text: a stirring , funny and finally transporting re-imagining of beauty and the beast and 1930s horror films
translation: 感動的で面白く、最終的には『美女と野獣』と1930年代のホラー映画を再構築した作品。
back_translation: A moving and interesting work that ultimately reconstructs "Beauty and the Beast" and 1930s horror films.

text: apparently reassembled from the cutting-room floor of any given daytime soap .
translation: どうやら、任意の昼間のソープオペラのカッティングルームの床から再構成されたようです。
back_translation: It seems to have been reconstructed from the floor of an arbitrary daytime soap opera's cutting room.

text: they presume their audience wo n't sit still for a sociology lesson , however entertainingly presented , so they trot out the conventional science-fiction elements of bug-eyed monsters and futuristic women in skimpy clothes .
translation: 彼らは、たとえ面白く提示されても、聴衆が社会学の授業にじっと座っているとは思っていないので、虫目の怪物や露出の多い服を着た未来的な女性といった従来のサイエンスフィクションの要素を持ち出します。
back_translation: They bring up traditional science fiction elements like insect-eyed monsters and futuristic women in revealing outfits, believing that the audience will not sit still in a sociology class, even if it's presented in an interesting way.

text: this is a visually stunning rumination on love , memory , history and the war between art and commerce .
translation: これは、愛、記憶、歴史、そして芸術と商業の間の戦争についての視覚的に素晴らしい考察です。
back_translation: This is a visually stunning examination of love, memory, history, and the war between art and commerce.

text: jonathan parker 's bartleby should have been the be-all-end-all of the modern-office anomie films .
translation: ジョナサン・パーカーの『バートルビー』は、現代のオフィスアノミー映画の決定版であるべきだった。
back_translation: Jonathan Parker's "Bertie" should have been the definitive modern office anomaly film.

text: campanella gets the tone just right -- funny in the middle of sad in the middle of hopeful .
translation: カンパネラはトーンを絶妙に調整している -- 希望の中に悲しみがあり、その中に面白さがある。
back_translation: Campanella exquisitely adjusts the tone -- there is sadness within hope, and within that, there is humor.

text: a fan film that for the uninitiated plays better on video with the sound turned down .
translation: 初心者には、音を消してビデオで見る方が楽しめるファンフィルムです。
back_translation: For beginners, it’s a fan film that is more enjoyable to watch on video with the sound muted.

text: béart and berling are both superb , while huppert ... is magnificent .
translation: ベアールとベルリンはどちらも素晴らしいですが、ヒュプフェルトは... 魅力的です。
back_translation: Both Beers and Berlin are great, but Hupfelt is... captivating.

text: a little less extreme than in the past , with longer exposition sequences between them , and with fewer gags to break the tedium .
translation: 過去より少し極端さが減り、彼らの間に長めの exposition シーケンスがあり、退屈を和らげるためのギャグが少なくなっています。
back_translation: The extremeness has decreased a bit compared to the past, there are longer exposition sequences among them, and the number of gags to alleviate boredom has decreased.

text: the film is strictly routine .
translation: その映画は厳密に言えば定型的です。
back_translation: The movie is strictly speaking, stereotypical.

text: a lyrical metaphor for cultural and personal self-discovery and a picaresque view of a little-remembered world .
translation: 文化的および個人的な自己発見の詩的な隠喩と、あまり記憶されていない世界に対するピカレスクな視点。
back_translation: A poetic metaphor for cultural and personal self-discovery, along with a picaresque perspective on a world that is little remembered.

text: the most repugnant adaptation of a classic text since roland joffé and demi moore 's the scarlet letter .
translation: ローランド・ジョッフェとデミ・ムーアの『スカーレット・レター』以来の、古典的なテキストの最も嫌悪すべき適応。
back_translation: The most detestable adaptation of a classical text since Roland Joffé and Demi Moore's "The Scarlet Letter."

text: for something as splendid-looking as this particular film , the viewer expects something special but instead gets -lrb- sci-fi -rrb- rehash .
translation: この特に見栄えのする映画に対して、観客は特別なものを期待しますが、代わりに得られるのは -lrb- サイエンスフィクション -rrb- の再hashです。
back_translation: For this particularly visually striking movie, the audience expects something special, but what they instead receive is a rehash of -lrb- science fiction -rrb-.

text: this is a stunning film , a one-of-a-kind tour de force .
translation: これは素晴らしい映画で、唯一無二の傑作です。
back_translation: This is a wonderful movie and a one-of-a-kind masterpiece.

text: may be more genial than ingenious , but it gets the job done .
translation: おそらく独創的というよりは親しみやすいかもしれませんが、仕事はこなせます。
back_translation: It may be more approachable than original, but it can get the job done.

text: there is a freedom to watching stunts that are this crude , this fast-paced and this insane .
translation: このように粗雑で、速いテンポで、そして狂気じみたスタントを観ることには自由がある。
back_translation: There is freedom in watching such rough, fast-paced, and crazy stunts.

text: if the tuxedo actually were a suit , it would fit chan like a $ 99 bargain-basement special .
translation: タキシードが実際にスーツであれば、それはチャンにとって99ドルのバーゲン品のようにぴったり合うだろう。
back_translation: If the tuxedo is actually a suit, it would fit Chan perfectly like a $99 bargain.

text: as quiet , patient and tenacious as mr. lopez himself , who approaches his difficult , endless work with remarkable serenity and discipline .
translation: ロペス氏自身のように静かで、忍耐強く、粘り強く、彼は困難で終わりのない仕事に驚くべき平静さと規律を持って取り組んでいます。
back_translation: Like Mr. Lopez himself, quiet, patient, and persevering, he approaches the difficult and endless work with remarkable calmness and discipline.

text: final verdict : you 've seen it all before .
translation: 最終的な判断：あなたはそれを以前にすべて見たことがある。
back_translation: Final judgment: You have seen it all before.

text: blue crush follows the formula , but throws in too many conflicts to keep the story compelling .
translation: ブルークラッシュは定型に従っていますが、物語を魅力的に保つためにあまりにも多くの対立を盛り込んでいます。
back_translation: Blue Crush follows a formula but incorporates too many conflicts to keep the story engaging.

text: you ... get a sense of good intentions derailed by a failure to seek and strike just the right tone .
translation: あなたは、適切なトーンを求めてうまく調和を取ろうとする失敗によって良い意図が逸脱する感覚を感じるでしょう。
back_translation: You will feel a sense that good intentions are deviating due to a failed attempt to harmonize in search of the appropriate tone.

text: a slick , engrossing melodrama .
translation: 洗練された、引き込まれるメロドラマ。
back_translation: A sophisticated and engaging melodrama.

text: a wretched movie that reduces the second world war to one man 's quest to find an old flame .
translation: 第二次世界大戦を一人の男が昔の恋人を探す旅に縮小した悲惨な映画。
back_translation: A tragic film that narrows down World War II to a man's journey to find an old lover.

text: will undoubtedly play well in european markets , where mr. besson is a brand name , and in asia , where ms. shu is an institution , but american audiences will probably find it familiar and insufficiently cathartic .
translation: 間違いなく欧州市場で好評を得るでしょう。ここではベッソン氏がブランド名であり、アジアではシュウ氏が権威です。しかし、アメリカの観客はおそらくそれを馴染み深く、十分なカタルシスを感じられないと感じるでしょう。
back_translation: There is no doubt that it will gain popularity in the European market. Here, Mr. Besson is the brand name, while Mr. Shu has authority in Asia. However, the American audience will likely find it unfamiliar and may not feel enough catharsis.

text: lacks the inspiration of the original and has a bloated plot that stretches the running time about 10 minutes past a child 's interest and an adult 's patience .
translation: オリジナルのインスピレーションに欠けており、膨れ上がったプロットが子供の興味と大人の忍耐をそれぞれ約10分超える上映時間を引き延ばしています。
back_translation: Lacking original inspiration, the inflated plot stretches the runtime to exceed about 10 minutes for children's interest and adults' patience respectively.

text: the santa clause 2 proves itself a more streamlined and thought out encounter than the original could ever have hoped to be .
translation: 『サンタクロース2』は、原作が期待することのできなかったよりも、一層洗練され、練られた体験であることを証明しています。
back_translation: "Santa Claus 2" proves to be a more refined and developed experience than what the original could have hoped for.

text: the film is moody , oozing , chilling and heart-warming all at once ... a twisting , unpredictable , cat-and-mouse thriller .
translation: その映画は、気分が変わり、じわじわと迫り、冷たくも心温まる要素が同時に存在する…ひねりの効いた予測不可能な猫とネズミのスリラーです。
back_translation: The movie is a cat-and-mouse thriller that changes the mood, builds slowly, and simultaneously contains both cold and heartwarming elements... with a twist that is unpredictable.

text: too bad .
translation: 残念です。
back_translation: That's unfortunate.

text: a strong first act and absolutely , inescapably gorgeous , skyscraper-trapeze motion of the amazing spider-man .
translation: 強力な第一幕と絶対に、避けられないほど美しい、驚くべきスパイダーマンの高層ビルのトラピーズの動き。
back_translation: A powerful first act and absolutely, inevitably beautiful, astonishing movements of Spider-Man on the skyscraper trapeze.

text: gooding offers a desperately ingratiating performance .
translation: グディングは必死に迎合するパフォーマンスを提供している。
back_translation: Gudding is desperately providing a performance that caters to others.

text: a well-intentioned effort that 's still too burdened by the actor 's offbeat sensibilities for the earnest emotional core to emerge with any degree of accessibility .
translation: 意図は良いが、俳優の独特な感性に重荷を負わされているため、誠実な感情の核心がアクセス可能な形で浮かび上がるには至らない努力。
back_translation: The intention is good, but due to the burden of the actor's unique sensitivity, the core of sincere emotions has not surfaced in an accessible form despite the effort.

text: a fun ride .
translation: 楽しい乗り物。
back_translation: Fun ride.

text: an edgy thriller that delivers a surprising punch .
translation: 驚くべきパンチをもたらすエッジの効いたスリラー。
back_translation: An edgy thriller that delivers astonishing punches.

text: ` what 's the russian word for wow !? '
translation: ロシア語で「ワオ！」は「Ух ты！」です。
back_translation: In Russian, "Wow!" is "Ух ты!"

text: otto-sallies has a real filmmaker 's eye .
translation: オットー・サリーズは本物の映画製作者の目を持っています。
back_translation: Otto Salles has the eye of a real filmmaker.

text: lurid and less than lucid work .
translation: 生々しく、明瞭さに欠ける作品。
back_translation: A work that is vivid but lacks clarity.

text: with its parade of almost perpetually wasted characters ... margarita feels like a hazy high that takes too long to shake .
translation: ほぼ常に酔っぱらったキャラクターたちのパレードの中で、マルガリータは振り払うのに時間がかかるぼんやりとした高揚感のように感じる。
back_translation: Amidst a parade of characters who are almost always drunk, Margarita feels like a hazy exhilaration that takes time to shake off.

text: i could just feel the screenwriter at every moment ` tap , tap , tap , tap , tapping away ' on this screenplay .
translation: スクリーンライターがこの脚本の上で「タップ、タップ、タップ、タップ」と書き続けているのを、私はあらゆる瞬間に感じることができた。
back_translation: I could feel the screenwriter "tap, tap, tap, tapping" away at this script in every moment.

text: overall , cletis tout is a winning comedy that excites the imagination and tickles the funny bone .
translation: 全体的に見て、「クレティス・タウト」は、想像力をかき立て、笑いのツボをくすぐる勝利のコメディです。
back_translation: Overall, "Kretis Tout" is a victorious comedy that stimulates the imagination and tickles the funny bone.

text: you live the mood rather than savour the story .
translation: あなたは物語を味わうのではなく、その雰囲気を生きています。
back_translation: You are not savoring the story, but living its atmosphere.

text: the movie is so thoughtlessly assembled .
translation: その映画は非常に無思慮に作られています。
back_translation: That movie is made very thoughtlessly.

text: some body is a shaky , uncertain film that nevertheless touches a few raw nerves .
translation: 『サム・ボディ』は不安定で不確実な映画ですが、それでもいくつかの敏感な神経に触れます。
back_translation: "Somebody" is an unstable and uncertain film, but it still touches on some sensitive nerves.

text: it 's a very sincere work , but it would be better as a diary or documentary .
translation: これは非常に誠実な作品ですが、日記やドキュメンタリーとしての方が良いでしょう。
back_translation: This is a very sincere work, but it would be better as a diary or documentary.

text: while american adobo has its heart -lrb- and its palate -rrb- in the right place , its brain is a little scattered -- ditsy , even .
translation: アメリカのアドボはその心（そして味覚）が正しい場所にありますが、頭は少し散漫で、ちょっとぼんやりしています。
back_translation: American adobo has its heart (and flavor) in the right place, but its head is a bit scattered and somewhat vague.

text: unfolds with such a wallop of you-are-there immediacy that when the bullets start to fly , your first instinct is to duck .
translation: あなたがそこにいるかのような迫力で展開し、弾が飛び始めると、最初の本能は思わず身をかがめることです。
back_translation: It unfolds with a powerful presence as if you were right there, and when the bullets start flying, the first instinct is to instinctively crouch down.

text: and it 's a lousy one at that .
translation: それはひどいものだ。
back_translation: That's terrible.

text: it 's not too fast and not too slow .
translation: 速すぎず遅すぎない。
back_translation: Not too fast and not too slow.

text: it 's an entertaining movie , and the effects , boosted to the size of a downtown hotel , will all but take you to outer space .
translation: それは魅力的な映画で、効果はダウンタウンのホテルの大きさに引き上げられ、ほとんどあなたを宇宙まで連れて行ってくれるでしょう。
back_translation: It's an intriguing movie, and the effects are elevated by the size of the downtown hotel, almost taking you to outer space.

text: it is as uncompromising as it is nonjudgmental , and makes clear that a prostitute can be as lonely and needy as any of the clients .
translation: それは妥協のない非判断的なものであり、売春婦がクライアントと同じくらい孤独で必要としている場合があることを明確に示しています。
back_translation: It clearly shows that it is an uncompromising, non-judgmental approach and that prostitutes can sometimes be just as lonely and in need as their clients.

text: compellingly watchable .
translation: 非常に魅力的に視聴できる。
back_translation: It is very appealing to watch.

text: despite some comic sparks , welcome to collinwood never catches fire .
translation: いくつかのコメディの火花が散るにもかかわらず、「ウェルカム・トゥ・コリンズウッド」は決して燃え上がらない。
back_translation: Despite some sparks of comedy, "Welcome to Collinwood" never truly ignites.

text: though jackson does n't always succeed in integrating the characters in the foreground into the extraordinarily rich landscape , it must be said that he is an imaginative filmmaker who can see the forest for the trees .
translation: ジャクソンは常に前景のキャラクターを非常に豊かな風景に統合することに成功しているわけではありませんが、彼が樹木の間に森を見出すことができる想像力豊かな映画製作者であることは言わざるを得ません。
back_translation: Jackson does not always succeed in integrating foreground characters into rich landscapes, but it must be said that he is an imaginative filmmaker who can find a forest among the trees.

text: not only does spider-man deliver , but i suspect it might deliver again and again .
translation: スパイダーマンは届けるだけでなく、何度も届けるかもしれないと疑っています。
back_translation: Spider-Man not only delivers but may also deliver multiple times.

text: it 's worth taking the kids to .
translation: 子供たちを連れて行く価値があります。
back_translation: It is worth taking the children with you.

text: without shakespeare 's eloquent language , the update is dreary and sluggish .
translation: シェイクスピアの雄弁な言葉なしでは、そのアップデートは陰気で鈍いです。
back_translation: Without Shakespeare's eloquent words, that update is gloomy and dull.

text: dense , exhilarating documentary .
translation: 密度の濃い、刺激的なドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A densely packed, provocative documentary.

text: ... feels as if -lrb- there 's -rrb- a choke leash around your neck so director nick cassavetes can give it a good , hard yank whenever he wants you to feel something .
translation: まるで、監督のニック・カサヴェテスがあなたに何かを感じさせたいときに、いつでも強く引っ張ることができる絞め縄が首にかかっているかのように感じます。
back_translation: It feels like there's a noose around your neck that director Nick Cassavetes can pull tightly whenever he wants to make you feel something.

text: poignant if familiar story of a young person suspended between two cultures .
translation: 二つの文化の間に揺れる若者の心に響く、どこか親しみのある物語。
back_translation: A familiar story that resonates with the hearts of young people caught between two cultures.

text: methodical , measured , and gently tedious in its comedy , secret ballot is a purposefully reductive movie -- which may be why it 's so successful at lodging itself in the brain .
translation: 方法的で計測された、そして穏やかに退屈なコメディである「秘密投票」は、意図的に簡素化された映画であり、これが脳に留まりやすい理由かもしれません。
back_translation: "Secret Ballot" is a methodical, measured, and gently boring comedy that is intentionally a simplified film, which may be the reason it sticks in the mind.

text: though a touch too arthouse 101 in its poetic symbolism , heaven proves to be a good match of the sensibilities of two directors .
translation: 少しアートハウス101的な詩的シンボリズムが感じられるものの、『ヘヴン』は2人の監督の感性がよく合っていることを証明している。
back_translation: Although it has a somewhat arthouse 101 poetic symbolism, "Heaven" proves that the sensibilities of the two directors align well.

text: superbly photographed and staged by mendes with a series of riveting set pieces the likes of which mainstream audiences have rarely seen .
translation: メンデスによって素晴らしく撮影され、演出された一連の魅力的なセットピースは、主流の観客がこれまでにほとんど見たことがないものです。
back_translation: The series of captivating set pieces, beautifully shot and directed by Mendes, is something that mainstream audiences have rarely seen before.

text: a metaphor for a modern-day urban china searching for its identity .
translation: 現代の都市中国が自らのアイデンティティを探し求めるメタファー。
back_translation: A metaphor for contemporary urban China searching for its own identity.

text: it 's a square , sentimental drama that satisfies , as comfort food often can .
translation: それは四角い、感情的なドラマであり、しばしば comfort food のように満足させてくれます。
back_translation: It is a square, emotional drama that often satisfies like comfort food.

text: the wonderfully lush morvern callar is pure punk existentialism , and ms. ramsay and her co-writer , liana dognini , have dramatized the alan warner novel , which itself felt like an answer to irvine welsh 's book trainspotting .
translation: 素晴らしく豊かな『モーヴァーン・キャラー』は純粋なパンク的実存主義であり、ラムゼイさんと彼女の共同執筆者リャナ・ドグニーニは、アラン・ワーナーの小説を dramatized しました。この小説自体も、アーヴィン・ウェルシュの『トレインスポッティング』への答えのように感じられました。
back_translation: The wonderfully rich 'Morvern Callar' is pure punk existentialism, and Ms. Ramsey, along with her co-writer Liana Dognini, has dramatized Alan Warner's novel. The novel itself also felt like a response to Irvine Welsh's 'Trainspotting.'

text: admirers of director abel ferrara may be relieved that his latest feature , r xmas , marks a modest if encouraging return to form .
translation: アベル・フェッラーラ監督のファンは、最新作『R Xmas』が控えめながらも励みになる復活を遂げたことに安堵するかもしれません。
back_translation: Fans of director Abel Ferrara might feel relieved that his latest work, "R Xmas," has made a modest yet encouraging comeback.

text: not once in the rush to save the day did i become very involved in the proceedings ; to me , it was just a matter of ` eh . '
translation: 一日を救うための慌ただしさの中で、私は proceedings に非常に関与することはなかった；私にとっては、ただの「うーん」という感じだった。
back_translation: In the hustle and bustle to save the day, I wasn't very involved in the proceedings; for me, it was just a feeling of "hmm."

text: an ugly-duckling tale so hideously and clumsily told it feels accidental .
translation: 醜いアヒルの子の物語が非常に醜く、不器用に語られ、偶然のように感じる。
back_translation: The story of the ugly duckling is told in a very ugly and clumsy manner, and feels like a coincidence.

text: becomes a bit of a mishmash : a tearjerker that does n't and a thriller that wo n't .
translation: 少しごちゃごちゃになってしまう：感動的なはずがそうでなく、スリラーながらそうではない。
back_translation: It's a bit chaotic: it should be moving but isn't, and it's a thriller yet not quite that either.

text: could i have been more geeked when i heard that apollo 13 was going to be released in imax format ?
translation: アポロ13がIMAXフォーマットで公開されると聞いたとき、もっと興奮してもよかったのかもしれません。
back_translation: When I heard that Apollo 13 would be released in IMAX format, I could have been more excited.

text: this is a very ambitious project for a fairly inexperienced filmmaker , but good actors , good poetry and good music help sustain it .
translation: これは、あまり経験のない映画製作者にとって非常に野心的なプロジェクトですが、良い俳優、良い詩、そして良い音楽がそれを支えています。
back_translation: This is a very ambitious project for a filmmaker with little experience, but it is supported by good actors, good poetry, and good music.

text: more successful at relating history than in creating an emotionally complex , dramatically satisfying heroine
translation: 歴史を伝えることには成功しているが、感情的に複雑で劇的に満足のいくヒロインを創造することには成功していない。
back_translation: While they have succeeded in conveying history, they have not succeeded in creating emotionally complex and dramatically satisfying heroines.

text: cho 's timing is priceless .
translation: チョのタイミングは貴重だ。
back_translation: Cho's timing is precious.

text: criminal conspiracies and true romances move so easily across racial and cultural lines in the film that it makes my big fat greek wedding look like an apartheid drama .
translation: 犯罪の陰謀や真実の恋愛が映画の中で人種や文化の境界を簡単に超えているので、私のビッグ・ファット・ギリシャ・ウェディングがアパルトヘイトのドラマのように見える。
back_translation: Because the conspiracies of crime and true love easily transcend racial and cultural boundaries in movies, my Big Fat Greek Wedding looks like a drama of apartheid.

text: there 's something to be said for a studio-produced film that never bothers to hand viewers a suitcase full of easy answers .
translation: 簡単な答えを詰め込んだスーツケースを観客に手渡すことを気にしないスタジオ制作の映画には、何か言えることがある。
back_translation: There is something to be said about a studio-produced film that does not hesitate to hand the audience a suitcase filled with easy answers.

text: what elevates the movie above the run-of-the-mill singles blender is its surreal sense of humor and technological finish .
translation: その映画をありふれたシングルブレンダーから引き上げるのは、シュールなユーモアと技術的な仕上がりです。
back_translation: What elevates the movie from an ordinary single blender is its surreal humor and technical finesse.

text: nicholson 's understated performance is wonderful .
translation: ニコルソンの控えめな演技は素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Nicholson's understated performance is wonderful.

text: the filmmakers know how to please the eye , but it is not always the prettiest pictures that tell the best story .
translation: 映画製作者は目を楽しませる方法を知っていますが、最も美しい絵が最良の物語を語るわけではありません。
back_translation: Filmmakers know how to delight the eyes, but the most beautiful images do not always tell the best stories.

text: it 's unfortunate that wallace , who wrote gibson 's braveheart as well as the recent pearl harbor , has such an irrepressible passion for sappy situations and dialogue .
translation: ワレスはギブソンの「ブレイブハート」や最近の「パールハーバー」を書いたにもかかわらず、そうした感傷的な状況と対話に対して抑えきれない情熱を持っているのは残念です。
back_translation: It is unfortunate that Wallace, despite having written Gibson's "Braveheart" and the recent "Pearl Harbor," has an uncontrollable passion for such sentimental situations and dialogues.

text: jackson shamefully strolls through this mess with a smug grin , inexplicably wearing a kilt and carrying a bag of golf clubs over one shoulder .
translation: ジャクソンはこの混乱を恥ずかしそうに歩き回り、得意げな笑みを浮かべて、不可解にキルトを着て片肩にゴルフクラブのバッグをぶら下げている。
back_translation: Jackson walks around this chaos with a shy demeanor, wearing a proud smile, inexplicably dressed in a quilt and dangling a golf club bag from one shoulder.

text: ... a fascinating curiosity piece -- fascinating , that is , for about ten minutes .
translation: ... 魅力的な好奇心の作品 — 魅力的なのは、約10分間だけです。
back_translation: ... A captivating work of curiosity — it is captivating for just about 10 minutes.

text: over and over again .
translation: 何度も何度も。
back_translation: Again and again.

text: nolan proves that he can cross swords with the best of them and helm a more traditionally plotted popcorn thriller while surrendering little of his intellectual rigor or creative composure .
translation: ノーランは、自身が最高の相手と剣を交えることができることを証明し、伝統的なプロットのポップコーンスリラーを指揮しながら、知的厳密さや創造的な冷静さをほとんど失うことなく実現しています。
back_translation: Nolan proves that he can engage in swordplay with the best opponents while directing a traditional plot popcorn thriller, achieving this with little loss of intellectual rigor or creative calmness.

text: this bond film goes off the beaten path , not necessarily for the better .
translation: このボンド映画は、必ずしも良い方向ではないが、従来の道から外れた。
back_translation: This Bond film has deviated from the traditional path, though not necessarily in a good way.

text: ... its solemn pretension prevents us from sharing the awe in which it holds itself .
translation: ...その厳粛な気取っている態度が、私たちがそれ自身に抱く畏敬の念を共有することを妨げています。
back_translation: ...that solemn, pretentious attitude hinders us from sharing the awe we hold for ourselves.

text: the drama discloses almost nothing .
translation: そのドラマはほとんど何も明らかにしない。
back_translation: That drama reveals almost nothing.

text: a sham construct based on theory , sleight-of-hand , and ill-wrought hypothesis .
translation: 理論、手品、そして未熟な仮説に基づく欺瞞的な構造。
back_translation: Theory, magic, and a deceptive structure based on immature hypotheses.

text: isabelle huppert excels as the enigmatic mika and anna mouglalis is a stunning new young talent in one of chabrol 's most intense psychological mysteries .
translation: イザベル・ユペールは謎めいたミカとして卓越しており、アンナ・ムグラリスはシャブロルの最も intenseな心理的ミステリーの一つで素晴らしい新しい若手の才能を見せています。
back_translation: Isabelle Huppert excels as the enigmatic Mika, and Anna Mouglalis showcases a wonderful new young talent in one of Chabrol's most intense psychological mysteries.

text: like its parade of predecessors , this halloween is a gory slash-fest .
translation: 前の作品と同様に、今年のハロウィンは血まみれのスラッシュフェストです。
back_translation: Like the previous work, this year's Halloween is a blood-soaked slasher fest.

text: perhaps the best sports movie i 've ever seen .
translation: 今まで見た中で、おそらく最高のスポーツ映画です。
back_translation: Probably the best sports movie I've ever seen.

text: this pathetic junk is barely an hour long .
translation: この情けないゴミは、わずか1時間しかありません。
back_translation: This pathetic garbage only has one hour left.

text: ou 've got to love a disney pic with as little cleavage as this one has , and a heroine as feisty and principled as jane .
translation: この映画は、こんなに肌の露出が少ないディズニー作品を愛するべきだし、ジェーンのように活発で原則を持ったヒロインがいるのも魅力的だ。
back_translation: This movie should be loved for having such little skin exposure compared to other Disney works, and it's also appealing to have a lively and principled heroine like Jane.

text: this is a gorgeous film - vivid with color , music and life .
translation: これは美しい映画です - 色、音楽、そして生命にあふれています。
back_translation: This is a beautiful movie - full of color, music, and life.

text: playing a role of almost bergmanesque intensity ... bisset is both convincing and radiant .
translation: ほぼベルイマン的な強 intensity を持つ役割を演じている ... ビセットは説得力があり、輝いている。
back_translation: He plays a role with almost Bergman-like intensity... Bisset is persuasive and brilliant.

text: the trappings of i spy are so familiar you might as well be watching a rerun .
translation: 「アイ・スパイ」の特徴は非常に馴染み深く、再放送を見ているかのようです。
back_translation: The characteristics of "I Spy" are very familiar, as if I am watching a rerun.

text: it treats ana 's journey with honesty that is tragically rare in the depiction of young women in film .
translation: それは、映画における若い女性の描写において悲劇的に希少な正直さで、アナの旅を扱っています。
back_translation: It deals with Anna's journey with a tragically rare honesty in the depiction of young women in film.

text: leigh makes these lives count .
translation: レイはこれらの人生を大切にします。
back_translation: Ray cherishes these lives.

text: ambitious , unsettling psychodrama that takes full , chilling advantage of its rough-around-the-edges , low-budget constraints .
translation: 野心的で不穏なサイコドラマで、荒削りで低予算の制約を完全に、ぞっとするほど活かしています。
back_translation: It is an ambitious and unsettling psychological drama that fully and chillingly makes use of its rough and low-budget constraints.

text: the woodman seems to have directly influenced this girl-meets-girl love story , but even more reassuring is how its makers actually seem to understand what made allen 's romantic comedies so pertinent and enduring .
translation: ウッドマンはこのガール・ミーツ・ガールのラブストーリーに直接影響を与えているようですが、さらに安心できるのは、その製作者たちがアレンのロマンティックコメディがなぜそんなに重要で永続的であるのかを実際に理解しているように見えることです。
back_translation: It seems that Woodman has a direct influence on this girl-meets-girl love story, but what is even more reassuring is that the creators appear to actually understand why Allen's romantic comedies are so important and enduring.

text: i could n't recommend this film more .
translation: この映画をこれ以上お勧めすることはできません。
back_translation: I cannot recommend this movie enough.

text: an inexperienced director , mehta has much to learn .
translation: 経験の浅い監督であるメータには、学ぶべきことがたくさんある。
back_translation: The inexperienced director, Mehta, has much to learn.

text: you can taste it , but there 's no fizz .
translation: 味わうことはできるが、泡はない。
back_translation: You can taste it, but there are no bubbles.

text: a reworking of die hard and cliffhanger but it 's nowhere near as exciting as either .
translation: 『ダイ・ハード』と『クリフハンガー』のリメイクですが、どちらにも全く及ばないほどの興奮しかありません。
back_translation: The remakes of "Die Hard" and "Cliffhanger" can only generate excitement that doesn't even come close to the originals.

text: a moving tale of love and destruction in unexpected places , unexamined lives .
translation: 予期しない場所での愛と破壊の感動的な物語、検証されない人生。
back_translation: An emotional story of love and destruction in unexpected places, an unverified life.

text: it has more than a few moments that are insightful enough to be fondly remembered in the endlessly challenging maze of moviegoing .
translation: 映画鑑賞の終わりのない迷路の中で、愛情を持って思い出されるほど洞察に満ちた瞬間がいくつかあります。
back_translation: In the never-ending maze of watching movies, there are several insightful moments that are fondly remembered.

text: why ?
translation: なぜですか？
back_translation: Why is that?

text: and that is where ararat went astray .
translation: そして、そこがアララトの道を外れたところです。
back_translation: And that is where it diverges from the path of Ararat.

text: vincent gallo is right at home in this french shocker playing his usual bad boy weirdo role .
translation: ヴィンセント・ギャロは、このフランスの衝撃作でいつもの悪役風変わりな役割を演じており、まるで自分の家にいるかのようです。
back_translation: Vincent Gallo plays a quirky villain in this shocking French film, as if he is right at home.

text: clockstoppers is one of those crazy , mixed-up films that does n't know what it wants to be when it grows up .
translation: クロックストップパーズは、大人になったときに何になりたいのかわからない、混乱したクレイジーな映画の一つです。
back_translation: Clockstopper is one of those crazy, confusing movies that doesn’t quite know what it wants to be when it grows up.

text: sandra bullock , despite downplaying her good looks , carries a little too much ai n't - she-cute baggage into her lead role as a troubled and determined homicide cop to quite pull off the heavy stuff .
translation: サンドラ・ブロックは、自身の美しさを控えめに表現しているにもかかわらず、トラブルを抱えた決意に満ちた殺人捜査官の主役を演じるには、少し過剰な「かわいい」要素を持ちすぎているため、重厚な内容をうまくこなすことができていない。
back_translation: Sandra Bullock, despite modestly expressing her beauty, has a bit too much of an excessive "cute" element to convincingly portray the role of a determined murder investigator with troubled resolve, which makes it hard for her to handle the heavy content effectively.

text: it 's mostly a pleasure to watch .
translation: 見るのは主に楽しみです。
back_translation: Watching is mainly for enjoyment.

text: its spirit of iconoclastic abandon -- however canned -- makes for unexpectedly giddy viewing .
translation: それの偶像破壊的な放縦の精神は、たとえ作り物であっても、予想外に気分が高揚する視聴体験をもたらします。
back_translation: The spirit of that iconoclastic indulgence, even if artificial, brings an unexpectedly uplifting viewing experience.

text: a kilted jackson is an unsettling sight , and indicative of his , if you will , out-of-kilter character , who rambles aimlessly through ill-conceived action pieces .
translation: キルトを身に着けたジャクソンは不気味な光景であり、彼の常識外れの性格を示しています。彼は、考えなしに作られたアクションシーンをさまようことになります。
back_translation: Jackson, wearing a quilt, presents a creepy sight that reflects his unconventional character. He will wander through action scenes created thoughtlessly.

text: i did n't find much fascination in the swinging .
translation: 私はブランコにあまり魅力を感じませんでした。
back_translation: I didn't find the swing very appealing.

text: this is no `` waterboy ! ''
translation: これは「ウォーターボーイ」ではない！
back_translation: This is not a "Waterboy"!

text: but the nerve-raked acting , the crackle of lines , the impressive stagings of hardware , make for some robust and scary entertainment .
translation: しかし、神経を逆なでする演技、セリフのひび割れ、印象的な演出のハードウェアは、力強く恐怖を与えるエンターテインメントを作り出しています。
back_translation: However, performances that go against one's nerves, cracked lines, and impressive hardware in direction create powerful and terrifying entertainment.

text: baby-faced renner is eerily convincing as this bland blank of a man with unimaginable demons within .
translation: 赤ちゃんのような顔のレンナーは、想像を絶する悪魔を抱えたこの無味乾燥な男として、ぞっとするほど説得力があります。
back_translation: Renner, with a face like a baby, is chillingly convincing as this bland man who harbors unimaginable evil.

text: the kind of primal storytelling that george lucas can only dream of .
translation: ジョージ・ルーカスが夢見ることしかできないような原始的なストーリーテリング。
back_translation: A primitive form of storytelling that George Lucas can only dream of.

text: uplifting as only a document of the worst possibilities of mankind can be , and among the best films of the year .
translation: 人類の最悪の可能性を示す文書としてのみ高揚感を与えるものであり、今年のベスト映画の中の一つ。
back_translation: It only evokes excitement as a document that shows humanity's worst possibilities, and it is one of the best films of the year.

text: the irwins ' scenes are fascinating ; the movie as a whole is cheap junk and an insult to their death-defying efforts .
translation: アーウィン家のシーンは魅力的ですが、映画全体は安っぽいゴミであり、彼らの死をかけた努力に対する侮辱です。
back_translation: The scenes of the Irwin family are captivating, but the overall movie is cheap rubbish and an insult to their efforts that risked their lives.

text: it 's a frightful vanity film that , no doubt , pays off what debt miramax felt they owed to benigni .
translation: これは恐ろしい虚栄心の映画で、間違いなくミラマックスがベニーニに対して感じていた借金を返済するものです。
back_translation: This is a terrifying film of vanity, and it undoubtedly pays off the debt that Miramax felt towards Benigni.

text: he seems to want both , but succeeds in making neither .
translation: 彼は両方を望んでいるようですが、どちらもうまくいっていないようです。
back_translation: It seems that he wants both, but neither is going well.

text: by turns fanciful , grisly and engagingly quixotic .
translation: 一方では空想的で、一方では恐ろしい、そして魅力的にキュイジックです。
back_translation: On one hand, it's fanciful, on the other hand, it's terrifying, and it's captivatingly quirky.

text: the re-release of ron howard 's apollo 13 in the imax format proves absolutely that really , really , really good things can come in enormous packages .
translation: ロン・ハワードの「アポロ13」のIMAXフォーマットでの再リリースは、本当に素晴らしいものが巨大なパッケージでやってくることを証明しています。
back_translation: Ron Howard's re-release of "Apollo 13" in IMAX format proves that truly amazing things come in large packages.

text: i 've never seen -lrb- a remake -rrb- do anything as stomach-turning as the way adam sandler 's new movie rapes , pillages and incinerates frank capra 's classic ...
translation: 私はアダム・サンドラーの新しい映画がフランク・キャプラのクラシックをどのように破壊し、略奪し、焼き尽くすかを見て、これほどまでに胸が悪くなるリメイクを見たことがありません。
back_translation: I have never seen a remake that made me feel so nauseated as I watched Adam Sandler's new movie destroy, plunder, and burn a classic by Frank Capra.

text: those who want to be jolted out of their gourd should drop everything and run to ichi .
translation: 自分の常識を覆したい人は、すべてを捨ててイチに走るべきです。
back_translation: People who want to overturn their own common sense should throw everything away and run towards "one."

text: mr. deeds is , as comedy goes , very silly -- and in the best way .
translation: ミスター・ディーズは、コメディとしては非常に馬鹿げていて、でもその良い方法でそうです。
back_translation: Mr. D's is very silly as a comedy, but in a good way.

text: this amiable picture talks tough , but it 's all bluster -- in the end it 's as sweet as greenfingers ...
translation: この愛らしい絵は強気に語っていますが、それはすべて空威張りです -- 最終的には緑の指のように甘いです...
back_translation: This charming picture speaks confidently, but it's all just a bluff -- ultimately, it's as sweet as green fingers...

text: my little eye is the best little `` horror '' movie i 've seen in years .
translation: 私の小さな目は、ここ数年で見た中で最高の小さな「ホラー」映画です。
back_translation: My tiny eyes have seen the best little "horror" movie in the past few years.

text: the movie is a negligible work of manipulation , an exploitation piece doing its usual worst to guilt-trip parents .
translation: その映画は取るに足らない操作の作品であり、親を罪悪感で苦しめるいつもの最悪な搾取作品です。
back_translation: That movie is a trivial piece of work, the usual worst kind of exploitation that torments parents with guilt.

text: it may ... work as a jaunt down memory lane for teens and young adults who grew up on televised scooby-doo shows or reruns .
translation: それは、テレビで放送されていたスカビー・ドゥーの番組や再放送を見て育ったティーンエイジャーや若い大人たちにとって、思い出の散策として機能するかもしれません。
back_translation: It may serve as a nostalgic exploration for teenagers and young adults who grew up watching the Scooby-Doo shows and reruns that aired on television.

text: suffers from a flat script and a low budget .
translation: 平坦な脚本と低予算に悩まされています。
back_translation: I am struggling with a flat script and a low budget.

text: the movie is well done , but slow .
translation: 映画はよくできていますが、遅いです。
back_translation: The movie is well made, but it's slow.

text: the master of disguise is awful .
translation: 変装の達人はひどいです。
back_translation: The master of disguise is terrible.

text: the film is one of the year 's best .
translation: その映画は今年のベストの一つです。
back_translation: That movie is one of the best of the year.

text: one of the year 's most weirdly engaging and unpredictable character pieces .
translation: 今年の最も奇妙に魅力的で予測不可能なキャラクター作品の一つ。
back_translation: One of the most strangely captivating and unpredictable character works of this year.

text: the direction occasionally rises to the level of marginal competence , but for most of the film it is hard to tell who is chasing who or why .
translation: 方向性は時々限界的な能力のレベルに達するが、映画の大部分では誰が誰を追いかけているのか、またその理由がわかりにくい。
back_translation: The direction sometimes reaches a limiting level of ability, but for most of the movie, it's unclear who is chasing whom and why.

text: the three leads produce adequate performances , but what 's missing from this material is any depth of feeling .
translation: 三人の主役は十分なパフォーマンスを見せていますが、この素材に欠けているのは感情の深みです。
back_translation: The three main characters are delivering a sufficient performance, but what is lacking in this material is emotional depth.

text: `` looking for leonard '' just seems to kinda sit in neutral , hoping for a stiff wind to blow it uphill or something .
translation: 「レオナルドを探している」はただ中立のままで、何かの強風が吹いて上へ運んでくれることを願っているようです。
back_translation: "Searching for Leonardo" seems to remain neutral, hoping that some strong wind will blow and carry it upwards.

text: the most surprising thing about this film is that they are actually releasing it into theaters .
translation: この映画の最も驚くべきことは、実際に劇場で公開するということです。
back_translation: The most surprising thing about this movie is that it will actually be released in theaters.

text: ... one resurrection too many .
translation: …復活するには多すぎる。
back_translation: It's too much to be revived.

text: oh , look at that clever angle !
translation: おお、その巧妙な角度を見て！
back_translation: Oh, look at that clever angle!

text: no , i hate it .
translation: いいえ、嫌いです。
back_translation: No, I don't like it.

text: for a long time the film succeeds with its dark , delicate treatment of these characters and its unerring respect for them .
translation: 長い間、この映画はこれらのキャラクターに対する暗く繊細な扱いと揺るぎない敬意によって成功しています。
back_translation: For a long time, this film has succeeded due to its dark and subtle treatment of these characters and its unwavering respect for them.

text: the casting of raymond j. barry as the ` assassin ' greatly enhances the quality of neil burger 's impressive fake documentary .
translation: レイモンド・J・バリーの「暗殺者」としてのキャスティングは、ニール・バーガーの印象的なフェイクドキュメンタリーの質を大いに高めている。
back_translation: The casting of Raymond J. Barry as the "assassin" greatly enhances the quality of Neil Burger's impressive faux documentary.

text: the film is like sitting in a downtown café , overhearing a bunch of typical late-twenty-somethings natter on about nothing , and desperately wishing you could change tables .
translation: その映画は、ダウンタウンのカフェに座って、典型的な20代後半の若者たちが何もないことについておしゃべりしているのを聞きながら、必死にテーブルを変えたいと思うようなものです。
back_translation: That movie is like wanting desperately to change tables while sitting in a downtown café, listening to typical twenty-somethings chatting about nothing.

text: the filmmakers want nothing else than to show us a good time , and in their cheap , b movie way , they succeed .
translation: 映画製作者たちは私たちに楽しいひとときを過ごさせること以外、何も望んでおらず、安価なB級映画の手法で彼らは成功しています。
back_translation: Filmmakers want nothing more than to give us a good time, and they are succeeding with the techniques of cheap B-movies.

text: a rollicking ride , with jaw-dropping action sequences , striking villains , a gorgeous color palette , astounding technology , stirring music and a boffo last hour that leads up to a strangely sinister happy ending .
translation: 騒がしい乗り物で、驚くべきアクションシーン、印象的な悪役、美しいカラーパレット、驚くべき技術、心を揺さぶる音楽、そして奇妙に不気味なハッピーエンドに至る素晴らしい最後の1時間があります。
back_translation: It has a noisy vehicle, incredible action scenes, an impressive villain, a beautiful color palette, amazing technology, heart-stirring music, and a wonderfully strange and unsettling happy ending in the remarkable last hour.

text: an hour and a half of joyful solo performance .
translation: 1時間半の楽しいソロパフォーマンス。
back_translation: A fun solo performance for one and a half hours.

text: contrived pastiche of caper clichés .
translation: 作為的なキャパーのクリシェの模倣。
back_translation: An imitation of the cliché of a caper.

text: a triumph , a film that hews out a world and carries us effortlessly from darkness to light .
translation: 勝利、暗闇から光へと effortlessly に私たちを導く世界を切り開く映画。
back_translation: A film that effortlessly leads us from darkness to light, paving the way for victory.

text: steven soderbergh 's digital video experiment is a clever and cutting , quick and dirty look at modern living and movie life .
translation: スティーブン・ソダーバーグのデジタルビデオ実験は、現代の生活と映画の生活を巧妙で鋭く、迅速かつ手軽に見せるものです。
back_translation: Steven Soderbergh's digital video experiments cleverly and sharply showcase modern life and the life of cinema in a quick and easy manner.

text: kinnear 's performance is a career-defining revelation .
translation: キニアのパフォーマンスはキャリアを定義する啓示です。
back_translation: Kinia's performance is a revelation that defines her career.

text: not only a reminder of how they used to make movies , but also how they sometimes still can be made .
translation: 映画を制作する方法のリマインダーだけでなく、時にはまだそのように制作されることができる方法でもあります。
back_translation: It's not just a reminder of how to produce a movie; sometimes it's also a way that still can be produced like that.

text: the dragons are the real stars of reign of fire and you wo n't be disappointed .
translation: ドラゴンが『レイン・オブ・ファイア』の真のスターであり、あなたは失望しないでしょう。
back_translation: The dragon is the true star of "Reign of Fire," and you won't be disappointed.

text: if you 're over 25 , have an iq over 90 , and have a driver 's license , you should be able to find better entertainment .
translation: 25歳以上で、IQが90以上で、運転免許を持っているなら、もっと良いエンターテイメントを見つけることができるはずです。
back_translation: If you are over 25 years old, have an IQ of 90 or higher, and possess a driver's license, you should be able to find better entertainment.

text: for devotees of french cinema , safe conduct is so rich with period minutiae it 's like dying and going to celluloid heaven .
translation: フランス映画の愛好者にとって、『セーフ・コンダクト』は時代の細部が豊富で、まるで死んでセルロイドの天国に行くような感じです。
back_translation: For lovers of French cinema, "Safe Conduct" is rich in the details of the era, as if one were going to a paradise of celluloid after death.

text: scherfig , who has had a successful career in tv , tackles more than she can handle .

text: this sade is hardly a perverse , dangerous libertine and agitator -- which would have made for better drama .

text: by the end of the movie , you 're definitely convinced that these women are spectacular .

text: ... a plotline that 's as lumpy as two-day old porridge ... the filmmakers ' paws , sad to say , were all over this `` un-bear-able '' project !

text: the modern-day royals have nothing on these guys when it comes to scandals .
translation: 現代の王族たちは、スキャンダルに関してはこれらの人々にはかないません。

text: essentially `` fatal attraction '' remade for viewers who were in diapers when the original was released in 1987 .
translation: 基本的に「致命的な誘惑」を1987年に元の作品が公開されたときにおむつを履いていた視聴者のためにリメイクしたものです。

text: it does n't really know or care about the characters , and uses them as markers for a series of preordained events .
translation: キャラクターについて本当に知っているわけでも気にかけているわけでもなく、前もって定められた一連の出来事のマーカーとして使っています。

translation: プレイを「オープニングアップ」することは、部分的にそれを閉じてしまった。

text: even though it 's common knowledge that park and his founding partner , yong kang , lost kozmo in the end , you ca n't help but get caught up in the thrill of the company 's astonishing growth .
translation: パークと彼の創設パートナーのヨン・カンが結局コズモを失ったことは常識であるにもかかわらず、その会社の驚くべき成長のスリルに引き込まれてしまうのを禁じ得ない。
back_translation: Despite the common understanding that Park and his founding partner Yong Kang ultimately lost Cosmo, one cannot help but be drawn into the thrill of the company's astonishing growth.

text: lots of effort and intelligence are on display but in execution it is all awkward , static , and lifeless rumblings .
translation: 多くの努力と知性が示されていますが、実行においてはすべて不格好で静的、そして生気のないゴロゴロした音に過ぎません。

text: every moment crackles with tension , and by the end of the flick , you 're on the edge of your seat .
translation: すべての瞬間が緊張感にあふれ、映画の終わりまでにはあなたは席の端に座っていることでしょう。
back_translation: Every moment is filled with tension, and by the end of the movie, you will likely be sitting on the edge of your seat.

text: the imax screen enhances the personal touch of manual animation .
translation: IMAXスクリーンは手動アニメーションの個人的なタッチを強化します。
back_translation: The IMAX screen enhances the personal touch of hand-drawn animation.

text: coal is n't as easy to come by as it used to be and this would be a worthy substitute for naughty children 's stockings .
translation: 石炭は以前ほど簡単には手に入らなくなっており、これは悪戯っ子のストッキングに代わる価値のあるものです。
back_translation: Coal is no longer as easily obtainable as it used to be, and this is a worthy substitute for mischief-makers' stockings.

text: as pedestrian as they come .
translation: ありふれた存在だ。
back_translation: It is an ordinary existence.

text: why , you may ask , why should you buy the movie milk when the tv cow is free ?
translation: なぜ、あなたは尋ねるかもしれませんが、無料のテレビ牛があるのに、映画「ミルク」を購入する必要があるのですか？
back_translation: You may ask, why do I need to buy the movie "Milk" when there are free TV shows?

text: sunk by way too much indulgence of scene-chewing , teeth-gnashing actorliness .
translation: シーンを噛み締めるような過度な振る舞いや、歯を食いしばるような演技によって沈んでしまった。
back_translation: The excessive behavior of savoring the scene and the acting that felt like gritting one’s teeth ended up weighing heavily.

text: that 's fun for kids of any age .
translation: それはどの年齢の子供にとっても楽しいです。
back_translation: It's fun for children of any age.

text: raimi and his team could n't have done any better in bringing the story of spider-man to the big screen .
translation: ライミと彼のチームは、スパイダーマンの物語をビッグスクリーンに持ってくる上で、これ以上のことはできなかった。
back_translation: Raimi and his team could not have done more to bring Spider-Man's story to the big screen.

text: a colorful , joyous celebration of life ; a tapestry woven of romance , dancing , singing , and unforgettable characters .
translation: 色とりどりで喜びに満ちた生命の祝典；ロマンス、ダンス、歌、そして忘れられないキャラクターで織りなされたタペストリー。
back_translation: A vibrant and joyful celebration of life; a tapestry woven with romance, dance, song, and unforgettable characters.

text: a rip-roaring comedy action fest that 'll put hairs on your chest .
translation: 胸に毛を生やすような大爆笑のアクションフェスト。
back_translation: An action fest that will make your chest hair grow with laughter.

text: the premise of jason x is silly but strangely believable .
translation: ジェイソンXの前提はばかげているが、奇妙に信じられる。

text: the modern-day characters are nowhere near as vivid as the 19th-century ones .
translation: 現代のキャラクターは19世紀のキャラクターほど鮮やかではありません。

text: chelsea walls is a case of too many chefs fussing over too weak a recipe .
translation: チェルシー・ウォールズは、あまりにも多くのシェフが弱すぎるレシピにこだわりすぎているケースです。

text: the cast ... keeps this pretty watchable , and casting mick jagger as director of the escort service was inspired .
translation: キャストはこの作品をかなり見やすくしており、ミック・ジャガーを escort サービスのディレクターとしてキャスティングしたのは素晴らしいアイデアでした。
back_translation: The cast has made this work quite easy to watch, and casting Mick Jagger as the director of an escort service was a brilliant idea.

text: -lrb- the kid 's -rrb- just too bratty for sympathy , and as the film grows to its finale , his little changes ring hollow .
translation: その子供はあまりにもわがままで同情の余地がない、そして映画がクライマックスに近づくにつれ、彼の小さな変化は空々しく響く。
back_translation: The child is too spoiled to evoke any sympathy, and as the movie approaches its climax, his small changes ring hollow.

text: contradicts everything we 've come to expect from movies nowadays .
translation: 現代の映画から私たちが期待してきたすべてに矛盾しています。
back_translation: It contradicts everything we have come to expect from modern films.

text: there is little question that this is a serious work by an important director who has something new to say about how , in the flip-flop of courtship , we often reel in when we should be playing out .
translation: この作品は、重要な監督による真剣な作品であり、私たちが恋愛の駆け引きの中で、プレイすべきときに引き下がってしまうことについて新しい視点を持っていることに疑いの余地はありません。
back_translation: This work is a serious piece by an important director, and there is no doubt that it offers a new perspective on how we sometimes step back when we should be playing the game of romantic maneuvering.

text: the script has less spice than a rat burger and the rock 's fighting skills are more in line with steven seagal .
translation: そのスクリプトはネズミのハンバーガーよりもスパイスが少なく、ザ・ロックの戦闘スキルはスティーブン・セガールにより近い。
back_translation: The script has less spice than a mouse hamburger, and The Rock's combat skills are closer to Steven Seagal's.

text: the solid filmmaking and convincing characters makes this a high water mark for this genre .
translation: 確固たる映像制作と説得力のあるキャラクターが、このジャンルの高い水準を示しています。
back_translation: Solid video production and compelling characters demonstrate the high standards of this genre.

text: the kind of movie that comes along only occasionally , one so unconventional , gutsy and perfectly executed it takes your breath away .
translation: 滅多に出会えない、非常に常識外れで大胆で完璧に仕上げられた映画で、息を呑むような作品。
back_translation: A rarely encountered, extremely unconventional, bold, and perfectly crafted film that takes your breath away.

text: with an admirably dark first script by brent hanley , paxton , making his directorial feature debut , does strong , measured work .
translation: ブレント・ハンリーによる賞賛すべきダークな初脚本をもとに、パクストンが監督デビューを果たし、しっかりとした、控えめな仕事をしています。
back_translation: Based on Brent Hanley's commendable dark debut script, Paxton makes his directorial debut, delivering a solid and understated piece of work.

text: funny , somber , absurd , and , finally , achingly sad , bartleby is a fine , understated piece of filmmaking .
translation: 面白く、厳粛で、滑稽で、そして最後には痛ましいほど悲しい『バルトルビー』は、素晴らしく控えめな映画作品です。
back_translation: "Bartleby," which is interesting, solemn, comical, and ultimately painfully sad, is a wonderfully understated film.

text: every now and again , a movie comes along to remind us of how very bad a motion picture can truly be .
translation: 時々、私たちに映画がどれほどひどいものになり得るかを思い出させる映画が現れます。
back_translation: Sometimes, a film appears that reminds us just how terrible movies can become.

text: unfortunately , there is almost nothing in this flat effort that will amuse or entertain them , either .
translation: 残念ながら、この平凡な努力には、彼らを楽しませたり、面白がらせたりするものはほとんどありません。
back_translation: Unfortunately, this ordinary effort has very little to entertain or amuse them.

text: schrader examines crane 's decline with unblinking candor .
translation: シュレイダーはクレーンの衰退を率直に検証している。
back_translation: Schreider candidly examines the decline of cranes.

text: that the e-graveyard holds as many good ideas as bad is the cold comfort that chin 's film serves up with style and empathy .
translation: eグレイブヤードには悪いアイデアと同じくらい良いアイデアがあるということは、チンの映画がスタイルと共感を持って提供する冷たい慰めです。
back_translation: The notion that there are just as many bad ideas in the e-graveyard as there are good ones is a cold comfort that films by Chin offer with style and empathy.

text: you would n't want to live waydowntown , but it is a hilarious place to visit .
translation: あなたはダウンタウンの深いところに住みたくはないでしょうが、訪れるには面白い場所です。
back_translation: You probably don't want to live deep in downtown, but it's an interesting place to visit.

text: the bai brothers have taken an small slice of history and opened it up for all of us to understand , and they 've told a nice little story in the process .
translation: バイ兄弟は歴史の小さな一片を取り上げ、それを私たち全員が理解できるように開放しました。そして、その過程で素敵な物語を語ってくれました。
back_translation: The Brothers Bai took a small piece of history and opened it up so that we could all understand it. And in the process, they told us a wonderful story.

text: there 's not one decent performance from the cast and not one clever line of dialogue .
translation: キャストの中にまともな演技は一つもなく、巧妙なセリフも一つもありません。
back_translation: There is not a single decent performance among the cast, and not a single clever line.

text: translation : ` we do n't need to try very hard . '
translation: 「私たちはあまり頑張る必要はありません。」
back_translation: "We don't need to try too hard."

text: return to never land is reliable , standard disney animated fare , with enough creative energy and wit to entertain all ages .
translation: 「リターン・トゥ・ネバーランド」は信頼できる、標準的なディズニーアニメーションであり、すべての年齢層を楽しませるための十分な創造的エネルギーとウィットを備えています。
back_translation: "Return to Neverland" is a reliable, standard Disney animation that has enough creative energy and wit to entertain audiences of all ages.

text: it sticks rigidly to the paradigm , rarely permitting its characters more than two obvious dimensions and repeatedly placing them in contrived , well-worn situations .
translation: それは厳格にパラダイムに固執し、キャラクターに二次元以上の明らかな次元をほとんど許さず、繰り返し巧妙で使い古された状況に置きます。
back_translation: It strictly adheres to a paradigm, allowing almost no obvious depth beyond two dimensions for characters, and repeatedly places them in clever but worn-out situations.

text: caine makes us watch as his character awakens to the notion that to be human is eventually to have to choose .
translation: ケインは、彼のキャラクターが人間であることは最終的に選ぶことだという概念に目覚める様子を私たちに見せます。
back_translation: Kane shows us the moment he becomes aware of the concept that ultimately, being human is a choice.

text: a captivating and intimate study about dying and loving ...
translation: 死と愛についての魅力的で親密な研究...
back_translation: An intriguing and intimate study on death and love...

text: oversexed , at times overwrought comedy\/drama that offers little insight into the experience of being forty , female and single .
translation: 性的に過剰で、時には過剰反応したコメディ/ドラマで、40歳、女性、独身であることの体験についてあまり洞察を提供しない。
back_translation: A sexually excessive comedy/drama that sometimes overreacts, providing little insight into the experience of being a 40-year-old, single woman.

text: the world needs more filmmakers with passionate enthusiasms like martin scorsese .
translation: 世界はマーティン・スコセッシのような情熱的な熱意を持つ映画製作者をもっと必要としています。
back_translation: The world needs more filmmakers with passionate enthusiasm like Martin Scorsese.

text: the director seems to take an unseemly pleasure in -lrb- the characters ' -rrb- misery and at the same time to congratulate himself for having the guts to confront it .
translation: 監督はキャラクターの苦悩に不適切な喜びを感じながら、それに立ち向かう勇気を持っている自分を同時に称賛しているようだ。
back_translation: The director seems to simultaneously feel an inappropriate joy in the character's suffering while also praising themselves for having the courage to confront it.

text: the history is fascinating ; the action is dazzling .
translation: 歴史は魅力的であり、アクションは目を見張るものがあります。
back_translation: History is fascinating, and the action is eye-catching.

text: the unexpected thing is that its dying , in this shower of black-and-white psychedelia , is quite beautiful .
translation: 予期しないことは、その死は、この白黒のサイケデリックのシャワーの中で、とても美しいということです。
back_translation: The unexpected thing is that its death is very beautiful within this black and white psychedelic shower.

text: i also believe that resident evil is not it .
translation: 私もバイオハザードはそれではないと思います。
back_translation: I also don't think that is Resident Evil.

text: offers a clear-eyed chronicle of a female friendship that is more complex and honest than anything represented in a hollywood film .
translation: ハリウッド映画で描かれているものよりも、より複雑で誠実な女性の友情を鮮明に描いた年代記を提供します。
back_translation: I offer a chronicle that vividly portrays a more complex and genuine friendship among women than what is depicted in Hollywood movies.

text: meeting , even exceeding expectations , it 's the best sequel since the empire strikes back ... a majestic achievement , an epic of astonishing grandeur and surprising emotional depth .
translation: 期待を上回る素晴らしい続編であり、帝国の逆襲以来の最高の作品です... 壮大な成果であり、驚くべき豪華さと意外な感情の深さを持つ叙事詩です。
back_translation: It's a wonderful sequel that exceeds expectations and is the best work since The Empire Strikes Back... An epic achievement with astonishing grandeur and unexpected emotional depth.

text: while general audiences might not come away with a greater knowledge of the facts of cuban music , they 'll be treated to an impressive and highly entertaining celebration of its sounds .
translation: 一般の観客はキューバ音楽の事実についてより深い知識を得ることはないかもしれませんが、その音の印象的で非常に楽しませる祝祭を体験することでしょう。
back_translation: The general audience may not gain a deeper knowledge of the facts about Cuban music, but they will experience an impressive and highly entertaining celebration of its sounds.

text: not only better than its predecessor , it may rate as the most magical and most fun family fare of this or any recent holiday season .
translation: 前作よりも優れているだけでなく、今年または最近のホリデーシーズンの中で最も魔法のようで、最も楽しいファミリーフェアとして評価されるかもしれません。
back_translation: Not only is it superior to the previous work, but it might also be regarded as the most magical and enjoyable family fair of this year or the recent holiday season.

text: ... may work as an addictive guilty pleasure but the material never overcomes its questionable satirical ambivalence .
translation: ...は中毒性のある罪悪感を伴う楽しみとして機能するかもしれませんが、その素材は決して疑問符のつく風刺的曖昧さを克服することはありません。
back_translation: ...may function as a pleasurable experience accompanied by addictive guilt, but its material will never overcome the question mark of satirical ambiguity.

text: death to smoochy tells a moldy-oldie , not-nearly - as-nasty - as-it - thinks-it-is joke .
translation: デス・トゥ・スムーチーは、古くてカビの生えた、思ったほどひどくないジョークを語ります。
back_translation: Death to Smoothie tells old, moldy jokes that aren't as bad as you might think.

text: spielberg 's picture is smarter and subtler than -lrb- total recall and blade runner -rrb- , although its plot may prove too convoluted for fun-seeking summer audiences .
translation: スピルバーグの作品は、「トータル・リコール」や「ブレードランナー」よりも賢く微妙ですが、そのプロットは楽しさを求める夏の観客には複雑すぎるかもしれません。
back_translation: Spielberg's works are more clever and nuanced than "Total Recall" and "Blade Runner," but their plots may be too complex for summer audiences seeking fun.

text: hart 's war seems to want to be a character study , but apparently ca n't quite decide which character .
translation: 「ハートの戦争」はキャラクタースタディを目指しているようですが、どのキャラクターに焦点を当てるべきか決めかねているようです。
back_translation: "Heart War" seems to aim for character study, but it appears uncertain about which character to focus on.

text: smaller numbered kidlets will enjoy .
translation: 小さい番号の子供たちは楽しむでしょう。
back_translation: Younger children will have fun.

text: offers no new insight on the matter , nor do its characters exactly spring to life .
translation: この問題について新たな洞察は提供せず、登場人物たちも生き生きとはしていない。
back_translation: No new insights are provided on this issue, and the characters are not vibrant.

text: i 'm convinced i could keep a family of five blind , crippled , amish people alive in this situation better than these british soldiers do at keeping themselves kicking .
translation: 私は、この状況でイギリス兵たちが自分自身を生き延びさせるよりも、盲目で身体に障害を持ち、アーミッシュの家族5人を生かすことができると確信しています。
back_translation: I am convinced that in this situation, the British soldiers will be able to save five blind and disabled Amish family members rather than saving themselves.

text: the connected stories of breitbart and hanussen are actually fascinating , but the filmmaking in invincible is such that the movie does not do them justice .
translation: ブレイトバートとハヌッセンのつながった物語は実際に魅力的ですが、『インビンシブル』の映画制作はそれらを正当に評価していません。
back_translation: The connected story of Breightbart and Hanussen is indeed fascinating, but the production of the movie "Invincible" does not do it justice.

text: the characters are more deeply thought through than in most ` right-thinking ' films .
translation: キャラクターは、大多数の「正しい考え方」の映画よりも深く考えられています。
back_translation: The characters are thought out more deeply than in most movies with a "correct way of thinking."

text: these characters are so well established that the gang feels comfortable with taking insane liberties and doing the goofiest stuff out of left field , and i 'm all for that .
translation: これらのキャラクターは非常に確立されているので、ギャングは大胆な liberties を取ることや余計なことをすることに安心感を持っており、私はそれに完全に賛成です。
back_translation: These characters are so well-established that the gang feels comfortable taking bold liberties and doing unnecessary things, and I completely agree with that.

text: with a completely predictable plot , you 'll swear that you 've seen it all before , even if you 've never come within a mile of the longest yard .
translation: 完全に予測可能なプロットで、たとえ長い庭から1マイルも離れたことがなくても、あなたはすべてを見たと誓うでしょう。
back_translation: With a completely predictable plot, you would swear you have seen everything, even if you have never strayed more than a mile from a long garden.

text: the jokes are sophomoric , stereotypes are sprinkled everywhere and the acting ranges from bad to bodacious .
translation: ジョークは幼稚で、ステレオタイプが至る所に散りばめられており、演技は悪いものから素晴らしいものまで様々です。
back_translation: The jokes are childish, the stereotypes are scattered everywhere, and the performances range from bad to excellent.

text: cho 's latest comic set is n't as sharp or as fresh as i 'm the one that i want ... but it 's still damn funny stuff .
translation: チョの最新の漫画セットは、「私はそれを望んでいる」と同じくらい鋭くも新しくもないが、それでもとても面白いものだ。
back_translation: Cho's latest manga set is not as sharp or fresh as "I Want It," but it is still very interesting.

text: much has been written about those years when the psychedelic '60s grooved over into the gay '70s , but words do n't really do the era justice .
translation: サイケデリックな60年代がゲイな70年代へと移り変わる年々については多くのことが書かれていますが、その時代を言葉で表現することは本当に難しいです。
back_translation: There is much written about the transition from the psychedelic 60s to the gay 70s, but it is truly difficult to express that era in words.

text: one of the best looking and stylish animated movies in quite a while ...
translation: ここ最近で最も美しくスタイリッシュなアニメ映画の一つです…。
back_translation: It is one of the most beautiful and stylish animated films in recent times...

text: light the candles , bring out the cake and do n't fret about the calories because there 's precious little substance in birthday girl -- it 's simply , and surprisingly , a nice , light treat .
translation: キャンドルを灯し、ケーキを出して、カロリーのことを心配しないでください。バースデーガールにはほとんど実体がないので、単純に、驚くほど、軽やかで素敵なごちそうです。
back_translation: Light the candles, serve the cake, and don’t worry about the calories. The birthday girl is almost weightless, so simply enjoy the surprisingly light and lovely treat.

text: it 's good , hard-edged stuff , violent and a bit exploitative but also nicely done , morally alert and street-smart .
translation: 良いもので、ハードエッジな内容で、暴力的で少し搾取的ですが、しっかりと作られており、道徳的に敏感で、ストリートスマートです。
back_translation: It's a good piece, with hard-edged content that is violent and a bit exploitative, but well-crafted, morally sensitive, and street-smart.

text: sayles ... once again strands his superb performers in the same old story .
translation: セイルズは再び彼の素晴らしいパフォーマーたちを同じ古い物語に取り残します。
back_translation: Sails once again leaves his wonderful performers stuck in the same old story.

text: high crimes carries almost no organic intrigue as a government \/ marine\/legal mystery , and that 's because the movie serves up all of that stuff , nearly subliminally , as the old-hat province of male intrigue .
translation: 高犯罪は、政府や海兵隊、法律の謎としてほとんどオーガニックな興味を持っておらず、それは映画がすべての要素を、ほぼ潜在的に、男性の興味の古臭い領域として提供しているからです。
back_translation: High crime holds almost an organic interest as a mystery of government, the Marine Corps, and the law, because films present all the elements as nearly potentially belonging to the outdated realm of male interest.

text: nicole kidman makes it a party worth attending .
translation: ニコール・キッドマンは参加する価値のあるパーティーにしています。

text: bogdanovich puts history in perspective and , via kirsten dunst 's remarkable performance , he showcases davies as a young woman of great charm , generosity and diplomacy .
translation: ボグダノヴィッチは歴史を視野に入れ、キルステン・ダンストの素晴らしい演技を通じて、デイヴィスを大いなる魅力、寛大さ、そして外交力を持つ若い女性として描いています。
back_translation: Bogdanovich, keeping history in mind, portrays Davis as a young woman with great charm, generosity, and diplomatic skill through Kirsten Dunst's wonderful performance.

text: the gentle comic treatment of adolescent sturm und drang should please fans of chris fuhrman 's posthumously published cult novel .
translation: 思春期のシュトゥルム・ウント・ドラングを優しくコミカルに描いたこの作品は、クリス・ファーマンの死后に発表されたカルト小説のファンを喜ばせることでしょう。
back_translation: This work, which gently and comically depicts the Sturm und Drang of adolescence, is sure to delight fans of the cult novel released after Chris Pfarman's death.

text: shatner is probably the funniest person in the film , which gives you an idea just how bad it was .
translation: シャトナーはおそらくこの映画で最も面白い人物であり、それがどれほど悪かったかの参考になります。
back_translation: Shatner is probably the funniest person in this movie, which serves as a reference for just how bad it was.

text: this is a fragmented film , once a good idea that was followed by the bad idea to turn it into a movie .
translation: これは断片的な映画で、一度は良いアイデアだったものが、映画にするという悪いアイデアに変わってしまった。
back_translation: This is a fragmented film that was once a good idea but has turned into a bad idea to make it into a movie.

text: there 's some outrageously creative action in the transporter ... -lrb- b -rrb- ut by the time frank parachutes down onto a moving truck , it 's just another cartoon with an unstoppable superman .
translation: 輸送者には非常に創造的なアクションがありますが、フランクが動くトラックにパラシュートで降下する頃には、ただの止まらないスーパーマンのアニメに過ぎません。
back_translation: The transporter has very creative actions, but by the time Frank parachutes onto a moving truck, it's just a never-ending Superman cartoon.

text: for those of an indulgent , slightly sunbaked and summery mind , sex and lucia may well prove diverting enough .
translation: 甘やかされていて、少し日焼けした夏のような心を持つ人々には、「セックス・アンド・ルシア」は十分に楽しませてくれるかもしれません。
back_translation: For those who are pampered and have a heart reminiscent of a slightly sun-tanned summer, "Sex and Lucia" might be quite enjoyable.

text: it might be ` easier ' to watch on video at home , but that should n't stop die-hard french film connoisseurs from going out and enjoying the big-screen experience .
translation: 家で動画を見る方が「楽」かもしれませんが、そうしたことが熱心なフランス映画愛好家が外に出て大画面での体験を楽しむのを妨げるべきではありません。
back_translation: It may be "easier" to watch videos at home, but that should not prevent enthusiastic French film lovers from going out and enjoying the experience on the big screen.

text: -lrb- reno -rrb- delivers a monologue that manages to incorporate both the horror and the absurdity of the situation in a well-balanced fashion .
translation: -（レノ）-は、状況の恐怖と不条理の両方をうまくバランスよく取り入れた独白を行います。

text: rich in atmosphere of the post-war art world , it manages to instruct without reeking of research library dust .
translation: 戦後のアート界の雰囲気に満ちており、研究図書館の埃の匂いがしないまま、教えることに成功しています。

text: more good than great but freeman and judd make it work .

text: it 's nice to see piscopo again after all these years , and chaykin and headly are priceless .

text: never again , while nothing special , is pleasant , diverting and modest -- definitely a step in the right direction .
translation: 決して再びという作品は、特別ではありませんが、心地良く、楽しませてくれ、控えめです -- 確実に正しい方向への一歩です。
back_translation: The work "Never Again" is not special, but it is comforting, entertaining, and modest -- definitely a step in the right direction.

text: if the last man were the last movie left on earth , there would be a toss-up between presiding over the end of cinema as we know it and another night of delightful hand shadows .
translation: もし最後の男が地球上に残された最後の映画であれば、映画の終わりを見届けるか、または楽しい手影絵の夜を過ごすかの選択になるだろう。
back_translation: If the last man was left on Earth as the final movie, it would be a choice between witnessing the end of the film or spending a joyful night making shadow puppets.

text: she is a lioness , protecting her cub , and he a reluctant villain , incapable of controlling his crew .
translation: 彼女は子を守る雌ライオンであり、彼は部下を制御できない渋々の悪役です。

text: this is an interesting movie ! ''
translation: これは面白い映画です！

text: it 's simply stupid , irrelevant and deeply , truly , bottomlessly cynical .

text: the movie is almost completely lacking in suspense , surprise and consistent emotional conviction .
translation: その映画は、サスペンス、驚き、そして一貫した感情の確信がほとんど欠けています。

text: the characters are so generic and the plot so bland that even as rogue cia assassins working for chris cooper 's agency boss close in on the resourceful amnesiac , we do n't feel much for damon\/bourne or his predicament .
translation: キャラクターは非常に一般的で、プロットはとても退屈なため、クリス・クーパーのエージェンシーのボスが資源に富んだ記憶喪失者に近づく中、私たちはデイモン／ボーンや彼の窮地に対してあまり感情を抱きません。
back_translation: The characters are very generic and the plot is quite boring, so as Chris Cooper's agency boss approaches the resource-rich amnesiac, we don't feel much emotion towards Damon/Bourne or his predicament.

text: like a can of 2-day old coke .
translation: 2日古いコーラの缶のような。
back_translation: Like a can of cola that is two days old.

text: this masterfully calibrated psychological thriller thrives on its taut performances and creepy atmosphere even if the screenplay falls somewhat short .
translation: この見事に調整された心理サスペンスは、緊張感のある演技と不気味な雰囲気によって成り立っていますが、脚本がやや不足している部分もあります。
back_translation: This impeccably crafted psychological suspense relies on tense performances and a chilling atmosphere, but there are some areas where the script is somewhat lacking.

text: yes , i suppose it 's lovely that cal works out his issues with his dad and comes to terms with his picture-perfect life -- but world traveler gave me no reason to care , so i did n't .
translation: はい、カルが父親との問題を解決し、自分の完璧な人生と向き合うのは素晴らしいことだと思いますが、ワールドトラベラーは私が気にかける理由を与えてくれなかったので、私は気にしませんでした。
back_translation: Yes, I think it's wonderful that Carl is resolving his issues with his father and facing his perfect life, but since World Traveler didn't give me a reason to care, I didn't care.

text: that the film opens with maggots crawling on a dead dog is not an out of place metaphor .

text: if the plot seems a bit on the skinny side , that 's because panic room is interested in nothing more than sucking you in ... and making you sweat .

text: drumline ably captures the complicated relationships in a marching band .
translation: ドラムラインは、マーチングバンドにおける複雑な関係を見事に捉えています。

translation: キャスト全体が一流で、特にソルビーノが素晴らしい。

text: it 's a drag how nettelbeck sees working women -- or at least this working woman -- for whom she shows little understanding .

translation: 「セーフ・コンダクト」は163分の長い映画ですが、ドラマ、ロマンス、悲劇、勇気、政治的陰謀、パルチザンや sabotage で時間を満たしています。
back_translation: "Safe Conduct" is a long movie at 163 minutes, but it is filled with drama, romance, tragedy, courage, political intrigue, partisanship, and sabotage.

text: although mainstream american movies tend to exploit the familiar , every once in a while a film arrives from the margin that gives viewers a chance to learn , to grow , to travel .
translation: 主流のアメリカ映画は馴染みのあるものを利用することが多いが、時々、視聴者に学び、成長し、旅する機会を与える映画が周辺から登場する。
back_translation: Mainstream American films often rely on familiar elements, but occasionally, movies that provide viewers the opportunity to learn, grow, and embark on a journey emerge from the margins.

text: a hit - and-miss affair , consistently amusing but not as outrageous or funny as cho may have intended or as imaginative as one might have hoped .
translation: ヒットとミスの入り交じった作品で、一貫して面白いが、チョが意図したほどの過激さやユーモア、あるいは期待したほどの想像力に欠ける。
back_translation: It’s a work that mixes hits and misses; consistently interesting, but lacking the intensity and humor that Cho intended, as well as the imagination that was expected.

text: this is an exercise in chilling style , and twohy films the sub , inside and out , with an eye on preserving a sense of mystery .

back_translation: This is a cold-style exercise, and Tuhee focuses on capturing the submarine from both the inside and outside while maintaining an air of mystery.

text: it makes compelling , provocative and prescient viewing .

translation: 欠点はあるが引き込まれるサスペンス。

text: what sets ms. birot 's film apart from others in the genre is a greater attention to the parents -- and particularly the fateful fathers -- in the emotional evolution of the two bewitched adolescents .
translation: ビロット監督の映画が同ジャンルの他の作品と異なる点は、二人の魔法にかけられた青年の感情の進化において、親、特に運命的な父親に対するより大きな注意を払っていることです。
back_translation: What sets director Birot's film apart from other works in the same genre is its greater focus on the emotional evolution of the two young men under a spell, particularly in relation to their parents, especially the fateful father.

text: like most of jaglom 's films , some of it is honestly affecting , but more of it seems contrived and secondhand .
translation: ジャグロムの映画のほとんどと同様に、その一部は正直に心に響くが、より多くの部分は作り物のようで二次的な印象を受ける。

text: it 's a wise and powerful tale of race and culture forcefully told , with superb performances throughout .
translation: それは、人種と文化について力強く語られた知恵と力のある物語であり、全体を通して素晴らしい演技が見られます。

text: one of those terrific documentaries that collect a bunch of people who are enthusiastic about something and then figures out how to make us share their enthusiasm .
translation: その素晴らしいドキュメンタリーの一つで、何かに熱心な人々を集めて、私たちがその熱意を共有できる方法を見つけ出すものです。

text: not only are the film 's sopranos gags incredibly dated and unfunny , they also demonstrate how desperate the makers of this ` we 're - doing-it-for - the-cash ' sequel were .
translation: 映画『ザ・ソプラノズ』のギャグは非常に時代遅れで面白くないだけでなく、この「金のためにやっている」続編の製作者たちがどれだけ必死だったかも示しています。
back_translation: The jokes in the movie "The Sopranos" are not only very dated and unfunny, but they also show just how desperate the producers of this "money-driven" sequel are.

text: the film gets close to the chimps the same way goodall did , with a serious minded patience , respect and affection .

text: if you answered yes , by all means enjoy the new guy .

text: generates an enormous feeling of empathy for its characters .
translation: キャラクターに対して非常に大きな共感を引き起こします。

text: the low-key direction is pleasingly emphatic in this properly intense , claustrophobic tale of obsessive love .
translation: この適切に強烈で閉塞感のある執着の愛の物語において、控えめな演出が心地良く力強い。

text: those prone to indignation need not apply ; those susceptible to blue hilarity , step right up .
translation: 怒りに陥りやすい人は応募しないでください；青い喜びに影響されやすい人は、どうぞお越しください。

text: an intriguing look at the french film industry during the german occupation ; its most delightful moments come when various characters express their quirky inner selves .
translation: ドイツ占領下のフランス映画産業の興味深い一面；さまざまなキャラクターが独特の内面を表現する瞬間が最も魅力的です。

text: would make an excellent companion piece to the similarly themed ` the french lieutenant 's woman . '
translation: 同じテーマの『フレンチ・ライフ・ウィメン』に非常に良い補完作品となるでしょう。

text: no french people were harmed during the making of this movie , but they were insulted and the audience was put through torture for an hour and a half .
translation: この映画の制作中にフランス人に害は及びませんでしたが、侮辱され、観客は1時間半の間拷問を受けました。
back_translation: During the production of this film, the French were not harmed but were insulted, and the audience endured torture for an hour and a half.

text: woody allen can write and deliver a one liner as well as anybody .
translation: ウディ・アレンは、誰にも劣らず素晴らしいワンライナーを書き、届けることができます。

text: the most consistently funny of the austin powers films .
translation: オースティン・パワーズの映画の中で最も一貫して面白い。

text: it 's both degrading and strangely liberating to see people working so hard at leading lives of sexy intrigue , only to be revealed by the dispassionate gantz brothers as ordinary , pasty lumpen .
translation: 人々が魅惑的な裏事情のある生活を送るために一生懸命に働いているのを見るのは、屈辱的でありながら奇妙に解放的でもある。そこに冷静なガンツ兄弟によって普通の、色のない不格好な人々として明らかにされるのだから。
back_translation: It is both humiliating and strangely liberating to see people working hard to live lives filled with captivating behind-the-scenes stories. This is made evident by the calm Gantz brothers, who reveal them as ordinary, colorless, and awkward individuals.

text: paid in full is remarkably engaging despite being noticeably derivative of goodfellas and at least a half dozen other trouble-in-the-ghetto flicks .
translation: 全額支払いは、グッドフェローズや他の半ダース以上のグhettoのトラブル映画に明らかに影響を受けているにもかかわらず、非常に魅力的です。

text: the plot has a number of holes , and at times it 's simply baffling .

text: amazingly lame .

text: not even felinni would know what to make of this italian freakshow .

text: garcía bernal and talancón are an immensely appealing couple , and even though their story is predictable , you 'll want things to work out .
translation: ガルシア・ベルナルとタランコンは非常に魅力的なカップルであり、物語は予測可能ですが、あなたは彼らの関係がうまくいくことを望むでしょう。

text: -- but certainly hard to hate .

text: finely crafted , finely written , exquisitely performed
translation: 精巧に作られた、精緻に書かれた、見事に演じられた
