text: the story is a rather simplistic one : grief drives her , love drives him , and a second chance to find love in the most unlikely place - it struck a chord in me .
translation: その物語はやや単純なもので、悲しみが彼女を駆り立て、愛が彼を駆り立て、最も予想外の場所で愛を見つけるための再チャンス - それは私の心に響きました。
back_translation: The story is somewhat simple, with sadness driving her, love driving him, and a second chance to find love in the most unexpected place - it resonated in my heart.

text: a cockeyed shot all the way .
translation: 全てが斜めに撮られている。
back_translation: Everything is taken at an angle.

text: clare peploe 's airless movie adaptation could use a little american pie-like irreverence .
translation: クレア・ペプロの『エアレス』の映画化には、アメリカン・パイのような軽妙さがもう少し必要かもしれない。
back_translation: The film adaptation of Claire Pepin's "Airless" might need a bit more lightheartedness akin to "American Pie."

text: a woefully dull , redundant concept that bears more than a whiff of exploitation , despite iwai 's vaunted empathy .
translation: 悲惨に退屈で、冗長な概念は、岩井の高く評価された共感にもかかわらず、搾取の気配を漂わせている。
back_translation: The painfully dull and redundant concept, despite Iwai's highly regarded empathy, carries a hint of exploitation.

text: a cutesy romantic tale with a twist .
translation: ひねりのあるかわいらしいロマンチックな物語。
back_translation: A charmingly romantic story with a twist.

text: about one in three gags in white 's intermittently wise script hits its mark ; the rest are padding unashamedly appropriated from the teen-exploitation playbook .
translation: ホワイトの時折賢い脚本のギャグの約三分の一は的を射ているが、残りはティーンエクスプロイテーションのプレイブックから無恥に流用されたお膳立てである。
back_translation: About one third of White's occasionally clever script gags hit the mark, but the rest are shameless setups borrowed from the teen exploitation playbook.

text: it plods along methodically , somehow under the assumption that its `` dead wife communicating from beyond the grave '' framework is even remotely new or interesting .
translation: それは方法的にゆっくりと進み、自身の「死んだ妻が霊界からコミュニケーションをとっている」という枠組みが少しでも新しいものであるかのように仮定しています。
back_translation: It proceeds methodically and slowly, assuming that its framework of "my dead wife is communicating from the spirit world" is at least somewhat new.

text: give credit to everyone from robinson down to the key grip that this bold move works .
translation: ロビンソンからキーグリップまで、この大胆な動きが成功するのは皆のおかげです。
back_translation: Thanks to everyone, this bold move is a success from the Robinson to the key grip.

text: enough said , except : film overboard !
translation: 十分です、ただし：映画『オーバーボード』！
back_translation: That's enough, but: the movie "Overboard"!

text: a suffocating rape-payback horror show that hinges on the subgenre 's most enabling victim ... and an ebullient affection for industrial-model meat freezers .
translation: 窒息するようなレイプ復讐ホラーショーで、サブジャンルの最も助長的な被害者に依存し、工業用の肉冷凍庫への活気に満ちた愛情を持っています。
back_translation: In a suffocating rape revenge horror show, it relies on the most exploitative victims of the subgenre and possesses a vibrant affection for industrial meat freezers.

text: while we no longer possess the lack-of-attention span that we did at seventeen , we had no trouble sitting for blade ii .
translation: 私たちは17歳のときのような注意力の欠如はもう持っていませんが、「ブレード2」を見るのに困難はありませんでした。
back_translation: We no longer have the lack of attention we had at 17, but we had no trouble watching "Blade 2."

text: a collage of clichés and a dim echo of allusions to other films .
translation: クリシェのコラージュと他の映画への暗い暗示のこだま。
back_translation: A collage of clichés and echoes of dark implications from other films.

text: combine the paranoid claustrophobia of a submarine movie with the unsettling spookiness of the supernatural -- why did n't hollywood think of this sooner ?
translation: 潜水艦映画の偏執的な閉所恐怖症と超自然的な不気味さを組み合わせる — なぜハリウッドはもっと早くこれを考えなかったのだろう？
back_translation: Combining the paranoid claustrophobia of submarine movies with a supernatural eeriness — why didn't Hollywood think of this sooner?

text: if damon and affleck attempt another project greenlight , next time out they might try paying less attention to the miniseries and more attention to the film it is about .
translation: もしデイモンとアフレックが別のプロジェクトグリーンライトを試みるなら、次回はミニシリーズにあまり注意を払わず、それがどの映画についてのものかにもっと注意を向けるかもしれません。
back_translation: If Damon and Affleck try to greenlight another project, they may pay less attention to the mini-series next time and focus more on what movie it is about.

text: the screenplay by james eric , james horton and director peter o'fallon ... is so pat it makes your teeth hurt .
translation: ジェームズ・エリック、ジェームズ・ホートン、監督ピーター・オファロンによる脚本は…あまりにも陳腐で、思わず歯が痛くなります。
back_translation: The script by James Eric, James Horton, and director Peter O'Farrell is... so clichéd that it makes my teeth hurt.

text: i 'm giving it thumbs down due to the endlessly repetitive scenes of embarrassment .
translation: 私は、終始繰り返される恥ずかしいシーンのせいで、評価を低くします。
back_translation: I will give it a low rating because of the embarrassing scenes that are repeated throughout.

text: not only does leblanc make one spectacularly ugly-looking broad , but he appears miserable throughout as he swaggers through his scenes .
translation: ルブランは見た目が非常に醜い女を一人作るだけでなく、シーンを歩き回る中でずっと不幸そうに見えます。
back_translation: Leblanc not only creates an incredibly ugly woman in appearance, but also looks unhappy the whole time while walking around the scene.

text: an elegant work , food of love is as consistently engaging as it is revealing .
translation: 優雅な作品である「愛の食べ物」は、一貫して魅力的でありながら、明らかにするものでもあります。
back_translation: The elegant work "Food of Love" is consistently captivating while also revealing something.

text: the pain , loneliness and insecurity of the screenwriting process are vividly and painfully brought to slovenly life in this self-deprecating , biting and witty feature written by charlie kaufman and his twin brother , donald , and directed by spike jonze .
translation: この自己卑下的で鋭い機知に富んだ作品は、チャーリー・カウフマンと彼の双子の兄弟ドナルドによって書かれ、スパイク・ジョーンズによって監督され、脚本家のプロセスの痛み、孤独、そして不安定さが生き生きと痛々しく描かれています。
back_translation: This self-deprecating and sharply witty work was written by Charlie Kaufman and his twin brother Donald, and directed by Spike Jonze, vividly and painfully portrays the agony, loneliness, and instability of the screenwriting process.

text: ... a weak and ineffective ghost story without a conclusion or pay off .
translation: 結論や報酬のない、弱くて効果的でない幽霊の話。
back_translation: A story about a ghost that is weak and ineffective, lacking any conclusion or reward.

text: if you 're a fan of the series you 'll love it and probably want to see it twice .
translation: シリーズのファンなら、きっと楽しめるし、二度見たいと思うでしょう。
back_translation: If you're a fan of the series, you'll surely enjoy it and want to watch it again.

text: the film never finds its tone and several scenes run too long .
translation: その映画はトーンを見つけられず、いくつかのシーンは長すぎる。
back_translation: The movie can't find its tone, and some scenes are too long.

text: suffers from a lack of clarity and audacity that a subject as monstrous and pathetic as dahmer demands .
translation: ダーマーのような恐ろしいかつ哀れなテーマが要求する明確さと大胆さが欠けている。
back_translation: The terrifying and pitiful theme, like that of Dharma, lacks the clarity and boldness it demands.

text: it 's not a motion picture ; it 's an utterly static picture .
translation: それは映画ではなく、まったく静止した画像です。
back_translation: That is not a movie, but a completely still image.

text: it 's probably not easy to make such a worthless film ...
translation: そんな無価値な映画を作るのは、おそらく簡単ではないでしょう。
back_translation: It probably isn't easy to make such a worthless movie.

text: the film is bright and flashy in all the right ways .
translation: 映画は適切な方法で明るく派手です。
back_translation: The movie is bright and flashy in the appropriate way.

text: a brisk , reverent , and subtly different sequel .
translation: 速やかで敬意を表し、微妙に異なる続編。
back_translation: A prompt and respectful sequel with subtle differences.

text: a macabre and very stylized swedish fillm about a modern city where all the religious and civic virtues that hold society in place are in tatters .
translation: 現代の都市を舞台にした、宗教的および市民的な美徳が崩壊したマカブレで非常にスタイライズされたスウェーデン映画。
back_translation: A highly stylized Swedish film set in a modern city where religious and civic virtues have collapsed, with a macabre theme.

text: does an impressive job of relating the complicated history of the war and of filling in the background .
translation: 戦争の複雑な歴史を伝え、背景を補完する印象的な仕事をしています。
back_translation: You are doing an impressive job conveying the complex history of war and providing context.

text: a fascinating documentary that provides a rounded and revealing overview of this ancient holistic healing system
translation: この古代のホリスティックな治療システムについての包括的で明らかにする魅力的なドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: An engaging documentary that provides a comprehensive and revealing look at this ancient holistic healing system.

text: a cautionary tale about the folly of superficiality that is itself endlessly superficial .
translation: 表面的な愚かさについての警告の物語であり、それ自体も無限に表面的である。
back_translation: It is a cautionary tale about superficial foolishness, which itself is infinitely superficial.

text: quitting , however , manages just to be depressing , as the lead actor phones in his autobiographical performance .
translation: 辞めることは、主役の俳優が自伝的なパフォーマンスを電話越しに行うため、ただただ憂鬱に感じます。
back_translation: Quitting feels simply melancholic, as if the leading actor is performing an autobiographical act over the phone.

text: i did go back and check out the last 10 minutes , but these were more repulsive than the first 30 or 40 minutes .
translation: 最後の10分を確認しに戻りましたが、これらは最初の30分や40分よりもさらに反発を感じました。
back_translation: I went back to check the last 10 minutes, but I felt even more resistance than in the first 30 or 40 minutes.

text: in the end , the movie bogs down in insignificance , saying nothing about kennedy 's assassination and revealing nothing about the pathology it pretends to investigate .
translation: 結局、その映画は重要性のないところで立ち往生し、ケネディの暗殺について何も言わず、調査を装っている病理について何も明らかにしない。
back_translation: In the end, the movie gets stuck in an irrelevant place, says nothing about Kennedy's assassination, and fails to reveal anything about the pathology that pretends to be an investigation.

text: it 's refreshing to see a movie that embraces its old-fashioned themes and in the process comes out looking like something wholly original .
translation: 古風なテーマを受け入れ、その過程でまったく新しいもののように見える映画を見るのは新鮮です。
back_translation: It is refreshing to embrace a vintage theme and watch a movie that appears entirely new in the process.

text: it must be the end of the world : the best film so far this year is a franchise sequel starring wesley snipes .
translation: 世界の終わりに違いない：今年のベスト映画はウェズリー・スナイプス主演のフランチャイズ続編だ。
back_translation: It must be the end of the world: this year's best movie is the franchise sequel starring Wesley Snipes.

text: boomers and their kids will have a barrie good time .
translation: ベビーブーマーとその子供たちは素晴らしい時間を過ごすでしょう。
back_translation: Baby boomers and their children will have a wonderful time.

text: wow .
translation: わお。
back_translation: Wow.

text: if disney 's cinderella proved that ' a dream is a wish your heart makes , ' then cinderella ii proves that a nightmare is a wish a studio 's wallet makes .
translation: もしディズニーのシンデレラが「夢はあなたの心が願うことだ」と証明したなら、シンデレラIIは「悪夢はスタジオの財布が願うことだ」と証明する。
back_translation: If Disney's Cinderella proved that "a dream is what your heart wishes for," then Cinderella II proves that "a nightmare is what the studio's wallet wishes for."

text: been there , done that ... a thousand times already , and better .
translation: そこには行った、やったことがある...すでに千回も、そしてもっと良く。
back_translation: I've been there, I've done it... already a thousand times, and even better.

text: an infuriating film .
translation: 腹立たしい映画。
back_translation: An annoying movie.

text: a film with a great premise but only a great premise .
translation: 素晴らしい前提を持っているが、前提以外はそれほど良くない映画。
back_translation: It has a wonderful premise, but everything other than the premise is not that great.

text: seagal ran out of movies years ago , and this is just the proof .
translation: シーガルは何年も前に映画が尽きており、これがその証拠です。
back_translation: Seagal ran out of movies years ago, and this is the proof.

text: a backhanded ode to female camaraderie penned by a man who has little clue about either the nature of women or of friendship .
translation: 女性の友情や女性の本質についてほとんど理解していない男によって書かれた、皮肉な女性同士の讃歌。
back_translation: A ironic tribute to female friendship written by a man who hardly understands women's friendships or the essence of women.

text: the fetid underbelly of fame has never looked uglier .
translation: 名声の不快な裏側はこれまでにないほど醜く見える。
back_translation: The unpleasant side of fame looks uglier than ever before.

text: by halfway through this picture i was beginning to hate it , and , of course , feeling guilty for it ... then , miracle of miracles , the movie does a flip-flop .
translation: この映画の途中で私はそれを嫌い始めていて、もちろんそれに対して罪悪感を感じていました... ところが、奇跡的なことに、映画はひっくり返ります。
back_translation: Halfway through the movie, I started to dislike it, and of course I felt guilty about that... However, miraculously, the movie takes a turn.

text: soulless and -- even more damning -- virtually joyless , xxx achieves near virtuosity in its crapulence .
translation: 魂のない、さらにはもっと厳しいことに、ほとんど喜びのないxxxは、そのおぞましさにおいてほぼ卓越性を達成しています。
back_translation: Soulless, and even more harshly, almost devoid of joy, xxx achieves an almost extraordinary level of ugliness.

text: what the movie lacks in action it more than makes up for in drama , suspense , revenge , and romance .
translation: その映画はアクションが欠けているものの、ドラマ、サスペンス、復讐、そしてロマンスではそれ以上のものを提供しています。
back_translation: Although the movie lacks action, it offers more in terms of drama, suspense, revenge, and romance.

text: sweet home alabama is n't going to win any academy awards , but this date-night diversion will definitely win some hearts .
translation: 「スウィート・ホーム・アラバマ」はアカデミー賞を受賞することはないでしょうが、このデートナイトの楽しみは確実にいくつかの心をつかむでしょう。
back_translation: "Sweet Home Alabama" may not win an Academy Award, but this date night will surely capture a few hearts.

text: it 's a satisfying summer blockbuster and worth a look .
translation: 満足のいく夏の大作で、一見の価値があります。
back_translation: It is a satisfying summer blockbuster worth seeing.

text: a party-hearty teen flick that scalds like acid .
translation: 酸のように焼けるパーティーハーティーなティーン映画。
back_translation: A party-hardy teen movie that burns like acid.

text: the movie is ... very funny as you peek at it through the fingers in front of your eyes .
translation: その映画は...目の前の指の隙間から見るととても面白いです。
back_translation: That movie is really interesting when you watch it through the gaps between your fingers.

text: while the story is better-focused than the incomprehensible anne rice novel it 's based upon , queen of the damned is a pointless , meandering celebration of the goth-vampire , tortured woe-is-me lifestyle .
translation: ストーリーは、元になっている不可解なアン・ライスの小説よりも焦点が合っていますが、『ダムドの女王』は、ゴス・バンパイアの苦悩と「私は不幸だ」というライフスタイルを無意味に、旅のように祝う作品です。
back_translation: The story is more focused than the puzzling Anne Rice novel it is based on, but "The Queen of the Damned" is a work that meaninglessly celebrates the struggles of Gothic vampires and a lifestyle of "I am unhappy," as if it were a journey.

text: originality ai n't on the menu , but there 's never a dull moment in the giant spider invasion comic chiller .
translation: オリジナリティはメニューに載っていないが、巨大なクモの侵略コミックスリラーでは決して退屈な瞬間はない。
back_translation: Although originality is not listed on the menu, there is never a dull moment in the colossal spider invasion comic thriller.

text: like mike is a slight and uninventive movie : like the exalted michael jordan referred to in the title , many can aspire but none can equal .
translation: 「ライク・マイク」は少し凡庸で独創性に欠ける映画です：タイトルに言及された崇高なマイケル・ジョーダンのように、多くの人が aspire することはできますが、誰も彼に匹敵することはできません。
back_translation: "Like Mike" is a somewhat mediocre film that lacks originality: just like the sublime Michael Jordan mentioned in the title, many can aspire to it, but no one can match him.

text: the cast , collectively a successful example of the lovable-loser protagonist , shows deft comic timing .
translation: キャストは、愛される負け犬の主人公の成功した例であり、巧みなコメディのタイミングを見せています。
back_translation: The cast is a successful example of a beloved underdog protagonist, showcasing impeccable comedic timing.

text: a grittily beautiful film that looks , sounds , and feels more like an extended , open-ended poem than a traditionally structured story .
translation: grittyで美しい映画で、見た目や音、感触が従来の構造を持つ物語というよりも、拡張されたオープンエンドの詩のようです。
back_translation: It is a gritty and beautiful film that feels more like an expanded open-ended poem than a story with a conventional structure in terms of appearance, sound, and texture.

text: strangely comes off as a kingdom more mild than wild .
translation: 奇妙にも、より穏やかな王国のように感じられます。
back_translation: Strangely, it feels like a more peaceful kingdom.

text: a few hours after you 've seen it , you forget you 've been to the movies .
translation: 映画を見た数時間後には、映画に行ったことを忘れてしまいます。
back_translation: A few hours after watching a movie, I forget that I went to see it.

text: yet it 's not quite the genre-busting film it 's been hyped to be because it plays everything too safe .
translation: それでも、すべてがあまりにも安全に進んでいるため、宣伝されているほどジャンルを打破する映画ではありません。
back_translation: Even so, it’s not a film that breaks the genre as much as it has been advertised, because everything is progressing too safely.

text: the biggest problem with roger avary 's uproar against the mpaa is that , even in all its director 's cut glory , he 's made a film that 's barely shocking , barely interesting and most of all , barely anything .
translation: ロジャー・アヴァリーのMPAAに対する抗議の最大の問題は、彼が監督版の栄光の中にあっても、ほとんど衝撃的でもなく、ほとんど興味深くもなく、何よりもほとんど何もない映画を作ってしまったことです。
back_translation: The biggest issue with Roger Avari's protest against the MPAA is that he created a film that is hardly shocking, hardly interesting, and above all, almost nothing, even in the glory of the director's cut.

text: peralta captures , in luminous interviews and amazingly evocative film from three decades ago , the essence of the dogtown experience .
translation: ペラルタは、30年前の光り輝くインタビューと驚くほど感情を喚起する映画の中で、ドッグタウンの体験の本質を捉えています。
back_translation: Peralta captures the essence of the Dogtown experience in a shining interview from 30 years ago and an incredibly emotionally stirring film.

text: manages to accomplish what few sequels can -- it equals the original and in some ways even betters it .
translation: 少数の続編が達成できることを成し遂げ、オリジナルに匹敵し、いくつかの点ではそれを上回ります。
back_translation: A few sequels have managed to achieve what they set out to do, matching the original and surpassing it in some aspects.

text: the end result is like cold porridge with only the odd enjoyably chewy lump .
translation: 最終結果は、時々美味しく歯ごたえのある塊がある冷たいお粥のような感じです。
back_translation: The final result feels like cold porridge with occasional delicious, chewy chunks.

text: it shows that some studios firmly believe that people have lost the ability to think and will forgive any shoddy product as long as there 's a little girl-on-girl action .
translation: いくつかのスタジオは、人々が考える能力を失い、少しの女の子同士のアクションさえあれば、どんな粗悪な製品でも許すと固く信じていることを示しています。
back_translation: Some studios firmly believe that people will lose their ability to think and will tolerate any shoddy product as long as there are a little bit of action between girls.

text: despite a quieter middle section , involving aragorn 's dreams of arwen , this is even better than the fellowship .
translation: 静かな中盤部分、アラゴルンのアルウェンの夢を含んでいるにもかかわらず、これは「旅の仲間」よりもさらに良い。
back_translation: Despite the quiet midsection that includes Aragorn's dream of Arwen, this is even better than "The Fellowship of the Ring."

text: that such a horrible movie could have sprung from such a great one is one of the year 's worst cinematic tragedies .
translation: そんな素晴らしい映画からこんなにひどい映画が生まれるなんて、今年の映画の悲劇の中でも最悪の一つです。
back_translation: It is one of the worst tragedies in this year's films that such a terrible movie could emerge from such a wonderful film.

text: a fleet-footed and pleasingly upbeat family diversion .
translation: 足の速い、楽しい雰囲気のファミリー向けの娯楽。
back_translation: Family-friendly entertainment with a fun atmosphere and fast-paced activities.

text: australian filmmaker david flatman uses the huge-screen format to make an old-fashioned nature film that educates viewers with words and pictures while entertaining them .
translation: オーストラリアの映画製作者デイビッド・フラットマンは、大画面フォーマットを使用して、視聴者を楽しませながら言葉と映像で教育する伝統的な自然映画を制作しています。
back_translation: Australian filmmaker David Flatman produces traditional nature films that educate audiences with words and visuals while entertaining them, using a large screen format.

text: `` mr. deeds '' is suitable summer entertainment that offers escapism without requiring a great deal of thought .
translation: 「ミスター・ディーズ」は多くの思考を必要とせず、逃避を提供する夏のエンターテイメントに適しています。
back_translation: "Mr. Deeds" is suitable as summer entertainment that provides an escape without requiring much thought.

text: lame sweet home leaves no southern stereotype unturned .
translation: レイム・スウィート・ホームは、南部のステレオタイプを一切残さずに描いている。
back_translation: Reimu's Sweet Home depicts the Southern stereotype without leaving any remnants of it.

text: rice is too pedestrian a filmmaker to bring any edge or personality to the rising place that would set it apart from other deep south stories .
translation: ライスは、他のディープサウスの物語とは一線を画すような独自性や個性を持たせるためのエッジを持たない平凡な映画製作者です。
back_translation: Rice is an ordinary filmmaker lacking the edge to distinguish him from other Deep South stories, lacking uniqueness and individuality.

text: it 's always disappointing when a documentary fails to live up to -- or offer any new insight into -- its chosen topic .
translation: ドキュメンタリーが選ばれたテーマに対して期待に応えられない、あるいは新たな洞察を提供しないときは、いつも失望します。
back_translation: I am always disappointed when a documentary fails to meet the expectations of the chosen theme or does not provide new insights.

text: yet another iteration of what 's become one of the movies ' creepiest conventions , in which the developmentally disabled are portrayed with almost supernatural powers to humble , teach and ultimately redeem their mentally `` superior '' friends , family ...
translation: またもや、発達障害のある人々が、不気味な映画の定番の一つとして、ほぼ超自然的な力を持って、精神的に「優れた」友人や家族を謙虚にし、教え、最終的には救う様子が描かれる新たな一例です。
back_translation: Once again, this is a new example depicting people with developmental disabilities, possessing almost supernatural powers, humbling, teaching, and ultimately saving their mentally "superior" friends and family, as a staple of eerie movies.

text: you may be galled that you 've wasted nearly two hours of your own precious life with this silly little puddle of a movie .
translation: あなたは、このくだらない小さな映画に自分の貴重な人生のほぼ2時間を無駄にしたことに腹を立てるかもしれません。
back_translation: You might be upset that you've wasted almost two hours of your precious life on this silly little movie.

text: mr. scorsese 's bravery and integrity in advancing this vision can hardly be underestimated .
translation: スコセッシ監督がこのビジョンを推進する上での勇気と誠実さは、ほとんど過小評価されることはないでしょう。
back_translation: The courage and integrity of Director Scorsese in promoting this vision is unlikely to be underestimated.

text: more intellectually scary than dramatically involving .
translation: 知的にはもっと恐ろしいが、ドラマ的には関与が少ない。
back_translation: Intellectually more terrifying, but dramatically less involved.

text: the movie is like a year late for tapping into our reality tv obsession , and even tardier for exploiting the novelty of the `` webcast . ''
translation: その映画は私たちのリアリティ番組への obsession に乗るには1年遅れており、「ウェブキャスト」の新しさを利用するにはさらに遅れています。
back_translation: That movie is a year late to ride on our obsession with reality shows and even later to take advantage of the novelty of "webcasts."

text: fun and nimble .
translation: 楽しくて機敏です。
back_translation: It's fun and lively.

text: when the casting call for this movie went out , it must have read ` seeking anyone with acting ambition but no sense of pride or shame . '
translation: この映画のオーディションが行われるとき、「演技の野心はあるがプライドや羞恥心のない人を求む」と書かれていたに違いない。
back_translation: When the auditions for this movie were held, it must have said, "Looking for someone with acting ambition but no pride or shame."

text: the movie is a desperate miscalculation .
translation: その映画は絶望的な誤算です。
back_translation: That movie is a desperate miscalculation.

text: what they 're doing is a matter of plumbing arrangements and mind games , of no erotic or sensuous charge .
translation: 彼らがしていることは、配管の配置と心のゲームの問題であり、官能的またはエロティックな要素はありません。
back_translation: What they are doing is a matter of plumbing layout and mind games, with no sensual or erotic elements involved.

text: plays like a glossy melodrama that occasionally verges on camp .
translation: 光沢のあるメロドラマのように演じられ、時折キャンプに近づく。
back_translation: Performed like a glossy melodrama, occasionally bordering on camp.

text: what ultimately makes windtalkers a disappointment is the superficial way it deals with its story .
translation: 「ウィンドトーカーズ」が最終的に失望させるのは、そのストーリーに対する表面的な扱い方です。
back_translation: "What ultimately disappoints about 'Windtalkers' is its superficial treatment of the story."

text: polanski has found the perfect material with which to address his own world war ii experience in his signature style .
translation: ポランスキーは、自身の第二次世界大戦の経験に対処するための完璧な素材を、彼の代表的なスタイルで見つけました。
back_translation: Polanski found the perfect material to address his experiences during World War II in his signature style.

text: the main story ... is compelling enough , but it 's difficult to shrug off the annoyance of that chatty fish .
translation: メインストーリーは十分に魅力的ですが、そのおしゃべりな魚のイライラ感を振り払うのは難しいです。
back_translation: The main story is quite engaging, but it's difficult to shake off the annoyance of the chatty fish.

text: the film boasts at least a few good ideas and features some decent performances , but the result is disappointing .
translation: この映画にはいくつかの良いアイデアがあり、いくつかの良い演技が見られるものの、結果は失望に終わります。
back_translation: This movie has some good ideas and showcases some good performances, but the result is disappointing.

text: it 's no surprise that as a director washington demands and receives excellent performances , from himself and from newcomer derek luke .
translation: 監督としてワシントンが自らと新人デレク・ルークから優れたパフォーマンスを求め、受け取るのは驚くべきことではありません。
back_translation: As a director, it is not surprising that Washington demands excellent performances from himself and the newcomer Derek Luke.

text: if mostly martha is mostly unsurprising , it 's still a sweet , even delectable diversion .
translation: もしほとんどのマルタがほとんど驚くべきものでないとしても、それでもなお甘く、さらには美味しい気晴らしです。
back_translation: Even if most Malta is not particularly surprising, it is still a sweet and even delicious diversion.

text: top-notch action powers this romantic drama .
translation: 一流のアクションがこのロマンティックドラマを支えています。
back_translation: Top-notch action supports this romantic drama.

text: roman polanski 's autobiographical gesture at redemption is better than ` shindler 's list ' - it is more than merely a holocaust movie .
translation: ロマン・ポランスキーの自己伝記的な贖罪の試みは『シンドラーのリスト』よりも優れており、単なるホロコースト映画以上のものです。
back_translation: Roman Polanski's autobiographical attempt at atonement is superior to "Schindler's List" and is more than just a Holocaust film.

text: an admitted egomaniac , evans is no hollywood villain , and yet this grating showcase almost makes you wish he 'd gone the way of don simpson .
translation: 自己中心的な性格を認めているエヴァンズは、ハリウッドの悪役ではないが、この不快なショーケースは、彼がドン・シンプソンのような道を歩んでいたら良かったと思わせるほどだ。
back_translation: Evans, who acknowledges his self-centered personality, is not a Hollywood villain, but this unpleasant showcase makes one wish he had walked a path like Don Simpson.

text: confessions may not be a straightforward bio , nor does it offer much in the way of barris ' motivations , but the film is an oddly fascinating depiction of an architect of pop culture .
translation: 告白は単純な伝記ではなく、バリスの動機について多くを提供するわけでもありませんが、この映画はポップカルチャーの創造者を奇妙に魅力的に描写しています。
back_translation: The confession is not a simple biography, nor does it offer much about Barris's motivations, but this film portrays the creators of pop culture in a strangely fascinating way.

text: the inherent limitations of using a video game as the source material movie are once again made all too clear in this schlocky horror\/action hybrid .
translation: この安っぽいホラー／アクションのハイブリッド作品では、ビデオゲームを素材として映画を作ることの固有の限界が再び明らかにされています。
back_translation: This cheap horror/action hybrid reveals once again the inherent limitations of making movies based on video games.

text: takes a simple premise and carries it to unexpected heights .
translation: シンプルな前提を取り上げ、それを予想外の高みに引き上げる。
back_translation: Take a simple premise and elevate it to an unexpectedly high level.

text: ` moore is like a progressive bull in a china shop , a provocateur crashing into ideas and special-interest groups as he slaps together his own brand of liberalism . '
translation: ムーアは中国の店で暴れる進歩的な雄牛のようで、彼自身のリベラリズムのブランドを作るために、アイデアや特定の利害団体にぶつかりながら挑発者として行動している。
back_translation: Moore is like a progressive bull rampaging in a Chinese store, acting as a provocateur while clashing with ideas and specific interest groups to create his own brand of liberalism.

text: the film reminds me of a vastly improved germanic version of my big fat greek wedding -- with better characters , some genuine quirkiness and at least a measure of style .
translation: その映画は、私のビッグ・ファット・ギリシャン・ウェディングのはるかに改良されたゲルマン風バージョンを思い出させます。キャラクターはより良く、いくつかの本物の奇抜さがあり、少なくともスタイルの点では一定の水準があります。
back_translation: That movie reminds me of a much-improved German version of My Big Fat Greek Wedding. The characters are better, there is some genuine eccentricity, and there is at least a certain level of quality in terms of style.

text: the star who helped give a spark to `` chasing amy '' and `` changing lanes '' falls flat as thinking man cia agent jack ryan in this summer 's new action film , `` the sum of all fears . ''
translation: 「エイミーを追いかけて」や「チェンジング・レーン」に火をつける手助けをしたスターが、今夏の新作アクション映画「すべての恐怖の合計」では、考える男のCIAエージェント・ジャック・ライアンとして失敗を重ねる。
back_translation: The star who helped ignite "Chasing Amy" and "Changing Lanes" now struggles as Jack Ryan, a thinking man's CIA agent, in this summer's new action film "The Total of All Fears."

text: a good film with a solid pedigree both in front of and , more specifically , behind the camera .
translation: 前面と、より具体的には裏方においても確かな実績を持つ良い映画。
back_translation: A good film with a solid track record both in front of the camera and, more specifically, behind the scenes.

text: a marvelous performance by allison lohman as an identity-seeking foster child .
translation: アイデンティティを求める養子の少女役を演じたアリソン・ローズマンの素晴らしいパフォーマンス。
back_translation: The wonderful performance of Alison Roseman as a girl seeking her identity as an adopted child.

text: a slow-moving police-procedural thriller that takes its title all too literally .
translation: 非常にゆっくりと進行する警察手続きスリラーで、そのタイトルをあまりにも文字通りに受け取っています。
back_translation: A police procedural thriller that advances very slowly and takes its title far too literally.

text: since dahmer resorts to standard slasher flick thrills when it should be most in the mind of the killer , it misses a major opportunity to be truly revelatory about his psyche .
translation: ダーマーは、殺人者の心に最も集中すべき時に標準的なスラッシャーフリックのスリルに頼るため、彼の精神について本当に啓発的になる大きな機会を逃しています。
back_translation: Darma misses a great opportunity to truly enlighten his mind by relying on the standard slasher flick thrills at the most focused moment on a killer's psyche.

text: leigh is n't breaking new ground , but he knows how a daily grind can kill love .
translation: レイは新しい領域を切り開いているわけではないが、日常の苦労が愛を殺すことを知っている。
back_translation: Rei is not pioneering a new realm, but knows that the struggles of everyday life can kill love.

text: the master of disguise represents adam sandler 's latest attempt to dumb down the universe .
translation: 「マスターファルス」はアダム・サンドラーの宇宙を単純化しようとする最新の試みを表しています。
back_translation: "Master Fars" represents Adam Sandler's latest attempt to simplify the universe.

text: i ca n't say this enough : this movie is about an adult male dressed in pink jammies .
translation: これを何度も言うことはできませんが、この映画はピンクのパジャマを着た成人男性についてのものです。
back_translation: I can't say this enough, but this movie is about an adult man wearing pink pajamas.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- boldly stroked , luridly coloured , uni-dimensional nonsense machine that strokes the eyeballs while it evaporates like so much crypt mist in the brain .
translation: （a）大胆に描かれ、鮮やかな色彩で、単一の次元のナンセンスな機械が、脳内の霧のように蒸発しながら、目玉を撫でる。
back_translation: Boldly drawn, in vivid colors, a nonsensical machine of a single dimension evaporates like mist in the brain, caressing the eyeballs.

text: once one experiences mr. haneke 's own sadistic tendencies toward his audience , one is left with a sour taste in one 's mouth , and little else .
translation: ハネケ監督自身の観客に対するサディスティックな傾向を経験すると、口の中に不快な味が残り、それ以外はほとんど何も得られない。
back_translation: Experiencing Haneke's director's sadistic tendencies towards the audience leaves an unpleasant taste in the mouth, and almost nothing else is gained.

text: with so many bad romances out there , this is the kind of movie that deserves a chance to shine .
translation: こんなにたくさんの悪いロマンスがある中で、これは輝く機会を得るべき映画です。
back_translation: Among so many bad romances, this is a movie that deserves to shine.

text: about schmidt is undoubtedly one of the finest films of the year .
translation: 『アバウト・シュミット』は間違いなく今年の最高の映画の一つです。
back_translation: "About Schmidt" is undoubtedly one of the best movies of the year.

text: it does n't reach them , but the effort is gratefully received .
translation: 彼らには届かないが、その努力は感謝して受け取られる。
back_translation: Their efforts may not reach them, but are appreciated and received.

text: - i also wanted a little alien as a friend !
translation: - 私も友達として小さなエイリアンが欲しかった！
back_translation: - I also wanted a little alien as a friend!

text: the work of a filmmaker who has secrets buried at the heart of his story and knows how to take time revealing them .
translation: 物語の核心に埋められた秘密を持ち、それを明らかにするために時間をかける方法を知っている映画製作者の作品。
back_translation: A filmmaker's work that has secrets embedded in the core of the story and knows how to take time to reveal them.

text: for this sort of thing to work , we need agile performers , but the proficient , dull sorvino has no light touch , and rodan is out of his league .
translation: この種のことが機能するためには、敏腕のパフォーマーが必要ですが、熟練した鈍いソルヴィーノには軽やかさがなく、ロダンは自分のレベルを超えています。
back_translation: For this kind of thing to work, a skilled performer is necessary, but the experienced but dull Solvay lacks lightness, and Rodin is beyond his level.

text: juliette binoche 's sand is vivacious , but it 's hard to sense that powerhouse of 19th-century prose behind her childlike smile .
translation: ジュリエット・ビノシュの砂は活気に満ちていますが、彼女の子供のような笑顔の背後にある19世紀の文体の力強さを感じるのは難しいです。
back_translation: Juliette Binoche's sand is full of life, but it's difficult to sense the strength of the 19th-century style behind her childlike smile.

text: most of the storylines feel like time fillers between surf shots .
translation: ほとんどのストーリーラインはサーフショットの間の時間埋めに感じる。
back_translation: Most storylines feel like they are just filling the time between surf shots.

text: a powerful performance from mel gibson and a brutal 90-minute battle sequence that does everything but issue you a dog-tag and an m-16 .
translation: メル・ギブソンの強力な演技と、犬タグやM-16を渡すことはないが、すべてを行う残酷な90分間の戦闘シーケンス。
back_translation: Mel Gibson's powerful performance and a brutal 90-minute combat sequence that does everything without handing over dog tags or an M-16.

text: woody allen has really found his groove these days .
translation: ウディ・アレンは最近、本当に調子を取り戻したようです。
back_translation: Woody Allen seems to have really regained his groove recently.

text: the screenwriters dig themselves in deeper every time they toss logic and science into what is essentially a `` dungeons and dragons '' fantasy with modern military weaponry ...
translation: screenwritersは、実質的には「ダンジョンズ＆ドラゴンズ」のファンタジーに現代の軍事兵器を絡めるたびに、論理や科学を投げ捨てて自らをさらに深く掘り下げています。
back_translation: Screenwriters are, in effect, throwing logic and science out the window as they delve deeper into intertwining the fantasy of "Dungeons & Dragons" with modern military weapons.

text: delirious fun .
translation: delirious fun.
back_translation: Delirious fun.

text: what might have been acceptable on the printed page of iles ' book does not translate well to the screen .
translation: ilesの本の印刷されたページで許容されるかもしれないことは、画面にもうまく移行できません。
back_translation: What may be acceptable on printed pages of a book by Iles doesn't necessarily transition well to the screen.

text: ice cube is n't quite out of ripe screwball ideas , but friday after next spreads them pretty thin .
translation: アイス・キューブはまだ熟れたスクリューボールなアイデアを持っているわけではありませんが、『フライデー・アフター・ネクスト』ではそれらがかなり薄く広がっています。
back_translation: Ice Cube may not have fully ripe screwball ideas yet, but they are quite thinly spread in "Friday After Next."

text: director david fincher and writer david koepp ca n't sustain it .
translation: 監督デビッド・フィンチャーと脚本家デビッド・ケッペルは、それを維持できない。
back_translation: Director David Fincher and screenwriter David Koepp cannot maintain it.

text: mckay shows crushingly little curiosity about , or is ill-equipped to examine , the interior lives of the characters in his film , much less incorporate them into his narrative .
translation: マッケイは、彼の映画のキャラクターたちの内面的な生活に対して圧倒的に好奇心を示さず、あるいはそれを考察するための準備が整っていないため、それを彼の物語に組み込むこともできない。
back_translation: McKay shows an overwhelming lack of curiosity towards the inner lives of his movie characters, or is not prepared to reflect on them, and as a result, he is unable to integrate that into his stories.

text: what lifts the film high above run-of-the-filth gangster flicks is its refusal to recognise any of the signposts , as if discovering a way through to the bitter end without a map .
translation: その映画がありふれたギャング映画を超えて高く引き上げるのは、まるで地図なしで苦い結末に至る道を見つけるかのように、いかなる標識も認識しないという拒否です。
back_translation: What elevates that film beyond a commonplace gangster movie is its refusal to acknowledge any signposts, as if finding a path to a bitter ending without a map.

text: it gets the details of its time frame right but it completely misses its emotions .
translation: 時間の枠組みについては詳細が正しいが、感情を完全に見逃している。
back_translation: The details regarding the framework of time are accurate, but it completely overlooks emotions.

text: entirely appropriately , the tale unfolds like a lazy summer afternoon and concludes with the crisp clarity of a fall dawn .
translation: 非常に適切に、物語は怠惰な夏の午後のように展開し、秋の夜明けの鮮やかな明瞭さで結びつきます。
back_translation: Very appropriately, the story unfolds like a lazy summer afternoon and connects with the vivid clarity of an autumn dawn.

text: what we have is a character faced with the possibility that her life is meaningless , vapid and devoid of substance , in a movie that is definitely meaningless , vapid and devoid of substance .
translation: 私たちが持っているのは、彼女の人生が無意味で、無趣味で、実質が欠けている可能性に直面しているキャラクターであり、確かに無意味で、無趣味で、実質が欠けている映画です。
back_translation: What we have is a character facing the possibility that her life is meaningless, lacking in hobbies, and devoid of substance, along with a film that is undoubtedly meaningless, lacking in hobbies, and lacking in substance.

text: with a cast of a-list brit actors , it is worth searching out .
translation: Aリストのイギリス俳優たちが出演しており、探す価値があります。
back_translation: The A-list British actors are starring, and it's worth looking for.

text: it 's refreshing that someone understands the need for the bad boy ; diesel , with his brawny frame and cool , composed delivery , fits the bill perfectly .
translation: 悪戯っぽい男の必要性を理解している人がいるのは新鮮だ；ディーゼルは、彼のたくましい体格と冷静で落ち着いた話し方で、まさにその役割にぴったりだ。
back_translation: It's refreshing to see someone understand the necessity of a mischievous man; Diesel, with his robust physique and calm, collected manner of speaking, is perfect for that role.

text: for all of its insights into the dream world of teen life , and its electronic expression through cyber culture , the film gives no quarter to anyone seeking to pull a cohesive story out of its 2 1\/2 - hour running time .
translation: ティーンライフの夢の世界に関する洞察やサイバー文化を通じた電子的表現が豊富であるにもかかわらず、この映画は2時間30分の上映時間から一貫したストーリーを引き出そうとする誰に対しても容赦しない。
back_translation: Despite the rich electronic expressions through insights into the dream world of teen life and cyber culture, this film shows no mercy to anyone trying to derive a consistent story from its 2 hour and 30 minute runtime.

text: with flashbulb editing as cover for the absence of narrative continuity , undisputed is nearly incoherent , an excuse to get to the closing bout ... by which time it 's impossible to care who wins .
translation: フラッシュバルブ編集をナarrativeの連続性の欠如のカバーとして使用しているため、「Undisputed」はほとんど非一貫性であり、終盤の戦いに到達するための言い訳である...その時には、誰が勝つのか気にすることは不可能になる。
back_translation: Since the flash bulb editing is used as a cover for the lack of continuity in the narrative, "Undisputed" is almost inconsistent, serving as an excuse to reach the final fight... by that point, it becomes impossible to care about who wins.

text: clooney directs this film always keeping the balance between the fantastic and the believable ...
translation: クルーニーはこの映画を監督し、常に幻想的な要素と信じられる要素のバランスを保っています。
back_translation: Clooney directed this film and maintains a balance between fantastical elements and believable elements.

text: happy times maintains an appealing veneer without becoming too cute about it .
translation: ハッピータイムズは、あまり可愛くなりすぎることなく、魅力的な表面を維持しています。
back_translation: Happy Times maintains an appealing surface without becoming too overly cute.

text: tv skit-com material fervently deposited on the big screen .
translation: テレビのスキットコメディ素材が熱心に大画面に映し出された。
back_translation: The skit comedy material from the television was enthusiastically projected on the big screen.

text: a compelling film .
translation: 魅力的な映画。
back_translation: An attractive movie.

text: the film 's unhurried pace is actually one of its strengths .
translation: その映画ののんびりとしたペースは、実際にはその強みの一つです。
back_translation: The relaxed pace of the film is actually one of its strengths.

text: it certainly wo n't win any awards in the plot department but it sets out with no pretensions and delivers big time .
translation: プロットの面では賞を取ることはないでしょうが、 pretensionなしでスタートし、大きな成果を上げています。
back_translation: While it may not win awards in terms of plot, it started without pretension and has achieved significant results.

text: most of the things that made the original men in black such a pleasure are still there .
translation: 元のメン・イン・ブラックを楽しいものにしたほとんどの要素はまだそこにあります。
back_translation: Most of the elements that made the original Men in Black enjoyable are still there.

text: cold , sterile and lacking any color or warmth .
translation: 冷たく、無機質で、色や温かみが欠けている。
back_translation: It is cold, inorganic, and lacking in color and warmth.

text: a ` girls gone wild ' video for the boho art-house crowd , the burning sensation is n't a definitive counter-cultural document -- its makers are n't removed and inquisitive enough for that .
translation: ボヘミアンアートハウスの crowd のための「ガールズゴーンワイルド」ビデオで、バーニングセンサーションは決定的なカウンターカルチャー文書ではありません - 制作者たちはそれほど距離を置いて好奇心旺盛ではありません。
back_translation: The "Girls Gone Wild" video for the crowd at the Bohemian Art House is not a definitive counterculture document; the creators are not as distanced and curious as one might expect.

text: ... the movie feels stitched together from stock situations and characters from other movies .
translation: 映画は他の映画からのストックな状況やキャラクターを繋ぎ合わせたように感じる。
back_translation: The movie feels like it connects stock situations and characters from other films.

text: with an obvious rapport with her actors and a striking style behind the camera , hélène angel is definitely a director to watch .
translation: 明らかな俳優との相性とカメラの後ろの印象的なスタイルを持つエレーヌ・アンジェルは、間違いなく注目すべき監督です。
back_translation: Élène Angel, with her obvious compatibility with actors and impressive style behind the camera, is undoubtedly a director to watch.

text: a deft , delightful mix of sulky teen drama and overcoming-obstacles sports-movie triumph .
translation: 不機嫌なティーンドラマと障害を克服するスポーツ映画の勝利が見事に融合した魅力的な作品。
back_translation: An engaging piece that beautifully combines the moody teen drama with the triumph of overcoming obstacles in a sports film.

text: men in black ii achieves ultimate insignificance -- it 's the sci-fi comedy spectacle as whiffle-ball epic .

translation: 人間の経験を豊富に取り入れた珍しいドキュメンタリーであり、ドラマ、葛藤、涙、驚きが詰まっていて、フィクションとノンフィクション映画の通常の境界を超えている。
back_translation: It is a rare documentary that richly incorporates human experiences, packed with drama, conflict, tears, and surprises, transcending the usual boundaries between fiction and nonfiction films.

text: hashiguchi covers this territory with wit and originality , suggesting that with his fourth feature -- the first to be released in the u.s. -- a major director is emerging in world cinema .
translation: 橋口はこの領域を機知と独創性で捉え、彼の4作目、つまりアメリカで初めて公開される作品によって、世界映画界に新たな大物監督が現れつつあることを示唆しています。
back_translation: Hashiguchi captures this realm with wit and creativity, suggesting that a new major director is emerging in the world of cinema through his fourth work, which will be premiered for the first time in America.

text: when -lrb- reno -rrb- lets her radical flag fly , taking angry potshots at george w. bush , henry kissinger , larry king , et al. , reno devolves into a laugh-free lecture .
translation: レノがジョージ・W・ブッシュ、ヘンリー・キッシンジャー、ラリー・キングなどに向けて怒りを込めた批判をする時、彼女の過激な旗が翻りますが、その結果、レノは笑いのない講義に陥ります。
back_translation: When Reno directs her angry criticism towards figures like George W. Bush, Henry Kissinger, and Larry King, her radical banner flies, but as a result, Reno ends up in a lecture devoid of laughter.

text: never capitalizes on this concept and opts for the breezy and amateurish feel of an after school special on the subject of tolerance .
translation: この概念をうまく活用することはなく、寛容をテーマにしたアフタースクールスペシャルのような軽やかで素人っぽい雰囲気を選んでいる。
back_translation: They have not made good use of this concept and instead opted for a light and amateurish atmosphere, like an after-school special focused on the theme of tolerance.

text: despite its visual virtuosity , ` naqoyqatsi ' is banal in its message and the choice of material to convey it .
translation: 視覚的な virtuosity にもかかわらず、『ナコイカツィ』はそのメッセージとそれを伝えるための素材の選択において平凡です。
back_translation: Despite its visual virtuosity, "Nakoikatsui" is mediocre in its message and the choice of materials used to convey it.

text: while the filmmaking may be a bit disjointed , the subject matter is so fascinating that you wo n't care .
translation: 映画製作は少しばらばらかもしれませんが、テーマがとても魅力的なので気にならないでしょう。
back_translation: The filmmaking may be a bit disjointed, but the theme is so captivating that you probably won't mind.

text: paul bettany is cool .
translation: ポール・ベタニーはかっこいい。
back_translation: Paul Bettany is cool.

text: collateral damage is trash , but it earns extra points by acting as if it were n't .
translation: コラテラル・ダメージはゴミだけど、まるでそうじゃないかのように振る舞うことで追加ポイントを稼いでいる。
back_translation: Collateral damage is trash, but it's racking up extra points by acting as if it's not.

text: it 's anchored by splendid performances from an honored screen veteran and a sparkling newcomer who instantly transform themselves into a believable mother\/daughter pair .
translation: 名誉あるスクリーンのベテランと瞬時に信じられる母娘のペアに変身する輝かしい新星による素晴らしい演技に支えられています。
back_translation: Supported by a wonderful performance from a brilliant new star who transforms into a pair of an esteemed screen veteran and a instantly believable mother and daughter.

text: the one not-so-small problem with expecting is that the entire exercise has no real point .
translation: 期待することの小さくない問題は、その行為には実際の意味がないことです。
back_translation: A significant problem with expectations is that the act itself has no real meaning.

text: when you 've got the wildly popular vin diesel in the equation , it adds up to big box office bucks all but guaranteed .
translation: ヴィン・ディーゼルが関わっていると、ほぼ確実に大ヒット成績が期待できる。
back_translation: When Vin Diesel is involved, a big hit is almost guaranteed.

text: the problem with all of this : it 's not really funny .
translation: これらすべての問題：それは本当に面白くない。
back_translation: All of these problems: it's really not interesting.

text: one hour photo may seem disappointing in its generalities , but it 's the little nuances that perhaps had to escape from director mark romanek 's self-conscious scrutiny to happen , that finally get under your skin .
translation: 「ワン・アワー・フォト」は、その一般的な側面では残念に思えるかもしれませんが、監督マーク・ロマネクの自己意識的な目から逃れて生じた小さなニュアンスが、最終的にはあなたの心に響くのです。
back_translation: "One Hour Photo" may seem disappointing in its general aspects, but the small nuances that emerge from director Mark Romanek's self-aware gaze ultimately resonate in your heart.

text: a modestly surprising movie .
translation: 控えめに驚くべき映画。
back_translation: A modestly astonishing movie.

text: it 's impossible to indulge the fanciful daydreams of janice beard -lrb- eileen walsh -rrb- when her real-life persona is so charmless and vacant .
translation: ジャニス・ビアード（アイリーン・ウォルシュ）の空想的な夢想にふけるのは不可能だ。彼女の実生活の人物像はあまりにも魅力がなく、空虚だからだ。
back_translation: It is impossible to indulge in the fanciful dreams of Janice Beard (Eileen Walsh). The character of her real-life persona is too unappealing and hollow.

text: as the movie traces mr. brown 's athletic exploits , it is impossible not to be awed by the power and grace of one of the greatest natural sportsmen of modern times .
translation: 映画がブラウン氏のスポーツの業績を追う中で、現代の偉大な天然のスポーツマンの一人である彼の力と優雅さに感嘆せずにはいられません。
back_translation: As the film traces Mr. Brown's accomplishments in sports, one cannot help but admire his strength and grace as one of the great natural athletes of modern times.

text: to others , it will remind them that hong kong action cinema is still alive and kicking .
translation: 他の人々にとって、香港のアクション映画がまだ生きていることを思い出させるでしょう。
back_translation: It will remind other people that Hong Kong action movies are still alive.

text: with tiny little jokes and nary an original idea , this sappy ethnic sleeper proves that not only blockbusters pollute the summer movie pool .
translation: 小さなジョークばかりでオリジナルのアイデアもほとんどないこの感傷的な民族映画は、大作だけが夏の映画に害を及ぼすわけではないことを証明しています。
back_translation: This sentimental ethnic film, which is mostly made up of small jokes and has hardly any original ideas, proves that it's not just big-budget films that can harm summer movies.

text: confuses its message with an ultimate desire to please , and contorting itself into an idea of expectation is the last thing any of these three actresses , nor their characters , deserve .
translation: メッセージを喜ばせたいという究極の欲望と混同し、期待のアイデアに自らを歪めることは、これら三人の女優や彼女たちのキャラクターが受けるべき最後のことです。
back_translation: Confusing the ultimate desire to please the message and distorting oneself with the idea of expectation is the last thing that these three actresses or their characters should endure.

text: it 's a fine , focused piece of work that reopens an interesting controversy and never succumbs to sensationalism .
translation: これは興味深い論争を再び浮上させる、洗練されて焦点を絞った作品であり、センセーショナリズムには決して屈しません。
back_translation: This is a refined and focused work that brings an interesting debate back to the forefront, and it never succumbs to sensationalism.

text: a heartening tale of small victories and enduring hope .
translation: 小さな勝利と持続する希望の心温まる物語。
back_translation: A heartwarming story of small victories and enduring hope.

text: this franchise has not spawned a single good film .
translation: このフランチャイズは一つの良い映画も生み出していません。
back_translation: This franchise has not produced a single good movie.

text: a taut , sobering film .
translation: 緊張感のある、心を打つ映画。
back_translation: A tense and heartwarming movie.

text: ear-splitting exercise in formula crash-and-bash action .
translation: 耳をつんざくような公式の衝突と破壊のアクションの練習。
back_translation: Practice of official collisions and destructive actions that pierce the ears.

text: just about everyone involved here seems to be coasting .
translation: ここに関わっているほとんどの人が流されているように見えます。
back_translation: It seems that most of the people involved here are being swept along.

text: what sets this romantic comedy apart from most hollywood romantic comedies is its low-key way of tackling what seems like done-to-death material .
translation: このロマンティックコメディがほとんどのハリウッドのロマンティックコメディと異なるのは、使い古された素材に対処する控えめな方法です。
back_translation: What makes this romantic comedy different from most Hollywood romantic comedies is its modest approach to dealing with worn-out material.

text: claims to sort the bad guys from the good , which is its essential problem .
translation: 悪者と善者を区別することを主張していますが、これはその本質的な問題です。
back_translation: It argues for distinguishing between villains and heroes, but this is the essential problem.

text: surprisingly , the film is a hilarious adventure and i shamelessly enjoyed it .
translation: 驚くことに、その映画は面白い冒険で、私は恥ずかしげもなく楽しみました。
back_translation: Surprisingly, the movie was an interesting adventure, and I enjoyed it without any shame.

text: woo has as much right to make a huge action sequence as any director , but how long will filmmakers copy the `` saving private ryan '' battle scenes before realizing steven spielberg got it right the first time ?
translation: ウー監督は他の監督と同じように大規模なアクションシーンを作る権利があるが、映画製作者たちはスティーブン・スピルバーグが最初にそれを正しく作ったことを理解するまで、どれだけの時間「プライベート・ライアン」の戦闘シーンを模倣し続けるのだろうか？
back_translation: Director Woo has the right to create large-scale action scenes like other directors, but how long will filmmakers continue to imitate the combat scenes of "Saving Private Ryan" until they understand that Steven Spielberg was the first to do it right?

text: although it starts off so bad that you feel like running out screaming , it eventually works its way up to merely bad rather than painfully awful .
translation: 最初はあまりにひどくて叫びながら逃げ出したくなるけれど、最終的にはただの悪い状態にまで上昇し、痛々しくひどいとは言えなくなる。
back_translation: At first, it’s so terrible that you feel like screaming and wanting to run away, but eventually it just rises to a bad state, and you can no longer say it’s painfully horrible.

text: makes 98 minutes feel like three hours .
translation: 98分が3時間のように感じさせる。
back_translation: It makes 98 minutes feel like 3 hours.

text: the entire point of a shaggy dog story , of course , is that it goes nowhere , and this is classic nowheresville in every sense .
translation: シャギードッグストーリーの全てのポイントは、もちろんそれがどこにも行かないということであり、これはあらゆる意味でまさに無のクラシックです。
back_translation: The point of the Shaggy Dog Story is, of course, that it goes nowhere, and in every sense, it's truly a classic of nothingness.

text: shame on writer\/director vicente aranda for making a florid biopic about mad queens , obsessive relationships , and rampant adultery so dull .
translation: 作家・監督のビセンテ・アランダには、華やかな伝記映画を制作しながら、狂気の女王たち、 obsessiveな関係、 rampantな不貞を描いてこれほど退屈に仕上げたことに恥じるべきだ。
back_translation: The writer and director Vicente Aranda should be ashamed to have made such a boring film while creating a flamboyant biographical story that depicts mad queens, obsessive relationships, and rampant infidelity.

text: spinning a web of dazzling entertainment may be overstating it , but `` spider-man '' certainly delivers the goods .
translation: 華やかなエンターテイメントの網を張るのはやや大げさかもしれませんが、「スパイダーマン」は確かに楽しませてくれます。
back_translation: It may be a bit of an exaggeration to say that it weaves a glamorous web of entertainment, but "Spider-Man" certainly provides enjoyment.

text: like the hanks character , he 's a slow study : the action is stilted and the tabloid energy embalmed .
translation: ハンクスのキャラクターのように、彼はのろい学習者です：アクションはぎこちなく、タブロイド的なエネルギーは封じ込められています。
back_translation: Like Hanks' character, he is a clumsy learner: his actions are awkward, and his tabloid-like energy is contained.

text: a poignant lyricism runs through balzac and the little chinese seamstress that transforms this story about love and culture into a cinematic poem .
translation: バルザックと小さな中国の仕立屋には、愛と文化についてのこの物語を映画的な詩に変える切実な詩情が流れている。
back_translation: "Balzac and the Little Chinese Seamstress" flows with a heartfelt poignant lyricism that transforms this story about love and culture into cinematic poetry.

text: ... is funny in the way that makes you ache with sadness -lrb- the way chekhov is funny -rrb- , profound without ever being self-important , warm without ever succumbing to sentimentality .
translation: …悲しさで胸が痛むような笑い方をする -（チェーホフのように）- 、決して自意識過剰にならず、深い思索を持ち、決して感傷的にならない温かさを持っています。
back_translation: They laugh in a way that feels like their chest is aching with sadness - (like Chekhov) - never overly self-conscious, possessing deep thought, and holding a warmth that is never sentimental.

text: paul bettany is good at being the ultra-violent gangster wannabe , but the movie is certainly not number 1 .
translation: ポール・ベタニーは超暴力的なギャングのなりたい奴を演じるのが上手ですが、この映画は確かにナンバーワンではありません。
back_translation: Paul Bettany is good at playing someone who wants to be a super-violent gangster, but this movie is definitely not number one.

text: the verdict : two bodies and hardly a laugh between them .
translation: 評決：2つの遺体とほとんど笑いはない。
back_translation: Verdict: Two bodies and hardly any laughter.

text: in xxx , diesel is that rare creature -- an action hero with table manners , and one who proves that elegance is more than tattoo deep .
translation: xxxでは、ディーゼルは珍しい存在です。テーブルマナーを持つアクションヒーローであり、優雅さがタトゥー以上のものであることを証明しています。
back_translation: In xxx, diesel is a rare presence. He is an action hero with table manners, proving that elegance is more than just a tattoo.

text: there is a strong directorial stamp on every frame of this stylish film that is able to visualize schizophrenia but is still confident enough to step back and look at the sick character with a sane eye .
translation: このスタイリッシュな映画のあらゆるフレームには強い監督のスタンプが刻まれており、統合失調症を視覚化することができる一方で、その病んだキャラクターを冷静な目で見る余裕も持っています。
back_translation: Every frame of this stylish film bears the strong stamp of its director, who is able to visualize schizophrenia while also maintaining the composure to observe the troubled character with a calm eye.

text: it 's funny , as the old saying goes , because it 's true .
translation: 面白いですね、古い言葉にあるように、それは真実だからです。
back_translation: It's interesting because, as the old saying goes, it is true.

text: special p.o.v. camera mounts on bikes , skateboards , and motorcycles provide an intense experience when splashed across the immense imax screen .
translation: 自転車、スケートボード、オートバイに取り付けられた特別なPOVカメラマウントは、広大なIMAXスクリーンに映し出されると、強烈な体験を提供します。
back_translation: Special POV camera mounts attached to bicycles, skateboards, and motorcycles provide an intense experience when projected onto a vast IMAX screen.

text: taken outside the context of the current political climate -lrb- see : terrorists are more evil than ever ! -rrb-
translation: 現在の政治的状況の文脈を離れて考えると -lrb- 参照 : テロリストはこれまでになく悪い！ -rrb-
back_translation: When thinking outside the context of the current political situation - (refer to: Terrorists are worse than ever!)

text: a little weak -- and it is n't that funny .
translation: ちょっと弱い -- それほど面白くはない。
back_translation: A bit weak -- not that interesting.

text: writer-director ritchie reduces wertmuller 's social mores and politics to tiresome jargon .
translation: 作家・監督のリッチーは、ヴェルトミューラーの社会的慣習や政治を煩わしい専門用語に還元している。
back_translation: The writer and director Richie reduces Veltmüller's social customs and politics to tedious jargon.

text: a forceful drama of an alienated executive who re-invents himself .
translation: 孤立したエグゼクティブが自らを再発明する力強いドラマ。
back_translation: A powerful drama of an isolated executive reinventing themselves.

text: one of those exceedingly rare films in which the talk alone is enough to keep us involved .
translation: 会話だけで私たちを引き込むことができる、非常に珍しい映画の一つです。
back_translation: It is one of the very rare movies that can draw us in with just conversation.

text: an almost unbearably morbid love story .
translation: ほとんど耐え難いほどの陰惨なラブストーリー。
back_translation: An almost unbearable, gruesome love story.

text: a mean-spirited film made by someone who surely read the catcher in the rye but clearly suffers from dyslexia
translation: 『ライ麦畑でつかまえて』を読んだに違いないが、明らかにディスレクシアに苦しむ誰かによって作られた、意地の悪い映画。
back_translation: It must have been read in "The Catcher in the Rye," but it is clearly a mean movie created by someone suffering from dyslexia.

text: if they broke out into elaborate choreography , singing and finger snapping it might have held my attention , but as it stands i kept looking for the last exit from brooklyn .
translation: もし彼らが華やかな振り付けで踊りながら歌ったり、指を鳴らしたりしていたら、私の注意を引いたかもしれない。しかし現状では、私はブルックリンの最後の出口をずっと探していた。
back_translation: If they had been singing and dancing with flashy choreography or snapping their fingers, they might have caught my attention. But in reality, I had been desperately searching for the last exit in Brooklyn.

text: there 's a sheer unbridled delight in the way the story unfurls ...
translation: 物語が展開する様子には、純粋な抑えきれない喜びがあります。
back_translation: There is a pure, uncontrollable joy in the way the story unfolds.

text: implicitly acknowledges and celebrates the glorious chicanery and self-delusion of this most american of businesses , and for that reason it may be the most oddly honest hollywood document of all .
translation: この最もアメリカ的なビジネスの華々しい詐欺行為と自己欺瞞を暗に認め、称賛しており、そのためにこれは最も奇妙に正直なハリウッドのドキュメントであるかもしれない。
back_translation: This may be the strangest yet most honest Hollywood documentary, as it implicitly acknowledges and praises the flashy fraud and self-deception that characterize this most American of businesses.

text: very well written and directed with brutal honesty and respect for its audience .
translation: 非常に良く書かれており、監督も素晴らしく、 brutal honesty（残酷な真実）と観客への敬意が込められています。
back_translation: It is very well written, the direction is wonderful, and it contains brutal honesty and respect for the audience.

text: impostor is a step down for director gary fleder .
translation: インポスターは、監督ゲイリー・フリーダーにとって一歩後退である。
back_translation: Imposter is a step back for director Gary Friedlander.

text: moving and vibrant .
translation: 動的で活気に満ちた。
back_translation: Dynamic and full of energy.

text: jacquot 's strategy allows his cast the benefit of being able to give full performances ... while demonstrating vividly that the beauty and power of the opera reside primarily in the music itself .
translation: ジャクォットの戦略は、彼のキャストにフルパフォーマンスを提供するメリットを与える一方で、オペラの美しさと力が主に音楽自体に存在することを生き生きと示しています。
back_translation: Jaquot's strategy vividly demonstrates that while it offers the advantage of providing a full performance to his cast, the beauty and power of opera mainly exist within the music itself.

text: hawn and sarandon form an acting bond that makes the banger sisters a fascinating character study with laughs to spare .
translation: ホーンとサランドンは、「バンガーシスターズ」において、笑いがあふれる魅力的なキャラクター研究を生み出す演技の絆を形成しています。
back_translation: Hawn and Sarandon form a bond of acting that creates a captivating character study filled with laughter in "The Banger Sisters."

text: may puzzle his most ardent fans .
translation: 彼の最も熱心なファンを困惑させるかもしれない。
back_translation: It might confuse his most enthusiastic fans.

text: in other words , it 's badder than bad .
translation: つまり、それは悪いどころか、もっと悪いということです。
back_translation: In other words, it means that it is not just bad, but even worse.

text: may prove to be -lrb- tsai 's -rrb- masterpiece .
translation: それは、（蔡の）傑作である可能性がある。
back_translation: It could be (Cai's) masterpiece.

text: one of the best , most understated performances of -lrb- jack nicholson 's -rrb- career .
translation: ジャック・ニコルソンのキャリアの中で最も優れた、控えめなパフォーマンスの一つ。
back_translation: One of Jack Nicholson's best and most understated performances in his career.

text: after all , he took three minutes of dialogue , 30 seconds of plot and turned them into a 90-minute movie that feels five hours long .
translation: 結局、彼は3分の対話と30秒のプロットを取り、それを5時間のように感じる90分の映画に仕立て上げた。
back_translation: In the end, he took a 3-minute dialogue and a 30-second plot and turned it into a 90-minute movie that felt like 5 hours.

text: the master of disguise falls under the category of ` should have been a sketch on saturday night live . '
translation: 変装の達人は「サタデー・ナイト・ライブ」のスケッチであったはずのカテゴリーに入ります。
back_translation: The master of disguise should fall into the category that was meant for the sketches of "Saturday Night Live."

text: shows holmes has the screen presence to become a major-league leading lady , -lrb- but -rrb- the movie itself is an underachiever , a psychological mystery that takes its sweet time building to a climax that 's scarcely a surprise by the time it arrives .
translation: ホルムズはメジャーリーグの主演女優になるためのスクリーンプレゼンスを持っていますが、映画自体は期待外れで、心理的ミステリーとしてクライマックスに至るまでじっくりと時間をかけますが、それに到達する頃にはほとんど驚きがありません。
back_translation: Holmes has the screen presence to be a leading actress in Major League, but the movie itself is disappointing. It takes its time building up as a psychological mystery, but by the time it reaches its climax, there’s almost no surprise left.

text: but it was n't .
translation: でも、そうではありませんでした。
back_translation: But that was not the case.

text: foster breathes life into a roll that could have otherwise been bland and run of the mill .
translation: フォスターは、さもなければ普通でありふれたロールに命を吹き込んでいる。
back_translation: Foster breathes life into otherwise ordinary and mundane roles.

text: in old-fashioned screenwriting parlance , ms. shreve 's novel proved too difficult a text to ` lick , ' despite the efforts of a first-rate cast .
translation: 旧式の脚本用語で言うと、シュリーブ女史の小説は、一流のキャストの努力にもかかわらず、"舐める"には難しすぎる作品であった。
back_translation: In old-fashioned script terminology, despite the efforts of a top-notch cast, Miss Shreve's novel was a work that was too difficult to "lick."

text: well-acted , well-directed and , for all its moodiness , not too pretentious .
translation: 演技が素晴らしく、演出も良く、ムードがある一方で、あまり気取らない。
back_translation: The acting is wonderful, the direction is good, and there is a mood to it, while also being quite unpretentious.

text: a tired , predictable , bordering on offensive , waste of time , money and celluloid .
translation: 疲れた、予測可能で、侮辱的な境界に達しており、時間、お金、セロイドの無駄です。
back_translation: I'm tired; it's predictable and has reached an insulting boundary; it's a waste of time, money, and effort.

text: there 's no disguising this as one of the worst films of the summer .
translation: これは今夏最悪の映画の一つだということを隠すことはできない。
back_translation: I cannot hide the fact that this is one of the worst movies of this summer.

text: frida is n't that much different from many a hollywood romance .
translation: フリーダは多くのハリウッドのロマンスとはそれほど違いません。
back_translation: Frida is not so different from many Hollywood romances.

text: follows the original film virtually scene for scene and yet manages to bleed it almost completely dry of humor , verve and fun .
translation: 元の映画をほぼシーンごとに忠実に再現しているにもかかわらず、ユーモアや活気、楽しさをほぼ完全に失ってしまっている。
back_translation: Despite faithfully recreating the original film almost scene by scene, it has almost completely lost its humor, vigor, and fun.

text: scott baio is turning in some delightful work on indie projects .
translation: スコット・バイオはインディー作品で素晴らしい仕事をしています。
back_translation: Scott Baio is doing a great job in indie projects.

text: keenly observed and refreshingly natural , swimming gets the details right , from its promenade of barely clad bodies in myrtle beach , s.c. , to the adrenaline jolt of a sudden lunch rush at the diner .
translation: 鋭く観察され、爽やかに自然な『スイミング』は、サウスカロライナ州マートルビーチでのほとんど服を着ていない人々の散策路から、ダイナーでの突然のランチラッシュのアドレナリンの急増まで、詳細をしっかりと捉えています。
back_translation: The sharply observed and refreshingly natural "Swimming" captures the details from nearly naked people strolling along the paths at Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, to the sudden surge of adrenaline during lunch rushes at diners.

text: like vardalos and corbett , who play their roles with vibrant charm , the film , directed by joel zwick , is heartfelt and hilarious in ways you ca n't fake .
translation: バーダロスとコーベットのように、彼らは豊かな魅力で役を演じており、ジョエル・ズウィック監督のこの映画は、偽ることのできない心温まる面白さを持っています。
back_translation: Like Bardalos and Corbett, they portray their roles with rich charm, and this film by director Joel Zwick has an undeniable heartwarming appeal.

text: a lame comedy .
translation: つまらないコメディ。
back_translation: Boring comedy.

text: deliberately and devotedly constructed , far from heaven is too picture postcard perfect , too neat and new pin-like , too obviously a recreation to resonate .
translation: 故意に熱心に構築された場所は、天国から遠く、絵葉書のように完璧すぎて、整然として新しく、あまりにも明らかに再創造されたもので、共鳴し合うことはできない。
back_translation: A place that is deliberately and earnestly constructed is far from paradise; it is too perfect like a postcard, orderly and new, and so evidently recreated that it cannot resonate.

text: morvern rocks .
translation: モーヴェンはすごいです。
back_translation: Moeven is amazing.

text: a positively thrilling combination of ethnography and all the intrigue , betrayal , deceit and murder of a shakespearean tragedy or a juicy soap opera .
translation: エスノグラフィーのポジティブにスリリングな組み合わせに、シェイクスピアの悲劇やジューシーなソープオペラの陰謀、裏切り、欺瞞、殺人が加わっています。
back_translation: In a positively thrilling combination of ethnography, Shakespearean tragedies, and juicy soap opera plots, there are elements of conspiracy, betrayal, deception, and murder.

text: when ` science fiction ' takes advantage of the fact that its intended audience has n't yet had much science , it does a disservice to the audience and to the genre .
translation: 「サイエンスフィクション」がその対象とする聴衆がまだあまり科学を学んでいないという事実を利用するとき、それは聴衆とジャンルに対して不利益を与えます。
back_translation: When science fiction takes advantage of the fact that its audience has not yet learned much about science, it disadvantages both the audience and the genre.

text: illiterate , often inert sci-fi action thriller .
translation: 無知で、しばしば無気力なSFアクションスリラー。
back_translation: An ignorant and often apathetic sci-fi action thriller.

text: as janice , eileen walsh , an engaging , wide-eyed actress whose teeth are a little too big for her mouth , infuses the movie with much of its slender , glinting charm .
translation: ジャニス役のアイリーン・ウォルシュは、口に対して少し大き過ぎる歯を持つ魅力的で目を輝かせた女優であり、映画にその細くてきらめく魅力を多く与えています。
back_translation: Eileen Walsh, who plays Janice, is an attractive actress with slightly oversized teeth for her mouth, and she brings a lot of her slender and sparkling charm to the film.

text: a film of quiet power .
translation: 静かな力の映画。
back_translation: A movie of quiet power.

text: overwrought , melodramatic bodice-ripper .
translation: 過剰で、メロドラマチックなボディス・リッパー。
back_translation: Excessive and melodramatic body ripper.

text: zhuangzhuang creates delicate balance of style , text , and subtext that 's so simple and precise that anything discordant would topple the balance , but against all odds , nothing does .
translation: zhuangzhuangは、スタイル、テキスト、サブテキストの微妙なバランスを創り出しており、そのシンプルさと正確さはとても高いため、何か discordant（不協和音）があればそのバランスは崩れてしまう。しかし、逆境にもかかわらず、何も崩れない。
back_translation: Zhuangzhuang creates a delicate balance of style, text, and subtext, and its simplicity and accuracy are so high that any discordant element can disrupt that balance. However, despite adversity, nothing falls apart.

text: because the film deliberately lacks irony , it has a genuine dramatic impact ; it plays like a powerful 1957 drama we 've somehow never seen before .
translation: その映画は意図的にアイロニーを欠いているため、真剣なドラマ的影響を持っています。私たちがこれまで見たことがないかのように、1957年の力強いドラマのように展開します。
back_translation: The movie deliberately lacks irony, resulting in a serious dramatic impact. It unfolds like a powerful drama from 1957, as if it were something we have never seen before.

text: it 's a very valuable film ...
translation: 非常に貴重な映画です。
back_translation: It is a very valuable movie.

text: bad movie .
translation: 悪い映画。
back_translation: A bad movie.

text: just when you think you are making sense of it , something happens that tells you there is no sense .
translation: あなたがそれを理解し始めたと思った瞬間、何かが起こり、それには意味がないことを教えてくれます。
back_translation: The moment you think you’ve started to understand it, something happens that tells you it means nothing.

text: the rich performances by friel -- and especially williams , an american actress who becomes fully english -- round out the square edges .
translation: フリエルの豊かな演技、特にアメリカ人女優のウィリアムズが完全にイギリス人になる様子が、角ばった部分を和らげている。
back_translation: Friel's rich performance, especially Williams' transformation into a completely British character, softens the sharp edges.

text: the film rehashes several old themes and is capped with pointless extremes -- it 's insanely violent and very graphic .
translation: その映画は、いくつかの古いテーマを再利用し、無意味な極端さで締めくくられている -- 非常に暴力的でグラフィックだ。
back_translation: The movie reuses several old themes and concludes with a senseless extremity – it is very violent and graphic.

text: an undistinguished attempt to make a classic theater piece cinematic .
translation: 平凡な試みとして、クラシックな劇作品を映画化しようとした。
back_translation: As a humble attempt, I tried to adapt a classic theatrical work into a film.

text: it 's pauly shore awful .
translation: それはポーリー・ショアのひどさだ。
back_translation: That's the awfulness of Pauly Shore.

text: , `` they 're out there ! ''
translation: 「彼らはそこにいる！」
back_translation: "They are over there!"

text: a sour attempt at making a farrelly brothers-style , down-and-dirty laugher for the female set .
translation: ファレリー兄弟スタイルの、女性向けの下品なコメディを作ろうとした酸っぱい試み。
back_translation: A failed attempt to create a vulgar comedy for women in the style of the Farrelly brothers.

text: what could have been right at home as a nifty plot line in steven soderbergh 's traffic fails to arrive at any satisfying destination .
translation: スティーブン・ソダーバーグの『トラフィック』での巧妙なプロットラインとして自宅にぴったりだったものが、満足のいく結末に至らない。
back_translation: The cleverly devised plotline in Steven Soderbergh's "Traffic," which fit perfectly at home, does not reach a satisfying conclusion.

text: oh , james !
translation: ああ、ジェームズ！
back_translation: Ah, James!

text: got some good , organic character work , lots of obvious political insights and little room for engaging , imaginative filmmaking in its nearly 2 1\/2 - hour , dissipated length .
translation: 良いオーガニックなキャラクター描写があり、明白な政治的洞察がたくさんある一方で、約2時間半という散漫な長さの中で、魅力的で想像力豊かな映画制作の余地はほとんどない。
back_translation: While there are good organic character portrayals and plenty of clear political insights, there is almost no room for engaging and imaginative filmmaking within its rather lengthy and meandering two-and-a-half-hour runtime.

text: an emotionally and spiritually compelling journey seen through the right eyes , with the right actors and with the kind of visual flair that shows what great cinema can really do .
translation: 感情的で霊的に魅力的な旅が、正しい視点、正しいキャスト、そして素晴らしい映画が本当に何ができるかを示すようなビジュアルの華やかさをもって描かれています。
back_translation: An emotionally and spiritually captivating journey is depicted with a visual splendor that showcases what the right perspective, the right cast, and a wonderful movie can truly achieve.

text: an inept , tedious spoof of '70s kung fu pictures , it contains almost enough chuckles for a three-minute sketch , and no more .
translation: 1970年代のカンフー映画をテーマにした無能で退屈な模倣作品であり、3分のスケッチに十分な笑いをほとんど含んでおり、それ以上はない。
back_translation: A dull and incompetent imitation piece themed around 1970s kung fu movies, containing hardly enough laughs for a three-minute sketch, and nothing more.

text: a vivid , sometimes surreal , glimpse into the mysteries of human behavior .
translation: 人間の行動の謎への鮮やかで、時には超現実的なひときわの垣間見。
back_translation: A vivid and sometimes surreal glimpse into the mysteries of human behavior.

text: it 's no accident that the accidental spy is a solid action pic that returns the martial arts master to top form .
translation: 「偶然のスパイ」が確かなアクション映画であり、武道の達人が最高の形に戻るのは偶然ではない。
back_translation: "The Accidental Spy" is a solid action movie, and it's no coincidence that a martial arts master returns to form in the best way.

text: a wild comedy that could only spring from the demented mind of the writer of being john malkovich .
translation: ジョン・マルコビッチになれる男の作家の狂った心からしか生まれない、野生のコメディ。
back_translation: A wild comedy that can only be born from the crazy heart of a writer who can become John Malkovich.

text: it 's affecting , amusing , sad and reflective .
translation: それは影響を与え、面白く、悲しく、そして反省させるものです。
back_translation: It is something that impacts, is interesting, sad, and makes you reflect.

text: how can such a cold movie claim to express warmth and longing ?
translation: どうしてこんなに冷たい映画が温もりと切望を表現していると主張できるのだろうか？
back_translation: How can one argue that such a cold movie expresses warmth and longing?

text: the film did n't convince me that calvin jr. 's barbershop represents some sort of beacon of hope in the middle of chicago 's south side .
translation: その映画は、カルビン・ジュニアの理髪店がシカゴの南側の中心にある希望の光を代表しているとは私を納得させませんでした。
back_translation: That movie did not convince me that Calvin Jr.'s barber shop represents a beacon of hope in the heart of South Side Chicago.

text: exciting documentary .
translation: 魅力的なドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: An intriguing documentary.

text: at its most basic , this cartoon adventure is that wind-in-the-hair exhilarating .
translation: 最も基本的には、このカートゥーンアドベンチャーは風を感じるスリルに満ちたものです。
back_translation: At its core, this cartoon adventure is filled with the thrill of feeling the wind.

text: a winning piece of work filled with love for the movies of the 1960s .
translation: 1960年代の映画への愛が詰まった素晴らしい作品。
back_translation: A wonderful work filled with love for movies from the 1960s.

text: her film is like a beautiful food entrée that is n't heated properly , so that it ends up a bit cold and relatively flavorless .
translation: 彼女の映画は、美しい料理の前菜のようですが、適切に加熱されていないため、少し冷たくて比較的味がないものになっています。
back_translation: Her movie is like a beautiful appetizer of cuisine, but it has turned out a bit cold and relatively tasteless because it was not heated properly.

text: the most excruciating 86 minutes one might sit through this summer that do not involve a dentist drill .
translation: 今夏、歯科用ドリルのない、最も耐えがたい86分の時間。
back_translation: This summer, an unbearable 86 minutes without a dental drill.

text: gives everyone something to shout about .
translation: 皆に叫ぶ理由を与える。
back_translation: Give everyone a reason to shout.

text: it 's a setup so easy it borders on facile , but keeping the film from cheap-shot mediocrity is its crack cast .
translation: それは非常に簡単な設定で、安易さを超えていますが、その映画を安っぽい mediocre から守っているのは素晴らしいキャストです。
back_translation: It's a very simple setup, bordering on the easy, but what saves the movie from being cheap and mediocre is the fantastic cast.

text: the chateau is a risky venture that never quite goes where you expect and often surprises you with unexpected comedy .
translation: シャトーはリスクのある試みで、決して予想通りには進まず、しばしば予期しないコメディであなたを驚かせます。
back_translation: A chateau is a risky endeavor that never goes as planned and often surprises you with unexpected comedy.

text: deliciously mean-spirited and wryly observant .
translation: 美味しく意地悪で、ひねりの効いた観察力を持っている。
back_translation: Deliciously mischievous and possessing a keen sense of observation.

text: as dumb and cheesy as they may be , the cartoons look almost shakespearean -- both in depth and breadth -- after watching this digital-effects-heavy , supposed family-friendly comedy .
translation: ばかげていて陳腐に見えるかもしれませんが、このアニメは、デジタルエフェクトが豊富で、家族向けとされるコメディを見た後では、深さと広がりの両方においてほぼシェイクスピアのように見えます。
back_translation: It may seem ridiculous and clichéd, but this anime, with its abundant digital effects, looks almost Shakespearean in terms of both depth and breadth after watching a family-oriented comedy.

text: though clearly well-intentioned , this cross-cultural soap opera is painfully formulaic and stilted .
translation: 明らかに善意から生まれたこの異文化のソープオペラは、痛々しいほど定型的でぎこちない。
back_translation: This soap opera, clearly born out of good intentions, is painfully stereotypical and awkward.

text: jones has tackled a meaty subject and drawn engaging characters while peppering the pages with memorable zingers .
translation: ジョーンズは肉厚なテーマに取り組み、魅力的なキャラクターを描き、ページを記憶に残る名言で彩りました。
back_translation: Jones tackled a meaty theme, created captivating characters, and adorned the pages with memorable quotes.

text: reassuring , retro uplifter .
translation: 安心させる、レトロな高揚感。
back_translation: Reassuring, retro nostalgia.

text: the most brilliant work in this genre since the 1984 uncut version of sergio leone 's flawed but staggering once upon a time in america .
