translation: このジャンルで1984年のセルジオ・レオーネの欠点はあるが圧倒的な「アメリカの昔々」のカットされていない版以降、最も優れた作品です。
back_translation: In this genre, despite the shortcomings of Sergio Leone's 1984 film, it is the best work since the uncut version of "Once Upon a Time in America."

text: there are deeply religious and spiritual people in this world who would argue that entering a church , synagogue or temple does n't mean you have to check your brain at the door .
translation: この世界には、教会、シナゴーグ、または寺院に入ることが必ずしも脳をその場に置いていくことを意味しないと主張する、非常に宗教的で精神的な人々がいます。
back_translation: In this world, there are very religious and spiritual people who argue that entering a church, synagogue, or temple does not necessarily mean leaving your brain at the door.

text: this is unusual , food-for-thought cinema that 's as entertaining as it is instructive .
translation: これは珍しい、考えさせられる映画で、楽しませるだけでなく教育的でもあります。
back_translation: This is a rare, thought-provoking movie that is not only entertaining but also educational.

text: much credit must be given to the water-camera operating team of don king , sonny miller , and michael stewart .
translation: ドン・キング、ソニー・ミラー、そしてマイケル・スチュワートの水中カメラ操作チームには多くの称賛を贈るべきです。
back_translation: We should give much praise to the underwater camera operation team of Don King, Sony Miller, and Michael Stewart.

text: a sugar-coated rocky whose valuable messages are forgotten 10 minutes after the last trombone honks .
translation: 最後のトロンボーンが鳴った10分後には忘れ去られる、価値のあるメッセージが詰まった砂糖でコーティングされた岩。
back_translation: A sugar-coated rock filled with a valuable message that will be forgotten 10 minutes after the last trombone sounds.

text: what begins brightly gets bogged down over 140 minutes .
translation: 明るく始まったものが140分で沈滞する。
back_translation: What started brightly becomes stagnant in 140 minutes.

text: a painfully slow cliche-ridden film filled with more holes than clyde barrow 's car .
translation: 痛々しいほど遅く、クリシェだらけの映画で、クライド・バロウの車よりも多くの穴が開いている。
back_translation: It's painfully slow and full of clichés, with more holes than Clyde Barrow's car.

text: the best of the pierce brosnan james bond films to date .
translation: これまでのピアス・ブロスナンのジェームズ・ボンド映画の中で最高のもの。
back_translation: The best of the Pierce Brosnan James Bond films so far.

text: drumline is -- the mere suggestion , albeit a visually compelling one , of a fully realized story .
translation: ドラムラインは、完全に実現された物語の単なる提案、視覚的には魅力的なものである。
back_translation: The drumline is merely a suggestion of a fully realized story, visually appealing.

text: to be influenced chiefly by humanity 's greatest shame , reality shows -- reality shows for god 's sake !
translation: 人類の最大の恥である現実番組に主に影響を受けるなんて、神のために現実番組とは！
back_translation: It is a reality show that is mainly influenced by the greatest shame of humanity, for the sake of God!

text: take away the controversy , and it 's not much more watchable than a mexican soap opera .
translation: 論争を取り除けば、メキシコのソープオペラとそれほど変わらないほど見る価値がない。
back_translation: If you remove the controversy, it's not worth watching, much like a Mexican soap opera.

text: the audacity to view one of shakespeare 's better known tragedies as a dark comedy is , by itself , deserving of discussion .
translation: シェイクスピアのより知られた悲劇の一つをダークコメディとして見るその勇気は、それ自体が議論に値する。
back_translation: The courage to view one of Shakespeare's better-known tragedies as a dark comedy is itself worthy of discussion.

text: the success of undercover brother is found in its ability to spoof both black and white stereotypes equally .
translation: 「アンダーカバー・ブラザー」の成功は、黒人と白人のステレオタイプの両方を平等にパロディ化する能力にあります。
back_translation: The success of "Undercover Brother" lies in its ability to parody both Black and White stereotypes equally.

text: too damn weird to pass up , and for the blacklight crowd , way cheaper -lrb- and better -rrb- than pink floyd tickets .
translation: とても奇妙で見逃せない、そしてブラックライトの人たちには、ピンク・フロイドのチケットよりもずっと安くて（そしてより良い）です。
back_translation: It's very strange and unmissable, and for those under black light, it's much cheaper (and better) than Pink Floyd tickets.

text: you expect more from director michael apted -lrb- enigma -rrb- and screenwriter nicholas kazan -lrb- reversal of fortune -rrb- than this cliche pileup .
translation: マイケル・アップデイ（エニグマ）監督とニコラス・カザン（運命の逆転）脚本家には、このクリシェの山以上のものを期待してしまいます。
back_translation: I have higher expectations for director Michael Updegraff (Enigma) and screenwriter Nicholas Kazan (Fate's Reversal) than just this mountain of clichés.

text: director jay russell weighs down his capricious fairy-tale with heavy sentiment and lightweight meaning .
translation: 監督のジェイ・ラッセルは、気まぐれなおとぎ話に重い感情と軽薄な意味を持たせています。
back_translation: Director Jay Russell imbues this whimsical fairy tale with heavy emotions and superficial meanings.

text: a good-natured ensemble comedy that tries hard to make the most of a bumper cast , but never quite gets off the ground .
translation: 多くのキャストを活かそうと一生懸命な、親しみやすいアンサンブルコメディですが、なかなか飛躍することができません。
back_translation: It's an ensemble comedy that is earnest in trying to make the most of its many cast members, but it struggles to make a breakthrough.

text: a moving and solidly entertaining comedy\/drama that should bolster director and co-writer juan josé campanella 's reputation in the united states .
translation: 感動的でしっかりと楽しめるコメディ・ドラマで、監督兼共同脚本家のフアン・ホセ・カンパネラのアメリカでの評価を高めるべき作品です。
back_translation: It's an emotional and thoroughly enjoyable comedy-drama that should enhance the reputation of director and co-writer Juan José Campanella in America.

text: everything is off .
translation: すべてが違っています。
back_translation: Everything is different.

text: working from a surprisingly sensitive script co-written by gianni romoli ... ozpetek avoids most of the pitfalls you 'd expect in such a potentially sudsy set-up .
translation: 驚くほど感受性の高い脚本を共同執筆したジャンニ・ロモリのもと、オズペテックは、このような潜在的に感情的な状況で予想される多くの落とし穴を避けています。
back_translation: Under the guidance of Gianni Romoli, who co-wrote the remarkably sensitive script, Ozpetek avoids many of the pitfalls that could be expected in such a potentially emotional situation.

text: pretend like your sat scores are below 120 and you might not notice the flaws .
translation: SATのスコアが120未満だと仮定して、欠点に気付かないかもしれません。
back_translation: Assuming the SAT score is below 120, you might not notice the shortcomings.

text: mordantly funny and intimately knowing ...
translation: 鋭く面白く、親密に理解している...
back_translation: Sharp, interesting, and intimately understanding...

text: i ca n't remember the last time i saw worse stunt editing or cheaper action movie production values than in extreme ops .
translation: 極限オプスで見たひどいスタント編集や安っぽいアクション映画の制作クオリティを最後に見たのはいつだったか、思い出せない。
back_translation: I can't remember the last time I saw such terrible stunt editing and cheap production quality in action movies like I did in Extreme Ops.

text: it 's tommy 's job to clean the peep booths surrounding her , and after viewing this one , you 'll feel like mopping up , too .
translation: トミーの仕事は彼女の周りにあるピープブースを掃除することであり、このブースを見た後、あなたも掃除をしたくなるでしょう。
back_translation: Tommy's job is to clean the peep booths around her, and after seeing this booth, you will also want to clean it.

text: each of these stories has the potential for touched by an angel simplicity and sappiness , but thirteen conversations about one thing , for all its generosity and optimism , never resorts to easy feel-good sentiments .
translation: これらの物語のそれぞれは、「天使に触れられた」シンプルさや甘さの可能性を持っていますが、「一つのことについての13の対話」は、その寛大さと楽観主義にもかかわらず、安易な気分を良くする感情には決して頼りません。
back_translation: Each of these stories has the potential for a simplicity and sweetness that is "touched by angels," yet "13 Dialogues about One Thing," despite its generosity and optimism, never relies on feel-good emotions that come too easily.

text: there 's ... an underlying old world sexism to monday morning that undercuts its charm .
translation: 月曜日の朝には、その魅力を損なう古い世界の性差別が潜んでいる。
back_translation: On Monday morning, the old-world sexism that undermines its charm lurks.

text: what a great shame that such a talented director as chen kaige has chosen to make his english-language debut with a film so poorly plotted and scripted .
translation: 才能ある監督である陳凱歌が、こんなにプロットや脚本がひどい映画で英語デビューを選んだのは本当に残念です。
back_translation: It is truly regrettable that the talented director Chen Kaige chose to make his English debut with such a terrible plot and script.

text: i liked a lot of the smaller scenes .
translation: 私は多くの小さなシーンが好きでした。
back_translation: I liked many small scenes.

text: some of the computer animation is handsome , and various amusing sidekicks add much-needed levity to the otherwise bleak tale , but overall the film never rises above mediocrity .
translation: 一部のコンピュータアニメーションは見栄えが良く、様々な面白いサイドキックが一見暗い物語に必要な軽快さを加えていますが、全体的に映画は決して平凡を超えることはありません。
back_translation: Some computer animations look good, and various interesting sidekicks add necessary lightness to what seems like a dark story, but overall, the film never rises above the ordinary.

text: beresford nicely mixes in as much humor as pathos to take us on his sentimental journey of the heart .
translation: ベレスフォードは、心の感情的な旅に私たちを連れて行くために、ユーモアと哀愁を見事に組み合わせています。
back_translation: Beresford brilliantly combines humor and melancholy to take us on an emotional journey of the heart.

text: nothing can detract from the affection of that moral favorite : friends will be friends through thick and thin .
translation: その道徳的なお気に入りの愛情を損なうものは何もありません：友は困難な時も共にいます。
back_translation: Nothing undermines that moral favorite affection: friends are with you in difficult times.

text: bring tissues .
translation: ティッシュを持ってきて。
back_translation: Please bring me some tissues.

text: an enthralling , entertaining feature .
translation: 魅力的で楽しませてくれる特徴。
back_translation: Attractive and entertaining characteristics.

text: as a director , paxton is surprisingly brilliant , deftly sewing together what could have been a confusing and horrifying vision into an intense and engrossing head-trip .
translation: ディレクターとしてのパクストンは驚くほど素晴らしく、混乱し恐ろしいビジョンになりかねないものを巧みに縫い合わせ、緊迫感があり没入感のある頭の中の旅に仕立て上げています。
back_translation: Paxton, as a director, is remarkably brilliant, skillfully weaving together what could become a chaotic and terrifying vision into a journey in the mind that is tense and immersive.

text: well-made but mush-hearted .
translation: よく作られているが、心が柔らかい。
back_translation: Well made, but soft-hearted.

text: labute masterfully balances both traditional or modern stories together in a manner that one never overwhelms the other .
translation: ラビュートは、伝統的な物語と現代の物語を見事にバランスさせており、どちらかが一方を圧倒することはありません。
back_translation: LaBute beautifully balances traditional narratives and modern stories, ensuring that neither overwhelms the other.

text: assured , glossy and shot through with brittle desperation .
translation: 確信に満ち、光沢があり、脆い絶望感が貫通している。
back_translation: It is filled with certainty, shiny, and a fragile sense of despair runs through it.

text: a damn fine and a truly distinctive and a deeply pertinent film .
translation: 非常に素晴らしく、真に独特で、深く関連性のある映画です。
back_translation: It is an incredibly wonderful, truly unique, and deeply relevant film.

text: filmmaker stacy peralta has a flashy editing style that does n't always jell with sean penn 's monotone narration , but he respects the material without sentimentalizing it .
translation: 映画製作者のステイシー・ペラルタは派手な編集スタイルを持っていますが、ショーン・ペンの単調なナレーションとは必ずしも合致しません。しかし、彼は素材を尊重し、感傷的に扱うことはありません。
back_translation: Filmmaker Stacey Peralta has a flashy editing style, but it doesn't always align with Sean Penn's monotone narration. However, he respects the material and doesn't handle it sentimentally.

text: despite its promising cast of characters , big trouble remains a loosely tied series of vignettes which only prove that ` zany ' does n't necessarily mean ` funny . '
translation: 期待できるキャラクターが揃っているにもかかわらず、『ビッグ・トラブル』は緩く結びついた小話のシリーズであり、「おかしい」とは必ずしも「面白い」ということではないことを示している。
back_translation: Despite having a lineup of promising characters, "Big Trouble" is a loosely connected series of anecdotes, demonstrating that "funny" does not necessarily mean "entertaining."

text: a surprisingly sweet and gentle comedy .
translation: 驚くほど甘くて優しいコメディ。
back_translation: A surprisingly sweet and gentle comedy.

text: ... begins with promise , but runs aground after being snared in its own tangled plot .
translation: ...約束から始まるが、自らの絡まったプロットに引っかかって行き詰まる。
back_translation: It starts with a promise, but then it gets caught in its own tangled plot and reaches a dead end.

text: although what time offers tsai 's usual style and themes , it has a more colorful , more playful tone than his other films .
translation: 「時間」の提供するものは、蔡の通常のスタイルやテーマですが、彼の他の映画よりもよりカラフルで、より遊び心のあるトーンを持っています。
back_translation: What "time" provides is a typical style and theme of Tsai, but it has a more colorful and playful tone compared to his other films.

text: a dull , inconsistent , dishonest female bonding picture .
translation: 退屈で、一貫性のない、 dishonestな女性の絆を描いた作品。
back_translation: A work depicting the bonds of boring, inconsistent, and dishonest women.

text: a must-see for fans of thoughtful war films and those interested in the sights and sounds of battle .
translation: 思慮深い戦争映画のファンや戦闘の光景や音に興味がある人々には必見の作品です。
back_translation: This is a must-see for fans of thought-provoking war movies and those interested in the sights and sounds of battle.

text: with an unflappable air of decadent urbanity , everett remains a perfect wildean actor , and a relaxed firth displays impeccable comic skill .
translation: 落ち着いたデカダントな都会の雰囲気を持つエヴレットは、完璧なワイルド風の俳優であり、リラックスしたファースは卓越したコメディの腕前を見せています。
back_translation: Everett, with its calm and decadent urban atmosphere, is the perfect wild styled actor, and the relaxed Farce showcases exceptional comedic skills.

text: by no means a slam-dunk and sure to ultimately disappoint the action fans who will be moved to the edge of their seats by the dynamic first act , it still comes off as a touching , transcendent love story .
translation: 決して簡単な勝利ではなく、ダイナミックな第一幕によって席の端に移動させられるアクションファンを最終的に失望させることが確実ですが、それでも感動的で超越的なラブストーリーとして成立しています。
back_translation: It is certainly not an easy victory, and the dynamic first act is sure to ultimately disappoint action fans who are moved to the edge of their seats, yet it still stands as an emotional and transcendent love story.

text: it has that rare quality of being able to creep the living hell out of you ...
translation: それは、あなたをひどく不安にさせることができるという稀な特質を持っています...
back_translation: It has a rare quality that can make you extremely anxious...

text: i encourage young and old alike to go see this unique and entertaining twist on the classic whale 's tale -- you wo n't be sorry !
translation: 若い人も年配の方も、このユニークで楽しい古典的なクジラの物語のアレンジを見に行くことをお勧めします -- 後悔しないでしょう！
back_translation: I recommend that both young and older people go see this unique and fun arrangement of the classic whale story -- you won't regret it!

text: what goes on for the 110 minutes of `` panic room '' is a battle of witlessness between a not-so-bright mother and daughter and an even less capable trio of criminals .
translation: 「パニック・ルーム」の110分間に展開されるのは、あまり頭の良くない母娘と、さらに能力の低い3人の criminals の間の知恵比べの戦いです。
back_translation: The 110 minutes of "Panic Room" unfolds as a battle of wits between a not-so-bright mother and daughter and three criminals of even lower capability.

text: in comparison to his earlier films it seems a disappointingly thin slice of lower-class london life ; despite the title ... amounts to surprisingly little .
translation: 彼の以前の映画と比較すると、今回の作品はロンドンの下層階級の生活を薄く切り取ったものであり、タイトルにもかかわらず、意外にも内容はほとんどないように思える。
back_translation: Compared to his previous films, this work offers a thin slice of the lives of the lower class in London, and despite the title, it surprisingly seems to lack substance.

text: the script was reportedly rewritten a dozen times -- either 11 times too many or else too few .
translation: 脚本は報じられるところによれば、12回書き直された -- 11回多すぎるか、あるいは少なすぎる。
back_translation: According to reports, the script was rewritten 12 times -- 11 times may be too many, or perhaps too few.

text: the master of disguise may have made a great saturday night live sketch , but a great movie it is not .
translation: 変装の達人は素晴らしいサタデー・ナイト・ライブのスケッチを作ったかもしれませんが、素晴らしい映画ではありません。
back_translation: The master of disguise may have created a wonderful Saturday Night Live sketch, but it's not a great movie.

text: if we 're to slap protagonist genevieve leplouff because she 's french , do we have that same option to slap her creators because they 're clueless and inept ?
translation: もし、フランス人の主人公ジェネヴィーブ・ルプルフを叩くなら、無知で無能な彼女の創作者を叩く選択肢も同じようにあるのでしょうか？
back_translation: If we criticize the French protagonist Geneviève Le Preuf, is there also the option to criticize her creator for being ignorant and incompetent?

text: i 've had more interesting -- and , dare i say , thematically complex -- bowel movements than this long-on-the-shelf , point-and-shoot exercise in gimmicky crime drama .
translation: 私はこれまででもっと興味深い、そして言ってしまえばテーマ的に複雑な排便を経験したことがあります。この長い間棚に置かれていた、カメラを構えて撮るだけの手法による、 gimmickyな犯罪ドラマとは比較にならないほどです。
back_translation: I have experienced a bowel movement that is more interesting and, to put it bluntly, thematically complex than any I have had before. This is incomparable to the gimmicky crime dramas that have been sitting on the shelf for so long, shot merely by setting up a camera.

text: i 've seen some bad singer-turned actors , but lil bow wow takes the cake .
translation: 悪い歌手から俳優に転身した人を何人か見てきましたが、リル・バウ・ワウが一番ひどいです。
back_translation: I have seen several people transition from being a bad singer to an actor, but Lil' Bow Wow is the worst.

text: `` nicholas nickleby '' is a perfect family film to take everyone to since there 's no new `` a christmas carol '' out in the theaters this year .
translation: 「ニコラス・ニクルビー」は、今年の劇場に新しい「クリスマス・キャロル」がないので、みんなで楽しむのにぴったりなファミリーフィルムです。
back_translation: "Nicholas Nickleby" is a perfect family film to enjoy together, especially since there are no new "A Christmas Carol" in theaters this year.

text: it wo n't hold up over the long haul , but in the moment , finch 's tale provides the forgettable pleasures of a saturday matinee .
translation: 長い目で見ると持ちこたえないが、その瞬間において、フィンチの物語は土曜日のマチネの忘れがたい楽しみを提供している。
back_translation: In the long run, it won't hold up, but in that moment, Finch's story offers an unforgettable pleasure for Saturday matinee.

text: was that movie nothing more than a tepid exercise in trotting out a formula that worked five years ago but has since lost its fizz ?
translation: その映画は、5年前に成功したフォーミュラを持ち出すだけの生ぬるい試みに過ぎなかったのか？それとも、もうその魅力を失ってしまったのか？
back_translation: Was that movie just a lukewarm attempt to bring back a formula that was successful five years ago? Or has it already lost its charm?

text: how good this film might be , depends if you believe that the shocking conclusion is too much of a plunge or not .
translation: この映画がどれくらい良いかは、衝撃的な結末があまりにも飛躍しすぎていると感じるかどうかにかかっています。
back_translation: The quality of this movie depends on whether you feel that the shocking ending is too far-fetched.

text: a cellophane-pop remake of the punk classic ladies and gentlemen , the fabulous stains ... crossroads is never much worse than bland or better than inconsequential .
translation: セロファンポップのリメイクであるパンククラシック「レディーズ・アンド・ジェントルマン、ザ・ファビュラス・ステインズ」、交差点はあまりにも平凡で、重要性もあまりない。
back_translation: The punk classic "Ladies and Gentlemen, The Fabulous Stains," a remake of the cellophane pop, is too mundane at the intersection and lacks much significance.

text: pretty good little movie .
translation: なかなか良い小さな映画です。
back_translation: It's quite a good little movie.

text: if nothing else , `` rollerball '' 2002 may go down in cinema history as the only movie ever in which the rest of the cast was outshined by ll cool j.
translation: もし他に何もなければ、2002年の「ローラーボール」は、他のキャストがLLクールJに圧倒された唯一の映画として映画史に名を刻むかもしれません。
back_translation: If nothing else, the 2002 film "Rollerball" may be remembered in film history as the only movie where other cast members were overshadowed by LL Cool J.

text: angel presents events partly from the perspective of aurelie and christelle , and infuses the film with the sensibility of a particularly nightmarish fairytale .
translation: 『エンジェル』は、オーレリーとクリステルの視点から部分的にイベントを描写し、特に悪夢的なフェアytaleの感覚を映画に注ぎ込んでいます。
back_translation: "Angel" partially depicts events from the perspectives of Aurelie and Christelle, infusing the film with a particularly nightmarish fairy tale sense.

text: nemesis suffers from a paunchy midsection , several plodding action sequences and a wickedly undramatic central theme .
translation: ネメシスは、ぽっこりした腹部、いくつかの鈍重なアクションシーン、そして非常にドラマ性に欠ける中心テーマに悩まされています。
back_translation: Nemesis is plagued by a protruding abdomen, several clumsy action scenes, and a central theme that lacks drama.

text: even when he 's not at his most critically insightful , godard can still be smarter than any 50 other filmmakers still at work .
translation: たとえ彼が最も批評的な洞察を持っていない時でも、ゴダールはまだ現役の他の50人の映画製作者よりも賢いことができる。
back_translation: Even when he doesn't have the most critical insights, Godard can still be smarter than the other 50 active filmmakers.

text: the fascination comes in the power of the huston performance , which seems so larger than life and yet so fragile , and in the way the ivan character accepts the news of his illness so quickly but still finds himself unable to react .
translation: その魅力は、ハスルトンのパフォーマンスの力にあり、それは非常に大きな存在でありながら、同時にとても脆い様子で、イワンのキャラクターが自分の病気の知らせをあっという間に受け入れるものの、反応できない自分に直面する様子にあります。
back_translation: Its charm lies in Hasserton's performance, which is a very significant presence yet at the same time appears very fragile, reflecting Ivan's character as he quickly accepts the news of his illness while facing his own inability to react.

text: -lrb- t -rrb- he film is never sure to make a clear point -- even if it seeks to rely on an ambiguous presentation .
translation: その映画は明確な主張をすることが決してできない -- あいまいなプレゼンテーションに頼ろうとする場合でさえ。
back_translation: That movie can never make a clear statement—even when it tries to rely on vague presentations.

text: this movie is about the worst thing chan has done in the united states .
translation: この映画は、チャンがアメリカで行った最悪のことについてです。
back_translation: This movie is about the worst thing that Chan did in America.

text: amazing !
translation: 素晴らしい！
back_translation: Wonderful!

text: the ya-ya 's have many secrets and one is - the books are better .
translation: ややたちは多くの秘密を持っており、その一つは- 本の方が良いということです。
back_translation: Yaya and the others have many secrets, one of which is that books are better.

text: the plot 's contrivances are uncomfortably strained .
translation: プロットの仕掛けは不自然にこじれている。
back_translation: The plot's contrivance is unnaturally complicated.

text: a thoroughly entertaining comedy that uses grant 's own twist of acidity to prevent itself from succumbing to its own bathos .
translation: 非常に楽しいコメディで、グラント自身の酸味のひねりを使って自らの陳腐さに陥るのを防いでいます。
back_translation: It is a very enjoyable comedy that utilizes Grant's own witty twist to prevent him from falling into his own clichés.

text: kids will love its fantasy and adventure , and grownups should appreciate its whimsical humor .
translation: 子供たちはそのファンタジーと冒険を愛し、大人たちはその気まぐれなユーモアを楽しむべきです。
back_translation: Children should love the fantasy and adventure, while adults should enjoy the whimsical humor.

text: -lrb- allen 's -rrb- best works understand why snobbery is a better satiric target than middle-america diversions could ever be .
translation: アレンの最高の作品は、スノッビズムが中流アメリカの逸脱や楽しみよりも優れた風刺の対象である理由を理解しています。
back_translation: Allen's greatest work understands why snobbery is a superior object of satire compared to the deviations and pleasures of middle-class America.

text: the stars may be college kids , but the subject matter is as adult as you can get : the temptations of the flesh are unleashed by a slightly crazed , overtly determined young woman and a one-night swim turns into an ocean of trouble .
translation: 星たちは大学生かもしれませんが、テーマは大人そのものです。肉体の誘惑は、少し狂った、はっきりとした決意を持つ若い女性によって解き放たれ、一晩の水泳がトラブルの海に変わります。
back_translation: The stars may be university students, but the theme is that of adulthood itself. The temptations of the body are unleashed by a slightly crazy young woman with a clear resolve, turning a night swim into a sea of trouble.

text: we 've liked klein 's other work but rollerball left us cold .
translation: 私たちはクラインの他の作品が好きですが、ローラーボールは私たちを冷たくしました。
back_translation: We like Klein's other works, but Rollerball left us cold.

text: both a grand tour through 300 hundred years of russian cultural identity and a stunning technical achievement .
translation: ロシアの文化的アイデンティティの300年を巡る壮大な旅であり、見事な技術的成果でもある。
back_translation: It is a magnificent journey through 300 years of Russia's cultural identity and a remarkable technical achievement.

text: a markedly inactive film , city is conversational bordering on confessional .
translation: 著しく非活動的な映画で、都市は告白に近い会話的です。
back_translation: A remarkably inactive film where the city is conversational and close to a confession.

text: clever and unflinching in its comic barbs , slap her is a small but rewarding comedy that takes aim at contemporary southern adolescence and never lets up .
translation: 巧妙で揺るぎないコメディの鋭い皮肉を持つ「スラップ・ハー」は、現代の南部の青春を直撃し、決して手を緩めない小さくとも充実したコメディです。
back_translation: "Slap Her," with its clever and unyielding sharp satire of comedy, strikes at modern Southern youth, delivering a small but fulfilling comedy that never lets up.

text: soderbergh , like kubrick before him , may not touch the planet 's skin , but understands the workings of its spirit .
translation: ソダーバーグは、以前のキューブリックのように、地球の表面に触れることはないかもしれないが、その精神の働きを理解している。
back_translation: Soderbergh may not touch the surface of the Earth like Kubrick did, but he understands the workings of its spirit.

text: there is no denying the power of polanski 's film ...
translation: ポランスキーの映画の力を否定することはできない。
back_translation: One cannot deny the power of Polanski's films.

text: to be oblivious to the existence of this film would be very sweet indeed .
translation: この映画の存在に気付かないのはとても素敵なことかもしれません。
back_translation: Not noticing the existence of this movie might be a wonderful thing.

text: though it goes further than both , anyone who has seen the hunger or cat people will find little new here , but a tasty performance from vincent gallo lifts this tale of cannibal lust above the ordinary .
translation: それは両方を超えていますが、『ハンガー』や『キャット・ピープル』を見たことのある人には新しいものはほとんどないでしょう。しかし、ヴィンセント・ギャロの魅力的なパフォーマンスが、この食人の欲望の物語を平凡なものを超えたものに引き上げています。
back_translation: It surpasses both, but for those who have seen "Hunger" or "Cat People," there is hardly anything new. However, Vincent Gallo's captivating performance elevates this story of cannibalistic desire to something extraordinary.

text: the beautifully choreographed kitchen ballet is simple but absorbing .
translation: 美しく振り付けられたキッチンのバレエはシンプルですが、魅力的です。
back_translation: The beautifully choreographed kitchen ballet is simple yet captivating.

text: from the opening strains of the average white band 's `` pick up the pieces '' , you can feel the love .
translation: 平均的なホワイトバンドの「ピックアップ・ザ・ピース」の冒頭のメロディーから、愛を感じることができます。
back_translation: From the beginning melody of the average White Band's "Pick Up the Pieces," you can feel love.

text: empire ca n't make up its mind whether it wants to be a gangster flick or an art film .
translation: 帝国はギャング映画になりたいのか、アート映画になりたいのか、決めかねている。
back_translation: The empire is undecided whether it wants to be a gangster film or an art film.

text: the result is so tame that even slightly wised-up kids would quickly change the channel .
translation: その結果はとても退屈で、少し賢くなった子供たちでさえすぐにチャンネルを変えてしまうだろう。
back_translation: The result is very boring, and even the slightly smarter children would quickly change the channel.

text: a penetrating , potent exploration of sanctimony , self-awareness , self-hatred and self-determination .
translation: 深く鋭い、聖性、自己認識、自己嫌悪、自己決定に関する強力な探求。
back_translation: A powerful exploration of deep sharpness, sanctity, self-awareness, self-hatred, and self-determination.

text: thirteen conversations about one thing lays out a narrative puzzle that interweaves individual stories , and , like a mobius strip , elliptically loops back to where it began .
translation: 「13の会話が一つのことについて」という作品は、個々の物語を織り交ぜたナarrativeパズルを描き出し、メビウスの帯のように、回り道をして元の場所に戻ります。
back_translation: The work "13 Conversations About One Thing" presents a narrative puzzle woven from individual stories, looping back to the original place like a Möbius strip.

text: director peter kosminsky gives these women a forum to demonstrate their acting ` chops ' and they take full advantage .
translation: 監督のピーター・コスミンスキーは、これらの女性に演技力を示すための場を提供し、彼女たちはそれを最大限に活用しています。
back_translation: Director Peter Kosminsky provides these women with a platform to showcase their acting abilities, and they are making the most of it.

text: storytelling feels slight .
translation: ストーリーテリングは軽薄に感じる。
back_translation: Storytelling feels superficial.

text: witty , vibrant , and intelligent .
translation: ウィットに富み、活気があり、知的。
back_translation: Witty, lively, and intellectual.

text: despite its shortcomings , girls ca n't swim represents an engaging and intimate first feature by a talented director to watch , and it 's a worthy entry in the french coming-of-age genre .
translation: 欠点があるにもかかわらず、『女の子は泳げない』は才能ある監督による魅力的で親密な初作品であり、フランスの成長物語ジャンルにおいて価値のある作品です。
back_translation: Despite its flaws, "Girls Can't Swim" is an attractive and intimate debut by a talented director and is a valuable addition to the French coming-of-age genre.

text: interesting and thoroughly unfaithful version of carmen
translation: 興味深く、徹底的に忠実でない「カルメン」のバージョン
back_translation: An interesting and thoroughly unfaithful version of "Carmen."

text: thanks to a small star with big heart , this family film sequel is plenty of fun for all .
translation: 心優しい小さな星のおかげで、このファミリー映画の続編はみんなにとって楽しいものになっています。
back_translation: Thanks to the kind-hearted little star, this family movie sequel is enjoyable for everyone.

text: for most of the distance the picture provides a satisfyingly unsettling ride into the dark places of our national psyche .
translation: ほとんどの距離において、この作品は私たちの国家的な精神の暗い場所へと満足感を伴った不穏な旅を提供しています。
back_translation: In most respects, this work offers a satisfied yet unsettling journey into the dark places of our national spirit.

text: it 's a smart , funny look at an arcane area of popular culture , and if it is n't entirely persuasive , it does give exposure to some talented performers .
translation: それは、ポピュラー文化の難解な領域についての賢くて面白い視点であり、完全に納得のいくものでないかもしれませんが、一部の才能あるパフォーマーに光を当てています。
back_translation: It is a smart and interesting perspective on the obscure realm of popular culture, and while it may not be entirely convincing, it sheds light on some talented performers.

text: we get the comedy we settle for .
translation: 私たちは妥協したコメディを手に入れる。
back_translation: We get a compromised comedy.

text: eerily accurate depiction of depression .
translation: 不気味なまでに正確なうつ病の描写。
back_translation: A disturbingly precise depiction of depression.

text: schrader aims to present an unflinching look at one man 's downfall , brought about by his lack of self-awareness .
translation: シュレイダーは、自己認識の欠如によって引き起こされた一人の男の没落を容赦なく描くことを目指している。
back_translation: Schreider aims to depict the relentless downfall of a man caused by a lack of self-awareness.

text: feels like the work of someone who may indeed have finally aged past his prime ... and , perhaps more than he realizes , just wants to be liked by the people who can still give him work .
translation: 彼は確かにピークを過ぎた年齢になった人の作品のように感じられ、そしておそらく彼自身が気づいている以上に、まだ彼に仕事を与えてくれる人たちに好かれたいと思っているのかもしれません。
back_translation: He certainly feels like the work of someone who has passed their peak age, and perhaps he wants to be liked by those who still give him work more than he himself realizes.

text: extraordinary debut from josh koury .
translation: ジョシュ・クーリーによる素晴らしいデビュー。
back_translation: A wonderful debut by Josh Cooley.

text: ... a bland murder-on-campus yawner .
translation: …味気ないキャンパスでの殺人の退屈な話。
back_translation: A boring story about a murder on a flavorless campus.

text: cannon 's confidence and laid-back good spirits are , with the drumming routines , among the film 's saving graces .
translation: キャノンの自信とリラックスした良い気分は、ドラムのルーチンと共に、この映画の救いの要素の一つです。
back_translation: Canon's confidence and relaxed good mood, along with the drumming routine, are one of the redeeming elements of this film.

text: just like a splendid meal , red dragon satisfies -- from its ripe recipe , inspiring ingredients , certified cuisine and palatable presentation .
translation: 素晴らしい料理のように、レッドドラゴンは満足させます - 熟成されたレシピ、インスピレーションを与える食材、認定された料理、そして口に合う盛り付けからです。
back_translation: Like a wonderful dish, the Red Dragon satisfies - with aged recipes, inspiring ingredients, certified cooking, and plating that pleases the palate.

text: feels more like a rejected x-files episode than a credible account of a puzzling real-life happening .
translation: まるで拒絶されたXファイルのエピソードのようで、信頼できる謎の現実の出来事の説明とは思えない。
back_translation: It feels like an episode of a rejected X-Files, and it seems impossible to explain as a reliable mystery of real events.

text: features what is surely the funniest and most accurate depiction of writer 's block ever .
translation: これは、作家のブロックを描いた最も面白く、最も正確な描写であることは間違いありません。
back_translation: This is undoubtedly the most interesting and accurate depiction of writer's block.

text: whenever it threatens to get bogged down in earnest dramaturgy , a stirring visual sequence like a surge through swirling rapids or a leap from pinnacle to pinnacle rouses us .
translation: 真剣なドラマに陥りそうになるたびに、 swirling rapidsを通り抜けるような力強いビジュアルシーケンスや、頂から頂へ飛び移るようなシーンが私たちを鼓舞します。
back_translation: Every time we feel like we might fall into a serious drama, powerful visual sequences that are like passing through swirling rapids, or scenes that leap from peak to peak, inspire us.

text: surprisingly powerful and universal .
translation: 驚くほど強力で普遍的です。
back_translation: Incredibly powerful and universal.

text: the story has its redundancies , and the young actors , not very experienced , are sometimes inexpressive .
translation: 物語には冗長な部分があり、若い俳優たちはあまり経験がなく、時には表情が乏しいことがあります。
back_translation: The story has redundant parts, and the young actors often lack experience, resulting in occasionally poor expressions.

text: even murphy 's expert comic timing and famed charisma ca n't rescue this effort .
translation: マーフィーの優れたコメディのタイミングと名高いカリスマ性でさえ、この試みを救うことはできない。
back_translation: Even Murphy's excellent comedic timing and renowned charisma cannot save this attempt.

text: a captivating coming-of-age story that may also be the first narrative film to be truly informed by the wireless age .
translation: ワイヤレス時代に真に影響を受けた初めての物語映画である可能性がある、魅力的な成長物語。
back_translation: It may be the first narrative film genuinely influenced by the wireless age, a captivating coming-of-age story.

text: an intelligent , multi-layered and profoundly humanist -lrb- not to mention gently political -rrb- meditation on the values of knowledge , education , and the affects of cultural and geographical displacement .
translation: 知識、教育の価値、文化的および地理的な移動の影響についての、知的で多層的かつ深いヒューマニズム - （穏やかな政治的要素も含まれています） - の瞑想。
back_translation: A meditation on knowledge, the value of education, the impact of cultural and geographical movements, and an intellectual, multifaceted, and profound humanism - (which also includes gentle political elements).

text: if hill is n't quite his generation 's don siegel -lrb- or robert aldrich -rrb- , it 's because there 's no discernible feeling beneath the chest hair ; it 's all bluster and cliché .
translation: もしヒルが彼の世代のドン・シーゲルやロバート・オルドリッチではないとしたら、それは胸毛の下に明らかな感情が感じられないからだ；それはすべて吹き荒れる誇張とクリシェに過ぎない。
back_translation: If Hill is not like the Don Siegel or Robert Aldrich of his generation, it is because there is no obvious emotion felt beneath the chest hair; it is all just a howling exaggeration and cliché.

text: and neither do cliches , no matter how ` inside ' they are .
translation: そして、どんなに「内輪」のものであっても、クリシェも同様です。
back_translation: And no matter how "insider" it might be, the same goes for clichés.

text: strictly a ` guy 's film ' in the worst sense of the expression .
translation: 最悪の意味での「男の映画」ということです。
back_translation: It's a "man movie" in the worst sense.

text: a lightweight , uneven action comedy that freely mingles french , japanese and hollywood cultures .
translation: 軽快で不均一なアクションコメディで、フランス、日本、ハリウッドの文化が自由に混ざり合っています。
back_translation: A lively and uneven action-comedy where French, Japanese, and Hollywood cultures mix freely.

text: irwin and his director never come up with an adequate reason why we should pay money for what we can get on television for free .
translation: アーウィンと彼のディレクターは、私たちがテレビで無料で手に入るものにお金を払う理由を適切に示すことができません。
back_translation: Irwin and his director cannot properly demonstrate why we should pay for something that we can get for free on television.

text: can you bear the laughter ?
translation: その笑いに耐えられますか？
back_translation: Can you endure that laughter?

text: `` abandon '' will leave you wanting to abandon the theater .
translation: 「アバンダン」はあなたを劇場を放棄したくさせるでしょう。
back_translation: "Abandon" will make you want to abandon the theater.

text: the movie fails to portray its literarily talented and notorious subject as anything much more than a dirty old man .
translation: その映画は、文学的に才能があり悪名高い主人公を、ただの汚れた老男としてしか描写できていない。
back_translation: The film is unable to portray the protagonist, who is both literarily talented and infamous, as anything more than just a dirty old man.

text: not as good as the full monty , but a really strong second effort .
translation: フルモンティほどではないが、非常に強力な第二作だ。
back_translation: It's not quite as strong as The Full Monty, but it's a very powerful second work.

text: asks what truth can be discerned from non-firsthand experience , and specifically questions cinema 's capability for recording truth .
translation: 非直接的な経験からどのような真実が見出されるかを尋ね、特に映画が真実を記録する能力について疑問を呈します。
back_translation: It asks what truths can be found from indirect experiences, particularly questioning the ability of films to record truth.

text: audiences are advised to sit near the back and squint to avoid noticing some truly egregious lip-non-synching , but otherwise the production is suitably elegant .
translation: 観客は、非常に目立つ口パクの不一致に気づかないように、後ろの方に座って細めた目で見ることを勧められていますが、その他は制作は適切に優雅です。
back_translation: The audience is advised to sit towards the back and watch with squinted eyes so as not to notice the very conspicuous lip-sync mismatch, but other than that, the production is appropriately graceful.

text: ... a solid , unassuming drama .
translation: ...堅実で控えめなドラマ。
back_translation: ...a solid and understated drama.

text: a formula family tearjerker told with a heavy irish brogue ... accentuating , rather than muting , the plot 's saccharine thrust .
translation: 重いアイルランド訛りで語られるフォーミュラファミリーの涙を誘う物語... プロットの甘ったるい推進を弱めるのではなく、強調しています。
back_translation: A tear-jerking story of a Formula Family told in a heavy Irish accent... It emphasizes rather than weakens the sweet propulsion of the plot.

text: it 's fairly solid -- not to mention well edited so that it certainly does n't feel like a film that strays past the two and a half mark .
translation: かなりしっかりとしており、丁寧に編集されているため、2時間30分を超えてしまったと感じるような映画ではありません。
back_translation: It is quite solid and well-edited, so it doesn't feel like a movie that exceeds 2 hours and 30 minutes.

text: the holiday message of the 37-minute santa vs. the snowman leaves a lot to be desired .
translation: 37分の「サンタ対スノーマン」のホリデーメッセージは、期待外れな点が多いです。
back_translation: The 37-minute holiday message of "Santa vs. Snowman" is disappointing in many aspects.

text: a vile , incoherent mess ... a scummy ripoff of david cronenberg 's brilliant ` videodrome . '
translation: ひどく、支離滅裂なゴミ・・・デビッド・クローネンバーグの素晴らしい『ビデオドローム』の最低のパクリです。
back_translation: Horribly incoherent garbage... the lowest rip-off of David Cronenberg's brilliant "Videodrome."

text: discursive but oddly riveting documentary .
translation: 言葉が多いが奇妙に引き込まれるドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A documentary that has a lot of words but is strangely captivating.

text: what 's most offensive is n't the waste of a good cast , but the film 's denial of sincere grief and mourning in favor of bogus spiritualism .
translation: 最も攻撃的なのは、優れたキャストの無駄遣いではなく、偽の精神主義を好むあまり、真摯な悲しみや喪に対する映画の否定です。
back_translation: The most aggressive thing is not the waste of a talented cast, but the denial of films that sincerely address sadness and mourning, due to an excessive preference for false spiritualism.

text: like a medium-grade network sitcom -- mostly inoffensive , fitfully amusing , but ultimately so weightless that a decent draft in the auditorium might blow it off the screen .
translation: 中程度のネットワークシットコムのようで、主に無害で時折面白いが、最終的にはあまりにも軽薄で、劇場内の風が吹けばスクリーンから吹き飛ばされてしまうかもしれない。
back_translation: It seems like a mediocre network sitcom that is mostly harmless and occasionally amusing, but ultimately too superficial, as it might be blown off the screen by a gust of wind in the theater.

text: a little melodramatic , but with enough hope to keep you engaged .
translation: 少しメロドラマティックですが、あなたを引きつけるのに十分な希望があります。
back_translation: It's a bit melodramatic, but there is enough hope to draw you in.

text: not only is it a charming , funny and beautifully crafted import , it uses very little dialogue , making it relatively effortless to read and follow the action at the same time .
translation: それは魅力的で面白く、美しく作られた輸入品であるだけでなく、非常に少ない対話を使用しているため、読みやすく、同時にアクションを追うのが比較的容易です。
back_translation: It is not only an attractive, interesting, and beautifully crafted import, but it is also easy to read due to its minimal dialogue, making it relatively easy to follow the action at the same time.

text: just about all of the film is confusing on one level or another , making ararat far more demanding than it needs to be .
translation: 映画のほとんどは何らかのレベルで混乱しており、「アララト」は必要以上に要求される作品となっています。
back_translation: Most movies are somewhat confusing at some level, and "Ararat" has become a work that demands more than necessary.

text: though it lacks the utter authority of a genre gem , there 's a certain robustness to this engaging mix of love and bloodletting .
translation: ジャンルの傑作には明確な権威が欠けているが、この愛と流血の魅力的なミックスには、ある種の堅実さがある。
back_translation: While masterpieces in the genre lack a clear authority, this captivating mix of love and bloodshed has a kind of solidity to it.

text: it 's touching and tender and proves that even in sorrow you can find humor .
translation: それは感動的で優しく、悲しみの中でもユーモアを見つけることができることを証明しています。
back_translation: It proves that it is emotional and gentle, and that one can find humor even in sadness.

text: collapses after 30 minutes into a slap-happy series of adolescent violence .
translation: 30分後に思春期の暴力のスラップハッピーなシリーズに崩壊する。
back_translation: In 30 minutes, it will collapse into a slap-happy series about adolescent violence.

text: a spiffy animated feature about an unruly adolescent boy who is yearning for adventure and a chance to prove his worth .
translation: 冒険を求め、自分の価値を証明する機会を切望するわんぱくな思春期の少年についての素晴らしいアニメーション作品。
back_translation: A wonderful animation work about a mischievous teenage boy seeking adventure and longing for the opportunity to prove his worth.

text: payne constructs a hilarious ode to middle america and middle age with this unlikely odyssey , featuring a pathetic , endearing hero who is all too human .
translation: ペインは、この予想外の冒険を通じて、中部アメリカと中年期に対するユーモラスな讃歌を構築し、あまりにも人間的な哀れで魅力的な英雄を描いています。
back_translation: Pain constructs a humorous ode to Middle America and middle age through this unexpected adventure, portraying a tragically human and charmingly flawed hero.

text: a surprisingly flat retread , hobbled by half-baked setups and sluggish pacing .
translation: 驚くほど平坦な再利用で、半端な設定と鈍いペースに足を引っ張られている。
back_translation: The surprisingly flat reuse is being hindered by mediocre settings and a slow pace.

text: fierce , glaring and unforgettable .
translation: 激しく、鋭く、忘れられない。
back_translation: Intense, sharp, unforgettable.

text: the film does n't show enough of the creative process or even of what was created for the non-fan to figure out what makes wilco a big deal .
translation: その映画は、クリエイティブなプロセスや、ウィルコがなぜ重要なのかを知るためにファンでない人が理解できるほどの作品を十分に示していない。
back_translation: The movie does not adequately showcase the creative process or explain why Wilco is important in a way that anyone who is not a fan can understand.

text: there are laughs aplenty , and , as a bonus , viewers do n't have to worry about being subjected to farts , urine , feces , semen , or any of the other foul substances that have overrun modern-day comedies .
translation: 笑いがたくさんあり、ボーナスとして、視聴者はおならや尿、糞、不妊、および現代のコメディで氾濫しているその他の不快な物質にさらされる心配をする必要がありません。
back_translation: There is plenty of laughter, and as a bonus, viewers don't have to worry about being exposed to unpleasant substances like farts, urine, feces, infertility, and other things that flood modern comedy.

text: a lot more dimensional and complex than its sunny disposition would lead you to believe .
translation: その晴れやかな外見が信じさせるよりも、はるかに多次元で複雑です。
back_translation: It is far more multidimensional and complex than its bright appearance would suggest.

text: miller has crafted an intriguing story of maternal instincts and misguided acts of affection .
translation: ミラーは母性本能と誤った愛情表現に関する興味深いストーリーを作り上げました。
back_translation: Mira has created an interesting story about maternal instincts and misguided expressions of love.

text: sometimes there are very , very good reasons for certain movies to be sealed in a jar and left on a remote shelf indefinitely .
translation: 時には、特定の映画を瓶に封じ込め、遠くの棚に無期限で置いておく非常に良い理由があることがあります。
back_translation: Sometimes, there are very good reasons to bottle up a specific movie and leave it on a distant shelf indefinitely.

text: an instantly forgettable snow-and-stuntwork extravaganza that likely will be upstaged by an avalanche of more appealing holiday-season product .
translation: 瞬時に忘れられる雪とスタントの大作で、より魅力的なホリデーシーズンの作品に雪崩のように脇役扱いされる可能性が高い。
back_translation: In a grand production with snow and stunts that can be instantly forgotten, it is highly likely to be treated as a supporting role in a more attractive holiday season piece, like an avalanche.

text: some movies suck you in despite their flaws , and heaven is one such beast .
translation: いくつかの映画は欠点があってもあなたを引き込むものであり、『ヘブン』はそのような作品の一つです。
back_translation: Some movies have flaws but still draw you in, and "Heaven" is one of those works.

text: with a `` spy kids '' sequel opening next week , why bother with a contemptible imitator starring a `` snl '' has-been acting like an 8-year-old channeling roberto benigni ?
translation: 来週「スパイキッズ」の続編が公開される中、なぜロベルト・ベニーニを模倣する8歳児のように振る舞う「SNL」の過去のスターが主演する軽蔑すべき模倣作品に関わる必要があるのでしょうか？
back_translation: Why is it necessary to be involved in a contemptible imitation starring a past "SNL" star who behaves like an 8-year-old imitating Roberto Benigni, while a sequel to "Spy Kids" is being released next week?

text: muddled , melodramatic paranormal romance is an all-time low for kevin costner .
translation: 混乱した、メロドラマ的な超自然的ロマンスは、ケビン・コスナーにとって史上最低の作品です。
back_translation: The confused, melodramatic supernatural romance is the worst film of all time for Kevin Costner.

text: in a summer of clones , harvard man is something rare and riveting : a wild ride that relies on more than special effects .
translation: クローンの夏の中で、ハーバードマンは珍しく魅力的な作品です：特別な効果だけに頼らない、ワイルドな乗り物です。
back_translation: In the summer of clones, Harvard Man is an unusually captivating work: a wild ride that doesn't rely solely on special effects.

text: so original in its base concept that you can not help but get caught up .
translation: その基本的な概念が非常に独創的で、思わず引き込まれてしまいます。
back_translation: That fundamental concept is very original and easily draws you in.

text: but even then , i 'd recommend waiting for dvd and just skipping straight to her scenes .
translation: でもその時でも、DVDを待って彼女のシーンだけを飛ばすことをお勧めします。
back_translation: However, even at that time, I recommend waiting for the DVD and just skipping her scenes.

text: this new zealand coming-of-age movie is n't really about anything .
translation: このニュージーランドの成長物語の映画は、実際には何についてもない。
back_translation: This movie about New Zealand's growth story is actually about nothing in particular.

text: quitting offers piercing domestic drama with spikes of sly humor .
translation: 「退職」は鋭いユーモアのスパイクを持つ、心に刺さる家庭ドラマを提供します。
back_translation: "Resignation" offers a poignant family drama infused with sharp humor.

text: mama africa pretty much delivers on that promise .
translation: ママアフリカはその約束をほぼ完璧に果たしています。
back_translation: Mama Africa has almost perfectly fulfilled that promise.

text: we hate -lrb- madonna -rrb- within the film 's first five minutes , and she lacks the skill or presence to regain any ground .
translation: 私たちは映画の最初の5分間でマドンナを嫌っていますが、彼女には追い上げるためのスキルや存在感が欠けています。
back_translation: We dislike Madonna in the first five minutes of the movie, but she lacks the skills and presence to catch up.

text: much smarter and more attentive than it first sets out to be .
translation: 最初に見えるほど単純ではなく、ずっと賢く注意深い。
back_translation: It's not as simple as it initially appears; it is much smarter and more careful.

text: one regards reign of fire with awe .
translation: 人々は「レイン・オブ・ファイア」を驚嘆の念をもって見ています。
back_translation: People are watching "Reign of Fire" with awe.

text: it 's tough to tell which is in more abundant supply in this woefully hackneyed movie , directed by scott kalvert , about street gangs and turf wars in 1958 brooklyn -- stale cliches , gratuitous violence , or empty machismo .
translation: この悲惨に陳腐な映画は、1958年のブルックリンにおけるストリートギャングとテリトリー争いについて、スコット・カルヴェルトが監督しており、どれがより豊富に供給されているのかを判断するのは難しい - 陳腐なクリシェ、無意味な暴力、または空虚なマチズモのどれなのか。
back_translation: This pathetic and clichéd movie, directed by Scott Calvert, is about street gangs and territorial disputes in Brooklyn in 1958, and it's difficult to determine which is more abundantly supplied - clichéd tropes, senseless violence, or empty machismo.

text: the story is also as unoriginal as they come , already having been recycled more times than i 'd care to count .
translation: その話は非常にありふれたもので、私が数えたくないほど何度もリサイクルされています。
back_translation: That story is very commonplace and has been recycled so many times that I can't even count.

text: you 've already seen city by the sea under a variety of titles , but it 's worth yet another visit .
translation: あなたは既に「海辺の街」をさまざまなタイトルで見たことがありますが、再び訪れる価値があります。
back_translation: You have already seen "The Coastal Town" under various titles, but it is worth visiting again.

text: in one scene , we get a stab at soccer hooliganism , a double-barreled rip-off of quentin tarantino 's climactic shootout -- and meat loaf explodes .
translation: あるシーンでは、サッカー暴力の一面を描き、クエンティン・タランティーノのクライマックスの銃撃戦を二重にパクった内容があり、ミートローフが爆発します。
back_translation: In one scene, it portrays an aspect of soccer violence, featuring content that doubles as a tribute to Quentin Tarantino's climactic gunfight, and Meat Loaf explodes.

text: is the kind of movie that 's critic-proof , simply because it aims so low .
translation: その映画は非常に低い目標を目指しているため、批評には影響されないタイプの作品です。
back_translation: The movie aims for very low targets, making it a type of work that is not influenced by criticism.

text: to the civilized mind , a movie like ballistic : ecks vs. sever is more of an ordeal than an amusement .
translation: 文明的な心にとって、「バリスティック：エックス対セバー」のような映画は、娯楽というよりもむしろ苦痛です。
back_translation: For a civilized mind, a film like "Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever" is more of a pain than entertainment.

text: a different movie -- sometimes tedious -- by a director many viewers would like to skip but film buffs should get to know .
translation: 異なる映画 -- 時には退屈な -- しかし、多くの観客がスキップしたい監督によるもので、映画愛好者は知っておくべき。
back_translation: Different films -- sometimes boring -- but made by directors that many audiences might want to skip, and that film lovers should know about.

text: my precious new star wars movie is a lumbering , wheezy drag ...
translation: 私の大切な新しいスター・ウォーズ映画は、鈍重で息切れするような退屈なものです。
back_translation: My precious new Star Wars movie is a dull and breathless bore.

text: a dull , simple-minded and stereotypical tale of drugs , death and mind-numbing indifference on the inner-city streets .
translation: 鈍く、単純で、ステレオタイプ的なドラッグ、死、そして内的都市の通りでの麻痺するような無関心の物語。
back_translation: A dull, simple, and stereotypical story of drugs, death, and a paralyzing indifference in the streets of the inner city.

text: throw smoochy from the train !
translation: 列車からスムーチーを投げ出せ！
back_translation: Throw the smoothie out of the train!

text: an alternately raucous and sappy ethnic sitcom ... you 'd be wise to send your regrets .
translation: 交互に騒がしくて感傷的な民族シットコム... ご遠慮した方が賢明でしょう。
back_translation: A noisy and sentimental ethnic sitcom alternately... It would be wise to refrain from it.

text: none of this is half as moving as the filmmakers seem to think .
translation: これらのどれも、映画製作者が思っているほど感動的ではない。
back_translation: None of these are as emotional as the filmmakers think.

text: the heedless impetuousness of youth is on full , irritating display in -lrb- this -rrb- meandering and pointless french coming-of-age import from writer-director anne-sophie birot .
translation: 若さの無鉄砲で衝動的な様子が、作家兼監督のアン＝ソフィー・ビロによるこの無駄に迷走したフランスの成長物語において、全面的かつ苛立たしい形で表れています。
back_translation: The impulsive and reckless nature of youth is fully and irritatingly expressed in this unnecessarily meandering French coming-of-age story by writer and director Anne-Sophie Biro.

text: a low-budget affair , tadpole was shot on digital video , and the images often look smeary and blurry , to the point of distraction .
translation: 低予算の作品である「タッドポール」はデジタルビデオで撮影されており、映像はしばしばぼやけていて、注意をそらすほどです。
back_translation: The low-budget work "Tadpole" is shot on digital video, and the footage is often blurry to the point of being distracting.

text: irwin is so earnest that it 's hard to resist his pleas to spare wildlife and respect their environs .
translation: アーウィンは非常に誠実で、野生動物を守り、その環境を尊重するよう助けを求める彼の懇願に抵抗するのは難しい。
back_translation: It is difficult to resist Irwin's earnest appeal to protect wildlife and respect their environment.

text: a miraculous movie , i 'm going home is so slight , yet overflows with wisdom and emotion .
translation: 奇跡の映画『帰る場所』は非常に淡いですが、知恵と感情で溢れています。
back_translation: The miraculous film "A Place to Return" is very subtle, yet it is filled with wisdom and emotion.

text: the story 's pathetic and the gags are puerile . .
translation: 物語は哀れで、ギャグは幼稚です。
back_translation: The story is pathetic, and the jokes are childish.

text: showtime is n't particularly assaultive , but it can still make you feel that you never want to see another car chase , explosion or gunfight again .
translation: ショータイムは特に攻撃的ではありませんが、それでもあなたにもう二度と車の追跡、爆発、銃撃戦を見たくないと思わせることができます。
back_translation: Showtime is not particularly aggressive, but it can still make you never want to see car chases, explosions, or gunfights again.

text: by the final whistle you 're convinced that this mean machine was a decent tv outing that just does n't have big screen magic .
translation: 試合終了のホイッスルが鳴る頃には、この素晴らしいチームが優れたテレビ番組であったと納得しているが、大画面の魔法はない。
back_translation: By the time the final whistle blows, I am convinced that this wonderful team was a great television show, but there is no magic in the big screen.

text: first , for a movie that tries to be smart , it 's kinda dumb .
translation: まず、この映画は賢いことを試みていますが、実際はちょっと馬鹿げています。
back_translation: First of all, this movie tries to be clever, but in reality, it's a bit ridiculous.

text: and people make fun of me for liking showgirls .
translation: そして、人々は私が『ショーガールズ』を好きだと言って私を馬鹿にします。
back_translation: And people mock me for saying that I like 'Showgirls'.

text: ... the story simply putters along looking for astute observations and coming up blank .
translation: …その物語は簡単に進んでいき、鋭い観察を探しているが、何も得られない。
back_translation: ...the story progresses easily, searching for sharp observations, but gains nothing.

text: it has a caffeinated , sloppy brilliance , sparkling with ideas you wish had been developed with more care , but animated by an energy that puts the dutiful efforts of more disciplined grade-grubbers to shame .
translation: それはカフェインを感じさせる、だらしない輝きを持ち、もっと丁寧に発展させてほしかったアイデアで輝いていますが、規律正しい成績重視の人たちの真面目な努力を恥じさせるようなエネルギーによって活気づけられています。
back_translation: It shines with a lazy brilliance that suggests caffeine, an idea that I wished had been developed more carefully, yet it is invigorated by an energy that makes the serious efforts of disciplined, performance-oriented people feel ashamed.

text: if you 're not deeply touched by this movie , check your pulse .
translation: この映画に深く感動しないなら、脈を確認してみてください。
back_translation: If you are not deeply moved by this movie, you might want to check your pulse.

text: whether it 's the worst movie of 2002 , i ca n't say for sure : memories of rollerball have faded , and i skipped country bears .
translation: それが2002年の最悪の映画かどうかは確かには言えないけれど、ローラーボールの記憶は薄れ、カントリーベアーズは見なかった。
back_translation: I can't say for sure if it was the worst movie of 2002, but my memory of Rollerball has faded, and I didn't watch The Country Bears.

text: children , christian or otherwise , deserve to hear the full story of jonah 's despair -- in all its agonizing , catch-22 glory -- even if they spend years trying to comprehend it .
translation: 子供たちは、クリスチャンであろうとそうでなかろうと、ヨナの絶望の完全な物語を聞く権利があります。それはすべての苦悩、そして矛盾の栄光を持っています。たとえ彼らが理解するのに何年もかかるとしても。
back_translation: Children have the right to hear the complete story of Jonah's despair, whether they are Christian or not. It encompasses all suffering and the glory of contradiction. Even if it takes them years to understand.

text: muccino , who directed from his own screenplay , is a canny crowd pleaser , and the last kiss ... provides more than enough sentimental catharsis for a satisfying evening at the multiplex .
translation: ムッキーノは、自らの脚本をもとに監督し、巧妙な観客受けをする人物であり、「ラストキス」は、マルチプレックスでの満足のいく夜のために十分な感情的カタルシスを提供します。
back_translation: Mukki-no directs based on his own script and is a person who cleverly appeals to the audience, and "Last Kiss" provides enough emotional catharsis for a satisfying night at the multiplex.

text: has a solid emotional impact .
translation: 強い感情的な影響があります。
back_translation: There is a strong emotional impact.

text: dogtown is hollow , self-indulgent , and - worst of all - boring .
translation: ドッグタウンは空虚で、自己満足的で、そして何より最悪なのは退屈です。
back_translation: Dogtown is empty, self-satisfied, and worst of all, it’s boring.

text: the sweetest thing leaves a bitter taste .
translation: 甘いものは苦い味を残す。
back_translation: Sweet things leave a bitter taste.

text: one of those films that seems tailor made to air on pay cable to offer some modest amusements when one has nothing else to watch .
translation: 何も見るものがないときに、少しの楽しみを提供するためにペイケーブルで流されるように作られた映画の一つです。
back_translation: It is one of the movies made to provide a little enjoyment when there is nothing to watch, designed to be shown on pay cable.

text: has enough wit , energy and geniality to please not only the fanatical adherents on either side , but also people who know nothing about the subject and think they 're not interested .
translation: 十分な機知、エネルギー、そして親しみやすさを持っているので、熱心な支持者だけでなく、テーマについて何も知らず、興味がないと思っている人々も楽しませることができる。
back_translation: With enough wit, energy, and approachability, it can entertain not only enthusiastic supporters but also those who know nothing about the topic and think they have no interest in it.

text: lawrence should stick to his day job .
translation: ローレンスは本業に専念するべきだ。
back_translation: Lawrence should focus on his main job.

text: by turns numbingly dull-witted and disquietingly creepy .
translation: 時には鈍感で退屈であり、時には不気味で不安を感じさせる。
back_translation: Sometimes it is dull and insensitive, and sometimes it feels eerie and unsettling.

text: buy is an accomplished actress , and this is a big , juicy role .
translation: バイは優れた女優であり、これは大きくて魅力的な役柄です。
back_translation: Bai is an excellent actress, and this is a large and appealing role.

text: maid in manhattan proves that it 's easier to change the sheets than to change hackneyed concepts when it comes to dreaming up romantic comedies .
translation: 「マンハッタンのメイド」は、ロマンティックコメディを考える際に、陳腐な概念を変えるよりもシーツを変える方が簡単であることを証明しています。
back_translation: "Manhattan's Maid" proves that it's easier to change the sheets than to change a clichéd concept when thinking about romantic comedies.

text: thought-provoking and stylish , if also somewhat hermetic .
translation: 考えさせられるスタイリッシュな作品ですが、やや隠密的でもあります。
back_translation: It is a thought-provoking and stylish work, but it is somewhat secretive as well.

text: a cleverly crafted but ultimately hollow mockumentary .
translation: 巧みに作られたが最終的には空虚なモキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A cleverly crafted yet ultimately hollow mockumentary.

text: jacquot has filmed the opera exactly as the libretto directs , ideally capturing the opera 's drama and lyricism .
translation: ジャクォットはオペラを台本に従って正確に撮影し、オペラのドラマと詩情を理想的に捉えています。
back_translation: Jakott accurately films the opera according to the script, ideally capturing the drama and lyricism of the opera.

text: the misery of these people becomes just another voyeuristic spectacle , to be consumed and forgotten .
translation: これらの人々の悲惨さは、消費され忘れ去られるただの別の見世物となる。
back_translation: The misery of these people will become just another spectacle that is consumed and forgotten.

text: from a deceptively simple premise , this deeply moving french drama develops a startling story that works both as a detailed personal portrait and as a rather frightening examination of modern times .
translation: 一見単純な前提から、この深く感動的なフランスのドラマは、詳細な個人のポートレートとしても、現代をかなり恐ろしい形で考察する物語としても機能する驚くべきストーリーを展開します。
back_translation: From a seemingly simple premise, this deeply moving French drama unfolds an astonishing story that serves both as a detailed personal portrait and as a reflection on the modern world in a rather frightening way.

text: unexpected , and often contradictory , truths emerge .
translation: 予期しない、そしてしばしば矛盾する真実が浮かび上がる。
back_translation: Unexpected and often contradictory truths emerge.

text: has the capability of effecting change and inspiring hope .
translation: 変化をもたらし、希望を与える能力があります。
back_translation: You have the ability to bring about change and give hope.

text: even if you 're an elvis person , you wo n't find anything to get excited about on this dvd .
translation: たとえあなたがエルヴィスのファンであっても、このDVDで興奮するようなものは見つからないでしょう。
back_translation: Even if you are a fan of Elvis, you won't find anything exciting on this DVD.

text: together writer-director danny verete 's three tales comprise a powerful and reasonably fulfilling gestalt .
translation: 共同で、作家兼監督のダニー・ベレテの3つの物語は、力強く、妥当な満足感をもたらすゲシュタルトを構成しています。
back_translation: Together, the three stories by writer-director Danny Berette create a powerful gestalt that brings a profound sense of satisfaction.

text: writer\/director walter hill is in his hypermasculine element here , once again able to inject some real vitality and even art into a pulpy concept that , in many other hands would be completely forgettable .
translation: 監督・脚本家のウォルター・ヒルはここで彼のハイパーマスキュリニティの要素を発揮し、他の多くの手にかかれば完全に忘れられてしまうような生っぽいコンセプトに、再び本物の活力とさえアートを注入することができた。
back_translation: Director and screenwriter Walter Hill showcases his hyper-masculinity here, managing to inject genuine vitality and even artistry into a raw concept that might have been completely forgotten in the hands of many others.

text: goldbacher draws on an elegant visual sense and a talent for easy , seductive pacing ... but she and writing partner laurence coriat do n't manage an equally assured narrative coinage .
translation: ゴールドバッハーは優雅な視覚センスと容易で魅惑的なペースに才能を発揮していますが、彼女と作家パートナーのローレンス・コリアットは同じくらい確かな物語の造語には成功していません。
back_translation: Goldbaher showcases her elegant visual sense and talent for an easy and charming pace, but she and her writer partner, Lawrence Koliat, have not succeeded in crafting equally solid narratives.

text: the script is smart and dark - hallelujah for small favors .
translation: スクリプトは賢くて暗い - 小さな恩恵に感謝します。
back_translation: The script is smart and dark - I appreciate the small blessings.

text: even though we know the outcome , the seesawing of the general 's fate in the arguments of competing lawyers has the stomach-knotting suspense of a legal thriller , while the testimony of witnesses lends the film a resonant undertone of tragedy .
translation: 結果を知っていても、競い合う弁護士たちの議論の中で将軍の運命が揺れ動く様子は、法律スリラーのような胃がキリキリする緊張感を持っており、証人の証言は映画に響く悲劇的な基調を与えています。
back_translation: Even knowing the outcome, the way the fate of the general wavers amid the arguments of the competing lawyers carries a stomach-churning tension akin to a legal thriller, while the testimonies of the witnesses provide a tragic undertone that resonates throughout the film.

text: you 're not merely watching history , you 're engulfed by it .
translation: ただ歴史を見ているのではなく、その中に飲み込まれているのです。
back_translation: It is not just observing history, but being engulfed by it.

text: i am more offended by his lack of faith in his audience than by anything on display here .
translation: 私は、ここに展示されているものよりも、彼の観客に対する信頼の欠如にもっと腹を立てています。
back_translation: I am more upset about his lack of trust in the audience than about what is exhibited here.

text: we 're drawn in by the dark luster .
translation: 私たちはその暗い光沢に惹きつけられます。
back_translation: We are drawn to that dark luster.

text: the darker elements of misogyny and unprovoked violence suffocate the illumination created by the two daughters and the sparse instances of humor meant to shine through the gloomy film noir veil .
translation: ミソジニーの暗い要素と無謀な暴力は、二人の娘が生み出す明かりや、陰鬱なフィルムノワールのヴェールを通して輝こうとする稀なユーモアの瞬間を窒息させる。
back_translation: The dark elements of misogyny and reckless violence suffocate the moments of rare humor that try to shine through the brightness created by the two daughters, as well as the veil of gloomy film noir.

text: it 's not a great monster movie .
translation: 素晴らしいモンスター映画ではありません。
back_translation: It's not a great monster movie.

text: it 's a lovely , sad dance highlighted by kwan 's unique directing style .
translation: それは、クワンの独特な演出スタイルによって際立つ、素敵で悲しいダンスです。
back_translation: It is a wonderful and sad dance that stands out due to Quan's unique directing style.

text: it 's so downbeat and nearly humorless that it becomes a chore to sit through -- despite some first-rate performances by its lead .
translation: それは非常に陰鬱でほとんどユーモアがなく、観るのが苦痛になってしまう - 主演の素晴らしい演技にもかかわらず。
back_translation: It is extremely grim and almost devoid of humor, making it painful to watch - despite the wonderful performances of the lead actors.

text: the all-french cast is marveilleux .
translation: 完全にフランス人のキャストは素晴らしいです。
back_translation: The completely French cast is wonderful.

text: if the title is a jeopardy question , then the answer might be `` how does steven seagal come across these days ? ''
translation: もしタイトルが jeopardy の質問であれば、答えは「スティーブン・セガールは最近どのように見えるのか？」かもしれません。
back_translation: If the title were a Jeopardy question, the answer might be "How does Steven Seagal look recently?"

text: the emperor 's club , ruthless in its own placid way , finds one of our most conservative and hidebound movie-making traditions and gives it new texture , new relevance , new reality .
translation: エンペラーズ・クラブは、その穏やかな方法で無情に、私たちの最も保守的でこだわりの強い映画製作の伝統の一つを見つけ、新しい質感、新しい関連性、新しい現実を与えています。
back_translation: The Emperor's Club ruthlessly finds one of our most conservative and particular traditions in filmmaking, giving it new textures, new relevance, and new realities in its gentle manner.

text: that storytelling has value can not be denied .
translation: 物語には価値があることは否定できません。
back_translation: It cannot be denied that stories hold value.

text: the whole thing comes off like a particularly amateurish episode of bewitched that takes place during spring break .
translation: 全体的に見ると、春休みの間に起こる特に素人っぽい「ビウィッチド」のエピソードのように思えます。
back_translation: Overall, it seems like a particularly amateurish episode of "Bewitched" that takes place during spring break.

text: it 's hard to believe that something so short could be so flabby .
translation: こんなに短いものがこんなにだらしなく見えるなんて信じられない。
back_translation: I can't believe something so short can look so sloppy.

text: it establishes its ominous mood and tension swiftly , and if the suspense never rises to a higher level , it is nevertheless maintained throughout .
translation: それは、不気味な雰囲気と緊張感を迅速に確立し、サスペンスがより高いレベルに達することは決してないが、それでもなお全体を通して維持されている。
back_translation: It quickly establishes an eerie atmosphere and tension, never reaching a higher level of suspense, yet it is still maintained throughout.

text: solondz may well be the only one laughing at his own joke
translation: ソロンツは自分のジョークで笑っているのは彼だけかもしれません。
back_translation: Soronzu might be the only one laughing at his own jokes.

text: deep intelligence and a warm , enveloping affection breathe out of every frame .
translation: 深い知性と温かく包み込む愛情が、すべてのフレームからあふれ出ている。
back_translation: Deep intelligence and warm, enveloping affection overflow from every frame.

text: swinging , the film makes it seem , is not a hobby that attracts the young and fit .
translation: 映画では、スウィングは若くて健康な人々を惹きつける趣味ではないように見えます。
back_translation: In the movie, swing seems to be a hobby that doesn't attract young and healthy people.

text: there 's a reason why halftime is only fifteen minutes long .
translation: ハーフタイムが15分間だけである理由があります。
back_translation: There is a reason why the halftime is only 15 minutes long.

text: winds up being both revelatory and narcissistic , achieving some honest insight into relationships that most high-concept films candy-coat with pat storylines , precious circumstances and beautiful stars .
translation: 結局、それは啓示的でありながら自己中心的であり、ほとんどのハイコンセプト映画が安易なストーリーや大切な状況、美しいスターたちで飾ってしまう関係に対する正直な洞察を得ることができる。
back_translation: In the end, it is revealing yet self-centered, allowing for an honest insight into the relationship that most high-concept films decorate with easy stories, important situations, and beautiful stars.

text: in its own floundering way , it gets to you .
translation: そのもがきながらの方法で、あなたに届きます。
back_translation: It will reach you in that struggling way.

text: behind the glitz , hollywood is sordid and disgusting .
translation: 華やかな背後には、ハリウッドの醜さと嫌悪があります。
back_translation: Behind the glamour, there is the ugliness and disdain of Hollywood.

text: this mild-mannered farce , directed by one of its writers , john c. walsh , is corny in a way that bespeaks an expiration date passed a long time ago .
translation: この穏やかな狂騒劇は、作家の一人であるジョン・C・ウォルシュが監督しており、古くからの有効期限を過ぎたことを示唆するような陳腐さを持っています。
back_translation: This gentle frenzy is directed by one of the writers, John C. Walsh, and has an air of cliché that suggests it has long surpassed its expiration date.

text: with very little to add beyond the dark visions already relayed by superb recent predecessors like swimming with sharks and the player , this latest skewering ... may put off insiders and outsiders alike .
translation: 優れた最近の先駆者たちが既に伝えた暗いビジョンに加えることはほとんどない中で、この最新の風刺は…内部の人々にも外部の人々にも嫌悪感を与えるかもしれません。
back_translation: This latest satire may provoke disgust among both insiders and outsiders, adding little to the dark vision already conveyed by the excellent recent pioneers.

text: significantly better than its 2002 children 's - movie competition .
translation: 2002年の子供向け映画の競争よりもはるかに優れています。
back_translation: It is far superior to the children's movies competition of 2002.

text: this is an elegantly balanced movie -- every member of the ensemble has something fascinating to do -- that does n't reveal even a hint of artifice .
translation: これは優雅にバランスの取れた映画であり、キャストの全員が魅力的な役割を持っているにもかかわらず、人工的なもののヒントすらも明らかにしません。
back_translation: This is an elegantly balanced film, and even though all the cast members have captivating roles, it doesn't even hint at anything artificial.

text: cox creates a fluid and mesmerizing sequence of images to match the words of nijinsky 's diaries .
translation: コックスはニジンスキーの日記の言葉に合わせて流れるようで魅惑的な画像の連続を作り出します。
back_translation: Cox creates a continuous sequence of flowing and enchanting images that align with the words of Nijinsky's diary.

text: with the exception of mccoist , the players do n't have a clue on the park .
translation: マッコイストを除いて、選手たちはフィールドで全く何も分かっていません。
back_translation: Except for McCoy, the players have no idea what's happening on the field at all.

text: no amount of good acting is enough to save oleander 's uninspired story .
translation: 良い演技の量では、オレアンダーの刺激のないストーリーを救うことはできない。
back_translation: No amount of good acting can save Oleander's unexciting story.

text: everyone 's to blame here .
translation: ここにいる全員が責められるべきです。
back_translation: Everyone here should be blamed.

text: evokes the 19th century with a subtlety that is an object lesson in period filmmaking .
translation: 19世紀を呼び起こし、時代映画製作の模範となる微妙さを持っています。
back_translation: It evokes the 19th century and possesses a subtlety that serves as a model for period film production.

text: an odd , haphazard , and inconsequential romantic comedy .
translation: 奇妙で行き当たりばったりで取るに足らないロマンティック・コメディ。
back_translation: A strange, haphazard, and trivial romantic comedy.

text: ... another example of how sandler is losing his touch .
translation: サンドラーがその感覚を失いつつあるもう一つの例。
back_translation: Another example of Sandler losing that sense.

text: an awful lot like one of -lrb- spears ' -rrb- music videos in content -- except that it goes on for at least 90 more minutes and , worse , that you have to pay if you want to see it .
translation: 内容的には -lrb- スピアーズの -rrb- ミュージックビデオのようで、ひどく似ている -- ただし、見るためには少なくとも90分以上続き、さらに悪いことに、見たい場合は料金を支払わなければならない。
back_translation: In terms of content, it is very similar to the Spear's music video -- however, it lasts at least 90 minutes to watch, and worst of all, you have to pay a fee to see it.

text: stale and clichéd to a fault .
translation: 陳腐で使い古されたといっても過言ではない。
back_translation: It would not be an exaggeration to say that it is clichéd and worn out.

text: ... built on the premise that middle-class arkansas consists of monster truck-loving good ol' boys and peroxide blond honeys whose worldly knowledge comes from tv reruns and supermarket tabloids .
translation: ... 中流階級のアーカンソーは、モンスタートラックを愛する良き老男たちと、テレビの再放送やスーパーマーケットのタブロイドから得た世間の知識を持つブロンドのハニーたちで構成されているという前提の上に成り立っています。
back_translation: ... The middle-class Arkansas is based on the premise that it is made up of good old men who love monster trucks and blonde honeys who have worldly knowledge gained from television reruns and supermarket tabloids.

text: zellweger 's whiny pouty-lipped poof faced and spindly attempt at playing an ingenue makes her nomination as best actress even more of a an a
translation: ゼルウィガーのうるさくて pouty な唇の顔と痩せ細った幼い女の子を演じる試みは、彼女の最優秀女優賞のノミネートをさらに顕著にしています。
back_translation: Zellweger's attempt to portray a noisy, pouty-lipped face and a thin, young girl further highlights her nomination for Best Actress.

text: holofcener rejects patent solutions to dramatize life 's messiness from inside out , in all its strange quirks .
translation: ホロフセナーは、人生の混沌とした様子を内側から外側へドラマ化するために、特許を解決策として退けています。その奇妙な特性すべてを描き出しています。
back_translation: Holovsenar dismisses patents as a solution in order to dramatize the chaotic aspects of life from the inside out. It portrays all of its strange characteristics.

text: i still want my money back .
translation: 私はまだお金を返してほしいです。
back_translation: I still want my money back.

text: no one involved , save dash , shows the slightest aptitude for acting , and the script , credited to director abdul malik abbott and ernest ` tron ' anderson , seems entirely improvised .
translation: 関係者はダッシュを除いて、演技の適性を示す者はいなく、アブドゥル・マリク・アボット監督とアーネスト・『トロン』・アンダーソンにクレジットされた脚本は、まったく即興のように思える。
back_translation: There are no actors demonstrating acting ability except for Dash, and the script credited to director Abdul Malik Abbot and Ernest "Tron" Anderson seems completely improvised.

text: it 's the kind of effectively creepy-scary thriller that has you fixating on a far corner of the screen at times because your nerves just ca n't take it any more .
translation: それは、時折画面の遠くの隅を凝視せざるを得なくなるような、効果的にぞっとする怖いスリラーの一種で、神経がこれ以上もたないからです。
back_translation: It is a type of effectively creepy thriller that occasionally forces you to stare intently into the far corners of the screen, because your nerves can't take it anymore.

text: narratively , trouble every day is a plodding mess .
translation: 物語的には、「毎日困難」は単調で混乱した状態です。
back_translation: In terms of the narrative, "daily difficulties" is a monotonous and chaotic state.

text: well-done supernatural thriller with keen insights into parapsychological phenomena and the soulful nuances of the grieving process .
translation: 優れた超自然のスリラーで、超心理現象に対する鋭い洞察と、悲しみの過程における心の微妙なニュアンスが描かれています。
back_translation: An excellent supernatural thriller that portrays sharp insights into psychic phenomena and the subtle nuances of the mind in the process of grief.

text: if there 's no art here , it 's still a good yarn -- which is nothing to sneeze at these days .
translation: ここに芸術がなくても、いい話には違いない — これは今の時代には侮れないことです。
back_translation: Even without art here, it's still a good story — this is something that cannot be underestimated in today's era.

text: the cumulative effect of watching this 65-minute trifle is rather like being trapped while some weird relative trots out the video he took of the family vacation to stonehenge .
translation: この65分の無意味な作品を見ることの累積的な効果は、まるで奇妙な親戚がストーンヘンジへの家族旅行の動画を見せつけているところに閉じ込められているようなものです。
back_translation: The cumulative effect of watching this meaningless 65-minute piece is like being trapped in a situation where a strange relative is showing you a video of their family trip to Stonehenge.

text: its sheer dynamism is infectious .
translation: その圧倒的なダイナミズムは感染的です。
back_translation: That overwhelming dynamism is infectious.

text: the film is reasonably entertaining , though it begins to drag two-thirds through , when the melodramatic aspects start to overtake the comedy .
translation: 映画は適度に楽しめるが、三分の二を過ぎると引き延ばされ始め、メロドラマ的な要素がコメディを上回り始める。
back_translation: The movie is enjoyable in moderation, but after the two-thirds mark, it starts to drag on, and the melodramatic elements begin to overshadow the comedy.

text: simultaneously heart-breaking and very funny , the last kiss is really all about performances .
translation: 同時に心を痛めつつ非常に面白い「ラストキス」は、本当に演技についての作品です。
back_translation: At the same time, while dealing with emotional pain, "Last Kiss" is a truly interesting work about acting.

text: start reading your scripts before signing that dotted line .
translation: その署名をする前に、あなたのスクリプトを読み始めてください。
back_translation: Before signing that, please start reading your script.

text: jackson and co have brought back the value and respect for the term epic cinema .
translation: ジャクソンと仲間たちは、「エピックシネマ」という言葉の価値と尊敬を取り戻しました。
back_translation: Jackson and his friends restored the value and respect of the term "epic cinema."

text: a pathetically inane and unimaginative cross between xxx and vertical limit .
translation: 情けなくも無内容で想像力のない、XXXとバーティカル・リミットの間のクロスオーバー。
back_translation: A pathetic and unoriginal crossover between XXX and Vertical Limit.

text: max pokes , provokes , takes expressionistic license and hits a nerve ... as far as art is concerned , it 's mission accomplished .
translation: 限界を突き、挑発し、表現の自由を取り入れ、神経を刺激する...芸術に関しては、ミッションは達成されたと言える。
back_translation: Pushing limits, provoking, embracing freedom of expression, stimulating nerves... when it comes to art, it can be said that the mission has been accomplished.

text: the power of shanghai ghetto , a documentary by dana janklowicz-mann and amir mann , rests in the voices of men and women , now in their 70s , who lived there in the 1940s .
translation: 「上海ゲットー」の力は、1940年代にそこで生活していた70代の男性と女性の声にあります。これはダナ・ジャンクロウィッツ＝マンとアミール・マンによるドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: The power of the "Shanghai Ghetto" lies in the voices of the men and women in their 70s who lived there in the 1940s. This is a documentary by Dana Janklowitz-Man and Amir Man.
