text: ` punch-drunk love is so convinced of its own brilliance that , if it were a person , you 'd want to smash its face in . '
translation: 『パンチドランク・ラブ』は自らの素晴らしさに非常に自信を持っているため、もしそれが人間であれば、その顔を殴りつけたくなるだろう。
back_translation: "Punch-Drunk Love" is so confident in its own greatness that if it were human, you would want to punch its face.

text: a sentimental mess that never rings true .
translation: 真実味のない感傷的な混乱。
back_translation: Sentimental confusion lacking in truthfulness.

text: a fascinating case study of flower-power liberation -- and the price that was paid for it .
translation: 花の力による解放の魅力的なケーススタディと、そのために支払われた代償。
back_translation: An attractive case study of liberation through the power of flowers and the price that was paid for it.

text: -lrb- janey -rrb- forgets about her other obligations , leading to a tragedy which is somehow guessable from the first few minutes , maybe because it echoes the by now intolerable morbidity of so many recent movies .
translation: （ジェイニー）は他の義務を忘れ、その結果、最初の数分からある程度予想できる悲劇が起こります。それは、最近の多くの映画の耐えがたい病的な雰囲気を反映しているからかもしれません。
back_translation: (Jaynie) forgets her other obligations, and as a result, a somewhat predictable tragedy occurs from the first few minutes. This may reflect the unbearable pathological atmosphere of many recent films.

text: the only problem is that , by the end , no one in the audience or the film seems to really care .
translation: 唯一の問題は、最後までに、観客や映画の中の誰も本当に気にしていないように見えることです。
back_translation: The only problem is that by the end, it seems that neither the audience nor anyone in the movie really cares.

text: a film without surprise geared toward maximum comfort and familiarity .
translation: 驚きのない、最大限の快適さと親しみを重視した映画。
back_translation: A movie that emphasizes maximum comfort and familiarity without any surprises.

text: ... although this idea is `` new '' the results are tired .
translation: ...このアイデアは「新しい」とは言えますが、結果は既に試されています。
back_translation: ...This idea can be said to be "new," but the results have already been tested.

text: remarkable for its excellent storytelling , its economical , compressed characterisations and for its profound humanity , it 's an adventure story and history lesson all in one .
translation: 優れたストーリーテリング、経済的で簡潔なキャラクター描写、そして深い人間性が際立っており、それは冒険物語であり歴史の教訓でもあります。
back_translation: Exemplary storytelling, economical and concise character portrayal, and profound humanity stand out, making it both an adventure tale and a lesson in history.

text: mike white 's deft combination of serious subject matter and dark , funny humor make `` the good girl '' a film worth watching .
translation: マイク・ホワイトの真剣なテーマとダークでユーモラスなユーモアの巧みな組み合わせは、「ザ・グッド・ガール」を見る価値のある映画にしています。
back_translation: Mike White's serious themes and the skillful combination of dark and humorous humor make "The Good Girl" a film worth watching.

text: a film that will be best appreciated by those willing to endure its extremely languorous rhythms , waiting for happiness is ultimately thoughtful without having much dramatic impact .
translation: 極端に緩慢なリズムに耐える意志のある人々に最も評価される映画で、幸福を待つことは最終的に考えさせられるものであり、劇的な影響はあまりありません。
back_translation: A movie that is most appreciated by people willing to endure an extremely slow rhythm, where waiting for happiness ultimately leads to contemplation, and it has little dramatic impact.

text: this may be the first cartoon ever to look as if it were being shown on the projection television screen of a sports bar .
translation: これはスポーツバーのプロジェクションテレビ画面で映されているかのように見える初めてのアニメーションかもしれません。
back_translation: This might be the first animation that looks like it's being displayed on a projection television screen in a sports bar.

text: it 's a treat -- a delightful , witty , improbable romantic comedy with a zippy jazzy score ... grant and bullock make it look as though they are having so much fun .
translation: それは素晴らしい作品です -- 楽しくて、ウィットに富んだ、ありえないロマンティックコメディで、活気あるジャズのスコアが流れています... グラントとサンドラ・ブロックは、とても楽しんでいるように見えます。
back_translation: It is a wonderful work -- a fun, witty, and unlikely romantic comedy, accompanied by a lively jazz score... Grant and Sandra Bullock seem to be having a great time.

text: the trouble is , its filmmakers run out of clever ideas and visual gags about halfway through .
translation: 問題は、映画製作者たちが途中で巧妙なアイデアや視覚的ギャグを使い果たしてしまうことだ。
back_translation: The problem is that filmmakers run out of clever ideas or visual gags halfway through.

text: even when crush departs from the 4w formula ... it feels like a glossy rehash .
translation: クラッシュが4Wフォーミュラから離れたとしても、それは光沢のある再編のように感じる。
back_translation: Even if Crash has moved away from the 4W formula, it feels like a glossy reorganization.

text: nair does n't treat the issues lightly .
translation: ナイアは問題を軽視していません。
back_translation: Naya is not underestimating the problem.

text: a compelling motion picture that illustrates an american tragedy .
translation: アメリカの悲劇を描いた魅力的な映画。
back_translation: An attractive film depicting the tragedy of America.

text: it 's that painful .
translation: それはとても痛い。
back_translation: That hurts a lot.

text: smart , sassy interpretation of the oscar wilde play .
translation: オスカー・ワイルドの劇をスマートで生意気な解釈。
back_translation: A smart and cheeky interpretation of Oscar Wilde's play.

text: there 's nothing more satisfying during a summer of event movies than a spy thriller like the bourne identity that 's packed with just as much intelligence as action .
translation: 夏のイベント映画の中で、アクションと同じくらいの知性が詰まったスパイスリラー「ボーン・アイデンティティ」のような作品ほど満足感を与えてくれるものはありません。
back_translation: There is nothing quite as satisfying as a summer event movie like "The Bourne Identity," which is packed with as much intelligence as it is with action.

text: though writer\/director bart freundlich 's film ultimately becomes a simplistic story about a dysfunctional parent-child relationship , it has some special qualities and the soulful gravity of crudup 's anchoring performance .
translation: ライター/ディレクターのバート・フリードリッヒの映画は最終的には非機能的な親子関係についての単純な物語になるが、いくつかの特別な特質と、クルダップの根底にあるパフォーマンスの魂の重さを持っている。
back_translation: The film by writer/director Bart Friedrich ultimately becomes a simple story about a dysfunctional parent-child relationship, but it possesses some special qualities and carries the weight of the underlying performance of the character Crewdap's soul.

text: the early and middle passages are surprising in how much they engage and even touch us .
translation: 初期および中期の部分は、私たちをどれほど魅了し、さらには心に触れるかが驚きです。
back_translation: It is amazing how captivating and even touching the initial and mid parts are for us.

text: -lrb- cho 's face is -rrb- an amazing slapstick instrument , creating a scrapbook of living mug shots .
translation: -（チョの顔は）- すごいスラップスティックの道具であり、生きた容疑者の写真集を作り出します。
back_translation: - (The face of Cho) - is an amazing slapstick tool that creates a photo book of living suspects.

text: if ever such a dependable concept was botched in execution , this is it .
translation: もしこれほど信頼できる概念が実行で失敗したのであれば、それがこれです。
back_translation: If such a reliable concept failed in execution, this is it.

text: his -lrb- nelson 's -rrb- screenplay needs some serious re-working to show more of the dilemma , rather than have his characters stage shouting matches about it .
translation: ネルソンの脚本は、キャラクターがそのことで叫び合うのではなく、ジレンマをもっと示すために真剣に再構成する必要があります。
back_translation: Nelson's script needs to be seriously restructured to better showcase the dilemmas, rather than having the characters shout at each other about it.

text: terminally brain dead production .
translation: 末期的な脳死状態の制作。
back_translation: Production of a terminal brain death state.

text: -lrb- grant -rrb- goes beyond his usual fluttering and stammering and captures the soul of a man in pain who gradually comes to recognize it and deal with it .
translation: （グラント）は彼のいつものひらひらとした動きやどもりを超えて、徐々に自分の痛みを認識し、それに対処していく男の魂を捉えています。
back_translation: (Grant) captures the soul of a man who gradually recognizes his pain beyond his usual fluttering movements and stutter, and learns to cope with it.

text: the movie suffers from two fatal ailments -- a dearth of vitality and a story that 's shapeless and uninflected .
translation: その映画は、活力の欠如と、形がなく、変化に乏しい物語という二つの致命的な欠点に苦しんでいる。
back_translation: The movie suffers from two fatal flaws: a lack of vitality and a story that is formless and lacks change.

text: bigelow handles the nuclear crisis sequences evenly but milks drama when she should be building suspense , and drags out too many scenes toward the end that should move quickly .
translation: ビゲロウは核危機のシーケンスを均等に扱っていますが、サスペンスを構築すべき時にドラマを引き延ばし、終盤には素早く進むべきシーンを引き延ばしすぎています。
back_translation: Bigelow handles the nuclear crisis sequence evenly, but she stretches the drama when it should build suspense and drags out scenes that should move quickly in the finale.

text: while most films these days are about nothing , this film seems to be about everything that 's plaguing the human spirit in a relentlessly globalizing world .
translation: 最近のほとんどの映画は何も描いていないが、この映画は、抑えきれないグローバル化の世界で人間の精神を苦しめているすべてのことについて描いているようだ。
back_translation: Most recent movies depict nothing, but this film seems to portray everything that torments the human spirit in a world of unstoppable globalization.

text: one senses in world traveler and in his earlier film that freundlich bears a grievous but obscure complaint against fathers , and circles it obsessively , without making contact .
translation: 世界の旅人において、そして彼の以前の作品において、フロインリヒは父親に対して深刻だが曖昧な不満を抱えており、それを執拗に繰り返すが、決して接触を持たない。
back_translation: In "The Traveler of the World" and in his previous works, Froinrich harbors a serious yet ambiguous dissatisfaction towards his father, which he persistently repeats but never directly confronts.

text: well-meant but unoriginal .
translation: 善意だが独創性に欠ける。
back_translation: Well-intentioned but lacking in originality.

text: it 's an effort to watch this movie , but it eventually pays off and is effective if you stick with it .
translation: この映画を見るのは大変ですが、最後まで頑張れば報われ、効果的です。
back_translation: Watching this movie is challenging, but if you stick with it until the end, you will be rewarded and it will be effective.

text: it 's burns ' visuals , characters and his punchy dialogue , not his plot , that carry waydowntown .
translation: ウェイダウンタウンを支えているのは、バーンズのビジュアル、キャラクター、そして彼のパンチの効いた対話であり、プロットではない。
back_translation: What supports Way Downtown are Burns’ visuals, character, and his punchy dialogue, not the plot.

text: the real triumphs in igby come from philippe , who makes oliver far more interesting than the character 's lines would suggest , and sarandon , who could n't be better as a cruel but weirdly likable wasp matron .
translation: イグビーの真の勝利はフィリップにあり、彼はオリバーをキャラクターのセリフが示唆するよりもはるかに興味深い存在にしています。そして、サランドンは冷酷でありながら奇妙に好感の持てるワスプの女主人役としてこれ以上ないほど素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Igby’s true triumph lies with Philip, who makes Oliver a far more interesting character than the dialogue suggests. And Sarandon is nothing short of brilliant as the cruel yet oddly endearing WASP matriarch.

text: the quiet american is n't a bad film , it 's just one that could easily wait for your pay per view dollar .
translation: 『静かなアメリカ人』は悪い映画ではありませんが、あなたのペイ・パー・ビューのお金を待ってもよい映画です。
back_translation: "The Quiet American" is not a bad movie, but it is a film that can wait for your pay-per-view money.

text: no. .
translation: いいえ。
back_translation: No.

text: kapur weighs down the tale with bogus profundities .
translation: カプールは物語を偽の深みで重くしている。
back_translation: Kapoor is weighing down the story with a false depth.

text: my big fat greek wedding is that rare animal known as ' a perfect family film , ' because it 's about family .
translation: 「私の大きな太ったギリシャの結婚式」は、「完璧なファミリーフィルム」として知られる珍しい作品です。なぜなら、それは家族についての映画だからです。
back_translation: "My Big Fat Greek Wedding" is a rare work known as a "perfect family film" because it is a movie about family.

text: even though many of these guys are less than adorable -lrb- their lamentations are pretty much self-centered -rrb- , there 's something vital about the movie .
translation: これらの連中の多くはあまり愛らしくはないものの （彼らの嘆きはほぼ自己中心的ですが）、この映画には何か重要なものがあります。
back_translation: Many of these people are not very lovable (their complaints are almost self-centered), but there is something important about this movie.

text: while it may not add up to the sum of its parts , holofcener 's film offers just enough insight to keep it from being simpleminded , and the ensemble cast is engaging enough to keep you from shifting in your chair too often .
translation: 部分の合計にはならないかもしれませんが、ホロフェセナーの映画は単純ではないための十分な洞察を提供しており、アンサンブルキャストは魅力的で、椅子で頻繁に動くことを防いでいます。
back_translation: It may not add up to a whole, but the holo-Face-Ner's movie provides enough insight for not being simple, and the ensemble cast is engaging, preventing you from frequently shifting in your seat.

text: an ugly , revolting movie .
translation: 醜くて嫌悪感を抱かせる映画。
back_translation: A movie that is ugly and evokes disgust.

text: if you are into splatter movies , then you will probably have a reasonably good time with the salton sea .
translation: もしスプラッタームービーが好きなら、『ソルトン・シー』で reasonably good time を過ごせるでしょう。
back_translation: If you like splatter movies, you can have a reasonably good time with "Salt Sea."

text: the characterizations and dialogue lack depth or complexity , with the ironic exception of scooter .
translation: キャラクターの描写と対話は深みや複雑さに欠けており、アイロニックな例外としてスクーターが挙げられます。
back_translation: The character descriptions and dialogues lack depth and complexity, with the ironic exception of the scooter.

text: shanghai ghetto may not be as dramatic as roman polanski 's the pianist , but its compassionate spirit soars every bit as high .
translation: 上海ゲットーはロマン・ポランスキーの「戦場のピアニスト」ほどドラマチックではないかもしれませんが、その思いやりの精神は同じくらい高く舞い上がります。
back_translation: The Shanghai Ghetto may not be as dramatic as Roman Polanski's "The Pianist," but its spirit of compassion rises just as high.

text: but it 's hardly a necessary enterprise .
translation: しかし、それはほとんど必要な事業ではありません。
back_translation: However, it is not an essential business.

text: ratliff 's two previous titles , plutonium circus and purgatory county show his penchant for wry , contentious configurations , and this film is part of that delicate canon .
translation: ラトリフの前の二つの作品、『プルトニウムサーカス』と『パージトリー郡』は、彼の皮肉で対立的な構成への好みを示しており、この映画もその微妙なカノンの一部です。
back_translation: The two works before "Latriff," "Plutonium Circus" and "Purgatory County," demonstrate his preference for ironic and confrontational structures, and this film is also part of that subtle canon.

text: distinctly sub-par ... more likely to drown a viewer in boredom than to send any shivers down his spine .
translation: 明らかに劣っており、視聴者を退屈で溺れさせる可能性が高く、恐怖を感じさせることは少ない。
back_translation: It is clearly inferior, likely to bore and overwhelm the audience, and rarely evokes a sense of fear.

text: it 's a shame that the storyline and its underlying themes ... finally seem so impersonal or even shallow .
translation: ストーリーラインとその根底にあるテーマが最終的に非常に無関心に感じられたり、さらには浅薄に感じられるのは残念です。
back_translation: It's unfortunate that the storyline and the underlying themes ultimately feel very indifferent, and even superficial.

text: as it stands , crocodile hunter has the hurried , badly cobbled look of the 1959 godzilla , which combined scenes of a japanese monster flick with canned shots of raymond burr commenting on the monster 's path of destruction .
translation: 現在のところ、クロコダイルハンターは1959年のゴジラの急いで作られた、適当に繋ぎ合わせたような印象を受ける。この映画は、日本のモンスター映画のシーンと、モンスターの破壊の軌跡をコメントするレイモンド・バ－の缶詰映像を組み合わせたものである。
back_translation: Currently, "Crocodile Hunter" gives the impression of being hastily made and pieced together, reminiscent of the 1959 Godzilla. This film combines scenes from Japanese monster movies with canned footage of Raymond Barr commenting on the trail of destruction left by the monsters.

text: leigh succeeds in delivering a dramatic slap in the face that 's simultaneously painful and refreshing .
translation: レイは、痛みを伴いながらもさわやかさを感じさせるドラマチックな平手打ちを見事に成功させる。
back_translation: Ray successfully delivers a dramatic slap that, while accompanied by pain, also conveys a sense of refreshment.

text: i liked the original short story but this movie , even at an hour and twenty-some minutes , it 's too long and it goes nowhere .
translation: 元の短編小説は好きでしたが、この映画は、たとえ1時間20分ほどの長さでも、長すぎてどこにも行かないように感じます。
back_translation: I liked the original short story, but this movie feels too long, even though it's about 1 hour and 20 minutes, and seems to go nowhere.

text: it 's the kind of under-inspired , overblown enterprise that gives hollywood sequels a bad name .
translation: それは、ハリウッドの続編に悪名を与えるような、インスピレーションに欠けた、過剰な企業の一種です。
back_translation: It is a type of uninspired and excessively corporate entity that tarnishes the reputation of Hollywood sequels.

text: the movie starts with a legend and ends with a story that is so far-fetched it would be impossible to believe if it were n't true .
translation: 映画は伝説で始まり、真実でなければ信じられないほど非現実的な物語で終わる。
back_translation: The movie begins with a legend and ends with a story so unrealistic that it can only be believed if it is true.

text: really does feel like a short stretched out to feature length .
translation: 本当に短編が特徴的な長編に引き伸ばされたように感じます。
back_translation: It really feels like a short story has been stretched into a long one.

text: a breezy blend of art , history , esoteric musings and philosophy .
translation: アート、歴史、難解な考察、哲学の爽やかなブレンド。
back_translation: A refreshing blend of art, history, intricate contemplation, and philosophy.

text: unexpected moments of authentically impulsive humor are the hallmark of this bittersweet , uncommonly sincere movie that portrays the frank humanity of ... emotional recovery .
translation: 予期しない瞬間の本物の衝動的なユーモアが、このほろ苦く、異常に誠実な映画の特徴であり、... 感情的な回復の率直な人間性を描いています。
back_translation: The genuine, impulsive humor of unexpected moments characterizes this bittersweet, unusually honest film, depicting the candid humanity of emotional recovery.

text: stands as a document of what it felt like to be a new yorker -- or , really , to be a human being -- in the weeks after 9\/11 .
translation: 9/11の後の数週間、ニューヨーカーであること -- あるいは、実際には人間であること -- がどう感じられたかを示す証として存在しています。
back_translation: It exists as proof of what it felt like to be a New Yorker -- or, in fact, to be human -- in the weeks following 9/11.

text: my wife is an actress works as well as it does because -lrb- the leads -rrb- are such a companionable couple .
translation: 私の妻は女優で、主演のカップルがとても仲の良い2人なので、彼女はうまくやっています。
back_translation: My wife is an actress, and since the lead couple gets along very well, she is doing great.

text: about schmidt is nicholson 's goofy , heartfelt , mesmerizing king lear .
translation: 『アバウト・シュミット』は、ニコルソンの陽気で思いやりがあり、魅惑的な『リア王』です。
back_translation: "About Schmidt" features Nicholson's cheerful, compassionate, and charming performance in "King Lear."

text: a comedy that is warm , inviting , and surprising .
translation: 温かく、心地よく、驚きに満ちたコメディ。
back_translation: A warm, pleasant, and surprise-filled comedy.

text: hatfield and hicks make the oddest of couples , and in this sense the movie becomes a study of the gambles of the publishing world , offering a case study that exists apart from all the movie 's political ramifications .
translation: ハットフィールドとヒックスは最も奇妙なカップルであり、この意味で映画は出版界の賭けの研究となり、映画の政治的影響とは別に存在するケーススタディを提供します。
back_translation: Hatfield and Hicks are the strangest couple, and in this sense, the film becomes a study of the risks in the publishing world, providing a case study that exists separately from the political impact of the movie.

text: the movie is so contrived , nonsensical and formulaic that , come to think of it , the day-old shelf would be a more appropriate location to store it .
translation: その映画は、あまりにも作りこまれていて、無意味で、型にはまっているので、よく考えてみると、1日前の棚に保管する方が適切な場所だろう。
back_translation: That movie is so overproduced, meaningless, and clichéd that upon reflection, it would be more appropriate to store it on a shelf a day ago.

text: this sensitive , smart , savvy , compelling coming-of-age drama delves into the passive-aggressive psychology of co-dependence and the struggle for self-esteem .
translation: この繊細でスマート、賢い、魅力的な成長ドラマは、共依存の受動的攻撃的な心理と自己評価を求める葛藤に深く切り込んでいます。
back_translation: This delicate, smart, clever, and charming growth drama deeply delves into the passive-aggressive psychology of codependency and the conflicts that arise from the search for self-esteem.

text: enigma looks great , has solid acting and a neat premise .
translation: エニグマは素晴らしい見た目で、確かな演技と魅力的な前提を持っています。
back_translation: Enigma has a wonderful appearance, solid performance, and an engaging premise.

text: eventually , they will have a showdown , but , by then , your senses are as mushy as peas and you do n't care who fires the winning shot .
translation: 結局、彼らは対決することになるが、その頃にはあなたの感覚はすでにマッシュポテトのようにぼんやりしていて、誰が勝利の一発を撃つか気にもしなくなる。
back_translation: In the end, they will confront each other, but by that time, your senses will be so dull like mashed potatoes that you won't even care who lands the winning blow.

text: as warm as it is wise , deftly setting off uproarious humor with an underlying seriousness that sneaks up on the viewer , providing an experience that is richer than anticipated .
translation: 温かさと賢さを兼ね備え、視聴者に忍び寄る根底にある真剣さと巧みに結びついた爆笑のユーモアを引き出し、予想以上に豊かな体験を提供します。
back_translation: It combines warmth and wisdom, drawing out humor that is skillfully tied to a serious underlying tone that sneaks up on the viewer, providing a surprisingly rich experience.

text: godard 's ode to tackling life 's wonderment is a rambling and incoherent manifesto about the vagueness of topical excess ... in praise of love remains a ponderous and pretentious endeavor that 's unfocused and tediously exasperating .
translation: ゴダールの人生の驚異に挑むオードは、テーマの過剰さの曖昧さについてのとりとめのない一貫性のないマニフェストです... 愛を称賛することは、焦点が合わず、煩わしくもイライラさせる重苦しくて気取った試みのままとなっています。
back_translation: The ode challenging the wonders of Godard's life is a rambling and inconsistent manifesto about the ambiguity of the excessiveness of themes... Praising love remains a heavy-handed and pretentious attempt that lacks focus and is both bothersome and frustrating.

text: this ready-made midnight movie probably wo n't stand the cold light of day , but under the right conditions , it 's goofy -lrb- if not entirely wholesome -rrb- fun .
translation: この即席の深夜映画は、おそらく明るい光の下では通用しないだろうが、適切な条件下では、 goofy（少しおかしな）楽しみがある -（全く健康的ではないにしても）- なんだ。
back_translation: This makeshift late-night movie probably wouldn't hold up under bright lights, but under the right conditions, there's a goofy (a bit strange) enjoyment to be found – albeit not entirely healthy.

text: hampered -- no , paralyzed -- by a self-indulgent script ... that aims for poetry and ends up sounding like satire .
translation: 自己陶酔的な脚本に妨げられ -- いや、麻痺させられ -- 詩を目指しているが結局は風刺のように聞こえる。
back_translation: Hindered -- no, paralyzed -- by a self-indulgent script, it aims for poetry but ultimately sounds like satire.

text: although sensitive to a fault , it 's often overwritten , with a surfeit of weighty revelations , flowery dialogue , and nostalgia for the past and roads not taken .
translation: 欠点に敏感でありながら、しばしば過剰な重みを持つ啓示、花言葉のような対話、過去や選ばれなかった道への懐旧感で上書きされます。
back_translation: While being sensitive to flaws, it is often overwritten by revelations that carry excessive weight, dialogues like the language of flowers, and nostalgia for the past or the paths not taken.

text: several uninteresting , unlikeable people do bad things to and with each other in `` unfaithful . ''
translation: 「不貞」では、いくつかの退屈で好感が持てない人々が、お互いに悪いことをしたり、悪いことをしたりします。
back_translation: In "Infidelity," a few dull and unlikable people do bad things to each other or engage in wrongdoing.

text: ... a low rate annie featuring some kid who ca n't act , only echoes of jordan , and weirdo actor crispin glover screwing things up old school .
translation: ... 演技ができない子供が出ている低予算のアニー、ジョーダンのエコーだけで、変わった俳優クリスピン・グローバーが古いスタイルで物事を台無しにしている。
back_translation: ... A low-budget Annie featuring children who cannot act, with only Jordan's echo, is being ruined by the eccentric actor Crispin Glover in an old-fashioned style.

text: this version does justice both to stevenson and to the sci-fi genre .
translation: このバージョンはスティーブンソンとサイエンスフィクションジャンルの両方に対して十分な評価を与えています。
back_translation: This version gives adequate recognition to both Stevenson and the science fiction genre.

text: surprisingly , considering that baird is a former film editor , the movie is rather choppy .
translation: 驚くべきことに、ベアードが元映画編集者であることを考えると、その映画はかなりぎこちない。
back_translation: Surprisingly, considering that Baird is a former film editor, the movie is quite awkward.

text: directing with a sure and measured hand , -lrb- haneke -rrb- steers clear of the sensational and offers instead an unflinching and objective look at a decidedly perverse pathology .
translation: 確かな手腕で導きながら、（ハネケ）はセンセーショナルなものを避け、むしろ明らかに異常な病理に対して動じることなく客観的な視点を提供している。
back_translation: While guiding with a sure hand, Haneke avoids sensationalism and instead provides an objective perspective, undisturbed by the clearly abnormal pathology.

text: ... it was n't the subject matter that ultimately defeated the film ... it was the unfulfilling , incongruous , `` wait a second , did i miss something ? ''
translation: …最終的に映画を敗北させたのはテーマではなく、満たされない不一致な「ちょっと待って、何か見逃した？」という感情だった。
back_translation: Ultimately, it was not the theme that led to the failure of the movie, but rather the unfulfilled, inconsistent feeling of "Wait, did I miss something?"

text: wiseman is patient and uncompromising , letting his camera observe and record the lives of women torn apart by a legacy of abuse .
translation: 賢者は忍耐強く妥協せず、カメラを通して虐待の遺産に引き裂かれた女性たちの生活を観察し記録しています。
back_translation: The wise observe and record the lives of women torn by the legacy of abuse through the camera, patiently and without compromise.

text: it 's a compelling and horrifying story , and the laramie project is worthwhile for reminding us that this sort of thing does , in fact , still happen in america .
translation: それは魅力的で恐ろしい物語であり、「ララミー・プロジェクト」は、このようなことが実際にアメリカで今も起こっていることを思い出させてくれる価値がある。
back_translation: It is a captivating and terrifying story, and "The Laramie Project" serves as a reminder that such things are still happening in America today.

text: ub equally spoofs and celebrates the more outre aspects of ` black culture ' and the dorkier aspects of ` white culture , ' even as it points out how inseparable the two are .
translation: 『黒人文化』のより突飛な側面と『白人文化』のダサい側面を同時に spoof し、祝福しながら、両者がどれほど切り離せないものであるかを指摘しています。
back_translation: It simultaneously spoofs the more eccentric aspects of "Black culture" and the uncool aspects of "White culture," while celebrating them and pointing out how inseparable they are from each other.

text: full frontal , which opens today nationwide , could almost be classified as a movie-industry satire , but it lacks the generous inclusiveness that is the genre 's definitive , if disingenuous , feature .
translation: 「フルフロンタル」は本日全国公開され、映画業界の風刺としてほぼ分類されることができるが、そのジャンルの決定的特徴である寛大な包容力が欠けており、それは誠実ではない。
back_translation: "Full Frontal" was released nationwide today, and while it can almost be classified as a satire of the film industry, it lacks the definitive characteristic of that genre, which is a generous inclusiveness, and that is not sincere.

text: ultimately ... the movie is too heady for children , and too preachy for adults .
translation: 結局のところ、映画は子供には難しすぎて、大人には説教じみている。
back_translation: In the end, the movie is too difficult for children and too preachy for adults.

text: could n't someone take rob schneider and have him switch bodies with a funny person ?
translation: 誰かロブ・シュナイダーを連れて行って、面白い人と体を交換させることはできないでしょうか？
back_translation: Is there anyone who can take Rob Schneider and make him swap bodies with someone funny?

text: in the wrong hands , i.e. peploe 's , it 's simply unbearable
translation: 間違った手に渡ると、つまり人々の手に渡ると、まったく耐え難いです。
back_translation: If it falls into the wrong hands, in other words, into the hands of people, it is simply unbearable.

text: what saves it ... and makes it one of the better video-game-based flicks , is that the film acknowledges upfront that the plot makes no sense , such that the lack of linearity is the point of emotional and moral departure for protagonist alice .
translation: それを救い、より良いビデオゲームを基にした映画の一つにしているのは、映画が事前にプロットが意味をなさないことを認識していることであり、そのため、直線性の欠如が主人公アリスの感情的および道徳的な出発点であるということです。
back_translation: What saves it and makes it one of the better video game-based films is the film's recognition that the pre-set plot does not make sense, and thus, the lack of linearity serves as the emotional and moral starting point for the protagonist, Alice.

text: like an afterschool special with costumes by gianni versace , mad love looks better than it feels .
translation: ジアニ・ヴェルサーチの衣装を身にまとった放課後スペシャルのように、狂おしい愛は感じるよりも見た目が良い。
back_translation: Like an after-school special dressed in Gianni Versace, obsessive love looks better than it feels.

text: a strong script , powerful direction and splendid production design allows us to be transported into the life of wladyslaw szpilman , who is not only a pianist , but a good human being .
translation: 強力な脚本、力強い演出、素晴らしいプロダクションデザインによって、私たちはピアニストであり、良き人間でもあるウラディスワフ・シュピルマンの生活に引き込まれます。
back_translation: Through a powerful script, strong direction, and wonderful production design, we are drawn into the life of Władysław Szpilman, a pianist and a good man.

text: miller tells this very compelling tale with little fuss or noise , expertly plucking tension from quiet .
translation: ミラーはこの非常に魅力的な物語を大きな騒ぎもなく語り、静けさから巧みに緊張感を引き出しています。
back_translation: Mira tells this very captivating story without making a big fuss, skillfully drawing tension from the silence.

text: it has no affect on the kurds , but it wore me down .
translation: それはクルド人には影響を与えませんが、私を消耗させました。
back_translation: It does not affect the Kurds, but it has drained me.

text: the wanton slipperiness of \* corpus and its amiable jerking and reshaping of physical time and space would make it a great piece to watch with kids and use to introduce video as art .
translation: \* コーパスの無邪気な滑りやすさと物理的な時間と空間の愛らしい揺れ動きと再形成は、子供たちと一緒に観るには素晴らしい作品であり、ビデオをアートとして紹介するのに役立つでしょう。
back_translation: The innocent slickness of the corpus and the lovely swaying and reshaping of physical time and space make it a wonderful work to watch with children, and it will help to present video as art.

text: the real star of this movie is the score , as in the songs translate well to film , and it 's really well directed .
translation: この映画の真の主役はスコアで、曲が映画にうまく表現されており、監督も本当に優れています。
back_translation: The true main character of this movie is the score, as the music is skillfully represented in the film, and the director is truly outstanding.

text: instead of letting the laughs come as they may , lawrence unleashes his trademark misogyny -- er , comedy -- like a human volcano or an overflowing septic tank , take your pick .
translation: 笑いが自然に起こるのを待つ代わりに、ローレンスは彼のトレードマークである女性嫌悪、ああ、コメディを、人間の火山や溢れ出る下水槽のように放出します、どちらでもお好きな方をどうぞ。
back_translation: Instead of waiting for laughter to occur naturally, Lawrence unleashes his trademark misanthropy, ah, comedy, like a human volcano or an overflowing sewage tank—whichever you prefer.

text: this tuxedo ... should have been sent back to the tailor for some major alterations .
translation: このタキシードは... 大幅な修正のために仕立て屋に返されるべきでした。
back_translation: This tuxedo should have been returned to the tailor for significant alterations.

text: ever see one of those comedies that just seem like a bad idea from frame one ?
translation: フレームの一つから悪いアイデアのように見えるコメディを見たことがありますか？
back_translation: Have you ever seen a comedy that looks like a bad idea from one frame?

text: the film is impressive for the sights and sounds of the wondrous beats the world has to offer .
translation: その映画は、世界が提供する素晴らしいビートの視覚と音に感銘を受けるものです。
back_translation: That movie is something that is impressed by the visual and sound of the wonderful beat that the world offers.

text: for most of its footage , the new thriller proves that director m. night shyamalan can weave an eerie spell and that mel gibson can gasp , shudder and even tremble without losing his machismo .
translation: 新しいスリラーは、そのほとんどの映像で、監督M・ナイト・シャマランが不気味な魔法を織りなすことができ、メル・ギブソンが男らしさを失うことなく息を呑み、震え、さらには身震いさせることができることを証明しています。
back_translation: The new thriller demonstrates that director M. Night Shyamalan can weave eerie magic throughout most of the footage, while Mel Gibson manages to gasp and tremble without losing his masculinity.

text: downright transparent is the script 's endless assault of embarrassingly ham-fisted sex jokes that reek of a script rewrite designed to garner the film a `` cooler '' pg-13 rating .
translation: まったくもって透明なのは、映画を「クールな」PG-13の評価を得るために脚本が書き直されていることを臭わせる、恥ずかしいほど稚拙なセックスジョークの終わりのない攻撃です。
back_translation: The completely transparent aspect is the endless barrage of embarrassingly childish sex jokes, suggesting that the script has been rewritten to achieve a "cool" PG-13 rating for the movie.

text: the performances are so overstated , the effect comes off as self-parody .
translation: 演技が非常にオーバーで、その影響は自己パロディのように感じられます。
back_translation: The performance is very over the top, and its impact feels like a self-parody.

text: in terms of execution this movie is careless and unfocused .
translation: この映画は実行において無頓着で焦点が定まっていません。
back_translation: This movie is careless in execution and lacks focus.

text: the story ultimately takes hold and grips hard .
translation: 物語は最終的に心をつかみ、強く引き込まれます。
back_translation: The story ultimately captures the heart and draws you in strongly.

text: the whole movie is simply a lazy exercise in bad filmmaking that asks you to not only suspend your disbelief but your intelligence as well .
translation: この映画全体は、単に怠惰な悪い映画作りの行為であり、あなたに不信感だけでなく、知性までも一時的に保留するよう求めています。
back_translation: The entire movie is simply an act of lazy and poor filmmaking, asking you to suspend not only your disbelief but also your intelligence temporarily.

text: it puts washington , as honest working man john q. archibald , on a pedestal , then keeps lifting the pedestal higher .
translation: ワシントンを、正直で働き者のジョン・Q・アーチボルドとして台座に乗せ、さらにその台座を高く持ち上げ続ける。
back_translation: Place Washington on a pedestal as the honest and hardworking John Q. Archibald, and continue to raise that pedestal higher.

text: i have not been this disappointed by a movie in a long time .
translation: 最近、映画にこんなに失望したことはありません。
back_translation: Recently, I have never been so disappointed in a movie.

text: an alternately fascinating and frustrating documentary .
translation: 魅力的でありながらもフラストレーションを感じるドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A captivating yet frustrating documentary.

text: a directorial tour de force by bernard rose , ivans xtc .
translation: バーナード・ローズによる監督の力作、「イワンのXTC」。
back_translation: A masterwork directed by Bernard Rose, "Ivan's XTC."

text: unfortunately , one hour photo lives down to its title .
translation: 残念ながら、「ワン・アワー・フォト」はそのタイトルにふさわしい内容です。
back_translation: Unfortunately, "One Hour Photo" has content that is fitting for its title.

text: for a guy who has waited three years with breathless anticipation for a new hal hartley movie to pore over , no such thing is a big letdown .
translation: 新しいハル・ハートリーの映画を待ち望んで3年も息を呑んでいた男にとっては、そのようなものが存在しないというのは大きな失望だ。
back_translation: For a man who has been holding his breath for three years, eagerly awaiting a new Hal Hartley film, the fact that such a thing does not exist is a great disappointment.

text: beautifully produced .
translation: 美しく制作された。
back_translation: Beautifully crafted.

text: a compelling coming-of-age drama about the arduous journey of a sensitive young girl through a series of foster homes and a fierce struggle to pull free from her dangerous and domineering mother 's hold over her .
translation: 感受性豊かな少女が一連の養護施設を通じて辛い旅をし、彼女の危険で支配的な母から逃れようと必死に戦う感動的な成長ドラマ。
back_translation: A touching coming-of-age drama about a sensitive young girl who endures a painful journey through a series of orphanages, desperately fighting to escape from her dangerous and controlling mother.

text: lee 's achievement extends to his supple understanding of the role that brown played in american culture as an athlete , a movie star , and an image of black indomitability .
translation: リーの業績は、アスリート、映画スター、そして黒人の不屈の象徴としてのブラウンの役割に対する柔軟な理解にまで及んでいる。
back_translation: Lee's achievements extend to a flexible understanding of Brown's role as an athlete, movie star, and an unwavering symbol of Black resilience.

text: it 's definitely an improvement on the first blade , since it does n't take itself so deadly seriously .
translation: 初代ブレードに比べて確実に改善されていますね。なぜなら、それほど真剣に受け止めていないからです。
back_translation: It has definitely improved compared to the first generation Blade. That's because I don't take it that seriously.

text: yet this one makes up for in heart what it lacks in outright newness .
translation: それでも、この作品は新しさに欠けている部分を心で補っています。
back_translation: Still, this work compensates for its lack of novelty with heart.

text: the most memorable moment was when green threw medical equipment at a window ; not because it was particularly funny , but because i had a serious urge to grab the old lady at the end of my aisle 's walker and toss it at the screen in frustration .
translation: 最も記憶に残る瞬間は、グリーンが窓に医療機器を投げたときだった；特に面白かったわけではなく、私が自分の列の端にいる老婦人の歩行器を掴んでイライラして画面に投げつけたいという真剣な衝動を感じたからだ。
back_translation: The most memorable moment was when Green threw the medical equipment out of the window; it wasn't particularly funny, but I felt a serious urge to grab the walker of the elderly woman at the end of my row and throw it at the screen in frustration.

text: the premise of `` abandon '' holds promise , ... but its delivery is a complete mess .
translation: 「アバンドン」の前提は期待を持っていますが、その届け方は完全に混乱しています。
back_translation: The premise of "Abandon" has expectations, but the way of delivering it is completely confused.

text: shyamalan offers copious hints along the way -- myriad signs , if you will -- that beneath the familiar , funny surface is a far bigger , far more meaningful story than one in which little green men come to earth for harvesting purposes .
translation: シャマランは途中で豊富なヒントを提供します。つまり、無数のサインがあり、親しみやすく面白い表面の下には、小さな緑の人々が地球に収穫のために来るだけの物語よりもはるかに大きく、より意味深い物語があるということです。
back_translation: Shyamalan provides plenty of hints along the way. In other words, there are countless signs, and beneath the friendly and interesting surface lies a story that is much larger and more meaningful than just the tale of little green people coming to Earth to harvest.

text: call me a cynic , but there 's something awfully deadly about any movie with a life-affirming message .
translation: 私を皮肉屋だと思っても構いませんが、生命を肯定するメッセージを持つ映画には、何か非常に致命的なものがあります。
back_translation: You may think of me as a cynic, but there is something very fatal about movies that carry a message of affirming life.

text: we started to wonder if ... some unpaid intern had just typed ` chris rock , ' ` anthony hopkins ' and ` terrorists ' into some univac-like script machine .
translation: 私たちは、いくつかの無給インターンがただ `クリス・ロック` 、 `アンソニー・ホプキンス` 、そして `テロリスト` をいくつかのユニバックスのようなスクリプトマシンに入力しただけではないかと疑い始めました。
back_translation: We began to suspect that some unpaid interns simply input `Chris Rock`, `Anthony Hopkins`, and `terrorist` into some kind of script machine like Unibux.

text: it 's hard to imagine that even very small children will be impressed by this tired retread .
translation: 非常に小さな子供たちがこの疲れたリメイクに感銘を受けるなんて想像しにくい。
back_translation: It's hard to imagine that very small children would be impressed by this tired remake.

text: the art direction is often exquisite , and the anthropomorphic animal characters are beautifully realized through clever makeup design , leaving one to hope that the eventual dvd release will offer subtitles and the original italian-language soundtrack .
translation: アートディレクションはしばしば見事であり、擬人化された動物キャラクターは巧妙なメイクデザインによって美しく表現されています。そのため、最終的なDVDリリースが字幕とオリジナルのイタリア語音声トラックを提供することを期待しています。
back_translation: Art direction is often stunning, and the anthropomorphized animal characters are beautifully portrayed through clever makeup design. Therefore, I hope that the final DVD release will provide subtitles and the original Italian audio track.

text: the problem with movies about angels is they have a tendency to slip into hokum .
translation: 天使を題材にした映画の問題は、しばしばありきたりになってしまう傾向があることです。
back_translation: The problem with movies featuring angels is that they often tend to be clichéd.

text: lazy filmmaking , with the director taking a hands-off approach when he should have shaped the story to show us why it 's compelling .
translation: 怠惰な映画製作で、監督が物語を形成するべきところで手を引いてしまったため、なぜそれが魅力的なのかを見せることができなかった。
back_translation: Due to lazy filmmaking, the director pulled back when he should have shaped the story, resulting in an inability to show why it was appealing.

text: like smoke signals , the film is also imbued with strong themes of familial ties and spirituality that are powerful and moving without stooping to base melodrama
translation: 煙信号のように、この映画は家族の絆や霊性という強いテーマに満ちており、低俗なメロドラマに陥ることなく力強く心に響きます。
back_translation: Like smoke signals, this film is filled with strong themes of family bonds and spirituality, resonating powerfully in the heart without falling into the trap of cheap melodrama.

text: as with so many merchandised-to-the-max movies of this type , more time appears to have gone into recruiting the right bands for the playlist and the costuming of the stars than into the script , which has a handful of smart jokes and not much else .
translation: この種の映画では、最大限に商品化された作品が多く、脚本よりもプレイリストのための適切なバンドの募集やスターたちの衣装に多くの時間が費やされたようです。脚本にはいくつかのスマートなジョークはあるものの、それ以外にはあまり内容がありません。
back_translation: In this type of movie, there are many highly commercialized works, and it seems that more time was spent on recruiting the right bands for the playlist and designing the stars' costumes than on the script. While there are a few clever jokes in the script, there isn't much substance otherwise.

text: the film 's images give a backbone to the company and provide an emotional edge to its ultimate demise .
translation: その映画のイメージは会社に backbone を与え、最終的な崩壊に感情的なエッジを提供する。
back_translation: The image of that movie gives the company a backbone and provides an emotional edge to the final collapse.

text: stuffed to the brim with ideas , american instigator michael moore 's film is a rambling examination of american gun culture that uses his usual modus operandi of crucifixion through juxtaposition .
translation: アイデアで満ち溢れたアメリカの扇動者マイケル・ムーアの映画は、アメリカの銃文化についての漫然とした考察であり、彼のいつもの手法である対比を通じた十字架にかけるようなスタイルを使用しています。
back_translation: The film by American provocateur Michael Moore, filled with ideas, offers a vague exploration of America's gun culture and employs his usual style of crucifying through contrast.

text: press the delete key .
translation: 削除キーを押してください。
back_translation: Please press the delete key.

text: ... the kind of entertainment that parents love to have their kids see .
translation: … 親が子供に見せたいと考えるような娯楽。
back_translation: ... entertainment that parents would like to show their children.

text: for all its visual panache and compelling supporting characters , the heart of the film rests in the relationship between sullivan and his son .
translation: その視覚的な華やかさや魅力的なサポートキャラクターにもかかわらず、映画の核心はサリバンと彼の息子との関係にあります。
back_translation: Despite the visual splendor and captivating supporting characters, the heart of the film lies in the relationship between Sullivan and his son.

text: imamura has said that warm water under a red bridge is a poem to the enduring strengths of women .
translation: 今村は、赤い橋の下の温かい水は女性の持続的な強さへの詩であると言った。
back_translation: Imamura said that the warm water under the red bridge is a poem about women's enduring strength.

text: a grating , emaciated flick .
translation: 痩せ細った音がするフィルム。
back_translation: A film that sounds emaciated.

text: it 's plotless , shapeless -- and yet , it must be admitted , not entirely humorless .
translation: それはプロットがなく、形もない - しかし、認めざるを得ないことに、まったくユーモアがないわけではない。
back_translation: It has no plot and no form - however, I must concede that it is not completely devoid of humor.

text: with a tone as variable as the cinematography , schaeffer 's film never settles into the light-footed enchantment the material needs , and the characters ' quirks and foibles never jell into charm .
translation: シェイファーの映画は、映像が変動するようにトーンも変化し、素材が必要とする軽快な魅力に決して落ち着くことがなく、キャラクターの個性や欠点も魅力として融合することはありません。
back_translation: Schaeffer's films change in tone as the visuals fluctuate, never settling into the light charm that the material requires, and the characters' personalities and flaws do not merge as part of their appeal.

text: a very slow , uneventful ride around a pretty tattered old carousel .
translation: とても遅く、何も起こらない、ボロボロの古いメリーゴーランドの周りを回る旅。
back_translation: A journey around a very slow, nothing happening, shabby old merry-go-round.

text: jackson is always watchable .
translation: ジャクソンはいつも見ごたえがあります。
back_translation: Jackson is always worth watching.

text: showtime is a fine-looking film with a bouncy score and a clutch of lively songs for deft punctuation .
translation: ショータイムは見栄えの良い映画で、弾むようなスコアと巧妙な間を持つ活気ある曲がいくつかあります。
back_translation: Showtime is an attractive movie that features several lively songs with a bouncing score and clever pauses.

text: mib ii is a movie that makes it possible for the viewer to doze off for a few minutes or make several runs to the concession stand and\/or restroom and not feel as if he or she has missed anything .
translation: MIB IIは、観客が数分間うとうとしたり、いくつかの回で売店やトイレに行っても、何かを見逃したとは感じない映画です。
back_translation: MIB II is a movie where the audience doesn't feel like they've missed anything even if they doze off for a few minutes or go to the concession stand or restroom during some parts.

text: ... bright , intelligent , and humanly funny film .
translation: …明るく、知的で、人間味のある面白い映画。
back_translation: ...A bright, intelligent, and interesting movie with human warmth.

text: too bad kramer could n't make a guest appearance to liven things up .
translation: 残念ながら、クレイマーはゲスト出演して雰囲気を盛り上げることができなかった。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Kramer was unable to guest appear and enhance the atmosphere.

text: 300 years of russian history and culture compressed into an evanescent , seamless and sumptuous stream of consciousness .
translation: 300年のロシアの歴史と文化が、儚く、途切れることなく、贅沢な意識の流れに凝縮されている。
back_translation: Three hundred years of Russian history and culture are condensed into a fleeting, uninterrupted flow of luxurious consciousness.

text: the modern remake of dumas 's story is long on narrative and -lrb- too -rrb- short on action .
translation: ダマの物語の現代版リメイクは、ストーリーが長く、アクションが（あまりにも）短い。
back_translation: The modern remake of the story of Dama has a long storyline and (too) little action.

text: seagal is painfully foolish in trying to hold onto what 's left of his passe ' chopsocky glory .
translation: シーガルは、過去の栄光である「チョップソッキー」を手放さないようにする姿が痛々しいほど愚かです。
back_translation: The seagull's desperate clinging to its past glory of "chop socky" is painfully foolish.

text: the enjoyable undercover brother , a zany mix of saturday night live-style parody , '70s blaxploitation films and goofball action comedy gone wild , dishes out a ton of laughs that everyone can enjoy .
translation: 楽しませてくれる『アンダーカバー・ブラザー』は、サタデー・ナイト・ライブ風のパロディ、70年代のブラックスプロイテーション映画、そしてバカバカしいアクションコメディが融合した奇抜な作品で、誰もが楽しめるたくさんの笑いを提供しています。
back_translation: "Undercover Brother," which provides entertainment, is an outlandish work that fuses Saturday Night Live-style parody, 70s blaxploitation films, and absurd action comedy, delivering plenty of laughs that everyone can enjoy.

text: fantastic !
translation: 素晴らしい！
back_translation: Wonderful!

text: there 's not a spark of new inspiration in it , just more of the same , done with noticeably less energy and imagination .
translation: 新しいインスピレーションのかけらもなく、ただ同じことが、明らかにエネルギーと想像力を欠いて行われているだけです。
back_translation: There is not a single new spark of inspiration; it is merely the same thing done clearly lacking energy and imagination.

text: `` red dragon '' is entertaining .
translation: 「赤いドラゴン」は面白いです。
back_translation: "Red Dragon" is interesting.

text: hoffman waits too long to turn his movie in an unexpected direction , and even then his tone retains a genteel , prep-school quality that feels dusty and leatherbound .
translation: ホフマンは映画を予期しない方向に進めるのに長く待ち過ぎており、それでも彼のトーンは上品でプレップスクールのような質感を保ち、古びて革表紙のように感じます。
back_translation: Hoffman has waited too long to move the film in an unexpected direction, yet his tone remains elegant and has a prep school-like texture, feeling like an old leather cover.

text: secretary is just too original to be ignored .
translation: 秘書は無視できないほど独自です。
back_translation: The secretary is uniquely significant and cannot be ignored.

text: while cherish does n't completely survive its tonal transformation from dark comedy to suspense thriller , it 's got just enough charm and appealing character quirks to forgive that still serious problem .
translation: 「チェリッシュ」はダークコメディからサスペンススリラーへのトーンの変化を完全には乗り越えられませんが、それでも魅力的なキャラクターの癖と十分な魅力があり、その深刻な問題を許すことができます。
back_translation: "cherish" doesn't fully overcome the tonal shift from dark comedy to suspense thriller, but it still possesses compelling character quirks and enough charm to allow for its serious issues.

text: the lack of naturalness makes everything seem self-consciously poetic and forced ... it 's a pity that -lrb- nelson 's -rrb- achievement does n't match his ambition .
translation: 自然さの欠如が、すべてを自意識的に詩的で強制的に見せてしまっている... -lrb- ネルソンの -rrb- 業績が彼の野心に見合わないのは残念だ。
back_translation: The lack of naturalness makes everything appear self-consciously poetic and forced... -lrb- Nelson's -rrb- achievements sadly do not match his ambition.

text: graham greene 's novel of colonialism and empire is elevated by michael caine 's performance as a weary journalist in a changing world .
translation: グレアム・グリーンの植民地主義と帝国をテーマにした小説は、変化する世界で疲れたジャーナリストを演じるマイケル・ケインのパフォーマンスによって高められている。
back_translation: Graham Greene's novels exploring colonialism and empire are enhanced by Michael Caine's performance as a weary journalist in a changing world.

text: the movie is so resolutely cobbled together out of older movies that it even uses a totally unnecessary prologue , just because it seems obligatory .
translation: その映画は古い映画から非常に決然と寄せ集められているため、義務的なように見えるので、まったく必要のない序幕さえも使っています。
back_translation: The movie is so resolutely assembled from old films that it appears obligatory, even using completely unnecessary prologues.

text: my big fat greek wedding is not only the best date movie of the year , it 's also a -- dare i say it twice -- delightfully charming -- and totally american , i might add -- slice of comedic bliss .
translation: 私の大きなギリシャの結婚式は、今年の最高のデート映画であるだけでなく、もう一度言わせていただくと、魅力的であり、さらに言わせてもらうと、完全にアメリカ的なコメディの至福の一片です。
back_translation: My big fat Greek wedding is not only the best date movie of the year, but again, I must say, it is charming, and furthermore, it is a blissful piece of completely American comedy.

text: an off-beat and fanciful film about the human need for monsters to blame for all that is amiss in the world .
translation: 世界のすべての問題を責めるためのモンスターが必要だという人間の欲求についての、型破りで幻想的な映画。
back_translation: An unconventional and fantastical film about humanity's desire for a monster to blame for all of the world's problems.

text: this thing works on no level whatsoever for me .
translation: これは私には全く機能しません。
back_translation: This doesn't work for me at all.

text: a selection of scenes in search of a movie .
translation: 映画を探し求める場面のセレクション。
back_translation: Selection of scenes depicting the search for a movie.

text: one of the most gloriously unsubtle and adrenalized extreme shockers since the evil dead .
translation: 悪魔のいけにえ以来の、最も素晴らしく露骨でアドレナリンに満ちた衝撃作の一つ。
back_translation: One of the most remarkable, explicit, and adrenaline-fueled shockers since The Devil's Rejects.

text: we do get the distinct impression that this franchise is drawing to a close .
translation: このフランチャイズが終わりに近づいているという明確な印象を受けています。
back_translation: I have a clear impression that this franchise is approaching its end.

text: an unholy mess , driven by the pathetic idea that if you shoot something on crummy-looking videotape , it must be labelled ` hip ' , ` innovative ' and ` realistic ' .
translation: 不気味な混乱であり、ひどい見た目のビデオテープで何かを撮影すれば、それが「ヒップ」、「革新」、「リアル」とラベル付けされるという哀れな考えに駆動されている。
back_translation: It's a creepy chaos, driven by the pathetic idea that if you film something on a terrible-looking videotape, it will be labeled as "hip," "innovative," and "real."

text: in the end , the weight of water comes to resemble the kind of soft-core twaddle you 'd expect to see on showtime 's ` red shoe diaries . '
translation: 結局、水の重さは、ショータイムの「レッドシュー・ダイアリーズ」で見られそうなソフトコアのくだらないものに似てくる。
back_translation: In the end, the weight of water seems to resemble the silly, softcore content that can be seen in Showtime's "Red Shoe Diaries."

text: meticulously uncovers a trail of outrageous force and craven concealment .
translation: 徹底的に驚くべき暴力と卑劣な隠蔽の痕跡を明らかにする。
back_translation: It reveals the thoroughly astonishing traces of violence and despicable concealment.

text: even if the ring has a familiar ring , it 's still unusually crafty and intelligent for hollywood horror .
translation: たとえそのリングがなじみ深いものであっても、ハリウッドホラーにしては異常に巧妙で知的です。
back_translation: Even if the ring is familiar, it is unusually clever and intellectual for a Hollywood horror film.

text: time is a beautiful film to watch , an interesting and at times captivating take on loss and loneliness .
translation: 「タイム」は見るに値する美しい映画で、喪失と孤独についての興味深く、時には心を奪う視点を提供しています。
back_translation: "Time" is a beautiful film worth watching, offering an interesting and, at times, captivating perspective on loss and loneliness.

text: a moving and weighty depiction of one family 's attempts to heal after the death of a child .
translation: 子供の死後に癒やそうとする一つの家族の試みを描いた感動的で重厚な物語。
back_translation: A touching and profound story depicting a family's attempt to heal after the death of a child.

text: it 's replaced by some dramatic scenes that are jarring and deeply out of place in what could have -lrb- and probably should have -rrb- been a lighthearted comedy .
translation: それは、軽妙なコメディーになるべきだったかもしれない、そしておそらくそうであったであろう状況において、不協和音で深く場違いな劇的なシーンに置き換えられています。
back_translation: It may have been a light-hearted comedy, but it has been replaced by a deeply discordant and out-of-place dramatic scene in what is likely the situation.

text: even if you do n't understand what on earth is going on , this is a movie that will stimulate hours of post viewing discussion , if only to be reminded of who did what to whom and why .
translation: たとえ何が起こっているのか全く理解できなくても、これは視聴後に何時間も議論を刺激する映画です。誰が誰に何をして、なぜそれをしたのかを思い出すためだけでも。
back_translation: Even if you have no idea what is happening, this is a movie that sparks discussions for hours after watching. Just remembering who did what to whom and why they did it is enough.

text: ... watching it was painful .
translation: ...見るのはつらかった。
back_translation: ...it was painful to watch.

text: mostly honest , this somber picture reveals itself slowly , intelligently , artfully .
translation: 主に正直で、この厳粛な絵はゆっくりと、賢く、巧みに明らかにされる。
back_translation: Mainly honest, this solemn picture is revealed slowly, wisely, and skillfully.

text: the story line may be 127 years old , but el crimen del padre amaro ... could n't be more timely in its despairing vision of corruption within the catholic establishment .
translation: ストーリーは127年前のものであるが、『アマロ神父の犯罪』はカトリック教会の腐敗に対する絶望的なビジョンにおいて、これ以上タイムリーな作品はない。
back_translation: The story is 127 years old, but "The Crimes of Father Amaro" is a work that could not be more timely in its desperate vision of the corruption within the Catholic Church.

text: wait to see it then .
translation: それを見るのを待っていてください。
back_translation: Please wait to see that.

text: unless there are zoning ordinances to protect your community from the dullest science fiction , impostor is opening today at a theater near you .
translation: あなたのコミュニティを最も退屈なSFから守るためのゾーニング条例がない限り、インポスターが本日、あなたの近くの劇場で上映されます。
back_translation: Unless there are zoning regulations to protect your community from the most boring sci-fi, "Imposter" will be showing today at a theater near you.

text: does a good job of establishing a time and place , and of telling a fascinating character 's story .
translation: 時と場所を設定し、魅力的なキャラクターの物語を語るのが上手です。
back_translation: You are good at setting the time and place and telling stories of intriguing characters.

text: it 's supposed to be a romantic comedy - it suffers from too much norma rae and not enough pretty woman .
translation: ロマンティックコメディのはずなのに、ノーマ・レイが多すぎてプリティ・ウーマンが足りていない。
back_translation: It should be a romantic comedy, but there’s too much Norma Rae and not enough Pretty Woman.

text: tries to work in the same vein as the brilliance of animal house but instead comes closer to the failure of the third revenge of the nerds sequel .
translation: 動物ハウスの素晴らしさを目指そうとするが、代わりに「リベンジ・オブ・ザ・ナーズ」の三作目の失敗に近づいてしまう。
back_translation: They aim for the greatness of Animal House, but instead, they end up closer to the failure of the third installment of "Revenge of the Nerds."

text: for those who pride themselves on sophisticated , discerning taste , this might not seem like the proper cup of tea , however it is almost guaranteed that even the stuffiest cinema goers will laugh their \*\*\* off for an hour-and-a-half .
translation: 洗練された目の肥えた趣味を誇りに思う人々には、これは適切なお茶のカップには見えないかもしれませんが、最も硬派な映画鑑賞者でさえ、1時間半の間、笑い転げることがほぼ保証されています。
back_translation: For those who pride themselves on their refined and discerning tastes, this may not look like an appropriate teacup, but even the most hardcore movie watchers can almost guarantee to be rolling with laughter for an hour and a half.

text: a film with contemporary political resonance illustrated by a winning family story .
translation: 現代の政治的共鳴をもたらす、勝利の家族の物語で彩られた映画。
back_translation: A movie adorned with the story of a victorious family that brings about modern political resonance.

text: disney again ransacks its archives for a quick-buck sequel .
translation: ディズニーは再びアーカイブを漁り、手っ取り早い利益のための続編を作り出す。
back_translation: Disney rummages through its archives once again to create sequels for quick profits.

text: payami tries to raise some serious issues about iran 's electoral process , but the result is a film that 's about as subtle as a party political broadcast .
translation: パヤミはイランの選挙プロセスについての深刻な問題を提起しようとしますが、その結果は政党の政治放送と同じくらい微妙さが欠けた映画になっています。
back_translation: Payami attempts to raise serious issues about Iran's electoral process, but the result is a film that lacks the subtlety of political broadcasts from political parties.

text: one of the most incoherent features in recent memory .
translation: 最近の記憶の中で最も不条理な特徴の一つ。
back_translation: One of the most absurd characteristics in my recent memory.

text: a wry , affectionate delight .
translation: すこし皮肉を交えた、愛情あふれる喜び。
back_translation: A joyful affection tinged with a bit of irony.

text: brosnan gives a portrayal as solid and as perfect as his outstanding performance as bond in die another day .
translation: ブロスナンは、「ダイ・アナザー・デイ」におけるボンドとしての素晴らしい演技と同様に、堅実で完璧な描写を提供しています。
back_translation: Brosnan delivers a solid and perfect portrayal, just like his wonderful performance as Bond in "Die Another Day."

text: the problem with the mayhem in formula 51 is not that it 's offensive , but that it 's boring .
translation: フォーミュラ51の混乱の問題は、それが攻撃的だからではなく、退屈だからです。
back_translation: The problem with Formula 51's chaos is that it is not aggressive, but rather boring.

text: a three-hour cinema master class .
translation: 3時間の映画マスタークラス。
back_translation: 3-hour movie masterclass.

text: a quirky comedy set in newfoundland that cleverly captures the dry wit that 's so prevalent on the rock .
translation: ニューファンドランドを舞台にした風変わりなコメディで、岩場で非常に一般的なドライなウィットを巧みに捉えています。
back_translation: A quirky comedy set in Newfoundland that cleverly captures the very common dry wit found in rocky areas.

text: may not be a breakthrough in filmmaking , but it is unwavering and arresting .
translation: 映画制作において画期的とは言えないかもしれませんが、揺るぎなく心を引きつけるものです。
back_translation: It may not be groundbreaking in film production, but it undeniably captivates the heart.

text: caruso sometimes descends into sub-tarantino cuteness ... but for the most part he makes sure the salton sea works the way a good noir should , keeping it tight and nasty .
translation: カルーソは時々サブ・タランティーノ的なかわいらしさに陥ることもありますが、ほとんどの部分で彼は『サルトン・シー』が良いノワールのように機能することを確保し、緊張感と不快さを保っています。
back_translation: Caruso sometimes falls into a charmingly sub-Tarantino style, but for the most part, he ensures that "Sarlton Sea" functions like a good noir, maintaining tension and discomfort.

text: the rest of the film ... is dudsville .
translation: 映画の残りは…つまらない。
back_translation: The rest of the movie is... boring.

text: brutally honest and told with humor and poignancy , which makes its message resonate .
translation: 残酷に正直で、ユーモアと哀切を交えて語られており、そのメッセージが響きます。
back_translation: It is brutally honest, told with a mix of humor and pathos, and its message resonates.

text: ... a good film that must have baffled the folks in the marketing department .
translation: ... マーケティング部門の人々を困惑させたに違いない良い映画。
back_translation: ... It must have been a good movie that confused the people in the marketing department.

text: director uwe boll and writer robert dean klein fail to generate any interest in an unsympathetic hero caught up in an intricate plot that while cleverly worked out , can not overcome blah characters .
translation: 監督ウヴェ・ボルと脚本家ロバート・ディーン・クラインは、複雑なプロットに巻き込まれた非共感的なヒーローに対して興味を引くことに失敗している。巧妙に練り上げられているが、つまらないキャラクターには勝てない。
back_translation: Director Uwe Boll and screenwriter Robert Dean Klein fail to engage the audience with a non-empathetic hero caught up in a complex plot. While cleverly crafted, they cannot overcome the dull characters.

text: the metaphors are provocative , but too often , the viewer is left puzzled by the mechanics of the delivery .
translation: 比喩は挑発的ですが、視聴者はしばしばその表現方法について困惑させられます。
back_translation: Metaphors can be provocative, but viewers are often perplexed by the way they are expressed.

text: works better in the conception than it does in the execution ... winds up seeming just a little too clever .
translation: 構想段階ではより効果的だが、実行に移すと少し賢すぎる印象を与える。
back_translation: In the conceptual stage, it is more effective, but when put into action, it gives off an impression of being somewhat too clever.

text: wonderful fencing scenes and an exciting plot make this an eminently engrossing film .
translation: 見事なフェンシングシーンと刺激的なプロットが、これを非常に引き込まれる映画にしています。
back_translation: The stunning fencing scenes and the exciting plot make this a very captivating movie.

text: a bold -lrb- and lovely -rrb- experiment that will almost certainly bore most audiences into their own brightly colored dreams .
translation: 大胆で魅力的な実験で、ほとんどの観客を自分の鮮やかな夢の中に退屈させることはほぼ確実です。
back_translation: With bold and captivating experiments, it is almost certain to bore most of the audience into your vivid dreams.

text: a wonderfully warm human drama that remains vividly in memory long after viewing
translation: 観た後も記憶に鮮やかに残る、素晴らしく温かい人間ドラマ。
back_translation: A wonderfully warm human drama that vividly remains in memory even after watching.

text: if any of them list this ` credit ' on their resumes in the future , that 'll be much funnier than anything in the film ...
translation: もし彼らの誰かが将来この「クレジット」を履歴書に載せたら、それは映画のどんな場面よりもずっと面白いだろう。
back_translation: If any of them were to put this "credit" on their resume in the future, it would be much more interesting than any scene from a movie.

text: after you laugh once -lrb- maybe twice -rrb- , you will have completely forgotten the movie by the time you get back to your car in the parking lot .
translation: 一度笑った後（多分二度）、駐車場に戻るころにはその映画のことを完全に忘れてしまっているでしょう。
back_translation: After laughing once (perhaps twice), by the time you return to the parking lot, you will have completely forgotten about that movie.

text: the hanukkah spirit seems fried in pork .
translation: ハヌカの精神は豚肉で揚げられているようだ。
back_translation: The spirit of Hanukkah seems to be deep-fried in pork.

text: there are plenty of scenes in frida that do work , but rarely do they involve the title character herself .
translation: フリーダにはたくさんの効果的なシーンがありますが、タイトルキャラクター自身が関与しているのは稀です。
back_translation: There are many effective scenes in "Frieda," but it is rare for the title character herself to be involved.

text: it is scott 's convincing portrayal of roger the sad cad that really gives the film its oomph .
translation: スコットのロジャーという悲しい男の説得力のある描写が、本当に映画に勢いを与えている。
back_translation: The compelling portrayal of the sad man Roger from Scott truly gives the film momentum.

text: 4ever has the same sledgehammer appeal as pokemon videos , but it breathes more on the big screen and induces headaches more slowly .
translation: 4everはポケモン動画と同じくらい魅力的ですが、大画面で見るとより生き生きとしていて、頭痛を引き起こすのが遅いです。
back_translation: 4ever is as captivating as Pokémon videos, but when watched on a big screen, it feels more vivid and takes longer to cause a headache.

text: a chilling tale of one of the great crimes of 20th century france : the murder of two rich women by their servants in 1933 .
translation: 20世紀フランスの偉大な犯罪のひとつについてのぞっとするような物語：1933年に召使いによって2人の裕福な女性が殺害された事件。
back_translation: A chilling story about one of the great crimes of 20th-century France: the case in 1933 where two wealthy women were murdered by their servant.

text: despite all the closed-door hanky-panky , the film is essentially juiceless .
translation: すべての裏でのごたごたにもかかわらず、この映画は本質的に味気ない。
back_translation: Despite all the behind-the-scenes turmoil, this movie is essentially bland.

text: it 's one long bore .
translation: それは一長い退屈です。
back_translation: That's a long boredom.

text: if you are curious to see the darker side of what 's going on with young tv actors -lrb- dawson leery did what ?!? -rrb- , or see some interesting storytelling devices , you might want to check it out , but there 's nothing very attractive about this movie .
translation: もし若いテレビ俳優たちの暗い側面 -（ドーソン・リーズリーは何をしたの！？）- に興味があるなら、あるいは興味深いストーリーテリングの手法を見たいなら、チェックしてみると良いかもしれませんが、この映画にはあまり魅力的なところはありません。
back_translation: If you're interested in the dark sides of young TV actors - (What did Dawson Leery do!?), or if you want to see interesting storytelling techniques, it might be worth checking out, but this movie doesn't have much charm.

text: it has a dashing and resourceful hero ; a lisping , reptilian villain ; big fights ; big hair ; lavish period scenery ; and a story just complicated enough to let you bask in your own cleverness as you figure it out .
translation: 魅力的で切り抜けるヒーローがいて、ひそみを持つ爬虫類の悪役がいて、大きな戦いがあり、大きな髪型があり、贅沢な時代の風景があり、そして自分の賢さを楽しむのにちょうど良いくらい複雑なストーリーがあります。
back_translation: There is a charming and resourceful hero, a reptilian villain with a hidden agenda, grand battles, extravagant hairstyles, lavish landscapes of a luxurious era, and a story that is just complicated enough to enjoy my own cleverness.

text: none of this is very original , and it is n't particularly funny .
translation: これはあまりオリジナルではなく、特に面白くもありません。
back_translation: This is not very original and is especially not interesting.

text: ice age wo n't drop your jaw , but it will warm your heart , and i 'm giving it a strong thumbs up .
translation: アイスエイジは驚くほどではありませんが、心を温めてくれます。そして、私はこの作品に強いグッドサインを送ります。
back_translation: Ice Age may not be surprising, but it warms the heart. And I send a strong good sign to this work.

text: a tasty masala .
translation: おいしいマサラ。
back_translation: Delicious masala.

text: but it does have one saving grace .
translation: しかし、それには一つの救いがあります。
back_translation: However, there is one silver lining to that.

text: one ca n't deny its seriousness and quality .
translation: その真剣さと質を否定することはできません。
back_translation: I cannot deny the seriousness and quality of that.

text: piccoli gives a superb performance full of deep feeling .
translation: ピッコリは深い感情に満ちた素晴らしいパフォーマンスを披露します。
back_translation: Piccolo delivers a wonderful performance filled with deep emotions.

text: it 'll keep you wide awake and ... very tense .
translation: それはあなたを目を覚まし、非常に緊張させるでしょう。
back_translation: It will wake you up and make you very tense.

text: an empty , purposeless exercise .
translation: 無意味で目的のない行為。
back_translation: A meaningless and aimless act.

text: too bad .
translation: 残念です。
back_translation: That's unfortunate.

text: rich in shadowy metaphor and as sharp as a samurai sword , jiang wen 's devils on the doorstep is a wartime farce in the alternately comic and gut-wrenching style of joseph heller or kurt vonnegut .
translation: 影のある比喩に満ち、まるで侍の刀のように鋭い、ジャン・ウェンの『ドアステップの悪魔』は、ジョセフ・ヘラーやカート・ヴォネガットのような、時にコミカルで時に胸を締め付けられる戦時ファルスです。
back_translation: Filled with shadowy metaphors and as sharp as a samurai's sword, Jean Wen's "The Devil at the Doorstep" is a wartime farce that is at times comical and at times heart-wrenching, akin to the works of Joseph Heller and Kurt Vonnegut.

text: can be classified as one of those ` alternate reality ' movies ... except that it would have worked so much better dealing in only one reality .
translation: それは「オルタネートリアリティ」映画の一つとして分類されることができる…ただし、ただ一つの現実だけを扱っていた方がはるかに効果的だっただろう。
back_translation: It can be classified as one of the "alternate reality" films... however, it would have been much more effective if it had dealt with just one reality.

text: despite some strong performances , never rises above the level of a telanovela .
translation: いくつかの強いパフォーマンスがあるにもかかわらず、テレノベラのレベルを超えることはありません。
back_translation: Despite some strong performances, it never rises above the level of a telenovela.

text: painfully padded .
translation: 痛みを伴うパッドが入っている。
back_translation: It contains a pad that comes with pain.

text: the sum of all fears is remarkably fuddled about motives and context , which drains it of the dramatic substance that would shake us in our boots -lrb- or cinema seats -rrb- .
translation: 「すべての恐怖の総体は、動機や文脈について非常に混乱しており、そのため私たちを震え上がらせるはずの劇的な内容が欠けています。」
back_translation: "The totality of all fears is very confused about motives and context, and as a result, the dramatic content that should terrify us is lacking."

text: a diverse and astonishingly articulate cast of palestinian and israeli children .
translation: 多様で驚くほど口達者なパレスチナとイスラエルの子供たちのキャスト。
back_translation: A diverse and remarkably articulate cast of Palestinian and Israeli children.

text: highly recommended viewing for its courage , ideas , technical proficiency and great acting .
translation: その勇気、アイデア、技術的な熟練さ、素晴らしい演技のために、非常に推薦される視聴です。
back_translation: This is highly recommended viewing for its courage, ideas, technical skill, and outstanding performance.

text: none of this is meaningful or memorable , but frosting is n't , either , and you would n't turn down a big bowl of that , would you ?
translation: これらのどれも意味があるわけでも思い出深いわけでもないが、フロスティングもそうではない。そして、あなたはそれを大きなボウルで断ることはないでしょう？
back_translation: None of these are particularly meaningful or memorable, but neither is the frosting. And you wouldn't refuse it in a big bowl, would you?

text: a gripping documentary that reveals how deep the antagonism lies in war-torn jerusalem .
translation: 戦火に ravされたエルサレムにおける対立がどれほど深いかを明らかにする感動的なドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: An emotional documentary that reveals how deep the conflicts are in Jerusalem ravaged by war.

text: i had a dream that a smart comedy would come along to rescue me from a summer of teen-driven , toilet-humor codswallop , and its name was earnest .
translation: 私は、スマートなコメディが現れて、ティーンが主導する、トイレのユーモアのくだらない夏から私を救ってくれるという夢を見ました。その名前は「アーナスト」でした。
back_translation: I dreamed that a smart comedy emerged to save me from a silly summer of toilet humor led by teens. Its name was "Earnest."

text: a delightful surprise because despite all the backstage drama , this is a movie that tells stories that work -- is charming , is moving , is funny and looks professional .
translation: 舞台裏の drama にもかかわらず、これは物語がうまく機能する映画であり、魅力的で、感動的で、面白く、プロフェッショナルに見えるので、素晴らしい驚きです。
back_translation: Despite the drama behind the scenes, this is a film where the story functions well, is engaging, moving, interesting, and looks professional, making it a wonderful surprise.

text: for all the wit and hoopla , festival in cannes offers rare insight into the structure of relationships .
translation: すべての機知と騒ぎの中、カンヌのフェスティバルは、人間関係の構造に対する貴重な洞察を提供します。
back_translation: Amid all the wit and commotion, the Cannes Festival offers valuable insights into the structures of human relationships.

text: every joke is repeated at least -- annoying , is n't it ?
translation: すべてのジョークは少なくとも繰り返される -- うんざりするよね？
back_translation: All jokes are at least repeated -- isn't it frustrating?

text: ` anyone with a passion for cinema , and indeed sex , should see it as soon as possible . '
translation: 「映画と、そして確かにセックスに情熱を持っている人は、できるだけ早く見るべきです。」
back_translation: "Those who have a passion for movies and certainly for sex should see it as soon as possible."

text: a refreshing change from the usual whoopee-cushion effort aimed at the youth market .
translation: 若者市場をターゲットにした通常のウーピークッションの取り組みからの新鮮な変化。
back_translation: A fresh change from the usual whoopee cushion initiatives targeting the youth market.

text: ... an interesting slice of history .
translation: ...興味深い歴史の一片。
back_translation: ...an interesting piece of history.

text: for dance completists only .
translation: ダンスのコンプリート主義者のためだけに。
back_translation: Only for the dance completionists.

text: it has the air of a surprisingly juvenile lark , a pop-influenced prank whose charms are immediately apparent and wear thin with repetition .
translation: それは驚くほど幼稚ないたずらの雰囲気を持っており、その魅力はすぐに明らかになり、繰り返しによって薄れていきます。
back_translation: It has an incredibly childish prank-like atmosphere, and its charm becomes apparent right away, but it fades with repetition.

text: it 's uninteresting .
translation: それは面白くないです。
back_translation: That's not interesting.

text: bray is completely at sea ; with nothing but a savage garden music video on his resume , he has no clue about making a movie .
translation: ブレイは完全に無知であり、彼の履歴書にはサヴェージ・ガーデンのミュージックビデオしかなく、映画を作ることについては何の手がかりも持っていません。
back_translation: Brey is completely clueless, and his resume only includes the music video for Savage Garden, with no clues about making movies.

text: a tone poem of transgression .
translation: 逸脱のトーン詩。
back_translation: Ode to Deviance.

text: seemingly a vehicle to showcase the canadian 's inane ramblings , stealing harvard is a smorgasbord of soliloquies about nothing delivered by the former mr. drew barrymore .
translation: カナダ人の無意味な独り言を披露するための手段のように見える「ハーバードを盗む」は、元ドリュー・バリモア氏によって何もないことについての独白のバイキングです。
back_translation: "Stealing Harvard," which appears to be a means of showcasing the meaningless musings of a Canadian, is a monologue buffet about nothing by former Drew Barrymore.

text: confusion is one of my least favourite emotions , especially when i have to put up with 146 minutes of it .
translation: 混乱は私のあまり好きではない感情の一つです、特に146分もそれに耐えなければならないときは。
back_translation: Confusion is one of my least favorite feelings, especially when I have to endure it for 146 minutes.

text: road to perdition does display greatness , and it 's worth seeing .
translation: 「運命の道」は偉大さを示しており、見る価値があります。
back_translation: "The Path of Destiny" represents greatness and is worth seeing.

text: ultimately , sarah 's dedication to finding her husband seems more psychotic than romantic , and nothing in the movie makes a convincing case that one woman 's broken heart outweighs all the loss we witness .
translation: 最終的に、サラの夫を見つけるための献身は、ロマンチックというよりはむしろ精神的なものに見え、映画の中で一人の女性の失恋が私たちが目の当たりにするすべての喪失よりも重要であるという説得力のある理由は示されていません。
back_translation: Ultimately, the dedication to finding Sarah's husband appears to be more spiritual than romantic, and the film does not provide a compelling reason why one woman's heartbreak is more significant than all the losses we witness.

text: an intense and effective film about loneliness and the chilly anonymity of the environments where so many of us spend so much of our time .
translation: 孤独と、私たちが多くの時間を過ごす環境の冷たい匿名性についての強烈で効果的な映画。
back_translation: A powerful and effective movie about loneliness and the cold anonymity of the environment we spend much of our time in.

text: one of the worst movies of the year .
translation: 今年の最悪の映画の一つ。
back_translation: One of the worst movies of this year.

text: like a soft drink that 's been sitting open too long : it 's too much syrup and not enough fizz .
translation: 開けてから長時間置かれたソフトドリンクのようだ：シロップが多すぎて炭酸が足りない。
back_translation: It seems like a soft drink that has been left open for a long time: too much syrup and not enough carbonation.

text: too bad writer-director adam rifkin situates it all in a plot as musty as one of the golden eagle 's carpets .
translation: 残念ながら、脚本家兼監督のアダム・リフキンは、すべてをゴールデンイーグルのカーペットのような古臭いプロットに配置しています。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the writer and director Adam Rifkin has placed everything into a plot that is as outdated as a golden eagle's carpet.

text: it has more in common with a fireworks display than a movie , which normally is expected to have characters and a storyline .
translation: それは映画よりも花火の展示により似ており、映画は通常キャラクターとストーリーラインを持つことが期待されます。
back_translation: It is more similar to a firework display than a movie, as movies usually have characters and storylines.

text: a captivatingly quirky hybrid of character portrait , romantic comedy and beat-the-clock thriller .
translation: 魅力的で風変わりなキャラクターポートレート、ロマンティックコメディ、そして時間との戦いのスリラーが融合した作品。
back_translation: A work that blends attractive and quirky character portraits, romantic comedy, and a thriller about the battle against time.

text: manages to delight without much of a story .
translation: あまりストーリーがなくても楽しませることに成功している。
back_translation: It succeeds in being entertaining even with not much of a story.

text: ... an hour-and-a-half of inoffensive , unmemorable filler .
translation: ...1時間半の無害で印象に残らないフィラー。
back_translation: A 1.5-hour harmless and unmemorable filler.

text: may take its sweet time to get wherever it 's going , but if you have the patience for it , you wo n't feel like it 's wasted yours .
translation: 目的地に到達するまで時間がかかることもありますが、もしそれに対する忍耐があれば、無駄に感じることはないでしょう。
back_translation: It may take time to reach your destination, but if you have the patience for it, you won't feel it was in vain.

text: ultimately , the film never recovers from the clumsy cliché of the ugly american abroad , and the too-frosty exterior ms. paltrow employs to authenticate her british persona is another liability .
translation: 結局、映画は「海外の醜いアメリカ人」という不器用なクリシェから決して回復することはなく、パルトローさんが彼女のイギリス人の persona を認証するために使うあまりに冷たい外見もまた一つの負担です。
back_translation: Ultimately, the film never recovers from the clumsy cliché of "ugly Americans abroad," and the overly cold appearance that Ms. Paltrow uses to authenticate her British persona is another burden.

text: in the book-on-tape market , the film of `` the kid stays in the picture '' would be an abridged edition
translation: オーディオブック市場では、「キッド・ステイ・イン・ザ・ピクチャー」のフィルムは要約版にあたります。
back_translation: In the audiobook market, the film "Kid Stay in the Picture" corresponds to a condensed version.

text: it is bad , but certainly not without merit as entertainment .
translation: それは悪いが、確かに娯楽としての価値はある。
back_translation: That's bad, but it certainly has entertainment value.

text: high crimes is a cinematic misdemeanor , a routine crime thriller remarkable only for its lack of logic and misuse of two fine actors , morgan freeman and ashley judd .
translation: ハイ・クライムズは映画的軽犯罪であり、論理の欠如と2人の優れた俳優、モーガン・フリーマンとアシュリー・ジャッドの誤用によって際立つ平凡な犯罪スリラーです。
back_translation: High Crimes is a cinematic petty crime that stands out as a mediocre crime thriller due to its lack of logic and the misuse of two great actors, Morgan Freeman and Ashley Judd.

text: the project 's filmmakers forgot to include anything even halfway scary as they poorly rejigger fatal attraction into a high school setting .
