translation: プロジェクトの映画製作者は、致命的な魅力を高校の設定にうまく調整することに失敗し、半分でも恐ろしいものを含めることを忘れてしまいました。
back_translation: The filmmakers of the project failed to effectively adjust the deadly charm to a high school setting and forgot to include even half of the terrifying elements.

text: a high-spirited buddy movie about the reunion of berlin anarchists who face arrest 15 years after their crime .
translation: ベルリンのアナーキストたちが、彼らの犯罪から15年後に逮捕の危機に直面する再会を描いた、ハイスピリットなバディムービー。
back_translation: A high-spirited buddy movie depicting the reunion of anarchists in Berlin facing the threat of arrest 15 years after their crimes.

text: ... one of the most entertaining monster movies in ages ...
translation: ... ここ数年で最も楽しませてくれるモンスタームービーの一つ ...
back_translation: ... one of the most entertaining monster movies in recent years ...

text: an infinitely wittier version of the home alone formula .
translation: 「ホームアローン」の公式の無限に機知に富んだバージョン。
back_translation: The official infinitely clever version of "Home Alone."

text: devoid of any of the qualities that made the first film so special .
translation: 最初の映画を特別なものにしたすべての特質を欠いている。
back_translation: It lacks all the qualities that made the first movie special.

text: succeeds where its recent predecessor miserably fails because it demands that you suffer the dreadfulness of war from both sides .
translation: 最近の先代が惨めに失敗したところで成功するのは、戦争の恐ろしさを両側から味わうことを求めるからです。
back_translation: The recent predecessor succeeded in a place where they miserably failed because they seek to experience the horrors of war from both sides.

text: fontaine masterfully creates a portrait of two strong men in conflict , inextricably entwined through family history , each seeing himself in the other , neither liking what he sees .
translation: フォンテーヌは、家族の歴史によって不可分に結びついた二人の強い男の対立の肖像を見事に描き出しており、互いに相手の中に自分自身を見つけながらも、その姿を好んでいない。
back_translation: Fontaine brilliantly portrays the conflict between two strong men inextricably linked by their family history, who, while finding themselves in each other, do not like the reflection they see.

text: everyone 's insecure in lovely and amazing , a poignant and wryly amusing film about mothers , daughters and their relationships .
translation: みんなが不安を抱える素敵で驚くべき映画、母親と娘、そして彼女たちの関係についての感動的で皮肉に満ちた作品。
back_translation: A wonderful and astonishing movie that many carry anxiety about, a touching and ironic work about mothers and daughters, and their relationships.

text: seemingly disgusted with the lazy material and the finished product 's unshapely look , director fisher stevens inexplicably dips key moments from the film in waking life water colors .
translation: 怠惰な素材と完成した作品の無骨な見た目に不快感を覚えたようなフィッシャー・スティーブンズ監督は、不可解にも映画の重要な瞬間を『ウェイキング・ライフ』の水彩画で表現しています。
back_translation: Director Fisher Stevens seems to feel discomfort with the lazy material and the rough appearance of the completed work, yet inexplicably expresses the film's important moments through watercolor paintings reminiscent of "Waking Life."

text: it 's also curious to note that this film , like the similarly ill-timed antitrust , is easily as bad at a fraction the budget .
translation: この映画は、同様に不適切なタイミングの独占禁止法とは異なり、予算のごく一部で同じくらいひどいことを指摘するのも興味深い。
back_translation: It is also interesting to point out that, unlike antitrust laws at similarly inappropriate times, this movie highlights equally terrible things with just a small portion of the budget.

text: do n't let the subtitles fool you ; the movie only proves that hollywood no longer has a monopoly on mindless action .
translation: 字幕に惑わされないでください；この映画は、ハリウッドがもはや無思考のアクションに独占的でないことを証明するだけです。
back_translation: Do not be misled by the subtitles; this movie simply proves that Hollywood is no longer exclusively about thoughtless action.

text: the only type of lives this glossy comedy-drama resembles are ones in formulaic mainstream movies .
translation: この艶やかなコメディドラマが似ているのは、型にはまった mainstream 映画の中の人生だけです。
back_translation: The only thing this glamorous comedy-drama resembles is life within the mold of mainstream films.

text: fulford-wierzbicki ... deftly captures the wise-beyond-her-years teen .
translation: フルフォード・ヴィエルツビッキは、年齢を超えた知恵を持つティーンを巧みに描写しています。
back_translation: Fulford Vielsbyki skillfully portrays a teen with wisdom beyond their years.

text: you see the movie and you think , zzzzzzzzz .
translation: 映画を見て、あなたは思う、zzzzzzzzzz。
back_translation: After watching the movie, you think, zzzzzzzzzz.

text: much of this slick and sprightly cgi feature is sufficiently funny to amuse even the most resolutely unreligious parents who escort their little ones to megaplex screenings .
translation: この洗練された軽快なCGI作品の多くは、メガプレックスの上映に子供を連れて行く最も堅固に無宗教な親たちさえも楽しませるのに十分なほど面白い。
back_translation: Many of these sophisticated and lively CGI works are entertaining enough to captivate even the most staunchly non-religious parents who take their children to the megaplex.

text: a tightly directed , highly professional film that 's old-fashioned in all the best possible ways .
translation: すべての最良の方法で古き良きスタイルの、厳密に指揮された非常にプロフェッショナルな映画です。
back_translation: A very professional film that is strictly directed in all the best ways, in the good old style.

text: confessions is without a doubt a memorable directorial debut from king hunk .
translation: 「告白」は、間違いなくキングハンクの印象的な監督デビュー作です。
back_translation: "Confession" is undoubtedly King Hank's impressive directorial debut.

text: best enjoyed as a work of fiction inspired by real-life events .
translation: 実際の事件に触発されたフィクションとして最も楽しめます。
back_translation: It can be most enjoyed as a work of fiction inspired by real events.

text: this is a heartfelt story ... it just is n't a very involving one .
translation: これは心に響く物語ですが、非常に引き込まれるものではありません。
back_translation: This is a touching story, but it is not very captivating.

text: schnitzler does a fine job contrasting the sleekness of the film 's present with the playful paranoia of the film 's past . '
translation: シュニッツラーは、映画の現在のスリックさと映画の過去の遊び心あるパラノイアを対比させる素晴らしい仕事をしています。
back_translation: Schnitzler does a wonderful job of contrasting the current slickness of cinema with the playful paranoia of its past.

text: george clooney , in his first directorial effort , presents this utterly ridiculous shaggy dog story as one of the most creative , energetic and original comedies to hit the screen in years .
translation: ジョージ・クルーニーは、彼の初めての監督作品で、この全くばかげたシャギードッグストーリーを、ここ数年でスクリーンに登場した最も創造的でエネルギッシュかつオリジナルなコメディの一つとして紹介しています。
back_translation: George Clooney presents his directorial debut with this utterly ridiculous shaggy dog story, introducing it as one of the most creative, energetic, and original comedies to hit the screen in recent years.

text: ` martin lawrence live ' is so self-pitying , i almost expected there to be a collection taken for the comedian at the end of the show .
translation: 「マーティン・ローレンス・ライブ」は非常に自己憐憫的で、番組の最後にコメディアンのために寄付が集められるかと思いました。
back_translation: "Martin Lawrence Live" was very self-pitying, and I thought donations would be collected for the comedian at the end of the show.

text: the screenplay does too much meandering , norton has to recite bland police procedural details , fiennes wanders around in an attempt to seem weird and distanced , hopkins looks like a drag queen .
translation: 脚本はあまりにも無駄に長引いており、ノートンはつまらない警察手続きの詳細を朗読しなければならず、ファインズは奇妙で距離を置くように見せるためにうろついており、ホプキンスはドラッグクイーンのように見える。
back_translation: The script is unnecessarily long, with Norton having to read out boring details of police procedures, Fiennes wandering around to appear strange and distant, and Hopkins looking like a drag queen.

text: if oscar had a category called best bad film you thought was going to be really awful but was n't , guys would probably be duking it out with the queen of the damned for the honor .
translation: もしオスカーに「最も悪い映画」というカテゴリーがあったとしたら、最悪だと思っていたけどそうではなかった映画を対象にすると、男たちはおそらく「呪われた女王」とその名誉のために争っていることでしょう。
back_translation: If there were a category for "Worst Movie" at the Oscars, the film that many thought was the worst but actually wasn't would likely be contending for its honor among men, specifically "The Cursed Queen."

text: anyone else who may , for whatever reason , be thinking about going to see this movie is hereby given fair warning .
translation: この映画を見に行こうとしている他の誰かには、理由はどうであれ、ここに公正な警告を与えます。
back_translation: I give a fair warning here to anyone else who is thinking of going to see this movie, for whatever reason.

text: i could n't help but feel the wasted potential of this slapstick comedy .
translation: このスラップスティックコメディの無駄になった可能性を感じずにはいられなかった。
back_translation: I couldn't help but feel the wasted potential of this slapstick comedy.

text: the latest vapid actor 's exercise to appropriate the structure of arthur schnitzler 's reigen .
translation: 最新の無内容な俳優のアーサー・シュニッツラーの『レイゲン』の構造を取り入れるための試み。
back_translation: An attempt to incorporate the structure of Arthur Schnitzler's "Reigen," an example of the latest meaningless actors.

text: majidi 's direction has never been smoother or more confident .
translation: マジディの演出はこれまでになく滑らかで自信に満ちています。
back_translation: Majidi's direction is smoother and more confident than ever before.

text: there 's only one way to kill michael myers for good : stop buying tickets to these movies .
translation: マイケル・マイヤーズを完全に殺す方法は一つだけ：これらの映画のチケットを買うのをやめることだ。
back_translation: There is only one way to completely kill Michael Myers: to stop buying tickets to these movies.

text: fear permeates the whole of stortelling , todd solondz ' oftentimes funny , yet ultimately cowardly autocritique .
translation: 恐怖はストーリーテリング全体に浸透しており、トッド・ソロンズのしばしば面白いが最終的には臆病な自己批評です。
back_translation: Fear permeates the entire storytelling, as seen in Todd Solondz's often humorous yet ultimately cowardly self-critique.

text: falsehoods pile up , undermining the movie 's reality and stifling its creator 's comic voice .
translation: 虚偽が積み重なり、映画の現実を損ない、制作者のコメディの声を抑えている。
back_translation: Lies are piling up, undermining the reality of the film and stifling the creators' comedic voice.

text: bland but harmless .
translation: bland but harmless .
back_translation: bland but harmless.

text: like leafing through an album of photos accompanied by the sketchiest of captions .
translation: まるでざっくりとしたキャプションが添えられた写真アルバムをめくるような。
back_translation: It's like flipping through a photo album with rough captions added.

text: judd 's characters ought to pick up the durable best seller smart women , foolish choices for advice .
translation: ジャッドのキャラクターは、アドバイスのために耐久性のあるベストセラー「スマートウィメン、フールッシュチョイス」を手に取るべきだ。
back_translation: Judd's character should pick up the durable bestseller "Smart Women, Foolish Choices" for advice.

text: the criticism never rises above easy , cynical potshots at morally bankrupt characters ...
translation: 批判は、道徳的に破綻したキャラクターに対する簡単で皮肉めいた攻撃にしかならない。
back_translation: Criticism becomes nothing more than a simplistic and sarcastic attack on morally bankrupt characters.

text: adolescents will be adequately served by the movie 's sophomoric blend of shenanigans and slapstick , although the more lascivious-minded might be disappointed in the relative modesty of a movie that sports a ` topless tutorial service . '
translation: 青春期の若者は、映画の幼稚な悪ふざけとスラップスティックのブレンドで十分に楽しめるでしょうが、よりいやらしい考えを持つ人々は、「トップレスのチュートリアルサービス」を掲げる映画の相対的な控えめさに失望するかもしれません。
back_translation: Adolescents will likely enjoy the blend of juvenile antics and slapstick humor in the film, but those with more lascivious thoughts might be disappointed by the relatively restrained nature of a movie that boasts "topless tutorial services."

text: about the best thing you could say about narc is that it 's a rock-solid little genre picture .
translation: ナークについての最も良いことは、それが「堅実な小さなジャンル作品」であるということです。
back_translation: The best thing about Nark is that it is a "solid little genre work."

text: an unbelievably stupid film , though occasionally fun enough to make you forget its absurdity .
translation: 信じられないほど愚かな映画ですが、時々その不条理を忘れさせるほど楽しい瞬間もあります。
back_translation: It's an incredibly stupid movie, but there are moments that are so enjoyable that they occasionally make you forget its absurdity.

text: star\/producer salma hayek and director julie taymor have infused frida with a visual style unique and inherent to the titular character 's paintings and in the process created a masterful work of art of their own .
translation: スター／プロデューサーのサルマ・ハエックと監督のジュリー・テイモアは、『フリーダ』にタイトルキャラクターの絵画に固有の視覚スタイルを注入し、その過程で自らの傑作を創り出しました。
back_translation: Star/producer Salma Hayek and director Julie Taymor infused the title character's paintings with a unique visual style in "Frida," creating their own masterpiece in the process.

text: what -lrb- denis -rrb- accomplishes in his chilling , unnerving film is a double portrait of two young women whose lives were as claustrophic , suffocating and chilly as the attics to which they were inevitably consigned .
translation: デニスが彼の不気味で不安を呼び起こす映画で達成したことは、必然的に閉じ込められた屋根裏部屋のように、彼女たちの人生が閉塞的で圧迫感があり、冷たさを帯びた二人の若い女性の二重肖像です。
back_translation: What Dennis achieved in his eerie and anxiety-inducing film is a dual portrait of two young women whose lives are claustrophobic and oppressive, cold like an inevitably trapped attic.

text: to build a feel-good fantasy around a vain dictator-madman is off-putting , to say the least , not to mention inappropriate and wildly undeserved .
translation: 自己中心的な独裁者気質の狂人を取り巻く心地よいファンタジーを構築することは、少なくとも不快であり、言うまでもなく不適切であり、まったくもって不当です。
back_translation: Building a comforting fantasy around a self-centered, dictatorial madman is at the very least uncomfortable, not to mention inappropriate and entirely unjust.

text: a generic bloodbath that often becomes laughably unbearable when it is n't merely offensive .
translation: 単なる攻撃的でないときに、しばしば笑いを誘うほど耐え難い一般的な血の洗礼。
back_translation: A general initiation by blood that is often unbearable enough to provoke laughter when it is merely non-aggressive.

text: judith and zaza 's extended bedroom sequence ... is so intimate and sensual and funny and psychologically self-revealing that it makes most of what passes for sex in the movies look like cheap hysterics .
translation: ジュディスとザザの長い寝室のシーンは、非常に親密で sensual で面白く、心理的に自己開示的なので、映画で見られる大部分のセックスは安っぽいヒステリーのように見えてしまいます。
back_translation: The long bedroom scene between Judith and Zaza is very intimate, sensual, and interesting, and psychologically self-disclosing, making much of the sex seen in the film appear like cheap hysteria.

text: with an unusual protagonist -lrb- a kilt-wearing jackson -rrb- and subject matter , the improbable `` formula 51 '' is somewhat entertaining , but it could have been much stronger .
translation: 珍しい主人公（キルトを着たジャクソン）とテーマを持つ「フォーミュラ51」は多少楽しめる作品だが、もっと強いものになった可能性があった。
back_translation: "Formula 51," featuring an unusual protagonist (Jackson in a kilt) and a theme, is somewhat enjoyable, but it had the potential to be something stronger.

text: this is the kind of movie during which you want to bang your head on the seat in front of you , at its cluelessness , at its idiocy , at its utterly misplaced earnestness .
translation: これは、無知さ、愚かさ、まったく不適切な真剣さに対して、前の席に頭を打ち付けたくなるような映画です。
back_translation: This is a movie that makes you want to bang your head against the front seat due to ignorance, foolishness, and completely inappropriate seriousness.

text: its appeal will probably limited to lds church members and undemanding armchair tourists .
translation: その魅力は、おそらくLDS教会のメンバーや要求が少ない観光客に限られるでしょう。
back_translation: Its appeal is likely limited to members of the LDS Church and tourists with few demands.

text: the latest adam sandler assault and possibly the worst film of the year .
translation: 最新のアダム・サンドラーの作品で、おそらく今年最悪の映画。
back_translation: The latest Adam Sandler film, probably the worst movie of the year.

text: the determination of pinochet 's victims to seek justice , and their often heartbreaking testimony , spoken directly into director patricio guzman 's camera , pack a powerful emotional wallop .
translation: ピノチェトの犠牲者たちの正義を求める決意と、彼らのしばしば心を打つ証言は、監督パトリシオ・グスマンのカメラに直接語りかけられ、強力な感情的影響を与えています。
back_translation: The determination to seek justice for the victims of Pinochet and their often moving testimonies speak directly to the camera of director Patricio Guzmán, leaving a powerful emotional impact.

text: a beautiful , timeless and universal tale of heated passions -- jealousy , betrayal , forgiveness and murder .
translation: 美しく、時を超え、普遍的な物語である、熱い情熱—嫉妬、裏切り、許し、そして殺人。
back_translation: A beautiful, timeless, universal story of hot passion—jealousy, betrayal, forgiveness, and murder.

text: hill looks to be going through the motions , beginning with the pale script .
translation: 丘は薄い脚本から始まり、単調に進んでいるように見える。
back_translation: The hill starts with a thin script and seems to progress monotonously.

text: who needs mind-bending drugs when they can see this , the final part of the ` qatsi ' trilogy , directed by godfrey reggio , with music by philip glass ?
translation: 誰が心を曲げるような薬を必要とするのか、神のようなレジオが監督し、フィリップ・グラスが音楽を担当した『クアッツィ』三部作の最終部を見れば良いのに。
back_translation: One should look at the final part of the "Quazzi" trilogy, supervised by a god-like Reggio and with music composed by Philip Glass, to see who needs a drug that bends the mind.

text: disjointed parody .
translation: ばらばらなパロディ
back_translation: Scattered Parody

text: typical animé , with cheapo animation -lrb- like saturday morning tv in the '60s -rrb- , a complex sword-and-sorcery plot and characters who all have big round eyes and japanese names .
translation: 典型的なアニメで、安っぽいアニメーション（1960年代の土曜の朝のテレビのような）、複雑な剣と魔法のプロット、そしてみんな大きな丸い目と日本の名前を持つキャラクターがいます。
back_translation: It's a typical anime with cheap animation (like Saturday morning TV from the 1960s), a complex sword and magic plot, and characters that all have large round eyes and Japanese names.

text: you ca n't believe anyone would really buy this stuff .
translation: 誰もこんなものを本当に買うとは信じられない。
back_translation: I can't believe anyone would actually buy something like this.

text: the plot is nothing but boilerplate clichés from start to finish , and the script assumes that not only would subtlety be lost on the target audience , but that it 's also too stupid to realize that they 've already seen this exact same movie a hundred times
translation: プロットは始まりから終わりまで何もかもが型通りのクリシェであり、脚本はターゲットオーディエンスが微妙さを理解できないだけでなく、すでにこの映画を百回も見たことに気づくほど愚かだと仮定している。
back_translation: The plot is nothing but a formulaic cliché from beginning to end, and the screenplay assumes that the target audience is not only incapable of understanding subtleties but is also foolish enough to realize that they have already seen this movie a hundred times.

text: twenty years later , e.t. is still a cinematic touchstone .
translation: 20年後、E.T.は依然として映画のタッチストーンです。
back_translation: Twenty years later, E.T. is still a touchstone of cinema.

text: angela gheorghiu as famous prima donna floria tosca , roberto alagna as her lover mario cavaradossi , and ruggero as the villainous , lecherous police chief scarpia , all sing beautifully and act adequately .
translation: アンジェラ・ゲオルギウが有名なプリマ・ドンナ、フロリア・トスカを演じ、ロベルト・アラーニャが彼女の愛人マリオ・カヴァラドッシを演じ、ルッジェーロが悪役で貪欲な警察署長スカルピアを演じ、皆美しく歌い、適切に演技をします。
back_translation: Angela Gheorghiu plays the famous prima donna, Floria Tosca, Roberto Alagna plays her lover Mario Cavaradossi, and Ruggero is the villainous and greedy police chief Scarpia. Everyone sings beautifully and performs appropriately.

text: gondry 's direction is adequate ... but what gives human nature its unique feel is kaufman 's script .
translation: ゴンドリーの演出は適切ですが、人間の本性に独特の感覚を与えるのはカウフマンの脚本です。
back_translation: Gondry's direction is appropriate, but it is Kaufman's script that gives a unique sense of human nature.

text: though this rude and crude film does deliver a few gut-busting laughs , its digs at modern society are all things we 've seen before .
translation: この失礼で下品な映画は、確かにいくつかの腹をかかえて笑うようなシーンを提供しますが、現代社会への批判はすべて以前に見たことのあるものです。
back_translation: This rude and vulgar movie certainly offers a few laugh-out-loud moments, but its critiques of modern society are all things we've seen before.

text: one of the most exciting action films to come out of china in recent years .
translation: 近年中国から出てきた最もエキサイティングなアクション映画の一つ。
back_translation: One of the most exciting action movies to come out of China in recent years.

text: glizty but formulaic and silly ... cagney 's ` top of the world ' has been replaced by the bottom of the barrel .
translation: 派手だけど型にはまっていて愚かだ… キャグニーの「世界の頂点」は、今や「バレルの底」に置き換えられた。
back_translation: It's flashy but conventional and foolish... Cagney's "top of the world" has now been replaced by "the bottom of the barrel."

text: makes a joke out of car chases for an hour and then gives us half an hour of car chases .
translation: 1時間にわたってカーチェイスをジョークにして、その後30分間カーチェイスを見せてくれる。
back_translation: They joke about the car chase for an hour, and then show the car chase for the next 30 minutes.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- soulless , stupid sequel ...
translation: -（a） 魂のない、愚かな続編...
back_translation: - (a) A soulless, foolish sequel...

text: with a large cast representing a broad cross-section , tavernier 's film bounds along with the rat-a-tat energy of `` his girl friday , '' maintaining a light touch while tackling serious themes .
translation: 大規模なキャストが幅広い層を代表しているタヴァニエの映画は、「彼女の金曜日」のようなラタタッというエネルギーで進行し、深刻なテーマに取り組みながらも軽やかなタッチを維持しています。
back_translation: Tavernier's films, featuring a large cast that represents a wide range of people, progress with a lively energy similar to "Her Friday," all while tackling serious themes but maintaining a light touch.

text: unpretentious , charming , quirky , original
translation: 控えめで魅力的な、風変わりな、独創的な
back_translation: Modest and charming, quirky, and original.

text: humorless , self-conscious art drivel , made without a glimmer of intelligence or invention .
translation: ユーモアのない、自意識過剰なアートのつまらない作品で、知性や創意のかけらもなく作られた。
back_translation: A boring work of art lacking humor and filled with self-importance, created without a shred of intelligence or creativity.

text: told just proficiently enough to trounce its overly comfortable trappings .
translation: その余りにも快適な枠を打破するために、十分に巧みに語られました。
back_translation: In order to break out of that overly comfortable framework, it was articulated quite skillfully.

text: if you have n't seen the film lately , you may be surprised at the variety of tones in spielberg 's work .
translation: 最近その映画を見ていない場合、スピルバーグの作品におけるトーンの多様性に驚くかもしれません。
back_translation: If you haven't seen that movie recently, you might be surprised by the diversity of tones in Spielberg's works.

text: any movie that makes hard work seem heroic deserves a look .
translation: 努力を英雄的に見せる映画は、見る価値がある。
back_translation: Movies that depict effort in a heroic manner are worth watching.

text: it 's a thin notion , repetitively stretched out to feature length , awash in self-consciously flashy camera effects , droning house music and flat , flat dialogue .
translation: それは薄っぺらな概念であり、繰り返し引き伸ばされて特徴的な長さになり、自意識過剰な華やかなカメラ効果、鈍いハウスミュージック、平坦で平坦な対話に溢れています。
back_translation: It is a superficial concept, repeatedly stretched to a characteristic length, filled with self-indulgent glamorous camera effects, dull house music, and flat, monotonous dialogues.

text: a dull , dumb and derivative horror film .
translation: 退屈で、つまらなく、類似したホラー映画。
back_translation: Boring, uninteresting, and similar horror films.

text: how about surprising us by trying something new ?
translation: 新しいことに挑戦して、私たちを驚かせてみませんか？
back_translation: How about trying something new and surprising us?

text: an energetic , violent movie with a momentum that never lets up .
translation: エネルギッシュで暴力的な映画で、決して momentum を失わない。
back_translation: An energetic and violent movie that never loses momentum.

text: even by the intentionally low standards of frat-boy humor , sorority boys is a bowser .
translation: フラットボーイのユーモアの意図的に低い基準でさえ、ソロリティボーイはひどい作品です。
back_translation: Even the intentionally low standards of Flat Boy's humor, Sorority Boy is a terrible work.

text: an affable but undernourished romantic comedy that fails to match the freshness of the actress-producer and writer 's previous collaboration , miss congeniality .
translation: 愛想は良いが栄養不足のロマンティックコメディで、女優・プロデューサー兼作家の以前のコラボレーション『ミス・コンジェニアリティ』の新鮮さには及んでいない。
back_translation: It's a charming but nutritionally lacking romantic comedy that doesn't match the freshness of the previous collaboration between actress, producer, and writer in "Miss Congeniality."

text: it really is a shame that more wo n't get an opportunity to embrace small , sweet ` evelyn . '
translation: 本当に残念なのは、もっと多くの人が小さくて可愛い『エヴリン』を受け入れる機会を得られないことです。
back_translation: What is truly unfortunate is that more people do not have the opportunity to embrace the small and cute 'Evelyn'.

text: caviezel embodies the transformation of his character completely .
translation: キャヴィーゼルは彼のキャラクターの変貌を完全に体現している。
back_translation: Caviezel completely embodies the transformation of his character.

text: i found it slow , predictable and not very amusing .
translation: 私はそれが遅く、予測可能であまり面白くないと感じました。
back_translation: I felt that it was slow, predictable, and not very interesting.

text: see it .
translation: 見る。
back_translation: To see.

text: as played by ryan gosling , danny is a frighteningly fascinating contradiction .
translation: ライアン・ゴズリングが演じるダニーは、恐ろしいほど魅力的な矛盾です。
back_translation: Danny, played by Ryan Gosling, is a terrifyingly charming contradiction.

text: the movie spends more time with schneider than with newcomer mcadams , even though her performance is more interesting -lrb- and funnier -rrb- than his .
translation: その映画は新しく登場したマクアダムスよりもシュナイダーと多くの時間を費やしているが、彼女の演技の方が彼のよりも魅力的で（面白い）、だ。
back_translation: The movie spends more time with Schneider than the newly introduced McAdams, but her performance is more captivating (interesting) than his.

text: oh , and more entertaining , too .
translation: ああ、そしてもっと面白いです。
back_translation: Ah, and it's even more interesting.

text: the genius of the work speaks volumes , offering up a hallucinatory dreamscape that frustrates and captivates .
translation: その作品の才能は多くを物語り、幻影の夢の景色を提供し、困惑させつつも魅了します。
back_translation: The talent of that work tells a lot, providing a dreamlike landscape of illusion that fascinates while also bewildering.

text: austin powers for the most part is extremely funny , the first part making up for any flaws that come later .
translation: オースティン・パワーズはほとんどの場合非常に面白く、第一部が後の欠点を補っています。
back_translation: Austin Powers is very funny most of the time, and the first part makes up for the later shortcomings.

text: a worthy addition to the cinematic canon , which , at last count , numbered 52 different versions .
translation: 映画のカノンにふさわしい追加であり、最後のカウントでは52の異なるバージョンがある。
back_translation: It is a suitable addition to the film canon, and there are 52 different versions in the final count.

text: if you like blood , guts and crazy beasts stalking men with guns though ... you will likely enjoy this monster .
translation: 血や内臓、銃を持った人を追う狂った獣が好きなら、この怪物を楽しむことができるでしょう。
back_translation: If you enjoy crazy beasts that chase people with blood, guts, and guns, you will likely enjoy this monster.

text: it is a popcorn film , not a must-own , or even a must-see .
translation: これはポップコーン映画であり、必見でも必携でもありません。
back_translation: This is a popcorn movie, and it's neither a must-see nor a must-have.

text: how inept is serving sara ?
translation: サラへのサービスはどれほど無能ですか？
back_translation: How incompetent is the service to Sara?

text: a thoughtful , reverent portrait of what is essentially a subculture , with its own rules regarding love and family , governance and hierarchy .
translation: 思慮深く、敬意を表したポートレートは、本質的に独自の愛と家族、ガバナンスと階層に関するルールを持つサブカルチャーを描いています。
back_translation: The thoughtful and respectful portrait depicts a subculture that inherently possesses its own rules about love and family, governance, and hierarchy.

text: -lrb- caine -rrb- proves once again he has n't lost his touch , bringing off a superb performance in an admittedly middling film .
translation: （ケイン）は再び彼の才能が失われていないことを証明し、認められた平凡な映画の中で素晴らしいパフォーマンスを披露しました。
back_translation: (Kane) proved once again that his talent had not diminished and delivered a wonderful performance in a well-recognized but ordinary movie.

text: a vibrant whirlwind of love , family and all that goes with it , my big fat greek wedding is a non-stop funny feast of warmth , colour and cringe .
translation: 愛、家族、そしてそれに伴うすべてが詰まった活気あふれる旋風である「大きな太ったギリシャの結婚式」は、温かさ、色彩、そしてちょっとした気まずさに満ちた止まることのない面白い饗宴です。
back_translation: "Big Fat Greek Wedding" is a vibrant whirlwind filled with love, family, and everything that comes with it, offering an endlessly amusing feast rich in warmth, color, and a touch of awkwardness.

text: the film , like jimmy 's routines , could use a few good laughs .
translation: その映画は、ジミーのルーチンのように、いくつかの良い笑いが必要かもしれません。
back_translation: That movie might need some good laughs, just like Jimmy's routine.

text: like a skillful fisher , the director uses the last act to reel in the audience since its poignancy hooks us completely .
translation: 巧妙な漁師のように、監督は最後の幕を使って観客を引き込む。なぜなら、その切なさが私たちを完全に捉えるからだ。
back_translation: Like a clever fisherman, the director draws in the audience with the final act. This is because the poignancy completely captivates us.

text: but once the falcon arrives in the skies above manhattan , the adventure is on red alert .
translation: しかし、一旦ファルコンがマンハッタンの空に到着すると、冒険は赤信号になります。
back_translation: However, once Falcon arrives in the skies over Manhattan, the adventure gets a red light.

text: as antonia is assimilated into this newfangled community , the film settles in and becomes compulsively watchable in a guilty-pleasure , daytime-drama sort of fashion .
translation: アントニアがこの新しいコミュニティに溶け込むにつれて、映画は落ち着き、罪悪感を感じるほど魅力的な、昼間のドラマのような形で見続けたくなる。
back_translation: As Antonia blends into this new community, the film settles into a captivating, almost guilt-inducing, daytime drama that makes you want to keep watching.

text: this is n't a new idea .
translation: これは新しいアイデアではありません。
back_translation: This is not a new idea.

text: on a cutting room floor somewhere lies ... footage that might have made no such thing a trenchant , ironic cultural satire instead of a frustrating misfire .
translation: どこかの編集室の床には、イライラするミスファイアではなく、鋭い皮肉のある文化的風刺を作り出したかもしれない映像が横たわっている。
back_translation: On the floor of some editing room lies footage that may have created a sharp, culturally satirical piece rather than an irritating misfire.

text: that haynes can both maintain and dismantle the facades that his genre and his character construct is a wonderous accomplishment of veracity and narrative grace .
translation: ヘインズが彼のジャンルとキャラクターが構築する外観を維持し、解体することができるのは、真実性と物語の優雅さの驚くべき成果です。
back_translation: What Haynes can maintain and deconstruct in terms of the appearance built by his genre and characters is an astonishing achievement of authenticity and narrative elegance.

text: just bring on the battle bots , please !
translation: バトルボットを早く持ってきてください！
back_translation: Please bring the battle bot quickly!

text: but first , you have to give the audience a reason to want to put for that effort
translation: しかしまず、観客にその努力をしたいと思わせる理由を与える必要があります。
back_translation: However, first, it is necessary to give the audience a reason to want to make that effort.

text: for all the dolorous trim , secretary is a genial romance that maintains a surprisingly buoyant tone throughout , notwithstanding some of the writers ' sporadic dips into pop freudianism .
translation: 全ての痛ましいトリムに対して、「秘書」は驚くほど明るいトーンを維持した親しみやすいロマンスです。これは、作家の時折のポップ・フロイト主義への逸脱にもかかわらずそうです。
back_translation: "Secretary" is a surprisingly cheerful and approachable romance that maintains an upbeat tone despite all the painful trims. This is true even considering the writer's occasional deviation into pop Freudianism.

text: a bright , inventive , thoroughly winning flight of revisionist fancy .
translation: 明るく、独創的で、徹底的に魅力的な修正主義的空想のひととき。
back_translation: A bright, original, and thoroughly charming moment of revisionist fantasy.

text: just about the surest bet for an all-around good time at the movies this summer .
translation: この夏の映画で総合的に楽しい時間を過ごすための確実な賭けと言えるでしょう。
back_translation: It can be said to be a sure bet for having an overall enjoyable time with this summer's movies.

text: those of you who are not an eighth grade girl will most likely doze off during this one .
translation: 中学二年生の女の子でないあなたは、この話を聞いている間におそらくうとうとするでしょう。
back_translation: As someone who is not a second-year junior high school girl, you will probably doze off while listening to this story.

text: a rambling ensemble piece with loosely connected characters and plots that never quite gel .
translation: 緩く結びついたキャラクターやプロットが絶妙に組み合わさることのない、おしゃべりなアンサンブル作品。
back_translation: A chatty ensemble piece where loosely connected characters and plots do not blend exquisitely.

text: greg kinnear gives a mesmerizing performance as a full-fledged sex addict who is in complete denial about his obsessive behavior .
translation: グレッグ・キニアは、自身の強迫的な行動を完全に否定している本格的なセックス依存症者として魅力的なパフォーマンスを披露しています。
back_translation: Greg Kinnear delivers a captivating performance as a full-fledged sex addict who completely denies his compulsive behavior.

text: this action-thriller\/dark comedy is one of the most repellent things to pop up in a cinematic year already littered with celluloid garbage .
translation: このアクションスリラー／ダークコメディは、すでにセルロイドのゴミで散らかった映画の年に現れた最も不愉快なものの一つです。
back_translation: This action thriller/dark comedy is one of the most unpleasant things to emerge in a year already littered with celluloid garbage.

text: metaphors abound , but it is easy to take this film at face value and enjoy its slightly humorous and tender story .
translation: メタファーは豊富にありますが、この映画を表面的に受け取って、その少しユーモラスで優しいストーリーを楽しむことは簡単です。
back_translation: There are many metaphors, but it's easy to take this movie at face value and enjoy its somewhat humorous and gentle story.

text: the movie is the equivalent of french hip-hop , which also seems to play on a 10-year delay .
translation: その映画はフランスのヒップホップに相当するもので、10年の遅れを持っているように思えます。
back_translation: That movie seems to be equivalent to French hip-hop and appears to be about 10 years late.

text: a well-rounded tribute to a man whose achievements -- and complexities -- reached far beyond the end zone .
translation: エンドゾーンの向こうにまで及んだ成果と複雑さを持つ男へのバランスの取れた賛辞。
back_translation: A balanced tribute to a man whose achievements and complexities extend beyond the end zone.

text: the film ... presents classic moral-condundrum drama : what would you have done to survive ?
translation: その映画は、古典的な道徳的ジレンマのドラマを提示します：生き残るためにあなたは何をしましたか？
back_translation: The movie presents a classic moral dilemma drama: What would you do to survive?

text: both shrill and soporific , and because everything is repeated five or six times , it can seem tiresomely simpleminded .
translation: 耳障りでありながらも眠気を誘い、すべてが五回や六回繰り返されるため、退屈で単純すぎるように思えることもあります。
back_translation: While it is jarring, it also induces sleepiness, and since everything is repeated five or six times, it can seem too boring and simplistic.

text: a rich tale of our times , very well told with an appropriate minimum of means .
translation: 現代の豊かな物語であり、適切な最小限の手段で非常によく語られています。
back_translation: It is a rich story of the modern era, told very well with a suitably minimalist approach.

text: the action here is unusually tame , the characters are too simplistic to maintain interest , and the plot offers few surprises .
translation: ここでのアクションは異常におとなしく、キャラクターは興味を持続させるには単純すぎ、プロットは驚きをほとんど提供しません。
back_translation: The actions here are unusually subdued, the characters are too simple to maintain interest, and the plot offers almost no surprises.

text: the four feathers has rewards , from the exoticism of its seas of sand to the fierce grandeur of its sweeping battle scenes .
translation: 『四つの羽根』は、その砂の海のエキゾチックさから壮大な戦闘シーンの激しい荘厳さまで、さまざまな報酬を提供します。
back_translation: "The Four Wings" offers a variety of rewards, from the exoticism of its sandy seas to the intense grandeur of its epic battle scenes.

text: there 's a delightfully quirky movie to be made from curling , but brooms is n't it .
translation: カーリングから作れる楽しい風変りな映画があるが、「ブルームス」はそれではない。
back_translation: There are fun and quirky movies that can be made from curling, but "Blooms" is not one of them.

text: i suspect that there are more interesting ways of dealing with the subject .
translation: 私はこのテーマに対処するもっと興味深い方法があるのではないかと疑っています。
back_translation: I suspect there might be a more interesting way to address this theme.

text: a very good film sits in the place where a masterpiece should be .
translation: 非常に良い映画が傑作があるべき場所に座っています。
back_translation: A very good movie is sitting where a masterpiece should be.

text: changing lanes is an anomaly for a hollywood movie ; it 's a well-written and occasionally challenging social drama that actually has something interesting to say .
translation: 『レーン・チェンジ』はハリウッド映画としては異例の作品であり、よく書かれた時折挑戦的な社会ドラマで、実際に興味深いことを語っている。
back_translation: "Lane Change" is an unusual film for a Hollywood production; it is a well-written, occasionally challenging social drama that tells genuinely interesting stories.

text: ... flat-out amusing , sometimes endearing and often fabulous , with a solid cast , noteworthy characters , delicious dialogue and a wide supply of effective sight gags .
translation: ...まったく面白く、時には愛らしく、しばしば素晴らしい、しっかりとしたキャスト、注目すべきキャラクター、魅力的な台詞、そして効果的な視覚ギャグの豊富な供給があります。
back_translation: ...completely entertaining, at times endearing, often wonderful, with a solid cast, noteworthy characters, captivating dialogue, and a rich supply of effective visual gags.

text: passionate , irrational , long-suffering but cruel as a tarantula , helga figures prominently in this movie , and helps keep the proceedings as funny for grown-ups as for rugrats .
translation: 情熱的で非合理的、長い苦難を耐えているがタランチュラのように冷酷なヘルガは、この映画で重要な役割を果たし、大人にとっても幼児にとっても楽しい進行を維持するのに貢献しています。
back_translation: Helga, passionate and irrational, enduring long sufferings yet cold as a tarantula, plays an important role in this film and contributes to maintaining an enjoyable progression for both adults and toddlers.

text: whenever you think you 've figured out late marriage , it throws you for a loop .
translation: 遅い結婚について理解したと思ったとき、いつも思いがけないことが起こります。
back_translation: Just when I think I understand late marriage, something unexpected always happens.

text: the story 's scope and pageantry are mesmerizing , and mr. day-lewis roars with leonine power .
translation: 物語のスコープと華やかさは魅惑的で、デイ＝ルイス氏は獅子のような力で吠えます。
back_translation: The scope and grandeur of the story are captivating, and Mr. Day-Lewis roars with the strength of a lion.

text: one problem with the movie , directed by joel schumacher , is that it jams too many prefabricated story elements into the running time .
translation: ジョエル・シューマスター監督の映画の問題の一つは、あまりにも多くの既製のストーリー要素を上映時間に詰め込みすぎていることです。
back_translation: One of the problems with director Joel Schumacher's films is that he crams too many ready-made story elements into the runtime.

text: barely manages for but a few seconds over its seemingly eternal running time to pique your interest , your imagination , your empathy or anything , really , save your disgust and your indifference .
translation: ほんの数秒間、永遠とも思えるランニングタイムの中で、あなたの興味や想像力、共感などを引き出すことができず、ただあなたの嫌悪感と無関心を呼び起こすだけで、かろうじて成り立っている。
back_translation: For just a few seconds, in what feels like an eternity of running time, it barely manages to exist by failing to evoke your interest, imagination, or empathy, only stirring feelings of disgust and indifference.

text: the story the movie tells is of brian de palma 's addiction to the junk-calorie suspense tropes that have all but ruined his career .
translation: 映画が語る物語は、ブライアン・デ・パルマがキャリアをほぼ台無しにしてしまったジャンクカロリーのサスペンストロープへの中毒についてです。
back_translation: The story told by the film is about Brian De Palma's addiction to the junk calories of suspense tropes that almost ruined his career.

text: miyazaki has created such a vibrant , colorful world , it 's almost impossible not to be swept away by the sheer beauty of his images .
translation: 宮崎は非常に生き生きとしたカラフルな世界を創造しており、その映像の美しさに心を奪われないことはほとんど不可能です。
back_translation: Miyazaki creates a vividly colorful world that it is almost impossible not to be captivated by the beauty of its visuals.

text: it 's not a bad premise , just a bad movie .
translation: 悪くない前提ですが、映画自体は良くありません。
back_translation: It's not a bad premise, but the movie itself is not good.

text: when one hears harry shearer is going to make his debut as a film director , one would hope for the best
translation: ハリー・シェアーが映画監督としてデビューするという話を聞くと、誰もが最良の結果を期待するだろう。
back_translation: When hearing that Harry Shearer is debuting as a film director, everyone would expect the best possible outcome.

text: if you enjoy being rewarded by a script that assumes you are n't very bright , then blood work is for you .
translation: もし、自分があまり賢くないと仮定した脚本から報酬を受け取ることを楽しむなら、血液検査はあなたにぴったりです。
back_translation: If you enjoy receiving rewards from a script that assumes you are not very smart, then a blood test is perfect for you.

text: great dragons !
translation: 偉大なドラゴン！
back_translation: Great Dragon!

text: the powerful success of read my lips with such provocative material shows why , after only three films , director\/co-writer jacques audiard , though little known in this country , belongs in the very top rank of french filmmakers .
translation: 挑発的な素材を扱った「リップを読んで」の強力な成功は、たった3本の映画の後に、あまり知られていないこの国で、監督/共同脚本家のジャック・オディアールがフランスの映画製作者の中で最上位に位置する理由を示しています。
back_translation: The powerful success of "Read My Lips," which dealt with provocative material, demonstrates why director/co-writer Jacques Audiard ranks among the top French filmmakers after just three films in this little-known country.

text: most fish stories are a little peculiar , but this is one that should be thrown back in the river .
translation: ほとんどの魚の話は少し奇妙ですが、これは川に戻すべき話です。
back_translation: Most fish stories are a bit strange, but this is one that should be thrown back into the river.

text: a word of advice to the makers of the singles ward : celebrity cameos do not automatically equal laughs .
translation: シングルズ・ワードの製作者へのアドバイス：セレブのカメオ出演は自動的に笑いを生むわけではありません。
back_translation: Advice to the creators of "Singles' Ward": A celebrity cameo does not automatically generate laughter.

text: kinnear and dafoe give what may be the performances of their careers .
translation: キニアとダフォーは、彼らのキャリアの中で最高のパフォーマンスを見せているかもしれません。
back_translation: Kinia and Daphor may be showing the best performance of their careers.

text: a pathetic exploitation film that tries to seem sincere , and just seems worse for the effort .
translation: 誠実に見せようとするが、結局努力が裏目に出てしまう哀れな搾取映画。
back_translation: It's a pathetic exploitation film that tries to appear sincere, but ultimately ends up backfiring despite its efforts.

text: pratfalls aside , barbershop gets its greatest play from the timeless spectacle of people really talking to each other .
translation: 失敗はさておき、バーバーショップは人々が本当にお互いに話しているという時を超えた光景から最大の魅力を得ています。
back_translation: Putting aside failure, barber shops draw their greatest appeal from the timeless scene where people are truly conversing with one another.

text: `` one look at a girl in tight pants and big tits and you turn stupid ? ''
translation: 「きついパンツと大きな胸の女の子を一目見て、バカになってしまうの？」
back_translation: "Do you become a fool at first sight of a girl in tight pants and with big breasts?"

text: kids should have a stirring time at this beautifully drawn movie .
translation: 子供たちはこの美しく描かれた映画でわくわくした時間を過ごすべきです。
back_translation: Children should spend an exciting time with this beautifully animated movie.

text: an unfortunate title for a film that has nothing endearing about it .
translation: それに魅力的な要素がまったくない映画にとって、不幸なタイトル。
back_translation: An unfortunate title for a movie that has absolutely no appealing elements.

text: david spade as citizen kane ?
translation: デヴィッド・スペードが『市民ケーン』？
back_translation: David Spade in "Citizen Kane"?

text: director tom dey demonstrated a knack for mixing action and idiosyncratic humor in his charming 2000 debut shanghai noon , but showtime 's uninspired send-up of tv cop show cliches mostly leaves him shooting blanks .
translation: 監督トム・デイは、2000年の魅力的なデビュー作『上海ヌーン』でアクションと独特のユーモアを融合させる才能を示しましたが、ショータイムのテレビ刑事ドラマのクリシェをつまらなく揶揄した作品では、ほとんど空振りに終わっています。
back_translation: Director Tom Day showcased his talent for melding action with unique humor in his captivating debut film "Shanghai Noon" in 2000, but his work that boringly lampooned the clichés of Showtime's TV cop dramas mostly fell flat.

text: director george hickenlooper has had some success with documentaries , but here his sense of story and his juvenile camera movements smack of a film school undergrad , and his maudlin ending might not have gotten him into film school in the first place .
translation: ジョージ・ヒッケンルーパー監督はドキュメンタリーでいくつか成功を収めていますが、ここでは彼の物語のセンスや幼稚なカメラワークは映画学校の学部生を思わせ、感傷的な結末はそもそも彼が映画学校に入学できなかったかもしれません。
back_translation: Director George Hickenlooper has achieved some success with documentaries, but here his sense of story and childish camera work resemble that of an undergraduate film school student, and the sentimental ending suggests that he may not have even been able to get into film school in the first place.

text: like kubrick , soderbergh is n't afraid to try any genre and to do it his own way .
translation: キューブリックのように、ソダーバーグもどのジャンルにも挑戦することを恐れず、自分なりのやり方でそれを行います。
back_translation: Like Kubrick, Soderbergh is unafraid to challenge any genre and does so in his own unique way.

text: the very definition of what critics have come to term an `` ambitious failure . ''
translation: 批評家が「野心的な失敗」と呼ぶことになった定義そのもの。
back_translation: The very definition that critics have come to refer to as an "ambitious failure."

text: i can imagine this movie as a b & w british comedy , circa 1960 , with peter sellers , kenneth williams , et al. , but at this time , with this cast , this movie is hopeless .
translation: 私はこの映画を1960年頃の白黒の英国コメディ、ピーター・セラーズやケネス・ウィリアムズなどが出演するものとして想像できますが、現時点ではこのキャストと共にこの映画は絶望的です。
back_translation: I can imagine this movie as a black-and-white British comedy from around 1960, featuring Peter Sellers and Kenneth Williams, but at this point, this movie with this cast seems hopeless.

text: at times auto focus feels so distant you might as well be watching it through a telescope .
translation: 時にはオートフォーカスがとても遠く感じられ、まるで望遠鏡越しに見ているかのようです。
back_translation: Sometimes the autofocus feels very distant, as if looking through a telescope.

text: a brutally dry satire of middle american numbness .
translation: 中西部アメリカの無感覚に対する残酷に乾いたサタイア。
back_translation: A cruelly dry satire on the numbness of the American Midwest.

text: it is philosophy , illustrated through everyday events .
translation: それは、日常の出来事を通じて示された哲学です。
back_translation: It is a philosophy demonstrated through everyday events.

text: this is one of the year 's best films .
translation: これは今年のベスト映画の一つです。
back_translation: This is one of the best movies of the year.

text: the wild thornberrys movie is pleasant enough and the message of our close ties with animals can certainly not be emphasized enough .
translation: 『ザ・ワイルド・ソーンベリーズ・ムービー』は十分に楽しい作品であり、私たちと動物との密接なつながりのメッセージは決して強調しすぎることはありません。
back_translation: "The Wild Thornberrys Movie" is an enjoyable work, and the message about our close connection with animals can never be overemphasized.

text: sounding like arnold schwarzenegger , with a physique to match , -lrb- ahola -rrb- has a wooden delivery and encounters a substantial arc of change that does n't produce any real transformation .
translation: アーノルド・シュワルツェネッガーのような声で、体格もそれに匹敵する-（アホラ）-は、木製のような独特の話し方をしており、実質的な変化をもたらさない大きな変化の曲線に直面しています。
back_translation: With a voice like Arnold Schwarzenegger's and a physique to match - (ha ha) - he has a unique way of speaking that is almost wooden and faces a curve of major changes that bring little to no substantial change.

text: the strength of the film lies in its two central performances by sven wollter as the stricken composer and viveka seldahl as his desperate violinist wife .
translation: 映画の強さは、苦悩する作曲家役のスヴェン・ウォルターと、彼の必死なバイオリニストの妻役のヴィヴェカ・セルダールによる二つの中心的な演技にあります。
back_translation: The strength of the movie lies in the two central performances by Sven Walter as the tormented composer and Viveka Serdar as his desperate violinist wife.

text: absorbing character study by andré turpin .
translation: アンドレ・テュルパンによる魅力的なキャラクター研究。
back_translation: An intriguing character study by André Turpin.

text: unfortunately , that 's precisely what arthur dong 's family fundamentals does .
translation: 残念ながら、それがアーサー・ドンのファミリー・ファンダメンタルズがまさにやっていることです。
back_translation: Unfortunately, that's exactly what Arthur Don's Family Fundamentals is doing.

text: instead , she sees it as a chance to revitalize what is and always has been remarkable about clung-to traditions .
translation: その代わりに、彼女はそれを守られてきた伝統の素晴らしさを再活性化する機会として捉えています。
back_translation: Instead, she sees it as an opportunity to revitalize the greatness of the traditions that have been preserved.

text: an odd drama set in the world of lingerie models and bar dancers in the midwest that held my interest precisely because it did n't try to .
translation: 下着モデルやバーのダンサーの世界を舞台にした奇妙なドラマで、興味を引かれたのは、まさにそれが無理に何かを試みようとしなかったからです。
back_translation: It was a peculiar drama set in the world of lingerie models and bar dancers, and what caught my interest was precisely that it didn't try to force anything.

text: a headline-fresh thriller set among orthodox jews on the west bank , joseph cedar 's time of favor manages not only to find a compelling dramatic means of addressing a complex situation , it does so without compromising that complexity .
translation: オルソドックス・ユダヤ人が住む西岸地区を舞台にした新鮮なスリラー、ジョセフ・シーダーの『タイム・オブ・フェイバー』は、複雑な状況に対処するための説得力のあるドラマ的手段を見つけるだけでなく、その複雑さを損なうことなく実現しています。
back_translation: "Time of Favor," a fresh thriller set in the West Bank, where Orthodox Jews live, finds compelling dramatic means not only to deal with complex situations but also achieves this without diminishing their complexity.

text: the way home is an ode to unconditional love and compassion garnered from years of seeing it all , a condition only the old are privy to , and ... often misconstrued as weakness .
translation: 帰り道は、すべてを見てきた年月から得られた無条件の愛と compassion へのオードであり、これは老年者のみが知ることのできる状態であり、しばしば弱さとして誤解されることもあります。
back_translation: The way back is an ode to unconditional love and compassion gained from years of witnessing everything, a state known only to the elderly, which is often misunderstood as weakness.

text: a rude black comedy about the catalytic effect a holy fool has upon those around him in the cutthroat world of children 's television .
translation: 子供向けテレビの過酷な世界で、聖なるバカが周囲の人々に与える触媒的効果についての失礼なブラックコメディ。
back_translation: A rude black comedy about the catalytic effect that a holy fool has on the people around them in the harsh world of children's television.

text: despite its lavish formalism and intellectual austerity , the film manages to keep you at the edge of your seat with its shape-shifting perils , political intrigue and brushes with calamity .
translation: 華やかな形式主義と知的な厳格さにもかかわらず、この映画は変幻自在な危険、政治的陰謀、そして災難との接触によって、観客を釘付けにすることに成功しています。
back_translation: Despite its glamorous formalism and intellectual rigor, this film succeeds in captivating the audience through its ever-changing dangers, political intrigue, and encounters with disaster.

text: coppola 's directorial debut is an incredibly layered and stylistic film that , despite a fairly slow paced , almost humdrum approach to character development , still manages at least a decent attempt at meaningful cinema .
translation: コッポラの監督デビュー作は、非常に層のあるスタイリッシュな映画であり、キャラクターの発展に対しては比較的遅いペースでほぼ平凡なアプローチを持っているにもかかわらず、少なくとも意味のある映画への良い試みを実現しています。
back_translation: Coppola's directorial debut is a very layered and stylish film, and despite having a relatively slow pace with an almost ordinary approach to character development, it achieves at least a good attempt at becoming a meaningful film.

text: so we got ten little indians meets friday the 13th by way of clean and sober , filmed on the set of carpenter 's the thing and loaded with actors you 're most likely to find on the next inevitable incarnation of the love boat .
translation: 私たちは「十人の小さなインディアン」が「13日の金曜日」と「クリーン＆ソバー」を融合させたものを手に入れました。カーペンターの「ザ・シング」のセットで撮影され、次の不可避な「ラブボート」の再生に登場する可能性が最も高い俳優たちが揃っています。
back_translation: We have obtained a fusion of "Ten Little Indians," "Friday the 13th," and "Clean & Sober." Filmed on the set of Carpenter's "The Thing," it features actors who are most likely to appear in the next inevitable revival of "The Love Boat."

text: with its lackadaisical plotting and mindless action , all about the benjamins evokes the bottom tier of blaxploitation flicks from the 1970s .
translation: ゆるいプロットと無気力なアクションで、「オール・アバウト・ザ・ベンジャミンズ」は1970年代のブラスプロイテーション映画の最下層を思わせる。
back_translation: With its loose plot and lackluster action, "All About the Benjamins" evokes the lowest tier of 1970s blaxploitation films.

text: among the many pleasures are the lively intelligence of the artists and their perceptiveness about their own situations .
translation: 多くの喜びの中には、アーティストたちの活気ある知性と、自らの状況に対する彼らの洞察力があります。
back_translation: Among the many joys, there is the vibrant intelligence of artists and their insight into their own circumstances.

text: a reminder that beyond all the hype and recent digital glitz , spielberg knows how to tell us about people .
translation: すべての誇張や最近のデジタル華やかさを超えて、スピルバーグは人々について語る方法を知っています。
back_translation: Beyond all exaggeration and recent digital flair, Spielberg knows how to tell stories about people.

text: collapses under its own meager weight .
translation: 自らのわずかな重さで崩れ落ちる。
back_translation: It collapses under its own slight weight.

text: does n't deserve a passing grade -lrb- even on a curve -rrb- .
translation: 合格点に値しない -lrb- カーブでさえ -rrb- 。
back_translation: Not worthy of a passing score - even with a curve.

text: white oleander may leave you rolling your eyes in the dark , but that does n't mean you wo n't like looking at it .
translation: ホワイトオリンダーは暗闇で目を転がさせるかもしれませんが、それがあなたが見るのを好きではないという意味ではありません。
back_translation: The white oleander may roll its eyes in the darkness, but that doesn't mean you don't like what you see.

text: at once disarmingly straightforward and strikingly devious .
translation: 一見して素直でありながら、巧妙に裏をかく。
back_translation: At first glance, it seems straightforward, yet it cleverly subverts expectations.

text: if you 're looking for a smart , nuanced look at de sade and what might have happened at picpus , sade is your film .
translation: もしサドとピクピュスで何が起こったのかについて賢く、微妙な視点を探しているなら、『サド』はあなたのための映画です。
back_translation: If you are looking for a clever and nuanced perspective on what happened with Sade and Pif Paf, then "Sade" is the movie for you.

text: i do n't blame eddie murphy but should n't owen wilson know a movie must have a story and a script ?
translation: エディ・マーフィを責めるつもりはないが、オーウェン・ウィルソンは映画にはストーリーと脚本が必要だと知っておくべきではないだろうか？
back_translation: I'm not intending to blame Eddie Murphy, but shouldn't Owen Wilson know that movies need a story and a script?

text: a manipulative feminist empowerment tale thinly posing as a serious drama about spousal abuse .
translation: 配偶者虐待についての真剣なドラマを薄っぺらに装った、操作的なフェミニストのエンパワーメントの物語。
back_translation: A serious drama about spousal abuse dressed up as an overly simplistic, manipulative story of feminist empowerment.

text: this in-depth study of important developments of the computer industry should make it required viewing in university computer science departments for years to come .
translation: このコンピュータ産業の重要な発展に関する詳細な研究は、今後数年間にわたり大学のコンピュータサイエンス学部で必見の視聴対象となるべきです。
back_translation: This detailed study on the important developments in the computer industry should be a must-watch for the computer science departments in universities over the coming years.

text: the script becomes lifeless and falls apart like a cheap lawn chair .
translation: 脚本は無気力になり、安い芝生用椅子のように崩れ落ちる。
back_translation: The script becomes lethargic, collapsing like a cheap lawn chair.

text: this is one of those war movies that focuses on human interaction rather than battle and action sequences ... and it 's all the stronger because of it .
translation: これは戦闘やアクションシーンよりも人間関係に焦点を当てた戦争映画の一つであり、そのためにさらに強さを増しています。
back_translation: This is a war movie that focuses more on human relationships than on combat or action scenes, which enhances its strength even further.

text: so devoid of pleasure or sensuality that it can not even be dubbed hedonistic .
translation: 快楽や官能の欠如が著しく、快楽主義とすら呼べない。
back_translation: The lack of pleasure and sensuality is remarkable, to the point that it cannot even be called hedonism.

text: solondz is without doubt an artist of uncompromising vision , but that vision is beginning to feel , if not morally bankrupt , at least terribly monotonous .
translation: ソロンツは妥協のないビジョンを持つアーティストであることに疑いはありませんが、そのビジョンは道徳的に破産しているわけではないにしても、少なくともひどく単調に感じ始めています。
back_translation: There is no doubt that Solontz is an artist with an uncompromising vision, but that vision, while not morally bankrupt, is starting to feel terribly monotonous at the very least.

text: here 's a case of two actors who do everything humanly possible to create characters who are sweet and believable , and are defeated by a screenplay that forces them into bizarre , implausible behavior .
translation: ここに、すべての人間的可能性を尽くして、甘くて believable なキャラクターを作ろうとする2人の俳優のケースがありますが、彼らは奇妙でありえない行動を強いる脚本によって打ち負かされます。
back_translation: Here, we have a case of two actors trying to create sweet and believable characters, but they are defeated by a script that forces them into strange and implausible behavior.

text: `` catch me '' feels capable of charming the masses with star power , a pop-induced score and sentimental moments that have become a spielberg trademark .
translation: 「キャッチ・ミー」は、スターの魅力、ポップなスコア、そしてスピルバーグのトレードマークとなった感情的な瞬間で、大衆を魅了する力を持っている。
back_translation: "Catch Me" has the power to captivate the public with its star appeal, pop score, and emotional moments that have become Spielberg's trademark.

text: `` solaris '' is a shapeless inconsequential move relying on the viewer to do most of the work .
translation: 「ソラリス」は、形のない重要でない作品であり、観客に多くの作業を任せている。
back_translation: "Solaris" is a formless, unimportant work that leaves a lot of work to the audience.

text: -lrb- t -rrb- his slop does n't even have potential as a cult film , as it 's too loud to shout insults at the screen .
translation: この駄作はカルト映画としての可能性すら持っておらず、画面に向かって罵声を叫ぶにはあまりにも騒がしい。
back_translation: This terrible work lacks even the potential to be a cult movie, and it is way too noisy to shout insults at the screen.

text: it reduces the complexities to bromides and slogans and it gets so preachy-keen and so tub-thumpingly loud it makes you feel like a chump just for sitting through it .
translation: それは複雑さをブロミドやスローガンに簡素化し、非常に説教じみていて、やたらと大声でまくし立てるため、ただ座っているだけでバカにされている気分になる。
back_translation: It simplifies complexity into bromides and slogans, is very preachy, and tends to be shouted loudly, making you feel mocked just by sitting there.

text: while solondz tries and tries hard , storytelling fails to provide much more insight than the inside column of a torn book jacket .
translation: ソロンツが努力を重ねている一方で、ストーリーテリングは破れた本のジャケットの内側のコラム以上の洞察を提供することに失敗している。
back_translation: While Solon is making efforts, storytelling fails to provide insights beyond the columns on the inside of a torn book jacket.

text: pacino and williams seem to keep upping the ante on each other , just as their characters do in the film .
translation: パチーノとウィリアムズは、お互いに賭けを上げ続けているようで、映画の中の彼らのキャラクターと同じようです。
back_translation: Pacino and Williams seem to be raising the stakes with each other, just like their characters in the movie.

text: this is n't a movie ; it 's a symptom .
translation: これは映画ではない；これは症状だ。
back_translation: This is not a movie; this is a symptom.

text: by the end you ca n't help but feel ` stoked . '
translation: 終わりには「ワクワクする」と感じずにはいられません。
back_translation: In the end, I can't help but feel "excited."

text: half past dead is just such an achievement .
translation: ハーフ・パスト・デッドは本当に素晴らしい成果です。
back_translation: Half Past Dead is truly an amazing achievement.

text: on its own , it 's not very interesting .
translation: それ自体では、あまり面白くありません。
back_translation: It's not very interesting by itself.

text: ignore the reputation , and ignore the film .
translation: 評判を無視し、映画も無視してください。
back_translation: Please ignore the reputation and also ignore the movie.

text: the performances of the children , untrained in acting , have an honesty and dignity that breaks your heart .
translation: 演技を習っていない子供たちのパフォーマンスは、心を打つ誠実さと品位を持っています。
back_translation: The performances of children who have not been trained in acting possess a heartfelt sincerity and dignity.

text: peter jackson has done the nearly impossible .
translation: ピーター・ジャクソンはほぼ不可能なことを成し遂げました。
back_translation: Peter Jackson accomplished what was nearly impossible.

text: the movie enters a realm where few non-porn films venture , and comes across as darkly funny , energetic , and surprisingly gentle .
translation: その映画は、ほとんどの非ポルノ映画が踏み込まない領域に入り込み、暗く笑える、エネルギッシュで、驚くほど穏やかな印象を与えます。
back_translation: The movie delves into a realm that most non-pornographic films do not explore, giving a darkly humorous, energetic, and surprisingly calm impression.

text: director chris wedge and screenwriters michael berg , michael j. wilson and peter ackerman create some episodes that rival vintage looney tunes for the most creative mayhem in a brief amount of time .
translation: 監督クリス・ウェッジと脚本家マイケル・バーグ、マイケル・J・ウィルソン、ピーター・アッカーマンは、短時間で最もクリエイティブな混乱を生み出すエピソードを制作したことで、ビンテージのルーニー・テューンズに匹敵する作品を生み出しました。
back_translation: Director Chris Wedge and screenwriters Michael Berg, Michael J. Wilson, and Peter Ackerman created an episode that produced the most creative chaos in a short time, resulting in a work that rivals vintage Looney Tunes.

text: and it 's not that funny -- which is just generally insulting .
translation: それはあまり面白くない -- つまり一般的に侮辱的です。
back_translation: That's not very interesting -- in other words, generally insulting.

text: evokes the style and flash of the double-cross that made mamet 's `` house of games '' and last fall 's `` heist '' so much fun .
translation: マメットの「ゲームの家」と昨年秋の「ハイスト」をとても楽しいものにした裏切りのスタイルと華やかさを呼び起こします。
back_translation: It evokes the betrayal style and glamor that made Mamet's "The Homecoming" and last autumn's "Heist" so enjoyable.

text: ... the efforts of its star , kline , to lend some dignity to a dumb story are for naught .
translation: ... その主役であるクラインの努力が愚かな物語にいくらかの dignity を与えようとしても、無駄に終わる。
back_translation: ... Even if Klein, the protagonist, tries to add some dignity to the foolish story through his efforts, it ends up being in vain.

text: one of the most original american productions this year , you 'll find yourself remembering this refreshing visit to a sunshine state .
translation: 今年の最もオリジナルなアメリカの作品の一つであり、あなたはこの太陽の州への新鮮な訪問を思い出すことでしょう。
back_translation: It is one of the most original American works of this year, and you will surely remember this fresh visit to the Sunshine State.

text: the more you think about the movie , the more you will probably like it .
translation: 映画について考えれば考えるほど、あなたはおそらくそれを好きになるでしょう。
back_translation: The more you think about the movie, the more you will probably come to like it.

text: some like it hot on the hardwood proves once again that a man in drag is not in and of himself funny .
translation: ハードウッドの上での「サム・ライク・イット・ホット」は、ドラッグをした男性自身が面白いわけではないことを再び証明しています。
back_translation: "Some Like It Hot" on hardwood once again proves that it's not funny just because it's a man who has done drugs.

text: there 's a lot of tooth in roger dodger .
translation: ロジャー・ドジャーにはたくさんの歯がある。
back_translation: Roger Dodger has many teeth.

text: a brutal and funny work .
translation: 残酷で面白い作品。
back_translation: A work that is cruel and interesting.

text: ramsay is clearly extraordinarily talented , and based on three short films and two features , here 's betting her third feature will be something to behold .
translation: ラムジーは明らかに並外れた才能を持っており、三本の短編映画と二本の長編映画に基づいて、彼女の三作目の長編映画は見ものになると賭けています。
back_translation: Ramsey clearly has exceptional talent, and her third feature film, based on three short films and two feature films, is bound to be a sight to behold.

text: we never feel anything for these characters , and as a result the film is basically just a curiosity .
translation: 私たちはこれらのキャラクターに対して何も感じませんし、その結果、映画は基本的にただの好奇心の対象に過ぎません。
back_translation: We don't feel anything for these characters, and as a result, the movie is basically just an object of curiosity.

text: director shekhar kapur and screenwriters michael schiffer and hossein amini have tried hard to modernize and reconceptualize things , but the barriers finally prove to be too great .
translation: 監督シェーカル・カプールと脚本家マイケル・シファー、ホセイン・アミニは物事を現代化し再構築しようと懸命に努力したが、最終的には障害があまりにも大きすぎることが証明されてしまった。
back_translation: Director Shekhar Kapur and screenwriters Michael Schiffer and Hossein Amini made a commendable effort to modernize and reconstruct things, but ultimately proved that the obstacles were just too great.

text: melds derivative elements into something that is often quite rich and exciting , and always a beauty to behold .
translation: 派生要素を融合させて、しばしば非常に豊かで刺激的なものを生み出し、常に見る者を魅了する美しさを持っています。
back_translation: By merging derivative elements, it often creates something very rich and stimulating, possessing a beauty that always captivates the viewer.

text: it 's like going to a house party and watching the host defend himself against a frothing ex-girlfriend .
translation: それはまるで家のパーティーに行って、ホストが狂った元彼女から自分を守るのを見ているようなものだ。
back_translation: It's like being at a house party and watching the host protect you from their crazy ex-girlfriend.

text: a great companion piece to other napoleon films .
translation: 他のナポレオン映画との素晴らしい相補的作品です。
back_translation: A wonderful complementary work to other Napoleon movies.

text: it aimlessly and unsuccessfully attempts to fuse at least three dull plots into one good one .
translation: それは無目的に、そして失敗しながら、少なくとも三つの退屈なプロットを一つの良いプロットに融合させようと試みます。
back_translation: It attempts to merge at least three boring plots into one good plot, without purpose and while failing.

text: however , it 's pleasant enough and its ecological , pro-wildlife sentiments are certainly welcome .
translation: しかし、それは十分に心地よく、その生態学的で野生動物を支持する感情は確かに歓迎されます。
back_translation: However, it is quite comfortable, and the support for ecology and wildlife is certainly welcomed.

text: between bursts of automatic gunfire , the story offers a trenchant critique of capitalism .
translation: 連続する自動小銃の銃声の間に、この物語は資本主義への鋭い批判を提供します。
back_translation: Between the continuous gunfire of automatic rifles, this story offers a sharp critique of capitalism.

text: kinnear ... gives his best screen performance with an oddly winning portrayal of one of life 's ultimate losers .
translation: キニアは、人生の究極の敗者の一人を奇妙に魅力的に描くことで、彼の最高のスクリーンパフォーマンスを発揮しています。
back_translation: Kinia delivers his best screen performance by depicting one of life's ultimate losers in a strangely captivating way.

text: it has plenty of laughs .
translation: たくさんの笑いがある。
back_translation: There is a lot of laughter.

text: beautifully crafted , engaging filmmaking that should attract upscale audiences hungry for quality and a nostalgic , twisty yarn that will keep them guessing .
translation: 美しく作り込まれた、魅力的な映画制作は、質に飢えた上質な観客を引きつけるべきであり、懐かしくひねりの効いた物語が彼らを飽きさせない。
back_translation: Well-crafted and captivating filmmaking should attract a quality audience hungry for substance, and a nostalgically twisted story will keep them engaged.

text: but the problem with wendigo , for all its effective moments , is n't really one of resources .
translation: しかし、ウェンディゴの問題は、その効果的な瞬間にもかかわらず、実際にはリソースの問題ではありません。
back_translation: However, the issue with the Wendigo is that, despite its effective moments, it is not actually a matter of resources.

text: transcends its agenda to deliver awe-inspiring , at times sublime , visuals and offer a fascinating glimpse into the subculture of extreme athletes whose derring-do puts the x into the games .
translation: その議題を超越し、驚嘆すべき、美しささえあるビジュアルを提供し、ゲームに「X」を加える冒険心あふれる極限スポーツ選手たちのサブカルチャーへの魅力的な窓を提供します。
back_translation: It offers an intriguing window into the subculture of adventurous extreme sports athletes who transcend that agenda, providing stunning visuals with even a sense of beauty and adding an "X" to the game.

text: -lrb- denis ' -rrb- bare-bones narrative more closely resembles an outline for a '70s exploitation picture than the finished product .
translation: デニスのベアボーンズな物語は、完成品というよりも70年代のエクスプロイテーション映画のアウトラインにより近い。
back_translation: Dennis's bare-bones story is closer to an outline of a 70s exploitation film than a finished product.

text: snipes is both a snore and utter tripe .
translation: スナイプスは、いびきであり全くのつまらないものです。
back_translation: Snipes are just snoring and completely boring.

text: the chateau has one very funny joke and a few other decent ones , but all it amounts to is a mildly funny , sometimes tedious , ultimately insignificant film .
translation: シャトーには非常に面白いジョークが一つと、いくつかのまずまずのジョークがありますが、結局はやや面白い、時には退屈で、最終的には重要性のない映画に過ぎません。
back_translation: The Château has one very interesting joke and a few mediocre ones, but in the end, it is somewhat funny, sometimes boring, and ultimately just an inconsequential movie.

text: not only is entry number twenty the worst of the brosnan bunch , it 's one of the worst of the entire franchise .
translation: エントリーナンバー20はブロスナン作品の中で最悪なだけでなく、フランチャイズ全体でも最悪のうちの一つです。
back_translation: Entry number 20 is not only the worst of the Brosnan films but also one of the worst in the entire franchise.

text: shot like a postcard and overacted with all the boozy self-indulgence that brings out the worst in otherwise talented actors ...
translation: 絵葉書のように撮影され、才能ある俳優の最悪の部分を引き出す酔った自己 indulgence で演技が大げさになった・・・
back_translation: Shot like a postcard, the performance became exaggerated through drunken self-indulgence, drawing out the worst aspects of the talented actor...

text: stephen earnhart 's documentary is a decomposition of healthy eccentric inspiration and ambition -- wearing a cloak of unsentimental , straightforward text -- when it 's really an exercise in gross romanticization of the delusional personality type .
translation: スティーブン・アーンハートのドキュメンタリーは、健康的な偏屈なインスピレーションと野心の分析であり、無感情でストレートなテキストのマントをまとっていますが、実際には妄想的な性格タイプのひどいロマン化の行為です。
back_translation: The documentary on Steven Ahern is an analysis of healthy eccentric inspiration and ambition, cloaked in emotionless and straightforward text, but in reality, it is a dreadful romanticization of a delusional personality type.

text: 77 minutes of pokemon may not last 4ever , it just seems like it does .
translation: 77分間のポケモンは永遠には続かないかもしれないが、そう感じるだけだ。
back_translation: 77 minutes of Pokémon may not last forever, but it certainly feels that way.

text: a colorful , vibrant introduction to a universal human impulse , lushly photographed and beautifully recorded .
translation: 色彩豊かで活気にあふれた、普遍的な人間の衝動への紹介で、豊かな映像と美しい音声で記録されています。
back_translation: It is recorded with rich visuals and beautiful sounds, introducing a vibrant and colorful celebration of the universal human impulse.

text: a droll , bitchy frolic which pokes fun at the price of popularity and small-town pretension in the lone star state .
translation: ユーモラスで辛辣な楽しみが、テキサスの田舎町における人気の代償と小さな町の見栄を揶揄しています。
back_translation: The humorous and caustic enjoyment mocks the price of popularity in a Texas small town and the vanity of a small community.

text: full of surprises .
translation: 驚きに満ちている。
back_translation: It is full of surprises.

text: whether or not ram dass proves as clear and reliable an authority on that as he was about inner consciousness , fierce grace reassures us that he will once again be an honest and loving one .
translation: ラム・ダスが内なる意識についてのように明確で信頼できる権威であるかどうかは別として、『フィアス・グレース』は彼が再び正直で愛情深い存在であることを私たちに安心させてくれます。
back_translation: Whether or not Ram Dass is a clear and reliable authority on inner consciousness, "Fierce Grace" assures us that he is once again a genuine and loving presence.

text: the whole thing 's fairly lame , making it par for the course for disney sequels .
translation: 全体的に見てかなり魅力がなく、ディズニーの続編としては普通のことです。
back_translation: Overall, it is quite unappealing and typical for a Disney sequel.

text: vividly demonstrates that the director of such hollywood blockbusters as patriot games can still turn out a small , personal film with an emotional wallop .
translation: そのようなハリウッドの大ヒット作である「パトリオット・ゲーム」の監督が、まだ小さくて個人的な感情豊かな映画を作ることができることを鮮明に示しています。
back_translation: It clearly shows that the director of the Hollywood blockbuster "Patriot Games" can still create small, personal, and emotionally rich films.

text: one of the best rock documentaries ever .
translation: 今までで最高のロックドキュメンタリーの1つ。
back_translation: One of the best rock documentaries ever.

text: as david letterman and the onion have proven , the worst of tragedies can be fertile sources of humor , but lawrence has only a fleeting grasp of how to develop them .
translation: デビッド・レターマンとオニオンが証明しているように、最も悲劇的な出来事はユーモアの肥沃な源になり得るが、ローレンスはそれを展開する方法を一時的にしか把握していない。
back_translation: As David Letterman and The Onion have demonstrated, the most tragic events can serve as a fertile source of humor, but Lawrence only temporarily grasps how to develop that.

text: somehow ms. griffiths and mr. pryce bring off this wild welsh whimsy .
translation: なぜかグリフィスさんとプライスさんは、このワイルドなウェールズの奇想を実現しています。
back_translation: For some reason, Mr. Griffiths and Mr. Price are realizing this wild Welsh whimsy.

text: if the film 's vision of sport as a secular religion is a bit cloying , its through-line of family and community is heartening in the same way that each season marks a new start .
translation: 映画がスポーツを世俗的な宗教として描くビジョンが少し甘ったるいと感じるかもしれませんが、家族やコミュニティの通底するテーマは、毎シーズンが新たなスタートを象徴するのと同様に心温まるものです。
back_translation: You might find the film's vision of depicting sports as a secular religion a bit too sweet, but the underlying themes of family and community are just as heartwarming as each season symbolizes a new beginning.

text: while somewhat less than it might have been , the film is a good one , and you 've got to hand it to director george clooney for biting off such a big job the first time out .
translation: 多少少なめではありますが、この映画は良いものであり、初めての挑戦でこんな大きな仕事を引き受けたジョージ・クルーニー監督に拍手を送るべきです。
back_translation: Although it's a bit lacking, this movie is good, and we should applaud director George Clooney for taking on such a big project for his first challenge.

text: if anything , the film is doing something of a public service -- shedding light on a group of extremely talented musicians who might otherwise go unnoticed and underappreciated by music fans .
translation: もし何かあるとすれば、その映画は公のサービスを果たしているようです。音楽ファンに見過ごされ、評価されないかもしれない非常に才能ある音楽家たちの存在に光を当てています。
back_translation: If there is anything to say, it seems that the film is serving a public service. It shines a light on the existence of very talented musicians who may be overlooked and unappreciated by music fans.

text: boasting some of the most poorly staged and lit action in memory , impostor is as close as you can get to an imitation movie .
translation: 記憶に残る中で最もひどく演出され、照明も悪いアクションを誇る『インポスター』は、模倣映画に限りなく近い作品です。
back_translation: "The Imposter," which boasts poorly executed direction and bad lighting, is a film that is incredibly close to being a derivative work.

text: claude chabrol 's camera has a way of gently swaying back and forth as it cradles its characters , veiling tension beneath otherwise tender movements .
translation: クロード・シャブロルのカメラは、キャラクターを優しく抱きしめるように前後に揺れ動き、 otherwise tender movementsの下に緊張感を覆い隠す方法を持っています。
back_translation: Claude Chabrol's camera sways gently back and forth, as if embracing the characters, concealing tension beneath otherwise tender movements.

text: the crassness of this reactionary thriller is matched only by the ridiculousness of its premise .
translation: この反動的スリラーの下品さは、その前提のばかげたことに匹敵する。
back_translation: The vulgarity of this reactionary thriller is comparable to the absurdity of its premise.

text: anyone who welcomes a dash of the avant-garde fused with their humor should take pleasure in this crazed , joyous romp of a film .
translation: 前衛的な要素とユーモアが融合したものを歓迎する人は、この狂った喜びに満ちた映画を楽しむべきです。
back_translation: Those who welcome a fusion of avant-garde elements and humor should enjoy this film filled with crazy joy.

text: it 's about as convincing as any other arnie musclefest , but has a little too much resonance with real world events and ultimately comes off as insultingly simplistic .
translation: 他のアーニーの筋肉祭りと同じくらい説得力がありますが、現実の出来事との共鳴が少し強すぎて、最終的には侮辱的に単純に感じられます。
back_translation: It is as persuasive as other Ernie's Muscle Festivals, but the resonance with real events feels a bit too strong, ultimately resulting in it coming across as insultingly simplistic.

text: nothing more or less than an outright bodice-ripper -- it should have ditched the artsy pretensions and revelled in the entertaining shallows .
translation: まったくのボディス・リッパーであり、芸術的な気取りを捨てて楽しい浅瀬を楽しむべきだった。
back_translation: It was a complete body ripper, and I should have discarded my artistic pretensions and enjoyed the fun shallows.

text: precocious smarter-than-thou wayward teen struggles to rebel against his oppressive , right-wing , propriety-obsessed family .
translation: 早熟で自分より賢いと思っている問題児のティーンエイジャーが、抑圧的で右寄りの礼儀にこだわる家族に対抗しようと奮闘する。
back_translation: A precocious teenager who thinks they are smarter than others struggles to oppose their oppressive, right-wing family that insists on strict decorum.

text: ` unfaithful ' cheats on itself and retreats to comfortable territory .
translation: 「不誠実」は自分を裏切り、快適な領域に戻る。
back_translation: "Disloyalty" betrays oneself and returns to a comfortable zone.

text: yes , spirited away is a triumph of imagination , but it 's also a failure of storytelling .
translation: はい、『千と千尋の神隠し』は想像力の勝利ですが、同時にストーリーテリングの失敗でもあります。
back_translation: Yes, "Spirited Away" is a triumph of imagination, but at the same time, it is a failure in storytelling.

text: much of the digitally altered footage appears jagged , as if filmed directly from a television monitor , while the extensive use of stock footage quickly becomes a tiresome cliché .
translation: デジタル処理された映像の多くは、まるでテレビモニターから直接撮影したかのようにギザギザに見え、またストック映像の多用はすぐに飽きの来るクリシェとなる。
back_translation: Many digitally processed images appear jagged as if they were shot directly from a television monitor, and the excessive use of stock footage quickly becomes a tiresome cliché.

text: the fluid motion is astounding on any number of levels -- including the physical demands made on büttner -- and it implies in its wake the intractable , irreversible flow of history .
translation: その流れるような動きは、身体的な要求を含めてあらゆるレベルで驚異的であり、それはその後に、手に負えず、逆転不可能な歴史の流れを示唆します。
back_translation: That flowing movement is astonishing at every level, including physical demands, and it subsequently suggests an uncontrollable and irreversible flow of history.

text: derailed by bad writing and possibly also by some of that extensive post-production reworking to aim the film at young males in the throes of their first full flush of testosterone .
translation: 悪い脚本と、おそらくは若い男性をターゲットにするための広範なポストプロダクションの再編集によって、失敗してしまった。
back_translation: It failed due to a poor script and likely extensive post-production re-editing aimed at targeting young men.

text: i like it .
translation: 私はそれが好きです。
back_translation: I like it.

text: birot creates a drama with such a well-defined sense of place and age -- as in , 15 years old -- that the torments and angst become almost as operatic to us as they are to her characters .
translation: birotは、場所と年齢が非常に明確に定義されたドラマを作り出します。つまり、15歳という設定で、登場人物たちにとっての苦悩や不安が、私たちにとってもほとんどオペラのように感じられるのです。
back_translation: Birot creates dramas that are defined very clearly by location and age. In other words, with a setting of 15 years old, the characters' struggles and anxieties feel almost operatic to us as well.
