text: ` god help us , but capra and cooper are rolling over in their graves . '
translation: 「神よ、我々を助けてください、しかしキャプラとクーパーは墓の中でひっくり返っている。」
back_translation: "God, please help us, but Capra and Cooper are turning over in their graves."

text: poignant japanese epic about adolescent anomie and heartbreak .
translation: 青少年の疎外感と心の痛みについての感動的な日本の叙事詩。
back_translation: An emotional Japanese epic about the sense of alienation and pain of youth.

text: a little uneven to be the cat 's meow , but it 's good enough to be the purr .
translation: ちょっと不均衡だけど、最高ではないけれど、それでも十分に良い。
back_translation: A little unbalanced, not the best, but still good enough.

text: -lrb- there 's -rrb- quite a bit of heart , as you would expect from the directors of the little mermaid and aladdin .
translation: 『リトル・マーメイド』や『アラジン』の監督らしい、かなりのハートがあります。
back_translation: It seems to have a lot of heart, reminiscent of the directors of "The Little Mermaid" and "Aladdin."

text: it 's a hoot watching the rock chomp on jumbo ants , pull an arrow out of his back , and leap unscathed through raging fire !
translation: 岩が巨大なアリを噛む様子や、背中から矢を引き抜き、怒り狂う火の中を無傷で跳び越えるのを見ているのは最高に面白い！
back_translation: It's incredibly entertaining to watch a rock bite a giant ant and then pull an arrow from its back, leaping unscathed through the raging fire!

text: giggling at the absurdities and inconsistencies is part of the fun .
translation: 無 absurdities と inconsistencies に笑いながら楽しむのも、この楽しさの一部です。
back_translation: Part of the fun is enjoying it while laughing at the absurdities and inconsistencies.

text: the film is insightful about kissinger 's background and history .
translation: その映画はキッシンジャーの背景と歴史について洞察に満ちています。
back_translation: The movie is filled with insights about Kissinger's background and history.

text: it makes me feel weird \/ thinking about all the bad things in the world \/ like puppies with broken legs \/ and butterflies that die \/ and movies starring pop queens
translation: 世界のすべての悪いことを考えると変な気持ちになります。例えば、足を骨折した子犬や、死んでしまう蝶々、そしてポップクイーンが主演する映画のことです。
back_translation: Thinking about all the bad things in the world gives me a strange feeling. For example, a puppy with a broken leg, a butterfly that is about to die, and a movie starring a pop queen.

text: a brilliant , absurd collection of vignettes that , in their own idiosyncratic way , sum up the strange horror of life in the new millennium .
translation: 新しいミレニアムの奇妙な恐怖を、独自の方法で要約した、素晴らしく、滑稽な小品集。
back_translation: A splendid and humorous collection of short works that summarizes the strange fears of the new millennium in a unique way.

text: beautiful , cold , oddly colorful and just plain otherworldly , a freaky bit of art that 's there to scare while we delight in the images .
translation: 美しく、寒く、奇妙にカラフルで、まさに異次元的な、この作品は私たちがその画像を楽しむ中で驚かせるために存在する不気味なアートの一片です。
back_translation: Beautiful, cold, oddly colorful, and truly otherworldly, this piece is a disturbing work of art that exists to astonish us as we enjoy its image.

text: this is n't a stand up and cheer flick ; it 's a sit down and ponder affair .
translation: これは立ち上がって喝采を送る映画ではなく、座って考えるべき作品です。
back_translation: This is not a film to stand up and applaud, but a work to sit down and think about.

text: this story still seems timely and important .
translation: この物語は今でもタイムリーで重要なように思えます。
back_translation: This story still seems timely and important even now.

text: a sloppy , amusing comedy that proceeds from a stunningly unoriginal premise .
translation: だらしなくて面白いコメディで、驚くほどオリジナルではない前提から展開される。
back_translation: It's a sloppy and funny comedy that unfolds from a premise that is surprisingly not original.

text: jae-eun jeong 's take care of my cat brings a beguiling freshness to a coming-of-age story with such a buoyant , expressive flow of images that it emerges as another key contribution to the flowering of the south korean cinema .
translation: ジョン・ジェウンの「私の猫を世話して」は、魅力的な新鮮さを持ち、画像の浮き立つような表現豊かな流れを通して、成長物語に新たな一歩を加えており、韓国映画の発展における重要な貢献の一つとなっています。
back_translation: John Je-eun's "Taking Care of My Cat" has an appealing freshness, adding a new dimension to the coming-of-age story through its vivid and lively imagery, making it one of the significant contributions to the development of Korean cinema.

text: the film 's appeal has a lot to do with the casting of juliette binoche as sand , who brings to the role her pale , dark beauty and characteristic warmth .
translation: 映画の魅力は、ジュリエット・ビノシュがサンド役を演じることに大きく関わっており、彼女はその役に淡い暗い美しさと特徴的な温かさをもたらしています。
back_translation: The charm of the film is largely connected to Juliette Binoche's portrayal of the character Sand, as she brings a faint dark beauty and distinctive warmth to the role.

text: like the english patient and the unbearable lightness of being , the hours is one of those reputedly `` unfilmable '' novels that has bucked the odds to emerge as an exquisite motion picture in its own right .
translation: 「イギリス人の患者」と「耐え難い軽さの存在」のように、「時刻」は「映画化不可能」と評判の小説の一つでありながら、逆境を乗り越えて独自の美しい映画作品として現れた。
back_translation: "Although 'Time' is one of the novels that has been deemed 'impossible to film' like 'The English Patient' and 'The Unbearable Lightness of Being,' it has emerged as a uniquely beautiful cinematic work that has overcome adversity."

text: the footage of the rappers at play and the prison interview with suge knight are just two of the elements that will grab you .
translation: ラッパーたちが遊んでいる映像とシュグ・ナイトとの刑務所インタビューは、あなたを引き込む要素の2つに過ぎません。
back_translation: The footage of the rappers playing and the prison interview with Suge Knight are just two of the elements that draw you in.

text: -lrb- f -rrb- rom the performances and the cinematography to the outstanding soundtrack and unconventional narrative , the film is blazingly alive and admirable on many levels .
translation: パフォーマンスや撮影技術から素晴らしいサウンドトラック、そして独自のストーリー展開に至るまで、この映画は非常に生き生きとしており、さまざまな面で称賛に値します。
back_translation: From the performance and filming techniques to the wonderful soundtrack and unique storytelling, this movie is so vibrant and deserves praise on multiple levels.

text: it 's bedeviled by labored writing and slack direction .
translation: それは、無理な文章と緩い演出に悩まされています。
back_translation: It is troubled by unrealistic sentences and loose direction.

text: it is too bad that this likable movie is n't more accomplished .
translation: この好感の持てる映画がもっと成功していないのは残念です。
back_translation: It's a shame that this likable movie hasn't been more successful.

text: quiet , adult and just about more stately than any contemporary movie this year ... a true study , a film with a questioning heart and mind that is n't afraid to admit it does n't have all the answers .
translation: 静かで、大人のための、そして今年のどの現代映画よりも威厳がある映画... 真の研究であり、疑問を持つ心と頭を持った作品で、全ての答えを持っていないことを恐れずに認める映画です。
back_translation: A quiet, adult film that is more dignified than any contemporary movie this year... It's a true study, a work with a questioning mind and intellect, unafraid to acknowledge that it doesn't have all the answers.

text: although god is great addresses interesting matters of identity and heritage , it 's hard to shake the feeling that it was intended to be a different kind of film .
translation: 「神は素晴らしい」はアイデンティティや遺産の興味深い問題に触れていますが、異なる種類の映画であるべきだったという感覚を拭い去るのは難しいです。
back_translation: "The statement 'God is wonderful' touches on interesting issues of identity and heritage, but it is difficult to shake off the feeling that it should have been a different kind of movie."

text: you can not guess why the cast and crew did n't sign a pact to burn the negative and the script and pretend the whole thing never existed .
translation: キャストとクルーがネガティブと脚本を焼却し、全てが存在しなかったことにするための契約に署名しなかった理由を推測することはできません。
back_translation: I cannot speculate on the reasons why the cast and crew did not sign the contract to burn the negative and make everything non-existent.

text: feel free to go get popcorn whenever he 's not onscreen .
translation: 彼が画面にいないときは、ポップコーンを取りに行っても構いません。
back_translation: You can go and get popcorn when he is not on screen.

text: definitely funny stuff , but it 's more of the ` laughing at ' variety than the ` laughing with . '
translation: 間違いなく面白いが、むしろ「一緒に笑う」というよりは「笑われる」という種類のものだ。
back_translation: It is undoubtedly funny, but it is more of a type that is "laughed at" rather than "laughing together."

text: ... pray does n't have a passion for the material .
translation: ...祈りは物質に対する情熱を持っていない。
back_translation: ...Prayer does not have a passion for material things.

text: plays like an unbalanced mixture of graphic combat footage and almost saccharine domestic interludes that are pure hollywood .
translation: グラフィックな戦闘映像と、ほぼ甘ったるい家庭的なインタールードの不均衡な混合のように演じられており、それはまさにハリウッド的です。
back_translation: It is performed like an unbalanced mixture of graphic combat footage and almost saccharine domestic interludes, which is exactly Hollywood.

text: the increasingly diverse french director has created a film that one can honestly describe as looking , sounding and simply feeling like no other film in recent history .
translation: ますます多様化するフランスの監督は、最近の歴史において他のどの映画とも正直に言って異なる見た目、音、そして感覚を持つ映画を作り上げました。
back_translation: The increasingly diverse French directors have created films that, frankly speaking, have a different look, sound, and feel compared to any other film in recent history.

text: the film is a confusing melange of tones and styles , one moment a romantic trifle and the next a turgid drama .
translation: この映画は、トーンとスタイルの混乱したメランジュであり、一瞬はロマンティックなつまらない作品で、次の瞬間には堅苦しいドラマになります。
back_translation: This movie is a confusing mélange of tone and style, at one moment being a romantically dull piece, and the next moment turning into a stiff drama.

text: lush and beautifully photographed -lrb- somebody suggested the stills might make a nice coffee table book -rrb- , but ultimately you 'll leave the theater wondering why these people mattered .
translation: 豊かで美しく撮影された -lrb- 誰かが静止画が素敵なコーヒーテーブルブックになるかもしれないと提案した -rrb- が、結局あなたはこれらの人々がなぜ重要だったのかを考えながら劇場を後にすることになるでしょう。
back_translation: Richly and beautifully photographed - someone suggested that the still images might make a lovely coffee table book - yet ultimately, you will leave the theater contemplating why these people mattered.

text: instead of using george and lucy 's most obvious differences to ignite sparks , lawrence desperately looks elsewhere , seizing on george 's haplessness and lucy 's personality tics .
translation: ジョージとルーシーの最も明白な違いを利用して火花を散らす代わりに、ローレンスは必死になって他の場所を探し、ジョージの不運とルーシーの性格的な癖をつかみ取る。
back_translation: Instead of sparking conflict by utilizing the most obvious differences between George and Lucy, Lawrence desperately looks elsewhere, trying to grasp George's misfortune and Lucy's character quirks.

text: it recycles every cliché about gays in what is essentially an extended soap opera .
translation: それは本質的に延長されたソープオペラの中で、ゲイに関するあらゆるクリシェをリサイクルしています。
back_translation: It essentially recycles every cliché about being gay within an extended soap opera.

text: one of the most splendid entertainments to emerge from the french film industry in years .
translation: フランス映画界からこの数年で登場した最も素晴らしいエンターテインメントの一つ。
back_translation: One of the most wonderful entertainments that has emerged from the French film industry in recent years.

text: the piano teacher , like its title character , is repellantly out of control .
translation: ピアノ教師は、そのタイトルキャラクターのように、非常に手に負えない状態です。
back_translation: The piano teacher is in a very unmanageable state, much like the title character.

text: the basic premise is intriguing but quickly becomes distasteful and downright creepy .
translation: 基本的な前提は興味深いですが、すぐに不快でぞっとするものになります。
back_translation: The basic premise is interesting, but it quickly becomes uncomfortable and creepy.

text: it is ok for a movie to be something of a sitcom apparatus , if the lines work , the humor has point and the actors are humanly engaged .
translation: 映画がシチュエーションコメディの装置のようなものであっても構わない。セリフがうまく機能し、ユーモアに意味があり、俳優たちが人間的に関与していれば。
back_translation: It's fine if the movie acts like a device for situational comedy, as long as the dialogue works well, the humor has meaning, and the actors are humanly engaged.

text: too campy to work as straight drama and too violent and sordid to function as comedy , vulgar is , truly and thankfully , a one-of-a-kind work .
translation: あまりにもキャンピーで真剣なドラマとしては機能せず、あまりにも暴力的で醜悪であるためコメディとしても機能しない『ヴァルガー』は、実際に、そして感謝して、唯一無二の作品です。
back_translation: "Vulgar" does not function as a serious drama because it's too campy, nor does it work as a comedy because it's too violent and grotesque; it is, in fact, a unique work that is both genuinely and gratefully so.

text: this romantic\/comedy asks the question how much souvlaki can you take before indigestion sets in .
translation: このロマンチックコメディは、消化不良が始まる前にどれくらいのスブラキを食べられるかという疑問を投げかけています。
back_translation: This romantic comedy poses the question of how much souvlaki one can eat before indigestion sets in.

text: visually breathtaking , viscerally exciting , and dramatically moving , it 's the very definition of epic adventure .
translation: 視覚的に素晴らしく、肉体的に刺激的で、劇的に感動的であり、それはまさに壮大な冒険の定義です。
back_translation: Visually stunning, physically exhilarating, and dramatically moving, it is the very definition of a grand adventure.

text: full frontal had no effect and elicited no sympathies for any of the characters .
translation: フルフロンタルは何の効果もなく、キャラクターたちへの同情も引き起こさなかった。
back_translation: Full Frontal had no effect and did not evoke any sympathy for the characters.

text: the movie is n't painfully bad , something to be ` fully experienced ' ; it 's just tediously bad , something to be fully forgotten .
translation: その映画は痛々しく悪いわけではなく、「完全に体験する」必要があるものではない；ただ退屈に悪いだけで、完全に忘れ去られるべきものだ。
back_translation: The movie is not painfully bad, nor is it something you "need to fully experience"; it is simply boringly bad and should be completely forgotten.

text: if you 've the patience , there are great rewards here .
translation: 忍耐があれば、ここには素晴らしい報酬があります。
back_translation: With patience, there are wonderful rewards here.

text: devolves into the derivative , leaning on badly-rendered cgi effects .
translation: 劣悪にレンダリングされたCGI効果に頼って、派生的なものに堕ちていく。
back_translation: Relying on poorly rendered CGI effects, it falls into being derivative.

text: it 's the type of film about growing up that we do n't see often enough these days : realistic , urgent , and not sugarcoated in the least .
translation: 最近ではあまり見かけない、成長をテーマにした映画のタイプです：リアルで緊急感があり、全く甘く見ない。
back_translation: It's a type of coming-of-age movie that is rarely seen these days: realistic, urgent, and completely unsweetened.

text: remember back when thrillers actually thrilled ?
translation: スリラーが実際にスリルを感じさせてくれた頃を思い出しますか？
back_translation: Do you remember the time when thrillers actually made you feel the thrill?

text: perhaps even the slc high command found writer-director mitch davis 's wall of kitsch hard going .
translation: おそらく、SLCの高指揮者たちさえも、作家兼監督ミッチ・デイヴィスのキッチュの壁に苦しんだのかもしれません。
back_translation: Perhaps even the high-ranking officials of SLC struggled with the kitschy wall created by writer-director Mitch Davis.

text: the acting is fine but the script is about as interesting as a recording of conversations at the wal-mart checkout line .
translation: 演技は悪くないが、脚本はウォルマートのレジ待ちの会話の録音と同じぐらい興味がない。
back_translation: The acting is not bad, but the script is as uninteresting as a recording of conversations while waiting in line at Walmart.

text: writer\/director alexander payne -lrb- election -rrb- and his co-writer jim taylor brilliantly employ their quirky and fearless ability to look american angst in the eye and end up laughing .
translation: 脚本家/監督のアレクサンダー・ペイン（「エレクション」）と彼の共同脚本家ジム・テイラーは、アメリカの苦悩を真正面から見つめ、最終的には笑ってしまうという独特で大胆な才能を見事に活かしています。
back_translation: Screenwriter/director Alexander Payne ("Election") and his co-writer Jim Taylor brilliantly showcase their unique and bold talent by directly confronting America's struggles and ultimately finding humor in them.

text: if you can push on through the slow spots , you 'll be rewarded with some fine acting .
translation: ゆっくりした部分を乗り越えることができれば、素晴らしい演技で報われるでしょう。
back_translation: If you can overcome the slow parts, you will be rewarded with a wonderful performance.

text: chris columbus ' sequel is faster , livelier and a good deal funnier than his original .
translation: クリス・コロンバスの続編は、彼のオリジナルよりも速く、活気があり、ずっと面白い。
back_translation: Chris Columbus's sequel is faster, more lively, and much more interesting than his original.

text: this is the stuff that disney movies are made of .
translation: これはディズニームービーの素材です。
back_translation: This is material from a Disney movie.

text: what 's invigorating about it is that it does n't give a damn .
translation: それについて爽快なのは、まったく気にしていないということです。
back_translation: What's refreshing about it is that I'm not concerned at all.

text: it 's difficult to conceive of anyone who has reached puberty actually finding the characters in slackers or their antics amusing , let alone funny .
translation: 思春期に達した誰もが、スラッカーズのキャラクターや彼らの行動を面白いと感じることは難しいと思います。
back_translation: I think it's difficult for anyone who has reached puberty to find the characters of Sluckers and their actions interesting.

text: the film is a verbal duel between two gifted performers .
translation: その映画は二人の才能あるパフォーマーの間の言葉の戦いです。
back_translation: The movie is a verbal battle between two talented performers.

text: it 's makes a better travelogue than movie .
translation: それは映画よりもより良い旅行記になります。
back_translation: That will be a better travelogue than a movie.

text: it 's a masterpiece .
translation: それは傑作です。
back_translation: That is a masterpiece.

text: been there , done that , liked it much better the first time around - when it was called the professional .
translation: 行ったことがある、やったことがある、初めての時の方がずっと好きだった - それは「プロフェッショナル」と呼ばれていた頃だ。
back_translation: I liked it much more when I had been there and done it for the first time - that was when it was called "Professional."

text: i have to admit i walked out of runteldat .
translation: 正直に言うと、私は「ランテルダット」を途中で出てしまいました。
back_translation: To be honest, I left "Lanterdat" halfway through.

text: a movie so bad that it quickly enters the pantheon of wreckage that includes battlefield earth and showgirls .
translation: あまりにもひどい映画で、すぐに「バトルフィールド・アース」や「ショーガールズ」を含む破壊の聖域に入ってしまう。
back_translation: It's such a terrible movie that it quickly falls into the sacred realm of destruction, alongside "Battlefield Earth" and "Showgirls."

text: -- but it makes for one of the most purely enjoyable and satisfying evenings at the movies i 've had in a while .
translation: しかし、それは私がしばらくの間経験した中で、最も純粋に楽しめて満足できる映画の夜の一つとなっています。
back_translation: However, it has become one of the most purely enjoyable and satisfying movie nights I have experienced in a while.

text: the unexplored story opportunities of `` punch-drunk love '' may have worked against the maker 's minimalist intent but it is an interesting exercise by talented writer\/director anderson .
translation: 「パンチドランク・ラブ」の未開拓のストーリーの機会は、制作者のミニマリストの意図に逆らったかもしれませんが、才能ある脚本家兼監督アンダーソンによる興味深い試みです。
back_translation: The unexploited storytelling opportunities in "Punch-Drunk Love" might have gone against the minimalist intentions of the creators, but it is an intriguing attempt by the talented writer-director Anderson.

text: there are now two signs that m. night shyamalan 's debut feature sucked up all he has to give to the mystic genres of cinema : unbreakable and signs .
translation: 現在、M・ナイト・シャマランのデビュー作が映画の神秘的なジャンルに彼が持っているすべてを吸収してしまったと示す二つの兆候があります：『アンブレイカブル』と『サイン』です。
back_translation: Currently, there are two signs that M. Night Shyamalan's debut work has absorbed everything he has into the mystical genre of film: "Unbreakable" and "Signs."

text: if cinema had been around to capture the chaos of france in the 1790 's , one imagines the result would look like something like this .
translation: もし映画が1790年代のフランスの混乱を捉えるために存在していたなら、その結果はこんな感じになっていたと想像できます。
back_translation: If movies had existed to capture the chaos of 1790s France, we can imagine that the result would have been something like this.

text: this quiet , introspective and entertaining independent is worth seeking .
translation: この静かで内省的でありながら面白い独立映画は、探す価値があります。
back_translation: This quiet, introspective yet interesting independent film is worth seeking out.

text: what little atmosphere is generated by the shadowy lighting , macabre sets , and endless rain is offset by the sheer ugliness of everything else .
translation: 影のある照明、陰鬱なセット、そして終わりのない雨が生成するわずかな雰囲気は、その他のすべてのものの純粋な醜さによって相殺されている。
back_translation: The faint atmosphere created by the shadowy lighting, gloomy set, and endless rain is completely offset by the pure ugliness of everything else.

text: what `` empire '' lacks in depth it makes up for with its heart .
translation: 「帝国」が深さに欠けているところは、心で補っている。
back_translation: What the "Empire" lacks in depth, it makes up for with the heart.

text: the usual movie rah-rah , pleasantly and predictably delivered in low-key style by director michael apted and writer tom stoppard .
translation: お馴染みの映画の盛り上がりで、監督マイケル・アップルトンと脚本家トム・ストッパードによって控えめなスタイルで心地よく、予測通りに届けられた。
back_translation: With the familiar excitement of the movie, it was delivered comfortably and predictably in a modest style by director Michael Appleton and screenwriter Tom Stoppard.

text: this starts off with a 1950 's doris day feel and it gets very ugly , very fast .
translation: これは1950年代のドリス・デイの雰囲気から始まり、すぐにとても醜くなります。
back_translation: This starts with the vibe of Doris Day from the 1950s and quickly becomes very ugly.

text: standing by yourself is haunting ... -lrb- it 's -rrb- what punk rock music used to be , and what the video medium could use more of : spirit , perception , conviction .
translation: 一人で立っていることは haunting です ... -lrb- それは -rrb- パンクロック音楽がかつて持っていたものであり、ビデオメディアがもっと必要としているものです：精神、認識、信念。
back_translation: Standing alone is haunting... -lrb- it is -rrb- what punk rock music once had and what video media needs more of: spirit, perception, and belief.

text: a lot like the imaginary sport it projects onto the screen -- loud , violent and mindless .
translation: 画面に投影される架空のスポーツのように、騒がしく、暴力的で、無思考です。
back_translation: Like a fictional sport projected on the screen, it is noisy, violent, and thoughtless.

text: all in all , a great party .
translation: 全体として、素晴らしいパーティーでした。
back_translation: Overall, it was a wonderful party.

text: a thriller with an edge -- which is to say that it does n't follow the stale , standard , connect-the-dots storyline which has become commonplace in movies that explore the seamy underbelly of the criminal world .
translation: エッジのあるスリラーであり、言い換えれば、犯罪の暗い世界を探る映画において一般的な陳腐な標準のストーリーラインに従っていないということです。
back_translation: It is an edgy thriller that does not follow the common clichéd storyline typical of films exploring the dark world of crime.

text: -lrb- seems -rrb- even more uselessly redundant and shamelessly money-grubbing than most third-rate horror sequels .
translation: 多くの三流ホラー続編よりも、さらに無駄に冗長で恥知らずな金儲けと言えるようです。
back_translation: It can be said that it is even more unnecessarily lengthy and shamelessly profit-driven than many third-rate horror sequels.

text: credit director ramsay for taking the sometimes improbable story and making it feel realistic .
translation: ラムジー監督が時にはありえないようなストーリーをリアルに感じさせるように仕上げたことを評価します。
back_translation: I appreciate that Director Ramsey has made even the most unlikely stories feel real at times.

text: it 's a feel-bad ending for a depressing story that throws a bunch of hot-button items in the viewer 's face and asks to be seen as hip , winking social commentary .
translation: 視聴者に対してホットなトピックを投げつけ、ヒップでウィンクする社会的コメントとして見られようとする、落ち込むストーリーの気分が悪くなるような結末です。
back_translation: It’s a story with a disappointing conclusion that throws hot topics at the viewers, aiming to be seen as a hip social commentary while leaving a bad taste.

text: it 's just that it 's so not-at-all-good .
translation: それはただ、全く良くないというだけです。
back_translation: It's just that it's totally not good.

text: -lrb- l -rrb- ame and unnecessary .
translation: -（l -rrb- 名なしで無用です。
back_translation: - (l -rrb- It's useless without a name.

text: while centered on the life experiences of a particular theatrical family , this marvelous documentary touches -- ever so gracefully -- on the entire history of the yiddish theater , both in america and israel .
translation: 特定の劇団の家族の生活体験に焦点を当てながらも、この素晴らしいドキュメンタリーは、アメリカとイスラエルのイディッシュ劇場の全歴史に優雅に触れています。
back_translation: While focusing on the life experiences of a specific theater family's experiences, this wonderful documentary gracefully touches upon the entire history of Yiddish theater in America and Israel.

text: i 'm not sure which will take longer to heal : the welt on johnny knoxville 's stomach from a riot-control projectile or my own tortured psyche .
translation: ジョニー・ノックスヴィルの腹部にある暴動制御用弾丸による腫れが治るのと、私自身の苦しむ精神のどちらが長くかかるか分からない。
back_translation: I don't know which will take longer to heal: the swelling from the riot control round in Johnny Knoxville's abdomen or my own tormented mind.

text: ... the kind of movie you see because the theater has air conditioning .
translation: …映画館がエアコンが効いているから見るタイプの映画。
back_translation: ...a type of movie that you watch because the movie theater has air conditioning.

text: as hannibal would say , yes , ` it 's like having an old friend for dinner ' .
translation: ハンニバルが言うように、「そう、まるで古い友達とディナーを楽しんでいるようだ」。
back_translation: As Hannibal says, "Yes, it's like enjoying dinner with an old friend."

text: it 's bright , pristine style and bold colors make it as much fun as reading an oversized picture book before bedtime .
translation: それは明るく、清潔なスタイルと大胆な色使いが特徴で、まるで就寝前に大きな絵本を読むような楽しさがあります。
back_translation: It features a bright, clean style and bold use of colors, reminiscent of the joy of reading a large picture book before bed.

text: imagine kevin smith , the blasphemous bad boy of suburban jersey , if he were stripped of most of his budget and all of his sense of humor .
translation: ケビン・スミスを想像してみてください。彼は郊外のジャージーの冒涜的な悪党ですが、もし彼がほとんどの予算とすべてのユーモアのセンスを奪われたらどうなるでしょう。
back_translation: Imagine Kevin Smith. He's a blasphemous villain from suburban Jersey, but what would happen if he were stripped of most of his budget and all of his sense of humor?

text: see scratch for the history , see scratch for the music , see scratch for a lesson in scratching , but , most of all , see it for the passion .
translation: 歴史を知るためにスクラッチを見て、音楽を知るためにスクラッチを見て、スクラッチのレッスンを学ぶためにスクラッチを見てください。しかし、何よりも、情熱を感じるためにそれを見ることが大切です。
back_translation: To learn about history, watch Scratch; to learn about music, watch Scratch; and to learn Scratch lessons, watch Scratch. But above all, it's important to watch it to feel passion.

text: always destined to be measured against anthony asquith 's acclaimed 1952 screen adaptation .
translation: 常にアントニー・アスキスの評価の高い1952年の映画化と比較される運命にある。
back_translation: It is destined to be constantly compared to the highly regarded 1952 film adaptation by Anthony Asquith.

text: try this obscenely bad dark comedy , so crass that it makes edward burns ' sidewalks of new york look like oscar wilde .
translation: この信じられないほどひどいダークコメディを試してみてください。あまりにも下品で、エドワード・バーンズの「ニューヨークの歩道」がオスカー・ワイルドのように見えます。
back_translation: Try this unbelievably terrible dark comedy. It's so vulgar that Edward Burns' "Sidewalks of New York" looks like Oscar Wilde.

text: hoffman 's performance is authentic to the core of his being .
translation: ホフマンのパフォーマンスは、彼の存在の核心に忠実です。
back_translation: Hoffman's performance is true to the core of his existence.

text: chicago offers much colorful eye candy , including the spectacle of gere in his dancing shoes , hoofing and crooning with the best of them .
translation: シカゴは多くのカラフルな視覚的魅力を提供しており、その中にはジェリーがダンスシューズを履いて最高の人たちと共に踊り、歌う光景も含まれています。
back_translation: Chicago offers a lot of colorful visual attractions, including scenes where Jerry dances and sings with the best people wearing dancing shoes.

text: the artwork is spectacular and unlike most animaton from japan , the characters move with grace and panache .
translation: そのアートワークは素晴らしく、日本の多くのアニメーションとは異なり、キャラクターは優雅さとスタイルで動きます。
back_translation: The artwork is wonderful, and unlike many Japanese animations, the characters move with grace and style.

text: the best movie in many a moon about the passions that sometimes fuel our best achievements and other times leave us stranded with nothing more than our lesser appetites .
translation: 多くの月の中で、私たちの最高の成果を促す情熱と、他の時には私たちを無力にし、より低い欲望だけを残してしまう情熱についての最高の映画。
back_translation: The best movie about the passion that drives our greatest achievements during many months, and the passion that sometimes renders us powerless, leaving only lower desires.

text: nothing more than a widget cranked out on an assembly line to see if stupid americans will get a kick out of goofy brits with cute accents performing ages-old slapstick and unfunny tricks .
translation: 愚かなアメリカ人が可愛らしいアクセントの楽しいイギリス人による古くからのスラップスティックや面白くないトリックを楽しむかどうかを見るために、組み立てラインで生産されたただのウィジェットに過ぎない。
back_translation: It's just a widget produced on an assembly line to see whether foolish Americans enjoy the old slapstick and unfunny tricks by charming Brits with their delightful accents.

text: bad and baffling from the get-go .
translation: 最初から悪くて困惑させる。
back_translation: It's been bad from the beginning and it's confusing.

text: the obnoxious special effects , the obligatory outbursts of flatulence and the incessant , so-five-minutes-ago pop music on the soundtrack overwhelm what is left of the scruffy , dopey old hanna-barbera charm .
translation: 嫌な特殊効果、必然的なおならの爆発、そしてサウンドトラックに流れるうるさい、もう五分前のポップミュージックが、ボロボロで間抜けな古いハンナ・バーベラの魅力を圧倒している。
back_translation: Unpleasant special effects, the inevitable explosion of flatulence, and the loud pop music from five minutes ago playing on the soundtrack overwhelm the shabby, goofy charm of the old Hanna-Barbera.

text: the filmmakers try to balance pointed , often incisive satire and unabashed sweetness , with results that are sometimes bracing , sometimes baffling and quite often , and in unexpected ways , touching .
translation: 映画製作者は、鋭い時には鋭利な風刺とあからさまな甘さのバランスを取ろうとし、時には刺激的で、時には困惑させられ、そしてしばしば意外な形で感動を与える結果を生み出しています。
back_translation: Filmmakers strive to balance sharp, sometimes cutting satire with overt sweetness, creating results that are at times provocative, at times perplexing, and often moving in unexpected ways.

text: harmless fun .
translation: 無害な楽しみ。
back_translation: Harmless enjoyment.

text: astonishingly skillful and moving ... it could become a historically significant work as well as a masterfully made one .
translation: 驚くほど巧妙で感動的であり... 歴史的に重要な作品になる可能性があると同時に、見事に作られた作品でもある。
back_translation: It is remarkably clever and moving... a work that has the potential to be historically significant, as well as being beautifully crafted.

text: feeling to it , but like the 1920 's , the trip there is a great deal of fun .
translation: その感覚ですが、1920年代のように、そこへの旅はとても楽しいです。
back_translation: That feeling is very enjoyable, like a journey to the 1920s.

text: unsurprisingly , the way this all works out makes the women look more like stereotypical caretakers and moral teachers , instead of serious athletes .
translation: 驚くことではないが、これがすべてどのように進展するかは、女性たちを真剣なアスリートではなく、典型的な世話役や道徳の教師のように見せる。
back_translation: It's not surprising, but how this all develops makes the women appear more like typical caretakers or moral instructors rather than serious athletes.

text: eight legged freaks is clever and funny , is amused by its special effects , and leaves you feeling like you 've seen a movie instead of an endless trailer .

back_translation: Cal is an uncomfortable and superficial character that feels immature for sharing a 110-minute sense of suffocation together.

text: berry 's saucy , full-bodied performance gives this aging series a much needed kick , making `` die another day '' one of the most entertaining bonds in years
translation: ベリーの大胆で豊かな演技が、この古いシリーズに必要な刺激を与え、「ダイ・アナザー・デイ」をここ数年で最も楽しめるボンド作品の一つにしています。
back_translation: Berry's bold and rich performance injects the necessary excitement into this old series, making "Die Another Day" one of the most enjoyable Bond films in recent years.

text: despite the film 's bizarre developments , hoffman keeps us riveted with every painful nuance , unexpected flashes of dark comedy and the character 's gripping humanity .
translation: 映画の奇妙な展開にもかかわらず、ホフマンは私たちを引きつけ続け、痛みを伴うニュアンスや予想外のダークコメディの瞬間、そしてキャラクターの心を掴む人間性で私たちを魅了します。
back_translation: Despite the film's strange developments, Hoffman continues to captivate us, enchanting us with painful nuances, unexpected moments of dark comedy, and the characters' gripping humanity.

text: if you love reading and\/or poetry , then by all means check it out .
translation: 読書や詩が好きなら、ぜひチェックしてみてください。
back_translation: If you like reading and poetry, be sure to check it out.

text: driven by a fantastic dual performance from ian holm ... the film is funny , insightfully human and a delightful lark for history buffs .
translation: イアン・ホルムの素晴らしい二重の演技によって駆動されているこの映画は、面白く、人間味あふれ、歴史好きにとって楽しいお遊びです。
back_translation: Driven by Ian Holm's wonderful dual performance, this film is entertaining, full of humanity, and a delightful romp for history buffs.

text: douglas mcgrath 's nicholas nickleby does dickens as it should be done cinematically .
translation: ダグラス・マクグラスの『ニコラス・ニクルビー』は、ディケンズを映画的に行うべきように実現しています。
back_translation: Douglas McGrath's "Nicholas Nickleby" realizes Dickens in a cinematic way.

text: diane lane 's sophisticated performance ca n't rescue adrian lyne 's unfaithful from its sleazy moralizing .
translation: ダイアン・レインの洗練された演技は、アドリアン・ラインの「不倫」をその下品な道徳的説教から救うことはできない。
back_translation: Diane Lane's sophisticated performance cannot save Adrian Lyne's "Unfaithful" from its vulgar moral preaching.

text: simply put , `` far from heaven '' is a masterpiece .
translation: 簡単に言えば、「ファー・フロム・ヘブン」は傑作です。
back_translation: In short, "Far from Heaven" is a masterpiece.

text: shot in rich , shadowy black-and-white , devils chronicles , with increasingly amused irony , the relationship between reluctant captors and befuddled captives .
translation: 豊かな陰影のある白黒で撮影された「悪魔の年代記」は、渋々捕らえた者と戸惑う囚人との関係をますます面白おかしくアイロニーを交えて描いています。
back_translation: "The Chronicles of the Devil," shot in rich shades of black and white, depicts the relationship between the reluctant captor and the bewildered prisoner with increasing humor and irony.

text: mcgrath has deftly trimmed dickens ' wonderfully sprawling soap opera , the better to focus on the hero 's odyssey from cowering poverty to courage and happiness .
translation: マクラースはディケンズの素晴らしく広がりのあるソープオペラを巧みに切り詰め、英雄の貧困からの恐れを克服し、勇気と幸せに至るオデッセイに焦点を当てることができました。
back_translation: MacLeish skillfully condensed Dickens' wonderfully expansive soap opera, focusing on the odyssey of overcoming the fear of the hero's poverty and reaching courage and happiness.

text: anyone who suffers through this film deserves , at the very least , a big box of consolation candy .
translation: この映画を耐え抜いた誰もが、少なくとも大きな慰めのキャンディボックスをもらうに値する。
back_translation: Anyone who perseveres through this movie deserves to at least receive a big comforting candy box.

text: a worthwhile documentary , whether you 're into rap or not , even if it may still leave you wanting more answers as the credits roll .
translation: ラップに興味があってもなくても、価値のあるドキュメンタリーです。エンドロールが流れるときに、もっと多くの答えを求めたくなるかもしれませんが。
back_translation: Whether you're interested in rap or not, it's a worthwhile documentary. You might find yourself wanting more answers when the credits roll.

text: the original was n't a good movie but this remake makes it look like a masterpiece !
translation: 元の作品は良い映画ではありませんでしたが、このリメイクはそれを名作のように見せています！
back_translation: The original work was not a good movie, but this remake makes it look like a masterpiece!

text: it 's a fun adventure movie for kids -lrb- of all ages -rrb- that like adventure .
translation: すべての年齢の子供たちにとって、冒険が好きな楽しい冒険映画です。
back_translation: It's a fun adventure movie for children of all ages who love adventure.

text: one sloughs one 's way through the mire of this alleged psychological thriller in search of purpose or even a plot .
translation: この名ばかりの心理的スリラーの泥沼を抜け出そうとしながら、目的やプロットさえも探し続ける。
back_translation: While trying to escape the quagmire of this nominal psychological thriller, I continue to search for purpose and even the plot.

text: limps along on a squirm-inducing fish-out-of-water formula that goes nowhere and goes there very , very slowly .
translation: どこにも行かず、とても、とても遅く進む、身動きの取れない場所にいる魚のようなフォーミュラに沿って、もどかしく進んでいます。
back_translation: I am frustratingly moving along a formula like a fish in a place where I can't move, going very, very slowly without going anywhere.

text: no amount of nostalgia for carvey 's glory days can disguise the fact that the new film is a lame kiddie flick and that carvey 's considerable talents are wasted in it .
translation: カーヴィーの栄光の日々への懐かしさがどれだけあろうとも、新しい映画がつまらない子供向けの作品であり、カーヴィーの相当な才能が無駄にされているという事実は隠せない。
back_translation: No matter how nostalgic one may feel about the glorious days of Kirby, the fact remains that the new movie is a boring children's film, and Kirby's considerable talent is being wasted.

text: consistently clever and suspenseful .
translation: 一貫して賢く、緊張感のある。
back_translation: Consistently intelligent and tense.

text: this is an ungainly movie , ill-fitting , with its elbows sticking out where the knees should be .
translation: これは不格好な映画で、膝のあるべきところに肘が出ているような不適合な作品です。
back_translation: This is an awkward movie, a mismatched piece of work where elbows protrude where knees should be.

text: a real audience-pleaser that will strike a chord with anyone who 's ever waited in a doctor 's office , emergency room , hospital bed or insurance company office .
translation: 誰しもが医者の待合室、緊急治療室、病院のベッド、または保険会社のオフィスで待ったことがあるなら、共感を呼ぶ本当の観客の心をつかむ作品です。
back_translation: This is a work that captures the hearts of a truly empathetic audience, especially for anyone who has ever waited in a doctor's waiting room, an emergency room, a hospital bed, or an insurance company office.

text: ... if you , like me , think an action film disguised as a war tribute is disgusting to begin with , then you 're in for a painful ride .
translation: ...もしあなたも私のように、戦争の賛辞として見せかけたアクション映画がそもそも気持ち悪いと思っているなら、痛苦な体験が待っています。
back_translation: ...if you, like me, find action films that masquerade as a tribute to war to be fundamentally disturbing, then a painful experience awaits.

text: if you 're as happy listening to movies as you are watching them , and the slow parade of human frailty fascinates you , then you 're at the right film .
translation: もし映画を観るのと同じくらい映画を聴くことにも幸せを感じ、人的な脆さの緩やかな行進に魅了されるなら、あなたは正しい映画にいます。
back_translation: If you find as much happiness in listening to movies as you do in watching them, and if you are captivated by the gentle march of human fragility, then you are in the right film.

text: one funny popcorn flick .
translation: おもしろいポップコーン映画。
back_translation: An interesting popcorn movie.

text: bad company has one of the most moronic screenplays of the year , full of holes that will be obvious even to those who are n't looking for them .
translation: 「バッドカンパニー」は、今年最も馬鹿げた脚本の一つであり、探していなくても明らかな穴がたくさんあります。
back_translation: "Bad Company" is one of the most ridiculous screenplays of the year, filled with obvious holes even if you aren't looking for them.

text: i 'd be hard pressed to think of a film more cloyingly sappy than evelyn this year .
translation: 今年、エブリンよりもこれほど甘ったるくて感傷的な映画を思いつくのは難しい。
back_translation: This year, it's hard to think of a film that is as sweet and sentimental as Evelyn.

text: a gem of a romantic crime comedy that turns out to be clever , amusing and unpredictable .
translation: 巧妙で、面白く、予測不可能なロマンティック・クライム・コメディの宝石のような作品です。
back_translation: It is a clever, entertaining, and unpredictable romantic crime comedy gem.

text: smith finds amusing juxtapositions that justify his exercise .
translation: スミスは彼の運動を正当化する面白い対比を見つける。
back_translation: Smith finds an interesting contrast to justify his exercise.

text: a charming , banter-filled comedy ... one of those airy cinematic bon bons whose aims -- and by extension , accomplishments -- seem deceptively slight on the surface .
translation: 魅力的で軽妙なコメディ…表面的にはその目的と達成が deceptivelyなほど小さく見える、そんな軽やかな映画のボンボンの一つです。
back_translation: An attractive and lighthearted comedy... On the surface, its purpose and achievement seem deceptively small, making it one of those light films that are like bonbons.

text: it 's that rare family movie -- genuine and sweet without relying on animation or dumb humor .
translation: それは珍しいファミリー映画で、アニメーションや愚かなユーモアに頼ることなく、本物で甘美です。
back_translation: It's a rare family movie that is genuine and sweet without relying on animation or silly humor.

text: hollywood ending is the most disappointing woody allen movie ever .
translation: ハリウッドエンディングは、ウディ・アレンの映画の中で最もがっかりさせる作品です。
back_translation: Hollywood Ending is the most disappointing film among Woody Allen's works.

text: it 's mildly amusing , but i certainly ca n't recommend it .
translation: それはやや面白いですが、私は決しておすすめできません。
back_translation: It’s somewhat interesting, but I can never recommend it.

text: this dreadfully earnest inversion of the concubine love triangle eschews the previous film 's historical panorama and roiling pathos for bug-eyed mugging and gay-niche condescension .
translation: この非常に真剣な側面からの愛人の愛の三角関係は、前作の歴史的なパノラマや激しい悲哀を避け、驚きの目を持った表情やゲイ・ニッチへの見下しを選んでいる。
back_translation: This very serious aspect of the love triangle involving the mistress avoids the historical panorama and intense sorrow of the previous work, opting instead for expressions of surprise and disdain towards the gay niche.

text: formula 51 promises a new kind of high but delivers the same old bad trip .
translation: フォーミュラ51は新しい種類のハイを約束するが、同じ古い悪いトリップをもたらす。
back_translation: Formula 51 promises a new kind of high, but brings the same old bad trip.

text: what madonna does here ca n't properly be called acting -- more accurately , it 's moving and it 's talking and it 's occasionally gesturing , sometimes all at once .
translation: ここでマドンナがしていることは、正確には演技とは呼べません。もっと正確に言えば、動いていて、話していて、時々ジェスチャーをしている、時にはそれらがすべて同時に行われています。
back_translation: What Madonna is doing here cannot accurately be called acting. To be more precise, she is moving, speaking, and sometimes gesturing, and at times all of these are happening simultaneously.

text: rifkin 's references are ... impeccable throughout .
translation: リフキンの参考文献は、全体を通して...完璧です。
back_translation: Rifkin's references are perfect throughout.

text: the director explores all three sides of his story with a sensitivity and an inquisitiveness reminiscent of truffaut .
translation: 監督は、トリュフォーを彷彿とさせる感受性と好奇心をもって、物語の三つの側面を探求しています。
back_translation: The director explores the three aspects of the story with a sensitivity and curiosity reminiscent of Truffaut.

text: the fact that the ` best part ' of the movie comes from a 60-second homage to one of demme 's good films does n't bode well for the rest of it .
translation: 映画の「最高の部分」がダメの良作への60秒のオマージュから来ているという事実は、残りの部分にとって良い兆しではない。
back_translation: The fact that the movie's "best part" comes from a 60-second homage to a good work that is otherwise not great is not a good sign for the rest of it.

text: an enjoyable comedy of lingual and cultural differences ... the château is a film -- full of life and small delights -- that has all the wiggling energy of young kitten .
translation: 言語的および文化的な違いによる楽しいコメディ…シャトーは、活気に満ち、小さな喜びで満たされた映画で、若い子猫のようなわくわくするエネルギーにあふれています。
back_translation: A delightful comedy stemming from linguistic and cultural differences... Château is a vibrant film filled with small joys, overflowing with the exciting energy of a young kitten.

text: an engaging , formulaic sports drama that carries a charge of genuine excitement .
translation: 真の興奮を伴った魅力的な、定型的なスポーツドラマ。
back_translation: A captivating, stereotypical sports drama filled with true excitement.

text: something must have been lost in the translation .
translation: 翻訳の過程で何かが失われたに違いありません。
back_translation: Something must have been lost in the translation process.

text: witty , contemplative , and sublimely beautiful .
translation: 機知に富み、考え深く、極めて美しい。
back_translation: Witty, thoughtful, and extremely beautiful.

text: foster and whitaker are especially fine .
translation: フォスターとウィッテカーは特に素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Foster and Whitaker are particularly wonderful.

text: the lightest , most breezy movie steven spielberg has made in more than a decade .
translation: スティーブン・スピルバーグがここ10年以上で作った中で、最も軽やかで、風通しの良い映画。
back_translation: The lightest and most breezy film that Steven Spielberg has made in the last ten years.

text: if i want a real movie , i 'll buy the criterion dvd .
translation: 本物の映画が欲しいなら、クリテリオンのDVDを買います。
back_translation: If you want the real movies, buy the Criterion DVDs.

text: an earnest , roughshod document , it serves as a workable primer for the region 's recent history , and would make a terrific 10th-grade learning tool .
translation: 誠実で粗野な文書であり、この地域の最近の歴史についての実用的な入門書として機能し、10年生の学習ツールとして素晴らしいものになるでしょう。
back_translation: It is a sincere and rough document that serves as a practical introduction to the recent history of this region, making it a great learning tool for 10th-grade students.

text: a conventional but heartwarming tale .
translation: 従来のですが心温まる物語。
back_translation: It is a traditional yet heartwarming story.

text: a sly female empowerment movie , although not in a way anyone would expect .
translation: 予想とは異なる形での狡猾な女性のエンパワーメント映画。
back_translation: A cunningly empowering film about women, in a form different from what was expected.

text: the problem is the needlessly poor quality of its archival prints and film footage .
translation: 問題は、アーカイブの印刷物やフィルム映像の必要以上に低い品質です。
back_translation: The issue is the unnecessarily low quality of archive prints and film footage.

text: there 's something unintentionally comic in the film 's drumbeat about authenticity , given the stale plot and pornographic way the film revels in swank apartments , clothes and parties .
translation: 映画が真実性について繰り返し語る中で、古くさいプロットや豪華なアパート、衣服、パーティーを享楽的に描く様子には、意図せざる滑稽さがある。
back_translation: As the film repeatedly speaks about authenticity, there is an unintended absurdity in the way it indulgently depicts outdated plots, luxurious apartments, clothing, and parties.

text: strange occurrences build in the mind of the viewer and take on extreme urgency .
translation: 奇妙な出来事が視聴者の心に積み重なり、極度の緊急性を帯びていく。
back_translation: Strange events accumulate in the viewers' minds, becoming increasingly urgent.

text: the formula is familiar but enjoyable .
translation: そのフォーミュラは親しみやすいが、楽しめる。
back_translation: The formula is accessible but enjoyable.

text: its screenplay serves as auto-critique , and its clumsiness as its own most damning censure .
translation: その脚本は自己批評として機能し、その不器用さは自らに対する最も厳しい非難となっている。
back_translation: The script functions as self-criticism, and its awkwardness serves as the harshest critique of itself.

text: less an examination of neo-nazism than a probe into the nature of faith itself .
translation: ネオナチズムの検証というよりは、信仰そのものの本質を探る試みである。
back_translation: It is an attempt to explore the very essence of faith rather than an examination of neo-Nazism.

text: good performances and a realistic , non-exploitive approach make paid in full worth seeing .
translation: 優れた演技と現実的で搾取的でないアプローチが、「ペイド・イン・フル」を見る価値のある作品にしています。
back_translation: The excellent acting and realistic, non-exploitative approach make "Paid in Full" a work worth watching.

text: just is n't as weird as it ought to be .
translation: ただ、それほど奇妙ではない。
back_translation: However, it’s not that strange.

text: if you love the music , and i do , its hard to imagine having more fun watching a documentary ...
translation: 音楽が好きなら、私もそうですが、ドキュメンタリーを観ることでこれ以上楽しいことを想像するのは難しいです...
back_translation: If you like music, I do too, but it's hard to imagine anything more enjoyable than watching documentaries...

text: watching queen of the damned is like reading a research paper , with special effects tossed in .
translation: 「虐げられた女王」を観るのは、特別な効果が加えられた研究論文を読むようなものです。
back_translation: Watching "The Oppressed Queen" is like reading a research paper with special effects added.

text: stinks from start to finish , like a wet burlap sack of gloom .
translation: 始まりから終わりまで臭い、まるで湿った麻袋のような憂鬱。
back_translation: From beginning to end, it smells like a damp burlap bag of gloom.

text: the merchant-ivory team continues to systematically destroy everything we hold dear about cinema , only now it 's begun to split up so that it can do even more damage .
translation: マーチャント・アイボリーのチームは、私たちが映画について大切に思っているすべてを体系的に破壊し続けていますが、今やさらなるダメージを与えるために分裂し始めています。
back_translation: The Merchant Ivory team continues to systematically destroy everything we care about regarding films, but now they have started to split up to inflict even more damage.

text: while there are times when the film 's reach exceeds its grasp , the production works more often than it does n't .
translation: 映画の届く範囲がその把握を超えることもあるが、制作はそうでないことよりもむしろ成功することが多い。
back_translation: While the range of a film can sometimes exceed that understanding, production is often more successful than not.

text: hugely accomplished slice of hitchcockian suspense .
translation: 非常に成し遂げられたヒッチコック風のサスペンスです。
back_translation: It is a highly accomplished Hitchcock-style suspense.

text: exhibits the shallow sensationalism characteristic of soap opera ... more salacious telenovela than serious drama .
translation: 昼ドラ特有の浅いセンセーショナリズムを示しており、真剣なドラマというよりももっと猥雑なテレノベラのようです。
back_translation: It shows the shallow sensationalism characteristic of daytime dramas, resembling more of a vulgar telenovela than a serious drama.

text: i 'm sure there 's a teenage boy out there somewhere who 's dying for this kind of entertainment .
translation: どこかにこのようなエンターテインメントを求めているティーンエイジャーの男の子がいるに違いない。
back_translation: There must be a teenage boy somewhere who is looking for this kind of entertainment.

text: why sit through a crummy , wannabe-hip crime comedy that refers incessantly to old movies , when you could just rent those movies instead , let alone seek out a respectable new one ?
translation: なぜ古い映画を執拗に引用するようなつまらない、真似をしたヒップな犯罪コメディを観なければならないのか？それなら、その映画をレンタルするか、立派な新作を探す方がよっぽど良いではないか。
back_translation: Why do we have to watch a boring, derivative hip crime comedy that obsessively quotes old movies? If that's the case, it's much better to rent that movie or look for a decent new release.

text: a thoroughly awful movie -- dumb , narratively chaotic , visually sloppy ... a weird amalgam of ` the thing ' and a geriatric ` scream . '
translation: 完全にひどい映画 -- バカバカしく、物語が混沌としていて、視覚的にも雑・・・『ザ・シング』と高齢者版『スクリーム』の奇妙な混合体。
back_translation: Completely terrible movie -- ridiculous, with a chaotic story, and visually messy... a strange mixture of 'The Thing' and an elderly version of 'Scream.'

text: contains the humor , characterization , poignancy , and intelligence of a bad sitcom .
translation: 悪いシットコムのユーモア、キャラクター描写、感動、そして知性が含まれています。
back_translation: It contains bad sitcom humor, character portrayal, emotion, and intelligence.

text: laughably , irredeemably awful .
translation: 嘲笑すべきほど取り返しのつかないひどさ。
back_translation: So terrible that it deserves to be mocked.

text: one long , numbing action sequence made up mostly of routine stuff yuen has given us before .
translation: ユエンが以前に私たちに提供した主に日常的な内容で構成された、一つの長く、鈍いアクションシーケンス。
back_translation: A long, dull action sequence primarily composed of everyday content that Yuen previously provided to us.

text: together -lrb- time out and human resources -rrb- establish mr. cantet as france 's foremost cinematic poet of the workplace .
translation: 「タッグを組んで（タイムアウトと人事）、カンテ氏をフランスの職場の最も重要な映画詩人として確立する。」
back_translation: "Teaming up (timeout and personnel), to establish Mr. Kanté as the most important film poet in the French workplace."

text: ... a gleefully grungy , hilariously wicked black comedy ...
translation: ... 陽気にグランジで、非常に悪意に満ちたブラックコメディ ...
back_translation: ... Cheerfully grunge and filled with extremely malicious black comedy ...

text: with spy kids 2 : the island of lost dreams , the spy kids franchise establishes itself as a durable part of the movie landscape : a james bond series for kids .
translation: スパイキッズ2：失われた夢の島により、スパイキッズフランチャイズは映画界の中で持続可能な存在を確立しました。子供向けのジェームズ・ボンドシリーズです。
back_translation: Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams has established the Spy Kids franchise as a sustainable presence in the film industry. It is a children's version of the James Bond series.

text: reno himself can take credit for most of the movie 's success .
translation: レノ自身が映画の成功の大部分に対してクレジットを得ることができる。
back_translation: Leno himself can take credit for much of the film's success.

text: outside of burger 's desire to make some kind of film , it 's really unclear why this project was undertaken
translation: バーガーの映画を作りたいという欲望を除けば、このプロジェクトがなぜ行われたのかは本当に不明です。
back_translation: Aside from the desire to make a movie about burgers, it is really unclear why this project took place.

text: as for children , they wo n't enjoy the movie at all .
translation: 子供たちは、この映画を全く楽しめないでしょう。
back_translation: The children probably won't enjoy this movie at all.

text: if you saw it on tv , you 'd probably turn it off , convinced that you had already seen that movie .
translation: もしテレビでそれを見たら、あの映画はもう見たと思い込み、たぶん消すでしょう。
back_translation: If I saw that on TV, I would probably assume I had already seen that movie and would likely turn it off.

text: while it is interesting to witness the conflict from the palestinian side , longley 's film lacks balance ... and fails to put the struggle into meaningful historical context .
translation: パレスチナ側からの対立を目撃することは興味深いが、ロンリーの映画はバランスを欠いており、闘争を意味のある歴史的文脈に置くことができていない。
back_translation: It is interesting to witness the conflict from the Palestinian side, but the lonely film lacks balance and fails to place the struggle in a meaningful historical context.

text: journalistically dubious , inept and often lethally dull .
translation: ジャーナリスティックに疑わしく、無能でしばしば致命的に退屈です。
back_translation: It is journalistic, questionable, incompetent, and often devastatingly boring.

text: brilliantly written and well-acted , yellow asphalt is an uncompromising film .
translation: 見事に書かれ、素晴らしい演技が光る「イエローアスファルト」は、妥協のない映画です。
back_translation: "Yellow Asphalt," beautifully written and featuring outstanding performances, is a film without compromise.

text: like mike is n't going to make box office money that makes michael jordan jealous , but it has some cute moments , funny scenes , and hits the target audience -lrb- young bow wow fans -rrb- - with nothing but net .
translation: マイクのようには興行収入でマイケル・ジョーダンを嫉妬させることはないでしょうが、かわいい瞬間や面白いシーンがいくつかあり、ターゲットオーディエンス（若いボウワウのファン）にはただネットを打って届けています。
back_translation: It probably won’t outdo Michael Jordan in box office revenue like Mike, but there are some cute moments and funny scenes that just hit the mark for the target audience (young Bow Wow fans).

text: the gags that fly at such a furiously funny pace that the only rip off that we were aware of was the one we felt when the movie ended so damned soon .
translation: そんなに猛スピードで飛び出すギャグに、私たちが気づいていた唯一のパクリは、映画がこんなにあっという間に終わってしまった時の残念さでした。
back_translation: The only thing we noticed that was a copy in such a rapid-fire joke was the disappointment when the movie ended so suddenly.

text: while the path may be familiar , first-time director denzel washington and a top-notch cast manage to keep things interesting .
translation: 道は馴染みのあるものかもしれませんが、初めて監督を務めるデンゼル・ワシントンと優れたキャストがうまく興味を引き続けています。
back_translation: The road may be familiar, but the first-time director Denzel Washington and the excellent cast manage to keep the interest alive.

text: standing in the shadows of motown is the best kind of documentary , one that makes a depleted yesterday feel very much like a brand-new tomorrow .
translation: モータウンの影で立っていることは、衰退した昨日をまるで真新しい明日であるかのように感じさせる、最高のドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: Standing in the shadow of Motown, this is the best documentary that makes the faded yesterday feel like a brand new tomorrow.

text: a series of escapades demonstrating the adage that what is good for the goose is also good for the gander , some of which occasionally amuses but none of which amounts to much of a story .
translation: おんどりに良いことは雌鳥にも良いという格言を示す一連の冒険であり、時折楽しませてくれるものの、どれも大した物語にはならない。
back_translation: It is a series of adventures that illustrates the proverb that what is good for the rooster is also good for the hen, and while it occasionally provides entertainment, none of it amounts to much of a story.

text: j. lo will earn her share of the holiday box office pie , although this movie makes one thing perfectly clear : she 's a pretty woman , but she 's no working girl .
translation: J.ロはホリデーボックスオフィスのシェアを得るだろうが、この映画は1つのことを完全に明らかにしている：彼女は美しい女性だが、働く女ではない。
back_translation: J.Lo will gain a share of the holiday box office, but this movie makes one thing completely clear: she is a beautiful woman, but not a working woman.

text: this documentary is a dazzling , remarkably unpretentious reminder of what -lrb- evans -rrb- had , lost , and got back .
translation: このドキュメンタリーは、エバンスが持っていたもの、失ったもの、そして取り戻したものを思い出させる、目を見張るような、驚くほど控えめな作品です。
back_translation: This documentary is a stunning and remarkably humble work that reminds us of what Evans had, what he lost, and what he regained.

text: their work is fantastic .
translation: 彼らの作品は素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Their work is wonderful.

text: much of the movie 's charm lies in the utter cuteness of stuart and margolo .
translation: 映画「スチュアート・リトル」の魅力は、スチュアートとマーゴの非常に可愛らしさにあります。
back_translation: The charm of the movie "Stuart Little" lies in the very cuteness of Stuart and Margo.

text: looks and feels like a low-budget hybrid of scarface or carlito 's way .
translation: スカーフェイスやカリートの道の低予算版のような見た目と感触です。
back_translation: It has the appearance and feel of a low-budget version of Scarface or Carlito's Way.

text: a profoundly stupid affair , populating its hackneyed and meanspirited storyline with cardboard characters and performers who value cash above credibility .
translation: 非常に愚かな出来事で、ありふれた意地の悪いストーリーに、キャッシュを信用よりも重視する擬似的なキャラクターと演者で溢れています。
back_translation: It is a very foolish event, filled with a common spiteful story, featuring pseudo characters and performers who prioritize cash over trust.

text: like its script , which nurses plot holes gaping enough to pilot an entire olympic swim team through , the characters in swimfan seem motivated by nothing short of dull , brain-deadening hangover .
translation: その脚本のように、穴が空いていてオリンピックの水泳チームを通すには十分な大きさのプロットホールがあり、スイムファンのキャラクターは退屈で頭が痛くなるような二日酔い以外の何物でもない動機に動かされているように見える。
back_translation: Like that screenplay, there is a plot hole big enough to fit an Olympic swimming team, and the character of the swim fan seems to be driven by nothing more than a boring and headache-inducing hangover.

text: do we really need the tiger beat version ?
translation: 本当にタイガービート版が必要ですか？
back_translation: Do you really need the Tiger Beat version?

text: if it 's unnerving suspense you 're after -- you 'll find it with ring , an indisputably spooky film ; with a screenplay to die for .
translation: あなたが探しているのが不安を感じさせるサスペンスなら、『リング』でそれを見つけることができます。間違いなく不気味な映画で、死ぬほど素晴らしい脚本があります。
back_translation: If you are looking for a suspense that induces anxiety, you can find it in "The Ring." It's undeniably a creepy movie with a brilliantly terrifying script.

text: gosling creates a staggeringly compelling character , a young man whose sharp intellect is at the very root of his contradictory , self-hating , self-destructive ways .
translation: ゴズリングは驚くほど魅力的なキャラクターを作り出します。彼は鋭い知性を持つ若者で、その矛盾した自己嫌悪的で自己破壊的な行動の根源にあります。
back_translation: Gosling creates an incredibly captivating character. He is a young man with sharp intelligence, and he embodies the roots of contradictory self-loathing and self-destructive behavior.

text: a beautiful paean to a time long past .
translation: 過ぎ去った時代への美しい賛歌。
back_translation: A beautiful ode to a bygone era.

text: an extremely funny , ultimately heartbreaking look at life in contemporary china .
translation: 現代中国の生活を非常に面白く、最終的には心が痛む形で描いた作品。
back_translation: A work that portrays modern Chinese life in a very interesting way, ultimately with a heart-wrenching feeling.

text: sheds light on a subject few are familiar with , and makes you care about music you may not have heard before .
translation: あまり知られていないテーマに光を当て、あなたがこれまで聞いたことがないかもしれない音楽に関心を持たせてくれます。
back_translation: It sheds light on lesser-known themes and piques your interest in music you may have never heard before.

text: but for the most part , the weight of water comes off as a two-way time-switching myopic mystery that stalls in its lackluster gear of emotional blandness .
translation: しかし、ほとんどの場合、水の重さは、一方通行の時間切り替えがわからないまま、感情の無味乾燥なギアで停滞する短視的な謎のように感じられる。
back_translation: However, in most cases, the weight of water feels like a short-sighted mystery that stagnates in the flavorless gears of emotion, unaware of the one-way switch of time.

text: and diesel is n't the actor to save it .
translation: そしてディーゼルはそれを救う役者ではない。
back_translation: And diesel is not the actor that will save it.

text: a feeble tootsie knockoff .
translation: 弱弱しいトゥーシーの模造品。
back_translation: A weak imitation of a Tushy.

text: see it for his performance if nothing else .
translation: 彼のパフォーマンスを見るためだけでも、見る価値があります。
back_translation: It's worth watching just to see his performance.

text: terrific casting and solid execution give all three stories life .
translation: 素晴らしいキャスティングと確かな実行が、全てのストーリーに命を吹き込んでいる。
back_translation: The wonderful casting and assured execution breathe life into every story.

text: the skirmishes for power waged among victims and predators settle into an undistinguished rhythm of artificial suspense .
translation: 犠牲者と捕食者の間で繰り広げられる権力を巡る小競り合いは、人工的なサスペンスの無個性なリズムに収束していく。
back_translation: The power struggle unfolding between victims and predators converges into an impersonal rhythm of artificial suspense.

text: a thriller without a lot of thrills .
translation: スリルの少ないスリラー。
back_translation: A thriller with little thrill.

text: yet the act is still charming here .
translation: しかし、ここではその行為はまだ魅力的です。
back_translation: However, the act is still appealing here.

text: far more enjoyable than its predecessor .
translation: 前作よりもはるかに楽しい。
back_translation: Much more fun than the previous work.

text: a moving essay about the specter of death , especially suicide .
translation: 死の幽霊、特に自殺についての感動的なエッセイ。
back_translation: A poignant essay about the ghost of death, particularly concerning suicide.

text: phillip noyce and all of his actors -- as well as his cinematographer , christopher doyle -- understand the delicate forcefulness of greene 's prose , and it 's there on the screen in their version of the quiet american .
translation: フィリップ・ノイスと彼の俳優たち、そして彼の撮影監督クリストファー・ドイルは、グリーンの文章の繊細な力強さを理解しており、彼らの「クワイエット・アメリカン」のバージョンにはそれが映し出されています。
back_translation: Philip Noyce and his actors, along with his cinematographer Christopher Doyle, understand the delicate power of Greene's writing, and it is reflected in their version of "The Quiet American."

text: though it runs 163 minutes , safe conduct is anything but languorous .
translation: 163分の長さにもかかわらず、「セーフ・コンダクト」は決してだらけた作品ではありません。
back_translation: Despite its length of 163 minutes, "Safe Conduct" is never a sluggish work.

text: this is the kind of movie that you only need to watch for about thirty seconds before you say to yourself , ` ah , yes , here we have a bad , bad , bad movie . '
translation: これは、約30秒見るだけで「うん、そうだ、ここには悪い、悪い、悪い映画がある」と自分に言ってしまうような映画です。
back_translation: This is the kind of movie that makes you say to yourself, "Yeah, that's right, there's a bad, bad, bad movie here," after just about 30 seconds of watching.

text: even at its worst , it 's not half-bad .
translation: 最悪の時でも、それほど悪くはない。
back_translation: Even in the worst times, it's not that bad.

text: ... even if you 've never heard of chaplin , you 'll still be glued to the screen .
translation: チャップリンを聞いたことがなくても、あなたはまだ画面に釘付けになるでしょう。
back_translation: Even if you have never heard of Chaplin, you will still be glued to the screen.

text: a long , dull procession of despair , set to cello music culled from a minimalist funeral .
translation: ミニマリストの葬式から選ばれたチェロの音楽に合わせた、長く退屈な絶望の行進。
back_translation: A long, dull march of despair set to cello music chosen from a minimalist funeral.

text: the concert footage is stirring , the recording sessions are intriguing , and -- on the way to striking a blow for artistic integrity -- this quality band may pick up new admirers .
translation: コンサートの映像は感動的で、レコーディングセッションは興味深く、芸術的な誠実さのために一撃を加える途中で、この質の高いバンドは新たなファンを獲得するかもしれません。
back_translation: The concert footage is moving, the recording sessions are intriguing, and in the midst of adding a punch for artistic integrity, this high-quality band might gain new fans.

text: most of the dialogue made me want to pack raw dough in my ears .
translation: ほとんどのセリフは生の生地を耳に詰め込みたくなりました。
back_translation: I wanted to stuff most of the lines into my ears like raw dough.

text: queen of the damned is too long with too little going on .
translation: 「呪われた女王」は長すぎて、内容が薄い。
back_translation: "The Cursed Queen" is too long and has little substance.

text: it ai n't art , by a long shot , but unlike last year 's lame musketeer , this dumas adaptation entertains .
translation: これは芸術ではないが、昨年のつまらないムスケティエールとは異なり、このデュマのadaptationは楽しませてくれる。
back_translation: This is not art, but unlike last year's boring Musquetier, this adaptation by Dumas is entertaining.

text: campanella 's competent direction and his excellent cast overcome the obstacles of a predictable outcome and a screenplay that glosses over rafael 's evolution .
translation: カンパネラの優れた演出と素晴らしいキャストは、予測可能な結末とラファエルの進化を軽視した脚本という障害を克服しています。
back_translation: Campanella's excellent direction and wonderful cast overcome the obstacles of a predictable ending and a script that underestimates Raphael's evolution.

text: schütte 's dramatic snapshot of the artist three days before his death offers an interesting bit of speculation as to the issues brecht faced as his life drew to a close .
translation: シュッテの、アーティストの死の三日前の劇的なスナップショットは、ブレヒトが人生の終わりを迎えるにあたって直面した問題についての興味深い憶測を提供しています。
back_translation: Schutte's dramatic snapshot taken three days before the artist's death offers intriguing speculation about the issues Brecht faced as he approached the end of his life.

text: would be an unendurable viewing experience for this ultra-provincial new yorker if 26-year-old reese witherspoon were not on hand to inject her pure fantasy character , melanie carmichael , with a massive infusion of old-fashioned hollywood magic .
translation: 26歳のリース・ウィザースプーンが、彼女の純粋なファンタジーキャラクターであるメラニー・カーマイケルに、古典的なハリウッドの魔法を大いに注入していなければ、この超地方的なニューヨーカーにとって耐え難い視聴体験になるだろう。
back_translation: If 26-year-old Reese Witherspoon had not infused her pure fantasy character, Melanie Carmichael, with a great deal of classic Hollywood magic, it would have been an unbearable viewing experience for this extremely local New Yorker.

text: a horror movie with seriously dumb characters , which somewhat dilutes the pleasure of watching them stalked by creepy-crawly bug things that live only in the darkness .
translation: 暗闇にだけ生息する気味の悪い虫のようなものに追いかけられる彼らを観る楽しみが、非常に愚かなキャラクターによって多少薄れてしまうホラー映画。
back_translation: A horror movie where the enjoyment of watching them being chased by creepy, bug-like creatures that only inhabit the darkness is somewhat diminished by a very foolish character.

text: their parents would do well to cram earplugs in their ears and put pillowcases over their heads for 87 minutes .
translation: 彼らの親は、87分間耳に耳栓を詰め、頭に枕カバーをかぶせるといいでしょう。
back_translation: Their parents should plug their ears with earplugs for 87 minutes and cover their heads with pillowcases.

text: cloaks a familiar anti-feminist equation -lrb- career - kids = misery -rrb- in tiresome romantic-comedy duds .
translation: 馴染みのある反フェミニストの方程式 -lrb- キャリア - 子供 = 不幸 -rrb- をつまらないロマンティックコメディの駄作で覆い隠す。
back_translation: The familiar anti-feminist equation - (career - children = unhappiness) - is buried under a boring romantic comedy flop.

text: naomi watts is terrific as rachel ; her petite frame and vulnerable persona emphasising her plight and isolation .
translation: ナオミ・ワッツはレイチェルとして素晴らしい演技を見せており、彼女の小柄な体型と脆弱な人格が彼女の苦境と孤立を強調しています。
back_translation: Naomi Watts delivers a wonderful performance as Rachel, and her petite physique and vulnerable personality highlight her struggles and isolation.

text: idiotic and ugly .
translation: 愚かで醜い。
back_translation: Foolish and ugly.

text: ` film aficionados can not help but love cinema paradiso , whether the original version or new director 's cut . '
translation: 映画愛好家は、オリジナル版でも新しい監督版でも『ニュー・シネマ・パラダイス』を愛さずにはいられません。
back_translation: Movie lovers can't help but love "Cinema Paradiso," whether it's the original version or the new director's cut.

text: hard , endearing , caring , warm .
translation: 硬い、愛情深い、思いやりのある、温かい。
back_translation: Hard, affectionate, compassionate, warm.

text: the major problem with windtalkers is that the bulk of the movie centers on the wrong character .
translation: ウィンドトーカーズの主な問題は、映画の大部分が間違ったキャラクターに焦点を当てていることです。
back_translation: The main issue with Windtalkers is that much of the movie focuses on the wrong characters.

text: - greaseballs mob action-comedy .
translation: グリースボールズ モブ アクションコメディ
back_translation: Greaseballs Mob Action Comedy

text: writer and director otar iosseliani 's pleasant tale about a factory worker who escapes for a holiday in venice reveals how we all need a playful respite from the grind to refresh our souls .
translation: 作家兼監督のオタール・イオセリアーニによる、工場労働者がヴェネツィアでの休暇に逃げる心地よい物語は、私たち全員が日々の grind からの遊び心のある休息を必要とし、魂をリフレッシュすることを明らかにしています。
back_translation: The pleasant story by writer and director Otar Ioseliani, about factory workers escaping to Venice for a vacation, reveals that we all need playful rest from our daily grind to refresh our souls.

text: a refreshingly realistic , affectation-free coming-of-age tale .
translation: 新鮮でリアルな、気取らない成長物語。
back_translation: A fresh and genuine, unpretentious coming-of-age story.

text: `` simone '' is a fun and funky look into an artificial creation in a world that thrives on artificiality .
translation: 「シモーネ」は、人工性が栄える世界における人工的な創造物への楽しいと funky な視点です。
back_translation: "Simone" offers a fun and funky perspective on artificial creations in a world where artificiality thrives.

text: supposedly , pokemon ca n't be killed , but pokemon 4ever practically assures that the pocket monster movie franchise is nearly ready to keel over .
translation: ポケモンは殺されることはないとされているが、「ポケモン4ever」はポケットモンスター映画シリーズがほぼ終わりを迎えようとしていることをほぼ確約している。
back_translation: It is believed that Pokémon cannot be killed, but "Pokémon 4ever" almost guarantees that the Pokémon movie series is nearing its end.

text: the acting is amateurish , the cinematography is atrocious , the direction is clumsy , the writing is insipid and the violence is at once luridly graphic and laughably unconvincing .
translation: 演技は素人運転で、撮影はひどく、演出は不器用で、脚本は味気なく、暴力は一方で目を引くほどグロテスクであり、他方では笑ってしまうほど不自然です。
back_translation: The acting is amateurish, the filming is terrible, the direction is clumsy, the script is bland, the violence is grotesque enough to catch your eye on one hand, yet on the other hand, it is so unnatural that it makes you want to laugh.

text: you have to see it .
translation: それを見なければなりません。
back_translation: I must see that.

text: pray has really done his subject justice .
translation: プレイは本当に彼のテーマを正当に評価しています。
back_translation: The play truly does justice to his theme.

text: woody , what happened ?
translation: ウッディ、何があったの？
back_translation: Woody, what happened?

text: but it 's also disappointing to a certain degree .
translation: しかし、ある程度は失望もあります。
back_translation: However, there is a certain degree of disappointment as well.

text: coarse , cliched and clunky , this trifling romantic comedy in which opposites attract for no better reason than that the screenplay demands it squanders the charms of stars hugh grant and sandra bullock .
translation: 粗雑で陳腐でぎこちない、この些細なロマンティックコメディは、反対が惹かれ合う理由が脚本の要求以外にはなく、ヒュー・グラントとサンドラ・ブロックというスターの魅力を無駄にしています。
back_translation: This crude, clichéd, and awkward little romantic comedy has no reason for its opposites to attract other than the script's demands, wasting the appeal of stars Hugh Grant and Sandra Bullock.

text: bears about as much resemblance to the experiences of most battered women as spider-man does to the experiences of most teenagers .
translation: それは、スパイダーマンがほとんどのティーンエイジャーの経験に似ているのと同じくらい、ほとんどの虐待を受けた女性の経験に似ている。
back_translation: That is as much like the experience of most abused women as it is like the experience of most teenagers.

text: at times a bit melodramatic and even a little dated -lrb- depending upon where you live -rrb- , ignorant fairies is still quite good-natured and not a bad way to spend an hour or two .
translation: 時には少しメロドラマティックで、さらには少し時代遅れに感じることもあります（住んでいる場所によりますが）、無知な妖精はそれでもかなり心温まるもので、1時間か2時間を過ごすには悪くない方法です。
back_translation: Sometimes it can feel a bit melodramatic and even somewhat outdated (depending on where you live), but the ignorant fairy is still quite heartwarming and isn't a bad way to spend an hour or two.

text: a boring masquerade ball where normally good actors , even kingsley , are made to look bad .
translation: 退屈な仮面舞踏会で、通常は良い俳優たち、さらにはキングスリーさえも、悪く見えるようにされています。
back_translation: At a boring masquerade ball, even the usually good actors, including Kingsley, are made to look bad.

text: a semi-autobiographical film that 's so sloppily written and cast that you can not believe anyone more central to the creation of bugsy than the caterer had anything to do with it .
translation: セミ自伝的な映画で、あまりにもだらしなく書かれ、キャスティングされているため、バグシーの創造に関与したとは思えないほど、ケータラーよりも中心的な役割を果たした人がいるとは信じられません。
back_translation: In this semi-autobiographical film, it is hard to believe that someone who played a more central role than Cattler in the creation of Bugsy could be so poorly written and cast.

text: the skills of a calculus major at m.i.t. are required to balance all the formulaic equations in the long-winded heist comedy who is cletis tout ?
translation: マサチューセッツ工科大学の微積分専攻のスキルが、長ったらしい強盗コメディ「クレティス・タウトとは誰か？」のすべての公式的な方程式をバランスさせるために必要です。
back_translation: The skills in calculus from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology are necessary to balance all the formal equations in the lengthy heist comedy "Who is Cretus Tout?"

text: though there are entertaining and audacious moments , the movie 's wildly careening tone and an extremely flat lead performance do little to salvage this filmmaker 's flailing reputation .
translation: 娯楽的で大胆な瞬間はあるものの、映画の非常に揺れ動くトーンと極めて平坦な主役の演技は、この映画製作者の失速する評判を救うにはほとんど役立たない。
back_translation: While there are entertaining and daring moments, the film's extremely fluctuating tone and the very flat performance of the lead actor do little to rescue this filmmaker's faltering reputation.

text: efteriades gives the neighborhood -- scenery , vibe and all -- the cinematic equivalent of a big , tender hug .
translation: エフティリアデスは、近隣に映画のような大きくて優しいハグのような風景や雰囲気を与えます。
back_translation: Eftirias gives the atmosphere and landscape of a big and gentle hug, like in a movie.

text: two weeks notice has appeal beyond being a sandra bullock vehicle or a standard romantic comedy .
