text: spain 's greatest star wattage does n't overcome the tumult of maudlin tragedy .
translation: スペインの最大のスターの輝きは、感傷的な悲劇の混乱を乗り越えることはできない。
back_translation: The brilliance of Spain's biggest star cannot overcome the turmoil of sentimental tragedy.

text: director jay russell stomps in hobnail boots over natalie babbitt 's gentle , endearing 1975 children 's novel .
translation: 監督のジェイ・ラッセルは、ナタリー・バビットの優しく心温まる1975年の児童小説の上を足音を立てて歩いている。
back_translation: Director Jay Russell is walking softly on top of Natalie Babbitt's gently heartwarming 1975 children's novel.

text: colorful , energetic and sweetly whimsical ... the rare sequel that 's better than its predecessor .
translation: カラフルでエネルギッシュ、そして甘く夢幻的… 前作よりも優れた珍しい続編。
back_translation: Colorful, energetic, and sweetly dreamy… A rare sequel that surpasses its predecessor.

text: ... a pretentious and ultimately empty examination of a sick and evil woman .
translation: ... 病んでいて邪悪な女性をめぐる見栄えのする、最終的には空虚な考察。
back_translation: ... A glamorous yet ultimately hollow exploration of a sick and wicked woman.

text: a small movie with a big heart .
translation: 大きな心を持った小さな映画。
back_translation: A small film with a big heart.

text: maggie g. makes an amazing breakthrough in her first starring role and eats up the screen .
translation: マギー・Gは初の主演作で素晴らしいブレイクスルーを果たし、画面を引き締めています。
back_translation: Maggie G makes a wonderful breakthrough in her first leading role, commanding the screen.

text: most of the movie is so deadly dull that watching the proverbial paint dry would be a welcome improvement .
translation: 映画のほとんどが死ぬほど退屈で、比喩的なペンキが乾くのを見る方が歓迎される改善と言える。
back_translation: Most movies are unbearably boring, and it can be said that watching metaphorical paint dry is a more welcome improvement.

text: -lrb- the cockettes -rrb- provides a window into a subculture hell-bent on expressing itself in every way imaginable . '
translation: 「コケット」とは、あらゆる想像し得る方法で自己表現を貫こうとするサブカルチャーの窓を提供します。
back_translation: "Coquette" provides a window into a subculture that seeks to express itself in every imaginable way.

text: most thrillers send audiences out talking about specific scary scenes or startling moments ; `` frailty '' leaves us with the terrifying message that the real horror may be waiting for us at home .
translation: ほとんどのスリラーは、観客が特定の恐ろしいシーンや驚くべき瞬間について語り合うようにしますが、「弱さ」は、本当の恐怖が私たちの家で待っているかもしれないという恐ろしいメッセージを私たちに残します。
back_translation: Most thrillers encourage the audience to discuss specific terrifying scenes or shocking moments, but "Weakness" leaves us with the chilling message that real fear may be waiting for us at home.

text: the difference between cho and most comics is that her confidence in her material is merited .
translation: ちょの漫画とほとんどの漫画の違いは、彼女が自分の素材に対する自信が正当であるということです。
back_translation: The difference between this manga and most other mangas is that she has a legitimate confidence in her own material.

text: this remake of lina wertmuller 's 1975 eroti-comedy might just be the biggest husband-and-wife disaster since john and bo derek made the ridiculous bolero .
translation: このリメイク版は、リナ・ワルトミューラーの1975年のエロティック・コメディの作品で、ジョン・デレクとボー・デレクが作った馬鹿げた『ボレロ』以来、最大の夫婦の災害かもしれません。
back_translation: This remake may be the biggest marital disaster since John Derek and Bo Derek's ridiculous "Bolero," based on Lina Wertmüller's 1975 erotic comedy.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- poorly executed comedy .
translation: -（a）うまくいっていないコメディ。
back_translation: - (a) A comedy that is not going well.

text: holland lets things peter out midway , but it 's notably better acted -- and far less crass - than some other recent efforts in the burgeoning genre of films about black urban professionals .
translation: ホランドは物事を中途半端に終わらせるが、この作品は特に演技が優れており、最近の黒人都市プロフェッショナルをテーマにした映画のいくつかよりも遥かに下品ではない。
back_translation: Holland tends to leave things half-finished, but this work is particularly well-acted and far less vulgar than some of the recent films centered on Black urban professionals.

text: ... rogers 's mouth never stops shut about the war between the sexes and how to win the battle .
translation: ロジャーズの口は、性別間の戦争とその戦いに勝つ方法について決して閉じることがありません。
back_translation: Rogers' mouth never shuts when it comes to discussing the war between the sexes and how to win that battle.

text: lawrence plumbs personal tragedy and also the human comedy .
translation: ローレンスは個人的な悲劇と人間の喜劇を掘り下げます。
back_translation: Lawrence delves into personal tragedy and the comedy of human existence.

text: maintains your sympathy for this otherwise challenging soul by letting you share her one-room world for a while .
translation: 彼女の一室の世界を少しの間共有させることで、この挑戦的な魂への同情を保っています。
back_translation: By sharing her world for a moment, we maintain a sympathy towards this challenging spirit.

text: tends to pile too many `` serious issues '' on its plate at times , yet remains fairly light , always entertaining , and smartly written .
translation: 時には「深刻な問題」をあまりにも多く抱えがちですが、それでも全体的には比較的軽く、常に面白く、賢く書かれています。
back_translation: Sometimes it tends to carry too many "serious issues," but overall it is relatively light, always interesting, and written intelligently.

text: an inventive , absorbing movie that 's as hard to classify as it is hard to resist .
translation: 発明的で引き込まれる映画で、分類するのが難しいのと同様に、抵抗するのも難しい。
back_translation: It's an inventive and captivating film that's hard to categorize and equally hard to resist.

text: -lrb- russell -rrb- makes good b movies -lrb- the mask , the blob -rrb- , and the scorpion king more than ably meets those standards .
translation: -ラッセル-は良いB級映画を作ります-（マスク、ザ・ブロブ）-、そしてザ・スコーピオン・キングはその基準を見事に満たしています。
back_translation: -Russell- makes good B-movies- (Mask, The Blob)- and The Scorpion King perfectly meets that standard.

text: what little grace -lrb- rifkin 's -rrb- tale of precarious skid-row dignity achieves is pushed into the margins by predictable plotting and tiresome histrionics .
translation: リフキンの「危ういスキッド・ローの尊厳」の小さな美点は、予想通りのプロットとつまらない演技によって脇に追いやられてしまっています。
back_translation: The small merits of Rifkin's "The Dignity of Risky Skid Row" are overshadowed by a predictable plot and dull performances.

text: the last scenes of the film are anguished , bitter and truthful .
translation: 映画の最後のシーンは、苦悩に満ち、苦々しく、真実です。
back_translation: The last scene of the movie is filled with agony, bitter, and truthful.

text: however sincere it may be , the rising place never quite justifies its own existence .
translation: どんなに誠実であっても、上昇する場所は自身の存在を決して完全には正当化しない。
back_translation: No matter how sincere one is, the place that rises never completely justifies its own existence.

text: the whole thing feels like a ruse , a tactic to cover up the fact that the picture is constructed around a core of flimsy -- or , worse yet , nonexistent -- ideas .
translation: 全体的に見て、これは策略のように感じる。写真が薄っぺらな、あるいは最悪の場合存在しないアイデアの中心を周囲に構成しているという事実を隠すための手段である。
back_translation: Overall, this feels like a strategy. It is a means to conceal the fact that the photos are centered around a shallow or, in the worst case, non-existent idea.

text: supposedly authentic account of a historical event that 's far too tragic to merit such superficial treatment .
translation: あまりにも悲劇的であり、そんな表面的な扱いを受けるには値しない歴史的事件の supposedly 本物の記録。
back_translation: A supposedly authentic record of a historical event that is far too tragic to deserve such superficial treatment.

text: no laughs .
translation: 笑いはない。
back_translation: There is no laughter.

text: but the actors make this worth a peek .
translation: しかし、俳優たちがこれを見る価値を与えています。
back_translation: However, the actors are giving this value to watch.

text: a gem of a movie .
translation: 素晴らしい映画。
back_translation: A wonderful movie.

text: the whole thing plays like a tired tyco ad .
translation: 全体的に疲れたタイコの広告のように感じる。
back_translation: It feels like an advertisement for a tired Taiko overall.

text: it 's exactly the kind of movie toback 's detractors always accuse him of making .
translation: それはトバックの批評家たちが彼が作っていると常に非難するような映画そのものです。
back_translation: It is the very movie that critics of Toba always criticize him for making.

text: mr. clooney , mr. kaufman and all their collaborators are entitled to take a deep bow for fashioning an engrossing entertainment out of an almost sure-fire prescription for a critical and commercial disaster .
translation: クルーニー氏、カウフマン氏、そして彼らのすべての協力者たちは、批評的かつ商業的な災害になることがほぼ確実な処方箋から、魅力的なエンターテインメントを作り上げたことに対して深いお辞儀をする権利があります。
back_translation: Mr. Clooney, Mr. Kaufman, and all their collaborators have the right to take a deep bow for creating captivating entertainment from a recipe that was almost guaranteed to be a critical and commercial disaster.

text: it would be churlish to begrudge anyone for receiving whatever consolation that can be found in dragonfly , yet it is impossible to find the film anything but appalling , shamelessly manipulative and contrived , and totally lacking in conviction .
translation: 誰かがトンボから得られる慰めを妬むのは無礼だが、その映画がひどく、恥知らずで操作的であることは否定できず、まったく信念が欠けていると言わざるを得ない。
back_translation: It is rude for someone to envy the comfort derived from a dragonfly, but it cannot be denied that the movie is terrible, shameless, and manipulative, and I must say it completely lacks conviction.

text: both deserve better .
translation: 両方ともより良いものに値する。
back_translation: Both deserve something better.

text: between them , de niro and murphy make showtime the most savory and hilarious guilty pleasure of many a recent movie season .
translation: ディニーロとマーフィーの間で、「ショータイム」は最近の映画シーズンの中で多くの人々にとって最も魅力的で hilarious な罪悪感のある楽しみを作り上げています。
back_translation: "Showtime" has become one of the most captivating and hilarious guilty pleasures for many people in the recent movie season, thanks to De Niro and Murphy.

text: upsetting and thought-provoking , the film has an odd purity that does n't bring you into the characters so much as it has you study them .
translation: 衝撃的で考えさせられるこの映画は、キャラクターに入り込ませるというよりは、彼らをじっくりと観察させる奇妙な純粋さを持っています。
back_translation: This shocking and thought-provoking film has a strange purity that invites the audience to observe the characters closely rather than immerse themselves in them.

text: slap me , i saw this movie .
translation: 叩いて！この映画を見ました。
back_translation: Hit me! I watched this movie.

text: visually , ` santa clause 2 ' is wondrously creative .
translation: 視覚的に、『サンタクロース2』は驚くほど創造的です。
back_translation: Visually, "Santa Claus 2" is astonishingly creative.

text: a coming-of-age tale from new zealand whose boozy , languid air is balanced by a rich visual clarity and deeply felt performances across the board .
translation: ニュージーランドの成長物語で、酒に溺れた怠惰な雰囲気が豊かなビジュアルの明確さと、全体にわたる深い感情を込めたパフォーマンスによってバランスを取っています。
back_translation: The growth story of New Zealand is balanced by a rich visual clarity and a deep emotional performance throughout, characterized by a lazy atmosphere drowned in alcohol.

text: ` it 's better to go in knowing full well what 's going to happen , but willing to let the earnestness of its execution and skill of its cast take you down a familiar road with a few twists .
translation: 事前に何が起こるかを十分に理解して向かうのが良いですが、その実行の真剣さとキャストのスキルによって、少しのひねりを加えた馴染みのある道を進むことを許す姿勢が大切です。
back_translation: It is good to understand what will happen in advance, but it is important to maintain an attitude that allows for a little twist while progressing down a familiar path, depending on the seriousness of the execution and the skills of the cast.

text: a portrait of hell so shattering it 's impossible to shake .
translation: 揺るぎないほど衝撃的な地獄の肖像。
back_translation: An unshakeably shocking portrait of hell.

text: hopelessly inane , humorless and under-inspired .
translation: 無気力で、ユーモアもなく、インスピレーションに欠けている。
back_translation: Lethargic, lacking humor, and devoid of inspiration.

text: bogdanich is unashamedly pro-serbian and makes little attempt to give voice to the other side .
translation: ボグダニッチは堂々と親セルビア的で、他の側の意見を表現しようとほとんど試みていません。
back_translation: Bogdanic is openly pro-Serbian and hardly attempts to express opposing views.

text: like a pack of dynamite sticks , built for controversy .
translation: 論争のために作られたダイナマイトの束のように。
back_translation: Like a bundle of dynamite created for controversy.

text: take any 12-year-old boy to see this picture , and he 'll be your slave for a year .
translation: 12歳の男の子をこの絵を見せに連れて行けば、彼は1年間あなたの奴隷になります。
back_translation: If you take a 12-year-old boy to see this picture, he will be your slave for a year.

text: miyazaki 's nonstop images are so stunning , and his imagination so vivid , that the only possible complaint you could have about spirited away is that there is no rest period , no timeout .
translation: 宮崎駿のノンストップな映像は非常に美しく、彼の想像力はとても鮮やかです。そのため、『千と千尋の神隠し』について唯一の不満があるとすれば、それは休む時間がなく、一息つくことができないということです。
back_translation: Hayao Miyazaki's nonstop visuals are extremely beautiful, and his imagination is very vibrant. Therefore, if there is only one complaint about "Spirited Away," it is that there is no time to rest and no chance to catch a breath.

text: stage director sam mendes showcases tom hanks as a depression era hit-man in this dark tale of revenge .
translation: 舞台演出家サム・メンデスが、トム・ハンクスを大不況時代のヒットマンとして描く、この復讐の暗い物語を披露します。
back_translation: Stage director Sam Mendes presents a dark tale of revenge, depicting Tom Hanks as a hitman during the Great Depression.

text: vereté has a whip-smart sense of narrative bluffs .
translation: veretéは鋭い物語のブラフを持っています。
back_translation: Vereté has a sharp story bluff.

text: ponderous , plodding soap opera disguised as a feature film .
translation: 重苦しく、もたもたしたソープオペラが劇場映画として装っています。
back_translation: A heavy and clumsy soap opera is disguised as a theatrical film.

text: gets the look and the period trappings right , but it otherwise drowns in a sea of visual and verbal clichés .
translation: 見た目と時代の特徴は正しく捉えていますが、それ以外は視覚的および言語的なクリシェの海に溺れています。
back_translation: While you accurately capture the appearance and characteristics of the era, you are drowning in a sea of visual and linguistic clichés otherwise.

text: director roger kumble offers just enough sweet and traditional romantic comedy to counter the crudity .
translation: 監督のロジャー・クンブルは、下品さに対抗するために、十分な甘さと伝統的なロマンティックコメディを提供しています。
back_translation: Director Roger Kumble provides enough sweetness and traditional romantic comedy to counteract vulgarity.

text: a bittersweet contemporary comedy about benevolent deception , which , while it may not rival the filmmaker 's period pieces , is still very much worth seeing .
translation: 優しい欺瞞についてのほろ苦い現代コメディであり、監督の時代劇には及ばないかもしれませんが、それでも見る価値は十分にあります。
back_translation: It is a bittersweet modern comedy about gentle deception, and while it may not reach the level of the director's period dramas, it is still definitely worth watching.

text: gorgeous to look at but insufferably tedious and turgid ... a curiously constricted epic .
translation: 見た目は美しいが、耐え難いほど退屈で冗長な... 奇妙に抑制された叙事詩。
back_translation: It is visually beautiful, but unbearable in its dullness and redundancy... a strangely restrained epic.

text: then again , in a better movie , you might not have noticed .
translation: それにしても、もっと良い映画なら、気づかなかったかもしれません。
back_translation: That being said, if it were a better movie, I might not have noticed it.

text: a fairly enjoyable mixture of longest yard ... and the 1999 guy ritchie caper lock stock and two smoking barrels .
translation: かなり楽しめる「ロング・ヤード」と1999年のガイ・リッチーの作品「ロック、ストック&トゥー・スモーキング・バレルズ」のミックス。
back_translation: A mix of "The Long Yard" that you can enjoy quite a bit and Guy Ritchie's 1999 work "Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels."

text: the re - enactments , however fascinating they may be as history , are too crude to serve the work especially well .
translation: 再現は、歴史としては非常に魅力的であるものの、作品に特に適しているとは言えないほど粗雑です。
back_translation: While the recreation is very intriguing as history, it is too粗雑 to be particularly suitable for the work.

text: if a horror movie 's primary goal is to frighten and disturb , then they works spectacularly well ... a shiver-inducing , nerve-rattling ride .
translation: ホラー映画の主な目的が恐怖を与え、動揺させることであるなら、それらは実に見事に成功します…寒気を誘う、神経を逆なでする体験です。
back_translation: If the main purpose of horror movies is to instill fear and disturb, they succeed remarkably well... it's a chilling, nerve-wracking experience.

text: oedekerk mugs mercilessly , and the genuinely funny jokes are few and far between .
translation: オーデケルクは容赦なく茶化し、本当に面白いジョークは稀にしかありません。
back_translation: Odekerk mercilessly mocks, and genuinely funny jokes are rare.

text: often silly -- and gross -- but it 's rarely as moronic as some campus gross-out films .
translation: しばしば愚かで、気持ち悪いですが、キャンパスのグロい映画のいくつかほど愚かではないことがほとんどです。
back_translation: Often foolish and disgusting, but almost none are as foolish as some of the gross movies on campus.

text: spielberg 's first real masterpiece , it deserved all the hearts it won -- and wins still , 20 years later .
translation: スピルバーグの最初の真の傑作であり、それが獲得したすべての心に値するもので、20年経った今でもなお賞賛され続けています。
back_translation: It is Spielberg's first true masterpiece, deserving of all the admiration it has received, and it continues to be praised even 20 years later.

text: ... unlike -lrb- scorsese 's mean streets -rrb- , ash wednesday is essentially devoid of interesting characters or even a halfway intriguing plot .
translation: ... スコセッシの「ミーン・ストリーツ」とは対照的に、「アッシュ・ウェンズデー」は本質的に興味深いキャラクターや、せいぜい魅力的なプロットが欠けています。
back_translation: In contrast to Scorsese's "Mean Streets," "Ash Wednesday" fundamentally lacks interesting characters and, at best, an engaging plot.

text: you may feel compelled to watch the film twice or pick up a book on the subject .
translation: 映画を二回見るか、関連する本を手に取りたくなるかもしれません。
back_translation: You might want to watch the movie twice or pick up a related book.

text: slow and ponderous , but rohmer 's drama builds to an intense indoor drama about compassion , sacrifice , and christian love in the face of political corruption .
translation: 遅くて重苦しいが、ローマーのドラマは、政治的腐敗に直面した時の思いやり、犠牲、そしてキリスト教的愛についての緊迫した室内劇に発展する。
back_translation: Slow and heavy, the Roman drama develops into a tense chamber play about compassion, sacrifice, and Christian love in the face of political corruption.

text: sheridan 's take on the author 's schoolboy memoir ... is a rather toothless take on a hard young life .
translation: シェリダンの著者の少年時代の回想録に対する見解は、厳しい若い人生に対するやや迫力のない見方です。
back_translation: The author's reflections on their boyhood in Sheridan's memoir present a somewhat lackluster perspective on a harsh young life.

text: godard has never made a more sheerly beautiful film than this unexpectedly moving meditation on love , history , memory , resistance and artistic transcendence .
translation: ゴダールは、愛、歴史、記憶、抵抗、そして芸術的超越についてのこの予想外に感動的な瞑想よりも、純粋に美しい映画を作ったことがない。
back_translation: Godard has never made a purely beautiful film more than this unexpectedly moving meditation on love, history, memory, resistance, and artistic transcendence.

text: under-rehearsed and lifeless
translation: 練習不足で無気力な
back_translation: Lack of practice and listlessness.

text: the film offers an intriguing what-if premise .
translation: その映画は、興味深い「もしも」の前提を提供します。
back_translation: The movie presents an intriguing premise of "what if."

text: this 10th film in the series looks and feels tired .
translation: このシリーズの10作目は、見た目も内容も疲れた感じがします。
back_translation: The tenth installment of this series feels tired both in appearance and content.

text: you need n't be steeped in '50s sociology , pop culture or movie lore to appreciate the emotional depth of haynes ' work .
translation: ハインズの作品の感情的な深さを理解するのに、50年代の社会学、ポップカルチャーや映画の伝説に精通している必要はありません。
back_translation: You do not need to be familiar with 1950s sociology, pop culture, or movie legends to understand the emotional depth of Hines's work.

text: rarely have i seen a film so willing to champion the fallibility of the human heart .
translation: 人間の心の誤りを称賛することにこれほど積極的な映画を見たことはほとんどありません。
back_translation: I have hardly ever seen a movie that is so proactive in praising the errors of the human heart.

text: a witty , low-key romantic comedy .
translation: ウィットに富んだ、控えめなロマンティックコメディ。
back_translation: A witty and understated romantic comedy.

text: what enlivens this film , beyond the astute direction of cardoso and beautifully detailed performances by all of the actors , is a note of defiance over social dictates .
translation: この映画を活気づけるのは、カルドーソの鋭い演出と全ての俳優による美しく緻密な演技を超えて、社会的規範に対する反抗の響きです。
back_translation: What brings this film to life is not only Cardoso's sharp direction and the beautifully intricate performances of all the actors, but also the resonance of rebellion against social norms.

text: a delightful little film that revels in its own simplicity , mostly martha will leave you with a smile on your face and a grumble in your stomach .
translation: シンプルさを楽しむ素敵な小さな映画で、主に「マーサ」はあなたに笑顔をもたらし、お腹に不満を残します。
back_translation: It's a wonderful little film that enjoys simplicity, mainly bringing a smile to your face while leaving some dissatisfaction in your stomach.

text: it 's hard to quibble with a flick boasting this many genuine cackles , but notorious c.h.o. still feels like a promising work-in-progress .
translation: このように多くの本物の笑い声を持つ映画に文句をつけるのは難しいですが、悪名高いC.H.O.はまだ有望な進行中の作品に感じます。
back_translation: It's hard to criticize a movie that has so many genuine laughs, but the notorious C.H.O. still feels like a promising work in progress.

text: a shoddy male hip hop fantasy filled with guns , expensive cars , lots of naked women and rocawear clothing .
translation: 銃、豪華な車、たくさんの裸の女性、そしてロカウェアの服で満たされた、しょぼい男性のヒップホップファンタジー。
back_translation: A men's hip-hop fantasy filled with guns, luxurious cars, lots of naked women, and Rocawear clothing.

text: a strong and confident work which works so well for the first 89 minutes , but ends so horrendously confusing in the final two
translation: 最初の89分間は非常にうまく機能する強く自信に満ちた作品ですが、最後の2分間で恐ろしいほど混乱した結末を迎えます。
back_translation: The first 89 minutes is a strongly confident work that functions very well, but it reaches a terrifyingly confusing ending in the last 2 minutes.

text: even the hastily and amateurishly drawn animation can not engage .
translation: 急いでアマチュアが描いたアニメーションでさえ、魅力を感じさせることはできない。
back_translation: Even animations hastily created by amateurs cannot fail to convey a sense of charm.

text: with ` bowling for columbine , ' michael moore gives us the perfect starting point for a national conversation about guns , violence , and fear .
translation: 『コロンバイン高校銃乱射事件』を通じて、マイケル・ムーアは銃、暴力、恐怖についての国民的対話の完璧な出発点を提供しています。
back_translation: Through the "Columbine High School shooting incident," Michael Moore provides a perfect starting point for a national dialogue about guns, violence, and fear.

text: i liked it just enough .
translation: 私はそれがちょうど良いほど好きでした。
back_translation: I liked it just enough.

text: it 's the funniest american comedy since graffiti bridge .
translation: それは「グラフィティ・ブリッジ」以来の最も面白いアメリカのコメディです。
back_translation: It's the funniest American comedy since "Graffiti Bridge."

text: after an uncertain start , murder hits and generally sustains a higher plateau with bullock 's memorable first interrogation of gosling .
translation: 不確かな始まりの後、殺人事件は盛り上がり、全般的に高い水準を維持し、ブロックのゴスリングに対する忘れがたい初めての取り調べが行われます。
back_translation: After an uncertain beginning, the murder case intensifies, maintaining a generally high level, and an unforgettable first interrogation of Gosling from the block takes place.

text: although devoid of objectivity and full of nostalgic comments from the now middle-aged participants , dogtown and z-boys has a compelling story to tell .
translation: 客観性を欠き、中年の参加者たちの懐かしいコメントで満たされているが、「ドッグタウンとZボーイズ」には語るべき魅力的な物語がある。
back_translation: While lacking objectivity and filled with nostalgic comments from middle-aged participants, "Dogtown and Z-Boys" has an engaging story to tell.

text: ... a delicious crime drama on par with the slickest of mamet .
translation: ... 魅惑的な犯罪ドラマで、最も洗練されたマメット作品と肩を並べる。
back_translation: ... a captivating crime drama that stands alongside the most sophisticated works of Mamet.

text: on top of a foundering performance , -lrb- madonna 's -rrb- denied her own athleticism by lighting that emphasizes every line and sag .
translation: 崩壊寸前のパフォーマンスの上で、（マドンナ）は自身の運動能力を否定し、すべての線やたるみを強調する照明を使っています。
back_translation: On the brink of collapse in her performance, Madonna denies her athletic abilities and uses lighting that accentuates all the lines and sagging.

text: on the surface a silly comedy , scotland , pa would be forgettable if it were n't such a clever adaptation of the bard 's tragic play .
translation: 一見するとくだらないコメディの「スコットランド、PA」は、バードの悲劇的な劇の巧妙な adaptación でなければ忘れられてしまうところです。
back_translation: At first glance, the seemingly silly comedy "Scotland, PA" would be forgotten if it weren't for its clever adaptation of Bird's tragic play.

text: mostly works because of the universal themes , earnest performances ... and excellent use of music by india 's popular gulzar and jagjit singh .
translation: 主に普遍的なテーマ、真剣な演技、そしてインドの人気音楽家グルザーとジャグジット・シンによる優れた音楽の使い方のおかげで、うまくいっています。
back_translation: It is doing well thanks to universal themes, serious performances, and the great use of music by popular Indian musicians Guruza and Jagjit Singh.

text: about the only thing to give the movie points for is bravado -- to take an entirely stale concept and push it through the audience 's meat grinder one more time .
translation: 映画にポイントを与える唯一のことは、その大胆さだ -- 完全に陳腐なコンセプトをもう一度観客のミートグラインダーに押し込むこと。
back_translation: The only thing that gives a movie points is its boldness -- shoving a completely cliché concept back into the audience's meat grinder.

text: but the performances of pacino , williams , and swank keep the viewer wide-awake all the way through .
translation: しかし、パチーノ、ウィリアムズ、スワンクの演技は、観客を最後まで目を覚まさせておく。
back_translation: However, the performances of Pacino, Williams, and Swank keep the audience awake until the end.

text: a boring , pretentious muddle that uses a sensational , real-life 19th-century crime as a metaphor for -- well , i 'm not exactly sure what -- and has all the dramatic weight of a raindrop .
translation: 退屈で、気取った混乱で、センセーショナルな19世紀の実際の犯罪を比喩として利用していますが、正直なところ何を示しているのかはよくわかりません。そして、そのドラマ的な重みは雨滴のようです。
back_translation: It's boring, pretentious chaos, using sensational actual crimes from the 19th century as a metaphor, but to be honest, I'm not quite sure what it's indicating. And the dramatic weight is like raindrops.

text: far from heaven is a dazzling conceptual feat , but more than that , it 's a work of enthralling drama .
translation: 「ファー・フロム・ヘブン」は眩いばかりのコンセプトの傑作ですが、それ以上に魅力的なドラマ作品です。
back_translation: "Far From Heaven" is a dazzling masterpiece of a concept, but even more, it is an attractive drama.

text: blessed with a searing lead performance by ryan gosling -lrb- murder by numbers -rrb- , the movie is powerful and provocative .
translation: ライアン・ゴスリングの圧倒的な主演パフォーマンス（『殺人番号』）によって、この映画は力強く挑発的です。
back_translation: This film is powerfully provocative thanks to Ryan Gosling's overwhelming lead performance in "Murder Number."

text: the film desperately sinks further and further into comedy futility .
translation: その映画は絶望的にさらに深くコメディの無力さに沈んでいく。
back_translation: The movie sinks hopelessly deeper into the powerlessness of comedy.

text: it almost feels as if the movie is more interested in entertaining itself than in amusing us .
translation: まるで映画が私たちを楽しませることよりも、自分自身を楽しませることに興味があるかのように感じます。
back_translation: It feels as if the movie is more interested in entertaining itself rather than entertaining us.

text: a low-rent retread of the alien pictures .
translation: エイリアン映画の低予算のリメイク。
back_translation: A low-budget remake of an alien movie.

text: it merely indulges in the worst elements of all of them .
translation: それは単にそれらの最悪の要素に耽っているだけです。
back_translation: It's simply indulging in the worst aspects of them.

text: there 's none of the happily-ever - after spangle of monsoon wedding in late marriage -- and that 's part of what makes dover kosashvili 's outstanding feature debut so potent .
translation: 遅い結婚におけるモンスーンウェディングのような「幸せな結末」の輝きは存在せず、それがドーバー・コサシュヴィリの優れた長編デビュー作を非常に力強くしている要素の一部です。
back_translation: The shine of a "happy ending" like a monsoon wedding in a late marriage does not exist, and that is part of what makes Dover Kosashvili's outstanding feature debut very powerful.

text: the entire film is one big excuse to play one lewd scene after another .
translation: 映画全体が、次々に露骨なシーンを見せるための大きな言い訳になっている。
back_translation: The entire movie serves as a grand excuse to show one explicit scene after another.

text: a fascinating examination of the joyous , turbulent self-discovery made by a proper , middle-aged woman .
translation: 魅力的な検証は、しっかりした中年女性による喜びに満ちた波乱の自己発見を描いています。
back_translation: The captivating exploration depicts a joyful and tumultuous journey of self-discovery by a confident middle-aged woman.

text: has an unmistakable , easy joie de vivre .
translation: 明らかな、楽な生き生きとした喜びがあります。
back_translation: There is a clear, easy, and vibrant joy.

text: it 's a rare window on an artistic collaboration .
translation: それはアーティスト同士のコラボレーションに関する珍しい機会です。
back_translation: It is a rare opportunity for collaboration among artists.

text: report card : does n't live up to the exalted tagline - there 's definite room for improvement .
translation: 評価表：崇高なキャッチフレーズには達していない - 改善の余地は確実にあります。
back_translation: Evaluation: It does not reach the lofty catchphrase - there is definitely room for improvement.

text: too intensely focused on the travails of being hal hartley to function as pastiche , no such thing is hartley 's least accessible screed yet .
translation: ハル・ハートリーであることの苦悩にあまりにも強く焦点を絞りすぎており、パスティーシュとして機能していない。そんなものは、ハートリーの最もアクセスしづらいものとしてはまだ存在しない。
back_translation: It is too narrowly focused on the struggles of being Hal Hartley, and does not function as a pastiche. Such a thing does not yet exist as one of Hartley's most inaccessible works.

text: a backstage must-see for true fans of comedy .
translation: コメディの真のファンにとって見逃せないバックステージ。
back_translation: The backstage that no true fan of comedy can afford to miss.

text: it 's got the brawn , but not the brains .
translation: 力はあるが、知恵はない。
back_translation: Strength exists, but wisdom is lacking.

text: lacks dramatic punch and depth .
translation: ドラマチックなインパクトと深みが欠けている。
back_translation: It lacks dramatic impact and depth.

text: it may be a no-brainer , but at least it 's a funny no-brainer .
translation: それは考えるまでもないかもしれませんが、少なくともそれは面白い考えるまでもないことです。
back_translation: It may not be necessary to think about it, but at least it’s an interesting thing to consider.

text: like the excruciating end of days , collateral damage presents schwarzenegger as a tragic figure , but sympathy really belongs with any viewer forced to watch him try out so many complicated facial expressions .
translation: 苦痛に満ちた終末のように、コラテラル・ダメージはシュワルツェネッガーを悲劇的な人物として描いているが、同情は実際には彼がそんなに多くの複雑な表情を試みるのを見せられなければならない視聴者にこそ向けられるべきだ。
back_translation: Like a painful end, the collateral damage portrays Schwarzenegger as a tragic figure, but sympathy should actually be directed towards the viewers who are forced to witness him attempt so many complex expressions.

text: a great cast and a wonderful but sometimes confusing flashback movie about growing up in a dysfunctional family .
translation: 素晴らしいキャストと、時には混乱を招くようなフラッシュバック映画で、機能不全の家族の中で成長することについてです。
back_translation: It's about growing up in a dysfunctional family with a wonderful cast and, at times, confusing flashbacks.

text: ozpetek offers an aids subtext , skims over the realities of gay sex , and presents yet another tired old vision of the gay community as an all-inclusive world where uptight , middle class bores like antonia can feel good about themselves .
translation: オズペテクはエイズのサブテキストを提供し、ゲイセックスの現実を軽く流し、アントニアのような堅苦しい中流階級の退屈者たちが自分自身を良い気分にさせることができる、全てを受け入れる世界としてのゲイコミュニティのもう一つの古びたビジョンを提示しています。
back_translation: Ozpetek offers a subtext about AIDS, lightly glossing over the realities of gay sex, presenting another outdated vision of the gay community as a world that accepts everything, where stuffy middle-class boring individuals like Antonia can make themselves feel good.

text: the leads are so unmemorable , despite several attempts at lengthy dialogue scenes , that one eventually resents having to inhale this gutter romancer 's secondhand material .
translation: リードは非常に印象に残らず、長い対話シーンを何度も試みたにもかかわらず、最終的にはこのゴミのようなロマンチック小説家のセカンドハンドの素材を吸い込むことにうんざりしてしまう。
back_translation: The lead is very forgettable, and despite multiple attempts at long dialogue scenes, I ultimately became fed up with sucking in this second-hand material from a trashy romantic novelist.

text: a relative letdown .
translation: 相対的な失望。
back_translation: Relative disappointment.

text: from its nauseating spinning credits sequence to a very talented but underutilized supporting cast , bartleby squanders as much as it gives out .
translation: バートルビーは、吐き気を催すような回転するクレジットシーケンスから、非常に才能のあるが活かされていない脇役たちまで、与えるものと同じくらい無駄にする。
back_translation: Bartleby wastes as much as it gives, from a nauseatingly spinning credit sequence to very talented but underutilized supporting characters.

text: a realistically terrifying movie that puts another notch in the belt of the long list of renegade-cop tales .
translation: 現実的に恐ろしい映画で、反逆者警察の物語の長いリストにもう一つの刻印を加える作品です。
back_translation: This is a realistically terrifying movie that adds another mark to the long list of stories about rebel police.

text: brings an irresistible blend of warmth and humor and a consistent embracing humanity in the face of life 's harshness .
translation: 人生の厳しさに直面しながら、温かさとユーモアのたまらない融合と一貫した人間性をもたらします。
back_translation: While facing the hardships of life, it brings an irresistible blend of warmth and humor, along with consistent humanity.

text: inconsequential road-and-buddy pic .
translation: 重要ではない道と友達の写真。
back_translation: An unimportant road and a picture of friends.

text: it 's been 13 months and 295 preview screenings since i last walked out on a movie , but resident evil really earned my indignant , preemptive departure .
translation: 最後に映画から途中退場してから13ヶ月295回の試写を経て、バイオハザードは私の憤慨した先行退場を本当に呼び起こしました。
back_translation: Finally, after leaving the movie, I went through 295 screenings over 13 months, and Resident Evil truly evoked my indignant early exit.

text: the leanest and meanest of solondz 's misanthropic comedies .
translation: ソロンドズのミサントロピックなコメディの中で最もスリムでシニカルな作品。
back_translation: The slimmest and most cynical work in Solondoz's misanthropic comedy.

text: about schmidt belongs to nicholson .
translation: シュミットについてはニコルソンに属しています。
back_translation: Schmidt belongs to Nicholson.

text: its metaphors are opaque enough to avoid didacticism , and the film succeeds as an emotionally accessible , almost mystical work .
translation: その比喩は十分に不明瞭で、教学的であることを避けており、映画は感情的にアクセス可能で、ほとんど神秘的な作品として成功している。
back_translation: That metaphor is sufficiently ambiguous, avoiding being didactic, and the film succeeds as an emotionally accessible and almost mystical work.

text: starts as an intense political and psychological thriller but is sabotaged by ticking time bombs and other hollywood-action cliches .
translation: 激しい政治的かつ心理的スリラーとして始まりますが、時限爆弾やその他のハリウッドアクションのクリシェによって台無しにされます。
back_translation: It starts as an intense political and psychological thriller, but is ruined by clichés of Hollywood action, such as time bombs and others.

text: even if it pushes its agenda too forcefully , this remains a film about something , one that attempts and often achieves a level of connection and concern .
translation: たとえその agenda をあまりにも強引に押し進めたとしても、これは何かについての映画であり、つながりや関心のレベルを試み、しばしば達成する映画です。
back_translation: Even if it pushes the agenda too forcefully, this is a film about something, attempting to explore levels of connection and interest, and often succeeding.

text: the film is grossly contradictory in conveying its social message , if indeed there is one .
translation: その映画は社会的メッセージを伝える上で極端に矛盾している。もし本当にメッセージがあるのなら。
back_translation: That movie is extremely contradictory in conveying a social message, if it even has one at all.

text: daringly perceptive , taut , piercing and feisty , biggie and tupac is undeniably subversive and involving in its bold presentation .
translation: 大胆で洞察力に満ち、緊張感があり、鋭く、活気に満ちた「ビギーとトゥパック」は、その大胆なプレゼンテーションにおいて間違いなく反体制的で魅力的です。
back_translation: "Biggie and Tupac," bold and insightful, filled with tension, sharp, and vibrant, is undoubtedly anti-establishment and captivating in its daring presentation.

text: boyd 's screenplay -lrb- co-written with guardian hack nick davies -rrb- has a florid turn of phrase that owes more to guy ritchie than the bard of avon .
translation: ボイドの脚本（ガーディアンのハッカー、ニック・デイビスと共同執筆）は、アボンのバードよりもガイ・リッチーに多くを負っている華やかな表現を持っている。
back_translation: The script for Void (co-written with Guardian's hacker, Nick Davis) possesses a colorful expression that owes more to Guy Ritchie than to Avon’s Bird.

text: not about scares but a mood in which an ominous , pervasive , and unknown threat lurks just below the proceedings and adds an almost constant mindset of suspense .
translation: 恐怖についてではなく、陰鬱で広がる未知の脅威が進行中の事柄のすぐ下に潜んでおり、ほぼ常に緊張感を高める心の状態をもたらすムード。
back_translation: A mood that brings about a state of mind that heightens tension, lurking just beneath the surface of ongoing matters, characterized by a gloomy and expanding unknown threat, rather than fear itself.

text: this deeply spiritual film taps into the meaning and consolation in afterlife communications .
translation: この深く精神的な映画は、死後のコミュニケーションにおける意味と慰めに触れています。
back_translation: This deeply spiritual film touches on the meaning and comfort in communication after death.

text: i know that i 'll never listen to marvin gaye or the supremes the same way again
translation: マーヴィン・ゲイやスプリームスをこれまでのようには二度と聴かないことは分かっています。
back_translation: I know that I will never listen to Marvin Gaye and the Supremes the same way again.

text: a big , loud , bang-the-drum bore .
translation: 大きくて、うるさくて、ドラムを叩く退屈な人。
back_translation: A big, noisy, boring person who plays the drums.

text: horrendously amateurish filmmaking that is plainly dull and visually ugly when it is n't incomprehensible .
translation: ひどく素人じみた映画制作で、明らかに退屈で視覚的にも醜い、理解不能な時さえある。
back_translation: It's a terribly amateurish movie production that is clearly boring and visually ugly, sometimes even incomprehensible.

text: after collateral damage , you might imagine that most every aggrieved father cliché has been unturned .
translation: 損害が発生した後、ほとんどの被害を受けた父親のクリシェはすでに掘り返されたと思われるかもしれません。
back_translation: After the damage occurred, it may seem that most of the affected father's cliche has already been dug up.

text: predictable storyline and by-the-book scripting is all but washed away by sumptuous ocean visuals and the cinematic stylings of director john stockwell .
translation: 予測可能なストーリーラインと教科書通りの脚本は、豪華な海のビジュアルと監督ジョン・ストックウェルのシネマティックなスタイルによってすっかり消し去られています。
back_translation: The predictable storyline and textbook script are completely overshadowed by the luxurious ocean visuals and director John Stockwell's cinematic style.

text: laugh-out-loud lines , adorably ditsy but heartfelt performances , and sparkling , bittersweet dialogue that cuts to the chase of the modern girl 's dilemma .
translation: 大声で笑えるセリフ、愛らしくおっちょこちょいだけど心のこもった演技、そして現代の女の子のジレンマに真正面から切り込む、きらめくほろ苦い対話。
back_translation: Lines that can make you laugh out loud, endearingly clumsy yet heartfelt performances, and sparkling bittersweet dialogues that tackle the dilemmas of modern girls head-on.

text: essentially a collection of bits -- and they 're all naughty .
translation: 本質的にはビットのコレクションであり、すべて悪戯っ子です。
back_translation: Essentially, it's a collection of bits, and they're all mischievous.

text: you get the impression that writer and director burr steers knows the territory ... but his sense of humor has yet to lose the smug self-satisfaction usually associated with the better private schools .
translation: 作家で監督のバーレイ・スティアーズはその領域を理解している印象を受けますが、彼のユーモアは、通常は優れた私立学校に関連付けられる自惚れた自己満足をまだ失っていないようです。
back_translation: Writer and director Burleigh Steers seems to have a grasp of the field, but his humor still appears to retain a self-satisfied arrogance typically associated with prestigious private schools.

text: ultimately engages less for its story of actorly existential despair than for its boundary-hopping formal innovations and glimpse into another kind of chinese ` cultural revolution . '
translation: 最終的には、俳優たちの存在的な絶望の物語よりも、境界を越えた形式革新や別の種類の中国の「文化革命」の垣間見せに対して、より少ない関心を引き起こします。
back_translation: Ultimately, it draws less interest towards glimpses of cross-boundary formal innovation or a different kind of "Cultural Revolution" in China than the story of the actors' existential despair.

text: happily , some things are immune to the folly of changing taste and attitude .
translation: 幸いなことに、いくつかのものは流行や態度の変化という愚かさに免疫があります。
back_translation: Fortunately, some things are immune to the foolishness of trends and changes in attitude.

text: viewers will need all the luck they can muster just figuring out who 's who in this pretentious mess .
translation: 視聴者は、この気取った混乱の中で誰が誰なのかを見極めるために、できる限りの運を必要とするでしょう。
back_translation: Viewers will need as much luck as possible to figure out who is who in this pretentious chaos.

text: the viewer takes great pleasure in watching the resourceful molly stay a step ahead of her pursuers .
translation: 視聴者は、機知に富んだモリーが追跡者の一歩先を行くのを見て大いに楽しむ。
back_translation: Viewers greatly enjoy seeing the witty Molly staying one step ahead of her pursuer.

text: with we were soldiers , hollywood makes a valiant attempt to tell a story about the vietnam war before the pathology set in .
translation: 『俺たちの戦争』では、ハリウッドは病的な事態が始まる前のベトナム戦争についての物語を語ろうと勇敢な試みをしています。
back_translation: In "Our War," Hollywood makes a brave attempt to tell the story of the Vietnam War before the pathological situation begins.

text: i just saw this movie ... well , it 's probably not accurate to call it a movie .
translation: 私はこの映画を見たばかりです...まあ、それを映画と呼ぶのは正確ではないかもしれません。
back_translation: I just watched this movie... well, it might not be accurate to call it a movie.

text: one of the smarter offerings the horror genre has produced in recent memory , even if it 's far tamer than advertised .
translation: 最近の記憶に残るホラージャンルが生み出した賢い作品の一つであるが、宣伝されているほどにはずっと穏やかである。
back_translation: It's one of the clever works created by the horror genre that remains memorable in recent memory, but it is much more subdued than advertised.

text: a well-done film of a self-reflexive , philosophical nature .
translation: 自己反射的で哲学的な性質を持つ、良くできた映画。
back_translation: A well-made film with self-reflective and philosophical qualities.

text: still , it just sits there like a side dish no one ordered .
translation: まだ、それは誰も注文しなかったおかずのようにそこにただ座っています。
back_translation: Still, it just sits there like a side dish that no one ordered.

text: filmmakers dana janklowicz-mann and amir mann area headed east , far east , in retelling a historically significant , and personal , episode detailing how one international city welcomed tens of thousands of german jewish refugees while the world 's democracie
translation: 映画制作者のダナ・ジャンクロウィッツ＝マンとアミール・マンは、歴史的に重要で個人的なエピソードを再現するために、極東へ向かっています。このエピソードは、どのようにしてある国際都市が何万人ものドイツ系ユダヤ人難民を受け入れたのかを詳細に描いていますが、世界の民主主義はそれに対してどうであったかを示しています。
back_translation: Filmmakers Dana Janukowicz-Man and Amir Man are heading to the Far East to recreate a historically significant and personal episode. This episode details how an international city welcomed tens of thousands of German-Jewish refugees, while also illustrating how the world's democracies responded to it.

text: who , exactly , is fighting whom here ?
translation: ここで、誰が誰と戦っているのですか？
back_translation: Who is fighting whom here?

text: can be as tiresome as 9 seconds of jesse helms ' anti- castro rhetoric , which are included
translation: ジェシー・ヘルムズの反カストロのレトリックの9秒間と同じくらい疲れることもありますが、それが含まれています。
back_translation: It can be as exhausting as the 9 seconds of Jesse Helms' anti-Castro rhetoric, but it's included.

text: it 's a lot to ask people to sit still for two hours and change watching such a character , especially when rendered in as flat and impassive a manner as phoenix 's .
translation: 人々に2時間もじっと座って、そんなキャラクターを見続けるようお願いするのは大変なことだ、特にフェニックスのように平坦で無表情な演出であればなおさらだ。
back_translation: It is very difficult to ask people to sit still for two hours and continue watching such a character, especially with a flat and expressionless performance like that of a phoenix.

text: in truth , it has all the heart of a porno flick -lrb- but none of the sheer lust -rrb- .
translation: 実際には、それはポルノ映画の全ての心を持っていますが、純粋な欲望はありません。
back_translation: In reality, it has all the essence of a pornographic film, but lacks pure desire.

text: cherish would 've worked a lot better had it been a short film .
translation: 「チェリッシュ」は短編映画であればもっと良かっただろう。
back_translation: "Cherryish" would have been better if it were a short film.

text: if you 're looking for an intelligent movie in which you can release your pent up anger , enough is just the ticket you need .
translation: もし、抑え込んでいた怒りを解放できる知的な映画を探しているなら、「アナタウィル」を見るのがちょうどいいでしょう。

text: maybe there 's a metaphor here , but figuring it out would n't make trouble every day any better .
translation: おそらくここにはメタファーがあるが、それを理解しても、毎日のトラブルが良くなることはないだろう。
back_translation: There is probably a metaphor here, but even if I understand it, the daily troubles are unlikely to get better.

text: a zippy 96 minutes of mediocre special effects , hoary dialogue , fluxing accents , and -- worst of all -- silly-looking morlocks .
translation: mediocreな特殊効果、陳腐な台詞、変動するアクセント、そして最悪なのは、見た目が滑稽なモーロックたちが登場する96分間の軽快な映画。
back_translation: A 96-minute light film with mediocre special effects, clichéd dialogue, fluctuating accents, and worst of all, the appearance of ridiculous Morlocks.

text: every so often a film comes along that is so insanely stupid , so awful in so many ways that watching it leaves you giddy .
translation: 時折、非常に馬鹿げていて、あまりにもひどい方法で悪い映画が登場し、それを見るとあなたは興奮してしまうことがあります。
back_translation: Sometimes, a very ridiculous and terrible movie comes along, and when you watch it, you can't help but get excited.

text: but it is entertaining on an inferior level .
translation: しかし、それは劣ったレベルで面白いです。
back_translation: However, it's interesting at a lower level.

text: plummer steals the show without resorting to camp as nicholas ' wounded and wounding uncle ralph .
translation: プラマーは、キャンプに頼ることなく、ニコラスの傷つき、傷つけている叔父ラルフとしてショーを奪います。
back_translation: The plumber steals the show as Nicholas's wounded and hurting uncle Ralph, without relying on the camp.

text: evokes the frustration , the awkwardness and the euphoria of growing up , without relying on the usual tropes .
translation: 成長することのフラストレーション、気まずさ、そして高揚感を呼び起こし、従来の陳腐なトロープに頼ることなく。
back_translation: Evoking the frustration, awkwardness, and exhilaration of growing up without relying on conventional and clichéd tropes.

text: it 's a head-turner -- thoughtfully written , beautifully read and , finally , deeply humanizing .
translation: それは目を引く作品です -- 思慮深く書かれ、美しく朗読され、そして最終的には深く人間味のあるものです。

text: as it is , it 's too long and unfocused .
translation: そのままでは、長すぎて焦点が定まっていません。

text: this is not a classical dramatic animated feature , nor a hip , contemporary , in-jokey one .
translation: これはクラシックなドラマティックなアニメーション映画でもなく、現代的でおしゃれなジョーク満載の作品でもありません。
back_translation: This is neither a classic dramatic animated film nor a modern stylish work filled with jokes.

text: i 'm not a fan of the phrase ` life affirming ' because it usually means ` schmaltzy , ' but real women have curves truly is life affirming .
translation: 「リアル・ウーマン・ハズ・カーブス」という言葉は本当に生命を肯定するものであり、私は「ライフアファーミング」というフレーズが好きではありません。なぜなら、それは通常「感傷的」を意味するからです。
back_translation: The phrase "Real women have curves" is truly life-affirming, and I don't like the phrase "life affirming" because it usually means "sentimental."

text: too much of storytelling moves away from solondz 's social critique , casting its audience as that of intellectual lector in contemplation of the auteur 's professional injuries .
translation: ストーリーテリングが過剰になると、ソロンツの社会批判から離れ、観客をオーサーの職業的な傷を考察する知的な読み手として位置付けてしまう。
back_translation: When storytelling becomes excessive, it drifts away from Solon's social criticism and positions the audience as intellectual readers who contemplate the author's professional wounds.

text: charlotte sometimes is a gem .
translation: シャーロット・サムタイムズは宝石のようだ。

text: as immaculate as stuart little 2 is , it could be a lot better if it were , well , more adventurous .
translation: 「スチュアート・リトル2」が完璧であるように見えるが、もう少し冒険的であればもっと良くなるだろう。

text: further sad evidence that tom tykwer , director of the resonant and sense-spinning run lola run , has turned out to be a one-trick pony -- a maker of softheaded metaphysical claptrap .
translation: さらに悲しい証拠として、共鳴し、感覚を揺さぶる「ラン・ローラ・ラン」の監督であるトム・ティクヴァーが、一発屋であり、思考の薄い形而上学的なナンセンスを作る人になってしまったことが明らかになった。
back_translation: As further sad evidence, it has become clear that Tom Tykwer, the director of the resonant and emotionally stirring "Run Lola Run," has become a one-hit wonder, creating thinly conceived metaphysical nonsense.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- satisfying niblet .
translation: -（a）-満足のいく一口。
back_translation: - (a) - A satisfying bite.

text: this is a more fascinating look at the future than `` bladerunner '' and one of the most high-concept sci fi adventures attempted for the screen .
translation: これは「ブレードランナー」よりも未来をより魅力的に描いたものであり、スクリーンに挑戦された最もハイコンセプトなSFアドベンチャーの一つです。
back_translation: This depicts the future in a more captivating way than "Blade Runner" and is one of the most high-concept sci-fi adventures ever challenged on screen.

text: coupling disgracefully written dialogue with flailing bodily movements that substitute for acting , circuit is the awkwardly paced soap opera-ish story .
translation: 不適切に書かれた対話と演技の代わりに体がゆらゆらと動くことを組み合わせた結果、物語はぎこちないペースの昼ドラのようなものです。
back_translation: As a result of combining inappropriate dialogue and acting with a body swaying back and forth, the story resembles an awkwardly paced daytime drama.

text: it rapidly develops into a gut-wrenching examination of the way cultural differences and emotional expectations collide .
translation: それは文化の違いや感情的な期待が衝突する様子を衝撃的に検証する展開へと急速に発展する。
back_translation: It rapidly develops into a shocking examination of the collision between cultural differences and emotional expectations.

text: you try to guess the order in which the kids in the house will be gored .
translation: 家の中の子供たちがいつ角を突かれるか、その順番を予想してみてください。
back_translation: Try to predict when the children in the house will be poked in the corner and in what order.

text: payne has created a beautiful canvas , and nicholson proves once again that he 's the best brush in the business .
translation: ペインは美しいキャンバスを作り、ニコルソンは再び自分が商売で最高のブラシであることを証明します。
back_translation: Pain creates a beautiful canvas, and Nicholson proves once again that he is the best brush in the business.

text: -lrb- siegel -rrb- and co-writers lisa bazadona and grace woodard have relied too much on convention in creating the characters who surround frankie .

back_translation: Siegel and co-authors Lisa Bazadona and Grace Woodward rely too much on convention when creating the characters surrounding Frankie.

text: while the material is slight , the movie is better than you might think .
translation: 素材はわずかですが、映画は思ったよりも良いです。

text: unambitious writing emerges in the movie , using a plot that could have come from an animated-movie screenwriting textbook .
translation: 野心のない脚本が映画に現れ、アニメ映画の脚本教科書から出てきたようなプロットを使用しています。
back_translation: A script lacking ambition appears in the film, using a plot that seems to have come straight out of an animated film screenplay textbook.

text: the film 's strength is n't in its details , but in the larger picture it paints - of a culture in conflict with itself , with the thin veneer of nationalism that covers our deepest , media-soaked fears .
translation: 映画の強さはその詳細にあるのではなく、それが描く大きな絵、つまり自己と対立する文化、我々の最も深い、メディアに浸された恐怖を覆い隠す薄っぺらなナショナリズムにある。
back_translation: The strength of a film lies not in its details, but in the larger picture it portrays—specifically, the conflict with culture and the superficial nationalism that masks our deepest, media-saturated fears.

text: i do n't think most of the people who loved the 1989 paradiso will prefer this new version .
translation: 1989年のパラディーゾを愛していたほとんどの人々は、この新しいバージョンを好むとは思わない。
back_translation: Most people who loved Paradiso in 1989 probably wouldn't prefer this new version.

text: a sluggish pace and lack of genuine narrative hem the movie in every bit as much as life hems in the spirits of these young women .
translation: 鈍いペースと本物の物語の欠如が映画を制約し、まるで人生がこれらの若い女性たちの精神を制約するのと同じくらいその影響を与えている。
back_translation: The dull pace and lack of a genuine story constrain the film, affecting it as much as life constrains the spirits of these young women.

text: broomfield 's style of journalism is hardly journalism at all , and even those with an avid interest in the subject will grow impatient .
translation: ブルームフィールドのジャーナリズムのスタイルは、まったくジャーナリズムとは言えず、対象に強い関心を持つ人々でさえも、次第にイライラしてしまうだろう。
back_translation: Bloomfield's style of journalism cannot truly be called journalism, and even those who have a strong interest in the subject will gradually become frustrated.

text: mostly , -lrb- goldbacher -rrb- just lets her complicated characters be unruly , confusing and , through it all , human .
translation: 主に、(ゴールドバッハ)は彼女の複雑なキャラクターをやんちゃで混乱させ、そしてそのすべてを通して人間らしくさせる。
back_translation: Mainly, (Goldbach) makes her complex character playful and confusing, and throughout all of that, keeps her human.

text: even with its $ 50-million us budget , pinocchio never quite achieves the feel of a fanciful motion picture .
translation: 5,000万ドルの予算を持ちながらも、『ピノキオ』は幻想的な映画の雰囲気を決して達成することはありません。
back_translation: Despite having a budget of 50 million dollars, "Pinocchio" never achieves the fantastical atmosphere of a movie.

text: adam sandler 's heart may be in the right place , but he needs to pull his head out of his butt
translation: アダム・サンドラーの心は正しい場所にあるかもしれないが、彼は自分の頭を尻から引き抜く必要がある。

text: a genuine mind-bender .
translation: 本物の頭をひねるもの。

text: just as the recent argentine film son of the bride reminded us that a feel-good movie can still show real heart , time of favor presents us with an action movie that actually has a brain .
translation: 最近のアルゼンチン映画「花嫁の息子」が心温まる映画も本当の心を持っていることを思い出させてくれたように、「時の恩恵」は実際に頭を持つアクション映画を私たちに提供してくれます。
back_translation: The recent Argentine film "The Son of the Bride" reminds us that heartwarming movies can also have a true heart, just as "The Gift of Time" offers us an action film that actually has a brain.

text: that frenetic spectacle -lrb- on the tv show -rrb- has usually been leavened by a charm that 's conspicuously missing from the girls ' big-screen blowout .

back_translation: The frenzied spectacle (on the television show) has usually been mitigated by the clearly lacking charm of the girls' explosive presence on the big screen.

text: nonchalantly freaky and uncommonly pleasurable , warm water may well be the year 's best and most unpredictable comedy .
translation: 冷ややかにおかしく、普通では考えられないほど楽しい「ウォームウォーター」は、今年のベストで最も予測不可能なコメディかもしれません。
back_translation: "Warm Water," with its coolly bizarre and extraordinarily fun elements, may be the most unpredictable comedy of the year.

text: she 's all-powerful , a voice for a pop-cyber culture that feeds on her bjorkness .
translation: 彼女は全能であり、彼女のビョークらしさに養われるポップ・サイバー文化の声です。

text: this is a story that zings all the way through with originality , humour and pathos .

back_translation: The production is too extravagant, with too many lines, and they are too long, which undermines its appeal.

text: as pure over-the-top trash , any john waters movie has it beat by a country mile .
translation: 純粋にタダのゴミとして、ジョン・ウォーターズの映画はその点で雲の上の存在だ。

text: a tasty appetizer that leaves you wanting more .

translation: そのままの驚くほど非独創的な内容で、このジェンダー・ベンディング・コメディは一般的にかなり面白いです。
back_translation: With its shockingly unoriginal content just as it is, this gender-bending comedy is generally quite funny.

text: a clumsily manufactured exploitation flick , a style-free exercise in manipulation and mayhem .
translation: 不器用に製作された搾取映画で、スタイルのない操作と混乱の演習です。

text: it lacks the compassion , good-natured humor and the level of insight that made -lrb- eyre 's -rrb- first film something of a sleeper success .
translation: それは、エアの最初の映画がスリーパー成功を収めた理由である思いやり、良い性格のユーモア、そして洞察力のレベルが欠けている。
back_translation: That is the reason why Air's first movie achieved sleeper success: it lacks compassion, good-natured humor, and a level of insight.

translation: 個人的には、動物プラネットで見る方が好きです。

translation: この映画の最高指揮官として、ビッグローは広い視野と細部への注意を示し、彼女を監督界の上位に押し上げています。
back_translation: As the top commander of this film, Big Low demonstrates a broad vision and attention to detail, elevating her to the upper echelon of the directing world.

text: an annoying orgy of excess and exploitation that has no point and goes nowhere .
translation: 意味のない、行き先のない、煩わしい過剰と搾取の乱交。

text: the art demands live viewing .
translation: アートはライブでの鑑賞を求める。

translation: ポール・コックスはそれを示す必要があった。

translation: 驚くべき... -lrb- フレーム -rrb- まばゆいポップエンターテイメントの形で深い倫理的および哲学的な問いを提起する。

text: although the subject matter may still be too close to recent national events , the film works - mostly due to its superior cast of characters .
translation: 題材はまだ最近の国家的出来事にとても近いかもしれませんが、この映画はキャラクターの優れたキャストのおかげで機能しています。

text: a stirring road movie .
translation: 感動的なロードムービー。

text: bursting through the constraints of its source , this is one adapted - from-television movie that actually looks as if it belongs on the big screen .
translation: その出所の制約を突破して、これは実際に大画面にふさわしいように見える、テレビ映画から適応された作品です。

text: even with all its botches , enigma offers all the pleasure of a handsome and well-made entertainment .
translation: すべての失敗があっても、エニグマは見た目が良く、よく作られた娯楽の喜びをすべて提供している。

text: the images lack contrast , are murky and are frequently too dark to be decipherable .
translation: 画像はコントラストが不足しており、ぼやけていて、しばしば解読不可能なくらい暗すぎます。
back_translation: The image lacks contrast, is blurry, and is often too dark to be decipherable.

text: there 's real visual charge to the filmmaking , and a strong erotic spark to the most crucial lip-reading sequence .
translation: 映像制作には本物の視覚的魅力があり、最も重要なリップリーディングのシーンには強いエロティックな火花があります。
back_translation: Filmmaking has genuine visual appeal, and the most important lip-reading scenes have a strong erotic spark.

text: if you 're in the right b-movie frame of mind , it may just scare the pants off you .
translation: もしあなたが正しいB級映画の心構えを持っているなら、それはあなたを恐怖で脱がすかもしれません。
back_translation: If you have the right mindset for a B-movie, it might strip you of your fear.

text: city by the sea is a gritty police thriller with all the dysfunctional family dynamics one could wish for .
translation: 海辺の街は、求められるすべての機能不全の家族ダイナミクスを持つ、 grittyな警察スリラーです。

text: dismally dull sci-fi comedy .
translation: 陰鬱で退屈なSFコメディ。

text: it 's weird , wonderful , and not necessarily for kids .
translation: それは奇妙で素晴らしく、必ずしも子供向けではありません。
back_translation: It is strange and wonderful, and not necessarily for children.

text: executed with such gentle but insistent sincerity , with such good humor and appreciation of the daily grind that only the most hardhearted scrooge could fail to respond .
translation: そんな優しくも執拗な誠実さで、日々の苦労への良いユーモアと感謝をもって実行されており、最も冷酷なスクルージでも反応せざるを得ないだろう。
back_translation: With such kind yet persistent sincerity, it is carried out with good humor and gratitude towards the daily hardships, and even the most cold-hearted Scrooge would have no choice but to respond.

text: maybe he was reading the minds of the audience .
translation: 彼は観客の心を読み取っていたのかもしれません。
back_translation: He may have been able to read the hearts of the audience.

text: grenier is terrific , bringing an unforced , rapid-fire delivery to toback 's heidegger - and nietzsche-referencing dialogue .
translation: グルニエは素晴らしく、トバックのハイデッガーとニーチェを参照した対話に対して、自然で迅速な口調を持ち込んでいます。
back_translation: Grunier is wonderful and brings a natural and swift tone to the dialogue referencing Heidegger and Nietzsche in Toback.

text: burns ' fifth beer-soaked film feels in almost every possible way -- from the writing and direction to the soggy performances -- tossed off .
translation: バーンズの5作目のビールに浸かった映画は、ほぼすべての面で、脚本や演出から湿っぽい演技に至るまで、いい加減なものと感じられる。
back_translation: Barnes's fifth beer-soaked film feels careless in almost every aspect, from the screenplay and direction to the damp performances.

text: less the sensational true-crime hell-jaunt purists might like and more experimental in its storytelling -lrb- though no less horrifying for it -rrb- .
translation: センセーショナルな真実の犯罪の過激な旅が好まれる純粋主義者には物足りないかもしれないが、物語の語り方はより実験的であり、（それによって恐ろしさが減るわけではない）。
back_translation: It may be unsatisfactory for purists who prefer sensational, extreme journeys into true crime, but the storytelling is more experimental (which does not lessen the horror).

text: it 's not so much a movie as a joint promotion for the national basketball association and teenaged rap and adolescent poster-boy lil ' bow wow .
translation: それは映画というよりも、全米バスケットボール協会とティーンエイジャーのラップ、そして青年のアイドルであるリル・バウ・ワウの共同プロモーションという感じだ。
back_translation: It feels more like a joint promotion between the NBA, teenage rap, and the youth idol Lil' Bow Wow rather than a movie.

text: it labours as storytelling .
translation: それはストーリーテリングとして働いています。
back_translation: It works as storytelling.

text: a first-class road movie that proves you can run away from home , but your ego and all your problems go with you .
translation: 家庭から逃げ出すことができることを証明する一流のロードムービーですが、あなたのエゴとすべての問題が一緒についてくるということです。
back_translation: It is a top-class road movie that proves you can escape from home, but it means your ego and all your problems come along with you.

text: the nonstop artifice ultimately proves tiresome , with the surface histrionics failing to compensate for the paper-thin characterizations and facile situations .
translation: 無限の演出は最終的に疲れさせるものであり、表面的な演技が薄っぺらなキャラクター描写や簡単すぎる状況を補うことにはなりません。
back_translation: Endless performances ultimately lead to exhaustion, and superficial acting cannot compensate for shallow character depictions or overly simplistic situations.

text: it makes me say the obvious : abandon all hope of a good movie ye who enter here .
translation: ここに入る者よ、良い映画の希望をすべて捨てよ。
back_translation: Abandon all hope of good movies, you who enter here.

text: festers in just such a dungpile that you 'd swear you were watching monkeys flinging their feces at you .
translation: まるで猿が糞を投げつけているのを見ているかのように、ちょうどそんな糞の山の中で腐っている。
back_translation: It's as if I'm watching a monkey throwing feces, rotting right in the middle of such a pile of dung.

text: yes , i have given this movie a rating of zero .
translation: はい、私はこの映画にゼロの評価をつけました。
back_translation: Yes, I gave this movie a zero rating.

text: a buoyant romantic comedy about friendship , love , and the truth that we 're all in this together .
translation: 友情、愛、そして私たちが皆この中にいるという真実についての弾むようなロマンティックコメディ。
back_translation: A bouncy romantic comedy about friendship, love, and the truth that we are all in this together.

text: the locations go from stark desert to gorgeous beaches .
translation: 場所は、厳しい砂漠から美しいビーチまで様々です。
back_translation: The locations range from harsh deserts to beautiful beaches.

text: an acceptable way to pass a little over an hour with moviegoers ages 8-10 , but it 's unlikely to inspire anything more than a visit to mcdonald 's , let alone some savvy street activism .
translation: 8〜10歳の映画鑑賞者と1時間ちょっと過ごすには許容できる方法ですが、マクドナルドへの訪問以上の何かを促すことは unlikely ですし、ましてや街の活動家としての洞察をもたらすことはありません。
back_translation: It is an acceptable way to spend just over an hour with moviegoers aged 8 to 10, but it is unlikely to encourage anything beyond a visit to McDonald's, let alone provide insights as an activist in the community.

text: those who are n't put off by the film 's austerity will find it more than capable of rewarding them .
translation: 映画の厳格さに気を取られない人々は、それが十分に彼らを報いてくれることに気づくでしょう。
back_translation: People who are not distracted by the rigor of the film will realize that it rewards them sufficiently.

text: has nothing good to speak about other than the fact that it is relatively short , tries its best to hide the fact that seagal 's overweight and out of shape .
translation: 良いことは短いという事実を除いて何もなく、セガールが太りすぎて体型が崩れていることを隠そうと最善を尽くしています。
back_translation: Apart from the fact that good things are short-lived, there is nothing else, and Seagal is doing his best to hide the fact that he has become too overweight and his physique has fallen apart.

text: like a three-ring circus , there are side stories aplenty -- none of them memorable .
translation: サーカスのように、サイドストーリーはたくさんあるが、どれも記憶に残るものではない。
back_translation: Like a circus, there are many side stories, but none of them are memorable.

text: a fascinating literary mystery story with multiple strands about the controversy of who really wrote shakespeare 's plays .
translation: シェイクスピアの劇を書いたのは誰かという論争に関する、複数の要素を持つ魅力的な文学ミステリーの物語。
back_translation: A captivating literary mystery story with multiple elements regarding the debate about who wrote Shakespeare's plays.

text: just too silly and sophomoric to ensnare its target audience .
translation: ただあまりにも馬鹿げていて、幼稚すぎて、ターゲットオーディエンスを捉えることができない。
back_translation: It's just too ridiculous and immature to capture the target audience.

text: ... one of the more influential works of the ` korean new wave ' .
translation: ...「韓国ニューウェーブ」のより影響力のある作品の一つです。
back_translation: ...it is one of the more influential works of the "Korean New Wave."

text: the closest thing to the experience of space travel
translation: 宇宙旅行の経験に最も近いもの
back_translation: The experience closest to space travel.

text: right now , they 're merely signposts marking the slow , lingering death of imagination .
translation: 今、彼らは想像力の緩やかで持続的な死を示す標識に過ぎない。
back_translation: Now, they are merely signs of a gradual and persistent death of imagination.

text: while easier to sit through than most of jaglom 's self-conscious and gratingly irritating films , it 's still tainted by cliches , painful improbability and murky points .
translation: ジャグロムの自己意識的でイライラさせる映画のほとんどよりは観るのが容易ですが、やはりクリシェや苦痛を伴う非現実性、曖昧なポイントによって汚染されています。
back_translation: It is easier to watch than most of Jaglom's self-aware and irritating films, but it is still tainted by clichés, the painful non-reality, and ambiguous points.

text: bon appétit !
translation: いただきます！
back_translation: Let's eat!

text: as animation increasingly emphasizes the computer and the cool , this is a film that takes a stand in favor of tradition and warmth .
translation: アニメーションがますますコンピューターとクールさを強調する中、この映画は伝統と温かさを支持する立場を取っています。
back_translation: As animation increasingly emphasizes computers and coolness, this film takes a stance that supports tradition and warmth.

text: boy , has this franchise ever run out of gas .
translation: 少年よ、このフランチャイズは本当にガスが切れたことがあるのか。
back_translation: Boy, has this franchise really run out of gas?

text: the film itself is about something very interesting and odd that would probably work better as a real documentary without the insinuation of mediocre acting or a fairly trite narrative .
translation: その映画自体は、非常に興味深く奇妙な内容についてであり、平凡な演技やかなり陳腐なストーリーの暗示なしに、実際のドキュメンタリーとしての方がうまく機能するだろう。
back_translation: The movie itself deals with very interesting and strange content, and would function better as an actual documentary, without the suggestion of mediocre acting or a rather clichéd story.

text: two hours of junk .
translation: 2時間のゴミ。
back_translation: Two hours of garbage.

text: this is absolutely and completely ridiculous and an insult to every family whose mother has suffered through the horrible pains of a death by cancer .
translation: これは完全に馬鹿げており、母親が癌による悲惨な痛みを経験したすべての家族に対する侮辱です。
back_translation: This is completely absurd and an insult to all families who have experienced the terrible pain of a mother suffering from cancer.

text: i love the opening scenes of a wintry new york city in 1899 .
translation: 私は1899年の冬のニューヨーク市のオープニングシーンが大好きです。
back_translation: I love the opening scene set in New York City in the winter of 1899.

text: -lrb- d -rrb- espite its familiar subject matter , ice age is consistently amusing and engrossing ...
translation: アイスエイジはその馴染み深いテーマにもかかわらず、一貫して面白くて引き込まれる作品です。
back_translation: Ice Age is a consistently interesting and engaging work, despite its familiar themes.

text: though its rather routine script is loaded with familiar situations , the movie has a cinematic fluidity and sense of intelligence that makes it work more than it probably should .
translation: 一見、ルーチンな脚本にはおなじみの状況が盛り込まれているものの、この映画には映画的な流動性と知性が備わっており、思った以上に成功している。
back_translation: At first glance, the routine script includes familiar situations, but this film possesses cinematic fluidity and intelligence, achieving more success than expected.

text: alternative medicine obviously has its merits ... but ayurveda does the field no favors .
translation: 代替医療には明らかに利点がありますが、アーユルヴェーダはこの分野にとって何の役にも立ちません。
back_translation: Alternative medicine clearly has its advantages, but Ayurveda is of no use to this field.

text: a living testament to the power of the eccentric and the strange .
translation: 奇妙で風変わりな力の生きた証。
back_translation: A living proof of strange and peculiar powers.

text: it 's not as awful as some of the recent hollywood trip tripe ... but it 's far from a groundbreaking endeavor .
translation: 最近のハリウッドのひどい作品ほどではありませんが、画期的な試みからはほど遠いです。
back_translation: It may not be as bad as some of the recent terrible works from Hollywood, but it is far from being a groundbreaking attempt.

text: infidelity drama is nicely shot , well-edited and features a standout performance by diane lane .
translation: 不倫ドラマは美しく撮影され、編集も優れており、ダイアン・レインの印象的な演技が際立っています。
back_translation: The infidelity drama is beautifully shot, excellently edited, and Diane Lane's impressive performance stands out.

text: a soulless jumble of ineptly assembled cliches and pabulum that plays like a 95-minute commercial for nba properties .
translation: 魂のない、無能に組み立てられたクリシェとパビュラムの寄せ集めで、NBAのプロパティのための95分間のコマーシャルのように感じられる。
back_translation: It feels like a collection of soul-less, incompetent clichés and patchwork that resembles a 95-minute commercial for NBA properties.

text: talkiness is n't necessarily bad , but the dialogue frequently misses the mark .
translation: おしゃべりが必ずしも悪いわけではありませんが、対話はしばしば的を外れています。
back_translation: Chatting is not necessarily bad, but conversations often miss the mark.

text: but the 2002 film does n't really believe in it , and breaks the mood with absurdly inappropriate ` comedy ' scenes .
translation: しかし、2002年の映画はそれを本当に信じておらず、ばかげた不適切な「コメディ」シーンで雰囲気を台無しにしています。
back_translation: However, the movie from 2002 doesn't really believe in that and ruins the atmosphere with absurdly inappropriate "comedy" scenes.

text: not so much farcical as sour .
translation: 滑稽というよりは、むしろ不機嫌な。
back_translation: Rather than being comical, it is rather unpleasant.

text: like life on the island , the movie grows boring despite the scenery .
translation: 島の生活のように、映画は風景にもかかわらず退屈になっていく。
back_translation: Like life on an island, movies become boring regardless of the scenery.

text: the material and the production itself are little more than routine .
translation: 素材と生産自体は、ほとんどルーチンに過ぎません。
back_translation: The materials and production itself are almost routine.

text: aspires to the cracked lunacy of the adventures of buckaroo banzai , but thanks to an astonishingly witless script ends up more like the adventures of ford fairlane .
translation: バクローバンザイの冒険のひび割れた狂気を目指しているが、驚くほど無知な脚本のおかげで、フォード・フェアレーンの冒険のようになってしまっている。
back_translation: While aiming for the cracked madness of Bacroban's adventure, it has surprisingly turned into something akin to Ford Fairlane's adventures due to an incredibly ignorant script.

text: far more successful , if considerably less ambitious , than last year 's kubrick-meets-spielberg exercise .
translation: 昨年のキューブリックとスピルバーグの融合よりもはるかに成功しているが、かなり野心が欠けている。
back_translation: It is far more successful than last year's fusion of Kubrick and Spielberg, but it lacks quite a bit of ambition.

text: when it 's this rich and luscious , who cares ?
translation: こんなにリッチで濃厚なら、誰が気にする？
back_translation: If it's this rich and creamy, who cares?

text: informative , intriguing , observant , often touching ... gives a human face to what 's often discussed in purely abstract terms .
translation: 情報豊かで、興味を引き、観察力に富み、しばしば感動的です... 抽象的な用語で語られることが多いものに人間の顔を与えます。
back_translation: It is informative, engaging, rich in observation, and often moving... it gives a human face to things that are often discussed in abstract terms.

text: a compelling pre-wwii drama with vivid characters and a warm , moving message .
translation: 第二次世界大戦前の魅力的なドラマで、鮮やかなキャラクターと心温まる感動的なメッセージがあります。
back_translation: An enchanting drama set before World War II, featuring vibrant characters and a heartwarming, touching message.

text: a bizarre piece of work , with premise and dialogue at the level of kids ' television and plot threads as morose as teen pregnancy , rape and suspected murder
translation: 奇妙な作品で、前提と台詞は子供向けテレビ番組のレベルでありながら、プロットのテーマは思春期の妊娠や強姦、疑われる殺人のように陰鬱です。
back_translation: It is a peculiar work where the premise and dialogue are at the level of a children's television program, yet the themes of the plot are grim, dealing with issues like teenage pregnancy, rape, and suspected murder.

text: at best , cletis tout might inspire a trip to the video store -- in search of a better movie experience .
translation: せいぜい、クレティス・タウトはより良い映画体験を求めてビデオショップへの旅行を促すかもしれません。
back_translation: At best, Cretis Taut may encourage a trip to the video store in search of a better movie experience.

text: skip this turd and pick your nose instead because you 're sure to get more out of the latter experience .
translation: このクソをスキップして鼻をほじる方がいいよ、後者の経験からはもっと得るものがあるから。
back_translation: It's better to skip this crap and pick your nose, because you'll gain more from the latter experience.

text: what a concept , what an idea , what a thrill ride .
translation: なんてコンセプト、なんてアイデア、なんてスリル満点の乗り物なんだ。
back_translation: What a concept, what an idea, what a thrilling ride it is!

text: unlike most surf movies , blue crush thrillingly uses modern technology to take the viewer inside the wave .
translation: ほとんどのサーフィン映画とは異なり、『ブルークラッシュ』は現代技術を駆使して、観客を波の中に引き込むスリリングな体験を提供しています。
back_translation: Unlike most surfing movies, "Blue Crush" utilizes modern technology to provide audiences with a thrilling experience that pulls them into the waves.

text: be forewarned , if you 're depressed about anything before watching this film , you may just end up trying to drown yourself in a lake afterwards .
translation: 警告しますが、この映画を見る前に何かについて落ち込んでいる場合、見た後に湖で自分を溺れさせようとするかもしれません。
back_translation: I warn you, if you are feeling down about something before watching this movie, you might try to drown yourself in the lake afterwards.

text: it has become apparent that the franchise 's best years are long past .
translation: フランチャイズの最盛期はとっくの昔に過ぎ去ったことが明らかになった。
back_translation: It has become clear that the heyday of franchises has long since passed.

text: it strikes hardest ... when it reminds you how pertinent its dynamics remain .
translation: それは最も強く響く...そのダイナミクスがどれほど依然として重要であるかを思い出させるときに。
back_translation: It resonates the most... when it reminds us how still important that dynamics are.

text: most consumers of lo mein and general tso 's chicken barely give a thought to the folks who prepare and deliver it , so , hopefully , this film will attach a human face to all those little steaming cartons .
translation: ローメインやティゾー・チキンを楽しむほとんどの消費者は、それを準備し配達する人々にほとんど考えを巡らせることはありません。ですので、この映画がそれらの小さな蒸気の立ち上るカートンに人間の顔をもたらすことを願っています。
back_translation: Most consumers who enjoy romaine and Tizzo chicken rarely think about the people who prepare and deliver it. So, I hope this film brings a human face to those small steaming cartons.

text: even in terms of the low-grade cheese standards on which it operates , it never quite makes the grade as tawdry trash .
translation: それが運営されている低品質のチーズ基準でさえ、決して下品なゴミとしてのレベルには達しない。
back_translation: Even that low-quality cheese standard it operates under never reaches the level of being outright disgusting garbage.

text: the nicest thing that can be said about stealing harvard -lrb- which might have been called freddy gets molested by a dog -rrb- is that it 's not as obnoxious as tom green 's freddie got fingered .
translation: 「ハーバードを盗む」と言われることについて一番良い点は、それがトム・グリーンの「フレディが指を刺された」ほど嫌なものではないということです。
back_translation: The best thing about being called "stealing Harvard" is that it's not as unpleasant as Tom Green's "Freddy got fingered."

text: ill-considered , unholy hokum .
translation: 考えが浅く、不道徳な無駄話。
back_translation: Shallow thinking and immoral nonsense.

text: it 's just merely very bad .
translation: それはただ非常に悪いだけです。
back_translation: It's just very bad.

text: a flick about our infantilized culture that is n't entirely infantile .
translation: 幼児化した文化についての映画ですが、完全に幼児的ではありません。
back_translation: It's a movie about a culture that has become infantile, but it is not completely childish.

text: rymer does n't trust laughs -- and does n't conjure proper respect for followers of the whole dead-undead genre , who deserve more from a vampire pic than a few shrieky special effects .
translation: ライマーは笑いを信用せず、全ての死者-不死者ジャンルのフォロワーに対して適切な敬意を示さない。彼らは吸血鬼映画から、数回の叫び声と特殊効果以上のものに値する。
back_translation: Reimer does not trust laughter and does not show appropriate respect to all the followers of the dead-undead genre. They deserve more than just a few screams and special effects from vampire movies.

text: trying to make head or tail of the story in the hip-hop indie snipes is enough to give you brain strain -- and the pay-off is negligible .
translation: ヒップホップインディーのスナイプのストーリーを理解しようとするのは、頭が痛くなるほどで、それに見合う報酬はほとんどありません。
back_translation: Trying to understand the story of the hip-hop indie snipe is a headache, and there is hardly any reward for it.

text: the film does give a pretty good overall picture of the situation in laramie following the murder of matthew shepard .
translation: その映画は、マシュー・シェパードの殺害後のララミーの状況について、かなり良い全体像を提供しています。
back_translation: The movie provides a fairly good overview of the situation in Laramie after the murder of Matthew Shepard.

text: this toothless dog , already on cable , loses all bite on the big screen .
translation: この歯のない犬は、すでにケーブルに繋がれていて、大画面ではすべての噛む力を失っています。
back_translation: This toothless dog is already connected to the cable and has lost all its biting power on the big screen.

text: this rich , bittersweet israeli documentary , about the life of song-and-dance-man pasach ` ke burstein and his family , transcends ethnic lines .
translation: この豊かでほろ苦いイスラエルのドキュメンタリーは、歌とダンスの男パサック・ケ・ブルスティンとその家族の生活について描かれており、民族の枠を超えています。
back_translation: This rich and bittersweet Israeli documentary portrays the life of the man of song and dance, Pasak Ke Burstin, and his family, transcending ethnic boundaries.

text: boll uses a lot of quick cutting and blurry step-printing to goose things up , but dopey dialogue and sometimes inadequate performances kill the effect .
translation: ボルは多くのクイックカッティングやぼやけたステッププリンティングを使ってテンポを上げていますが、バカなセリフや時には不十分な演技がその効果を台無しにしています。
back_translation: Bol is increasing the tempo with a lot of quick cutting and blurry step printing, but silly lines and sometimes insufficient acting ruin the effect.

text: this 90-minute dud could pass for mike tyson 's e !
translation: この90分のダメ作品は、マイク・タイソンの「e！」と見なされてもおかしくありません。
back_translation: This 90-minute bad work could very well be considered "e!" by Mike Tyson.

text: a generic family comedy unlikely to be appreciated by anyone outside the under-10 set .
translation: 10歳未満の子供以外には評価されそうもない、一般的なファミリーコメディ。
back_translation: A typical family comedy that is unlikely to be appreciated by anyone other than children under 10 years old.

text: an amateurish , quasi-improvised acting exercise shot on ugly digital video .
translation: 素人の、準即興の演技エクササイズで、醜いデジタルビデオで撮影された。
back_translation: An amateur, semi-improvised acting exercise filmed in ugly digital video.
