text: the very simple story seems too simple and the working out of the plot almost arbitrary .
translation: その非常に単純な話はあまりにも単純に思え、プロットの進行はほとんど恣意的です。
back_translation: That very simple story seems too simple, and the progression of the plot is almost arbitrary.

text: the elements were all there but lack of a pyschological center knocks it flat .
translation: 要素はすべて揃っていたが、心理的な中心が欠けているために台無しになっている。
back_translation: All the elements were in place, but it's ruined due to a lack of psychological core.

text: exactly what its title implies : lusty , boisterous and utterly charming .
translation: まさにそのタイトルが示す通りの：官能的で、賑やかで、全く魅力的です。
back_translation: Just as the title suggests: sensual, lively, and completely captivating.

text: what remains is a variant of the nincompoop benigni persona , here a more annoying , though less angry version of the irresponsible sandlerian manchild , undercut by the voice of the star of road trip .
translation: 残っているのは、バカなベニーニのペルソナのバリエーションで、ここではより迷惑であるが、怒りの少ない無責任なサンドラーの幼児的な男の子のバージョンであり、ロードトリップのスターの声によって割り引かれています。
back_translation: What remains is a variation of the foolish Benigni persona, which here is a more annoying but less angry, irresponsible Sandler-like childish boy version, diminished by the voice of a road trip star.

text: cherish is a dud -- a romantic comedy that 's not the least bit romantic and only mildly funny .
translation: 「チェリッシュ」は失敗作で、全くロマンチックでなく、わずかに面白いだけのロマンティックコメディです。
back_translation: "Cherry's" is a failure, completely lacking in romance, and is just a slightly amusing romantic comedy.

text: heartwarming here relies less on forced air than on petter næss ' delicate , clever direction ... and a wonderful , imaginative script by axel hellstenius .
translation: 心温まるここでは、ペッター・ネスの繊細で巧妙な監督によるものが主であり、アクセル・ヘルステニウスの素晴らしく想像力豊かな脚本によるものでもあります。
back_translation: In this heartwarming piece, it is primarily the delicate and skillful direction of Petter Ness, as well as the wonderfully imaginative script by Axel Hellstenius, that stands out.

text: let 's see , a haunted house , a haunted ship , what 's next ... ghost blimp ?
translation: さあ、幽霊屋敷、幽霊船、次は... 幽霊飛行船？
back_translation: Well, haunted mansion, ghost ship, what's next... ghost airship?

text: with its paint fights , motorized scooter chases and dewy-eyed sentiment , it 's a pretty listless collection of kid-movie clichés .
translation: ペイントバトルや電動スクーターの追跡、そして涙ぐんだ感傷とともに、これはかなり退屈な子供向け映画のクリシェのコレクションです。
back_translation: With paint battles, tracking electric scooters, and tearful sentimentality, this is quite a collection of clichés from a rather dull children's movie.

text: based on dave barry 's popular book of the same name , the movie benefits from having a real writer plot out all of the characters ' moves and overlapping story .
translation: デイブ・バリーの同名の人気書籍に基づいて、映画は実際の作家がすべてのキャラクターの動きや重なり合うストーリーを練ることで恩恵を受けています。
back_translation: Based on the popular book of the same name by Dave Barry, the movie benefits from the actual writer crafting all the characters' movements and overlapping stories.

text: what 's missing is what we call the ` wow ' factor .
translation: 欠けているのは、私たちが「ワオ」要素と呼ぶものです。
back_translation: What is missing is what we call the "wow" factor.

text: normally , rohmer 's talky films fascinate me , but when he moves his setting to the past , and relies on a historical text , he loses the richness of characterization that makes his films so memorable .
translation: 通常、ロメールの対話中心の映画には魅了されますが、彼が設定を過去に移し、歴史的なテキストに依存する時、彼の映画を記憶に残るものにしているキャラクターの豊かさを失ってしまいます。
back_translation: Usually, I'm captivated by Rohmer's dialogue-centered films, but when he moves the setting to the past and relies on historical texts, he loses the richness of character that makes his films memorable.

text: even if it is generally amusing from time to time , i spy has all the same problems the majority of action comedies have .
translation: たとえ時々面白いとしても、『スパイ』はほとんどのアクションコメディが抱える同じ問題を持っています。
back_translation: Even if it is occasionally funny, "Spy" has the same problems that most action comedies face.

text: you watch for that sense of openness , the little surprises .
translation: その開放感や、小さな驚きを待ち望んでいます。
back_translation: I am looking forward to that sense of liberation and the small surprises.

text: the urban landscapes are detailed down to the signs on the kiosks , and the color palette , with lots of somber blues and pinks , is dreamy and evocative .
translation: 都市の風景はキオスクの看板まで詳細に描かれており、色調は多くの陰鬱な青やピンクを含み、夢のようで感情を呼び起こします。
back_translation: The cityscape is depicted in detail, down to the kiosk signs, with a color palette that includes many somber blues and pinks, evoking a dreamlike quality and stirring emotions.

text: the abiding impression , despite the mild hallucinogenic buzz , is of overwhelming waste -- the acres of haute couture ca n't quite conceal that there 's nothing resembling a spine here .
translation: 持続的な印象は、穏やかな幻覚的な高揚感にもかかわらず、圧倒的な無駄さです — 高級ファッションの広がりは、ここに脊髄のようなものがまったく存在しないことを隠すことができません。
back_translation: The lasting impression is one of overwhelming futility, despite a gentle hallucinatory elation— the spread of high fashion cannot hide the complete absence of any backbone here.

text: it throws quirky characters , odd situations , and off-kilter dialogue at us , all as if to say , `` look at this !
translation: それは奇妙なキャラクター、奇妙な状況、そして不調和な対話を私たちに投げかけ、まるで「これを見て！」と言っているかのようです。
back_translation: It throws at us strange characters, odd situations, and discordant dialogue, as if saying, "Look at this!"

text: alan and his fellow survivors are idiosyncratic enough to lift the movie above its playwriting 101 premise .
translation: アランと彼の仲間の生存者たちは、その映画の基本的なプロットを超えて、独特な魅力を持っています。
back_translation: Alan and his fellow survivors have a unique charm that goes beyond the basic plot of the movie.

text: a film neither bitter nor sweet , neither romantic nor comedic , neither warm nor fuzzy .
translation: 苦くもなく甘くもない、ロマンチックでもなくコメディでもない、温かくもなく心地よくもない映画。
back_translation: A movie that is neither bitter nor sweet, neither romantic nor comedic, neither warm nor comfortable.

text: of all the halloween 's , this is the most visually unappealing .
translation: すべてのハロウィンの中で、これは最も視覚的に魅力がない。
back_translation: Of all the Halloweens, this one is the least visually appealing.

text: light , silly , photographed with colour and depth , and rather a good time .
translation: 明るく、愚かで、色と深みを持って撮影されており、なかなか楽しい時間です。
back_translation: It's brightly filmed, foolish, full of color and depth, and quite a fun time.

text: it 's refreshing to see a romance this smart .
translation: これほどスマートなロマンスを見るのは爽快です。
back_translation: It's refreshing to see such a smart romance.

text: sodden and glum , even in those moments where it 's supposed to feel funny and light .
translation: 湿っぽくて憂鬱で、面白くて軽やかであるはずの瞬間でも。
back_translation: Even in moments that should be damp and gloomy, yet interesting and light.

text: with nary a glimmer of self-knowledge , -lrb- crane -rrb- becomes more specimen than character -- and auto focus remains a chilly , clinical lab report .
translation: 自己認識のかけらもなく、-lrb- クレイン -rrb- はキャラクターよりも標本になり、オートフォーカスは冷たく、臨床的な実験報告のままです。
back_translation: With no semblance of self-awareness, -lrb- Crane -rrb- becomes more of a specimen than a character, and the autofocus remains cold, sticking to a clinical report of the experiment.

text: nothing about the film -- with the possible exception of elizabeth hurley 's breasts -- is authentic .
translation: 映画については、エリザベス・ハーレイの胸部を除いて、何も本物ではない。
back_translation: Nothing in the movie is real, except for Elizabeth Hurley's chest.

text: a manically generous christmas vaudeville .
translation: 狂気のように寛大なクリスマスバウベル。
back_translation: A Christmas Baubel that is generously insane.

text: the powder blues and sun-splashed whites of tunis make an alluring backdrop for this sensuous and spirited tale of a prim widow who finds an unlikely release in belly-dancing clubs .
translation: チュニスの粉色の青と太陽に照らされた白は、まじめな未亡人がベリーダンスクラブで思いがけない解放を見つけるという官能的で活気ある物語の魅力的な背景を作り出しています。
back_translation: The powder pink of Tunis, combined with the bright white illuminated by the sun, creates an enchanting backdrop for a sensual and vibrant story in which a serious widow finds unexpected liberation in a belly dance club.

text: with dickens ' words and writer-director douglas mcgrath 's even-toned direction , a ripping good yarn is told .
translation: ディケンズの言葉と、監督・脚本家ダグラス・マクグラスの穏やかな演出により、素晴らしい物語が語られます。
back_translation: Through the words of Dickens and the gentle direction of director and screenwriter Douglas McGrath, a wonderful story is told.

text: i approached the usher and said that if she had to sit through it again , she should ask for a raise .
translation: 私は案内係に近づき、もし彼女が再びそれを見なければならないのなら、昇給をお願いすべきだと言いました。
back_translation: I approached the guide and said that if she had to see it again, she should ask for a raise.

text: it makes you believe the cast and crew thoroughly enjoyed themselves and believed in their small-budget film .
translation: キャストとスタッフが心から楽しんでおり、彼らの小予算の映画に信じていることをあなたに信じさせます。
back_translation: You will be convinced that the cast and crew are genuinely enjoying themselves and believe in their low-budget film.

text: the film is enriched by an imaginatively mixed cast of antic spirits , headed by christopher plummer as the subtlest and most complexly evil uncle ralph i 've ever seen in the many film and stage adaptations of the work .
translation: この映画は、想像力豊かな混成キャストによって豊かにされており、クリストファー・プラマーがこれまで見た中で最も微妙で複雑に悪役を演じるラルフおじさんを務めています。
back_translation: This movie is enriched by a vividly imaginative mixed cast, with Christopher Plummer playing Uncle Ralph, a villain in the most subtle and complex way that we have ever seen.

text: these three films form a remarkably cohesive whole , both visually and thematically , through their consistently sensitive and often exciting treatment of an ignored people .
translation: これらの3つの映画は、無視されている人々に対する一貫して敏感でしばしば刺激的な扱いを通じて、視覚的にもテーマ的にも驚くほど統一感のある全体を形成しています。
back_translation: These three films form an astonishingly cohesive whole, both visually and thematically, through a consistently sensitive and often provocative treatment of marginalized people.

text: smart and alert , thirteen conversations about one thing is a small gem .
translation: スマートで機敏な「13の会話、一つのことについて」は、小さな宝石です。
back_translation: The smart and agile "13 Conversations About One Thing" is a small gem.

text: insanely hilarious !
translation: 信じられないほど面白い！
back_translation: Incredibly interesting!

text: ... strips bible stores of the potential for sanctimoniousness , making them meaningful for both kids and church-wary adults .
translation: ... 聖書を持つ店から自己正義の可能性を取り除き、子供たちと教会に警戒心を持つ大人の両方にとって意味のあるものにしています。
back_translation: ... It removes the possibility of self-righteousness from the stores that hold the Bible, making it meaningful for both children and adults who have a sense of caution towards the church.

text: it 's just weirdness for the sake of weirdness , and where human nature should be ingratiating , it 's just grating .
translation: それは単なる奇妙さのための奇妙さであり、人間の本性が親しみやすくあるべきところで、ただ不快に感じるだけです。
back_translation: It is just absurdity for the sake of absurdity, where human nature should be approachable, but it only feels uncomfortable.

text: its audacious ambitions sabotaged by pomposity , steven soderbergh 's space opera emerges as a numbingly dull experience .
translation: その大胆な野望がうぬぼれによって台無しにされ、スティーブン・ソダーバーグのスペースオペラは麻痺するように退屈な体験として浮かび上がります。
back_translation: That bold ambition is undermined by arrogance, and Steven Soderbergh's space opera emerges as a painfully dull experience.

text: it works its magic with such exuberance and passion that the film 's length becomes a part of its fun .
translation: その魔法があまりにも exuberance と情熱を持って働くため、映画の長ささえも楽しさの一部になります。
back_translation: The magic works with such exuberance and passion that even the length of the movie becomes a part of the enjoyment.

text: even if the enticing prospect of a lot of nubile young actors in a film about campus depravity did n't fade amid the deliberate , tiresome ugliness , it would be rendered tedious by avary 's failure to construct a story with even a trace of dramatic interest .
translation: キャンパスの堕落に関する映画で多くの若い俳優たちの魅力的な展望が、意図的で退屈な醜さの中で消えなかったとしても、アヴァリーが劇的な興味のかけらすら持った物語を構築することに失敗したために、退屈なものとなるだろう。
back_translation: Even if the appealing prospects of many young actors in a film about the decay of campus life do not vanish in the midst of intentional and tedious ugliness, it will still become dull because Avery fails to construct a story that holds even a shred of dramatic interest.

text: it goes on for too long and bogs down in a surfeit of characters and unnecessary subplots .
translation: それは長すぎて、キャラクターや不必要なサブプロットが多すぎて進行が遅くなります。
back_translation: It's too long and has too many characters and unnecessary subplots, which slows down the progression.

text: a feel-good movie that does n't give you enough to feel good about .
translation: 気分が良くなる映画だけど、気分を良くするほどの要素が足りない。
back_translation: It's a feel-good movie, but it lacks enough elements to truly lift your spirits.

text: give shapiro , goldman , and bolado credit for good intentions , but there 's nothing here that they could n't have done in half an hour .
translation: シャピロ、ゴールドマン、ボラドに良い意図を評価するが、ここにあることは彼らが30分でできたことに過ぎない。
back_translation: While I appreciate the good intentions of Shapiro, Goldman, and Borado, what is here is merely what they accomplished in 30 minutes.

text: i was feeling this movie until it veered off too far into the exxon zone , and left me behind at the station looking for a return ticket to realism .
translation: この映画には共感していたのですが、あまりにもエクソンゾーンに逸脱してしまい、現実への帰りの切符を探して駅に置き去りにされました。
back_translation: I empathized with this movie, but it deviated too far into the Exon Zone, leaving me stranded at the station searching for my ticket back to reality.

text: if the real-life story is genuinely inspirational , the movie stirs us as well .
translation: 実際の物語が本当に感動的であれば、その映画も私たちを揺さぶります。
back_translation: If the real-life story is truly moving, then the movie will also shake us.

text: disturbing .
translation: 不気味な
back_translation: eerie

text: the large-frame imax camera lends itself beautifully to filming the teeming life on the reefs , making this gorgeous film a must for everyone from junior scientists to grown-up fish lovers .
translation: 大型フレームのIMAXカメラは、リーフの豊かな生態を撮影するのに最適で、この美しい映画はジュニア科学者から大人の魚好きまで、誰にとっても必見です。
back_translation: The large-frame IMAX camera is perfect for capturing the rich ecology of the reef, and this beautiful film is a must-see for everyone from junior scientists to adult fish enthusiasts.

text: it 's hard to pity the ` plain ' girl who becomes a ravishing waif after applying a smear of lip-gloss .
translation: リップグロスを塗った後に魅力的な少女になる「普通の」女の子に同情するのは難しい。
back_translation: It's hard to sympathize with a "normal" girl who becomes an attractive girl after applying lip gloss.

text: why anyone who is not a character in this movie should care is beyond me .
translation: この映画のキャラクターでない誰かがなぜ気にするべきなのか私には理解できません。
back_translation: I don't understand why someone who is not a character in this movie should care.

text: the movie 's major and most devastating flaw is its reliance on formula , though , and it 's quite enough to lessen the overall impact the movie could have had .
translation: 映画の主要かつ最も壊滅的な欠点は、そのフォーミュラへの依存であり、それは映画が持ち得た全体的な影響を十分に減少させる要因となっています。
back_translation: The main and most devastating flaw of the movie is its reliance on formula, which significantly diminishes the overall impact the film could have had.

text: it is depressing , ruthlessly pained and depraved , the movie equivalent of staring into an open wound .
translation: それは憂鬱で、無情に痛み苦しんでおり、堕落したものであり、開いた傷を見つめる映画の同等物です。
back_translation: It is melancholic, mercilessly in pain and suffering, degenerate, and equivalent to a film that stares into an open wound.

text: as aimless as an old pickup skidding completely out of control on a long patch of black ice , the movie makes two hours feel like four .
translation: 古いピックアップトラックが長い黒氷の上で完全に制御を失って滑るように、目的のない映画は2時間を4時間のように感じさせる。
back_translation: Like an old pickup truck completely losing control and sliding on long black ice, a purposeless movie makes two hours feel like four.

text: a comedy-drama of nearly epic proportions rooted in a sincere performance by the title character undergoing midlife crisis .
translation: 中年の危機を迎える主人公の真摯な演技に根ざした、ほぼ壮大な規模のコメディドラマ。
back_translation: A nearly epic-scale comedy-drama rooted in the earnest performance of the protagonist facing a midlife crisis.

text: ... contains very few laughs and even less surprises .
translation: ... 笑いはほとんどなく、驚きもさらに少ない。
back_translation: There is hardly any laughter, and even less surprise.

text: a horrible , 99-minute stink bomb .
translation: ひどい99分間の悪臭爆弾。
back_translation: A terrible 99-minute stench bomb.

text: you can watch , giggle and get an adrenaline boost without feeling like you 've completely lowered your entertainment standards .
translation: あなたは楽しむことができ、クスクス笑い、エネルギーを感じることができるので、完全に娯楽の基準を下げた気分にはなりません。
back_translation: You are able to enjoy, chuckle, and feel energized, so you don't feel like you've completely lowered your entertainment standards.

text: earnest and heartfelt but undernourished and plodding .
translation: 誠実で心からのものですが、栄養不足で鈍重です。
back_translation: It is sincere and heartfelt, but lacking in nutrition and sluggish.

text: a dull , somnambulant exercise in pretension whose pervasive quiet is broken by frequent outbursts of violence and noise .
translation: 鈍い、夢遊病者のような見せかけの行為で、その静寂が頻繁な暴力と騒音の爆発によって破られる。
back_translation: Dull, a façade of somnambulism, its silence frequently shattered by explosions of violence and noise.

text: it is n't quite one of the worst movies of the year .
translation: 今年の最悪の映画の一つというわけではありません。
back_translation: It's not one of the worst movies of the year.

text: the film presents visceral and dangerously honest revelations about the men and machines behind the curtains of our planet .
translation: この映画は、私たちの地球の舞台裏にいる男たちと機械について、肉体的で危険なまでに正直な明らかにします。
back_translation: This movie reveals the men and machines behind the scenes of our Earth in a physically dangerous and brutally honest way.

text: handled correctly , wilde 's play is a masterpiece of elegant wit and artifice .
translation: 正しく扱われれば、ワイルドの戯曲は優雅な機知と技巧の傑作です。
back_translation: If treated correctly, Wilde's plays are masterpieces of elegant wit and technique.

text: this is the best star trek movie in a long time .
translation: これは長い間で最高のスター・トレックの映画です。
back_translation: This is the best Star Trek movie in a long time.

text: a remarkably alluring film set in the constrictive eisenhower era about one suburban woman 's yearning in the face of a loss that shatters her cheery and tranquil suburban life .
translation: アイゼンハワー時代の制約の中にある、魅力的な映画で、一人の郊外の女性が彼女の明るく穏やかな郊外の生活を粉々にする喪失に直面しての憧れを描いています。
back_translation: In the constraints of the Eisenhower era, this captivating film depicts the yearning of a suburban woman as she faces the shattering loss of her bright and peaceful suburban life.

text: instead of simply handling conventional material in a conventional way , secretary takes the most unexpected material and handles it in the most unexpected way .
translation: 従来の方法で従来の素材を扱うのではなく、秘書は最も予想外の素材を取り扱い、最も予想外の方法で対応します。
back_translation: Instead of handling conventional materials using traditional methods, the secretary deals with the most unexpected materials and responds in the most unexpected ways.

text: a winning comedy with its wry observations about long-lived friendships and the ways in which we all lose track of ourselves by trying to please others .
translation: 長い友情についての鋭い観察と、他人を喜ばせようとすることで私たちが自分自身を見失う方法に関する勝利のコメディ。
back_translation: A sharp observation on long-lasting friendship and a triumphant comedy about how we lose ourselves by trying to please others.

text: writer-director randall wallace has bitten off more than he or anyone else could chew , and his movie veers like a drunken driver through heavy traffic .
translation: 作家兼監督のランダル・ウォレスは、自分や他の誰もが処理できない量を抱え込んでおり、彼の映画は混雑した交通の中を酔っぱらった運転手のように曲がりくねっている。
back_translation: Writer and director Randall Wallace is burdened with more than he or anyone else can handle, and his films twist and turn like a drunken driver in heavy traffic.

text: like kissing jessica stein , amy 's orgasm has a key strength in its willingness to explore its principal characters with honesty , insight and humor .
translation: 「ジェシカ・スタインにキスをするように」、エイミーのオーガズムは、主要キャラクターを誠实、洞察力、ユーモアで探求する意欲において重要な強みを持っています。
back_translation: "Like kissing Jessica Stein," Amy's orgasm has a significant strength in its willingness to explore the main characters with sincerity, insight, and humor.

text: an edifying glimpse into the wit and revolutionary spirit of these performers and their era .
translation: これらのパフォーマーと彼らの時代の機知と革命的精神への啓発的なひとしずく。
back_translation: An inspirational drop of wit and revolutionary spirit from these performers and their era.

text: starts promisingly but disintegrates into a dreary , humorless soap opera .
translation: promisingで始まるが、陰鬱でユーモアのないメロドラマに崩壊する。
back_translation: It starts off promising but collapses into a bleak and humorless melodrama.

text: the touch is generally light enough and the performances , for the most part , credible .
translation: タッチは一般的に軽やかで、パフォーマンスは大部分が信頼できるものです。
back_translation: The touch is generally light, and the performance is mostly reliable.

text: it is sentimental but feels free to offend , is analytical and then surrenders to the illogic of its characters , is about grief and yet permits laughter .
translation: 感傷的でありながら自由に侮辱し、分析的であり、キャラクターの非論理性に屈服する。悲しみについてでありながら、笑いを許容する。
back_translation: It is sentimental while freely insulting, analytical, and succumbs to the illogicality of characters. While it is about sadness, it allows for laughter.

text: eight legged freaks wo n't join the pantheon of great monster\/science fiction flicks that we have come to love ...
translation: 「エイト・レッグド・フリークス」は、私たちが愛してやまない偉大なモンスター／SF映画の殿堂には入らないでしょう…
back_translation: "Eight-Legged Freaks" will probably not make it into the hall of fame of the great monster/SF movies that we love dearly...

text: howard and his co-stars all give committed performances , but they 're often undone by howard 's self-conscious attempts to find a ` literary ' filmmaking style to match his subject .
translation: ハワードと彼の共演者たちは皆、熱心な演技を披露していますが、しばしばハワードの自意識的な「文学的」映画スタイルを見つけようとする試みが彼らを台無しにしています。
back_translation: Howard and his co-stars all deliver enthusiastic performances, but their attempts to pin down Howard's self-conscious "literary" film style often detract from their efforts.

text: the actors must indeed be good to recite some of this laughable dialogue with a straight face .
translation: 俳優たちは、これらの滑稽なセリフを真面目な顔で演じるために、確かに優れていなければなりません。
back_translation: The actors must certainly be excellent in order to perform these ridiculous lines with serious expressions.

text: it 's better suited for the history or biography channel , but there 's no arguing the tone of the movie - it leaves a bad taste in your mouth and questions on your mind .
translation: 歴史や伝記のチャンネルにより適しているが、その映画のトーンには反論の余地がない - 不快な後味を残し、心に疑問を抱かせる。
back_translation: It is more suited for channels about history and biography, but there is no denying the tone of the film - it leaves an unpleasant aftertaste and raises questions in the mind.

text: a story which fails to rise above its disgusting source material .
translation: 不快な原作を超えることができない物語。
back_translation: A story that cannot surpass the unpleasant original.

text: belongs in the too-hot-for-tv direct-to-video\/dvd category , and this is why i have given it a one-star rating .
translation: テレビ向けには暑すぎるダイレクト・トゥ・ビデオ／DVDカテゴリーに属しており、これが私が一つ星の評価を付けた理由です。
back_translation: It belongs to the category of direct-to-video/DVD that is too hot for television, which is why I gave it a one-star rating.

text: imagine a film that begins as a seven rip-off , only to switch to a mix of the shining , the thing , and any naked teenagers horror flick from the 1980s .
translation: 七人のリメイクとして始まり、シャイニング、ザ・シング、そして1980年代の裸のティーンエイジャーのホラー映画が混ざったものに切り替わる映画を想像してみてください。
back_translation: Imagine a movie that starts as a remake of Seven, then switches to a mix of Shining, The Thing, and horror films featuring naked teenagers from the 1980s.

text: without a fresh infusion of creativity , 4ever is neither a promise nor a threat so much as wishful thinking .
translation: 新たな創造力の注入なしでは、4everは約束でも脅威でもなく、むしろ願望的な考えにすぎない。
back_translation: Without a new injection of creativity, 4ever is neither a promise nor a threat, but rather just a wishful thought.

text: this humbling little film , fueled by the light comedic work of zhao benshan and the delicate ways of dong jie , is just the sort for those moviegoers who complain that ` they do n't make movies like they used to anymore . '
translation: この謙虚な小さな映画は、趙本山の軽妙なコメディの表現と董捷の繊細な演技によって彩られており、「昔のような映画はもう作られていない」と不満を抱く映画ファンにはぴったりの作品です。
back_translation: This humble little film is colored by Zhao Benshan's witty comedic expressions and Dong Jie’s delicate performances, making it a perfect work for film fans who lament that "movies like they used to make are no longer being made."

text: what does n't this film have that an impressionable kid could n't stand to hear ?
translation: この映画には、影響を受けやすい子供が聞きたくないものが何がありますか？
back_translation: What are some things in this movie that impressionable children might not want to hear?

text: stevens ' vibrant creative instincts are the difference between this and countless other flicks about guys and dolls .
translation: スティーブンズの活気に満ちた創造的本能が、この映画と多くの他の「男と人形」に関する映画との違いを生み出しています。
back_translation: Steven's vibrant creative instincts create a difference between this film and many other movies about "men and dolls."

text: ` in this poor remake of such a well loved classic , parker exposes the limitations of his skill and the basic flaws in his vision . '
translation: この愛されるクラシックの貧弱なリメイクで、パーカーは自分の技術の限界と彼のビジョンにおける基本的な欠陥をさらけ出しています。
back_translation: In this poor remake of the beloved classic, Parker exposes the limits of his skills and the fundamental flaws in his vision.

text: overall tomfoolery like this is a matter of taste .
translation: このような全体的な悪ふざけは好みの問題です。
back_translation: Such overall pranks are a matter of personal preference.

text: a soap-opera quality twist in the last 20 minutes ... almost puts the kibosh on what is otherwise a sumptuous work of b-movie imagination .
translation: 最後の20分にあるテレビドラマのようなひねり ... それは、他は豪華なB級映画の想像力の作品であることをほぼ台無しにしてしまう。
back_translation: The twist in the last 20 minutes is like something out of a television drama... it nearly ruins what would otherwise be a lavish work of B-movie imagination.

text: the actors try hard but come off too amateurish and awkward .
translation: 俳優たちは一生懸命ですが、あまりにも素人っぽくてぎこちなく見えます。
back_translation: The actors are trying hard, but they look too amateurish and awkward.

text: occasionally loud and offensive , but more often , it simply lulls you into a gentle waking coma .
translation: 時折うるさくて不快ですが、より多くの場合、ただあなたを穏やかな目覚めの昏睡状態に誘い込みます。
back_translation: Sometimes it's noisy and uncomfortable, but more often, it simply lures you into a calm state of waking slumber.

text: we 've seen it all before in one form or another , but director hoffman , with great help from kevin kline , makes us care about this latest reincarnation of the world 's greatest teacher .
translation: 私たちはこれまでにさまざまな形でそれを見てきましたが、監督のホフマンはケビン・クラインの大きな助けを得て、世界最高の教師の最新の生まれ変わりに私たちが関心を持つようにしています。
back_translation: We have seen it in various forms so far, but director Hoffman, with the great help of Kevin Kline, is making us interested in the latest reincarnation of the world's greatest teacher.

text: easily the most thoughtful fictional examination of the root causes of anti-semitism ever seen on screen .
translation: 画面上で見られる反ユダヤ主義の根本原因を最も考慮深く考察したフィクション作品の一つです。
back_translation: One of the most thoughtful fictional works that examines the root causes of antisemitism visible on screens.

text: despite suffering a sense-of-humour failure , the man who wrote rocky does not deserve to go down with a ship as leaky as this .
translation: ユーモアの欠如に苦しんでいるにもかかわらず、『ロッキー』の脚本家である彼は、こんなにもひどく漏れた船で沈むべきではない。
back_translation: Despite suffering from a lack of humor, as the screenwriter of "Rocky," he should not be sinking in such a leaky ship.

text: about half of them are funny , a few are sexy and none are useful in telling the story , which is paper-thin and decidedly unoriginal .
translation: 半分ほどは面白く、いくつかはセクシーですが、ストーリーを語る上では役に立たないものばかりで、内容は薄くて決定的に独創性に欠けています。
back_translation: About half of it is interesting, and some parts are sexy, but they are all unhelpful for telling the story, lacking substance and definitively lacking originality.

text: the film is filled with humorous observations about the general absurdity of modern life as seen through the eyes outsiders , but deftly manages to avoid many of the condescending stereotypes that so often plague films dealing with the mentally ill .
translation: この映画は、外部者の視点から見た現代生活の一般的な不条理に関するユーモラスな観察で満たされていますが、精神的な病を扱う映画によく見られる軽蔑的なステレオタイプを巧みに回避しています。
back_translation: This movie is filled with humorous observations about the common absurdities of modern life from the perspective of an outsider, while skillfully avoiding the disdainful stereotypes often found in films that deal with mental illness.

text: impostor ca n't think of a thing to do with these characters except have them run through dark tunnels , fight off various anonymous attackers , and evade elaborate surveillance technologies .
translation: インポスターは、これらのキャラクターにすることを考えられず、ただ暗いトンネルを駆け抜けさせたり、さまざまな匿名の攻撃者と戦ったり、複雑な監視技術をかわしたりするだけです。
back_translation: The impostor cannot imagine these characters doing anything other than dashing through dark tunnels, battling various anonymous attackers, and evading complex surveillance technologies.

text: a great script brought down by lousy direction .
translation: 素晴らしい脚本がひどい監督によって台無しにされた。
back_translation: A wonderful script was ruined by a terrible director.

text: new ways of describing badness need to be invented to describe exactly how bad it is .
translation: 悪さを正確に表現するための新しい表現方法を考案する必要があります。
back_translation: We need to come up with new ways to accurately express mischief.

text: rubbo runs through a remarkable amount of material in the film 's short 90 minutes .
translation: ラッボは映画の短い90分で驚くべき量の素材を扱っています。
back_translation: Rabbo handles an amazing amount of material in a short 90-minute movie.

text: while this film has an ` a ' list cast and some strong supporting players , the tale -- like its central figure , vivi -- is just a little bit hard to love .
translation: この映画はAリストのキャストと強力なサブキャストを持っているが、その物語は—中心人物であるヴィヴィのように—少し愛しにくい。
back_translation: This movie has an A-list cast and a strong supporting cast, but its story is—like its central character Vivi—a bit hard to love.

text: zoom !
translation: ズーム！
back_translation: Zoom!

text: it 's a bad sign when you 're rooting for the film to hurry up and get to its subjects ' deaths just so the documentary will be over , but it 's indicative of how uncompelling the movie is unless it happens to cover your particular area of interest .
translation: 映画が早く登場人物の死に至ることを願っているというのは悪い兆候です。ドキュメンタリーが終わるためだけにそう思うのは、この映画がいかに魅力に欠けているかを示しています。特定の興味のある分野を扱っていない限り、です。
back_translation: Hoping for the characters’ deaths to come quickly in a movie is a bad sign. Thinking this way just to see the documentary end shows how lacking in appeal the film is, unless it deals with a specific area of interest.

text: the creative animation work may not look as fully ` rendered ' as pixar 's industry standard , but it uses lighting effects and innovative backgrounds to an equally impressive degree .
translation: クリエイティブなアニメーション作品はピクサーの業界標準ほど完全に「レンダリング」されているわけではありませんが、同じくらい印象的な程度でライティング効果や革新的な背景を使用しています。
back_translation: Creative animation works may not be "rendered" as perfectly as Pixar's industry standard, but they use lighting effects and innovative backgrounds to a similarly impressive degree.

text: every sequel you skip will be two hours gained .
translation: 見逃した続編ごとに2時間を得ることができます。
back_translation: You can gain two hours for each sequel you missed.

text: it 's hard to imagine anybody ever being `` in the mood '' to view a movie as harrowing and painful as the grey zone , but it 's equally hard to imagine anybody being able to tear their eyes away from the screen once it 's started .
translation: 誰もが「ムード」に入って、アグレッシブで痛々しい映画「グレーゾーン」を見ることを想像するのは難しいですが、一度始まると誰もがスクリーンから目を離すことができないことも同様に想像しにくいです。
back_translation: It is hard to imagine that everyone gets into the "mood" to watch the aggressive and painful movie "Gray Zone," but it is equally difficult to envision that once it starts, no one can take their eyes off the screen.

text: it gives devastating testimony to both people 's capacity for evil and their heroic capacity for good .
translation: それは、人々の悪に対する能力と英雄的な善への能力の両方を証明する、壊滅的な証言を与えます。
back_translation: It provides a devastating testimony that proves both people's capacity for evil and their capacity for heroic good.

text: makes one thing abundantly clear .
translation: 一つのことが非常に明確になる。
back_translation: One thing becomes very clear.

text: cherry orchard is badly edited , often awkwardly directed and suffers from the addition of a wholly unnecessary pre-credit sequence designed to give some of the characters a ` back story . '
translation: 「桜の園」は編集が悪く、しばしばぎこちなく演出されており、一部のキャラクターに「背景ストーリー」を与えるために全く不要なプレクレジットシーケンスが追加されているため、苦しんでいます。
back_translation: "The Cherry Orchard" suffers from poor editing and is often awkwardly directed, with unnecessary pre-credit sequences added to give some characters a 'backstory.'

text: too slick and manufactured to claim street credibility .
translation: あまりにも洗練されていて作られた感じがして、ストリートの信頼性を主張するには不十分だ。
back_translation: It feels overly sophisticated and artificial, making it insufficient to assert credibility on the street.

text: the film is full of charm .
translation: その映画は魅力でいっぱいです。
back_translation: That movie is full of charm.

text: it 's not the least of afghan tragedies that this noble warlord would be consigned to the dustbin of history .
translation: この高貴な指導者が歴史のごみに追いやられることは、アフガニスタンの悲劇の中で最も重要な事ではない。
back_translation: It is not the most important thing that this noble leader is cast into the dustbin of history in the tragedy of Afghanistan.

text: there are no special effects , and no hollywood endings .
translation: 特別な効果もなく、ハリウッド的な結末も存在しません。
back_translation: There are no special effects, nor is there a Hollywood-style ending.

text: while hollywood ending has its share of belly laughs -lrb- including a knockout of a closing line -rrb- , the movie winds up feeling like a great missed opportunity .
translation: ハリウッドの結末には腹を抱えて笑えるシーンがいくつかありますが（素晴らしい締めのセリフも含めて）、映画は大きな機会を逃したように感じます。
back_translation: While there are several scenes that make you laugh out loud at the conclusion of Hollywood (including some brilliant closing lines), the movie feels like it has missed a significant opportunity.

text: we admire this film for its harsh objectivity and refusal to seek our tears , our sympathies .
translation: 私たちはこの映画の厳しい客観性と、私たちの涙や共感を求めようとしない姿勢を称賛します。
back_translation: We admire the film's stark objectivity and its refusal to seek our tears or sympathy.

text: a funny and well-contructed black comedy where the old adage `` be careful what you wish for '' is given a full workout .
translation: 面白くてよく構成されたブラックコメディで、「願い事には気をつけろ」という古い格言が徹底的に試されます。
back_translation: A funny and well-structured black comedy that thoroughly tests the old adage, "Be careful what you wish for."

text: not a schlocky creature feature but something far more stylish and cerebral -- and , hence , more chillingly effective .
translation: 単なる安っぽいクリーチャー映画ではなく、もっとスタイリッシュで知的な作品であり、そのためによりぞっとするほど効果的です。
back_translation: It is not just a cheap creature movie, but a more stylish and intellectual work, making it all the more hauntingly effective.

text: this movie ... does n't deserve the energy it takes to describe how bad it is .
translation: この映画は…そのひどさを説明するためにかかるエネルギーに値しません。
back_translation: This movie isn't worth the energy it takes to explain its horribleness.

text: one of the most important and exhilarating forms of animated filmmaking since old walt doodled steamboat willie .
translation: ウォルトがスティームボート・ウィリーを落書きして以来、アニメーション映画制作の最も重要でエキサイティングな形態の一つです。
back_translation: Since Walt doodled Steamboat Willie, it has become one of the most important and exciting forms of animated filmmaking.

text: after a while , hoffman 's quirks and mannerisms , particularly his penchant for tearing up on cue -- things that seem so real in small doses -- become annoying and artificial .
translation: しばらくすると、ホフマンの特異な癖や仕草、特に合図に合わせて涙を流す傾向など、少量ではとてもリアルに見えるものが、煩わしくて不自然なものに感じられるようになる。
back_translation: After a while, Hoffman's peculiar habits and gestures, especially his tendency to shed tears in sync with cues, which initially seem very realistic in small amounts, begin to feel bothersome and unnatural.

text: it 's not like having a real film of nijinsky , but at least it 's better than that eponymous 1980 biopic that used soap in the places where the mysteries lingered .
translation: それはニジンスキーの実際の映画があるわけではありませんが、少なくとも神秘が漂う場所で石鹸を使った1980年の同名伝記映画よりはましです。
back_translation: While there isn't an actual film of Nijinsky, it's certainly better than the 1980 biopic of the same name that features soap used in a place filled with mystery.

text: the only surprise is that heavyweights joel silver and robert zemeckis agreed to produce this ; i assume the director has pictures of them cavorting in ladies ' underwear .
translation: 唯一の驚きは、ヘビー級のジョエル・シルバーとロバート・ゼメキスがこれをプロデュースすることに同意したことだ。監督は彼らが女性用下着で遊んでいる写真を持っているに違いない。
back_translation: The only surprise is that heavyweight Joel Silver and Robert Zemeckis agreed to produce this. The director must have photos of them playing with women's underwear.

text: the overall feel is not unlike watching a glorified episode of `` 7th heaven . ''
translation: 全体的な感覚は、栄光ある「7th heaven」のエピソードを見ているようなものです。
back_translation: The overall feeling is like watching an episode of the glorious "7th Heaven."

text: ... spellbinding fun and deliciously exploitative .
translation: ...魅惑的な楽しさと美味しく搾取的です。
back_translation: ...it's an enchanting fun and deliciously exploitative.

text: what 's next ?
translation: 次は何ですか？
back_translation: What comes next?

text: in the end , there is n't much to it .
translation: 結局のところ、あまり大したことはありません。
back_translation: In the end, it's not a big deal.

text: an allegory concerning the chronically mixed signals african american professionals get about overachieving could be intriguing , but the supernatural trappings only obscure the message .
translation: アフリカ系アメリカ人のプロフェッショナルが過剰な成果を求められることに関する混乱したメッセージについての寓話は興味深いかもしれませんが、超自然的な要素はメッセージを曖昧にするだけです。
back_translation: A fable about the mixed messages regarding the excessive achievements expected of African American professionals may be interesting, but the supernatural elements only serve to obscure the message.

text: an incredibly irritating comedy about thoroughly vacuous people ... manages to embody the worst excesses of nouvelle vague without any of its sense of fun or energy .
translation: 完全に空虚な人々についての信じられないほどイライラするコメディ ... 楽しさやエネルギーの感覚なしにヌーヴェルヴァーグの最悪の過剰を体現することに成功している。
back_translation: Incredibly frustrating comedy about completely hollow people... Successfully embodies the worst excesses of the Nouvelle Vague without a sense of fun or energy.

text: the movie itself is far from disappointing , offering an original take on courtroom movies , a few nifty twists that are so crucial to the genre and another first-rate performance by top-billed star bruce willis .
translation: 映画自体は失望からはほど遠く、法廷映画に対する独自の視点を提供し、ジャンルにとって非常に重要な巧妙なねじれがいくつかあり、トップビルドのスターであるブルース・ウィリスによる一流のパフォーマンスがもう一度見られる。
back_translation: The movie itself is far from disappointing, offering a unique perspective on courtroom films, featuring several clever twists that are very important for the genre, and showcasing another top-notch performance by the star, Bruce Willis.

text: norton is magnetic as graham .
translation: ノートンはグレアムのように魅力的です。
back_translation: Norton is as charming as Graham.

text: the year 's greatest adventure , and jackson 's limited but enthusiastic adaptation has made literature literal without killing its soul -- a feat any thinking person is bound to appreciate .
translation: その年の最大の冒険であり、ジャクソンの限られたが熱心な適応は、文学を文字通りにする一方で、その魂を奪うことなく成し遂げた - これは考える人なら誰でも評価せざるを得ない偉業です。
back_translation: It was the greatest adventure of that year, and Jackson's limited but passionate adaptation achieved this literally in literature without robbing it of its soul – a feat that anyone who thinks must inevitably appreciate.

text: a remarkable movie with an unsatisfying ending , which is just the point .
translation: 満足のいかない結末を持つ素晴らしい映画、それがまさにポイントです。
back_translation: A wonderful movie with an unsatisfactory ending, that is precisely the point.

text: mr. goyer 's loose , unaccountable direction is technically sophisticated in the worst way .
translation: ゴイヤー氏の曖昧で説明のつかない指導は、最悪の形で技術的に洗練されています。
back_translation: Mr. Goya's vague and inexplicable guidance is technically sophisticated in the worst possible way.

text: a weird little movie that 's amusing enough while you watch it , offering fine acting moments and pungent insights into modern l.a. 's show-biz and media subcultures .
translation: 観る際には面白く、現代のロサンゼルスのエンターテインメントやメディアサブカルチャーに対する鋭い洞察と素晴らしい演技の瞬間を提供する、奇妙な小さな映画。
back_translation: A strange little film that offers sharp insights into contemporary Los Angeles entertainment and media subculture, along with moments of wonderful acting, making it enjoyable to watch.

text: a wonderful , ghastly film .
translation: 素晴らしく、恐ろしい映画。
back_translation: A wonderful, horrifying movie.

text: the movie weighs no more than a glass of flat champagne .
translation: その映画は、平たいシャンパンのグラスよりも重くない。
back_translation: That movie is not heavier than a flat champagne glass.

text: the film is flat .
translation: 映画はつまらない。
back_translation: The movie is boring.

text: stealing harvard will dip into your wallet , swipe 90 minutes of your time , and offer you precisely this in recompense : a few early laughs scattered around a plot as thin as it is repetitious .
translation: スティーリング・ハーバードはあなたの財布からお金を盗み、90分間の時間を奪い、代わりに提供するものはこれだけです：薄くて繰り返しの多いプロットの周りに散らばったいくつかの早い笑いだけです。
back_translation: Stealing Harvard will rob you of your money and 90 minutes of your time, offering you nothing in return but a few early laughs scattered around a thin and repetitive plot.

text: shiner can certainly go the distance , but is n't world championship material
translation: シャイナーは確かに距離を走ることができますが、世界選手権の素材ではありません。
back_translation: Shiner can certainly run long distances, but they are not material for the World Championships.

text: but windtalkers does n't beat that one , either .
translation: しかし、ウィンドトーカーズはそれにも勝てません。
back_translation: However, the Windtalkers cannot overcome that.

text: -lrb- lee -rrb- treats his audience the same way that jim brown treats his women -- as dumb , credulous , unassuming , subordinate subjects .
translation: （リー）は、観客をジム・ブラウンが女性を扱うのと同じように扱う - 愚かで、信じやすく、無邪気で、従属的な存在として。
back_translation: (Lee) treats the audience the same way Jim Brown treats women - as foolish, gullible, innocent, and subservient beings.

text: the problem with antwone fisher is that it has a screenplay written by antwone fisher based on the book by antwone fisher .
translation: アンタワン・フィッシャーの問題は、アンタワン・フィッシャーが書いた脚本が、アンタワン・フィッシャーの本に基づいているということです。
back_translation: The problem with Antawn Fisher is that the script written by Antawn Fisher is based on Antawn Fisher's book.

text: whenever you think you 've seen the end of the movie , we cut to a new scene , which also appears to be the end .
translation: 映画の終わりを見たと思ったとき、私たちは新しいシーンにカットします。それもまた終わりのように見えます。
back_translation: When we think we have seen the end of the movie, we cut to a new scene. It also appears to be an end.

text: a zinger-filled crowd-pleaser that open-minded elvis fans -lrb- but by no means all -rrb- will have fun with .
translation: 辛辣なジョークの盛りだくさんで、オープンマインドなエルビスファン（しかし全員ではない）が楽しめる作品です。
back_translation: This is a work full of sharp jokes that open-minded Elvis fans (though not all) can enjoy.

text: co-writer\/director jonathan parker 's attempts to fashion a brazil-like , hyper-real satire fall dreadfully short .
translation: 共同脚本家/監督のジョナサン・パーカーの試みは、ブラジルのようなハイパーリアルなサタリを作り上げようとしましたが、ひどく失敗しています。
back_translation: Co-writer/director Jonathan Parker's attempt to create a hyper-real satire like that of Brazil has been a terrible failure.

text: smart and fun , but far more witty than it is wise .
translation: スマートで楽しいが、賢いよりもずっと機知に富んでいる。
back_translation: Smart and fun, but much more witty than intelligent.

text: o fantasma is boldly , confidently orchestrated , aesthetically and sexually , and its impact is deeply and rightly disturbing .
translation: 「オ・ファンタズマ」は、大胆かつ自信を持って、美的かつ性的に構成されており、その影響は深く、正当に不安をもたらします。
back_translation: "Phantasma" is bold and confident, aesthetically and sexually composed, and its influence is profound, justifiably causing anxiety.

text: a film about female friendship that men can embrace and women will talk about for hours .
translation: 男性も共感でき、女性が何時間も語り合うことができる女性の友情についての映画。
back_translation: A movie about female friendships that men can empathize with and women can talk about for hours.

text: ` it looks good , sonny , but you missed the point . '
translation: 「見た目はいいけど、息子よ、要点を外している。」
back_translation: "It looks nice, but son, you are missing the point."

text: there 's nothing remotely topical or sexy here .
translation: ここには何もそれらしい話題やセクシーなことはありません。
back_translation: There are no relevant topics or sexy things here.

text: fincher takes no apparent joy in making movies , and he gives none to the audience .
translation: フィンチャーは映画を作ることに明らかな喜びを感じておらず、観客にもそれを与えていない。
back_translation: Fincher does not seem to feel an evident joy in making films, nor does he provide that to the audience.

text: even after 90 minutes of playing opposite each other bullock and grant still look ill at ease sharing the same scene .
translation: お互いに90分間対戦した後でも、ブルックとグラントは同じシーンを共有することに不安な様子を見せている。
back_translation: Even after facing each other for 90 minutes, Brooke and Grant seem anxious about sharing the same scene.

text: blood work is laughable in the solemnity with which it tries to pump life into overworked elements from eastwood 's dirty harry period .
translation: 血液検査は、イーストウッドの『ダーティハリー』時代の疲れた要素に命を吹き込もうとするその厳粛さにおいて滑稽である。
back_translation: The blood test is comical in its solemnity as it tries to breathe life into the tired elements of Eastwood's 'Dirty Harry' era.

text: the slapstick is labored , and the bigger setpieces flat .
translation: そのスラップスティックはぎこちなく、大きなセットピースは平坦です。
back_translation: The slapstick is awkward, and the large set pieces are flat.

text: the pool drowned me in boredom .
translation: プールは退屈で私を溺れさせた。
back_translation: The pool was boring and made me drown.

text: -lrb- sports -rrb- admirable energy , full-bodied characterizations and narrative urgency .
translation: （スポーツ）賞賛すべきエネルギー、豊かなキャラクター描写、そして物語の緊迫感。
back_translation: Praise-worthy energy, rich character portrayal, and a sense of urgency in the story.

text: here is a vh1 behind the music special that has something a little more special behind it : music that did n't sell many records but helped change a nation .
translation: ここには、あまり多くのレコードを売れなかったが、国を変える手助けをした音楽についてのVH1の「Behind the Music」特集があります。
back_translation: There is a VH1 special "Behind the Music" about music that helped change the country, although not many records were sold here.

text: it 's never dull and always looks good .
translation: 決して退屈ではなく、いつも良い見た目です。
back_translation: Never boring and always looks good.

text: competently directed but terminally cute drama .
translation: 適切に演出されたが、致命的に可愛らしいドラマ。
back_translation: A properly staged but fatally adorable drama.

text: a sweet , tender sermon about a 12-year-old welsh boy more curious about god than girls , who learns that believing in something does matter .
translation: 神様よりも女の子よりも神に関心を持つ12歳のウェールズの少年についての、優しくてやさしい説教。彼は何かを信じることが重要であることを学びます。
back_translation: A gentle and kind sermon about a 12-year-old boy from Wales who is more interested in God than in girls. He learns that believing in something is important.

text: loses its sense of humor in a vat of failed jokes , twitchy acting , and general boorishness .
translation: 失敗したジョークの大釜の中でユーモアのセンスを失い、そわそわした演技と一般的な無礼さに満ち溢れています。
back_translation: In the cauldron of failed jokes, I have lost my sense of humor and am filled with restless acting and general rudeness.

text: in the era of the sopranos , it feels painfully redundant and inauthentic .
translation: ザ・ソプラノズの時代には、それが痛々しく冗長で不誠実に感じられます。
back_translation: In the era of The Sopranos, it feels painfully redundant and insincere.

text: i will be .
translation: 私はそうします。
back_translation: I will do that.

text: it 's tough to be startled when you 're almost dozing .
translation: ほとんどうとうとしているときに驚くのは難しい。
back_translation: It's hard to be surprised when you're mostly just dozing off.

text: represents the depths to which the girls-behaving-badly film has fallen .
translation: 女の子が悪い行動をする映画がどれほど深い底に落ちたかを表しています。
back_translation: It illustrates how deeply a movie about a girl engaging in bad behavior can fall.

text: an impenetrable and insufferable ball of pseudo-philosophic twaddle .
translation: 侵入不可能で耐え難い擬似哲学的な戯言の塊。
back_translation: An impenetrable and unbearable mass of pseudo-philosophical nonsense.

text: the film is an earnest try at beachcombing verismo , but it would be even more indistinct than it is were it not for the striking , quietly vulnerable personality of ms. ambrose .
translation: この映画はビーチコーミング・ヴェリズモへの真剣な試みですが、アンブローズさんの際立った、静かに脆弱な個性がなければ、さらに曖昧なものになっていたでしょう。
back_translation: This film is a serious attempt at beachcombing verismo, but without Mr. Ambrose's outstanding, quietly fragile personality, it would have become even more ambiguous.

text: it 's the element of condescension , as the filmmakers look down on their working-class subjects from their lofty perch , that finally makes sex with strangers , which opens today in the new york metropolitan area , so distasteful .
translation: それは映画製作者が高い位置から労働者階級の被写体を見下ろすという軽蔑の要素であり、今日ニューヨーク都市圏で公開される『見知らぬ人とのセックス』を非常に不快なものにしています。
back_translation: It is an element of contempt where filmmakers look down on working-class subjects from a high vantage point, which makes "Sex with Strangers," being released today in the New York metropolitan area, extremely uncomfortable.

text: a return to pure disney magic and is enjoyable family fare .
translation: 純粋なディズニーの魔法への回帰であり、家族にとって楽しめる作品です。
back_translation: It is a return to pure Disney magic and a work that can be enjoyed by the whole family.

text: distances you by throwing out so many red herrings , so many false scares , that the genuine ones barely register .
translation: 本物の恐怖がほとんど感じられないほど、さまざまな赤いニシンを投げ出し、数多くの偽の恐怖であなたを遠ざけます。
back_translation: It throws out various red herrings to keep you away with numerous false fears, to the point where you can hardly feel any real fear.

text: the fact that it is n't very good is almost beside the point .
translation: それがあまり良くないという事実は、ほとんど重要ではない。
back_translation: The fact that it is not very good is almost irrelevant.

text: it takes you somewhere you 're not likely to have seen before , but beneath the exotic surface -lrb- and exotic dancing -rrb- it 's surprisingly old-fashioned .
translation: あなたが見ることがないだろう場所に連れて行ってくれますが、そのエキゾチックな表面の下 -lrb- そしてエキゾチックなダンス -rrb- は驚くほど古風です。
back_translation: It will take you to places you would never see, but beneath that exotic surface - and the exotic dance - is surprisingly antiquated.

text: bolstered by exceptional performances and a clear-eyed take on the economics of dealing and the pathology of ghetto fabulousness .
translation: 卓越したパフォーマンスと取引の経済学、そしてゲットーの華やかさの病理に対する冷静な視点によって後押しされています。
back_translation: It is supported by exceptional performance and the economics of transactions, as well as a calm perspective on the pathology of the glamor of the ghetto.

text: it is a happy , heady jumble of thought and storytelling , an insane comic undertaking that ultimately coheres into a sane and breathtakingly creative film .
translation: それは、思考と物語の幸福で酔わせる混沌であり、最終的には健全で息をのむほど創造的な映画に凝縮される狂気のコメディーな試みです。
back_translation: It is a chaotic blend that intoxicates with the happiness of thought and story, ultimately condensing into a healthy and breathtakingly creative film that is a madcap comedy attempt.

text: perhaps the grossest movie ever made .
translation: おそらく今まで作られた中で最もグロい映画。
back_translation: Probably the goriest movie ever made.

text: viveka seldahl and sven wollter will touch you to the core in a film you will never forget -- that you should never forget .
translation: ヴィヴェカ・セルダールとスヴェン・ヴォルターは、あなたの心の深いところに触れる映画で、決して忘れられない、忘れてはいけない作品を届けます。
back_translation: Viveka Seldahl and Sven Wolter deliver a film that touches the deep parts of your heart, an unforgettable work that must not be forgotten.

text: ... instead go rent `` shakes the clown '' , a much funnier film with a similar theme and an equally great robin williams performance .
translation: 代わりに「シェイクス・ザ・クラウン」をレンタルしてください。似たテーマの、さらに面白い映画であり、ロビン・ウィリアムズの素晴らしい演技も見られます。
back_translation: Please rent "Shakes the Clown" instead. It's a similarly themed and even more entertaining movie, featuring Robin Williams' wonderful performance as well.

text: the documentary is much too conventional -- lots of boring talking heads , etc. -- to do the subject matter justice .
translation: そのドキュメンタリーはあまりにも従来通りで、退屈なインタビューばかりで、テーマを十分に表現することができていません。
back_translation: The documentary is too conventional, filled with boring interviews, and fails to adequately express the theme.

text: an engrossing and infectiously enthusiastic documentary .
translation: 心を奪われ、感染するような熱意に満ちたドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A captivating documentary filled with infectious enthusiasm that captures the heart.

text: nothing sticks , really , except a lingering creepiness one feels from being dragged through a sad , sordid universe of guns , drugs , avarice and damaged dreams .
translation: 何もかもが心に残るわけではなく、本当に、銃、ドラッグ、欲望、壊れた夢という悲惨で陰湿な宇宙に引きずり込まれることで感じる不気味さだけが残る。
back_translation: Not everything lingers in the heart; instead, it is only the eerie sensation of being dragged into a horrific and grim universe filled with guns, drugs, desires, and broken dreams that remains.

text: the film 's gamble to occasionally break up the live-action scenes with animated sequences pays off , as does its sensitive handling of some delicate subject matter .
translation: 映画が時折実写シーンをアニメーションシーケンスで切り替える賭けは成功を収めており、また繊細なテーマを扱う姿勢も評価される。
back_translation: The film's gamble of occasionally switching between live-action scenes and animated sequences has been successful, and its approach to delicate themes is also commendable.

text: the attempt to build up a pressure cooker of horrified awe emerges from the simple fact that the movie has virtually nothing to show .
translation: 驚愕の畏敬の圧力鍋を作ろうとする試みは、その映画がほとんど何も見せるものがないという単純な事実から生まれます。
back_translation: The attempt to create a pressure cooker of awe and shock arises from the simple fact that the film has almost nothing to show.

text: wes craven 's presence is felt ; not the craven of ' a nightmare on elm street ' or ` the hills have eyes , ' but the sad schlock merchant of ` deadly friend . '
translation: ウェス・クレイブンの存在が感じられる；『エルム街の悪夢』や『ザ・ヒルズ・ハブ・アイズ』のクレイブンではなく、『デッドリー・フレンド』の悲しい悪趣味商人の方だ。
back_translation: You can feel the presence of Wes Craven; it's not the Craven from "A Nightmare on Elm Street" or "The Hills Have Eyes," but rather the sad purveyor of bad taste from "Deadly Friend."

text: but tongue-in-cheek preposterousness has always been part of for the most part wilde 's droll whimsy helps `` being earnest '' overcome its weaknesses and parker 's creative interference ...
translation: しかし、皮肉な不条理さは常にワイルドの風刺的な気まぐれの一部であり、「真面目であること」がその弱点を克服するのを助け、パーカーの創造的な干渉もそうです。
back_translation: However, the ironic absurdity is always part of Wilde's satirical whimsy, and "being serious" helps overcome that weakness, just as Parker's creative interference does.

text: as the princess , sorvino glides gracefully from male persona to female without missing a beat .
translation: プリンセスとして、ソルヴィーノは男性の persona から女性へと優雅に移行し、一瞬のミスもありません。
back_translation: As a princess, Solvinu gracefully transitions from a male persona to a female one without a moment's mistake.

text: run for your lives !
translation: 命をかけて逃げろ！
back_translation: Run for your life!

text: for every cheesy scene , though , there is a really cool bit -- the movie 's conception of a future-world holographic librarian -lrb- orlando jones -rrb- who knows everything and answers all questions , is visually smart , cleverly written , and nicely realized .
translation: cheesyなシーンがある一方で、映画の未来世界のホログラフィック図書館員（オーランド・ジョーンズ）が登場する本当にクールな部分もあります。彼はすべてを知っていて、あらゆる質問に答える存在で、視覚的にスマートで、巧妙に書かれており、うまく実現されています。
back_translation: On one hand, there are cheesy scenes, while on the other hand, there are really cool parts featuring a holographic librarian from the futuristic world of the movie (Orlando Jones). He knows everything and is an entity that answers all questions, visually smart, cleverly written, and well realized.

text: an impressive hybrid .
translation: 素晴らしいハイブリッド。
back_translation: Wonderful hybrid.

text: the chateau ... is less concerned with cultural and political issues than doting on its eccentric characters .
translation: その城は、奇抜なキャラクターに愛情を注ぐことに関心があり、文化的および政治的な問題にはあまり関心がない。
back_translation: The castle is interested in nurturing quirky characters and is not very concerned with cultural and political issues.

text: highly recommended as an engrossing story about a horrifying historical event and the elements which contributed to it .
translation: 恐ろしい歴史的事件とそれに寄与した要因についての心を引きつける物語として強く推薦されます。
back_translation: It is strongly recommended as a captivating story about terrifying historical events and the factors that contributed to them.

text: -lrb- macdowell -rrb- ventures beyond her abilities several times here and reveals how bad an actress she is .
translation: （マクドウェル）はここで何度も自分の能力を超えて挑戦し、彼女がどれほど下手な女優であるかを明らかにしている。
back_translation: (McDowell) repeatedly challenges herself beyond her abilities here, revealing just how bad of an actress she is.

text: pap invested in undergraduate doubling subtexts and ridiculous stabs at existentialism reminding of the discovery of the wizard of god in the fifth trek flick .
translation: パパは学部のダブリングサブテキストと、神の魔法使いの発見を思い起こさせる存在主義へのばかげた挑戦を投資しました、第五作のトレック映画で。
back_translation: Dad invested in the absurd challenge to existentialism that recalls the doubling subtext of the faculty and the discovery of the god's wizard in the fifth installment of the Trek films.

text: the disjointed mess flows as naturally as jolie 's hideous yellow ` do .
translation: そのばらばらな混乱は、ジョリーの醜い黄色い「ドー」と同じくらい自然に流れています。
back_translation: That chaotic disarray flows as naturally as Jolie's ugly yellow "Doh."

text: he does this so well you do n't have the slightest difficulty accepting him in the role .
translation: 彼はこれを非常に上手にこなすので、彼をその役割に受け入れるのに少しも苦労しません。
back_translation: He handles this very well, so we have no trouble accepting him in that role.

text: unless bob crane is someone of particular interest to you , this film 's impressive performances and adept direction are n't likely to leave a lasting impression .
translation: ボブ・クレーンが特に興味のある人物でない限り、この映画の印象的な演技と巧妙な演出は、あまり記憶に残らないことでしょう。
back_translation: Unless you are particularly interested in Bob Crane, the impressive performances and clever direction of this movie are likely to be easily forgotten.

text: a surprisingly funny movie .
translation: 驚くほど面白い映画。
back_translation: An incredibly interesting movie.

text: drug abuse , infidelity and death are n't usually comedy fare , but turpin 's film allows us to chuckle through the angst .
translation: 薬物乱用、不貞、そして死は通常コメディの題材ではありませんが、ターピンの映画は私たちが苦悩の中で笑うことを可能にしています。
back_translation: Substance abuse, infidelity, and death are not typically subjects for comedy, but Tarpeen's films allow us to laugh in the midst of suffering.

text: a not-so-divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood with a hefty helping of re-fried green tomatoes .
translation: やや神秘的なヤーヤ姉妹の秘密に、たっぷりのリフライド・グリーン・トマトを添えて。
back_translation: With a generous serving of refried green tomatoes, the somewhat mysterious secrets of the Ya-Ya sisters are revealed.

text: allegiance to chekhov , which director michael cacoyannis displays with somber earnestness in the new adaptation of the cherry orchard , is a particularly vexing handicap .
translation: チェーホフへの忠誠心は、ミハイル・カコヤニスが新しい『桜の園』の adaptations で見せる真摯な姿勢であり、特に厄介なハンディキャップである。
back_translation: Loyalty to Chekhov is a sincere attitude that Mikhail Kakoyannis displays in his new adaptations of "The Cherry Orchard," which is particularly a troublesome handicap.

text: not only a coming-of-age story and cautionary parable , but also a perfectly rendered period piece .
translation: 単なる成長物語や警告的寓話ではなく、完璧に表現された時代劇でもある。
back_translation: It is not just a simple growth story or a cautionary tale, but also a perfectly expressed period drama.

text: sparkling , often hilarious romantic jealousy comedy ... attal looks so much like a young robert deniro that it seems the film should instead be called ` my husband is travis bickle ' .
translation: スパークリングで、しばしば面白いロマンティック・ジェラシー・コメディ…アッタルは若いロバート・デ・ニーロにとても似ているので、この映画はむしろ『私の夫はトラヴィス・ビックル』と呼ばれるべきだと思える。
back_translation: It's a sparkling, often interesting romantic jealousy comedy... Attal resembles a young Robert De Niro so much that one might think this movie should be called "My Husband is Travis Bickle."

text: a harrowing account of a psychological breakdown .
translation: 精神的崩壊の痛ましい記録。
back_translation: A heartbreaking record of mental collapse.

text: a mature , deeply felt fantasy of a director 's travel through 300 years of russian history .
translation: 監督が300年のロシアの歴史を旅行する、成熟した深い感情のファンタジー。
back_translation: A fantasy of mature and deep emotions that travels through 300 years of Russian history.

text: the movie is a trove of delights .
translation: その映画は喜びの宝庫です。
back_translation: That movie is a treasure trove of joy.

text: the filmmakers needed more emphasis on the storytelling and less on the glamorous machine that thrusts the audience into a future they wo n't much care about .
translation: 製作者たちは、物語の語りにもっと重点を置く必要があり、観客があまり気にしない未来に彼らを押し込む派手な機械にはあまり重点を置くべきではない。
back_translation: The creators need to place more emphasis on storytelling and should not focus too much on flashy machines that push the audience into a future they don’t really care about.

text: but it does somehow manage to get you under its spell .
translation: しかし、それはどういうわけかあなたをその魅力の虜にさせることができます。
back_translation: However, for some reason, it can make you captivated by that charm.

text: in his u.s. debut , mr. schnitzler proves himself a deft pace master and stylist .
translation: 彼のアメリカデビューにおいて、シュニッツラー氏は巧みなペースマスターでありスタイリストであることを証明しました。
back_translation: In his American debut, Mr. Schnitzler proved to be a master of pacing and a stylist.

text: yet another arnold vehicle that fails to make adequate use of his particular talents .
translation: またしてもアーノルドの特別な才能を十分に活かせていない乗り物です。
back_translation: Once again, this vehicle is not fully utilizing Arnold's special talents.

text: it will guarantee to have you leaving the theater with a smile on your face .
translation: あなたは劇場を出るときに笑顔でいることを保証します。
back_translation: I guarantee that you will leave the theater with a smile.

text: an uncomfortable movie , suffocating and sometimes almost senseless , the grey zone does have a center , though a morbid one .
translation: 不快な映画で、息苦しく、時にはほとんど意味を成さないが、「グレーゾーン」には中心がある。ただし、それは不気味な中心である。
back_translation: It's an uncomfortable movie, suffocating, and sometimes almost meaningless, but there is a core to the "gray zone." However, it is a creepy core.

text: sweet gentle jesus , did the screenwriters just do a cut-and-paste of every bad action-movie line in history ?
translation: 甘い優しいイエスよ、脚本家たちは歴史上のすべての悪いアクション映画のセリフを切り貼りしただけなのか？
back_translation: Sweet, gentle Jesus, have the screenwriters just cut and pasted the lines from all the bad action movies in history?

text: -lrb- sam 's -rrb- self-flagellation is more depressing than entertaining .
translation: サムの自己懲罰は、楽しませるよりももっと落胆させる。
back_translation: Sam's self-punishment is more disappointing than entertaining.

text: dramas like this make it human .
translation: このようなドラマは人間らしさを醸し出します。
back_translation: Such dramas bring out humanity.

text: although estela bravo 's documentary is cloyingly hagiographic in its portrait of cuban leader fidel castro , it 's still a guilty pleasure to watch .
translation: エステラ・ブラーボのドキュメンタリーはキューバの指導者フィデル・カストロを美化して描いているが、それでも見ることが罪悪感を伴う楽しみである。
back_translation: The documentary on Estela Bravo glorifies the Cuban leader Fidel Castro, but it remains a guilty pleasure to watch.

text: but the cinematography is cloudy , the picture making becalmed .
translation: しかし、撮影は曇っており、映像は静まっています。
back_translation: However, the filming is cloudy, and the footage is calm.

text: this is christmas future for a lot of baby boomers .
translation: これは多くのベビーブーマーにとってのクリスマスの未来です。
back_translation: This is the future of Christmas for many baby boomers.

text: this bracingly truthful antidote to hollywood teenage movies that slather clearasil over the blemishes of youth captures the combustible mixture of a chafing inner loneliness and desperate grandiosity that tend to characterize puberty .
translation: この心を揺さぶる真実の解毒剤は、ハリウッドのティーンエイジャー映画が若さの欠点にクリアサイルを塗りたくるのとは対照的に、思春期に特有の、かゆい内面的な孤独感と必死の壮大さの爆発的な混合物を捉えています。
back_translation: This truth, which stirs the heart like an antidote, captures an explosive mixture of the uniquely adolescent, itchy inner loneliness and desperate grandeur, in contrast to how Hollywood teen movies gloss over the flaws of youth.

text: viva le resistance !
translation: バンザイ！レジスタンス！
back_translation: Banzai! Resistance!

text: some body smacks of exhibitionism more than it does cathartic truth telling .
translation: ある人はカタルシス的な真実の告白というよりも、むしろ自己顕示欲が強いように感じられる。
back_translation: Some people seem to have a strong desire for self-display rather than a cathartic confession of truth.

text: plodding , peevish and gimmicky .
translation: のろのろしていて、いじわるで、ギミックが多い。
back_translation: Sluggish, spiteful, and full of gimmicks.

text: given too much time to consider the looseness of the piece , the picture begins to resemble the shapeless , grasping actors ' workshop that it is .
translation: 与えられた時間が長すぎると、その作品の緩さを考えるうちに、その絵は無形でつかみどころのない俳優のワークショップに似てくる。
back_translation: If the given time is too long, while considering the looseness of the work, the painting begins to resemble an intangible and elusive actor's workshop.

text: the ingenuity that parker displays in freshening the play is almost in a class with that of wilde himself .
translation: パーカーが劇を新鮮にするために見せる独創性は、ワイルド自身のものに匹敵するほどである。
back_translation: The originality that Parker shows to refresh the play is comparable to that of Wild himself.

text: nijinsky says , ' i know how to suffer ' and if you see this film you 'll know too .
translation: ニジンスキーは「私は苦しむ方法を知っている」と言います。そして、この映画を観ればあなたも知るでしょう。
back_translation: Nijinsky says, "I know how to suffer." And if you watch this movie, you will know too.

text: frequent flurries of creative belly laughs and genuinely enthusiastic performances ... keep the movie slaloming through its hackneyed elements with enjoyable ease .
translation: 頻繁に繰り広げられる創造的な腹痛の笑いや本当に熱心な演技が、映画を楽しい余裕でありふれた要素をすり抜けさせ続ける。
back_translation: Frequent bursts of creative humor related to stomach pain and genuinely enthusiastic performances allow the film to skirt around the enjoyable yet ordinary elements.

text: it will make you think twice about what might be going on inside each trailer park you drive past -- even if it chiefly inspires you to drive a little faster .
translation: あなたが通り過ぎる各トレーラーパークの中で何が起こっているのか、二度考えさせるでしょう -- たとえそれが主にあなたに少し速く運転するように促すものであっても。
back_translation: What happens in each trailer park you pass by will make you think twice -- even if it mainly encourages you to drive a little faster.

text: witless and utterly pointless .
translation: 愚かでまったく意味がない。
back_translation: It's foolish and completely meaningless.

text: fred schepisi 's film is paced at a speed that is slow to those of us in middle age and deathly slow to any teen .
translation: フレッド・シェピシの映画は、中年の私たちには遅いペースで、ティーンエイジャーにとっては死ぬほど遅い。
back_translation: Fred Schepisi's films have a pace that's slow for us middle-aged individuals and painfully slow for teenagers.

text: may lack the pungent bite of its title , but it 's an enjoyable trifle nonetheless .
translation: そのタイトルの刺激的な味わいに欠けるかもしれませんが、それでも楽しめる軽い作品です。
back_translation: It may lack the stimulating flavor suggested by the title, but it is still an enjoyable light piece.

text: a rather brilliant little cult item : a pastiche of children 's entertainment , superhero comics , and japanese animation .
translation: かなり素晴らしいカルトアイテム：子供向けエンターテインメント、スーパーヒーローコミック、そして日本のアニメのパスティーシュ。
back_translation: Quite an amazing cult item: children's entertainment, superhero comics, and a pastiche of Japanese anime.

text: the film is a fierce dance of destruction .
translation: その映画は破壊の激しいダンスです。
back_translation: That movie is a dance of intense destruction.

text: the mark of a respectable summer blockbuster is one of two things : unadulterated thrills or genuine laughs .
translation: 尊敬される夏のブロックバスターの特徴は、純粋なスリルか本物の笑いのいずれかです。
back_translation: The hallmark of a respected summer blockbuster is either pure thrills or genuine laughter.

text: it 's hard to care about a film that proposes as epic tragedy the plight of a callow rich boy who is forced to choose between his beautiful , self-satisfied 22-year-old girlfriend and an equally beautiful , self-satisfied 18-year-old mistress .
translation: 未熟な裕福な青年が、美しい自己満足の22歳のガールフレンドと、同じく美しい自己満足の18歳の愛人の間で選択を迫られるという状況を壮大な悲劇として提案する映画に心を動かされるのは難しい。
back_translation: It's hard to be moved by a film that proposes the situation of an immature wealthy young man being forced to choose between his beautiful, self-satisfied 22-year-old girlfriend and his equally beautiful, self-satisfied 18-year-old mistress as a grand tragedy.

text: psychologically revealing .
translation: 心理的に明らかになる。
back_translation: It becomes clear psychologically.

text: if a big musical number like ` praise the lord , he 's the god of second chances ' does n't put you off , this will be an enjoyable choice for younger kids .
translation: 「主を称えよ、彼は第二のチャンスの神だ」というような大きなミュージカルナンバーが気にならないのであれば、これは小さい子供たちにとって楽しめる選択になるでしょう。
back_translation: "If you don't mind a big musical number like 'Praise the Lord, for He is the God of Second Chances,' then this will be an enjoyable choice for small children."

text: but seriously , folks , it does n't work .
translation: しかし真面目に言うと、うまくいきません。
back_translation: However, to be serious, it isn't going well.

text: i was trying to decide what annoyed me most about god is great ... i 'm not , and then i realized that i just did n't care .
translation: 神は偉大であるということについて、何が一番私を苛立たせるのかを考えていましたが、結局私にはどうでもよいことだと気づきました。
back_translation: I was thinking about what irritates me the most about the idea that God is great, but in the end, I realized it doesn't matter to me.

text: and there 's an element of heartbreak to watching it now , with older and wiser eyes , because we know what will happen after greene 's story ends .
translation: 今見ると、年を重ねて賢くなった目で見るせいか、心が痛む要素があります。なぜなら、グリーンの物語が終わった後に何が起こるかを私たちは知っているからです。
back_translation: Looking back now, perhaps because I view it with a wiser perspective gained over the years, there are elements that pain my heart. This is because we know what happens after Green's story ends.

text: bluto blutarsky , we miss you .
translation: ブルート・ブルタースキー、私たちはあなたを恋しく思っています。
back_translation: Brute Brutarski, we miss you.

text: crossroads feels like a teenybopper ed wood film , replete with the pubescent scandalous innuendo and the high-strung but flaccid drama .
translation: クロスロードはティーニーバッパーのエド・ウッド映画のようで、思春期のスキャンダラスな暗示や、緊張感はあるが萎えたドラマが満載です。
back_translation: Crossroads feels like an Ed Wood movie with teeny-bopper elements, full of scandalous implications of adolescence and a dramatic tension that is present but deflated.

text: do n't say you were n't warned .
translation: 警告されなかったとは言わないでください。
back_translation: Please don't say that you weren't warned.

text: hopkins , squarely fills the screen .
translation: ホプキンスが画面を占めています。
back_translation: Hopkins is dominating the screen.

text: hashiguchi vividly captures the way young japanese live now , chafing against their culture 's manic mix of millennial brusqueness and undying , traditional politesse .
translation: 橋口は、若い日本人の現在の生活を鮮やかに捉え、ミレニアル世代のぶっきらぼうさと変わらぬ伝統的な礼儀作法の混乱に苛立ちながら生きる様子を描いている。
back_translation: Hashiguchi vividly captures the current lives of young Japanese people, depicting how they live in frustration amidst the confusion between the bluntness of the millennial generation and the unchanged traditional manners.

text: you leave the same way you came -- a few tasty morsels under your belt , but no new friends .
translation: あなたは、やってきたのと同じように去ります -- いくつかの美味しい餌を腹に入れていますが、新しい友達はできません。
back_translation: You come as you go -- having filled your stomach with some tasty food, but without making any new friends.

text: while it can be a bit repetitive , overall it 's an entertaining and informative documentary .
translation: 少し繰り返しがあるかもしれませんが、全体的には面白く、情報豊かなドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: There may be some repetition, but overall it is an interesting and informative documentary.

text: what makes the film special is the refreshingly unhibited enthusiasm that the people , in spite of clearly evident poverty and hardship , bring to their music .
translation: 映画を特別なものにしているのは、明らかに貧困と困難があるにもかかわらず、人々が音楽に持ち込む新鮮で自由な熱意です。
back_translation: What makes movies special is the fresh and free enthusiasm that people bring to music, despite the evident poverty and hardships.

text: this may be burns 's strongest film since the brothers mcmullen .
translation: これはバーンズの「マクマレン兄弟」以来最も強力な映画かもしれません。
back_translation: This may be the most powerful film since Burns' "The McMullen Brothers."

text: warm in its loving yet unforgivingly inconsistent depiction of everyday people , relaxed in its perfect quiet pace and proud in its message .
translation: 愛情に満ちていても厳格に一貫性のない日常の人々の描写に温かさを感じ、完璧な静かなペースでリラックスし、そのメッセージに誇りを持っている。
back_translation: I feel warmth in the depiction of everyday people who are filled with love yet are strictly inconsistent, relax at a perfect quiet pace, and take pride in that message.

text: its director 's most substantial feature for some time .
translation: その監督にとって、しばらくの間で最も重要な作品です。
back_translation: For that director, it is the most important work for a while.

text: a chilly , remote , emotionally distant piece ... so dull that its tagline should be : ` in space , no one can hear you snore . '
translation: 冷たく、遠く、感情的に距離のある作品...あまりにも退屈で、そのキャッチフレーズは「宇宙では誰もあなたのいびきを聞くことができない」とすべきだ。
back_translation: Cold, distant, and emotionally distant work... too boring, and its catchphrase should be "In space, no one can hear you snore."

text: leave it to john sayles to take on developers , the chamber of commerce , tourism , historical pageants , and commercialism all in the same movie ... without neglecting character development for even one minute .
translation: ジョン・セイルズに任せておけば、開発者、商工会議所、観光、歴史的ページェント、そして商業主義を同じ映画で取り上げつつ、キャラクターの発展を一分たりともおろそかにしない。
back_translation: If you leave it to John Sayles, he will address developers, chambers of commerce, tourism, historical pageants, and commercialism all in the same film without neglecting character development for even a moment.

text: `` extreme ops '' exceeds expectations .
translation: 「エクストリームオプス」は期待を超える。
back_translation: "Extreme Ops" exceeds expectations.

text: it 's stylishly directed with verve ...
translation: スタイリッシュに活気を持って演出されています...
back_translation: It is stylishly and dynamically presented...

text: fans of critics ' darling band wilco will marvel at the sometimes murky , always brooding look of i am trying to break your heart .
translation: 批評家のお気に入りのバンドウィルコのファンは、「I Am Trying to Break Your Heart」の時に曖昧で常に陰鬱な見た目に驚嘆することでしょう。
back_translation: Fans of the critic-favorite band Wilco will be astonished by the ambiguous and always bleak appearance during "I Am Trying to Break Your Heart."

text: its adult themes of familial separation and societal betrayal are head and shoulders above much of the director 's previous popcorn work .
translation: 家族の分離や社会的裏切りといった大人のテーマは、監督の過去のポップコーン映画の多くを凌駕しています。
back_translation: Themes of family separation and social betrayal surpass many of the director's previous popcorn films.

text: chen films the resolutely downbeat smokers only with every indulgent , indie trick in the book .
translation: チェンは、徹底的に暗い喫煙者たちを、書籍にあるすべての贅沢でインディな手法を使って撮影しています。
back_translation: Chen is photographing thoroughly dark smokers using all the luxurious and indie techniques found in the books.

text: the weird thing about the santa clause 2 , purportedly a children 's movie , is that there is nothing in it to engage children emotionally .
translation: 『サンタクローズ2』は、一見子供向けの映画であるにもかかわらず、子供たちを感情的に引き込む要素が何もないという奇妙な点があります。
back_translation: "Santa Clause 2" is a strange film in that, despite appearing to be a children's movie, it has no elements that emotionally engage children.

text: what -lrb- frei -rrb- gives us ... is a man who uses the damage of war -- far more often than the warfare itself -- to create the kind of art shots that fill gallery shows .
translation: -（フライ）-が私たちに与えるものは、戦争の被害を利用する男です――戦闘そのものよりもはるかに頻繁に――ギャラリー展示を満たすようなアートショットを作り出すために。
back_translation: What (flies) give us are men who exploit the victims of war—far more frequently than the combat itself—to create art shots that fill gallery exhibitions.

text: -lrb- hell is -rrb- looking down at your watch and realizing serving sara is n't even halfway through .
translation: -（地獄とは）-腕時計を見下ろし、サラへのサービスがまだ半分も終わっていないことに気づくことです。
back_translation: - (Hell is) - looking down at the watch and realizing that the service for Sara is still not even halfway done.

text: me no lika da accents so good , but i thoroughly enjoyed the love story .
translation: アクセントはとても良いとは思わないけれど、恋愛ストーリーは十分に楽しみました。
back_translation: I don't think the accent is very good, but I enjoyed the romance story quite a bit.

text: director lee has a true cinematic knack , but it 's also nice to see a movie with its heart so thoroughly , unabashedly on its sleeve .
translation: リー監督は本当に映画的な才能を持っていますが、心をまっすぐに、恥ずかしげもなく見せる映画を見るのも素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Director Lee truly has cinematic talent, and it is wonderful to watch a film that openly and unabashedly reveals the heart.

text: in other words , it 's just another sports drama\/character study .
translation: つまり、それはただのスポーツドラマ／キャラクター研究です。
back_translation: In other words, it's just a sports drama/character study.

text: there 's nothing interesting in unfaithful whatsoever .
translation: 不誠実には何も面白いことはありません。
back_translation: There is nothing interesting about being insincere.

text: compassionately explores the seemingly irreconcilable situation between conservative christian parents and their estranged gay and lesbian children .
translation: 保守的なクリスチャンの親と彼らの疎遠なゲイやレズビアンの子供たちとの、一見調和することのない状況を思いやりを持って探求します。
back_translation: It compassionately explores the seemingly discordant situation between conservative Christian parents and their estranged gay and lesbian children.

text: worthy of the gong .
translation: ゴングに値する。
back_translation: It deserves a gong.

text: a pointed , often tender , examination of the pros and cons of unconditional love and familial duties .
