back_translation: As a result, it gives Derrida a human face and makes him appealing and accessible to people who typically have no interest in him, positioning him as one of the great thinkers of our time.

text: the film is way too full of itself ; it 's stuffy and pretentious in a give-me-an-oscar kind of way .
translation: その映画は自惚れすぎている；息苦しく、オスカーを求めるような気取りがあります。
back_translation: The movie is too full of itself; it's suffocating and has a pretentiousness that seeks an Oscar.

text: according to the script , grant and bullock 's characters are made for each other .
translation: 脚本によれば、グラントとブロックのキャラクターはお互いにぴったり合っています。
back_translation: According to the script, the characters of Grant and Block fit perfectly together.

text: the picture uses humor and a heartfelt conviction to tell a story about discovering your destination in life , but also acknowledging the places , and the people , from whence you came .
translation: その絵はユーモアと心のこもった信念を使って、人生の目的地を見つける物語を語り、同時に自分がどこから来たのか、場所や人々を認識しています。
back_translation: The painting tells a story of finding life's destination, using humor and heartfelt beliefs, while also recognizing where one comes from, including places and people.

text: a perfect example of rancid , well-intentioned , but shamelessly manipulative movie making .
translation: 悪意はないが、恥知らずに操作的な映画制作の完璧な例。
back_translation: It is a perfect example of manipulative filmmaking that lacks malice but is shameless.

text: a movie version of a paint-by-numbers picture .
translation: 数字で塗る絵の映画版。
back_translation: A movie version of painting by numbers.

text: lux , now in her eighties , does a great combination act as narrator , jewish grandmother and subject -- taking us through a film that is part biography , part entertainment and part history .
translation: ルクスは今80代で、ナレーター、ユダヤ人のおばあさん、そして主題として素晴らしいコンビネーションアクトを披露し、伝記、エンターテインメント、歴史の一部である映画を私たちに送り出します。
back_translation: Lux is now in her 80s, showcasing a wonderful combination act as a narrator, a Jewish grandmother, and sending us films that are part biography, part entertainment, and part history.

text: a stylish but steady , and ultimately very satisfying , piece of character-driven storytelling .
translation: スタイリッシュでありながら安定感のある、そして最終的には非常に満足のいくキャラクター主導のストーリーテリングの作品です。
back_translation: A stylish yet stable work that ultimately provides a very satisfying character-driven storytelling experience.

text: the feature-length stretch ... strains the show 's concept .
translation: 長編のストレッチは、ショーのコンセプトを試すものです。
back_translation: A long stretch is an opportunity to test the concept of the show.

text: the characters , cast in impossibly contrived situations , are totally estranged from reality .
translation: 登場人物たちは、無理に作り出された状況に置かれ、完全に現実から切り離されています。
back_translation: The characters are placed in a situation that has been forcefully created, completely disconnected from reality.

text: a small independent film suffering from a severe case of hollywood-itis .
translation: ハリウッド病にひどくかかっている小さな独立系映画。
back_translation: A small independent film that is severely afflicted with Hollywood disease.

text: an exercise in cynicism every bit as ugly as the shabby digital photography and muddy sound .
translation: 粗末なデジタル写真や濁った音と同じくらい醜い、皮肉の演習。
back_translation: An exercise in irony, as ugly as a shoddy digital photo or muddy sound.

text: ken russell would love this .
translation: ケン・ラッセルはこれを気に入るだろう。
back_translation: Ken Russell would like this.

text: has all the scenic appeal of a cesspool .
translation: 汚水槽のような景観の魅力しかない。
back_translation: There is only the charm of a landscape that resembles a sewage tank.

text: they can and will turn on a dime from oddly humorous to tediously sentimental .
translation: 彼らは奇妙にユーモラスから退屈なほど感傷的に一瞬で切り替えることができ、そして実際に切り替えるでしょう。
back_translation: They can switch from oddly humorous to sentimentally boring in an instant, and they will actually make that switch.

text: claire is a terrific role for someone like judd , who really ought to be playing villains .
translation: クレアは、悪役を演じるべきジュッドのような人物にとって素晴らしい役割です。
back_translation: Clara is a wonderful role for someone like Judd, who should play the villain.

text: kitschy , flashy , overlong soap opera .
translation: キッチュで、派手で、長すぎる昼ドラマ。
back_translation: Kitschy, flashy, and overly long daytime drama.

text: its message has merit and , in the hands of a brutally honest individual like prophet jack , might have made a point or two regarding life .
translation: そのメッセージには価値があり、率直な個人である預言者ジャックの手にかかれば、人生についての一つや二つのポイントを示すことができたかもしれません。
back_translation: That message had value, and in the hands of the honest individual known as Prophet Jack, it could have pointed out one or two points about life.

text: sex is one of those films that aims to confuse .
translation: セックスは、観客を混乱させることを目的とした映画の一つです。
back_translation: Sex is one of the movies aimed at confusing the audience.

text: first-time director joão pedro rodrigues ' unwillingness to define his hero 's background or motivations becomes more and more frustrating as the film goes on .
translation: 初監督のジョアン・ペドロ・ロドリゲスが、彼のヒーローの背景や動機を定義しようとしないことは、映画が進むにつれてますます frustrate させる。
back_translation: João Pedro Rodrigues, in his debut as a director, increasingly frustrates as the film progresses by not attempting to define the background and motivations of his hero.

text: salma goes native and she 's never been better in this colorful bio-pic of a mexican icon .
translation: サルマは土着の生活を始め、メキシコのアイコンのカラフルな伝記映画でこれまでになく素晴らしい演技を見せています。
back_translation: Salma has started a native lifestyle and has delivered an incredible performance like never before in a colorful biopic film about an icon from Mexico.

text: human nature is a goofball movie , in the way that malkovich was , but it tries too hard .
translation: 「ヒューマン・ネイチャー」は、マルコビッチがそうであったように、グーフィーな映画ですが、やりすぎです。
back_translation: "Human Nature" is a goofy movie, just like "Being John Malkovich," but it's over the top.

text: the asylum material is gripping , as are the scenes of jia with his family .
translation: 亡命の素材は魅力的であり、家族とのジアのシーンも同様です。
back_translation: The material on exile is fascinating, and the scenes with family are similarly captivating.

text: a literary detective story is still a detective story and aficionados of the whodunit wo n't be disappointed .
translation: 文学的な探偵小説は依然として探偵小説であり、ミステリー愛好家は失望しないでしょう。
back_translation: Literary detective novels are still detective novels, and mystery enthusiasts will not be disappointed.

text: the soundtrack alone is worth the price of admission .
translation: サウンドトラックだけでも入場料の価値があります。
back_translation: The soundtrack alone is worth the admission price.

text: it sounds like another clever if pointless excursion into the abyss , and that 's more or less how it plays out .
translation: それは無意味な深淵への巧妙な冒険のように聞こえ、それがほぼそのままの形で展開します。
back_translation: It sounds like a clever adventure into a meaningless abyss, and it unfolds almost exactly in that way.

text: the film has the high-buffed gloss and high-octane jolts you expect of de palma , but what makes it transporting is that it 's also one of the smartest , most pleasurable expressions of pure movie love to come from an american director in years .
translation: その映画はデ・パルマに期待する高光沢の仕上げとハイオクタインの衝撃を持っていますが、魅力的なのは、それがここ数年のアメリカの監督から生まれた、純粋な映画愛を表現した最も賢く、最も楽しい作品の一つであることです。
back_translation: The film has the high-gloss finish and high-octane shock that one expects from De Palma, but what is captivating is that it is one of the smartest and most entertaining works that expresses pure love for cinema, emerging from American directors in recent years.

text: sly , sophisticated and surprising .
translation: 狡猾で、洗練されていて、驚くべき。
back_translation: Cunning, sophisticated, and astonishing.

text: -lrb- kline 's -rrb- utterly convincing -- and deeply appealing -- as a noble teacher who embraces a strict moral code , and as a flawed human being who ca n't quite live up to it .
translation: （クラインの）完全に納得のいく、そして深く魅力的な教師としての姿勢は、厳格な道徳規範を受け入れる一方で、それに完全には応えられない欠陥のある人間として描かれています。
back_translation: Klein's completely convincing and deeply engaging stance as a teacher is depicted as one who accepts strict moral standards, while also being portrayed as an imperfect human who cannot fully meet those standards.

text: more trifle than triumph .
translation: 勝利というよりは些事。
back_translation: Rather than victory, it's a trivial matter.

text: it 's hard to believe these jokers are supposed to have pulled off four similar kidnappings before .
translation: これらの連中が以前に4件の類似した誘拐を成功させたとは信じがたい。
back_translation: It's hard to believe that these guys successfully carried out four similar kidnappings before.

text: murphy and wilson actually make a pretty good team ... but the project surrounding them is distressingly rote .
translation: マーフィーとウィルソンは実際に良いチームを作っていますが、彼らを取り巻くプロジェクトは非常に単調です。
back_translation: Murphy and Wilson are actually creating a good team, but the projects surrounding them are very monotonous.

text: the screenplay , co-written by director imogen kimmel , lacks the wit necessary to fully exploit the comic elements of the premise , making the proceedings more bizarre than actually amusing .
translation: 監督イモージェン・キメルと共同執筆された脚本は、設定のコメディ要素を十分に活かすために必要な機知を欠いており、結果として展開は実際に面白いよりも奇妙になってしまっている。
back_translation: The screenplay co-written with director Imogen Kimmel lacks the wit necessary to fully exploit the comedic elements of the setting, resulting in a narrative that is more peculiar than actually funny.

text: i hope the movie is widely seen and debated with appropriate ferocity and thoughtfulness .
translation: その映画が広く観られ、適切な激しさと思慮によって議論されることを願っています。
back_translation: I hope that the movie will be widely viewed and discussed with the appropriate intensity and thoughtfulness.

text: she may not be real , but the laughs are .
translation: 彼女は本物ではないかもしれませんが、笑いは本物です。
back_translation: She may not be real, but the laughter is real.

text: clumsy , obvious , preposterous , the movie will likely set the cause of woman warriors back decades .
translation: 不器用で明白でばかげたこの映画は、女性戦士の原因を数十年も遅らせる可能性があります。
back_translation: This clumsy, obvious, and ridiculous movie could delay the cause of female warriors by decades.

text: a depressingly retrograde , ` post-feminist ' romantic comedy that takes an astonishingly condescending attitude toward women .
translation: 女性に対して驚くほど見下した態度をとる、うんざりするほど後退的な「ポストフェミニスト」ロマンティックコメディ。
back_translation: A frustratingly regressive "post-feminist" romantic comedy that takes an astonishingly condescending attitude towards women.

text: scherfig 's light-hearted profile of emotional desperation is achingly honest and delightfully cheeky .
translation: シャーフィグの軽快な感情的絶望のプロフィールは、痛々しく正直でありながら、楽しい悪戯心にあふれています。
back_translation: The profile of Shafig's lighthearted emotional despair is painfully honest yet filled with playful mischief.

text: you can sip your vintage wines and watch your merchant ivory productions ; i 'll settle for a nice cool glass of iced tea and a jerry bruckheimer flick any day of the week .
translation: あなたはヴィンテージワインを sip し、マーチャント・アイボリーの作品を観ることができますが、私はどんな週の日でも、冷たいアイスティーとジェリー・ブラッカイマーの映画で満足します。
back_translation: You can sip vintage wine and watch Merchant Ivory films, but I’m satisfied with cold iced tea and Jerry Bruckheimer movies on any day of the week.

text: this is the kind of movie where the big scene is a man shot out of a cannon into a vat of ice cream .
translation: これは、大きなシーンが男が大砲からアイスクリームのタンクに撃ち出されるような映画です。
back_translation: This is a movie where a big scene has a man being shot out of a cannon into a tank of ice cream.

text: both garcia and jagger turn in perfectly executed and wonderfully sympathetic characters , who are alternately touching and funny .
translation: ガルシアとジャガーは、交互に感動的で面白い、完璧に実行された魅力的なキャラクターを演じています。
back_translation: García and Jaguar portray compelling characters that are alternately moving and entertaining, perfectly executed.

text: many went to see the attraction for the sole reason that it was hot outside and there was air conditioning inside , and i do n't think that a.c. will help this movie one bit .
translation: 多くの人々は外が暑かったため、そして中にエアコンがあったため、このアトラクションを見に行きましたが、私はこの映画にエアコンが一切役立つとは思いません。
back_translation: Many people went to see this attraction because it was hot outside and there was air conditioning inside, but I don't think the air conditioning helped at all with this movie.

text: you 'll trudge out of the theater feeling as though you rode the zipper after eating a corn dog and an extra-large cotton candy .
translation: あなたはコーンドッグと特大の綿あめを食べた後にジッパーに乗ったような気分で、劇場をどっさりと出ていくでしょう。
back_translation: You would feel like you got on a zipper after eating a corn dog and a giant cotton candy, and you'd exit the theater in a rush.

text: crudup 's screen presence is the one thing that holds interest in the midst of a mushy , existential exploration of why men leave their families .
translation: クラダップのスクリーンプレゼンスは、男性が家族を捨てる理由についてのもやもやした存在論的探求の最中で、唯一興味を引くものです。
back_translation: The screen presence of "Kradup" is the only thing that catches the interest in the midst of a murky existential exploration of the reasons why men abandon their families.

text: not everyone will welcome or accept the trials of henry kissinger as faithful portraiture , but few can argue that the debate it joins is a necessary and timely one .
translation: ヘンリー・キッシンジャーの試練が忠実な肖像であると歓迎または受け入れる人は誰もいないが、それに関する議論が必要であり、タイムリーなものであることには異論の余地が少ない。
back_translation: No one welcomes or accepts Henry Kissinger's trials as a faithful portrait, but there is little doubt that a discussion about it is necessary and timely.

text: by surrounding us with hyper-artificiality , haynes makes us see familiar issues , like racism and homophobia , in a fresh way .
translation: ハインズは、超人工的な環境に私たちを囲むことで、人種差別やホモフォビアなどの身近な問題を新たな視点で見させてくれます。
back_translation: Hines gives us a new perspective on familiar issues like racism and homophobia by surrounding us with a hyper-artificial environment.

text: ... somehow manages to escape the shackles of its own clichés to be the best espionage picture to come out in weeks .
translation: ...自らのクリシェの束縛から何とか逃れ、ここ数週間で公開された最高のスパイ映画となっています。
back_translation: ...managing to escape from the shackles of its own clichés, it has become the best spy movie released in the past few weeks.

text: a highly spirited , imaginative kid 's movie that broaches neo-augustinian theology : is god stuck in heaven because he 's afraid of his best-known creation ?
translation: 非常に活気に満ちた、想像力豊かな子供向け映画で、ネオ・アウグスティニウスの神学に触れています：神は最も知られた創造物を恐れているため、天国に閉じ込められているのでしょうか？
back_translation: A very lively and imaginative children's movie that touches on Neo-Augustinian theology: Is it because God fears the most well-known creation that it is confined to heaven?

text: alas , it 's the man that makes the clothes .
translation: ああ、結局は人が服を作るのです。
back_translation: Ah, in the end, it is people who make clothes.

text: when the fire burns out , we 've only come face-to-face with a couple dragons and that 's where the film ultimately fails .
translation: 火が消えるとき、私たちはいくつかのドラゴンと対面したに過ぎず、そこが映画の本質的な失敗の部分です。
back_translation: When the fire goes out, we have only encountered a few dragons, which is where the fundamental failure of the movie lies.

text: this often-hilarious farce manages to generate the belly laughs of lowbrow comedy without sacrificing its high-minded appeal .
translation: このしばしば笑えるファルスは、低俗なコメディの大笑いを生み出しながら、高尚な魅力を犠牲にすることなく成功しています。
back_translation: This often hilarious farce succeeds in generating great laughs from lowbrow comedy without sacrificing its highbrow appeal.

text: the pianist is polanski 's best film .
translation: 「戦場のピアニスト」はポランスキーの最高の作品です。
back_translation: "The Pianist" is Polanski's best work.

text: you feel good , you feel sad , you feel pissed off , but in the end , you feel alive - which is what they did .
translation: あなたは気分が良いと感じたり、悲しいと感じたり、腹が立ったりしますが、最終的には生きていると感じるのです - それが彼らのしたことです。
back_translation: You feel good, sad, or angry, but in the end, you feel alive - that is what they have done.

text: klein , charming in comedies like american pie and dead-on in election , delivers one of the saddest action hero performances ever witnessed .
translation: クラインは、「アメリカン・パイ」などのコメディで魅力的であり、「選挙」では完璧な演技を見せていますが、今回の作品では今まで目撃した中で最も悲しいアクションヒーローの演技を披露しています。
back_translation: Klein is charming in comedies like "American Pie" and delivers a perfect performance in "Election," but in this latest work, he showcases the most heartbreaking portrayal of an action hero I've ever witnessed.

text: from the dull , surreal ache of mortal awareness emerges a radiant character portrait .
translation: 鈍く、超現実的な死の意識の痛みから、輝かしいキャラクターの肖像が浮かび上がる。
back_translation: From the dull, surreal pain of the awareness of death, the portrait of a brilliant character emerges.

text: utter mush ... conceited pap .
translation: 全くのナンセンス... 自惚れたおしゃべり。
back_translation: Utter nonsense... Arrogant chatter.

text: despite its hawaiian setting , the science-fiction trimmings and some moments of rowdy slapstick , the basic plot of `` lilo '' could have been pulled from a tear-stained vintage shirley temple script .
translation: ハワイを舞台にしているにもかかわらず、サイエンスフィクションの要素や時折の騒がしいスラップスティックがあるにもかかわらず、「リロ」の基本的なプロットは、涙で濡れたヴィンテージのシャーリー・テンプルの脚本から引き出されたものであろう。
back_translation: Despite being set in Hawaii, and having elements of science fiction and occasional noisy slapstick, the basic plot of "Lilo" seems to be drawn from a tear-soaked vintage Shirley Temple script.

text: gooding is the energetic frontman , and it 's hard to resist his enthusiasm , even if the filmmakers come up with nothing original in the way of slapstick sequences .
translation: グディングはエネルギッシュなフロントマンであり、映画製作者がスラップスティックのシーケンスにおいて特にオリジナルなものを思いつかなくても、彼の熱意には抗えない。
back_translation: Guding is an energetic frontman, and even if filmmakers can't come up with particularly original ideas for slapstick sequences, his enthusiasm is irresistible.

text: ... the whole thing succeeded only in making me groggy .
translation: …全体的に見て、私をぼんやりさせるだけでした。
back_translation: Overall, it just made me feel vague.

text: just when you think that every possible angle has been exhausted by documentarians , another new film emerges with yet another remarkable yet shockingly little-known perspective .
translation: ドキュメンタリー制作者によってあらゆる角度が使い尽くされたと思った瞬間、また新たな映画が登場し、驚くべきながら驚くほど知られていない視点を提供します。
back_translation: Just when you think that every angle has been exhausted by documentary filmmakers, a new film appears, offering astonishingly unknown perspectives.

text: think of it as gidget , only with muscles and a lot more smarts , but just as endearing and easy to watch .
translation: 筋肉とたくさんの知恵を持ったギジェットのように考えてくださいが、同じように愛らしく、見るのが簡単です。
back_translation: Think of it like a Gidget with lots of muscle and wisdom, but just as adorable and easy to look at.

text: grant carries the day with impeccable comic timing , raffish charm and piercing intellect .
translation: グラントは完璧なコメディのタイミング、魅力的な魅力、鋭い知性でその日を制した。
back_translation: Grant dominated the day with perfect comedic timing, captivating charm, and sharp intelligence.

text: a frustrating ` tweener ' -- too slick , contrived and exploitative for the art houses and too cynical , small and decadent for the malls .
translation: イライラする「中途半端な作品」-- アートハウスにはあまりにも滑らかで作為的、搾取的であり、モールにはあまりにも皮肉的で小さく堕落している。
back_translation: Frustrating "half-baked works" -- Too smooth and contrived for art houses, and too ironic and petty for malls.

text: predictably soulless techno-tripe .
translation: 予測可能な魂のないテクノのつまらないもの。
back_translation: Predictable, soulless techno that is boring.

text: the filmmakers keep pushing the jokes at the expense of character until things fall apart .
translation: 映画製作者たちは、キャラクターを犠牲にしてまでジョークを押し続け、最終的には物事が崩壊してしまう。
back_translation: Filmmakers continue to push jokes at the expense of characters, ultimately leading to a breakdown.

text: it 's incredible the number of stories the holocaust has generated .
translation: ホロコーストが生み出した物語の数は信じられないほどです。
back_translation: The number of stories born from the Holocaust is unbelievable.

text: the movie keeps coming back to the achingly unfunny phonce and his several silly subplots .
translation: 映画は痛々しく面白くないフォンスと彼のいくつかの愚かなサブプロットに何度も戻ってきます。
back_translation: The movie repeatedly returns to the painfully uninteresting Fons and some of his foolish subplots.

text: the film 's most improbable feat ?
translation: 映画の最もあり得ない偉業は何ですか？
back_translation: What is the most unlikely achievement in movies?

text: the charm of revolution os is rather the way it introduces you to new , fervently held ideas and fanciful thinkers .
translation: 革命の魅力は、新しい情熱的なアイデアや空想的な思想家たちに出会わせてくれるその方法にあります。
back_translation: The charm of revolution lies in the way it introduces you to new passionate ideas and visionary thinkers.

text: there is no substitute for on-screen chemistry , and when friel pulls the strings that make williams sink into melancholia , the reaction in williams is as visceral as a gut punch .
translation: スクリーン上の化学反応には代替がなく、フリエルがウィリアムズをメランコリーに沈ませる糸を引くと、ウィリアムズの反応はまるで腹パンのように生々しいです。
back_translation: There is no alternative to the chemical reaction on the screen, and as Frier pulls the strings that plunge Williams into melancholy, Williams's reaction is as raw as a gut punch.

text: there are some fairly unsettling scenes , but they never succeed in really rattling the viewer .
translation: いくつか非常に不安を感じさせるシーンがありますが、視聴者を本当に動揺させることには決して成功しません。
back_translation: There are several scenes that are very anxiety-inducing, but they never truly succeed in unsettling the audience.

text: possibly the most irresponsible picture ever released by a major film studio .
translation: おそらく大手映画スタジオが公開した中で最も無責任な写真です。
back_translation: This is probably the most irresponsible movie released by a major film studio.

text: the characters are paper thin and the plot is so cliched and contrived that it makes your least favorite james bond movie seem as cleverly plotted as the usual suspects .
translation: キャラクターは薄っぺらで、プロットは非常にクリシェで作り物めいており、あなたの最も好きでないジェームズ・ボンド映画が「ユージュアル・サ suspects」のように巧妙に構成されたものに思えてしまう。
back_translation: The characters are shallow, the plot is very clichéd and artificial, making even your least favorite James Bond film seem cleverly constructed like "The Usual Suspects."

text: a crisp psychological drama -lrb- and -rrb- a fascinating little thriller that would have been perfect for an old `` twilight zone '' episode .
translation: 鮮やかな心理ドラマ -lrb- そして -rrb- 古い「トワイライトゾーン」のエピソードにぴったりな魅力的なスリラー。
back_translation: A vivid psychological drama - and - an intriguing thriller perfect for an old "Twilight Zone" episode.

text: there is simply no doubt that this film asks the right questions at the right time in the history of our country .
translation: この映画が私たちの国の歴史の中で適切なタイミングで正しい質問を投げかけていることに疑いの余地はありません。
back_translation: There is no doubt that this movie raises the right questions at the appropriate time in the history of our country.

text: time stands still in more ways that one in clockstoppers , a sci-fi thriller as lazy as it is interminable .
translation: 『クロックストッパーズ』では、時間が一つの方法だけでなく、多くの方法で止まっています。このSFスリラーは怠惰でありながらも終わりがないように感じます。
back_translation: In "Clockstoppers," time is stopped not in just one way but in many ways. This sci-fi thriller feels lazy yet also seems to have no ending.

text: a dark , quirky road movie that constantly defies expectation .
translation: 期待を常に裏切る、暗くて風変わりなロードムービー。
back_translation: A dark and quirky road movie that always defies expectations.

text: mr. spielberg and his company just want you to enjoy yourselves without feeling conned .
translation: スピルバーグ氏と彼の会社は、あなたが騙されたと感じることなく楽しんでもらいたいだけです。
back_translation: Mr. Spielberg and his company just want you to enjoy without feeling deceived.

text: what the audience feels is exhaustion , from watching a movie that is dark -lrb- dark green , to be exact -rrb- , sour , bloody and mean .
translation: 観客が感じるのは疲労であり、暗い映画を見た後のことです（正確には暗緑色）、酸っぱく、血なまぐさい、意地悪なものです。
back_translation: What the audience feels is fatigue, after watching a dark movie (more precisely, a dark green one), something sour, bloody, and spiteful.

text: mr. polanski is in his element here : alone , abandoned , but still consoled by his art , which is more than he has ever revealed before about the source of his spiritual survival .
translation: ポランスキー氏はここで彼の本領を発揮しています：孤独で見捨てられていますが、依然として彼の芸術によって慰められています。これは彼の精神的な生存の源についてこれまでに明らかにしたどの情報よりも多いものです。
back_translation: Mr. Polanski is showcasing his true abilities here: he is alone and abandoned, yet still comforted by his art. This reveals more about the source of his spiritual survival than any information previously disclosed.

text: a devastating indictment of unbridled greed and materalism .
translation: 抑制のない貪欲と物質主義に対する壊滅的な非難。
back_translation: A devastating critique of unrestrained greed and materialism.

text: it feels like very light errol morris , focusing on eccentricity but failing , ultimately , to make something bigger out of its scrapbook of oddballs .
translation: 非常に軽やかなエロール・モリスのように感じられるが、偏屈さに焦点を当てながら、最終的にはその珍妙な人々の切り抜き帳からより大きなものを作り出すことに失敗している。
back_translation: It feels very much like a light-hearted Errol Morris, but while focusing on eccentricity, it ultimately fails to create something larger from the scrapbook of those peculiar people.

text: it 's full of cheesy dialogue , but great trashy fun that finally returns de palma to his pulpy thrillers of the early '80s .
translation: チーズのような台詞が満載ですが、1980年代初頭のダイ・パルマの pulp スリラーに彼をようやく戻す素晴らしいトラッシュな楽しさです。
back_translation: It is filled with cheesy lines, but it's wonderfully trashy fun that finally brings him back to the pulp thrillers of early 1980s De Palma.

text: diggs and lathan are among the chief reasons brown sugar is such a sweet and sexy film .
translation: ディッグスとレイサンは、『ブラウンシュガー』がそんなに甘くてセクシーな映画である主な理由の一つです。
back_translation: Diggs and Leysan are one of the main reasons why "Brown Sugar" is such a sweet and sexy movie.

text: but this new jangle of noise , mayhem and stupidity must be a serious contender for the title .
translation: しかし、この新しい騒音、混乱、愚かさのジャングルは、そのタイトルの真剣な候補に違いありません。
back_translation: However, this new jungle of noise, chaos, and foolishness is certainly a serious contender for its title.

text: darkly funny and frequently insightful .
translation: 暗くて笑えることが多く、しばしば洞察に満ちている。
back_translation: It is often dark and funny, and frequently filled with insight.

text: formuliac , but fun .
translation: 型にはまっているけれど、楽しい。
back_translation: It's conventional, but fun.

text: there 's some good material in their story about a retail clerk wanting more out of life , but the movie too often spins its wheels with familiar situations and repetitive scenes .
translation: 小売店の店員が人生にもっと何かを求める物語には良い素材があるが、映画はあまりにも頻繁におなじみの状況や繰り返しのシーンで時間を浪費している。
back_translation: The story of a retail store clerk seeking something more in life has good material, but the film wastes too much time on familiar situations and repetitive scenes.

text: damon brings the proper conviction to his role as -lrb- jason bourne -rrb- .
translation: デイモンは彼の役割であるジェイソン・ボーンに適切な信念をもたらします。
back_translation: Damon brings the right conviction to his role as Jason Bourne.

text: the movie does n't generate a lot of energy .
translation: その映画はあまりエネルギーを生み出しません。
back_translation: That movie doesn't generate much energy.

text: and yet , it still works .
translation: それでも、まだ機能しています。
back_translation: Still, it is still functioning.

text: it squanders chan 's uniqueness ; it could even be said to squander jennifer love hewitt !
translation: それはチャンの独自性を無駄にしている；ジェニファー・ラブ・ヒューイットを無駄にしているとも言える！
back_translation: It is wasting Chan's uniqueness; you could also say it is wasting Jennifer Love Hewitt!

text: ... a light , yet engrossing piece .
translation: …軽快でありながら、引き込まれる作品。
back_translation: ...a work that is lively yet captivating.

text: really quite funny .
translation: 本当にとても面白い。
back_translation: It's really very interesting.

text: pretty much sucks , but has a funny moment or two .
translation: ほぼダメだけど、いくつか面白い瞬間がある。
back_translation: It's almost useless, but there are a few interesting moments.

text: a singularly off-putting romantic comedy .
translation: 非常に不快なロマンティックコメディ。
back_translation: A very unpleasant romantic comedy.

text: diaz wears out her welcome in her most charmless performance
translation: ダイアズは、最も魅力のないパフォーマンスで彼女の歓迎を尽くしてしまう。
back_translation: Daisy puts in her utmost effort with the least appealing performance to welcome her.

text: the actors improvise and scream their way around this movie directionless , lacking any of the rollicking dark humor so necessary to make this kind of idea work on screen .
translation: 俳優たちは即興で叫びながらこの映画の中を方向を失って進み、画面上でこの種のアイデアを機能させるために必要なごちゃごちゃしたダークユーモアが欠けています。
back_translation: The actors shout improvisationally as they lose their way in this movie, lacking the messy dark humor necessary to make this kind of idea work on screen.

text: the off-center humor is a constant , and the ensemble gives it a buoyant delivery .
translation: 外れたユーモアが常に存在し、キャストはそれを軽快に届けています。
back_translation: Offbeat humor always exists, and the cast delivers it with great flair.

text: nearly all the fundamentals you take for granted in most films are mishandled here .
translation: ほとんどすべての基本的な要素が、この映画では悪く扱われています。
back_translation: Almost all the basic elements are poorly handled in this movie.

text: an eye-boggling blend of psychedelic devices , special effects and backgrounds , ` spy kids 2 ' is a visual treat for all audiences .
translation: 驚くべきサイケデリックな装置、特殊効果、背景の融合である「スパイキッズ2」は、すべての観客にとって視覚的な楽しみです。
back_translation: "Spy Kids 2," with its amazing psychedelic devices, special effects, and background fusion, is a visual delight for all audiences.

text: a lot of talent is wasted in this crass , low-wattage endeavor .
translation: この下品で低次元な試みでは、多くの才能が無駄にされています。
back_translation: This vulgar and low-dimensional attempt is wasting a lot of talent.

text: saddled with an unwieldy cast of characters and angles , but the payoff is powerful and revelatory .
translation: 扱いにくいキャラクターや視点に悩まされるが、その報酬は強力で啓示的である。
back_translation: While troubled by difficult characters and perspectives, the rewards are powerful and revelatory.

text: an engaging criminal romp that will have viewers guessing just who 's being conned right up to the finale .
translation: 視聴者がフィナーレまで誰が騙されているのかを推測し続ける、魅力的な犯罪映画です。
back_translation: It's an intriguing crime movie that keeps the viewers guessing who is being deceived until the finale.

text: an engrossing portrait of uncompromising artists trying to create something original against the backdrop of a corporate music industry that only seems to care about the bottom line .
translation: 妥協のないアーティストが、利益の最優先を重視するコーポレート音楽業界を背景に、オリジナルな何かを作り出そうと奮闘する魅力的な肖像。
back_translation: An intriguing portrait of an uncompromising artist struggling to create something original against the backdrop of the corporate music industry, where profit takes precedence.

text: kaufman 's script is never especially clever and often is rather pretentious .
translation: カウフマンの脚本は決して特に賢くはなく、しばしばかなり気取ったものです。
back_translation: Kaufman's scripts are never particularly clever and are often quite pretentious.

text: it celebrates the group 's playful spark of nonconformity , glancing vividly back at what hibiscus grandly called his ` angels of light . '
translation: それは、グループの遊び心ある非協調性を祝福し、ヒビスカスが偉大に呼んだ「光の天使たち」を鮮やかに振り返っています。
back_translation: It celebrates the playful non-conformity of the group and vividly recalls the "angels of light" that Hibiscus wonderfully called upon.

text: like coming into a long-running , well-written television series where you 've missed the first half-dozen episodes and probably wo n't see the next six .
translation: 長く続いていて、よく書かれたテレビシリーズに入るようなもので、最初の6話を見逃しており、おそらく次の6話も見られないということです。
back_translation: It's like entering a long-running, well-written TV series where I've missed the first six episodes and will probably miss the next six as well.

text: its flame-like , roiling black-and-white inspires trembling and gratitude .
translation: その炎のような、うねる白黒は震えと感謝を呼び起こします。
back_translation: That flame-like, writhing black and white evokes tremors and gratitude.

text: although it includes a fair share of dumb drug jokes and predictable slapstick , `` orange county '' is far funnier than it would seem to have any right to be .
translation: 「オレンジカウンティ」は、馬鹿げた薬のジョークや予測可能なスラップスティックが豊富に含まれているにもかかわらず、見た目以上にずっと面白いです。
back_translation: "Orange County," despite being filled with ridiculous drug jokes and predictable slapstick, is much funnier than it appears.

text: -lrb- the film -rrb- tackles the topic of relationships in such a straightforward , emotionally honest manner that by the end , it 's impossible to ascertain whether the film is , at its core , deeply pessimistic or quietly hopeful .
translation: （映画）は、関係のテーマを非常にストレートで感情的に誠実な方法で扱っているため、最後には、その映画が本質的に深く悲観的なのか、静かに希望を抱いているのかを判断することが不可能になる。
back_translation: The film addresses the theme of relationships in a very straightforward and emotionally sincere manner, making it impossible to determine by the end whether it is fundamentally deeply pessimistic or quietly hopeful.

text: the film is weighed down by supporting characters who are either too goodly , wise and knowing or downright comically evil .
translation: 映画は、あまりにも善良で賢く知恵のある支援キャラクターや、まったくコミカルに悪なキャラクターによって重くなっています。
back_translation: The movie is weighed down by overly virtuous and wise supporting characters, as well as comically evil characters.

text: it 's a visual rorschach test and i must have failed .
translation: それは視覚的なロールシャッハテストで、私は失敗したに違いありません。
back_translation: It's a visual Rorschach test, and I must have failed.

text: an uncomfortable experience , but one as brave and challenging as you could possibly expect these days from american cinema .
translation: 不快な体験ですが、最近のアメリカ映画から期待できる限り勇敢で挑戦的なものです。
back_translation: It's an unpleasant experience, but it's as brave and challenging as one can expect from recent American films.

text: the huskies are beautiful , the border collie is funny and the overall feeling is genial and decent .
translation: ハスキーは美しく、ボーダーコリーは面白く、全体的な雰囲気は素晴らしくて decent です。
back_translation: Huskies are beautiful, Border Collies are interesting, and the overall atmosphere is wonderful and decent.

text: charming and witty , it 's also somewhat clumsy .
translation: 魅力的で機知に富んでいますが、少し不器用でもあります。
back_translation: Charming and witty, but a little awkward as well.

text: amari has dressed up this little parable in a fairly irresistible package full of privileged moments and memorable performances .
translation: アマリはこの小さな寓話を、特権的な瞬間や記憶に残るパフォーマンスで満たされた非常に魅力的な形に仕立て上げました。
back_translation: Amari crafted this small fable into a highly engaging form filled with privileged moments and memorable performances.

text: with mcconaughey in an entirely irony-free zone and bale reduced mainly to batting his sensitive eyelids , there 's not enough intelligence , wit or innovation on the screen to attract and sustain an older crowd .
translation: マシュ・マコノヒーが全くアイロニーのないゾーンにいる一方で、クリスチャン・ベールは主に敏感なまつ毛をバタバタさせることに限られているため、画面上には成熟した観客を惹きつけ持続させるほどの知性、機知、革新性が不足している。
back_translation: While Matthew McConaughey is in a completely un-ironic zone, Christian Bale is mainly limited to fluttering his sensitive eyelashes, resulting in a lack of intelligence, wit, and innovation on screen to attract and sustain a mature audience.

text: a vivid , spicy footnote to history , and a movie that grips and holds you in rapt attention from start to finish .
translation: 歴史に対する鮮やかでスパイシーなフットノートであり、始まりから終わりまであなたを魅了し、引き込む映画です。
back_translation: A vibrant and spicy footnote to history, this film captivates and draws you in from start to finish.

text: ... an eerily suspenseful , deeply absorbing piece that works as a treatise on spirituality as well as a solid sci-fi thriller .
translation: ... 不気味な緊張感と深い没入感を持つ作品で、精神性についての論文としても、しっかりとしたSFスリラーとしても機能しています。
back_translation: It is a work that carries an eerie sense of tension and deep immersion, functioning both as a thesis on spirituality and as a solid sci-fi thriller.

text: despite juliet stevenon 's attempt to bring cohesion to pamela 's emotional roller coaster life , it is not enough to give the film the substance it so desperately needs .
translation: ジュリエット・スティーブンソンがパメラの感情のジェットコースターのような人生に一貫性をもたらそうと試みたにもかかわらず、それは映画に必要な実質を十分に与えるには不十分である。
back_translation: Despite Juliet Stevenson’s attempt to bring consistency to Pamela's emotionally turbulent life, it is insufficient to provide the substance necessary for the film.

text: this film is an act of spiritual faith -- an eloquent , deeply felt meditation on the nature of compassion .
translation: この映画は精神的な信念の行為であり、思いやりの本質についての雄弁で深い瞑想です。
back_translation: This movie is an act of spiritual conviction and a profound meditation on the essence of compassion.

text: it all plays out ... like a high-end john hughes comedy , a kind of elder bueller 's time out .
translation: すべてが展開するのは... 高級なジョン・ヒューズのコメディのようで、エルダー・ビュラーのタイムアウトのようなものです。
back_translation: Everything unfolds like... a high-end John Hughes comedy, akin to an Elder Buehler's Day Off.

text: what with all the blanket statements and dime-store ruminations on vanity , the worries of the rich and sudden wisdom , the film becomes a sermon for most of its running time .
translation: すべての一般化された発言や安っぽい虚栄心についての考察、裕福な人々の悩みや突然の知恵についての話題が混ざり合い、映画のほとんどの時間が説教のようになってしまっています。
back_translation: All generalized statements and reflections on cheap vanity, discussions about the troubles of the wealthy and sudden wisdom are intertwined, making most of the movie feel like a sermon.

text: wildly incompetent but brilliantly named half past dead -- or for seagal pessimists : totally past his prime .
translation: 非常に無能だが見事に名付けられた『ハーフ・パスト・デッド』 — または、セガールの悲観主義者にとっては：完全に全盛期を過ぎた。
back_translation: Incredibly incompetent yet brilliantly titled "Half Past Dead" — or, for the pessimists of Seagal: completely past its prime.

text: those eternally devoted to the insanity of black will have an intermittently good time .
translation: 黒の狂気に永遠に捧げられた者たちは、時折良い時を過ごすだろう。
back_translation: Those who are forever devoted to the madness of black will occasionally have good times.

text: the pretensions -- and disposable story -- sink the movie .
translation: その見えを張った態度と使い捨てのストーリーが映画を台無しにする。
back_translation: That pretentious attitude and disposable storyline ruin the movie.

text: she nearly glows with enthusiasm , sensuality and a conniving wit .
translation: 彼女は熱意、官能性、そしてずる賢い機知にあふれてほとんど輝いている。
back_translation: She shines brightly with enthusiasm, sensuality, and a sly wit.

text: and for many of us , that 's good enough .
translation: そして、多くの私たちにとって、それで十分です。
back_translation: And for many of us, that is enough.

text: meyjes ... has done his homework and soaked up some jazzy new revisionist theories about the origins of nazi politics and aesthetics .
translation: メイジェスは宿題をしっかりとやり、新たなジャズ風の修正主義理論を吸収しました。これはナチスの政治と美学の起源についてのものです。
back_translation: Meijes diligently completed his homework and absorbed a new jazz-influenced revisionist theory. This pertains to the origins of Nazi politics and aesthetics.

text: poetic , heartbreaking .
translation: 詩的で、胸が痛む。
back_translation: Poetic and heartbreaking.

text: a memorable experience that , like many of his works , presents weighty issues colorfully wrapped up in his own idiosyncratic strain of kitschy goodwill .
translation: 彼の作品の多くと同様に、彼自身の独自のキッチーな親切心でカラフルに包まれた重要な問題を提示する、記憶に残る体験です。
back_translation: It is a memorable experience that presents important issues wrapped in his own unique, kitschy kindness, much like many of his works.

text: as an actress , madonna is one helluva singer .
translation: 女優として、マドンナはすごい歌手です。
back_translation: As an actress, Madonna is an amazing singer.

text: the script by vincent r. nebrida ... tries to cram too many ingredients into one small pot .
translation: ヴィンセント・R・ネブリダによる脚本は、一つの小さな鍋にあまりにも多くの要素を詰め込もうとしています。
back_translation: The script by Vincent R. Nebreda tries to cram too many elements into one small pot.

text: just as the lousy tarantino imitations have subsided , here comes the first lousy guy ritchie imitation .
translation: タランティーノのひどい模倣が収まると、今度はリチャーディな男のひどい模倣が登場です。
back_translation: Once the terrible imitation of Tarantino settles down, now we have the terrible imitation of a Richard-like man coming onto the scene.

text: the direction has a fluid , no-nonsense authority , and the performances by harris , phifer and cam ` ron seal the deal .
translation: 演出は流れるような無駄のない権威を持ち、ハリス、ファイファー、カムロンの演技がその勝負を決定づけています。
back_translation: The direction has a fluid and efficient authority, with the performances of Harris, Pfeiffer, and Cameron decisively determining the outcome.

text: a film that will enthrall the whole family .
translation: 家族全員を魅了する映画。
back_translation: A movie that captivates the entire family.

text: it just does n't have anything really interesting to say .
translation: それほど興味深いことは何も言っていません。
back_translation: I haven't said anything particularly interesting.

text: much of the lady and the duke is about quiet , decisive moments between members of the cultural elite as they determine how to proceed as the world implodes .
translation: 「レディとデューク」の多くは、世界が崩壊する中で文化的エリートのメンバー間で静かで決定的な瞬間がどのように進行するかを決定することに関するものです。
back_translation: Much of "Lady and Duke" is about how quiet and decisive moments unfold among members of the cultural elite as the world collapses.

text: while you have to admit it 's semi-amusing to watch robert deniro belt out `` when you 're a jet , you 're a jet all the way , '' it 's equally distasteful to watch him sing the lyrics to `` tonight . ''
translation: ロバート・デ・ニーロが「あなたがジェットなら、最後までジェットだ」と歌うのを見るのは半分面白いと認めざるを得ないが、「今夜」の歌詞を歌うのを見るのは同じくらい不快だ。
back_translation: I have to admit that it's half amusing to see Robert De Niro sing, "If you’re a jet, you’re a jet all the way," but watching him sing the lyrics of "Tonight" is equally uncomfortable.

text: a quaint , romanticized rendering .
translation: 風情のある、ロマンチックに描かれた表現。
back_translation: A picturesque and romantically depicted expression.

text: filmmakers david weissman and bill weber benefit enormously from the cockettes ' camera craziness -- not only did they film performances , but they did the same at home .
translation: 映画製作者のデイビッド・ワイスマンとビル・ウェバーは、コケットのカメラの狂気から恩恵を受けており、彼らはパフォーマンスを撮影しただけでなく、自宅でも同じことをしました。
back_translation: Filmmakers David Weissman and Bill Weber have benefited from the madness of Coquette's camera, as they not only filmed the performances but also did the same at home.

text: as chilling and fascinating as philippe mora 's modern hitler-study , snide and prejudice .
translation: フィリップ・モラの現代ヒトラー研究『嫌悪と偏見』のように、ゾッとするほど魅力的です。
back_translation: It is chillingly captivating, much like Philip Mora's contemporary study of Hitler, "Hatred and Prejudice."

text: a little too ponderous to work as shallow entertainment , not remotely incisive enough to qualify as drama , monsoon wedding serves mostly to whet one 's appetite for the bollywood films .
translation: 少し重すぎて浅いエンターテインメントとしては機能せず、ドラマとしては全く鋭さが足りない『モンスーン・ウェディング』は、主にボリウッド映画への食欲をそそる役割を果たしている。
back_translation: "Monsoon Wedding," while too heavy to function as light entertainment and lacking in sharpness as a drama, primarily serves to stimulate appetite for Bollywood films.

text: a movie that the less charitable might describe as a castrated cross between highlander and lolita .
translation: 少し情け容赦のない人々が「ハイランダー」と「ロリタ」の去勢された交配作と表現するかもしれない映画。
back_translation: A movie that some unforgiving people might describe as a castrated hybrid of "Highlander" and "Lolita."

text: seagal , who looks more like danny aiello these days , mumbles his way through the movie .
translation: 最近ダニー・アイエロに似てきたスティーブン・セガールは、映画をぼそぼそと話しながら進めていく。
back_translation: Recently, Steven Seagal, who has started to resemble Danny Aiello, progresses through the movie speaking in a low voice.

text: a full experience , a love story and a murder mystery that expands into a meditation on the deep deceptions of innocence .
translation: 完全な体験、愛の物語、そして無邪気さの深い欺瞞についての瞑想に広がる殺人ミステリー。
back_translation: A murder mystery that unfolds into a meditation on a complete experience, a love story, and the deep deception of innocence.

text: how do you make a movie with depth about a man who lacked any ?
translation: 深みのある映画を作るには、深みのない男についてどのように描けばよいですか？
back_translation: How should I portray a shallow man in order to create a deep movie?

text: fudges fact and fancy with such confidence that we feel as if we 're seeing something purer than the real thing .
translation: 現実よりも純粋なものを見ているように感じるほどの自信を持って、事実や幻想を曲げている。
back_translation: With a confidence that makes it feel like I'm seeing something purer than reality, I bend facts and fantasies.

text: the cast is top-notch and i predict there will be plenty of female audience members drooling over michael idemoto as michael .
translation: キャストは一流で、女性観客がマイケル役のマイケル・イデモトに夢中になると予測しています。
back_translation: The cast is top-notch, and it is predicted that female audiences will be captivated by Michael, played by Michael Idemoto.

text: sandra bullock and hugh grant make a great team , but this predictable romantic comedy should get a pink slip .
translation: サンドラ・ブロックとヒュー・グラントは素晴らしいコンビですが、この予測可能なロマンティックコメディは解雇されるべきです。
back_translation: Sandra Bullock and Hugh Grant are a wonderful combination, but this predictable romantic comedy should be dismissed.

text: it 's all stitched together with energy , intelligence and verve , enhanced by a surplus of vintage archive footage .
translation: それはすべてエネルギー、知性、活力で縫い合わされており、豊富なビンテージアーカイブ映像によって強化されています。
back_translation: It is all stitched together with energy, intelligence, and vitality, enhanced by a wealth of vintage archival footage.

text: so muddled , repetitive and ragged that it says far less about the horrifying historical reality than about the filmmaker 's characteristic style .
translation: 非常に混乱しており、繰り返しが多く、切れ切れなため、恐ろしい歴史的現実についてはほとんど語らず、むしろ映像作品の制作者の特徴的なスタイルについて語っている。
back_translation: It is very confusing, repetitive, and fragmented, and it hardly discusses the terrible historical reality; instead, it talks about the distinctive style of the filmmakers.

text: a faster paced family flick .
translation: よりテンポの速いファミリーフリック。
back_translation: A faster-paced family flick.

text: `` analyze that '' is one of those crass , contrived sequels that not only fails on its own , but makes you second-guess your affection for the original .
translation: 「アナライズ・ゼット」は、単独では失敗するだけでなく、オリジナルへの愛情さえも疑わせるような下品で人工的な続編の一つです。
back_translation: "Analyze Z" is one of those vulgar and artificial sequels that not only fails on its own but also makes you doubt the affection for the original.

text: fairy-tale formula , serves as a paper skeleton for some very good acting , dialogue , comedy , direction and especially charm .
translation: おとぎ話のフォーミュラは、非常に良い演技、対話、コメディ、演出、そして特に魅力のための紙の骨組みとして機能します。
back_translation: The formula of fairy tales serves as a paper framework for very good acting, dialogue, comedy, direction, and especially for charm.

text: the quirky drama touches the heart and the funnybone thanks to the energetic and always surprising performance by rachel griffiths .
translation: 風変わりなドラマは、レイチェル・グリフィスのエネルギッシュで常に驚きを与えるパフォーマンスのおかげで、心に響き、笑いを誘います。
back_translation: The quirky drama resonates and evokes laughter thanks to Rachel Griffiths' energetic and always surprising performance.

text: i 'm sure the filmmakers found this a remarkable and novel concept , but anybody who has ever seen an independent film can report that it is instead a cheap cliché .
translation: 映画製作者たちはこれを素晴らしく新しい概念だと感じたに違いありませんが、独立系映画を見たことがある人なら誰でも、それが安っぽいクリシェに過ぎないと報告できるでしょう。
back_translation: Filmmakers must have felt this was a wonderfully new concept, but anyone who has seen independent films can report that it is nothing more than a cheap cliché.

text: in its understanding , often funny way , it tells a story whose restatement is validated by the changing composition of the nation .
translation: その理解において、しばしば面白い方法で、国の変化する構成によって裏付けられた物語を語ります。
back_translation: In that understanding, it often tells stories backed by the changing composition of the country in interesting ways.

text: let 's issue a moratorium , effective immediately , on treacly films about inspirational prep-school professors and the children they so heartwarmingly motivate .
translation: 心温まるように子供たちを動機づける準備学校の教授についての感動的な映画に対して、即時発効の一時停止を発令しましょう。
back_translation: Let's issue an immediate suspension regarding an inspiring movie about a preparatory school professor who motivates children in a heartwarming way.

text: tiresomely derivative and hammily acted .
translation: 退屈でありきたりで、演技も演技じみている。
back_translation: Boring and cliched, and the acting feels very much like acting.

text: i walked away from this new version of e.t. just as i hoped i would -- with moist eyes .
translation: 私はこの新しいバージョンのE.T.から、期待通りに歩いて離れました - 涙を浮かべながら。
back_translation: I walked away from this new version of E.T. as expected - with tears in my eyes.

text: what should have been a cutting hollywood satire is instead about as fresh as last week 's issue of variety .
translation: 切り込んだハリウッドの風刺であるべき作品が、逆に先週のバラエティ誌の号と同じくらい新鮮さがない。
back_translation: The work, which should be a cutting satire of Hollywood, ironically lacks as much freshness as last week's issue of a variety magazine.

text: the film does a solid job of slowly , steadily building up to the climactic burst of violence .
translation: 映画は、徐々に着実にクライマックスの暴力の爆発へと盛り上げる良い仕事をしています。
back_translation: The movie does a good job of gradually building up to the explosive climax of violence.

text: the heart of the film is a touching reflection on aging , suffering and the prospect of death .
translation: この映画の中心は、老い、苦しみ、そして死の可能性についての感動的な反映です。
back_translation: The heart of this film is an emotional reflection on aging, suffering, and the possibility of death.

text: the notion of deleting emotion from people , even in an advanced prozac nation , is so insanely dysfunctional that the rampantly designed equilibrium becomes a concept doofus .
translation: 人々から感情を削除するという考えは、進んだプロザック国家においても非常に非機能的であり、 rampantに設計された均衡が概念としてばかげたものになります。
back_translation: The idea of removing emotions from people is extremely dysfunctional even in an advanced Prozac nation, and the rampant design of balance becomes absurd as a concept.

text: puts to rest any thought that the german film industry can not make a delightful comedy centering on food .
translation: ドイツの映画産業が食べ物を中心にした楽しいコメディを作れないという考えを払拭します。
back_translation: It dispels the idea that the German film industry cannot create enjoyable comedies centered around food.

text: with the dog days of august upon us , think of this dog of a movie as the cinematic equivalent of high humidity .
translation: 8月の厳しい暑さの中で、この映画を高い湿度の映画的な同等物として考えてみてください。
back_translation: In the intense heat of August, consider this film as a cinematic equivalent of high humidity.

text: no amount of arty theorizing -- the special effects are ` german-expressionist , ' according to the press notes -- can render it anything but laughable .
translation: どんなに芸術的な理論があっても — 特殊効果は「ドイツ表現主義的」とプレスノートには書かれているが — それを笑えるもの以外にすることはできない。
back_translation: No matter how artistic the theory is—though the press notes say the special effects are "German expressionist"—it can only be made into something laughable.

text: a well-executed spy-thriller .
translation: うまく作られたスパイ・スリラー。
back_translation: A well-crafted spy thriller.

text: lisa rinzler 's cinematography may be lovely , but love liza 's tale itself virtually collapses into an inhalant blackout , maintaining consciousness just long enough to achieve callow pretension .
translation: リサ・リンズラーの cinematography は素晴らしいかもしれませんが、「ラブ・ライザ」の物語自体はほぼ吸入剤の失神に崩れ込み、子供じみた偽善を達成するのに十分な意識を維持するだけです。
back_translation: Lisa Rinzler's cinematography may be wonderful, but the story of "Love Liza" nearly collapses into an inhalant-induced stupor, barely maintaining enough awareness to achieve its childish hypocrisy.

text: the trailer is a riot .
translation: トレーラーは大盛り上がりです。
back_translation: The trailer is very exciting.

text: this cloying , voices-from-the-other-side story is hell .
translation: この甘ったるい、あちら側からの声の物語は地獄だ。
back_translation: This sweet, sugary story of the voice from that side is hell.

text: alas , getting there is not even half the interest .
translation: ああ、そこに行くこと自体は、興味の半分にも満たない。
back_translation: Ah, just going there doesn't even meet half of my interest.

text: a chilly , brooding but quietly resonant psychological study of domestic tension and unhappiness .
translation: 寒く、陰鬱でありながら静かに響く心理的な家庭の緊張と不幸の研究です。
back_translation: It is a study of the cold, gloomy yet quietly resonant psychological tension and unhappiness within a household.

text: the result is somewhat satisfying -- it still comes from spielberg , who has never made anything that was n't at least watchable .
translation: 結果にはいくらか満足しています -- それはまだスピルバーグから出ており、彼は少なくとも観るに耐えないものは作ったことがありません。
back_translation: I am somewhat satisfied with the results -- it still comes from Spielberg, and he has never made anything that isn't at least watchable.

text: i 'll go out on a limb .
translation: 私はリスクを冒すつもりです。
back_translation: I am willing to take risks.

text: deflated ending aside , there 's much to recommend the film .
translation: 萎んだ結末は別として、この映画には多くの推薦すべき点があります。
back_translation: Apart from the withered conclusion, there are many commendable points in this movie.

text: sheridan is painfully bad , a fourth-rate jim carrey who does n't understand the difference between dumb fun and just plain dumb .
translation: シェリダンは痛々しいほどにひどく、四流のジム・キャリーで、馬鹿な楽しさと単に馬鹿なことの違いがわからない。
back_translation: Sheridan is painfully bad, a fourth-rate Jim Carrey, unable to tell the difference between foolish fun and just being foolish.

text: as improbable as this premise may seem , abbass 's understated , shining performance offers us the sense that on some elemental level , lilia deeply wants to break free of her old life .
translation: この前提がいかにあり得ないように見えようとも、アッバスの控えめで輝く演技は、リリアが古い生活から解放されたいと深く望んでいるという、根本的なレベルでの感覚を私たちに提供している。
back_translation: No matter how unlikely this premise may seem, Abbas's understated and radiant performance provides us with a fundamental sense that Lilia deeply desires to be freed from her old life.

text: maybe leblanc thought , `` hey , the movie about the baseball-playing monkey was worse . ''
translation: おそらくルブランは考えたのだろう、「ああ、野球をする猿の映画の方がひどかった」と。
back_translation: LeBlanc probably thought, "Ah, the movie with the monkeys playing baseball was worse."

text: gives an intriguing twist to the french coming-of-age genre .
translation: フランスの成長物語ジャンルに興味深いひねりを加えています。
back_translation: It adds an interesting twist to the French coming-of-age genre.

text: he nonetheless appreciates the art and reveals a music scene that transcends culture and race .
translation: 彼はそれでもアートを評価し、文化や人種を超えた音楽シーンを明らかにします。
back_translation: He still appreciates art and reveals a music scene that transcends culture and race.

text: escapes the precious trappings of most romantic comedies , infusing into the story very real , complicated emotions .
translation: ほとんどのロマンティックコメディの貴重な装飾から脱却し、物語に非常に現実的で複雑な感情を注ぎ込みます。
back_translation: It breaks away from the precious embellishments of most romantic comedies and imbues the story with very realistic and complex emotions.

text: full of bland hotels , highways , parking lots , with some glimpses of nature and family warmth , time out is a discreet moan of despair about entrapment in the maze of modern life .
translation: 平凡なホテル、高速道路、駐車場で満ちており、自然や家族の温かさの一 glimpses もある中で、「タイムアウト」は現代生活の迷路に捕らわれたことへの控えめな絶望の呻きです。
back_translation: An ordinary hotel, filled with highways and parking lots, with only glimpses of nature and the warmth of family, "Timeout" is a subdued moan of despair at being trapped in the maze of modern life.

text: a naturally funny film , home movie makes you crave chris smith 's next movie .
translation: 自然に面白い映画であるホームムービーは、クリス・スミスの次の映画が見たくなる。
back_translation: The naturally interesting film "Home Movie" makes you want to see Chris Smith's next movie.

text: director hoffman , his writer and kline 's agent should serve detention
translation: ホフマン監督、彼の作家、そしてクラインのエージェントは停留処分にされるべきです。
back_translation: Director Hoffman, his writer, and Klein's agent should be suspended.

text: the quirky and recessive charms of co-stars martin donovan and mary-louise parker help overcome the problematic script .
translation: 共演者のマーティン・ドノヴァンとメアリー＝ルイーズ・パーカーの風変わりで引っ込み思案な魅力が、問題のある脚本を乗り越える手助けをしています。
back_translation: The quirky and reserved charm of co-stars Martin Donovan and Mary-Louise Parker helps to overcome the problematic script.

text: it 's a mindless action flick with a twist -- far better suited to video-viewing than the multiplex .
translation: それはひねりのある無心のアクション映画であり、 multiplex よりも動画視聴にずっと適しています。
back_translation: It is a twisty, mindless action movie that is much more suitable for video viewing than for a multiplex.

text: as an entertainment destination for the general public , kung pow sets a new benchmark for lameness .
translation: 一般の人々のためのエンターテイメントの目的地として、カンフー・パウはダサさの新しいベンチマークを設定しています。
back_translation: As a destination for entertainment for the general public, Kung Fu Paw is setting a new benchmark for tackiness.

text: graced with the kind of social texture and realism that would be foreign in american teen comedies .
translation: アメリカのティーンコメディでは異質な、社会的な質感とリアリズムに恵まれている。
back_translation: It is blessed with a social texture and realism that is peculiar to American teen comedies.

text: -lrb- allen -rrb- manages to breathe life into this somewhat tired premise .
translation: アレンは、このやや疲れた前提に命を吹き込むことに成功している。
back_translation: Allen has succeeded in breathing life into this somewhat tired premise.

text: the truth about charlie is that it 's a brazenly misguided project .
translation: チャーリーについての真実は、それが大胆に誤ったプロジェクトであるということです。
back_translation: The truth about Charlie is that it is a boldly misguided project.

text: with little visible talent and no energy , colin hanks is in bad need of major acting lessons and maybe a little coffee .
translation: 目立った才能もエネルギーもほとんどないコリン・ハンクスは、主要な演技レッスンと少しのコーヒーが必要です。
back_translation: Colin Hanks, who has little notable talent or energy, needs major acting lessons and a little coffee.

text: this movie feel more like a non-stop cry for attention , than an attempt at any kind of satisfying entertainment .
translation: この映画は、満足のいく娯楽を目指す試みというよりは、むしろ止まらない注目の叫びのように感じる。
back_translation: This movie feels more like an incessant cry for attention rather than an attempt to achieve satisfying entertainment.

text: exhilarating but blatantly biased .
translation: 刺激的だが明らかに偏っている。
back_translation: It's stimulating but clearly biased.

text: a mostly believable , refreshingly low-key and quietly inspirational little sports drama .
translation: 大部分が信じられる、さわやかに控えめで静かに感動的な小さなスポーツドラマ。
back_translation: A small sports drama that is largely believable, refreshingly modest, and quietly moving.

text: rarely , a movie is more than a movie .
translation: 稀に、映画は単なる映画以上のものになることがあります。
back_translation: Occasionally, a movie can become something more than just a movie.

text: how this one escaped the lifetime network i 'll never know .
translation: この作品がライフタイムネットワークから逃れた理由は、私にはわかりません。
back_translation: I don’t know the reason why this work escaped from Lifetime Network.

text: to some eyes this will seem like a recycling of clichés , an assassin 's greatest hits .
translation: ある人には、これはクリシェの再利用のように思えるでしょう、暗殺者のヒット曲集のように。
back_translation: For some, this may seem like a reuse of clichés, like a greatest hits collection of assassins.

text: less funny than it should be and less funny than it thinks it is .
translation: 思っているほど面白くなく、実際よりも面白くない。
back_translation: It's not as interesting as I thought, and it's actually less interesting.

text: an achingly enthralling premise , the film is hindered by uneven dialogue and plot lapses .
translation: 心を引き裂くような魅力的な前提があるが、映画は不均一な対話とプロットの欠落によって妨げられている。
back_translation: There is a heart-wrenching and captivating premise, but the film is hindered by uneven dialogue and a lack of plot.

text: the innate theatrics that provide its thrills and extreme emotions lose their luster when flattened onscreen .
translation: 本来の演出がもたらすスリルや極端な感情は、スクリーン上で平坦にされるとその輝きを失います。
back_translation: The thrill and extreme emotions brought about by the original direction lose their sparkle when flattened on the screen.

text: a gentle and engrossing character study .
translation: 穏やかで引き込まれるキャラクターの研究。
back_translation: Research on calm and engaging characters.

text: sluggish , tonally uneven .
translation: 鈍い、音調が不均一な。
back_translation: Dull, with an uneven tone.

text: ultimately , the film amounts to being lectured to by tech-geeks , if you 're up for that sort of thing .
translation: 最終的に、この映画は技術オタクから講義を受けることになるので、その手のことを受け入れられるならどうぞ。
back_translation: Ultimately, this movie will end up being lectured by a tech enthusiast, so feel free to accept that if you can.

text: the film is undone by anachronistic quick edits and occasional jarring glimpses of a modern theater audience watching the events unfold .
translation: 映画は、時代錯誤の速い編集や、出来事が展開するのを見守る現代の劇場の観客の時折不快な視線によって台無しにされている。
back_translation: The movie is spoiled by the fast editing of anachronistic elements and the occasionally uncomfortable gaze of modern theater audiences watching events unfold.

text: what could have easily become a cold , calculated exercise in postmodern pastiche winds up a powerful and deeply moving example of melodramatic moviemaking .
translation: 容易に冷淡で計算されたポストモダンのパスティーシュに陥る可能性があったものが、力強く深く感動的なメロドラマ映画の例となっています。
back_translation: What could easily have fallen into a cold and calculated postmodern pastiche has instead become an example of a powerful and deeply moving melodrama film.

text: russell lacks the visual panache , the comic touch , and perhaps the budget of sommers 's title-bout features .
translation: ラッセルは、サマーズのタイトルマッチの特徴にある視覚的な華やかさや、コメディのタッチ、そしておそらく予算が欠けている。
back_translation: Russell lacks the visual flair, comedic touches, and perhaps the budget that are characteristic of Summer's title matches.

text: some remarkable achival film about how shanghai -lrb- of all places -rrb- served jews who escaped the holocaust .
translation: 上海がホロコーストから逃れたユダヤ人をどのように受け入れたかについての素晴らしいアーカイブ映画。
back_translation: A wonderful archival film about how Shanghai welcomed Jews who escaped the Holocaust.

text: `` interview '' loses its overall sense of mystery and becomes a tv episode rather than a documentary that you actually buy into .
translation: 「インタビュー」は全体の神秘感を失い、実際に信じ込むことができるドキュメンタリーではなく、テレビ番組のエピソードになってしまいます。
back_translation: "The interview loses its overall sense of mystery and becomes more like an episode of a television show rather than a documentary that one can truly believe in."

text: an old-fashioned but emotionally stirring adventure tale of the kind they rarely make anymore .
translation: 今ではほとんど作られない、古風でありながら感情を揺さぶる冒険物語。
back_translation: An old-fashioned yet emotionally stirring adventure story that is hardly made anymore.

text: intelligent and moving .
translation: 知的で感動的な。
back_translation: Intellectual and moving.

text: a bodice-ripper for intellectuals .
translation: 知識人のためのボディスリッパー。
back_translation: Body slipper for intellectuals.

text: it 's fun , wispy , wise and surprisingly inoffensive for a film about a teen in love with his stepmom .
translation: それは楽しく、ふわふわとしていて、賢く、そして義母に恋をしたティーンエイジャーの映画にしては驚くほど無害です。
back_translation: It's surprisingly harmless for a teenage movie about fun, fluffiness, intelligence, and falling in love with a stepmother.

text: the narrator and the other characters try to convince us that acting transfigures esther , but she 's never seen speaking on stage ; one feels cheated , and esther seems to remain an unchanged dullard .
translation: ナレーターや他のキャラクターは、演技がエスターを変貌させると私たちを納得させようとしますが、彼女が舞台で話しているのを見ることはありません。そうすると、騙されたように感じ、エスターは変わらない鈍な存在のままのようです。
back_translation: The narrator and other characters try to convince us that acting transforms Esther, but we never see her speaking on stage. This makes us feel deceived, as it seems that Esther remains a dull existence without change.

text: time out is existential drama without any of the pretension associated with the term .
translation: タイムアウトは、その用語に伴ういかなる気取りもなく、存在的なドラマです。
back_translation: Timeout is an existential drama, without any pretentiousness associated with the term.

text: guilty of the worst sin of attributable to a movie like this : it 's not scary in the slightest .
translation: このような映画に帰される最悪の罪に問われているのは、全く怖くないということです。
back_translation: The worst crime that can be attributed to a movie like this is that it is not scary at all.

text: peppering this urban study with references to norwegian folktales , villeneuve creates in maelstrom a world where the bizarre is credible and the real turns magical .
translation: この都市研究にノルウェーの民話への言及を散りばめることによって、ヴィルヌーブは『メイルストローム』において、奇妙なものが信じられ、現実が魔法のようになる世界を創造します。
back_translation: By interspersing references to Norwegian folklore in this urban study, Villeneuve creates a world in "Maelstrom" where the strange is believed and reality becomes magical.

text: elling builds gradually until you feel fully embraced by this gentle comedy .
translation: この優しいコメディに十分に包まれていると感じるまで、徐々に盛り上がります。
back_translation: It gradually builds up until you feel completely enveloped in this gentle comedy.

text: kwan is a master of shadow , quietude , and room noise , and lan yu is a disarmingly lived-in movie .
translation: クワンは影、静けさ、そして部屋の雑音の達人であり、ラン・ユーはどこか親しみやすい映画です。
back_translation: Kwan is a master of shadows, silence, and the noise of the room, while Run You is a somehow relatable film.

text: maryam is a small film , but it offers large rewards .
translation: マリアムは小さな映画ですが、大きな報酬を提供します。
back_translation: Mariam is a small film, but it offers big rewards.

text: ya-yas everywhere will forgive the flaws and love the film .
translation: どこにでもいるヤーヤーズは、欠点を許し、その映画を愛するでしょう。
back_translation: The average Yayaz will forgive flaws and love that movie.

text: a stylistic romp that 's always fun to watch .
translation: 常に見るのが楽しいスタイリッシュな遊び。
back_translation: A stylish game that is always fun to watch.

text: you can tell almost immediately that welcome to collinwood is n't going to jell .
translation: 「コリンウッドへようこそ」がうまくいかないことはほぼすぐにわかります。
back_translation: It's almost immediately obvious that "Welcome to Collinwood" is not going well.

text: a shimmeringly lovely coming-of-age portrait , shot in artful , watery tones of blue , green and brown .
translation: 青、緑、茶色の芸術的で水のようなトーンで撮影された、きらりと美しい成長の肖像。
back_translation: A sparkling and beautiful portrait of growth captured in artistic, water-like tones of blue, green, and brown.

text: its impressive images of crematorium chimney fires and stacks of dead bodies are undermined by the movie 's presentation , which is way too stagy .
translation: 火葬場の煙突の炎や死体の山の印象的なイメージは、映画のプレゼンテーションによって台無しにされています。それはあまりにも舞台的です。
back_translation: The impressive images of the flames from the crematorium chimney and the pile of corpses are ruined by the presentation of the film. It's just too theatrical.

text: there 's a heavy stench of ` been there , done that ' hanging over the film .
translation: 映画には「やったことがある」という重い悪臭が漂っています。
back_translation: The movie carries a heavy stench of "having done it before."

text: an affectionately goofy satire that 's unafraid to throw elbows when necessary ...
translation: 必要なときには遠慮せずに肘をぶつける、愛情を込めたおかしみのある風刺。
back_translation: Don't hesitate to bump elbows when necessary, a humorous satire filled with affection.

text: but never mind all that ; the boobs are fantasti
translation: まあそれは置いておいて；胸は素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Well, putting that aside; the chest is wonderful.

text: at every opportunity to do something clever , the film goes right over the edge and kills every sense of believability ... all you have left is a no-surprise series of explosions and violence while banderas looks like he 's not trying to laugh at how bad it
translation: あらゆる機会に巧妙なことをしようとする映画は、すぐに限界を超えてしまい、信じられない感覚をすべて殺してしまう... 残されるのは驚きのない一連の爆発と暴力だけで、バンデラスはその悪さに笑ってはいないように見える。
back_translation: Movies that try to do clever things at every opportunity quickly exceed their limits and kill all sense of disbelief... What remains is just a series of explosions and violence devoid of surprise, and Banderas doesn't seem to be laughing at that wickedness.

text: stress ` dumb . '
translation: ストレス「ダム」
back_translation: Stress "Dam"

text: katz 's documentary does n't have much panache , but with material this rich it does n't need it .
translation: カッツのドキュメンタリーはあまり派手さはないが、これほど豊かな素材があれば必要ない。
back_translation: Katz's documentary may not be flashy, but it doesn't need to be with such rich material.

text: deadly dull , pointless meditation on losers in a gone-to-seed hotel .
translation: 死に至るほど退屈で、廃れたホテルにいる負け犬についての無意味な瞑想。
back_translation: A meaningless meditation on a loser in a decayed hotel, unbearably boring to the point of death.

text: huppert and girardot give performances of exceptional honesty .
translation: ユペールとジラールの演技は、卓越した誠実さを持っています。
back_translation: The performances of Yuper and Girard have an exceptional sincerity.

text: where 's the movie here ?
translation: 映画はどこにありますか？
back_translation: Where is the movie?

text: an unsophisticated sci-fi drama that takes itself all too seriously .
translation: あまりにも深刻に受け止める未熟なSFドラマ。
back_translation: An immature sci-fi drama taken too seriously.

text: whether this is art imitating life or life imitating art , it 's an unhappy situation all around .
translation: これはアートが人生を模倣しているのか、それとも人生がアートを模倣しているのか、いずれにせよすべてにおいて不幸な状況です。
back_translation: Is art imitating life, or is life imitating art? Either way, it's an unfortunate situation all around.

text: it does n't take a rocket scientist to figure out that this is a mormon family movie , and a sappy , preachy one at that .
translation: これはモルモンの家族映画であり、さらに感傷的で説教臭いものであることを理解するのにロケット科学者である必要はありません。
back_translation: This is a Mormon family movie, and you don't need to be a rocket scientist to understand that it's more sentimental and preachy.

text: this makes minority report necessary viewing for sci-fi fans , as the film has some of the best special effects ever .
translation: これは少数派報告をSFファンにとって必要な視聴作品にしています。なぜなら、この映画には今までで最高の特撮がいくつかあるからです。
back_translation: This makes the Minority Report a necessary viewing for sci-fi fans, because this movie features some of the best special effects ever.

text: if you really want to understand what this story is really all about , you 're far better served by the source material .
translation: この物語が本当に何についてなのかを理解したいのなら、原資料を読む方がはるかに価値があります。
back_translation: If you really want to understand what this story is about, it's far more valuable to read the original material.

text: swimming is above all about a young woman 's face , and by casting an actress whose face projects that woman 's doubts and yearnings , it succeeds .
translation: 水泳は何よりも若い女性の顔についてであり、その女性の疑念や渇望を表現する顔の女優をキャスティングすることによって、成功を収めています。
back_translation: Swimming is primarily about the faces of young women, and it achieves success by casting actresses whose faces express the doubts and desires of those women.

text: mattei 's underdeveloped effort here is nothing but a convenient conveyor belt of brooding personalities that parade about as if they were coming back from stock character camp -- a drowsy drama infatuated by its own pretentious self-examination .
translation: マッテイの未発達な努力は、自己の気取った自己検証に夢中になった眠そうなドラマであり、まるでストックキャラクターキャンプから戻ってきたかのように行進する陰気な人格の便利なコンベヤーベルトに過ぎない。
back_translation: Mattei's underdeveloped efforts are a sleepy drama caught up in pretentious self-examination, merely a convenient conveyor belt for a gloomy personality that seems to march back from stock character camp.

text: ` the war of the roses , ' trailer-trash style .
translation: 『バラ戦争』、トレーラートラッシュスタイル。
back_translation: "War of the Roses," trailer trash style.

text: the powerpuff girls arrive on the big screen with their super-powers , their super-simple animation and their super-dooper-adorability intact .
translation: パワーパフガールズは、彼女たちのスーパーパワー、超シンプルなアニメーション、そしてスーパードゥーパーかわいさをそのままに、大画面に登場します。
back_translation: The Powerpuff Girls are making their big screen debut with their superpowers, ultra-simple animation, and super-duper cuteness intact.

text: originality is sorely lacking .
translation: 独創性が著しく欠けています。
back_translation: It significantly lacks originality.

text: it trusts the story it sets out to tell .
translation: それは語ろうとする物語を信じています。
back_translation: I believe in the story that wants to be told.

text: the film has a kind of hard , cold effect .
translation: その映画は、硬く冷たい効果を持っています。
back_translation: The movie has a hard, cold effect.

text: strip it of all its excess debris , and you 'd have a 90-minute , four-star movie .
translation: 余分なゴミをすべて取り除けば、90分の4つ星映画になるでしょう。
back_translation: If you remove all the unnecessary junk, it will become a four-star movie in 90 minutes.

text: while there 's likely very little crossover appeal to those without much interest in the elizabethans -lrb- as well as rank frustration from those in the know about rubbo 's dumbed-down tactics -rrb- , much ado about something is an amicable endeavor .
translation: エリザベス朝にあまり興味のない人々にはほとんどクロスオーバーの魅力がないと思われる一方で -lrb- ランキングを知っている人たちからのルボの単純化された戦術への苛立ちもある -rrb- 、『何かについての大騒ぎ』は友好的な試みです。
back_translation: While it may seem that there is little crossover appeal for those who are not particularly interested in the Elizabethan era - (there is also frustration from those familiar with the rankings towards the simplified tactics of Rubo) - "A Big Fuss About Something" is a friendly attempt.

text: did we really need a remake of `` charade ? ''
translation: 「シャレード」のリメイクは本当に必要だったのでしょうか？
back_translation: Was a remake of "Charade" really necessary?

text: stevens has a flair for dialogue comedy , the film operates nicely off the element of surprise , and the large cast is solid .
translation: スティーブンスは対話コメディの才能があり、この映画はサプライズの要素をうまく活用しており、大人数のキャストも魅力的です。
back_translation: Stevens has a talent for dialogue comedy, and this film cleverly utilizes elements of surprise, with a large cast that is also charming.

text: the mystery of enigma is how a rich historical subject , combined with so much first-rate talent ... could have yielded such a flat , plodding picture .
translation: エニグマの謎は、豊かな歴史的テーマとこれほど多くの一流の才能が結びついていながら、なぜこんなにも平坦で退屈な作品になったのかということです。
back_translation: The mystery of the Enigma is why, despite being tied to such a rich historical theme and so many top talents, it has become such a flat and boring work.

text: all leather pants & augmented boobs , hawn is hilarious as she tries to resuscitate the fun-loving libertine lost somewhere inside the conservative , handbag-clutching sarandon .
translation: 全てのレザーパンツと増強された胸部、ハーンは保守的でハンドバッグを抱えたサランドンの中に失われた楽しみを愛する放蕩者を蘇生させようとする姿が非常に面白い。
back_translation: With all the leather pants and augmented chest, Haan's attempt to revive the lost enjoyment of a libertine within Sarandon, who is conservative and clutching a handbag, is very entertaining.

text: throughout , mr. audiard 's direction is fluid and quick .
translation: 通して、オーディアール監督の演出は流れるようで迅速です。
back_translation: Overall, Director Audior's direction is fluid and swift.

text: the observations of this social\/economic\/urban environment are canny and spiced with irony .
translation: この社会的・経済的・都市的環境の観察は巧妙であり、皮肉が交じっています。
back_translation: The observation of this social, economic, and urban environment is clever and tinged with irony.

text: while insomnia is in many ways a conventional , even predictable remake , nolan 's penetrating undercurrent of cerebral and cinemantic flair lends -lrb- it -rrb- stimulating depth .
translation: 不眠症は多くの面で従来型で、むしろ予測可能なリメイクではあるが、ノーランの鋭い知的な下地と映画的な華やかさがそれに刺激的な深みを与えている。
back_translation: Insomnia is traditionally many ways conventional and rather a predictable remake, but Nolan's sharp intellectual foundation and cinematic flair give it an exciting depth.

text: undoubtedly the scariest movie ever made about tattoos .
translation: 間違いなくタトゥーに関する最も怖い映画です。
back_translation: Without a doubt, it's the scariest movie about tattoos.

text: ... in the pile of useless actioners from mtv schmucks who do n't know how to tell a story for more than four minutes .
translation: ... 物語を4分以上語ることができないMTVの無能たちからの役に立たないアクション映画の山の中で。
back_translation: ...among a pile of useless action movies from the incompetent MTV people who can't narrate a story for more than four minutes.

text: watching a brian depalma movie is like watching an alfred hitchcock movie after drinking twelve beers .
translation: ブライアン・デ・パルマの映画を観るのは、ビールを12本飲んだ後にアルフレッド・ヒッチコックの映画を見るようなものだ。
back_translation: Watching a Brian De Palma movie is like watching an Alfred Hitchcock film after drinking 12 beers.

text: ian holm conquers france as an earthy napoleon
translation: イアン・ホームが土臭いナポレオンとしてフランスを征服する
back_translation: Ian Holm conquers France as a down-to-earth Napoleon.

text: time out is as serious as a pink slip .
translation: タイムアウトは解雇通知と同じくらい深刻です。
back_translation: A timeout is just as serious as a termination notice.

text: tykwer 's surface flash is n't just a poor fit with kieslowski 's lyrical pessimism ; it completely contradicts everything kieslowski 's work aspired to , including the condition of art .
translation: ティクワの「サーフェス・フラッシュ」は、キェスロフスキの抒情的な悲観主義とは単に合わないだけでなく、キェスロフスキの作品が目指したすべて、芸術の状態を含むものと完全に矛盾しています。
back_translation: Tykwer's "Surface Flash" not only simply does not align with Kieslowski's lyrical pessimism, but it also completely contradicts everything that Kieslowski's works aimed for, including the state of art.

text: -lrb- creates -rrb- the worst kind of mythologizing , the kind that sacrifices real heroism and abject suffering for melodrama .
translation: 最悪の神話化を生み出し、リアルな英雄主義や惨めな苦しみをメロドラマのために犠牲にする種類のもの。
back_translation: A type that creates the worst kind of mythologizing, sacrificing real heroism and miserable suffering for the sake of melodrama.

text: director tom shadyac and star kevin costner glumly mishandle the story 's promising premise of a physician who needs to heal himself .
translation: 監督のトム・シャダイアックと主演のケビン・コスナーは、自己を癒す必要がある医師の有望な前提を暗く誤って扱っています。
back_translation: Director Tom Shadyac and star Kevin Costner mishandle the promising premise of a doctor in need of self-healing in a darkly incorrect way.

text: a tremendous piece of work .
translation: 素晴らしい作品です。
back_translation: It is a wonderful work.

text: as an actor 's showcase , hart 's war has much to recommend it , even if the top-billed willis is not the most impressive player .
translation: 俳優のショーケースとして、『ハートの war』は多くの点で推奨できる作品ですが、トップビルドのウィリスが最も印象的なプレイヤーではないにしても。
back_translation: As an actor's showcase, "Heart of War" is a作品 that can be recommended in many ways, although the top-billed Willis is not the most impressive player.

text: a pretty funny movie , with most of the humor coming , as before , from the incongruous but chemically perfect teaming of crystal and de niro .
translation: 非常に面白い映画で、ほとんどのユーモアは、以前と同様に、クリスタルとデ・ニーロの矛盾しているが化学的に完璧なタッグから生まれています。
back_translation: It's a very interesting movie, and most of the humor, as before, comes from the contradictory yet chemically perfect duo of Crystal and De Niro.

text: there 's something poignant about an artist of 90-plus years taking the effort to share his impressions of life and loss and time and art with us .
translation: 90歳以上のアーティストが、人生や喪失、時間、芸術についての彼の印象を私たちと共有しようとする姿には、何か心に響くものがあります。
back_translation: There is something profoundly touching in the way an artist over 90 years old tries to share his impressions on life, loss, time, and art with us.

text: our culture is headed down the toilet with the ferocity of a frozen burrito after an all-night tequila bender -- and i know this because i 've seen ` jackass : the movie . '
translation: 私たちの文化は、徹夜のテキーラバンダーの後の凍ったブリトーのように激しくトイレに流れていっています -- そして私はこれを「ジャッカス：ザ・ムービー」を見たので知っています。
