back_translation: Our culture is flowing down the toilet fiercely like a frozen burrito after an all-night tequila bender -- and I know this because I've seen "Jackass: The Movie."

text: moonlight mile does n't quite go the distance but the cast is impressive and they all give life to these broken characters who are trying to make their way through this tragedy .
translation: ムーンライトマイルは完全ではないものの、キャストは印象的で、彼らはこの悲劇を乗り越えようとする壊れたキャラクターたちに命を吹き込んでいる。
back_translation: While Moonlight Mile is not perfect, the cast is impressive, and they bring life to the broken characters who are trying to overcome this tragedy.

text: american and european cinema has amassed a vast holocaust literature , but it is impossible to think of any film more challenging or depressing than the grey zone .
translation: アメリカやヨーロッパの映画は膨大なホロコースト文学を蓄積してきましたが、「グレーゾーン」よりも挑戦的または鬱屈した映画を考えるのは不可能です。
back_translation: American and European films have accumulated a vast amount of Holocaust literature, but it is impossible to think of a more challenging or oppressive film than "The Grey Zone."

text: the script is too mainstream and the psychology too textbook to intrigue .
translation: 脚本はあまりにもメインストリームで、心理学が教科書的すぎて興味を引かない。
back_translation: The script is too mainstream, and the psychology is too textbook-like to be interesting.

text: if you recognize zeus -lrb- the dog from snatch -rrb- it will make you wish you were at home watching that movie instead of in the theater watching this one .
translation: 「スナッチ」に出てくるゼウス（犬）がわかるなら、この映画を劇場で見る代わりに家でその映画を見ていたいと思うでしょう。
back_translation: If you recognize Zeus (the dog) from "Snatch," you would probably prefer to watch that movie at home instead of seeing it in theaters.

text: wilco is a phenomenal band with such an engrossing story that will capture the minds and hearts of many .
translation: ウィルコは、多くの人々の心と心をつかむような魅力的なストーリーを持つ素晴らしいバンドです。
back_translation: Wilco is a wonderful band with an engaging story that captivates the hearts and minds of many people.

text: though nijinsky 's words grow increasingly disturbed , the film maintains a beguiling serenity and poise that make it accessible for a non-narrative feature .
translation: ニジンスキーの言葉がますます不安定になっていく一方で、映画は魅惑的な静けさと優雅さを保ち、非物語的な特徴を持つ作品として誰にでもアクセスできるものにしています。
back_translation: While Nijinsky's words become increasingly unstable, the film maintains an enchanting calmness and elegance, making it accessible to anyone as a work with non-narrative characteristics.

text: parker updates the setting in an attempt to make the film relevant today , without fully understanding what it was that made the story relevant in the first place .
translation: パーカーは、物語が最初に関連性を持っていた理由を完全に理解することなく、映画を今日の時代に関連付けるために設定を更新します。
back_translation: Parker updates the setting to relate the story to today's era without fully understanding the reasons why the story was originally relevant.

text: this movie may not have the highest production values you 've ever seen , but it 's the work of an artist , one whose view of america , history and the awkwardness of human life is generous and deep .
translation: この映画は、あなたが今まで見た中で最高の制作価値を持っているわけではありませんが、アーティストの作品であり、アメリカ、歴史、そして人間の生活のぎこちなさに対する彼の見解は寛大で深いものです。
back_translation: This film may not have the highest production value of anything you have ever seen, but it is the work of an artist, and his insights into America, history, and the awkwardness of human life are generous and profound.

text: brings together some of the biggest names in japanese anime , with impressive results .
translation: 日本のアニメの大物たちを集め、素晴らしい結果をもたらす。
back_translation: Bringing together the big names of Japanese anime to achieve wonderful results.

text: woefully pretentious .
translation: 悲惨に気取った。
back_translation: I pretended to be tragic.

text: mattei so completely loses himself to the film 's circular structure to ever offer any insightful discourse on , well , love in the time of money .
translation: マッテイは映画の円環構造に完全に没頭し、金銭の時代における愛についての洞察に満ちた議論を提供することはありません。
back_translation: Mattei is completely immersed in the circular structure of the film and does not provide insightful discussions about love in the age of money.

text: -lrb- leigh -rrb- has a true talent for drawing wrenching performances from his actors -lrb- improvised over many months -rrb- and for conveying the way tiny acts of kindness make ordinary life survivable .
translation: -（レイ）-は、俳優から心を揺さぶる演技を引き出す真の才能を持っており（何ヶ月にもわたって即興で）、小さな親切の行為が普通の生活を生き延びるためにどのように影響するかを伝えることができる。
back_translation: - (Ray) has a true talent for drawing powerful performances from actors (improvising for months on end) and is able to convey how small acts of kindness can impact the survival of ordinary life.

text: director douglas mcgrath takes on nickleby with all the halfhearted zeal of an 8th grade boy delving into required reading .
translation: 監督ダグラス・マクグラスは、ニコルビーに対して、必読書に取り組む中学2年生の少年のような半端な熱意で挑んでいます。
back_translation: Director Douglas McGrath approaches Nicoleby with a half-hearted enthusiasm reminiscent of a second-year middle school boy tackling a must-read book.

text: godard uses his characters -- if that 's not too glorified a term -- as art things , mouthpieces , visual motifs , blanks .
translation: ゴダールは彼のキャラクターを、もしそれがあまりにも崇高な表現でなければ、アートのもの、口実、視覚的モチーフ、空白として使用します。
back_translation: Godard uses his characters as elements of art, pretexts, visual motifs, and blanks, as long as they are not expressions that are too lofty.

text: there 's plenty to enjoy -- in no small part thanks to lau .
translation: 楽しむことがたくさんあります - ラウのおかげで少なからず。
back_translation: There are many things to enjoy - thanks to Rauru, at least to some extent.

text: gaping plot holes sink this ` sub ' - standard thriller and drag audience enthusiasm to crush depth .
translation: 大きなプロットの穴がこの「サブ」-標準的なスリラーを沈め、観客の熱意を押しつぶす深さに引きずり下ろす。
back_translation: A large plot hole drags this "sub"-standard thriller down to a depth that crushes the audience's enthusiasm.

text: no surprises .
translation: 驚きはありません。
back_translation: There is no surprise.

text: the film is so bad it does n't improve upon the experience of staring at a blank screen .
translation: その映画はあまりにもひどく、真っ白な画面を見つめる体験すら改善されない。
back_translation: The movie was so terrible that even staring at a blank screen did not improve the experience.

text: a stylish cast and some clever scripting solutions help chicago make the transition from stage to screen with considerable appeal intact .
translation: スタイリッシュなキャストと巧妙な脚本の解決策が、シカゴがステージからスクリーンへの移行を行う際に considerable appeal を維持する手助けをしています。
back_translation: The stylish cast and clever script solutions help maintain considerable appeal as Chicago transitions from stage to screen.

text: conforms itself with creating a game of ` who 's who ' ... where the characters ' moves are often more predictable than their consequences .
translation: 「誰が誰か」のゲームを作ることで自らを適応させており、そこでキャラクターの動きはしばしばその結果よりも予測可能です。
back_translation: By creating a game of "Who is Who," I am adapting myself, and there the movement of the characters is often more predictable than the outcome.

text: an effective portrait of a life in stasis -- of the power of inertia to arrest development in a dead-end existence .
translation: 停滞した人生の効果的な肖像 — 行き止まりの存在において発展を阻む慣性の力。
back_translation: An effective portrait of a stagnant life — the force of inertia that hinders development in the presence of a dead end.

text: nights feels more like a quickie tv special than a feature film ... it 's not even a tv special you 'd bother watching past the second commercial break .
translation: ナイツは、特別番組というよりも短いテレビスペシャルのように感じられます… セカンドコマーシャルブレイクを越えて観る価値のあるテレビスペシャルですらありません。
back_translation: Knights feel more like a short TV special than a special program... It's not even a TV special worth watching beyond the second commercial break.

text: blue crush is as predictable as the tides .
translation: ブルー・クラッシュは潮の流れと同じくらい予測可能です。
back_translation: Blue Crush is as predictable as the tides.

text: we 're left with a story that tries to grab us , only to keep letting go at all the wrong moments .
translation: 私たちは、私たちを引きつけようとする物語を残されていますが、すべての間違った瞬間に手を放し続けます。
back_translation: We are left with stories that try to attract us, but we continue to let go at every wrong moment.

text: the subtitled costume drama is set in a remote african empire before cell phones , guns , and the internal combustion engine , but the politics that thump through it are as timely as tomorrow .
translation: その字幕付きのコスチュームドラマは、携帯電話、銃、内燃機関が存在しない遠くのアフリカ帝国を舞台にしているが、その中に流れる政治は明日にも通じるほどタイムリーである。
back_translation: The costume drama with subtitles is set in a distant African empire where cell phones, guns, and internal combustion engines do not exist, yet the politics flowing within it are timely enough to resonate with tomorrow.

text: with minimal imagination , you could restage the whole thing in your bathtub .
translation: 最小限の想像力があれば、バスタブの中で全てを再現することができます。
back_translation: With a minimal amount of imagination, you can recreate everything in a bathtub.

text: just consider what new best friend does not have , beginning with the minor omission of a screenplay .
translation: 新しい親友が持っていないものを考えてください。それは、脚本という小さな欠落から始まります。
back_translation: Think of something that your new best friend doesn't have. It starts with a small absence called a script.

text: instead of contriving a climactic hero 's death for the beloved-major - character-who-shall - remain-nameless , why not invite some genuine spontaneity into the film by having the evil aliens ' laser guns actually hit something for once ?
translation: beloved-major-character-who-shall-remain-namelessのために決定的な英雄の死を考え出すのではなく、悪事を働くエイリアンのレーザーガンが実際に何かを打つことで、映画に本物の自発性を招いてみてはどうでしょうか？
back_translation: Instead of coming up with a definitive heroic death for the beloved major character who shall remain nameless, how about introducing genuine spontaneity to the film by having the alien's laser gun actually hit something?

text: brown sugar signals director rick famuyiwa 's emergence as an articulate , grown-up voice in african-american cinema .
translation: ブラウンシュガーは、監督リック・ファマイワがアフリカ系アメリカ人映画において、明確で成熟した声としての台頭を示しています。
back_translation: Brown Sugar shows the emergence of a clear and mature voice in African American cinema, directed by Rick Famuyiwa.

text: their computer-animated faces are very expressive .
translation: 彼らのコンピュータアニメーションの顔は非常に表現豊かです。
back_translation: Their computer-animated faces are very expressive.

text: not only is it hokey , manipulative and as bland as wonder bread dipped in milk , but it also does the absolute last thing we need hollywood doing to us : it preaches .
translation: それは単に陳腐で操作的で、牛乳に浸したワンダーブレッドのように平淡であるだけでなく、ハリウッドに私たちにしてほしくない絶対に最後のことをしているのです：それは説教をしています。
back_translation: It is not only simply clichéd and manipulative, dull like Wonder Bread soaked in milk, but it is doing the one thing Hollywood absolutely does not want us to do: it is preaching.

text: the acting is n't much better .
translation: 演技もあまり良くない。
back_translation: The acting is not very good either.

text: a powerful and telling story that examines forbidden love , racial tension , and other issues that are as valid today as they were in the 1950s .
translation: 禁じられた愛、人種間の緊張、そして1950年代と同様に今日でも有効なその他の問題を考察した力強く示唆に富む物語。
back_translation: A powerful and thought-provoking story that explores forbidden love, racial tensions, and other issues that remain relevant today, just as they did in the 1950s.

text: another best of the year selection .
translation: 今年のもう一つのベストセレクション。
back_translation: Another best selection of this year.

text: the film runs on a little longer than it needs to -- muccino either does n't notice when his story ends or just ca n't tear himself away from the characters -- but it 's smooth and professional .
translation: 映画は必要以上に少し長く続きます。ムッキーノは物語が終わるときに気づかないか、キャラクターから離れられないだけですが、全体的には滑らかでプロフェッショナルです。
back_translation: The movie runs a bit longer than necessary. Mukkiino either doesn't notice when the story ends or just can't distance himself from the characters, but overall it is smooth and professional.

text: it 's just too bad the screenwriters eventually shoot themselves in the feet with cop flick cliches like an oily arms dealer , squad car pile-ups and the requisite screaming captain .
translation: 残念なことに、脚本家たちは最終的に、油ぎった武器商人やパトカーの衝突、そして必要不可欠な叫ぶキャプテンといった警察映画のクリシェで自爆してしまいます。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the screenwriters ultimately self-destruct with clichés of police movies, such as oily arms dealers, crashing patrol cars, and the indispensable shouting captain.

text: its one-sidedness ... flirts with propaganda .
translation: その一方的な性質は... プロパガンダにふける。
back_translation: Its one-sided nature... indulges in propaganda.

text: the overall effect is awe and affection -- and a strange urge to get on a board and , uh , shred , dude .
translation: 全体的な効果は畏敬と愛情であり、奇妙なボードに乗って、えーと、シャレドしたくなる衝動です、ダude。
back_translation: The overall effect is a sense of awe and affection, and it’s a strange urge to want to prank while aboard, dude.

text: the underworld urban angst is derivative of martin scorsese 's taxi driver and goodfellas , but this film speaks for itself .
translation: アンダーワールドの都市的な苦悩はマーティン・スコセッシの『タクシードライバー』や『グッドフェローズ』に影響を受けていますが、この映画は自身で語っています。
back_translation: The urban distress of the underworld is influenced by Martin Scorsese's "Taxi Driver" and "Goodfellas," but this film tells its own story.

text: ` synthetic ' is the best description of this well-meaning , beautifully produced film that sacrifices its promise for a high-powered star pedigree .
translation: 「合成」という言葉が、この意図の良い、美しく制作された映画を最もよく表現していますが、高名なスターの名声のためにその約束を犠牲にしています。
back_translation: The word "synthesis" best expresses the intention of a well-made, beautiful film, but sacrifices that promise for the fame of a renowned star.

text: the film proves unrelentingly grim -- and equally engrossing .
translation: その映画は容赦なく陰鬱であり、同様に魅力的です。
back_translation: The movie is relentlessly gloomy and equally captivating.

text: too clumsy in key moments ... to make a big splash .
translation: 重要な瞬間にあまりにも不器用で...大きな爪痕を残すことができない。
back_translation: Too clumsy in important moments... I can't leave a significant mark.

text: a small gem of a movie that defies classification and is as thought-provoking as it is funny , scary and sad .
translation: 分類を超えた小さな宝石のような映画で、考えさせられると同時に、笑えるし、恐ろしいし、悲しい。
back_translation: It's a small gem of a movie that transcends categories; it makes you think, while also being funny, frightening, and sad.

text: the château would have been benefited from a sharper , cleaner script before it went in front of the camera .
translation: シャトーは、カメラの前に出る前により鋭く、クリーンな脚本の恩恵を受けていたでしょう。
back_translation: Chateau would have benefited from a sharper, cleaner script before stepping in front of the camera.

text: ... quite good at providing some good old fashioned spooks .
translation: ...昔ながらの怖さを提供するのがとても得意です。
back_translation: I am very good at providing the old-fashioned kind of fear.

text: arliss howard 's ambitious , moving , and adventurous directorial debut , big bad love , meets so many of the challenges it poses for itself that one can forgive the film its flaws .
translation: アーリス・ハワードの野心的で感動的、冒険的な監督デビュー作『ビッグ・バッド・ラブ』は、自らが設定した多くの課題に応えているため、その欠点を許すことができる。
back_translation: Arliss Howard's ambitious, touching, and adventurous directorial debut, "Big Bad Love," is able to be forgiven its flaws because it meets many of the challenges he set for himself.

text: ` the château is never quite able to overcome the cultural moat surrounding its ludicrous and contrived plot . '
translation: 「シャトーはそのばかげた作りごとのプロットを取り巻く文化的な堀を決して完全には克服できない。」
back_translation: "The castle can never fully overcome the cultural moat surrounding its ridiculous fabrication of a plot."

text: in that setting , their struggle is simply too ludicrous and borderline insulting .
translation: その設定では、彼らの奮闘は単純に滑稽で、ほとんど侮辱的です。
back_translation: In that setting, their struggles are simply ridiculous and almost insulting.

text: i am not generally a huge fan of cartoons derived from tv shows , but hey arnold !
translation: 私は一般的にテレビ番組から派生したアニメにはあまり興味がありませんが、『ヘイ・アーノルド！』は好きです。
back_translation: I generally don't have much interest in anime that originated from TV shows, but I like "Hey Arnold!"

text: literary purists may not be pleased , but as far as mainstream matinee-style entertainment goes , it does a bang-up job of pleasing the crowds .
translation: 文学的純粋主義者は喜ばないかもしれませんが、主流のマチネスタイルのエンターテインメントとしては、人々を楽しませる素晴らしい仕事をしています。
back_translation: Literary purists may not be pleased, but as mainstream matinee-style entertainment, it does a wonderful job of entertaining people.

text: it 's rare to see a movie that takes such a speedy swan dive from `` promising '' to `` interesting '' to `` familiar '' before landing squarely on `` stupid '' .
translation: 「期待できる」から「興味深い」、「おなじみ」、そして最終的には「馬鹿げている」へと、そんなに急速にダイブする映画を見るのは珍しい。
back_translation: It's rare to see a movie that dives so rapidly from "promising" to "interesting," then to "familiar," and finally to "ridiculous."

text: a wild ride of a movie that keeps throwing fastballs .
translation: 速球を投げ続けるワイルドな映画です。
back_translation: It's a wild movie that keeps throwing fastballs.

text: tunney , brimming with coltish , neurotic energy , holds the screen like a true star .
translation: タニーは、生き生きとした若々しく神経質なエネルギーで画面を持ち、真のスターのように輝いている。
back_translation: Tani possesses a vibrant, youthful, and nervy energy on screen, shining like a true star.

text: the actresses find their own rhythm and protect each other from the script 's bad ideas and awkwardness .
translation: 女優たちは自分たちのリズムを見つけ、脚本の悪いアイデアやぎこちなさからお互いを守ります。
back_translation: The actresses find their rhythm and protect each other from bad script ideas and awkwardness.

text: romething 's really wrong with this ricture !
translation: この写真には本当に何か問題があります！
back_translation: There is really something wrong with this photo!

text: an uninspired preachy and clichéd war film .
translation: インスピレーションのない説教じみたありふれた戦争映画。
back_translation: A commonplace war movie that feels like a preachy sermon with no inspiration.

text: el crimen del padre amaro would likely be most effective if used as a tool to rally anti-catholic protestors .
translation: 「アマロ神父の罪」は、反カトリックの抗議者を結集するための道具として最も効果的である可能性が高い。
back_translation: "The sins of Father Amaro" is likely to be the most effective tool for rallying anti-Catholic protesters.

text: a processed comedy chop suey .
translation: 加工されたコメディーチャップスイ。
back_translation: Processed comedy chap sui.

text: rouge is less about a superficial midlife crisis than it is about the need to stay in touch with your own skin , at 18 or 80 .
translation: ルージュは、表面的な中年危機についてよりも、18歳でも80歳でも自分の肌と接触を保ち続ける必要性についてです。
back_translation: Rouge is about the necessity of maintaining contact with your own skin, whether you're 18 or 80, rather than a superficial midlife crisis.

text: part of the charm of satin rouge is that it avoids the obvious with humour and lightness .
translation: サテン・ルージュの魅力の一部は、明白なことをユーモアと軽やかさで避けている点です。
back_translation: Part of the charm of Satin Rouge lies in the way it humorously and lightly avoids the obvious.

text: its story about a young chinese woman , ah na , who has come to new york city to replace past tragedy with the american dream is one that any art-house moviegoer is likely to find compelling .
translation: 物語は、過去の悲劇をアメリカンドリームで置き換えようとニューヨーク市にやってきた若い中国人女性、アーニャのものです。これは、アートハウス映画の観客が魅力を感じる可能性の高い物語です。
back_translation: The story is about a young Chinese woman, Anya, who comes to New York City in an attempt to replace her past tragedies with the American Dream. This is a story that is likely to appeal to audiences of art house films.

text: great performances , stylish cinematography and a gritty feel help make gangster no. 1 a worthwhile moviegoing experience .
translation: 素晴らしい演技、スタイリッシュな cinematography 、そして荒々しい雰囲気が、ギャングスター No. 1 を見る価値のある映画体験にしています。
back_translation: The wonderful performances, stylish cinematography, and rough atmosphere make Gangster No. 1 a worth-watching movie experience.

text: but that they are doing it is thought-provoking .
translation: しかし、それを行っていることは考えさせられる。
back_translation: However, it makes one think about doing it.

text: the film has a nearly terminal case of the cutes , and it 's neither as funny nor as charming as it thinks it is .
translation: この映画はほぼ致命的なほどの可愛さを持っており、思っているほど面白くも魅力的でもありません。
back_translation: This movie has an almost fatal level of cuteness, but it is not as interesting or appealing as you might think.

text: the screenplay flounders under the weight of too many story lines .
translation: 脚本はあまりにも多くのストーリーラインの重みによってつまずいている。
back_translation: The script is stumbling under the weight of too many storylines.

text: an improvement on the feeble examples of big-screen poke-mania that have preceded it .
translation: それ以前の貧弱な大画面ポケモン熱の例よりも改善されています。
back_translation: It has improved compared to previous examples of weak enthusiasm for large-screen Pokémon.

text: manages to please its intended audience -- children -- without placing their parents in a coma-like state .
translation: その意図されたオーディエンスである子供たちを喜ばせながら、親たちを昏睡状態にさせることなく管理する。
back_translation: Manage to delight the intended audience, the children, while not putting the parents into a stupor.

text: what starts off as a possible argentine american beauty reeks like a room stacked with pungent flowers .
translation: 最初は可能性のあるアルゼンチン系アメリカの美しさとして始まるが、強烈な花の香りに満ちた部屋のように匂う。
back_translation: It begins as a potential Argentine-American beauty, but it smells like a room filled with intense floral fragrances.

text: serving sara should be served an eviction notice at every theater stuck with it .
translation: サービング・サラは、すべての劇場に居残っている際に、立ち退き通知を出されるべきです。
back_translation: Serving Sara should be given an eviction notice while still remaining in all the theaters.

text: what 's hard to understand is why anybody picked it up .
translation: 理解するのが難しいのは、なぜ誰もそれを拾ったのかということです。
back_translation: What is difficult to understand is why no one picked it up.

text: a winning and wildly fascinating work .
translation: 勝利を収め、非常に魅力的な作品。
back_translation: Achieved victory, a very captivating work.

text: blue crush is so prolonged and boring it is n't even close to being the barn-burningly bad movie it promised it would be .
translation: ブルークラッシュは非常に長くて退屈で、約束されたほど悪いバンバーン映画には全く近づいていない。
back_translation: Blue Crush is very long and boring, and it doesn't come close to being the bad banger movie that was promised.

text: for once , a movie does not proclaim the truth about two love-struck somebodies , but permits them time and space to convince us of that all on their own .
translation: 今回の映画は、恋に落ちた二人の誰かの真実を宣言するのではなく、彼らが自分たちの力で私たちを納得させるための時間と空間を与えてくれます。
back_translation: This movie does not declare the truth of someone who has fallen in love, but rather gives them the time and space to convince us with their own power.

text: -lrb- fincher 's -rrb- camera sense and assured pacing make it an above-average thriller .
translation: フィンチャーのカメラセンスと確かなペース配分が、平均以上のスリラーにしています。
back_translation: Fincher's sense of camera work and solid pacing elevate it to an above-average thriller.

text: but while the highly predictable narrative falls short , treasure planet is truly gorgeous to behold .
translation: しかし、非常に予測可能な物語が期待に応えられない一方で、『トレジャープラネット』は本当に美しいです。
back_translation: However, while a very predictable story fails to meet expectations, "Treasure Planet" is truly beautiful.

text: there must be an audience that enjoys the friday series , but i would n't be interested in knowing any of them personally .
translation: 金曜日のシリーズを楽しむ観客がいるに違いありませんが、彼らのことを個人的に知りたいとは思いません。
back_translation: There are surely audiences who enjoy the Friday series, but I don’t want to know them personally.

text: some fine acting , but ultimately a movie with no reason for being .
translation: 素晴らしい演技があるが、結局存在する理由のない映画。
back_translation: There are wonderful performances, but ultimately it's a movie without a reason to exist.

text: and if you appreciate the one-sided theme to lawrence 's over-indulgent tirade , then knock yourself out and enjoy the big screen postcard that is a self-glorified martin lawrence lovefest .
translation: そして、ローレンスの過剰な暴言に対する一方的なテーマを評価するなら、思いっきり楽しんで、その自己を称賛するマーティン・ローレンスのラブフェストという大画面のポストカードを楽しんでください。
back_translation: And if we're to evaluate the one-sided theme of Martin Lawrence's excessive outbursts, enjoy the grand postcard of his love fest, where he revels in himself and has a blast.

text: it 's consistently funny , in an irresistible junior-high way , and consistently free of any gag that would force you to give it a millisecond of thought .
translation: それは一貫して面白く、抗うことのできない中学生的な方法で、一瞬でも考えさせるようなギャグがまったくない。
back_translation: It is consistently interesting and lacks any jokes that might provoke thought, presented in an undeniably middle school way.

text: it 's definitely not made for kids or their parents , for that matter , and i think even fans of sandler 's comic taste may find it uninteresting .
translation: 子供やその親のために作られたものではなく、サンドラーのコメディセンスのファンでさえも興味を持たないかもしれません。
back_translation: It is not something created for children or their parents, and even fans of Sandler's comedic sense may not find it interesting.

text: things really get weird , though not particularly scary : the movie is all portent and no content .
translation: 物事は実際に奇妙になるが、特に恐ろしくはない：この映画は全て予兆であり、内容がない。
back_translation: Things become truly strange, but not particularly frightening: this movie is all foreshadowing and has no substance.

text: a properly spooky film about the power of spirits to influence us whether we believe in them or not .
translation: 私たちを影響する霊の力について、信じているかどうかにかかわらず、適切に恐ろしい映画。
back_translation: A properly terrifying movie about the power of spirits that influence us, regardless of whether you believe it or not.

text: drawing on an irresistible , languid romanticism , byler reveals the ways in which a sultry evening or a beer-fueled afternoon in the sun can inspire even the most retiring heart to venture forth .
translation: 魅惑的で緩やかなロマンティシズムを身にまとったバイラーは、蒸し暑い夕べやビールで満たされた日差しの午後が、どのようにして最も内気な心さえも前に踏み出す勇気を与えることができるかを明らかにしています。
back_translation: The alluring and gentle romanticism embodied by the bailer reveals how humid evenings and sunlit afternoons filled with beer can provide even the shyest heart with the courage to step forward.

text: there 's absolutely no reason why blue crush , a late-summer surfer girl entry , should be as entertaining as it is
translation: ブルー・クラッシュ、遅い夏のサーフガール映画がこれほど楽しい理由は全くありません。
back_translation: There is absolutely no reason why "Blue Crush," the late summer surf girl movie, is this much fun.

text: mike leigh populates his movie with a wonderful ensemble cast of characters that bring the routine day to day struggles of the working class to life
translation: マイク・リーは、働くクラスの日常的な苦闘を生き生きと描く素晴らしいキャストのキャラクターたちで彼の映画を満たしています。
back_translation: Mike Leigh fills his films with characters from a wonderful cast that vividly depict the everyday struggles of the working class.

text: contains a few big laughs but many more that graze the funny bone or miss it altogether , in part because the consciously dumbed-down approach wears thin .
translation: いくつかの大笑いが含まれているが、面白さに触れるか、まったく外れてしまうものがもっと多い。その一因は、意図的に馬鹿げたアプローチが薄れてしまうからである。
back_translation: While there are some big laughs included, there are many more that either touch on humor or completely miss it. One reason for this is that the intentionally absurd approach tends to diminish.

text: transforms one of -lrb- shakespeare 's -rrb- deepest tragedies into a smart new comedy .
translation: シェイクスピアの最も深い悲劇の一つを賢い新しいコメディに変身させます。
back_translation: It transforms one of Shakespeare's deepest tragedies into a clever new comedy.

text: successfully blended satire , high camp and yet another sexual taboo into a really funny movie .
translation: 風刺、高いキャンプ、そしてもう一つの性的タブーを見事に融合させた、本当に面白い映画になりました。
back_translation: It has become a truly funny movie that brilliantly fuses satire, high camp, and yet another sexual taboo.

text: a sweet-tempered comedy that forgoes the knee-jerk misogyny that passes for humor in so many teenage comedies .
translation: 多くのティーンエイジャーコメディで見られる反射的な女性嫌悪を避けた、愛すべきコメディ。
back_translation: A lovable comedy that avoids the reflexive misogyny often seen in many teenage comedies.

text: an elegant film with often surprising twists and an intermingling of naiveté and sophistication .
translation: 洗練された映画で、しばしば驚くような展開と素朴さと洗練さの交錯があります。
back_translation: A sophisticated film that often features surprising developments, with a blend of simplicity and refinement.

text: even better than the first one !
translation: 前のものよりもさらに良い！
back_translation: Even better than the previous one!

text: i ca n't recommend it .
translation: お勧めできません。
back_translation: I cannot recommend it.

text: poor ben bratt could n't find stardom if mapquest emailed him point-to-point driving directions .
translation: 貧乏なベン・ブラットは、マップクエストが彼にポイント・トゥ・ポイントの運転方向をメールしても、スターの地位を見つけることができないだろう。
back_translation: The poor Ben Bratt won't be able to find star status, even if MapQuest emails him point-to-point driving directions.

text: more of the same from taiwanese auteur tsai ming-liang , which is good news to anyone who 's fallen under the sweet , melancholy spell of this unique director 's previous films .
translation: 台湾のオーター、ツァイ・ミンリャンからの同様の作品がさらに登場することは、この独特な監督の以前の映画に魅了された誰にとっても良いニュースです。
back_translation: It's good news for anyone who has been captivated by the previous films of this unique director that similar works are coming from Taiwan's auteur, Tsai Ming-liang.

text: allen shows he can outgag any of those young whippersnappers making moving pictures today .
translation: アレンは、今日の若い映像制作者たちを超えるギャグを作れることを示しています。
back_translation: Allen is demonstrating that he can create gags that surpass those of today's young filmmakers.

text: by-the-numbers yarn .
translation: 数字による毛糸。
back_translation: Yarn by numbers.

text: on the granger movie gauge of 1 to 10 , the powerpuff girls is a fast , frenetic , funny , even punny 6 -- aimed specifically at a grade-school audience .
translation: グレンジャー映画評価の1から10の尺度では、「パワーパフガールズ」は速く、活気があり、面白く、さらに言葉遊びも交えた6です。これは主に小学生を対象としています。
back_translation: On a scale from 1 to 10 for Granger movie evaluations, "The Powerpuff Girls" is a 6 for being fast, lively, funny, and incorporating wordplay. It is primarily aimed at elementary school students.

text: those who trek to the ` plex predisposed to like it probably will enjoy themselves .
translation: 『プレックス』に向かうトレッカーは、おそらくそれを気に入る傾向があるため、楽しむでしょう。
back_translation: Trekker heading to "Plex" will likely enjoy it because they tend to like that sort of thing.

text: an ambitious ` what if ? '
translation: 野心的な「もしも？」
back_translation: Ambitious "What if?"

text: when a movie has stuck around for this long , you know there 's something there .
translation: 映画がこれほど長く残っているときは、何か特別なものがあると知っている。
back_translation: When a movie has lasted this long, I know there must be something special about it.

text: nothing wrong with performances here , but the whiney characters bugged me .
translation: ここでのパフォーマンスに問題はないが、うるさいキャラクターが気になった。
back_translation: There are no problems with the performance here, but the loud character was distracting.

text: it 's a boring movie about a boring man , made watchable by a bravura performance from a consummate actor incapable of being boring .
translation: 退屈な男についての退屈な映画で、退屈することのない熟練の俳優の素晴らしい演技によって見られるものになっている。
back_translation: It's a boring movie about a boring man, made bearable by the wonderful performances of seasoned actors who never fail to entertain.

text: a first-class , thoroughly involving b movie that effectively combines two surefire , beloved genres -- the prison flick and the fight film .
translation: 一流の、徹底的に没入させるB級映画で、二つの確実な、愛されるジャンルを効果的に組み合わせています - 刑務所映画と格闘映画です。
back_translation: A top-notch, thoroughly immersive B-movie that effectively combines two beloved genres - prison films and martial arts films.

text: the lady and the duke is a smart , romantic drama that dares to depict the french revolution from the aristocrats ' perspective .
translation: 「おばあさんと公爵」は、貴族の視点からフランス革命を描くことに挑戦したスマートでロマンティックなドラマです。
back_translation: "The Grandmother and the Duke" is a smart and romantic drama that challenges the portrayal of the French Revolution from the perspective of the aristocracy.

text: even if you 've seen `` stomp '' -lrb- the stage show -rrb- , you still have to see this !
translation: 「ストンプ」（ステージショー）を見たことがあっても、これを見なければなりません！
back_translation: Even if you've seen "Stomp" (the stage show), you must see this!

text: this familiar rise-and-fall tale is long on glamour and short on larger moralistic consequences , though it 's told with sharp ears and eyes for the tenor of the times .
translation: この親しみのある浮き沈みの物語は華やかさには満ちているが、より大きな倫理的な結果については欠けている。ただし、時代の気風に対する鋭い耳と目を持って語られている。
back_translation: This familiar story of ups and downs is filled with splendor, but it lacks greater ethical implications. However, it is told with a sharp ear and eye for the spirit of the times.

text: the ensemble cast turns in a collectively stellar performance , and the writing is tight and truthful , full of funny situations and honest observations .
translation: アンサンブルキャストは集団として素晴らしいパフォーマンスを披露し、脚本は緊密で真実に満ちており、面白い状況や誠実な考察でいっぱいです。
back_translation: The ensemble cast delivers a wonderful performance as a group, the script is tight and full of truth, and it is filled with interesting situations and sincere insights.

text: while not all that bad of a movie , it 's nowhere near as good as the original .
translation: 悪くはない映画だけれど、オリジナルには到底及ばない。
back_translation: It's not a bad movie, but it certainly doesn't measure up to the original.

text: as broad and cartoonish as the screenplay is , there is an accuracy of observation in the work of the director , frank novak , that keeps the film grounded in an undeniable social realism .
translation: 脚本がどれほど広範で漫画的であっても、監督フランク・ノヴァクの作品には観察の正確さがあり、そのため映画は否定できない社会的リアリズムに根付いています。
back_translation: No matter how extensive and comic the script may be, director Frank Novak's work possesses a precision of observation, and as a result, the film is grounded in undeniable social realism.

text: its use of the thriller form to examine the labyrinthine ways in which people 's lives cross and change , buffeted by events seemingly out of their control , is intriguing , provocative stuff .
translation: 人々の生活が交差し変化する迷宮のような方法を探求し、制御不能に見える出来事に翻弄される様子をスリラー形式で描くことは、興味深く、挑発的な内容です。
back_translation: Exploring the labyrinthine ways in which people's lives intersect and change, and depicting their struggles with seemingly uncontrollable events in a thriller format is intriguing and provocative.

text: a less-than-thrilling thriller .
translation: あまりスリリングでないスリラー。
back_translation: A thriller that isn't very thrilling.

text: would 've been nice if the screenwriters had trusted audiences to understand a complex story , and left off the film 's predictable denouement .
translation: もし脚本家が観客が複雑な物語を理解できると信頼し、映画の予測可能な結末を省いてくれていれば、良かったのに。
back_translation: It would have been better if the screenwriter had trusted that the audience could understand a complex story and omitted the predictable ending of the movie.

text: the hard-to-predict and absolutely essential chemistry between the down-to-earth bullock and the nonchalant grant proves to be sensational , and everything meshes in this elegant entertainment .
translation: 地に足のついたブルックと無頓着なグラントとの間にある予測困難で絶対に必要な化学反応は sensational であり、すべてがこの洗練されたエンターテイメントにおいて見事に調和しています。
back_translation: The unpredictable and absolutely essential chemistry between grounded Brooke and indifferent Grant is sensational, and everything harmonizes beautifully in this sophisticated entertainment.

text: some of the most ravaging , gut-wrenching , frightening war scenes since `` saving private ryan '' have been recreated by john woo in this little-known story of native americans and their role in the second great war .
translation: 「プライベート・ライアン」を超える衝撃的で、胸が締め付けられる、恐ろしい戦争のシーンが、ジョン・ウーによってこのあまり知られていないネイティブアメリカンの物語に再現されています。そして彼らの第二次世界大戦での役割が描かれています。
back_translation: Shocking, heart-wrenching, and terrifying war scenes surpassing "Saving Private Ryan" are recreated by John Woo in this lesser-known story of Native Americans, showcasing their role in World War II.

text: morton deserves an oscar nomination .
translation: モートンはオスカー候補に値する。
back_translation: Morton deserves an Oscar nomination.

text: you 'll just have your head in your hands wondering why lee 's character did n't just go to a bank manager and save everyone the misery .
translation: あなたはただ頭を抱えて、リーのキャラクターがなぜ銀行のマネージャーのところに行かなかったのか、みんなを苦しめずに済んだのにと思うでしょう。
back_translation: You might just be scratching your head, thinking about why Lee's character didn't go to the bank manager, which could have spared everyone from suffering.

text: by turns pretentious , fascinating , ludicrous , provocative and vainglorious .
translation: 時には気取っていて、魅力的で、ばかげていて、挑発的で、自慢げです。
back_translation: Sometimes it is pretentious, charming, silly, provocative, and boastful.

text: it 's kind of sad that so many people put so much time and energy into this turkey .
translation: 多くの人がこの七面鳥に多くの時間とエネルギーを注いでいるのはちょっと悲しい。
back_translation: It's a bit sad that many people are pouring a lot of time and energy into this turkey.

text: -lrb- davis -rrb- wants to cause his audience an epiphany , yet he refuses to give us real situations and characters .
translation: -（デイビス）は観客に啓示をもたらしたいと思っているが、実際の状況やキャラクターを私たちに与えることを拒んでいる。
back_translation: Davis wants to bring revelation to the audience, but he refuses to provide us with the actual situation or characters.

text: it all looks and plays like a $ 40 million version of a game you 're more likely to enjoy on a computer .
translation: すべてが見た目もプレイも、あなたがコンピューターで楽しむ可能性が高いゲームの4000万ドル版のように感じます。
back_translation: Everything feels like a $40 million version of a game that you are likely to enjoy on your computer, both in appearance and gameplay.

text: van wilder has a built-in audience , but only among those who are drying out from spring break and are still unconcerned about what they ingest .
translation: ヴァン・ワイルダーには、春休みの余韻を引きずりながら自分が何を摂取しているかにまだ気にかけていない人々の間でのみ、内在的なオーディエンスがあります。
back_translation: Van Wilder has an intrinsic audience only among those who are still lingering in the afterglow of spring break and are not yet concerned about what they are consuming.

text: forget the psychology 101 study of romantic obsession and just watch the procession of costumes in castles and this wo n't seem like such a bore .
translation: 心理学101のロマンティックな執着の研究を忘れて、城の中のコスチュームの行進を見てみれば、そんなに退屈には思えないだろう。
back_translation: Forget the study of romantic attachment in Psychology 101, and consider watching a costume parade in a castle; it might not seem so boring after all.

text: it 's too harsh to work as a piece of storytelling , but as an intellectual exercise -- an unpleasant debate that 's been given the drive of a narrative and that 's been acted out -- the believer is nothing less than a provocative piece of work .
translation: 物語としてはあまりにも厳しいが、知的な演習として—物語の駆動力を与えられ、演じられた不快な議論として—信者はまさに挑発的な作品である。
back_translation: Although the story is exceedingly harsh, as an intellectual exercise—provided with the driving force of the narrative and performed as an unpleasant debate—believers is indeed a provocative work.

text: there 's no excuse for following up a delightful , well-crafted family film with a computer-generated cold fish .
translation: 素晴らしく、巧みに作られたファミリーフィルムの後に、コンピュータ生成の冷たい魚を続けるのには言い訳がありません。
back_translation: There is no excuse for following a wonderfully crafted family film with a cold, computer-generated fish.

text: a very capable nailbiter .
translation: 非常に有能な爪噛みです。
back_translation: Very skilled nail biter.

text: one scene after another in this supposedly funny movie falls to the floor with a sickening thud .
translation: このいわゆる面白い映画の一場面また一場面が、気持ち悪い音を立てて床に落ちる。
back_translation: Each scene of this so-called funny movie falls to the floor with a disgusting sound.

text: a witty , whimsical feature debut .
translation: 機知に富んだ、風変わりな特徴的デビュー。
back_translation: A witty and unconventional characteristic debut.

text: `` -lrb- hopkins -rrb- does n't so much phone in his performance as fax it .
translation: 「ホプキンスは、自分のパフォーマンスを電話で伝えるのではなく、ファックスで送っているようだ。」
back_translation: "Hopkins seems to be sending his performance via fax rather than communicating it over the phone."

text: a moving and stark reminder that the casualties of war reach much further than we imagine .
translation: 戦争の犠牲が私たちが想像する以上に広がっていることを痛感させる、感動的で厳しい警告です。
back_translation: It is an emotional and harsh warning that makes us realize the extent of the casualties of war goes beyond what we can imagine.

text: no big whoop , nothing new to see , zero thrills , too many flashbacks and a choppy ending make for a bad film .
translation: 大したことではない、新しいものは何もない、全く面白くない、フラッシュバックが多すぎて、終わり方もバタバタしていて、悪い映画になっている。
back_translation: It's not a big deal, nothing new, completely uninteresting, too many flashbacks, a chaotic ending, resulting in a bad movie.

text: wedding feels a bit anachronistic .
translation: 結婚式は少し古臭く感じる。
back_translation: Weddings feel a bit outdated.

text: it 's like rocky and bullwinkle on speed , but that 's neither completely enlightening , nor does it catch the intensity of the movie 's strangeness .
translation: それはスピードを出したロッキーとブルウィンクルのようですが、それは完全に啓発的でもなく、映画の奇妙さの強 intensity を捉えているわけでもありません。
back_translation: It seems like a speedy Rocky and Bullwinkle, but it is neither completely enlightening nor does it capture the strong intensity of the movie's strangeness.

text: schepisi , aided by a cast that seems to include every top-notch british actor who did not appear in gosford park -lrb- as well as one , ms. mirren , who did -rrb- , has succeeded beyond all expectation .
translation: シェピシは、ゴスフォード・パークに出演しなかったすべての一流英国俳優を含むキャストと共に、さらにはその中の一人、ミス・ミレンとともに、期待以上の成功を収めました。
back_translation: Shepis achieved greater success than expected, alongside a cast that included all the top British actors who did not appear in Gosford Park, as well as one of them, Miss Merlyn.

text: this movie got me grinning .
translation: この映画は私をニヤニヤさせました。
back_translation: This movie made me smile.

text: a haunting tale of murder and mayhem .
translation: 殺人と混乱の haunting な物語。
back_translation: A haunting story of murder and chaos.

text: weighted down with slow , uninvolving storytelling and flat acting .
translation: 遅くて魅力のないストーリーテリングと平坦な演技によって重くなっています。
back_translation: It is weighed down by slow and unappealing storytelling and flat performances.

text: me without you has a bracing truth that 's refreshing after the phoniness of female-bonding pictures like divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood .
translation: あなたなしの私には、ヤヤシスターズの神秘のような女性の絆を描いた作品の不誠実さの後に新鮮な爽快感をもたらす刺激的な真実があります。
back_translation: Without you, there is an exciting truth that brings a fresh sense of exhilaration after the insincerity of a work depicting the mysterious bond of women like the Yay Sisters.

text: consummate actor barry has done excellent work here .
translation: 名優バリーはここで素晴らしい仕事をしました。
back_translation: The great actor Barry delivered an outstanding performance here.

text: a decent-enough nail-biter that stands a good chance of being the big hit franklin needs to stay afloat in hollywood .
translation: ハリウッドで生き残るためにフランクリンが必要とする大ヒットになる可能性が高い、まずまずの緊張感のある作品。
back_translation: A fairly tense work that is likely to become a big hit, which Franklin needs to survive in Hollywood.

text: ... the plot weaves us into a complex web .
translation: ...物語は私たちを複雑な網の中に絡ませます。
back_translation: The story entangles us in a complex web.

text: too infuriatingly quirky and taken with its own style .
translation: 非常に腹立たしいほど奇妙で、自分のスタイルに夢中になっている。
back_translation: It's very frustratingly strange and obsessed with its own style.

text: the most opaque , self-indulgent and just plain goofy an excuse for a movie as you can imagine .
translation: 最も不透明で自己満足的、そしてただ単に馬鹿げた映画の言い訳のようなものを想像してみてください。
back_translation: Imagine something like the most opaque, self-satisfied, and simply ridiculous excuse for a movie.

text: the scorpion king is more fun than conan the barbarian .
translation: サソリの王は、バーバリアン・コナンよりも楽しい。
back_translation: The King of Scorpions is more fun than Barbarian Conan.

text: he has a great cast and a great idea .
translation: 彼は素晴らしいキャストと素晴らしいアイデアを持っています。
back_translation: He has a wonderful cast and great ideas.

text: `` sweet home alabama '' is what it is -- a nice , harmless date film ...
translation: 「スウィート・ホーム・アラバマ」はそれ自体が良い、無害なデート映画です...
back_translation: "Sweet Home Alabama" is a good, harmless date movie in itself...

text: even when there are lulls , the emotions seem authentic , and the picture is so lovely toward the end ... you almost do n't notice the 129-minute running time .
translation: 沈黙の時があっても、感情は本物のように感じられ、終盤に向けての映像はとても美しいです…129分の上映時間をほとんど気にしないほどです。
back_translation: Even with moments of silence, the emotions feel genuine, and the visuals leading up to the climax are very beautiful… to the point that you hardly notice the 129-minute runtime.

text: diaz , applegate , blair and posey are suitably kooky which should appeal to women and they strip down often enough to keep men alert , if not amused .
translation: ディアス、アッペルゲイト、ブレア、そしてポージーは適度にクールで、女性にアピールするはずですし、男性を警戒させるために十分に脱ぎますが、必ずしも楽しませるわけではありません。
back_translation: Dias, Applegate, Blair, and Posey are moderately cool and should appeal to women, and they undress enough to make men wary, but they don’t necessarily entertain.

text: sure , it 's contrived and predictable , but its performances are so well tuned that the film comes off winningly , even though it 's never as solid as you want it to be .
translation: もちろん、作り物で予測可能ですが、演技が非常に調和が取れているので、映画は素晴らしく仕上がっています。とはいえ、望んでいるほどには決して堅実ではありません。
back_translation: Of course, it can be predictable because it's fictional, but the performances are so harmonious that the film is wonderfully crafted. That said, it is never as solid as one might hope.

text: sadly , full frontal plays like the work of a dilettante .
translation: 残念ながら、フルフロンタルは素人の作品のように見えます。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Full Frontal looks like an amateur's work.

text: runs on the pure adrenalin of pacino 's performance .
translation: パチーノのパフォーマンスの純粋なアドレナリンで動いている。
back_translation: Pacino's performance is driven purely by adrenaline.

text: the tuxedo was n't just bad ; it was , as my friend david cross would call it , ` hungry-man portions of bad ' .
translation: タキシードはただ悪いだけではなく、私の友人デビッド・クロスが言うように「ハングリーマンのような悪さ」だった。
back_translation: The tuxedo was not just bad, it was "bad like a hungry man," as my friend David Cross would say.

text: shyamalan takes a potentially trite and overused concept -lrb- aliens come to earth -rrb- and infuses it into a rustic , realistic , and altogether creepy tale of hidden invasion .
translation: シャマランは、潜在的に陳腐で使い古された概念（宇宙人が地球に来る）を取り入れ、田舎的でリアルかつ全体として不気味な隠れた侵略の物語に注ぎ込んでいます。
back_translation: Shyamalan takes a potentially clichéd and worn-out concept (aliens coming to Earth) and infuses it into a rural, realistic, and overall eerie story of hidden invasion.

text: `` spider-man is better than any summer blockbuster we had to endure last summer , and hopefully , sets the tone for a summer of good stuff .
translation: スパイダーマンは昨夏耐えなければならなかったどの夏の大作映画よりも優れており、何とか良いものの夏のトーンを設定してくれることを願っています。
back_translation: Spider-Man is superior to any of the summer blockbuster movies that had to endure last summer, and I hope it manages to set a good tone for the summer.

text: the film is visually dazzling , the depicted events dramatic , funny and poignant .
translation: 映画は視覚的に目を引き、描かれた出来事はドラマチックで、面白く、感動的です。
back_translation: The movie is visually captivating, and the depicted events are dramatic, interesting, and moving.

text: ... a complete shambles of a movie so sloppy , so uneven , so damn unpleasant that i ca n't believe any viewer , young or old , would have a good time here .
translation: ... 完全にめちゃくちゃな映画で、非常に雑で、不均衡で、非常に不快であり、若い人も年配の人も誰一人としてここで楽しい時間を過ごせるとは思えない。
back_translation: It's a completely chaotic movie, very messy, unbalanced, and extremely unpleasant. I don't think anyone, whether young or old, could have a good time here.

text: like many western action films , this thriller is too loud and thoroughly overbearing , but its heartfelt concern about north korea 's recent past and south korea 's future adds a much needed moral weight .
translation: 多くの西洋のアクション映画のように、このスリラーは非常に音が大きく、圧倒的ですが、北朝鮮の最近の過去と南朝鮮の未来に対する心からの関心が、必要な道徳的重みを加えています。
back_translation: Like many Western action films, this thriller is very loud and overwhelming, but a heartfelt interest in North Korea's recent past and South Korea's future adds the necessary moral weight.

text: a charmer from belgium .
translation: ベルギーの魅力的な人物。
back_translation: An attractive person from Belgium.

text: it 's not only dull because we 've seen -lrb- eddie -rrb- murphy do the genial-rogue shtick to death , but because the plot is equally hackneyed .
translation: それは、エディ・マーフィが親しみやすい悪党のスキットをやり尽くしているだけでなく、プロットも同様に使い古されたものだから、単に退屈なわけではありません。
back_translation: It's not just boring because Eddie Murphy has exhausted the familiar villain skits, but also because the plot is similarly worn out.

text: even during the climactic hourlong cricket match , boredom never takes hold .
translation: クライマックスの1時間にわたるクリケットの試合中でも、退屈感は決して襲ってこない。
back_translation: Even during the one-hour climax of the cricket match, boredom never sets in.

text: a movie that sends you out of the theater feeling like you 've actually spent time living in another community .
translation: 他のコミュニティに実際に住んでいるかのように感じさせる映画。
back_translation: A movie that makes you feel like you're actually living in another community.

text: pipe dream does have its charms .
translation: 夢物語には確かに魅力があります。
back_translation: There is indeed a charm in fairy tales.

text: if you 're part of her targeted audience , you 'll cheer .
translation: 彼女のターゲットオーディエンスの一員であれば、あなたは応援するでしょう。
back_translation: If you are a member of her target audience, you would support her.

text: crush could be the worst film a man has made about women since valley of the dolls .
translation: クッシュは、男性が女性について作った最悪の映画かもしれません、バレー・オブ・ザ・ドールズ以来。
back_translation: "Crush may be the worst movie a man has made about women since Valley of the Dolls."

text: it 's very beavis and butthead , yet always seems to elicit a chuckle .
translation: 非常にビーバスとバットヘッドのようですが、いつも笑いを引き起こすようです。
back_translation: It very much resembles Beavis and Butt-Head, but it always seems to bring laughter.

text: solaris is rigid and evasive in ways that soderbergh 's best films , `` erin brockovich , '' `` out of sight '' and `` ocean 's eleven , '' never were .
translation: 『ソラリス』は、ソダーバーグの最高の映画である『エリン・ブロコビッチ』や『アウト・オブ・サイト』、そして『オーシャンズ11』が決して持っていなかった方法で、堅固で回避的です。
back_translation: "Solaris" is solid and evasive in a way that Soderbergh's best films like "Erin Brockovich," "Out of Sight," and "Ocean's 11" never were.

text: a modestly made but profoundly moving documentary .
translation: 控えめに作られていますが、非常に感動的なドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: It is made modestly, but it is a very moving documentary.

text: ... grows decidedly flimsier with its many out-sized , out of character and logically porous action set pieces .
translation: ... 多くの過剰で、不自然で、論理的に薄弱なアクションのセットピースによって明らかに脆弱になります。
back_translation: ... it becomes clearly vulnerable due to a multitude of excessive, unnatural, and logically weak action set pieces.

text: fessenden continues to do interesting work , and it would be nice to see what he could make with a decent budget .
translation: フェッセンダンは引き続き興味深い作品を作り続けており、彼がまともな予算でどんなものを作るのかを見るのは素晴らしいことだと思います。
back_translation: Fessenden continues to create interesting works, and I think it's great to see what he can make with a decent budget.

text: as a feature-length film , it wears out its welcome as tryingly as the title character .
translation: 長編映画として、タイトルキャラクターのように厄介さを感じさせながら、その居心地の良さが薄れていきます。
back_translation: As a feature film, it conveys a sense of trouble like the title character, while its comfort gradually fades away.

text: frank capra played this story straight .
translation: フランク・キャプラはこの物語を真面目に演じました。
back_translation: Frank Capra played this story seriously.

text: control-alt-delete simone as quickly as possible
translation: できるだけ早くコントロール・オルト・デリートをシモーネに実行してください。
back_translation: Please execute Control-Alt-Delete on Simone as soon as possible.

text: nevertheless , it still seems endless .
translation: それでも、まだ終わりがないように思えます。
back_translation: Even so, it still seems like there is no end in sight.

text: there 's a persistent theatrical sentiment and a woozy quality to the manner of the storytelling , which undercuts the devastatingly telling impact of utter loss personified in the film 's simple title .
translation: その物語の語り口には、持続的な演劇的感情とふわふわした質感があり、映画のシンプルなタイトルに具現化された圧倒的な喪失の影響を削ぐ効果があります。
back_translation: The narrative style of that story has a sustained theatrical emotion and a fluffy texture, which has the effect of diminishing the overwhelming impact of loss embodied in the film's simple title.

text: mel gibson fights the good fight in vietnam in director randall wallace 's flag-waving war flick with a core of decency .
translation: メル・ギブソンは、監督ランドール・ウォレスの旗を揚げる戦争映画で、ベトナムで良き戦いを繰り広げる。その核心には誠実さがある。
back_translation: Mel Gibson fights a good battle in Vietnam in the war film directed by Randall Wallace, which raises the banner of sincerity at its core.

text: for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped .
translation: コメディとして宣伝されている映画『スウィート・ホーム・アラバマ』は、あなたが期待したほど面白くありません。
back_translation: The movie "Sweet Home Alabama," marketed as a comedy, is not as funny as you might expect.

text: `` barbershop '' is a good-hearted ensemble comedy with a variety of quirky characters and an engaging story .
translation: 「バーバーショップ」は、個性的なキャラクターと魅力的なストーリーを持つ心温まるアンサンブルコメディです。
back_translation: "Barbershop" is a heartwarming ensemble comedy with unique characters and an engaging story.

text: though lan yu lacks a sense of dramatic urgency , the film makes up for it with a pleasing verisimilitude .
translation: ラン・ユーはドラマティックな緊迫感に欠けているが、映画は心地よいリアリズムでそれを補っている。
back_translation: Lan Yu lacks dramatic tension, but the film compensates for it with a pleasant realism.

text: this hastily mounted production exists only to capitalize on hopkins ' inclination to play hannibal lecter again , even though harris has no immediate inclination to provide a fourth book .
translation: この急ごしらえの制作は、ハリスが即座に第四の本を提供する意向がないにもかかわらず、ホプキンスが再びハンニバル・レクターを演じたいという傾向を利用するためだけに存在しています。
back_translation: This hastily put together production exists solely to take advantage of the fact that Hopkins wants to play Hannibal Lecter again, despite Harris having no intention of providing a fourth book immediately.

text: fortunately , elling never gets too cloying thanks to the actors ' perfect comic timing and sweet , genuine chemistry .
translation: 幸運なことに、エリングは俳優たちの完璧なコメディのタイミングと甘くて本物の化学反応のおかげで、決してくどくならない。
back_translation: Fortunately, thanks to the actors' perfect comedic timing and their sweet and genuine chemistry, the performance never becomes excessive.

text: but it has an ambition to say something about its subjects , but not a willingness .
translation: しかし、それは自分のテーマについて何かを言うという野心を持っていますが、意欲はありません。
back_translation: However, it has the ambition to say something about its own theme, but lacks the motivation.

text: please , someone , stop eric schaeffer before he makes another film .
translation: 誰か、エリック・シェイファーがもう一つ映画を作る前に止めてください。
back_translation: Someone, please stop Eric Shaefer before he makes another movie.

text: sheridan had a wonderful account to work from , but , curiously , he waters it down , turning grit and vulnerability into light reading .
translation: シェリダンは素晴らしい素材を持っていたが、興味深いことに彼はそれを薄めてしまい、 grit と脆弱性を軽い読み物に変えてしまった。
back_translation: Sheridan had wonderful material, but interestingly, he diluted it and turned grit and vulnerability into light reading.

text: despite its faults , gangs excels in spectacle and pacing .
translation: 欠点があるにもかかわらず、ギャングはスペクタクルとペーシングにおいて優れている。
back_translation: Despite its flaws, the gang excels in spectacle and pacing.

text: a loud , low-budget and tired formula film that arrives cloaked in the euphemism ` urban drama . '
translation: 大きな音で、低予算で、疲れたフォーミュラ映画が「アーバンドラマ」という婉曲表現で包まれてやってくる。
back_translation: A loud, low-budget, tired formula film arrives wrapped in the euphemistic expression "urban drama."

text: lovingly photographed in the manner of a golden book sprung to life , stuart little 2 manages sweetness largely without stickiness .
translation: 愛情を込めて撮影された、まるで生き返ったゴールデンブックのような『スチュアート・リトル2』は、大部分で甘さを持ちながらも、ベタつきはありません。
back_translation: "Stuart Little 2," filmed with love and resembling a resurrected golden book, has a sweetness throughout, yet it is not overly sticky.

text: provides a satisfactory overview of the bizarre world of extreme athletes as several daredevils express their own views .
translation: 極限スポーツ選手の奇妙な世界を満足のいく形で概観しており、いくつかのデアデビルが自分自身の見解を表現しています。
back_translation: It provides a satisfying overview of the strange world of extreme sports athletes, with several daredevils expressing their own viewpoints.

text: flat , misguided comedy .
translation: 平坦で誤ったコメディ。
back_translation: Flat and incorrect comedy.

text: it 's been done before but never so vividly or with so much passion .
translation: 以前にも行われたことがあるが、これほど鮮明に、そして情熱を持って行われたことはなかった。
back_translation: It has been done before, but it has never been carried out as vividly and passionately as this.

text: berling and béart ... continue to impress , and isabelle huppert ... again shows uncanny skill in getting under the skin of her characters .
translation: ベルリングとベアールは依然として感銘を与え、イザベル・ユペールは再び彼女のキャラクターの内面に深く入り込む驚くべき技術を示しています。
back_translation: Berling and Béard still impress, and Isabelle Huppert once again demonstrates her remarkable ability to delve deeply into the inner workings of her character.

text: serious movie-goers embarking upon this journey will find that the road to perdition leads to a satisfying destination .
translation: 真剣な映画鑑賞者がこの旅に出ると、滅びへの道が満足のいく目的地につながっていることに気づくでしょう。
back_translation: Serious movie watchers will realize that embarking on this journey connects the road to ruin with a satisfying destination.

text: this overproduced piece of dreck is shockingly bad and absolutely unnecessary .
translation: この過剰生産されたクズの作品は驚くほど悪く、まったく必要ありません。
back_translation: This excessively produced trash of a work is astonishingly bad and completely unnecessary.

text: there are moments of hilarity to be had .
translation: 面白い瞬間があります。
back_translation: There are interesting moments.

text: it 's hard to imagine anyone managing to steal a movie not only from charismatic rising star jake gyllenhaal but also from accomplished oscar winners susan sarandon , dustin hoffman and holly hunter , yet newcomer ellen pompeo pulls off the feat with aplomb .
translation: カリスマ的な成長中のスター、ジェイク・ギレンホールだけでなく、実力派オスカー受賞者であるスーザン・サランドン、ダスティン・ホフマン、ホリー・ハンターから映画を盗むことができる人を想像するのは難しいが、新人のエレン・ポンピオは見事にその偉業を成し遂げている。
back_translation: It's hard to imagine someone who could steal a movie from not only the charismatic rising star Jake Gyllenhaal but also from seasoned Oscar winners like Susan Sarandon, Dustin Hoffman, and Holly Hunter, yet newcomer Ellen Pompeo has brilliantly achieved that feat.

text: i never thought i 'd say this , but i 'd much rather watch teens poking their genitals into fruit pies !
translation: こんなことを言うとは思わなかったが、ティーンが果物のパイに genital を突っ込むのを見る方がずっと好きだ！
back_translation: I never thought I would say this, but I much prefer seeing teens sticking their genitals into fruit pies!

text: i suspect this is the kind of production that would have been funnier if the director had released the outtakes theatrically and used the film as a bonus feature on the dvd .
translation: 私は、このような作品は監督がアウトテイクを劇場で公開し、映画をDVDのボーナス機能として使用していた方が面白かったのではないかと疑っています。
back_translation: I wonder if it would have been more interesting if the director had released such works as outtakes in theaters and used the movie as a bonus feature on the DVD.

text: it offers a glimpse of the solomonic decision facing jewish parents in those turbulent times : to save their children and yet to lose them .
translation: それは、激動の時代においてユダヤ人の親たちが直面しているソロモン的な決断の一端を垣間見せている：子供を救うことと、同時に彼らを失うこと。
back_translation: It offers a glimpse into the Solomon-like decisions that Jewish parents are facing in this tumultuous era: saving their children while simultaneously losing them.

text: the film jolts the laughs from the audience -- as if by cattle prod .
translation: その映画は観客から笑いを引き出す -- 牛の刺激棒のように。
back_translation: The movie draws laughter from the audience -- like a cattle prod.

text: plodding , poorly written , murky and weakly acted , the picture feels as if everyone making it lost their movie mojo .
translation: のろのろとした、下手に書かれ、曖昧で弱い演技のこの作品は、制作に関わった誰もが映画の魔力を失ったかのように感じられます。
back_translation: This work, slow and poorly written with vague and weak performances, makes it feel as if no one involved in its production has retained the magic of cinema.

text: elegant , mannered and teasing .
translation: 優雅で、礼儀正しく、からかうような。
back_translation: Elegant, polite, and teasing.

text: ... plays like a badly edited , 91-minute trailer -lrb- and -rrb- the director ca n't seem to get a coherent rhythm going .
translation: ... まるでうまく編集されていない91分のトレーラーのようで、監督は一貫したリズムを作ることができないようだ。
back_translation: It feels like an unedited 91-minute trailer, and the director seems unable to create a consistent rhythm.

text: there are flaws , but also stretches of impact and moments of awe ; we 're wrapped up in the characters , how they make their choices , and why .
translation: 欠点はありますが、影響を与える瞬間や驚きの瞬間もあります。私たちはキャラクターに引き込まれ、彼らがどのように選択をし、なぜそうするのかに注目しています。
back_translation: There are drawbacks, but there are also moments that influence and surprise us. We are drawn into the characters and focus on how they make choices and why they do so.

text: by turns touching , raucously amusing , uncomfortable , and , yes , even sexy , never again is a welcome and heartwarming addition to the romantic comedy genre .
translation: 感動的で、騒々しく楽しませ、気まずく、さらにはセクシーささえ感じさせる「ネバー・アゲイン」は、ロマンティックコメディジャンルにとって歓迎すべき心温まる作品です。
back_translation: "Never Again," which is moving, wildly entertaining, awkward, and even evokes a sense of sexiness, is a heartwarming addition to the romantic comedy genre.

text: not the great american comedy , but if you liked the previous movies in the series , you 'll have a good time with this one too .
translation: 偉大なアメリカのコメディではありませんが、シリーズの以前の映画が好きなら、今回も楽しめるでしょう。
back_translation: It's not the great American comedy, but if you enjoyed the previous films in the series, you'll likely enjoy this one as well.

text: kapur 's contradictory feelings about his material result in a movie that works against itself .
translation: カプールの物質に対する矛盾した感情は、彼自身に逆らう映画を生み出す結果となる。
back_translation: Kapoor's conflicting feelings about materialism result in the creation of films that go against himself.

text: but they fascinate in their recklessness .
translation: しかし、彼らの無謀さには魅了される。
back_translation: However, I am captivated by their recklessness.

text: a heartbreakingly thoughtful minor classic , the work of a genuine and singular artist .
translation: 心を打つ考え深いマイナーなクラシックで、真摯で独自のアーティストの作品です。
back_translation: A deeply moving and thought-provoking minor classical work by a sincere and unique artist.

text: this is an action movie with an action icon who 's been all but decommissioned .
translation: これはすでにほぼ引退したアクションアイコンが登場するアクション映画です。
back_translation: This is an action movie featuring an action icon who is already almost retired.

text: worth catching for griffiths ' warm and winning central performance .
translation: グリフィスの温かく魅力的な中心的なパフォーマンスを見る価値があります。
back_translation: It's worth seeing Griffith's warm and captivating central performance.

text: ` cq may one day be fondly remembered as roman coppola 's brief pretentious period before going on to other films that actually tell a story worth caring about
translation: 『cq』は、ロマン・コッポラの一時的な気取りの時期として、いつの日か愛情を持って思い出されるかもしれない。その後、実際に気にかける価値のある物語を語る映画に進んでいくのだ。
back_translation: "CQ" may one day be fondly remembered as a temporary bout of pretension for Roman Coppola. After that, he moves on to making films that tell stories truly worth caring about.

text: who cares ? -rrb- .
translation: 誰が気にする？
back_translation: Who cares?

text: neither revelatory nor truly edgy -- merely crassly flamboyant and comedically labored .
translation: 啓示的でもなく、真にエッジの効いたものでもなく、単に下品に派手で、コメディとしてもこじんまりとした。
back_translation: Neither revelatory nor truly edgy, simply gaudy and vulgar, and modest as a comedy.

text: an unflinching , complex portrait of a modern israel that is rarely seen on-screen .
translation: 画面にほとんど映し出されることのない、揺るぎない複雑な現代イスラエルの肖像。
back_translation: An unwavering and complex portrait of modern Israel, rarely reflected on screen.

text: the first question to ask about bad company is why anthony hopkins is in it .
translation: 悪い会社について最初に聞くべき質問は、なぜアンソニー・ホプキンスが出演しているのかということです。
back_translation: The first question you should ask about a bad company is, why is Anthony Hopkins involved?

text: an intelligent romantic thriller of a very old-school kind of quality .
translation: 非常にオールドスクールの品質を持つ知的なロマンティックスリラー。
back_translation: An intellectually engaging romantic thriller with a very old-school quality.

text: it 's difficult to feel anything much while watching this movie , beyond mild disturbance or detached pleasure at the acting .
translation: この映画を観ている間、多少の不快感や演技に対する無関心な楽しみを除いて、何かを強く感じるのは難しい。
back_translation: It's difficult to strongly feel anything while watching this movie, aside from some discomfort and a disinterested enjoyment of the performances.

text: a distinctly mixed bag , the occasional bursts of sharp writing alternating with lots of sloppiness and the obligatory moments of sentimental ooze .
translation: 明らかにバラバラな内容で、時折鋭い文章が現れる一方で、多くの雑さと必須の感傷的な粘液が交互に見られる。
back_translation: The content is clearly disparate, with sharp sentences emerging occasionally, while much of the writing alternates between a lot of roughness and the essential sentimental sludge.

text: a b-movie you can sit through , enjoy on a certain level and then forget .
translation: 一定のレベルで楽しみ、そして忘れられるB映画。
back_translation: B-movies that are enjoyable at a certain level and then forgotten.

text: a fascinating , dark thriller that keeps you hooked on the delicious pulpiness of its lurid fiction .
translation: 魅力的でダークなスリラーで、刺激的なフィクションの美味しいパルプ感に引き込まれます。
back_translation: A captivating and dark thriller that draws you in with the delicious pulp quality of exciting fiction.

text: enjoyably dumb , sweet , and intermittently hilarious -- if you 've a taste for the quirky , steal a glimpse .
translation: 楽しげで愚かで、甘く、時折笑える -- ユニークなものがお好きなら、ちょっと覗いてみてください。
back_translation: Fun, silly, sweet, and sometimes laughable -- if you like unique things, take a little look.

text: there 's a great deal of corny dialogue and preposterous moments .
translation: くだらないセリフや馬鹿げた瞬間がたくさんあります。
back_translation: There are many silly lines and ridiculous moments.

text: williams absolutely nails sy 's queasy infatuation and overall strangeness .
translation: ウィリアムズは、シーの吐き気を催すような愛情と全体的な奇妙さを見事に捉えています。
back_translation: Williams beautifully captures the nauseating affection and overall peculiarity of the sea.

text: curiously , super troopers suffers because it does n't have enough vices to merit its 103-minute length .
translation: 興味深いことに、『スーパートゥルーパーズ』は、その103分の長さに見合うほどの悪癖が足りないため、苦しんでいます。
back_translation: Interestingly, "Super Troopers" suffers from a lack of flaws that match its 103-minute length.

text: as exciting as all this exoticism might sound to the typical pax viewer , the rest of us will be lulled into a coma .
translation: このエキゾチックさが典型的な視聴者にとってどれほど魅力的に聞こえるとしても、その他の人々は昏睡状態に陥るでしょう。
back_translation: No matter how appealing this exoticism may sound to a typical viewer, others will likely fall into a stupor.

text: watch barbershop again if you 're in need of a cube fix -- this is n't worth sitting through .
translation: キューブが恋しいなら、バーバーショップを再び観てください。これは見る価値がありません。
back_translation: If you miss the cube, please watch the barbershop again. This isn't worth watching.

text: an awkwardly garish showcase that diverges from anything remotely probing or penetrating .
translation: 奇妙に派手なショーケースであり、何かを深く探るようなものから逸脱している。
back_translation: It is a strangely flashy showcase, deviating from something that deeply explores.

text: certain to be distasteful to children and adults alike , eight crazy nights is a total misfire .
translation: 子供にも大人にも不快なこと間違いなしの「エイト・クレイジー・ナイツ」は、完全な失敗作です。
back_translation: "Eight Crazy Nights," which is sure to be unpleasant for both children and adults, is a complete failure.

text: i have n't laughed that hard in years !
translation: 私はそんなに大笑いしたのは何年ぶりだろう！
back_translation: I wonder how many years it's been since I laughed so hard!

text: sorvino is delightful in the central role .
translation: ソルビーノは主役として素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Sorvino is wonderful in the leading role.

text: a gracious , eloquent film that by its end offers a ray of hope to the refugees able to look ahead and resist living in a past forever lost .
translation: 優雅で雄弁な映画で、終わりには未来を見据え、永遠に失われた過去に生きることを拒むことができる難民たちに希望の光を提供します。
back_translation: It is an elegant and eloquent film that offers a ray of hope to refugees who, in the end, look towards the future and refuse to live in the eternally lost past.

text: what a great way to spend 4 units of your day .
translation: 1日の4時間を過ごすのに素晴らしい方法です。
back_translation: It’s a wonderful way to spend 4 hours of the day.

text: a passionately inquisitive film determined to uncover the truth and hopefully inspire action .
translation: 真実を明らかにし、できれば行動を促すことを目指した情熱的な探求心を持つ映画。
back_translation: A passionate exploration aimed at uncovering the truth and, if possible, prompting action.

text: both a successful adaptation and an enjoyable film in its own right .
translation: 成功した適応であり、それ自体も楽しめる映画です。
back_translation: It is a successful adaptation and a movie that can be enjoyed in itself.

text: and vin diesel is the man .
translation: そしてヴィン・ディーゼルは男だ。
back_translation: And Vin Diesel is a man.

text: just a kiss is a just a waste .
translation: ただのキスはただの無駄だ。
back_translation: A simple kiss is just a waste.

text: murder by numbers just does n't add up .
translation: 数字で見ると、殺人はどうも合わない。
back_translation: Looking at the numbers, murder doesn't seem to make sense.

text: all three descriptions suit evelyn , a besotted and obvious drama that tells us nothing new .
translation: すべての3つの説明はエヴリンに当てはまり、熱狂的で明らかなドラマで、新しいことは何も教えてくれません。
back_translation: All three descriptions apply to Evelyn, filled with enthusiasm and obvious drama, offering nothing new.

text: this is popcorn movie fun with equal doses of action , cheese , ham and cheek -lrb- as well as a serious debt to the road warrior -rrb- , but it feels like unrealized potential
translation: これはポップコーン映画の楽しさで、アクション、チーズ、ハム、そして cheek の等しい要素が含まれています（さらに、『マッドマックス/ロード・ウォリアー』への真剣な借りもあります）が、実現されていない潜在能力のように感じます。
back_translation: This has the fun of a popcorn movie, containing equal elements of action, cheese, ham, and cheek (with a serious borrowing from "Mad Max: The Road Warrior"), but it feels like unrealized potential.

text: in death to smoochy , we do n't get williams ' usual tear and a smile , just sneers and bile , and the spectacle is nothing short of refreshing .
translation: 『デス・トゥ・スムーチー』では、ウィリアムズのいつもの涙と笑顔はなく、ただ冷笑と悪意があるだけで、そもそもの光景は至って新鮮です。
back_translation: In "Death to Smoochy," Williams lacks his usual tears and smiles, offering only cold smirks and malice, making the overall scene quite refreshing.

text: an uneven mix of dark satire and childhood awakening .
translation: 不均衡なダークサテリアと子供時代の目覚めの組み合わせ。
back_translation: An uneven combination of dark satyria and the awakening of childhood.

text: the movie is about as humorous as watching your favorite pet get buried alive .
translation: その映画は、好きなペットが生き埋めにされるのを見るのと同じくらいユーモラスです。
back_translation: That movie is just as humorous as watching your favorite pet being buried alive.

text: bears is even worse than i imagined a movie ever could be .
translation: 「ベアーズ」は、私が思っていた映画よりも悪いです。
back_translation: "Bears" is worse than the movie I was expecting.

text: dramatically lackluster .
translation: 劇的にぱっとしない。
back_translation: It's dramatically unremarkable.

text: made eddie murphy a movie star and the man has n't aged a day .
translation: エディ・マーフィを映画スターにしたが、その男はまったく年を取っていない。
back_translation: Eddie Murphy made him a movie star, but that man hasn't aged at all.

text: this is an undeniably intriguing film from an adventurous young talent who finds his inspiration on the fringes of the american underground .
translation: これは、アメリカのアンダーグラウンドの片隅でインスピレーションを見つける冒険心あふれる若き才能による、間違いなく魅力的な映画です。
back_translation: This is undoubtedly an intriguing film by a young talent filled with adventurous spirit, finding inspiration in the corners of America's underground.

text: yes , mibii is rote work and predictable , but with a philosophical visual coming right at the end that extravagantly redeems it .
translation: はい、ミビーは単調な作業で予測可能ですが、最後に哲学的なビジュアルが現れ、それが贅沢にそれを救います。
back_translation: Yes, Mibee is monotonous and predictable, but in the end, a philosophical visual emerges, which saves it luxuriously.

text: their contrast is neither dramatic nor comic -- it 's just a weird fizzle .
translation: その対比はドラマティックでもコメディックでもなく、ただ奇妙な消沈です。
back_translation: The contrast is neither dramatic nor comedic; it is merely a strange despondency.

text: all the characters are clinically depressed and have abandoned their slim hopes and dreams .
translation: すべてのキャラクターは臨床的にうつ病であり、細い希望や夢を捨ててしまっています。
back_translation: All of the characters are clinically depressed and have given up on slender hopes and dreams.

text: tartakovsky 's team has some freakish powers of visual charm , but the five writers slip into the modern rut of narrative banality .
translation: タタコフスキーのチームは驚異的な視覚的魅力を持っていますが、5人の作家は現代の陳腐な物語のマンネリに陥っています。
back_translation: Tarkovsky's team possesses incredible visual appeal, but the five writers are falling into the monotony of contemporary clichéd stories.

text: a gently funny , sweetly adventurous film that makes you feel genuinely good , that is to say , entirely unconned by false sentiment or sharp , overmanipulative hollywood practices .
translation: 優しい笑いをもたらし、甘く冒険的な映画で、心から良い気分にさせてくれる作品です。つまり、偽りの感情や過度に操作的なハリウッドの手法にまったく騙されないということです。
back_translation: It's a film that brings gentle laughter and is sweetly adventurous, making you genuinely feel good. In other words, it is completely unfooled by false emotions or overly manipulative Hollywood techniques.

text: tries too hard to be funny in a way that 's too loud , too goofy and too short of an attention span .
translation: 笑おうとするあまり、うるさすぎて、 goofyすぎて、注意力が散漫すぎる。
back_translation: In trying to laugh too much, it's too loud, too goofy, and too distracting.

text: the obnoxious title character provides the drama that gives added clout to this doc .
translation: 厄介なタイトルキャラクターが、このドキュメンタリーにさらなる重みを与えるドラマを提供します。
back_translation: A troublesome title character adds dramatic weight to this documentary.

text: you emerge dazed , confused as to whether you 've seen pornography or documentary .
translation: あなたはぼんやりと現れ、ポルノを見たのかドキュメンタリーを見たのか混乱しています。
back_translation: You faintly appeared, confused about whether you watched pornography or a documentary.

text: lucy 's a dull girl , that 's all .
translation: ルーシーは退屈な女の子、それだけです。
back_translation: Lucy is just a boring girl.

text: sensitive ensemble performances and good period reconstruction add up to a moving tragedy with some buoyant human moments .
translation: 繊細なアンサンブル演奏と良好な時代再現が合わさり、いくつかの浮き立つ人間の瞬間を伴った感動的な悲劇が生まれます。
back_translation: A delicate ensemble performance combined with a good period recreation gives birth to an emotional tragedy accompanied by several uplifting human moments.

text: directed without the expected flair or imagination by hong kong master john woo , windtalkers airs just about every cliche in the war movie compendium across its indulgent two-hour-and-fifteen-minute length .
translation: 香港の巨匠ジョン・ウーによって、期待される華やかさや想像力なしに演出された『ウィンドトーカーズ』は、贅沢な2時間15分の長さの中で戦争映画の定番のクリシェをほぼすべて放送しています。
back_translation: Directed by the master John Woo from Hong Kong, "Windtalkers" unfolds for a luxurious 2 hours and 15 minutes, broadcasting almost all the classic clichés of war films without the expected splendor or imagination.

text: it looks closely , insightfully at fragile , complex relationships .
translation: それは脆くて複雑な関係を注意深く、洞察深く見つめています。
back_translation: It carefully and insightfully examines a fragile and complex relationship.

text: the story has some nice twists but the ending and some of the back-story is a little tired .
translation: 物語にはいくつかの素晴らしいひねりがありますが、結末やいくつかのバックストーリーは少し疲れている感じです。
back_translation: The story has several amazing twists, but the ending and some of the backstory feel a bit worn out.

text: is an inexpressible and drab wannabe looking for that exact niche .
translation: 表現できない無味乾燥なワナビーが、その正確なニッチを探しています。
back_translation: A bland wannabe that cannot express itself is searching for its exact niche.

text: the mothman prophecies , which is mostly a bore , seems to exist only for its climactic setpiece .
translation: モスマンの予言は、主に退屈なもので、クライマックスのセットピースのためだけに存在しているようだ。
back_translation: The prophecies of Mothman seem mainly dull, existing only for the sake of setting up the climax.

text: spirit is a visual treat , and it takes chances that are bold by studio standards , but it lacks a strong narrative .
translation: スピリットは視覚的に素晴らしく、スタジオの基準では大胆な挑戦をしていますが、強い物語性に欠けています。
back_translation: Spirit is visually stunning and makes bold challenges for studio standards, but it lacks strong storytelling.

text: this is one of the rarest kinds of films : a family-oriented non-disney film that is actually funny without hitting below the belt .
translation: これは非常に珍しいタイプの映画です。ファミリー向けのディズニー以外の映画で、実際に面白く、下品なことを言わずに済んでいます。
back_translation: This is a very rare type of movie. It's a family-friendly film that's not from Disney, actually funny, and manages to avoid crude jokes.

text: for almost the first two-thirds of martin scorsese 's 168-minute gangs of new york , i was entranced .
translation: マーティン・スコセッシの168分の「ギャング・オブ・ニューヨーク」の最初の約三分の二は、私は魅了されていました。
back_translation: I was captivated for the first two-thirds of Martin Scorsese's 168-minute "Gangs of New York."

text: ... a cheap , ludicrous attempt at serious horror .
translation: ...安っぽくて滑稽な真剣なホラーの試み。
back_translation: ...a serious attempt at horror that is cheap and absurd.

text: an unremittingly ugly movie to look at , listen to , and think about , it is quite possibly the sturdiest example yet of why the dv revolution has cheapened the artistry of making a film .
translation: 視覚的にも聴覚的にも思考的にも容赦なく醜い映画であり、これはおそらく、DVD革命が映画制作の芸術性を安っぽくした理由の最も強固な例の一つである。
back_translation: It is a ruthlessly ugly film both visually and aurally, and this is likely one of the strongest examples of how the DVD revolution cheapened the artistry of filmmaking.

text: enticing and often funny documentary .
translation: 魅力的でしばしば面白いドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: An engaging and often interesting documentary.

text: but one thing 's for sure : it never comes close to being either funny or scary .
translation: しかし、確かなことは一つあります。それは、決して面白くも恐ろしくもならないということです。
back_translation: However, there is one certain thing. That is, it will never be interesting or frightening.

text: the movie eventually snaps under the strain of its plot contrivances and its need to reassure .
translation: 映画は最終的にプロットの捻りや安心させる必要によって負担に耐えきれず、崩れてしまいます。
back_translation: The movie ultimately collapses under the burden of the plot twists and the need to provide reassurance.
