text: whereas oliver stone 's conspiracy thriller jfk was long , intricate , star-studded and visually flashy , interview with the assassin draws its considerable power from simplicity .
translation: オリバー・ストーンの陰謀サスペンス映画「JFK」が長く、複雑で、豪華なキャストを持ち、視覚的にも派手であるのに対し、「暗殺者とのインタビュー」はその considerable powerをシンプルさから引き出しています。
back_translation: Oliver Stone's conspiracy thriller "JFK" has a long, complex narrative and a lavish cast, and is visually stunning, while "Interview with an Assassin" draws its considerable power from its simplicity.

text: the komediant is a tale worth catching .
translation: コメディアントは見る価値のある物語です。
back_translation: "Comediant" is a story worth seeing.

text: the holes in this film remain agape -- holes punched through by an inconsistent , meandering , and sometimes dry plot .
translation: この映画の穴は開いたままであり、一貫性のない、曲がりくねった、時には乾燥したプロットによって開けられた穴です。
back_translation: The film has holes that remain open, created by an inconsistent, winding, and sometimes dry plot.

text: worth seeing just for weaver and lapaglia .
translation: ウィーバーとラパーリアを見るだけの価値がある。
back_translation: It's worth seeing Weaver and Laparia.

text: it follows the blair witch formula for an hour , in which we 're told something creepy and vague is in the works , and then it goes awry in the final 30 minutes .
translation: それは1時間にわたってブレアウィッチのフォーミュラに従い、何か不気味で曖昧なものが進行中であると知らされ、そして最後の30分でそれが台無しになります。
back_translation: It follows the Blair Witch formula for an hour, suggesting that something creepy and ambiguous is underway, and then it gets ruined in the last 30 minutes.

text: an encouraging effort from mccrudden
translation: マクルーダンによる励ましの努力
back_translation: Encouraging efforts by MacLoudan

text: i was amused and entertained by the unfolding of bielinsky 's cleverly constructed scenario , and greatly impressed by the skill of the actors involved in the enterprise .
translation: 私はビエリンキーの巧妙に構成されたシナリオの展開に楽しませられ、関わった俳優たちの技術に非常に感銘を受けました。
back_translation: I was entertained by the cleverly crafted unfolding of Bielenky's scenario and was truly impressed by the skills of the actors involved.

text: such master screenwriting comes courtesy of john pogue , the yale grad who previously gave us `` the skulls '' and last year 's `` rollerball . ''
translation: そのような卓越した脚本は、イェール大学の卒業生で、以前に「ザ・スカルズ」と昨年の「ローラー・ボール」を提供したジョン・ポーグのおかげです。
back_translation: Such an excellent script is thanks to John Pogue, a Yale University graduate, who previously provided "The Skulls" and last year's "Rollerball."

text: initially gripping , eventually cloying pow drama .
translation: 最初は引き込まれるが、最終的には飽きが来るパワードラマ。
back_translation: At first, it draws you in, but ultimately, it becomes boring.

text: this is not a jackie chan movie .
translation: これはジャッキー・チェンの映画ではありません。
back_translation: This is not a Jackie Chan movie.

text: chamber of secrets will find millions of eager fans .
translation: 秘密の部屋は、何百万もの熱心なファンを見つけるでしょう。
back_translation: The secret room will find millions of passionate fans.

text: lacks the visual flair and bouncing bravado that characterizes better hip-hop clips and is content to recycle images and characters that were already tired 10 years ago .
translation: 視覚的な華やかさや弾けるような自信が不足しており、10年前にはすでに飽きられていた画像やキャラクターを使い回すことに満足している。
back_translation: There is a lack of visual splendor and sparkling confidence, content to recycle images and characters that were already tired a decade ago.

text: a timid , soggy near miss .
translation: timidで湿っぽい近い失敗。
back_translation: A timid and damp close failure.

text: a solidly constructed , entertaining thriller that stops short of true inspiration .
translation: しっかりとした構造の、面白いスリラーですが、本当のインスピレーションには至っていません。
back_translation: It's a solidly structured, interesting thriller, but it doesn't reach true inspiration.

text: a quiet family drama with a little bit of romance and a dose of darkness .
translation: 静かな家族ドラマに少しのロマンスと少しの闇が加わった物語。
back_translation: A story that combines a quiet family drama with a touch of romance and a hint of darkness.

text: smith examines the intimate , unguarded moments of folks who live in unusual homes -- which pop up in nearly every corner of the country .
translation: スミスは、国のほぼすべての隅々に現れる珍しい家に住む人々の親密で無防備な瞬間を探ります。
back_translation: Smith explores the intimate and vulnerable moments of people living in the rare houses that appear in almost every corner of the country.

text: i admire it and yet can not recommend it , because it overstays its natural running time .
translation: 私はそれを賞賛しますが、自然な上映時間を超えてしまうため、お勧めすることはできません。
back_translation: I admire it, but I cannot recommend it because it exceeds the natural runtime.

text: thoroughly engrossing and ultimately tragic .
translation: 徹底的に引き込まれ、最終的には悲劇的です。
back_translation: Thoroughly immersive and ultimately tragic.

text: i can analyze this movie in three words : thumbs friggin ' down .
translation: この映画を三つの言葉で分析すると、「親指を下げる」です。
back_translation: If I were to analyze this movie in three words, it would be "thumbs down."

text: if only it were , well , funnier .
translation: もしそれがもっと面白ければいいのに。
back_translation: I wish it were more interesting.

text: it is messy , uncouth , incomprehensible , vicious and absurd .
translation: それは混沌としていて、粗野で、理解不能で、 vicious で、ばかげています。
back_translation: It is chaotic,粗野, incomprehensible, vicious, and absurd.

text: from its invitingly upbeat overture to its pathos-filled but ultimately life-affirming finale , martin is a masterfully conducted work .
translation: その魅力的で明るい序曲から、感情に満ちたしかし最終的には生命を肯定するフィナーレまで、マーチンは見事に指揮された作品です。
back_translation: From the captivating and bright overture to the emotionally charged yet ultimately life-affirming finale, Martin conducted the piece brilliantly.

text: charly comes off as emotionally manipulative and sadly imitative of innumerable past love story derisions .
translation: チャーリーは感情的に操作的で、残念ながら無数の過去の恋愛物語の皮肉を模倣しているように見えます。
back_translation: Charlie seems to be emotionally manipulative and unfortunately appears to be mimicking the irony of countless past love stories.

text: kung pow seems like some futile concoction that was developed hastily after oedekerk and his fellow moviemakers got through crashing a college keg party .
translation: カンフー・パンダは、オーデカーキと彼の仲間の映画製作者たちが大学のケグパーティーを崩壊させた後に、急いで作り上げた無駄な混合物のように思える。
back_translation: Kung Fu Panda seems like a hasty concoction of pointless ideas that was put together by Audekarky and his fellow filmmakers after they ruined a college keg party.

text: its premise is smart , but the execution is pretty weary .
translation: その前提は賢いが、実行はかなり疲れさせる。
back_translation: The premise is intelligent, but executing it is quite exhausting.

text: an engrossing iranian film about two itinerant teachers and some lost and desolate people they encounter in a place where war has savaged the lives and liberties of the poor and the dispossessed .
translation: 興味深いイランの映画で、二人の旅回りの教師と、戦争によって貧しい人々の生活と自由が奪われた場所で出会う孤独で desolate な人々について描かれています。
back_translation: It is an intriguing Iranian film that depicts the lonely and desolate people encountered by two traveling teachers in a place where the lives and freedoms of the poor have been taken away by war.

text: for those for whom the name woody allen was once a guarantee of something fresh , sometimes funny , and usually genuinely worthwhile , hollywood ending is a depressing experience
translation: ウディ・アレンという名前がかつて新鮮で、時には面白く、通常は本当に価値のあるものであることの保証であった人々にとって、『ハリウッド・エンディング』は失望させられる体験です。
back_translation: For those who once found the name Woody Allen fresh, sometimes funny, and usually a true guarantee of value, "Hollywood Ending" is a disappointing experience.

text: somewhere inside the mess that is world traveler , there is a mediocre movie trying to get out .
translation: 混沌とした世界旅行者の中には、脱出しようとしている平凡な映画があります。
back_translation: Among the chaotic travelers of the world, there is an ordinary film that is trying to escape.

text: first and foremost ... the reason to go see `` blue crush '' is the phenomenal , water-born cinematography by david hennings .
translation: まず第一に、「ブルークラッシュ」を観る理由は、デビッド・ヘニングスによる素晴らしい水中撮影技術です。
back_translation: First of all, the reason to watch "Blue Crush" is the incredible underwater cinematography by David Hennings.

text: connoisseurs of chinese film will be pleased to discover that tian 's meticulous talent has not withered during his enforced hiatus .
translation: 中国映画の愛好家は、天の細心の才能が強制的な休止期間中に衰えていないことを発見して喜ぶことでしょう。
back_translation: Chinese film enthusiasts will surely be pleased to discover that the fine talents of heaven have not diminished during the enforced hiatus.

text: gaunt , silver-haired and leonine , -lrb- harris -rrb- brings a tragic dimension and savage full-bodied wit and cunning to the aging sandeman .
translation: 痩せこけた銀髪でライオンのような姿をしたハリスは、老いていくサンデマンに悲劇的な側面と野性的で豊かな機知をもたらす。
back_translation: The emaciated silver-haired Harris, with a lion-like appearance, brings a tragic aspect and a wild, rich wit to the aging Sandeman.

text: left me with the visceral sensation of longing , lasting traces of charlotte 's web of desire and desperation .
translation: 私に切実な渇望の感覚を残し、シャーロットの欲望と絶望の網の lasting traces を感じさせました。
back_translation: It left me with a deep sense of longing and made me feel the lasting traces of Charlotte's desire and despair.

text: the problem with the bread , my sweet is that it 's far too sentimental .
translation: パンの問題は、私の愛しい人、それがあまりにも感傷的すぎることです。
back_translation: The problem with bread is, my dear, that it is far too sentimental.

text: combines a comically dismal social realism with a farcically bawdy fantasy of redemption and regeneration .
translation: コミカルに惨めな社会リアリズムと、滑稽で奔放な贖罪と再生のファンタジーを組み合わせています。
back_translation: It combines comical yet miserable social realism with a whimsical and unrestrained fantasy of atonement and rebirth.

text: loud , chaotic and largely unfunny .
translation: うるさく、混沌としていて、ほとんど面白くない。
back_translation: Noisy, chaotic, and almost not interesting at all.

text: the main characters are simply named the husband , the wife and the kidnapper , emphasizing the disappointingly generic nature of the entire effort .
translation: 主要な登場人物は、夫、妻、誘拐者と単純に名付けられており、全体の努力の失望させるほど一般的な性質を強調しています。
back_translation: The main characters are simply named Husband, Wife, and Kidnapper, highlighting the overall effort's disappointingly generic nature.

text: a movie to forget
translation: 忘れるための映画
back_translation: A movie to forget.

text: rife with nutty cliches and far too much dialogue .
translation: ありふれたクリシェが多く、対話が過剰だ。
back_translation: There are many common clichés, and the dialogue is excessive.

text: starts out with tremendous promise , introducing an intriguing and alluring premise , only to fall prey to a boatload of screenwriting cliches that sink it faster than a leaky freighter .
translation: 素晴らしい期待を抱かせるスタートを切り、魅力的で興味をそそる前提が紹介されるものの、膨大な脚本のクリシェに陥り、漏れた貨物船よりも早く沈んでしまう。
back_translation: It starts with wonderful expectations and presents an intriguing and captivating premise, but it falls into a vast array of script clichés and sinks faster than a leaking cargo ship.

text: a raunchy and frequently hilarious follow-up to the gifted korean american stand-up 's i 'm the one that i want .
translation: 才能ある韓国系アメリカ人スタンドアップコメディアンの「私は自分が望む人だ」の続編で、過激で頻繁に笑える作品です。
back_translation: It is a sequel to the talented Korean American stand-up comedian's "I Am Who I Want to Be," a work that is extreme and often hilarious.

text: a completely spooky piece of business that gets under your skin and , some plot blips aside , stays there for the duration .
translation: 完全に不気味な作品で、あなたの心の奥底に入り込み、いくつかのストーリーの乱れはあるものの、その間ずっとそこに留まり続けます。
back_translation: A completely eerie work that digs deep into the recesses of your mind, and despite some disruptions in the stories, it stays with you the whole time.

text: an artful yet depressing film that makes a melodramatic mountain out of the molehill of a missing bike .
translation: 巧妙でありながら悲しい映画で、失くした自転車という小さな問題を大げさに扱っています。
back_translation: It is a clever yet sad movie that exaggerates a small problem of a lost bicycle.

text: the movie ends with outtakes in which most of the characters forget their lines and just utter ` uhhh , ' which is better than most of the writing in the movie .
translation: 映画は、ほとんどのキャラクターがセリフを忘れて「うーん」とだけ言うアウトテイクで終わりますが、それは映画のほとんどの書き込みよりも良いです。
back_translation: The movie ends with an outtake where most of the characters forget their lines and just say "umm," but it's better than most of the writing in the film.

text: if that does n't clue you in that something 's horribly wrong , nothing will .
translation: それが何かひどく間違っていることを示していないなら、何もそうはならないだろう。
back_translation: If it doesn't show that something is terribly wrong, then nothing would be like that.

text: this loud and thoroughly obnoxious comedy about a pair of squabbling working-class spouses is a deeply unpleasant experience .
translation: この大声で非常に不快なコメディは、口論を繰り返す労働者階級の夫婦に関するもので、非常に不愉快な体験です。
back_translation: This loud and extremely unpleasant comedy is about a bickering working-class couple and is an incredibly uncomfortable experience.

text: it 's not an easy one to review .
translation: レビューするのは簡単ではありません。
back_translation: Reviewing is not easy.

text: ultimately , in the history of the academy , people may be wondering what all that jazz was about `` chicago '' in 2002 .
translation: 結局、アカデミーの歴史の中で、人々は2002年の「シカゴ」が何だったのかを疑問に思うかもしれません。
back_translation: In the end, throughout the history of the Academy, people may wonder what the 2002 "Chicago" was.

text: the film has a terrific look and salma hayek has a feel for the character at all stages of her life .
translation: その映画は素晴らしいビジュアルを持っており、サルマ・ハエックは彼女の人生のすべての段階でキャラクターの感情を捉えています。
back_translation: The movie has stunning visuals, and Salma Hayek captures the character's emotions at every stage of her life.

text: what makes barbershop so likable , with all its flaws , is that it has none of the pushiness and decibel volume of most contemporary comedies .
translation: バーバーショップがその欠点にもかかわらず非常に好まれる理由は、ほとんどの現代コメディが持つ押し付けがましさや音量がないからです。
back_translation: The reason barber shops are highly favored despite their drawbacks is that they lack the pretentiousness and volume that most modern comedies possess.

text: this is for the most part a useless movie , even with a great director at the helm .
translation: この映画は、素晴らしい監督が舵を取っていても、ほとんど役に立たないものです。

text: -lrb- reaches -rrb- wholly believable and heart-wrenching depths of despair .
translation: 完全に信じられ、心を締め付けられるような絶望の深みに達します。
back_translation: You will completely believe and reach a deep despair that feels like a tightening of the heart.

text: the film fearlessly gets under the skin of the people involved ... this makes it not only a detailed historical document , but an engaging and moving portrait of a subculture .
translation: その映画は、関わった人々の心に深く入り込んでおり、これによりそれは単なる詳細な歴史的文書ではなく、サブカルチャーの魅力的で感動的な肖像となっています。
back_translation: The film deeply resonates in the hearts of those involved, making it not just a detailed historical document but an engaging and moving portrait of subculture.

text: for a movie about the power of poetry and passion , there is precious little of either .
translation: 詩と情熱の力についての映画には、そのどちらもほとんど存在しない。
back_translation: Movies about the power of poetry and passion hardly have either of them.

text: unfortunately , we 'd prefer a simple misfire .
translation: 残念ながら、私たちは単純な誤作動を好みます。
back_translation: Unfortunately, we prefer simple malfunctions.

text: ... a true delight .
translation: ...本当の喜び。
back_translation: ...true joy.

text: an awful snooze .
translation: ひどい居眠り。
back_translation: Terrible nap.

text: does n't really add up to much .
translation: あまり大したことにはなりません。
back_translation: It's not a big deal.

text: an interesting psychological game of cat-and-mouse , three-dimensional characters and believable performances all add up to a satisfying crime drama .
translation: 興味深い心理的な駆け引き、三次元のキャラクター、そして信じられる演技がすべて組み合わさって、満足のいくクライムドラマを生み出しています。
back_translation: Interesting psychological maneuvers, three-dimensional characters, and believable acting come together to create a satisfying crime drama.

text: a new film from bill plympton , the animation master , is always welcome .
translation: アニメーションの巨匠ビル・プリンプトンからの新しい映画は常に歓迎されます。
back_translation: New films from animation master Bill Plympton are always welcome.

text: watching `` ending '' is too often like looking over the outdated clothes and plastic knickknacks at your neighbor 's garage sale .
translation: 「エンディング」を見ることは、隣の家のガレージセールで古くなった服やプラスチックのガラクタを見るのとあまりにも似ている。
back_translation: Watching the "ending" is very much like looking at old clothes and plastic junk at a garage sale next door.

text: cox offers plenty of glimpses at existing photos , but there are no movies of nijinsky , so instead the director treats us to an aimless hodgepodge .
translation: コックスは既存の写真をたくさん見せてくれますが、ニジンスキーの映画はないため、監督は目的のない寄せ集めを私たちに提供します。
back_translation: Cox shows us a lot of existing photos, but since there are no films of Nijinsky, the director offers us a random collection without any purpose.

text: its weighty themes are too grave for youngsters , but the story is too steeped in fairy tales and other childish things to appeal much to teenagers .
translation: その重いテーマは若者にはあまりにも深刻ですが、物語は妖精物語や他の子供っぽい要素に浸りすぎていて、ティーンエイジャーにはあまり魅力を感じません。
back_translation: That heavy theme is too serious for young people, and the story is too immersed in fairy tales and other childish elements, making it less appealing to teenagers.

text: nothing happens , and it happens to flat characters .
translation: 何も起こらず、それが平面的なキャラクターに起こる。
back_translation: Nothing happens, and it happens to a two-dimensional character.

text: leaves us wondering less about its ideas and more about its characterization of hitler and the contrived nature of its provocative conclusion .
translation: それは、アイデアについてはあまり考えさせず、ヒトラーのキャラクタリゼーションと、その挑発的な結論のこじつけの性質についてもっと考えさせる。
back_translation: It leads one to think less about the idea and more about Hitler's characterization and the tenuous nature of its provocative conclusion.

text: `` white oleander , '' the movie , is akin to a reader 's digest condensed version of the source material .
translation: 「ホワイト・オレガンダー」という映画は、原作の要約版のようなものです。
back_translation: The movie "White Oleander" is like a summary version of the original novel.

text: high drama , disney-style - a wing and a prayer and a hunky has-been pursuing his castle in the sky .
translation: ハイドラマ、ディズニースタイル - 翼と祈りで、かつてのイケメンが空の城を追い求めている。
back_translation: Hydrama, Disney style - with wings and prayers, a former handsome man is in search of a castle in the sky.

text: schnieder bounces around with limp wrists , wearing tight tummy tops and hip huggers , twirling his hair on his finger and assuming that 's enough to sustain laughs ...
translation: シュナイダーは腕をだらっとさせながら跳ね回り、タイトな腹出しトップスとヒップハガーを着て、指で髪をくるくる回し、それだけで笑いを取れると思っている。
back_translation: Schneider bounces around with his arms drooping, wearing a tight cropped top and hip-hugging pants, twirling his hair around with his fingers, thinking that’s enough to get a laugh.

text: a wonderfully speculative character study that made up for its rather slow beginning by drawing me into the picture .
translation: 素晴らしく推測的なキャラクター研究で、始まりはやや遅かったものの、私を物語に引き込むことでそれを補っていました。
back_translation: A wonderfully speculative character study, which compensated for a somewhat slow start by drawing me into the story.

text: it 's the kind of movie that , aside from robert altman , spike lee , the coen brothers and a few others , our moviemakers do n't make often enough .
translation: ロバート・アルトマン、スパイク・リー、コーエン兄弟、その他数人を除いて、私たちの映画製作者があまり作らないタイプの映画です。
back_translation: It’s a type of film that our filmmakers don’t make much, except for Robert Altman, Spike Lee, the Coen brothers, and a few others.

text: the action sequences are fun and reminiscent of combat scenes from the star wars series .
translation: アクションシーンは楽しく、スター・ウォーズシリーズの戦闘シーンを思い起こさせます。
back_translation: The action scenes are fun and reminiscent of the battle scenes from the Star Wars series.

text: the work of an exhausted , desiccated talent who ca n't get out of his own way .
translation: 疲れ果て、干からびた才能の働きで、自分の足元にも立ち出せない。
back_translation: Exhausted and dried up, my talent is unable to even stand on its own feet.

text: the problem is that van wilder does little that is actually funny with the material .
translation: 問題は、バン・ワイルダーがその素材を使って実際に面白いことをほとんどしないということです。
back_translation: The problem is that Van Wilder hardly does anything actually funny with that material.

text: no cliche escapes the perfervid treatment of gang warfare called ces wild .
translation: 「CES Wild」と呼ばれるギャング戦争の熱烈な扱いから逃れるクリシェはない。
back_translation: There is no cliché that escapes the intense coverage of the gang wars known as "CES Wild."

text: comes off like a bad imitation of the bard .
translation: バードの悪い模倣のように聞こえる。
back_translation: It sounds like a bad imitation of a bird.

text: the sweetest thing leaves an awful sour taste .
translation: 最も甘いものはひどい酸味を残す。
back_translation: The sweetest things leave a terrible sourness behind.

text: it 's a great american adventure and a wonderful film to bring to imax .
translation: それは素晴らしいアメリカの冒険であり、IMAXに持ってくるのに素晴らしい映画です。
back_translation: It is a wonderful American adventure and a fantastic movie to bring to IMAX.

text: resembles a soft porn brian de palma pastiche .
translation: ソフトポルノのブライアン・デ・パルマのパスティーシュに似ている。
back_translation: It resembles a soft porn pastiche by Brian De Palma.

text: a uniquely sensual metaphorical dramatization of sexual obsession that spends a bit too much time on its fairly ludicrous plot .
translation: 性的執着の独特に官能的な比喩的 dramatization で、かなり馬鹿げたプロットに少し多くの時間を費やしている。
back_translation: It's spending a bit too much time on a rather ridiculous plot with a uniquely sensual metaphorical dramatization of sexual obsession.

text: the sentimental cliches mar an otherwise excellent film .
translation: 感傷的なクリシェが、そうでなければ素晴らしい映画を台無しにしている。
back_translation: Sentimental clichés are ruining what would otherwise be a wonderful movie.

text: hollywood has taken quite a nosedive from alfred hitchcock 's imaginative flight to shyamalan 's self-important summer fluff .
translation: ハリウッドはアルフレッド・ヒッチコックの想像力豊かな作品から、シャマランの自己重要感にあふれた夏の軽薄な作品へと随分と落ち込んでしまった。
back_translation: Hollywood has significantly declined from the imaginative works of Alfred Hitchcock to the self-important, frivolous films of Shyamalan.

text: this is standard crime drama fare ... instantly forgettable and thoroughly dull .
translation: これは標準的な犯罪ドラマの内容であり...すぐに忘れられ、全く退屈です。
back_translation: This is the content of a standard crime drama... easily forgotten and completely boring.

text: eyre is on his way to becoming the american indian spike lee .
translation: エイヤーはアメリカン・インディアンのスパイク・リーになる途上です。
back_translation: Eiya is on the way to becoming the Spike Lee of American Indians.

text: in questioning the election process , payami graphically illustrates the problems of fledgling democracies , but also the strength and sense of freedom the iranian people already possess , with or without access to the ballot box .
translation: 選挙プロセスを問い直す中で、パヤミは新興民主主義の問題を具体的に描写しつつ、投票箱へのアクセスがあろうとなかろうと、イランの人々がすでに持っている力と自由感も示しています。
back_translation: In reexamining the electoral process, Payami vividly depicts the issues of emerging democracies while also illustrating the sense of power and freedom that the people of Iran already possess, regardless of their access to the ballot box.

text: there 's a scientific law to be discerned here that producers would be well to heed : mediocre movies start to drag as soon as the action speeds up ; when the explosions start , they fall to pieces .
translation: ここには、製作者がよく注意すべき科学的法則があります。平凡な映画はアクションが速くなるとすぐにだれてしまい、爆発が始まると崩れ去ります。
back_translation: Here, there are scientific principles that creators should pay close attention to. Ordinary movies tend to lose their momentum as soon as the action speeds up, and they crumble when the explosions begin.

text: borstal boy represents the worst kind of filmmaking , the kind that pretends to be passionate and truthful but is really frustratingly timid and soggy .
translation: 『ボースタル・ボーイ』は、情熱的で真実であるふりをしながら、実際には frustratingly timid で湿っぽいという最悪の映画製作の類を代表しています。
back_translation: "The Boastal Boy" represents the worst kind of filmmaking, pretending to be passionate and truthful while actually being frustratingly timid and wet.

text: so genial is the conceit , this is one of those rare pictures that you root for throughout , dearly hoping that the rich promise of the script will be realized on the screen .
translation: そのアイデアはとても素晴らしいので、これは脚本の豊かな約束が画面で実現することを心から願いながら応援する、そんな稀な作品の一つです。
back_translation: That idea is so wonderful, and this is one of those rare works that I wholeheartedly support, hoping that the rich promise of the script will come to life on screen.

text: the only entertainment you 'll derive from this choppy and sloppy affair will be from unintentional giggles -- several of them .
translation: このバラバラで雑な出来事から得られる唯一の楽しみは、意図しない笑い声であり、それもいくつかあります。
back_translation: The only enjoyment gained from this chaotic and sketchy event is the unintended laughter, and there are a few of them.

text: the good girl is a film in which the talent is undeniable but the results are underwhelming .
translation: 「グッドガール」は才能は否定できないものの、結果が期待外れな映画である。
back_translation: "Good Girl" is a film that cannot deny its talent, but the results are disappointing.

text: more of the same old garbage hollywood has been trying to pass off as acceptable teen entertainment for some time now .
translation: 同じような古いゴミを、ハリウッドはしばらくの間、受け入れ可能なティーンエンターテイメントとして押し付けようとしています。
back_translation: Hollywood has been trying to impose similar old junk as acceptable teen entertainment for a while now.

text: amazingly dopey .
translation: 驚くほど間抜け。
back_translation: Surprisingly foolish.

text: the christ allegory does n't work because there is no foundation for it
translation: キリストの寓話は、それに基づく基盤がないため機能しません。
back_translation: The parables of Christ do not work because they lack a foundational basis.

text: romanek keeps adding flourishes -- artsy fantasy sequences -- that simply feel wrong .
translation: ロマネクは単に不自然に感じる華やかな要素やアート的なファンタジーシーンを付け加え続けている。
back_translation: Romaneque continues to add elements that feel unnaturally extravagant and artistic fantasy scenes.

text: combines improbable melodrama -lrb- gored bullfighters , comatose ballerinas -rrb- with subtly kinky bedside vigils and sensational denouements , and yet at the end , we are undeniably touched .
translation: 信じがたいメロドラマ（角を突かれた闘牛士、昏睡状態のバレリーナなど）と微妙に変わった夜の看護、そしてセンセーショナルな結末を組み合わせているが、最後には間違いなく心を揺さぶられる。
back_translation: It combines unbelievable melodrama (like the bullfighter who is gored and the ballerina in a coma) with a subtly altered night of nursing, and ends with a sensational conclusion that undoubtedly stirs the heart.

text: you do n't need to be a hip-hop fan to appreciate scratch , and that 's the mark of a documentary that works .
translation: ヒップホップファンでなくてもスクラッチを楽しむことができ、それが成功したドキュメンタリーの証です。
back_translation: Even if you are not a hip-hop fan, you can enjoy scratching, and that is proof of a successful documentary.

text: i 'm not sure which half of dragonfly is worse : the part where nothing 's happening , or the part where something 's happening , but it 's stupid .
translation: ドラゴンフライのどちらの半分が悪いのか分からない：何も起こっていない部分か、何かが起こっているけれどそれが馬鹿げている部分か。
back_translation: I can't tell which half of the dragonfly is bad: the part where nothing is happening or the part where something is happening but it's ridiculous.

text: writer\/director david caesar ladles on the local flavour with a hugely enjoyable film about changing times , clashing cultures and the pleasures of a well-made pizza .
translation: 作家・監督のデイビッド・シーザーは、変わりつつある時代、対立する文化、そして良く作られたピザの楽しさについての非常に楽しい映画で地元の風味をたっぷりと盛り込んでいます。
back_translation: Writer and director David Caesar incorporates plenty of local flavor in his highly entertaining film about a changing era, clashing cultures, and the joys of a well-made pizza.

text: the journey to the secret 's eventual discovery is a separate adventure , and thrill enough .
translation: 秘密の発見への旅は別の冒険であり、十分に刺激的です。
back_translation: The journey to uncover secrets is another adventure, and it is quite thrilling.

text: roman polanski directs the pianist like a surgeon mends a broken heart ; very meticulously but without any passion .
translation: ロマン・ポランスキーは、『ピアニスト』を心の傷を癒す外科医のように監督している；非常に綿密だが、情熱は感じられない。
back_translation: Roman Polanski directs "The Pianist" like a surgeon healing emotional wounds; it is very meticulous, but lacks passion.

text: it 's soulful and unslick , and that 's apparently just what -lrb- aniston -rrb- has always needed to grow into a movie career .
translation: それは魂のこもったものであり、洗練されていません。アニストンが映画キャリアを築くためにずっと必要としていたものであることは明らかです。
back_translation: It is something that is heartfelt and not refined. It is clear that this is what Aniston has needed all along to build her film career.

text: like blended shades of lipstick , these components combine into one terrific story with lots of laughs .
translation: 口紅の混ぜ合わせた色合いのように、これらの要素はたくさんの笑いを伴った素晴らしい物語に組み合わさります。
back_translation: Like the blended colors of lipstick, these elements come together to create a wonderful story filled with plenty of laughter.

text: devos delivers a perfect performance that captures the innocence and budding demons within a wallflower .
translation: デボスは、ウォールフラワーの中にある無邪気さと芽生えた悪魔を捉えた見事なパフォーマンスを披露します。
back_translation: DeVos delivers a remarkable performance that captures both the innocence found within the wallflower and the budding devil.

text: has lost some of the dramatic conviction that underlies the best of comedies ...
translation: 最高のコメディの根底にある劇的な説得力の一部を失ってしまった…
back_translation: I have lost some of the dramatic persuasion that lies at the heart of the best comedy...

text: tells a fascinating , compelling story .
translation: 魅力的で引き込まれる物語を語る。
back_translation: Tell an intriguing and captivating story.

text: like a comedian who starts off promisingly but then proceeds to flop , comedian runs out of steam after a half hour .
translation: 期待を持って始まるが、その後失敗してしまうコメディアンのように、コメディアンは30分後に息切れしてしまう。
back_translation: Like a comedian who begins with high hopes but later fails, the comedian runs out of breath after 30 minutes.

text: one of those films where the characters inhabit that special annex of hell where adults behave like kids , children behave like adults and everyone screams at the top of their lungs no matter what the situation .
translation: 大人が子供のように振る舞い、子供が大人のように振る舞い、誰もが状況に関わらず大声で叫ぶ、そんな特別な地獄の一角にキャラクターたちが住む映画の一つ。
back_translation: One of those movies where adults act like children, children act like adults, and everyone shouts loudly regardless of the situation; a special corner of hell where the characters live.

text: devotees of star trek ii : the wrath of khan will feel a nagging sense of deja vu , and the grandeur of the best next generation episodes is lacking .
translation: 『スタートレックII：カーンの逆襲』の熱心なファンは、どこか懐かしい感じを抱くでしょうが、最高の『新スター・トレック』エピソードの壮大さには欠けるものがあります。
back_translation: Fans of "Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan" may feel a sense of nostalgia, but it lacks the grandeur of the best "New Star Trek" episodes.

text: beautifully reclaiming the story of carmen and recreating it an in an african idiom .
translation: カーメンの物語を美しく再生し、アフリカの言語で再創造する。
back_translation: Beautifully recreate the story of Carmen and reimagine it in an African language.

text: the punch lines that miss , unfortunately , outnumber the hits by three-to-one .
translation: 残念ながら、外れるパンチラインは当たるものの三倍の数に上ります。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the number of punchlines that miss is three times the number that hit.

text: michel piccoli 's moving performance is this films reason for being .
translation: ミシェル・ピッコリの感動的な演技が、この映画の存在理由です。
back_translation: Michel Piccoli's moving performance is the reason for this movie's existence.

text: read my lips is to be viewed and treasured for its extraordinary intelligence and originality as well as its lyrical variations on the game of love .
translation: 「リップスを読め」は、その並外れた知性と独創性、そして愛のゲームに関する叙情的な変奏によって、見て楽しむべきものとされ、貴重な作品とされています。
back_translation: "Read Lips" is considered a valuable work to be enjoyed for its extraordinary intelligence and originality, as well as its lyrical variations on the theme of the game of love.

text: those seeking a definitive account of eisenstein 's life would do better elsewhere .
translation: アイゼンシュテインの人生についての決定的な記述を求める人は、別の場所を探した方が良いでしょう。
back_translation: Those seeking a definitive account of Eisenstein's life might do well to look elsewhere.

text: yes , soar .
translation: はい、舞い上がれ。
back_translation: Yes, soar high.

text: as banal as the telling may be -- and at times , all my loved ones more than flirts with kitsch -- the tale commands attention .
translation: どんなにありふれた話であっても、時には愛する人々がキッチュにもっと寄り添うことがあっても、その物語は注意を引く。
back_translation: No matter how ordinary the story may be, sometimes when beloved people become more intimately close in a kitschy way, that narrative captures attention.

text: although frailty fits into a classic genre , in its script and execution it is a remarkably original work .
translation: 虚弱は古典的なジャンルに適合していますが、その脚本と実行においては非常に独創的な作品です。
back_translation: Weakness fits into the classical genre, but it is a very original work in terms of its script and execution.

text: naipaul fans may be disappointed .
translation: ナイポールのファンは失望するかもしれません。
back_translation: Naipaul's fans may be disappointed.

text: attal pushes too hard to make this a comedy or serious drama .
translation: アッタルはこれをコメディーや真剣なドラマにしようとしすぎている。
back_translation: Attar is trying too hard to make this a comedy or a serious drama.

text: poignant and moving , a walk to remember is an inspirational love story , capturing the innocence and idealism of that first encounter .
translation: 感動的で心に響く『ウォーク・トゥ・リメンバー』は、最初の出会いの無垢さと理想主義を捉えた、感動的なラブストーリーです。
back_translation: Emotional and heartwarming, "A Walk to Remember" is a touching love story that captures the innocence and idealism of first encounters.

text: in any case , i would recommend big bad love only to winger fans who have missed her since 1995 's forget paris .
translation: いずれにせよ、1995年の「フォゲット・パリ」以来彼女を恋しく思っているウィンガーのファンにのみ、「ビッグ・バッド・ラブ」をお勧めします。
back_translation: In any case, I only recommend "Big Bad Love" to fans of Winger who have been missing her since "Forget Paris" in 1995.

text: ... by the time it 's done with us , mira nair 's new movie has its audience giddy with the delight of discovery , of having been immersed in a foreign culture only to find that human nature is pretty much the same all over .
translation: …私たちと過ごした後、ミラ・ナイアーの新しい映画は、観客を発見の喜びで興奮させます。異文化に浸ることで、実は人間の本質はどこでもほとんど同じであることがわかるのです。
back_translation: After spending time with us, Mira Nair's new film excites the audience with the joy of discovery. By immersing ourselves in different cultures, we come to realize that the essence of being human is almost the same everywhere.

text: if there 's a heaven for bad movies , deuces wild is on its way .
translation: 悪い映画のための天国があるなら、『デューシズ・ワイルド』はその道を進んでいる。
back_translation: If there is a heaven for bad movies, "Dude, Where's My Car?" is on its way there.

text: a huge box-office hit in korea , shiri is a must for genre fans .
translation: 韓国で大ヒットした「シルリ」は、ジャンルファン必見の作品です。
back_translation: "The hit in South Korea, 'Shil-ri,' is a must-see for genre fans."

text: clint eastwood 's blood work is a lot like a well-made pb & j sandwich : familiar , fairly uneventful and boasting no real surprises -- but still quite tasty and inviting all the same .
translation: クリント・イーストウッドの「ブラッド・ワーク」は、よく作られたピーナッツバターとジャムのサンドイッチに似ています：馴染み深く、比較的平穏で、特に驚きもないですが、それでもなおとても美味しくて魅力的です。
back_translation: Clint Eastwood's "Blood Work" is like a well-made peanut butter and jelly sandwich: familiar, relatively calm, and not particularly surprising, yet still very delicious and engaging.

text: the thing about guys like evans is this : you 're never quite sure where self-promotion ends and the truth begins .
translation: エバンズのような男たちについてのことは、自分のプロモーションがどこで終わり、真実がどこから始まるのかが決してはっきりしないということだ。
back_translation: The thing about men like Evans is that it is never clear where their promotion ends and the truth begins.

text: i found myself growing more and more frustrated and detached as vincent became more and more abhorrent .
translation: 私は、ヴィンセントがますます忌まわしい存在になるにつれて、自分がますます苛立ちと無関心を感じるようになっているのに気づきました。
back_translation: I realized that as Vincent became more and more of a detestable presence, I was feeling increasingly frustrated and indifferent.

text: it 's like an all-star salute to disney 's cheesy commercialism .
translation: それはディズニーの安っぽい商業主義へのオールスターのお祝いのようです。
back_translation: It seems like an all-star celebration of Disney's cheap commercialism.

text: like a bad improvisation exercise , the superficially written characters ramble on tediously about their lives , loves and the art they 're struggling to create .
translation: まるで悪い即興演技の練習のように、表面的に書かれたキャラクターたちは、自分たちの人生や愛、そして苦労して創り出そうとしているアートについて退屈にしゃべり続ける。
back_translation: Like a bad improv performance, the superficially written characters continue to talk boringly about their lives, love, and the art they are struggling to create.

text: though her fans will assuredly have their funny bones tickled , others will find their humor-seeking dollars best spent elsewhere .
translation: ファンは間違いなく笑いのツボを刺激されるでしょうが、他の人はユーモアを求めるお金を別のところで使った方が良いと感じるでしょう。
back_translation: Fans will undoubtedly have their funny bone tickled, but others may feel it's better to spend their money seeking humor elsewhere.

text: the first fatal attraction was vile enough .
translation: 最初の致命的な魅力は十分にひどかった。
back_translation: The initial fatal attraction was bad enough.

text: a sentimental but entirely irresistible portrait of three aging sisters .
translation: 感傷的でありながら全く抵抗できない、三人の年老いた姉妹の肖像。
back_translation: A portrait of three elderly sisters that is sentimental yet completely irresistible.

text: measured against practically any like-themed film other than its oscar-sweeping franchise predecessor the silence of the lambs , red dragon rates as an exceptional thriller .
translation: 「ハンニバル」の前作である「羊たちの沈黙」を除けば、同じテーマの映画と比較しても、「レッドドラゴン」は優れたスリラーとして評価されます。
back_translation: Except for the previous film "The Silence of the Lambs," "Red Dragon" is regarded as an excellent thriller compared to other movies with similar themes.

text: and as with most late-night bull sessions , eventually the content is n't nearly as captivating as the rowdy participants think it is .
translation: そして、ほとんどの深夜の談義と同様に、最終的には内容が賑やかな参加者たちが思っているほど魅力的ではない。
back_translation: And, like most late-night conversations, in the end, the content is not as captivating as the lively participants believe it to be.

text: ... a quietly introspective portrait of the self-esteem of employment and the shame of losing a job ...
translation: ...雇用の自己評価と仕事を失うことの恥に関する静かに内省的な肖像...
back_translation: ...a quietly introspective portrait of self-evaluation in employment and the shame of losing a job...

text: garcia and the other actors help make the wobbly premise work .
translation: ガルシアと他の俳優たちがその不安定な前提を機能させるのを助けている。
back_translation: García and the other actors help make that unstable premise work.

text: it 's just plain lurid when it is n't downright silly .
translation: 単に衝撃的で、時には全く馬鹿げている。
back_translation: It's simply shocking, and at times completely ridiculous.

text: friday after next is the kind of film that could only be made by african-americans because of its broad racial insensitivity towards african-americans .
translation: 「次の金曜日」は、アフリカ系アメリカ人にしか作れない映画であり、アフリカ系アメリカ人に対する広範な人種に対する無神経さが表れています。
back_translation: "Next Friday" is a film that can only be made by African Americans and reflects a broad insensitivity towards racism against African Americans.

text: it is also beautifully acted .
translation: それは美しく演じられています。
back_translation: It is beautifully performed.

text: this dubious product of a college-spawned -lrb- colgate u. -rrb- comedy ensemble known as broken lizard plays like a mix of cheech and chong and chips .
translation: この大学発のコメディアンサンブル「ブロークンリザード」の疑わしい作品は、チーチ＆チョンとチップスの混合のように展開する。
back_translation: This university-based comedy ensemble "Broken Lizard" unfolds like a mix of Cheech & Chong and chips.

text: all three actresses are simply dazzling , particularly balk , who 's finally been given a part worthy of her considerable talents .
translation: 3人の女優は皆素晴らしく、特にバルクは彼女の才能に見合った役をようやく与えられました。
back_translation: All three actresses were wonderful, and especially Bulk was finally given a role that suited her talent.

text: ... a powerful sequel and one of the best films of the year .
translation: ...力強い続編であり、今年の最高の映画の一つです。
back_translation: ...a powerful sequel and one of the best films of the year.

text: it 's about individual moments of mood , and an aimlessness that 's actually sort of amazing .
translation: それは、個々の気分の瞬間と、実際には驚くべき無目的さについてのことです。
back_translation: It is about the fleeting moments of individual moods and, in fact, remarkable aimlessness.

text: a gift to anyone who loves both dance and cinema
translation: ダンスと映画の両方を愛する人への贈り物
back_translation: A gift for someone who loves both dance and movies.

text: such a wildly uneven hit-and-miss enterprise , you ca n't help suspecting that it was improvised on a day-to-day basis during production .
translation: 非常に不均衡なヒットまたはミスの企業であり、制作中に日々即興で行われていたのではないかと疑わずにはいられません。
back_translation: It is a company with extremely unbalanced hits and misses, and I can't help but wonder if it was being improvised on a daily basis during production.

text: the new film of anton chekhov 's the cherry orchard puts the ` ick ' in ` classic . '
translation: アントン・チェーホフの新しい映画『桜の園』は、クラシックに「ゲンナリ」をもたらす。
back_translation: Anton Chekhov's new film "The Cherry Orchard" brings a sense of "disappointment" to the classic.

text: poor editing , bad bluescreen , and ultra-cheesy dialogue highlight the radical action .
translation: 拙い編集、悪いブルースクリーン、そして超チープなセリフが過激なアクションを際立たせています。
back_translation: Clumsy editing, bad blue screens, and super cheap dialogue highlight the intense action.

text: if welles was unhappy at the prospect of the human race splitting in two , he probably would n't be too crazy with his great-grandson 's movie splitting up in pretty much the same way .
translation: ウェルズが人類が二つに分かれる見通しに不満だったのなら、彼のひ孫の映画がほぼ同じように分かれることにあまり喜ばないかもしれません。
back_translation: If Wells was dissatisfied with the prospect of humanity dividing into two, his great-grandson might not be very pleased with the fact that his movie is almost similarly divided.

text: passions , obsessions , and loneliest dark spots are pushed to their most virtuous limits , lending the narrative an unusually surreal tone .
translation: 情熱、執着、そして最も孤独な暗い場所がその最も美徳に満ちた限界まで押し上げられ、物語に異様にシュールなトーンを与えている。
back_translation: Passion, obsession, and the darkest, loneliest places are pushed to their most virtuous limits, giving the story an unusually surreal tone.

text: definitely a crowd-pleaser , but then , so was the roman colosseum .
translation: 間違いなく観衆を魅了するものですが、ローマのコロッセオもそうでした。
back_translation: It is undoubtedly something that fascinates the audience, just like the Colosseum in Rome.

text: this story of a determined woman 's courage to find her husband in a war zone offers winning performances and some effecting moments .
translation: 戦争地域で夫を見つけるために奮闘する女性の勇気の物語は、素晴らしい演技と感動的な瞬間を提供します。
back_translation: The story of a woman's courage as she struggles to find her husband in a war-torn area offers wonderful performances and touching moments.

text: well made but uninvolving , bloodwork is n't a terrible movie , just a stultifyingly obvious one -- an unrewarding collar for a murder mystery .
translation: よく作られているが没入感がない『ブラッドワーク』は、ひどい映画ではないが、あまりにも明白すぎる映画だ。殺人ミステリーには報酬のない作品である。
back_translation: "Bloodwork" is well-made but lacks immersion; it is not a terrible movie, but it is far too obvious. It’s a murder mystery that offers no rewards.

text: ... expands the horizons of boredom to the point of collapse , turning into a black hole of dullness , from which no interesting concept can escape .
translation: 退屈の地平線を崩壊するまで広げ、退屈のブラックホールに変わり、そこからはどんな興味深い概念も逃れることができない。
back_translation: Expand until the horizon of boredom collapses, transforming into a black hole of boredom from which no intriguing concept can escape.

text: as steamy as last week 's pork dumplings .
translation: 先週の豚餃子と同じくらい蒸し暑い。
back_translation: It's as humid as last week's pork dumplings.

text: the story itself it mostly told through on-camera interviews with several survivors , whose riveting memories are rendered with such clarity that it 's as if it all happened only yesterday .
translation: 物語自体は、数人の生存者へのカメラインタビューを通じて主に語られています。彼らの心を打つ記憶は非常に鮮明に描かれており、まるでそれが昨日の出来事であるかのようです。
back_translation: The story itself is primarily told through camera interviews with several survivors. Their poignant memories are vividly depicted, as if the events occurred just yesterday.

text: the movie is clever , offbeat and even gritty enough to overcome my resistance .
translation: その映画は賢く、独特で、抵抗を乗り越えるのに十分な粗さがあります。
back_translation: The movie is clever, unique, and sufficiently rough to overcome resistance.

text: another week , another gross-out college comedy -- ugh .
translation: もう一週間、また不快な大学コメディ -- うんざり。
back_translation: Another week of yet another unpleasant college comedy -- I'm fed up.

text: a laughable -- or rather , unlaughable -- excuse for a film .
translation: 笑えない、むしろ笑えない映画の言い訳。
back_translation: A movie that isn't funny, rather an excuse for not being funny.

text: too silly to take seriously .
translation: あまりにも愚かで真剣に受け止めることができない。
back_translation: It's too foolish to take seriously.

text: low comedy does n't come much lower .
translation: 低俗なコメディはこれ以上低くなることはありません。
back_translation: Vulgar comedy cannot get any lower than this.

text: it 's a very tasteful rock and roll movie .
translation: とてもセンスの良いロックンロール映画です。
back_translation: It's a very stylish rock and roll movie.

text: meticulously mounted , exasperatingly well-behaved film , which ticks off kahlo 's lifetime milestones with the dutiful precision of a tax accountant .
translation: 緻密に組み立てられ、苛立たしいほどに良く行儀の良い映画で、カーロの生涯のマイルストーンを税理士のような忠実な精度で刻んでいます。
back_translation: A meticulously crafted and annoyingly well-mannered film that marks the milestones of Carlo's life with the precision of a tax accountant.

text: davis ' candid , archly funny and deeply authentic take on intimate relationships comes to fruition in her sophomore effort .
translation: デイヴィスの率直で、巧妙に面白く、深く真摯な親密な関係に関する視点が、彼女の2作目の作品で実を結びます。
back_translation: Davis's candid, cleverly amusing, and deeply sincere perspective on intimate relationships comes to fruition in her second work.

text: a fast paced and suspenseful argentinian thriller about the shadow side of play .
translation: 遊びの影の側面についての、スピード感あふれたサスペンスフルなアルゼンチンのスリラー。
back_translation: A fast-paced, suspenseful Argentine thriller about the darker side of play.

text: ultimately the , yes , snail-like pacing and lack of thematic resonance make the film more silly than scary , like some sort of martha stewart decorating program run amok .
translation: 最終的に、はい、カタツムリのようなペースとテーマの響きの欠如が、この映画をもっとバカバカしく、怖いよりもマザー・ステュワートの装飾番組が狂ったようなものにしています。
back_translation: Ultimately, yes, the snail-like pace and lack of thematic resonance make this movie more ridiculous, turning it into something crazier than a Mother Stewart decoration show rather than being scary.

text: sewer rats could watch this movie and be so skeeved out that they 'd need a shower .
translation: sewerのネズミはこの映画を見て、あまりにも気持ち悪くなってシャワーが必要になるかもしれません。
back_translation: The sewer rats watching this movie might feel so grossed out that they’ll need a shower.

text: hard to resist .
translation: 抵抗するのが難しい。
back_translation: It's hard to resist.

text: there 's an excellent 90-minute film here ; unfortunately , it runs for 170 .
translation: ここには優れた90分の映画がありますが、残念ながら170分もあります。
back_translation: Here is an excellent 90-minute movie, but unfortunately, it is 170 minutes long.

text: director carl franklin , so crisp and economical in one false move , bogs down in genre cliches here .
translation: 監督のカール・フランクリンは、「ワン・フォールス・ムーブ」でシャープで経済的な演出を見せましたが、ここではジャンルのクリシェに埋もれてしまっています。
back_translation: Director Carl Franklin showcased a sharp and economical style in "One False Move," but here he gets buried in genre clichés.

text: like a precious and finely cut diamond , magnificent to behold in its sparkling beauty yet in reality it 's one tough rock .
translation: まるで貴重で美しくカットされたダイヤモンドのように、その輝く美しさは見る者を魅了しますが、実際にはそれは頑丈な岩です。
back_translation: Like a precious and beautifully cut diamond, its shining beauty captivates those who look at it, but in reality, it is a sturdy rock.

text: no cute factor here ... not that i mind ugly ; the problem is he has no character , loveable or otherwise .
translation: ここにはかわいさは全くない…見た目が悪いのは気にしないけれど、問題は彼に魅力がないことだ。愛されるところも、他のどんな点でも。
back_translation: There is absolutely no cuteness here... I don’t mind the bad appearance, but the problem is that he has no charm. There’s nothing lovable about him, or anything else for that matter.

text: suffers from its timid parsing of the barn-side target of sons trying to breach gaps in their relationships with their fathers .
translation: 父親との関係におけるギャップを埋めようとする息子たちのバンの側のターゲットに対する控えめな解析によって苦しんでいます。
back_translation: The sons are suffering from a modest analysis of the targets on their side of the van as they try to bridge the gap in their relationship with their fathers.

text: it 's a frankenstein-monster of a film that does n't know what it wants to be .
translation: それは、自分が何になりたいのか分からないフランケンシュタインの怪物のような映画です。
back_translation: It's a movie like Frankenstein's monster that doesn't know what it wants to be.

text: an incredibly narrow in-joke targeted to the tiniest segment of an already obscure demographic .
translation: 非常に狭いインジョークで、すでにあまり知られていないデモグラフィックの最小限のセグメントを対象にしています。
back_translation: It's an extremely niche inside joke targeting a minimal segment of a demographic that is already not very well known.

text: a knowing look at female friendship , spiked with raw urban humor .
translation: 女性の友情に対する知的な視線と、リアルな都市のユーモアが交じり合った作品。
back_translation: A work that intertwines an intellectual perspective on female friendship with the humor of a real city.

text: ... begins on a high note and sustains it beautifully .
translation: ...は高い音で始まり、美しくそれを維持します。
back_translation: ...starts with a high sound and beautifully maintains it.

text: the overall result is an intelligent , realistic portrayal of testing boundaries .
translation: 全体の結果は、限界を試す知的で現実的な描写です。
back_translation: The overall result is an intellectual and realistic depiction that tests the limits.

text: quaid is utterly fearless as the tortured husband living a painful lie , and moore wonderfully underplays the long-suffering heroine with an unflappable '50s dignity somewhere between jane wyman and june cleaver .
translation: クエイドは、苦しむ夫として痛ましい嘘を生きる中で全く恐れを知らず、ムーアは長年苦しんできたヒロインを、ジェーン・ワイマンとジュン・クリーバーの間にある揺るぎない1950年代の品格で素晴らしく抑制して演じている。
back_translation: Quaid is utterly fearless while living a painful lie as a suffering husband, and Moore wonderfully restrains her performance as the long-suffering heroine with the unwavering dignity of the 1950s, existing between Jane Wyman and June Cleaver.

text: most of the problems with the film do n't derive from the screenplay , but rather the mediocre performances by most of the actors involved
translation: 映画の多くの問題は脚本から生じているのではなく、むしろ関与するほとんどの俳優の平凡な演技から来ている。
back_translation: Many of the problems with movies do not stem from the script, but rather from the mediocre performances of most of the actors involved.

text: a poignant comedy that offers food for thought .
translation: 考えさせられる食事を提供する感動的なコメディ。
back_translation: A touching comedy that offers thought-provoking meals.

text: deuces wild treads heavily into romeo and juliet\/west side story territory , where it plainly has no business going .
translation: デュースワイルドはロミオとジュリエットやウエストサイドストーリーの領域に深く踏み込み、明らかにそこに存在するべきではない。
back_translation: Deus Wild deeply steps into the realm of Romeo and Juliet and West Side Story, clearly where it should not be.

text: there is no psychology here , and no real narrative logic -- just a series of carefully choreographed atrocities , which become strangely impersonal and abstract .
translation: ここには心理学もなく、実際の物語の論理もありません。ただ、慎重に振り付けられた残虐行為の連続があり、それは奇妙に非人間的で抽象的になります。
back_translation: There is no psychology here, nor is there any logic of real stories. There is only a carefully choreographed series of brutal acts that become strangely inhuman and abstract.

text: secretary manages a neat trick , bundling the flowers of perversity , comedy and romance into a strangely tempting bouquet of a movie .
translation: 『セクレタリー』は、ひねくれた花々、コメディ、ロマンスを巧みに束ね、奇妙に魅力的な映画のブーケを作り上げる素晴らしい作品です。
back_translation: "The Secretary" is a wonderful work that skillfully ties together twisted flowers, comedy, and romance to create a strangely captivating bouquet of film.

text: everything about it from the bland songs to the colorful but flat drawings is completely serviceable and quickly forgettable .
translation: 平凡な曲からカラフルだけど平面的な描画まで、それに関するすべては完全に機能的であり、すぐに忘れられるものです。
back_translation: From ordinary songs to colorful yet flat drawings, everything related to it is completely functional and easily forgettable.

text: this fascinating experiment plays as more of a poetic than a strict reality , creating an intriguing species of artifice that gives the lady and the duke something of a theatrical air .
translation: この魅力的な実験は、厳密な現実というよりも詩的なものとして展開し、女と公爵に劇的な雰囲気を与える興味深い人工物の種を生み出しています。
back_translation: This captivating experiment unfolds more as something poetic than as a strict reality, generating interesting artifacts that provide a dramatic atmosphere to the woman and the duke.

text: a few pieces of the film buzz and whir ; very little of it actually clicks .
translation: 映画はざわめきと音がするが、その多くは実際には響かない。
back_translation: Movies are full of hustle and noise, but much of it doesn't actually resonate.

text: ah-nuld 's action hero days might be over .
translation: アーノルドのアクションヒーローの時代は終わったかもしれない。
back_translation: The era of Arnold's action hero may be over.

text: the movie has a script -lrb- by paul pender -rrb- made of wood , and it 's relentlessly folksy , a procession of stagy set pieces stacked with binary oppositions .
translation: その映画には、ポール・ペンダーによる脚本があり、木でできており、ずっと素朴です。舞台のセットピースが二項対立で積み重ねられた行列のようです。
back_translation: The movie features a script by Paul Pender, is made of wood, and is very rustic. The stage set pieces resemble a lineup stacked in a binary opposition.

text: the filmmakers ' eye for detail and the high standards of performance convey a strong sense of the girls ' environment .
translation: 映画製作者の細部へのこだわりと高いパフォーマンス基準が、少女たちの環境を強く感じさせる。
back_translation: The filmmaker's attention to detail and high performance standards strongly convey the environment of the girls.

text: it also shows how deeply felt emotions can draw people together across the walls that might otherwise separate them .
translation: それはまた、深く感じられる感情が、そうでなければ人々を隔てるかもしれない壁を越えて人々を結びつけることができることを示しています。
back_translation: This also shows that deep-feeling emotions can connect people beyond the walls that might otherwise separate them.

text: even accepting this in the right frame of mind can only provide it with so much leniency .
translation: このことを適切な心構えで受け入れることさえも、それに対して限られた寛容さを与えることしかできない。
back_translation: Even just accepting this with the right mindset can only allow for a limited tolerance towards it.

text: it 's at once laughable and compulsively watchable , in its committed dumbness .
translation: それは一見滑稽でありながら、執拗に見入ってしまうもので、その徹底的な愚かさにおいて魅力的です。
back_translation: At first glance, it seems absurd, yet it is so engrossing that one cannot look away, and it is captivating in its relentless foolishness.

text: they threw loads of money at an idea that should 've been so much more even if it was only made for teenage boys and wrestling fans .
translation: 彼らは、ティーンエイジャーの男の子やレスリングファンのためだけに作られていたとしても、もっと多くなり得たアイデアにたくさんのお金を投じました。
back_translation: They invested a lot of money into ideas that could have become much more, even if they were originally made just for teenage boys or wrestling fans.

text: - west coast rap wars , this modern mob music drama never fails to fascinate .
translation: - ウェストコーストのラップ戦争、この現代のマフィア音楽ドラマは決して魅了することをやめません。
back_translation: - The West Coast rap wars, this modern mafia music drama never ceases to captivate.

text: as part of mr. dong 's continuing exploration of homosexuality in america , family fundamentals is an earnest study in despair .
translation: ドン氏のアメリカにおける同性愛の探求の一環として、「ファミリー・ファンダメンタルズ」は絶望における真摯な研究である。
back_translation: As part of Mr. Don's exploration of homosexuality in America, "Family Fundamentals" is a serious study in despair.

text: a movie more to be prescribed than recommended -- as visually bland as a dentist 's waiting room , complete with soothing muzak and a cushion of predictable narrative rhythms .
translation: 処方されるべき映画であり、推奨されるべき映画ではない -- 歯科医の待合室のように視覚的に bland で、心地よいミュージックと予測可能な物語のリズムのクッションが揃っています。
back_translation: It is a movie that should be prescribed, not recommended -- visually bland like a dental waiting room, with comfortable music and a predictable rhythm of the story.

text: all in all , brown sugar is a satisfying well-made romantic comedy that 's both charming and well acted .
translation: 全体として、ブラウンシュガーは魅力的で演技も素晴らしい、満足のいく質の高いロマンティックコメディです。
back_translation: Overall, Brown Sugar is an attractive and wonderfully acted romantic comedy of high quality that satisfies.

text: represents a worthy departure from the culture clash comedies that have marked an emerging indian american cinema .
translation: 新興インディアンアメリカンシネマを特徴づける文化的衝突コメディからの価値ある出発を示しています。
back_translation: It shows a valuable departure from the cultural clash comedies that characterize emerging Indian American cinema.

text: so bland and utterly forgettable that it might as well have been titled generic jennifer lopez romantic comedy .
translation: とても平凡で完全に忘れ去られてしまうほどなので、「一般的なジェニファー・ロペスのロマンティック・コメディ」とタイトルを付けてもよかったでしょう。
back_translation: It's so very ordinary and completely forgettable that it could have been titled "A Typical Jennifer Lopez Romantic Comedy."

text: a comedy that swings and jostles to the rhythms of life .
translation: 人生のリズムに合わせて揺れ動くコメディ。
back_translation: A comedy that sways in tune with the rhythm of life.

text: a stylish thriller .
translation: スタイリッシュなスリラー。
back_translation: A stylish thriller.

text: constantly touching , surprisingly funny , semi-surrealist exploration of the creative act .
translation: 一貫して感動的で、驚くほど面白く、セミ・シュルレアリスムの創造的行為の探求。
back_translation: Consistently moving, astonishingly interesting, and an exploration of the creative act of semi-surrealism.

text: birthday girl does n't try to surprise us with plot twists , but rather seems to enjoy its own transparency .
translation: バースデーガールは私たちを驚かせるためにプロットツイストを試みることはなく、むしろその透明性を楽しんでいるようです。
back_translation: The birthday girl doesn't seem to attempt a plot twist to surprise us; rather, she seems to enjoy that transparency.

text: a poky and pseudo-serious exercise in sham actor workshops and an affected malaise .
translation: 狭苦しくて偽りの真剣さを漂わせる役者ワークショップの中での作り物の不調。
back_translation: The artificial discomfort within the cramped atmosphere of an actor's workshop, where a false seriousness lingers.

text: that rare movie that works on any number of levels -- as a film of magic and whimsy for children , a heartfelt romance for teenagers and a compelling argument about death , both pro and con , for adults .
translation: あらゆるレベルで通用する珍しい映画――子供たちのための魔法と whimsy の映画、ティーンエイジャーのための心温まる恋愛、そして大人にとっての死についての賛否の説得力のある議論。
back_translation: A rare movie that appeals at every level—magic and whimsy for children, heartwarming romance for teenagers, and a compelling debate about death for adults.

text: the universal theme of becoming a better person through love has never been filmed more irresistibly than in ` baran . '
translation: 愛を通じてより良い人間になるという普遍的なテーマは、『バラン』ほど魅力的に描かれたことはありません。
back_translation: The universal theme of becoming a better person through love has never been depicted as compellingly as in "Balan."

text: there 's got to be a more graceful way of portraying the devastation of this disease .
translation: この病気の devastatio（破壊）を表現するより優雅な方法があるはずです。
back_translation: There must be a more elegant way to express the devastation of this disease.

text: unfolds as one of the most politically audacious films of recent decades from any country , but especially from france .
translation: 近年のどの国からも、特にフランスからの最も政治的に大胆な映画の一つとして展開されます。
back_translation: In recent years, it has emerged as one of the most politically daring films from any country, especially France.

text: the rock is destined to be the 21st century 's new `` conan '' and that he 's going to make a splash even greater than arnold schwarzenegger , jean-claud van damme or steven segal .
translation: ロックは21世紀の新しい「コナン」となる運命にあり、アーノルド・シュワルツェネッガー、ジャン＝クロード・バンダム、スティーブン・セガールよりもさらに大きなインパクトを与えるだろう。
back_translation: Rock is destined to become the new "Conan" of the 21st century, having an even greater impact than Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jean-Claude Van Damme, and Steven Seagal.

text: adults , other than the parents ... will be hard pressed to succumb to the call of the wild .
translation: 親以外の大人は、野生の呼びかけに屈するのが難しいだろう。
back_translation: Other adults besides parents may find it difficult to succumb to the call of the wild.

text: here , alas , it collapses like an overcooked soufflé .
translation: ここで、ああ、まるで焼きすぎたスフレのように崩れ落ちます。
back_translation: Here, oh, it crumbles like an overcooked soufflé.

text: plays like one long , meandering sketch inspired by the works of john waters and todd solondz , rather than a fully developed story .
translation: ジョン・ウォーターズやトッド・ソロンドズの作品に触発された、一本の長くて曲がりくねったスケッチのように演じられ、完全に発展した物語ではありません。
back_translation: It is performed like a long and winding sketch inspired by the works of John Waters and Todd Solondz, rather than being a fully developed story.

text: snow dogs finds its humour in a black man getting humiliated by a pack of dogs who are smarter than him
translation: スノードッグスは、黒人男性が自分より賢い犬の群れに屈辱を受けることでユーモアを見出しています。
back_translation: Snow Dogs finds humor in a black man being humiliated by a pack of dogs that are smarter than him.

text: before it takes a sudden turn and devolves into a bizarre sort of romantic comedy , steven shainberg 's adaptation of mary gaitskill 's harrowing short story ... is a brilliantly played , deeply unsettling experience .
translation: 突然の展開を迎え、奇妙なロマンティックコメディに変わる前に、スティーブン・シャインバーグによるメアリー・ゲイツキルの心をかき乱す短編小説の adaptación は、素晴らしい演技と深く不穏な体験です。
back_translation: Before it turns into a strange romantic comedy with a sudden twist, the adaptation of Mary Gateskill's unsettling short story by Steven Soderbergh is a remarkable showcase of acting and a deeply unsettling experience.

text: ... very funny , very enjoyable ...
translation: ... とても面白い、とても楽しい ...
back_translation: ... very interesting, very fun ...

text: the hackneyed story about an affluent damsel in distress who decides to fight her bully of a husband is simply too overdone .
translation: 裕福な困った姫を描いた使い古された物語が、彼女のいじめる夫に立ち向かうことを決意するのはあまりにもありふれています。
back_translation: It's all too common for a worn-out tale about a wealthy troubled princess to decide to confront her bullying husband.

text: ... with the gifted pearce on hand to keep things on semi-stable ground dramatically , this retooled machine is ultimately effective enough at achieving the modest , crowd-pleasing goals it sets for itself .
translation: 才能あるピアスが手元にいることで、劇的に物事をやや安定した状態に保つことができ、この改良された機械は最終的に自らが設定した控えめで観客を喜ばせる目標を達成するには十分な効果を持っています。
back_translation: Having a talented peer at hand can dramatically help keep things in a somewhat stable state, and this improved mechanism is sufficiently effective to ultimately achieve the modest and audience-pleasing goals it has set for itself.

text: much like its easily dismissive take on the upscale lifestyle , there is n't much there here .
translation: 高級なライフスタイルに対する簡単に無視できるような見方と同様に、ここにはあまり何もない。
back_translation: Just like the perspective that can easily overlook a luxurious lifestyle, there is not much here.

text: lathan and diggs carry the film with their charisma , and both exhibit sharp comic timing that makes the more hackneyed elements of the film easier to digest .
translation: ラサンとディッグスは彼らの魅力で映画を引っ張り、二人は鋭いコメディのタイミングを見せることで、映画のより陳腐な要素を消化しやすくしています。
back_translation: Lassan and Diggs drive the movie with their charm, and by showcasing their sharp comedic timing, they make the film's more clichéd elements easier to digest.

text: he has improved upon the first and taken it a step further , richer and deeper .
translation: 彼は最初のものを改善し、一歩進めて、より豊かで深いものにしました。
back_translation: He improved the first one, took a step further, and made it richer and deeper.

text: it 's a testament to de niro and director michael caton-jones that by movie 's end , we accept the characters and the film , flaws and all .
translation: デ・ニーロと監督マイケル・ケイトン＝ジョーンズの Testament により、映画の終わりまでには、私たちはキャラクターや映画を、欠点を含めて受け入れることができる。
back_translation: Thanks to De Niro and director Michael Caton-Jones in "Testament," by the end of the film, we can accept the characters and the movie, flaws and all.

text: this method almost never fails him , and it works superbly here .
translation: この方法は彼をほとんど裏切ることがなく、ここでも素晴らしく機能しています。
back_translation: This method hardly betrays him and works wonderfully here as well.

text: it 's technically sumptuous but also almost wildly alive .
translation: それは技術的には贅沢ですが、ほぼ狂おしいほど生き生きとしています。
back_translation: It is technically extravagant, but it is almost maddeningly lively.

text: a characteristically engorged and sloppy coming-of-age movie .
translation: 特徴的に膨れ上がっただらしない成長物語の映画。
back_translation: A uniquely inflated and messy growth story movie.

text: often likable , but just as often it 's meandering , low on energy , and too eager to be quirky at moments when a little old-fashioned storytelling would come in handy .
translation: しばしば好感が持てるが、同じくらいの頻度で、よどみがちで、エネルギーが低く、時にはちょっと奇抜になりすぎて、少し古典的なストーリーテリングが役立つ場面でそれが必要とされる。
back_translation: It is often likable, but equally often it tends to be stagnant, low-energy, and at times a bit too unconventional, where a more classic storytelling approach is needed.

text: rob schneider 's infantile cross-dressing routines fill the hot chick , the latest gimmick from this unimaginative comedian .
translation: ロブ・シュナイダーの幼稚なクロスドレッシングのルーチンが、彼の発想力のない最新作『ホット・チック』を満たしている。
back_translation: Rob Schneider's childish cross-dressing routine fills his uninspired latest work, "The Hot Chick."

text: ... the tale of her passionate , tumultuous affair with musset unfolds as sand 's masculine persona , with its love of life and beauty , takes form .
translation: ...サンドの男らしいペルソナが形を成す中で、彼女の情熱的で波乱に満ちたミュッセとの affair の物語が展開します。
back_translation: As the masculine persona of Sand takes shape, a story unfolds of her passionate and tumultuous affair with Musset.

text: it 's so devoid of joy and energy it makes even jason x ... look positively shakesperean by comparison .
translation: それは喜びとエネルギーが全く欠けていて、ジェイソンXでさえ比較するとポジティブにシェイクスピア的に見えてしまう。
back_translation: It completely lacks joy and energy, making even Jason X look positively Shakespearean by comparison.

text: a hypnotic portrait of this sad , compulsive life .
translation: この悲しげで強迫的な生活の催眠的な肖像。
back_translation: The hypnotic portrait of this sad and compulsive life.

text: an ugly , pointless , stupid movie .
translation: 醜くて無意味で愚かな映画。
back_translation: A film that is ugly, meaningless, and foolish.

text: a fascinating , unnerving examination of the delusions of one unstable man .
translation: 不安を覚える一人の不安定な男の妄想についての魅力的な検証。
back_translation: An intriguing exploration of the delusions of an unstable man who feels anxious.

text: a smart little indie .
translation: 賢い小さなインディー。
back_translation: Smart little indie.

text: a big meal of cliches that the talented cast generally chokes on .
translation: 才能あるキャストが一般的に苦しむ、クリシェの大きな食事。
back_translation: Talented casts generally struggle with cliché big meals.

text: ... what a banal bore the preachy circuit turns out to be
translation: ...説教じみたサーキットがどれほど平凡で退屈なものであるか。
back_translation: ...how ordinary and boring a preachy circuit can be.

text: goes on and on to the point of nausea .
translation: 気分が悪くなるまで続く。
back_translation: It continues until I feel sick.

text: i have a new favorite musical -- and i 'm not even a fan of the genre
translation: 私は新しいお気に入りのミュージカルができました -- しかも私はそのジャンルのファンではありません。
back_translation: I have found a new favorite musical -- and I'm not even a fan of that genre.

text: master of disguise runs for only 71 minutes and feels like three hours .
translation: 《変身の達人》は71分しかありませんが、3時間のように感じます。
back_translation: "The Master of Transformation" is only 71 minutes long, but it feels like 3 hours.

text: you 'll feel like you ate a reeses without the peanut butter ... '
translation: ピーナッツバターなしのリースのような気分になるでしょう...
back_translation: It feels like a wreath without peanut butter...

text: easily one of the best and most exciting movies of the year .
translation: 間違いなく今年最高で最もエキサイティングな映画の一つです。
back_translation: It is undoubtedly one of the best and most exciting movies of the year.

text: despite the surface attractions -- conrad l. hall 's cinematography will likely be nominated for an oscar next year -- there 's something impressive and yet lacking about everything .
translation: 表面的な魅力があるにもかかわらず、コンラッド・L・ホールの撮影は来年オスカーにノミネートされる可能性が高いが、すべてにおいて印象的でありながら欠けているものがある。
back_translation: Despite its superficial appeal, Conrad L. Hall's cinematography is likely to be nominated for an Oscar next year, but while it is impressive in every way, it lacks something.

text: broder 's screenplay is shallow , offensive and redundant , with pitifully few real laughs .
translation: ブローダーの脚本は浅薄で、不快で、冗長であり、笑えるシーンが痛々しいほど少ないです。
back_translation: The script of the wider is shallow, unpleasant, and redundant, with painfully few funny scenes.

text: looks more like a travel-agency video targeted at people who like to ride bikes topless and roll in the mud than a worthwhile glimpse of independent-community guiding lights .
translation: 独立したコミュニティの指導者たちの価値ある姿を垣間見るよりも、トップレスでバイクに乗ったり泥の中を転がったりするのが好きな人々をターゲットにした旅行代理店の動画のように見えます。
back_translation: It looks more like a travel agency video targeting people who enjoy riding bikes topless or rolling in the mud, rather than catching a glimpse of the valuable figures of independent community leaders.

text: that 's why sex and lucia is so alluring .
translation: それが「セックスとルシア」がこれほど魅力的な理由です。
back_translation: That is why "Sex and Lucia" is so captivating.

text: after an hour and a half of wondering -- sometimes amusedly , sometimes impatiently -- just what this strenuously unconventional movie is supposed to be , you discover that the answer is as conventional as can be .
translation: 1時間半にわたって、時には楽しんで、時には無耐な気持ちで、この非常に型破りな映画が一体何を目指しているのかを考え続けた後、その答えが極めて型通りのものであることに気づく。
back_translation: After spending an hour and a half, sometimes enjoying it and sometimes feeling impatient, pondering what this very unconventional movie is aiming for, I realize that the answer is remarkably conventional.

text: nettelbeck ... has a pleasing way with a metaphor .
translation: ネットルベックは、比喩に対する心地よい使い方を持っています。
back_translation: Net Lebec has a pleasant way of using metaphors.

text: a puzzle whose pieces do not fit .
translation: 合わないピースのパズル。
back_translation: A puzzle with pieces that don't fit.

text: a bit of a downer and a little over-dramatic at times , but this is a beautiful film for people who like their romances to have that french realism .
translation: 少し暗いところがあり、時折大げさですが、フランスのリアリズムを楽しむ人々には美しい映画です。
back_translation: It has a slightly dark tone and can be exaggerated at times, but it is a beautiful film for those who enjoy French realism.

text: after the first 10 minutes , which is worth seeing , the movie sinks into an abyss of clichés , depression and bad alternative music .
translation: 最初の10分が見ごたえがある後、映画はクリシェ、抑鬱、そして悪いオルタナティブ音楽の深淵に沈んでいきます。
back_translation: After the first 10 minutes are worthwhile, the movie sinks into clichés, depression, and the abyss of bad alternative music.

text: not everything in this ambitious comic escapade works , but coppola , along with his sister , sofia , is a real filmmaker .
translation: この野心的なコミックの冒険にはすべてがうまくいっているわけではありませんが、コッポラと彼の妹ソフィアは本物の映画製作者です。
back_translation: Not everything goes smoothly in this ambitious comic adventure, but Coppola and his sister Sofia are genuine filmmakers.

text: it 's fun , but it 's a real howler .
translation: 楽しいけれど、実際に面白いです。
back_translation: It's fun, but actually interesting.

text: even through its flaws , revolution # 9 proves to be a compelling , interestingly told film .
translation: 欠点があっても、『レボリューション #9』は魅力的で興味深い物語の映画であることが証明されています。
back_translation: Even with its flaws, "Revolution #9" has proven to be an intriguing and captivating story film.

text: just the labour involved in creating the layered richness of the imagery in this chiaroscuro of madness and light is astonishing .
translation: この狂気と光の明暗におけるイメージの層状の豊かさを創造するためにかかる労力は驚くべきものです。
back_translation: The effort required to create the layered richness of images in this madness and the interplay of light and dark is truly remarkable.

text: the case is a convincing one , and should give anyone with a conscience reason to pause .
translation: このケースは説得力があり、良心のある人には一旦立ち止まる理由を与えるべきです。
back_translation: This case is compelling and should give conscientious people a reason to pause.

text: no such thing breaks no new ground and treads old turf like a hippopotamus ballerina .
translation: そのようなものは、新しい地を切り開くことはなく、まるでヒッポポタマスのバレリーナのように古い道を踏みしめている。
back_translation: Such things do not break new ground and, like a hippopotamus ballerina, they tread upon old paths.

text: when twentysomething hotsies make movies about their lives , hard-driving narcissism is a given , but what a world we 'd live in if argento 's hollywood counterparts ... had this much imagination and nerve .
translation: 20代のホッティーたちが自分たちの人生について映画を作るとき、強い自己愛は当然のことですが、もしアルジェントのハリウッドの仲間たちがこれほどの想像力と勇気を持っていたら、どんな世界になるでしょう。
back_translation: When young hotties in their 20s make a movie about their lives, strong self-love is to be expected. But what kind of world would it be if Argento's Hollywood peers had such imagination and courage?

text: on its own , big trouble could be considered a funny little film .
translation: それ自体では、「ビッグ・トラブル」は面白い小さな映画と見なされるかもしれません。
back_translation: On its own, "Big Trouble" may be considered an interesting little movie.

text: -lrb- reynolds -rrb- takes a classic story , casts attractive and talented actors and uses a magnificent landscape to create a feature film that is wickedly fun to watch .
translation: -（レイノルズ）は、クラシックな物語を取り上げ、魅力的で才能ある俳優をキャスティングし、壮大な風景を利用して、見るのが非常に楽しい劇場映画を制作します。
back_translation: -Reynolds takes classic stories, casts charismatic and talented actors, and utilizes grand landscapes to create theatrical films that are incredibly enjoyable to watch.

text: if you 're content with a clever pseudo-bio that manages to have a good time as it doles out pieces of the famous director 's life , eisenstein delivers .
translation: もしあなたが有名な監督の人生の断片を提供しながら楽しい時間を過ごす巧妙な擬似バイオを満足しているなら、エイゼンシュタインはそれを実現します。
back_translation: If you're satisfied with a clever faux biography that provides fragments of a famous director's life while having a good time, Eisenstein will make it happen.

text: this is the kind of subject matter that could so easily have been fumbled by a lesser filmmaker , but ayres makes the right choices at every turn .
translation: これは、劣った映画制作者によって簡単に失敗する可能性のある題材ですが、エアーズは常に正しい選択をしています。
back_translation: This is a topic that could easily fail under inferior filmmakers, but Ayers always makes the right choice.

text: probes in a light-hearted way the romantic problems of individuals for whom the yearning for passion spells discontent .
translation: 軽やかな方法で、情熱への憧れが不満をもたらす個人の恋愛問題を探ります。
back_translation: We will explore the personal love problems of individuals where the longing for passion brings about dissatisfaction in a light-hearted manner.

text: it made me realize that we really have n't had a good cheesy b-movie playing in theaters since ... well ... since last week 's reign of fire .
translation: それは私に、実際に私たちは「先週のレイン・オブ・ファイア」以来、劇場で本当に良いチーズバイムービーが上映されていないことに気づかせました。
back_translation: That made me realize that, in fact, we haven't really had any good cheese-by movies in theaters since "Reign of Fire" last week.

text: ultimately this is a frustrating patchwork : an uneasy marriage of louis begley 's source novel -lrb- about schmidt -rrb- and an old payne screenplay .
translation: 結局、これは苛立たしい寄せ集めです：ルイ・ベグリーの原作小説（『アバウト・シュミット』）と古いペインの脚本の不安定な結婚です。
back_translation: In the end, this is a frustrating mishmash: an unstable marriage between Louis Begley's original novel ("About Schmidt") and an old screenplay by Payne.

text: ... once the true impact of the day unfolds , the power of this movie is undeniable .
translation: ...その日の真の影響が明らかになると、この映画の力は否定できなくなる。
back_translation: As the true impact of that day becomes clear, the power of this film cannot be denied.

text: this time , the hype is quieter , and while the movie is slightly less successful than the first , it 's still a rollicking good time for the most part .
translation: 今回は、期待感は控えめで、映画は前作よりやや成功度が低いものの、全体的には十分に楽しめる作品です。
back_translation: This time, the expectations are modest, and while the film is slightly less successful than the previous installment, overall it is an enjoyable work.

text: nothing more than a stifling morality tale dressed up in peekaboo clothing .
translation: ただの窮屈な道徳物語を、かくれんぼの衣装で着飾ったものに過ぎない。
back_translation: It's nothing more than a confined moral tale dressed up in a game of hide and seek.

text: this is the sort of low-grade dreck that usually goes straight to video -- with a lousy script , inept direction , pathetic acting , poorly dubbed dialogue and murky cinematography , complete with visible boom mikes .
translation: これは通常、ビデオに直行するような低級な駄作です。ひどい脚本、無能な演出、情けない演技、下手な吹き替えのダイアログ、見えるブームマイクを含む曖昧な撮影が揃っています。
back_translation: This is typically a low-quality work that goes straight to video. It features a terrible script, incompetent directing, pathetic acting, poorly dubbed dialogue, and vague cinematography that includes visible boom microphones.

text: every joke is repeated at least four times .
translation: すべてのジョークは少なくとも4回繰り返される。
back_translation: All jokes are repeated at least four times.

text: the gags , and the script , are a mixed bag .
translation: ギャグと脚本は、さまざまです。
back_translation: The gags and scripts vary.

text: and adults will at least have a dream image of the west to savor whenever the film 's lamer instincts are in the saddle .
translation: 大人たちは、映画のダメな本能が表れるときに楽しむための西部の夢のイメージを少なくとも持っているでしょう。
back_translation: Adults at least have a concept of the Western dream image to enjoy when the movie's bad instincts come to light.

text: the best film of the year 2002 .
translation: 2002年の最高の映画。
back_translation: The best movie of 2002.

text: blisteringly rude , scarily funny , sorrowfully sympathetic to the damage it surveys , the film has in kieran culkin a pitch-perfect holden .
translation: 非常に失礼で、恐ろしいほど面白く、調査する損傷に対して悲しげに同情するこの映画は、キーラン・カルキンが完璧なホールデンを演じています。
back_translation: This film, which is extremely rude, terrifyingly funny, and sadly sympathetic to the damage being investigated, features Kieran Culkin perfectly portraying Holden.

text: the first shocking thing about sorority boys is that it 's actually watchable .
translation: ソロリティボーイズの最初の衝撃的なことは、実際に見る価値があるということです。
back_translation: The first shocking thing about Sorority Boys is that it is actually worth watching.

text: a movie i loved on first sight and , even more important , love in remembrance .
