translation: 一目惚れした映画であり、さらに重要なことに、思い出の中で愛している映画です。
back_translation: It is a movie I fell in love with at first sight, and more importantly, it is a movie I love in my memories.

text: an overstylized , puréed mélange of sex , psychology , drugs and philosophy .
translation: 過剰にスタイライズされた、セックス、心理学、薬物、哲学のピューレ状の混合物。
back_translation: An excessively stylized, puréed mixture of sex, psychology, drugs, and philosophy.

text: this is a movie full of grace and , ultimately , hope .
translation: これは優雅さと最終的には希望に満ちた映画です。
back_translation: This is a film filled with grace and ultimately hope.

text: a documentary to make the stones weep -- as shameful as it is scary .
translation: 石が泣くようなドキュメンタリー -- 恥ずかしいほど恐ろしい。
back_translation: A documentary that makes stones cry -- terrifying to the point of embarrassment.

text: most haunting about `` fence '' is its conclusion , when we hear the ultimate fate of these girls and realize , much to our dismay , that this really did happen .
translation: 「フェンス」の最も心に残る点は、その結末です。私たちはこれらの女の子の最終的な運命を耳にし、非常に残念ながら、これは実際に起こったことだと理解します。
back_translation: The most memorable aspect of "The Fence" is its ending. We hear about the final fates of these girls and, unfortunately, we understand that this actually happened.

text: starts out ballsy and stylish but fails to keep it up and settles into clichés .
translation: 最初は大胆でスタイリッシュだが、持続できずに clichés に陥ってしまう。
back_translation: At first, it is bold and stylish, but it falls into clichés that cannot be sustained.

text: the film feels formulaic , its plot and pacing typical hollywood war-movie stuff , while the performances elicit more of a sense of deja vu than awe .
translation: この映画は型にはまった感じがし、プロットとペースは典型的なハリウッドの戦争映画のもので、演技は感嘆よりもむしろデジャヴを引き起こす。
back_translation: This movie feels formulaic, with a plot and pace typical of Hollywood war films, and the performances evoke more of a sense of déjà vu than admiration.

text: -lrb- i -rrb- t 's certainly laudable that the movie deals with hot-button issues in a comedic context , but barbershop is n't as funny as it should be .
translation: 映画が問題のあるテーマをコメディの文脈で扱っているのは確かに称賛に値しますが、『バーバーショップ』は期待されるほど面白くはありません。
back_translation: It is certainly commendable that the film addresses problematic themes within a comedic context, but "Barbershop" is not as entertaining as expected.

text: but the second half of the movie really goes downhill .
translation: しかし、映画の後半は本当に落ち込む。
back_translation: However, the second half of the movie is really depressing.

text: a well paced and satisfying little drama that deserved better than a ` direct-to-video ' release .
translation: 満足できるペースの良い小さなドラマで、'直接販売ビデオ' リリースよりももっと評価されるべき作品です。
back_translation: It is a satisfying, well-paced small drama that deserves more recognition than the 'direct-to-video' releases.

text: this misty-eyed southern nostalgia piece , in treading the line between sappy and sanguine , winds up mired in tear-drenched quicksand .
translation: この涙目の南部のノスタルジー作品は、感傷的と明るさの間を行き来し、涙にまみれた砂地にはまってしまう。
back_translation: This tearful work of Southern nostalgia oscillates between sentimentality and brightness, getting stuck in a sandpit drenched in tears.

text: the only fun part of the movie is playing the obvious game .
translation: 映画で唯一楽しい部分は、明らかなゲームをすることです。
back_translation: The only fun part of the movie is playing an obvious game.

text: an inconsequential , barely there bit of piffle .
translation: 重要でない、ほとんど存在しない退屈な無駄話。
back_translation: Unimportant, almost nonexistent boring small talk.

text: although fairly involving as far as it goes , the film does n't end up having much that is fresh to say about growing up catholic or , really , anything .
translation: それなりに引き込まれるものではあるが、映画はカトリックとして成長することや、実際には他の何についても新しいことをあまり言わないまま終わってしまう。
back_translation: While it is somewhat engaging, the film ends without really saying anything new about growing up as a Catholic or about anything else.

text: an engrossing story that combines psychological drama , sociological reflection , and high-octane thriller .
translation: 心理的ドラマ、社会的考察、そしてハイオクタンのスリラーを組み合わせた引き込まれる物語。
back_translation: A captivating story that combines psychological drama, social commentary, and high-octane thrills.

text: a gripping drama .
translation: 心を惹きつけるドラマ。
back_translation: A captivating drama.

text: it picked me up , swung me around , and dropped me back in my seat with more emotional force than any other recent film .
translation: それは私を拾い上げて、振り回し、最近のどの映画よりも感情的な力で私を席に戻しました。
back_translation: It picked me up, swung me around, and brought me back to my seat with more emotional power than any recent movie.

text: the pleasures that it does afford may be enough to keep many moviegoers occupied amidst some of the more serious-minded concerns of other year-end movies .
translation: それが提供する楽しみは、他の年末映画のより真剣な関心事の中でも、多くの映画鑑賞者を楽しませるのに十分かもしれません。
back_translation: The enjoyment it provides may be enough to entertain many movie viewers, even among the more serious interests of other year-end films.

text: its inescapable absurdities are tantamount to insulting the intelligence of anyone who has n't been living under a rock -lrb- since sept. 11 -rrb- .
translation: その避けがたい不条理は、岩の下に住んでいない誰にとっても知性を侮辱するのと同等である -lrb- 9月11日以降 -rrb- 。
back_translation: That unavoidable absurdity is equivalent to an insult to intelligence for anyone who does not live under a rock - (since) September 11.

text: a pretty decent kid-pleasing , tolerable-to-adults lark of a movie .
translation: 子供を喜ばせるためのかなり良い、成人には耐えられる楽しい映画。
back_translation: A pretty good, fun movie for children that adults can also enjoy.

text: as i settled into my world war ii memories , i found myself strangely moved by even the corniest and most hackneyed contrivances .
translation: 第二次世界大戦の思い出に浸るうちに、私は最も陳腐でありきたりな仕掛けでさえ、奇妙に心を動かされる自分に気づいた。
back_translation: As I immersed myself in memories of World War II, I became aware that I was strangely moved even by the most clichéd and ordinary devices.

text: the movie generates plot points with a degree of randomness usually achieved only by lottery drawing .
translation: その映画は、通常は宝くじの抽選によってのみ達成される程度のランダムnessでプロットポイントを生成します。
back_translation: The movie generates plot points with a level of randomness that is typically achieved only through a lottery draw.

text: classic cinema served up with heart and humor
translation: 心とユーモアを添えたクラシック映画
back_translation: Classic films with heart and humor.

text: there may have been a good film in `` trouble every day , '' but it is not what is on the screen .
translation: 「トラブル・エブリデイ」には良い映画があったかもしれませんが、画面に映っているのはそれではありません。
back_translation: "There may have been good movies in 'Trouble Everyday,' but what is shown on the screen is not that."

text: the result is an ` action film ' mired in stasis .
translation: 結果は、停滞に沈んだ『アクション映画』です。
back_translation: The result is a stagnant "action movie."

text: that 's because relatively nothing happens .
translation: それは比較的何も起こらないからです。
back_translation: That's because relatively nothing happens.

text: an authentically vague , but ultimately purposeless , study in total pandemonium .
translation: 本物の曖昧さを持ち、最終的には目的のない、完全な混沌の中での研究。
back_translation: Research in complete chaos, ultimately devoid of purpose, with genuine ambiguity.

text: but they do n't fit well together and neither is well told .
translation: しかし、それらはうまくまとまりがなく、どちらも十分に語られていません。
back_translation: However, they are poorly organized and neither is adequately discussed.

text: like most movies about the pitfalls of bad behavior ... circuit gets drawn into the party .
translation: 悪い行動の落とし穴についてのほとんどの映画のように、サーキットはパーティーに引き込まれていく。
back_translation: Like most movies about the pitfalls of bad behavior, the circuit is drawn into the party.

text: with dirty deeds , david caesar has stepped into the mainstream of filmmaking with an assurance worthy of international acclaim and with every cinematic tool well under his control -- driven by a natural sense for what works on screen .
translation: ダビッド・シーザーは、「ダーティ・デイズ」とともに映画製作の主流に踏み出し、国際的な称賛に値する自信を持ち、画面上で何が効果的かを自然に理解する感覚に駆り立てられながら、すべての映画製作ツールを巧みに操っています。
back_translation: David Caesar has stepped into the mainstream of filmmaking with "Dirty Days," confidently deserving of international acclaim, skillfully wielding all the tools of filmmaking while being driven by a natural understanding of what works effectively on screen.

text: oddly , the film is n't nearly as downbeat as it sounds , but strikes a tone that 's alternately melancholic , hopeful and strangely funny .
translation: 奇妙なことに、この映画は聞こえるほど暗いわけではなく、交互にメランコリックで希望に満ちており、奇妙に面白いトーンを奏でています。
back_translation: Strangely, this movie is not as dark as it sounds; it alternates between being melancholic and hopeful, playing a strangely humorous tone.

text: i 've never seen or heard anything quite like this film , and i recommend it for its originality alone .
translation: 私はこの映画のようなものを見たことも聞いたこともありませんし、独創性だけでも推薦します。
back_translation: I have never seen or heard anything like this movie, and I recommend it solely for its originality.

text: when the movie mixes the cornpone and the cosa nostra , it finds a nice rhythm .
translation: 映画がコーンポーンとコーサ・ノストラをミックスすると、良いリズムを見つけます。
back_translation: When movies mix corn pop and Cosa Nostra, they find a good rhythm.

text: ... there 's a choppy , surface-effect feeling to the whole enterprise .
translation: 全体の事業には、波立った表面的な感覚があります。
back_translation: The overall business has a turbulent superficial sensation.

text: it 's funny , touching , dramatically forceful , and beautifully shot .
translation: それは面白く、感動的で、劇的に力強く、美しく撮影されています。
back_translation: It is interesting, emotional, powerfully dramatic, and beautifully filmed.

text: a good documentary can make interesting a subject you thought would leave you cold .
translation: 良いドキュメンタリーは、あなたが無関心だと思っていたテーマを興味深くすることができます。
back_translation: A good documentary can make a theme that you thought you were indifferent to interesting.

text: this is a children 's film in the truest sense .
translation: これは真の意味での子供向けの映画です。
back_translation: This is a movie truly meant for children.

text: a very funny romantic comedy about two skittish new york middle-agers who stumble into a relationship and then struggle furiously with their fears and foibles .
translation: ニューヨークの中年男女二人が、偶然恋愛に落ちる非常に面白いロマンティックコメディで、彼らは自分の恐れや欠点と激しく葛藤します。
back_translation: A very funny romantic comedy about two middle-aged people in New York who accidentally fall in love, and they intensely struggle with their fears and flaws.

text: the movie does such an excellent job of critiquing itself at every faltering half-step of its development that criticizing feels more like commiserating .
translation: その映画は、自らの発展のあらゆるつまずきの半歩で自己批評を行うのが非常に優れているため、批判することはむしろ同情しているかのように感じられる。
back_translation: The movie excels at self-criticism through every stumbling block in its own development, making it feel like critiquing it is more akin to expressing sympathy.

text: a solid , spooky entertainment worthy of the price of a ticket .
translation: チケットの値段に見合う、しっかりとした不気味なエンターテインメントです。
back_translation: It's solid, creepy entertainment that matches the ticket price.

text: there are n't many conclusive answers in the film , but there is an interesting story of pointed personalities , courage , tragedy and the little guys vs. the big guys .
translation: 映画には決定的な答えはあまりありませんが、尖った個性、勇気、悲劇、そして小さな人々対大きな人々の興味深い物語があります。
back_translation: Movies often lack definitive answers, but they feature sharp personalities, courage, tragedy, and interesting stories about the small vs. the big.

text: plays like a series of vignettes -- clips of a film that are still looking for a common through-line .
translation: 一連の vignettes のようなプレイ - 共通のストーリーラインをまだ探している映画のクリップ。
back_translation: A series of vignettes-like play - clips from a movie still searching for a common storyline.

text: a film that begins with the everyday lives of naval personnel in san diego and ends with scenes so true and heartbreaking that tears welled up in my eyes both times i saw the film .
translation: サンディエゴの海軍関係者の日常生活から始まり、私がその映画を見た2回とも涙が溢れ出るほど本物で心が痛むシーンで終わる映画。
back_translation: The film starts with the daily life of a Navy personnel in San Diego and ends with scenes that are so real and heartbreaking that I was in tears both times I watched it.

text: leigh is one of the rare directors who feels acting is the heart and soul of cinema .
translation: レイは、演技が映画の核と魂であると感じる稀な監督の一人です。
back_translation: Ray is one of the rare directors who believes that acting is the core and soul of a film.

text: sitting in the third row of the imax cinema at sydney 's darling harbour , but i sometimes felt as though i was in the tiny two seater plane that carried the giant camera around australia , sweeping and gliding , banking and hovering over some of the most not
translation: シドニーのダーリングハーバーにあるIMAXシネマの3列目に座っているが、時にはオーストラリアを飛び回る巨大なカメラを載せた小さな2人乗りの飛行機にいるように感じることがあった。
back_translation: Sitting in the third row of the IMAX cinema in Darling Harbour, Sydney, there were times when I felt like I was in a small two-seater plane with a giant camera flying around Australia.

text: it 's more enjoyable than i expected , though , and that 's because the laughs come from fairly basic comedic constructs .
translation: 予想以上に楽しいですが、それは笑いが比較的基本的なコメディの構造から来ているからです。
back_translation: It's more enjoyable than I expected, but that's because the humor comes from a relatively basic structure of comedy.

text: it 's crafty , energetic and smart -- the kid is sort of like a fourteen-year old ferris bueller .
translation: それはずる賢く、エネルギッシュで賢いです — その子は14歳のフェリス・ビュラーのような感じです。
back_translation: It is cunning, energetic, and clever — the child feels like a 14-year-old Ferris Bueller.

text: the film does n't have enough innovation or pizazz to attract teenagers , and it lacks the novel charm that made spy kids a surprising winner with both adults and younger audiences .
translation: この映画は、ティーンエイジャーを惹きつけるほどの革新性や魅力が不足しており、スパイキッズが大人と若い観客の両方に驚くべき成功をもたらした独特の魅力も欠けています。
back_translation: This movie lacks the innovation and appeal needed to attract teenagers, and it also misses the unique charm that made Spy Kids an astonishing success with both adult and young audiences.

text: she boxes these women 's souls right open for us .
translation: 彼女はこれらの女性の魂を私たちのために開放します。
back_translation: She will free the souls of these women for us.

text: all the movie 's narrative gymnastics ca n't disguise the fact that it 's inauthentic at its core and that its story just is n't worth telling .
translation: 映画のすべての物語の技巧は、それが本質的に非本物であり、物語自体が語る価値がないという事実を隠すことはできない。
back_translation: The techniques of all movie stories cannot hide the fact that they are essentially inauthentic and that the story itself holds no value.

text: this is dicaprio 's best performance in anything ever , and easily the most watchable film of the year .
translation: これはディカプリオのこれまでの最高のパフォーマンスであり、間違いなく今年最も見やすい映画です。
back_translation: This is DiCaprio's best performance to date, and it is definitely the most enjoyable movie of the year.

text: though impostor deviously adopts the guise of a modern motion picture , it too is a bomb .
translation: インポスターは巧妙に現代の映画の姿を装っているが、それもまた爆弾だ。
back_translation: The impostor cleverly disguises itself as a modern movie, but that too is a bomb.

text: jolie gives it that extra little something that makes it worth checking out at theaters , especially if you 're in the mood for something more comfortable than challenging .
translation: ジョリーは、それを観る価値のある特別な何かを与えており、特に挑戦的なものよりも居心地の良いものを求めているときには、劇場でチェックする価値があります。
back_translation: Jolie offers something special that is worth watching, and it's definitely worth checking out in theaters, especially when you're looking for something comfortable rather than particularly challenging.

text: one key problem with these ardently christian storylines is that there is never any question of how things will turn out .
translation: これらの熱心なクリスチャンのストーリーラインの一つの重要な問題は、物事がどのように進展するかについての疑問が決してないということです。
back_translation: One important issue with these enthusiastic Christian storylines is that there is never any doubt about how things will progress.

text: other than the slightly flawed -lrb- and fairly unbelievable -rrb- finale , everything else is top shelf .
translation: 少し欠点があり（-lrb-）かなり信じがたい（-rrb-）結末を除けば、他のすべては一級品です。
back_translation: Aside from a few flaws (which are quite unbelievable), everything else is first-class.

text: a summer entertainment adults can see without feeling embarrassed , but it could have been more .
translation: 大人が恥ずかしさを感じることなく楽しめる夏のエンターテインメントですが、もっと良かったかもしれません。
back_translation: It is summer entertainment that adults can enjoy without feeling embarrassed, but it could have been better.

text: `` bad '' is the operative word for `` bad company , '' and i do n't mean that in a good way .
translation: 「悪い」という言葉は「悪い仲間」を指す重要な言葉であり、それを良い意味ではありません。
back_translation: The word "bad" is an important term that refers to "bad companions," and it does not have a good meaning.

text: seriously , rent the disney version .
translation: 真剣に、ディズニー版をレンタルしてみてください。
back_translation: Seriously, try renting the Disney version.

text: the immersive powers of the giant screen and its hyper-realistic images are put to perfect use in the breathtakingly beautiful outer-space documentary space station 3d .
translation: 巨型スクリーンの没入感とそのハイパーリアリスティックな映像は、息をのむほど美しい宇宙ドキュメンタリー『スペースステーション 3D』で完璧に活用されています。
back_translation: The immersive experience of the giant screen and its hyper-realistic visuals are perfectly utilized in the breathtakingly beautiful space documentary "Space Station 3D."

text: it 's difficult to imagine that a more confused , less interesting and more sloppily made film could possibly come down the road in 2002 .
translation: 2002年には、これまでよりも混乱し、興味が薄く、雑に作られた映画が現れるとは想像しがたい。
back_translation: In 2002, it is hard to imagine that movies would emerge that are more chaotic, less engaging, and poorly made than ever before.

text: as they used to say in the 1950s sci-fi movies , signs is a tribute to shyamalan 's gifts , which are such that we 'll keep watching the skies for his next project .
translation: 1950年代のSF映画でよく言われたように、『サイン』はシャマランの才能への賛辞であり、私たちは彼の次のプロジェクトのために空を見上げ続けることでしょう。
back_translation: As often mentioned in 1950s sci-fi movies, "Signs" is a tribute to Shyamalan's talent, and we will continue to look up at the sky for his next project.

text: the only pain you 'll feel as the credits roll is your stomach grumbling for some tasty grub .
translation: エンドロールが流れる頃に感じる唯一の痛みは、美味しい食べ物を求めてお腹が鳴ることです。
back_translation: The only pain I feel when the end credits roll is my stomach growling for delicious food.

text: in visual fertility treasure planet rivals the top japanese animations of recent vintage .
translation: 『ビジュアル・ファーティリティ』は、最近の日本のアニメーションの中でトップのものと肩を並べる。
back_translation: "Visual Fertility" stands alongside the top works in recent Japanese animation.

text: if you go , pack your knitting needles .
translation: 行くなら、編み針を持っていってください。
back_translation: If you go, please take your knitting needles with you.

text: call me a cold-hearted curmudgeon for not being able to enjoy a mindless action movie , but i believe a movie can be mindless without being the peak of all things insipid .
translation: 私を冷酷で偏屈な人間だと言っても構わないが、単調なアクション映画を楽しめないことには理由がある。映画は無思考であっても、すべての物事の退屈さの頂点である必要はないと私は信じている。
back_translation: You can call me a cold-hearted and eccentric person, but there is a reason why I can't enjoy monotonous action movies. I believe that even if a movie is thoughtless, it doesn't have to be the pinnacle of boredom.

text: assured , vital and well wrought , the film is , arguably , the most accomplished work to date from hong kong 's versatile stanley kwan .
translation: 確信を持って言えば、重要で練り上げられたこの映画は、香港の多才なスタンリー・クワンによる今までの最も優れた作品であると言えるでしょう。
back_translation: Confidently speaking, this important and refined film can be said to be the best work so far by Hong Kong's versatile Stanley Kwan.

text: notwithstanding my problem with the movie 's final half hour , i 'm going to recommend secretary , based on the wonderful acting clinic put on by spader and gyllenhaal , and also the unique way shainberg goes about telling what at heart is a sweet little girl -
translation: 映画の最後の30分には問題があるものの、スパイダーとジレンホールによる素晴らしい演技クリニックに基づいて、「セクレタリー」を推薦します。また、シェインバーグが本質的には可愛らしい女の子の物語を語るユニークな方法も評価できます。
back_translation: While there are issues with the last 30 minutes of the movie, I recommend "Secretary" based on the wonderful performance clinic by Spider and Gyllenhaal. I also appreciate the unique way in which Shainberg tells the essentially charming story of a girl.

text: the big ending surprise almost saves the movie .
translation: 大きなエンディングの驚きが映画をほぼ救う。
back_translation: The big surprise ending almost saves the movie.

text: an ill-conceived jumble that 's not scary , not smart and not engaging .
translation: 恐ろしくもなく、賢くもなく、引きつけるものもない、考えの足りないごちゃ混ぜです。
back_translation: It's not frightening, it's not intelligent, and it has nothing appealing; it's a confused jumble lacking thought.

text: what we get in feardotcom is more like something from a bad clive barker movie .

text: functions as both a revealing look at the collaborative process and a timely , tongue-in-cheek profile of the corporate circus that is the recording industry in the current climate of mergers and downsizing .

back_translation: While clarifying the process of collaboration, it timely profiles the circus of the music industry with irony in the current climate of mergers and downsizing.

text: reign of fire is hardly the most original fantasy film ever made -- beyond road warrior , it owes enormous debts to aliens and every previous dragon drama -- but that barely makes it any less entertaining .
translation: 「レイン・オブ・ファイア」は、今まで作られた中で最も独創的なファンタジー映画とは言えないが、ロード・ウォリアーを超えて、エイリアンやこれまでのすべてのドラゴン・ドラマに多くの借りがある。しかし、それでもなお、楽しさが減ることはほとんどない。
back_translation: "Reign of Fire" may not be the most original fantasy film ever made, but it exceeds "The Road Warrior" and owes a lot to "Alien" and all previous dragon dramas. Nonetheless, it remains incredibly entertaining.

text: the comedy death to smoochy is a rancorous curiosity : a movie without an apparent audience .
translation: コメディ映画『デス・トゥ・スムーチー』は、明らかな観客のいない悪意に満ちた好奇心の作品です。
back_translation: The comedy film "Death to Smoochy" is a work filled with obvious malice and curiosity, devoid of any audience.

text: turns a potentially interesting idea into an excruciating film school experience that plays better only for the film 's publicists or for people who take as many drugs as the film 's characters
translation: 潜在的に興味深いアイデアを、映画の広報担当者や映画のキャラクターと同じくらい薬をたくさん摂取する人々にしか楽しめない苦痛な映画学校の体験に変えてしまう。
back_translation: It transforms potentially interesting ideas into a painful film school experience that can only be enjoyed by people who consume as many drugs as film publicists or film characters.

text: one of those strained caper movies that 's hardly any fun to watch and begins to vaporize from your memory minutes after it ends .
translation: 観るのがほとんど楽しくない、終了後数分で記憶から消えてしまうような、ひどく緊張感のある密輸映画の一つ。
back_translation: One of those extremely tense smuggling movies that is hardly enjoyable to watch and fades from memory just a few minutes after it's over.

text: there 's no denying that burns is a filmmaker with a bright future ahead of him .
translation: バーンズが将来有望な映画監督であることは否定できない。
back_translation: It is undeniable that Barnes is a promising film director.

text: a film that loses sight of its own story .
translation: 自分のストーリーを見失う映画。
back_translation: A movie that makes you lose sight of your own story.

text: where tom green stages his gags as assaults on america 's knee-jerk moral sanctimony , jackass lacks aspirations of social upheaval .
translation: トム・グリーンがアメリカの即時的な道徳的ひとりよがりに対する攻撃としてギャグを展開するのに対し、ジャッカスは社会的な変革の志を欠いている。
back_translation: While Tom Green uses humor as an attack against America's immediate moral self-righteousness, Jackass lacks the ambition for social change.

text: these self-styled athletes have banged their brains into the ground so frequently and furiously , their capacity to explain themselves has gone the same way as their natural instinct for self-preservation .
translation: これらの自称アスリートは、頻繁かつ激しく頭を地面に打ち付けてきたため、自分自身を説明する能力は、自己保存の本能と同様に失われてしまった。
back_translation: These self-proclaimed athletes have frequently and violently smashed their heads against the ground, resulting in the loss of their ability to describe themselves, similar to the instinct for self-preservation.

text: a fascinating documentary about the long and eventful spiritual journey of the guru who helped launch the new age .
translation: 新時代を切り開く手助けをした guru の長くて波乱に満ちた精神的旅路についての魅力的なドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: An intriguing documentary about the long and tumultuous spiritual journey of a guru who helped pave the way for a new era.

text: the film has the courage of its convictions and excellent performances on its side .
translation: その映画は自らの信念に対する勇気と優れた演技が味方しています。
back_translation: The movie is supported by courage in one's beliefs and excellent performances.

text: a loud , ugly , irritating movie without any of its satirical salvos hitting a discernible target .
translation: 大きな音で、醜く、イライラさせる映画で、風刺的な攻撃が明確な標的に当たることはない。
back_translation: A loud, ugly, and frustrating movie that doesn't clearly hit a satirical target.

text: there 's plenty to impress about e.t.
translation: E.T.には感心させられる要素がたくさんあります。
back_translation: There are many impressive elements in E.T.

text: the pianist -lrb- is -rrb- a supremely hopeful cautionary tale of war 's madness remembered that we , today , can prevent its tragic waste of life .
translation: 「ピアニスト」は、戦争の狂気を思い出させる非常に希望に満ちた警告の物語であり、私たちが今日、その悲劇的な命の無駄を防ぐことができることを示しています。
back_translation: "The Pianist" is a deeply hopeful cautionary tale that reminds us of the madness of war and shows that we can prevent such tragic loss of life today.

text: topics that could make a sailor blush - but lots of laughs .
translation: 水夫を赤面させるかもしれないトピック - でも笑いがたくさん。
back_translation: Topics that might embarrass sailors - but there's plenty of laughter.

text: never decides whether it wants to be a black comedy , drama , melodrama or some combination of the three .
translation: それはブラックコメディ、ドラマ、メロドラマのいずれか、またはその三つの組み合わせになりたいのか、決して決まらない。
back_translation: It can never be decided whether it wants to be a black comedy, a drama, a melodrama, or a combination of all three.

text: has the rare capability to soothe and break your heart with a single stroke .
translation: 一撃で心を癒し、壊すという稀な能力を持っています。
back_translation: It has a rare ability to heal and break the heart in a single blow.

text: a conventional , but well-crafted film about a historic legal battle in ireland over a man 's right to raise his own children .
translation: アイルランドにおける男性の子供を育てる権利に関する歴史的な法廷闘争についての、従来型だが巧妙に作られた映画。
back_translation: A traditionally structured yet cleverly crafted film about the historical courtroom battles concerning the rights of men to raise children in Ireland.

text: those 24-and-unders looking for their own caddyshack to adopt as a generational signpost may have to keep on looking .
translation: 自分たちの世代の象徴として受け入れることができるキャディ・シャックを探している24歳以下の人たちは、まだ探し続けなければならないかもしれません。
back_translation: Those under 24 who are looking for a symbol of their generation in Caddy Shack may still have to keep searching.

text: sadly , ` garth ' has n't progressed as nicely as ` wayne . '
translation: 残念ながら、『ガース』は『ウェイン』ほどうまく進展していません。
back_translation: Unfortunately, "Garth" is not progressing as well as "Wayne."

text: the story of trouble every day ... is so sketchy it amounts to little more than preliminary notes for a science-fiction horror film , and the movie 's fragmentary narrative style makes piecing the story together frustrating difficult .
translation: 「トラブル・エブリデイ」の話は非常にざっくりしており、サイエンスフィクションホラー映画のための予備的なメモに過ぎないと言えます。また、映画の断片的な語り口は、ストーリーをつなぎ合わせるのを非常に難しくし、苛立たしさを増しています。
back_translation: The story of "Trouble Every Day" is very rough and can be said to be merely preliminary notes for a science fiction horror film. Additionally, the fragmented narrative style of the film makes it extremely difficult to piece the story together, increasing the frustration.

text: -lrb- t -rrb- he ideas of revolution # 9 are more compelling than the execution
translation: 革命9のアイデアは、実行よりもより魅力的である。
back_translation: The idea of Revolution 9 is more appealing than the execution.

text: most of the information has already appeared in one forum or another and , no matter how broomfield dresses it up , it tends to speculation , conspiracy theories or , at best , circumstantial evidence .
translation: ほとんどの情報はすでにいくつかのフォーラムで登場しており、ブールフィールドがどんなにそれを飾り立てても、推測や陰謀論、せいぜい状況証拠にとどまる傾向があります。
back_translation: Most of the information has already appeared in several forums, and no matter how much Bullfield embellishes it, it tends to remain speculation, conspiracy theories, or at best, circumstantial evidence.

text: consider the film a celluloid litmus test for the intellectual and emotional pedigree of your date and a giant step backward for a director i admire .
translation: その映画をあなたのデートの知的および感情的な血統のセロイドリトマス試験として考え、私が尊敬する監督にとっては大きな後退だと思ってください。
back_translation: Consider that movie as a litmus test for the intellectual and emotional pedigree of your date, and think of it as a significant setback for a director I respect.

text: imagine -lrb- if possible -rrb- a pasolini film without passion or politics , or an almodovar movie without beauty or humor , and you have some idea of the glum , numb experience of watching o fantasma .
translation: パゾリーニの映画が情熱や政治なしで、あるいはアルモドバルの映画が美しさやユーモアなしであることを想像してみてください。そして、それが「オ・ファンタズマ」を観る際の暗く麻痺した体験の一端を示していると言えるでしょう。
back_translation: Imagine Pasolini's films without passion or politics, or Almodóvar's films without beauty or humor. This could be seen as part of the dark and numbing experience of watching "O Fantasma."

text: just plain bad .
translation: ただ単に悪い。
back_translation: Simply bad.

text: although it tries to be much more , it 's really just another major league .
translation: それはもっと大きいものになろうと努力しているが、実際にはただの別のメジャーリーグに過ぎない。
back_translation: It strives to become something bigger, but in reality, it is just another major league.

text: when the screenwriter responsible for one of the worst movies of one year directs an equally miserable film the following year , you 'd have a hard time believing it was just coincidence .
translation: ある年の最悪の映画の脚本家が、翌年に同じくひどい映画を監督したとき、それが単なる偶然であるとは信じがたい。
back_translation: It's hard to believe that when the worst movie screenwriter of one year directed another terrible movie the following year, it was just a coincidence.

text: the entire movie establishes a wonderfully creepy mood .
translation: 映画全体が素晴らしく不気味な雰囲気を醸し出しています。
back_translation: The entire movie exudes a wonderfully eerie atmosphere.

text: director elie chouraqui , who co-wrote the script , catches the chaotic horror of war , but why bother if you 're going to subjugate truth to the tear-jerking demands of soap opera ?
translation: 脚本を共同執筆した監督エリー・シュラキは、戦争の混沌とした恐怖を捉えていますが、もし真実を涙を誘うソープオペラの要求に従属させるつもりなら、なぜそんなことをするのでしょうか？
back_translation: Director Ellie Shuraki, who co-wrote the screenplay, captures the chaotic horror of war, but if you intend to subordinate the truth to the demands of a tear-jerking soap opera, why would you do such a thing?

text: this is a movie so insecure about its capacity to excite that it churns up not one but two flagrantly fake thunderstorms to underscore the action .
translation: この映画は、自身の興奮させる力に対して非常に不安を抱いており、アクションを強調するためにあからさまに偽の雷雨を二つも生み出している。
back_translation: This movie is very anxious about its own ability to excite, and it blatantly creates two fake thunderstorms to emphasize the action.

text: if i want music , i 'll buy the soundtrack .
translation: 音楽が欲しいなら、サウンドトラックを買います。
back_translation: If you want music, buy the soundtrack.

text: this movie has the usual impossible stunts ... but it has just as many scenes that are lean and tough enough to fit in any modern action movie .
translation: この映画にはお決まりの不可能なスタントがあるが、同時にどんな現代のアクション映画にも合うような引き締まったタフなシーンが同じくらい多く含まれている。
back_translation: This movie has the usual impossible stunts, but at the same time, it contains just as many tight, tough scenes that fit any modern action film.

text: sometimes makes less sense than the bruckheimeresque american action flicks it emulates .
translation: 時には、それが模倣しているブルックハイマー風のアメリカンアクション映画よりも理解しづらいことがあります。
back_translation: Sometimes, it can be more difficult to understand than the American action movies in the style of Bruckheimer that it's imitating.

text: as a film director , labute continues to improve .
translation: 映画監督として、ラビュートは常に成長を続けている。
back_translation: As a film director, Labute is continually evolving.

text: a dark comedy that goes for sick and demented humor simply to do so .
translation: 病んだユーモアと捻じ曲がったユーモアを追求するダークコメディ。
back_translation: A dark comedy that explores sick humor and twisted humor.

text: lazily directed by charles stone iii ... from a leaden script by matthew cirulnick and novelist thulani davis .
translation: チャールズ・ストーンIIIによって怠惰に監督され、マシュー・シルリニックと小説家スラニ・デイビスによる重い脚本から作られた。
back_translation: Directed lazily by Charles Stone III, created from a heavy script by Matthew Silvianick and novelist Slani Davis.

text: the dialogue is cumbersome , the simpering soundtrack and editing more so .
translation: 対話は煩わしく、媚びるようなサウンドトラックと編集はさらにそうです。
back_translation: The dialogue is troublesome, and the soundtrack and editing, which seem to pander, make it even more so.

text: this is a film living far too much in its own head .
translation: これは、自分の頭の中に生きすぎている映画です。
back_translation: This is a movie that lives too much in my head.

text: pascale bailly 's rom-com provides amélie 's audrey tautou with another fabuleux destin -- i.e. , a banal spiritual quest .
translation: パスカル・バイリーのロマンティック・コメディは、アメリーのオドレイ・トトゥにもう一つの素晴らしい運命を与えます――つまり、平凡な精神的探求です。
back_translation: Pascal Baileys' romantic comedy gives Audrey Tautou from Amélie another wonderful destiny—namely, a mundane spiritual quest.

text: p.t. anderson understands the grandness of romance and how love is the great equalizer that can calm us of our daily ills and bring out joys in our lives that we never knew were possible .
translation: p.t. アンダーソンは、ロマンスの壮大さと愛が私たちの日常の苦痛を和らげ、私たちの人生に意外な喜びをもたらす偉大な平等者であることを理解しています。
back_translation: P.T. Anderson understands that the grandeur of romance and love are great equalizers that ease the daily pains of our lives and bring unexpected joy.

text: imagine o. henry 's the gift of the magi relocated to the scuzzy underbelly of nyc 's drug scene .
translation: O.ヘンリーの「マギの贈り物」をニューヨークの薬物シーンのごみごみした裏社会に置き換えて想像してみてください。
back_translation: Imagine O. Henry's "The Gift of the Magi" set in the gritty underworld of New York's drug scene.

text: i do n't know if frailty will turn bill paxton into an a-list director , but he can rest contentedly with the knowledge that he 's made at least one damn fine horror movie .
translation: 彼が「フレイルティ」によってビル・パクストンがAリストの監督になるかどうかは分からないが、彼は少なくとも素晴らしいホラー映画を1本作ったということを知って満足できるだろう。
back_translation: It is unclear whether Bill Paxton will become an A-list director due to "Frailty," but it is likely that he can be content knowing that he at least made one wonderful horror film.

text: large budget notwithstanding , the movie is such a blip on the year 's radar screen that it 's tempting just to go with it for the ride .
translation: 大きな予算にもかかわらず、その映画は今年のレーダー画面において非常に微小な存在であり、一緒に流れに任せるのも魅力的だ。
back_translation: Despite having a large budget, that movie is a very minimal presence on this year's radar screen, and it's tempting to just go with the flow.

text: `` frailty '' offers chills much like those that you get when sitting around a campfire around midnight , telling creepy stories to give each other the willies .
translation: 「脆さ」は、真夜中にキャンプファイヤーの周りに座って、気味の悪い話をしてお互いをぞっとさせるときと似たような寒気を提供します。
back_translation: "Fragility" offers a chill similar to when sitting around a campfire in the middle of the night, sharing creepy stories that send shivers down each other's spines.

text: despite modest aspirations its occasional charms are not to be dismissed .
translation: 控えめな願望にもかかわらず、その時折の魅力を軽視することはできない。
back_translation: Despite the modest desire, one cannot overlook the occasional charm.

text: any reasonably creative eighth-grader could have written a more credible script , though with the same number of continuity errors .
translation: 合理的に創造的な八年生なら、同じ数の連続性のエラーがあっても、もっと信じられる脚本を書けたでしょう。
back_translation: If a reasonably creative eighth grader were to write it, they could have created a more believable script even with the same number of continuity errors.

text: go , girls , right down the reality drain .
translation: 行け、女の子たち、現実の排水溝に真っ直ぐに。
back_translation: Go, girls, straight into the real sewer.

text: staggeringly dreadful romance .
translation: 驚くほどひどいロマンス。
back_translation: A surprisingly terrible romance.

text: a smart , compelling drama .
translation: 賢く、魅力的なドラマ。
back_translation: A smart and captivating drama.

text: thoughtless , random , superficial humour and a lot of very bad scouse accents
translation: 考えなしで無造作な表面的なユーモアと、非常にひどいスカウスのアクセントがたくさん。
back_translation: Thoughtless and careless superficial humor, along with a very terrible Scouse accent.

text: ... there 's enough cool fun here to warm the hearts of animation enthusiasts of all ages .
translation: ... ここには、すべての年齢のアニメーション愛好家の心を温めるのに十分なクールで楽しいものがあります。
back_translation: There are enough cool and fun things here to warm the hearts of animation enthusiasts of all ages.

text: deliciously slow .
translation: おいしくゆっくり。
back_translation: Deliciously and slowly.

text: the problem , amazingly enough , is the screenplay .
translation: 驚くべきことに、問題は脚本です。
back_translation: Surprisingly, the problem is the script.

text: offers an interesting look at the rapidly changing face of beijing .
translation: 急速に変化する北京の顔を興味深く見つめています。
back_translation: I am keenly observing the rapidly changing face of Beijing.

text: ... certainly an entertaining ride , despite many talky , slow scenes .
translation: ...多くの会話が多く、遅いシーンがあるにもかかわらず、確かに楽しませてくれる作品です。
back_translation: ...despite having many conversations and slow scenes, it is certainly a work that entertains.

text: an escapist confection that 's pure entertainment .
translation: 純粋なエンターテインメントの逃避的なお菓子。
back_translation: A pure entertainment escapist treat.

text: an amused indictment of jaglom 's own profession .
translation: ジャグロム自身の職業に対する面白おかしい非難。
back_translation: Humorous criticism of Jagrum's own profession.

text: so aggressively cheery that pollyana would reach for a barf bag .
translation: あまりにも陽気すぎて、ポリアンナもバーフバッグを探しに行くでしょう。
back_translation: It's so cheerful that even Pollyanna would go looking for a barf bag.

text: a worthy idea , but the uninspired scripts , acting and direction never rise above the level of an after-school tv special .
translation: 価値のあるアイデアですが、インスピレーションのない脚本、演技、演出は、放課後のテレビスペシャルのレベルを超えることはありません。
back_translation: It's a valuable idea, but a script, performance, and direction lacking inspiration doesn't go beyond the level of an after-school TV special.

text: beautifully shot , delicately scored and powered by a set of heartfelt performances , it 's a lyrical endeavour .
translation: 美しく撮影され、繊細な音楽が施され、心のこもった演技によって支えられた、これは叙情的な試みです。
back_translation: This is a lyrical attempt, beautifully photographed, adorned with delicate music, and supported by heartfelt performances.

text: pompous and garbled .
translation: もったいぶった難解な。
back_translation: Pretentiously difficult.

text: there 's a whole heap of nothing at the core of this slight coming-of-age\/coming-out tale .
translation: この微妙な成長物語／カミングアウトの物語の核心には、何もない。
back_translation: At the core of this subtle growth story / coming-out story, there is nothing.

text: for all its problems ... the lady and the duke surprisingly manages never to grow boring ... which proves that rohmer still has a sense of his audience .
translation: すべての問題にもかかわらず、『貴族とその女性』は驚くほど退屈になることがなく、これはロメールがまだ観客を理解していることを証明している。
back_translation: Despite all the issues, "The Aristocrats and Their Women" remains astonishingly never boring, which proves that Rohmer still understands his audience.

text: the salton sea has moments of inspired humour , though every scrap is of the darkest variety .
translation: サルトン湾にはインスピレーションを受けたユーモアの瞬間がありますが、それはすべて最も暗い種類のものです。
back_translation: The moments of humor inspired by Sarton Bay are all of the darkest kind.

text: a touching , sophisticated film that almost seems like a documentary in the way it captures an italian immigrant family on the brink of major changes .
translation: 感動的で洗練された映画で、イタリアの移民家族が大きな変化の瀬戸際にある様子を捉えている点で、まるでドキュメンタリーのように思えます。
back_translation: It's an emotional and sophisticated movie that captures the plight of an Italian immigrant family on the brink of significant change, making it feel almost like a documentary.

text: it is supremely unfunny and unentertaining to watch middle-age and older men drink to excess , piss on trees , b.s. one another and put on a show in drag .
translation: 中年やそれ以上の年齢の男性が酔っ払って木に小便をし、お互いにバカ話をし、ドラッグでショーをするのを見るのは、非常に面白くなく、楽しめない。
back_translation: It is not very interesting and not enjoyable to watch middle-aged men or older drunkenly urinating on a tree, exchanging silly stories, and putting on a show with drugs.

text: a sleep-inducing thriller with a single twist that everyone except the characters in it can see coming a mile away .
translation: 登場人物以外は誰もが遠くから見えてしまう、ひとつのひねりがある眠りを誘うスリラー。
back_translation: A sleep-inducing thriller with a twist, where everyone except the characters can be seen from afar.

text: cuba gooding jr. valiantly mugs his way through snow dogs , but even his boisterous energy fails to spark this leaden comedy .
translation: キューバ・グッディング・ジュニアは『スノードッグス』で勇敢に演じていますが、彼の華やかなエネルギーでもこの重苦しいコメディを盛り上げることはできません。
back_translation: Cuba Gooding Jr. bravely performs in "Snow Dogs," but even his sparkling energy cannot lift this heavy comedy.

text: a sharp , amusing study of the cult of celebrity .
translation: 鋭く、面白く描かれたセレブリティのカルトについての研究。
back_translation: A sharp and interesting study on the cult of celebrities.

text: a culture-clash comedy that , in addition to being very funny , captures some of the discomfort and embarrassment of being a bumbling american in europe .
translation: 文化の衝突を描いたコメディであり、とても面白いだけでなく、ヨーロッパでドジなアメリカ人であることの不快感や恥ずかしさを捉えています。
back_translation: It is a comedy that depicts cultural clashes, and not only is it very funny, but it also captures the discomfort and embarrassment of being a clumsy American in Europe.

text: constantly slips from the grasp of its maker .
translation: 常にその作り手の手からすり抜ける。
back_translation: It always slips through the hands of its creator.

text: the leaping story line , shaped by director peter kosminsky into sharp slivers and cutting impressions , shows all the signs of rich detail condensed into a few evocative images and striking character traits .
translation: 飛躍するストーリーラインは、監督ピーター・コズミンスキーによって鋭い断片と印象的な表現に形作られ、豊かなディテールが少数の心に響くイメージと際立ったキャラクターの特徴に凝縮されているすべての兆候を示しています。
back_translation: The soaring storyline is shaped by director Peter Kosminsky through sharp fragments and striking expressions, condensing rich details into images that resonate with a few minds and distinctive character traits.

text: an emotionally strong and politically potent piece of cinema .
translation: 感情的に強く、政治的に力のある映画作品。
back_translation: An emotionally powerful and politically influential film.
