text: brims with passion : for words , for its eccentric , accident-prone characters , and for the crazy things that keep people going in this crazy life .
translation: 言葉への情熱、風変わりで事故に遭いやすいキャラクターへの情熱、そしてこのクレイジーな人生で人々を支え続けるクレイジーなことへの情熱で満ちています。
back_translation: It is filled with a passion for words, a passion for quirky characters who are prone to accidents, and a passion for the crazy things that continue to support people in this crazy life.

text: borrows from other movies like it in the most ordinary and obvious fashion .
translation: 他の映画から最も普通で明白な方法で借りている。
back_translation: It borrows in the most ordinary and obvious way from other movies.

text: appropriately cynical social commentary aside , # 9 never quite ignites .
translation: 適切な皮肉の社会評論はさておき、#9は決して火がつくことはありません。
back_translation: Putting aside appropriate ironic social commentary, #9 will never catch fire.

text: the story alone could force you to scratch a hole in your head .
translation: その話だけで、頭を掻きむしりたくなるかもしれません。
back_translation: Just from that story, you might feel like tearing your hair out.

text: this u-boat does n't have a captain .
translation: このUボートには艦長がいません。
back_translation: This U-boat has no captain.

text: spectacular in every sense of the word , even if you don ' t know an orc from a uruk-hai .
translation: 言葉のあらゆる意味で素晴らしい、オークとウルク＝ハイの違いがわからなくても。
back_translation: Wonderful in every sense of the word, even if I can't tell the difference between an orc and an Uruk-hai.

text: a different and emotionally reserved type of survival story -- a film less about refracting all of world war ii through the specific conditions of one man , and more about that man lost in its midst .
translation: 異なる感情を抑えたタイプのサバイバルストーリー - 一人の男性の特定の状況を通して第二次世界大戦全体を反射することではなく、その男性がその渦中で迷子になっていることに関する映画。
back_translation: A survival story that suppresses different emotions - rather than reflecting the entirety of World War II through the specific circumstances of one man, it is a film about that man being lost in the midst of it all.

text: you will likely prefer to keep on watching .
translation: おそらく、見続けることを好むでしょう。
back_translation: You will probably prefer to keep watching.

text: a film that 's flawed and brilliant in equal measure .
translation: 欠点がありながらも素晴らしい映画。
back_translation: A wonderful movie despite its flaws.

text: it 's leaden and predictable , and laughs are lacking .
translation: それは重苦しくて予測可能で、笑いが足りません。
back_translation: It is heavy and predictable, lacking in humor.

text: the importance of being earnest movie seems to be missing a great deal of the acerbic repartee of the play . ''
translation: 「真剣でいること」の映画は、劇の鋭い応酬の多くを欠いているようです。
back_translation: The movie "Being Serious" seems to lack much of the sharp exchanges found in the play.

text: it 's a lovely , eerie film that casts an odd , rapt spell .
translation: それは奇妙で魅惑的な魔法をかける、素敵で不気味な映画です。
back_translation: It is a wonderful and eerie movie that casts a strange and enchanting spell.

text: one fantastic -lrb- and educational -rrb- documentary .
translation: 素晴らしく（そして教育的な）ドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A wonderful (and educational) documentary.

text: the word that comes to mind , while watching eric rohmer 's tribute to a courageous scottish lady , is painterly .
translation: エリック・ローマーが勇敢なスコットランドの女性に捧げた作品を観ながら思い浮かぶ言葉は「絵画的」です。
back_translation: The word that comes to mind while watching the work dedicated by Eric Rohmer to the brave Scottish woman is "pictorial."

text: a funny and touching film that is gorgeously acted by a british cast to rival gosford park 's .
translation: ゴスフォード・パークに匹敵する英国のキャストによる素晴らしい演技が光る、面白くて感動的な映画。
back_translation: A funny and moving film featuring wonderful performances by a British cast comparable to Gosford Park.

text: he allows his cast members to make creative contributions to the story and dialogue .
translation: 彼はキャストメンバーがストーリーやダイアログに創造的な貢献をすることを許可しています。
back_translation: He allows the cast members to make creative contributions to the story and dialogue.

text: an incoherent jumble of a film that 's rarely as entertaining as it could have been .
translation: まとまりのない映画で、もっと楽しめたはずのものに比べてめったに面白くない。
back_translation: It's a disjointed movie that is rarely interesting compared to what could have been a more enjoyable experience.

text: cho continues her exploration of the outer limits of raunch with considerable brio .
translation: チョは、かなりの活気をもって卑猥の限界を探求し続けています。
back_translation: Cho continues to explore the limits of obscenity with considerable enthusiasm.

text: instead of panoramic sweep , kapur gives us episodic choppiness , undermining the story 's emotional thrust .
translation: パノラマ的な広がりの代わりに、カプールはエピソードの断片的なカットを提供し、物語の感情的な推進力を損ねています。
back_translation: Instead of a panoramic expanse, Kapoor provides fragmented cuts of episodes, compromising the emotional momentum of the story.

text: i love the robust middle of this picture .
translation: この写真の中間部が好きです。
back_translation: I like the middle part of this photo.

text: for those of us who respond more strongly to storytelling than computer-generated effects , the new star wars installment has n't escaped the rut dug by the last one .
translation: 物語により強く反応する私たちにとって、新しいスターウォーズの続編は前回によって掘られたマンネリから逃れることができていません。
back_translation: For those of us who react strongly to stories, the new Star Wars sequel has been unable to escape the rut dug by the previous installment.

text: it 's a diverting enough hour-and-a-half for the family audience .
translation: 家族向けには十分に楽しめる1時間半です。
back_translation: It's a sufficiently enjoyable hour and a half for families.

text: intriguing and downright intoxicating .
translation: 魅力的でまさに陶酔的です。
back_translation: It is charming and truly intoxicating.

text: a sharp satire of desperation and cinematic deception .
translation: 絶望と映画の欺瞞に対する鋭い風刺。
back_translation: A sharp satire against despair and the deception of cinema.

text: i still like moonlight mile , better judgment be damned .
translation: 私は今でも「ムーンライト・マイル」が好きです。 Better judgment be damned.
back_translation: I still love "Moonlight Mile." Better judgment be damned.

text: a showcase for both the scenic splendor of the mountains and for legendary actor michel serrault , the film is less successful on other levels .
translation: 山々の景観の美しさと伝説的な俳優ミシェル・セラウトの両方を紹介するためのショーケースである本作は、他の面ではあまり成功していない。
back_translation: This work, which is a showcase to introduce both the beauty of the mountainous landscape and the legendary actor Michel Serrault, is not particularly successful in other aspects.

text: with an expressive face reminiscent of gong li and a vivid personality like zhang ziyi 's , dong stakes out the emotional heart of happy .
translation: 宮崎あおいを彷彿とさせる表現豊かな顔と、章子怡のような鮮やかな個性を持つドンは、『ハッピー』の感情的な核を突いています。
back_translation: Don, with a richly expressive face reminiscent of Aoi Miyazaki and a vibrant personality like Zhang Ziyi, strikes at the emotional core of 'Happy.'

text: steve oedekerk is , alas , no woody allen .
translation: スティーブ・オデカークは、残念ながらウディ・アレンではありません。
back_translation: Steve Oedekerk is, unfortunately, not Woody Allen.

text: george lucas returns as a visionary with a tale full of nuance and character dimension .
translation: ジョージ・ルーカスがビジョナリーとして戻り、ニュアンスとキャラクターのディメンションに満ちた物語を提供します。
back_translation: George Lucas returns as a visionary, delivering a story rich in nuance and character dimensions.

text: putting the primitive murderer inside a high-tech space station unleashes a pandora 's box of special effects that run the gamut from cheesy to cheesier to cheesiest .
translation: 原始的な殺人者をハイテク宇宙ステーションに閉じ込めることで、チープからさらにチープ、そして最もチープな特撮のパンデモニウムを引き起こす。
back_translation: By trapping a primitive killer in a high-tech space station, it creates a pandemonium of cheap special effects, taking the cheapness to a whole new level.

text: with the cheesiest monsters this side of a horror spoof , which they is n't , it is more likely to induce sleep than fright .
translation: ホラーのスプーフのこの側で一番チーズのようなモンスターたちと共に、実際には恐怖ではなく、むしろ眠気を誘う可能性が高いです。
back_translation: On this side of horror spoof, it is more likely to induce sleepiness rather than actual fear, alongside the most cheesy monsters.

text: though tom shadyac 's film kicks off spookily enough , around the halfway mark it takes an abrupt turn into glucose sentimentality and laughable contrivance .
translation: トム・シャディアックの映画は、最初は不気味に始まりますが、途中から急に甘ったるい感情や滑稽な仕組みに変わります。
back_translation: Tom Shadyac's films start off ominously, but suddenly shift to overly sweet emotions and ridiculous scenarios halfway through.

text: `` auto focus '' works as an unusual biopic and document of male swingers in the playboy era
translation: 「オートフォーカス」は、プレイボーイ時代の男性スウィンガーに関する珍しいバイオピックおよびドキュメントとして機能します。
back_translation: "Auto Focus" serves as a rare biopic and documentary about male swingers during the Playboy era.

text: with jump cuts , fast editing and lots of pyrotechnics , yu clearly hopes to camouflage how bad his movie is .
translation: ジャンプカットや速い編集、そしてたくさんの花火を使って、ユウは明らかに彼の映画がどれほど悪いかを隠そうとしている。
back_translation: With jump cuts, fast editing, and a lot of fireworks, Yu is clearly trying to hide how bad his movie is.

text: one of the most depressing movie-going experiences i can think of is to sit through about 90 minutes of a so-called ` comedy ' and not laugh once .
translation: 考えうる中で最も憂鬱な映画体験のひとつは、いわゆる『コメディ』を約90分間観て、1度も笑わないことです。
back_translation: One of the most depressing movie experiences possible is watching a so-called "comedy" for about 90 minutes without laughing at all.

text: except it 's much , much better .
translation: それははるかに、はるかに良いです。
back_translation: That is far, far better.

text: good fun , good action , good acting , good dialogue , good pace , good cinematography .
translation: 楽しい、良いアクション、良い演技、良い対話、良いテンポ、良い cinematography。
back_translation: Fun, good action, good acting, good dialogue, good pace, good cinematography.

text: it 's a sharp movie about otherwise dull subjects .
translation: それはそうでない退屈なテーマについての鋭い映画です。
back_translation: It is a sharp film about a theme that is not boring.

text: is that it 's a crime movie made by someone who obviously knows nothing about crime .
translation: それは、明らかに犯罪について何も知らない誰かによって作られた犯罪映画です。
back_translation: That is a crime movie made by someone who clearly knows nothing about crime.

text: jason patric and ray liotta make for one splendidly cast pair .
translation: ジェイソン・パトリックとレイ・リオッタは、素晴らしくキャストされたペアです。
back_translation: Jason Patrick and Ray Liotta make a wonderfully cast pair.

text: its compelling mix of trial movie , escape movie and unexpected fable ensures the film never feels draggy .
translation: 試練の映画、脱出の映画、そして予想外の寓話が絶妙に組み合わさっているため、この映画は決してだらけていると感じさせません。
back_translation: The movie never feels sluggish because the trials, the escape, and the unexpected fable are intricately woven together.

text: insightfully written , delicately performed
translation: 洞察に満ちた文章で、繊細に演じられた。
back_translation: An insightful piece of writing, performed with delicacy.

text: shyamalan should stop trying to please his mom .
translation: シャマランは母親を喜ばせようとするのをやめるべきだ。
back_translation: Shyamalan should stop trying to please his mother.

text: kung pow is oedekerk 's realization of his childhood dream to be in a martial-arts flick , and proves that sometimes the dreams of youth should remain just that .
translation: カンフー・パンダは、オーデカーケルクが子供時代の夢である武道映画に出ることを実現した作品であり、時には若い頃の夢はそのままにしておくべきだということを証明しています。
back_translation: Kung Fu Panda is a work that realizes Odetta Kelker's childhood dream of appearing in a martial arts film, and it proves that sometimes, dreams from our youth should be kept as they are.

text: wimps out by going for that pg-13 rating , so the more graphic violence is mostly off-screen and the sexuality is muted .
translation: PG-13の評価を狙うことで逃げてしまい、よりグラフィックな暴力はほとんどオフscreenで、セクシャリティは抑えられています。
back_translation: In aiming for a PG-13 rating, it avoids more graphic violence, mostly off-screen, and keeps sexuality restrained.

text: the directing and story are disjointed , flaws that have to be laid squarely on taylor 's doorstep .
translation: 演出とストーリーはバラバラであり、その欠陥は全てテイラーの責任に帰するべきです。
back_translation: The direction and story are disconnected, and all the flaws should be attributed to Taylor.

text: the movie 's thesis -- elegant technology for the masses -- is surprisingly refreshing .
translation: 映画のテーマ「大衆のためのエレガントなテクノロジー」は、驚くほど新鮮です。
back_translation: The theme of the movie, "Elegant Technology for the Masses," is surprisingly fresh.

text: it 's no lie -- big fat liar is a real charmer .
translation: 嘘ではありません -- 大きな太った嘘つきは本当に魅力的です。
back_translation: It's not a lie -- a big, fat liar is truly charming.

text: a gorgeously strange movie , heaven is deeply concerned with morality , but it refuses to spell things out for viewers .
translation: 素晴らしく奇妙な映画である『ヘブン』は、道徳に深く関心を寄せていますが、観客に明確に言い表すことは拒否しています。
back_translation: The wonderfully strange film "Heaven" has a deep interest in morality, but it refuses to clearly express this to the audience.

text: you 'll cry for your money back .
translation: あなたはお金を返してもらうために泣くだろう。
back_translation: You would cry to get your money back.

text: the package in which this fascinating -- and timely -- content comes wrapped is disappointingly generic .
translation: この魅力的でタイムリーな内容が包まれているパッケージは、残念ながら一般的すぎます。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the packaging containing this engaging and timely content is too generic.

text: a subtle , humorous , illuminating study of politics , power and social mobility .
translation: 政治、権力、社会的移動に関する微妙でユーモラスかつ啓発的な研究。
back_translation: A subtle, humorous, and enlightening study on politics, power, and social mobility.

text: i loved the look of this film .
translation: この映画のビジュアルが大好きでした。
back_translation: I loved the visuals of this movie.

text: this little film is so slovenly done , so primitive in technique , that it ca n't really be called animation .
translation: この小さな映画は、とてもだらしなく作られており、技術的にも非常に原始的なので、実際にはアニメーションとは呼べません。
back_translation: This small film is made very sloppily and is technically very primitive, so it can't really be called animation.

text: another boorish movie from the i-heard-a-joke - at-a-frat-party school of screenwriting .
translation: また、フラットパーティー学校の「ジョークを聞いた」形式の脚本からの無礼な映画です。
back_translation: Also, it's a rude movie from the "I heard a joke" format script of the Flat Party School.

text: it has its faults , but it is a kind , unapologetic , sweetheart of a movie , and mandy moore leaves a positive impression .
translation: 欠点もありますが、優しく、謝罪しない、心温まる映画で、マンディ・ムーアは好印象を残します。
back_translation: It has its flaws, but it's a kind, heartfelt movie that leaves a good impression with Mandy Moore.

text: a baffling mixed platter of gritty realism and magic realism with a hard-to-swallow premise .
translation: grittyなリアリズムとマジックリアリズムが混ざり合った困惑するようなミックスプレートで、飲み込みにくい前提があります。
back_translation: It presents a perplexing mix of gritty realism and magic realism, with a hard-to-swallow premise.

text: the code talkers deserved better than a hollow tribute .
translation: コードトーカーたちは、空虚な賛辞以上のものに値した。
back_translation: The code talkers deserved more than mere empty praise.

text: for proof of that on the cinematic front , look no further than this 20th anniversary edition of the film that spielberg calls , retrospectively , his most personal work yet .
translation: その証拠として、スピルバーグが振り返って「最も個人的な作品」と呼ぶ映画の20周年記念版に目を向けてください。
back_translation: As evidence, take a look at the 20th-anniversary edition of the film that Spielberg looks back on and calls his "most personal work."

text: a slam-bang extravaganza that is all about a wild-and-woolly , wall-to-wall good time .
translation: 盛大で豪華なエンターテインメントで、ワイルドで楽しい、壁から壁までの良い時間が全てです。
back_translation: It's all about grand and luxurious entertainment, a wild and fun good time from wall to wall.

text: what you expect is just what you get ... assuming the bar of expectations has n't been raised above sixth-grade height .
translation: 期待することは得られるものであり... 期待のバーが6年生の高さ以上に上がっていなければ。
back_translation: What is expected is what is obtained... as long as the bar of expectation doesn’t rise above the height of a sixth grader.

text: the campy results make mel brooks ' borscht belt schtick look sophisticated .
translation: そのキャンピーな結果は、メル・ブルックスのボルシチ・ベルトの滑稽さを洗練されたものに見せる。
back_translation: That campy result makes Mel Brooks' Borscht Belt absurdity look sophisticated.

text: an entertainment so in love with its overinflated mythology that it no longer recognizes the needs of moviegoers for real characters and compelling plots .
translation: 過大評価された神話に夢中になりすぎて、映画観客が求めるリアルなキャラクターや魅力的なプロットのニーズをもはや認識していないエンターテインメント。
back_translation: Entertainment that has become so obsessed with an overrated myth that it no longer recognizes the audience's need for realistic characters and engaging plots.

text: two badly interlocked stories drowned by all too clever complexity .
translation: あまりにも巧妙な複雑さによって溺れた二つのうまく絡み合っていない物語。
back_translation: Two poorly intertwined stories that have drowned in overly intricate complexity.

text: aloof and lacks any real raw emotion , which is fatal for a film that relies on personal relationships .
translation: 距離を置いており、実際の生の感情が欠けているため、個人の関係に依存する映画には致命的です。
back_translation: It is fatal for films that rely on personal relationships, as they maintain a distance and lack genuine raw emotions.

text: while parker and co-writer catherine di napoli are faithful to melville 's plotline , they and a fully engaged supporting cast ... have made the old boy 's characters more quick-witted than any english lit major would have thought possible .
translation: パーカーと共同脚本家のキャサリン・ディ・ナポリはメルヴィルのプロットラインに忠実でありながら、彼らと完全に関与したサポーティングキャストは、昔の登場人物たちを英文学の専攻者が思っていた以上に機知に富んだものに仕上げています。
back_translation: Parker and co-writer Catherine DiNapoli remain faithful to Melville's plotline, while the supporting cast, fully engaged with them, has transformed the old characters into ones that are wittier than English literature majors might have thought.

text: the aaa of action , xxx is a blast of adrenalin , rated eee for excitement .
translation: アクションのaaa、xxxはアドレナリンのバーストで、興奮のためにeeeと評価されています。
back_translation: The action aaa and xxx are evaluated as eee due to bursts of adrenaline and excitement.

text: it 's all surface psychodramatics .
translation: それはすべて表面的な心理劇に過ぎない。
back_translation: It's all just a superficial psychological drama.

text: comedian , like its subjects , delivers the goods and audiences will have a fun , no-frills ride .
translation: コメディアンは、彼のテーマと同様に、しっかりとしたパフォーマンスを提供し、観客は楽しく、飾り気のない体験を楽しむことができる。
back_translation: The comedian delivers a solid performance, just like his theme, allowing the audience to enjoy a fun and unpretentious experience.

text: it was only a matter of time before some savvy producer saw the potential success inherent in the mixture of bullock bubble and hugh goo .
translation: 牛のバブルとヒュー・グーの組み合わせに秘められた成功の可能性を見抜く賢いプロデューサーが現れるのは時間の問題だった。
back_translation: It was only a matter of time before a clever producer emerged who could see the potential for success hidden in the combination of cow bubbles and Hugh Goo.

text: it 's virtually impossible to like any of these despicable characters .
translation: これらの卑劣なキャラクターを好きになることはほぼ不可能です。
back_translation: It is almost impossible to like these despicable characters.

text: it 's a sweet , laugh-a-minute crowd pleaser that lifts your spirits as well as the corners of your mouth .
translation: それは心を明るくし、口角を上げる甘くて、笑いが絶えない観客を喜ばせる作品です。
back_translation: It is a work that brightens the heart, raises the corners of the mouth, and delights the audience with its sweetness and constant laughter.

text: scott delivers a terrific performance in this fascinating portrait of a modern lothario .
translation: スコットは、この魅惑的な現代のロタリオのポートレートにおいて素晴らしいパフォーマンスを披露しています。
back_translation: Scott delivers a wonderful performance in this captivating portrait of a modern-day Lothario.

text: replacing john carpenter 's stylish tracking shots is degraded , handheld blair witch video-cam footage .
translation: ジョン・カーペンターのスタイリッシュなトラッキングショットの代わりに、劣化した手持ちのブレア・ウィッチのビデオカメラ映像が使用されている。
back_translation: Instead of John Carpenter's stylish tracking shots, deteriorated handheld footage from the Blair Witch video camera is used.

text: the film delivers what it promises : a look at the `` wild ride '' that ensues when brash young men set out to conquer the online world with laptops , cell phones and sketchy business plans .
translation: 映画は約束されたものを提供します：派手な若者たちがノートパソコン、携帯電話、そして怪しいビジネスプランでオンラインの世界を征服しようとする際に繰り広げられる「ワイルドライド」を描いています。
back_translation: The movie delivers what is promised: it depicts a "wild ride" as flashy young people try to conquer the online world with laptops, mobile phones, and dubious business plans.

text: it thankfully goes easy on the reel\/real world dichotomy that -lrb- jaglom -rrb- pursued with such enervating determination in venice\/venice .
translation: それは感謝すべきことに、ヴェニス/ヴェニスでジャグロムがそんなに疲れるほどの決意を持って追求したフィクション/現実の二項対立に対して優しく接してくれます。
back_translation: It is something to be grateful for, as it gently engages with the dichotomy between fiction and reality that Jagrum pursued with such determination in Venice/Venice to the point of exhaustion.

text: a fake street drama that keeps telling you things instead of showing them .
translation: 事実を見せずに、ずっと語りかけてくる偽のストリートドラマ。
back_translation: A fake street drama that continues to speak without showing the facts.

text: like showgirls and glitter , the most entertaining moments here are unintentional .
translation: ショーガールやグリッターのように、ここで最も楽しめる瞬間は意図しないものです。
back_translation: The most enjoyable moments here, like showgirls and glitter, are the unintended ones.

text: the story is predictable , the jokes are typical sandler fare , and the romance with ryder is puzzling .
translation: ストーリーは予測でき、ジョークは典型的なサンドラーのものであり、ライダーとのロマンスは不思議です。
back_translation: The story is predictable, the jokes are typical of Sandler, and the romance with the rider is strange.

text: mark pellington 's latest pop thriller is as kooky and overeager as it is spooky and subtly in love with myth .
translation: マーク・ペリンジャーの最新のポップスリラーは、スプーキーで神話に微妙に恋をしている一方で、風変わりであまりにも熱心です。
back_translation: Mark Perlinger's latest pop thriller is spooky and subtly in love with mythology, while also being quirky and overly enthusiastic.

text: no amount of burning , blasting , stabbing , and shooting can hide a weak script .
translation: どんなに燃やしたり、爆破したり、刺したり、撃ったりしても、弱い脚本は隠せない。
back_translation: No matter how much you burn, blow up, stab, or shoot, a weak script cannot be hidden.

text: prepare to marvel again .
translation: 再び驚嘆する準備をしてください。
back_translation: Get ready to be amazed again.

text: family togetherness takes a back seat to inter-family rivalry and workplace ambition ... whole subplots have no explanation or even plot relevance .
translation: 家族の団結は家族間の対立や職場の野心の後ろに押しやられている... いくつかのサブプロットには説明もなく、プロットの関連性すらない。
back_translation: The unity of the family is pushed aside by conflicts between family members and ambitions in the workplace... Some subplots lack explanation and even relevance to the main plot.

text: stiff and schmaltzy and clumsily directed .
translation: 堅くて、感傷的で、不器用に演出されている。
back_translation: It is rigid, sentimental, and awkwardly staged.

text: troubling and powerful .
translation: 困難で力強い。
back_translation: Difficult and strong.

text: cassavetes thinks he 's making dog day afternoon with a cause , but all he 's done is to reduce everything he touches to a shrill , didactic cartoon .
translation: カサヴェテスは、自分が意義のある作品として「犬の日の午後」を制作していると思っているが、彼が触れるものすべてを高く叫ぶような教訓的な漫画に還元しているだけだ。
back_translation: Cassavetes believes that he is creating a meaningful work with "Dog Day Afternoon," but he is merely reducing everything he touches to a loud, didactic comic strip.

text: ` dragonfly ' dwells on crossing-over mumbo jumbo , manipulative sentimentality , and sappy dialogue .
translation: 「ドラゴンフライ」は、クロスオーバーのごたごた、操作的な感情表現、そして感傷的な対話に住んでいます。
back_translation: "Dragonfly" resides in the chaos of crossover, manipulative emotional expressions, and sentimental dialogues.

text: a genuinely moving and wisely unsentimental drama .
translation: 心を動かす、賢明に感傷的でないドラマ。
back_translation: A drama that moves the heart, wise and not sentimental.

text: amy and matthew have a bit of a phony relationship , but the film works in spite of it .
translation: エイミーとマシューは少し偽りの関係にありますが、映画はそれにもかかわらずうまくいっています。
back_translation: Amy and Matthew have a somewhat fake relationship, but the movie is doing well despite that.

text: maybe it is formula filmmaking , but there 's nothing wrong with that if the film is well-crafted and this one is .
translation: おそらくこれはフォーミュラ映画ですが、もし映画がよく作られているのなら、それに何も問題はありません。そしてこの映画はそうです。
back_translation: This is probably a formulaic movie, but if the movie is well made, there is nothing wrong with that. And this film is.

text: nohe 's documentary about the event is sympathetic without being gullible : he is n't blind to the silliness , but also captures moments of spontaneous creativity and authentic co-operative interaction .
translation: ノヘのその出来事に関するドキュメンタリーは、愚かではなく同情的です。彼はばかげたことには気づいていますが、自発的な創造性や本物の協力的な交流の瞬間も捉えています。
back_translation: The documentary about that event in Nohe is not foolish but sympathetic. He recognizes the absurdity of it, but it also captures moments of spontaneous creativity and genuine collaborative interaction.

text: rock 's stand-up magic wanes .
translation: ロックのスタンドアップマジックは衰退している。
back_translation: Rock's stand-up magic is declining.

text: a delightful , if minor , pastry of a movie .
translation: 楽しいですが、控えめな映画のペストリー。
back_translation: It's a fun yet modest movie pastry.

text: a sexy , surprising romance ... idemoto and kim make a gorgeous pair ... their scenes brim with sexual possibility and emotional danger .
translation: セクシーで驚きのロマンス…イドモトとキムは魅力的なカップルを形成している…彼らのシーンは性的な可能性と感情の危険で溢れている。
back_translation: A sexy and surprising romance... Idomoto and Kim form an enchanting couple... Their scenes are overflowing with sexual potential and emotional danger.

text: there are n't too many films that can be as simultaneously funny , offbeat and heartwarming -lrb- without a thick shmear of the goo , at least -rrb- , but `` elling '' manages to do all three quite well , making it one of the year 's most enjoyable releases .
translation: 同時に面白く、ユニークで心温まる映画はあまり多くありませんが（少なくとも厚い甘ったるさなしで）、『エリング』はこの3つをうまく実現しており、今年の最も楽しい作品の一つとなっています。
back_translation: There aren't many films that are simultaneously interesting, unique, and heartwarming (at least without excessive saccharine), but "Erling" successfully achieves all three, making it one of the most enjoyable works of the year.

text: plays like some corny television production from a bygone era
translation: 昔の時代の陳腐なテレビ制作のようなプレイ
back_translation: A play reminiscent of the clichéd television productions of old times.

text: as a girl-meets-girl romantic comedy , kissing jessica steinis quirky , charming and often hilarious .
translation: 女の子が女の子に出会うロマンティックコメディとして、『キス・ジャスミン・スタイン』は独特で魅力的、そしてしばしば笑える作品です。
back_translation: "Kiss Jasmine Stein" is a unique, charming, and often humorous work as a romantic comedy about girls meeting girls.

text: it 's like a drive-by .
translation: それはまるで車の中から撃たれるようなものだ。
back_translation: It's like being shot at from inside a car.

text: it 's sweet .
translation: それは甘いです。
back_translation: That is sweet.

text: one of the worst movies of the year .
translation: 今年の最悪の映画の一つ。
back_translation: One of the worst movies of the year.

text: like brosnan 's performance , evelyn comes from the heart .
translation: ブロスナンの演技のように、エヴリンは心から来ています。
back_translation: Like Brosnan's performance, Evelyn comes from the heart.

text: though the film is well-intentioned , one could rent the original and get the same love story and parable .
translation: 映画は良い意図を持っているが、オリジナルをレンタルすれば同じ愛の物語と寓話を得ることができる。
back_translation: The movie has good intentions, but by renting the original, you can get the same love story and fable.

text: -lrb- woo 's -rrb- most resonant film since the killer .
translation: -（ウーの）-最も共鳴する映画は「キラー」以来。
back_translation: The most resonant movie since "Killer" is "Woe."

text: it 's rare that a movie can be as intelligent as this one is in every regard except its storyline ; everything that 's good is ultimately scuttled by a plot that 's just too boring and obvious .
translation: この映画は、ストーリー以外のすべての面でこれほど知的であることは珍しいですが、良い部分はすべて、単に退屈で明白すぎるプロットによって台無しにされています。
back_translation: This movie is rare in its intelligence in every aspect except for the story, but all the good parts are simply ruined by a boring and overly obvious plot.

text: this mistaken-identity picture is so film-culture referential that the final product is a ghost .
translation: この誤認識の写真は映画文化を参照しすぎて、最終的な作品は幽霊のようだ。
back_translation: This misinterpreted photo references movie culture too much, making the final work seem ghostly.

text: strange and beautiful film .
translation: 奇妙で美しい映画。
back_translation: A strange and beautiful movie.

text: the histrionic muse still eludes madonna and , playing a charmless witch , she is merely a charmless witch .
translation: 演技派のミューズは今なおマドンナを逃れ、魅力のない魔女を演じる彼女はただの魅力のない魔女である。
back_translation: The actress muse still escapes Madonna, and the uncharismatic witch she portrays is nothing more than a charm-less witch.

text: the result , however well-intentioned , is ironically just the sort of disposable , kitchen-sink homage that illustrates why the whole is so often less than the sum of its parts in today 's hollywood .
translation: 結果は、意図は良いものの、皮肉なことに、今日のハリウッドにおいて、全体が部分の合計よりもしばしば劣っている理由を示す、まさにその種類の使い捨てのキッチンシンク・オマージュとなっている。
back_translation: The result is, although the intention is good, ironically, it has become exactly that kind of disposable kitchen sink homage that shows why, in today's Hollywood, the whole is often lesser than the sum of its parts.

text: the catch is that they 're stuck with a script that prevents them from firing on all cylinders .
translation: 問題は、彼らが全力を発揮することを妨げるスクリプトに縛られていることです。
back_translation: The problem is that they are bound by a script that prevents them from giving their best effort.

text: one of those so-so films that could have been much better .
translation: まあまあの映画の一つで、もっと良くなったはずだった。
back_translation: It's one of those decent movies that could have been better.

text: has all the complexity and realistic human behavior of an episode of general hospital .
translation: 一般病院のエピソードと同じほどの複雑さと現実の人間の行動を持っています。
back_translation: It has the same complexity and realistic human behavior as episodes from a general hospital.

text: as original and insightful as last week 's episode of behind the music .
translation: 先週の「ビハインド・ザ・ミュージック」のエピソードと同じくらいオリジナルで洞察に満ちた。
back_translation: As original and insightful as last week's episode of "Behind the Music."

text: marvelously entertaining and deliriously joyous documentary .
translation: 素晴らしく楽しく、陶酔するほど喜ばしいドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A wonderfully enjoyable and blissfully delightful documentary.

text: ... this story gets sillier , not scarier , as it goes along ...
translation: ...この物語は進むにつれて、怖くなるのではなく、ますます愚かになっていきます...
back_translation: ...As this story progresses, it doesn't become scarier, but rather increasingly foolish...

text: ... most viewers will wish there had been more of the `` queen '' and less of the `` damned . ''
translation: ほとんどの視聴者は「女王」がもっとあり、「呪われた者」が少なかった方が良かったと思うでしょう。
back_translation: Most viewers would probably think that there should have been more "Queen" and fewer "Cursed Ones."

text: reveals how important our special talents can be when put in service of of others .
translation: 他の人のために役立てられたとき、私たちの特別な才能がどれほど重要であるかを明らかにします。
back_translation: When we are able to help others, it reveals how important our special talents are.

text: as a vehicle to savour binoche 's skill , the film is well worthwhile .
translation: ビノシュの技術を味わうための手段として、この映画は非常に価値があります。
back_translation: This film is extremely valuable as a means to savor the techniques of Binosh.

text: what saves this deeply affecting film from being merely a collection of wrenching cases is corcuera 's attention to detail .
translation: この深く感動的な映画が単なる痛ましい事例の集まりにならずに済んでいるのは、コルクエラの細部への細心の注意によるものです。
back_translation: The reason this deeply moving film avoids becoming merely a collection of painful cases is the meticulous attention to detail by Corkerra.

text: steers , in his feature film debut , has created a brilliant motion picture .
translation: スティアーズは彼の長編映画デビューで素晴らしい映画を作り上げました。
back_translation: Steers created a wonderful film in his feature film debut.

text: it has a way of seeping into your consciousness , with lingering questions about what the film is really getting at .
translation: それはあなたの意識に浸透する方法があり、映画が本当に何を伝えようとしているのかについての lingering questions を残します。
back_translation: There is a way for it to seep into your consciousness, leaving lingering questions about what the movie is really trying to convey.

text: the charms of the lead performances allow us to forget most of the film 's problems .
translation: 主演の魅力があれば、映画の多くの問題を忘れることができます。
back_translation: If the lead actor has charm, one can forget many problems of the movie.

text: the pleasure of read my lips is like seeing a series of perfect black pearls clicking together to form a string .
translation: 私の唇を読む喜びは、一連の完璧な黒い真珠がクリックして糸を形成するのを見るようなものです。
back_translation: The joy of reading my lips is like watching a series of perfect black pearls click together to form a thread.

text: insomnia loses points when it surrenders to a formulaic bang-bang , shoot-em-up scene at the conclusion .
translation: 不眠症は、結末で型にはまったバンバン、シューティングシーンに屈したときに評価を失います。
back_translation: Insomnia loses its value when it succumbs to a predictable ending and conventional shooting scenes.

text: this would-be ` james bond for the extreme generation ' pic is one big , dumb action movie .
translation: この「極端な世代のためのジェームズ・ボンド」的な映画は、ただの大味なアクション映画です。
back_translation: This "James Bond for an extreme generation" type of movie is just a bland action film.

text: when it comes to the battle of hollywood vs. woo , it looks like woo 's a p.o.w.
translation: ハリウッド対ウーの戦いに関して言えば、ウーは捕虜のように見える。
back_translation: When it comes to the battle between Hollywood and Wu, Wu seems to be a prisoner.

text: evelyn may be based on a true and historically significant story , but the filmmakers have made every effort to disguise it as an unimaginative screenwriter 's invention .
translation: エヴリンは真実で歴史的に重要な物語に基づいているかもしれませんが、映画製作者はそれを想像力に欠ける脚本家の創作に見せかけるためにあらゆる努力をしています。
back_translation: Evelyn may be based on a true and historically significant story, but the filmmakers are making every effort to present it as the creations of a lackluster screenwriter.

text: characterisation has been sacrificed for the sake of spectacle .
translation: キャラクターの描写はスペクタクルのために犠牲にされています。
back_translation: Character depiction is sacrificed for the sake of spectacle.

text: it turns out to be smarter and more diabolical than you could have guessed at the beginning .
translation: 最初に想像していたよりも、はるかに賢く、悪巧みに満ちていることが判明しました。
back_translation: It turned out to be much smarter and full of schemes than I initially imagined.

text: is significantly less charming than listening to a four-year-old with a taste for exaggeration recount his halloween trip to the haunted house .
translation: 誇張を好む4歳児がハロウィンの幽霊屋敷の旅行を話すのを聞くより、はるかに魅力がありません。
back_translation: There is much less charm in hearing a 4-year-old who loves exaggeration talk about a trip to a Halloween haunted house.

text: an example of quiet , confident craftsmanship that tells a sweet , charming tale of intergalactic friendship .
translation: 静かで自信に満ちた職人技の一例であり、銀河間の友情の甘く魅力的な物語を語っています。
back_translation: It is an example of quiet and confident craftsmanship, telling a sweet and captivating story of intergalactic friendship.

text: cheap , vulgar dialogue and a plot that crawls along at a snail 's pace .
translation: 安っぽい、下品な対話と、カタツムリのように遅く進むプロット。
back_translation: Cheap and vulgar dialogue, and a plot that moves as slowly as a snail.

text: been there done that .
translation: 行ったことがある、やったことがある。
back_translation: I have been there, I have done it.

text: something has been lost in the translation ... another routine hollywood frightfest in which the slack execution italicizes the absurdity of the premise .
translation: 翻訳の際に何かが失われてしまった... あの怠慢な実行が前提の不条理さを強調する、また別のルーチン的なハリウッドの恐怖祭。
back_translation: Something was lost in the translation... Another routine Hollywood horror festival that emphasizes the absurdity based on that lazy execution.

text: tense , terrific , sweaty-palmed fun .
translation: 緊張感のある、素晴らしく、手に汗をかくような楽しさ。
back_translation: A thrilling, wonderful, and sweat-inducing fun.

text: despite some charm and heart , this quirky soccer import is forgettable
translation: いくつかの魅力と心があるにもかかわらず、この風変わりなサッカー輸入品は忘れられがちです。
back_translation: Despite having several charms and a heart, this quirky soccer import tends to be overlooked.

text: cuaron repeatedly , perversely undercuts the joie de vivre even as he creates it , giving the movie a mournful undercurrent that places the good-time shenanigans in welcome perspective .
translation: キュアロンは繰り返し、意地悪なほどに生き生きとした喜びを削ぎ落としながら、それを生み出し、映画に悲しげな下地を与え、楽しい悪ふざけに歓迎すべき視点を与えています。
back_translation: Cuarón repeatedly strips away the surprisingly vivid joy with a sense of cruelty, creating it while providing the film with a sad undertone and giving a welcomed perspective to the playful mischief.

text: for all its brooding quality , ash wednesday is suspenseful and ultimately unpredictable , with a sterling ensemble cast .
translation: その陰鬱な雰囲気にもかかわらず、『アッシュ・ウェンズデー』は緊張感があり、最終的には予測不可能で、素晴らしいアンサンブルキャストが揃っています。
back_translation: Despite its gloomy atmosphere, "Ash Wednesday" is tense, ultimately unpredictable, and features a wonderful ensemble cast.

text: delivers the sexy razzle-dazzle that everyone , especially movie musical fans , has been hoping for .
translation: 映画ミュージカルファンを特に魅了する、セクシーで華やかなパフォーマンスを提供してくれます。
back_translation: It offers a sexy and glamorous performance that particularly captivates fans of musical films.

text: -- that the ` true story ' by which all the queen 's men is allegedly `` inspired '' was a lot funnier and more deftly enacted than what 's been cobbled together onscreen .
translation: すべての女王の男たちが「インスパイア」されたとされる「真実の物語」は、画面にまとめられたものよりもずっと面白く、巧みに演じられていた。
back_translation: The "true story" that all the queens' men are said to have been "inspired" by is much more interesting and skillfully performed than what was summarized on screen.

text: you could hate it for the same reason .
translation: あなたも同じ理由でそれを嫌うかもしれません。
back_translation: You might hate it for the same reason.

text: a story about intelligent high school students that deals with first love sweetly but also seriously .
translation: 知的な高校生たちが初恋について甘くも真剣に描かれる物語。
back_translation: A story depicting the sweet yet serious first love of intelligent high school students.

text: waydowntown may not be an important movie , or even a good one , but it provides a nice change of mindless pace in collision with the hot oscar season currently underway .
translation: 「ウェイダウンタウン」は重要な映画ではないかもしれませんし、良い映画でもないかもしれませんが、現在進行中の熱いオスカーシーズンに対して、無心で楽しめるペースの良い変化を提供してくれます。
back_translation: "Way Downtown" may not be an important film, and it may not even be a good film, but it offers a refreshing change of pace that can be enjoyed without pretense during the ongoing intense Oscar season.

text: `` frailty '' starts out like a typical bible killer story , but it turns out to be significantly different -lrb- and better -rrb- than most films with this theme .
translation: 「脆弱性」は典型的なバイブルキラーのストーリーで始まりますが、実際にはこのテーマのほとんどの映画とは大きく異なり（そして良い）ものとなっています。
back_translation: "Vulnerability" begins with a typical Bible killer story, but in reality, it turns out to be vastly different (and better) than most movies with this theme.

text: thanks to the château 's balance of whimsicality , narrative discipline and serious improvisation , almost every relationship and personality in the film yields surprises .
translation: シャトーのユーモラスなバランス、物語の規律、真剣な即興演奏のおかげで、映画のほとんどすべての関係と個性が驚きをもたらします。
back_translation: Thanks to the humorous balance of the chateau, the discipline of the story, and the serious improvisation, almost all of the relationships and personalities in the film bring surprises.

text: gaghan captures the half-lit , sometimes creepy intimacy of college dorm rooms , a subtlety that makes the silly , over-the-top coda especially disappointing .
translation: ギャガンは、半分暗い時に時々気味の悪い大学の寮の親密さを捉えており、その微妙さが思い切りデタラメで大げさなエンディングを特に失望させるものにしています。
back_translation: Gagan captures the unsettling intimacy of a sometimes creepy university dorm during half-light, and that subtlety makes the utterly ridiculous and exaggerated ending particularly disappointing.

text: julie davis is the kathie lee gifford of film directors , sadly proving once again ego does n't always go hand in hand with talent .
translation: ジュリー・デイビスは映画監督のキャシー・リー・ギフォードであり、残念ながら再び自己中心的な態度が必ずしも才能と結びつくわけではないことを証明している。
back_translation: Julie Davis is a film director, Kathy Lee Gifford, and unfortunately proves once again that a self-centered attitude does not necessarily correlate with talent.

text: in the affable maid in manhattan , jennifer lopez 's most aggressive and most sincere attempt to take movies by storm , the diva shrewdly surrounds herself with a company of strictly a-list players .
translation: 「マンハッタンの優雅なメイド」では、ジェニファー・ロペスが映画界を席巻しようとする最も積極的で最も誠実な試みを見せており、彼女は巧みに一流のキャストに囲まれています。
back_translation: In "Maid in Manhattan," Jennifer Lopez shows the most ambitious and sincere attempt to dominate the film industry, and she is expertly surrounded by a top-notch cast.

text: elegantly produced and expressively performed , the six musical numbers crystallize key plot moments into minutely detailed wonders of dreamlike ecstasy .
translation: 優雅に制作され、表現豊かに演奏された6つの音楽ナンバーは、重要なプロットの瞬間を鮮明に精緻化し、夢のような恍惚の細部にわたる驚異を生み出しています。
back_translation: The six music numbers, crafted elegantly and performed expressively, vividly enhance key moments of the plot and create a sense of wonder that delves into the dreamlike details of ecstasy.

text: dark and unrepentant , this excursion into the epicenter of percolating mental instability is not easily dismissed or forgotten .
translation: 暗く、反省の色がないこの精神的不安定の中心地への旅は、容易には無視されることも忘れ去られることもありません。
back_translation: The journey to this center of mental instability, which is dark and devoid of reflection, is not easily ignored or forgotten.

text: solondz may be convinced that he has something significant to say , but he is n't talking a talk that appeals to me .
translation: ソロンツは自分に重要なことを言う権利があると確信しているかもしれませんが、彼の話は私には響きません。
back_translation: Solonts may be convinced that he has the right to speak about what is important to him, but his words do not resonate with me.

text: a beautifully shot but dull and ankle-deep ` epic . '
translation: 美しく撮影されたが、退屈で水深が足首ほどの「壮大な作品」。
back_translation: "Beautifully shot, but a boring 'magnificent piece' with water depth about ankle high."

text: stale , futile scenario .
translation: 陳腐で無意味なシナリオ。
back_translation: Trite and meaningless scenario.

text: a film in a class with spike lee 's masterful do the right thing .
translation: スパイク・リーの名作『ドゥ・ザ・ライト・シング』を特集したクラスの映画。
back_translation: A film class featuring Spike Lee's masterpiece "Do the Right Thing."

text: in addition to sporting one of the worst titles in recent cinematic history , ballistic : ecks vs. sever also features terrible , banal dialogue ; convenient , hole-ridden plotting ; superficial characters and a rather dull , unimaginative car chase .
translation: 最近の映画史の中で最悪のタイトルの一つを持つだけでなく、バリスティック : エックス vs. セバーは、ひどい、平凡な対話や、便利で穴だらけのプロット、表面的なキャラクター、そしてかなり退屈で想像力に欠けるカーチェイスも特徴としています。
back_translation: Not only does it have one of the worst titles in recent film history, but "Ballistic: Ek vs. Sever" is also characterized by terrible, mediocre dialogue, a convenient and full of holes plot, superficial characters, and quite boring and unimaginative car chases.

text: full of the kind of obnoxious chitchat that only self-aware neurotics engage in .
translation: 自己認識のある神経質な人々だけが行うような、うんざりするような雑談でいっぱいです。
back_translation: It's filled with annoying small talk that only self-aware neurotic people seem to engage in.

text: a simpler , leaner treatment would have been preferable ; after all , being about nothing is sometimes funnier than being about something .
translation: よりシンプルで洗練されたアプローチの方が好ましかったでしょう。結局のところ、何もないことについてである方が、何かについてであるよりも時には面白いこともあります。
back_translation: A simpler and more refined approach would have been preferable. After all, sometimes it can be more interesting to be about nothing rather than being about something.

text: a delightful stimulus for the optic nerves , so much that it 's forgivable that the plot feels like every other tale of a totalitarian tomorrow .
translation: 視神経にとって魅力的な刺激であり、そのため、プロットが全体主義の未来を描いた他の物語と同じように感じられるのは許される。
back_translation: It is an appealing stimulus for the optic nerve, and therefore, it is acceptable that the plot feels similar to other stories that depict a totalitarian future.

text: nothing but an episode of smackdown !
translation: ただのスマックダウンのエピソードです！
back_translation: It's just an episode of SmackDown!

text: for all the charm of kevin kline and a story that puts old-fashioned values under the microscope , there 's something creepy about this movie .
translation: ケヴィン・クラインの魅力と古風な価値観を細かく検証するストーリーがあるにもかかわらず、この映画には何か不気味なものがあります。
back_translation: Despite the presence of a story that intricately examines Kevin Klein's charm and old-fashioned values, there is something unsettling about this movie.

text: kirshner and monroe seem to be in a contest to see who can out-bad-act the other .
translation: キルシュナーとモンローは、お互いにどちらがより悪い演技ができるかを競っているようだ。
back_translation: Kirschner and Monroe seem to be competing with each other to see who can perform worse.

text: the only reason you should see this movie is if you have a case of masochism and an hour and a half to blow .
translation: この映画を見るべき唯一の理由は、マゾヒズムの気があり、1時間半を無駄にする時間がある場合だけです。
back_translation: The only reason to watch this movie is if you have a masochistic tendency and have an hour and a half to waste.

text: it 's pretentious in a way that verges on the amateurish .
translation: それはアマチュア的な域に近いほど、気取った印象を与えます。
back_translation: It gives off a pretentious impression as it approaches an amateurish level.

text: a plodding teen remake that 's so mechanical you can smell the grease on the plot twists .
translation: ぎこちないティーン向けのリメイクで、ストーリーのひねりに脂の匂いが漂ってくるほど機械的です。
back_translation: It's an awkward teenage remake, so mechanical that the story's twists reek of grease.

text: it 's drab .
translation: それは地味です。
back_translation: That's plain.

text: ... a delightfully unpredictable , hilarious comedy with wonderful performances that tug at your heart in ways that utterly transcend gender labels .
translation: ... 非常に予測不可能で、ユーモラスなコメディで、性別のレッテルを完全に超えた方法で心を引きつける素晴らしいパフォーマンスが詰まっています。
back_translation: ... It is filled with a highly unpredictable and humorous comedy that captivates the heart in a way that completely transcends gender labels.

text: what 's so striking about jolie 's performance is that she never lets her character become a caricature -- not even with that radioactive hair .
translation: ジョリーの演技で際立っているのは、彼女がキャラクターをカリカチュアにさせないことです -- あの放射能のような髪型でさえも。
back_translation: What stands out in Jolie's performance is that she does not allow the character to become a caricature—even with that radioactive hairstyle.

text: in my own very humble opinion , in praise of love lacks even the most fragmented charms i have found in almost all of his previous works .
translation: 私のとても控えめな意見ですが、「愛の賛美」は、彼の以前の作品に見られるほとんど全ての断片的な魅力さえ欠けていると思います。
back_translation: In my very humble opinion, I think "Praise of Love" lacks almost all the fragmented charm found in his earlier works.

text: i 've never bought from telemarketers , but i bought this movie .
translation: 私はテレマーケティングの業者から買ったことはありませんが、この映画を買いました。
back_translation: I have never bought anything from a telemarketing company, but I bought this movie.

text: woven together handsomely , recalling sixties ' rockumentary milestones from lonely boy to do n't look back .
translation: 見事に織り交ぜられ、孤独な少年から振り返るなまでの60年代のロックドキュメンタリーのマイルストーンを思い起こさせる。
back_translation: It is beautifully intertwined, reminiscent of a milestone in 60s rock documentaries, looking back from the perspective of a lonely boy.

text: horrid little propaganda film with fascinating connections not only to the serbs themselves but also to a network of american right-wing extremists .
translation: ひどい小さなプロパガンダ映画で、セルビア人自身だけでなく、アメリカの右翼過激派のネットワークとの興味深い関係もあります。
back_translation: A terrible little propaganda film that has an interesting relationship not only with Serbians themselves but also with the network of American right-wing extremists.

text: a sun-drenched masterpiece , part parlor game , part psychological case study , part droll social satire .
translation: 日差しの降り注ぐ傑作、パーラーゲームの一部、心理的ケーススタディの一部、そして滑稽な社会風刺の一部。
back_translation: A masterwork bathed in sunlight, part of a parlor game, part of a psychological case study, and part of a humorous social satire.

text: a thriller without thrills and a mystery devoid of urgent questions .
translation: スリルのないスリラーと、切迫した問いのないミステリー。
back_translation: A thriller without thrills and a mystery without urgent questions.

text: 10 minutes into the film you 'll be white-knuckled and unable to look away .
translation: 映画が始まって10分で、あなたは緊張して手に汗を握り、目を離せなくなるでしょう。
back_translation: Within 10 minutes of the movie starting, you will feel tense, your palms will be sweaty, and you won’t be able to look away.

text: an enjoyable above average summer diversion .
translation: 楽しめる、平均以上の夏の気晴らし。
back_translation: An enjoyable summer diversion that's above average.

text: watching this film , what we feel is n't mainly suspense or excitement .
translation: この映画を観ていると、私たちが感じるのは主にサスペンスや興奮ではありません。
back_translation: What we mostly feel while watching this movie is not suspense or excitement.

text: it 's not going to be everyone 's bag of popcorn , but it definitely gives you something to chew on .
translation: それは誰にとっても好みのものではないかもしれませんが、確かに考える材料を提供してくれます。
back_translation: It may not be to everyone's taste, but it certainly provides food for thought.

text: violent , vulgar and forgettably entertaining .
translation: 暴力的で、下品で、記憶に残らない楽しみ。
back_translation: Violent, vulgar, and unmemorable pleasures.

text: like many such biographical melodramas , it suffers from the awkwardness that results from adhering to the messiness of true stories .
translation: 多くの同様の伝記メロドラマと同様に、真実の物語の混沌に従うことで生じる不器用さに悩まされている。
back_translation: Like many similar biographical melodramas, it is troubled by the awkwardness that arises from following the chaos of a true story.

text: as a story of dramatic enlightenment , the screenplay by billy ray and terry george leaves something to be desired .
translation: ドラマティックな啓発の物語として、ビリー・レイとテリー・ジョージの脚本には何か物足りなさが残る。
back_translation: As a story of dramatic enlightenment, the script by Billy Ray and Terry George leaves something to be desired.

text: sometimes charming , sometimes infuriating , this argentinean ` dramedy ' succeeds mainly on the shoulders of its actors .
translation: 時に魅力的で、時に腹立たしいこのアルゼンチンの「ドラマコメディ」は、主にその俳優たちの肩の上で成功しています。
back_translation: This Argentine "drama comedy," which is sometimes charming and sometimes frustrating, primarily succeeds on the shoulders of its actors.

text: `` 13 conversations about one thing '' is an intelligent flick that examines many different ideas from happiness to guilt in an intriguing bit of storytelling .
translation: 「13の会話について」は、興味深いストーリーテリングの中で、幸福から罪悪感までのさまざまなアイデアを検証する知的な映画です。
back_translation: "About the 13 Conversations" is an intellectual film that explores various ideas ranging from happiness to guilt within an intriguing narrative.

text: a no-holds-barred cinematic treat .
translation: 全く手加減のない映画の楽しみ。
back_translation: The joy of a movie with no holds barred.

text: plotless collection of moronic stunts is by far the worst movie of the year .
translation: プロットのない愚かなスタントの集まりは、今年最悪の映画です。
back_translation: A collection of foolish stunts without a plot is the worst movie of the year.

text: all in all , road to perdition is more in love with strangeness than excellence .
translation: 総じて言えば、『天国行きの道』は卓越性よりも奇妙さにもっと惹かれている。
back_translation: Overall, it can be said that "The Road to Heaven" is more captivated by strangeness than by excellence.

text: with all the sympathy , empathy and pity fogging up the screen ... his secret life enters the land of unintentional melodrama and tiresome love triangles .
translation: すべての同情、共感、そして哀れみが画面を覆い尽くす中、彼の秘密の人生は意図しないメロドラマと煩わしい恋愛三角関係の土地に足を踏み入れる。
back_translation: Amidst all the sympathy, empathy, and pity that envelop the screen, his secret life steps into a realm of unintended melodrama and troublesome love triangles.

text: like a fish that 's lived too long , austin powers in goldmember has some unnecessary parts and is kinda wrong in places .
translation: 長生きしすぎた魚のように、「オースティン・パワーズ ゴールドメンバー」には不要な部分があり、いくつかの点で少しおかしい。
back_translation: Like a fish that has lived too long, "Austin Powers: Goldmember" has unnecessary parts and is a bit strange in some aspects.

text: adaptation 's success in engaging the audience in the travails of creating a screenplay is extraordinary .
translation: 脚本を作成する苦労に観客を引き込む適応の成功は並外れています。
back_translation: The success of adapting a script into something that captivates the audience is remarkable, considering the difficulties involved in creating a script.

text: canadian filmmaker gary burns ' inventive and mordantly humorous take on the soullessness of work in the city .
translation: カナダの映画製作者ゲイリー・バーンズの、都市における労働の無情さについての独創的で皮肉なユーモアの視点。
back_translation: The original and ironic humorous perspective of Canadian filmmaker Gary Burns on the harshness of labor in the urban environment.

text: ultimately , `` mib ii '' succeeds due to its rapid-fire delivery and enough inspired levity that it ca n't be dismissed as mindless .
translation: 最終的に、「ミニチュア II」は、その速射的な展開と、軽快さが十分にインスパイアされているため、無神経なものとして退けることができません。
back_translation: Ultimately, "Miniature II" cannot be dismissed as insensitive due to its rapid development and lightness, which are sufficiently inspiring.

text: like the original , this version is raised a few notches above kiddie fantasy pablum by allen 's astringent wit .
translation: オリジナルと同様に、このバージョンはアレンの辛辣なウィットによって子供向けファンタジーの平坦さよりも一段階高められています。
back_translation: Like the original, this version is elevated above the flatness of children's fantasy by Allen's biting wit.

text: tries so hard to be quirky and funny that the strain is all too evident .
translation: あまりにも奇抜で面白くあろうと努力しすぎて、その無理が明らかに見えてしまう。
back_translation: Trying too hard to be too unconventional and interesting makes the effort glaringly obvious.

text: the self-serious equilibrium makes its point too well ; a movie , like life , is n't much fun without the highs and lows .
translation: 自己重視の均衡はそのポイントをあまりにもよく伝えています；映画は、人生と同じように、高低がなければあまり楽しくありません。
back_translation: The self-centered balance conveys that point too well; the movie, much like life, is not very enjoyable without ups and downs.

text: a family film that contains some hefty thematic material on time , death , eternity , and what is needed to live a rich and full life .
translation: 時間、死、永遠についての重厚なテーマを含む、豊かで充実した人生を生きるために必要なものを描いたファミリーフィルム。
back_translation: A family film that depicts the essentials for living a rich and fulfilling life, incorporating heavy themes of time, death, and eternity.

text: a riveting profile of law enforcement , and a visceral , nasty journey into an urban hades .
translation: 法執行機関の刺激的なプロフィールと、都市のハデスへの生々しく、悪質な旅。
back_translation: A thrilling profile of law enforcement and a vivid, malicious journey to the Hades of the city.

text: by no means a great movie , but it is a refreshingly forthright one .
translation: 決して素晴らしい映画ではありませんが、率直さが新鮮な作品です。
back_translation: It's not a great movie, but its honesty is refreshing.

text: rewarding .
translation: 報酬のある。
back_translation: There is a reward.

text: often hilarious .
translation: しばしば面白い。
back_translation: Often interesting.

text: shot largely in small rooms , the film has a gentle , unforced intimacy that never becomes claustrophobic .
translation: 小さな部屋で多く撮影されたこの映画は、窮屈にならない穏やかで無理のない親密さを持っています。
back_translation: This film, shot mostly in a small room, has a gentle and effortless intimacy that does not feel cramped.

text: i like all four of the lead actors a lot and they manage to squeeze a few laughs out of the material , but they 're treading water at best in this forgettable effort .
translation: 主な4人の俳優全員がとても好きで、彼らは素材からいくつかの笑いを引き出すことに成功していますが、この忘れられた作品では精一杯足踏みしているに過ぎません。
back_translation: I really like all four main actors, and they succeed in drawing some laughs from the material, but in this forgotten work, they are merely treading water.

text: the adventure does n't contain half the excitement of balto , or quarter the fun of toy story 2 .
translation: その冒険はバルドの半分の興奮も、トイ・ストーリー2の四分の一の楽しさも含んでいない。
back_translation: The adventure included none of the excitement of half of Bald and a quarter of the fun of Toy Story 2.

text: a very charming and funny movie .
translation: とても魅力的で面白い映画。
back_translation: A very charming and interesting movie.

text: nair 's attention to detail creates an impeccable sense of place , while thurman and lewis give what can easily be considered career-best performances .
translation: ナイアーの細部へのこだわりは完璧な場所の感覚を生み出し、サーマンとルイスはキャリアの中で最高のパフォーマンスと呼べるものを提供しています。
back_translation: Naya's attention to detail creates a sense of a perfect place, and Thurman and Lewis deliver what can be called the best performances of their careers.

text: ... the maudlin way its story unfolds suggests a director fighting against the urge to sensationalize his material .
translation: 物語が進む感傷的な方法は、監督が素材をセンセーショナルに演出したい衝動に抵抗していることを示唆しています。
back_translation: The sentimental way the story unfolds suggests that the director is resisting the impulse to sensationalize the material.

text: beware the quirky brit-com .
translation: 風変わりなイギリスのコメディには注意。
back_translation: Beware of quirky British comedy.

text: a sense of real magic , perhaps .
translation: 本物の魔法の感覚、あるいは。
back_translation: The sensation of real magic, or.

text: in theory , a middle-aged romance pairing clayburgh and tambor sounds promising , but in practice it 's something else altogether -- clownish and offensive and nothing at all like real life .
translation: 理論的には、中年のロマンスとしてクレーバーとタンバーロの組み合わせは期待できるが、実際にはまったく別のもので、滑稽で攻撃的で、現実とは全く異なる。
back_translation: Theoretically, the combination of Cleaver and Tamburro as a middle-aged romance has potential, but in reality, it is something entirely different, absurd, and offensive, completely unrelated to reality.

text: a tour de force of modern cinema .
translation: 現代映画の傑作。
back_translation: A masterpiece of contemporary cinema.

text: able to provide insight into a fascinating part of theater history .
translation: 劇場の歴史の魅力的な部分について洞察を提供することができます。
back_translation: I can provide insights into the fascinating aspects of theatrical history.

text: it still feels like a prison stretch .
translation: まだ監獄のような延長に感じる。
back_translation: It still feels like an extension of a prison.

text: adams , with four scriptwriters , takes care with the characters , who are so believable that you feel what they feel .
translation: アダムスは、4人の脚本家と共にキャラクターに気を配り、彼らが非常にリアルであるため、彼らの感じていることをあなたも感じることができます。
back_translation: Adams pays attention to the characters alongside four writers, and because they are very realistic, you can feel what they are feeling.

text: he makes you realize that deep inside righteousness can be found a tough beauty .
translation: 彼は、内面の奥深くに正義の中に厳しい美しさが存在することを気づかせてくれます。
back_translation: He makes us realize that there is a severe beauty within deep inside justice.

text: this is historical filmmaking without the balm of right-thinking ideology , either liberal or conservative .
translation: これは、リベラルでも保守的でもない、正しい思想のバームなしに歴史的な映画製作です。
back_translation: This is historic filmmaking without the balm of a correct ideology, neither liberal nor conservative.

text: the direction , by george hickenlooper , has no snap to it , no wiseacre crackle or hard-bitten cynicism .
translation: ジョージ・ヒッケンルーパーの「ディレクション」には、キレや皮肉っぽいひねり、または厳しいシニシズムがありません。
back_translation: George Hickenlooper's "Direction" lacks sharpness, sarcastic twists, or harsh cynicism.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- smarter and much funnier version of the old police academy flicks .
translation: -（a）- 古いポリスアカデミー映画のスマートでずっと面白いバージョン。
back_translation: - (a) - A smart and much funnier version of an old Police Academy movie.

text: her fans walked out muttering words like `` horrible '' and `` terrible , '' but had so much fun dissing the film that they did n't mind the ticket cost .
translation: 彼女のファンたちは「ひどい」や「最低」といった言葉をこぼしながら劇場を出ていったが、映画を批評するのが楽しすぎてチケット代は気にならなかった。
back_translation: Her fans exited the theater muttering words like "terrible" and "the worst," but they were having too much fun critiquing the movie to care about the ticket price.

text: a supernatural mystery that does n't know whether it wants to be a suspenseful horror movie or a weepy melodrama .
translation: サスペンスホラー映画になりたいのか、感傷的なメロドラマになりたいのか分からない超自然的ミステリー。
back_translation: A supernatural mystery that doesn't know whether it wants to be a suspense horror film or a sentimental melodrama.

text: an impeccable study in perversity .
translation: 倒錯の完璧な研究。
back_translation: A perfect study of perversion.

text: what sets it apart is the vision that taymor , the avant garde director of broadway 's the lion king and the film titus , brings .
translation: それを際立たせるのは、ブロードウェイの「ライオン・キング」と映画「ティタス」の前衛的な監督テイモアがもたらすビジョンです。
back_translation: What highlights it is the vision brought by avant-garde director Taymor from Broadway's "The Lion King" and the film "Titus."

text: offers the flash of rock videos fused with solid performances and eerie atmosphere .
translation: ロックビデオの華やかさと、確かなパフォーマンス、そして不気味な雰囲気が融合しています。
back_translation: The glamour of the rock video, the solid performances, and the eerie atmosphere come together in a fusion.

text: but the film itself is ultimately quite unengaging .
translation: しかし、映画自体は結局あまり魅力的ではありません。
back_translation: However, the movie itself is ultimately not very appealing.

text: a sleep-inducingly slow-paced crime drama with clumsy dialogue , heavy-handed phoney-feeling sentiment , and an overly-familiar set of plot devices .
translation: 眠くなるほどのスローペースの犯罪ドラマで、ぎこちない対話や重い感じの偽物の感情、そしてあまりにも馴染みのあるプロットデバイスが使われています。
back_translation: It's a crime drama with such a slow pace that it makes you sleepy, featuring awkward dialogue, heavy fake emotions, and overly familiar plot devices.

text: an awful movie that will only satisfy the most emotionally malleable of filmgoers .
translation: 感情的に影響を受けやすい映画ファンしか満足させないひどい映画。
back_translation: A terrible movie that only satisfies emotionally susceptible film fans.

text: i guess it just goes to show that if you give a filmmaker an unlimited amount of phony blood , nothing good can happen .
translation: やはり、映画製作者に無制限のフェイク血を与えると、良い結果は生まれないということがわかります。
back_translation: Indeed, it becomes clear that giving filmmakers unlimited fake blood does not produce good results.

text: time of favor could have given audiences the time of day by concentrating on the elements of a revealing alienation among a culture of people who sadly are at hostile odds with one another through recklessness and retaliation .
translation: 好意の時は、無謀さと報復によって残念ながら互いに敵対している文化の人々の間にある明らかな疎外感の要素に集中することで、観客に時の恩恵を与えることができたかもしれません。
back_translation: During times of goodwill, it may have been possible to grant the audience the benefits of the moment by focusing on the elements of apparent alienation that exist between cultures that, unfortunately, are mutually hostile due to recklessness and retaliation.

text: a waste of fearless purity in the acting craft .
translation: 演技の技術における恐れ知らずの純粋さの無駄。
back_translation: The waste of fearless purity in the art of performance.

text: twenty years after its first release , e.t. remains the most wondrous of all hollywood fantasies -- and the apex of steven spielberg 's misunderstood career .
translation: 初回公開から20年後、E.T.はすべてのハリウッドファンタジーの中で最も驚異的な作品であり、スティーブン・スピルバーグの誤解されたキャリアの頂点です。
back_translation: Twenty years after its initial release, E.T. stands as the most astonishing work among all Hollywood fantasies and is the peak of Steven Spielberg's misunderstood career.

text: suffers from unlikable characters and a self-conscious sense of its own quirky hipness .
translation: 好感の持てないキャラクターと、自らの独特のヒップさを意識しすぎているという問題を抱えています。
back_translation: They have the problem of being an unlikable character and being overly self-conscious about their own unique hipness.

text: talky , artificial and opaque ... an interesting technical exercise , but a tedious picture .
translation: おしゃべりで、人工的で不透明... 興味深い技術的な演習ですが、退屈な映画です。
back_translation: Talkative, artificial, and opaque... an interesting technical exercise, but a boring movie.

text: filled with low-brow humor , gratuitous violence and a disturbing disregard for life .
translation: 低俗なユーモア、無意味な暴力、そして命に対する不気味な無関心で満ちている。
back_translation: It is filled with base humor, meaningless violence, and a disturbing indifference to life.

text: the great pity is that those responsible did n't cut their losses -- and ours -- and retitle it the adventures of direct-to-video nash , and send it to its proper home .
translation: 大変残念なことに、責任者たちは損失を切り捨てず、私たちの損失も削減せずに、それを「ダイレクト・トゥ・ビデオ・ナッシュの冒険」と改題し、適切な場所へ送ることをしませんでした。
back_translation: It is very unfortunate that the people in charge did not cut their losses or reduce our losses, and instead re-titled it "Direct-to-Video Nash's Adventure" and did not send it to the appropriate place.

text: beneath the uncanny , inevitable and seemingly shrewd facade of movie-biz farce ... lies a plot cobbled together from largely flat and uncreative moments .
translation: 気味の悪い、避けられない、そして一見鋭い表向きの映画ビジネスの茶番の背後には、大部分が平坦で創造性のない瞬間から寄せ集められたプロットがあります。
back_translation: Behind the creepy, unavoidable, and seemingly sharp facade of the movie business, there lies a plot largely cobbled together from flat and creativity-lacking moments.

text: more tiring than anything .
translation: 何よりも疲れる。
back_translation: It's exhausting above all.

text: laconic and very stilted in its dialogue , this indie flick never found its audience , probably because it 's extremely hard to relate to any of the characters .
translation: 台詞が簡潔で非常に堅苦しいこのインディー映画は、観客を見つけることができず、恐らくキャラクターの誰にも共感することが非常に難しいからだ。
back_translation: This indie film, with its concise and very stiff dialogue, struggles to find an audience, likely because it is very difficult to empathize with any of the characters.

text: uzumaki 's interesting social parallel and defiant aesthetic seems a prostituted muse ...
translation: うずまきの興味深い社会的パラレルと反抗的な美学は、まるで売春されたミューズのように見える...
back_translation: The interesting social parallels and rebellious aesthetics of the spiral seem like a prostituted muse...

text: a perceptive , good-natured movie .
translation: 洞察力があり、性格の良い映画。
back_translation: A movie with insight and a good character.

text: maelstrom is strange and compelling , engrossing and different , a moral tale with a twisted sense of humor .
translation: メイルストロムは奇妙で魅力的で、引き込まれ、異なるものであり、ひねりの効いたユーモアを伴った道徳的な物語です。
back_translation: The maelstrom is strange and captivating, drawing you in with its differences, and it is a moral story accompanied by a twist of humor.

text: if you 're looking for a story , do n't bother .
translation: ストーリーを探しているなら、気にしないでください。
back_translation: If you are looking for a story, don't worry about it.

text: reign of fire never comes close to recovering from its demented premise , but it does sustain an enjoyable level of ridiculousness .
translation: 「レイン・オブ・ファイア」はその狂った前提から回復することは決してないが、楽しげな不条理さを維持している。
back_translation: "Reign of Fire" never recovers from its insane premise, but it maintains a cheerful absurdity.

text: if you ever wondered what it would be like to be smack in the middle of a war zone armed with nothing but a camera , this oscar-nominated documentary takes you there .
translation: もし、カメラだけを持って戦争地帯の真ん中にいるとどんな気分になるのか考えたことがあるなら、このオスカーにノミネートされたドキュメンタリーがあなたをその場所に連れて行きます。
back_translation: If you have ever thought about how it would feel to be in the middle of a war zone with only a camera, this Oscar-nominated documentary will take you to that place.

text: other than a mildly engaging central romance , hospital is sickly entertainment at best and mind-destroying cinematic pollution at worst .
translation: 中央のロマンスがやや魅力的である以外、病院はせいぜい病的なエンターテイメントであり、最悪の場合は精神を破壊する映画的汚染です。
back_translation: Apart from the central romance being somewhat appealing, the hospital is at best a pathological form of entertainment, and at worst, a cinematic pollution that can destroy the mind.

text: the movie is like scorsese 's mean streets redone by someone who ignored it in favor of old ` juvenile delinquent ' paperbacks with titles like leather warriors and switchblade sexpot .
translation: その映画は、スコセッシの「ミーン・ストリート」を、革の戦士やスイッチブレード・セックスポットのような古い「未成年の非行者」のペーパーバックを好んで無視した誰かによって作り直されたもののようだ。
back_translation: That movie seems to have been remade by someone who prefers to ignore old paperback novels like Scorsese's "Mean Streets," featuring leather warriors and switchblade sexpots, rather than acknowledging "juvenile delinquents."

text: like the chilled breath of oral storytelling frozen onto film .
translation: 口承物語の冷たい息が映画に凍りついたように。

text: captivates as it shows excess in business and pleasure , allowing us to find the small , human moments , and leaving off with a grand whimper .
translation: ビジネスと楽しみの過剰を示しながら心を奪う作品で、小さな人間的瞬間を見つけることを可能にし、壮大な悲鳴で締めくくります。
back_translation: A work that captivates while showcasing the excess of business and pleasure, allowing the discovery of small, human moments, and concludes with a grand scream.

text: gay or straight , kissing jessica stein is one of the greatest date movies in years .
translation: ゲイでもストレートでも、『ジャシカ・スタインの決断』はここ数年で最高のデートムービーの一つです。
back_translation: Whether you are gay or straight, "Jessica Stein's Decision" is one of the best date movies in recent years.

text: he drags it back , single-handed .

text: translating complex characters from novels to the big screen is an impossible task but they are true to the essence of what it is to be ya-ya .

text: a thoughtful and surprisingly affecting portrait of a screwed-up man who dared to mess with some powerful people , seen through the eyes of the idealistic kid who chooses to champion his ultimately losing cause .
translation: 思慮深く、驚くほど感動的な、強力な人々に手を出そうとしたうまくいかない男の肖像が、最終的には負けることになるその男の大義を支持することを選んだ理想主義的な子供の目を通して描かれています。
back_translation: The portrait of a failed man who attempted to reach out to thoughtful, remarkably moving, and powerful people is depicted through the eyes of an idealistic child who ultimately chooses to support the cause of that man, who will end up losing.

text: reggio and glass put on an intoxicating show .

text: a rare and lightly entertaining look behind the curtain that separates comics from the people laughing in the crowd .

text: be prepared to cling to the edge of your seat , tense with suspense .

text: stealing harvard ca n't even do that much .

text: expands the limits of what a film can be , taking us into the lives of women to whom we might not give a second look if we passed them on the street .
translation: 映画の限界を広げ、街で彼女たちとすれ違った時に二度見もしないかもしれない女性たちの生活に私たちを引き込みます。

text: ... wallace is smart to vary the pitch of his movie , balancing deafening battle scenes with quieter domestic scenes of women back home receiving war department telegrams .
translation: ... ウォレスは映画のピッチを変えることに賢い。彼は、戦闘の騒がしいシーンと、帰宅した女性たちが戦争省からの電報を受け取る静かな家庭のシーンとのバランスを取っている。

text: a true-blue delight .

text: what ensues are much blood-splattering , mass drug-induced bowel evacuations , and none-too-funny commentary on the cultural distinctions between americans and brits .

text: an enjoyable experience .

text: and they succeed merrily at their noble endeavor .

translation: 私は小さな目で見た…ありきたりなアクションシーンの mediocre コレクションと時折ひらめきのあるセリフの断片。

text: the hours , a delicately crafted film , is an impressive achievement in spite of a river of sadness that pours into every frame .

text: well , this movie proves you wrong on both counts .
translation: まあ、この映画は両方の点であなたが間違っていることを証明しています。

text: much of it is funny , but there are also some startling , surrealistic moments ...

text: those who are only mildly curious , i fear , will be put to sleep or bewildered by the artsy and often pointless visuals .

text: this 90-minute postmodern voyage was more diverting and thought-provoking than i 'd expected it to be .

text: ignoring that , he made swimfan anyway

text: we never truly come to care about the main characters and whether or not they 'll wind up together , and michele 's spiritual quest is neither amusing nor dramatic enough to sustain interest .
