back_translation: The children who are fascinated by this thornberry are surely in Wedge's paradise.

text: it 's easy to love robin tunney -- she 's pretty and she can act -- but it gets harder and harder to understand her choices .
translation: ロビン・タニーを愛するのは容易い -- 彼女は美しく、演技もできる -- しかし彼女の選択を理解するのはだんだん難しくなっている。
back_translation: Loving Robin Tanie is easy—she is beautiful and talented—but understanding her choices is becoming increasingly difficult.

text: it 's just not very smart .
translation: それはあまり賢くないです。
back_translation: That is not very wise.

text: meandering and confusing .
translation: 曲がりくねっていて混乱している。
back_translation: It is winding and confusing.

text: there are just too many characters saying too many clever things and getting into too many pointless situations .
translation: 登場人物が多すぎて、賢いことを言いすぎ、無意味な状況に巻き込まれすぎている。
back_translation: There are too many characters, too much clever dialogue, and too many meaningless situations.

text: the film feels uncomfortably real , its language and locations bearing the unmistakable stamp of authority .
translation: その映画は不快なほど現実的で、言語やロケーションには明らかな権威の印が刻まれています。
back_translation: The movie is uncomfortably realistic, with obvious signs of authority stamped in the language and locations.

text: i 'm sure the filmmaker would disagree , but , honestly , i do n't see the point .
translation: 映画製作者は同意しないと思いますが、正直なところ、私はその意味がわかりません。
back_translation: I don’t think filmmakers would agree, but to be honest, I don’t understand what that means.

text: without -lrb- de niro -rrb- , city by the sea would slip under the waves .
translation: デ・ニーロなしでは、『シティ・バイ・ザ・シー』は波の下に沈んでしまうだろう。
back_translation: Without De Niro, "City by the Sea" would sink beneath the waves.

text: great over-the-top moviemaking if you 're in a slap-happy mood .
translation: 楽しげな気分のときには、派手で素晴らしい映画制作です。
back_translation: When feeling cheerful, it's about extravagant and wonderful filmmaking.

text: mr. soderbergh 's direction and visual style struck me as unusually and unimpressively fussy and pretentious .
translation: ソダーバーグ監督の演出と視覚スタイルは、異常に繊細でありながら印象に残らない pretentiousに感じました。
back_translation: Director Soderbergh's direction and visual style felt unusually delicate yet unmemorable and pretentious.

text: if we sometimes need comforting fantasies about mental illness , we also need movies like tim mccann 's revolution no. 9 .
translation: 時には精神疾患についての心慰める空想が必要なこともありますが、ティム・マッカンの「レボリューションNo.9」のような映画も必要です。
back_translation: Sometimes it is necessary to have comforting fantasies about mental illness, but films like Tim McCann's "Revolution No. 9" are also needed.

text: it 's something of the ultimate scorsese film , with all the stomach-turning violence , colorful new york gang lore and other hallmarks of his personal cinema painted on their largest-ever historical canvas .
translation: それは究極のスコセッシ映画と言えるもので、すべての胃がひっくり返るような暴力、色とりどりのニューヨークのギャング伝説、そして彼の個人的な映画の特徴が最大の歴史的キャンバスに描かれています。
back_translation: It can be said to be the ultimate Scorsese film, with all its stomach-turning violence, the colorful legends of New York gangs, and his personal cinematic traits portrayed on the largest historical canvas.

text: too slow for a younger crowd , too shallow for an older one .
translation: 若い世代には遅すぎ、年配の世代には浅すぎる。
back_translation: Too late for the younger generation and too shallow for the older generation.

text: instead of building to a laugh riot we are left with a handful of disparate funny moments of no real consequence .
translation: 笑いの大暴走に向かって構築する代わりに、私たちは実際には重要性のない、バラバラな面白い瞬間のいくつかだけが残されています。
back_translation: Instead of building towards a grand rush of laughter, we are left with only a few scattered funny moments that are actually insignificant.

text: just another generic drama that has nothing going for it other than its exploitive array of obligatory cheap thrills .
translation: 他に特に目立つものが何もない、必須の安っぽいスリルの搾取的な配列だけを持つ、ただの一般的なドラマ。
back_translation: Just a plain drama with nothing particularly noteworthy, only a cheap thrill exploitative arrangement that is essential.

text: williams creates a stunning , taxi driver-esque portrayal of a man teetering on the edge of sanity .
translation: ウィリアムズは、正気の縁に立つ男の驚くべきタクシードライバーのような描写を生み出しています。
back_translation: Williams creates a remarkable depiction of a man on the edge of sanity, much like a taxi driver.

text: demme gets a lot of flavor and spice into his charade remake , but he ca n't disguise that he 's spiffing up leftovers that are n't so substantial or fresh .
translation: デメは彼のシャレードのリメイクに多くの風味とスパイスを加えていますが、実際にはそれほど重要で新鮮ではない残り物を手を加えていることを隠すことはできません。
back_translation: Deme adds a lot of flavor and spice to his remake of the charade, but he cannot hide the fact that he is actually just embellishing leftovers that are not that significant or fresh.

text: but unless you 're an absolute raving star wars junkie , it is n't much fun .
translation: しかし、あなたが絶対的なスター・ウォーズファンでなければ、それほど面白くはありません。
back_translation: However, if you are not an absolute Star Wars fan, it may not be that interesting.

text: promises is one film that 's truly deserving of its oscar nomination .
translation: 「約束」は、本当にオスカーへのノミネートに値する映画です。
back_translation: "Promise" is truly a film deserving of an Oscar nomination.

text: impossible as it may sound , this film 's heart is even more embracing than monty , if only because it accepts nasty behavior and severe flaws as part of the human condition .
translation: 不可能に聞こえるかもしれませんが、この映画の心はモンティよりもさらに包み込むものです。なぜなら、醜い行動や深刻な欠点を人間の条件の一部として受け入れているからです。
back_translation: It may sound impossible, but the heart of this film is even more encompassing than Monty's because it accepts ugly behavior and serious flaws as part of the human condition.

text: it 's the brilliant surfing photography bringing you right inside the massive waves that lifts blue crush into one of the summer 's most pleasurable movies .
translation: その素晴らしいサーフィンの写真が巨大な波の中にあなたを引き込み、「ブルー・クラッシュ」を夏の最も楽しめる映画の一つに押し上げています。
back_translation: That amazing surfing photo draws you into massive waves, making "Blue Crush" one of the most enjoyable movies of the summer.

text: a powerful , inflammatory film about religion that dares to question an ancient faith , and about hatred that offers no easy , comfortable resolution .
translation: 古い信仰に疑問を投げかける力強く、扇動的な宗教に関する映画であり、簡単で快適な解決策を提供しない憎しみについてのものです。
back_translation: It is a powerful and provocative film about religion that questions old beliefs and deals with hatred without offering simple and comfortable solutions.

text: fessenden has nurtured his metaphors at the expense of his narrative , but he does display an original talent .
translation: フェッセンデンは物語の代償でメタファーを育んできたが、彼は独自の才能を示している。
back_translation: Fessenden has cultivated metaphor at the cost of storytelling, but he demonstrates a unique talent.

text: to honestly address the flaws inherent in how medical aid is made available to american workers , a more balanced or fair portrayal of both sides will be needed .
translation: アメリカの労働者に医療援助がどのように提供されるかに内在する欠陥を正直に対処するためには、両方の側面をよりバランスの取れた公平な描写が必要です。
back_translation: To honestly address the inherent flaws in how healthcare assistance is provided to American workers, a more balanced and fair depiction of both aspects is needed.

text: halfway through , however , having sucked dry the undead action flick formula , blade ii mutates into a gross-out monster movie with effects that are more silly than scary .
translation: 途中で、しかし、アンデッドアクション映画の定型を使い果たした後、ブレイドIIは気持ち悪いモンスター映画に変わり、効果は恐ろしいというよりも滑稽です。
back_translation: However, halfway through, after exhausting the clichés of the undead action film, Blade II turns into a grotesque monster movie, and the effects are more ridiculous than frightening.

text: the otherwise good-naturedness of mr. deeds , with its embrace of sheer goofiness and cameos of less - than-likely new york celebrities ... certainly raises the film above anything sandler 's been attached to before .
translation: 映画がサンドラーがこれまで関わってきたものを上回る要因の一つは、ミスター・ディーズの本来の良い性格であり、純粋な愚かさを受け入れ、あり得ないニューヨークの有名人たちのカメオ出演があることです。
back_translation: One factor that surpasses the films Sandler has been involved in so far is Mr. Deeds' inherently good nature, the acceptance of pure silliness, and the unbelievable cameos from famous personalities in New York.

text: all the pieces fall together without much surprise , but little moments give it a boost .
translation: すべてのピースは大きな驚きもなくはまるが、小さな瞬間がそれに弾みを与える。
back_translation: All the pieces fit together without any big surprises, but small moments give it a boost.

text: to get at the root psychology of this film would require many sessions on the couch of dr. freud .
translation: この映画の根本的な心理を理解するには、フロイト博士のカウチで何回もセッションを受ける必要があるだろう。
back_translation: To truly understand the fundamental psychology of this movie, one would likely need to have multiple sessions on Freud's couch.

text: a remarkable film by bernard rose .
translation: バーナード・ローズによる素晴らしい映画。
back_translation: A wonderful film by Bernard Rose.

text: overly long and worshipful bio-doc .
translation: 過度に長く、崇拝的な伝記ドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: An excessively long and reverential biographical documentary.

text: it 's the sweet cinderella story that `` pretty woman '' wanted to be .
translation: それは「プリティ・ウーマン」がなりたかった甘いシンデレラの物語です。
back_translation: It is a sweet Cinderella story that wanted to be "Pretty Woman."

text: a delicious , quirky movie with a terrific screenplay and fanciful direction by michael gondry .
translation: 美味しくて奇妙な映画で、素晴らしい脚本とミシェル・ゴンドリーによる幻想的な演出が特徴です。
back_translation: It's a deliciously strange film, characterized by a wonderful script and whimsical direction by Michel Gondry.

text: it appears to have been made by people to whom the idea of narrative logic or cohesion is an entirely foreign concept .
translation: 物語の論理や一貫性という概念がまったく馴染みのない人々によって作られたようです。
back_translation: It seems that it was created by people who are completely unfamiliar with the concepts of narrative logic and consistency.

text: a tone of rueful compassion ... reverberates throughout this film , whose meaning and impact is sadly heightened by current world events .
translation: 悲しげな同情のトーンがこの映画全体に響き渡り、その意味と影響は残念ながら現在の世界の出来事によって増幅されています。
back_translation: The tone of sad sympathy resonates throughout this film, and its meaning and impact are, unfortunately, amplified by current world events.

text: a mechanical action-comedy whose seeming purpose is to market the charismatic jackie chan to even younger audiences .
translation: 魅力的なジャッキー・チェンをさらに若い観客に市場に送り込むことを目的としたように見えるアクションコメディ。
back_translation: An action comedy that seems aimed at introducing the charming Jackie Chan to a younger audience.

text: it desperately wants to be a wacky , screwball comedy , but the most screwy thing here is how so many talented people were convinced to waste their time .
translation: それは必死にユニークでおかしなコメディになりたいと思っているが、ここで最もおかしなことは、才能のある多くの人々がどうして時間を無駄にすることに納得したのかということだ。
back_translation: It desperately wants to be a unique and funny comedy, but the funniest thing here is why so many talented people have accepted wasting their time on it.

text: both grant and hoult carry the movie because they are believable as people -- flawed , assured of the wrong things , and scared to admit how much they may really need the company of others .
translation: グラントとハウルトは、魅力的な人物として映画を支えています。彼らは欠点を持ち、間違ったことに自信を持ち、他者の存在がどれほど必要かを認めることに恐れを抱いています。
back_translation: Grant and Howlt support the film as compelling characters. They have flaws, are confident in the wrong things, and are afraid to acknowledge how much they need others.

text: i liked the movie , but i know i would have liked it more if it had just gone that one step further .
translation: 映画は好きだったが、もう一歩踏み込んでいたらもっと好きになったと思う。
back_translation: I liked movies, but I think I would have liked them even more if I had delved a bit deeper.

text: wonder of wonders -- a teen movie with a humanistic message .
translation: 驚くべきことに -- 人間的なメッセージを持つティーン映画。
back_translation: Amazingly - a teen movie that carries a human message.

text: the threat implied in the title pokémon 4ever is terrifying -- like locusts in a horde these things will keep coming .
translation: 「ポケモン4ever」というタイトルに暗示された脅威は恐ろしい。まるで大群のバッタのように、これらは何度でも襲いかかってくる。
back_translation: The threat implied by the title "Pokémon 4ever" is frightening. Like a swarm of locusts, they attack again and again.

text: flashy gadgets and whirling fight sequences may look cool , but they ca n't distract from the flawed support structure holding equilibrium up .
translation: 派手なガジェットや回転する戦闘シーンは見た目がかっこいいかもしれませんが、バランスを保つための欠陥のある支援構造から目を逸らすことはできません。
back_translation: While flashy gadgets and spinning combat scenes may look cool, they cannot distract you from the flawed support structure needed to maintain balance.

text: mr. wollter and ms. seldhal give strong and convincing performances , but neither reaches into the deepest recesses of the character to unearth the quaking essence of passion , grief and fear .
translation: ウォルター氏とセルダール氏は力強く説得力のある演技を見せますが、どちらもキャラクターの最も深い奥底にまで踏み込み、激情、悲しみ、恐怖の揺れる本質を掘り起こすことはできていません。
back_translation: Mr. Walter and Mr. Serdar deliver strong and convincing performances, but neither manages to delve into the deepest depths of their characters and unearth the wavering essence of passion, sadness, and fear.

text: a moving story of determination and the human spirit .
translation: 決意と人間の精神に関する感動的な物語。
back_translation: An inspiring story about determination and the human spirit.

text: there is greatness here .
translation: ここには偉大さがあります。
back_translation: There is greatness here.

text: lovely and amazing is holofcener 's deep , uncompromising curtsy to women she knows , and very likely is .
translation: 素晴らしく、驚くべきことは、ホロフセナーが知っている女性たちへの深く、妥協のない敬意を表していることです。そして、彼女自身もその一人である可能性が非常に高いです。
back_translation: What's wonderful and astonishing is that Holofcener expresses deep and uncompromising respect for the women she knows, and she herself is very likely one of them.

text: i liked this film a lot ...
translation: 私はこの映画がとても好きでした...
back_translation: I really liked this movie...

text: demonstrates the unusual power of thoughtful , subjective filmmaking .
translation: 思慮深く主観的な映画制作の異常な力を示しています。
back_translation: It demonstrates the unusual power of thoughtful and subjective filmmaking.

text: although the sequel has all the outward elements of the original , the first film 's lovely flakiness is gone , replaced by the forced funniness found in the dullest kiddie flicks .
translation: 続編はオリジナルの外見上の要素をすべて持っているが、最初の映画の素敵な曖昧さは失われ、最も退屈な子供向け映画で見られるような無理に面白さを追求したものに置き換えられている。
back_translation: The sequel has all the visual elements of the original, but the charming ambiguity of the first film has been lost and replaced with a forced attempt at humor, resembling the most boring children's movies.

text: but they lack their idol 's energy and passion for detail .
translation: しかし、彼らはアイドルのエネルギーと細部への情熱が欠けています。
back_translation: However, they lack the energy of idols and the passion for detail.

text: a screenplay more ingeniously constructed than `` memento ''
translation: 「メメント」よりも巧妙に構築された脚本
back_translation: A script constructed more cleverly than "Memento"

text: those with a modicum of patience will find in these characters ' foibles a timeless and unique perspective .
translation: 少しの忍耐を持つ人々は、これらのキャラクターの欠点において、時代を超えた独特の視点を見出すでしょう。
back_translation: People with a little patience will find a timeless and unique perspective in the flaws of these characters.

text: on that score , the film certainly does n't disappoint .
translation: その点に関して、この映画は確かに期待を裏切らない。
back_translation: In that regard, this movie certainly lives up to expectations.

text: the movie 's vision of a white american zealously spreading a puritanical brand of christianity to south seas islanders is one only a true believer could relish .
translation: その映画が描く、白人アメリカ人が熱心に南海の島民に厳格なキリスト教を広めようとする姿は、真の信者でなければ楽しめないものです。
back_translation: The portrayal in that movie of white Americans zealously trying to spread strict Christianity to the islanders in the South Seas is something that can only be enjoyed by true believers.

text: it asks nothing of the audience other than to sit back and enjoy a couple of great actors hamming it up .
translation: 観客に求めるのは、ただリラックスして素晴らしい俳優たちの熱演を楽しむことだけです。
back_translation: All that we ask of the audience is to relax and enjoy the passionate performances of the wonderful actors.

text: you can almost see mendes and company getting together before a single frame had been shot and collectively vowing , ` this is going to be something really good . '
translation: メンデスと彼の仲間たちが、1フレームも撮影される前に集まって「これは本当に素晴らしいものになるだろう」と誓っているのがほぼ見える。
back_translation: You can almost see Mendes and his colleagues gathering before a single frame is shot, pledging, "This is really going to be something amazing."

text: a negligible british comedy .
translation: 無視できるイギリスのコメディ。
back_translation: An ignorable British comedy.

text: great fun both for sports aficionados and for ordinary louts whose idea of exercise is climbing the steps of a stadium-seat megaplex .
translation: スポーツ愛好者にも、スタジアムシートのメガプレックスの階段を登ることを運動だと考える普通の人たちにも、素晴らしい楽しみです。
back_translation: It is a wonderful enjoyment for both sports enthusiasts and ordinary people who consider climbing the stairs of the megaproplex stadium seats as exercise.

text: beautifully crafted and cooly unsettling ... recreates the atmosphere of the crime expertly .
translation: 美しく巧妙に作られ、ひどく不気味な ... 犯罪の雰囲気を見事に再現している。
back_translation: Beautifully and cleverly crafted, it perfectly recreates a horrific and eerie atmosphere of crime.

text: , is a temporal inquiry that shoulders its philosophical burden lightly .
translation: は、その哲学的な重荷を軽やかに背負った時間に関する探求です。
back_translation: It is an exploration of time, lightly bearing that philosophical burden.

text: there has been a string of ensemble cast romances recently ... but peter mattei 's love in the time of money sets itself apart by forming a chain of relationships that come full circle to end on a positive -lrb- if tragic -rrb- note .
translation: 最近、アンサンブルキャストのロマンスが続いていますが、ピーター・マッテイの『お金の時代の恋』は、関係の連鎖を形成し、悲劇的ではあるもののポジティブな結末で巡りくることで際立っています。
back_translation: Recently, the romance of the ensemble cast has been ongoing, but Peter Mattei's "Love in the Age of Money" stands out for forming a chain of relationships that culminates in a positive ending, despite being tragic.

text: children and adults enamored of all things pokemon wo n't be disappointed .
translation: ポケモンに夢中な子供たちと大人たちは失望しないでしょう。
back_translation: Children and adults who are crazy about Pokémon will not be disappointed.

text: you 'll find yourself wishing that you and they were in another movie .
translation: あなたは自分と彼らが別の映画の中にいることを願っていることに気づくでしょう。
back_translation: You will realize that you hope you and they are in a different movie.

text: little more than a stylish exercise in revisionism whose point ... is no doubt true , but serves as a rather thin moral to such a knowing fable .
translation: スタイリッシュな修正主義の運動に過ぎず、そのポイントは間違いなく真実だが、そういった知識のある寓話に対してはかなり薄い道徳としてしか機能しない。
back_translation: It is nothing more than a stylish revisionist movement, and while its points are undoubtedly true, it functions only as a rather thin morality against such knowledgeable fables.

text: like edward norton in american history x , ryan gosling -lrb- murder by numbers -rrb- delivers a magnetic performance .
translation: エドワード・ノートンが『アメリカン・ヒストリーX』で見せたように、ライアン・ゴスリング（『殺人鬼の数字』）は魅力的な演技を披露しています。
back_translation: Just as Edward Norton showcased in "American History X," Ryan Gosling delivers a captivating performance in "The Nice Guys."

text: despite bearing the paramount imprint , it 's a bargain-basement european pickup .
translation: 重要な印象を持ちながらも、これは安価なヨーロッパ製のピックアップトラックです。
back_translation: While it leaves an important impression, this is a cheap European-made pickup truck.

text: by the time you reach the finale , you 're likely wondering why you 've been watching all this strutting and posturing .
translation: フィナーレに達するころには、あなたはなぜ自分がこれほどの見せびらかしやポーズを見てきたのか不思議に思っていることでしょう。
back_translation: By the time you reach the finale, you may wonder why you have witnessed such displays and poses.

text: a predictable , manipulative stinker .
translation: 予測可能で操作的な嫌な奴。
back_translation: A predictable and manipulable jerk.

text: ... post-september 11 , `` the sum of all fears '' seems more tacky and reprehensible , manipulating our collective fear without bestowing the subject with the intelligence or sincerity it unequivocally deserves .
translation: ... 9.11以降、「すべての恐怖の合計」は、私たちの集団的な恐怖を操りながら、そのテーマに明確にふさわしい知性や誠実さを与えず、より安っぽく、非難されるべきものに見える。
back_translation: Since 9/11, the "sum of all fears" seems to manipulate our collective fears without providing the intelligence or sincerity that is clearly appropriate for the theme, appearing cheaper and more deserving of criticism.

text: a solid , psychological action film from hong kong .
translation: 香港からのしっかりとした心理アクション映画。
back_translation: A solid psychological action movie from Hong Kong.

text: a retread of material already thoroughly plumbed by martin scorsese .
translation: マーティン・スコセッシによって既に徹底的に掘り下げられた素材の再利用。
back_translation: The reuse of material that has already been thoroughly explored by Martin Scorsese.

text: it 's a perfect show of respect to just one of those underrated professionals who deserve but rarely receive it .
translation: それは、評価されるべきでありながら滅多に受けることがない、過小評価されている専門家の一人に対する完璧な尊敬の示し方です。
back_translation: It is a perfect way to show respect for an undervalued expert who should be appreciated yet rarely is.

text: a bad movie that happened to good actors .
translation: 良い俳優に起こった悪い映画。
back_translation: A bad movie that happened to a good actor.

text: plays like john le carré with a couple of burnt-out cylinders .
translation: ジョン・ル・カレのような作品だが、いくつかのシリンダーが焼き切れている。
back_translation: It's like a work by John le Carré, but some of the cylinders are burnt out.

text: ... a rather bland affair .
translation: ...かなり味気ない出来事。
back_translation: ...a rather bland event.

text: spielberg has managed to marry science fiction with film noir and action flicks with philosophical inquiry .
translation: スピルバーグは、サイエンスフィクションとフィルムノワール、アクション映画と哲学的探求を見事に結びつけています。
back_translation: Spielberg brilliantly connects science fiction with film noir, action movies, and philosophical exploration.

text: by the standards of knucklehead swill , the hot chick is pretty damned funny .
translation: ナンセンスな飲み物の基準では、その魅力的な女の子はかなり面白い。
back_translation: By the standards of nonsensical drinks, that attractive girl is quite interesting.

text: despite engaging offbeat touches , knockaround guys rarely seems interested in kicking around a raison d'etre that 's as fresh-faced as its young-guns cast .
translation: 奇抜な要素を取り入れているにもかかわらず、『ノックアラウンド・ガイ』は、その若手キャストのように新鮮な存在理由を追求しているようには見えない。
back_translation: Despite incorporating unconventional elements, "Knockaround Guys" does not seem to pursue a fresh reason for existence like its young cast does.

text: as action-adventure , this space-based homage to robert louis stevenson 's treasure island fires on all plasma conduits .
translation: アクションアドベンチャーとして、この宇宙を舞台にしたロバート・ルイス・スティーヴンソンの「宝島」へのオマージュは、すべてのプラズマ導管で発火します。
back_translation: As an action-adventure, this homage to Robert Louis Stevenson's "Treasure Island," set in this universe, ignites in all plasma conduits.

text: it 's funny .
translation: 面白いです。
back_translation: It's interesting.

text: what an embarrassment .
translation: 何という恥ずかしさだ。
back_translation: What embarrassment it is.

text: i hate the feeling of having been slimed in the name of high art .
translation: 高尚な芸術の名の下にネバネバしたものをかけられたような感覚が嫌いだ。
back_translation: I dislike the feeling of being smeared with something sticky in the name of high art.

text: what makes esther kahn so demanding is that it progresses in such a low-key manner that it risks monotony .
translation: エスター・カーンが非常に要求の厳しい作品である理由は、それが非常に控えめな方法で進行するため、単調さの危険性があるからです。
back_translation: The reason why Esther Kahn is a very demanding work is that it progresses in a very understated way, which poses the risk of monotony.

text: that old adage about women being unknowable gets an exhilarating new interpretation in morvern callar .
translation: 女性は知り得ないという古い言い回しは、『モーヴァーン・キャラー』で刺激的な新解釈を得る。
back_translation: The old saying that women do not know is given an exciting new interpretation in "Mauveine Kyarā."

text: without resorting to camp or parody , haynes -lrb- like sirk , but differently -rrb- has transformed the rhetoric of hollywood melodrama into something provocative , rich , and strange .
translation: キャンプやパロディに頼ることなく、ヘインズ（サークとは異なるが、同様に）は、ハリウッドメロドラマのレトリックを挑発的で豊かかつ奇妙なものへと変容させた。
back_translation: Without relying on camp or parody, Haynes (though different from Sirk, similarly) transformed the rhetoric of Hollywood melodrama into something provocative, rich, and peculiar.

text: a thoroughly enjoyable , heartfelt coming-of-age comedy .
translation: 心温まる、心に響く青春コメディで、非常に楽しい作品です。
back_translation: It's a heartwarming and touching youth comedy, and a very enjoyable piece.

text: this is a film tailor-made for those who when they were in high school would choose the cliff-notes over reading a full-length classic .
translation: これは、高校時代に古典作品全編を読む代わりにクリフノートを選ぶような人々のために特別に作られた映画です。
back_translation: This is a movie specifically made for people who choose to read Cliff Notes instead of the entire classic works during their high school years.

text: jacobi , the most fluent of actors , is given relatively dry material from nijinsky 's writings to perform , and the visuals , even erotically frank ones , become dullingly repetitive .
translation: ジャコビは、最も流暢な俳優であり、ニジンスキーの著作から比較的乾燥した素材を与えられて演じ、視覚的には、たとえそれが性的に率直なものであっても、退屈なほど繰り返しになる。
back_translation: Jacobi is the most fluent actor, performing with relatively dry material taken from Nijinsky's works, and visually, it becomes monotonous to the point of boredom, even if it is sexually explicit.

text: it just did n't mean much to me and played too skewed to ever get a hold on -lrb- or be entertained by -rrb- .
translation: それは私にとってあまり意味がなく、いつも歪んでいて、理解を持つことも（または楽しむことも）できませんでした。
back_translation: It didn't mean much to me, and it was always distorted, so I couldn't really understand it (or enjoy it).

text: although largely a heavy-handed indictment of parental failings and the indifference of spanish social workers and legal system towards child abuse , the film retains ambiguities that make it well worth watching .
translation: 親の失敗やスペインのソーシャルワーカーおよび法制度の子供虐待に対する無関心を厳しく批判している一方で、映画は観る価値のあるあいまいさを保っています。
back_translation: While fiercely criticizing parental failures and the indifference of social workers and legal systems in Spain towards child abuse, the film maintains a worth-watching ambiguity.

text: sweet home alabama certainly wo n't be remembered as one of -lrb- witherspoon 's -rrb- better films .
translation: スウィート・ホーム・アラバマは、確かに（ウィザースプーンの）より良い映画の一つとしては記憶されないでしょう。
back_translation: Sweet Home Alabama will certainly not be remembered as one of Reese Witherspoon's better films.

text: the film is all over the place , really .
translation: その映画は本当にめちゃくちゃです。
back_translation: That movie is really a mess.

text: has all the values of a straight-to-video movie , but because it has a bigger-name cast , it gets a full theatrical release .
translation: ストレート・トゥ・ビデオ映画のすべての価値を持っているが、より大きな名のキャストがいるため、フル劇場公開される。
back_translation: It has all the value of a straight-to-video film, but is given a full theatrical release due to a cast with a bigger name.

text: ... this is n't even a movie we can enjoy as mild escapism ; it is one in which fear and frustration are provoked to intolerable levels .
translation: …これは軽い現実逃避として楽しめる映画ですらなく、恐怖とフラストレーションが耐え難いレベルまで引き起こされるものです。
back_translation: This is not even a movie that can be enjoyed as a light escapism; it evokes fear and frustration to an unbearable level.

text: do n't even bother to rent this on video .
translation: ビデオレンタルする価値もないです。
back_translation: It's not even worth renting the video.

text: if only merchant paid more attention the story .
translation: もし商人が物語にもっと注意を払っていれば。
back_translation: If the merchant had paid more attention to the story.

text: it 's a glorious spectacle like those d.w. griffith made in the early days of silent film .
translation: それは、サイレント映画の初期にダブリュー・グリフィスが作ったような素晴らしいスペクタクルです。
back_translation: It is a wonderful spectacle like those created by D.W. Griffith in the early days of silent film.

text: the colorful masseur wastes its time on mood rather than riding with the inherent absurdity of ganesh 's rise up the social ladder .
translation: 色とりどりのマッサージ師は、ガネーシャの社会的階層の上昇に伴う固有の不条理を乗り越えることよりも、ムードに時間を浪費している。
back_translation: The colorful massage therapists are wasting time on mood rather than overcoming the inherent absurdities that come with Ganesha's rise in the social hierarchy.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- painfully flat gross-out comedy ...
translation: （a）痛々しく平坦な悪趣味コメディー...
back_translation: (a) A painfully flat piece of bad taste comedy...

text: richly entertaining and suggestive of any number of metaphorical readings .
translation: 豊かに楽しませてくれ、さまざまな比喩的解釈を示唆しています。
back_translation: It richly entertains and suggests various metaphorical interpretations.

text: shunji iwai 's all about lily chou chou is a beautifully shot , but ultimately flawed film about growing up in japan .
translation: 岩井俊二の「リリー・シュシュのすべて」は、美しく撮影された作品ですが、結局は欠点のある日本の成長についての映画です。
back_translation: Shunji Iwai's "All About Lily Chou-Chou" is a beautifully shot film, but ultimately it is a movie about the flawed growth of Japan.

text: it is not the first time that director sara sugarman stoops to having characters drop their pants for laughs and not the last time she fails to provoke them .
translation: サラ・シュガーマン監督がキャラクターに笑いを取るためにパンツを下ろさせるのは初めてではなく、彼女がそれを引き起こすのに失敗するのも最後ではない。
back_translation: It is not the first time that director Sara Sugarman has a character drop their pants for comedic effect, nor will it be the last time she fails to make it work.

text: maybe not a classic , but a movie the kids will want to see over and over again .
translation: クラシックではないかもしれませんが、子供たちが何度も見たいと思う映画です。
back_translation: It may not be a classic, but it's a movie that children want to watch over and over again.

text: hugely entertaining from start to finish , featuring a fall from grace that still leaves shockwaves , it will gratify anyone who has ever suspected hollywood of being overrun by corrupt and hedonistic weasels .
translation: 始まりから終わりまで非常に楽しめる内容で、まだ余波を残す転落劇があり、ハリウッドが腐敗した享楽主義者に支配されていると疑ったことのある人々を満足させるでしょう。
back_translation: From beginning to end, it is a highly enjoyable content that still leaves lingering effects from the downfall, and it will satisfy those who have ever suspected that Hollywood is being dominated by corrupt hedonists.

text: franco is an excellent choice for the walled-off but combustible hustler , but he does not give the transcendent performance sonny needs to overcome gaps in character development and story logic .
translation: フランコは囲まれたが燃えやすいハスラーには優れた選択肢だが、ソニーがキャラクターの発展やストーリーの論理のギャップを克服するために必要な超越的な演技を提供していない。
back_translation: Franco is surrounded, but the flammable hustler is a great option; however, Sony does not provide the transcendent performance necessary to overcome the gaps in character development and story logic.

text: even though the film does n't manage to hit all of its marks , it 's still entertaining to watch the target practice .
translation: 映画はすべての目標を達成できていないにもかかわらず、標的練習を見るのはまだ面白いです。
back_translation: Despite the movie not achieving all its goals, it's still interesting to watch the target practice.

text: fans of the modern day hong kong action film finally have the worthy successor to a better tomorrow and the killer which they have been patiently waiting for .
translation: 現代の香港アクション映画のファンは、ついに彼らが辛抱強く待っていた『英雄本色』と『殺しの烙印』の価値ある後継者を手に入れました。
back_translation: Fans of modern Hong Kong action films have finally gotten a worthy successor to the films they have patiently waited for, "A Better Tomorrow" and "The Killer."

text: this is not an easy film .
translation: これは簡単な映画ではありません。
back_translation: This is not an easy movie.

text: a spooky yarn of demonic doings on the high seas that works better the less the brain is engaged .
translation: 脳をあまり使わずに楽しめる、高海での悪魔的な行いに関する不気味な物語。
back_translation: A creepy story about diabolical deeds at high sea that can be enjoyed with minimal use of the brain.

text: some writer dude , i think his name was , uh , michael zaidan , was supposed to have like written the screenplay or something , but , dude , the only thing that i ever saw that was written down were the zeroes on my paycheck .
translation: ある作家、名前はたしかマイケル・ザイダンとかいう人が、脚本を書いたと思うんだけどさ、ダude、私が見たのは給料明細のゼロだけだったよ。
back_translation: I think a writer named Michael Zaiden or something wrote the script, but dude, all I saw were zeros on the paycheck.

text: it challenges , this nervy oddity , like modern art should .
translation: それは挑戦する、この神経質な奇妙さは、現代アートがあるべきように。
back_translation: It challenges, this nervous oddity, as modern art should be.

text: while obviously aimed at kids , the country bears ... should keep parents amused with its low groan-to-guffaw ratio .
translation: 明らかに子供向けである一方で、カントリーベアーズはその低いうめき声対笑い声の比率で親たちも楽しませるべきです。
back_translation: Clearly aimed at children, the Country Bears should also entertain parents with their low grumbling to laughter ratio.

text: the following things are not at all entertaining : the bad sound , the lack of climax and , worst of all , watching seinfeld -lrb- who is also one of the film 's producers -rrb- do everything he can to look like a good guy .
translation: 以下のことはまったく楽しめない：悪い音、クライマックスの欠如、そして最もひどいのは、サインフェルド（映画のプロデューサーの一人でもある）が良い人に見えるためにあらゆることをするのを見ること。
back_translation: The following things are absolutely not enjoyable: bad sound, lack of climax, and worst of all, seeing Seinfeld (one of the producers of the movie) do everything to appear to be a good person.

text: in its chicken heart , crush goes to absurd lengths to duck the very issues it raises .
translation: 『チキンハート』の中で、クラッシュは彼が提起した問題を回避するために途方もない手段を講じています。
back_translation: In "Chicken Heart," Crash takes extraordinary measures to avoid the issues he has raised.

text: a heady , biting , be-bop ride through nighttime manhattan , a loquacious videologue of the modern male and the lengths to which he 'll go to weave a protective cocoon around his own ego .
translation: 夜のマンハッタンを通り抜ける、頭がクラクラするような刺激的でビバップな旅、現代男性の饒舌なビデオログと彼自身のエゴを守るために彼がどこまで行くのかという物語。
back_translation: A thrilling and vibrant journey through nighttime Manhattan, where a modern man's eloquent video log tells the story of how far he will go to protect his own ego.

text: squandering his opportunity to make absurdist observations , burns gets caught up in the rush of slapstick thoroughfare .
translation: 不条理な観察をする機会を無駄にし、バーンズはスラップスティックな混雑に巻き込まれてしまう。
back_translation: Wasting the opportunity for absurd observations, Barnes gets caught up in a slapstick chaos.

text: skin of man gets a few cheap shocks from its kids-in-peril theatrics , but it also taps into the primal fears of young people trying to cope with the mysterious and brutal nature of adults .
translation: 人間の皮膚は子供たちの危機に瀕した演技から少しの安いショックを受けるが、同時に大人の神秘的で残酷な本質に対処しようとする若者たちの原始的な恐怖にも触れている。
back_translation: Human skin receives a slight cheap shock from the performances of children in crisis, while at the same time, it also touches on the primal fears of young people trying to confront the mysterious and cruel nature of adults.

text: as satisfyingly odd and intriguing a tale as it was a century and a half ago ... has a delightfully dour , deadpan tone and stylistic consistency .
translation: 満足のいくほど奇妙で興味深い物語が150年前と同様に・・・楽しいほど陰気で無表情なトーンとスタイルの一貫性を持っています。
back_translation: A satisfyingly strange and interesting story maintains a consistent tone and style that is as enjoyably gloomy and expressionless as it was 150 years ago.

text: elvira fans could hardly ask for more .
translation: エルヴィラのファンはこれ以上を望むことはほとんどないだろう。
back_translation: Elvira's fans probably couldn't wish for more than this.

text: its simplicity puts an exclamation point on the fact that this is n't something to be taken seriously , but it also wrecks any chance of the movie rising above similar fare .
translation: そのシンプルさは、これが真剣に受け止めるべきものではないという事実に感嘆符を付けていますが、一方でこの映画が似たような作品を超えるチャンスも台無しにしています。
back_translation: The simplicity of it adds an exclamation mark to the fact that this is not something to be taken seriously, but on the other hand, it also undermines the chance for this film to surpass similar works.

text: a coming-of-age film that avoids the cartoonish clichés and sneering humor of the genre as it provides a fresh view of an old type -- the uncertain girl on the brink of womanhood .
translation: 風俗的なクリシェや冷笑的なユーモアを避けながら、成熟の境界にいる不安定な少女という旧来のタイプに新しい視点を提供する青春映画。
back_translation: A coming-of-age film that offers a new perspective on the traditional type of the unstable girl on the brink of maturity, while avoiding clichéd tropes and cynical humor.

text: at times , it actually hurts to watch .
translation: 時には、見るのが本当に辛いこともある。
back_translation: Sometimes, there are things that are really painful to watch.

text: made me unintentionally famous -- as the queasy-stomached critic who staggered from the theater and blacked out in the lobby .
translation: 気持ち悪くなった批評家として、劇場からよろめいて出てきてロビーで気を失ったことで、意図せず有名になってしまった。
back_translation: As a critic who felt sick, I stumbled out of the theater and fainted in the lobby, unintentionally becoming famous.

text: -lrb- taymor -rrb- utilizes the idea of making kahlo 's art a living , breathing part of the movie , often catapulting the artist into her own work .
translation: -（テイモール）は、カーロの芸術を映画の生きた息遣いの一部にするというアイデアを活用し、しばしばアーティストを自らの作品に飛び込ませる。
back_translation: Teimor utilizes the idea of making Carlo's art a living breath within the film, often plunging artists into their own works.

text: one of those rare films that come by once in a while with flawless amounts of acting , direction , story and pace .
translation: 稀に見る、演技、演出、ストーリー、テンポが完璧な作品の一つです。
back_translation: This is one of the rare works with perfect acting, direction, story, and tempo.

text: forget about one oscar nomination for julianne moore this year - she should get all five .
translation: 今年のジュリアン・ムーアのオスカー候補については一つ忘れてください - 彼女は全ての五つを受賞すべきです。
back_translation: Forget about Julianne Moore's Oscar nominations this year - she should win all five.

text: i like it .
translation: 私はそれが好きです。
back_translation: I like it.

text: philosophically , intellectually and logistically a mess .
translation: 哲学的に、知的に、そして物流的に混乱している。
back_translation: Philosophically, intellectually, and logistically confused.

text: while the humor is recognizably plympton , he has actually bothered to construct a real story this time .
translation: ユーモアは明確にプライムトンのものであるが、彼は今回は実際に本物のストーリーを構築することに気を使った。
back_translation: Humor is clearly a hallmark of Primton, but this time he made an effort to actually construct a genuine story.

text: although some viewers will not be able to stomach so much tongue-in-cheek weirdness , those who do will have found a cult favorite to enjoy for a lifetime .
translation: 一部の視聴者は、これほどの皮肉的な奇妙さに耐えられないかもしれませんが、耐えられる人々は、一生楽しめるカルト的なお気に入りを見つけたことでしょう。
back_translation: Some viewers may not be able to endure such ironic strangeness, but those who can will have found a cult favorite to enjoy for a lifetime.

text: a well-crafted letdown .
translation: うまく作られた期待外れ。
back_translation: A well-crafted disappointment.

text: duvall is strong as always .
translation: デュバルはいつも通り強い。
back_translation: Duval is as strong as usual.

text: toward the end sum of all fears morphs into a mundane '70s disaster flick .
translation: 終わりに近づくにつれて、「全ての恐怖の合計」は平凡な70年代の災害映画に変わります。
back_translation: As it approaches the end, "the total of all fears" transforms into an ordinary disaster film from the 70s.

text: terrific performances , great to look at , and funny .
translation: 素晴らしいパフォーマンス、見るのが楽しく、面白い。
back_translation: Wonderful performance, enjoyable to watch, and interesting.

text: very well-written and very well-acted .
translation: 非常によく書かれていて、非常によく演技されています。
back_translation: It is very well written and very well acted.

text: there 's a little violence and lots of sex in a bid to hold our attention , but it grows monotonous after a while , as do joan and philip 's repetitive arguments , schemes and treachery .
translation: 少しの暴力と多くのセックスが私たちの注意を引くためにありますが、しばらくすると単調になり、ジョーンとフィリップの繰り返される議論、策略、裏切りも同様です。
back_translation: A little violence and a lot of sex are there to grab our attention, but after a while, it becomes monotonous, just like the repeated arguments, schemes, and betrayals of Joan and Philip.

text: girlfriends are bad , wives are worse and babies are the kiss of death in this bitter italian comedy .
translation: 彼女たちは悪く、妻たちはさらに悪く、赤ちゃんはこの苦いイタリアのコメディにおける死のキスです。
back_translation: They are bad, the wives are even worse, and the babies are the kiss of death in this bitter Italian comedy.

text: adrift , bentley and hudson stare and sniffle , respectively , as ledger attempts , in vain , to prove that movie-star intensity can overcome bad hair design .
translation: アドラフト、ベントレーとハドソンはそれぞれ見つめ、鼻をすすりながら、レッジが映画スターの強烈さが悪い髪型を克服できることを証明しようとするも無駄である。
back_translation: Adraft, Bentley, and Hudson stared at each other, sniffling, as Ledge tried in vain to prove that a movie star’s intensity could overcome a bad haircut.

text: muddled , simplistic and more than a little pretentious .
translation: 混乱していて、単純すぎて、少しばかり見栄っ張りだ。
back_translation: It's confused, too simple, and a bit of a show-off.

text: morrissette has performed a difficult task indeed - he 's taken one of the world 's most fascinating stories and made it dull , lifeless , and irritating .
translation: モリセットは確かに難しい仕事をしました。彼は世界で最も魅力的な物語の一つをつまらなく、無気力で、イライラするものにしました。
back_translation: Morissette certainly did a difficult job. He made one of the most captivating stories in the world boring, lethargic, and frustrating.

text: carrying this wafer-thin movie on his nimble shoulders , chan wades through putrid writing , direction and timing with a smile that says , ` if i stay positive , maybe i can channel one of my greatest pictures , drunken master . '
translation: この薄っぺらな映画を軽快な肩で担ぎながら、チャンは腐った脚本や演出、タイミングを笑顔で乗り越えていく。その笑顔は「ポジティブでいれば、もしかしたら自分の最高作の一つである『酔拳』を引き出せるかもしれない」ということを物語っている。
back_translation: As he carries this shallow movie on his light shoulders, Chan smiles past the rotten script, direction, and timing. That smile suggests that "if you stay positive, you might just unlock one of your best works, 'Drunken Master'."

text: nothing short of a masterpiece -- and a challenging one .
translation: 傑作には違いなく、挑戦的な作品です。
back_translation: It is undoubtedly a masterpiece and a challenging work.

text: this latest installment of the horror film franchise that is apparently as invulnerable as its trademark villain has arrived for an incongruous summer playoff , demonstrating yet again that the era of the intelligent , well-made b movie is long gone .
translation: この恐怖映画シリーズの最新作が、明らかにその象徴的な悪党と同様に無敵であるかのように、似つかわしくない夏のプレイオフのために到着しました。再び、知的でよく作り込まれたB級映画の時代はとっくに去ったことを示しています。
back_translation: The latest installment of this horror film series has arrived, seemingly invincible just like its iconic villain, for an incongruous summer playoff season. Once again, it indicates that the era of intelligent and well-crafted B-movies is long gone.

text: and that makes all the difference .
translation: それが全ての違いを生み出します。
back_translation: That makes all the difference.

text: robert harmon 's less-is-more approach delivers real bump-in - the-night chills -- his greatest triumph is keeping the creepy crawlies hidden in the film 's thick shadows .
translation: ロバート・ハーモンの「少ないほど多い」アプローチは、本物の夜中のゾクゾク感をもたらします。彼の最大の成功は、映画の濃厚な影に creepy crawlies を隠しておくことです。
back_translation: Robert Harmon's "less is more" approach delivers a true midnight thrill. His greatest success lies in hiding creepy crawlies in the film's dense shadows.

text: ... a sour little movie at its core ; an exploration of the emptiness that underlay the relentless gaiety of the 1920 's ... the film 's ending has a `` what was it all for ? ''
translation: ... 核心には酸っぱい小さな映画 ; 1920年代の絶え間ない陽気さの裏にある空虚さの探求 ... 映画の結末は「結局、何のためだったのか？」というものです。
back_translation: ... At its core, a small sour film; an exploration of the emptiness behind the continuous cheerfulness of the 1920s... The conclusion of the movie is, "In the end, what was it all for?"

text: it 's good to see michael caine whipping out the dirty words and punching people in the stomach again .
translation: マイケル・ケインが汚い言葉を使い、再び人を腹殴りするのを見るのは良いことです。
back_translation: It's good to see Michael Caine using foul language and punching someone in the stomach again.

text: slack and uninspired , and peopled mainly by characters so unsympathetic that you 're left with a sour taste in your mouth .
translation: だらしなく活気がなく、主に非常に同情の余地のないキャラクターたちで構成されているため、口の中に不快な味が残ります。
back_translation: It leaves an unpleasant taste in your mouth, as it is composed mainly of lazy, unenergetic characters who are very lacking in sympathy.

text: forgettable , if good-hearted , movie .
translation: 忘れられない、しかし心優しい映画。
back_translation: An unforgettable yet heartwarming movie.

text: a riveting story well told .
translation: 見事に語られた心を惹きつける物語。
back_translation: A captivating story beautifully told.

text: for every articulate player , such as skateboarder tony hawk or bmx rider mat hoffman , are about a half dozen young turks angling to see how many times they can work the words `` radical '' or `` suck '' into a sentence .
translation: すべての明確に表現するプレーヤー、スケートボーダーのトニー・ホークやBMXライダーのマット・ホフマンのような存在に対して、どのくらい頻繁に「ラディカル」や「サック」という言葉を文の中に取り入れられるかを試みる約半ダースの若者たちがいます。
back_translation: There are about half a dozen young people trying to see how often they can incorporate words like "radical" or "sack" into sentences, similar to clear expression players like skateboarder Tony Hawk and BMX rider Matt Hoffman.

text: a culture clash comedy only half as clever as it thinks it is .
translation: 思っているほど賢くはない文化の衝突コメディ。
back_translation: A culture clash comedy that isn't as smart as you might think.

text: this is a third-person story now , told by hollywood , and much more ordinary for it .
translation: これは今、ハリウッドによって語られる三人称の物語であり、それにとってはずっと普通のことです。
back_translation: This is a third-person story being told by Hollywood now, and it is something quite ordinary for them.

text: at 90 minutes this movie is short , but it feels much longer .
translation: この映画は90分と短いですが、実際にはもっと長く感じます。
back_translation: This movie is short at 90 minutes, but it actually feels much longer.

text: mckay seems embarrassed by his own invention and tries to rush through the intermediary passages , apparently hoping that the audience will not notice the glaring triteness of the plot device he has put in service .
translation: マッケイは自分の発明にい embarrassed感じているようで、中間の部分を急いで通り過ぎようとしている。彼は、観衆が自分が使ったプロットデバイスの明らかな陳腐さに気づかないことを望んでいるようだ。
back_translation: MacKay seems to feel embarrassed about his invention and is hurriedly trying to get through the middle part. It seems he hopes that the audience will not notice the obvious triteness of the plot devices he used.

text: the big-screen scooby makes the silly original cartoon seem smart and well-crafted in comparison .
translation: 大画面のスクービーは、オリジナルの愚かなアニメを比較すると賢くよく作られているように思わせる。
back_translation: The large-screen Scooby seems to be cleverly and well-made compared to the original silly animation.

text: the fact is that the screen is most alive when it seems most likely that broomfield 's interviewees , or even himself , will not be for much longer .
translation: 事実は、画面が最も生き生きとしているのは、ブルームフィールドのインタビュー対象者、あるいは彼自身が長くはないと思われる時である。
back_translation: The truth is that the screen is most vibrant when Bloomfield is interviewing a subject, or when he himself seems to be running out of time.

text: the script ?
translation: スクリプトは？
back_translation: What about the script?

text: nicole holofcener 's lovely and amazing , from her own screenplay , jumps to the head of the class of women 's films that manage to avoid the ghetto of sentimental chick-flicks by treating female follies with a satirical style .
translation: ニコール・ホロフセナーの素晴らしく魅力的な作品は、彼女自身の脚本から生まれ、女性の錯誤を皮肉なスタイルで扱うことによって、感傷的なチック・フリックのゲトーを避ける女性映画のトップに躍り出ています。
back_translation: Nicole Holofcener's wonderfully captivating work emerges from her own scripts, skillfully addressing women's follies in a ironic style, propelling it to the forefront of female cinema while avoiding the sentimental trappings of a typical chick flick.

text: likeable thanks to its cast , its cuisine and its quirky tunes .
translation: キャスト、美味しい料理、そしてユニークな音楽のおかげで好感が持てます。
back_translation: The cast, delicious food, and unique music make it enjoyable.

text: borrows a bit from the classics `` wait until dark '' and `` extremities '' ... but in terms of its style , the movie is in a class by itself .
translation: クラシックの「ダークの中で待て」と「エクストレミティーズ」から少し影響を受けているが、スタイルに関してはこの映画は独自のカテゴリーに属している。
back_translation: It is influenced a bit by the classics "Wait in the Dark" and "Extremities," but in terms of style, this film belongs to a unique category.

text: a pleasant piece of escapist entertainment .
translation: 心地よい逃避の娯楽。
back_translation: Pleasant escapism entertainment.

text: sweet and memorable film .
translation: 甘くて記憶に残る映画。
back_translation: A sweet and memorable movie.

text: this is a movie you can trust .
translation: これは信頼できる映画です。
back_translation: This is a reliable movie.

text: whole stretches of the film may be incomprehensible to moviegoers not already clad in basic black .
translation: 映画の全体的な部分は、基本的な黒を着ていない映画観客には理解できないかもしれません。
back_translation: The overall part of the movie may not be understandable to moviegoers who are not wearing basic black.

text: impresses as a skillfully assembled , highly polished and professional adaptation ... just about as chilling and unsettling as ` manhunter ' was .
translation: 巧みに組み立てられ、高度に洗練されたプロフェッショナルな適応として印象を与えます...まさに『マンハンター』がそうであったように、非常にぞっとするほど不安を引き起こす作品です。
back_translation: It creates an impression of being a cleverly assembled and highly sophisticated professional adaptation... much like "Manhunter," it is a work that evokes a sense of chilling anxiety.

text: these guys seem great to knock back a beer with but they 're simply not funny performers .
translation: 彼らはビールを飲むには素晴らしい人たちのようですが、ただ単に面白いパフォーマーではありません。
back_translation: They seem like great people to drink beer with, but they are not just interesting performers.

text: there are a couple of things that elevate `` glory '' above most of its ilk , most notably the mere presence of duvall .
translation: 「グローリー」がその類の中で際立っているいくつかの要素があり、特にデュヴァルの存在が挙げられます。
back_translation: "Glory" has several standout elements among its kind, particularly the presence of Duval.

text: it is also a testament to the integrity and vision of the band .
translation: それはバンドの誠実さとビジョンの証でもあります。
back_translation: It is also a testament to the band's sincerity and vision.

text: daily struggles and simple pleasures usurp the preaching message so that , by the time the credits roll across the pat ending , a warm , fuzzy feeling prevails .
translation: 日々の苦闘と小さな喜びが説教のメッセージを奪い去ることで、エンディングのクレジットが流れる頃には、温かく心地よい感覚が支配する。
back_translation: As the daily struggles and small joys take away the message of the sermon, by the time the ending credits roll, a warm and pleasant sensation dominates.

text: many a parent and their teen -lrb- or preteen -rrb- kid could bond while watching a walk to remember .
translation: 多くの親とそのティーンエイジャー（またはプレティーン）の子供は、「ウォーク・トゥ・リメンバー」を見ながら絆を深めることができる。
back_translation: Many parents and their teenage (or pre-teen) children can deepen their bond while watching "A Walk to Remember."

text: the trials of henry kissinger is a remarkable piece of filmmaking ... because you get it .
translation: 「ヘンリー・キッシンジャーの試練」は素晴らしい映画作品です...なぜなら、あなたはそれを理解できるからです。
back_translation: "The Trials of Henry Kissinger" is a wonderful film...because you can understand it.

text: though the film is static , its writer-director 's heart is in the right place , his plea for democracy and civic action laudable .
translation: 映画は静的ですが、脚本家・監督の心は正しい場所にあり、彼の民主主義と市民活動への訴えは称賛に値します。
back_translation: The film is static, but the heart of the writer and director is in the right place, and his appeal for democracy and civic engagement is commendable.

text: evelyn 's strong cast and surehanded direction make for a winning , heartwarming yarn .
translation: エヴリンの強力なキャストと確かな演出が、勝利を収める心温まる物語を生み出しています。
back_translation: Evelyn's powerful cast and sure direction create a heartwarming story of triumph.

text: ... bibbidy-bobbidi-bland .
translation: ...ビビディ・バビディ・ブラン。
back_translation: ...Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo.

text: one thing 's for sure -- if george romero had directed this movie , it would n't have taken the protagonists a full hour to determine that in order to kill a zombie you must shoot it in the head .
translation: ひとつ確かなことがある -- もしジョージ・ロメロがこの映画を監督していれば、主人公たちがゾンビを殺すには頭を撃たなければならないと気づくのに、丸々一時間もかからなかっただろう。
back_translation: One thing is for sure -- if George Romero had directed this movie, it wouldn't have taken the protagonists a whole hour to realize that they need to shoot zombies in the head to kill them.

text: and he allows a gawky actor like spall -- who could too easily become comic relief in any other film -- to reveal his impressively delicate range .
translation: そして彼は、他の映画ではあまりにも簡単にコミカルな存在になり得るスパルのような不器用な俳優に、その印象的で繊細な幅を表現させることを許しています。
back_translation: And he allows a clumsy actor, who could easily become a comedic presence in other films like Spal, to express an impressive and delicate range.

text: epps has neither the charisma nor the natural affability that has made tucker a star .
translation: エップスには、タッカーをスターにしたカリスマ性も自然な愛想もありません。
back_translation: Epps lacks the charisma and natural friendliness that made Tucker a star.

text: it 's rare to find a film to which the adjective ` gentle ' applies , but the word perfectly describes pauline & paulette .
translation: 「優しい」という形容詞が当てはまる映画を見つけるのは稀ですが、その言葉は「ポーリーヌ＆ポーレット」を完璧に表しています。
back_translation: It's rare to find a movie that fits the adjective "gentle," but that word perfectly describes "Pauline & Paulette."

text: ` blue crush ' swims away with the sleeper movie of the summer award .
translation: 「ブルークラッシュ」は夏の隠れた名作賞を受賞します。
back_translation: "Blue Crush" wins the award for Best Hidden Gem of Summer.

text: needed a little less bling-bling and a lot more romance .
translation: もう少し派手さを減らして、もっとロマンチックさを増やす必要があった。
back_translation: It was necessary to reduce the flamboyance a bit and increase the romance more.

text: it lets you brush up against the humanity of a psycho , without making him any less psycho .
translation: それは、サイコの人間性に触れることができるが、彼をサイコでなくすることはない。
back_translation: It allows you to touch upon the humanity of a psycho, but it does not make him less of a psycho.

text: but the movie 's narrative hook is way too muddled to be an effectively chilling guilty pleasure .
translation: しかし、その映画のナarrティブフックはあまりにも混乱していて、効果的に冷や汗が出るような罪悪感を感じる楽しさにはなりえません。
back_translation: However, the narrative hook of that movie is so confusing that it fails to provide the enjoyable thrill of a guilty pleasure that makes you break out in a cold sweat.

text: so fiendishly cunning that even the most jaded cinema audiences will leave the auditorium feeling dizzy , confused , and totally disorientated .
translation: 非常に狡猾で、最もマンネリ化した映画の観客さえも、劇場を出るときにめまいを感じ、混乱し、完全に方向を見失っていることでしょう。
back_translation: It is very cunning, and even the audience of the most stale movies will feel dizzy, confused, and completely lost in direction when they leave the theater.

text: despite an overwrought ending , the film works as well as it does because of the performances .
translation: 過剰な結末にもかかわらず、映画がこれほどまでに成功したのは、演技のおかげです。
back_translation: Despite the excessive ending, the film was a success largely due to the performances.

text: a film of ideas and wry comic mayhem .
translation: アイデアの映画と皮肉なコミック・メイヘム。
back_translation: A movie of ideas and ironic comic mayhem.

text: effective in all its aspects , margarita happy hour represents an auspicious feature debut for chaiken .
translation: すべての側面で効果的なマルガリータハッピーアワーは、チャイケンにとって幸先の良いデビューを意味します。
back_translation: An effective margarita happy hour in all aspects means a positive debut for Chaiken.

text: goldmember has none of the visual wit of the previous pictures , and it looks as though jay roach directed the film from the back of a taxicab .
translation: ゴールドメンバーは前作の視覚的な機知に欠けており、まるでジェイ・ローチがタクシーの後部座席から映画を監督しているかのようです。
back_translation: Goldmember lacks the visual ingenuity of its predecessor, as if Jay Roach is directing the movie from the backseat of a taxi.

text: quietly engaging .
translation: 静かに関与する
back_translation: To be quietly involved.

text: what could have been a daytime soap opera is actually a compelling look at a young woman 's tragic odyssey .
translation: 日中のソープオペラとなり得たものは、実際には若い女性の悲劇的な旅路を魅力的に描いたものです。
back_translation: What could have become a daytime soap opera is, in fact, a captivating portrayal of a young woman's tragic journey.

text: not completely loveable -- but what underdog movie since the bad news bears has been ?
translation: 完全に愛されるわけではないが、「バッドニュースベアーズ」以来、どのアンダードッグ映画が愛されているのだろうか？
back_translation: While not completely beloved, which underdog movie has been loved since "Bad News Bears"?

text: a 94-minute travesty of unparalleled proportions , writer-director parker seems to go out of his way to turn the legendary wit 's classic mistaken identity farce into brutally labored and unfunny hokum .
translation: 94分間の比類なき悲劇で、作家兼監督のパーカーは、伝説的なウィットの古典的な誤認同的ファルスを、無理に労力をかけて笑えないばかげたものにしようとしているようです。
back_translation: In this 94-minute unparalleled tragedy, writer-director Parker seems to be trying to force a classic mistaken-identity farce, legendary for its wit, into something absurd that just isn't funny.

text: what starts off as a satisfying kids flck becomes increasingly implausible as it races through contrived plot points .
translation: 満足のいく子供向け映画として始まるものの、意図的なプロットポイントを駆け抜けるにつれて、ますます非現実的になっていく。
back_translation: It starts as a satisfying children's movie, but as it rushes through intentional plot points, it becomes increasingly unrealistic.

text: the dirty jokes provide the funniest moments in this oddly sweet comedy about jokester highway patrolmen .
translation: この奇妙に甘いコメディでは、ジョークを言うハイウェイパトロールマンたちの中で、下品なジョークが最も面白い瞬間を提供します。
back_translation: In this strangely sweet comedy, the lewd jokes told by the highway patrolmen provide the funniest moments.

text: has none of the crackle of `` fatal attraction '' , `` 9 1\/2 weeks '' , or even `` indecent proposal '' , and feels more like lyne 's stolid remake of `` lolita '' .
translation: 「致命的な魅力」や「9と1/2週間」、さらには「不適切な提案」のような緊張感はまったくなく、むしろラインの堅実なリメイク版「ロリータ」に近い感触を持っている。
back_translation: There is no tension like that in "Fatal Attraction," "9 1/2 Weeks," or even "Indecent Proposal"; rather, it has a feeling closer to the solid remake of "Lolita."

text: a sensitive , modest comic tragedy that works as both character study and symbolic examination of the huge economic changes sweeping modern china .
translation: 感受性が高く、控えめな喜劇的悲劇であり、キャラクター研究と現代中国を席巻する大きな経済変化の象徴的な検証として機能しています。
back_translation: It is a highly sensitive, subtly comedic tragedy that serves as a symbolic examination of character study and the significant economic changes sweeping through modern China.

text: fathers and sons , and the uneasy bonds between them , rarely have received such a sophisticated and unsentimental treatment on the big screen as they do in this marvelous film .
translation: 父と息子、そして彼らの間にある不安定な絆は、この素晴らしい映画の中で、これほど洗練されていて感情に流されない形で扱われることは稀です。
back_translation: The unstable bond between a father and son is rarely portrayed in such a refined and emotionally restrained manner in this wonderful movie.

text: as a director , eastwood is off his game -- there 's no real sense of suspense , and none of the plot ` surprises ' are really surprising .
translation: 監督としてのイーストウッドは調子が出ていない。緊張感はなく、プロットの「驚き」も本当に驚くものではない。
back_translation: As a director, Eastwood is not in top form. There is a lack of tension, and the plot's "twists" are not genuinely surprising.

text: there 's much tongue in cheek in the film and there 's no doubt the filmmaker is having fun with it all .
translation: 映画には多くの皮肉があり、製作者がすべてを楽しんでいるのは間違いありません。
back_translation: The movie is filled with a lot of irony, and there's no doubt that the creators are enjoying themselves.

text: ... `` bowling for columbine '' remains a disquieting and thought-provoking film ...
translation: ... 「コロンバイン高校銃乱射事件の衝撃」 は不安を掻き立てる、考えさせられる映画のままです ...
back_translation: "The shock of the Columbine High School shooting remains a thought-provoking, anxiety-inducing film..."

text: it 's a loathsome movie , it really is and it makes absolutely no sense .
translation: それは忌まわしい映画で、本当にそうですし、全く意味がありません。
back_translation: It is a disgusting movie, and it really is that way, completely meaningless.

text: phoned-in business as usual .
translation: いつも通りの電話でのビジネス。
back_translation: Business as usual over the phone.

text: the only thing to fear about `` fear dot com '' is hitting your head on the theater seat in front of you when you doze off thirty minutes into the film .
translation: 「フィア・ドット・コム」で唯一恐れるべきことは、映画の30分目に意識を失って前の席の頭を打つことです。
back_translation: The only thing you should fear at "Fear.com" is losing consciousness at the 30-minute mark of the movie and hitting the head of the person in front of you.

text: blade ii merges bits and pieces from fighting games , wire fu , horror movies , mystery , james bond , wrestling , sci-fi and anime into one big bloody stew .
translation: ブレードIIは格闘ゲーム、ワイヤーアクション、ホラー映画、ミステリー、ジェームズ・ボンド、レスリング、SF、アニメの要素を融合させた一つの大きな血まみれのシチューです。
back_translation: Blade II is a big bloody stew that fuses elements of fighting games, wire action, horror movies, mystery, James Bond, wrestling, science fiction, and anime.

text: to the vast majority of more casual filmgoers , it will probably be a talky bore .
translation: 大多数のカジュアルな映画ファンにとっては、おそらく退屈な会話劇となるでしょう。
back_translation: For the majority of casual movie fans, it will likely be a boring conversation piece.

text: there is a real subject here , and it is handled with intelligence and care .
translation: ここには本当のテーマがあり、それは知性と配慮をもって扱われています。
back_translation: There is a real theme here, and it is being handled with intelligence and consideration.

text: bigelow offers some flashy twists and turns that occasionally fortify this turgid fable .
translation: ビゲロウは、この重苦しい寓話を時折強化するような派手なひねりや展開を提供します。
back_translation: Bigelow provides flashy twists and developments that occasionally enhance this heavy allegory.

text: the film has the uncanny ability to right itself precisely when you think it 's in danger of going wrong .
translation: その映画は、まさにそれが間違った方向に進んでいると思った瞬間に自らを正す不気味な能力を持っている。
back_translation: The movie has a creepy ability to correct itself the moment you think it's heading in the wrong direction.

text: it 's a mystery how the movie could be released in this condition .
translation: この状態で映画が公開されたのは謎です。
back_translation: It’s a mystery that the movie was released in this state.

text: an unforgettable look at morality , family , and social expectation through the prism of that omnibus tradition called marriage .
translation: 結婚というオムニバスの伝統を通して、道徳、家族、社会的期待を忘れがたい視点で描いた作品。
back_translation: A work that portrays morals, family, and social expectations through an unforgettable perspective via the omnibus tradition of marriage.

text: a sad and rote exercise in milking a played-out idea -- a straight guy has to dress up in drag -- that shockingly manages to be even worse than its title would imply .
translation: 使い古されたアイデアを搾り取る悲しいお決まりの演習で、ストレートの男がドラッグに衣装を着る必要があるというもので、驚くべきことに、そのタイトルが示唆する以上にひどい結果になっています。
back_translation: In a sad, clichéd exercise that squeezes out a worn-out idea, it is required for straight men to dress up in drag, and surprisingly, the results are worse than the title suggests.

text: a funny film .
translation: おもしろい映画。
back_translation: Interesting movie.

text: a gangster movie with the capacity to surprise .
translation: 驚きをもたらす能力を持ったギャング映画。
back_translation: A gang movie with the ability to bring astonishment.

text: a grand fart coming from a director beginning to resemble someone 's crazy french grandfather .
translation: 監督から出る壮大なおならが、誰かの狂ったフランスの祖父に似始めている。
back_translation: The magnificent fart coming from the director is starting to resemble someone's crazy French grandfather.

text: it 's possible that something hip and transgressive was being attempted here that stubbornly refused to gel , but the result is more puzzling than unsettling .
translation: ここで何かヒップでトランスグレッシブなものが試みられていた可能性がありますが、それは頑固に一体化せず、その結果は不安を感じさせるというよりはむしろ困惑させるものです。
back_translation: It is possible that something hip and transgressive was being attempted here, but it stubbornly failed to integrate, resulting in something that is more confusing than unsettling.

text: an entertaining , if somewhat standardized , action movie .
translation: やや標準化された面白いアクション映画。
back_translation: A somewhat standardized interesting action movie.

text: a generous , inspiring film that unfolds with grace and humor and gradually becomes a testament to faith .
translation: 優しさとユーモアを持って優雅に展開し、徐々に信仰の証となる寛大で感動的な映画。
back_translation: A generous and touching film that gracefully unfolds with kindness and humor, gradually becoming a testament to faith.

text: eight legged freaks ?
translation: 八本足の怪物?
back_translation: An eight-legged monster?

text: malcolm mcdowell is cool .
translation: マルコム・マクダウェルはかっこいい。
back_translation: Malcolm McDowell is cool.

text: the movie wavers between hallmark card sentimentality and goofy , life-affirming moments straight out of a cellular phone commercial .
translation: その映画は、ハートマークカードの感傷と携帯電話のコマーシャルから飛び出したようなユーモラスで生命力あふれる瞬間の間で揺れ動いています。
back_translation: The movie oscillates between sentimental moments reminiscent of heart-mark cards and humorous, vibrant scenes that feel like they jumped out of a mobile phone commercial.

text: as a thoughtful and unflinching examination of an alternative lifestyle , sex with strangers is a success .
translation: 異なるライフスタイルに対する真剣で揺るぎない検討として、見知らぬ人とのセックスは成功です。
back_translation: As a serious and unwavering consideration of different lifestyles, sex with strangers is a success.

text: a reality-snubbing hodgepodge .
translation: 現実を無視したごちゃ混ぜ。
back_translation: A hodgepodge that ignores reality.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- slummer .
translation: -（a）スラム居住者。
back_translation: - (a) Slum resident.

text: it 's a big idea , but the film itself is small and shriveled .
translation: 大きなアイデアだけれど、映画そのものは小さくしぼんでいる。
back_translation: It's a big idea, but the movie itself feels small and deflated.

text: an engrossing portrait of a man whose engaging manner and flamboyant style made him a truly larger-than-life character .
translation: 魅力的な態度と華やかなスタイルを持つ男の魅力的な肖像画であり、彼はまさに生き生きとしたキャラクターです。

text: sayles has a knack for casting , often resurrecting performers who rarely work in movies now ... and drawing flavorful performances from bland actors .
translation: セイルズはキャスティングの才能があり、今はほとんど映画に出演しないパフォーマーを蘇らせたり、平凡な俳優から魅力的な演技を引き出したりすることが得意です。
back_translation: Sails has a talent for casting and is adept at resurrecting performers who rarely appear in films now, as well as drawing captivating performances from ordinary actors.

text: for all its violence , the movie is remarkably dull with only caine making much of an impression .
translation: その暴力的な内容にもかかわらず、この映画は驚くほど退屈で、印象に残るのはケインだけです。
back_translation: Despite its violent content, this movie is surprisingly boring, and the only memorable part is Kane.

text: this is a finely written , superbly acted offbeat thriller .
translation: これは巧みに書かれた、素晴らしい演技のユニークなスリラーです。
back_translation: This is a uniquely crafted, wonderful thriller with excellent performances.

text: at the end , when the now computerized yoda finally reveals his martial artistry , the film ascends to a kinetic life so teeming that even cranky adults may rediscover the quivering kid inside .
translation: 最後に、コンピュータ化されたヨodaがついに彼の武道を明らかにする時、映画は活気に満ちた動的な生へと昇華し、頑固な大人たちでさえ内なる震える子供を再発見するかもしれません。
back_translation: Finally, when the computerized Yoda finally reveals his martial arts, the movie sublimates into a vibrant, dynamic life, and even stubborn adults may rediscover their inner trembling child.

text: ferrara 's strongest and most touching movie of recent years .
translation: フェラーラの最近の最も力強く、感動的な映画。
back_translation: The most powerful and moving film from Ferrara in recent times.

text: ... a cinematic disaster so inadvertently sidesplitting it 's worth the price of admission for the ridicule factor alone .
translation: ... その嘲笑の要素だけでも入場料の価値があるほど、思わず笑ってしまう映画の災厄。
back_translation: It's a disaster of a movie that's worth the admission price just for the element of mockery, making you unintentionally laugh.

text: even if it made its original release date last fall , it would 've reeked of a been-there , done-that sameness .
translation: たとえそれが昨秋に元のリリース日を迎えたとしても、既視感のあるありふれたものとしての臭いがしていただろう。
back_translation: Even if it had reached its original release date last autumn, it would still have had the smell of something familiar and commonplace.

text: unfortunately , it 's also not very good .
translation: 残念ながら、それもあまり良くありません。
back_translation: Unfortunately, that's not very good either.

text: the most wondrous love story in years , it is a great film .
translation: 数年で最も素晴らしいラブストーリーであり、素晴らしい映画です。
back_translation: It is the most wonderful love story of the year and a fantastic movie.

text: too much power , not enough puff .
translation: 力が強すぎるが、パフが足りない。
back_translation: The strength is too much, but there isn't enough puff.

text: despite an impressive roster of stars and direction from kathryn bigelow , the weight of water is oppressively heavy .
translation: 印象的なスターのキャストとキャスリン・ビグローの監督にもかかわらず、『ウェイト・オブ・ウォーター』は圧倒的に重い作品です。
back_translation: Despite the impressive star cast and direction by Kathryn Bigelow, "The Weight of Water" is overwhelmingly heavy.

text: finally , the french-produced `` read my lips '' is a movie that understands characters must come first .
translation: ついに、フランス製の「リード・マイ・リップス」は、キャラクターが最優先であるべきだということを理解した映画です。
back_translation: Finally, "Read My Lips," made in France, is a film that understands that character should be the top priority.

text: even before it builds up to its insanely staged ballroom scene , in which 3000 actors appear in full regalia , it 's waltzed itself into the art film pantheon .
translation: その狂気に満ちた舞踏会のシーンに3,000人の俳優が豪華な衣装で登場する前から、すでにそれはアートフィルムの殿堂に踊り込んでいる。
back_translation: Before the scene of the madness-filled ball, where 3,000 actors appear in lavish costumes, it has already danced its way into the hall of art films.

text: a film which presses familiar herzog tropes into the service of a limpid and conventional historical fiction , when really what we demand of the director is to be mesmerised .
translation: よく知られたハーツォークのトロープを、明瞭で伝統的な歴史小説のために押し込む映画。しかし、私たちが監督に求めるのは、魅了されることです。
back_translation: A well-known trope of Hartzok, squeezed into a clear and traditional historical novel. However, what we seek from the director is to be captivated.

text: the rare movie that 's as crisp and to the point as the novel on which it 's based .
translation: 小説に基づいているにもかかわらず、非常に明快で本質的な珍しい映画。
back_translation: A rare film that is very clear and essential, despite being based on a novel.

text: here , common sense flies out the window , along with the hail of bullets , none of which ever seem to hit sascha .
translation: ここでは、常識は窓から飛び出し、弾の雨と共に、サーシャに当たることは決してないようだ。
back_translation: Here, common sense seems to fly out the window, and it never seems to hit Sasha amidst the rain of bullets.

text: -lrb- dong -rrb- makes a valiant effort to understand everyone 's point of view , and he does such a good job of it that family fundamentals gets you riled up .
translation: （ドン）は、皆の視点を理解しようと勇敢な努力をし、その仕事ぶりが素晴らしいため、『ファミリーファンダメンタルズ』はあなたを興奮させます。
back_translation: (Don) makes a brave effort to understand everyone’s perspective, and because of his wonderful work, 'Family Fundamentals' excites you.

text: once she lets her love depraved leads meet , -lrb- denis ' -rrb- story becomes a hopeless , unsatisfying muddle
translation: 彼女が彼女の堕落した愛の出会いを許すと、デニスの物語は絶望的で満足のいかない混乱になります。
back_translation: When she allows her fallen love encounter, Dennis's story becomes a hopeless and unsatisfactory chaos.

text: nothing too deep or substantial .
translation: あまり深いことや重要なことではない。
back_translation: It's not something very deep or important.

text: but what is missing from it all is a moral .
translation: しかしすべてから欠けているのは道徳です。
back_translation: However, what is lacking from everything is morality.

text: splendidly illustrates the ability of the human spirit to overcome adversity .
translation: 人間の精神が困難を克服する能力を見事に示しています。
back_translation: It beautifully demonstrates the human spirit's ability to overcome difficulties.

text: obvious , obnoxious and didactic burlesque .
translation: 明白で、いやらしく、教訓的なバーレスク。
back_translation: Clear, suggestive, and instructive burlesque.

text: it 's definitely a step in the right direction .
translation: 確実に良い方向への一歩です。
back_translation: It is definitely a step in the right direction.

text: vaguely interesting , but it 's just too too much .
translation: あいまいに興味深いですが、ただ少しやりすぎです。
back_translation: It's ambiguously interesting, but just a bit too much.

text: the film sounds like the stuff of lurid melodrama , but what makes it interesting as a character study is the fact that the story is told from paul 's perspective .
translation: その映画は刺激的なメロドラマの素材のように聞こえますが、キャラクタースタディとして興味深いのは、物語がポールの視点から語られているという事実です。
back_translation: The movie sounds like the material for an exciting melodrama, but what makes it interesting as a character study is the fact that the story is told from Paul's perspective.

text: this one is a few bits funnier than malle 's dud , if only because the cast is so engagingly messing around like slob city reductions of damon runyon crooks .
translation: これはマレの駄作よりもいくつかの部分で面白い、キャストがダモン・ランヨンの不良たちのように楽しそうに遊び回っているからだ。
back_translation: This is more interesting in several parts than Malre's poor work because the cast seems to be having fun playing around like Damon's delinquents.

text: the writing is clever and the cast is appealing .
translation: 文章は巧妙で、キャストは魅力的です。
back_translation: The writing is clever, and the cast is charming.

text: although commentary on nachtwey is provided ... it 's the image that really tells the tale .
translation: ナハトウェイに関する解説は行われていますが、実際に物語を語るのはイメージです。
back_translation: While there is an explanation about Nachtwey, the actual storytelling is done through imagery.

text: a nearly 21\/2 hours , the film is way too indulgent .
translation: 約2時間半の映画は、非常にダラダラとした内容です。
back_translation: The approximately two and a half hour movie has a very slow and dull content.

text: ... unlikable , uninteresting , unfunny , and completely , utterly inept .
translation: ... 好かれない、興味がない、面白くない、そして完全に、全く無能です。
back_translation: ... disliked, uninterested, uninteresting, and completely, utterly incompetent.

text: some of the visual flourishes are a little too obvious , but restrained and subtle storytelling , and fine performances make this delicate coming-of-age tale a treat .
translation: いくつかのビジュアルの装飾は少し明らかすぎるが、控えめで微妙なストーリーテリングと素晴らしい演技が、この繊細な成長物語を楽しませてくれる。
back_translation: Some of the visual decorations are a bit too obvious, but the subtle and understated storytelling, along with the fantastic performances, make this delicate coming-of-age story enjoyable.

text: but the talented cast alone will keep you watching , as will the fight scenes .
translation: しかし、才能あるキャストだけでも視聴を続ける価値がありますし、戦闘シーンも同様です。
back_translation: However, it's still worth watching for the talented cast alone, and the battle scenes are similarly noteworthy.

text: earnest , unsubtle and hollywood-predictable , green dragon is still a deeply moving effort to put a human face on the travail of thousands of vietnamese .
translation: 真剣で、遠慮のない、ハリウッドの予測通りの『グリーンドラゴン』は、ベトナムの何千人もの苦悩に人間の顔を与える非常に感動的な作品です。
back_translation: Serious, unreserved, and just as predicted by Hollywood, "Green Dragon" is a profoundly moving work that gives a human face to the suffering of thousands in Vietnam.

text: jeffrey tambor 's performance as the intelligent jazz-playing exterminator is oscar-worthy .
translation: ジェフリー・タンバーチの知的なジャズ演奏をする駆除業者としての演技はオスカーに値する。
