text: an overly familiar scenario is made fresh by an intelligent screenplay and gripping performances in this low-budget , video-shot , debut indie effort .
translation: 過剰に親しいシナリオが、知的な脚本と魅力的な演技によって新鮮に生まれ変わった、低予算のビデオ撮影によるデビューインディー作品です。
back_translation: An overly intimate scenario has been rejuvenated with an intelligent script and captivating performances in this low-budget debut indie film shot on video.

text: a clash between the artificial structure of the story and the more contemporary , naturalistic tone of the film ...
translation: 物語の人工的な構造と、より現代的で自然主義的な映画のトーンとの対立...
back_translation: The conflict between the artificial structure of the story and the more modern, naturalistic tone of the film...

text: ` christian bale 's quinn -lrb- is -rrb- a leather clad grunge-pirate with a hairdo like gandalf in a wind-tunnel and a simply astounding cor-blimey-luv-a-duck cockney accent . '
translation: クリスチャン・ベールのクインは、風洞の中のガンダルフのような髪型をしたレザーをまとったグランジ・パイレーツで、驚くべきコックニーのアクセントを持っています。
back_translation: Christian Bale's Quinn is a leather-clad grunge pirate with a hairstyle reminiscent of Gandalf in a wind tunnel, complete with an astonishing Cockney accent.

text: i 'm not exactly sure what this movie thinks it is about .
translation: この映画が何についてだと思っているのか、正確には分かりません。
back_translation: I'm not exactly sure what I think this movie is about.

text: it 's a scorcher .
translation: 猛暑です。
back_translation: It's a heat wave.

text: a real snooze .
translation: 本当に退屈な。
back_translation: It's really boring.

text: like its title character , this nicholas nickleby finds itself in reduced circumstances -- and , also like its hero , it remains brightly optimistic , coming through in the end .
translation: タイトルキャラクターのように、この『ニコラス・ニクルビー』は困難な状況に置かれていますが、主人公のように明るい楽観主義を保ち、最終的には乗り越えます。
back_translation: Like the title character, this "Nicholas Nickleby" finds itself in difficult situations, but it maintains a bright optimism like the protagonist and ultimately overcomes them.

text: the kids in the audience at the preview screening seemed bored , cheering the pratfalls but little else ; their parents , wise folks that they are , read books .
translation: 試写会の観客の子供たちは退屈そうで、ドジには笑っていたがそれ以外にはあまり反応しなかった；その親たちは、賢い人たちで、本を読んでいた。
back_translation: The children in the audience at the preview screening seemed bored and laughed at the clumsy moments, but didn't react much otherwise; their parents, who were wise, were reading books.

text: partly a schmaltzy , by-the-numbers romantic comedy , partly a shallow rumination on the emptiness of success -- and entirely soulless .
translation: 部分的には感傷的で型通りのロマンティック・コメディ、部分的には成功の虚しさについての浅い考察であり、完全に魂のない作品である。
back_translation: It is partially a sentimental and formulaic romantic comedy, partially a shallow reflection on the emptiness of success, and entirely a soulless work.

text: for its 100 minutes running time , you 'll wait in vain for a movie to happen .
translation: 100分の上映時間の中で、映画が始まるのを無駄に待つことになります。
back_translation: You will waste time waiting for the movie to start during the 100-minute runtime.

text: a chronicle not only of one man 's quest to be president , but of how that man single-handedly turned a plane full of hard-bitten , cynical journalists into what was essentially , by campaign 's end , an extended publicity department .
translation: 一人の男が大統領になるための探求の年代記だけでなく、その男が厳しい現実に直面した皮肉なジャーナリストたちの満載の飛行機を、キャンペーンの終わりには本質的に拡張された宣伝部に変えてしまった方法についてのものです。
back_translation: It is not only a chronicle of a man's quest to become president, but also about how that man turned a plane full of cynical journalists, who confronted harsh realities, into an essentially expanded publicity department by the end of the campaign.

text: a movie that harps on media-constructed ` issues ' like whether compromise is the death of self ... this orgasm -lrb- wo n't be an -rrb- exceedingly memorable one for most people .
translation: メディアが作り上げた「問題」、例えば妥協が自己の死を意味するかどうかを強調する映画…このオーガズムは、大多数の人にとって非常に記憶に残るものにはならないでしょう。
back_translation: The "issues" created by the media, such as movies that emphasize whether compromise means the death of the self... this orgasm may not become very memorable for the majority of people.

text: fresnadillo has something serious to say about the ways in which extravagant chance can distort our perspective and throw us off the path of good sense .
translation: フレスナディージョは、 extravagant chance が私たちの視点を歪め、良識の道から外れさせる方法について深刻なことを言っています。
back_translation: Fresnadillo speaks seriously about how extravagant chance distorts our perspective and leads us away from the path of common sense.

text: this is not one of the movies you 'd want to watch if you only had a week to live .
translation: これは、もし残りの人生が1週間しかないなら、見たい映画の一つではありません。
back_translation: This is not one of the movies I would want to see if I only had one week left to live.

text: but mainstream audiences will find little of interest in this film , which is often preachy and poorly acted .
translation: しかし、主流の観客はこの映画にあまり興味を持たないでしょう。これはしばしば説教じみていて、演技も下手です。
back_translation: However, mainstream audiences are likely not very interested in this movie. It often comes across as preachy, and the acting is poor.

text: at once subtle and visceral , the film never succumbs to the trap of the maudlin or tearful , offering instead with its unflinching gaze a measure of faith in the future .
translation: 微妙でありながら生々しいこの映画は、感傷的な罠には決して陥らず、揺るぎない視線で未来への信頼の感覚を提供しています。
back_translation: This film, which is subtle yet vivid, never falls into sentimental traps and offers a sense of trust in the future with an unwavering gaze.

text: lookin ' for sin , american-style ?
translation: アメリカンスタイルで罪を探しているの？
back_translation: Are you searching for sin in an American style?

text: it drowns in sap .
translation: それは樹液に溺れる。
back_translation: It drowns in the sap.

text: laggard drama wending its way to an uninspired philosophical epiphany .
translation: 遅々として進まないドラマが無気力な哲学的閃きに至る。
back_translation: A slowly progressing drama leads to a listless philosophical insight.

text: interminably bleak , to say nothing of boring .
translation: 終わりなく陰鬱で、退屈だと言うまでもない。
back_translation: It goes without saying that it is endlessly gloomy and boring.

text: believability was n't one of the film 's virtues .
translation: 信憑性は映画の美徳の一つではありませんでした。
back_translation: Credibility was not one of the virtues of the film.

text: filled with alexandre desplat 's haunting and sublime music , the movie completely transfixes the audience .
translation: アレクサンドル・デスプラの心に残る崇高な音楽で満たされたこの映画は、観客を完全に魅了します。
back_translation: This film, filled with the sublime music of Alexandre Desplat, completely captivates the audience.

text: the four feathers is definitely horse feathers , but if you go in knowing that , you might have fun in this cinematic sandbox .
translation: 「四つの羽」は確かに馬の羽毛ですが、それを知っていれば、この映画の砂場で楽しむことができるかもしれません。
back_translation: "The Four Feathers" is indeed horse feathers, and if you know that, you might enjoy this movie in the sandbox.

text: the movie attempts to mine laughs from a genre -- the gangster\/crime comedy -- that wore out its welcome with audiences several years ago , and its cutesy reliance on movie-specific cliches is n't exactly endearing .
translation: その映画は、数年前に観客の歓迎を失ったジャンルであるギャング/クライムコメディから笑いを引き出そうと試みており、映画特有のクリシェに可愛らしさを依存している点は、必ずしも魅力的ではありません。
back_translation: That movie attempts to draw laughs from the gang/crime comedy genre, which lost audience appeal a few years ago, and its reliance on cute clichés specific to film is not necessarily charming.

text: steadfastly uncinematic but powerfully dramatic .
translation: 堅実に映画的ではないが、力強くドラマチックである。
back_translation: Solidly non-cinematic, yet powerfully dramatic.

text: ... del toro maintains a dark mood that makes the film seem like something to endure instead of enjoy .
translation: ...デル・トロは映画を楽しむのではなく耐えるべき何かのように思わせる暗い雰囲気を維持しています。
back_translation: Del Toro maintains a dark atmosphere that makes it seem like watching a movie is something to endure rather than enjoy.

text: this filmed tosca -- not the first , by the way -- is a pretty good job , if it 's filmed tosca that you want .
translation: この撮影されたトスカは、初めてではありませんが、もし撮影されたトスカが欲しいなら、かなり良い出来です。
back_translation: This filmed Tosca is not the first, but if you want a filmed Tosca, it is quite well done.

text: features one of the most affecting depictions of a love affair ever committed to film .
translation: 映画で描かれた愛の関係の中でも、最も影響力のある描写のひとつです。
back_translation: It is one of the most influential portrayals of love relationships depicted in movies.

text: a journey spanning nearly three decades of bittersweet camaraderie and history , in which we feel that we truly know what makes holly and marina tick , and our hearts go out to them as both continue to negotiate their imperfect , love-hate relationship .
translation: ほろ苦い友情と歴史がほぼ30年にわたって続く旅であり、その中で私たちはホリーとマリーナが何に動かされているのかを真に理解していると感じており、彼女たちが不完全な愛憎関係を続けていく中で、心を寄せています。
back_translation: It is a bittersweet friendship and history that has lasted for nearly 30 years, during which we feel that we truly understand what motivates Holly and Marina, and we sympathize with them as they continue their imperfect love-hate relationship.

text: starts out strongly before quickly losing its focus , point and purpose in a mess of mixed messages , over-blown drama and bruce willis with a scar .
translation: 強いスタートを切るものの、すぐに焦点、点、目的を失い、混乱したメッセージ、盛りすぎたドラマ、そして傷のあるブルース・ウィリスの登場で台無しになってしまう。
back_translation: Although it starts strong, it quickly loses focus, clarity, and purpose, becoming derailed by a confusing message, overly dramatic elements, and the appearance of a wounded Bruce Willis.

text: though an important political documentary , this does not really make the case the kissinger should be tried as a war criminal .
translation: 重要な政治ドキュメンタリーではありますが、これがキッシンジャーが戦争犯罪者として裁かれるべきだという主張を十分に裏付けるものではありません。
back_translation: While it is an important political documentary, it does not sufficiently support the claim that Kissinger should be tried as a war criminal.

text: swims in mediocrity , sticking its head up for a breath of fresh air now and then .
translation: 平凡の中で泳ぎ、時折新鮮な空気を吸うために頭を出す。
back_translation: Swimming in the ordinary, occasionally coming up for a breath of fresh air.

text: although the film boils down to a lightweight story about matchmaking , the characters make italian for beginners worth the journey
translation: 映画はお見合いに関する軽いストーリーに過ぎないが、キャラクターたちのおかげで「イタリア語入門」の旅は価値がある。
back_translation: The movie is just a light story about arranged marriages, but thanks to the characters, the journey of "Introduction to Italian" is worthwhile.

text: even fans of ismail merchant 's work , i suspect , would have a hard time sitting through this one .
translation: イスマイル・マーチャントの作品のファンでさえ、私は、この作品を最後まで見るのが難しいと思うでしょう。
back_translation: Even fans of Ismail Merchant's works would find it difficult to watch this piece until the end, I believe.

text: the high-concept scenario soon proves preposterous , the acting is robotically italicized , and truth-in-advertising hounds take note : there 's very little hustling on view .
translation: そのハイコンセプトのシナリオはすぐに不条理であることが証明され、演技は機械的に強調され、広告の真実を追求する人々は注目する：目に見えるほどの派手さはほとんどない。
back_translation: The high-concept scenario is quickly proven to be absurd, the acting is mechanically exaggerated, and those who seek the truth of the advertisement draw attention: there is hardly any noticeable flashiness.

text: what 's worse is that pelosi knows it .
translation: それより悪いのは、ペロシがそれを知っていることです。
back_translation: What's worse is that Pelosi knows it.

text: a `` home alone '' film that is staged like `` rosemary 's baby , '' but is not as well-conceived as either of those films .
translation: 「ホームアローン」に似た映画で、「ローズマリーの赤ちゃん」のような演出がされているが、どちらの映画ほどよく練られていない。
back_translation: It's a movie similar to "Home Alone," but it has a direction reminiscent of "Rosemary's Baby," although it's not as well-crafted as either film.

text: although made on a shoestring and unevenly acted , conjures a lynch-like vision of the rotting underbelly of middle america .
translation: 限られた予算で制作され、不均一な演技ではあるものの、中部アメリカの腐敗した裏側をリンチのようなビジョンで呼び起こす。
back_translation: Produced on a limited budget, it evokes the corrupt underbelly of Middle America with a vision reminiscent of Lynch, despite uneven performances.

text: everything about girls ca n't swim , even its passages of sensitive observation , feels secondhand , familiar -- and not in a good way .
translation: 女の子が泳げないことに関するすべては、敏感な観察の部分でさえも、二次的で親しみがあり、良い意味ではない。
back_translation: Everything regarding a girl not being able to swim, even the sensitive observations, is secondary, familiar, and not in a good sense.

text: brian tufano 's handsome widescreen photography and paul grabowsky 's excellent music turn this fairly parochial melodrama into something really rather special .
translation: ブライアン・タファノの美しいワイドスクリーン写真とポール・グラボウスキーの素晴らしい音楽が、このやや地方的なメロドラマを本当に特別なものに変えています。
back_translation: Brian Taffano's beautiful widescreen photography and Paul Grabowski's wonderful music really elevate this somewhat regional melodrama into something truly special.

text: it is definitely worth seeing .
translation: 絶対に見る価値があります。
back_translation: It is definitely worth seeing.

text: a heroic tale of persistence that is sure to win viewers ' hearts .
translation: 視聴者の心を掴むこと間違いなしの、粘り強さの英雄的な物語。
back_translation: A heroic tale of perseverance that is sure to capture the hearts of the audience.

text: will probably be one of those movies barely registering a blip on the radar screen of 2002 .
translation: おそらく2002年のレーダースクリーンでほとんど気づかれない映画の一つになるでしょう。
back_translation: It will likely become one of those movies that hardly goes noticed on radar screens in 2002.

text: a bilingual charmer , just like the woman who inspired it
translation: バイリンガルの魅力的な存在、それはそれをインスパイアした女性のようだ。
back_translation: The魅力的な存在 of a bilingual person seems to be like the woman who inspired it.

text: allen 's underestimated charm delivers more goodies than lumps of coal .
translation: アレンの過小評価された魅力は、石炭の塊以上の素晴らしいものを提供します。
back_translation: Allen's underrated charm offers something wonderful beyond a lump of coal.

text: everybody loves a david and goliath story , and this one is told almost entirely from david 's point of view .
translation: 誰もがダビデとゴリアテの物語が好きで、この物語はほぼダビデの視点から語られています。
back_translation: Everyone loves the story of David and Goliath, and this story is mostly told from David's perspective.

text: both lead performances are oscar-size .
translation: 両方の主役の演技はオスカー級です。
back_translation: The performances of both leads are Oscar-worthy.

text: as a good old-fashioned adventure for kids , spirit : stallion of the cimarron is a winner .
translation: 古き良き子供向けの冒険映画として、『スピリット - シマロンの雄馬』は間違いなく成功しています。
back_translation: As a classic children's adventure film, "Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron" is undoubtedly a success.

text: it 's super - violent , super-serious and super-stupid .
translation: 超暴力的で、超真剣で、超馬鹿げている。
back_translation: Extremely violent, extremely serious, and extremely ridiculous.

text: all the small moments and flashbacks do n't add up to much more than trite observations on the human condition .
translation: すべての小さな瞬間やフラッシュバックは、人間の条件に関する陳腐な観察以上のものにはあまりならない。
back_translation: All the small moments and flashbacks are hardly more than trite observations about the human condition.

text: elaborate special effects take centre screen , so that the human story is pushed to one side .
translation: 特殊効果がメイン画面を占めるため、人間の物語が脇に追いやられています。
back_translation: Because special effects occupy the main screen, the human story is pushed to the side.

text: the film is ... determined to treat its characters , weak and strong , as fallible human beings , not caricatures , and to carefully delineate the cost of the inevitable conflicts between human urges and an institution concerned with self-preservation .
translation: この映画は、強い者と弱い者を戯画的な存在ではなく、誤りを犯す可能性のある人間として描くことに決定しており、人間の欲望と自己保全を重視する機関との間に避けられない対立がもたらす代償を慎重に描写しています。
back_translation: This film decides to portray the strong and the weak not as caricatures, but as human beings who can make mistakes, carefully depicting the costs brought about by the inevitable conflict between human desires and the institutions that prioritize self-preservation.

text: i found the movie as divided against itself as the dysfunctional family it portrays .
translation: 私はその映画が、自身が描く機能不全の家族と同じように、内部分裂していると感じました。
back_translation: I felt that the movie, much like the dysfunctional family it portrays, was internally divided.

text: too daft by half ... but supremely good natured .
translation: 半分愚かなほど...しかし非常に良い性格です。
back_translation: Halfway foolish... but has a very good character.

text: though frida is easier to swallow than julie taymor 's preposterous titus , the eye candy here lacks considerable brio .
translation: フリーダはジュリー・テイモアのばかげた『タイタス』よりは飲み込みやすいが、ここには視覚的な魅力がかなり欠けている。
back_translation: Frida is easier to digest than Julie Taymor's ridiculous "Titus," but it lacks a considerable amount of visual appeal.

text: the film is hard to dismiss -- moody , thoughtful , and lit by flashes of mordant humor .
translation: その映画は無視するのが難しい -- 気まぐれで思慮深く、鋭いユーモアの瞬間に照らされています。
back_translation: It's hard to ignore that movie -- it is whimsical yet thoughtful, illuminated by moments of sharp humor.

text: the first five minutes will have you talking 'til the end of the year !
translation: 最初の5分であなたは年末まで話し続けることになるでしょう！
back_translation: In the first 5 minutes, you will end up talking until the end of the year!

text: ... silly humbuggery ...
translation: ...ばかげた偽善 ...
back_translation: ... ridiculous hypocrisy ...

text: predecessors the mummy and the mummy returns stand as intellectual masterpieces next to the scorpion king .
translation: 「ミイラ」と「ミイラ2」は、「スコーピオン・キング」の隣に知的な傑作として立っています。
back_translation: "Mummy" and "Mummy 2" stand as intellectual masterpieces alongside "The Scorpion King."

text: worth a look by those on both sides of the issues , if only for the perspective it offers , one the public rarely sees .
translation: 問題の双方にいる人々が一見の価値があると思うのは、一般的に見ることのできない視点を提供しているからです。
back_translation: What people on both sides of an issue find valuable at first glance is that they offer perspectives that are generally not visible.

text: it zips along with b-movie verve while adding the rich details and go-for-broke acting that heralds something special .
translation: それはB級映画の活力でさっそうと進みながら、特別な何かを予感させる豊かな細部と全力投球の演技を加えています。
back_translation: It moves forward with the energy of a B-movie, adding rich details that hint at something special and performances that are fully committed.

text: ... too sappy for its own good .
translation: ...自分自身のためには甘すぎる。
back_translation: ...it is too sweet for myself.

text: this flat run at a hip-hop tootsie is so poorly paced you could fit all of pootie tang in between its punchlines .
translation: この平坦なヒップホップのトゥーツィーは、ペースが非常に悪くて、そのパンチラインの間にすべてのプーチー・タンを収めることができる。
back_translation: This flat hip-hop tootie has a very poor pace and can fit all the Pootie Tang between its punchlines.

text: no , i do n't know why steven seagal is considered a star , nor why he keeps being cast in action films when none of them are ever any good or make any money .
translation: いいえ、スティーブン・セガールがなぜスターと見なされるのか、また彼がなぜアクション映画にキャスティングされ続けるのかはわかりません。どの作品も良いわけではなく、興行収入も上がらないのに。
back_translation: No, I don't understand why Steven Seagal is considered a star and why he continues to be cast in action movies. Not all of his works are good, and the box office earnings are not increasing.

text: if s&m seems like a strange route to true love , maybe it is , but it 's to this film 's -lrb- and its makers ' -rrb- credit that we believe that that 's exactly what these two people need to find each other -- and themselves .
translation: S&Mが真実の愛への奇妙な道に思えるかもしれませんが、確かにそうかもしれません。しかし、この映画（およびその製作者たち）の功績として、私たちはこの二人が互いに、そして自分自身を見つけるために必要なことがそれだと信じています。
back_translation: S&M may seem like a strange path to true love, but it certainly could be. However, as a credit to this movie (and its creators), we believe that what these two need in order to find each other and themselves is exactly that.

text: little is done to support the premise other than fling gags at it to see which ones shtick .
translation: 前提を支持するために行われることはほとんどなく、ただギャグを投げてどれがウケるかを試しているだけです。
back_translation: What is done to support the premise is rarely done; it's just a matter of throwing out gags and seeing which ones land.

text: one of those decades-spanning historical epics that strives to be intimate and socially encompassing but fails to do justice to either effort in three hours of screen time .
translation: 親密さと社会的包括性を目指しているが、3時間のスクリーンタイムではどちらの努力にも十分に応えられない、数十年にわたる歴史的な叙事詩の一つ。
back_translation: A historical epic spanning decades that aims for intimacy and social inclusivity, but cannot sufficiently meet either effort with just 3 hours of screen time.

text: the kind of sweet-and-sour insider movie that film buffs will eat up like so much gelati .
translation: 映画愛好家がジェラートのように夢中で味わうような、甘酸っぱい裏話的な映画。
back_translation: A movie that has sweet and sour behind-the-scenes stories that film lovers savor with enthusiasm, like gelato.

text: a huge disappointment coming , as it does , from filmmakers and performers of this calibre
translation: このようなクオリティの映画製作者やパフォーマーからの大きな失望がある。
back_translation: There is great disappointment from filmmakers and performers of this level of quality.

text: for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped .
translation: コメディとして宣伝されている映画「スウィート・ホーム・アラバマ」は、あなたが期待したほど面白くありません。
back_translation: The movie "Sweet Home Alabama," marketed as a comedy, isn't as funny as you might expect.

text: richard pryor mined his personal horrors and came up with a treasure chest of material , but lawrence gives us mostly fool 's gold .
translation: リチャード・プライヤーは自らの個人的な恐怖から素材を掘り起こし、宝の山を生み出しましたが、ローレンスは主に fool's gold を私たちに提供します。
back_translation: Richard Pryor unearthed material from his personal fears, creating a treasure trove, while Lawrence mainly offers us fool's gold.

text: a movie of riveting power and sadness .
translation: 心を揺さぶる力と悲しみを持つ映画。
back_translation: A film with the power to move the heart and carry sadness.

text: robert john burke as the monster horns in and steals the show .
translation: ロバート・ジョン・バークがモンスターの角を演じて、ショーを奪う。
back_translation: Robert John Burke plays the monster's horn and steals the show.

text: the new insomnia is a surprisingly faithful remake of its chilly predecessor , and when it does elect to head off in its own direction , it employs changes that fit it well rather than ones that were imposed for the sake of commercial sensibilities .
translation: 新しい『インソムニア』は、その冷たい先代の驚くほど忠実なリメイクであり、自らの方向に進むことを選ぶときには、商業的な感覚のために強いられたものではなく、うまくフィットする変更を採用しています。
back_translation: The new "Insomnia" is an incredibly faithful remake of its cold predecessor and has adopted well-fitting changes, not forced by commercial sensibilities when it chooses to go in its own direction.

text: just offbeat enough to keep you interested without coming close to bowling you over .
translation: 適度に独特で、あなたの興味を引きつけつつも、圧倒するほどではありません。
back_translation: It's moderately unique, capturing your interest without being overwhelming.

text: written , flatly , by david kendall and directed , barely , by there 's something about mary co-writer ed decter .
translation: デイビッド・ケンダルによって平坦に書かれ、メリーに何かがあるの共同執筆者エド・デクターによってかろうじて監督された。
back_translation: Written flatly by David Kendall and barely supervised by co-author Ed Dexter, who has something with Mary.

text: it 's a film with an idea buried somewhere inside its fabric , but never clearly seen or felt .
translation: それは、生地の中に埋もれたアイデアを持つ映画ですが、決してはっきりと見えたり感じられたりすることはありません。
back_translation: It is a film with ideas buried within the fabric, but they can never be seen or felt clearly.

text: one can only assume that the jury who bestowed star hoffman 's brother gordy with the waldo salt screenwriting award at 2002 's sundance festival were honoring an attempt to do something different over actually pulling it off
translation: 人々は、2002年のサンダンス映画祭でスター・ホフマンの兄ゴーディにウォルド・ソルト脚本賞を授与した陪審員たちが、実際に成功を収めることよりも、何か異なることを試みたことを称えていたと考えるしかない。
back_translation: It can only be thought that the jurors who awarded the Waldo Salt Screenwriting Award to Gordy, the brother of Star Hoffman, at the 2002 Sundance Film Festival were praising the attempt to try something different rather than actual success.

text: seeks to transcend its genre with a curiously stylized , quasi-shakespearean portrait of pure misogynist evil .
translation: 純粋な男性嫌悪の悪を、好奇心をそそるスタイライズされた準シェイクスピア的な肖像で表現し、ジャンルを超越しようとする。
back_translation: Expressing the pure evil of male hatred through a stylized, quasi-Shakespearean portrait that seeks to transcend genres.

text: not a stereotype is omitted nor a cliché left unsaid .
translation: ステレオタイプは省かれず、クリシェは言及されていない。
back_translation: Stereotypes are not omitted, and clichés are not mentioned.

text: a smart , steamy mix of road movie , coming-of-age story and political satire .
translation: スマートでスチーミーなロードムービー、成長物語、政治風刺のミックス。
back_translation: A smart and steamy road movie, a coming-of-age story, and a mix of political satire.

text: it 's coherent , well shot , and tartly acted , but it wears you down like a dinner guest showing off his doctorate .
translation: それは一貫性があり、よく撮影され、鋭く演じられていますが、博士号を見せびらかす夕食の客のように疲れさせます。
back_translation: It is consistent, well-shot, and sharply performed, but it is exhausting like a dinner guest who flaunts their doctorate.

text: k-19 will not go down in the annals of cinema as one of the great submarine stories , but it is an engaging and exciting narrative of man confronting the demons of his own fear and paranoia .
translation: K-19は、映画の歴史において偉大な潜水艦物語の一つとして記録されることはないでしょうが、自己の恐れや偏執的な思いと向き合う人間の物語として、魅力的でエキサイティングな内容となっています。
back_translation: K-19 may not be recorded as one of the great submarine stories in the history of film, but it becomes an engaging and exciting narrative about a person confronting their own fears and paranoid thoughts.

text: a four star performance from kevin kline who unfortunately works with a two star script .
translation: ケヴィン・クラインの四つ星の演技だが、残念ながら二つ星の脚本と共に働いている。
back_translation: It's a four-star performance by Kevin Kline, but unfortunately, he's working with a two-star script.

text: god bless crudup and his aversion to taking the easy hollywood road and cashing in on his movie-star gorgeousness .
translation: 神がクルダップを祝福し、彼が楽なハリウッドの道を選ばず、映画スターとしての美しさを利用することを避ける姿勢に感謝します。
back_translation: I am grateful that God blesses Kurudapp and that he chooses not to take the easy path in Hollywood, avoiding the use of his beauty as a movie star.

text: it 's a feel-good movie about which you can actually feel good .
translation: 人を幸せにさせる映画で、実際に気分が良くなることができる。
back_translation: A movie that makes people happy can actually improve your mood.

text: if anything , see it for karen black , who camps up a storm as a fringe feminist conspiracy theorist named dirty dick .
translation: もし何か見るなら、カレン・ブラックのために見るべきです。彼女は「ダーティ・ディック」という名のフリンジ・フェミニスト陰謀論者として大暴れしています。
back_translation: If you're going to watch something, you should watch it for Karen Black. She is causing quite a stir as a fringe feminist conspiracy theorist named "Dirty Dick."

text: watching the chemistry between freeman and judd , however , almost makes this movie worth seeing .
translation: フリーマンとジャッドの化学反応を見るだけでも、この映画を見る価値がほぼある。
back_translation: Just watching the chemical reactions between Freeman and Judd is almost worth seeing this movie.

text: moonlight mile gives itself the freedom to feel contradictory things .
translation: ムーンライトマイルは矛盾した感情を抱く自由を自ら許しています。
back_translation: Moonlight Mile allows itself the freedom to embrace contradictory emotions.

text: it 's a movie that accomplishes so much that one viewing ca n't possibly be enough .
translation: それはとても多くのことを達成している映画であり、一度の視聴では到底足りない。
back_translation: It is a movie that achieves a great deal, and one viewing is certainly not enough.

text: the film aims to be funny , uplifting and moving , sometimes all at once .
translation: この映画は面白く、元気づけられ、感動させることを目指しており、時にはすべてを同時に達成します。
back_translation: This movie aims to be interesting, uplifting, and moving, and at times achieves all of these simultaneously.

text: the film never gets over its own investment in conventional arrangements , in terms of love , age , gender , race , and class .
translation: 映画は、愛、年齢、性別、人種、階級といった従来の枠組みに対する自らの投資から決して抜け出せない。
back_translation: Movies can never escape from their own investments in traditional frameworks such as love, age, gender, race, and class.

text: nicely combines the enigmatic features of ` memento ' with the hallucinatory drug culture of ` requiem for a dream . '
translation: 「メメント」の神秘的な特徴と「レクイエム・フォー・ドリーム」の幻覚的なドラッグ文化を見事に結びつけています。
back_translation: It brilliantly connects the mysterious characteristics of "Memento" with the hallucinogenic drug culture of "Requiem for a Dream."

text: sorvino makes the princess seem smug and cartoonish , and the film only really comes alive when poor hermocrates and leontine pathetically compare notes about their budding amours .
translation: ソルヴィーノは王女を傲慢で漫画のように見せており、映画は貧しいヘルモクラテスとレオンティーヌが彼らの芽生えた愛について愚かに比較する時だけ本当に活気を帯びます。
back_translation: Sorvino portrays the princess as arrogant and cartoonish, and the film only truly comes to life when the poor Hermocrates and Leontine foolishly compare their budding love.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- stale retread of the '53 original .
translation: （a）1953年のオリジナルの古い使いまわし。
back_translation: (a) The original old reuse from 1953.

text: more concerned with overall feelings , broader ideas , and open-ended questions than concrete story and definitive answers , soderbergh 's solaris is a gorgeous and deceptively minimalist cinematic tone poem .
translation: 全体的な感情、広いアイデア、そして具体的な物語や明確な答えよりもオープンエンドの質問に重きを置いているソダーバーグの『ソラリス』は、美しく、巧妙にミニマリストな映画的トーン・ポエムです。
back_translation: Soderbergh's "Solaris," which puts more emphasis on open-ended questions than on overall emotion, broad ideas, and concrete stories or clear answers, is a beautifully crafted, cleverly minimalist cinematic tone poem.

text: alarms for duvall 's throbbing sincerity and his elderly propensity for patting people while he talks .
translation: デュバルの心のこもった誠実さと、話している間に人を軽く叩く高齢者の傾向に対する警戒。
back_translation: Duval's heartfelt sincerity and the caution against the tendency of the elderly to lightly pat people while talking.

text: there 's no point in extracting the bare bones of byatt 's plot for purposes of bland hollywood romance .
translation: バイアットのプロットの核心を抜き出して、味気ないハリウッドのロマンスのために利用することには意味がない。
back_translation: It is meaningless to extract the core of the Bayat plot and utilize it for bland Hollywood romance.

text: the performances are amiable and committed , and the comedy more often than not hits the bullseye .
translation: 演技は親しみやすく、真剣であり、コメディはしばしば的を射ています。
back_translation: The performance is approachable and serious, while the comedy is often spot-on.

text: zigzag might have been richer and more observant if it were less densely plotted .
translation: ジグザグは、プロットがそれほど密でなければ、もっと豊かで観察力に富んでいたかもしれません。
back_translation: Zigzag might have been richer and more insightful if the plot weren't so dense.

text: to better understand why this did n't connect with me would require another viewing , and i wo n't be sitting through this one again ... that in itself is commentary enough .
translation: 私がこの作品と繋がらなかった理由をよりよく理解するには、もう一度観る必要がありますが、今回は再度観るつもりはありません...それ自体が十分なコメントです。
back_translation: To better understand why I couldn't connect with this work, I need to watch it again, but I have no intention of doing so this time... that in itself is a sufficient comment.

text: is a question for philosophers , not filmmakers ; all the filmmakers need to do is engage an audience .
translation: これは哲学者のための質問であり、映画製作者のためのものではありません。映画製作者がするべきことは、観客を引き込むことだけです。
back_translation: This is a question for philosophers, not for filmmakers. What filmmakers should do is simply engage the audience.

text: at some point , all this visual trickery stops being clever and devolves into flashy , vaguely silly overkill .
translation: ある時点で、この視覚的なトリックは賢くあることをやめ、派手で漠然と馬鹿げたやりすぎに devolve します。
back_translation: At some point, this visual trick stops being clever and devolves into something flashy and vaguely ridiculous.

text: a ragbag of cliches .
translation: 古臭い言い回しの寄せ集め。
back_translation: A collection of outdated expressions.

text: overburdened with complicated plotting and banal dialogue
translation: 複雑なプロットと平凡な対話に圧倒されている
back_translation: I am overwhelmed by the complex plot and ordinary dialogue.

text: the picture runs a mere 84 minutes , but it 's no glance .
translation: その映画はわずか84分ですが、決して軽いものではありません。
back_translation: The movie is just 84 minutes long, but it is by no means light.

text: steers refreshingly clear of the usual cliches .
translation: ありきたりなクリシェから爽やかに逸脱しています。
back_translation: It gracefully deviates from the cliché.

text: niccol the filmmaker merges his collaborators ' symbolic images with his words , insinuating , for example , that in hollywood , only god speaks to the press
translation: 映画監督ニッコルは、彼の仲間たちの象徴的なイメージを彼自身の言葉と融合させ、たとえばハリウッドでは神だけが報道陣に語りかけることを暗示しています。
back_translation: Director Niccol blends the iconic imagery of his peers with his own words, suggesting that in Hollywood only gods speak to the press.

text: it 's a beautiful film , full of elaborate and twisted characters - and it 's also pretty funny .

back_translation: With a touch of humor - (after an interaction with a slightly bubbly alien deckhand, Denlopp advises, "I speak fluent Flatruta") - and a witty update - (the silver parrot is replaced by a cute alien creature named Morph, who imitates everything around it) -

back_translation: Diane Lane and Richard Gere give exceptionally good performances.

text: content merely to lionize its title character and exploit his anger - all for easy sanctimony , formulaic thrills and a ham-fisted sermon on the need for national health insurance .
translation: 単にタイトルキャラクターを称賛し、彼の怒りを利用する内容 - 簡単な偽善、型にはまったスリル、そして国民健康保険の必要性についての不器用な説教のために。
back_translation: Simply praising the title character and exploiting his anger - for the sake of easy hypocrisy, clichéd thrills, and an awkward sermon on the necessity of national health insurance.

text: a charming but slight comedy .
translation: 魅力的だがやや軽いコメディ。
back_translation: Charming but somewhat light comedy.

text: an unusually dry-eyed , even analytical approach to material that is generally played for maximum moisture .
translation: 異常にドライな、むしろ分析的なアプローチが、一般的に最大の湿り気をもって扱われる素材に対して。
back_translation: An unusually dry, rather analytical approach is applied to materials that are generally handled with maximum moisture.

text: a beyond-lame satire , teddy bears ' picnic ranks among the most pitiful directing debuts by an esteemed writer-actor .
translation: 非常にダメな風刺として、テディベアのピクニックは著名な作家・俳優による最も哀れな監督デビューの一つにランクインします。
back_translation: As a very poor satire, Teddy Bear's Picnic ranks among the most pathetic directorial debuts by renowned writers and actors.

text: it looks like an action movie , but it 's so poorly made , on all levels , that it does n't even qualify as a spoof of such .
translation: アクション映画のように見えますが、あまりにも手作り感があり、すべての面で酷いため、そうした映画のパロディとしても成立していません。
back_translation: It looks like an action movie, but it is so poorly made, with a handcrafted feel, that it doesn't even work as a parody of such films.

text: but mostly it 's a work that , with humor , warmth , and intelligence , captures a life interestingly lived .
translation: しかし主に、それはユーモア、温かさ、そして知性をもって、興味深く生きられた人生を捉えた作品です。
back_translation: However, primarily, it is a work that captures a life lived interestingly, with humor, warmth, and intelligence.

text: as an introduction to the man 's theories and influence , derrida is all but useless ; as a portrait of the artist as an endlessly inquisitive old man , however , it 's invaluable .
translation: 彼の理論と影響の紹介として、デリダはほとんど役に立たない。しかし、常に好奇心旺盛な老人としてのアーティストの肖像として見ると、それは非常に貴重である。
back_translation: As an introduction to his theories and influences, Derrida is almost useless. However, when viewed as a portrait of an artist who is always curious, it becomes very valuable.

text: young hanks and fisk , who vaguely resemble their celebrity parents , bring fresh good looks and an ease in front of the camera to the work .
translation: 有名な親にわずかに似ている若いハンクスとフィスクは、新鮮な美しさとカメラの前での自然さを作品にもたらしている。
back_translation: The young Hanks and Fisk, who slightly resemble their famous parents, bring fresh beauty and a naturalness in front of the camera to their work.

text: excellent performances from jacqueline bisset and martha plimpton grace this deeply touching melodrama .
translation: ジャクリーン・ビセットとマーサ・プリンプトンの優れた演技が、この心に深く響くメロドラマを彩っています。
back_translation: The outstanding performances of Jacqueline Bisset and Martha Plimpton bring this deeply resonant melodrama to life.

text: the cast is spot on and the mood is laid back .
translation: キャストは完璧で、雰囲気はリラックスしています。
back_translation: The cast is perfect, and the atmosphere is relaxed.

text: its generic villains lack any intrigue -lrb- other than their funny accents -rrb- and the action scenes are poorly delivered .
translation: その一般的な悪役には面白みが欠けており（面白いアクセントを除いて）、アクションシーンもあまりうまく表現されていません。
back_translation: The typical villain lacks depth (aside from an interesting accent), and the action scenes are not portrayed very well either.

text: while bollywood\/hollywood will undoubtedly provide its keenest pleasures to those familiar with bombay musicals , it also has plenty for those -lrb- like me -rrb- who are n't .
translation: ボリウッド／ハリウッドは、間違いなくムンバイのミュージカルに詳しい人々に最も強い楽しみを提供しますが、私のように詳しくない人々にも多くの楽しみがあります。
back_translation: Bollywood/Hollywood undoubtedly provides the greatest enjoyment for those well-versed in Mumbai's musicals, but there is also plenty of enjoyment for those like me who are not so knowledgeable.

text: has no reason to exist , other than to employ hollywood kids and people who owe favors to their famous parents .
translation: 存在する理由はなく、ハリウッドの子供たちや有名な親に借りを負っている人々を雇うためだけです。
back_translation: There is no reason for existence, and it is only to hire Hollywood children and people who owe something to famous parents.

text: in a big corner office in hell , satan is throwing up his hands in surrender , is firing his r&d people , and has decided he will just screen the master of disguise 24\/7 .
translation: 地獄の大きな角のオフィスで、サタンは手を挙げて降伏し、研究開発の人々を解雇し、24時間体制で「変身の達人」を上映することに決めました。
back_translation: In the large office of hell, Satan raised his hand in surrender, fired the research and development people, and decided to screen "The Master of Transformation" around the clock.

text: captures all the longing , anguish and ache , the confusing sexual messages and the wish to be a part of that elusive adult world .
translation: すべての切望、苦悩、痛み、混乱した性的メッセージ、そしてその捉えどころのない大人の世界の一部になりたいという願望を捉えています。
back_translation: It captures all desires, suffering, pain, confusing sexual messages, and the yearning to be a part of that elusive adult world.

text: in a movie full of surprises , the biggest is that secret ballot is a comedy , both gentle and biting .
translation: 驚きに満ちた映画の中で、最大の驚きは「秘密投票」が穏やかでありながらも鋭いコメディであるということです。
back_translation: In a movie full of surprises, the biggest shock is that "Secret Ballot" is a calm yet sharp comedy.

text: deep down , i realized the harsh reality of my situation : i would leave the theater with a lower i.q. than when i had entered .
translation: 心の奥底で、私は自分の状況の厳しい現実に気づいた：劇場を出るときには、入るときよりも低いIQを持っていることになるだろう。
back_translation: Deep down, I realized the harsh reality of my situation: when I leave the theater, I will have a lower IQ than when I entered.

text: a chance to see three splendid actors turn a larky chase movie into an emotionally satisfying exploration of the very human need to be somebody , and to belong to somebody .
translation: 三人の素晴らしい俳優が軽妙な追跡映画を、人間として誰かになり、誰かに属するという非常に人間的な欲求を感情的に満たす探求に変える機会。
back_translation: An opportunity for three wonderful actors to turn a light-hearted chase film into an emotional exploration of the very human desire to become someone and belong to someone.

text: well cast and well directed - a powerful drama with enough sardonic wit to keep it from being maudlin .
translation: キャストも演出も優れており、感傷的にならないように十分な皮肉が利いた、力強いドラマです。
back_translation: The cast and direction are excellent, and it's a powerful drama with enough irony to avoid becoming sentimental.

text: an ambitiously naturalistic , albeit half-baked , drama about an abused , inner-city autistic teen .
translation: 野心的なリアリズムを持ちながらも、まだ発展途上のドラマで、虐待を受けた内市の自閉症のティーンエイジャーについて描いています。
back_translation: It is an ambitious yet still developing drama that depicts an abused autistic teenager in an inner city.

text: it is just too bad the film 's story does not live up to its style .
translation: 映画のストーリーがそのスタイルに見合わないのは本当に残念です。
back_translation: It's really a shame that the story of the movie does not match its style.

text: a wild ride juiced with enough energy and excitement for at least three films .
translation: 少なくとも三本の映画分のエネルギーと興奮で満ちたワイルドライド。
back_translation: A wild ride filled with enough energy and excitement for at least three movies.

text: a muted freak-out
translation: muted freak-out
back_translation: muted freak-out

text: lead actress gaï , she of the impossibly long limbs and sweetly conspiratorial smile , is a towering siren .
translation: 主演女優のガイは、手足が驚くほど長く、甘く共謀的な微笑を浮かべた、圧倒的な美しさを持つセイレーンです。
back_translation: The leading actress is a siren with an overwhelming beauty, possessing surprisingly long limbs and a sweetly conspiratorial smile.

text: absolutely not .
translation: 絶対に違います。
back_translation: Absolutely not.

text: by turns gripping , amusing , tender and heart-wrenching , laissez-passer has all the earmarks of french cinema at its best .
translation: 交互に引き込まれるような、楽しい、優しい、そして心を締め付けるような「レセパッセ」は、フランス映画の最良の特徴をすべて兼ね備えています。
back_translation: "Rese Passe," which draws you in alternately, is fun, gentle, and heart-wrenching, embodying all the best characteristics of French cinema.

text: the cat 's meow marks a return to form for director peter bogdanovich ...
translation: 「猫の鳴き声」は、監督ピーター・ボグダノヴィッチにとって再起を示す作品です...
back_translation: "The sound of a cat meowing" is a work that signifies a comeback for director Peter Bogdanovich...

text: vibrantly colored and beautifully designed , metropolis is a feast for the eyes .
translation: 鮮やかな色彩と美しいデザインのメトロポリスは、目の饗宴です。
back_translation: The vibrant colors and beautiful design of the metropolis are a feast for the eyes.

text: ` stock up on silver bullets for director neil marshall 's intense freight train of a film . '
translation: ニール・マーシャル監督の激烈な列車のような映画のために、銀の弾丸を備蓄しておけ。
back_translation: Stock up on silver bullets for Neil Marshall's intense, train-like film.

text: at its best , which occurs often , michael moore 's bowling for columbine rekindles the muckraking , soul-searching spirit of the ` are we a sick society ? '
translation: 最良の時期には、しばしば起こることですが、マイケル・ムーアの「ボウリング・フォー・コロンバイン」は、「私たちは病んだ社会なのか？」という魂を探求するスピリットを再燃させます。
back_translation: In the best of times, it often happens that Michael Moore's "Bowling for Columbine" reignites the spirit of exploring the soul of the question, "Are we a sick society?"

text: in the real world , an actor this uncharismatically beautiful would have a résumé loaded with credits like `` girl in bar # 3 . ''
translation: 現実の世界では、これほど魅力的でない美しい俳優は「バーの女の子 #3」などのクレジットが詰まった履歴書を持っていることだろう。
back_translation: In the real world, a not-so-attractive beautiful actor would likely have a resume filled with credits like "Bar Girl #3."

text: barney throws away the goodwill the first half of his movie generates by orchestrating a finale that is impenetrable and dull .
translation: バーニーは、自分の映画の前半が生み出した良好な評価を、理解しにくくて退屈なフィナーレを演出することによって台無しにしてしまう。
back_translation: Barney ruins the positive reception generated by the first half of his movie by directing a confusing and boring finale.

text: an indispensable peek at the art and the agony of making people laugh .
translation: 人々を笑わせるという芸術と苦悩の不可欠な一瞥。
back_translation: An essential glimpse into the art and suffering of making people laugh.

text: at 78 minutes it just zings along with vibrance and warmth .
translation: 78分の時点では、活気と温かみを持ってズンと進んでいきます。
back_translation: At the 78-minute mark, it moves forward with vitality and warmth.

text: the film , while not exactly assured in its execution , is notable for its sheer audacity and openness .
translation: この映画は、実行において決して自信満々ではないものの、その純粋な大胆さとオープンさで注目に値します。
back_translation: This movie is worth noting for its pure boldness and openness, even though it is never completely confident in its execution.

text: it 's sweet and fluffy at the time , but it may leave you feeling a little sticky and unsatisfied .
translation: それは甘くてふわふわしているときもありますが、少し粘り気があって満足感が得られないかもしれません。
back_translation: It can be sweet and fluffy at times, but it might also have a bit of stickiness, which could result in a lack of satisfaction.

text: sayles has an eye for the ways people of different ethnicities talk to and about others outside the group .
translation: セイルズは、異なる民族の人々が自分たちのグループ外の他者に対してどのように話し、また語るかに目を光らせています。
back_translation: Sails is keeping an eye on how people from different ethnic groups talk about and speak to others outside their own group.

text: the irony is that this film 's cast is uniformly superb ; their performances could have -- should have -- been allowed to stand on their own .
translation: 皮肉なことに、この映画のキャストは全員素晴らしく、その演技は単独で認められるべきだった。
back_translation: Ironically, the entire cast of this movie is wonderful, and their performances should have been acknowledged on their own.

text: i admire the closing scenes of the film , which seem to ask whether our civilization offers a cure for vincent 's complaint .
translation: 私は映画のクライマックスのシーンに感心しています。そこでは、私たちの文明がビンセントの不満に対する解決策を提供しているのかどうかを問うように見えます。
back_translation: I am impressed by the climax scene of the movie. It seems to question whether our civilization offers a solution to Vincent's discontent.

text: a dreary movie .
translation: 陰鬱な映画。
back_translation: A gloomy movie.

text: a thriller whose style , structure and rhythms are so integrated with the story , you can not separate them .
translation: ストーリーと完全に統合されたスタイル、構造、リズムを持つスリラーで、それらを切り離すことはできません。
back_translation: A thriller with a style, structure, and rhythm that is completely integrated with the story, making them inseparable.

text: cruel and inhuman cinematic punishment ... simultaneously degrades its characters , its stars and its audience .
translation: 残酷で非人道的な映画的罰は...同時にそのキャラクター、スター、そして観客を貶める。
back_translation: The cruel and inhumane cinematic punishment... simultaneously degrades the characters, the stars, and the audience.

text: you may think you have figured out the con and the players in this debut film by argentine director fabian bielinsky , but while you were thinking someone made off with your wallet .
translation: あなたはアルゼンチンの監督ファビアン・ビエリンキのデビュー映画で詐欺とそのプレイヤーを見抜いたと思うかもしれませんが、その間に誰かがあなたの財布を持ち去ってしまいました。
back_translation: You might think you’ve spotted the fraud and its players in director Fabian Bielinsky’s debut film from Argentina, but in the meantime, someone has stolen your wallet.

text: the premise itself is just sooooo tired .
translation: その前提自体がとても疲れています。
back_translation: That premise itself is very exhausting.

text: like any good romance , son of the bride , proves it 's never too late to learn .
translation: 良いロマンスのように、「花嫁の息子」は学ぶのに遅すぎることは決してないことを証明しています。
back_translation: Like a good romance, "The Bride's Son" proves that it is never too late to learn.

text: the emotional overload of female angst irreparably drags the film down .
translation: 女性の苦悩の感情的な過負荷が、映画を取り返しのつかないほど引きずり下ろしている。
back_translation: The emotional burden of women's suffering is dragging the film down irreparably.

text: there 's undeniable enjoyment to be had from films crammed with movie references , but the fun wears thin -- then out -- when there 's nothing else happening .
translation: 映画の引用でぎっしり詰まった映画から得られる楽しみは否定できませんが、他に何も起こらないときには、その楽しみも薄れていきます。
back_translation: While the enjoyment derived from a movie packed with quotes cannot be denied, that enjoyment diminishes when nothing else is happening.

text: an engrossing and grim portrait of hookers : what they think of themselves and their clients .
translation: 売春婦の没入感があり厳しい肖像：彼女たちが自分自身や顧客についてどう考えているか。
back_translation: An immersive and intense portrayal of prostitutes: how they think about themselves and their clients.

text: a lovely and beautifully photographed romance .
translation: 愛らしく美しく撮影されたロマンチックな作品。
back_translation: A romantic piece that is lovingly and beautifully captured.

text: ... while each moment of this broken character study is rich in emotional texture , the journey does n't really go anywhere .
translation: ...この壊れたキャラクタースタディの各瞬間は感情的な質感に富んでいるものの、物語は実際にはどこにも行かない。
back_translation: ...Although each moment of this broken character study is rich in emotional texture, the story doesn’t actually go anywhere.

text: the film 's messages of tolerance and diversity are n't particularly original , but one ca n't help but be drawn in by the sympathetic characters .
translation: 映画のメッセージである寛容さと多様性は特に斬新ではないが、共感できるキャラクターに引き込まれてしまう。
back_translation: The message of the film about tolerance and diversity is not particularly original, but you get drawn in by the relatable characters.

text: aside from the fact that the film idiotically uses the website feardotcom.com or the improperly hammy performance from poor stephen rea , the film gets added disdain for the fact that it is nearly impossible to look at or understand .
translation: 映画が愚かにもウェブサイトfeardotcom.comを使用していることや、可哀想なスティーブン・リアの不適切な演技に加えて、その映画は見たり理解したりすることがほぼ不可能であるため、さらに軽蔑される。
back_translation: The movie is further scorned for its foolish use of the website feardotcom.com and the inappropriate performance by the poor Stephen Rea, making it nearly impossible to watch or understand.

text: i had more fun watching spy than i had with most of the big summer movies .
translation: 「スパイ」を観るのは、ほとんどの大作夏映画よりも楽しかった。
back_translation: Watching "Spy" was more enjoyable than most blockbuster summer films.

text: a simple tale of an unlikely friendship , but thanks to the gorgeous locales and exceptional lead performances , it has considerable charm .
translation: 意外な友情のシンプルな物語ですが、美しいロケ地と卓越した主演のパフォーマンスのおかげで、かなりの魅力があります。
back_translation: It's a simple story of unexpected friendship, but it has considerable charm thanks to the beautiful locations and the outstanding performances of the leads.

text: no such thing is sort of a minimalist beauty and the beast , but in this case the beast should definitely get top billing .
translation: そのようなものは、ある種のミニマリスト版の美女と野獣ですが、この場合、野獣が間違いなく主役となるべきです。
back_translation: Such a thing is a sort of minimalist version of Beauty and the Beast, but in this case, the Beast should definitely be the main character.

text: it 's not particularly well made , but since i found myself howling more than cringing , i 'd say the film works .
translation: 特にしっかりと作られているわけではありませんが、自分が cringe するよりも大声で笑っていることに気づいたので、この映画は成功していると言えます。
back_translation: Although it is not particularly well made, I realized that I was laughing out loud rather than cringing, so I can say this movie is a success.

text: aniston has at last decisively broken with her friends image in an independent film of satiric fire and emotional turmoil .
translation: アニストンは、風刺的な炎と感情的な turmoil の独立映画で友人のイメージをついに断ち切りました。
back_translation: Aniston finally broke the image of her friend in an independent film filled with satirical fire and emotional turmoil.

text: ... blade ii is still top-heavy with blazing guns , cheatfully filmed martial arts , disintegrating bloodsucker computer effects and jagged camera moves that serve no other purpose than to call attention to themselves .
translation: ... ブレード II は依然として、目を引く銃器、ずるがしこく撮影された武道、崩壊する血吸いコンピューター効果、そして自己主張するだけのギザギザしたカメラの動きで重心が上に偏っています。
back_translation: ... Blade II still has its focus on eye-catching firearms, cleverly shot martial arts, decaying bloodsucking computer effects, and overly assertive jagged camera movements.

text: every joke is repeated at least four times .
translation: すべてのジョークは少なくとも4回繰り返される。
back_translation: All jokes are repeated at least four times.

text: a smart and funny , albeit sometimes superficial , cautionary tale of a technology in search of an artist .
translation: 賢くて面白いが、時には表面的な技術とアーティストの関係に関する警告の物語。
back_translation: A story that is clever and amusing, but sometimes serves as a warning about the superficial relationship between technology and artists.

text: if you like an extreme action-packed film with a hint of humor , then triple x marks the spot .
translation: もしアクション満載で少しのユーモアがある極限の映画が好きなら、『トリプルX』がぴったりです。
back_translation: If you love action-packed movies with a bit of humor, then "Triple X" is perfect for you.

text: stanley kwan has directed not only one of the best gay love stories ever made , but one of the best love stories of any stripe .
translation: スタンリー・クワンは、これまでに作られた最高のゲイラブストーリーの一つだけでなく、あらゆるタイプの恋愛物語の中でも最高の物語の一つを監督しています。
back_translation: Stanley Kwan is directing not only one of the best gay love stories ever made but also one of the greatest stories among all types of romantic tales.

text: just about the best straight-up , old-school horror film of the last 15 years .
translation: ここ15年間で、間違いなく最高のストレートなオールドスクールホラー映画です。
back_translation: This is undoubtedly the best straight old school horror movie in the last 15 years.

text: in the director 's cut , the film is not only a love song to the movies but it also is more fully an example of the kind of lush , all-enveloping movie experience it rhapsodizes .
translation: ディレクターズカットでは、この映画は単なる映画へのラブソングであるだけでなく、彼が賛美するような豊かで包み込むような映画体験の一例をより完全に示しています。
back_translation: In the director's cut, this movie not only serves as a love letter to cinema but also more completely showcases an example of the rich and enveloping film experience that it praises.

text: samuel l. jackson is one of the best actors there is .
translation: サミュエル・L・ジャクソンは、最高の俳優の一人です。
back_translation: Samuel L. Jackson is one of the best actors.

text: it does give a taste of the burning man ethos , an appealing blend of counter-cultural idealism and hedonistic creativity .
translation: それはバーニングマンのエートスの味わいを提供しており、反文化的理想主義と快楽的創造性の魅力的な融合です。
back_translation: It offers a taste of the ethos of Burning Man, an enticing fusion of countercultural idealism and hedonistic creativity.

text: a plethora of engaging diatribes on the meaning of ` home , ' delivered in grand passion by the members of the various households .
translation: さまざまな家庭のメンバーによって、壮大な情熱で語られる「家」の意味に関する魅力的なディアトリーブが溢れています。
back_translation: There is an abundance of captivating diatribes about the meaning of "home," expressed with grand passion by various members of households.

text: an imponderably stilted and self-consciously arty movie .
translation: 計り知れないほど堅苦しく、自己意識的なアーティ映画。
back_translation: An incredibly formal and self-aware art film.

text: this real-life hollywood fairy-tale is more engaging than the usual fantasies hollywood produces .
translation: この実生活のハリウッドのフェアリーテイルは、ハリウッドが生み出す通常のファンタジーよりも魅力的です。
back_translation: This real-life Hollywood fairy tale is more captivating than the typical fantasies produced by Hollywood.

text: waiting for godard can be fruitful : ` in praise of love ' is the director 's epitaph for himself .
translation: ゴダールを待つことは実り多いことがある:『愛の賛歌』は監督自身への碑文である。
back_translation: Waiting for Godard can be fruitful: "La chanson de la pluie" is an epitaph for the director himself.

text: it 's all about anakin ... and the lustrous polished visuals rich in color and creativity and , of course , special effect .
translation: すべてはアナキンに関することであり、色と創造性に満ちた光沢のある洗練されたビジュアルと、もちろん特撮も含まれています。
back_translation: Everything is about Anakin, filled with colors and creativity, featuring glossy, refined visuals, and of course, including special effects.

text: solondz is so intent on hammering home his message that he forgets to make it entertaining .
translation: ソロンツは自分のメッセージを強調することに夢中になりすぎて、楽しませることを忘れてしまっています。
back_translation: Soronutsu has become so obsessed with emphasizing his message that he has forgotten to entertain.

text: ... pitiful , slapdash disaster .
translation: ... 哀れな、いい加減な惨事。
back_translation: ... Pitiful, careless disaster.

text: the crap continues .
translation: クソは続く。
back_translation: The shit continues.

text: while the story 's undeniably hard to follow , iwai 's gorgeous visuals seduce .
translation: 物語は間違いなく追いにくいですが、岩井の美しい映像が魅了します。
back_translation: The story is undoubtedly difficult to pursue, but Iwai's beautiful visuals are captivating.

text: it 's a terrible movie in every regard , and utterly painful to watch .
translation: あらゆる点でひどい映画で、見るのが非常に苦痛です。
back_translation: A terrible movie in every way, and it's very painful to watch.

text: this is a monumental achievement in practically every facet of inept filmmaking : joyless , idiotic , annoying , heavy-handed , visually atrocious , and often downright creepy .
translation: これは、 inept filmmaking のほぼすべての側面において、 monumental achievement です：喜びのない、愚かな、迷惑な、押し付けがましい、視覚的にひどい、そしてしばしば全く不気味な作品です。
back_translation: This is a monumental achievement in almost every aspect of inept filmmaking: a joyless, foolish, obnoxious, heavy-handed, visually terrible, and often completely creepy work.

text: a rock-solid gangster movie with a fair amount of suspense , intriguing characters and bizarre bank robberies , plus a heavy dose of father-and-son dynamics .
translation: 頑丈なギャング映画で、適度なサスペンス、興味深いキャラクター、奇妙な銀行強盗があり、父と息子の関係が重厚に描かれています。
back_translation: A sturdy gang movie with moderate suspense, interesting characters, a peculiar bank robbery, and a heavily portrayed father-son relationship.

text: a terrific b movie -- in fact , the best in recent memory .
translation: 素晴らしいB級映画で、実際には最近の記憶の中で最高です。
back_translation: It's a wonderful B-movie and actually the best in recent memory.

text: unfortunately , the experience of actually watching the movie is less compelling than the circumstances of its making .
translation: 残念ながら、実際に映画を観る体験は、その制作過程の状況よりも魅力に欠けます。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the experience of actually watching a movie is less appealing than the circumstances surrounding its production.

text: i liked about schmidt a lot , but i have a feeling that i would have liked it much more if harry & tonto never existed .
translation: 「アバウト・シュミット」はとても好きでしたが、もし「ハリーとトント」が存在しなかったら、もっと好きだっただろうなという気がします。
back_translation: I really liked "About Schmidt," but I feel that I would have liked it even more if "Harry and Tonto" hadn't existed.

text: what starts off as a potentially incredibly twisting mystery becomes simply a monster chase film .
translation: 最初は非常にひねりの効いた謎になりそうなものが、単なるモンスター追跡映画になります。
back_translation: What initially seems like a cleverly twisted mystery turns into just a simple monster chase movie.

text: you may leave the theater with more questions than answers , but darned if your toes wo n't still be tapping .
translation: あなたは回答よりも多くの疑問を抱えて劇場を出るかもしれませんが、それでもあなたのつま先はまだリズムに合わせて動いていることでしょう。
back_translation: You may leave the theater with more questions than answers, but still, your toes are likely still moving to the rhythm.

text: nobody seems to have cared much about any aspect of it , from its cheesy screenplay to the grayish quality of its lighting to its last-minute , haphazard theatrical release .
translation: 誰もそのどの側面にもあまり気にかけていなかったようです。安っぽい脚本から灰色がかった照明の質、最後の最後に行き当たりばったりで行われた劇場公開まで。
back_translation: It seems that no one really cared about any of those aspects, from the cheap script to the grayish lighting quality, and even the haphazard theatrical release at the last minute.

text: as in aimless , arduous , and arbitrary .
translation: 無目的で、骨の折れる、そして恣意的な。
back_translation: Aimless, arduous, and arbitrary.

text: aside from rohmer 's bold choices regarding point of view , the lady and the duke represents the filmmaker 's lifelong concern with formalist experimentation in cinematic art .
translation: ロメールの視点に関する大胆な選択を除けば、『レディとデューク』は映画芸術における形式主義的実験に対する監督の生涯にわたる関心を示しています。
back_translation: Apart from the bold choice regarding Rohmer's perspective, "The Lady and the Duke" demonstrates the director's lifelong interest in formalist experimentation in cinematic art.

text: a fascinating glimpse into an insular world that gives the lie to many clichés and showcases a group of dedicated artists .
translation: 多くのクリシェに反証を与え、献身的なアーティストたちのグループを紹介する、閉ざされた世界への魅力的な洞察。
back_translation: A captivating insight into a closed world that provides counterarguments to many clichés and introduces a group of devoted artists.

text: this is a poster movie , a mediocre tribute to films like them !
translation: これはポスタームービーで、彼らのような映画への平凡なトリビュートです！
back_translation: This is a poster movie, an ordinary tribute to films like theirs!

text: there is no solace here , no entertainment value , merely a fierce lesson in where filmmaking can take us .
translation: ここには安らぎもなく、娯楽の価値もなく、ただ映画制作が私たちをどこに導くかの厳しい教訓があります。
back_translation: Here, there is no tranquility, no value in entertainment, only the harsh lesson of where film production leads us.

text: the graphic carnage and re-creation of war-torn croatia is uncomfortably timely , relevant , and sickeningly real .
translation: 戦争で荒廃したクロアチアのグラフィックな惨状と再現は、不快なほどタイムリーで関連性があり、ぞっとするほどリアルです。
back_translation: The graphic devastation and recreation of war-torn Croatia are uncomfortably timely and relevant, and disturbingly realistic.

text: the ingenious construction -lrb- adapted by david hare from michael cunningham 's novel -rrb- constantly flows forwards and back , weaving themes among three strands which allow us to view events as if through a prism
translation: 巧妙な構成（マイケル・カニンガムの小説からデビッド・ヘアによって適応された）は、常に前後に流れ、三つの要素の間でテーマを織り交ぜ、出来事をプリズムを通して見るかのように私たちに提示します。
back_translation: The clever structure (adapted from Michael Cunningham's novel by David Hare) flows back and forth, intertwining themes between three elements and presenting events to us as if seen through a prism.

text: the most horrific movie experience i 've had since `` ca n't stop the music . ''
translation: 私が経験した中で最も恐ろしい映画体験は「ミュージックを止めることができない」以来です。
back_translation: The most terrifying movie experience I've had since "Can't Stop the Music."

text: but it also has many of the things that made the first one charming .
translation: しかし、それは最初の作品を魅力的にした多くの要素も持っています。
back_translation: However, it also has many elements that made the first work appealing.

text: weaver and lapaglia are both excellent , in the kind of low-key way that allows us to forget that they are actually movie folk .
translation: ウィーバーとラパリアはどちらも素晴らしく、彼らが実際に映画業界の人々であることを忘れさせるような控えめな方法で演技をしています。
back_translation: Weaver and Laparia are both incredible, and they perform in such a modest way that it makes you forget they are actually people from the movie industry.

text: it 's never laugh-out-loud funny , but it is frequently amusing .
translation: 決して声を出して笑うほどの面白さではありませんが、頻繁に楽しいです。
back_translation: It's not so funny that I would laugh out loud, but it's enjoyable quite often.

text: a movie in which laughter and self-exploitation merge into jolly soft-porn 'em powerment . '
translation: 笑いと自己搾取が融合し、陽気なソフトポルノの「エンパワーメント」となる映画。
back_translation: A movie where laughter and self-exploitation merge to become a cheerful soft porn "empowerment."

text: quite simply , a joy to watch and -- especially -- to listen to .
translation: 非常にシンプルに、見るだけでなく、特に聞くのも楽しいです。
back_translation: It's very simple; not only is it enjoyable to see, but especially to listen to as well.

text: not to mention absolutely refreshed .
translation: 言うまでもなく、まったくリフレッシュされています。
back_translation: Needless to say, I am completely refreshed.

text: you can take the grandkids or the grandparents and never worry about anyone being bored ... audience is a sea of constant smiles and frequent laughter .
translation: 孫たちを連れて行っても、祖父母を連れて行っても、誰も退屈する心配はありません…観客は常に笑顔に溢れ、頻繁に笑い声が響いています。
back_translation: Whether you take your grandchildren or your grandparents, there's no worry about anyone being bored... The audience is always full of smiles, and laughter frequently echoes.

text: arteta paints a picture of lives lived in a state of quiet desperation .
translation: アルテタは静かな絶望の中で生きる人々の姿を描いています。
back_translation: Arteta portrays the lives of people living in quiet despair.

text: there 's no reason to miss interview with the assassin
translation: 暗殺者とのインタビューを逃す理由はありません。
back_translation: There is no reason to miss an interview with an assassin.

text: i like this movie a lot .
translation: 私はこの映画がとても好きです。
back_translation: I really like this movie.

text: comes off more like a misdemeanor , a flat , unconvincing drama that never catches fire .
translation: 軽犯罪のように感じられ、火がつかない平坦で説得力のないドラマです。
back_translation: It feels like a petty crime, a flat and unconvincing drama that doesn't ignite.

text: close enough in spirit to its freewheeling trash-cinema roots to be a breath of fresh air .
translation: その自由なトラッシュシネマのルーツに精神的に近く、新鮮な空気をもたらす。
back_translation: It is spiritually close to the roots of that free trash cinema and brings fresh air.

text: while the transgressive trappings -lrb- especially the frank sex scenes -rrb- ensure that the film is never dull , rodrigues 's beast-within metaphor is ultimately rather silly and overwrought , making the ambiguous ending seem goofy rather than provocative .
translation: 過激な要素 - 特に率直なセックスシーン - により映画が決して退屈にならない一方で、ロドリゲスの「内なる獣」メタファーは最終的にはかなりばかげていて過剰であり、あいまいな結末を挑発的ではなく滑稽に感じさせてしまう。
back_translation: The extreme elements—especially the frank sex scenes—ensure that the film is never boring, while Rodriguez's "inner beast" metaphor ultimately feels quite ridiculous and excessive, making the ambiguous ending feel more comical than provocative.

text: blue crush has all the trappings of an energetic , extreme-sports adventure , but ends up more of a creaky `` pretty woman '' retread , with the emphasis on self-empowering schmaltz and big-wave surfing that gives pic its title an afterthought .
translation: ブルークラッシュはエネルギッシュでエクストリームスポーツの冒険のすべての要素を持っているが、結局は自己啓発的な感傷とビッグウェーブサーフィンに重点を置いた、いわゆる「プリティ・ウーマン」の焼き直しになってしまい、タイトルの由来となるビッグウェーブサーフィンは後回しにされてしまっている。
back_translation: Blue Crush has all the elements of an energetic and extreme sports adventure, but in the end, it becomes a rehash of the so-called "Pretty Woman" with an emphasis on self-help sentiment and big wave surfing, with the big wave surfing that gives rise to the title being pushed to the background.

text: a man leaving the screening said the film was better than saving private ryan .
translation: 上映を終えた男が、その映画は『プライベート・ライアンを救え』よりも良かったと言った。
back_translation: A man who finished watching the movie said that it was better than "Saving Private Ryan."

text: -lrb- a -rrb- strong piece of work .
translation: （a）強力な作品。
back_translation: A powerful work.

text: daring and beautifully made .
translation: 大胆で美しく作られている。
back_translation: It is bold and beautifully made.

text: a well-crafted film that is all the more remarkable because it achieves its emotional power and moments of revelation with restraint and a delicate ambiguity .
translation: 感情的な力と啓示の瞬間を控えめで繊細な曖昧さで達成しているため、より一層素晴らしい、巧みに作られた映画。
back_translation: A more wonderful and skillfully crafted film, achieving emotional power and moments of revelation with understated and delicate ambiguity.

text: ... hits every cliche we 've come to expect , including the assumption that `` crazy '' people are innocent , childlike and inherently funny .
translation: ...私たちが期待しているすべてのクリシェに当てはまり、「クレイジーな」人々は無邪気で子供のようで本質的に面白いという前提を含んでいます。
back_translation: …applies to all the clichés we expect, containing the premise that "crazy" people are innocent, childlike, and inherently funny.

text: slight but enjoyable documentary .
translation: 少しですが楽しめるドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: It's a documentary that can be enjoyed a little.

text: adam sandler 's eight crazy nights grows on you -- like a rash .
translation: アダム・サンドラーの「エイト・クレイジー・ナイツ」は、あなたにじわじわと広がる — まるで発疹のように。
back_translation: Adam Sandler's "Eight Crazy Nights" gradually spreads over you — like a rash.

text: when compared to the usual , more somber festival entries , davis ' highly personal brand of romantic comedy is a tart , smart breath of fresh air that stands out from the pack even if the picture itself is somewhat problematic .
translation: 通常の、より厳かな祭りのエントリーと比べると、デイビスの非常に個人的なロマンティックコメディのスタイルは、作品自体にいくらか問題があるにしても、群衆の中で際立つ辛口でスマートな新鮮さを持っています。
back_translation: Compared to the usual, more solemn entries of festivals, Davis's very personal romantic comedy style has a sharp and smart freshness that stands out in the crowd, even if there are some issues with the work itself.

text: nicks and steinberg match their own creations for pure venality -- that 's giving it the old college try .
translation: ニックスとスタインバーグは、自らの創作物を純粋な金銭欲のために一致させる - それが古き良き大学の精神を示すことだ。
back_translation: Nix and Steinberg align their creations purely for monetary greed - that represents the spirit of the good old university.

text: not even solondz 's thirst for controversy , sketchy characters and immature provocations can fully succeed at cheapening it .
translation: ソロンズの論争への渇望や、怪しいキャラクター、未熟な挑発ですら、それを安っぽくすることには完全には成功しない。
back_translation: Even the desire for controversy, shady characters, and immature provocations in Solon's work do not completely succeed in making it feel cheap.

text: and in a sense , that 's a liability .
translation: そしてある意味、それは負債です。
back_translation: And in a sense, it is a liability.

text: the romance between the leads is n't as compelling or as believable as it should be .
translation: 主役たちのロマンスは、期待されるほど魅力的でも信じられるものでもありません。
back_translation: The romance of the main characters is not as appealing or believable as one would expect.

text: hugh grant , who has a good line in charm , has never been more charming than in about a boy .
translation: ヒュー・グラントは魅力的なセリフが得意で、『アバウト・ア・ボーイ』ではこれまで以上に魅力的でした。
back_translation: Hugh Grant is great at charming lines, and in "About a Boy," he was more charming than ever before.

text: poignant and funny .
translation: 切なくて面白い。
back_translation: It's painful yet amusing.

text: this is pure , exciting moviemaking .
translation: これは純粋で、ワクワクする映画制作です。
back_translation: This is a pure and exciting film production.

text: never having seen the first two films in the series , i ca n't compare friday after next to them , but nothing would change the fact that what we have here is a load of clams left in the broiling sun for a good three days .
translation: シリーズの最初の二本の映画を見たことがないので、「フライデー・アフター・ネクスト」とそれらを比較することはできませんが、ここにあるのは、灼熱の太陽の下で三日間放置されたハマグリの山であるという事実は変わりません。
back_translation: I have not seen the first two movies in the series, so I cannot compare "Friday After Next" to them, but the fact remains that there is a mountain of clams left out for three days under the scorching sun.

text: a straight-ahead thriller that never rises above superficiality .
translation: 表面的なものを超えることのない、一直線のスリラー。
back_translation: A straight-line thriller that doesn't go beyond the surface.

text: the film 's constant mood of melancholy and its unhurried narrative are masterfully controlled .
translation: 映画の常に漂うメランコリーの雰囲気と、そのゆったりとした物語展開が巧みにコントロールされています。
back_translation: The film's constant atmosphere of melancholy and its leisurely narrative progression are skillfully controlled.

text: there are scenes of cinematic perfection that steal your heart away .
translation: 心を奪う映画の完璧なシーンがあります。
back_translation: There is a perfect scene in a movie that captures the heart.

text: a low-key labor of love that strikes a very resonant chord .
translation: 控えめな愛の労働で、非常に共鳴するメロディーを奏でる。
back_translation: With modest labor of love, it plays a melody that resonates deeply.

text: one of those movies that catches you up in something bigger than yourself , namely , an archetypal desire to enjoy good trash every now and then .
translation: 自分以上の何かに引き込まれる映画の一つであり、具体的には、たまに良いゴミを楽しみたいという典型的な欲望です。
back_translation: It is a movie that draws you into something beyond yourself, specifically a typical desire to occasionally enjoy good trash.

text: an old-fashioned scary movie , one that relies on lingering terror punctuated by sudden shocks and not constant bloodshed punctuated by flying guts .
translation: 旧式の恐ろしい映画、持続的な恐怖に静かに包まれ、突然のショックで際立たせるもので、絶え間ない流血と飛び散る内臓で目立つものではない。
back_translation: An old-fashioned horror movie, quietly enveloped in persistent fear, highlighted by sudden shocks, not standing out with incessant bloodshed and splattering innards.

text: there 's an energy to y tu mamá también .
translation: 「やつとお母さんも」という作品にはエネルギーがある。
back_translation: "The work 'Finally, Mother too' has energy."

text: the problem with the film is whether these ambitions , laudable in themselves , justify a theatrical simulation of the death camp of auschwitz ii-birkenau .
translation: この映画の問題は、これらの野望が自体として称賛に値するものであるかどうかが、アウシュビッツII-ビルケナウの死のキャンプを劇的に再現することを正当化するのかどうかである。
back_translation: The problem with this film is whether these ambitions are worthy of praise in themselves and whether that justifies the dramatic recreation of the death camp at Auschwitz II-Birkenau.

text: the whole mess boils down to a transparently hypocritical work that feels as though it 's trying to set the women 's liberation movement back 20 years . '
translation: その全ての混乱は、表面的に偽善的な作品に帰結しており、まるで女性解放運動を20年前に戻そうとしているかのように感じられます。
back_translation: All of that confusion seems to culminate in superficially hypocritical works, as if trying to turn back the women's liberation movement by twenty years.

text: not even steven spielberg has dreamed up such blatant and sickening product placement in a movie .
translation: スティーブン・スピルバーグでさえ、映画でこんなにも露骨で不快な商品プレースメントを思いつくことはありませんでした。
back_translation: Even Steven Spielberg never thought of such blatant and unpleasant product placement in movies.

text: miyazaki is one of world cinema 's most wondrously gifted artists and storytellers .
translation: 宮崎は世界の映画界で最も素晴らしい才能を持つアーティストであり、語り手の一人です。
back_translation: Miyazaki is one of the most talented artists in the world of cinema and a storyteller.

text: the paradiso 's rusted-out ruin and ultimate collapse during the film 's final -lrb- restored -rrb- third ... emotionally belittle a cinema classic .
translation: 映画の最後の（復元された）第3幕でのパラディーソの錆びた廃墟と究極の崩壊は、映画のクラシックを感情的に軽視することになる。
back_translation: The rusted ruins of Paradiso and the ultimate collapse in the restored third act at the end of the film emotionally trivialize the classic of the movie.

text: if you 're down for a silly hack-and-slash flick , you can do no wrong with jason x.
translation: もしバカげたハック・アンド・スラッシュ映画が好きなら、ジェイソンXを選んで間違いはありません。
back_translation: If you like ridiculous hack-and-slash movies, you can't go wrong with Jason X.

text: all in all , an interesting look at the life of the campaign-trail press , especially ones that do n't really care for the candidate they 're forced to follow .
translation: 全体として、候補者を追わざるを得ない中で、特に候補者にあまり関心を持たないキャンペーン・トレイル報道の生活についての興味深い見方です。
back_translation: Overall, this offers an interesting perspective on the life of campaign trail reporting, especially when candidates have to be pursued, particularly in a context where there is little interest in the candidates themselves.

text: in the not-too-distant future , movies like ghost ship will be used as analgesic balm for overstimulated minds .
translation: 近い将来、ゴーストシップのような映画は過剰に刺激された心を癒す鎮痛剤として使われることでしょう。
back_translation: In the near future, movies like Ghost Ship will be used as painkillers to soothe overly stimulated minds.

text: ryan gosling is , in a word , brilliant as the conflicted daniel .
translation: ライアン・ゴスリングは、言葉で言えば、葛藤するダニエルとして素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Ryan Gosling is fantastic as the conflicted Daniel, to put it in words.

text: i do n't think so .
translation: そうは思いません。
back_translation: I don't think so.

text: at best this is a film for the under-7 crowd .
translation: せいぜいこれは7歳未満の子供向けの映画です。
back_translation: This is at most a movie for children under the age of 7.

text: a fresh , entertaining comedy that looks at relationships minus traditional gender roles .
translation: 伝統的な性別役割を排除した関係を描いた、新鮮で面白いコメディ。
back_translation: A fresh and interesting comedy depicting a relationship that eliminates traditional gender roles.

text: poetry in motion captured on film .
translation: 動きの中の詩が映像で捉えられた。
back_translation: The poetry in motion has been captured in images.

text: parts of the film feel a bit too much like an infomercial for ram dass 's latest book aimed at the boomer demographic .
translation: 映画の一部は、ベビーブーム世代を対象としたラム・ダスの最新書籍のインフォマーシャルのように感じられる部分がある。
back_translation: Some parts of the movie feel like an infomercial for Ram Dass's latest book aimed at the baby boomer generation.

text: the script is a dim-witted pairing of teen-speak and animal gibberish .
translation: そのスクリプトは、ティーンの言葉と動物の意味不明な言葉との鈍感な組み合わせです。
back_translation: The script is a dull combination of teenage slang and incomprehensible words from animals.

text: almost peerlessly unsettling .
translation: ほとんど比類のない不安感。
back_translation: An almost unparalleled sense of anxiety.

text: despite auteuil 's performance , it 's a rather listless amble down the middle of the road , where the thematic ironies are too obvious and the sexual politics too smug .
translation: オテュイユの演技にもかかわらず、それはむしろ中道をゆっくりと歩く無気力な様子で、テーマのアイロニーがあまりにも明白で、性的政治があまりにも自負している。
back_translation: Despite Oteuil's performance, it rather slowly walks the middle path with a lethargic demeanor, the irony of the theme is too evident, and the sexual politics are overly self-important.

text: -lrb- ferrera -rrb- has the charisma of a young woman who knows how to hold the screen .
translation: フェレラは、画面を引きつける方法を知っている若い女性の魅力を持っています。
back_translation: Ferera has the charm of a young woman who knows how to captivate the screen.

text: a solid and refined piece of moviemaking imbued with passion and attitude .
translation: 情熱と態度に満ちた、堅実で洗練された映画制作の作品。
back_translation: A passionate and attitudinal work of solid and sophisticated film production.

text: flamboyant in some movies and artfully restrained in others , 65-year-old jack nicholson could be looking at his 12th oscar nomination by proving that he 's now , more than ever , choosing his roles with the precision of the insurance actuary .
translation: 映画では派手であり、他の作品では巧みに抑制されている65歳のジャック・ニコルソンは、今こそ保険のアクチュアリーのように役柄を選んでいることを証明することで、12回目のオスカー候補になる可能性があります。
back_translation: At 65, Jack Nicholson, who is flamboyant in movies and cleverly restrained in other works, may have a chance to become a 12-time Oscar nominee by proving that he now chooses roles like an insurance actuary.

text: while this one gets off with a good natured warning , future lizard endeavors will need to adhere more closely to the laws of laughter
translation: この一方は、好意的な警告で始まりますが、将来のトカゲの試みは笑いの法則にもっと厳密に従う必要があります。
back_translation: On the one hand, it starts with a friendly warning, but future attempts at lizards need to adhere more strictly to the laws of humor.

text: the hot topics of the plot are relegated to the background -- a welcome step forward from the sally jesse raphael atmosphere of films like philadelphia and american beauty .
translation: プロットのホットトピックは背景に退かされており、これは「フィラデルフィア」や「アメリカン・ビューティ」などのサリー・ジェシー・ラファエルの雰囲気からの歓迎すべき前進です。
back_translation: The hot topic of the plot is pushed to the background, which is a welcome advancement from the vibe of Sally Jesse Raphael's shows like "Philadelphia" and "American Beauty."

text: daughter from danang reveals that efforts toward closure only open new wounds .
translation: ダナンの娘は、閉塞感を解消しようとする努力が新たな傷を開くことになると明らかにした。
back_translation: The daughter from Da Nang revealed that her efforts to alleviate the sense of stagnation would only open new wounds.

text: if not a home run , then at least a solid base hit .
translation: ホームランではなくても、せめて確実なヒットを。
