back_translation: Even if it's not a home run, at least get a reliable hit.

text: it 's a fine , old-fashioned-movie movie , which is to say it 's unburdened by pretensions to great artistic significance .
translation: これは古き良き映画のようなものであり、つまりは偉大な芸術的意義に対するうぬぼれにとらわれていないということです。
back_translation: This is like an old good movie, which means that it is not caught up in the arrogance towards great artistic significance.

text: what it lacks in substance it makes up for in heart .
translation: 内容に欠けているものは、心で補う。
back_translation: What is lacking in content is to be complemented by the heart.

text: carrying off a spot-on scottish burr , duvall -lrb- also a producer -rrb- peels layers from this character that may well not have existed on paper .
translation: スコットランドの訛りを完璧に再現したデュヴァル（製作も手掛けている）は、このキャラクターが紙の上に存在しなかったかもしれない層を剥がしていく。
back_translation: Duval, who perfectly replicates the Scottish accent and is also involved in production, peels away the layers that suggest this character may not have existed on paper.

text: there are enough throwaway references to faith and rainbows to plant smile-button faces on that segment of the populace that made a walk to remember a niche hit .
translation: 信仰や虹に関する使い捨ての言及が十分にあるので、「あの人を忘れない」という映画をニッチなヒットにした人々の一部の心に微笑みボタンの顔を植え付けることができる。
back_translation: There are enough disposable references to faith and rainbows to plant a smiley face button in the hearts of some of the people who turned the movie "I Won't Forget That Person" into a niche hit.

text: suffice to say its total promise is left slightly unfulfilled .
translation: 言うまでもなく、その全体の約束はやや未完成のままです。
back_translation: Needless to say, the overall agreement is somewhat incomplete.

text: the picture 's fascinating byways are littered with trenchant satirical jabs at the peculiar egocentricities of the acting breed .
translation: その絵の魅力的な側道は、演技者の独特な自己中心的特性に対する鋭い風刺的な刺し傷で散らばっている。
back_translation: The captivating side of that painting is scattered with sharp satirical jabs at the performer's unique self-centered traits.

text: walter hill 's undisputed is like a 1940s warner bros. .
translation: ウォルター・ヒルの『アンディスプテッド』は1940年代のワーナー・ブラザーズのようです。
back_translation: Walter Hill's "Undisputed" resembles Warner Bros. from the 1940s.

text: parents beware ; this is downright movie penance .
translation: 親御さん注意；これはまさしく映画の贖罪です。
back_translation: Parents, please be advised; this is truly a cinematic atonement.

text: whatever satire lucky break was aiming for , it certainly got lost in the `` soon-to-be-forgettable '' section of the quirky rip-off prison romp pile .
translation: どんな風刺を狙っていたのかはともかく、それは確かに「すぐに忘れられる」セクションの個性的な盗作刑務所コメディの山の中で失われてしまった。
back_translation: Regardless of what kind of satire it was aiming for, it certainly got lost among the mound of quirky plagiarism prison comedies in the "quickly forgotten" section.

text: fred schepisi 's tale of four englishmen facing the prospect of their own mortality views youthful affluence not as a lost ideal but a starting point .
translation: フレッド・シェピシの作品「4人のイギリス人の物語」は、自己の死を見据える若者たちの裕福さを失われた理想ではなく、出発点として捉えている。
back_translation: The work "The Story of Four Englishmen" by Fred Shepehris sees the youth's loss of wealth not as a lost ideal, but as a starting point while facing their own mortality.

text: there 's no energy .
translation: エネルギーがありません。
back_translation: I don't have any energy.

text: starts off witty and sophisticated and you want to love it -- but filmmaker yvan attal quickly writes himself into a corner .
translation: 最初は機知に富んだ洗練された作品で、愛したくなるが、映画監督のイヴァン・アタールはすぐに自らを窮地に追い込んでしまう。
back_translation: At first, it's a witty and sophisticated work that makes you want to love it, but soon the filmmaker Ivan Attal finds himself in a predicament.

text: kosminsky ... puts enough salt into the wounds of the tortured and self-conscious material to make it sting .
translation: コスミンスキーは、苦しんで自己意識の強い素材に十分な塩を注ぎ込み、痛みを感じさせる。
back_translation: Kosminsky pours enough salt into the suffering, self-aware material, making it feel pain.

text: a well made indieflick in need of some trims and a more chemistry between its stars .
translation: よく作られたインディー映画ですが、もう少し編集が必要で、主演俳優たちの間にもっと化学反応が必要です。
back_translation: It's a well-made indie film, but it needs a bit more editing, and there should be more chemistry among the lead actors.

text: seems based on ugly ideas instead of ugly behavior , as happiness was ... hence , storytelling is far more appealing .
translation: 醜い行動ではなく醜いアイデアに基づいているようです。幸せは…そのため、物語を語ることははるかに魅力的です。
back_translation: It seems to be based on ugly ideas rather than ugly actions. Happiness... therefore, telling stories is far more appealing.

text: alternates between deadpan comedy and heartbreaking loneliness and is n't afraid to provoke introspection in both its characters and its audience .
translation: デッドパンコメディと心を痛める孤独の間を行き来し、登場人物と観客の両方に内省を促すことを恐れない。
back_translation: It navigates between deadpan comedy and heart-wrenching loneliness, unafraid to prompt introspection for both the characters and the audience.

text: true to its title , it traps audiences in a series of relentlessly nasty situations that we would pay a considerable ransom not to be looking at .
translation: タイトルに忠実に、それは観客を容赦なく悪質な状況の連続に閉じ込め、私たちが見ることを望まないためにかなりの身代金を払いたくなるような状況です。
back_translation: True to its title, it relentlessly traps the audience in a series of vicious situations that make us want to pay a considerable ransom to avoid seeing them.

text: with exquisite craftsmanship ... olivier assayas has fashioned an absorbing look at provincial bourgeois french society .
translation: 見事な職人技で、オリビエ・アサヤスは地方のブルジョワフランス社会を魅力的に描き出しています。
back_translation: With remarkable craftsmanship, Olivier Assayas vividly portrays the charm of the provincial bourgeois French society.

text: a hard look at one man 's occupational angst and its subsequent reinvention , a terrifying study of bourgeois desperation worthy of claude chabrol .
translation: 一人の男の職業的な苦悩とその後の再生を厳しく見つめる、クロード・シャブロルにふさわしいブルジョア階級の絶望に関する恐ろしい研究。
back_translation: A terrifying study on the despair of the bourgeoisie, fitting for Claude Chabrol, that closely examines a man's professional struggles and his subsequent rebirth.

text: the ethos of the chelsea hotel may shape hawke 's artistic aspirations , but he has n't yet coordinated his own dv poetry with the beat he hears in his soul .
translation: チェルシーホテルの精神はホークの芸術的な願望に影響を与えるかもしれませんが、彼はまだ自分自身のDV詩を彼の魂の中で聞くビートと調和させていません。
back_translation: The spirit of the Chelsea Hotel may influence Hawk's artistic ambitions, but he still hasn't harmonized his own DV poetry with the beats he hears within his soul.

text: grant is certainly amusing , but the very hollowness of the character he plays keeps him at arms length
translation: グラントは確かに面白いですが、彼が演じるキャラクターの非常に空虚さが彼を距離を置かせています。
back_translation: Grant is certainly interesting, but the very emptiness of the character he plays makes it hard for me to connect with him.

text: definitely in the guilty pleasure b-movie category , reign of fire is so incredibly inane that it is laughingly enjoyable .
translation: 明らかにギルティ・プレジャーなB級映画のカテゴリーに属する『レイン・オブ・ファイア』は、非常に馬鹿げていて、笑いながら楽しめる作品です。
back_translation: Clearly belonging to the category of guilty pleasure B-movies, "Reign of Fire" is a work that is extremely ridiculous and enjoyable while laughing.

text: it 's not just the vampires that are damned in queen of the damned -- the viewers will feel they suffer the same fate .
translation: 「呪われた女王」では、吸血鬼だけが呪われているわけではなく、視聴者も同じ運命を味わうことになるだろう。
back_translation: In "The Cursed Queen," it is not only the vampires who are cursed, but the viewers will also experience the same fate.

text: as simple and innocent a movie as you can imagine .
translation: 想像できる中で、非常にシンプルで無邪気な映画です。
back_translation: It's a very simple and innocent movie, as far as I can imagine.

text: extremely bad .
translation: 非常に悪い。
back_translation: Very bad.

text: although disney follows its standard formula in this animated adventure , it feels more forced than usual .
translation: 今回はディズニーが定番のフォーマットに従っているものの、このアニメーションアドベンチャーはいつもよりも強引に感じられます。
back_translation: This time, while Disney is following a standard format, this animated adventure feels more forceful than usual.

text: deserves a place of honor next to nanook as a landmark in film history .
translation: フィルム史のランドマークとしてナヌークの隣に名誉の場所に値する。
back_translation: It deserves an honorable place next to Nanook as a landmark in film history.

text: what 's missing in murder by numbers is any real psychological grounding for the teens ' deviant behaviour .
translation: 「マーダー・バイ・ナンバーズ」には、ティーンエイジャーの逸脱した行動に対する実際の心理的基盤が欠けている。
back_translation: "Murder by Numbers" lacks a real psychological basis for the deviant behavior of teenagers.

text: any attempts at nuance given by the capable cast is drowned out by director jon purdy 's sledgehammer sap .
translation: キャストの有能な演技による微妙な試みは、ジョン・パーディ監督の猛然たる演出によってかき消されてしまっています。
back_translation: The subtle attempts of the talented cast's performances are overshadowed by the fierce direction of director John Purdy.

text: it 's lost the politics and the social observation and become just another situation romance about a couple of saps stuck in an inarticulate screenplay .
translation: 政治と社会の観察が失われ、無口な脚本に困ったカップルのただの状況ロマンスになってしまった。
back_translation: The observation of politics and society was lost, resulting in a mere situational romance for a couple struggling with a silent script.

text: cut through the layers of soap-opera emotion and you find a scathing portrayal of a powerful entity strangling the life out of the people who want to believe in it the most .
translation: メロドラマ的な感情の層を切り抜けると、自らを信じたいと最も願う人々の命を絞めつける強力な存在の鋭い描写が見えてきます。
back_translation: By cutting through the melodramatic layers of emotion, a sharp depiction of a powerful presence that constricts the lives of those who most fervently wish to believe in themselves becomes visible.

text: it made me want to get made-up and go see this movie with my sisters .
translation: それを見たら、メイクをして姉妹と一緒にこの映画を見に行きたいと思った。
back_translation: When I saw that, I wanted to put on makeup and go see this movie with my sisters.

text: argento , at only 26 , brings a youthful , out-to-change-the-world aggressiveness to the project , as if she 's cut open a vein and bled the raw film stock .
translation: アルジェントはわずか26歳で、プロジェクトに対して世界を変えようとする若々しい攻撃性を持ちあわせているかのように、まるで自分の血管を切り開いて生のフィルムストックを流し込んだかのようです。
back_translation: At just 26 years old, Argento seems to possess a youthful aggression to change the world through his projects, as if he has cut open his veins to let raw film stock flow out.

text: as refreshing as a drink from a woodland stream .
translation: 森林の湧き水のように爽やか。
back_translation: Refreshing like a spring water in the forest.

text: ... a sweetly affecting story about four sisters who are coping , in one way or another , with life 's endgame .
translation: ...人生の終局に対処している4姉妹の心温まる感動的な物語。
back_translation: ...a heartwarming and moving story of four sisters dealing with the end of life.

text: beautifully directed and convincingly acted .
translation: 美しく演出され、説得力のある演技。
back_translation: Beautifully staged and compelling performance.

text: it is an unstinting look at a collaboration between damaged people that may or may not qual
translation: それは、傷ついた人々の間のコラボレーションについての惜しみない視点です。それは、資格があるかもしれないし、ないかもしれません。
back_translation: It is a generous perspective on collaboration among injured people. It may or may not be qualified.

text: ritchie 's film is easier to swallow than wertmuller 's polemical allegory , but it 's self-defeatingly decorous .
translation: リッチーの映画はヴェルトミュラーの論争的な寓話よりも受け入れやすいが、それは自己矛盾を抱えた上品さを持っている。
back_translation: Richie's film is more accessible than Wertmüller's controversial fable, but it possesses a subtle sophistication that is fraught with contradictions.

text: the charm of the first movie is still there , and the story feels like the logical , unforced continuation of the careers of a pair of spy kids .
translation: 最初の映画の魅力はまだ残っており、物語は一対のスパイキッズのキャリアの論理的で無理のない続きのように感じられます。
back_translation: The charm of the original movie still remains, and the story feels like a logical and natural continuation of the careers of the pair of Spy Kids.

text: purports to be a hollywood satire but winds up as the kind of film that should be the target of something deeper and more engaging .
translation: ハリウッドの風刺を意図しているが、結局はもっと深くて引き込まれるようなものをターゲットにすべき映画になってしまっている。
back_translation: It intends to be a satire of Hollywood, but in the end, it becomes a movie that should target something deeper and more engaging.

text: any enjoyment will be hinge from a personal threshold of watching sad but endearing characters do extremely unconventional things .
translation: どんな楽しみも、悲しげだけど愛らしいキャラクターが非常に独特なことをするのを観る個人的な閾値にかかっています。
back_translation: Any enjoyment lies in watching a sadly yet charming character do something very unique.

text: an undeniably gorgeous , terminally smitten document of a troubadour , his acolytes , and the triumph of his band .
translation: 否定できないほど美しい、終わりのない恋に落ちたトルバドゥールとその信者たち、そして彼のバンドの勝利を記録した文書。
back_translation: The undeniable beauty of the troubadour and his followers who have fallen into an endless love, and the documents that record the victory of his band.

text: halfway through the movie , the humor dwindles .
translation: 映画の途中で、ユーモアが減少します。
back_translation: The humor decreases during the movie.

text: the magic -lrb- and original running time -rrb- of ace japanimator hayao miyazaki 's spirited away survives intact in bv 's re-voiced version .
translation: 魔法（そして元の上映時間）であるスタジオジブリの日本アニメーター宮崎駿の「千と千尋の神隠し」は、BVの再音声版でそのまま生き残っています。
back_translation: The magical (and original runtime) work of Studio Ghibli's Japanese animator Hayao Miyazaki, "Spirited Away," has survived in its re-voiced version by BV.

text: michael moore has perfected the art of highly entertaining , self-aggrandizing , politically motivated documentary-making , and he 's got as potent a topic as ever here .
translation: マイケル・ムーアは、非常に楽しませる自己陶酔的で政治的な動機のドキュメンタリー制作の技術を磨いてきました。そして、今回はこれまでにないほど強力なテーマを扱っています。
back_translation: Michael Moore has honed his craft in creating self-indulgent, politically motivated documentaries that are highly entertaining. This time, he tackles a theme that is more powerful than ever before.

text: frei assembles a fascinating profile of a deeply humanistic artist who , in spite of all that he 's witnessed , remains surprisingly idealistic , and retains an extraordinary faith in the ability of images to communicate the truth of the world around him .
translation: フライは、彼が目にしたすべてにもかかわらず、驚くほど理想主義的であり、周囲の世界の真実を伝える画像の能力に対する並外れた信念を持ち続ける、深く人間的なアーティストの魅力的なプロフィールをまとめています。
back_translation: The profile captures the compelling essence of Fly as a deeply human artist, remarkably idealistic despite all he has witnessed, maintaining an extraordinary belief in the power of images to convey the truths of the surrounding world.

text: predictable and cloying , though brown sugar is so earnest in its yearning for the days before rap went nihilistic that it summons more spirit and bite than your average formulaic romantic quadrangle .
translation: 予測可能で甘ったるいが、ブラウンシュガーはラップがニヒリスティックになる前の日々を切実に求めているため、平均的な型にはまったロマンチックな四角関係よりも、もっと強い精神と切なさを呼び起こしている。
back_translation: Predictable and sweet, but brown sugar yearns desperately for the days before rap became nihilistic, evoking a stronger spirit and poignancy than the average clichéd romantic love triangle.

text: sadly , though many of the actors throw off a spark or two when they first appear , they ca n't generate enough heat in this cold vacuum of a comedy to start a reaction .
translation: 残念ながら、多くの俳優が最初に登場したときに一瞬の火花を散らすものの、この冷たい空虚なコメディでは反応を引き起こすほどの熱を生み出すことはできません。
back_translation: Unfortunately, while many actors may spark a moment of excitement when they first appear, they fail to generate enough heat to provoke a reaction in this cold, empty comedy.

text: such a bad movie that its luckiest viewers will be seated next to one of those ignorant pinheads who talk throughout the show .
translation: そんなに悪い映画で、最も運の良い観客は、上映中ずっと話をする無知なバカの隣に座っていることになります。
back_translation: In such a bad movie, the unluckiest audience member will be sitting next to a ignorant fool who talks throughout the entire screening.

text: a modest masterpiece .
translation: 控えめな傑作。
back_translation: A modest masterpiece.

text: neil burger here succeeded in ... making the mystery of four decades back the springboard for a more immediate mystery in the present .
translation: ニール・バーガーは、40年前の謎を現在のもっと直接的な謎の足がかりにすることに成功しました。
back_translation: Neil Burger has succeeded in using a mystery from 40 years ago as a stepping stone to a more direct mystery in the present.

text: and thanks to kline 's superbly nuanced performance , that pondering is highly pleasurable .
translation: そして、クラインの非常に微妙な演技のおかげで、その思索は非常に心地よいものです。
back_translation: And thanks to Klein's very subtle performance, that reflection is very pleasant.

text: it 's still a comic book , but maguire makes it a comic book with soul .
translation: まだ漫画ですが、マグワイアはそれに魂を持った漫画にしています。
back_translation: It's still a comic, but Maguire has turned it into a comic with soul.

text: shiri is an action film that delivers on the promise of excitement , but it also has a strong dramatic and emotional pull that gradually sneaks up on the audience .
translation: シリは興奮を約束するアクション映画でありながら、観客に徐々に迫る強いドラマと感情の引力も備えています。
back_translation: Siri is an action film that promises excitement, but it also possesses a strong drama and emotional pull that gradually draws in the audience.

text: seems content to dog-paddle in the mediocre end of the pool , and it 's a sad , sick sight .
translation: 平凡なプールの端で犬掻きすることに満足しているようで、それは悲しくて病的な光景です。
back_translation: It seems satisfied just dog-paddling at the edge of a mundane pool, which is a sad and pathological sight.

text: takes a fresh and absorbing look at a figure whose legacy had begun to bronze .
translation: 新たで魅力的な視点から、その遺産が青銅化し始めている人物に焦点を当てています。
back_translation: It focuses on individuals whose legacy is beginning to be bronze-like, from a new and captivating perspective.

text: but it does n't leave you with much .
translation: しかし、それはあまり多くを残しません。
back_translation: However, it doesn't leave much behind.

text: the trick when watching godard is to catch the pitch of his poetics , savor the pleasure of his sounds and images , and ponder the historical , philosophical , and ethical issues that intersect with them .
translation: ゴダールを観る際のコツは、彼の詩学の音調を捉え、その音やイメージの喜びを味わい、それらと交差する歴史的、哲学的、倫理的な問題について考えることです。
back_translation: A tip for watching Godard is to capture the tone of his poetics, relish in the joy of sound and imagery, and contemplate the historical, philosophical, and ethical issues that intersect with them.

text: broomfield has a rather unique approach to documentary .
translation: ブルームフィールドはドキュメンタリーに対して非常に独特なアプローチを持っています。
back_translation: Bloomfield has a very unique approach to documentaries.

text: as the mediterranean sparkles , ` swept away ' sinks .
translation: 地中海がきらめく中、「消え去った」が沈んでいく。
back_translation: As the Mediterranean sparkles, the "vanished" is sinking.

text: two-bit potboiler .
translation: つまらない作品
back_translation: Boring work.

text: a poignant and gently humorous parable that loves its characters and communicates something rather beautiful about human nature .
translation: キャラクターを愛し、人間の本性について非常に美しい何かを伝える、感動的で穏やかにユーモラスな寓話。
back_translation: A touching and gently humorous fable that conveys something very beautiful about human nature through a love for its characters.

text: a smart , provocative drama that does the nearly impossible : it gets under the skin of a man we only know as an evil , monstrous lunatic .
translation: 賢く挑発的なドラマで、ほぼ不可能なことを成し遂げる：我々がただの悪で鬼畜な狂人としてしか知らない男の心の深くに迫る。
back_translation: A clever and provocative drama that achieves the nearly impossible: it delves deep into the heart of a man we only know as pure evil and a monstrous madman.

text: at once overly old-fashioned in its sudsy plotting and heavy-handed in its effort to modernize it with encomia to diversity and tolerance .
translation: 一度に古臭すぎる泡立ったプロットと、多様性と寛容への賛辞でそれを現代化しようとする手法が過剰すぎる。
back_translation: The overly outdated, bubbling plot attempts to modernize itself with excessive methods that pay tribute to diversity and tolerance.

text: it 's just rather leaden and dull .
translation: ただ単に鈍くて退屈です。
back_translation: It's just dull and boring.

text: problem is , we have no idea what in creation is going on .
translation: 問題は、私たちは一体何が起こっているのかわからないということです。
back_translation: The problem is that we have no idea what is happening.

text: the movie is a mess from start to finish .
translation: 映画は始まりから終わりまでめちゃくちゃです。
back_translation: The movie is a mess from beginning to end.

text: its rawness and vitality give it considerable punch .
translation: その生々しさと活力は、 considerable punch を持たせています。
back_translation: The rawness and vitality give it a considerable punch.

text: one of the best inside-show-biz yarns ever .
translation: ショービジネスの裏話の中で最高の物語の一つ。
back_translation: One of the best stories behind the scenes of show business.

text: but the feelings evoked in the film are lukewarm and quick to pass .
translation: しかし、映画で引き起こされる感情は生ぬるく、すぐに消えてしまう。
back_translation: However, the emotions evoked by movies are lukewarm and quickly fade away.

text: a burst of color , music , and dance that only the most practiced curmudgeon could fail to crack a smile at .
translation: 色と音楽、ダンスの鮮やかな洪水で、最も頑固な人さえも微笑まずにはいられない。
back_translation: With a vibrant flood of colors, music, and dance, even the most stubborn person cannot help but smile.

text: the best animated feature to hit theaters since beauty and the beast 11 years ago .
translation: 『美女と野獣』以来、11年ぶりに劇場に登場した最高のアニメーション映画。
back_translation: The best animated film to hit theaters in 11 years since "Beauty and the Beast."

text: the only camouflage carvey should now be considering is a paper bag to wear over his head when he goes out into public , to avoid being recognized as the man who bilked unsuspecting moviegoers .
translation: カモフラージュとしてカーヴィーが今考えるべき唯一の方法は、外出時に頭にかぶる紙袋です。無防備な映画観客をだました男として認識されないようにするためです。
back_translation: The only method that Curvy should consider as a camouflage right now is a paper bag to wear on his head when going out. This is to avoid being recognized as the man who deceived defenseless moviegoers.

text: scarcely worth a mention apart from reporting on the number of tumbleweeds blowing through the empty theatres graced with its company .
translation: その存在について言及する価値もほとんどなく、空の劇場を吹き抜ける風に乗って舞う枯れ草の数を報告することを除いて。
back_translation: There is almost no worth in mentioning its existence, except to report the number of dried grasses dancing on the wind that sweeps through the empty theater.

text: a beautifully observed character piece .
translation: 美しく観察されたキャラクター作品。
back_translation: Beautifully observed character artwork.

text: compared to his series of spectacular belly flops both on and off the screen , runteldat is something of a triumph .
translation: 彼のスクリーン内外での見事な腹打ちの数々と比べると、ランテルダットは一種の勝利と言える。
back_translation: Compared to his impressive gut punches both on and off the screen, Lanteldat can be considered a sort of victory.

text: as plain and pedestrian as catsup --
translation: ケチャップのように平凡で普通の
back_translation: Ordinary and commonplace like ketchup.

text: some people march to the beat of a different drum , and if you ever wondered what kind of houses those people live in , this documentary takes a look at 5 alternative housing options .
translation: ある人々は異なるリズムで行進し、そうした人々がどのような家に住んでいるのか疑問に思ったことがあるなら、このドキュメンタリーは5つの代替住宅オプションを紹介します。
back_translation: If you have ever wondered what kind of homes people who march to different rhythms live in, this documentary introduces five alternative housing options.

text: that jack nicholson makes this man so watchable is a tribute not only to his craft , but to his legend .
translation: ジャック・ニコルソンがこの男をこれほど魅力的にするのは、彼の技術だけでなく、彼の伝説に対する賛辞でもある。
back_translation: Jack Nicholson's ability to make this man so charming is not only due to his skills but also a tribute to his legend.

text: with each of her three protagonists , miller eloquently captures the moment when a woman 's life , out of a deep-seated , emotional need , is about to turn onto a different path .
translation: ミラーは彼女の三人の主人公それぞれとの関係において、深い感情的な必要から、女性の人生が異なる道に進もうとする瞬間を雄弁に捉えています。
back_translation: Mira eloquently captures the moments when a woman's life diverges into different paths due to deep emotional needs in her relationships with each of her three protagonists.

text: a college story that works even without vulgarity , sex scenes , and cussing !
translation: 下品な表現やセックスシーン、罵りなくても成り立つ大学の物語！
back_translation: A university story that stands on its own without vulgar expressions, sex scenes, or insults!

text: a loquacious and dreary piece of business .
translation: お喋りで陰鬱な商売の一環。
back_translation: A part of a chatty and gloomy business.

text: behan 's memoir is great material for a film -- rowdy , brawny and lyrical in the best irish sense -- but sheridan has settled for a lugubrious romance .
translation: ビーハンの回想録は映画に最適な素材であり、騒々しく、力強く、そして最高のアイリッシュな意味で詩的ですが、シェリダンは陰鬱なロマンスに落ち着いてしまいました。
back_translation: The memoirs of Behan are perfect material for a movie; they are noisy, powerful, and poetically Irish in the best sense, but Sheridan has settled for a gloomy romance.

text: a rather tired exercise in nostalgia .
translation: やや疲れたノスタルジーの行為。
back_translation: A somewhat tired act of nostalgia.

text: ` linklater fans , or pretentious types who want to appear avant-garde will suck up to this project ... '
translation: 「リンクレーターのファンや、前衛的に見られたがる気取り屋は、このプロジェクトに取り入ろうとするだろう...」
back_translation: "Fans of link creators and those who like to be seen as avant-garde will likely try to get involved in this project..."

text: there 's little to recommend snow dogs , unless one considers cliched dialogue and perverse escapism a source of high hilarity .
translation: 「スノー・ドッグ」は、クリシェの台詞や歪んだ escapism を高い笑いの源と考えない限り、おすすめする点はほとんどありません。
back_translation: Unless you consider clichés and distorted escapism as a significant source of humor, there are hardly any points to recommend "Snow Dogs."

text: one lousy movie .
translation: 一つのひどい映画。
back_translation: A terrible movie.

text: it 's such a mechanical endeavor -lrb- that -rrb- it never bothers to question why somebody might devote time to see it .
translation: それは非常に機械的な試みであり、誰かがそれを見るために時間を費やす理由を問いかけることさえしません。
back_translation: It is a very mechanical attempt, and it doesn’t even question the reason why someone would spend time looking at it.

text: a blair witch - style adventure that plays like a bad soap opera , with passable performances from everyone in the cast .
translation: ブレアウィッチスタイルの冒険で、悪いソープオペラのように進行し、キャスト全員のパフォーマンスは並の出来です。
back_translation: In a Blair Witch-style adventure, it unfolds like a bad soap opera, and the performances of the entire cast are average.

text: until its final minutes this is a perceptive study of two families in crisis -- and of two girls whose friendship is severely tested by bad luck and their own immaturity .
translation: 最後の瞬間まで、これは危機にある二つの家族と、不運や自らの未熟さによって友情が厳しく試される二人の少女についての洞察に満ちた研究です。
back_translation: Until the last moment, this is an insightful study about two families in crisis and the friendship of two girls that is severely tested by misfortune and their own immaturity.

text: abandon spends 90 minutes trying figure out whether or not some cocky pseudo-intellectual kid has intentionally left college or was killed .
translation: アバンダンは、ちょっと生意気な擬似知識人の子供が意図的に大学を辞めたのか、殺されたのかを判断するために90分を費やします。
back_translation: Abandon spends 90 minutes trying to determine whether a slightly cheeky pseudo-intellectual child intentionally dropped out of university or was killed.

text: needs more impressionistic cinematography and exhilarating point-of-view shots and fewer slow-motion ` grandeur ' shots and quick-cut edits that often detract from the athleticism .
translation: もっと印象派的な cinematography と興奮をもたらす視点ショットが必要で、スローモーションの「壮大な」ショットや、アスレチックな要素を削ぐことの多いクイックカット編集は少なくするべきです。
back_translation: We need more impressionistic cinematography and perspective shots that evoke excitement, and we should reduce slow-motion "epic" shots and quick-cut editing that often detracts from the athletic elements.

text: with the prospect of films like kangaroo jack about to burst across america 's winter movie screens it 's a pleasure to have a film like the hours as an alternative .
translation: カンガルー・ジャックのような映画がアメリカの冬の映画スクリーンに登場しようとしている中、代わりに「アワーズ」のような映画があるのは嬉しいことです。
back_translation: It's nice to have movies like "Hours" instead, as films like Kangaroo Jack are about to hit the American winter movie screens.

text: where this was lazy but enjoyable , a formula comedy redeemed by its stars , that is even lazier and far less enjoyable .
translation: これは怠惰だが楽しいもので、星たちによって救われたフォーミュラコメディですが、さらに怠惰でずっと楽しめません。
back_translation: This is a lazy yet enjoyable formula comedy saved by the stars, but even lazier and not as enjoyable.

text: a highly watchable , giggly little story with a sweet edge to it .
translation: 非常に視覚的に魅力的で、むずっと笑える小さな物語で、甘さのあるエッジがあります。
back_translation: A very visually appealing and quite funny little story that has a sweet edge to it.

text: skillfully weaves both the elements of the plot and a powerfully evocative mood combining heated sexuality with a haunting sense of malaise .
translation: 巧みにプロットの要素と強く心に訴えるムードを織り交ぜ、熱い性的魅力と不気味な気怠さを組み合わせています。
back_translation: Skillfully intertwining elements of the plot with a strongly evocative mood, it combines intense sexual allure with an eerie languor.

text: -lrb- soderbergh -rrb- tends to place most of the psychological and philosophical material in italics rather than trust an audience 's intelligence , and he creates an overall sense of brusqueness .
translation: -（ソーダーバーグ）は、観客の知性を信用するのではなく、心理的および哲学的な素材のほとんどをイタリック体に置く傾向があり、全体的に急ぎ足の感覚を生み出しています。
back_translation: - The "Soderbergh" tends to place most of the psychological and philosophical material in italics, rather than trusting the intellect of the audience, creating an overall sense of urgency.

text: writer-director juan carlos fresnadillo makes a feature debut that is fully formed and remarkably assured .
translation: 作家兼監督のフアン・カルロス・フレスナディージョは、完全に形成され、非常に自信に満ちた劇場映画デビューを果たしました。
back_translation: Writer and director Juan Carlos Fresnadillo made a fully formed and highly confident theatrical film debut.

text: the kind of film that leaves you scratching your head in amazement over the fact that so many talented people could participate in such an ill-advised and poorly executed idea .
translation: そんな不適切でうまくいっていないアイデアに、これほど多くの才能ある人々が参加できるとは驚きを禁じ得ないような映画。
back_translation: It is a movie that is astonishing how so many talented people could be involved in such an inappropriate and unsuccessful idea.

text: each story is built on a potentially interesting idea , but the first two are ruined by amateurish writing and acting , while the third feels limited by its short running time .
translation: 各ストーリーは潜在的に興味深いアイデアに基づいていますが、最初の二つは素人のような執筆と演技によって台無しになっており、三つ目は短い実行時間によって制限されていると感じます。
back_translation: Each story is based on potentially interesting ideas, but the first two are ruined by amateurish writing and acting, while the third feels constrained by a short runtime.

text: sweetly sexy , funny and touching .
translation: 甘くセクシーで、面白くて、感動的。
back_translation: Sweet, sexy, funny, and moving.

text: like all of egoyan 's work , ararat is fiercely intelligent and uncommonly ambitious .
translation: エゴヤンの作品と同様に、『アララト』は非常に知的で並外れた野心を持っています。
back_translation: Like Egoyan's works, "Ararat" is highly intellectual and extraordinarily ambitious.

text: even if invincible is not quite the career peak that the pianist is for roman polanski , it demonstrates that werner herzog can still leave us with a sense of wonder at the diverse , marvelously twisted shapes history has taken .
translation: 「インヴィンシブル」はロマン・ポランスキーの「ピアニスト」ほどのキャリアのピークではないにしても、ヴェルナー・ヘルツォークが歴史が取ってきた多様で素晴らしくひねりの効いた形に対する驚きを私たちに与えてくれることを示しています。
back_translation: "Invincible" may not be at the peak of Roman Polanski's "The Pianist," but it shows us how Werner Herzog presents the surprises of the diverse and wonderfully twisted forms that history has taken.

text: the film is really closer to porn than a serious critique of what 's wrong with this increasingly pervasive aspect of gay culture .
translation: この映画は、ますます広がるゲイ文化の問題点を真剣に批評するよりも、実際にはポルノに近いものです。
back_translation: This movie is actually closer to pornography than seriously critiquing the issues of the increasingly expanding gay culture.

text: this is a movie that starts out like heathers , then becomes bring it on , then becomes unwatchable .
translation: これはヘザースのように始まり、次にブリング・イット・オンのようになり、最後には見るに耐えない映画です。
back_translation: It starts like Heather's, then becomes like Bring It On, and finally ends up being an unbearable movie.

text: it 's a cool event for the whole family .
translation: 家族全員で楽しめる素晴らしいイベントです。
back_translation: It is a wonderful event that the whole family can enjoy.

text: time literally stops on a dime in the tries-so-hard-to-be-cool `` clockstoppers , '' but that does n't mean it still wo n't feel like the longest 90 minutes of your movie-going life .
translation: 時間は「クロックストッパーズ」でクールになろうと頑張っている瞬間に文字通り止まりますが、それでもあなたの映画鑑賞人生で最も長い90分のように感じないわけではありません。
back_translation: Time literally stops during the moment you try to be cool in "Clockstoppers," but it still doesn’t feel like the longest 90 minutes of your movie-watching life.

text: a beautiful , entertaining two hours .
translation: 美しく、楽しませてくれる二時間。
back_translation: Two hours that are beautiful and entertaining.

text: though it pretends to expose the life of male hustlers , it 's exploitive without being insightful .
translation: 男性のハスラーの生活を暴露しているかのように見せかけているが、洞察力がなく搾取的である。
back_translation: It pretends to expose the life of a male hustler, but is lacking in insight and exploitative.

text: too long , and larded with exposition , this somber cop drama ultimately feels as flat as the scruffy sands of its titular community .
translation: 長すぎて、説明が多すぎるこの陰鬱な刑事ドラマは、結局そのタイトルにあるコミュニティの粗い砂浜のように平坦に感じられる。
back_translation: This grim detective drama, with its excessive length and numerous explanations, ultimately feels as flat as the rough sandy beach of the community mentioned in its title.

text: another love story in 2002 's remarkable procession of sweeping pictures that have reinvigorated the romance genre .
translation: 2002年の優れた映像の流れの中で、恋愛ジャンルに新たな息吹を与えた別のラブストーリー。
back_translation: In the excellent flow of visuals in 2002, another love story that breathed new life into the romance genre.

text: the chateau belongs to rudd , whose portrait of a therapy-dependent flakeball spouting french malapropisms ... is a nonstop hoot .
translation: その城はラッドに属しており、彼のセラピー依存のフレイクボールがフランス語の誤用を口にする肖像画は... 絶え間ない笑いの源です。
back_translation: The castle belongs to Rad, and the portrait of his therapy-dependent flake ball uttering a misused French phrase is... a constant source of laughter.

text: the story ... is inspiring , ironic , and revelatory of just how ridiculous and money-oriented the record industry really is .
translation: その物語は…刺激的で皮肉なものであり、レコード業界がいかに馬鹿げていて金に偏っているかを明らかにしています。
back_translation: The story is... exciting and ironic, revealing how ridiculous and money-driven the record industry is.

text: love may have been in the air onscreen , but i certainly was n't feeling any of it .
translation: 画面上では愛が漂っていたかもしれませんが、私はそれを全く感じていませんでした。
back_translation: There may have been love floating on the screen, but I didn't feel it at all.

text: this director 's cut -- which adds 51 minutes -- takes a great film and turns it into a mundane soap opera .
translation: この監督版は51分の追加があり、素晴らしい映画をありふれたソープオペラに変えてしまいます。
back_translation: This director's cut adds 51 minutes and turns a wonderful movie into an ordinary soap opera.

text: `` the dangerous lives of altar boys '' has flaws , but it also has humor and heart and very talented young actors
translation: 「祭壇の少年たちの危険な生活」には欠点がありますが、ユーモアと心があり、とても才能のある若い俳優たちがいます。
back_translation: "The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys" has its flaws, but it is filled with humor and heart, featuring very talented young actors.

text: movies like high crimes flog the dead horse of surprise as if it were an obligation .
translation: 『ハイ・クライムズ』のような映画は、驚きを義務のようにして死んだ馬を打ちのめしている。
back_translation: Movies like "High Crimes" are beating a dead horse by treating surprises as an obligation.

text: an amusing and unexpectedly insightful examination of sexual jealousy , resentment and the fine line between passion and pretence .
translation: 性的嫉妬、恨み、情熱と見せかけの微妙な境界についての面白く、予想外に洞察に満ちた考察。
back_translation: An interesting and unexpectedly insightful exploration of the subtle boundary between sexual jealousy, resentment, and passion.

text: producer john penotti surveyed high school students ... and came back with the astonishing revelation that `` they wanted to see something that did n't talk down to them . ''
translation: プロデューサーのジョン・ペノッティは高校生を調査し、彼らが「自分たちを見下すようなものは見たくない」と驚くべき洞察を持ち帰った。
back_translation: Producer John Penotti conducted a survey among high school students and brought back an astonishing insight: they "do not want to see anything that looks down on them."

text: it 's just a movie that happens to have jackie chan in it .
translation: ただジャッキー・チェンが出ている映画です。
back_translation: It's just a movie that Jackie Chan is in.

text: what redeems the film is the cast , particularly the ya-yas themselves .
translation: 映画を救うのはキャストであり、特にヤヤたち自身です。
back_translation: The ones who save the movie are the cast, especially Yay and the others themselves.

text: but what 's nice is that there 's a casual intelligence that permeates the script .
translation: しかし、素晴らしいのは、脚本に遍在するカジュアルな知性です。
back_translation: However, what is wonderful is the pervasive casual intelligence in the script.

text: adam sandler 's 8 crazy nights is 75 wasted minutes of sandler as the voice-over hero in columbia pictures ' perverse idea of an animated holiday movie .
translation: アダム・サンドラーの「8つのクレイジーナイト」は、コロンビア映画のひねくれたアイデアのアニメーションホリデー映画において、声優ヒーローとしてのサンドラーの75分が無駄にされた時間です。
back_translation: Adam Sandler's "Eight Crazy Nights" is a waste of 75 minutes of Sandler's time as a voice acting hero in a twisted idea of an animated holiday film by Columbia Pictures.

text: a mess .
translation: めちゃくちゃ。
back_translation: Chaotic.

text: the filmmakers wisely decided to let crocodile hunter steve irwin do what he does best , and fashion a story around him .
translation: 映画製作者たちは、クロコダイルハンターのスティーブ・アーウィンが得意とすることをさせ、彼を中心にストーリーを構築することを賢明に決定しました。
back_translation: The filmmakers wisely decided to have Steve Irwin, the Crocodile Hunter, do what he excels at and build the story around him.

text: so purely enjoyable that you might not even notice it 's a fairly straightforward remake of hollywood comedies such as father of the bride .
translation: それは非常に楽しいので、ハリウッドのコメディ映画「花婿の父」のかなりストレートなリメイクであることに気づかないかもしれません。
back_translation: It is so much fun that you might not realize it is a fairly straightforward remake of the Hollywood comedy film "Father of the Bride."

text: talk to her is so darned assured , we have absolutely no idea who the main characters are until the film is well under way -- and yet it 's hard to stop watching .
translation: 「彼女に話しかける」はとても確信に満ちていて、映画が進むまで主なキャラクターが誰なのかわからないのに、それでも見るのを止めるのが難しい。
back_translation: "Talking to her" is very confident, and even though you don't know who the main character is until the movie progresses, it’s still hard to stop watching.

text: a genuinely funny ensemble comedy that also asks its audience -- in a heartwarming , nonjudgmental kind of way -- to consider what we value in our daily lives .
translation: 心温まる非判断的な方法で、私たちが日常生活で何を大切にしているかを考えさせる、真に面白いアンサンブルコメディ。
back_translation: A truly interesting ensemble comedy that makes us reflect on what we value in our daily lives in a warm-hearted, non-judgmental way.

text: after seeing ` analyze that , ' i feel better already .
translation: 「それを見た後、私はもう気分が良くなりました。」
back_translation: "After seeing that, I already felt better."

text: mazel tov to a film about a family 's joyous life acting on the yiddish stage .
translation: イディッシュ舞台での家族の喜びに満ちた生活を描いた映画に、マゼル・トヴ。
back_translation: A film that depicts a joyful family life on the Yiddish stage, titled "Mazl Tov."

text: the characters are never more than sketches ... which leaves any true emotional connection or identification frustratingly out of reach .
translation: キャラクターは決してスケッチ以上のものではなく、本当の感情的なつながりや同一化は frustrate されて手の届かないところに残ります。
back_translation: Characters are never more than sketches, and true emotional connection and identification remain frustrated and out of reach.

text: reign of fire just might go down as one of the all-time great apocalypse movies .
translation: 「レイン・オブ・ファイア」は、史上最高のアポカリプス映画の一つとして語り継がれるかもしれません。
back_translation: "Reign of Fire" may be remembered as one of the greatest apocalypse movies in history.

text: though few will argue that it ranks with the best of herzog 's works , invincible shows he 's back in form , with an astoundingly rich film .
translation: 多くの人がヘルツォークの作品の中で最高のものと並ぶとは主張しないだろうが、『インヴィンシブル』は彼が再び最高の状態に戻ったことを示しており、驚くほど豊かな映画である。
back_translation: While many may not claim that "Invincible" ranks among Herzog's best works, it shows that he has returned to his finest form and is an incredibly rich film.

text: monte cristo smartly emphasizes the well-wrought story and omits needless chase scenes and swordfights as the revenge unfolds .
translation: モンテ・クリストは、巧妙に練られたストーリーを強調し、復讐が展開される中で無駄な追跡シーンや剣戟を省いています。
back_translation: The Count of Monte Cristo emphasizes a cleverly crafted story, omitting unnecessary chase scenes and sword fights as the revenge unfolds.

text: it shows us a slice of life that 's very different from our own and yet instantly recognizable .
translation: それは私たちの生活とは非常に異なる一面を示しながらも、瞬時に認識できるものです。
back_translation: It shows an aspect that is very different from our lives, yet can be recognized instantly.

text: interesting both as a historical study and as a tragic love story .
translation: 歴史的な研究としても、悲劇的なラブストーリーとしても興味深い。
back_translation: It is fascinating both as a historical study and as a tragic love story.

text: what we have here is n't a disaster , exactly , but a very handsomely produced let-down .

text: there 's a reason the studio did n't offer an advance screening .

text: there is a certain sense of experimentation and improvisation to this film that may not always work , but it is nevertheless compelling .

text: though it 's equally solipsistic in tone , the movie has enough vitality to justify the notion of creating a screen adaptation of evans ' saga of hollywood excess .
translation: そのトーンは同様に自己中心的ではあるが、映画はエヴァンズのハリウッドの過剰の物語をスクリーンに適応させるという考えを正当化するのに十分な活力を持っている。

text: one of the worst films of 2002 .
translation: 2002年の最悪の映画の一つ。

text: lazy , miserable and smug .
translation: 怠惰で、不幸で、自己満足な。

text: -lrb- t -rrb- he script is n't up to the level of the direction , nor are the uneven performances by the cast members , who seem bound and determined to duplicate bela lugosi 's now-cliched vampire accent .
translation: 脚本は演出のレベルに達しておらず、キャストのメンバーの不均一な演技も同様です。彼らは、ベラ・ルゴシの今ではクリシェとなったバンパイアのアクセントを再現しようと必死になっているようです。
back_translation: The script does not reach the level of direction, and the uneven performances of the cast members are similar. They seem to be desperately trying to reproduce Bela Lugosi's now-clichéd vampire accent.

text: often demented in a good way , but it is an uneven film for the most part .
translation: 良い意味でしばしば狂気じみているが、全体的には不均一な映画である。

text: an animation landmark as monumental as disney 's 1937 breakthrough snow white and the seven dwarfs .
translation: ディズニーの1937年の画期的な「白雪姫と七人の小人」と同じくらい重要なアニメーションのランドマーク。

text: this thing is just garbage .
translation: これはただのゴミです。

text: `` the road paved with good intentions leads to the video store ''
translation: 「善意で舗装された道はビデオストアに通じる」

text: still , this flick is fun , and host to some truly excellent sequences .

text: a disoriented but occasionally disarming saga packed with moments out of an alice in wonderland adventure , a stalker thriller , and a condensed season of tv 's big brother .

translation: 彼の映画の世界のように、ハートリーは怪物を創り出したが、それをどう扱うべきかわからなかった。
back_translation: Like in his movie world, Hartley created monsters, but he didn't know how to handle them.

text: what 's surprising is how well it holds up in an era in which computer-generated images are the norm .
translation: 驚くべきことは、コンピュータ生成画像が常態化している時代において、それがどれほどよく保たれているかということです。

text: it 's a clear-eyed portrait of an intensely lived time , filled with nervous energy , moral ambiguity and great uncertainties .
translation: それは、神経的なエネルギー、道徳的曖昧さ、そして大きな不確実性に満ちた、強く生きられた時代の明晰な肖像です。

text: the extent to which it succeeds is impressive .
translation: それが成功する程度は印象的です。

text: proves a servicable world war ii drama that ca n't totally hide its contrivances , but it at least calls attention to a problem hollywood too long has ignored .
translation: サービス可能な第二次世界大戦ドラマを証明しているが、その仕組みを完全に隠すことはできない。しかし、それは少なくともハリウッドが長い間無視してきた問題に注意を喚起している。
back_translation: It proves the serviceable nature of World War II dramas, but it cannot completely hide the mechanics behind it. However, it at least draws attention to an issue that Hollywood has long ignored.

text: a fascinating , bombshell documentary that should shame americans , regardless of whether or not ultimate blame finally lies with kissinger .
translation: アメリカ人を恥じ入らせるべき、魅力的で衝撃的なドキュメンタリー。結局のところ、最終的な責任がキッシンジャーにあるかどうかに関わらず。
back_translation: A captivating and shocking documentary that should embarrass Americans. After all, regardless of whether Kissinger bears ultimate responsibility.

text: never inspires more than an interested detachment .
translation: 決して興味のある距離感以上の感動を与えない。

text: a sharp and quick documentary that is funny and pithy , while illuminating an era of theatrical comedy that , while past , really is n't .
translation: 鋭くて迅速なドキュメンタリーで、面白くて簡潔でありながら、過去の劇場コメディの時代を照らし出しており、過去のものではないことが本当にわかります。
back_translation: It is a sharp and swift documentary, interesting and concise, yet it illuminates the era of past theatrical comedies, making it clear that it is not a thing of the past.

text: this is a smart movie that knows its classical music , knows its freud and knows its sade .
translation: これはクラシック音楽、フロイト、そしてシャーデーを知っている賢い映画です。

text: instead of trying to bust some blondes , -lrb- diggs -rrb- should be probing why a guy with his talent ended up in a movie this bad .

text: delivers roughly equal amounts of beautiful movement and inside information .
translation: 美しい動きと内部情報をほぼ同等に提供します。

text: meyjes 's movie , like max rothman 's future , does not work .

text: a weird , arresting little ride .
translation: 奇妙で印象的な小さな乗り物。

translation: しかし、この映画には多くの問題がありました。

back_translation: Boring, lifeless, silly, and monotonous: a loud cacophony of meaningless chaos that quickly goes nowhere.

text: the year 2002 has conjured up more coming-of-age stories than seem possible , but take care of my cat emerges as the very best of them .

text: nakata 's technique is to imply terror by suggestion , rather than the overuse of special effects .
translation: ナカタの技法は、特殊効果の過剰使用ではなく、暗示によって恐怖を仄めかすことです。

text: the cinematic equivalent of patronizing a bar favored by pretentious , untalented artistes who enjoy moaning about their cruel fate .
translation: 才能のない気取ったアーティストが自分たちの厳しい運命について愚痴をこぼすのを楽しむ、そんなバーを利用することの映画的相当物。
back_translation: A cinematic equivalent of visiting a bar where pretentious artists without talent enjoy complaining about their harsh fate.

text: there 's a part of us that can not help be entertained by the sight of someone getting away with something .

text: but mr. polanski creates images even more haunting than those in mr. spielberg 's 1993 classic .
translation: しかし、ポランスキー氏はスピルバーグ氏の1993年のクラシック作品のものよりもさらに心に残る映像を作り出しています。

text: the performances are strong , though the subject matter demands acting that borders on hammy at times .

text: never does `` lilo & stitch '' reach the emotion or timelessness of disney 's great past , or even that of more recent successes such as `` mulan '' or `` tarzan . ''
translation: 「リロ・アンド・スティッチ」は、ディズニーの素晴らしい過去や、「ムーラン」や「ターザン」といった最近の成功作の感情や時代を超えた魅力には決して到達しません。

text: a wild ride with eight boarders from venice beach that was a deserved co-winner of the audience award for documentaries at the sundance film festival .

text: the mushy finale turns john q into a movie-of-the-week tearjerker .

text: a venturesome , beautifully realized psychological mood piece that reveals its first-time feature director 's understanding of the expressive power of the camera .

text: that it 'll probably be the best and most mature comedy of the 2002 summer season speaks more of the season than the picture
translation: それが2002年の夏のシーズンで最も優れた成熟したコメディになるだろうというのは、その作品よりもシーズン自体をより示している。

text: my own minority report is that it stinks .

text: cage makes an unusual but pleasantly haunting debut behind the camera .

text: brosnan is more feral in this film than i 've seen him before and halle berry does her best to keep up with him .

text: ben kingsley is truly funny , playing a kind of ghandi gone bad .
translation: ベン・キングズレーは本当に面白く、悪化したガンディのようなキャラクターを演じています。

text: frankly , it 's pretty stupid .

text: too clever by about nine-tenths .

text: watching the powerpuff girls movie , my mind kept returning to one anecdote for comparison : the cartoon in japan that gave people seizures .
translation: パワーパフ ガールズの映画を見ていると、比較のために一つの逸話が頭に浮かんできました。それは、日本で人々に発作を引き起こしたアニメのことです。

text: cantet beautifully illuminates what it means sometimes to be inside looking out , and at other times outside looking in .
translation: カンテは、時には内側から外を見ることが、また他の時には外側から内を見ることがどういう意味を持つのかを美しく照らし出しています。

text: if you think it 's a riot to see rob schneider in a young woman 's clothes , then you 'll enjoy the hot chick .

text: a bore that tends to hammer home every one of its points .
translation: あらゆるポイントをしっかりと押し付ける退屈な人。

text: a non-mystery mystery .
translation: ミステリーではないミステリー

text: there 's back-stabbing , inter-racial desire and , most importantly , singing and dancing .
translation: 裏切り、異人種間の欲望、そして最も重要なことは、歌と踊りがあります。

text: there 's more repetition than creativity throughout the movie .
translation: 映画全体にわたって創造性よりも繰り返しが多い。

translation: 私はその映画を表面的に楽しんだが、その目的が何であるのかは決してわからなかった。

text: fear dot com is more frustrating than a modem that disconnects every 10 seconds .
translation: フィア・ドットコムは、10秒ごとに切断されるモデムよりもイライラします。

text: instead of a witty expose on the banality and hypocrisy of too much kid-vid , we get an ugly , mean-spirited lashing out by an adult who 's apparently been forced by his kids to watch too many barney videos .
translation: 子供向けのビデオの平凡さと偽善についての機知に富んだ暴露ではなく、子供たちに無理やりバーニーのビデオを見せられた成人による醜い、意地悪な反撃を受けることになります。
back_translation: Instead of a witty expose on the mediocrity and hypocrisy of children's videos, adults forced to watch Barney videos will face an ugly, mean-spirited backlash.

text: feels like the work of an artist who is simply tired -- of fighting the same fights , of putting the weight of the world on his shoulders , of playing with narrative form .
translation: 同じ戦いを繰り返すことに疲れたアーティストの作品のように感じる。世界の重みを肩に乗せること、物語の形式で遊ぶことに疲れた。
back_translation: It feels like the work of an artist who is tired of repeating the same battles. I am weary of bearing the weight of the world on my shoulders and playing with the form of stories.

text: it is very difficult to care about the character , and that is the central flaw of the film .
translation: キャラクターに関心を持つことが非常に難しく、それが映画の中心的な欠点です。

translation: ギャングスターNo.1は、大人にとってしっかりとした満足のいく娯楽です。

text: why did they deem it necessary to document all this emotional misery ?
translation: なぜ彼らはこのすべての感情的苦痛を記録する必要があると考えたのでしょうか？

translation: 疑いもなく、スターと関与したすべての人々は、心の中で正しい思いを持っていた。

text: -lrb- rises -rrb- above its oh-so-hollywood rejiggering and its conventional direction to give the film a soul and an unabashed sense of good old-fashioned escapism .
translation: その映画は、非常にハリウッドらしい再構成や従来の演出を超えて、魂と昔ながらの逃避感を与えている。

text: captures that perverse element of the kafkaesque where identity , overnight , is robbed and replaced with a persecuted `` other . ''
translation: アイデンティティが一夜にして奪われ、迫害される「他者」に置き換えられるカフカ的な歪んだ要素を捉えている。
back_translation: It captures the Kafkaesque distorted elements where identity is stolen overnight and replaced by the persecuted "Other."

text: never once predictable .
translation: 一度も予測できなかった。
back_translation: I never could have predicted it.

text: the film does n't really care about the thousands of americans who die hideously , it cares about how ryan meets his future wife and makes his start at the cia .
translation: その映画は、恐ろしい死を遂げる何千人ものアメリカ人にはあまり関心がなく、ライアンが未来の妻と出会い、CIAでのスタートを切ることに焦点を当てています。
back_translation: The movie is largely unconcerned with the thousands of Americans who meet a terrible death, focusing instead on Ryan meeting his future wife and starting his career in the CIA.

text: offers a guilt-free trip into feel-good territory .
translation: 罪悪感のない気分が良くなる旅を提供します。
back_translation: We offer a journey that lifts your spirits without any guilt.

text: the filmmakers are playing to the big boys in new york and l.a. to that end , they mock the kind of folks they do n't understand , ones they figure the power-lunchers do n't care to understand , either .
translation: 映画製作者たちはニューヨークやロサンゼルスの大物たちにアピールしており、その目的のために、自分たちが理解できない人々を嘲笑しています。彼らは、権力者たちも理解したくないと考えている人々です。
back_translation: Filmmakers are appealing to the big shots in New York and Los Angeles, and for that purpose, they are mocking people they do not understand. They believe these are the same people that the powerful also do not want to understand.

text: i wish it would have just gone more over-the-top instead of trying to have it both ways .
translation: もっと過剰にやってほしかったのに、両方の方法を取ろうとするのは残念だった。
back_translation: I wished for it to be more excessive, so it was disappointing that they tried to take both approaches.

text: the whole affair , true story or not , feels incredibly hokey ... -lrb- it -rrb- comes off like a hallmark commercial .
translation: この一件は、真実の話であれそうでなかれ、非常に安っぽく感じられる…（例えば）ハーホールのコマーシャルのように。
back_translation: This incident feels very cheap, whether it is a true story or not... (for example) like a Har-Hall commercial.

text: the structure is simple , but in its own way , rabbit-proof fence is a quest story as grand as the lord of the rings .
translation: 構造はシンプルですが、その独自の方法で「ラビットプルーフフェンス」は「ロード・オブ・ザ・リング」のように壮大なクエスト物語です。
back_translation: The structure is simple, but in its unique way, "Rabbit-Proof Fence" is an epic quest story like "The Lord of the Rings."

text: a puppy dog so desperate for attention it nearly breaks its little neck trying to perform entertaining tricks .

text: noyce 's greatest mistake is thinking that we needed sweeping , dramatic , hollywood moments to keep us
translation: ノイスの最大の誤りは、私たちを引き留めるために、劇的でハリウッド的な瞬間が必要だと考えることです。

text: what emerges is an unsettling picture of childhood innocence combined with indoctrinated prejudice .

text: the 3-d vistas from orbit , with the space station suspended like a huge set of wind chimes over the great blue globe , are stanzas of breathtaking , awe-inspiring visual poetry .

text: cacoyannis ' vision is far less mature , interpreting the play as a call for pity and sympathy for anachronistic phantasms haunting the imagined glory of their own pasts .
translation: カコヤニスのビジョンははるかに未熟であり、戯曲を自らの過去の想像上の栄光に悩む時代錯誤の幻想に対する憐れみと同情を求めるものとして解釈しています。

text: delightfully rendered
translation: 楽しく描かれた

text: many insightful moments .

text: it is refreshingly undogmatic about its characters .

text: -lrb- shyamalan -rrb- turns the goose-pimple genre on its empty head and fills it with spirit , purpose and emotionally bruised characters who add up to more than body count .
translation: -（シャマラン）は、ゾクゾクするジャンルを空っぽの頭でひっくり返し、精神、目的、そして感情的に傷ついたキャラクターたちで満たし、単なる死亡者数以上のものを生み出しています。
back_translation: - Shyamalan flips the thrilling genre upside down with an empty mind, filling it with characters that are mentally, purposefully, and emotionally wounded, creating something more than just a body count.

text: totally overwrought , deeply biased , and wholly designed to make you feel guilty about ignoring what the filmmakers clearly believe are the greatest musicians of all time .
translation: 完全に過剰に感情的で、深く偏った内容であり、映画製作者が明らかに歴史上の最高の音楽家だと信じる人々を無視することに対する罪悪感を抱かせるように全て設計されています。

text: the movie 's seams may show ... but pellington gives `` mothman '' an irresistibly uncanny ambience that goes a long way toward keeping the picture compelling .

text: the sight of the spaceship on the launching pad is duly impressive in imax dimensions , as are shots of the astronauts floating in their cabins .

text: the unique niche of self-critical , behind-the-scenes navel-gazing kaufman has carved from orleans ' story and his own infinite insecurity is a work of outstanding originality .

back_translation: From the story of All Bunny and his own infinite anxieties, Kaufman has built a unique niche that is self-critical and introspective, with an exceptional originality in his work.

text: lucas has in fact come closer than anyone could desire to the cheap , graceless , hackneyed sci-fi serials of the '30s and '40s .

text: a fine effort , an interesting topic , some intriguing characters and a sad ending .

text: featherweight romantic comedy has a few nice twists in a standard plot and the charisma of hugh grant and sandra bullock .

text: hypnotically dull , relentlessly downbeat , laughably predictable wail pitched to the cadence of a depressed fifteen-year-old 's suicidal poetry .
translation: 催眠的に退屈で、絶えず陰鬱で、滑稽に予測可能な叫びは、うつ状態の15歳の自殺詩のリズムに合わせて調整された。

text: everything about the quiet american is good , except its timing .

text: it 's a smartly directed , grown-up film of ideas .

text: the bourne identity should n't be half as entertaining as it is , but director doug liman and his colleagues have managed to pack it with enough action to satisfy the boom-bam crowd without a huge sacrifice of character and mood .
translation: ボーン・アイデンティティは、これほどまでに面白くあるべきではないはずですが、監督のダグ・リーマンと彼の仲間たちは、キャラクターや雰囲気を大きく犠牲にすることなく、アクションを十分に詰め込むことに成功しました。

text: once he starts learning to compromise with reality enough to become comparatively sane and healthy , the film becomes predictably conventional .
translation: 彼が現実と妥協することを学び、比較的健全で正気を保つようになると、映画は予測可能な伝統的なものになります。
back_translation: As he learns to compromise with reality and becomes relatively healthy and sane, the movie becomes predictably traditional.

text: a touching , small-scale story of family responsibility and care in the community .
translation: 家族の責任とコミュニティのケアに関する感動的で小規模な物語。

text: the gifted crudup has the perfect face to play a handsome blank yearning to find himself , and his cipherlike personality and bad behavior would play fine if the movie knew what to do with him .
translation: 才能あるクリードアップは、自分を見つけることを求めるハンサムな空白を演じるのに完璧な顔を持っており、彼の謎めいた性格と悪行は、映画が彼をどのように扱うべきかを知っていればうまく機能したでしょう。
back_translation: The talented Creed-up has the perfect face for playing a handsome blank seeking to find himself, and his enigmatic personality and misdeeds would have worked well if the film knew how to handle him.

translation: 芸術の要素が少なく、搾取が多すぎるアートスプロイテーション映画。

text: unless you 're a fanatic , the best advice is : ` scooby ' do n't .

text: nicole kidman evolved from star to superstar some time over the past year , which means that birthday girl is the kind of quirkily appealing minor movie she might not make for a while .
translation: ニコール・キッドマンは昨年のいずれかの時点でスターからスーパースターへと進化しました。これは、誕生日を迎えた彼女がしばらくの間制作しないかもしれない、奇妙に魅力的なマイナー映画のような作品を意味します。
back_translation: Nicole Kidman evolved from a star to a superstar at some point last year. This means that her birthday might bring about a strangely captivating minor film that she may not produce for a while.

text: and the positive change in tone here seems to have recharged him .
translation: そしてここでのトーンのポジティブな変化は、彼に活力を与えたようです。
back_translation: And it seems that the positive change in tone here has given him energy.

text: there 's just something about watching a squad of psychopathic underdogs whale the tar out of unsuspecting lawmen that reaches across time and distance .
translation: 無邪気な法執行官を容赦なく叩きのめすサイコパスのアンダードッグたちを観ることには、時代や距離を超えた何かがある。
back_translation: There is something timeless and beyond distance in watching the psychopathic underdogs mercilessly beat down the innocent law enforcement officers.

text: the script is high on squaddie banter , low on shocks .
translation: スクリプトは兵士のジョークが豊富で、驚きは少ない。
back_translation: The script is full of soldier jokes and has few surprises.

text: go back to sleep .
translation: 再び眠りにつきなさい。
back_translation: Go back to sleep.

text: this movie plays like an extended dialogue exercise in retard 101 .
translation: この映画は、遅れた者101の長編対話練習のように展開します。
back_translation: This movie unfolds like a long dialogue practice for the delayed ones 101.

text: it 's as if a bored cage spent the duration of the film 's shooting schedule waiting to scream : `` got aids yet ? ''
translation: まるで退屈な檻が映画の撮影スケジュールの間ずっと「エイズになった？」と叫ぶのを待っているかのようです。
back_translation: It's as if the boring cage is waiting the whole time during the filming schedule to shout, "Did you get AIDS?"

text: secret ballot is a funny , puzzling movie ambiguous enough to be engaging and oddly moving .
translation: 「秘密の投票」は、魅力的でありながら奇妙に感動的な、面白くて困惑させる映画です。

text: a visionary marvel , but it 's lacking a depth in storytelling usually found in anime like this .
translation: ビジョンに満ちた驚異ですが、このようなアニメに通常見られる物語の深みが欠けています。
back_translation: It is a vision-filled wonder, but it lacks the depth of story usually seen in such anime.

text: nair just does n't have the necessary self-control to guide a loose , poorly structured film through the pitfalls of incoherence and redundancy .
translation: ナイアーは、緩い構造のない映画を不整合や冗長性の落とし穴から導くために必要な自己制御を持っていません。
back_translation: Nair lacks the self-control necessary to guide a loosely structured film away from the pitfalls of inconsistency and redundancy.

text: one of the most slyly exquisite anti-adult movies ever made .
translation: 最も巧妙で優れたアダルト反対映画の一つ。
back_translation: One of the most clever and outstanding anti-adult films.

text: this low-rent -- and even lower-wit -- rip-off of the farrelly brothers ' oeuvre gets way too mushy -- and in a relatively short amount of time .
translation: この低予算で、さらに低レベルなファレリー兄弟の作品のパクリは、非常に感情的になりすぎます -- しかも比較的短い時間で。
back_translation: This low-budget, even lower-level imitation of the Farrelly brothers' work becomes extremely emotional—especially in a relatively short amount of time.

text: happily stays close to the ground in a spare and simple manner and does n't pummel us with phony imagery or music .
translation: 幸せそうに、スパルタンでシンプルな方法で地面に近く留まり、私たちを偽のイメージや音楽で攻撃することはありません。
back_translation: Happily, staying close to the ground in a Spartan and simple way, we will not be attacked by false images or music.

text: fails as a dystopian movie , as a retooling of fahrenheit 451 , and even as a rip-off of the matrix .
translation: ディストピア映画としても、ファーレンハイト451のリツールとしても、さらにはマトリックスのパクリとしても失敗している。
back_translation: It fails as a dystopian movie, as a retool of Fahrenheit 451, and even as a copy of The Matrix.

text: whatever one makes of its political edge , this is beautiful filmmaking from one of french cinema 's master craftsmen .
translation: その政治的な側面に何を感じ取るにしても、これはフランス映画界の名匠の一人による美しい映画制作です。
back_translation: Regardless of what one perceives in its political aspects, this is a beautiful film created by one of the masters of French cinema.

text: jagger , stoppard and director michael apted ... deliver a riveting and surprisingly romantic ride .
translation: ジャガー、ストッパード、そして監督のマイケル・アップデッドは、魅力的で驚くほどロマンティックな体験を提供します。
back_translation: Jaguar, Stoppard, and director Michael Updike offer an enchanting and surprisingly romantic experience.

text: banal and predictable .
translation: 平凡で予測可能な。
back_translation: Ordinary and predictable.

text: takes a clunky tv-movie approach to detailing a chapter in the life of the celebrated irish playwright , poet and drinker .
translation: 有名なアイルランドの劇作家、詩人、飲酒者の人生の一章を詳細に描くには、どことなく粗いテレビ映画のアプローチを取る。
back_translation: To detail a chapter in the life of a famous Irish playwright, poet, and drinker, it takes a somewhat rough television movie approach.

text: the trashy teen-sleaze equivalent of showgirls .
translation: ショーガールズのごとく、下品なティーン・スリーズの同等品。
back_translation: A counterpart to Showgirls, a vulgar teen series.

text: best of all is garcia , who perfectly portrays the desperation of a very insecure man .
translation: すべての中で最高なのはガルシアで、彼は非常に不安定な男性の絶望を完璧に表現しています。
back_translation: The best of all is Garcia, who perfectly expresses the despair of a very unstable man.

text: it does n't flinch from its unsettling prognosis , namely , that the legacy of war is a kind of perpetual pain .
translation: それは不安を感じさせる予測から逃げることはなく、つまり、戦争の遺産は一種の永続的な痛みであるということです。
back_translation: It means not escaping from predictions that cause anxiety, in other words, that the legacy of war is a kind of lasting pain.

text: scooby-doo does n't know if it wants to be a retro-refitting exercise in campy recall for older fans or a silly , nickelodeon-esque kiddie flick .
translation: スクービー・ドゥーは、古いファンのためのキャンプ的回想のレトロフィッティングエクササイズとしてなのか、あるいはおかしなニコロデオン風の子供向け映画なのか、どちらにしたいのか分からない。
back_translation: Scooby-Doo is unsure whether it wants to be a campy nostalgic retro-fitting exercise for older fans or a quirky Nickelodeon-style children's movie.

text: a dramatic comedy as pleasantly dishonest and pat as any hollywood fluff .
translation: ドラマチックなコメディは、心地よく不誠実で、ハリウッドの軽薄な作品と同じくらい単純明快です。
back_translation: Dramatic comedy is comfortably dishonest and as straightforward as Hollywood's superficial works.

text: unfunny and lacking any sense of commitment to or affection for its characters , the reginald hudlin comedy relies on toilet humor , ethnic slurs .
translation: 面白くなく、キャラクターに対するコミットメントや愛情が欠けているレジナルド・ハドリンのコメディは、トイレジョークや民族的侮辱に頼っています。
back_translation: Reginald Hudlin's comedy, which lacks interest and commitment or affection for the characters, relies on toilet jokes and ethnic insults.

text: `` the best disney movie since the lion king ''
translation: ライオン・キング以来の最高のディズニー映画
back_translation: The best Disney movie since The Lion King.

text: best indie of the year , so far .
translation: 今年のベストインディー、これまでのところ。
back_translation: This year's best indie, so far.

text: feels less like a cousin to blade runner than like a bottom-feeder sequel in the escape from new york series .
translation: ブレードランナーのいとこというよりも、ニューヨークからの脱出シリーズの劣化版続編のように感じる。
back_translation: It feels more like a degraded sequel to the Escape from New York series rather than a cousin to Blade Runner.

text: it jumps around with little logic or continuity , presenting backstage bytes of information that never amount to a satisfying complete picture of this particular , anciently demanding métier .
translation: それはあまり論理や連続性がなく飛び跳ねるように進行し、この特定の古代から要求されている職業に関する満足のいく完全な絵を決して成し遂げることのない舞台裏の情報を提示します。
back_translation: It advances in a way that is rather illogical and discontinuous, presenting backstage information that never achieves a satisfying complete picture regarding the profession required from this particular ancient times.

text: simone is not a bad film .
translation: シモーヌは悪くない映画です。
back_translation: "Simone is not a bad movie."

text: a sexy , peculiar and always entertaining costume drama set in renaissance spain , and the fact that it 's based on true events somehow makes it all the more compelling .
translation: 官能的で独特、そして常に楽しませてくれるコスチュームドラマがルネサンス時代のスペインを舞台にしており、実際の出来事に基づいているという事実が、さらに魅力的にしています。
back_translation: The fact that this sensual and unique costume drama, which always entertains, is set in Renaissance Spain and is based on actual events makes it even more captivating.

text: as the sulking , moody male hustler in the title role , -lrb- franco -rrb- has all of dean 's mannerisms and self-indulgence , but none of his sweetness and vulnerability .
translation: タイトル役の不機嫌で気分屋な男性ハスラーとして、（フランコ）はディーンの癖や自己陶酔をすべて持っているが、彼の甘さや脆さは持っていない。
back_translation: As the title role of a moody and capricious male hustler, (Franco) has all of Dean's quirks and self-absorption, but lacks his sweetness and fragility.

text: the first bond movie in ages that is n't fake fun .
translation: 何年ぶりかの、本物の楽しさがない最初のボンド映画。
back_translation: The first Bond movie in years that doesn't have any real fun.

text: the problem is that for the most part , the film is deadly dull .
translation: 問題は、大部分の映画が非常に退屈であることです。
back_translation: The problem is that most movies are very boring.

text: for the rest of us , sitting through dahmer 's two hours amounts to little more than punishment .
translation: 私たちにとって、ダーマーの2時間を耐えることは、ほとんど罰のようなものです。
back_translation: For us, enduring two hours of Dharma is almost like a punishment.

text: the rollerball sequences feel sanitised and stagey .
translation: ローラーボールのシーンは、衛生的で舞台的な感じがする。
