text: ramsay and morton fill this character study with poetic force and buoyant feeling .
translation: ラムゼイとモートンは、このキャラクタースタディに詩的な力と浮き立つ感情を満たしています。
back_translation: Ramsey and Morton infuse this character study with poetic power and vivid emotions.

text: the film is saved from are n't - kids-cute sentimentality by a warmth that is n't faked and a stately sense of composition .
translation: その映画は、偽りのない温かさと荘厳な構成感によって、子供たちの可愛らしい感傷から救われています。
back_translation: The movie is saved from the charming sentimentality of children by its genuine warmth and majestic sense of structure.

text: death to smoochy is often very funny , but what 's even more remarkable is the integrity of devito 's misanthropic vision .
translation: 『デス・トゥ・スムーチー』はしばしば非常に面白いですが、さらに注目すべきはデビートの人間嫌いのビジョンの整合性です。
back_translation: "Death to Smoochy" is often very funny, but what is even more noteworthy is the consistency of DeVito's vision of misanthropy.

text: the only young people who possibly will enjoy it are infants ... who might be distracted by the movie 's quick movements and sounds .
translation: 唯一楽しむ可能性のある若者は幼児だけであり、映画の速い動きや音に気を取られるかもしれません。
back_translation: The only young people who might enjoy it are toddlers, as they might be distracted by the fast movements and sounds of the movie.

text: there 's something fishy about a seasonal holiday kids ' movie ... that derives its moment of most convincing emotional gravity from a scene where santa gives gifts to grownups .
translation: 季節のホリデー子供向け映画には、サンタが大人にプレゼントを渡すシーンから最も説得力のある感情の重みを引き出すという、ちょっと怪しいところがあります。
back_translation: Seasonal holiday films for children have a slightly dubious aspect of drawing out the most compelling emotional weight from scenes where Santa gives presents to adults.

text: it collapses when mr. taylor tries to shift the tone to a thriller 's rush .
translation: テイラー氏がトーンをスリラーの緊張感にシフトしようとすると、それは崩壊します。
back_translation: When Mr. Taylor tries to shift the tone to the tension of a thriller, it collapses.

text: it 's also not smart or barbed enough for older viewers -- not everyone thinks poo-poo jokes are ` edgy . '
translation: それはまた、年配の視聴者にとって十分にスマートでもなく尖ってもいない -- すべての人がプープージョークを「エッジィ」と考えているわけではない。
back_translation: It is also not smart enough or edgy enough for older viewers— not everyone thinks poop jokes are "edgy."

text: it gives poor dana carvey nothing to do that is really funny , and then expects us to laugh because he acts so goofy all the time .
translation: ダナ・カーヴィーに本当に面白いことをさせず、常にふざけているから笑えと期待しているのは、彼にとって悪いことです。
back_translation: It’s bad for Dana Carvey that he’s never really allowed to do anything interesting and that people always expect him to be funny.

text: efficient , suitably anonymous chiller .
translation: 効率的で、適切に匿名なチラー。
back_translation: An efficient and appropriately anonymous chiller.

text: ... stylistically , the movie is a disaster .
translation: …スタイル的には、その映画は大失敗です。
back_translation: In terms of style, that movie is a total failure.

text: it 's mildly entertaining , especially if you find comfort in familiarity .
translation: 少し面白いですが、特に親しみを感じるならなおさらです。
back_translation: It's a bit interesting, but even more so if it feels especially familiar.

text: ... a guiltless film for nice evening out .
translation: 罪のない映画で素敵な夜を過ごすために。
back_translation: To spend a wonderful night with an innocent movie.

text: what makes salton sea surprisingly engrossing is that caruso takes an atypically hypnotic approach to a world that 's often handled in fast-edit , hopped-up fashion .
translation: サルトン湖が驚くほど魅力的なのは、カルーソが通常は速い編集で扱われる世界に対して、異例の催眠的アプローチを取っているからです。
back_translation: The reason Sarlton Lake is incredibly captivating is that Caruso takes an unusual hypnotic approach in a world that is typically dealt with through fast editing.

text: an opportunity missed .
translation: 逃した機会。
back_translation: Missed opportunity.

text: canada 's arctic light shines bright on this frozen tundra soap opera that breathes extraordinary life into the private existence of the inuit people .
translation: カナダの北極の光は、この凍ったツンドラのソープオペラに明るく輝き、イヌイットの人々の私生活に extraordinary な命を吹き込んでいます。
back_translation: The northern lights of Canada shine brightly over this frozen tundra soap opera, breathing extraordinary life into the private lives of the Inuit people.

text: fresh and raw like a blown-out vein , narc takes a walking-dead , cop-flick subgenre and beats new life into it .
translation: 新鮮で生々しい、破れた静脈のように、ナークはウォーキング・デッド的な警官映画のサブジャンルに新たな命を吹き込んだ。
back_translation: Fresh and raw, like a torn vein, Nark breathed new life into the subgenre of cop movies reminiscent of The Walking Dead.

text: dignified ceo 's meet at a rustic retreat and pee against a tree .
translation: 威厳のあるCEOたちが田舎のリトリートで会い、木に向かって用を足す。
back_translation: Dignified CEOs meet at a rural retreat to relieve themselves against a tree.

text: a creepy , intermittently powerful study of a self-destructive man ... about as unsettling to watch as an exploratory medical procedure or an autopsy .
translation: 自己破壊的な男を扱った、不気味で時折力強い研究… 探索的な医療手続きや解剖を見ているかのように、見るのが不安を覚える。
back_translation: A creepy yet occasionally powerful study dealing with self-destructive men... It feels unsettling to watch, as if observing exploratory medical procedures or dissections.

text: the overall vibe is druggy and self-indulgent , like a spring-break orgy for pretentious arts majors .
translation: 全体の雰囲気は、薬に侵された自己陶酔的で、まるで気取った芸術専攻の学生たちのための春休みのオルジのようです。
back_translation: The overall atmosphere is self-indulgent, as if it were a spring break orgy for pretentious art majors who have been consumed by drugs.

text: the transporter bombards the viewer with so many explosions and side snap kicks that it ends up being surprisingly dull .
translation: トランスポーターは、視聴者にあまりにも多くの爆発とサイドスナップキックを浴びせるため、驚くほど退屈な結果になります。
back_translation: Transporter ends up being surprisingly dull due to bombarding the audience with too many explosions and side snap kicks.

text: beneath the film 's obvious determination to shock at any cost lies considerable skill and determination , backed by sheer nerve .
translation: 映画の明らかな衝撃を与えようとする決意の背後には、かなりの技術と決意があり、それを支えるのは純粋な神経です。
back_translation: Behind the determination to deliver a clear shock in the film lies considerable skill and resolve, supported by pure nerves.

text: perry 's good and his is an interesting character , but `` serving sara '' has n't much more to serve than silly fluff .
translation: ペリーは良いキャラクターで興味深いですが、「サラをサーブする」には、それ以上のものは提供されていません。無意味な軽薄さしかありません。
back_translation: Perry is a good character and interesting, but "Serving Sarah" offers nothing more than that. It has nothing but meaningless frivolity.

text: the film 's trailer also looked like crap , so crap is what i was expecting .
translation: 映画の予告編もひどい見栄えだったので、ひどいものを期待していました。
back_translation: The trailer for the movie looked terrible, so I was expecting something awful.

text: the sentimental script has problems , but the actors pick up the slack .
translation: 感情的な脚本には問題がありますが、俳優たちがその分をカバーしています。
back_translation: There are issues with the emotional script, but the actors are covering for it.

text: puts a refreshing and comical spin on the all-too-familiar saga of the contemporary single woman .
translation: 現代の独身女性のあまりにも馴染み深い物語に、爽快でおかしみのあるひねりを加えています。
back_translation: It adds a refreshing and humorous twist to the all-too-familiar stories of modern single women.

text: there are some laughs in this movie , but williams ' anarchy gets tiresome , the satire is weak .
translation: この映画にはいくつかの笑いがありますが、ウィリアムズの無秩序は飽きが来て、風刺は弱いです。
back_translation: This movie has some laughs, but Williams' chaos becomes tiresome, and the satire is weak.

text: boisterous , heartfelt comedy .
translation: にぎやかで心温まるコメディ。
back_translation: A lively and heartwarming comedy.

text: it 's as if allen , at 66 , has stopped challenging himself .
translation: まるでアレンが66歳で自分自身に挑戦することをやめたかのようです。
back_translation: It's as if Allen has stopped challenging himself at the age of 66.

text: the characters seem one-dimensional , and the film is superficial and will probably be of interest primarily to its target audience .
translation: キャラクターは一面的で、映画は表面的であり、おそらく主にそのターゲットオーディエンスに興味を持たれるでしょう。
back_translation: The characters are one-dimensional, and the movie is superficial, likely appealing primarily to its target audience.

text: i 'm sure mainstream audiences will be baffled , but , for those with at least a minimal appreciation of woolf and clarissa dalloway , the hours represents two of those well spent .
translation: 主流の観客は混乱するだろうが、ウルフとクラリッサ・ダロウェイに対して最低限の理解のある人々にとって、「時間」は二つの価値ある時間を表している。
back_translation: Mainstream audiences may be confused, but for those with at least a minimal understanding of Woolf and Clarissa Dalloway, "time" represents two valuable moments.

text: very amusing , not the usual route in a thriller , and the performances are odd and pixilated and sometimes both .
translation: 非常に面白く、スリラーとしては通常のルートではなく、パフォーマンスは奇妙でピクセル化されていて、時にはその両方です。
back_translation: It's very interesting, and as a thriller, it takes an unconventional route; the performance is strange and pixelated, and at times it's both.

text: if festival in cannes nails hard - boiled hollywood argot with a bracingly nasty accuracy , much about the film , including some of its casting , is frustratingly unconvincing .
translation: カンヌの祭典が煮えたぎるハリウッドの専門用語を厳しいまでに正確に描くなら、映画の多く、特に一部のキャスティングについては不満に思うほど説得力に欠ける。
back_translation: If the Cannes festival depicts the boiling Hollywood jargon with extreme accuracy, many films, especially regarding some casting, may be disappointingly unconvincing.

text: coral reef adventure is a heavyweight film that fights a good fight on behalf of the world 's endangered reefs -- and it lets the pictures do the punching .
translation: コーラルリーフアドベンチャーは、世界の絶滅危惧種のサンゴ礁のために良い戦いを繰り広げる重厚な映画であり、映像がその戦いを表現しています。
back_translation: Coral Reef Adventure is a powerful film that engages in a good fight for the world's endangered coral reefs, with the visuals expressing that struggle.

text: but it could be , by its art and heart , a necessary one .
translation: しかし、それはその芸術と心によって、必要なものである可能性があります。
back_translation: However, it may be necessary due to that art and spirit.

text: i wanted more .
translation: もっと欲しい。
back_translation: I want more.

text: the entire cast is extraordinarily good .
translation: キャスト全員が非常に素晴らしいです。
back_translation: All the cast members are truly amazing.

text: as if trying to grab a lump of play-doh , the harder that liman tries to squeeze his story , the more details slip out between his fingers .
translation: まるでプレイ・ドーを掴もうとしているかのように、リマンが自分の物語を絞り出そうとすればするほど、詳細が指の間からすり抜けていく。
back_translation: As Liman tries to squeeze out his story, it slips through his fingers like play-dough, as if he were grasping at it.

text: a bracing , unblinking work that serves as a painful elegy and sobering cautionary tale .
translation: 痛ましい追悼詩であり、厳粛な警告の物語として機能する、鋭敏でまっすぐな作品。
back_translation: A poignant elegy that serves as a solemn warning tale, a sharp and straightforward piece.

text: a fine , rousing , g-rated family film , aimed mainly at little kids but with plenty of entertainment value to keep grown-ups from squirming in their seats .
translation: 素晴らしく、盛り上がる、Gレートのファミリー映画で、主に小さな子供を対象にしていますが、大人も座っているのが苦痛にならないほどのエンターテインメント価値が豊富です。
back_translation: It’s a wonderful, exciting G-rated family movie primarily aimed at young children, but it also offers plenty of entertainment value that makes it enjoyable for adults without being painful to sit through.

text: it 's immensely ambitious , different than anything that 's been done before and amazingly successful in terms of what it 's trying to do .
translation: それは非常に野心的で、これまでに行われたものとは異なり、目指していることに関して驚くほど成功しています。
back_translation: It is very ambitious, remarkably successful in what it aims for, and unlike anything that has been done before.

text: ... a pretentious mess ...
translation: ... ぼんやりした混乱 ...
back_translation: ... a vague confusion ...

text: it sends you away a believer again and quite cheered at just that .
translation: それはあなたを再び信者に送り出し、ただそのことで非常に元気づけられます。
back_translation: It encourages you greatly just to send you back as a believer again.

text: terminally bland , painfully slow and needlessly confusing ... the movie , shot on digital videotape rather than film , is frequently indecipherable .
translation: 終始平凡で、痛々しいほど遅く、無意味に混乱を招く…この映画は、フィルムではなくデジタルビデオテープで撮影されており、しばしば解読不可能です。
back_translation: Consistently mediocre, painfully slow, and unnecessarily confusing... this film is shot on digital video tape rather than film and is often indecipherable.

text: a very depressing movie of many missed opportunities .
translation: 多くの逃した機会があった、とても落ち込む映画。
back_translation: A very depressing movie about many missed opportunities.

text: captures the raw comic energy of one of our most flamboyant female comics .
translation: 私たちの最も派手な女性コメディアンの一人の生のコメディエネルギーを捉えています。
back_translation: We are capturing the raw comedic energy of one of our flashiest female comedians.

text: if the man from elysian fields is doomed by its smallness , it is also elevated by it -- the kind of movie that you enjoy more because you 're one of the lucky few who sought it out .
translation: エリジアン・フィールズの男がその小ささによって運命づけられているなら、それは同時にその小ささによって高められてもいる — 自ら探し出した少数の幸運な人々の一人だからこそ、より楽しめる種類の映画だ。
back_translation: If the man from the Elysian Fields is destined by his smallness, he is simultaneously elevated by that same smallness — it is precisely because he is one of the few lucky people he has sought out that he can enjoy a different kind of film more.

text: writer-director walter hill and co-writer david giler try to create characters out of the obvious cliches , but wind up using them as punching bags .
translation: ライター兼監督のウォルター・ヒルと共同脚本家のデイヴィッド・ギラーは、明白なクリシェからキャラクターを創り出そうと試みますが、結局それらをパンチングバッグとして使う結果になります。
back_translation: Writer-director Walter Hill and co-writer David Giler attempt to create characters from obvious clichés, but ultimately end up using them as punching bags.

text: this wretchedly unfunny wannabe comedy is inane and awful - no doubt , it 's the worst movie i 've seen this summer .
translation: このひどく面白くないなりきりコメディは、空虚で恐ろしいです - 疑いようもなく、今夏見た中で最悪の映画です。
back_translation: This incredibly unfunny impersonation comedy is hollow and dreadful - undoubtedly the worst movie I've seen this summer.

text: in the process of trimming the movie to an expeditious 84 minutes , director roger kumble seems to have dumped a whole lot of plot in favor of ... outrageous gags .
translation: 映画を迅速な84分に編集する過程で、監督のロジャー・カンブルは、物語をたくさん削除し、... 限りなく outrageous なギャグを優先したようです。
back_translation: In the process of editing the film down to a brisk 84 minutes, director Roger Cumble seems to have removed a lot of the story and prioritized an endlessly outrageous humor.

text: singer\/composer bryan adams contributes a slew of songs -- a few potential hits , a few more simply intrusive to the story -- but the whole package certainly captures the intended , er , spirit of the piece .
translation: 歌手・作曲家のブライアン・アダムスが多くの曲を提供しており、その中にはいくつかのヒットの可能性がある曲や、物語に対して単に邪魔になる曲もありますが、全体としては作品の意図された、ええ、雰囲気を確実に捉えています。
back_translation: Singer-songwriter Bryan Adams has provided many songs, some of which have the potential to be hits, while others may simply interfere with the story, but overall, they certainly capture the intended atmosphere of the work.

text: does n't come close to justifying the hype that surrounded its debut at the sundance film festival two years ago .
translation: その内容は、2年前のサンダンス映画祭でのデビューを取り巻く期待を正当化するにはほど遠い。
back_translation: The content is far from justifying the expectations surrounding its debut at the Sundance Film Festival two years ago.

text: this slender plot feels especially thin stretched over the nearly 80-minute running time .
translation: この細いプロットは、ほぼ80分の上映時間に対して特に薄く感じられます。
back_translation: This thin plot feels particularly flimsy for a runtime of nearly 80 minutes.

text: the movie 's biggest shocks come from seeing former nymphette juliette lewis playing a salt-of-the-earth mommy named minnie and watching slim travel incognito in a ridiculous wig no respectable halloween costume shop would ever try to sell .
translation: 映画の最大の衝撃は、元ニンフェットのジュリエット・ルイスが、ミニーという塩のような地味なママを演じているのを見たり、スリムが尊敬されるハロウィンコスチュームショップが絶対に売ろうとしない不条理なウィッグをかぶって密かに移動するのを見たりすることから来る。
back_translation: The biggest shock of the movie comes from seeing former nymphet Juliette Lewis play a plain mother named Minnie, who is as unremarkable as salt, and seeing Slim secretly move while wearing an absurd wig that no respectable Halloween costume shop would ever sell.

text: if you value your time and money , find an escape clause and avoid seeing this trite , predictable rehash .
translation: 時間とお金を大切にするなら、この陳腐で予測可能な再利用を避けるための逃げ道を見つけましょう。
back_translation: If you value time and money, let's find a way to avoid this clichéd and predictable reuse.

text: boasts a handful of virtuosic set pieces and offers a fair amount of trashy , kinky fun .
translation: いくつかの卓越したセッションを誇り、かなりの量の下品で変わった楽しさを提供しています。
back_translation: It boasts some outstanding sessions and offers a considerable amount of vulgar and quirky fun.

text: the jokes are flat , and the action looks fake .
translation: ジョークはつまらなく、アクションは不自然に見えます。
back_translation: The jokes are boring, and the action looks unnatural.

text: it 's a ripper of a yarn and i for one enjoyed the thrill of the chill .
translation: それは素晴らしい物語で、私自身はその寒気のスリルを楽しみました。
back_translation: It is a wonderful story, and I personally enjoyed the thrill of that chill.

text: weirdly , broomfield has compelling new material but he does n't unveil it until the end , after endless scenes of him wheedling reluctant witnesses and pointing his camera through the smeared windshield of his rental car .
translation: 奇妙なことに、ブルームフィールドは魅力的な新しい素材を持っていますが、彼はそれを最後まで明らかにしません。彼はためらう証人にしつこく頼み続け、レンタカーの汚れたフロントガラス越しにカメラを向けるシーンが続きます。
back_translation: Strangely, Bloomfield has an intriguing new material, but he doesn’t reveal it until the end. He persistently asks a hesitant witness, and a scene continues with him directing the camera through the dirty windshield of a rental car.

text: once folks started hanging out at the barbershop , they never wanted to leave .
translation: 人々が理髪店でくつろぎ始めると、決して離れたくなくなる。
back_translation: As people begin to relax in the barbershop, they never want to leave.

text: choppy , overlong documentary about ` the lifestyle . '
translation: 途切れ途切れで、長すぎるドキュメンタリー『ライフスタイル』について。
back_translation: A fragmented and overly long documentary called "Lifestyle."

text: better still , he does all of this , and more , while remaining one of the most savagely hilarious social critics this side of jonathan swift .
translation: さらに素晴らしいのは、彼がこれらすべてを行い、さらにそれ以上のことをしながら、ジョナサン・スウィフトのこの側にいる中で最も凶暴に面白い社会批評家の一人であり続けていることです。
back_translation: What is even more remarkable is that while he accomplishes all of this and more, he remains one of the most fiercely humorous social critics alongside Jonathan Swift.

text: the action quickly sinks into by-the-numbers territory .
translation: そのアクションはすぐに型通りの領域に落ち着いてしまう。
back_translation: That action quickly settles into a conventional area.

text: ends up offering nothing more than the latest schwarzenegger or stallone flick would .
translation: 結局は最新のシュワルツェネッガーやスタローンの映画以上のものを提供しない。
back_translation: In the end, it doesn't offer anything more than the latest Schwarzenegger or Stallone movies.

text: though there are many tense scenes in trapped , they prove more distressing than suspenseful .
translation: 「トラップド」には多くの緊迫したシーンがありますが、それはサスペンスよりもむしろ不安を引き起こすものです。
back_translation: "Trapped" has many tense scenes, but they provoke anxiety rather than suspense.

text: the last kiss will probably never achieve the popularity of my big fat greek wedding , but its provocative central wedding sequence has far more impact .
translation: 最後のキスは「ミーン・ガールズ」のような人気を得ることはおそらくないでしょうが、挑発的な中心の結婚式のシーンははるかに多くのインパクトがあります。
back_translation: The final kiss may not achieve the same popularity as "Mean Girls," but the provocative wedding scene at its center has much more impact.

text: low rent from frame one .
translation: フレーム1からの低賃料。
back_translation: Low rent from frame 1.

text: sheridan seems terrified of the book 's irreverent energy , and scotches most of its élan , humor , bile , and irony .
translation: シェリダンは、その本の不敬なエネルギーに怯えているようで、ほとんどその活力、ユーモア、悪意、そしてアイロニーを抑え込んでいる。
back_translation: Sheridan seems to be frightened by the irreverent energy of the book, almost suppressing its vitality, humor, malice, and irony.

text: unfortunately , carvey 's rubber-face routine is no match for the insipid script he has crafted with harris goldberg .
translation: 残念ながら、カーヴィーのゴム顔のルーチンは、ハリス・ゴールドバーグと共に作り上げた退屈な脚本には敵いません。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Curvy's rubber-faced routine cannot compete with the dull script created alongside Harris Goldberg.

text: it may as well be called `` jar-jar binks : the movie . ''
translation: 「ジャー・ジャー・ビンクス：ザ・ムービー」と呼んでもいいかもしれません。
back_translation: It might be called "Jar Jar Binks: The Movie."

text: over the years , hollywood has crafted a solid formula for successful animated movies , and ice age only improves on it , with terrific computer graphics , inventive action sequences and a droll sense of humor .
translation: 年を重ねるにつれて、ハリウッドは成功するアニメ映画のための確固たる公式を作り上げてきましたが、アイスエイジは素晴らしいコンピュータグラフィックス、独創的なアクションシーン、そしてユーモアに富んだ感覚でそれをさらに向上させています。
back_translation: As the years go by, Hollywood has established a solid formula for successful animated films, but Ice Age takes it a step further with its amazing computer graphics, creative action scenes, and a sense of humor rich in elements.

text: what one is left with , even after the most awful acts are committed , is an overwhelming sadness that feels as if it has made its way into your very bloodstream .
translation: 最もひどい行為が行われた後でも残るのは、まるで自分の血液の中に入り込んでしまったかのような圧倒的な悲しみです。
back_translation: What remains even after the worst acts have been committed is an overwhelming sorrow, as if it has seeped into one's very blood.

text: it hates its characters .
translation: それはそのキャラクターを嫌っています。
back_translation: They dislike that character.

text: ... an incredibly heavy-handed , manipulative dud that feels all too familiar .
translation: ... 信じられないほど強引で、操り人形のような駄作で、非常に馴染み深く感じる。
back_translation: ... Incredibly forceful, a piece of work like a puppet, and feeling very familiar.

text: with `` ichi the killer '' , takashi miike , japan 's wildest filmmaker gives us a crime fighter carrying more emotional baggage than batman ...
translation: 「イチ・ザ・キラー」において、タカシ・ミイケは、日本の最も過激な映画監督として、バットマンよりも多くの感情的荷物を抱えた犯罪者を描いています…
back_translation: In "Ichi the Killer," Takashi Miike depicts criminals with more emotional baggage than Batman, establishing himself as Japan's most extreme film director...

text: anyone who wants to start writing screenplays can just follow the same blueprint from hundreds of other films , sell it to the highest bidder and walk away without anyone truly knowing your identity .
translation: 脚本を書くことを始めたい人は、何百もの他の映画から同じ設計図に従うことができ、それを最高入札者に売り渡し、誰にも自分の正体を知られることなく去ることができます。
back_translation: People who want to start writing scripts can follow the same blueprint from hundreds of other films, sell it to the highest bidder, and leave without anyone knowing their true identity.

text: comes off as a long , laborious whine , the bellyaching of a paranoid and unlikable man .
translation: 長くて骨の折れる不満のように聞こえ、偏執的で好感の持てない男の文句のようだ。
back_translation: It sounds like a long and tiresome complaint, similar to the grievances of a paranoid and unpleasant man.

text: we do n't even like their characters .
translation: 私たちは彼らのキャラクターさえ好きではありません。
back_translation: We don't even like their characters.

text: just a collection of this and that -- whatever fills time -- with no unified whole .
translation: ただの寄せ集め --- 時間を埋めるためのもので --- 統一された全体はない。
back_translation: Just a collection --- something to fill time --- there is no unified whole.

text: the characters never change .
translation: キャラクターは決して変わらない。
back_translation: The character never changes.

text: even kids deserve better .
translation: 子供たちももっと良いものに値する。
back_translation: Children also deserve something better.

text: while scorsese 's bold images and generally smart casting ensure that `` gangs '' is never lethargic , the movie is hindered by a central plot that 's peppered with false starts and populated by characters who are nearly impossible to care about .
translation: スコセッシの大胆な映像と一般的に賢いキャスティングが「ギャングス」を決して鈍くさせない一方で、映画は誤ったスタートが散発的にあり、ほとんど気にかけることができないキャラクターで構成された中心的なプロットによって妨げられています。
back_translation: While Scorsese's bold visuals and generally clever casting never dull "Gangs," the film is hindered by sporadic false starts and a central plot made up of characters that are barely worth caring about.

text: once ice-t sticks his mug in the window of the couple 's bmw and begins haranguing the wife in bad stage dialogue , all credibility flies out the window .
translation: アイス-TがカップルのBMWの窓に顔を突っ込み、悪い舞台のセリフで妻を攻撃し始めると、すべての信頼性が失われます。
back_translation: When Ice-T sticks his face into the couple's BMW window and starts attacking the wife with bad stage lines, all credibility is lost.

text: this is more fascinating -- being real -- than anything seen on jerry springer .
translation: これはジェリー・スプリンガーで見たどんなものよりも、リアルで興味深いです。
back_translation: This is more real and interesting than anything I've seen on Jerry Springer.

text: into how long is this movie ?
translation: この映画はどれくらいの長さですか？
back_translation: How long is this movie?

text: the work of an artist tormented by his heritage , using his storytelling ability to honor the many faceless victims .
translation: 自らの遺産に悩まされるアーティストの作品であり、彼の物語の技術を使って、多くの無名の犠牲者を尊重している。
back_translation: This is the work of an artist troubled by his own legacy, using the techniques of his story to honor many anonymous victims.

text: think the lion king redone for horses , with fewer deliberate laughs , more inadvertent ones and stunningly trite songs by bryan adams , the world 's most generic rock star .
translation: 馬のために再制作されたライオン・キングを考えてみてください。意図的な笑いは少なく、偶発的な笑いが増え、世界で最も一般的なロックスターであるブライアン・アダムスによる驚くほど陳腐な曲が満載です。
back_translation: Imagine a reimagined Lion King for horses. It has less intentional humor and more accidental humor, filled with the incredibly cliché songs by Brian Adams, the world's most common rock star.

text: you 'll probably love it .
translation: あなたはおそらく気に入るでしょう。
back_translation: You will probably like it.

text: and for all the wrong reasons besides .
translation: そして、他の全ての間違った理由のために。
back_translation: And for all the other wrong reasons.

text: reminiscent of alfred hitchcock 's thrillers , most of the scary parts in ` signs ' occur while waiting for things to happen .
translation: アルフレッド・ヒッチコックのスリラーを思わせるように、『サイン』の恐ろしい場面のほとんどは、物事が起こるのを待っている間に発生します。
back_translation: Like an Alfred Hitchcock thriller, most of the terrifying scenes in "Signs" occur while waiting for things to happen.

text: in his debut as a director , washington has a sure hand .
translation: 彼の監督デビューにおいて、ワシントンは確かな手腕を発揮している。
back_translation: In his directorial debut, Washington has demonstrated remarkable skills.

text: if you love him , you 'll like it .
translation: 彼を愛しているなら、あなたはそれを気に入るでしょう。
back_translation: If you love him, you will like it.

text: what 's so fun about this silly , outrageous , ingenious thriller is the director 's talent .
translation: この愉快で衝撃的で巧妙なスリラーの楽しい要素は、監督の才能にあります。
back_translation: The fun elements of this delightful, shocking, and clever thriller lie in the director's talent.

text: i like that smith , he 's not making fun of these people , he 's not laughing at them .
translation: 私はスミスが好きです。彼はこれらの人々を見下したり、彼らを笑ったりしていません。
back_translation: I like Smith. He does not look down on these people or laugh at them.

text: the logic of it all will be greek to anyone not predisposed to the movie 's rude and crude humor .
translation: そのすべての論理は、映画の無礼で下品なユーモアに偏見を持たない人には理解できないだろう。
back_translation: All of that logic would be incomprehensible to someone who does not have a bias against the movie's rude and vulgar humor.

text: the movie 's downfall is to substitute plot for personality .
translation: 映画の没落は、プロットを個性に置き換えてしまうことだ。
back_translation: The downfall of movies is replacing the plot with personality.

text: so much about the film is loopy and ludicrous ... that it could have been a hoot in a bad-movie way if the laborious pacing and endless exposition had been tightened .
translation: 映画の多くはぐるぐる回っておかしなことで…労働的なペース配分と終わりのない説明が締められていれば、悪い映画的な意味で楽しめたかもしれない。
back_translation: Many movies spin around in a strange way... If the pacing and endless explanations were wrapped up in a laborious manner, I might have enjoyed it in a bad movie kind of way.

text: victor rosa is leguizamo 's best movie work so far , a subtle and richly internalized performance .
translation: ビクター・ローザはレギザモのこれまでの最高の映画作品であり、微妙で豊かな内面的な演技です。
back_translation: Victor Roza is the best film work of Regizamo to date, showcasing subtle and rich inner performances.

text: psychologically savvy .
translation: 心理的に賢い。
back_translation: Psychologically smart.

text: a stirring tribute to the bravery and dedication of the world 's reporters who willingly walk into the nightmare of war not only to record the events for posterity , but to help us clearly see the world of our making .
translation: 戦争の悪夢に自ら進んで足を踏み入れ、出来事を記録するだけでなく、私たちが作り出した世界を明確に見る手助けをするために尽力する世界の報道陣の勇気と献身に捧げる感動的な賛辞です。
back_translation: This is an emotional tribute dedicated to the courage and dedication of the world's reporters who willingly step into the nightmare of war, not only to document events but also to help us clearly see the world we have created.

text: a chilling movie without oppressive gore .
translation: 過度な残酷さのないぞくぞくする映画。
back_translation: A thrilling movie without excessive cruelty.

text: we assume he had a bad run in the market or a costly divorce , because there is no earthly reason other than money why this distinguished actor would stoop so low .
translation: 彼が市場で悪い運を抱えていたか、高額な離婚を経験したと考えています。なぜなら、この著名な俳優がこれほどまでに自分を貶める理由は、金銭以外に考えられないからです。
back_translation: I think he was either having a run of bad luck in the market or going through an expensive divorce. This is because there seems to be no reason for this famous actor to demean himself to such an extent other than financial reasons.

text: star trek was kind of terrific once , but now it is a copy of a copy of a copy .
translation: スター・トレックは昔は素晴らしかったが、今はコピーのコピーのコピーになっている。
back_translation: Star Trek was wonderful in the past, but now it has become a copy of a copy of a copy.

text: several of steven soderbergh 's earlier films were hailed as the works of an artist .
translation: スティーブン・ソダーバーグの初期のいくつかの映画は、アーティストの作品として称賛されました。
back_translation: Some of Steven Soderbergh's early films were praised as works of art.

text: the riveting performances by the incredibly flexible cast make love a joy to behold .
translation: 驚くほど柔軟なキャストによる心を打つパフォーマンスは、愛を見ている喜びにします。
back_translation: The astonishingly flexible cast delivers a heart-touching performance that evokes the joy of witnessing love.

text: the most audacious , outrageous , sexually explicit , psychologically probing , pure libido film of the year has arrived from portugal .
translation: ポルトガルから、今年最も大胆で、衝撃的で、性的に露骨で、心理的に掘り下げた、純粋なリビドーの映画がやってきました。
back_translation: A film has arrived from Portugal that is the boldest, most shocking, sexually explicit, and psychologically deep exploration of pure libido this year.

text: a thoughtful movie , a movie that is concerned with souls and risk and schemes and the consequences of one 's actions .
translation: 思慮深い映画、魂やリスク、計画、そして自分の行動の結果に関心を持つ映画。
back_translation: A thoughtful movie that is interested in the soul, risk, planning, and the consequences of one's actions.

text: the dramatic scenes are frequently unintentionally funny , and the action sequences -- clearly the main event -- are surprisingly uninvolving .
translation: ドラマチックなシーンはしばしば意図せず面白く、アクションシーケンスは明らかにメインイベントであるにもかかわらず、驚くほど没入感がありません。
back_translation: Dramatic scenes are often unintentionally funny, and although the action sequences are clearly the main event, they are surprisingly lacking in immersion.

text: directed by kevin bray , whose crisp framing , edgy camera work , and wholesale ineptitude with acting , tone and pace very obviously mark him as a video helmer making his feature debut .
translation: ケビン・ブレイ監督によるもので、彼の鮮やかな構図、鋭いカメラワーク、そして演技、トーン、ペースにおける完全な不慣れさが、明らかに彼をビデオ監督としての長編デビューを果たす人物として示しています。
back_translation: Directed by Kevin Bray, his vivid compositions, sharp camera work, and complete unfamiliarity with acting, tone, and pace clearly mark him as someone making his feature debut as a video director.

text: because the intelligence level of the characters must be low , very low , very very low , for the masquerade to work , the movie contains no wit , only labored gags .
translation: キャラクターの知能レベルが低く、非常に低く、非常に非常に低くなければならないため、仮面舞踏会が成立します。この映画には機知はなく、ただ苦労して作られたギャグしかありません。
back_translation: The characters must have a low, very low, and extremely low intelligence level for the masquerade to be established. This movie has no wit; it only has poorly crafted gags.

text: viewers of barney 's crushingly self-indulgent spectacle will see nothing in it to match the ordeal of sitting through it .
translation: バーニーの圧倒的に自己満足なスペクタクルを観る視聴者は、その中にそれを耐え抜く苦痛に匹敵するものは何も見出さないだろう。
back_translation: Viewers who watch Barney's overwhelmingly self-satisfying spectacle will find nothing within it that compares to the pain of enduring it.

text: they ought to be a whole lot scarier than they are in this tepid genre offering .
translation: 彼らはこのぬるいジャンルの提供よりもずっと恐ろしいはずです。
back_translation: They must be much more terrifying than this lukewarm genre offers.

text: as it turns out , you can go home again .
translation: 結局のところ、あなたは再び家に帰ることができます。
back_translation: In the end, you will be able to return home again.

text: it 's far from a frothy piece , and the characters are complex , laden with plenty of baggage and tinged with tragic undertones .
translation: それは軽薄な作品とはほど遠く、登場人物たちは複雑で多くの baggage を抱え、悲劇的なニュアンスが漂っています。
back_translation: It is far from a trivial work, with characters that are complex and carry a lot of baggage, imbued with a tragic nuance.

text: his work transcends the boy-meets-girl posturing of typical love stories .
translation: 彼の作品は、典型的な恋愛物語の少年と少女の出会いという姿勢を超越しています。
back_translation: His work transcends the typical narrative of the meeting between a boy and a girl in a romantic story.

text: writer \/ director m. night shyamalan 's ability to pull together easily accessible stories that resonate with profundity is undeniable .
translation: 作家兼監督のM・ナイト・シャマランが簡単にアクセスできる物語を作り出し、それが深い共鳴を持つ能力は否定できません。
back_translation: It is undeniable that M. Night Shyamalan, the writer and director, has the ability to create stories that are easily accessible and resonate deeply.

text: fontaine 's direction , especially her agreeably startling use of close-ups and her grace with a moving camera , creates sheerly cinematic appeal .
translation: フォンテーヌの演出、特に彼女の心地よく驚くべきクローズアップの使い方や、動くカメラでの優雅さは、まさに映画的な魅力を生み出しています。
back_translation: Fontaine's direction, especially her pleasantly surprising use of close-ups and the elegance of moving cameras, truly creates cinematic charm.

text: what bubbles up out of john c. walsh 's pipe dream is the distinct and very welcome sense of watching intelligent people making a movie they might actually want to watch .
translation: ジョン・C・ウォルシュの夢から湧き出るのは、知的な人々が彼ら自身が実際に見たいと思う映画を作っているのを見るという、独特でとても歓迎すべき感覚です。
back_translation: What emerges from John C. Walsh's dream is a unique and very welcome feeling of seeing intelligent people create the films they actually want to see.

text: abysmally pathetic
translation: ひどく哀れな
back_translation: terribly pitiful

text: instead of a balanced film that explains the zeitgeist that is the x games , we get a cinematic postcard that 's superficial and unrealized .
translation: バランスの取れた映画ではなく、Xゲームの時代精神を説明するものとして、表面的で未完成な映画的なポストカードが提供される。
back_translation: Instead of a well-balanced film, a superficial and unfinished cinematic postcard is offered to explain the spirit of the X Games era.

text: the issues are presented in such a lousy way , complete with some of the year 's -lrb- unintentionally -rrb- funniest moments , that it 's impossible to care .
translation: その問題は、とてもお粗末な方法で提示されており、今年の -lrb- 意図しない -rrb- 最も面白い瞬間のいくつかを伴っているため、気にかけることは不可能です。
back_translation: That issue is presented in a very poor manner, making it impossible to care about it as it comes with some of this year's -lrb- unintended -rrb- most entertaining moments.

text: blessed with two fine , nuanced lead performances .
translation: 2つの素晴らしく、微妙な主演パフォーマンスに恵まれています。
back_translation: It is blessed with two wonderful and subtle lead performances.

text: it all unfolds predictably , and the adventures that happen along the way seem repetitive and designed to fill time , providing no real sense of suspense .
translation: すべては予想通りに展開し、途中で起こる冒険も繰り返しのようで、時間を埋めるために作られているように見え、真のサスペンス感は提供されない。
back_translation: Everything unfolds as expected, and the adventures that happen along the way seem repetitive, as if created just to fill time, lacking true suspense.

text: an exhilarating experience .
translation: 爽快な体験。
back_translation: Refreshing experience.

text: a dazzling dream of a documentary .
translation: 目を見張るようなドキュメンタリーの夢。
back_translation: A breathtaking documentary dream.

text: narc is a no-bull throwback to 1970s action films .
translation: ナークは1970年代のアクション映画へのストレートな回帰だ。
back_translation: Narc is a straightforward return to the action movies of the 1970s.

text: jones ... makes a great impression as the writer-director of this little $ 1.8 million charmer , which may not be cutting-edge indie filmmaking but has a huge heart .
translation: ジョーンズは、この小さな180万ドルの魅力的な作品の脚本家兼監督として素晴らしい印象を与えています。これは最先端のインディー映画制作ではないかもしれませんが、心が大きく込められています。
back_translation: Jones makes a wonderful impression as the writer and director of this charming little $1.8 million piece. While it may not be cutting-edge indie filmmaking, it is filled with heart.

text: in the disturbingly involving family dysfunctional drama how i killed my father , french director anne fontaine delivers an inspired portrait of male-ridden angst and the emotional blockage that accompanies this human condition
translation: 『父を殺した方法』という衝撃的な家庭の dysfunction drama において、フランスの監督アンヌ・フォンテーヌは、男性に支配された苦悩と、この人間の状態に伴う感情の障害についてのインスパイアされた肖像を描いています。
back_translation: In the shocking domestic dysfunction drama titled "The Method of Killing My Father," French director Anne Fontaine paints an inspired portrait of the anguish under male dominance and the emotional disorders associated with this human condition.

text: animated drivel meant to enhance the self-image of drooling idiots .
translation: よだれを垂らす愚か者たちの自己イメージを高めるために作られたアニメーションの無駄作品。
back_translation: A pointless animation created to boost the self-image of drooling fools.

text: but rather , ` how can you charge money for this ? '
translation: むしろ、「これにお金を取るなんてどういうこと？」
back_translation: "Rather, what does it mean to charge money for this?"

text: `` austin powers in goldmember '' has the right stuff for silly summer entertainment and has enough laughs to sustain interest to the end .
translation: 「オースティン・パワーズ ゴールドメンバー」は、愚かな夏のエンターテイメントにぴったりで、最後まで興味を持続させる十分な笑いを提供しています。
back_translation: "Austin Powers: The Goldmember" is perfect for silly summer entertainment and provides enough laughs to keep your interest until the end.

text: not really a thriller so much as a movie for teens to laugh , groan and hiss at .
translation: あまりスリラーというわけではなく、ティーンエイジャーが笑ったり、うめいたり、 hiss したりするための映画です。
back_translation: It's not really a thriller; it's a movie for teenagers to laugh, groan, and hiss.

text: an erotic thriller that 's neither too erotic nor very thrilling , either .
translation: 過度に官能的でもなく、非常にスリリングでもない官能的スリラー。
back_translation: A sensual thriller that is neither overly sensual nor extremely thrilling.

text: family portrait of need , neurosis and nervy negativity is a rare treat that shows the promise of digital filmmaking .
translation: 必要、神経症、神経質なネガティブさの家族肖像は、デジタル映画制作の可能性を示す珍しい作品です。
back_translation: "Necessary" is a rare work that showcases the possibilities of digital filmmaking, portraying a family characterized by neuroses and neurotic negativity.

text: the uneven movie does have its charms and its funny moments but not quite enough of them .
translation: 不均衡な映画には魅力や面白い瞬間があるものの、それらが少し足りない。
back_translation: While there are魅力 and interesting moments in an unbalanced film, they are somewhat lacking.

text: it manages to squeeze by on angelina jolie 's surprising flair for self-deprecating comedy .
translation: アンジェリーナ・ジョリーの驚くべき自己卑下的なコメディのセンスで、何とかやりくりしている。
back_translation: With Angelina Jolie's amazing self-deprecating sense of comedy, I'm managing to get by somehow.

text: demme finally succeeds in diminishing his stature from oscar-winning master to lowly studio hack .
translation: デメはついに、オスカー受賞の巨匠から低劣なスタジオの使い走りへと自らの地位を低下させることに成功した。
back_translation: Deme has finally succeeded in lowering his status from an Oscar-winning master to a lowly errand boy for a mediocre studio.

text: i 'm not sure which is worse : the poor acting by the ensemble cast , the flat dialogue by vincent r. nebrida or the gutless direction by laurice guillen .
translation: どれが悪いのか分からない：アンサンブルキャストによるひどい演技、ビンセント・R・ネブリダの平凡な対話、またはローリス・ギレンの無気力な演出。
back_translation: I don't know what the problem is: the terrible acting by the ensemble cast, the mediocre dialogue by Vincent R. Nebrida, or the listless direction by Lauris Gillen.

text: it 's an ambitious film , and as with all ambitious films , it has some problems .
translation: これは野心的な映画であり、すべての野心的な映画と同様に、いくつかの問題があります。
back_translation: This is an ambitious film and, like all ambitious films, it has some problems.

text: like the best 60 minutes exposé , the film -lrb- at 80 minutes -rrb- is actually quite entertaining .
translation: 最高の60分間の特集のように、この映画（80分間）は実際に非常に面白いです。
back_translation: Like a great 60-minute special, this movie (80 minutes long) is actually very interesting.

text: the lousy lead performances ... keep the movie from ever reaching the comic heights it obviously desired .
translation: ひどい主演パフォーマンスが、映画が明らかに望んでいたコメディの高みには決して達しないようにしている。
back_translation: The terrible lead performance ensures that the film never reaches the heights of comedy it clearly aspired to.

text: medem may have disrobed most of the cast , leaving their bodies exposed , but the plot remains as guarded as a virgin with a chastity belt .
translation: メデムはキャストのほとんどを脱がせ、その身体をさらけ出しましたが、プロットは貞操帯をまとった処女のように守られています。
back_translation: Medem stripped most of the cast bare, exposing their bodies, but the plot is protected like a virgin wearing a chastity belt.

text: is it really an advantage to invest such subtlety and warmth in an animatronic bear when the humans are acting like puppets ?
translation: 本当に、人間がパペットのように振る舞っている中で、アニマトロニクスのクマにそんな微妙さや温かさを投資することが利点なのでしょうか？
back_translation: Is it really beneficial to invest such subtlety and warmth into an animatronic bear, while humans are behaving like puppets?

text: art-house to the core , read my lips is a genre-curling crime story that revives the free-wheeling noir spirit of old french cinema .
translation: アートハウスの本質を持つ「リード・マイ・リップス」は、古いフランス映画の自由奔放なノワールスピリットを蘇らせる、ジャンルを捻じ曲げた犯罪物語です。
back_translation: "Read My Lips," which embodies the essence of an art house, is a twisted crime story that revives the free-spirited noir spirit of old French films.

text: madonna has made herself over so often now , there 's apparently nothing left to work with , sort of like michael jackson 's nose .
translation: マドンナはこれまで何度も自分を変えてきたため、もう扱うものが何も残っていないようです。まるでマイケル・ジャクソンの鼻のように。
back_translation: Madonna seems to have changed herself so many times that there is nothing left to handle, almost like Michael Jackson's nose.

text: so exaggerated and broad that it comes off as annoying rather than charming .
translation: 非常に誇張されていて広範囲であるため、魅力的というよりはうざったく感じられます。
back_translation: It feels more annoying than attractive because it is highly exaggerated and extensive.

text: ... the story , like ravel 's bolero , builds to a crescendo that encompasses many more paths than we started with .
translation: ... 物語は、ラヴェルのボレロのように、私たちが始めたよりも多くの道を包含するクレッシェンドへと高まり続けます。
back_translation: The story continues to rise into a crescendo that encompasses more paths than when we began, like Ravel's Boléro.

text: it has fun with the quirks of family life , but it also treats the subject with fondness and respect .
translation: 家族生活の独特な特性を楽しみながらも、そのテーマに対して愛情と敬意を持って扱っています。
back_translation: While enjoying the unique characteristics of family life, it is treated with love and respect regarding that theme.

text: it should have stayed there .
translation: そこに留まっているべきだった。
back_translation: You should have stayed there.

text: well , it probably wo n't have you swinging from the trees hooting it 's praises , but it 's definitely worth taking a look .
translation: まあ、あなたが木からぶら下がってその称賛を叫ぶほどのものではないかもしれませんが、確実に見る価値はあります。
back_translation: Well, it may not be something to shout about while hanging from a tree, but it's definitely worth seeing.

text: bravo for history rewritten , and for the uncompromising knowledge that the highest power of all is the power of love .
translation: 歴史が書き換えられたことに拍手を送り、すべての中で最高の力は愛の力であるという妥協のない知識に感謝します。
back_translation: I applaud the rewriting of history and I am grateful for the unwavering knowledge that the greatest power of all is the power of love.

text: what a pity ... that the material is so second-rate .
translation: なんて残念なんでしょう…その素材がこんなにも二流だなんて。
back_translation: How disappointing... that material is so inferior.

text: it 's that good .
translation: それほど素晴らしい。
back_translation: That's so wonderful.

text: a mischievous visual style and oodles of charm make ` cherish ' a very good -lrb- but not great -rrb- movie .
translation: いたずらっぽいビジュアルスタイルとたっぷりの魅力が「チェリッシュ」を非常に良い（しかし素晴らしくはない）映画にしています。
back_translation: The playful visual style and abundant charm make "Cherish" a very good (but not wonderful) movie.

text: enthusiastically taking up the current teen movie concern with bodily functions , walt becker 's film pushes all the demographically appropriate comic buttons .
translation: 現在のティーン映画が身体機能に関する関心を熱心に取り上げている中で、ウォルト・ベッカーの映画は、すべての年齢層に適したコメディのボタンを押しています。
back_translation: While current teen films enthusiastically focus on bodily functions, Walt Becker's movie hits the comedy button suitable for all age groups.

text: a truly wonderful tale combined with stunning animation .
translation: 本当に素晴らしい物語が、美しいアニメーションと組み合わさっています。
back_translation: A truly wonderful story is combined with beautiful animation.

text: directors brett morgen and nanette burstein have put together a bold biographical fantasia .
translation: 監督のブレット・モーゲンとナネット・バーンスタインは、大胆な伝記ファンタジアをまとめ上げました。
back_translation: Directors Brett Morgen and Nanette Burstein have crafted a bold biographical fantasia.

text: ... a confusing drudgery .
translation: ... 混乱した厳しい作業。
back_translation: ... a confusing and difficult task.

text: it 's a testament to the film 's considerable charm that it succeeds in entertaining , despite playing out like a feature-length sitcom replete with stereotypical familial quandaries .
translation: 映画のかなりの魅力を物語る証拠として、典型的な家族の問題が満載の長編シットコムのように展開するにもかかわらず、観客を楽しませることに成功しています。
back_translation: Despite unfolding like a lengthy sitcom filled with typical family issues, it successfully entertains the audience as evidence of its considerable appeal.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- mess .
translation: -（a）- めちゃくちゃ。
back_translation: - (a) - Extremely messy.

text: plays like a bad blend of an overripe episode of tv 's dawson 's creek and a recycled and dumbed-down version of love story .
translation: 過熟な「ドーソンズ・クリーク」のエピソードと、再利用されて簡略化された「ラブストーリー」の悪いブレンドのような作品です。
back_translation: It is like a poorly blended work of an overripe episode of "Dawson's Creek" and a simplified, repurposed "Love Story."

text: black-and-white and unrealistic .
translation: 白黒で非現実的。
back_translation: Black and white and unrealistic.

text: -lrb- lin chung 's -rrb- voice is rather unexceptional , even irritating -lrb- at least to this western ear -rrb- , making it awfully hard to buy the impetus for the complicated love triangle that develops between the three central characters .
translation: リン・チュンの声は特に際立ったものではなく、むしろイライラさせるものであり（少なくともこの西洋の耳には）、三人の中央キャラクターの間で展開される複雑な恋愛関係の動機を理解するのが非常に難しい。
back_translation: Lin Chun's voice is not particularly outstanding; rather, it is somewhat irritating (at least to this Western ear), and it is very difficult to understand the motivations behind the complex romantic relationships that unfold among the three central characters.

text: it 's not helpful to listen to extremist name-calling , regardless of whether you think kissinger was a calculating fiend or just a slippery self-promoter .
translation: 過激な名指しを聞くことは役に立ちません。それがキッシンジャーを冷酷な悪党だと思うか、ただのずる賢い自己宣伝者だと思うかにかかわらず。
back_translation: Listening to extreme name-calling is not helpful. It doesn't matter whether you think Kissinger is a ruthless villain or just a cunning self-promoter.

text: hardly an objective documentary , but it 's great cinematic polemic ... love moore or loathe him , you 've got to admire ... the intensity with which he 's willing to express his convictions .
translation: 客観的なドキュメンタリーとは言えませんが、素晴らしい映画的論争です...ムーアを愛するか嫌うかは別として、彼が自分の信念を表現するために示す熱意には感服せざるを得ません。
back_translation: It may not be an objective documentary, but it is a wonderful cinematic controversy... Regardless of whether you love or hate Moore, one cannot help but admire the enthusiasm he shows in expressing his beliefs.

text: the movie is pretty funny now and then without in any way demeaning its subjects .
translation: その映画は、決してそのテーマを軽視することなく、時折とても面白いです。
back_translation: The movie is quite interesting at times, without ever underestimating its theme.

text: a lovely film ... elegant , witty and beneath a prim exterior unabashedly romantic ... hugely enjoyable in its own right though not really faithful to its source 's complexity .
translation: 素敵な映画です... エレガントで機知に富み、きちんとした外見の下には遠慮のないロマンチックさが隠れています... 自体として非常に楽しめますが、原作の複雑さにはあまり忠実ではありません。
back_translation: It’s a lovely movie... Elegant and witty, beneath the tidy appearance lies an unabashed romanticism... It's very enjoyable in itself, but it’s not very faithful to the complexity of the original work.

text: a summary of the plot does n't quite do justice to the awfulness of the movie , for that comes through all too painfully in the execution .
translation: プロットの要約ではその映画のひどさを十分に伝えられず、実行においてそれが痛々しく伝わってきます。
back_translation: The summary of the plot fails to convey the movie's awfulness adequately, and this is painfully evident in its execution.

text: taken as a whole , the tuxedo does n't add up to a whole lot .
translation: 全体として見ると、タキシードはあまり大したものではありません。
back_translation: Overall, the tuxedo is not that impressive.

text: good-looking but relentlessly lowbrow outing plays like clueless does south fork .
translation: 見た目は良いが、徹底的に低俗な外出は「クルーレス」がサウスフォークを演じるように感じられる。
back_translation: It looks good, but the thoroughly vulgar outing feels like "Clueless" playing South Fork.

text: intimate and panoramic .
translation: 親密で広大な。
back_translation: Intimate and vast.

text: suffers from all the excesses of the genre .
translation: ジャンルのすべての過剰に悩まされている。
back_translation: I am troubled by all the excesses of the genre.

text: hate it because it 's lousy .
translation: ダメだと思うのはそれがひどいからです。
back_translation: I think it’s not good because it’s terrible.

text: this rather unfocused , all-over-the-map movie would be a lot better if it pared down its plots and characters to a few rather than dozens ... or if it were subtler ... or if it had a sense of humor .
translation: このあまりにも焦点が定まらない、内容が散漫な映画は、プロットとキャラクターを数少ないものに絞り込むか、もっと控えめにするか、ユーモアのセンスを持っていればはるかに良くなるでしょう。
back_translation: This overly unfocused and scattered movie would be much better if it streamlined the plot and characters to just a few or took a more modest approach, provided it had a sense of humor.

text: big fat liar is little more than home alone raised to a new , self-deprecating level .
translation: ビッグ・ファット・ライアーは、ホーム・アローンを新しい、自己卑下的なレベルに引き上げただけのものです。
back_translation: Big Fat Liar is just a new, self-deprecating level of Home Alone.

text: a doa dud from frame one .
translation: フレーム1からのドアダッド。
back_translation: Door dad from frame 1.

text: why spend $ 9 on the same stuff you can get for a buck or so in that greasy little vidgame pit in the theater lobby ?
translation: 劇場のロビーにある脂っこいゲームコーナーで1ドル程度で手に入るものに9ドルも払う必要があるのでしょうか？
back_translation: Do you really need to pay 9 dollars for something that can be obtained for about 1 dollar at the greasy game corner in the theater lobby?

text: just the sort of lazy tearjerker that gives movies about ordinary folk a bad name .
translation: 一般の人々に関する映画に悪名を与えるような、怠惰な涙を誘う作品。
back_translation: A lazy, tear-jerking work that tarnishes the reputation of movies about ordinary people.

text: `` home movie '' is a sweet treasure and something well worth your time .
translation: 「ホームムービー」は素晴らしい宝物であり、あなたの時間を費やす価値があります。
back_translation: "Home movies" are a wonderful treasure and are worth your time.

text: it 's enough to watch huppert scheming , with her small , intelligent eyes as steady as any noir villain , and to enjoy the perfectly pitched web of tension that chabrol spins .
translation: ヒュペールが小さく賢い目を持ち、ノワールの悪役のようにじっと見つめながら策略を巡らせるのを観るだけで十分であり、シャブロルが織り成す完璧に調和の取れた緊張感の網を楽しむことができる。
back_translation: It is enough to simply watch Hupair with his small, clever eyes scheming as he stares intently like a noir villain, enjoying the perfectly balanced tension woven by Chabrol.

text: the bottom line with nemesis is the same as it has been with all the films in the series : fans will undoubtedly enjoy it , and the uncommitted need n't waste their time on it .
translation: ネメシスの結論は、シリーズのすべての映画と同様です。ファンは間違いなく楽しむでしょうが、興味のない人は時間を無駄にする必要はありません。
back_translation: The conclusion of Nemesis is the same as all the movies in the series. Fans will undoubtedly enjoy it, but those who are not interested don't need to waste their time.

text: robinson 's web of suspense matches the page-turning frenzy that clancy creates .
translation: ロビンソンの緊張感あふれるウェブは、クランシーが生み出すページをめくる興奮と匹敵します。
back_translation: The tension-filled web of Robinson rivals the excitement of turning the pages created by Clancy.

text: ... a hokey piece of nonsense that tries too hard to be emotional .
translation: 感情的になろうとしすぎる、馬鹿げたナンセンスな作品。
back_translation: Trying too hard to be emotional, a ridiculous and nonsensical work.

text: intelligent , caustic take on a great writer and dubious human being .
translation: 優れた作家であり疑わしい人間に対する知的で辛辣な見解。
back_translation: An intellectual and caustic perspective on a distinguished writer and a questionable human being.

text: like its title character , esther kahn is unusual but unfortunately also irritating .
translation: タイトルキャラクターのエスター・カーンのように、彼女は独特ですが、残念ながらイライラさせる存在でもあります。
back_translation: Like the titular character Esther Kahn, she is unique but unfortunately also an irritating presence.

text: where janice beard falters in its recycled aspects , implausibility , and sags in pace , it rises in its courageousness , and comedic employment .
translation: ジャニス・ビアードが再利用された側面や非現実性において躓き、テンポが落ちるところでは、その勇気とコメディの活用において高まります。
back_translation: Janis Beard stumbles in the aspects of reuse and unreality, where the tempo slows down, but her courage and use of comedy rise.

text: throws in enough clever and unexpected twists to make the formula feel fresh .
translation: 新鮮に感じさせるために、巧妙で予期しないひねりを十分に加えています。
back_translation: We have added clever and unexpected twists to make it feel fresh.

text: a fairly harmless but ultimately lifeless feature-length afterschool special .
translation: 比較的無害ではあるが、結局は生命のない長編アフタースクールスペシャル。
back_translation: It is relatively harmless, but ultimately a long-running after-school special without any life.

text: i did n't laugh .
translation: 私は笑わなかった。
back_translation: I did not laugh.

text: holm does his sly , intricate magic , and iben hjelje is entirely appealing as pumpkin .
