translation: 何も本当に起こらない大きな風に吹かれた映画。
back_translation: A film blown by a strong wind where nothing really happens.

text: one of those rare films that seems as though it was written for no one , but somehow manages to convince almost everyone that it was put on the screen , just for them .
translation: 誰のためにも書かれていないように思える珍しい映画の一つだが、なぜかほとんどすべての人を納得させて、そのためだけにスクリーンに映されたかのように感じさせる。
back_translation: It seems like one of those rare movies that wasn't made for anyone in particular, yet somehow manages to convince almost everyone, making it feel as if it was projected on the screen solely for them.

text: diane lane works nothing short of a minor miracle in unfaithful .
translation: ダイアン・レインは『不倫』で小さな奇跡を成し遂げています。
back_translation: Diane Lane achieves a small miracle in "Infidelity."

text: one of the very best movies ever made about the life of moviemaking .
translation: 映画製作の人生について作られた最高の映画の一つです。
back_translation: It is one of the best movies made about the life of film production.

text: is many things -- stoner midnight flick , sci-fi deconstruction , gay fantasia -- but above all it 's a love story as sanguine as its title .
translation: 多くの要素がある -- ストーナーの深夜映画、SFの解体、ゲイの幻想 -- しかし何よりもそれはそのタイトルにふさわしい、陽気なラブストーリーです。
back_translation: There are many elements -- stoner midnight movies, deconstructing sci-fi, gay fantasies -- but above all, it is a cheerful love story that lives up to its title.

text: but if the essence of magic is its make-believe promise of life that soars above the material realm , this is the opposite of a truly magical movie .
translation: しかし、魔法の本質が物質界を超えて舞い上がる生命の作り話の約束であるならば、これは真に魔法の映画とは逆のものである。
back_translation: However, if the essence of magic is a promise of a story about life soaring beyond the material world, then this is truly the opposite of a magical film.

text: a loud , brash and mainly unfunny high school comedy .
translation: うるさくて派手で、主に面白くない高校コメディ。
back_translation: Noisy, flashy, and mostly unfunny high school comedy.

text: watching junk like this induces a kind of abstract guilt , as if you were paying dues for good books unread , fine music never heard .
translation: このようなクズを見ていると、良い本を読まなかったり、素晴らしい音楽を聴かなかったりすることで、何か抽象的な罪悪感を抱くような気分になる。
back_translation: When I see such trash, I feel somewhat abstractly guilty for not reading good books or listening to wonderful music.

text: an inuit masterpiece that will give you goosebumps as its uncanny tale of love , communal discord , and justice unfolds .
translation: イヌイットの傑作で、愛、共同体の不和、そして正義の不気味な物語が展開する中で、あなたに鳥肌を立てるような感動を与えるでしょう。
back_translation: A masterpiece by the Inuit that will give you goosebumps as it unfolds a haunting story of love, community discord, and justice.

text: can be viewed as pure composition and form -- film as music
translation: 純粋な構成と形として見なすことができる -- 映画は音楽のように
back_translation: It can be seen as pure composition and form -- like music, movies.

text: this is a remake by the numbers , linking a halfwit plot to a series of standup routines in which wilson and murphy show how funny they could have been in a more ambitious movie .
translation: これは数字によるリメイクで、半可笑しなプロットを一連のスタンドアップルーチンに結びつけており、ウィルソンとマーフィーがもっと野心的な映画でいかに面白かったかを示しています。
back_translation: This is a remake by numbers that ties a somewhat ridiculous plot to a series of stand-up routines, showing how funny Wilson and Murphy were in a more ambitious film.

text: the jokes are telegraphed so far in advance they must have been lost in the mail .
translation: ジョークはあまりにも前もって伝えられているので、郵便で紛失したに違いありません。
back_translation: The joke was conveyed too long in advance, so it must have been lost in the mail.

text: a cruelly funny twist on teen comedy packed with inventive cinematic tricks and an ironically killer soundtrack
translation: 残酷に面白いひねりのあるティーンコメディで、独創的な映画的手法と皮肉なまでに素晴らしいサウンドトラックが詰まっています。
back_translation: A brutally funny teen comedy filled with innovative cinematic techniques and an ironically fantastic soundtrack.

text: smarter than its commercials make it seem .
translation: CMが見せるよりも賢い。
back_translation: Smarter than what the commercial shows.

text: a reasonably entertaining sequel to 1994 's surprise family hit that may strain adult credibility .
translation: 1994年の驚きのファミリーヒットの妥当なエンターテインメント性を持つ続編で、大人の信頼性を試すかもしれません。
back_translation: A sequel to the surprising family hit of 1994 that may test the credibility of adults, while maintaining a reasonable level of entertainment.

text: could have been crisper and punchier , but it 's likely to please audiences who like movies that demand four hankies .
translation: もう少しキリッとしていてインパクトがあったかもしれませんが、ハンカチを４枚必要とする映画が好きな観客には喜ばれるでしょう。
back_translation: It might have been a bit more sharp and impactful, but it will surely please audiences who enjoy movies that require four handkerchiefs.

text: a french film with a more down-home flavor .
translation: より家庭的な雰囲気のフランスの映画。
back_translation: A French movie with a more homely atmosphere.

text: when a movie asks you to feel sorry for mick jagger 's sex life , it already has one strike against it .
translation: 映画がミック・ジャガーの性生活に同情するよう求めてくると、それだけで既に一つのストライクです。
back_translation: When a movie seeks to elicit sympathy for Mick Jagger's sex life, that's already a strike against it.

text: an asian neo-realist treasure .
translation: アジアのネオリアリズムの宝物。
back_translation: Treasures of Asian Neorealism.

text: generic thriller junk .
translation: 一般的なスリラーのゴミ。
back_translation: Typical thriller garbage.

text: an honest , sensitive story from a vietnamese point of view .
translation: ベトナムの視点から見た、正直で繊細な物語。
back_translation: A sincere and delicate story from the perspective of Vietnam.

text: while some of the camera work is interesting , the film 's mid-to-low budget is betrayed by the surprisingly shoddy makeup work .
translation: カメラワークには興味深い部分もありますが、映画の中低予算は驚くほど粗雑なメイクワークによって裏切られています。
back_translation: There are interesting aspects to the camera work, but the low to mid-budget of the film is betrayed by surprisingly rough makeup work.

text: more than their unique residences , home movie is about the people who live in them , who have carved their own comfortable niche in the world and have been kind enough to share it .
translation: ユニークな住居以上に、『ホームムービー』は、その中に住む人々、つまり自分の快適な居場所を世界に築き、それを共有してくれる親切な人々についての物語です。
back_translation: More than a unique dwelling, "Home Movie" is a story about the people who live within it, that is, the kind-hearted individuals who build their comfortable places in the world and share them with others.

text: apparently , romantic comedy with a fresh point of view just does n't figure in the present hollywood program .
translation: 明らかに、斬新な視点を持ったロマンティック・コメディは、現在のハリウッドのプログラムには入っていないようです。
back_translation: Clearly, it seems that a romantic comedy with a fresh perspective is not currently part of Hollywood's lineup.

text: thanks to confident filmmaking and a pair of fascinating performances , the way to that destination is a really special walk in the woods .
translation: 自信に満ちた映画制作と魅力的な演技のおかげで、その目的地へ向かう道は本当に特別な森の散策です。
back_translation: Thanks to confident filmmaking and captivating performances, the journey to that destination is truly a special walk through the forest.

text: a compelling allegory about the last days of germany 's democratic weimar republic .
translation: ドイツの民主的ヴァイマル共和国の最期の日々に関する魅力的な寓話。
back_translation: An intriguing fable about the last days of the democratic Weimar Republic of Germany.

text: or maybe `` how will you feel after an 88-minute rip-off of the rock with action confined to slo-mo gun firing and random glass-shattering ? ''
translation: あるいは「スローモーションの銃撃とランダムなガラス破壊に限定された88分間の『ザ・ロック』の盗作を見た後、あなたはどのように感じるでしょうか？」
back_translation: "Or how would you feel after watching an 88-minute 'The Rock' rip-off limited to slow-motion gunfire and random glass breaking?"

text: it falls far short of poetry , but it 's not bad prose .
translation: 詩には遠く及ばないが、悪くない散文だ。
back_translation: It's not anywhere near poetry, but it's not bad prose.

text: the things this movie tries to get the audience to buy just wo n't fly with most intelligent viewers .
translation: この映画が観客に受け入れさせようとするものは、ほとんどの知的な視聴者には受け入れられない。
back_translation: What this movie tries to make the audience accept is not accepted by most intellectual viewers.

text: sillier , cuter , and shorter than the first -lrb- as best i remember -rrb- , but still a very good time at the cinema .
translation: 最初よりも愚かで、かわいくて、短いですが（私の記憶が正しければ）、それでも映画館でとても楽しい時間を過ごしました。
back_translation: It's more foolish, cute, and shorter than at first, but (if my memory serves me right), I still had a very enjoyable time at the cinema.

text: by the time the surprise ending is revealed , interest can not be revived .
translation: サプライズの結末が明らかになる頃には、興味を再生させることはできません。
back_translation: By the time the surprise ending is revealed, it is impossible to rekindle interest.

text: a sloppy slapstick throwback to long gone bottom-of-the-bill fare like the ghost and mr. chicken .
translation: 昔の下位の作品である「ゴーストとミスター・チキン」のような、雑なスラップスティックの回帰。
back_translation: A return to rough slapstick like the old subpar work "Ghost and Mr. Chicken."

text: a beguiling evocation of the quality that keeps dickens evergreen : the exuberant openness with which he expresses our most basic emotions .
translation: ディケンズが常に新鮮な理由を魅力的に呼び覚ますのは、彼が私たちの最も基本的な感情を表現する際に示す活気に満ちた開放性です。
back_translation: The reason Dickens remains ever fresh is the vibrant openness he demonstrates when expressing our most fundamental emotions.

text: scotland , pa is entirely too straight-faced to transcend its clever concept .
translation: スコットランド、ペンシルベニアは、その巧妙なコンセプトを超えるにはあまりにも真面目すぎる。
back_translation: Scotland, Pennsylvania is too serious to go beyond its clever concept.

text: i firmly believe that a good video game movie is going to show up soon .
translation: 私は、優れたビデオゲームの映画がすぐに登場するだろうと確信しています。
back_translation: I am confident that excellent video game movies will soon be released.

text: chaiken ably balances real-time rhythms with propulsive incident .
translation: チャイケンは、リアルタイムのリズムと推進的な出来事を巧みにバランスさせています。
back_translation: Chaiken skillfully balances real-time rhythms with propulsive events.

text: the movie is about as deep as that sentiment .
translation: その映画はその感情と同じくらい深いです。
back_translation: That movie is as deep as those emotions.

text: brainless , but enjoyably over-the-top , the retro gang melodrama , deuces wild represents fifties teen-gang machismo in a way that borders on rough-trade homo-eroticism .
translation: 脳がないが、楽しめるほど過剰なレトロギャングメロドラマ『デューシーズ・ワイルド』は、50年代のティーンギャングの男らしさを、粗野なトレードのホモエロティシズムに近い形で表現している。
back_translation: "Deuce's Wild," an excessively retro gang melodrama that can be enjoyed despite lacking a brain, expresses the masculinity of 1950s teen gangs in a form reminiscent of the rough trade's homoeroticism.

text: if you ever wanted to be an astronaut , this is the ultimate movie experience - it 's informative and breathtakingly spectacular .
translation: もしあなたが宇宙飛行士になりたいと思ったことがあるなら、これは究極の映画体験です - 情報が豊かで驚くほど壮観です。
back_translation: If you have ever wanted to be an astronaut, this is the ultimate movie experience - rich in information and extraordinarily spectacular.

text: even the digressions are funny .
translation: 脱線さえも面白い。
back_translation: Even the digressions are interesting.

text: and , thanks to the presence of ` the king , ' it also rocks .
translation: そして、「王」の存在のおかげで、それはさらに素晴らしいです。
back_translation: And because of the existence of the "king," it becomes even more wonderful.

text: in other words , about as bad a film you 're likely to see all year .
translation: 言い換えれば、今年見る可能性のある最悪の映画の一つだ。
back_translation: In other words, it's one of the worst movies you might see this year.

text: visually fascinating ... an often intense character study about fathers and sons , loyalty and duty .
translation: 視覚的に魅力的で、父と息子、忠誠心と義務についてのしばしば激しいキャラクター研究です。
back_translation: A visually striking and often intense character study about a father and son, loyalty, and duty.

text: as violent , profane and exploitative as the most offensive action flick you 've ever seen .
translation: 最も攻撃的なアクション映画と同じように、暴力的で冒涜的で搾取的です。
back_translation: Like the most aggressive action movies, it is violent, blasphemous, and exploitative.

text: we 've seen the hippie-turned-yuppie plot before , but there 's an enthusiastic charm in fire that makes the formula fresh again .
translation: ヒッピーからヤッピーに変わるプロットは以前に見たことがありますが、『ファイア』にはその公式を再び新鮮にする熱心な魅力があります。
back_translation: I've seen the plot of transforming from a hippie to a yuppie before, but "Fire" has an enthusiastic charm that refreshes that formula once again.

text: gets better after foster leaves that little room .
translation: フォスターがその小さな部屋を出た後、良くなります。
back_translation: Things will get better after Foster leaves that small room.

text: compulsively watchable , no matter how degraded things get .
translation: どんなに状況が悪化しても、強迫的に見たくなる。
back_translation: No matter how much the situation worsens, I feel an obsessive urge to see it.

text: -lrb- evans is -rrb- a fascinating character , and deserves a better vehicle than this facetious smirk of a movie .
translation: エバンスは魅力的なキャラクターであり、この軽薄な映画よりももっと良い作品にふさわしい。
back_translation: Evans is a charming character and deserves a better work than this superficial movie.

text: the plot grows thin soon , and you find yourself praying for a quick resolution .
translation: プロットはすぐに薄くなり、あなたは早い解決を願うようになります。
back_translation: The plot soon becomes thin, and you start to wish for a quick resolution.

text: this is rote spookiness , with nary an original idea -lrb- or role , or edit , or score , or anything , really -rrb- in sight , and the whole of the proceedings beg the question ` why ? '
translation: これは単なる陳腐な不気味さであり、独創的なアイデアは全く見当たらない—役割も、編集も、スコアも、何もかも、実際には—その全体の進行は「なぜ？」という疑問を呼び起こす。
back_translation: This is merely a clichéd eeriness, with no original ideas in sight—roles, editing, scoring, everything, really—that the whole progression evokes the question, "Why?"

text: manages to be wholesome and subversive at the same time .
translation: 同時に健全でありながら反逆的であることができる。
back_translation: It can be both healthy and rebellious at the same time.

text: feels aimless for much of its running time , until late in the film when a tidal wave of plot arrives , leaving questions in its wake .
translation: 映画の大半では無目的な感じがし、後半になってプロットの大波が押し寄せてきて、その余波に疑問を残します。
back_translation: In most of the movie, it feels aimless, and in the second half, a huge wave of plot comes crashing in, leaving behind questions in its wake.

text: a few zingers aside , the writing is indifferent , and jordan brady 's direction is prosaic .
translation: いくつかの辛辣な言葉は別として、文章は無関心であり、ジョーダン・ブラディの監督は平凡です。
back_translation: Apart from a few harsh words, the writing is indifferent, and Jordan Brady's direction is mediocre.

text: the corpse count ultimately overrides what little we learn along the way about vicarious redemption .
translation: 最終的には死体の数が、私たちが道中で得る少しの代理的救済についての知識を覆い隠してしまいます。
back_translation: In the end, the number of corpses will overshadow the little knowledge of proxy salvation that we gain along the way.

text: a wishy-washy melodramatic movie that shows us plenty of sturm und drung , but explains its characters ' decisions only unsatisfactorily .
translation: 中途半端でメロドラマ的な映画で、たくさんの嵐や興奮を見せるが、登場人物の決断を満足に説明することはない。
back_translation: It's a half-hearted and melodramatic film that showcases a lot of storms and excitement, but fails to adequately explain the characters' decisions.

text: a tired , unnecessary retread ... a stale copy of a picture that was n't all that great to begin with .
translation: 疲れきった、無駄な再利用…そもそもあまり良くなかった作品の古くなったコピー。
back_translation: Exhausted, pointless reuse... an old copy of a work that wasn't really good to begin with.

text: is n't as sharp as the original ... despite some visual virtues , ` blade ii ' just does n't cut it .
translation: オリジナルほど鋭くはない...視覚的な美点はあるものの、『ブレイド2』はただ物足りない。
back_translation: It's not as sharp as the original... While it has visual beauty, "Blade II" is just unsatisfying.

text: enigma lacks it .
translation: エニグマはそれを欠いています。
back_translation: The Enigma lacks that.

text: mr. caine and mr. fraser are the whole show here , with their memorable and resourceful performances .
translation: ケインさんとフレイザーさんがここでの全てであり、彼らの記憶に残る創造的な演技が印象的です。
back_translation: Mr. Kane and Mr. Fraser are everything here, and their memorable creative performances are impressive.

text: too bad none of it is funny .
translation: 残念ながら、そのどれも面白くありません。
back_translation: Unfortunately, none of those are interesting.

text: overcomes its visual hideousness with a sharp script and strong performances .
translation: 視覚的な醜さを鋭い脚本と強力な演技で克服している。
back_translation: Overcoming visual ugliness with a sharp script and powerful acting.

text: there 's no conversion effort , much of the writing is genuinely witty and both stars are appealing enough to probably have a good shot at a hollywood career , if they want one .
translation: 翻訳の努力は不要で、多くの文章は本当に機知に富んでおり、両方のスターはハリウッドでのキャリアを望むなら、きっと良いチャンスがあるほど魅力的です。
back_translation: There is no need for translation efforts, as many of the sentences are truly witty, and both stars have attractive qualities that certainly provide good opportunities if they wish for a career in Hollywood.

text: yet in its own aloof , unreachable way it 's so fascinating you wo n't be able to look away for a second .
translation: それは自らの冷淡で手の届かない方法で、非常に魅力的であり、あなたは一瞬たりとも目が離せなくなるでしょう。
back_translation: It is extremely captivating in its own cold and inaccessible way, and you won't be able to take your eyes off it for even a moment.

text: this film puts wang at the forefront of china 's sixth generation of film makers .
translation: この映画は、中国の第六世代の映画製作者の最前線にワンを置いています。
back_translation: This film places Wang at the forefront of China's sixth generation of filmmakers.

text: a sobering and powerful documentary about the most severe kind of personal loss : rejection by one 's mother .
translation: 母親からの拒絶という最も厳しい個人的喪失についての、心を沈ませる力強いドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A powerful and heart-wrenching documentary about the most severe personal loss of rejection from one's mother.

text: like the full monty , this is sure to raise audience 's spirits and leave them singing long after the credits roll .
translation: フルモンティのように、これは観客の気分を高め、エンディングクレジットが流れた後も長く歌い続けることを確信させる作品です。
back_translation: Like The Full Monty, this is a work that elevates the audience's mood and makes them feel confident in singing along long after the ending credits have rolled.

text: i have always appreciated a smartly written motion picture , and , whatever flaws igby goes down may possess , it is undeniably that .
translation: 私は常に巧みに書かれた映画を評価してきました。そして、「イグビーが降りる」には欠点があるかもしれませんが、それは間違いなくそうです。
back_translation: I have always appreciated cleverly written movies. And while "Igby Goes Down" may have its flaws, it is definitely that.

text: -lrb- n -rrb- o matter how much good will the actors generate , showtime eventually folds under its own thinness .
translation: -rrb- 俳優がどれだけ良い意志を生み出しても、ショータイムは最終的にその薄さに折れてしまいます。
back_translation: No matter how well an actor creates good intentions, the showtime ultimately bends to its thinness.

text: not many movies have that kind of impact on me these days .
translation: 最近、そのような影響を私に与える映画はあまりありません。
back_translation: Recently, there haven't been many movies that have an impact on me like that.

text: after sitting through this sloppy , made-for-movie comedy special , it makes me wonder if lawrence hates criticism so much that he refuses to evaluate his own work .
translation: このいい加減で映画向けのコメディスペシャルを見た後、ローレンスは批判をそんなに嫌っているのか、それとも自分の作品を評価しようとしないのかと疑問に思います。
back_translation: After watching this sloppy, movie-style comedy special, Lawrence wonders whether he hates criticism so much or if he simply doesn't want to evaluate his own work.

text: texan director george ratliff had unlimited access to families and church meetings , and he delivers fascinating psychological fare .
translation: テキサスの監督ジョージ・ラトリフは家族や教会の集会に無制限にアクセスでき、魅力的な心理的内容を提供しています。
back_translation: Texas coach George Ratliff has unlimited access to family and church gatherings, providing engaging psychological content.

text: obviously , a lot of people wasted a lot of their time -lrb- including mine -rrb- on something very inconsequential .
translation: 明らかに、多くの人々が非常に重要でないことに多くの時間を無駄にしました（私も含めて）。
back_translation: Clearly, many people have wasted a lot of time on things that are not very important (myself included).

text: should have gone straight to video .
translation: 直接ビデオに行くべきだった。
back_translation: I should have gone directly to the video.

text: maryam is more timely now than ever .
translation: マリアムは今まで以上にタイムリーです。
back_translation: Mariam is more timely than ever before.

text: koepp 's screenplay is n't nearly surprising or clever enough to sustain a reasonable degree of suspense on its own .
translation: コエップの脚本は、それ自体で合理的な緊張感を維持するには驚きや巧妙さが不足している。
back_translation: The script of Koep lacks the surprises and cleverness needed to maintain a reasonable tension on its own.

text: it deserves to be seen everywhere .
translation: どこでも見る価値があります。
back_translation: It is worth seeing anywhere.

text: a timely look back at civil disobedience , anti-war movements and the power of strong voices .
translation: 市民的不服従、反戦運動、そして強い声の力を振り返るタイムリーな考察。
back_translation: A timely reflection on civil disobedience, anti-war movements, and the power of a strong voice.

text: you do n't need to know your ice-t 's from your cool-j 's to realize that as far as these shootings are concerned , something is rotten in the state of california .
translation: カリフォルニア州では、これらの発砲事件に関して何かが腐っていると気づくために、あなたはアイス-Tのことを知る必要も、クール-Jのことを知る必要もありません。
back_translation: In California, you don't need to know about Ice-T or Cool J to realize that something is rotten regarding these shootings.

text: by turns very dark and very funny .
translation: 時には非常に暗く、時には非常に面白い。
back_translation: Sometimes very dark, and sometimes very funny.

text: completely awful iranian drama ... as much fun as a grouchy ayatollah in a cold mosque .
translation: 完全にひどいイランのドラマ...寒いモスクの中で不機嫌なアヤトラのように楽しくない。
back_translation: Completely awful Iranian drama... It's not fun, like a grumpy Ayatollah in a cold mosque.

text: suspend your disbelief here and now , or you 'll be shaking your head all the way to the credits .
translation: ここで今、あなたの不信を放棄してください。そうしないと、クレジットが流れるまでずっと首を振っていることになるでしょう。
back_translation: Please abandon your distrust here and now. Otherwise, you will be shaking your head until the credits roll.

text: nothing more than four or five mild chuckles surrounded by 86 minutes of overly-familiar and poorly-constructed comedy .
translation: 86分間の過度に馴染みのある、構成の悪いコメディの中に、4、5回の軽い笑いしかない。
back_translation: In this overly familiar, poorly structured comedy that lasts 86 minutes, there are only four or five light laughs.

text: uneven but a lot of fun .
translation: 不均一だけど、とても楽しい。
back_translation: It's uneven, but very fun.

text: the satire is just too easy to be genuinely satisfying .
translation: その風刺はあまりにも簡単で、真に満足するには不十分です。
back_translation: The satire is too simplistic and insufficient for true satisfaction.

text: the biggest problem i have -lrb- other than the very sluggish pace -rrb- is we never really see her esther blossom as an actress , even though her talent is supposed to be growing .
translation: 私が抱えている最大の問題は -lrb- とても鈍い進行を除けば -rrb-、彼女のエスター・ブロッサムとしての女優としての成長を本当に見ることがないことです。彼女の才能は成長しているはずなのに。
back_translation: The biggest problem I have - aside from the very slow progression - is that I really don't see her growth as an actress in her role as Esther Blossom. Her talent should be growing.

text: ... it 's as comprehensible as any dummies guide , something even non-techies can enjoy .
translation: それはどんな素人向けガイドと同じくらい理解しやすく、非技術者でも楽しめるものです。
back_translation: It is as easy to understand as any beginner's guide and enjoyable for non-technical people as well.

text: a zombie movie in every sense of the word -- mindless , lifeless , meandering , loud , painful , obnoxious .
translation: 言葉のすべての意味でのゾンビ映画 - 無意識で、無生気で、だらだらしていて、大きく、辛く、不快な。
back_translation: A zombie movie in every sense of the word - unconscious, lifeless, slack, large, harsh, and unpleasant.

text: -lrb- moore 's -rrb- better at fingering problems than finding solutions .
translation: 「モアの方が問題を指摘するのが得意で、解決策を見つけるのは苦手だ。」
back_translation: "Moira is better at pointing out problems, but not so good at finding solutions."

text: ... fuses the events of her life with the imagery in her paintings so vividly that the artist 's work may take on a striking new significance for anyone who sees the film .
translation: 彼女の人生の出来事を彼女の絵画のイメージと非常に鮮明に融合させるため、アーティストの作品は映画を見る人にとって驚くべき新しい重要性を帯びることがある。
back_translation: To vividly merge the events of her life with the imagery of her paintings, the artist's work can take on a surprising new significance for those watching the film.

text: is there a group of more self-absorbed women than the mother and daughters featured in this film ?
translation: この映画に登場する母親と娘たちよりも自己中心的な女性のグループはいますか？
back_translation: Is there a group of women who are more self-centered than the mothers and daughters featured in this movie?

text: there are cheesy backdrops , ridiculous action sequences , and many tired jokes about men in heels .
translation: チーズのような背景、ばかげたアクションシーン、そしてハイヒールを履いた男性についての多くの使い古されたジョークがあります。
back_translation: There are many worn-out jokes about a cheese-like background, ridiculous action scenes, and men wearing high heels.

text: -lrb- green is -rrb- the comedy equivalent of saddam hussein , and i 'm just about ready to go to the u.n. and ask permission for a preemptive strike .
translation: -（グリーンは）サダム・フセインのコメディ版で、私は今まさに国連に行って先制攻撃の許可を求める準備ができています。
back_translation: - (Green is) the comedy version of Saddam Hussein, and I am just about ready to go to the United Nations to seek permission for a preemptive strike.

text: once again , director chris columbus takes a hat-in-hand approach to rowling that stifles creativity and allows the film to drag on for nearly three hours .
translation: 再び、監督クリス・コロンバスは、クリエイティビティを抑制し、映画がほぼ三時間もダラダラと続く原因となる、頭を下げるようなアプローチを取っています。
back_translation: Once again, director Chris Columbus takes an approach that stifles creativity, resulting in the film dragging on for nearly three hours.

text: some of the characters die and others do n't , and the film pretends that those living have learned some sort of lesson , and , really , nobody in the viewing audience cares .
translation: 登場人物の中には死ぬ者もいれば死なない者もおり、映画は生き残った者たちが何らかの教訓を学んだかのように装っているが、実際には視聴者の誰も気にしていない。
back_translation: Among the characters, some die while others do not, and the film pretends that the survivors have learned some kind of lesson, but in reality, no one in the audience cares.

text: brave and sweetly rendered love story .
translation: 勇敢で甘美に描かれた愛の物語。
back_translation: A story of love portrayed boldly and sweetly.

text: for decades we 've marveled at disney 's rendering of water , snow , flames and shadows in a hand-drawn animated world .
translation: 何十年もの間、私たちはディズニーが手描きアニメの世界で水、雪、炎、影を表現する様子に驚嘆してきました。
back_translation: For decades, we have been amazed by how Disney portrays water, snow, fire, and shadows in the world of hand-drawn animation.

text: the level of acting elevates the material above pat inspirational status and gives it a sturdiness and solidity that we 've long associated with washington the actor .
translation: 演技のレベルが素材を単なる感動的なstatusを超えさせており、ワシントンという俳優に長い間関連付けてきた頑丈さと安定感を与えている。
back_translation: The level of acting elevates the material beyond mere emotional status, providing the robustness and stability that has long been associated with the actor Washington.

text: while tattoo borrows heavily from both seven and the silence of the lambs , it manages to maintain both a level of sophisticated intrigue and human-scale characters that suck the audience in .
translation: タトゥーは「セブン」と「羊たちの沈黙」から多くを借りているが、洗練された興味深さと人間的なキャラクターのレベルを維持し、観客を引き込むことに成功している。
back_translation: The tattoo borrows a lot from "Seven" and "The Silence of the Lambs," but successfully maintains a sophisticated intrigue and a level of human character that captivates the audience.

text: long before it 's over , you 'll be thinking of 51 ways to leave this loser .
translation: 終わるずっと前に、あなたはこの負け犬から去る51の方法を考えているでしょう。
back_translation: Long before it ends, you are probably thinking of 51 ways to leave this loser.

text: the film belongs to the marvelous verdu , a sexy slip of an earth mother who mourns her tragedies in private and embraces life in public
translation: その映画は素晴らしいヴェルデュに属しており、悲劇を内に秘めて嘆き、公の場では人生を楽しむセクシーな地球母のような存在です。
back_translation: The movie belongs to a wonderful category of Verdoux, harboring a tragedy within while lamenting, yet appearing in public as a sexy Earth Mother enjoying life.

text: a thought-provoking and often-funny drama about isolation .
translation: 孤独についての考えさせられる、しばしば面白いドラマ。
back_translation: A thought-provoking and often amusing drama about loneliness.

text: bittersweet comedy\/drama full of life , hand gestures , and some really adorable italian guys .
translation: 人生に満ちたほろ苦いコメディ／ドラマで、手振りや本当にかわいいイタリア人たちが登場します。
back_translation: A bittersweet comedy/drama filled with life, featuring expressive gestures and truly charming Italians.

text: the town has kind of an authentic feel , but each one of these people stand out and everybody else is in the background and it just seems manufactured to me and artificial .
translation: その町はなんだか本物の雰囲気がありますが、これらの人々はそれぞれ際立っていて、他の人々は背景にいるだけで、私にはそれが作られたものであり人工的に感じます。
back_translation: The town has a somewhat genuine atmosphere, but these people are each distinct, while others are just in the background, making it feel manufactured and artificial to me.

text: this is a sincerely crafted picture that deserves to emerge from the traffic jam of holiday movies .
translation: これは、ホリデー映画の交通渋滞から抜け出すに値する、心のこもった作品です。
back_translation: This is a heartfelt work that is worth escaping from the holiday movie traffic jam.

text: remarkable for its intelligence and intensity .
translation: 知性と強度において注目に値する。
back_translation: It is notable in terms of intelligence and strength.

text: a complete waste of time .
translation: 完全に時間の無駄です。
back_translation: It's completely a waste of time.

text: should be required viewing for civics classes and would-be public servants alike .
translation: 市民教育の授業や将来の公務員にとって必見であるべきです。
back_translation: It should be essential for civic education classes and for future public servants.

text: an intimate contemplation of two marvelously messy lives .
translation: 二つの素晴らしく混沌とした人生についての親密な考察。
back_translation: An intimate exploration of two wonderfully chaotic lives.

text: you never know where changing lanes is going to take you but it 's a heck of a ride .
translation: レーンを変更することでどこに行くかわからないけれど、それは素晴らしい旅だ。
back_translation: I don't know where I'll go by changing lanes, but it's a wonderful journey.

text: resident evil is n't a product of its cinematic predecessors so much as an mtv , sugar hysteria , and playstation cocktail .
translation: バイオハザードは、その映画の前作の産物というよりも、MTV、シュガーヒステリア、そしてプレイステーションのカクテルです。
back_translation: Resident Evil is more of a cocktail of MTV, sugar hysteria, and PlayStation than a product of its predecessor film.

text: that works .
translation: それはうまくいきます。
back_translation: It will work well.

text: what 's most memorable about circuit is that it 's shot on digital video , whose tiny camera enables shafer to navigate spaces both large ... and small ... with considerable aplomb .
translation: サーキットで最も記憶に残るのは、それがデジタルビデオで撮影されていることであり、その小さなカメラがシャファーに広い空間と狭い空間の両方をかなりの自信を持って移動させることを可能にしている点です。
back_translation: What remains most memorable about the circuit is that it is filmed in digital video, and the way that small camera allows the chauffeur to navigate both wide and narrow spaces with considerable confidence.

text: the journey is worth your time , especially if you have ellen pompeo sitting next to you for the ride .
translation: その旅はあなたの時間を無駄にしない価値があります。特に、隣にエレン・ポンぺオが座っているならなおさらです。
back_translation: That journey is worth your time, especially if Ellen Pompeo is sitting next to you.

text: a classy , sprightly spin on film .
translation: 上品で活気のある映画のひねり。
back_translation: An elegant and lively twist on a movie.

text: frankly , it 's kind of insulting , both to men and women .
translation: 率直に言って、それは男性にも女性にも少し侮辱的です。
back_translation: To be frank, it's a bit insulting to both men and women.

text: in addition to the overcooked , ham-fisted direction , which has all the actors reaching for the back row , the dialogue sounds like horrible poetry .
translation: 過剰に調理された手探りの演出に加え、すべての俳優が後方を意識している中で、セリフはひどい詩のように聞こえます。
back_translation: In addition to the overly cooked, fumbling presentation, the dialogue sounds like terrible poetry with all the actors being overly aware of the background.

text: watching austin powers in goldmember is like binging on cotton candy .
translation: オースティン・パワーズ ゴールドメンバーを観るのは、わたあめを食べまくるようなものだ。
back_translation: Watching Austin Powers: Goldmember is like eating a ton of cotton candy.

text: nothing overly original , mind you , but solidly entertaining .
translation: 特に目新しいわけではありませんが、しっかりと楽しませてくれます。
back_translation: It's not particularly new, but it definitely provides good entertainment.

text: it ends up being neither , and fails at both endeavors .
translation: 結局どちらにもならず、両方の試みに失敗します。
back_translation: In the end, neither path is taken, and both attempts fail.

text: so putrid it is not worth the price of the match that should be used to burn every print of the film .
translation: それは腐っていて、映画のすべてのコピーを燃やすために使われるべきマッチの価格さえも価値がない。
back_translation: It is rotten, and is not even worth the price of the match that should be used to burn all copies of the movie.

text: one of the finest , most humane and important holocaust movies ever made .
translation: 最も素晴らしく、人間味あふれる、そして重要なホロコースト映画の一つです。
back_translation: One of the most wonderful, human, and important Holocaust films.

text: this fascinating look at israel in ferment feels as immediate as the latest news footage from gaza and , because of its heightened , well-shaped dramas , twice as powerful .
translation: この魅力的なイスラエルの混乱を描いた作品は、ガザからの最新のニュース映像と同じくらい切迫感があり、緊張感のある緻密なドラマによって、2倍の力を持っています。
back_translation: This compelling work depicting the turmoil in Israel is as urgent as the latest news footage from Gaza, and it possesses double the impact due to its tense and meticulously crafted drama.

text: if villainous vampires are your cup of blood , blade 2 is definitely a cut above the rest .
translation: 悪役の吸血鬼が好みなら、『ブレイド2』は間違いなく他の作品より一枚上手です。
back_translation: If you prefer villainous vampires, "Blade II" is definitely a cut above other works.

text: if swimfan does catch on , it may be because teens are looking for something to make them laugh .
translation: もし『スイムファン』が受け入れられるなら、それはティーンエイジャーが笑わせてくれる何かを求めているからかもしれません。
back_translation: If "Swim Fan" is accepted, it might be because teenagers are looking for something that makes them laugh.

text: a shame that stealing harvard is too busy getting in its own way to be anything but frustrating , boring , and forgettable .
translation: ハーバードを盗むのがあまりにも自分の足を引っ張ることに忙しく、イライラさせるだけでなく、退屈で忘れられるようなものになってしまっているのは残念です。
back_translation: It's unfortunate that stealing from Harvard has become something that is not only busy dragging me down, but also frustrating and boring to the point of being forgettable.

text: refreshing .
translation: リフレッシュする。
back_translation: Refresh.

text: a clichéd and shallow cautionary tale about the hard-partying lives of gay men .
translation: 陳腐で浅薄な警告の物語で、ゲイ男性のハードパーティーライフについて。
back_translation: A story of clichéd and superficial warnings about the hard-partying life of gay men.

text: by the end of it all i sort of loved the people onscreen , even though i could not stand them .
translation: 結局のところ、画面上の人々を少し愛してしまったけれど、彼らが我慢できなかった。
back_translation: In the end, I ended up loving the people on the screen a little, but they couldn't stand it.

text: the waterlogged script plumbs uncharted depths of stupidity , incoherence and sub-sophomoric sexual banter .
translation: 水浸しの脚本は、愚かさ、無意味さ、そして未熟な性的ジョークの未知の深さに踏み込んでいます。
back_translation: The soaked script delves into the unknown depths of foolishness, meaninglessness, and immature sexual jokes.

text: ... a rich and intelligent film that uses its pulpy core conceit to probe questions of attraction and interdependence and how the heart accomodates practical needs .
translation: ...濃厚で知的な映画で、ジュースを絞ったような核心の概念を利用して、魅力や相互依存の問い、そして心が実際のニーズにどのように適応するかを探求しています。
back_translation: It is a rich and intellectual film that utilizes the core concept extracted like juice, exploring questions of attraction and interdependence, as well as how the mind adapts to actual needs.

text: while the film is competent , it 's also uninspired , lacking the real talent and wit to elevate it beyond its formula to the level of classic romantic comedy to which it aspires .
translation: 映画はしっかりとした作りではあるが、同時にインスピレーションにも欠けており、その公式を超えてクラシックなロマンティックコメディのレベルに引き上げる真の才能やウィットが不足している。
back_translation: The film is well-made, but at the same time, it lacks inspiration and is missing the true talent and wit to elevate it beyond the formula to the level of a classic romantic comedy.

text: the locale ... remains far more interesting than the story at hand .
translation: その場所は、目の前の物語よりもはるかに興味深い。
back_translation: That place is far more interesting than the story in front of me.

text: releasing a film with the word ` dog ' in its title in january lends itself to easy jokes and insults , and snow dogs deserves every single one of them .
translation: 1月にタイトルに「犬」という言葉を含む映画を公開することは、簡単なジョークや侮辱の対象となりやすく、『スノードッグ』はそのすべてに値する。
back_translation: Releasing a movie with the word "dog" in the title in January is prone to becoming an easy joke or subject to insults, and "Snow Dogs" deserves all of that.

text: alternating between facetious comic parody and pulp melodrama , this smart-aleck movie ... tosses around some intriguing questions about the difference between human and android life .
translation: 皮肉なコメディーパロディとパルプメロドラマを交互に展開するこの賢い映画は、人間とアンドロイドの生活の違いについて興味深い問いを投げかけます。
back_translation: This clever film alternates between ironic comedic parodies and pulp melodrama, raising intriguing questions about the differences between human life and that of androids.

text: director todd solondz has made a movie about critical reaction to his two previous movies , and about his responsibility to the characters that he creates .
translation: 監督のトッド・ソロンドズは、彼の2作の前の映画に対する批評の反応と、彼が創り出すキャラクターに対する責任についての映画を作りました。
back_translation: Director Todd Solondz made a film about the critical reactions to his two previous movies and the responsibility he feels toward the characters he creates.

text: shankman ... and screenwriter karen janszen bungle their way through the narrative as if it were a series of bible parables and not an actual story .
translation: シャンクマンと脚本家のカレン・ジャンゼンは、実際の物語ではなく、一連の聖書の寓話のように Narrativeをつまずきながら進めている。
back_translation: Shankman and screenwriter Karen Janszen stumble through the narrative, much like a series of biblical parables rather than an actual story.

text: cinematic poo .
translation: シネマティックなウンチ。
back_translation: Cinematic poop.

text: she 's as rude and profane as ever , always hilarious and , most of the time , absolutely right in her stinging social observations .
translation: 彼女は相変わらず失礼で汚い言葉を使い、常に面白く、ほとんどの場合、鋭い社会観察において絶対に正しい。
back_translation: She continues to use rude and vulgar language, is always funny, and is absolutely right in her sharp social observations most of the time.

text: i ca n't begin to tell you how tedious , how resolutely unamusing , how thoroughly unrewarding all of this is , and what a reckless squandering of four fine acting talents ...
translation: これがどれだけ退屈で、どれだけ全く面白くなく、どれだけ徹底的に報われないものであるか、そして四人の素晴らしい演技力の無駄遣いがいかに無謀であるかを言い始めることすらできません。
back_translation: I can't even begin to express just how boring this is, how utterly uninteresting it is, how thoroughly unrewarding it is, and how reckless it is to waste the incredible talents of the four actors.

text: buries an interesting storyline about morality and the choices we make underneath such a mountain of clichés and borrowed images that it might more accurately be titled mr. chips off the old block .
translation: 道徳や私たちが下す選択に関する興味深いストーリーラインを、陳腐な表現や借り物のイメージの山の下に埋め込んでいるため、むしろ「元祖チップス先生」というタイトルの方が正確かもしれない。
back_translation: It might actually be more accurate to call it "Original Mr. Chips," as it embeds an interesting storyline about morality and the choices we make beneath a mountain of cliché expressions and borrowed images.

text: in an art film !
translation: アートフィルムで！
back_translation: In an art film!

text: presents a side of contemporary chinese life that many outsiders will be surprised to know exists , and does so with an artistry that also smacks of revelation .
translation: 現代中国の生活の一面を紹介しており、多くの外部者が存在することを驚くでしょう。そして、それは啓示を感じさせる芸術性でも表現されています。
back_translation: It introduces an aspect of modern Chinese life, and many outsiders would be surprised by its existence. Additionally, it is expressed through an artistic quality that evokes a sense of revelation.

text: after watching it , you can only love the players it brings to the fore for the gifted but no-nonsense human beings they are and for the still-inestimable contribution they have made to our shared history .
translation: それを見た後は、彼らが持つ才能と真剣さという素晴らしい人間性のために、目の前に引き出される選手たちを愛するしかありません。そして彼らが私たちの共有の歴史に対してまだ計り知れない貢献をしてきたことのためにも。
back_translation: After seeing that, I can only love the players in front of me for their wonderful humanity, which includes their talents and seriousness. And for the immeasurable contributions they have made to our shared history.

text: promises is a compelling piece that demonstrates just how well children can be trained to live out and carry on their parents ' anguish .
translation: 「約束」は、子供たちがいかに親の苦悩を生き、引き継ぐように訓練されることができるかを示す、魅力的な作品です。
back_translation: "Promise" is a captivating work that shows how children can be trained to live through and inherit their parents' struggles.

text: it is most remarkable not because of its epic scope , but because of the startling intimacy it achieves despite that breadth .
translation: それは、その壮大なスコープではなく、その幅広さにもかかわらず達成される驚くべき親密さのために、最も注目に値します。
back_translation: It is most noteworthy for the amazing intimacy achieved despite its grand scope and vastness.

text: robin williams has thankfully ditched the saccharine sentimentality of bicentennial man in favour of an altogether darker side .
translation: ロビン・ウィリアムズは、幸いにも『バイセントニアル・マン』の甘ったるい感傷を捨てて、全く別の暗い面を選びました。
back_translation: Robin Williams fortunately chose to abandon the saccharine sentimentality of "Bicentennial Man" and opted for a completely different dark side.

text: the sweetest thing is expressly for idiots who do n't care what kind of sewage they shovel into their mental gullets to simulate sustenance .
translation: 一番甘いものは、自分の精神的な喉にどんな汚水を押し込んでも気にしない愚か者のために明示的に作られている。
back_translation: The sweetest things are explicitly made for fools who don't care what kind of filthy water they pour into their own spiritual throats.

text: the film would have been more enjoyable had the balance shifted in favor of water-bound action over the land-based ` drama , ' but the emphasis on the latter leaves blue crush waterlogged .
translation: 映画は、陸上の「ドラマ」よりも水上のアクションに重点が置かれていれば、もっと楽しめたかもしれませんが、後者に重点が置かれているため、「ブルークラッシュ」は水に浸かってしまっています。
back_translation: The movie might have been more enjoyable if it had focused more on water-based action rather than the "drama" on land, but since the latter is emphasized, "Blue Crush" ends up sinking.

text: tackles the difficult subject of grief and loss with such life-embracing spirit that the theme does n't drag an audience down .
translation: 悲しみと喪失という難しいテーマを取り上げながらも、その生命を享受する精神によって、テーマが観客を引きずり下げることはありません。
back_translation: While addressing the difficult themes of sadness and loss, the spirit of enjoying life prevents the theme from dragging the audience down.

text: a disaster of a drama , saved only by its winged assailants .
translation: 翼のある襲撃者たちによってのみ救われた悲劇的なドラマ。
back_translation: A tragic drama saved only by attackers with wings.

text: playfully profound ... and crazier than michael jackson on the top floor of a skyscraper nursery surrounded by open windows .

text: the story itself is actually quite vapid .
translation: その物語自体は実際にはかなり無味乾燥です。

text: this orange has some juice , but it 's far from fresh-squeezed .

text: he does n't , however , deliver nearly enough of the show 's trademark style and flash .

text: the film has several strong performances .
translation: その映画にはいくつかの強力な演技があります。

text: nothing here seems as funny as it did in analyze this , not even joe viterelli as de niro 's right-hand goombah .
translation: ここにあるものは、「アナライズ・ディス」に比べると全然面白くない。デ・ニーロの右腕のグンバ（イタリア系アメリカ人）としてのジョー・ビタレリさえも。
back_translation: What is here is not interesting at all compared to "Analyze This." Not even Joe Vitale as De Niro's right-hand man Gumba (Italian-American).

text: the wild thornberrys movie has all the sibling rivalry and general family chaos to which anyone can relate .
translation: 「ワイルド・ソーンベリーズ」の映画は、誰もが共感できる兄弟間の競争や一般的な家族の混乱が全て含まれています。

text: too predictably , in fact .
translation: 実際、あまりにも予測可能です。
back_translation: In reality, it's too predictable.

text: what makes how i killed my father compelling , besides its terrific performances , is fontaine 's willingness to wander into the dark areas of parent-child relationships without flinching .
translation: 「父を殺した理由」を魅力的にしているのは、素晴らしい演技だけでなく、フォンテーヌが親子関係の暗い部分にためらうことなく踏み込む意欲があるからだ。
back_translation: What makes "The Reason I Killed My Father" compelling is not only the wonderful performances but also Fontaine's willingness to delve unhesitatingly into the dark aspects of the father-son relationship.

text: it is that rare combination of bad writing , bad direction and bad acting -- the trifecta of badness .
translation: それは悪い文章、悪い演出、そして悪い演技という珍しい組み合わせであり、悪の三重奏です。
back_translation: It is a rare combination of bad writing, bad direction, and bad acting, a triple play of evil.

text: japanese director shohei imamura 's latest film is an odd but ultimately satisfying blend of the sophomoric and the sublime .
translation: 日本の監督今村昌平の最新作は、幼稚さと崇高さが奇妙に交じり合った、しかし最終的には満足できる作品です。
back_translation: The latest work by Japanese director Masahiro Imamura is a piece that strangely blends childishness and nobility, yet ultimately ends up being satisfying.

text: one of the more glaring signs of this movie 's servitude to its superstar is the way it skirts around any scenes that might have required genuine acting from ms. spears .
translation: この映画がスーパースターに従属していることの最も目立つ兆候の一つは、スピアーズさんが本格的な演技を必要とするようなシーンを回避している方法です。
back_translation: One of the most noticeable signs that this movie is dependent on a superstar is the way it avoids scenes that require genuine acting from Spears.

text: jaw-droppingly superficial , straining to get by on humor that is not even as daring as john ritter 's glory days on three 's company .
translation: 驚くほど表面的で、ジョン・リッターの「スリーズカンパニー」の全盛期ほどの挑戦的なユーモアもない状態で、なんとかやりくりしている。
back_translation: It's surprisingly superficial, struggling to manage without the challenging humor that was present during the heyday of John Ritter's "Three's Company."

text: not too fancy , not too filling , not too fluffy , but definitely tasty and sweet .
translation: あまり豪華すぎず、あまり満腹にならず、あまりふわふわしすぎず、でも確実においしくて甘い。
back_translation: Not too extravagant, not too filling, not too fluffy, but definitely delicious and sweet.

text: a true pleasure .
translation: 本当の喜び。
back_translation: True joy.

text: lacks the spirit of the previous two , and makes all those jokes about hos and even more unmentionable subjects seem like mere splashing around in the muck .
translation: 前の二つの作品の精神に欠けており、ホスについてのジョークやそれ以上に言及できないテーマについてのジョークを、ただの泥水の中での無駄な戯れのように感じさせます。
back_translation: It lacks the spirit of the previous two works and makes jokes about hos and other themes that cannot be mentioned feel like a mere futile play in muddy water.

text: if you go into the theater expecting a scary , action-packed chiller , you might soon be looking for a sign .
translation: 劇場に恐ろしいアクション満載のスリラーを期待して入ると、すぐにサインを探し始めるかもしれません。
back_translation: When you enter the theater expecting a thrilling action-packed thriller, you might start searching for signs right away.

text: a movie of technical skill and rare depth of intellect and feeling .
translation: 技術的なスキルと希少な知性と感情の深さを持つ映画。
back_translation: A film with technical skills and rare intelligence and depth of emotion.

text: i loved this film .
translation: 私はこの映画が大好きでした。
back_translation: I loved this movie.

text: if this is cinema , i pledge allegiance to cagney and lacey .
translation: もしこれが映画なら、私はキャグニーとレイシーに誓います。
back_translation: If this were a movie, I swear to you, it's Cagney and Lacey.

text: could this be the first major studio production shot on video tape instead of film ?
translation: これはフィルムではなく、ビデオテープで撮影された最初の大手スタジオ制作作品でしょうか？
back_translation: Is this the first major studio production filmed on videotape rather than on film?

text: for the most part , it works beautifully as a movie without sacrificing the integrity of the opera .
translation: 大部分において、それはオペラの本質を損なうことなく、美しい映画として機能しています。
back_translation: In most respects, it functions as a beautiful film without compromising the essence of opera.

text: it 's loud and boring ; watching it is like being trapped at a bad rock concert .
translation: それはうるさくて退屈です；見るのは悪いロックコンサートに閉じ込められているような感じです。
back_translation: It's loud and boring; it feels like being trapped at a bad rock concert.

text: probably the best case for christianity since chesterton and lewis .
translation: おそらくチェスター・トンとルイス以来のキリスト教にとって最良の事例。
back_translation: Possibly the best case for Christianity since Chester Ton and Lewis.

text: i suspect that you 'll be as bored watching morvern callar as the characters are in it .
translation: モーヴァン・カラーを見るのが登場人物たち同様、退屈だと思います。
back_translation: I think watching the Mauve color is as boring as the characters themselves.

text: this ill-conceived and expensive project winds up looking like a bunch of talented thesps slumming it .
translation: この考えの浅い高額なプロジェクトは、才能ある俳優たちが手を抜いているように見えてしまう。
back_translation: This shallow and expensive project makes it seem like the talented actors are slacking off.

text: this is one of mr. chabrol 's subtlest works , but also one of his most uncanny .
translation: これはシャブロル氏の最も微妙な作品の一つですが、同時に彼の最も不気味な作品の一つでもあります。
back_translation: This is one of Mr. Chabrol's most subtle works, but at the same time, it is also one of his most eerie works.

text: sparse but oddly compelling .
translation: 希薄だが奇妙に魅力的。
back_translation: Thin but strangely enchanting.

text: despite the opulent lushness of every scene , the characters never seem to match the power of their surroundings .
translation: どんなに贅沢で豊かなシーンであっても、キャラクターたちは決してその環境の力に釣り合っているようには見えない。
back_translation: No matter how extravagant and rich the scene is, the characters never seem to match the power of their environment.

text: it 's a powerful though flawed movie , guaranteed to put a lump in your throat while reaffirming washington as possibly the best actor working in movies today .
translation: それは力強いながらも欠点のある映画で、あなたの喉に塊を生じさせることが保証されており、ワシントンが今日の映画界で働いている最良の俳優である可能性を再確認させてくれます。
back_translation: It is a powerful yet flawed film that is sure to give you a lump in your throat, and it reaffirms that Washington may be the best actor working in today's film industry.

text: the movie is virtually without context -- journalistic or historical .
translation: その映画は事実上、文脈がなく、ジャーナリスティックでも歴史的でもありません。
back_translation: The film is, in effect, devoid of context and is neither journalistic nor historical.

text: -lrb- the film 's -rrb- taste for `` shock humor '' will wear thin on all but those weaned on the comedy of tom green and the farrelly brothers .
translation: この映画の「ショック・ユーモア」に対する嗜好は、トム・グリーンやファレリー兄弟のコメディに慣れ親しんだ人々を除いて、すぐに飽きるだろう。
back_translation: The preference for "shock humor" in this movie will likely wear thin quickly for anyone not accustomed to the comedies of Tom Green or the Farrelly brothers.

text: as a remake , it 's a pale imitation .
translation: リメイクとしては、色あせた模倣です。
back_translation: As a remake, it is a faded imitation.

text: lan yu is a genuine love story , full of traditional layers of awakening and ripening and separation and recovery .
translation: 「藍宇」は、本物のラブストーリーで、目覚めと成熟、別れと回復という伝統的な層に満ちています。
back_translation: "Aiyu" is a genuine love story, rich in traditional layers of awakening and maturation, separation and healing.

text: -lrb- washington 's -rrb- strong hand , keen eye , sweet spirit and good taste are reflected in almost every scene .
translation: ワシントンの強い手、鋭い目、優しい心、そして良いセンスは、ほぼすべてのシーンに反映されています。
back_translation: Washington's strong hand, sharp eyes, kind heart, and good sense are reflected in almost every scene.

text: only about as sexy and dangerous as an actress in a role that reminds at every turn of elizabeth berkley 's flopping dolphin-gasm .
translation: エリザベス・バークレーの失敗したドルフィン・ガズムを思い出させる役を演じる女優と同じぐらいセクシーで危険な存在。
back_translation: As sexy and dangerous as the actress playing a role that reminds one of Elizabeth Berkley's failed "Dolphin Gasm."

text: i 'm left slightly disappointed that it did n't .
translation: 少し失望しましたが、それは起こりませんでした。
back_translation: I was a little disappointed, but it didn't happen.

text: this is lightweight filmmaking , to be sure , but it 's pleasant enough -- and oozing with attractive men .
translation: これは軽量の映画制作と言えるが、十分に楽しいものであり、魅力的な男性たちが溢れている。
back_translation: This can be called a lightweight film production, but it is quite enjoyable and filled with attractive men.

text: i was impressed by how many tit-for-tat retaliatory responses the filmmakers allow before pulling the plug on the conspirators and averting an american-russian armageddon .
translation: 映画製作者が共謀者に対して引き金を引く前に、どれだけの報復的な反応を許すかに感銘を受けました。そうすることで、アメリカとロシアのアルマゲドンを回避しました。
back_translation: I was impressed by how much retaliatory response was allowed before the filmmaker pulled the trigger on the conspirators. By doing so, they avoided an Armageddon between the United States and Russia.

text: entertaining enough , but nothing new
translation: おもしろいが、新しいものはない。
back_translation: It's interesting, but there's nothing new.

text: pure cinematic intoxication , a wildly inventive mixture of comedy and melodrama , tastelessness and swooning elegance .
translation: 純粋な映画的陶酔、独創的なコメディとメロドラマ、品のないものとうっとりするような優雅さの大胆な混合。
back_translation: A pure cinematic ecstasy, a bold mix of original comedy and melodrama, combining the unrefined with a mesmerizing elegance.

text: changing lanes tries for more .
translation: レーンを変更することで、より多くを目指す。
back_translation: Change lanes to aim for more.

text: the predominantly amateur cast is painful to watch , so stilted and unconvincing are the performances .
translation: 主にアマチュアのキャストは見るのが苦痛で、演技がぎこちなく説得力に欠けています。
back_translation: Watching mainly amateur casts is painful, as their performances are awkward and lack persuasiveness.

text: the film exudes the urbane sweetness that woody allen seems to have bitterly forsaken .
translation: その映画は、ウディ・アレンが bitterly forsaken したように思える都会的な甘さを醸し出している。
back_translation: The movie exudes an urban sweetness that seems to be bitterly forsaken by Woody Allen.

text: ludicrous , but director carl franklin adds enough flourishes and freak-outs to make it entertaining .
translation: ばかげているが、監督のカール・フランクリンは十分な装飾や衝撃を加えて、楽しませてくれる。

text: for his first attempt at film noir , spielberg presents a fascinating but flawed look at the near future .
translation: スピルバーグは彼の初めてのフィルムノワールの試みで、近い未来を魅力的ながらも欠陥のある視点で描いています。
back_translation: Spielberg portrays the near future in an appealing yet flawed perspective in his first attempt at film noir.

text: a lively and engaging examination of how similar obsessions can dominate a family .
translation: 家族を支配する似たような執着についての活気に満ち、魅力的な検討。
back_translation: A lively and intriguing examination of similar obsessions that dominate families.

text: certainly the performances are worthwhile .
translation: 確かに、パフォーマンスは価値があります。
back_translation: Indeed, performance is valuable.

text: fifty years after the fact , the world 's political situation seems little different , and -lrb- director phillip -rrb- noyce brings out the allegory with remarkable skill .
translation: 事実から50年後、世界の政治状況はほとんど変わっていないようで、フィリップ・ノイス監督は驚くべき技量でその寓意を引き出している。
back_translation: Fifty years after the events, the political situation in the world seems to have changed little, and director Philippe Noiret draws out that allegory with remarkable skill.

text: i do n't feel the least bit ashamed in admitting that my enjoyment came at the expense of seeing justice served , even if it 's a dish that 's best served cold .
translation: 私は、楽しみが正義が果たされることの代償であったことを認めることに少しも恥ずかしさを感じません。たとえそれが冷たい形で提供されるべき料理であっても。
back_translation: I do not feel the slightest bit of shame in admitting that my enjoyment came at the cost of justice being served, even if it is a dish that should be served cold.

text: the acting in pauline and paulette is good all round , but what really sets the film apart is debrauwer 's refusal to push the easy emotional buttons .
translation: 『ポーリンとポーレット』の演技は全体的に良いですが、映画を際立たせているのはデブロワーが簡単な感情のボタンを押すことを拒否している点です。
back_translation: The performance in "Pauline and Paulette" is overall good, but what makes the film stand out is that the director refuses to push simple emotional buttons.

text: spectacularly beautiful , not to mention mysterious , sensual , emotionally intense , and replete with virtuoso throat-singing .
translation: 壮観に美しく、否応なく神秘的で、官能的で、感情的に強烈であり、名人級の喉歌で満ちています。
back_translation: It is spectacularly beautiful, inevitably mysterious, sensual, emotionally intense, and filled with masterful throat singing.

text: a weird and wonderful comedy .
translation: 奇妙で素晴らしいコメディ。
back_translation: A strange and wonderful comedy.

text: smart and taut .
translation: スマートで引き締まった。
back_translation: Smart and toned.

text: a non-britney person might survive a screening with little harm done , except maybe for the last 15 minutes , which are as maudlin as any after-school special you can imagine .
translation: ブリトニーでない人は、傷がほとんどない状態で上映を生き延びるかもしれないが、最後の15分間は、想像できるどんなアフタースクールスペシャルよりも感傷的である。
back_translation: Those who are not Britney may survive the screening with little to no scars, but the last 15 minutes are more sentimental than any after-school special you can imagine.

text: this is one of the outstanding thrillers of recent years .
translation: これは最近の優れたスリラーの一つです。
back_translation: This is one of the excellent thrillers from recent times.

text: in the end , the film is less the cheap thriller you 'd expect than it is a fairly revealing study of its two main characters -- damaged-goods people whose orbits will inevitably and dangerously collide .
translation: 結局のところ、この映画は予想される安っぽいスリラーよりも、2人の主要キャラクターのかなり明らかな研究となっています。彼らは傷ついた人々であり、その軌道は避けられず危険に衝突することになるのです。
back_translation: In the end, this movie turns out to be a rather obvious study of its two main characters rather than the expected cheap thriller. They are both damaged individuals, and their trajectories inevitably collide with danger.

text: a searing , epic treatment of a nationwide blight that seems to be , horrifyingly , ever on the rise .
translation: 全国的な悪影響に対する焼きつくような、壮大な取り扱いであり、それは恐ろしいことに、ますます高まり続けているように思える。
back_translation: It is a burning, grand handling of the national adverse effects, and frighteningly, it seems to be increasingly escalating.

text: every individual will see the movie through the prism of his or her own beliefs and prejudices , but the one thing most will take away is the sense that peace is possible .
translation: すべての個人は自分自身の信念や偏見を通して映画を観るでしょうが、ほとんどの人が持ち帰るものは平和が可能であるという感覚です。
back_translation: Every individual will watch a movie through their own beliefs and biases, but what most people take away is a sense that peace is possible.

text: an extraordinary dramatic experience .
translation: 並外れたドラマチックな体験。
back_translation: An extraordinary dramatic experience.

text: piccoli 's performance is amazing , yes , but the symbols of loss and denial and life-at-arm 's - length in the film seem irritatingly transparent .
translation: ピッコリの演技は素晴らしいですが、映画における喪失や否認、距離を置いた生活の象徴はイライラするほど明白に見えます。
back_translation: Piccolo's performance is wonderful, but the symbols of loss, denial, and a life lived at a distance in the film are frustratingly obvious.

text: no film could possibly be more contemptuous of the single female population .
translation: どの映画も、独身女性人口にこれほどまでに軽蔑的であることはできない。
back_translation: No movie can be this contemptuous of the population of single women.

text: it 's clear why deuces wild , which was shot two years ago , has been gathering dust on mgm 's shelf .
translation: 2年前に撮影された「デュース・ワイルド」がMGMの棚でほこりをかぶっている理由は明らかです。
back_translation: The reason why "Deuce Wild," filmed two years ago, is gathering dust on MGM's shelf is clear.

text: drowning 's too good for this sucker .
translation: この野郎には溺れさせるのも良すぎる。
back_translation: It's too good to let this bastard drown.

text: if i could have looked into my future and saw how bad this movie was , i would go back and choose to skip it .
translation: もし未来を見てこの映画がどれほどひどいかを知っていたら、私は戻って観るのをスキップすることを選んでいたでしょう。
back_translation: If I had known how terrible this movie would be by looking into the future, I would have chosen to skip watching it.

text: as inept as big-screen remakes of the avengers and the wild wild west .
translation: アベンジャーズやワイルド・ワイルド・ウエストの大画面リメイクと同じくらい無能だ。
back_translation: It's as incompetent as the big-screen remakes of Avengers and Wild Wild West.

text: everything -- even life on an aircraft carrier -- is sentimentalized .
translation: すべてのもの――航空母艦での生活さえも――感傷的に描かれている。
back_translation: Everything - even life on an aircraft carrier - is depicted sentimentally.

text: a bittersweet film , simple in form but rich with human events .
translation: bittersweetな映画で、形式はシンプルですが、人間の出来事が豊かです。
back_translation: It's a bittersweet movie with a simple form, but the human events are rich.

text: a classic fairy tale that perfectly captures the wonders and worries of childhood in a way that few movies have ever approached .
translation: 子供時代の驚きと不安を完璧に捉えたクラシックなおとぎ話で、これまでの映画の中でもこのようにアプローチした作品は稀です。
back_translation: It is a classic fairy tale that perfectly captures the wonder and anxiety of childhood, and works that approach it in this way are rare among all the films made thus far.

text: directed with purpose and finesse by england 's roger mitchell , who handily makes the move from pleasing , relatively lightweight commercial fare such as notting hill to commercial fare with real thematic heft .
translation: 目的と洗練をもってイギリスのロジャー・ミッチェルが監督した本作は、『ノッティングヒル』のような心地よい比較的軽めの商業作品から、実際のテーマ的重みを持つ商業作品へと巧みに移行しています。
back_translation: With purpose and refinement, this work directed by Roger Michell from the UK skillfully transitions from a relatively light commercial piece like "Notting Hill" to a commercial work that carries actual thematic weight.

text: it 's an odd show , pregnant with moods , stillborn except as a harsh conceptual exercise .
translation: それは奇妙なショーで、感情に満ちていますが、厳しい概念的な演習としてはまだ生まれていません。
back_translation: It is a strange show, full of emotions, but it has not yet been born as a rigorous conceptual exercise.

text: cletis is playful but highly studied and dependent for its success on a patient viewer .
translation: クレティスは遊び心がありながらも高度に研究されており、その成功は忍耐強い視聴者に依存しています。
back_translation: Kretis is playful yet highly researched, and its success depends on patient viewers.

text: would benigni 's italian pinocchio have been any easier to sit through than this hastily dubbed disaster ?
translation: ベニーニのイタリア版ピノキオは、この急ごしらえのダブの惨事よりも観るのが楽だったでしょうか？
back_translation: Was Benigni's Italian version of Pinocchio more enjoyable to watch than this hasty disaster of a dub?

text: this is a fudged opportunity of gigantic proportions -- a lunar mission with no signs of life .
translation: これは巨大な規模のごまかされた機会です -- 生命の兆候のない月のミッションです。
back_translation: This is a massive-scale deceptive opportunity -- a mission to the moon with no signs of life.

text: there 's an admirable rigor to jimmy 's relentless anger , and to the script 's refusal of a happy ending , but as those monologues stretch on and on , you realize there 's no place for this story to go but down .
translation: ジミーの執拗な怒りには賞賛に値する厳格さがあり、脚本がハッピーエンドを拒絶している点も興味深いですが、あの独白が延々と続くにつれて、この物語が進むべき場所は下しかないと気づくのです。
back_translation: Jimmy's persistent anger has a commendable strictness, and it's interesting that the script rejects a happy ending; however, as that monologue continues endlessly, one realizes that the only place this story can go is down.

text: i 'll stay with the stage versions , however , which bite cleaner , and deeper .
translation: 私は舞台版に留まりますが、それはよりクリーンで、より深いです。
back_translation: I will remain with the stage version, as it is cleaner and deeper.

text: it 's a movie that ends with truckzilla , for cryin ' out loud .
translation: トラックジラで終わる映画なんだから、たまったもんじゃない。
back_translation: It's a movie that ends with a truckzilla, so it's just unbearable.

text: chalk it up as the worst kind of hubristic folly .
translation: それを最も悪しき誇り高い愚行として記録する。
back_translation: It is recorded as the most wicked and prideful folly.

text: the story , once it gets rolling , is nothing short of a great one .
translation: 物語は、一旦動き出すと、素晴らしいものに他なりません。
back_translation: Once the story starts to unfold, it can only be wonderful.

text: they just do n't work in concert .
translation: 彼らはちょうど協力して機能しません。
back_translation: They just don't function well together.

text: an unintentionally surreal kid 's picture ... in which actors in bad bear suits enact a sort of inter-species parody of a vh1 behind the music episode .
translation: 意図せずしてシュールな子供の絵…そこでは、悪趣味なクマの衣装を着た俳優たちが、VH1の「Behind the Music」エピソードの一種の種間パロディを演じている。
back_translation: Unintentionally surreal children's drawings... where actors dressed in tasteless bear costumes perform a kind of interspecies parody of a VH1 "Behind the Music" episode.

text: both damning and damned compelling .
translation: 罪深くも魅力的な。
back_translation: Sinfully attractive.

text: it 's not original enough .
translation: それは十分にオリジナルではありません。
back_translation: It is not original enough.

text: apart from anything else , this is one of the best-sustained ideas i have ever seen on the screen .
translation: それを除けば、これは私が今まで画面で見た中で最も持続的なアイデアの一つです。
back_translation: Apart from that, this is one of the most enduring ideas I have ever seen on screen.

text: the adventures of pluto nash is a whole lot of nada .
translation: 『プルート・ナッシュの冒険』はまったくの無意味です。
back_translation: "Pluto Nash's Adventure" is completely meaningless.

text: a meditation on faith and madness , frailty is blood-curdling stuff .
translation: 信仰と狂気についての瞑想、そして脆さは身の毛もよだつものです。
back_translation: A meditation on faith and madness, and fragility is something that sends shivers down the spine.

text: he 's one of the few ` cool ' actors who never seems aware of his own coolness .
translation: 彼は自分のクールさに全く気づいていない数少ない「クールな」俳優の一人です。
back_translation: He is one of the few "cool" actors who is completely unaware of his own coolness.

text: this 100-minute movie only has about 25 minutes of decent material .
translation: この100分の映画には、まともな素材が約25分しかありません。
back_translation: This 100-minute movie only has about 25 minutes of decent material.

text: a serious movie with serious ideas .
translation: 真剣なアイデアを持つ真剣な映画。
back_translation: A serious movie with serious ideas.

text: attal 's hang-ups surrounding infidelity are so old-fashioned and , dare i say , outdated , it 's a wonder that he could n't have brought something fresher to the proceedings simply by accident .
translation: アタルの不貞に関するコンプレックスは非常に時代遅れであり、思い切って言えば古臭いもので、彼が偶然にも進行中のものに何か新しいものをもたらすことができなかったのは不思議です。
back_translation: Ataru's complex about infidelity is very outdated and, to put it bluntly, old-fashioned. It's surprising that he could not bring anything new to what is already in progress.

text: plot , characters , drama , emotions , ideas -- all are irrelevant to the experience of seeing the scorpion king .
translation: プロット、キャラクター、ドラマ、感情、アイデア――すべて『スコーピオン・キング』を見る体験には無関係です。
back_translation: Plot, characters, drama, emotions, ideas—none of these are relevant to the experience of watching "The Scorpion King."

text: stripped almost entirely of such tools as nudity , profanity and violence , labute does manage to make a few points about modern man and his problematic quest for human connection .
translation: ヌードや profanity、暴力といった要素がほぼ完全に排除されているにもかかわらず、ラブテは現代人と人間関係を求める問題のある探求についていくつかのポイントを伝えることができる。
back_translation: Despite the fact that elements such as nudity, profanity, and violence are almost completely eliminated, "Rabu Te" is able to convey several points about the problematic exploration of modern people's relationships.

text: it 's the cute frissons of discovery and humor between chaplin and kidman that keep this nicely wound clock not just ticking , but humming .
translation: チャップリンとキッドマンの間にある発見とユーモアの可愛いひらめきが、このしっかりとした時計をただ動かすだけでなく、うなりを上げさせている。
back_translation: The charming insights of discovery and humor between Chaplin and Kidman not only set this sturdy clock in motion but also make it hum.

text: leave it to the french to truly capture the terrifying angst of the modern working man without turning the film into a cheap thriller , a dumb comedy or a sappy melodrama .
translation: フランス人に任せれば、安っぽいスリラーやバカなコメディ、感傷的なメロドラマにすることなく、現代の働く男の恐ろしい不安を真に捉えることができます。
back_translation: If entrusted to the French, it can truly capture the terrifying anxieties of the modern working man without turning into a cheap thriller, silly comedy, or sentimental melodrama.

text: beautiful to watch and holds a certain charm .
translation: 見るには美しく、特別な魅力を持っています。
back_translation: It is beautiful to look at and has a special charm.

text: campbell scott finds the ideal outlet for his flick-knife diction in the role of roger swanson .
translation: キャンベル・スコットは、ロジャー・スワンソンの役において、自身の独特な言葉遣いを理想的に表現しています。
back_translation: Campbell Scott perfectly expresses his unique way of speaking in the role of Roger Swanson.

text: then you 'd do well to check this one out because it 's straight up twin peaks action ...
translation: それなら、これは必見です。まさに「ツインピークス」のアクションですから。
back_translation: In that case, this is a must-see. It's exactly the action of "Twin Peaks."

text: that neither protagonist has a distinguishable condition hardly matters because both are just actory concoctions , defined by childlike dimness and a handful of quirks .
translation: どちらの主人公にも識別可能な状態がないことはほとんど重要ではなく、彼らは単に子供のような鈍さといくつかの特異な性格によって定義された役者の創作物だからです。
back_translation: It is almost irrelevant that neither of the protagonists has a recognizable state, as they are merely creations of actors defined by a childlike dullness and some peculiar traits.

text: land , people and narrative flow together in a stark portrait of motherhood deferred and desire explored .
translation: 土地、人々、そして物語が一緒になって、先延ばしにされた母性と探求された欲望の鮮やかな肖像を描き出す。
back_translation: The land, the people, and the stories come together to paint a vivid portrait of deferred motherhood and explored desires.

text: barney 's ideas about creation and identity do n't really seem all that profound , at least by way of what can be gleaned from this three-hour endurance test built around an hour 's worth of actual material .
translation: バーニーの創造とアイデンティティについての考えは、少なくとも実際の素材が1時間分しかない、この3時間の耐久テストから読み取れる限りでは、それほど深いものに思えません。
back_translation: The thoughts on Barney's creation and identity, from what can be gleaned from this three-hour endurance test, which only has about one hour of actual material, do not seem very profound.

text: build some robots , haul 'em to the theatre with you for the late show , and put on your own mystery science theatre 3000 tribute to what is almost certainly going to go down as the worst -- and only -- killer website movie of this or any other year .
translation: ロボットを作って、それらを劇場に持って行き、遅いショーのために自分自身のミステリーサイエンスシアター3000へのトリビュートを行い、ほぼ確実に今年または他のどの年にも最悪の、そして唯一の殺人ウェブサイト映画として知られることになるであろう作品を上映してください。
back_translation: Create robots, take them to the theater, and pay tribute to your own Mystery Science Theater 3000 for a late show, screening a film that will almost certainly be known as the worst and only murder website movie of this year or any other year.

text: cineasts will revel in those visual in-jokes , as in the film 's verbal pokes at everything from the likes of miramax chief harvey weinstein 's bluff personal style to the stylistic rigors of denmark 's dogma movement .
translation: 映画製作者たちは、ミラマックスのハーベイ・ワインスタインの巧妙な個人的スタイルからデンマークのドグマ運動のスタイル的な厳格さまで、あらゆるものに対する映画の言葉遊びに楽しむでしょう。
back_translation: Filmmakers will enjoy wordplay in cinema, ranging from Miramax's Harvey Weinstein's clever personal style to the stylistic rigor of the Danish Dogme movement.

text: bottom-rung new jack city wannabe .
translation: 底辺の新ジャックシティの成り済まし。
back_translation: Impersonation of the new Jack City at the bottom.

text: despite the fact that this film was n't as bad as i thought it was going to be , it 's still not a good movie
translation: この映画は思っていたほど悪くはなかったが、それでも良い映画ではない。
back_translation: This movie wasn't as bad as I thought, but it still isn't a good film.

text: but this time , the old mib label stands for milder is n't better .
translation: しかし今回は、古いMIBラベルは「穏やかな方が良い」という意味ではありません。
back_translation: However, this time, the old MIB label does not mean "better to be gentle."

text: forget the misleading title , what 's with the unexplained baboon cameo ?
translation: 誤解を招くタイトルは忘れて、説明されていないバブーンのカメオはどういうこと？
back_translation: Forget the misleading title; what does the unexplained baboon cameo mean?

text: it 's clotted with heavy-handed symbolism , dime-store psychology and endless scenic shots that make 105 minutes seem twice as long .
translation: 重苦しいシンボリズム、安っぽい心理描写、そして105分が倍の長さに感じられるほどの終わりのない風景ショットで詰まっています。
back_translation: It is filled with heavy symbolism, cheap psychological depiction, and endless landscape shots that make the 105 minutes feel twice as long.

text: what 's surprising about this traditional thriller , moderately successful but not completely satisfying , is exactly how genteel and unsurprising the execution turns out to be .
translation: この伝統的なスリラーの驚くべき点は、まずまず成功しているものの完全には満足できないということで、実行の仕方が非常に上品で驚くべきものではないということです。
back_translation: The remarkable aspect of this traditional thriller is that, while it is fairly successful, it does not fully satisfy, and the way it is executed is not particularly refined or astonishing.

text: yet another entry in the sentimental oh-those-wacky-brits genre that was ushered in by the full monty and is still straining to produce another smash hit .
translation: フルモンティに導かれた感傷的な「なんとも愉快なイギリス人」ジャンルの新たなエントリーであり、今なお次なるヒット作を生み出そうと奮闘している。
back_translation: It is a new entry in the sentimental "delightfully amusing British" genre, guided by The Full Monty, and continues to strive to create the next hit.

text: every conceivable mistake a director could make in filming opera has been perpetrated here .
translation: オペラの撮影において監督が犯し得るあらゆる考えうるミスがここで行われています。
back_translation: All conceivable mistakes that a director could make in filming an opera are being made here.

text: the film 's desire to be liked sometimes undermines the possibility for an exploration of the thornier aspects of the nature\/nurture argument in regards to homosexuality .
translation: 映画は好かれたいという欲望が時に、同性愛に関する本質と育成の議論の厄介な側面を探求する可能性を損なうことがある。
back_translation: The desire to be liked in movies can sometimes undermine the potential to explore the troublesome aspects of the essence and upbringing of discussions regarding homosexuality.

text: a standard police-oriented drama that , were it not for de niro 's participation , would have likely wound up a tnt original .
translation: デ・ニーロの参加がなかったら、TNTオリジナルになっていた可能性が高い、標準的な警察ドラマ。
back_translation: If De Niro hadn't participated, it likely would have become a standard police drama as a TNT original.

text: with notorious c.h.o. cho proves she has the stuff to stand tall with pryor , carlin and murphy .
translation: 悪名高いC.H.O.が、プライヤー、カーレン、マーフィーと肩を並べるための実力を示している。
back_translation: The infamous C.H.O. is demonstrating the skills to stand shoulder to shoulder with Pliyar, Carlen, and Murphy.

text: watching this film , one is left with the inescapable conclusion that hitchens ' obsession with kissinger is , at bottom , a sophisticated flower child 's desire to purge the world of the tooth and claw of human power .
translation: この映画を観ると、ヒッチェンスのキッシンジャーへの執着は、根本的には洗練されたフラワーチャイルドの人間の権力の牙や爪を世界から取り除きたいという欲望であるという避けられない結論に至る。
back_translation: Watching this movie leads to the unavoidable conclusion that Hitchens' obsession with Kissinger fundamentally stems from a desire to eradicate the claws and fangs of human power from the world, as an enlightened flower child.

text: e.t. works because its flabbergasting principals , 14-year-old robert macnaughton , 6-year-old drew barrymore and 10-year-old henry thomas , convince us of the existence of the wise , wizened visitor from a faraway planet .
translation: 「E.T.」は、その驚くべき原則によって成り立っています。14歳のロバート・マクノートン、6歳のドリュー・バリモア、10歳のヘンリー・トーマスが、遠い惑星から来た賢くて老成した訪問者の存在を私たちに納得させてくれます。
back_translation: "E.T." is built on its amazing principles. Robert MacNaughton, 14, Drew Barrymore, 6, and Henry Thomas, 10, convince us of the existence of a wise and mature visitor from a distant planet.

text: yes , it 's as good as you remember .
translation: はい、あなたが覚えている通り、同じくらい良いです。
back_translation: Yes, as you remember, it is just as good.

text: for veggietales fans , this is more appetizing than a side dish of asparagus .
translation: ベジータイルズファンにとって、これはアスパラガスのサイドディッシュよりも魅力的です。
back_translation: For fans of Vegeta, this is more appealing than a side dish of asparagus.

text: full of detail about the man and his country , and is well worth seeing .
translation: その男と彼の国についての詳細が豊富であり、見る価値があります。
back_translation: There is a wealth of information about that man and his country, and it is worth seeing.

text: little more than a well-mounted history lesson .
translation: よく整備された歴史の授業以上のものではない。
back_translation: It is nothing more than a well-organized history class.

text: peter jackson and company once again dazzle and delight us , fulfilling practically every expectation either a longtime tolkien fan or a movie-going neophyte could want .
translation: ピーター・ジャクソンと彼の仲間たちは再び私たちを魅了し、喜ばせてくれます。長年のトルーキンファンや映画に不慣れな人々が求めるほぼすべての期待を満たしています。
back_translation: Peter Jackson and his companions captivate and delight us once again. They fulfill almost all the expectations of longtime Tolkien fans as well as those unfamiliar with the films.

text: this tale has been told and retold ; the races and rackets change , but the song remains the same .
translation: この物語は語られ、再び語られてきた；人種や詐欺の手口は変わるが、曲は変わらない。
back_translation: This story has been told and retold; while the races and the methods of deception change, the tune remains the same.

text: a joyous occasion
translation: 喜ばしい機会
back_translation: A delightful opportunity

text: -lrb- `` take care of my cat '' -rrb- is an honestly nice little film that takes us on an examination of young adult life in urban south korea through the hearts and minds of the five principals .
translation: 「私の猫の世話をして」というのは、正直に言って、韓国の都市での若い大人の生活を5人の主要な登場人物の心と精神を通じて探る、素敵な小さな映画です。
back_translation: "Take care of my cat" is, to be honest, a lovely little film that explores the lives of young adults in a South Korean city through the hearts and minds of five main characters.

text: novak contemplates a heartland so overwhelmed by its lack of purpose that it seeks excitement in manufactured high drama .
translation: ノバクは、目的の欠如に圧倒され、作り出された大劇場の興奮を求めるハートランドについて考えています。
back_translation: Novak is thinking about Heartland, overwhelmed by a lack of purpose and seeking the excitement of the grand theater that was created.
