text: one-of-a-kind near-masterpiece .
translation: 一品の近代的傑作。
back_translation: A modern masterpiece.

text: trying to figure out the rules of the country bear universe -- when are bears bears and when are they like humans , only hairier -- would tax einstein 's brain .
translation: カントリー・ベア・ユニバースのルールを理解しようとしている - クマはいつクマで、いつは人間のようで、ただ毛深いだけなのか - アインシュタインの脳を試すだろう。
back_translation: Trying to understand the rules of the Country Bear Universe – when a bear is a bear, when it's like a human, and when it's just hairy – would challenge Einstein's brain.

text: a thoroughly engaging , surprisingly touching british comedy .
translation: 非常に魅力的で、驚くほど感動的なイギリスのコメディ。
back_translation: A very charming and surprisingly moving British comedy.

text: you have no affinity for most of the characters .
translation: あなたはほとんどのキャラクターに対して親しみを感じていません。
back_translation: You do not feel a sense of familiarity with most characters.

text: its salient points are simultaneously buried , drowned and smothered in the excesses of writer-director roger avary .
translation: その重要なポイントは、同時に埋もれ、溺れ、そして作家兼監督のロジャー・アヴァリーの過剰さに覆い隠されています。
back_translation: That important point is simultaneously buried, drowned, and overshadowed by the excesses of writer-director Roger Avary.

text: whether or not you buy mr. broomfield 's findings , the film acquires an undeniable entertainment value as the slight , pale mr. broomfield continues to force himself on people and into situations that would make lesser men run for cover .
translation: あなたがブルームフィールド氏の発見を信じるかどうかにかかわらず、この映画は、細身で顔色の悪いブルームフィールド氏が、他の人々やより多くの人々が逃げ出すような状況に強引に入り込むことで、否定できないエンターテインメントの価値を持つようになります。
back_translation: Regardless of whether you believe Mr. Bloomfield's discoveries, this movie becomes undeniably entertaining as the thin, pale Mr. Bloomfield forcibly enters situations that cause others to flee.

text: a relentless , bombastic and ultimately empty world war ii action flick .
translation: 執拗で、派手で、最終的には空虚な第二次世界大戦アクション映画。
back_translation: Persistent, flashy, and ultimately hollow World War II action film.

text: charlotte sometimes is a brilliant movie .
translation: シャーロット・サムタイムズは素晴らしい映画です。
back_translation: Charlotte Somethymes is a wonderful movie.

text: move over bond ; this girl deserves a sequel .
translation: Bondの出番はおしまい; この女の子には続編がふさわしい。
back_translation: It's the end of Bond's turn; this girl deserves a sequel.

text: an exceptionally dreary and overwrought bit of work , every bit as imperious as katzenberg 's the prince of egypt from 1998 .
translation: 非常に陰気で過剰な作品であり、1998年のカッツェンバーグの「エジプトの王子」と同じくらい威圧感があります。
back_translation: It is a very gloomy and excessive work, equally as intimidating as Katzenberg's "The Prince of Egypt" from 1998.

text: for a story set at sea , ghost ship is pretty landbound , with its leaden acting , dull exposition and telegraphed ` surprises . '
translation: 海を舞台にした物語において、ゴーストシップはかなり陸に根ざしたもので、その重苦しい演技、退屈な説明、そして予想された「驚き」が特徴です。
back_translation: In stories set on the sea, ghost ships are quite land-based, characterized by their heavy performances, tedious explanations, and predictable "surprises."

text: congrats disney on a job well done , i enjoyed it just as much !
translation: ディズニー、お疲れ様でした！私も同じくらい楽しめました！
back_translation: Thank you, Disney! I enjoyed it just as much!

text: a muddy psychological thriller rife with miscalculations .
translation: 誤算に満ちた泥だらけの心理スリラー。
back_translation: A muddy psychological thriller filled with miscalculations.

text: is it possible for a documentary to be utterly entranced by its subject and still show virtually no understanding of it ?
translation: ドキュメンタリーがそのテーマに完全に魅了されながらも、ほとんど理解を示さないということは可能でしょうか？
back_translation: Is it possible for a documentary to be completely fascinated by its theme while showing almost no understanding of it?

text: it 's a piece of handiwork that shows its indie tatters and self-conscious seams in places , but has some quietly moving moments and an intelligent subtlety .
translation: それは独立系のほころびや自意識的な縫い目がところどころに見える手作りの作品ですが、静かに感動的な瞬間や知的な微妙さも持っています。
back_translation: It is a handmade work that shows independent flaws and self-conscious seams here and there, yet it also possesses quietly moving moments and intellectual subtlety.

text: the movie 's plot is almost entirely witless and inane , carrying every gag two or three times beyond its limit to sustain a laugh .
translation: 映画のプロットはほとんど完全に無反応で無意味であり、すべてのギャグを笑い続ける限界を超えて2回、3回と繰り返しています。
back_translation: The plot of the movie is nearly completely unresponsive and meaningless, repeating all the gags twice and three times beyond the limit of laughter.

text: in between all the emotional seesawing , it 's hard to figure the depth of these two literary figures , and even the times in which they lived .
translation: 感情の揺れ動きの中で、これら二人の文学者の深さや、彼らが生きた時代を理解するのは難しい。
back_translation: Amid the fluctuations of emotions, it is difficult to grasp the depth of these two literary figures and the era in which they lived.

text: expect no major discoveries , nor any stylish sizzle , but the film sits with square conviction and touching good sense on the experience of its women .
translation: 大きな発見やスタイリッシュな演出は期待できませんが、この映画は女性の経験について確固たる信念と感動的な良識を持っています。
back_translation: While you shouldn't expect major discoveries or stylish presentations, this film possesses a firm belief and an emotional sensibility regarding women's experiences.

text: an exit sign , that is .
translation: 出口サイン、それが。
back_translation: It's an exit sign.

text: beautifully crafted and brutally honest , promises offers an unexpected window into the complexities of the middle east struggle and into the humanity of its people .
translation: 美しく巧みに作られ、残酷に正直な「約束」は、中東の苦闘の複雑さとその人々の人間性への予期せぬ窓を提供します。
back_translation: Beautifully and skillfully crafted, and brutally honest, "The Promise" offers an unexpected window into the complexities of the struggles in the Middle East and the humanity of its people.

text: entirely suspenseful , extremely well-paced and ultimately ... dare i say , entertaining !
translation: 完全にサスペンスに満ちていて、非常にテンポが良く、最終的には…思い切って言えば、面白い！
back_translation: It is fully filled with suspense, very well-paced, and ultimately... to put it boldly, interesting!

text: just dreadful .
translation: 本当にひどい。
back_translation: Really terrible.

text: bill morrison 's decasia is uncompromising , difficult and unbearably beautiful .
translation: ビル・モリソンの「デカシア」は妥協なく、難解で、耐え難いほど美しい。
back_translation: Bill Morrison's "Decasia" is uncompromising, difficult to grasp, and unbearably beautiful.

text: a superlative b movie -- funny , sexy , and rousing .
translation: スーパーラティブなB級映画 — おかしくて、セクシーで、元気づけられる。
back_translation: A superlative B-movie — funny, sexy, and uplifting.

text: the advantage of a postapocalyptic setting is that it can be made on the cheap .
translation: ポストアポカリプスの設定の利点は、安価に制作できることです。
back_translation: The advantage of a post-apocalyptic setting is that it can be produced cheaply.

text: yet another genre exercise , gangster no. 1 is as generic as its title .
translation: もう一つのジャンルの練習として、ギャングスターNo.1はそのタイトルと同じくらい一般的です。
back_translation: As another genre practice, Gangster No. 1 is as common as its title.

text: before it collapses into exactly the kind of buddy cop comedy it set out to lampoon , anyway .
translation: 結局、それがパロディしようとしたまさにその種類のバディ・コップ・コメディに崩壊する前に、まあ。
back_translation: In the end, it collapses into exactly that kind of buddy cop comedy that it was trying to parody, well.

text: ... while dark water is n't a complete wash -lrb- no pun intended -rrb- , watched side-by-side with ringu , it ultimately comes off as a pale successor .
translation: ... ダークウォーターは完全に洗い流されたわけではありませんが -lrb- 意味はありませんが -rrb- 、リングと並べて見ると、結局は薄い後継者のように感じられます。
back_translation: ... Although the dark water hasn't been completely washed away - it doesn't mean anything - when viewed alongside the ring, it ultimately feels like a pale successor.

text: plays out with a dogged and eventually winning squareness that would make it the darling of many a kids-and-family-oriented cable channel .
translation: 執拗で最終的に勝利する真っ直ぐさで展開され、多くの子供や家族向けのケーブルチャンネルの寵児となるでしょう。
back_translation: With persistence and a straightforwardness that ultimately leads to victory, it will unfold and become a darling of many children's and family cable channels.

text: one feels the dimming of a certain ambition , but in its place a sweetness , clarity and emotional openness that recalls the classics of early italian neorealism .
translation: ある野心が薄れていくのを感じるが、その代わりに甘さ、明瞭さ、そして感情の開放感が生まれ、それは初期のイタリアのネオレアリズムの古典を思い起こさせる。
back_translation: I feel a certain ambition fading away, but in its place, a sweetness, clarity, and emotional release emerge, reminiscent of the classics of early Italian neorealism.

text: the script 's judgment and sense of weight is way , way off .
translation: スクリプトの判断と重みの感覚は、非常にずれている。
back_translation: The judgment of the script and the sense of weight are very off.

text: despite its dry wit and compassion , the film suffers from a philosophical emptiness and maddeningly sedate pacing .
translation: その dry wit と compassion にもかかわらず、この映画は哲学的な空虚さといらいらするほどの静かなテンポに苦しんでいます。
back_translation: Despite its dry wit and compassion, this film suffers from philosophical emptiness and a frustratingly slow pace.

text: is a mess .
translation: めちゃくちゃです。
back_translation: It's a mess.

text: adroit but finally a trifle flat , mad love does n't galvanize its outrage the way , say , jane campion might have done , but at least it possesses some .
translation: 巧みではあるが、最終的にはわずかに平坦で、狂気の愛は、例えばジェーン・カンピオンがやったように、その憤りを刺激することはないが、少なくともいくらかのそれを持っている。
back_translation: It is skillful, but ultimately slightly flat, and the madness of love does not provoke that outrage as, for example, Jane Campion did, but at least it has some of it.

text: ... quite endearing .
translation: ...とても愛らしい。
back_translation: ...very adorable.

text: hip-hop prison thriller of stupefying absurdity .
translation: 驚くべき不条理のヒップホップ刑務所スリラー。
back_translation: An astonishing absurdist hip-hop prison thriller.

text: a domestic melodrama with weak dialogue and biopic cliches .
translation: 弱い台詞と伝記映画のクリシェが満載の家庭のメロドラマ。
back_translation: A family melodrama filled with weak lines and clichés from biographical films.

text: a little better than sorcerer 's stone .
translation: 魔法使いの石より少し良い。
back_translation: A little better than the Sorcerer's Stone.

text: nothing short of wonderful with its ten-year-old female protagonist and its steadfast refusal to set up a dualistic battle between good and evil .
translation: 素晴らしいの一言に尽きる、10歳の女性主人公を持ち、善と悪の二元的な戦いを設定することを頑なに拒否している。
back_translation: It can only be described as wonderful; it features a 10-year-old female protagonist and steadfastly refuses to set up a binary struggle between good and evil.

text: almost as offensive as `` freddy got fingered . ''
translation: 「フレディは指を指された」にほぼ匹敵するほど攻撃的です。
back_translation: "It is almost as offensive as 'Freddy was pointed at'."

text: imagine susan sontag falling in love with howard stern .
translation: スーザン・ソンタグがハワード・スターンに恋をする様子を想像してみてください。
back_translation: Imagine Susan Sontag falling in love with Howard Stern.

text: there 's no point of view , no contemporary interpretation of joan 's prefeminist plight , so we 're left thinking the only reason to make the movie is because present standards allow for plenty of nudity .
translation: 視点もなく、ジョーンのプレフェミニストな苦境に対する現代的な解釈もないため、この映画を作る理由は現代の基準が豊富なヌードを許容しているからだと考えざるを得ません。
back_translation: Without a perspective and without a modern interpretation of Joan's pre-feminist plight, I can only conclude that the reason for making this film is that modern standards allow for ample nudity.

text: a listless sci-fi comedy in which eddie murphy deploys two guises and elaborate futuristic sets to no particularly memorable effect .
translation: 活気のないSFコメディで、エディ・マーフィが二つの変装をし、 elaborateな未来的セットを使うものの、特に記憶に残る効果はない。
back_translation: A lackluster sci-fi comedy in which Eddie Murphy dons two disguises, utilizing elaborate futuristic sets, but fails to leave any particularly memorable effects.

text: renner carries much of the film with a creepy and dead-on performance .
translation: レンナーは、不気味で正確な演技で映画の大部分を担っています。
back_translation: Renner carries much of the film with his eerie and precise performance.

text: the film fits into a genre that has been overexposed , redolent of a thousand cliches , and yet remains uniquely itself , vibrant with originality .
translation: その映画は、過剰に露出されたジャンルに位置し、千のクリシェを思い起こさせるものでありながら、独自の存在感を保ち、独創性にあふれています。
back_translation: The movie occupies a genre that is excessively exposed, evoking a thousand clichés, yet it maintains a unique presence and is full of originality.

text: the sequel plays out like a flimsy excuse to give blade fans another look at wesley snipes ' iconic hero doing battle with dozens of bad guys -- at once .
translation: 続編は、ブレードのファンにウェズリー・スナイプスのアイコニックなヒーローが悪党たちと同時に戦う姿を再び見せるための薄っぺらい口実のように展開する。
back_translation: The sequel unfolds as a flimsy excuse to once again show Blade's fans Wesley Snipes' iconic hero battling villains.

text: wendigo wants to be a monster movie for the art-house crowd , but it falls into the trap of pretention almost every time .
translation: ウェンディゴはアートハウスの観客向けのモンスタームービーになりたいが、ほとんど毎回、見せかけの罠にはまってしまう。
back_translation: Wendigo wants to be a monster movie for art house audiences, but almost every time, it falls into a superficial trap.

text: steven soderbergh does n't remake andrei tarkovsky 's solaris so much as distill it .
translation: スティーブン・ソダーバーグはアンドレイ・タルコフスキーの『ソラリス』をリメイクするのではなく、むしろそれを蒸留している。
back_translation: Steven Soderbergh is not remaking Andrei Tarkovsky's "Solaris," but rather distilling it.

text: a compelling yarn , but not quite a ripping one .
translation: 魅力的な物語ですが、そこまでの素晴らしさではありません。
back_translation: It's an interesting story, but it's not quite that amazing.

text: if routine action and jokes like this are your cup of tea , then pay your $ 8 and get ready for the big shear .
translation: 日常の行動やこのようなジョークが好きなら、8ドルを払って大きなシェアの準備をしましょう。
back_translation: If you enjoy daily activities and jokes like this, let's pay 8 dollars and get ready for a big share.

text: tale will be all too familiar for anyone who 's seen george roy hill 's 1973 film , `` the sting . ''
translation: この物語は、ジョージ・ロイ・ヒル監督の1973年の映画「スティング」を見たことのある人には非常に馴染み深いものになるでしょう。
back_translation: This story will be very familiar to those who have seen the 1973 film "The Sting," directed by George Roy Hill.

text: warm and exotic .
translation: 暖かく、エキゾチック。
back_translation: Warm and exotic.

text: the movie 's blatant derivativeness is one reason it 's so lackluster .
translation: 映画の明白な模倣性は、それが非常に魅力に欠ける理由の一つです。
back_translation: The obvious mimetic nature of the film is one reason why it lacks charm.

text: rehearsals are frequently more fascinating than the results .
translation: リハーサルは結果よりも頻繁に魅力的です。
back_translation: Rehearsals are more captivating than the results.

text: like a grinning jack o ' lantern , its apparent glee is derived from a lobotomy , having had all its vital essence scooped out and discarded .
translation: グリinningするジャック・オー・ランタンのように、その明らかな喜びはロボトミーから来ていて、すべての重要な本質が掘り出されて捨てられたのです。
back_translation: Like a grinning Jack-o'-lantern, that apparent joy comes from a lobotomy, where all essential significance has been dug up and discarded.

text: a dazzling thing to behold -- as long as you 're wearing the somewhat cumbersome 3d goggles the theater provides .
translation: 見るのがまばゆいものですが、劇場が提供するやや不便な3Dゴーグルを着用している限りではあります。
back_translation: It is something dazzling to see, but only as long as you are wearing the somewhat inconvenient 3D goggles provided by the theater.

text: it 's a wonderful , sobering , heart-felt drama .
translation: それは素晴らしく、心を揺さぶる、心のこもったドラマです。
back_translation: It is a wonderful, moving, and heartfelt drama.

text: here 's yet another cool crime movie that actually manages to bring something new into the mix .
translation: また新たに、実際に新しい要素を取り入れたクールな犯罪映画が登場しました。
back_translation: A new cool crime movie that actually incorporates new elements has emerged.

text: one of those movies that make us pause and think of what we have given up to acquire the fast-paced contemporary society .
translation: 私たちが迅速な現代社会を手に入れるために何を犠牲にしてきたのか考えさせるような映画の一つです。
back_translation: It is one of those films that make us think about what we have sacrificed to achieve a fast-paced modern society.

text: done in mostly by a weak script that ca n't support the epic treatment .
translation: 壮大な演出を支えられない弱い脚本によって、主に台無しになった。
back_translation: It was mainly ruined by a weak script that couldn't support the grand production.

text: unfortunately , kapur modernizes a.e.w. mason 's story to suit the sensibilities of a young american , a decision that plucks `` the four feathers '' bare .
translation: 残念ながら、カプールはA.E.W.メイソンの物語を若いアメリカ人の感性に合わせて現代化しており、その決定は「四つの羽」を無骨にしてしまっています。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Kapoor has modernized A.E.W. Mason's story to suit the sensibilities of young Americans, and that decision has made "Four Feathers" awkward.

text: uneven , self-conscious but often hilarious spoof .
translation: 不均衡で自己意識的だが、しばしば面白おかしいパロディ。
back_translation: An unbalanced and self-aware parody that is often humorous.

text: deserving of its critical backlash and more .
translation: その批判的な反発を受けるに値し、さらに多くのこと。
back_translation: It deserves that critical backlash and even more.

text: do we really need another film that praises female self-sacrifice ?
translation: 本当に女性の自己犠牲を称賛する別の映画が必要なのでしょうか？
back_translation: Do we really need another movie that praises women's self-sacrifice?

text: more mature than fatal attraction , more complete than indecent proposal and more relevant than 9 1\/2 weeks , unfaithful is at once intimate and universal cinema .
translation: 「不貞」は、「致命的な接触」よりも成熟しており、「不適切な提案」よりも完全で、「９と１／２週」よりも関連性があります。これは親密でありながら普遍的な映画です。
back_translation: "Infidelity" is more mature than "fatal attraction," more complete than "inappropriate suggestion," and more relevant than "9 and 1/2 weeks." It is an intimate yet universal film.

text: the wonder of mostly martha is the performance of gedeck , who makes martha enormously endearing .
translation: 「モーストリー・マーサ」の素晴らしさは、マーサを非常に愛らしくするゲデックの演技です。
back_translation: The brilliance of "Mostly Martha" lies in Gedeck's performance that makes Martha incredibly lovable.

text: a battle between bug-eye theatre and dead-eye matinee .
translation: バグアイ・シアターとデッドアイ・マチネの戦い。
back_translation: The battle of Bug Eye Theater and Dead Eye Matinee.

text: like a tarantino movie with heart , alias betty is richly detailed , deftly executed and utterly absorbing .
translation: ハートのあるタランティーノ映画のように、エイリアス・ベティは豊かに詳細に描かれ、巧みに実行され、まったく目を奪われる作品です。
back_translation: Like a Quentin Tarantino film with heart, Alias Betty is a richly detailed, skillfully executed work that is absolutely captivating.

text: it 's hard to say who might enjoy this , are there tolstoy groupies out there ?
translation: 誰がこれを楽しむかは言いにくいですが、トルストイのファンはいるのでしょうか？
back_translation: It's hard to say who would enjoy this, but are there fans of Tolstoy?

text: this movie is to be cherished .
translation: この映画は大切にされるべきです。
back_translation: This movie should be cherished.

text: in all fairness , i must report that the children of varying ages in my audience never coughed , fidgeted or romped up and down the aisles for bathroom breaks .
translation: 正直に言えば、私の観客の中の様々な年齢の子供たちは、一度も咳をしたり、そわそわしたり、トイレ休憩のために通路を走り回ったりすることはありませんでした。
back_translation: To be honest, the children of various ages in my audience never once coughed, fidgeted, or ran up and down the aisles for bathroom breaks.

text: the screenplay is hugely overwritten , with tons and tons of dialogue -- most of it given to children .
translation: 脚本は非常に過剰に書かれており、たくさんのセリフが含まれています——そのほとんどは子供たちに与えられています。
back_translation: The script is written in a very exaggerated manner and contains many lines—most of which are given to the children.

text: entertains not so much because of its music or comic antics , but through the perverse pleasure of watching disney scrape the bottom of its own cracker barrel .
translation: 音楽やコミカルな antics からではなく、ディズニーが自らのクリッカーバレルの底をかき回す様子を見ることで得られる歪んだ快感によって楽しませている。
back_translation: It is not the music or comedic antics, but rather the distorted pleasure gained from watching Disney itself stir the bottom of its own clicker barrel that provides enjoyment.

text: ryan gosling ... is at 22 a powerful young actor .
translation: ライアン・ゴスリングは22歳で、力強い若手俳優です。
back_translation: Ryan Gosling is 22 years old and a strong young actor.

text: i am highly amused by the idea that we have come to a point in society where it has been deemed important enough to make a film in which someone has to be hired to portray richard dawson .
translation: リチャード・ドーソンを演じるために誰かを雇わなければならないという映画を作ることが重要と見なされる社会に達したという考えに、私は非常に楽しませられています。
back_translation: I am very amused by the idea that we have reached a society where it is considered important to make a movie that requires hiring someone to play Richard Dawson.

text: while this movie , by necessity , lacks fellowship 's heart , two towers outdoes its spectacle .
translation: この映画は必然的に「 Fellowship 」の心を欠いていますが、「 Two Towers 」はそのスペクタクルを上回っています。
back_translation: This movie inevitably lacks the heart of "Fellowship," but "Two Towers" surpasses its spectacle.

text: for those who are intrigued by politics of the '70s , the film is every bit as fascinating as it is flawed .
translation: 1970年代の政治に興味がある人々にとって、この映画は欠点があるにもかかわらず、非常に魅力的です。
back_translation: For those interested in the politics of the 1970s, this film is very engaging despite its flaws.

text: an absorbing and unsettling psychological drama .
translation: 心を引きつけ、不安を覚えさせる心理ドラマ。
back_translation: A psychological drama that captivates the heart and evokes anxiety.

text: like the best of godard 's movies ... it is visually ravishing , penetrating , impenetrable .
translation: ゴダールの映画の最高のもののように…それは視覚的に魅力的で、鋭く、難解です。
back_translation: Like the best of Godard's films… it is visually captivating, sharp, and intricate.

text: spare but quietly effective retelling .
translation: 控えめだが静かに効果的な再話。
back_translation: A modest yet quietly effective retelling.

text: the story that emerges has elements of romance , tragedy and even silent-movie comedy .
translation: 浮かび上がる物語には、ロマンス、悲劇、さらにはサイレント映画のコメディの要素が含まれています。
back_translation: The emerging story includes elements of romance, tragedy, and even the comedy of silent films.

text: this is an insultingly inept and artificial examination of grief and its impacts upon the relationships of the survivors .
translation: これは、悲しみとそれが生存者の関係に与える影響についての侮辱的で無能な人工的検証です。
back_translation: This is an insulting and incompetent artificial verification of sadness and its impact on the relationships of survivors.

text: it 's a strange film , one that was hard for me to warm up to .
translation: 奇妙な映画で、私が受け入れるのが難しかった作品です。
back_translation: It's a strange movie, and it's a work that I found difficult to accept.

text: a series of immaculately composed shots of patch adams quietly freaking out does not make for much of a movie .
translation: パッチ・アダムスが静かに取り乱す完璧に構成された一連のショットでは、あまり映画として成立しません。
back_translation: In a perfectly composed series of shots, Patch Adams quietly loses his composure, which doesn't quite hold up as a film.

text: harks back to a time when movies had more to do with imagination than market research .
translation: 映画が市場調査よりも想像力にもっと関係していた時代にさかのぼります。
back_translation: It goes back to a time when films were more related to imagination than market research.

text: all the queen 's men is a throwback war movie that fails on so many levels , it should pay reparations to viewers .
translation: 「オール・ザ・クイーンズ・メン」は、多くの面で失敗した懐古的な戦争映画で、観客に賠償金を支払うべきだ。
back_translation: "All the Queen's Men" is a nostalgic war film that has failed in many ways and should compensate the audience.

text: fessenden 's narrative is just as much about the ownership and redefinition of myth as it is about a domestic unit finding their way to joy .
translation: フェッセンデンの物語は、神話の所有と再定義についてのものであると同時に、家庭が喜びを見つける過程でもある。
back_translation: The story of Fessenden is about the ownership and redefinition of myths, while also being a process through which a family finds joy.

text: the exclamation point seems to be the only bit of glee you 'll find in this dreary mess .
translation: 感嘆符は、この陰鬱な混乱の中で見つけることができる唯一の喜びの一片のようです。
back_translation: The exclamation mark seems like the only piece of joy that can be found in this dreary chaos.

text: a banal , virulently unpleasant excuse for a romantic comedy .
translation: ありふれた、非常に不快なロマンティックコメディの言い訳。
back_translation: A cliché, very unpleasant excuse for a romantic comedy.

text: a must see for all sides of the political spectrum
translation: 政治スペクトルのすべての側にとって必見の作品です。
back_translation: This is a must-see work for all sides of the political spectrum.

text: the storylines are woven together skilfully , the magnificent swooping aerial shots are breathtaking , and the overall experience is awesome .
translation: ストーリーラインは巧みに織り交ぜられ、壮大な空撮は息をのむ美しさで、全体の体験は素晴らしいです。
back_translation: The storyline is skillfully interwoven, the breathtaking aerial shots are stunningly beautiful, and the overall experience is fantastic.

text: skip the film and buy the philip glass soundtrack cd .
translation: 映画をスキップして、フィリップ・グラスのサウンドトラックCDを購入してください。
back_translation: Skip the movie and buy the soundtrack CD by Philip Glass.

text: ... unspeakably , unbearably dull , featuring reams of flatly delivered dialogue and a heroine who comes across as both shallow and dim-witted .
translation: ... 言葉にできないほど、耐え難いほど退屈で、平坦に語られるセリフが無数にあり、浅薄で鈍感なヒロインが登場します。
back_translation: There are countless lines that are so boring they are unbearable and cannot be put into words, and a shallow and insensitive heroine makes her appearance.

text: forages for audience sympathy like a temperamental child begging for attention , giving audiences no reason to truly care for its decrepit freaks beyond the promise of a reprieve from their incessant whining .
translation: 観客の同情を求める様子は、気まぐれな子供が注意を引こうとするかのようで、観客がその疲れ果てた奇形たちに心から関心を持つ理由を与えず、ただ彼らの絶え間ない不平からの解放の約束だけがある。
back_translation: The way they seek the audience's sympathy is like a whimsical child trying to attract attention, offering no reason for the audience to genuinely care about those exhausted deformities, only the promise of release from their incessant complaints.

text: an action\/thriller of the finest kind , evoking memories of day of the jackal , the french connection , and heat .
translation: 最高のアクション／スリラーであり、『ジャッカルの日』、『フレンチ・コネクション』、そして『ヒート』を思い起こさせる作品です。
back_translation: It is the best action/thriller, reminiscent of "Day of the Jackal," "French Connection," and "Heat."

text: beyond the cleverness , the weirdness and the pristine camerawork , one hour photo is a sobering meditation on why we take pictures .
translation: 巧妙さ、奇妙さ、そして純粋なカメラワークを超えて、『ワン・アワー・フォト』は私たちが写真を撮る理由についての冷静な瞑想です。
back_translation: Beyond cleverness, oddity, and pure camerawork, "One Hour Photo" is a calm meditation on the reasons we take photographs.

text: the best part about `` gangs '' was daniel day-lewis .
translation: 「ギャング」の最も良い部分はダニエル・デイ＝ルイスでした。
back_translation: The best part of "Gangs" was Daniel Day-Lewis.

text: ... hypnotically dull .
translation: ...催眠のように退屈。
back_translation: ...Boring like hypnosis.

text: we ca n't accuse kung pow for misfiring , since it is exactly what it wants to be : an atrociously , mind-numbingly , indescribably bad movie .
translation: 私たちは「クン・パオ」を誤って作ったと非難することはできません。なぜなら、それはまさに自分がなりたいものだからです：恐ろしいほど、頭がぼんやりするほど、言葉では表現できないくらいの悪い映画です。
back_translation: We cannot blame ourselves for accidentally creating "Kun Pao" because it is exactly what we want to be: a terrifyingly bad movie that is so mind-numbingly awful it defies description.

text: but then again , i hate myself most mornings .
translation: でもまた、そのことを考えると、私はほとんどの朝自分が嫌になる。
back_translation: But again, when I think about it, I almost hate myself every morning.

text: although purportedly a study in modern alienation , it 's really little more than a particularly slanted , gay s\/m fantasy , enervating and deadeningly drawn-out .
translation: 一見、現代の疎外に関する研究のように見えるが、実際には特に偏ったゲイのS/Mファンタジーに過ぎず、疲弊させるほど冗長である。
back_translation: At first glance, it seems like a study on modern alienation, but in reality, it is merely a particularly biased gay S/M fantasy that is exhausting in its redundancy.

text: it can be safely recommended as a video\/dvd babysitter .
translation: ビデオ/DVDのベビーシッターとして安全に推奨できます。
back_translation: I can safely recommend it as a babysitter for videos/DVDs.

text: the movie should jolt you out of your seat a couple of times , give you a few laughs , and leave you feeling like it was worth your seven bucks , even though it does turn out to be a bit of a cheat in the end .
translation: 映画は何度かあなたを席から飛び上がらせ、いくつかの笑いを提供し、最終的には少し騙された気分になるにしても、あなたの7ドルの価値があったと感じさせるべきです。
back_translation: The movie should be worth your $7, even if it makes you jump out of your seat a few times, offers some laughs, and ultimately leaves you feeling a little deceived.

text: part of the film 's cheeky charm comes from its vintage schmaltz .
translation: 映画の「くすぐりの魅力」の一部は、そのレトロな甘さから来ています。
back_translation: Part of the charm of the movie "The Allure of Tickling" comes from its retro sweetness.

text: a fun family movie that 's suitable for all ages -- a movie that will make you laugh , cry and realize , ` it 's never too late to believe in your dreams . '
translation: すべての年齢層に適した楽しいファミリー映画で、笑い、泣き、そして「夢を信じるのに遅すぎることはない」と気づかせてくれる映画です。
back_translation: A fun family movie suitable for all ages that makes you laugh, cry, and realize that "it's never too late to believe in your dreams."

text: unlike most anime , whose most ardent fans outside japan seem to be introverted young men with fantasy fetishes , metropolis never seems hopelessly juvenile .
translation: ほとんどのアニメとは異なり、日本の外での最も熱心なファンがファンタジーフェティッシュを持つ内向的な若い男性であるのに対し、「メトロポリス」は決して無邪気すぎることがないように見える。
back_translation: Unlike most anime, where the most fervent fans outside of Japan tend to be introverted young men with a fantasy fetish, "Metropolis" never seems to be too innocent.

text: there is something that is so meditative and lyrical about babak payami 's boldly quirky iranian drama secret ballot ... a charming and evoking little ditty that manages to show the gentle and humane side of middle eastern world politics
translation: ババク・パヤミの大胆に風変わりなイランのドラマ「秘密投票」には、非常に瞑想的で詩的な何かがあります... 中東の世界政治の穏やかで人間的な側面を見せる魅力的で感動的な小品です。
back_translation: Babak Payami's boldly unconventional Iranian drama "Secret Ballot" has something very meditative and poetic about it... It is a captivating and moving piece that reveals a gentle and humane aspect of Middle Eastern world politics.

text: it winds up moving in many directions as it searches -lrb- vainly , i think -rrb- for something fresh to say .
translation: それは新しい何かを言おうと探しながら、多くの方向に動いてしまいます -（虚しく、私は思います）-。
back_translation: While trying to say something new, it ends up moving in many directions - (futilely, I think).

text: it 's as if de palma spent an hour setting a fancy table and then served up kraft macaroni and cheese .
translation: まるでデ・パルマが1時間かけて華やかなテーブルを用意したかのようなのに、出てきたのはクラフトのマカロニチーズだった。
back_translation: It was as if De Palma had spent an hour setting up an elegant table, only for what came out to be Kraft macaroni and cheese.

text: with or without the sex , a wonderful tale of love and destiny , told well by a master storyteller
translation: 性的な要素があろうとなかろうと、素晴らしい愛と運命の物語であり、名人の語り手によって巧みに語られています。
back_translation: Whether it has sexual elements or not, it is a wonderful story of love and destiny, skillfully narrated by a master storyteller.

text: rifkin no doubt fancies himself something of a hubert selby jr. , but there is n't an ounce of honest poetry in his entire script ; it 's simply crude and unrelentingly exploitative .
translation: リフキンは自分をハーバート・セルビー・ジュニアのような存在だと思っているに違いないが、彼の脚本には正直な詩の要素は一切なく、単に粗野で容赦ない搾取的な内容だ。
back_translation: Lifkin must believe he is akin to Hubert Selby Jr., but there is not a single element of honest poetry in his scripts; they are merely coarse, relentless, and exploitative content.

text: but it will just as likely make you weep , and it will do so in a way that does n't make you feel like a sucker .
translation: しかし、それはあなたを涙させる可能性も同じくらい高く、あなたをバカだと感じさせることなくそうさせるでしょう。
back_translation: However, it is just as likely to make you cry, and it will do so without making you feel foolish.

text: the acting is just fine , but there 's not enough substance here to sustain interest for the full 90 minutes , especially with the weak payoff .
translation: 演技はすばらしいですが、全90分の間に興味を持続させるほどの内容が不足しており、特に弱い結末がその傾向を助長しています。
back_translation: The performance is wonderful, but there is a lack of content to maintain interest over the entire 90 minutes, and especially the weak ending reinforces this tendency.

text: romantic comedy and dogme 95 filmmaking may seem odd bedfellows , but they turn out to be delightfully compatible here .
translation: ロマンティック・コメディとドグマ95映画制作は一見奇妙な組み合わせに見えるかもしれませんが、ここでは驚くほど相性が良いことがわかります。
back_translation: Romantic comedies and Dogme 95 filmmaking might seem like a strange combination at first glance, but here we find that they surprisingly complement each other very well.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- rather thinly-conceived movie .
translation: （a）やや薄い構想の映画。
back_translation: A movie with a somewhat thin concept.

text: good , solid storytelling .
translation: 良い、しっかりとしたストーリーテリング。
back_translation: Good, solid storytelling.

text: it 's a treat watching shaw , a british stage icon , melting under the heat of phocion 's attentions .
translation: ショーというイギリスの舞台アイコンが、フォキオンの関心の熱に溶け込んでいく様子を見るのは楽しいです。
back_translation: It's enjoyable to see the British stage icon, Show, blend into the fervor of interest in Phocion.

text: the film does n't sustain its initial promise with a jarring , new-agey tone creeping into the second half
translation: 映画は、後半に入るにつれて不快なニューエイジのトーンが忍び寄り、最初の期待を持続できません。
back_translation: As the movie enters its second half, an unpleasant New Age tone creeps in, making it difficult to maintain the initial expectations.

text: a smug and convoluted action-comedy that does n't allow an earnest moment to pass without reminding audiences that it 's only a movie .
translation: 自己満足で複雑なアクションコメディで、真剣な瞬間を通り過ぎることがなく、観客に「これはただの映画だ」と思い出させる。
back_translation: A self-satisfying and complex action comedy that never overlooks serious moments, reminding the audience that "this is just a movie."

text: um ... is n't that the basis for the entire plot ?
translation: えっと・・・それは物語全体の基盤ではないの？
back_translation: Um... isn't that the foundation of the entire story?

text: -lrb- has -rrb- an immediacy and an intimacy that sucks you in and dares you not to believe it 's all true .
translation: それはあなたを引き込む即時性と親密さがあり、それがすべて真実であると信じないことに挑戦します。
back_translation: It has an immediacy and intimacy that draws you in, challenging you to not believe that it is all true.

text: a deftly entertaining film , smartly played and smartly directed .
translation: 巧妙に楽しませる映画で、スマートに演じられ、スマートに監督されている。
back_translation: A cleverly entertaining movie that is performed and directed smartly.

text: bogdanovich taps deep into the hearst mystique , entertainingly reenacting a historic scandal .
translation: ボグダノビッチはハーストの神秘を深く掘り下げ、歴史的なスキャンダルを娯楽的に再現しています。
back_translation: Bogdanovich delves deeply into Hearst's mysteries, recreating historical scandals in an entertaining way.

text: a terrible movie that some people will nevertheless find moving .
translation: ひどい映画だけれども、それでも一部の人には感動的に感じられる。
back_translation: It's a terrible movie, but still, it can feel moving to some people.

text: to blandly go where we went 8 movies ago ...
translation: 私たちが8本前の映画で行った場所に無表情に行くこと...
back_translation: Going to the place we went in the movie from eight years ago with a blank expression...

text: the film 's lack of personality permeates all its aspects -- from the tv movie-esque , affected child acting to the dullest irish pub scenes ever filmed .
translation: 映画の無個性さは、そのすべての側面に浸透しており、テレビ映画のような影響を受けた子供の演技から、今まで撮影された中で最も退屈なアイリッシュパブのシーンにまで及んでいます。
back_translation: The lack of individuality in the film permeates all aspects, from the child performances influenced by TV movies to the most boring Irish pub scene ever filmed.

text: craig bartlett and director tuck tucker should be commended for illustrating the merits of fighting hard for something that really matters .
translation: クレイグ・バートレットとディレクターのタック・タッカーは、本当に大切なもののために一生懸命に戦うことの重要性を描いたことを称賛されるべきです。
back_translation: Craig Bartlett and director Tuck Tucker should be praised for depicting the importance of fighting hard for what truly matters.

text: rosenthal -lrb- halloween ii -rrb- seems to have forgotten everything he ever knew about generating suspense .
translation: ロゼンタール（『ハロウィン II』）は、サスペンスを生み出すために知っていたことすべてを忘れてしまったようだ。
back_translation: Rosenthal (from "Halloween II") seems to have forgotten everything he knew in order to create suspense.

text: but it 's defiantly and delightfully against the grain .
translation: しかし、それは確かに魅力的に逆らっています。
back_translation: However, it certainly goes against what is appealing.

text: famuyiwa 's feature deals with its subject matter in a tasteful , intelligent manner , rather than forcing us to endure every plot contrivance that the cliché-riddled genre can offer .
translation: ファミユイワの作品は、そのテーマを上品で知的な方法で扱い、陳腐なジャンルが提供できるすべてのプロットの仕掛けを私たちに耐えさせることなく進行します。
back_translation: The works of Famiyuiwa elegantly and intelligently handle their themes without making us endure all the plot contrivances that a stale genre has to offer.

text: ` matrix ' - style massacres erupt throughout ... but the movie has a tougher time balancing its violence with kafka-inspired philosophy .
translation: 『マトリックス』スタイルの虐殺が至る所で勃発するが、この映画は暴力とカフカに触発された哲学のバランスを取るのに苦労している。
back_translation: Massacres in the style of "The Matrix" erupt everywhere, but this movie struggles to balance violence with philosophy inspired by Kafka.

text: -lrb- toback 's -rrb- fondness for fancy split-screen , stuttering editing and pompous references to wittgenstein and kirkegaard ... blends uneasily with the titillating material .
translation: トバックのファンシーな分割画面、途切れ途切れの編集、ウィトゲンシュタインやキルケゴールへの誇大な言及に対する好みは、刺激的な素材との相性が悪い。
back_translation: The fancy split-screen of Toback, the choppy editing, and the preference for exaggerated references to Wittgenstein and Kierkegaard do not pair well with the stimulating material.

text: at a time when commercialism has squeezed the life out of whatever idealism american moviemaking ever had , godfrey reggio 's career shines like a lonely beacon .
translation: 商業主義がアメリカの映画制作にかつてあった理想主義を押しつぶした時代において、ゴッドフリー・レッジオのキャリアは孤独な灯台のように輝いている。
back_translation: In an era when commercialism has crushed the idealism that once existed in American film production, Godfrey Reggio's career shines like a solitary lighthouse.

text: the type of dumbed-down exercise in stereotypes that gives the -lrb- teen comedy -rrb- genre a bad name .
translation: ステレオタイプを単純化した運動の一種で、（ティーンコメディ）ジャンルに悪い名前を与えるもの。
back_translation: A type of movement that simplifies stereotypes, giving a bad name to the teen comedy genre.

text: elegant and eloquent -lrb- meditation -rrb- on death and that most elusive of passions , love .
translation: 死と最も捉えにくい情熱である愛についての優雅で雄弁な瞑想。
back_translation: An elegant and eloquent meditation on love, which is the most elusive passion next to death.

text: weird .
translation: 奇妙。
back_translation: Strange.

text: -lrb- clooney 's -rrb- debut can be accused of being a bit undisciplined , but it has a tremendous , offbeat sense of style and humor that suggests he was influenced by some of the filmmakers who have directed him , especially the coen brothers and steven soderbergh .
translation: -（クルーニーの）デビュー作は少し無軌道であると非難されることもあるが、彼が影響を受けたと思われる監督たち、特にコーエン兄弟やスティーブン・ソダーバーグのスタイルとユーモアを反映した素晴らしい独特のセンスがある。
back_translation: Clooney's debut work is sometimes criticized for being a bit erratic, but it has a wonderful and unique sense that reflects the style and humor of the directors he seems to have been influenced by, particularly the Coen brothers and Steven Soderbergh.

text: pair that with really poor comedic writing ... and you 've got a huge mess .
translation: それに本当にひどいコメディの脚本を組み合わせると、大変な混乱になります。
back_translation: Combining that with a really terrible comedy script leads to a huge mess.

text: the audience when i saw this one was chuckling at all the wrong times , and that 's a bad sign when they 're supposed to be having a collective heart attack .
translation: この作品を見たとき、観客は全く不適切なタイミングでクスクス笑っていて、それは一緒に心臓発作を起こすことになっているときには悪い兆候です。
back_translation: When I saw this work, the audience was giggling at completely inappropriate moments, which is a bad sign when it is supposed to be causing heart attacks together.

text: nicholas nickleby celebrates the human spirit with such unrelenting dickensian decency that it turned me -lrb- horrors ! -rrb-
translation: 『ニコラス・ニクルビー』は、人間の精神を非常に執拗なディケンズ的な良識で称賛しており、私を驚かせました（恐ろしい！）。
back_translation: "Nickleby" praises the human spirit with a very tenacious Dickensian sensibility, and it amazed me (how terrifying!).

text: romanek 's themes are every bit as distinctive as his visuals .
translation: ロマネクのテーマは、彼のビジュアルと同じくらい独特です。
back_translation: The theme of Romaneck is as unique as his visuals.

text: no worse a film than breaking out , and breaking out was utterly charming .
translation: 「ブレイキング・アウト」より悪くはない映画であり、「ブレイキング・アウト」は全く魅力的でした。
back_translation: It's a movie that's not worse than "Breaking Out," and "Breaking Out" was completely captivating.

text: scooby doo is surely everything its fans are hoping it will be , and in that sense is a movie that deserves recommendation .
translation: スクービー・ドゥーは、間違いなくそのファンが期待するすべての要素を備えており、その意味で推薦に値する映画です。
back_translation: Scooby-Doo undoubtedly has all the elements that its fans expect, making it a movie worth recommending.

text: a dim-witted and lazy spin-off of the animal planet documentary series , crocodile hunter is entertainment opportunism at its most glaring .
translation: 動物プラネットのドキュメンタリーシリーズの薄っぺらで怠惰なスピンオフである「クロコダイル・ハンター」は、最もあからさまなエンターテインメントの機会主義です。
back_translation: "Crocodile Hunter," a thin and lazy spin-off of Animal Planet's documentary series, is the most blatant opportunism in entertainment.

text: ... an airless , prepackaged julia roberts wannabe that stinks so badly of hard-sell image-mongering you 'll wonder if lopez 's publicist should share screenwriting credit .
translation: ... 空気のない、パッケージ化されたジュリア・ロバーツの模倣品で、強引なイメージ戦略の臭いがひどいので、ロペスの広報担当者が脚本クレジットを共有すべきかどうか疑問に思うでしょう。
back_translation: ... a packaged imitation of Julia Roberts without any substance, and the stench of a forceful image strategy is so strong that Lopez's publicist may wonder whether they should share the script credit.

text: will anyone who is n't a fangoria subscriber be excited that it has n't gone straight to video ?
translation: ファンゴリアの購読者でない誰かが、これが直にビデオになっていないことに興奮するでしょうか？
back_translation: Will someone who is not a subscriber of Fangoria be excited that this is not going directly to video?

text: your children will be occupied for 72 minutes .
translation: あなたの子供たちは72分間忙しくなります。
back_translation: Your children will be busy for 72 minutes.

text: exciting and well-paced .
translation: ワクワクさせるテンポの良い。
back_translation: Exciting and lively tempo.

text: lasker 's canny , meditative script distances sex and love , as byron and luther ... realize they ca n't get no satisfaction without the latter .
translation: ラスカーの巧妙で瞑想的な脚本は、バイロンやルターのように、セックスと愛を切り離し、彼らが後者なしでは満足を得られないことを認識させる。
back_translation: Lasker's clever and meditative screenplay, like Byron and Luther, separates sex from love and makes them realize that they cannot find satisfaction without the latter.

text: like rudy yellow lodge , eyre needs to take a good sweat to clarify his cinematic vision before his next creation and remember the lessons of the trickster spider .
translation: ルディ・イエローロッジのように、エイヤーは次の創作の前に自分の映画的ビジョンを明確にするために、しっかりと汗をかく必要があり、トリックスターのクモの教訓を思い出すべきだ。
back_translation: Like Rudy Yellow Lodge, Eyer needs to sweat it out to clarify his cinematic vision before his next creation, and he should remember the lessons of the trickster spider.

text: the amazing film work is so convincing that by movies ' end you 'll swear you are wet in some places and feel sand creeping in others .
translation: その素晴らしい映画の作品は非常に説得力があり、映画の終わりには、あなたはどこかで濡れていると確信し、他の場所では砂が忍び寄るのを感じるでしょう。
back_translation: The work of that wonderful movie is incredibly persuasive, and by the end of the film, you will be convinced that you are wet somewhere while feeling the sand creeping in other places.

text: femme fatale offers nothing more than a bait-and-switch that is beyond playing fair with the audience .
translation: ファム・ファタールは、観客に対して正直にプレイすることを超えた、ただの bait-and-switch（おとり商法）を提供しているに過ぎない。
back_translation: The femme fatale is merely providing a bait-and-switch that goes beyond playing honestly with the audience.

text: combines sharp comedy , old-fashioned monster movie atmospherics , and genuine heart to create a film that 's not merely about kicking undead \*\*\* , but also about dealing with regret and , ultimately , finding redemption .
translation: 鋭いコメディ、昔ながらのモンスター映画の雰囲気、そして真の心を融合させ、単に亡霊を蹴散らすだけでなく、後悔に対処し、最終的には贖罪を見出す映画を作り上げている。
back_translation: Creating a movie that merges sharp comedy, the atmosphere of classic monster films, and genuine heart, not only scattering ghosts but also confronting regrets and ultimately finding redemption.

text: just a bunch of good actors flailing around in a caper that 's neither original nor terribly funny .
translation: ただの良い俳優たちが、オリジナルでもなく、あまり面白くもない悪事に手をこまねいているだけです。
back_translation: They are just good actors doing nothing but participating in unoriginal and not very interesting misdeeds.

text: the movie does its best to work us over , with second helpings of love , romance , tragedy , false dawns , real dawns , comic relief , two separate crises during marriage ceremonies , and the lush scenery of the cotswolds .
translation: 映画は、愛、ロマンス、悲劇、偽りの夜明け、真の夜明け、コメディリリーフ、結婚式での2つの別々の危機、そしてコッツウォルズの豊かな風景の二度目の助けを提供しようと最善を尽くしています。
back_translation: The movie is doing its best to provide a second helping of love, romance, tragedy, a false dawn, a true dawn, comedic relief, two separate crises at a wedding, and the rich landscape of the Cotswolds.

text: filled with honest performances and exceptional detail , baran is a gentle film with dramatic punch , a haunting ode to humanity .
translation: 正直な演技と卓越したディテールに満ちた「バラン」は、劇的なインパクトを持つ穏やかな映画であり、人類への心に残るオードです。
back_translation: "Balun," filled with honest performances and exquisite details, is a gentle film with dramatic impact and a heartfelt ode to humanity.

text: rodriguez does a splendid job of racial profiling hollywood style -- casting excellent latin actors of all ages -- a trend long overdue .
translation: ロドリゲスはハリウッドスタイルの人種プロファイリングを見事にこなし、すべての年齢の優れたラテン系俳優をキャスティングしています。これはずっと待たれていたトレンドです。
back_translation: Rodriguez brilliantly handles Hollywood-style racial profiling and casts excellent Latin actors of all ages. This has been a long-awaited trend.

text: takashi miike keeps pushing the envelope : ichi the killer
translation: 三池崇史は限界を押し広げ続ける：『殺し屋イチ』
back_translation: Takashi Miike continues to push the limits: "Koroshiya Ichi"

text: more likely to have you scratching your head than hiding under your seat .
translation: あなたが座席の下に隠れるよりも、むしろ頭をひねることになるでしょう。
back_translation: It would rather lead you to wrack your brains than hide under the seat.

text: fairly run-of-the-mill .
translation: 一般的な。
back_translation: General.

text: so could young romantics out on a date .
translation: そう、若いロマンティックたちがデートをしているかもしれません。
back_translation: Yes, young romantics might be on a date.

text: despite its flaws ... belinsky is still able to create an engaging story that keeps you guessing at almost every turn .
translation: 欠点があるにもかかわらず、ベリンスキーはほぼ全ての局面であなたを予想させる魅力的な物語を創り出すことに成功しています。
back_translation: Despite its flaws, Belinsky succeeds in creating an engaging story that invites you to guess in almost every situation.

text: the secrets of time travel will have been discovered , indulged in and rejected as boring before i see this piece of crap again .
translation: タイムトラベルの秘密は発見され、楽しむことも退屈だと拒絶されるだろうが、私がこのゴミを再び見る前にそうなるだろう。
back_translation: The secret of time travel will be discovered and rejected as either enjoyable or boring, but it will happen before I see this garbage again.

text: the script boasts some tart tv-insider humor , but the film has not a trace of humanity or empathy .
translation: この脚本は辛口のテレビ業界のユーモアを自慢していますが、映画には人間性や共感の欠片もありません。
back_translation: This script boasts sharp humor from the television industry, but it lacks any trace of humanity or empathy in the film.

text: though it 's not very well shot or composed or edited , the score is too insistent and the dialogue is frequently overwrought and crudely literal , the film shatters you in waves .
translation: 撮影や構成、編集があまり上手くないにもかかわらず、音楽は非常にあからさまで、対話はしばしば過度に感情的で素朴ですが、映画は波のようにあなたを打ち砕きます。
back_translation: Despite the filming, composition, and editing not being very skillful, the music is very blatant, and the dialogue is often excessively emotional and simplistic, the film crushes you like a wave.

text: satin rouge is not a new , or inventive , journey , but it 's encouraging to see a three-dimensional , average , middle-aged woman 's experience of self-discovery handled with such sensitivity .
translation: サテン・ルージュは新しい革新的な旅ではありませんが、三次元的な平均的な中年女性の自己発見の経験が、これほどの繊細さで扱われているのを見るのは励みになります。
back_translation: Satin Rouge is not a new innovative journey, but it is encouraging to see the three-dimensional average middle-aged woman's self-discovery experience treated with such delicacy.

text: due to stodgy , soap opera-ish dialogue , the rest of the cast comes across as stick figures reading lines from a teleprompter .
translation: 堅苦しく、昼ドラのようなセリフのせいで、他のキャストはテレプロンプターからセリフを読んでいる棒人間のように映る。
back_translation: Because of the stiff dialogue that sounds like something from a daytime drama, the other cast members come across as lifeless stick figures reading from a teleprompter.

text: it 's so crammed with scenes and vistas and pretty moments that it 's left a few crucial things out , like character development and coherence .
translation: シーンや景色、美しい瞬間で詰め込まれすぎて、キャラクターの成長や整合性などいくつかの重要な要素が欠けてしまっています。
back_translation: It is packed with scenes, landscapes, and beautiful moments, but it lacks some important elements such as character development and consistency.

text: a hypnotic cyber hymn and a cruel story of youth culture .
translation: 催眠的なサイバー賛美歌と若者文化の残酷な物語。
back_translation: A hypnotic cyber hymn and a cruel tale of youth culture.

text: noyce has worked wonders with the material .
translation: ノイスはその素材で素晴らしい成果を上げました。
back_translation: Noise achieved remarkable results with that material.

text: a sometimes incisive and sensitive portrait that is undercut by its awkward structure and a final veering toward melodrama .
translation: 時には鋭く敏感な肖像画ですが、そのぎこちない構造と最後のメロドラマへの急展開によって台無しにされています。
back_translation: It is sometimes a sharply sensitive portrait, but it is ruined by its awkward structure and the abrupt shift to the final melodrama.

text: no thanks .
translation: いいえ、結構です。
back_translation: No, that's fine.

text: despite the predictable parent vs. child coming-of-age theme , first-class , natural acting and a look at `` the real americans '' make this a charmer .
translation: 予測可能な親子の成長テーマにもかかわらず、一流の自然な演技と「本物のアメリカ人」への視点がこの作品を魅力的にしています。
back_translation: Despite the predictable theme of parent-child growth, the top-notch natural performances and the perspective on "real Americans" make this work captivating.

text: delia , greta , and paula rank as three of the most multilayered and sympathetic female characters of the year .
translation: デリア、グレタ、パウラは、今年の最も多層的で共感を呼ぶ女性キャラクターの三人として評価されています。
back_translation: Delia, Greta, and Paula are being recognized as three of the most multi-dimensional and relatable female characters this year.

text: action - mechanical .
translation: アクション - 機械的。
back_translation: Action - Mechanical.

text: another wholly unnecessary addition to the growing , moldering pile of , well , extreme stunt pictures .
translation: 成長し、朽ち果てる極端なスタント映画の山に、完全に不要な追加がもう一つ加わった。
back_translation: An entirely unnecessary addition has been made to the extreme stunt film that grows and decays.

text: this would have been better than the fiction it has concocted , and there still could have been room for the war scenes .
translation: これは彼が作り上げたフィクションよりも良かっただろうし、戦争シーンの余地もまだあったかもしれない。
back_translation: This was probably better than the fiction he created, and there might have still been room for war scenes as well.

text: it 's a bad sign in a thriller when you instantly know whodunit .
translation: スリラーでは、犯人がすぐにわかってしまうのは悪い兆しです。
back_translation: In a thriller, it's a bad sign if the culprit is revealed right away.

text: while the production details are lavish , film has little insight into the historical period and its artists , particularly in how sand developed a notorious reputation .
translation: 制作の詳細は豪華ですが、映画は歴史的な時代やそのアーティストについての洞察がほとんどなく、特に砂が悪名高い評判をどのように持つに至ったかについては触れられていません。
back_translation: Although the production details are lavish, the film offers little insight into the historical period or its artists, particularly regarding how the infamous reputation of sand came to be.

text: although olivier assayas ' elegantly appointed period drama seems , at times , padded with incident in the way of a too-conscientious adaptation ... its three-hour running time plays closer to two .
translation: オリヴィエ・アサヤスの優雅に装飾された時代劇は、時折、過度に良心的な翻案のように事件が盛り込まれているように見えるが、その3時間の上映時間は実際には2時間に近い。
back_translation: Olivier Assayas's elegantly decorated period drama sometimes appears to incorporate events like an overly conscientious adaptation, but its three-hour runtime is actually closer to two hours.

text: the moral shrapnel and mental shellshock will linger long after this film has ended .
translation: 道徳的な破片と精神的なショックは、この映画が終わった後も長く残り続けるでしょう。
back_translation: Moral fragments and psychological shocks will linger long after this movie ends.

text: a sleek advert for youthful anomie that never quite equals the sum of its pretensions .
translation: 洗練された若者のアノミーの広告であり、決してその意図の総和に等しくはない。
back_translation: It is an advertisement for the anomie of refined youth, and it is never equal to the sum of its intentions.

text: overall , it 's a very entertaining , thought-provoking film with a simple message : god is love .
translation: 全体として、とてもエンターテイニングで、考えさせられる映画で、シンプルなメッセージがあります：神は愛です。
back_translation: Overall, it is a very entertaining and thought-provoking movie with a simple message: God is love.

text: some movies were made for the big screen , some for the small screen , and some , like ballistic : ecks vs. sever , were made for the palm screen .
translation: いくつかの映画は大画面用に作られ、いくつかは小画面用、そして「バリスティック：エックス対セバー」のように、いくつかは手のひらの画面用に作られました。
back_translation: Some movies are made for the big screen, some for the small screen, and some, like "Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever," are made for handheld screens.

text: a confident , richly acted , emotionally devastating piece of work and 2002 's first great film
translation: 自信に満ち、豊かに演技され、感情的に破壊的な作品であり、2002年の最初の偉大な映画です。
back_translation: A confident, richly performed, and emotionally devastating work, it is the first great film of 2002.

text: labute 's careful handling makes the material seem genuine rather than pandering .
translation: ラブテの慎重な取り扱いは、素材をお世辞ではなく、本物に見せる。
back_translation: The careful handling of the fabric makes it look genuine, not just flattering.

text: the whole film has this sneaky feel to it -- as if the director is trying to dupe the viewer into taking it all as very important simply because the movie is ugly to look at and not a hollywood product .
translation: 映画全体には、このこっそりとした感覚があります。まるで監督が視聴者をだまし、映画が醜く見えるために非常に重要なものだと思わせようとしているかのようですし、ハリウッドの作品ではないからです。
back_translation: The entire movie has a secretive feeling to it. It's as if the director is trying to deceive the audience into thinking that something very important is being made to look ugly, and it's not a Hollywood production.

text: an inelegant combination of two unrelated shorts that falls far short of the director 's previous work in terms of both thematic content and narrative strength .
translation: テーマ的内容と物語の力の両面において、監督の以前の作品には遠く及ばない、無関係な2つの短編を不恰好に組み合わせたもの。
back_translation: It is a clumsily combined work of two unrelated short films that fall far short, both thematically and in narrative strength, of the director's previous works.

text: ... a funny yet dark and seedy clash of cultures and generations .
translation: ... 面白くも暗く、そして陰湿な文化と世代の衝突。
back_translation: ... an interesting yet dark, and also insidious clash of culture and generations.

text: as tricky and satisfying as any of david mamet 's airless cinematic shell games .
translation: デイヴィッド・マミットの空気のない映画的な手品のように、トリッキーで満足感のあるものです。
back_translation: Like David Mamet's airless cinematic magic, it is tricky and satisfying.

text: the story is smart and entirely charming in intent and execution .
translation: その物語は賢く、意図と実行において完全に魅力的です。
back_translation: That story is clever and utterly captivating in its intention and execution.

text: the action clichés just pile up .
translation: アクションのクリシェがどんどん積み重なっていく。
back_translation: The clichés of action are piling up more and more.

text: not only does the thoroughly formulaic film represent totally exemplify middle-of-the-road mainstream , it also represents glossy hollywood at its laziest .
translation: 徹底的に型にはまったこの映画は、全く中間的なメインストリームを完全に具現化しているだけでなく、最も怠惰なグロスなハリウッドも表しています。
back_translation: This thoroughly formulaic movie not only fully embodies a completely average mainstream, but also represents the laziest, grossest aspects of Hollywood.

text: a delicious and delicately funny look at the residents of a copenhagen neighborhood coping with the befuddling complications life tosses at them .
translation: デンマークのコペンハーゲンのある地域に住む住民たちが、人生が投げかける混乱した複雑さに対処する様子を、美味しさと繊細なユーモアで描いた作品です。
back_translation: This work depicts how residents living in a certain area of Copenhagen, Denmark, cope with the chaotic complexities that life throws at them, with deliciousness and subtle humor.

text: if ever a concept came handed down from the movie gods on a silver platter , this is it .
translation: 映画の神々から銀の皿の上に乗せられて贈られたような概念があるとすれば、これです。
back_translation: If there is a concept that feels as if it has been placed on a silver platter and gifted by the gods of cinema, it is this.

text: you may be captivated , as i was , by its moods , and by its subtly transformed star , and still wonder why paul thomas anderson ever had the inclination to make the most sincere and artful movie in which adam sandler will probably ever appear .
translation: あなたも私と同じように、そのムードや微妙に変化した星に心を奪われるかもしれません。そして、なぜポール・トーマス・アンダーソンがアダム・サンドラーが恐らく出演する中で最も誠実で芸術的な映画を作りたいと思ったのか、まだ不思議に思うことでしょう。
back_translation: You might find yourself captivated by that mood and the subtly changed stars, just like I am. And you may still wonder why Paul Thomas Anderson wanted to create what is likely the most sincere and artistic film featuring Adam Sandler.

text: `` brown sugar '' admirably aspires to be more than another `` best man '' clone by weaving a theme throughout this funny film .
translation: 「ブラウンシュガー」は、この面白い映画にテーマを織り交ぜることで、単なる「親友」クローン以上のものを目指して見事に成長しています。
back_translation: "Brown Sugar" has grown remarkably by incorporating themes into this interesting movie, aiming to be more than just a simple "best friend" clone.

text: highlighted by a gritty style and an excellent cast , it 's better than one might expect when you look at the list of movies starring ice-t in a major role .
translation: 粗いスタイルと卓越したキャストによって強調されており、アイス-Tが主要な役で出演している映画のリストを見ると、予想以上に良い作品です。
back_translation: Highlighted by a rough style and an outstanding cast, the list of movies featuring Ice-T in prominent roles includes works that are surprisingly good.

text: gently humorous and touching .
translation: 優しくユーモラスで感動的。
back_translation: Gentle, humorous, and touching.

text: puportedly `` based on true events , '' a convolution of language that suggests it 's impossible to claim that it is `` based on a true story '' with a straight face .
translation: 「真実の出来事に基づいている」と主張されることは、まるで言葉の入り組みのようで、真顔で「実際の物語に基づいている」と主張するのは不可能であることを示唆しています。
back_translation: Claiming that it is "based on a true story" seems like a twist of words, suggesting that it is impossible to assert with a straight face that it is "based on a real story."

text: vulgar is too optimistic a title .
translation: 「下品」というタイトルはあまりにも楽観的だ。
back_translation: The title "Vulgar" is far too optimistic.

text: `` the adventures of pluto nash '' is a big time stinker .
translation: 「プルート・ナッシュの冒険」は大失敗の映画です。
back_translation: "Pluto Nash's Adventure" is a movie that was a huge failure.

text: visually captivating .
translation: 視覚的に魅力的な。
back_translation: Visually appealing.

text: as each of them searches for their place in the world , miller digs into their very minds to find an unblinking , flawed humanity .
translation: それぞれが自分の世界での居場所を探す中、ミラーは彼らの心の奥深くに入り込み、まなざしを逸らさない欠陥のある人間性を見出します。
back_translation: As each seeks their place in their own world, Mirror delves deep into their hearts, uncovering a flawed humanity that does not avert its gaze.

text: writer-director stephen gaghan has made the near-fatal mistake of being what the english call ` too clever by half . '
translation: 脚本家・監督のスティーブン・ギャガンは、イギリス人が「半分賢い」と呼ぶような、致命的なミスを犯してしまった。
back_translation: Screenwriter and director Steven Gaghan made a fatal mistake that the British would call "half smart."

text: for the future , one hopes mr. plympton will find room for one more member of his little band , a professional screenwriter .
translation: 未来のために、プレンプトン氏が彼の小さなバンドにもう一人、プロの脚本家を加える余地を見つけることを望む。
back_translation: For the future, I hope Mr. Plenton will find room to add another professional screenwriter to his small band.

text: the story plays out slowly , but the characters are intriguing and realistic .
translation: 物語はゆっくり展開しますが、キャラクターは興味深くリアルです。
back_translation: The story unfolds slowly, but the characters are intriguing and real.

text: very predictable but still entertaining
translation: 非常に予測可能ですが、それでも楽しいです。
back_translation: It's very predictable, but still fun.

text: if you 're not a fan , it might be like trying to eat brussels sprouts .
translation: ファンでないなら、ブリュッセルスプラウトを食べようとするようなものかもしれません。
back_translation: If you're not a fan, it might be like trying to eat Brussels sprouts.

text: has far more energy , wit and warmth than should be expected from any movie with a `` 2 '' at the end of its title .
translation: 「2」というタイトルの映画から期待されるものをはるかに超えるエネルギー、ウィット、温かさがあります。
back_translation: There is energy, wit, and warmth that far exceed what is expected from a movie titled "2."

text: mr. deeds is sure to give you a lot of laughs in this simple , sweet and romantic comedy .
translation: ミスター・ディーズは、このシンプルで甘くてロマンティックなコメディで、あなたをたくさん笑わせてくれること間違いなしです。
back_translation: Mr. Deez is sure to make you laugh a lot in this simple, sweet, and romantic comedy.

text: it all seemed wasted like deniro 's once promising career and the once grand long beach boardwalk .
translation: それは全て無駄に思えた、デニーロのかつての輝かしいキャリアや、一度は壮大だったロングビーチのボードウォークのように。
back_translation: It all seemed pointless, like De Niro's once-glorious career or the once-grand Long Beach boardwalk.

text: its gentle , touching story creeps into your heart .
translation: その優しく感動的な物語は、あなたの心に忍び寄ります。
back_translation: That gentle and moving story sneaks into your heart.

text: armed with a game supporting cast , from the pitch-perfect forster to the always hilarious meara and levy , like mike shoots and scores , doing its namesake proud .
translation: 完璧な演技のフォスターから常に面白いミーラとレヴィまで、サポートキャストが揃った『マイク』は、名に恥じない素晴らしい作品を作り上げている。
back_translation: From the perfect performance of Foster to the always entertaining Mira and Levi, the supporting cast of "Mike" has created a wonderful work that lives up to its name.

text: ... works on some levels and is certainly worth seeing at least once .
translation: ...いくつかのレベルでは機能しており、少なくとも一度は見る価値があります。
back_translation: It functions on several levels and is worth seeing at least once.

text: a potentially good comic premise and excellent cast are terribly wasted .
translation: 潜在的に良い漫画の前提と素晴らしいキャストがひどく無駄にされています。
back_translation: The premise of a potentially good manga and the wonderful cast are terribly wasted.

text: a small gem from belgium .
translation: ベルギーからの小さな宝石。
back_translation: A small gem from Belgium.

text: the characters are complex and quirky , but entirely believable as the remarkable ensemble cast brings them to life .
translation: キャラクターは複雑で風変わりですが、素晴らしいアンサンブルキャストが彼らを生き生きと表現するため、まったく信じられるものです。
back_translation: The characters are complex and quirky, but thanks to the wonderful ensemble cast bringing them to life, they are entirely believable.

text: worth a look as a curiosity .
translation: 興味深いものとして見る価値があります。
back_translation: It is worth seeing as something interesting.

text: if you 've got a house full of tots -- do n't worry , this will be on video long before they grow up and you can wait till then .
translation: もし家の中に子供がたくさんいるなら、心配しないでください。彼らが成長する前にこれがビデオに収められるので、その時まで待てます。
back_translation: If there are many children in the house, don't worry. This can be recorded on video before they grow up, so you can wait until then.

text: eddie murphy and owen wilson have a cute partnership in i spy , but the movie around them is so often nearly nothing that their charm does n't do a load of good .
translation: エディ・マーフィとオーウェン・ウィルソンは『アイ・スパイ』でかわいらしいパートナーシップを見せるが、彼らの周りの映画はしばしばほとんど何もないため、彼らの魅力はあまり効果がない。
back_translation: Eddie Murphy and Owen Wilson showcase a charming partnership in "I Spy," but the movies surrounding them often leave almost nothing to work with, so their charm is not very effective.

text: short and sweet , but also more than anything else slight ... tadpole pulls back from the consequences of its own actions and revelations .
translation: 短くて甘いが、何よりも少しだけ・・・オタマジャクシは自分の行動や啓示の結果から引き下がる。
back_translation: Short and sweet, but above all, the tadpole withdraws from the results of its actions and revelations, just a little bit...

text: poignant and delicately complex .
translation: 感動的で繊細に複雑。
back_translation: Emotional and delicately complex.

text: and we do n't avert our eyes for a moment .
translation: そして私たちは一瞬も目を背けません。
back_translation: And we do not look away for a moment.

text: simply and eloquently articulates the tangled feelings of particular new yorkers deeply touched by an unprecedented tragedy .
translation: 前例のない悲劇に深く心を揺さぶられた特定のニューヨーカーの複雑な感情をシンプルかつ優雅に表現しています。
back_translation: It expresses the complex emotions of a specific New Yorker deeply shaken by an unprecedented tragedy in a simple and elegant manner.

text: ... could easily be called the best korean film of 2002 .
translation: 2002年の最高の韓国映画と呼ばれてもおかしくない。
back_translation: It's not surprising to call it the best Korean film of 2002.

text: the title , alone , should scare any sane person away .
translation: そのタイトルだけで、正気の人間なら誰でも怯えるはずだ。
back_translation: Just with that title, any sane person would be scared.

text: for all the time we spend with these people , we never really get inside of them .
translation: 私たちがこれらの人々と過ごすすべての時間のために、私たちは彼らの内面に本当に入ることはありません。
back_translation: For all the time we spend with these people, we never really get into their inner selves.

text: it does n't matter that the film is less than 90 minutes .
translation: 映画の長さが90分未満であっても気にしない。
back_translation: I don't mind if the movie is less than 90 minutes long.

text: the plot is paper-thin and the characters are n't interesting enough to watch them go about their daily activities for two whole hours .
translation: プロットは薄っぺらで、キャラクターたちも彼らの日常を2時間も観る価値がないほど面白くありません。
back_translation: The plot is shallow, and the characters are not interesting enough to watch their daily lives for two hours.

text: the film is a hoot , and is just as good , if not better than much of what 's on saturday morning tv especially the pseudo-educational stuff we all ca n't stand .
translation: その映画はとても楽しくて、土曜日の朝のテレビにある多くの番組、特に私たちが我慢できない擬似教育的なものよりも、同じくらい良いか、またはそれ以上です。
back_translation: That movie was so much fun, and it was as good as or even better than many of the shows on Saturday morning television, especially the pseudo-educational ones that we can't stand.

text: the ending feels at odds with the rest of the film .
translation: 結末は映画の他の部分と相反するように感じる。
back_translation: The ending feels contradictory to the rest of the movie.

text: in the end there is one word that best describes this film : honest .
translation: 結局、この映画を最もよく表す言葉は「正直」です。
back_translation: In the end, the word that best describes this movie is "honesty."

text: the movie barely makes sense , with its unbelievable naïveté and arbitrary flashbacks .
translation: 映画は信じられないほどの無邪気さと恣意的なフラッシュバックで、ほとんど意味をなさない。
back_translation: The movie has an incredibly naive quality and arbitrary flashbacks, making it almost meaningless.

text: it 's a quirky , off-beat project .
translation: それは風変わりで個性的なプロジェクトです。
back_translation: It is a quirky and unique project.

text: if you can get past the taboo subject matter , it will be well worth your time .
translation: タブーなテーマを乗り越えられれば、あなたの時間をかけるだけの価値があります。
back_translation: If you can overcome taboo themes, it is worth your time.

text: coy but exhilarating , with really solid performances by ving rhames and wesley snipes .
translation: 控えめでありながらも刺激的で、ヴィング・レイムスとウェスリー・スナイプスの本当に素晴らしい演技があります。
back_translation: It is understated yet exciting, with truly great performances from Ving Rhames and Wesley Snipes.

text: starts slowly , but adrien brody -- in the title role -- helps make the film 's conclusion powerful and satisfying .
translation: ゆっくりと始まりますが、タイトルロールのエイドリアン・ブロディが映画の結末を力強く満足のいくものにするのを助けています。
back_translation: It starts slowly, but Adrian Brody in the title role helps make the film's conclusion powerfully satisfying.

text: feeble comedy .
translation: 弱々しいコメディ。
back_translation: Weak comedy.

text: no amount of blood and disintegrating vampire cadavers can obscure this movie 's lack of ideas .
translation: どれだけの血や崩れ落ちる吸血鬼の死体があっても、この映画のアイデアの欠如を覆い隠すことはできない。
back_translation: No amount of blood or crumbling vampire corpses can conceal the lack of ideas in this film.

text: ... the good and different idea -lrb- of middle-aged romance -rrb- is not handled well and , except for the fine star performances , there is little else to recommend `` never again . ''
translation: 中年ロマンスという良くもあり異なるアイデアはうまく扱われておらず、素晴らしいスターの演技を除けば、「二度とない」と推薦するものはほとんどありません。
back_translation: The idea of midlife romance, which is both good and different, is not handled well, and aside from the performances of the wonderful stars, there is hardly anything to recommend it as a "once-in-a-lifetime" experience.

text: would that greengrass had gone a tad less for grit and a lot more for intelligibility .
translation: グリーングラスがもう少し grit を抑えて、もっと明瞭さを重視してくれていたらよかったのに。
back_translation: I wish Green Grass had toned down the grit a bit more and focused more on clarity.

text: sadly , as blood work proves , that was a long , long time ago .
translation: 残念ながら、血液検査が証明するように、それはずっと昔のことです。
back_translation: Unfortunately, as the blood test proves, that was a long time ago.

text: the performers are so spot on , it is hard to conceive anyone else in their roles .
translation: パフォーマーたちは非常に完璧で、彼ら以外に誰かがその役を演じることを想像するのは難しいです。
back_translation: The performers are incredibly perfect, and it's hard to imagine anyone else playing those roles.

text: the first mistake , i suspect , is casting shatner as a legendary professor and kunis as a brilliant college student -- where 's pauly shore as the rocket scientist ?
translation: 最初の間違いは、シャトナーを伝説の教授として、キュニスを優秀な大学生としてキャスティングしたことだと思います。パウリー・ショアはロケット科学者としてどこにいるのでしょうか？
back_translation: I think the first mistake was casting Shatner as the legendary professor and Kunis as the outstanding college student. Where is Pauly Shore as the rocket scientist?

text: wise and deadpan humorous .
translation: 賢くて無表情なユーモア。
back_translation: Smart and expressionless humor.

text: twenty-three movies into a mostly magnificent directorial career , clint eastwood 's efficiently minimalist style finally has failed him .
translation: 23本の映画を経て、ほぼ素晴らしい監督キャリアを築いてきたクリント・イーストウッドの効率的なミニマリストスタイルはついに彼を裏切った。
back_translation: After directing 23 films, Clint Eastwood's efficient minimalist style, which has helped him build an almost remarkable directing career, has finally let him down.

text: boring and meandering .
translation: 退屈で曲がりくねった。
back_translation: Boring and winding.

text: while certainly more naturalistic than its australian counterpart , amari 's film falls short in building the drama of lilia 's journey .
translation: オーストラリアの作品と比べて確かにより自然主義的であるものの、アマリの映画はリリアの旅のドラマを構築する点で不足しています。
back_translation: Although it is certainly more naturalistic compared to Australian works, Amari's film is lacking in building the drama of Lilia's journey.

text: make chan 's action sequences boring .
translation: チャンのアクションシーンを退屈にする。
back_translation: Make Chan's action scene boring.

text: simply put , there should have been a more compelling excuse to pair susan sarandon and goldie hawn .
translation: 簡単に言えば、スーザン・サランドンとゴールディ・ホーンを組み合わせるには、もっと説得力のある理由が必要だったはずです。
back_translation: In simple terms, there should have been a more compelling reason to combine Susan Sarandon and Goldie Hawn.

text: proves a lovely trifle that , unfortunately , is a little too in love with its own cuteness .
translation: 残念ながら、自分の可愛さに少しだけ陶酔しすぎている素敵なトリフルを証明している。
back_translation: Unfortunately, it proves that a wonderful trifle is a little too intoxicated by its own cuteness.

text: but its storytelling prowess and special effects are both listless .
translation: しかし、そのストーリーテリングの腕前と特殊効果はどちらも活気がありません。
back_translation: However, both the storytelling skills and the special effects are lacking in vitality.

text: an energizing , intoxicating documentary charting the rise of hip-hop culture in general and the art of scratching -lrb- or turntablism -rrb- in particular .
translation: ヒップホップ文化の全体的な盛り上がりと、特にスクラッチング（ターンテーブル技術）の芸術を描いた、活気あふれ中毒性のあるドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A lively and addictive documentary that depicts the overall rise of hip-hop culture, especially the art of scratching (turntable technique).

text: screenwriter dan schneider and director shawn levy substitute volume and primary colors for humor and bite .
translation: 脚本家ダン・シュナイダーと監督ショーン・レビーは、ユーモアと鋭さの代わりに音量と基礎色を用いる。
back_translation: Screenwriter Dan Schneider and director Shawn Levy use volume and primary colors instead of humor and sharpness.

text: -lrb- ramsay -rrb- visually transforms the dreary expanse of dead-end distaste the characters inhabit into a poem of art , music and metaphor .
translation: -（ラムゼイ）-は、登場人物たちが住む行き止まりの不快感の陰鬱な広がりを、芸術、音楽、そして隠喩の詩に変える。
back_translation: -Ramsey- transforms the gloomy expanse of discomfort in the dead-end where the characters live into art, music, and metaphorical poetry.

text: works as pretty contagious fun .
translation: かなり感染力のある楽しい仕事です。
back_translation: It's a quite contagious and enjoyable job.

text: in the pianist , polanski is saying what he has long wanted to say , confronting the roots of his own preoccupations and obsessions , and he allows nothing to get in the way .
translation: 「ピアニスト」では、ポランスキーが長い間言いたかったことを語り、自身の関心事や執念の根源に向き合い、何も邪魔させないようにしています。
back_translation: In "The Pianist," Polanski expresses what he has wanted to say for a long time, confronting the roots of his interests and obsessions, ensuring that nothing gets in the way.

text: ... liotta is put in an impossible spot because his character 's deceptions ultimately undo him and the believability of the entire scenario .
translation: ... リオッタは不可能な立場に置かれています。なぜなら、彼のキャラクターの欺瞞が最終的に自らを滅ぼし、シナリオ全体の信憑性を損なうからです。
back_translation: ... Riotta is placed in an impossible position. This is because the hypocrisy of his character ultimately leads to his own destruction, undermining the credibility of the entire scenario.

text: if there was ever a movie where the upbeat ending feels like a copout , this is the one .
translation: もし陽気な結末が手抜きに感じる映画があるとすれば、これがその映画です。
back_translation: If there is a movie where a cheerful ending feels like a cop-out, this is that movie.

text: ... the cast portrays their cartoon counterparts well ... but quite frankly , scoob and shag do n't eat enough during the film . '
translation: ... キャストは彼らのアニメーションの対応キャラクターをうまく演じているが、正直なところ、スクービーとシャギーは映画中に十分に食べていない。
back_translation: ... The cast does a great job portraying their animated counterparts, but to be honest, Scooby and Shaggy don't eat enough throughout the movie.

text: the sheer dumbness of the plot -lrb- other than its one good idea -rrb- and the movie 's inescapable air of sleaziness get you down .
translation: プロットの純粋な愚かさ（その一つの良いアイデアを除けば）と、映画の避けられないいやらしさはあなたを落ち込ませる。
back_translation: The sheer foolishness of the plot (except for one good idea) and the movie's inevitable sleaziness bring you down.

text: those who do n't entirely ` get ' godard 's distinctive discourse will still come away with a sense of his reserved but existential poignancy .
translation: ゴダールの独特の言説を完全に「理解」できない人でも、彼の控えめだが存在的な痛切さを感じ取ることができる。
back_translation: Even those who cannot completely "understand" Godard's unique discourse can still perceive his understated yet existential poignancy.

text: provides a very moving and revelatory footnote to the holocaust .
translation: ホロコーストに対して非常に感動的で啓発的な脚注を提供します。
back_translation: I will provide a very moving and enlightening footnote about the Holocaust.

text: ... there is enough originality in ` life ' to distance it from the pack of paint-by-number romantic comedies that so often end up on cinema screens .
translation: 「人生」には、塗り絵のようなロマンティックコメディの群れから遠ざけるだけの十分な独自性がある。
back_translation: "Life" has enough uniqueness to keep it away from the crowd of romantic comedies like a coloring book.

text: raimi crafted a complicated hero who is a welcome relief from the usual two-dimensional offerings .
translation: ライミは、通常の二次元的なキャラクターとは一線を画す、複雑なヒーローを作り上げた。
back_translation: Raimi has created a complex hero that stands apart from the typical two-dimensional characters.

text: if you saw benigni 's pinocchio at a public park , you 'd grab your kids and run and then probably call the police .
translation: もし公園でベニーニの『ピノッキオ』を見かけたら、あなたは子供たちを連れて逃げ、そしておそらく警察を呼ぶでしょう。
back_translation: If you see Benini's "Pinocchio" in the park, you would likely grab the children and run away, and probably call the police.

text: it is dark , brooding and slow , and takes its central idea way too seriously .
translation: それは暗く、陰鬱で遅く、中心となるアイデアを真剣に受け止めすぎている。
back_translation: It is dark, gloomy, slow, and takes the central idea too seriously.

text: it cuts to the core of what it actually means to face your fears , to be a girl in a world of boys , to be a boy truly in love with a girl , and to ride the big metaphorical wave that is life -- wherever it takes you .
translation: それは、恐れに立ち向かうこと、男の世界で女であること、本当に女に恋をしている男であること、そして人生という大きな比喩的な波に乗ることの本質に迫ります - それがどこにあなたを連れて行こうとも。
back_translation: It delves into the essence of confronting fear, being a woman in a man's world, being a man truly in love with a woman, and riding the great metaphorical wave of life - wherever it may take you.

text: an enjoyable , if occasionally flawed , experiment .
translation: 楽しい、時々欠点のある実験。
back_translation: A fun experiment with occasional flaws.

text: it is , however , a completely honest , open-hearted film that should appeal to anyone willing to succumb to it .
translation: しかし、これは完全に正直で、心のこもった映画であり、それに屈することをいとわない誰にでも魅力を持つべきです。
