back_translation: However, this is a completely honest and heartfelt movie, and it should have an appeal to anyone who is willing to be moved by it.

text: i do n't think this movie loves women at all .
translation: この映画は女性を全く愛していないと思います。
back_translation: I don't think this movie loves women at all.

text: american musical comedy as we know it would n't exist without the precedent of yiddish theater , whose jolly , fun-for-fun 's - sake communal spirit goes to the essence of broadway .
translation: アメリカのミュージカルコメディは、イディッシュ・シアターの前例がなければ存在しなかったであろう。その陽気で楽しむための共同体の精神は、ブロードウェイの本質に通じている。
back_translation: American musical comedy would not have existed without the precedents of Yiddish theater. The spirit of community for joy and enjoyment is inherent in the essence of Broadway.

text: do n't judge this one too soon - it 's a dark , gritty story but it takes off in totally unexpected directions and keeps on going .
translation: この作品は早まって評価しないでください - ダークで厳しい物語ですが、全く予想外の方向に進展し、どんどん続いていきます。
back_translation: Please do not judge this work too quickly - it is a dark and harsh story, but it develops in completely unexpected directions and continues to unfold.

text: ... -lrb- the film -rrb- works , due mostly to the tongue-in-cheek attitude of the screenplay .
translation: ...（映画）は、主に脚本の皮肉な態度のおかげで機能する。
back_translation: The film primarily works due to the ironic attitude of the script.

text: features nonsensical and laughable plotting , wooden performances , ineptly directed action sequences and some of the worst dialogue in recent memory .
translation: 意味のない滑稽なプロット、ぎこちない演技、下手に演出されたアクションシーン、そして最近の記憶に残る中で最も悪いダイアログのいくつかが特徴です。
back_translation: It features a meaningless and absurd plot, awkward acting, poorly directed action scenes, and some of the worst dialogue in recent memory.

text: too smart to ignore but a little too smugly superior to like , this could be a movie that ends up slapping its target audience in the face by shooting itself in the foot .
translation: 無視するには賢すぎるが、好かれるには少しばかり傲慢すぎる。これは、ターゲットとする視聴者を顔面に引っ叩くような形で、自己矛盾に陥る映画になるかもしれない。
back_translation: Too smart to be ignored, but a bit too arrogant to be liked. This could lead to a film that falls into self-contradiction, slapping the target audience right in the face.

text: the director 's many dodges and turns add up to little more than a screenful of gamesmanship that 's low on both suspense and payoff .
translation: 監督の多くの回避や転換は、緊張感も満足感も乏しい、ただのゲーム性に過ぎないスクリーンの一面を作り上げるに過ぎない。
back_translation: Many of the director's evasions and twists result in creating just a superficial aspect of the screen that lacks both tension and satisfaction, merely reducing it to gameplay.

text: an invaluable historical document thanks to the filmmaker 's extraordinary access to massoud , whose charm , cultivation and devotion to his people are readily apparent .
translation: マスードへの映画製作者の並外れたアクセスのおかげで、この貴重な歴史的文書は、彼の魅力、教養、そして彼の人々への献身が明らかに表れています。
back_translation: Thanks to the extraordinary access to Masood as a filmmaker, this valuable historical document clearly reveals his charisma, intellect, and devotion to his people.

text: ... no charm , no laughs , no fun , no reason to watch .
translation: … 魅力もなく、笑いもなく、楽しさもなく、見る理由もない。
back_translation: … There is no charm, no laughter, no joy, and no reason to watch.

text: thanks largely to williams , all the interesting developments are processed in 60 minutes -- the rest is just an overexposed waste of film .
translation: ウィリアムズのおかげで、すべての興味深い展開は60分で処理され、残りはただの過剰露光されたフィルムの無駄です。
back_translation: Thanks to Williams, all the interesting developments are processed in 60 minutes, and the rest is just wasted overexposed film.

text: what might have emerged as hilarious lunacy in the hands of woody allen or mel brooks -lrb- at least during their '70s heyday -rrb- comes across as lame and sophomoric in this debut indie feature .
translation: ウディ・アレンやメル・ブルックスの手にかかれば、少なくとも1970年代の全盛期には面白おかしい狂気として現れたかもしれないものが、このデビュー独立映画では陳腐で未熟に感じられる。
back_translation: What might have appeared as amusing madness in the hands of Woody Allen or Mel Brooks during their peak in the 1970s feels clichéd and immature in this debut independent film.

text: it would take a complete moron to foul up a screen adaptation of oscar wilde 's classic satire .
translation: オスカー・ワイルドの古典的な風刺のスクリーンアダプテーションを台無しにするには、完全な愚か者が必要だ。
back_translation: To ruin a classic satirical screen adaptation of Oscar Wilde, a complete fool is necessary.

text: jackass is a vulgar and cheap-looking version of candid camera staged for the marquis de sade set .
translation: ジャッカスは、マルキ・ド・サドのために仕掛けられたバルガーで安っぽいバージョンのカメラを使ったドッキリ番組です。
back_translation: Jackass is a prank show that uses cheap versions of cameras set up for Marquis de Sade.

text: everyone should be able to appreciate the wonderful cinematography and naturalistic acting .
translation: 誰もが素晴らしい撮影技術と自然主義的な演技を評価できるべきです。
back_translation: Everyone should be able to appreciate the wonderful filming techniques and naturalistic acting.

text: one well-timed explosion in a movie can be a knockout , but a hundred of them can be numbing .
translation: 映画の中での一度のタイミングの良い爆発は圧倒的な印象を与えるが、百回の爆発は麻痺することがある。
back_translation: A single well-timed explosion in a movie leaves an overwhelming impression, but a hundred explosions can become numbing.

text: where their heads were is anyone 's guess .
translation: 彼らの頭がどこにあったのかは誰にも分からない。
back_translation: No one knows where their heads were at.

text: scotland looks wonderful , the fans are often funny fanatics , the showdown sure beats a bad day of golf .
translation: スコットランドは素晴らしいですね。ファンはしばしば面白い熱狂者で、対決は悪いゴルフの日よりも確実に良いです。
back_translation: Scotland is wonderful. Fans are often interesting enthusiasts, and the matches are definitely better than a bad day of golf.

text: the music makes a nice album , the food is enticing and italy beckons us all .
translation: 音楽は素晴らしいアルバムを作り、料理は魅力的で、イタリアは私たちを皆呼び寄せています。
back_translation: Music creates wonderful albums, cooking is charming, and Italy is calling us all.

text: one of the best silly horror movies of recent memory , with some real shocks in store for unwary viewers .
translation: 最近の記憶に残る最高のシリーホラー映画の一つで、 unsuspecting viewers にとって本当に驚かされるシーンが待っています。
back_translation: One of the best horror series films that stands out in recent memory, featuring truly shocking scenes for unsuspecting viewers.

text: the film is a very good viewing alternative for young women .
translation: この映画は若い女性にとって非常に良い視聴の選択肢です。
back_translation: This movie is a very good viewing option for young women.

text: beautifully shot against the frozen winter landscapes of grenoble and geneva , the film unfolds with all the mounting tension of an expert thriller , until the tragedy beneath it all gradually reveals itself .
translation: グルノーブルとジュネーブの凍りついた冬の風景を背景に美しく撮影されたこの映画は、熟練のスリラーのような緊張感を高めながら展開し、やがてその背後にある悲劇が徐々に明らかになっていく。
back_translation: Set against the frozen winter landscapes of Grenoble and Geneva, this film is beautifully shot and unfolds with the tension of a seasoned thriller, gradually revealing the tragedy behind it.

text: griffin & co. manage to be spectacularly outrageous .
translation: グリフィン＆コは、驚くほど大胆であることに成功しています。
back_translation: Griffin & Co has succeeded in being astonishingly bold.

text: it is hard not to be especially grateful for freedom after a film like this .
translation: このような映画の後では、自由に対して特に感謝しないのは難しい。
back_translation: After a movie like this, it's hard not to feel especially grateful for freedom.

text: a well-put-together piece of urban satire .
translation: よくまとめられた都市風刺の作品。
back_translation: A well-organized work of urban satire.

text: too much of nemesis has a tired , talky feel .
translation: 「ネメシス」は疲れた、話が長く感じる。
back_translation: "Nemesis" feels tiring, and the story seems long.

text: pan nalin 's exposition is beautiful and mysterious , and the interviews that follow , with the practitioners of this ancient indian practice , are as subtle and as enigmatic .
translation: パーン・ナリンの展示は美しく神秘的であり、その後に続くこの古代インドの実践者たちとのインタビューもまた、微妙で謎めいています。
back_translation: The exhibition of Parn Narin is beautiful and mystical, and the interviews that follow with these ancient Indian practitioners are also subtle and enigmatic.

text: given the fact that virtually no one is bound to show up at theatres for it , the project should have been made for the tube .
translation: 実際にはほとんど誰も劇場に行くことがないという事実から、このプロジェクトはテレビ用に作られるべきだった。
back_translation: The fact that almost no one actually goes to the theater suggests that this project should have been made for television.

text: with more character development this might have been an eerie thriller ; with better payoffs , it could have been a thinking man 's monster movie .
translation: もっとキャラクターの発展があれば、これは不気味なスリラーになっていたかもしれません; より良い成果があれば、考える人のためのモンスター映画になっていたでしょう。
back_translation: If there had been more character development, this could have been an eerie thriller; with better results, it might have turned into a monster movie for thinkers.

text: an entertaining british hybrid of comedy , caper thrills and quirky romance .
translation: コメディ、キャパースリル、奇妙なロマンスが融合した面白いイギリスのハイブリッド。
back_translation: A funny British hybrid that blends comedy, caper thrill, and peculiar romance.

text: but ... in trying to capture the novel 's deeper intimate resonances , the film has -- ironically - distanced us from the characters .
translation: しかし...小説の深い親密な共鳴を捉えようとする中で、映画は皮肉なことに私たちをキャラクターから遠ざけてしまった。
back_translation: However, in trying to capture the deep, intimate resonance of the novel, the film ironically distanced us from the characters.

text: the modern master of the chase sequence returns with a chase to end all chases
translation: 現代の追跡シーケンスの巨匠が、すべての追跡の終わりとなる追跡を引き連れて戻ってきました。
back_translation: The master of modern chase sequences has returned with a chase that will be the end of all chases.

text: queen of the damned as you might have guessed , makes sorry use of aaliyah in her one and only starring role -- she does little here but point at things that explode into flame .
translation: 「呪われた女王」は、あなたが推測したように、アリーヤを彼女の唯一の主演作で残念な使い方をしています。彼女はここでは、炎を巻き起こす物を指さすだけです。
back_translation: "The Cursed Queen" disappointingly uses Aaliyah in her only leading role, as you guessed. Here, she merely points to something that ignites flames.

text: a loud , witless mess that has none of the charm and little of the intrigue from the tv series .
translation: 騒がしく、無知な混乱であり、テレビシリーズの魅力も intrigueもほとんどない。
back_translation: It is a noisy, ignorant chaos, lacking almost any charm or intrigue of a television series.

text: a cartoon ?
translation: アニメ？
back_translation: Anime?

text: a crass and insulting homage to great films like some like it hot and the john wayne classics .
translation: 「サム・ライク・イット・ホット」やジョン・ウェインのクラシック映画に対する下品で侮辱的なオマージュ。
back_translation: A vulgar and insulting homage to "Some Like It Hot" and classic films starring John Wayne.

text: the problem with `` xxx '' is that its own action is n't very effective .
translation: 「xxx」の問題は、その自体の行動があまり効果的でないことです。
back_translation: The problem with "xxx" is that its own behavior is not very effective.

text: ` yes , that 's right : it 's forrest gump , angel of death . '
translation: はい、その通りです：フォレスト・ガンプ、死の天使です。
back_translation: Yes, that's right: Forrest Gump, the angel of death.

text: with a romantic comedy plotline straight from the ages , this cinderella story does n't have a single surprise up its sleeve .
translation: 時代を超えたロマンティック・コメディのプロットラインを持ったこのシンデレラストーリーには、驚きが一つもありません。
back_translation: This Cinderella story, with a plotline that transcends time, has no surprises whatsoever.

text: ... while certainly clever in spots , this too-long , spoofy update of shakespeare 's macbeth does n't sustain a high enough level of invention .
translation: ... 場所によっては確かに巧妙ですが、この長すぎるシェイクスピアのマクベスのパロディ更新は、十分なレベルの創造性を維持していません。
back_translation: ... In some places it is certainly clever, but this overly lengthy parody update of Shakespeare's Macbeth does not maintain a sufficient level of creativity.

text: no new plot conceptions or environmental changes , just different bodies for sharp objects to rip through .
translation: 新しいプロットの概念や環境の変化はなく、ただ鋭い物体が貫通するための異なる身体があるだけです。
back_translation: There are no new concepts for the plot or changes in the environment; there are just different bodies for sharp objects to penetrate.

text: australian actor\/director john polson and award-winning english cinematographer giles nuttgens make a terrific effort at disguising the obvious with energy and innovation .
translation: オーストラリアの俳優・監督ジョン・ポルソンと受賞歴のあるイギリスの撮影監督ジャイルズ・ナッテンズは、エネルギーと革新性をもって明らかなものを隠す素晴らしい努力をしています。
back_translation: Australian actor and director John Polson and award-winning British cinematographer Giles Nuttgens are making a remarkable effort to conceal the obvious with energy and innovation.

text: twohy knows how to inflate the mundane into the scarifying , and gets full mileage out of the rolling of a stray barrel or the unexpected blast of a phonograph record .
translation: トゥーヒーは平凡なものを恐ろしいものに膨らませる方法を知っており、はぐれた樽が転がる音や予期しないレコードの爆発的な音から最大限に楽しみを引き出します。
back_translation: Tuhi knows how to amplify ordinary things into terrifying ones and maximizes enjoyment from the sound of a stray barrel rolling and the explosive sound of an unexpected record.

text: at once a testament to the divine calling of education and a demonstration of the painstaking process of imparting knowledge .
translation: 教育の神聖な使命の証であり、知識を伝えるための骨の折れるプロセスの実証でもある。
back_translation: It is a testament to the sacred mission of education and also a demonstration of the arduous process of conveying knowledge.

text: insufferably naive .
translation: 耐え難く無邪気な。
back_translation: Unbearably innocent.

text: these are textbook lives of quiet desperation .
translation: これは教科書のような静かな絶望の生活です。
back_translation: This is a life of quiet despair, like that of a textbook.

text: worth a salute just for trying to be more complex than your average film .
translation: 平均的な映画よりも複雑になろうとしたことに対して、敬意を表する価値がある。
back_translation: It is worth acknowledging the effort to be more complex than an average film.

text: it excels because , unlike so many other hollywood movies of its ilk , it offers hope .
translation: それは、同じような他のハリウッド映画とは異なり、希望を提供するために優れています。
back_translation: Unlike other similar Hollywood movies, it excels in providing hope.

text: the fun of the movie is the chance it affords to watch jackson , who also served as executive producer , take his smooth , shrewd , powerful act abroad .
translation: 映画の楽しさは、エグゼクティブ・プロデューサーも務めたジャクソンが、自身の洗練され、機知に富み、強力なパフォーマンスを海外で披露する機会を提供することにあります。
back_translation: The fun of the movie lies in the opportunity provided by Jackson, who also serves as the executive producer, to showcase his refined, witty, and powerful performance overseas.

text: far too clever by half , howard 's film is really a series of strung-together moments , with all the spaces in between filled with fantasies , daydreams , memories and one fantastic visual trope after another .
translation: ハワードの映画は、実際には連結された瞬間のシリーズであり、その間のすべての空間は幻想、白昼の夢、記憶、そして次々と現れる素晴らしいビジュアル・トロープで満たされています。
back_translation: Howard's films are, in fact, a series of interconnected moments, filled with fantasy, daydreams, memories, and a succession of brilliant visual tropes in all the spaces in between.

text: serious and thoughtful .
translation: 真剣で思慮深い。
back_translation: Serious and thoughtful.

text: soderbergh skims the fat from the 1972 film .
translation: ソダーバーグは1972年の映画から余分な部分を省いています。
back_translation: Soderbergh has eliminated the extraneous parts from the 1972 film.

text: a remarkably insightful look at the backstage angst of the stand-up comic .
translation: スタンドアップコメディアンの裏方の苦悩を非常に洞察に満ちて描いた作品。
back_translation: A work that insightfully depicts the struggles behind the scenes of stand-up comedians.

text: alternately hilarious and sad , aggravating and soulful , scathing and joyous .
translation: 交互に面白くて悲しく、苛立たしくて心のこもった、辛辣で喜ばしい。
back_translation: Alternately interesting and sad, frustrating and heartfelt, caustic and delightful.

text: this is the case of a pregnant premise being wasted by a script that takes few chances and manages to insult the intelligence of everyone in the audience .
translation: これは、いくつかのリスクを取らず、観客全員の知性を侮辱する脚本によって無駄にされた妊娠中の前提のケースです。
back_translation: This is a case where the premise of pregnancy is wasted by a script that takes no risks and insults the intelligence of the entire audience.

text: it 's unlikely we 'll see a better thriller this year .
translation: 今年、これよりも優れたスリラーを見ることはなさそうです。
back_translation: It seems unlikely that I will see a better thriller than this one this year.

text: it 's provocative stuff , but the speculative effort is hampered by taylor 's cartoonish performance and the film 's ill-considered notion that hitler 's destiny was shaped by the most random of chances .
translation: これは挑発的な内容ですが、推測的な試みはテイラーの漫画的な演技と、ヒトラーの運命が最も偶然の要素によって形作られたという映画の考えによって妨げられています。
back_translation: This is provocative content, but the speculative attempt is hindered by Taylor's cartoonish performance and the film's notion that Hitler's fate was shaped largely by chance.

text: a movie that ca n't get sufficient distance from leroy 's delusions to escape their maudlin influence .
translation: レロイの妄想から十分な距離を置けず、感傷的な影響から逃れることができない映画。
back_translation: A movie that cannot keep a sufficient distance from Leroy's delusions and cannot escape emotional influences.

text: though harris is affecting at times , he can not overcome the sense that pumpkin is a mere plot pawn for two directors with far less endearing disabilities .
translation: ハリスは時には影響を与えているが、彼はパンプキンが2人の監督のための単なるプロットの駒であるという感覚を克服することはできない。
back_translation: At times, Harris has an influence, but he cannot overcome the feeling that Pumpkin is merely a plot pawn for the two directors.

text: schneidermeister ... makin ' a fool of himself ... losin ' his fan base ...
translation: シュナイダーマイスター... 自分自身を愚かにして... ファンベースを失っている...
back_translation: Schneider Meister... making oneself foolish... losing the fan base...

text: in this case zero .
translation: この場合はゼロです。
back_translation: In this case, it is zero.

text: the young stars are too cute ; the story and ensuing complications are too manipulative ; the message is too blatant ; the resolutions are too convenient .
translation: 若いスターたちはとても可愛い；ストーリーとそれに続く複雑な展開はあまりにも操られている；メッセージはあまりにも明白；解決策はあまりにも都合が良すぎる。
back_translation: The young stars are very cute; the story and the subsequent complex developments are too manipulated; the message is too obvious; the solutions are too convenient.

text: the difference is that i truly enjoyed most of mostly martha while i ne
translation: 違いは、私は「モーストリー・マーサ」のほとんどを本当に楽しんだのに対して、私はそうではなかったということです。
back_translation: The difference is that I really enjoyed most of "Mostly Martha," whereas I did not feel the same way.

text: sexy and romantic .
translation: セクシーでロマンチック。
back_translation: Sexy and romantic.

text: by the time the plot grinds itself out in increasingly incoherent fashion , you might be wishing for a watch that makes time go faster rather than the other way around .
translation: プロットがますます無関係に進行する頃には、逆に時間が早く進む時計を望むようになるかもしれません。
back_translation: As the plot progresses increasingly irrelevantly, you may find yourself wanting a clock that runs faster instead.

text: arteta directs one of the best ensemble casts of the year
translation: アルテタは今年の最高のアンサンブルキャストの一つを指揮しています。
back_translation: Arteta is conducting one of the year's best ensemble casts.

text: vividly conveys the passion , creativity , and fearlessness of one of mexico 's most colorful and controversial artists -- a captivating drama that will speak to the nonconformist in us all .
translation: メキシコの最もカラフルで物議を醸すアーティストの情熱、創造性、そして恐れ知らずの精神を鮮やかに伝える、私たちの中の非順応者に響く魅力的なドラマ。
back_translation: An captivating drama that vividly conveys the passion, creativity, and fearless spirit of Mexico's most colorful and controversial artists, resonating with the nonconformists within us.

text: the concept is a hoot .
translation: そのコンセプトは面白いです。
back_translation: That concept is interesting.

text: it may not be particularly innovative , but the film 's crisp , unaffected style and air of gentle longing make it unexpectedly rewarding .
translation: 特に革新的ではないかもしれませんが、映画のシャープで無頓着なスタイルと穏やかな憧れの空気が意外にも心に残ります。
back_translation: It may not be particularly innovative, but the film's sharp and nonchalant style, along with its gentle atmosphere of longing, surprisingly lingers in the heart.

text: in its own way , joshua is as blasphemous and nonsensical as a luis buñuel film without the latter 's attendant intelligence , poetry , passion , and genius .
translation: それぞれの方法で、ジョシュアはルイス・ブニュエルの映画と同じくらい冒涜的で無意味ですが、後者の知性、詩、情熱、天才は伴っていません。
back_translation: In each case, Joshua is as blasphemous and meaningless as Luis Buñuel's films, but lacks the latter's intelligence, poetry, passion, and genius.

text: perhaps a better celebration of these unfairly dismissed heroes would be a film that is n't this painfully forced , false and fabricated .
translation: おそらく、これらの不当に解雇された英雄を祝うより良い方法は、こんなにも痛々しく無理に作られた、偽りのある、捏造された映画ではないことです。
back_translation: Perhaps a better way to celebrate these unjustly fired heroes is not through this painfully forced, false, and fabricated film.

text: ... you can be forgiven for realizing that you 've spent the past 20 minutes looking at your watch and waiting for frida to just die already .
translation: …フリーダが早く死んでくれと時計を見ながら20分も待っていたことに気づいても許されるでしょう。
back_translation: ...it would be understandable if one realized they had waited for 20 minutes while wishing for Frida to die quickly, glancing at the clock.

text: the director , mark pellington , does a terrific job conjuring up a sinister , menacing atmosphere though unfortunately all the story gives us is flashing red lights , a rattling noise , and a bump on the head .
translation: 監督のマーク・ペリンは、不気味で威圧的な雰囲気を見事に作り出していますが、残念ながらストーリーは赤い点滅灯、ガタガタという音、そして頭をぶつけるだけです。
back_translation: Director Mark Perrin brilliantly creates a chilling and intimidating atmosphere, but unfortunately, the story consists only of a red flashing light, rattling noises, and head bumps.

text: even if the naipaul original remains the real masterpiece , the movie possesses its own languorous charm .
translation: ナイポールの原作が真の傑作であるとしても、映画には独自の languorous（寝ぼけたような）魅力があります。
back_translation: Even if Naipaul's original work is a true masterpiece, the film has its own languorous charm.

text: delivers more than its fair share of saucy hilarity .
translation: ひょうきんな笑いをこれ以上ないほど提供します。
back_translation: We provide laughter like never before.

text: if it were any more of a turkey , it would gobble in dolby digital stereo .
translation: もしそれがもっと七面鳥だったら、ドルビー・デジタル・ステレオでガボガボ言うだろう。
back_translation: If it were more of a turkey, it would be gobbling in Dolby Digital Stereo.

text: more intimate than spectacular , e.t. is carried less by wow factors than by its funny , moving yarn that holds up well after two decades .
translation: 壮大さよりもより親密で、E.T.は驚きの要素よりも、20年経っても色あせない面白く感動的な物語によって支えられています。
back_translation: Rather than grandeur, E.T. is supported by a heartfelt and moving story that remains interesting and impactful even 20 years later, rather than by elements of surprise.

text: i thought the relationships were wonderful , the comedy was funny , and the love ` real ' .
translation: 人間関係は素晴らしく、コメディは面白く、愛は「本物」だと思いました。
back_translation: I thought human relationships were wonderful, the comedy was funny, and love was "real."

text: amid the shock and curiosity factors , the film is just a corny examination of a young actress trying to find her way .
translation: 驚きと好奇心の要素の中で、この映画は若い女優が自分の道を見つけようとする軽薄な考察に過ぎない。
back_translation: Amid elements of surprise and curiosity, this film is nothing more than a superficial exploration of a young actress trying to find her own way.

text: wickedly funny , visually engrossing , never boring , this movie challenges us to think about the ways we consume pop culture .
translation: 非常に面白く、視覚的に魅力的で、決して退屈ではなく、この映画は私たちにポップカルチャーを消費する方法について考えることを促します。
back_translation: This movie is very interesting, visually appealing, and never boring; it encourages us to think about how we consume pop culture.

text: the spaniel-eyed jean reno infuses hubert with a mixture of deadpan cool , wry humor and just the measure of tenderness required to give this comic slugfest some heart .
translation: スパニエルのような目を持つジャン・レノが、ヒューバートにデッドパンのクールさ、皮肉なユーモア、そしてこのコメディー乱闘劇に心を与えるために必要な優しさのバランスを注ぎ込んでいる。
back_translation: Jean Reno, with his spaniel-like eyes, brings the balance of deadpan coolness, ironic humor, and the necessary kindness to give heart to this comedic brawl.

text: a film with almost as many delights for adults as there are for children and dog lovers .
translation: 大人にとっての楽しみが子供や犬好きの人々にとっての楽しみとほぼ同じくらいある映画。
back_translation: A movie that offers as much enjoyment for adults as it does for children and dog lovers.

text: a depraved , incoherent , instantly disposable piece of hackery .
translation: 堕落した、無秩序で、即座に廃棄可能な手抜きの作品。
back_translation: A degraded, disorderly, and instantly disposable work that is half-heartedly created.

text: the animation and game phenomenon that peaked about three years ago is actually dying a slow death , if the poor quality of pokemon 4 ever is any indication .
translation: 約3年前にピークを迎えたアニメーションとゲームの現象は、実際にはゆっくりと死に向かっている。ポケモン4エバーの質の悪さがその兆候であるならば。
back_translation: The phenomenon of animation and games that peaked about three years ago is actually slowly heading towards decline. If the poor quality of Pokémon Forever is a sign of that.

text: the camera soars above the globe in dazzling panoramic shots that make the most of the large-screen format , before swooping down on a string of exotic locales , scooping the whole world up in a joyous communal festival of rhythm .
translation: カメラは地球の上空を飛翔し、素晴らしいパノラマショットで大画面フォーマットの利点を最大限に活かします。その後、エキゾチックな場所の連なりに急降下し、全世界を歓喜に満ちたリズムの共同祭りで包み込みます。
back_translation: The camera soars above the Earth, maximizing the benefits of a large screen format with stunning panoramic shots. It then swoops down to a series of exotic locations, enveloping the entire world in a joyful rhythm of a communal festival.

text: what 's really sad is to see two academy award winning actresses -lrb- and one academy award winning actor -rrb- succumb to appearing in this junk that 's tv sitcom material at best .
translation: 本当に悲しいのは、2人のアカデミー賞受賞女優（と1人のアカデミー賞受賞男優）が、せいぜいテレビシットコムの素材にすぎないこのゴミに出演してしまうのを見ることです。
back_translation: What is truly sad is seeing two Academy Award-winning actresses (and one Academy Award-winning actor) appearing in this garbage that is nothing more than material for a television sitcom.

text: -lrb- jackson and bledel -rrb- seem to have been picked not for their acting chops , but for their looks and appeal to the pre-teen crowd .
translation: （ジャクソンとブレデル）は、演技力ではなく、見た目やティーン以下の若者層への魅力で選ばれたようです。
back_translation: It seems that (Jackson and Bradel) were chosen not for their acting skills, but for their appearance and appeal to the youth demographic under the age of 18.

text: whatever the movie 's sentimental , hypocritical lessons about sexism , its true colors come out in various wet t-shirt and shower scenes .
translation: どんなに映画が性差別についての感傷的で偽善的な教訓を持っていても、その真の姿はさまざまな濡れたTシャツやシャワーシーンで明らかになります。
back_translation: No matter how sentimental and hypocritical the lessons about gender discrimination in a movie may be, its true nature becomes apparent through various wet T-shirt and shower scenes.

text: piercingly affecting ... while clearly a manipulative film , emerges as powerful rather than cloying .
translation: 刺刺しく心に響く…明らかに操作的な映画でありながら、甘ったるくはなく、逆に力強い作品として現れる。
back_translation: It resonates sharply in the heart... Clearly a manipulative film, yet it does not feel overly sweet; instead, it emerges as a powerful piece of work.

text: gussied up with so many distracting special effects and visual party tricks that it 's not clear whether we 're supposed to shriek or laugh .
translation: あまりにも多くの気を散らせる特殊効果や視覚的なパーティートリックで飾られているので、私たちが叫ぶべきなのか笑うべきなのかはっきりしません。
back_translation: It's unclear whether we should scream or laugh, as it's adorned with too many distracting special effects and visual party tricks.

text: if only it had the story to match .
translation: もしそれが物語に見合うものであったなら。
back_translation: If it were something worthy of the story.

text: `` frailty '' has been written so well , that even a simple `` goddammit ! ''
translation: 「 frailty 」は非常に良く書かれているので、たとえ「くそっ！」というシンプルな一言でも。
back_translation: "Frailty" is very well written, so even a simple word like "Damn!" would suffice.

text: the pianist is the film roman polanski may have been born to make .
translation: 『戦慄の絆』は、ロマン・ポランスキーが作るために生まれた映画かもしれない。
back_translation: "The Bond of Terror" may be a movie that was born for Roman Polanski to create.

text: the film has an infectious enthusiasm and we 're touched by the film 's conviction that all life centered on that place , that time and that sport .
translation: その映画は感染するような熱意に満ちており、その場所、その時間、そしてそのスポーツを中心としたすべての生命に対する映画の確信に心を打たれます。
back_translation: The movie is filled with an infectious passion, and it profoundly resonates with the conviction of life surrounding that place, that time, and that sport.

text: an excellent sequel .
translation: 素晴らしい続編です。
back_translation: It's a wonderful sequel.

text: the trouble with making this queen a thoroughly modern maiden is that it also makes her appear foolish and shallow rather than , as was more likely , a victim of mental illness .
translation: この女王を完全に現代的な乙女にすることの問題は、彼女が愚かで浅薄に見えてしまうことであり、むしろ、彼女が精神的な病の犠牲者である可能性が高かったことを示すものではないということです。
back_translation: The problem with making this queen a completely modern maiden is that she may appear foolish and superficial, rather than indicating that she was more likely a victim of mental illness.

text: it 's a technically superb film , shining with all the usual spielberg flair , expertly utilizing the talents of his top-notch creative team .
translation: 技術的に素晴らしい映画で、いつものスピルバーグの魅力が光っており、彼の一流のクリエイティブチームの才能を巧みに活用しています。
back_translation: A technically stunning film that showcases the usual charm of Spielberg, skillfully utilizing the talents of his top-notch creative team.

text: the story really has no place to go since simone is not real -- she ca n't provide any conflict .
translation: 物語は本当に進むべき場所がありません。なぜならシモーヌは現実ではなく、対立を提供することができないからです。
back_translation: The story really has no place to go. This is because Simone cannot offer conflict, as it is not reality.

text: both a detective story and a romance spiced with the intrigue of academic skullduggery and politics .
translation: 探偵物語とロマンスの両方を含み、学術的不正や政治の intrigues にスパイスを効かせたもの。
back_translation: A story that includes both detective tales and romance, spiced up with academic misconduct and political intrigues.

text: all the sensuality , all the eroticism of a good vampire tale has been , pardon the pun , sucked out and replaced by goth goofiness .
translation: すべての官能性、すべてのエロティシズムが、言葉遊びをお許し願いたいのですが、吸い尽くされてゴスゴフ的な愚かさに置き換えられてしまった。
back_translation: All sensuality and all eroticism, if you would allow me a play on words, have been utterly drained and replaced by a kind of grotesque foolishness.

text: a quiet , disquieting triumph .
translation: 静かな、不安を覚える勝利。
back_translation: A quiet victory that evokes unease.

text: anyone who ever fantasized about space travel but ca n't afford the $ 20 million ticket to ride a russian rocket should catch this imax offering .
translation: 宇宙旅行を夢見たことがあるが、ロシアのロケットに乗るための2000万ドルのチケットを購入できない人は、このIMAXの作品を観るべきです。
back_translation: If you've ever dreamed of space travel but can't afford the $20 million ticket to ride a Russian rocket, you should watch this IMAX film.

text: -lrb- carvey 's -rrb- characters are both overplayed and exaggerated , but then again , subtlety has never been his trademark .
translation: （カーヴィーの）キャラクターはどちらもやりすぎで誇張されているが、逆に彼の商標は繊細さでは決してない。
back_translation: Both of the characters (from Kirby) are overly exaggerated, but conversely, his trademark is never subtlety.

text: if divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood suffers from a ploddingly melodramatic structure , it comes to life in the performances .
translation: 「ヤヤ・シスターズの神秘」が冗長なメロドラマ的な構造に悩まされているとしても、演技によって生き生きとしたものになる。
back_translation: Even if "The Secret Life of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood" suffers from a redundant melodramatic structure, it comes to life through the performances.

text: rashomon-for-dipsticks tale .
translation: ラショモンのディップスティックの物語。
back_translation: The story of the dipstick of Rashomon.

text: sleek and arty .
translation: スリークでアートな。
back_translation: Sleek and artistic.

text: a terrific date movie , whatever your orientation .
translation: 素晴らしいデートムービー、あなたのオリエンテーションに関係なく。
back_translation: A fantastic date movie, regardless of your orientation.

text: the exploitative , clumsily staged violence overshadows everything , including most of the actors .
translation: 搾取的で不器用に演出された暴力がすべてを覆い隠し、ほとんどの俳優もその影に隠れてしまっています。
back_translation: Exploitive and clumsily staged violence obscures everything, and most actors are also hidden in its shadow.

text: it takes a really long , slow and dreary time to dope out what tuck everlasting is about .
translation: 『タック・エバーラスティング』が何についてなのかを理解するのには、本当に長くて、ゆっくりとした、憂鬱な時間がかかる。
back_translation: Understanding what "Tuck Everlasting" is about truly takes a long, slow, and melancholic time.

text: it 's splash without the jokes .
translation: ジョークなしのスプラッシュです。
back_translation: It's a splash without a joke.

text: even as it pays earnest homage to turntablists and beat jugglers , old schoolers and current innovators , scratch is great fun , full of the kind of energy it 's documenting .
translation: ターンテーブリストやビートジャグラー、オールドスクールのアーティストや現在の革新者への真剣な敬意を表しながらも、『スクラッチ』は非常に楽しい作品で、そのドキュメントしているエネルギーに満ちています。
back_translation: While paying serious respect to turntablists, beat jugglers, old school artists, and current innovators, "Scratch" is an exceptionally entertaining work, filled with the energy it documents.

text: you begin to long for the end credits as the desert does for rain .
translation: 砂漠が雨を渇望するように、あなたはエンドクレジットを待ち望むようになる。
back_translation: Just as the desert longs for rain, you will come to look forward to the end credits.

text: a coming-of-age movie that hollywood would n't have the guts to make .
translation: ハリウッドが作る勇気を持たないComing-of-Ageムービー。
back_translation: A Coming-of-Age movie from Hollywood that lacks courage.

text: ` possession , ' based on the book by a.s. byatt , demands that labute deal with the subject of love head-on ; trading in his cynicism for reverence and a little wit
translation: 『所有』はA.S.バイアットの本に基づき、ラビュートに愛のテーマに真正面から向き合うことを求めている。彼の皮肉を敬意と少しの機知に置き換えさせるのだ。
back_translation: "Ownership" is based on A.S. Byatt's book, calling for Labute to confront the theme of love head-on. It replaces his irony with respect and a touch of wit.

text: did no one on the set have a sense of humor , or did they not have the nerve to speak up ?
translation: 撮影現場の誰もユーモアのセンスがなかったのか、それとも意見を言う勇気がなかったのか？
back_translation: Was it that no one on the set had a sense of humor, or did they lack the courage to express their opinions?

text: cinematic pyrotechnics aside , the only thing avary seems to care about are mean giggles and pulchritude .
translation: 映画的な火花はさておき、アヴァリーが気にかけているのは、意地悪な笑い声と美しさだけのようです。
back_translation: Putting aside the cinematic sparks, it seems that what Avalie cares about are just malicious laughter and beauty.

text: some of the most inventive silliness you are likely to witness in a movie theatre for some time .
translation: しばらくの間、映画館で目にする可能性のある最も独創的な愚かさのいくつかです。
back_translation: For a while, here are some of the most original absurdities you might see in a movie theater.

text: the story is lacking any real emotional impact , and the plot is both contrived and cliched .
translation: 物語は真の感情的な影響が欠けており、プロットは両方とも作り物であり、ありきたりです。
back_translation: The story lacks true emotional impact, and both the plot and characters feel contrived and clichéd.

text: others , more attuned to the anarchist maxim that ` the urge to destroy is also a creative urge ' , or more willing to see with their own eyes , will find morrison 's iconoclastic uses of technology to be liberating .
translation: 他の人々は、アナーキストの名言「破壊の衝動は創造的な衝動でもある」により調和し、自分の目で見ることを好む人々は、モリソンの技術を用いた破壊的な使い方が解放的であると感じるだろう。
back_translation: Others harmonize with the anarchist's famous saying, "The impulse to destroy is also a creative impulse," and those who prefer to see with their own eyes will feel that the destructive application of Morrison's technique is liberating.

text: an awfully good , achingly human picture .
translation: 非常に良い、切なく人間らしい作品。
back_translation: A very good, poignant and human piece of work.

text: but no. .
translation: しかし、いいえ。
back_translation: However, no.

text: it never plays as dramatic even when dramatic things happen to people .
translation: 人々に劇的なことが起こっても、それは決して劇的には遊びません。
back_translation: Even when dramatic things happen to people, they never play dramatically.

text: i have n't seen such self-amused trash since freddy got fingered .
translation: フレディが指で触れられた以来、こんなにも自己満足なゴミを見たことがありません。
back_translation: Since Freddie was touched with a finger, I have never seen such self-satisfied garbage.

text: a cross between blow and boyz n the hood , this movie strives to be more , but does n't quite get there .
translation: 「ブロー」と「ボーイズ・ン・ザ・フッド」のクロスオーバーで、この映画はもっと何かを目指していますが、そこには達していません。
back_translation: This movie aims for something more with a crossover between "Broke" and "Boys 'N the Hood," but it does not reach that goal.

text: it 's a bad action movie because there 's no rooting interest and the spectacle is grotesque and boring .
translation: これは悪いアクション映画です。なぜなら、応援したくなる要素がなく、スペクタクルが grotesque で退屈だからです。
back_translation: This is a bad action movie because it lacks elements that make you want to cheer, and the spectacle is grotesque and boring.

text: provides the kind of ` laugh therapy ' i need from movie comedies -- offbeat humor , amusing characters , and a happy ending .
translation: 私が映画コメディから必要としている「笑いのセラピー」を提供してくれるのは、型破りなユーモア、面白いキャラクター、そしてハッピーエンドです。
back_translation: The "laughter therapy" I need from movie comedies is provided by unconventional humor, interesting characters, and happy endings.

text: a prolonged extrusion of psychopathic pulp .
translation: 精神病的なパルプの長期押出し。
back_translation: Long-term extrusion of psychopathic pulp.

text: little action , almost no suspense or believable tension , one-dimensional characters up the wazoo and sets that can only be described as sci-fi generic .
translation: ほとんどアクションがなく、サスペンスや信じられる緊張感もほとんどなく、キャラクターは一面ばかりで、セットはサイエンスフィクションの一般的なものとしか言いようがありません。
back_translation: There is hardly any action, almost no suspense or believable tension, the characters are one-dimensional, and the sets can only be described as typical science fiction.

text: director nancy savoca 's no-frills record of a show forged in still-raw emotions captures the unsettled tenor of that post 9-11 period far better than a more measured or polished production ever could .
translation: 監督ナンシー・サヴォカの素朴な記録は、まだ生々しい感情で作られたショーを捉えており、9/11以降の不安定な雰囲気を、より慎重または洗練された制作ができるよりもはるかに良く表現しています。
back_translation: Director Nancy Savoca's unpretentious record captures shows made with raw emotions, expressing the unstable atmosphere after 9/11 far better than more cautious or polished productions could.

text: despite its floating narrative , this is a remarkably accessible and haunting film .
translation: 浮遊する物語にもかかわらず、これは非常にアクセスしやすく、心に残る映画です。
back_translation: Despite being a floating story, this is a very accessible and memorable film.

text: the sum of all fears pretends to be a serious exploration of nuclear terrorism , but it 's really nothing more than warmed-over cold war paranoia .
translation: 「すべての恐怖の合算」は、核テロリズムの真剣な探求を装っていますが、実際には戦争冷戦のパラノイアの温め直しに過ぎません。
back_translation: "The 'aggregate of all fears' pretends to be a serious inquiry into nuclear terrorism, but in reality it is merely a reheating of the paranoia from the Cold War."

text: the hypnotic imagery and fragmentary tale explore the connections between place and personal identity .
translation: 催眠的なイメージと断片的な物語は、場所と個人のアイデンティティとのつながりを探求します。
back_translation: The hypnotic imagery and fragmented narrative explore the connection between place and personal identity.

text: it 's fun , splashy and entertainingly nasty .
translation: 楽しく、派手で、エンターテイメント性に富んだ不快さがあります。
back_translation: There is a fun, flashy, and entertaining unpleasantness.

text: ... the first 2\/3 of the film are incredibly captivating and insanely funny , thanks in part to interesting cinematic devices -lrb- cool visual backmasking -rrb- , a solid cast , and some wickedly sick and twisted humor ...
translation: 映画の前2/3は非常に魅力的で信じられないほど面白く、興味深い映像技法（クールな視覚的バックマスキング）や、しっかりとしたキャスト、そして少し病的でひねくれたユーモアのおかげでそうなっています。
back_translation: The first two-thirds of the movie are very captivating and incredibly interesting, thanks to intriguing visual techniques (cool visual back-masking), a solid cast, and a slightly twisted and cynical sense of humor.

text: rather , pity anyone who sees this mishmash .
translation: むしろ、このごちゃごちゃを見てしまった人に同情します。
back_translation: Rather, I feel sympathy for those who have seen this mess.

text: return to never land may be another shameless attempt by disney to rake in dough from baby boomer families , but it 's not half-bad .
translation: 「リターン・トゥ・ネバーランド」は、ディズニーがベビーブーム世代の家族から金をかき集めようとした恥知らずな試みかもしれませんが、それほど悪くはありません。
back_translation: "Return to Never Land" may be an unabashed attempt by Disney to rake in money from the baby boomer generation's families, but it's not that bad.

text: the movie , despite its rough edges and a tendency to sag in certain places , is wry and engrossing .
translation: その映画は、粗削りな部分や特定の場所でだらける傾向があるにもかかわらず、皮肉で魅力的です。
back_translation: Despite its rough edges and tendency to drag in certain places, the movie is ironic and engaging.

text: much like robin williams , death to smoochy has already reached its expiration date .
translation: ロビン・ウィリアムズのように、『デス・トゥ・スムーチー』はすでにその有効期限を迎えています。
back_translation: Like Robin Williams, "Death to Smoochy" has already reached its expiration date.

text: a pleasing , often-funny comedy .
translation: 楽しい、しばしば面白いコメディ。
back_translation: A fun and often entertaining comedy.

text: a tour de force drama about the astonishingly pivotal role of imagination in the soulful development of two rowdy teenagers .
translation: 想像力が二人のやんちゃなティーンエイジャーの魂の成長において驚くべき重要な役割を果たすことを描いた傑作ドラマ。
back_translation: A masterpiece drama depicting the remarkable role that imagination plays in the soul's growth of two mischievous teenagers.

text: good actors have a radar for juicy roles -- there 's a plethora of characters in this picture , and not one of them is flat .
translation: 優れた俳優は魅力的な役を見つけるためのレーダーを持っている。この作品には多くのキャラクターが登場するが、そのどれもが平坦ではない。
back_translation: An excellent actor has a radar for finding compelling roles. This work features many characters, but none of them are flat.

text: after all , it 'll probably be in video stores by christmas , and it might just be better suited to a night in the living room than a night at the movies .
translation: 結局のところ、クリスマスまでにはビデオストアに並ぶでしょうし、映画館での夜よりもリビングルームで過ごす夜に適しているかもしれません。
back_translation: In the end, it will likely be available at the video store by Christmas, and it may be better suited for a night in the living room rather than in the movie theater.

text: it concentrates far too much on the awkward interplay and utter lack of chemistry between chan and hewitt .
translation: それはチャンとヒューイットの間のぎこちないやり取りと全く化学反応がないことにあまりにも集中しすぎている。
back_translation: It is too focused on the awkward exchanges between Chan and Hewitt and the complete lack of chemistry.

text: her performance moves between heartbreak and rebellion as she continually tries to accommodate to fit in and gain the unconditional love she seeks .
translation: 彼女のパフォーマンスは、失恋と反抗の間を行き来し、常に受け入れられ、求める無条件の愛を得ようと努力しています。
back_translation: Her performance oscillates between heartbreak and rebellion, constantly striving to obtain the unconditional love she seeks and longs for.

text: bad company .
translation: 悪い仲間。
back_translation: Bad companions.

text: so vivid a portrait of a woman consumed by lust and love and crushed by betrayal that it conjures up the intoxicating fumes and emotional ghosts of a freshly painted rembrandt .
translation: 欲望と愛に飲み込まれ、裏切りによって打ちひしがれた女性の非常に鮮やかな肖像であり、新たに描かれたレンブラントの酔わせるような香りと感情の幽霊を呼び起こします。
back_translation: It is a very vivid portrait of a woman consumed by desire and love, crushed by betrayal, evoking the intoxicating scent and emotional ghosts newly painted in Rembrandt's style.

text: if you 've grown tired of going where no man has gone before , but several movies have - take heart .
translation: もし「誰も行ったことがない場所」に行くことに疲れたなら、いくつかの映画がそうしていることを思い出してください。心配はいりません。
back_translation: If you're tired of going to "places no one has ever been," remember that some movies do that for you. Don't worry.

text: swiftly deteriorates into a terribly obvious melodrama and rough-hewn vanity project for lead actress andie macdowell .
translation: 急速にひどく明白なメロドラマと、主演女優アandiマクダウェルの粗野な自己満足プロジェクトに堕ちてしまう。
back_translation: It rapidly descends into a blatantly terrible melodrama and the coarse self-satisfied project of lead actress Andie MacDowell.

text: almost everyone growing up believes their family must look like `` the addams family '' to everyone looking in ... `` my big fat greek wedding '' comes from the heart ...
translation: ほとんどすべての人が育つ過程で、自分の家族は外から見ると「アダムス・ファミリー」のように見えるべきだと信じています…「マイ・ビッグ・ファット・ギリシャ・ウェディング」は心からのものです…
back_translation: Almost everyone believes that their family should look like the "Addams Family" from the outside as they grow up... "My Big Fat Greek Wedding" is heartfelt...

text: an excruciating demonstration of the unsalvageability of a movie saddled with an amateurish screenplay .
translation: 素人の脚本に悩まされて救いようのない映画の苦痛なデモンストレーション。
back_translation: A painful demonstration of a movie tormented by an amateur script, with no hope of salvation.

text: despite its old-hat set-up and predictable plot , empire still has enough moments to keep it entertaining .
translation: 古臭い設定や予測可能なプロットにもかかわらず、『エンパイア』にはまだ楽しませる瞬間が十分にある。
back_translation: Despite its outdated settings and predictable plot, "Empire" still has plenty of moments to entertain.

text: otherwise , this could be a passable date film .
translation: そうでなければ、これはそれなりに楽しめるデート映画になるかもしれません。
back_translation: Otherwise, this could be a fairly enjoyable date movie.

text: -lrb- at least -rrb- moore is a real charmer .
translation: -（少なくとも）ムーアは本物の魅力者です。
back_translation: - (At least) Moore is a true charmer.

text: leaves viewers out in the cold and undermines some phenomenal performances .
translation: 視聴者を置き去りにし、一部の素晴らしいパフォーマンスを損なう。
back_translation: It leaves the viewers behind and undermines some wonderful performances.

text: this rush to profits has created a predictably efficient piece of business notable largely for its overwhelming creepiness , for an eagerness to create images you wish you had n't seen , which , in this day and age , is of course the point .
translation: 利益へのこの急速な追求は、予想通り効率的なビジネスを生み出しましたが、その特徴は圧倒的な不気味さにあり、見たくなかった画像を作り出そうとする熱意が際立っています。現代においては、もちろんそれが目的なのです。
back_translation: This rapid pursuit of profit has, as expected, resulted in efficient businesses, but their defining characteristic is an overwhelming eeriness, marked by a fervor to create images that people would rather not see. In modern times, that is, of course, the point.

text: the concept behind kung pow : enter the fist is hilarious .
translation: 「カンフー・パンダ：エンタ―・ザ・フィスト」の背後にあるコンセプトはとても面白いです。
back_translation: The concept behind "Kung Fu Panda: Enter the Fist" is very interesting.

text: by not averting his eyes , solondz forces us to consider the unthinkable , the unacceptable , the unmentionable .
translation: 彼は目をそらさないことで、私たちに考えさせるのです。考えられないこと、受け入れがたいこと、言及すべきでないことを。
back_translation: He makes us think by not averting his gaze. Things that are unthinkable, unacceptable, and should not be mentioned.

text: ... better described as a ghost story gone badly awry .
translation: ...悪く展開したゴーストストーリーと説明されるべきです。
back_translation: It should be described as a ghost story that unfolds poorly.

text: the movie itself appears to be running on hypertime in reverse as the truly funny bits get further and further apart .
translation: 映画自体は逆にハイパータイムで進んでいるようで、本当に面白い部分がますます遠ざかっていく。
back_translation: The movie itself seems to be progressing at hyper speed, and the truly interesting parts keep drifting further away.

text: does n't get the job done , running off the limited chemistry created by ralph fiennes and jennifer lopez .
translation: ラルフ・ファインズとジェニファー・ロペスによって生み出された限られた化学反応に頼ったままでは、仕事は進まない。
back_translation: Relying solely on the limited chemical reaction created by Ralph Fiennes and Jennifer Lopez will not advance the work.

text: tsai has a well-deserved reputation as one of the cinema world 's great visual stylists , and in this film , every shot enhances the excellent performances .
translation: ツァイは映画界の優れたビジュアルスタイリストの一人としての評判を実に持っており、この映画では、すべてのショットが素晴らしい演技を引き立てています。
back_translation: Tsai is truly known as one of the outstanding visual stylists in the film industry, and in this movie, every shot enhances the wonderful performances.

text: a movie that 's about as overbearing and over-the-top as the family it depicts .
translation: 描かれている家族と同じくらい押し付けがましくて大げさな映画。
back_translation: A movie that is as forceful and exaggerated as the family depicted.

text: a movie that both thrills the eye and , in its over-the-top way , touches the heart .
translation: 目を楽しませると同時に、その過剰な表現で心に触れる映画。
back_translation: A movie that delights the eyes while touching the heart with its excessive expressions.

text: elegantly crafted but emotionally cold , a puzzle whose intricate construction one can admire but is difficult to connect with on any deeper level .
translation: 優雅に作られているが感情的に冷たい、複雑な構造を持つパズルで、賞賛することはできても、より深いレベルでつながるのは難しい。
back_translation: It is elegantly made but emotionally cold, a puzzle with a complex structure that can be admired, yet it is difficult to connect on a deeper level.

text: it 's hard to understand why anyone in his right mind would even think to make the attraction a movie .
translation: なぜ正気の人がそのアトラクションを映画にしようと思うのか理解するのが難しい。
back_translation: It's hard to understand why a sane person would think to make that attraction into a movie.

text: sc2 is an autopilot hollywood concoction lacking in imagination and authentic christmas spirit , yet it 's geared toward an audience full of masters of both .
translation: SC2は想像力と本物のクリスマス精神が欠けたオートパイロットのハリウッド作品ですが、それでも両方の名人で満ちた観客に向けられています。
back_translation: SC2 is an autopilot Hollywood production lacking imagination and the true spirit of Christmas, yet it is still aimed at an audience filled with both masters.

text: donovan ... squanders his main asset , jackie chan , and fumbles the vital action sequences .
translation: ドノバンは主要な資産であるジャッキー・チェンを浪費し、重要なアクションシークエンスをつまずかせる。
back_translation: Donovan squanders his main asset, Jackie Chan, and stumbles through important action sequences.

text: this angst-ridden territory was covered earlier and much better in ordinary people .
translation: この苦悩に満ちた領域は、以前にそしてもっと良く『オーディナリー・ピープル』で扱われました。
back_translation: This anguish-filled realm was previously and better addressed in "Ordinary People."

text: in spite of featuring a script credited to no fewer than five writers , apparently nobody here bothered to check it twice .
translation: 少なくとも5人の作家のクレジットがある脚本にもかかわらず、どうやら誰もそれを2回チェックすることを気にしなかったようだ。
back_translation: Despite having credits from at least five writers, it seems that no one cared to double-check it.

text: as underwater ghost stories go , below casts its spooky net out into the atlantic ocean and spits it back , grizzled and charred , somewhere northwest of the bermuda triangle .
translation: 水中の幽霊話としては、以下の物語は大西洋にその不気味な網を投げ込み、バミューダトライアングルの北西部で、煤けた焦げた状態で返してきます。
back_translation: As a ghost story from underwater, the following tale casts its eerie net into the Atlantic Ocean, returning in a charred, sooty state from the northwestern part of the Bermuda Triangle.

text: the most compelling performance of the year adds substantial depth to this shocking testament to anti-semitism and neo-fascism .
translation: 今年最も説得力のあるパフォーマンスは、反ユダヤ主義とネオファシズムに対するこの衝撃的な証言に substantial な深みを加えます。
back_translation: This year's most compelling performance adds substantial depth to this shocking testimony against anti-Semitism and neo-fascism.

text: though this saga would be terrific to read about , it is dicey screen material that only a genius should touch .
translation: このサーガは読むには素晴らしいですが、天才だけが手を出すべき危険なスクリーン素材です。
back_translation: This saga is wonderful to read, but it is dangerous material that only geniuses should attempt to handle.

text: a sentimental hybrid that could benefit from the spice of specificity .
translation: 特定のスパイスから恩恵を受けることができる感情的なハイブリッド。
back_translation: An emotional hybrid that can benefit from specific spices.

text: despite slick production values and director roger michell 's tick-tock pacing , the final effect is like having two guys yelling in your face for two hours .
translation: 洗練された製作価値とロジャー・ミッシェル監督のテンポの良い演出にもかかわらず、最終的な効果は、2時間にわたって2人の男があなたの顔の前で叫び続けるようなものです。
back_translation: Despite the refined production values and Roger Michell's brisk direction, the final effect is akin to two men shouting in front of your face for two hours.

text: well , jason 's gone to manhattan and hell , i guess a space station in the year 2455 can be crossed off the list of ideas for the inevitable future sequels -lrb- hey , do n't shoot the messenger -rrb- .
translation: まあ、ジェイソンはマンハッタンに行ってしまったし、そうだな、2455年の宇宙ステーションは必然的な未来の続編のアイデアリストから外せるだろう -lrb- メッセンジャーを撃たないでくれ -rrb- 。
back_translation: Well, Jason has gone to Manhattan, and I guess we can rule out the idea of a space station in the year 2455 from the list of inevitable future sequels - (please don't shoot the messenger).

text: like a veteran head cutter , barbershop is tuned in to its community .
translation: ベテランの理髪師のように、理容室は地域社会に密着しています。
back_translation: Like veteran barbers, barber shops are closely connected to the community.

text: brisk hack job .
translation: 迅速な不正行為。
back_translation: Rapid misconduct.

text: thumbs up to paxton for not falling into the hollywood trap and making a vanity project with nothing new to offer .
translation: パクストンがハリウッドの罠に陥らず、何も新しいものを提供しない自己満足のプロジェクトを作らなかったことに賛辞を送ります。
back_translation: I commend Paxton for not falling into the Hollywood trap and for not creating a self-satisfying project that offers nothing new.

text: performances all around are tops , with the two leads delivering oscar-caliber performances .
translation: あらゆるパフォーマンスが素晴らしく、2人の主演がオスカー級の演技を披露しています。
back_translation: Every performance is fantastic, and the two leads deliver Oscar-worthy performances.

text: it does n't offer audiences any way of gripping what its point is , or even its attitude toward its subject .
translation: それは観客に対して、その目的やテーマに対する態度を理解する方法を何も提供していません。
back_translation: It provides nothing for the audience to understand their attitude towards the purpose or theme.

text: miller comes at film with bracing intelligence and a vision both painterly and literary .
translation: ミラーは映画に鮮やかな知性と、絵画的かつ文学的なビジョンを持って取り組みます。
back_translation: Mira approaches the film with vivid intelligence and a painterly yet literary vision.

text: this odd , poetic road movie , spiked by jolts of pop music , pretty much takes place in morton 's ever-watchful gaze -- and it 's a tribute to the actress , and to her inventive director , that the journey is such a mesmerizing one .
translation: この奇妙で詩的なロードムービーは、ポップ音楽の刺激によって彩られ、モートンの常に見守る視線の中でほぼ展開します。旅がこれほど魅力的であるのは、女優と彼女の創造的な監督への賛辞です。
back_translation: This strange and poetic road movie unfolds almost entirely under the watchful gaze of Morton, colored by the excitement of pop music. The journey is so captivating as a tribute to the actress and her creative director.

text: as gamely as the movie tries to make sense of its title character , there remains a huge gap between the film 's creepy , clean-cut dahmer -lrb- jeremy renner -rrb- and fiendish acts that no amount of earnest textbook psychologizing can bridge .
translation: 映画がそのタイトルキャラクターを理解しようと頑張る一方で、フィルムの不気味でクリーンカットなダーマー（ジェレミー・レナー）と、真剣な教科書的心理学では埋められない邪悪な行為との間には大きなギャップが残る。
back_translation: While the movie tries to understand its title character, there remains a significant gap between the film's eerie and clean-cut Dharma (Jeremy Renner) and the evil acts that cannot be filled by serious textbook psychology.

text: as earnest as a community-college advertisement , american chai is enough to make you put away the guitar , sell the amp , and apply to medical school .
translation: 地域コミュニティカレッジの広告と同じくらい真剣なアメリカンチャイは、ギターをしまい、アンプを売り、医学部への出願を考える気にさせるほどのものです。
back_translation: American chai is as serious as a community college advertisement, enough to make you put away the guitar, sell the amp, and consider applying to medical school.

text: if you 're not , you 'll still have a good time . ''
translation: もしそうでなくても、きっと良い時間を過ごせるでしょう。
back_translation: Even if that's not the case, I'm sure you'll have a good time.

text: has a certain ghoulish fascination , and generates a fair amount of b-movie excitement .
translation: ある種のゾンビのような魅力があり、かなりのB級映画の興奮を生み出します。
back_translation: It has a certain zombie-like charm and generates quite a thrill typical of B-movies.

text: although it lacks the detail of the book , the film does pack some serious suspense .
translation: 本の詳細には欠けるが、映画は確かに緊張感を持っている。
back_translation: While lacking details from the book, the movie certainly has a sense of tension.

text: -lrb- cuarón has -rrb- created a substantive movie out of several cliched movie structures : the road movie , the coming-of-age movie , and the teenage sex comedy .
translation: キュアロンは、ロードムービー、成長物語、そしてティーンエイジャーのセックスコメディなど、いくつかのクリシェを使った映画の構造から実質的な映画を作り上げた。
back_translation: Cuarón has created a substantial film from a structure that uses several clichés such as a road movie, a coming-of-age story, and a teenage sex comedy.

text: and second , what 's with all the shooting ?
translation: そして第二に、すべての銃撃は何ですか？
back_translation: And secondly, what are all the shootings?

text: billy crystal and robert de niro sleepwalk through vulgarities in a sequel you can refuse .
translation: ビリー・クリスタルとロバート・デ・ニーロが、拒否できる続編で無礼な言葉を寝ぼけながら演じる。
back_translation: Billy Crystal and Robert De Niro perform rude lines in a sequel they can't refuse while half-asleep.

text: shrewd but pointless .
translation: 抜け目がないが無意味。
back_translation: Sharp but meaningless.

text: the problems and characters it reveals are universal and involving , and the film itself -- as well its delightful cast -- is so breezy , pretty and gifted , it really won my heart .
translation: その作品が明らかにする問題やキャラクターは普遍的で魅力的であり、映画自体、そしてその素晴らしいキャストは、とても軽やかで美しく才能に恵まれていて、私の心を本当に掴みました。
back_translation: The issues and characters revealed by that work are universal and captivating, and the film itself, along with its wonderful cast, is so light, beautifully gifted, and truly captured my heart.

text: proof once again that if the filmmakers just follow the books , they ca n't go wrong .
translation: 映画製作者がただ本を忠実に守れば、必ず間違いがないということを再び証明しています。
back_translation: It再次证明，只要电影制作人忠实地遵循书籍，就一定不会出错。

text: ... wise and elegiac ...
translation: …賢明で悲歌的な…
back_translation: ...wise and melancholic...

text: though filmed partly in canada , paid in full has clever ways of capturing inner-city life during the reagan years .
translation: カナダで一部撮影されたにもかかわらず、『ペイド・イン・フル』はレーガン政権時代の内市生活を巧妙に捉えています。
back_translation: Despite being partially filmed in Canada, "Paid in Full" cleverly captures the inner-city life during the Reagan administration.

text: not counting a few gross-out comedies i 've been trying to forget , this is the first film in a long time that made me want to bolt the theater in the first 10 minutes .
translation: 数本の不快なコメディを除けば、これは私が長い間観た映画の中で、最初の10分で劇場を飛び出したくなった初めての作品です。
back_translation: Aside from a few unpleasant comedies, this is the first movie in a long time that made me want to run out of the theater within the first 10 minutes.

text: all of the elements are in place for a great film noir , but director george hickenlooper 's approach to the material is too upbeat .
translation: すべての要素は素晴らしいフィルム・ノワールのために整っているが、監督のジョージ・ヒッケンルーパーのアプローチはあまりにも明るすぎる。
back_translation: All the elements are in place for a great film noir, but director George Hickenlooper's approach is too bright.

text: the overall fabric is hypnotic , and mr. mattei fosters moments of spontaneous intimacy .
translation: 全体の雰囲気は魅惑的で、マッテイ氏は自然な親密さの瞬間を育んでいます。
back_translation: The overall atmosphere is enchanting, and Mr. Mattei fosters moments of natural intimacy.

text: friday after next is a lot more bluster than bite .
translation: 次の金曜日は、たくさんの虚勢があるが実質は薄い。
back_translation: Next Friday, there will be a lot of bravado, but in substance, it is thin.

text: opera on film is never satisfactory .
translation: 映画でのオペラは決して満足のいくものではない。
back_translation: Opera in movies is never satisfying.

text: nicole holofcenter , the insightful writer\/director responsible for this illuminating comedy does n't wrap the proceedings up neatly but the ideas tie together beautifully .
translation: この啓発的なコメディの責任者である洞察力に富んだ作家／監督ニコール・ホロフセンターは、物事をきちんとまとめることはしませんが、アイデアは見事にまとまっています。
back_translation: The insightful writer/director Nicole Holofcener, who is responsible for this enlightening comedy, doesn't neatly tie things together, but the ideas are beautifully cohesive.

text: but , like silence , it 's a movie that gets under your skin .
translation: しかし、それは静けさのように、あなたの心に響く映画です。
back_translation: However, it is a movie that resonates in your heart like tranquility.

text: gooding and coburn are both oscar winners , a fact which , as you watch them clumsily mugging their way through snow dogs , seems inconceivable .
translation: グディングとコバーンは両方ともオスカー受賞者であり、その事実は、彼らが「スノードッグ」で不器用に演技しているのを見ると信じられないように思えます。
back_translation: Guding and Cobain are both Oscar winners, and that fact seems unbelievable when you see them awkwardly acting in "Snow Dogs."

text: loud , silly , stupid and pointless .
translation: うるさくて、馬鹿げていて、愚かで、無意味な。
back_translation: Loud, foolish, silly, and meaningless.

text: while it 's nothing we have n't seen before from murphy , i spy is still fun and enjoyable and so aggressively silly that it 's more than a worthwhile effort .
translation: マーフィーから見慣れたものではありますが、『アイ・スパイ』はそれでも楽しく、楽しめて、非常に馬鹿げているので、十分に価値のある作品です。
back_translation: Although it is something familiar from Murphy's perspective, "I Spy" is still enjoyable, fun, and delightfully ridiculous, making it a work of ample worth.

text: mctiernan 's remake may be lighter on its feet -- the sober-minded original was as graceful as a tap-dancing rhino -- but it is just as boring and as obvious .
translation: マクティアナンのリメイクは軽やかかもしれませんが、真面目なオリジナルはタップダンスを踊るサイのように優雅でしたが、同様に退屈で明白です。
back_translation: The remake of McTyanna may be lighthearted, but the serious original was as graceful as a tap-dancing rhinoceros, yet equally boring and obvious.

text: if you 're looking to rekindle the magic of the first film , you 'll need a stronger stomach than us .
translation: もし最初の映画の魔法を再燃させたいなら、私たちよりも強い胃が必要です。
back_translation: If you want to reignite the magic of the first movie, you'll need a stronger stomach than ours.

text: an average b-movie with no aspirations to be anything more .
translation: ただの平均的なB級映画で、それ以上になろうとはしていない。
back_translation: It's just an average B-movie and doesn't aspire to be anything more.

text: a film that plays things so nice 'n safe as to often play like a milquetoast movie of the week blown up for the big screen .
translation: 非常に安全に進める映画で、しばしば大画面用に膨らませたミルクトーストのテレビ映画のように感じられる。
back_translation: It's a movie that proceeds very safely, often feeling like an inflated milk toast television film for the big screen.

text: the movie straddles the fence between escapism and social commentary , and on both sides it falls short .
translation: この映画はエスケープ主義と社会的コメントの間で揺れ動いており、どちらの側でも期待外れとなっています。
back_translation: This movie wavers between escapism and social commentary, falling short on both sides.

text: only masochistic moviegoers need apply .
translation: マゾヒスティックな映画ファンのみ応募してください。
back_translation: Only masochistic movie fans should apply.

text: is anyone else out there getting tired of the whole slo-mo , double-pistoled , ballistic-pyrotechnic hong kong action aesthetic ?
translation: 他に誰か、全体的なスローモーション、ダブルピストル、弾道花火のような香港アクションの美学に疲れてきている人はいますか？
back_translation: Is there anyone else who is getting tired of the overall slow motion, double pistols, and the aesthetic of Hong Kong action that feels like a ballistic firework?

text: like shrek , spirit 's visual imagination reminds you of why animation is such a perfect medium for children , because of the way it allows the mind to enter and accept another world .
translation: シュレックやスピリットのビジュアルイマジネーションは、アニメーションが子供たちにとっていかに完璧な媒体であるかを思い出させます。それは、心が別の世界に入って受け入れることを可能にする方法のためです。
back_translation: The visual imagination of Shrek and Spirit reminds us how perfect a medium animation is for children. This is because it allows the mind to enter and embrace another world.

text: statham employs an accent that i think is supposed to be an attempt at hardass american but sometimes just lapses into unhidden british .
translation: スタサムは、硬派なアメリカ人を試みたアクセントを使っていますが、時々は無意識のうちに隠れた英国訛りに陥ります。
back_translation: Stasum uses an accent that attempts to sound like a tough American, but sometimes unconsciously slips into a hidden British accent.

text: a yawn-provoking little farm melodrama .
translation: あくびを誘う小さな農場のメロドラマ。
back_translation: A small farm melodrama that invites yawns.

text: for all its shoot-outs , fistfights , and car chases , this movie is a phlegmatic bore , so tedious it makes the silly spy vs. spy film the sum of all fears , starring ben affleck , seem downright hitchcockian .
translation: 銃撃戦や殴り合い、カーチェイスがあるにもかかわらず、この映画は無気力で退屈で、あまりにも冗長で、ベン・アフレック主演の「スパイ対スパイ」がいかにヒッチコック的に見えるかというと、まさにその通りです。
back_translation: Despite the presence of gunfights, brawls, and car chases, this movie is lethargic and boring, excessively lengthy, and it certainly shows how much Ben Affleck's "Spy vs. Spy" resembles a Hitchcock film.

text: kicks off with an inauspicious premise , mopes through a dreary tract of virtually plotless meanderings and then ends with a whimper .
translation: 不吉な前提から始まり、ほとんどプロットのない迷走を経て、最後はしょぼい結末を迎える。
back_translation: It starts with an ominous premise, meanders with almost no plot, and ultimately ends with a disappointing conclusion.

text: one of the greatest films i 've ever seen .
translation: 私が今まで見た中で最も素晴らしい映画の一つです。
back_translation: One of the most amazing movies I've ever seen.

text: feels strangely hollow at its emotional core .
translation: 感情のコアが奇妙に空虚に感じられる。
back_translation: The core of my emotions feels strangely empty.

text: it gets old quickly .
translation: すぐに飽きてしまいます。
back_translation: I get bored quickly.

text: feels less like a change in -lrb- herzog 's -rrb- personal policy than a half-hearted fluke .
translation: ヘルツォグの個人的な方針の変化というよりは、やや不本意ながらも偶然の出来事のように感じられる。
back_translation: It feels less like a change in Herzog's personal policy and more like a somewhat reluctant occurrence of coincidence.

text: exudes the fizz of a busby berkeley musical and the visceral excitement of a sports extravaganza .
translation: バスビー・バークレーのミュージカルの泡立ちとスポーツエクストラバガンザの生々しい興奮を醸し出しています。
back_translation: It captures the effervescence of Busby Berkeley's musicals and the raw excitement of sports extravaganzas.

text: good performances keep it from being a total rehash .
translation: 良いパフォーマンスがそれを完全な再現にするのを防いでいます。
back_translation: Good performance prevents it from being a complete replication.

text: tsai convincingly paints a specifically urban sense of disassociation here .
translation: ツァイはここで特に都市的な疎外感を convincingly 描写している。
back_translation: Tsai convincingly depicts a particularly urban sense of alienation here.

text: he thinks the film is just as much a document about him as it is about the subject .
translation: 彼はその映画がテーマについてだけでなく、彼自身についても同じくらいのドキュメントだと思っています。
back_translation: He thinks that the movie is just as much a documentary about him as it is about the theme.

text: it all starts to smack of a hallmark hall of fame , with a few four letter words thrown in that are generally not heard on television .
translation: すべてがハローマークの名作のように感じられ、一般的にテレビでは聞かれないいくつかの4文字の言葉が加わっています。
back_translation: Everything feels like a masterpiece with the Hello Mark, and a few four-letter words that are not commonly heard on television have been added.

text: some body will take you places you have n't been , and also places you have .
translation: 誰かがあなたを行ったことがない場所や、行ったことがある場所に連れて行ってくれるでしょう。
back_translation: Someone will take you to a place you've never been or to a place you have been before.

text: hollywood ending just is n't very funny .
translation: ハリウッド・エンディングはあまり面白くありません。
back_translation: Hollywood Ending is not very interesting.

text: a jaw-droppingly beautiful work that upends nearly every cliché of japanese animation while delivering a more than satisfactory amount of carnage .
translation: 驚くほど美しい作品で、日本のアニメーションのほぼすべてのクリシェを覆しながら、満足のいくほどの惨劇を提供しています。
back_translation: An astonishingly beautiful piece that subverts almost all clichés of Japanese animation while delivering a satisfying level of tragedy.

text: but kouyate elicits strong performances from his cast , and he delivers a powerful commentary on how governments lie , no matter who runs them .
translation: しかし、コウヤテはキャストから強力なパフォーマンスを引き出し、政府が誰によって運営されていようと嘘をつくということについて力強いコメントを提供しています。
back_translation: However, Kouyate draws powerful performances from the cast and provides a strong commentary on the fact that the government lies, regardless of who is in power.

text: ` drumline ' shows a level of young , black manhood that is funny , touching , smart and complicated .
translation: 『ドラマライン』は、若い黒人の男らしさを描いており、面白く、感動的で、賢く、そして複雑です。
back_translation: "Drama Line" portrays young Black masculinity in a way that is entertaining, moving, smart, and complex.

text: upper teens may get cynical .
translation: 上のティーンエイジャーは皮肉に陥ることがある。
back_translation: Teenagers above can sometimes fall into irony.

text: welles groupie\/scholar peter bogdanovich took a long time to do it , but he 's finally provided his own broadside at publishing giant william randolph hearst .
translation: ウェルズのグルーピー／学者ピーター・ボグダノヴィッチは長い時間をかけましたが、遂に出版大手ウィリアム・ランドルフ・ハーストに対する自らの見解を提供しました。
back_translation: Wells' groupie/scholar Peter Bogdanovich took a long time, but he finally provided his perspective on the major publisher William Randolph Hearst.

text: the most brilliant and brutal uk crime film since jack carter went back to newcastle , the first half of gangster no. 1 drips with style and , at times , blood .
translation: ジャック・カーターがニューカッスルに帰った以来、最も優れたそして残酷な英国犯罪映画である『ギャングスターNo.1』の前半は、スタイルと時折血が滴る。
back_translation: Since Jack Carter returned to Newcastle, the first half of "Gangster No. 1," the most excellent and brutal British crime film, is filled with style and occasionally dripping with blood.

text: it might not be 1970s animation , but everything else about it is straight from the saturday morning cartoons -- a retread story , bad writing , and the same old silliness .
translation: 1970年代のアニメではないかもしれませんが、それ以外のすべては土曜日の朝のカートゥーンからそのまま持ってきたようなもので、退屈なストーリー、ひどい脚本、そしていつものバカバカしさです。
back_translation: It may not be an anime from the 1970s, but everything else feels like it was taken straight from Saturday morning cartoons, with a boring story, terrible writing, and the usual silliness.

text: birthday girl lucks out with chaplin and kidman , who are capable of anteing up some movie star charisma when they need it to sell us on this twisted love story , but who can also negotiate the movie 's darker turns .
translation: 誕生日の少女はチャップリンとキッドマンに恵まれています。彼らはこの歪んだラブストーリーを売り込むために必要な映画スターのカリスマ性を発揮することができる一方で、映画の暗い展開をうまく交渉することもできます。
back_translation: The birthday girl is blessed with Chaplin and Kidman. While they can showcase the charisma of movie stars needed to promote this twisted love story, they are also able to navigate the film's darker developments successfully.

text: stay for the credits and see a devastating comic impersonation by dustin hoffman that is revelatory .
translation: クレジットを待って、ダスティン・ホフマンによる衝撃的なコメディのモノマネを見てください。それは啓示的です。
back_translation: Wait for the credits and watch Dustin Hoffman's shocking comedy impersonation. It's revealing.

text: it is a likable story , told with competence .
translation: 魅力的な物語で、巧みに語られています。
back_translation: It is an enchanting story, skillfully told.

text: a gushy episode of `` m \* a \* s \* h '' only this time from an asian perspective .
translation: アジアの視点から見た「M*A*S*H」の感動的なエピソード。
back_translation: An emotional episode of "M*A*S*H" from an Asian perspective.

text: bread , my sweet has so many flaws it would be easy for critics to shred it .
translation: パン、私の甘いものには多くの欠点があるので、批評家がそれを徹底的に批判するのは簡単でしょう。
back_translation: Bread has many flaws when it comes to my sweet treats, so it would be easy for critics to thoroughly criticize it.

text: a delightful romantic comedy with plenty of bite .
translation: 魅力的なロマンティックコメディで、たくさんのスパイスがあります。
back_translation: It's an attractive romantic comedy with a lot of spice.

text: you 'll forget about it by monday , though , and if they 're old enough to have developed some taste , so will your kids .
translation: 月曜日までにはそれを忘れてしまうでしょうし、もし彼らがある程度の趣味を持つ年齢に達しているなら、あなたの子供たちもそうなるでしょう。
back_translation: By Monday, they will probably forget it, and if they have reached an age where they have some hobbies, your children will likely be the same.

text: a good thriller .
translation: 良いスリラー。
back_translation: A good thriller.

text: you could easily mistake it for a sketchy work-in-progress that was inexplicably rushed to the megaplexes before its time .
translation: それは、なぜか時間を前倒ししてメガプレックスに急いで公開された、怪しげな進行中の作品と簡単に間違えてしまうかもしれません。
back_translation: This could easily be mistaken for a suspicious ongoing project that was hurriedly released to Megaplex ahead of schedule for some reason.

text: it 's hard to imagine any recent film , independent or otherwise , that makes as much of a mess as this one .
translation: 最近の映画の中で、この作品ほど混乱を招くものを想像するのは難しい。
back_translation: It is hard to imagine a film in recent years that causes as much confusion as this one.

text: rumor , a muddled drama about coming to terms with death , feels impersonal , almost generic .
translation: 「ルーモア」は、死と向き合う過程を描いた混乱したドラマで、無味乾燥でほとんど一般的な印象を与えます。
back_translation: "Rumor" is a chaotic drama that depicts the process of confronting death, giving off a bland and almost typical impression.

text: works on the whodunit level as its larger themes get lost in the murk of its own making
translation: 自らの作り出した濁りの中で、大きなテーマが失われる一方で、推理小説としての魅力を持っている。
back_translation: While a large theme is lost within the murk created by oneself, it still possesses the charm of a mystery novel.

text: there 's nothing like love to give a movie a b-12 shot , and cq shimmers with it .
translation: 愛ほど映画にB12ショットを与えるものはありません。そして、CQはそれで輝いています。
back_translation: Nothing gives a movie a B12 shot like love. And CQ shines with it.

text: while not for every taste , this often very funny collegiate gross-out comedy goes a long way toward restoring the luster of the national lampoon film franchise , too long reduced to direct-to-video irrelevancy .
translation: すべての好みに合うわけではありませんが、この非常に面白い大学生のグロテスクなコメディは、長い間直接ビデオの無関係さに貶められていた全国ランプーン映画フランチャイズの輝きを取り戻すために大いに貢献しています。
back_translation: While it may not suit everyone's taste, this very entertaining grotesque comedy about college students significantly contributes to restoring the shine of the National Lampoon movie franchise, which has long been undermined by the irrelevance of direct-to-video releases.

text: the movie is not as terrible as the synergistic impulse that created it .
translation: その映画は、それを作り出したシナジーの衝動ほどひどくはない。
back_translation: The movie is not as terrible as the impulse of the synergy that created it.

text: the characters are based on stock clichés , and the attempt to complicate the story only defies credibility .
translation: キャラクターはありふれたクリシェに基づいており、ストーリーを複雑にしようとする試みは信憑性を否定するだけです。
back_translation: The characters are based on common clichés, and attempts to complicate the story only undermine its credibility.

text: it 's petty thievery like this that puts flimsy flicks like this behind bars
translation: こんな小さな窃盗が、このような薄っぺらい映画を刑務所に追いやるのです。
back_translation: Such a small theft drives such a flimsy movie into prison.

text: ... an adorably whimsical comedy that deserves more than a passing twinkle .
translation: 愛らしくも風変わりなコメディで、もっと注目されるべき作品です。
back_translation: It’s a charming yet quirky comedy that deserves more attention.

text: with or without ballast tanks , k-19 sinks to a harrison ford low .
translation: バラストタンクの有無にかかわらず、K-19はハリソン・フォードの低さに沈む。
back_translation: Regardless of the presence of a ballast tank, K-19 sinks in the shallowness of Harrison Ford.

text: mr. koshashvili is a director to watch .
translation: コシャシュヴィリ氏は注目すべき監督です。
back_translation: Mr. Koshasvili is a noteworthy director.

text: about as big a crowdpleaser as they possibly come .
translation: これ以上の観客を喜ばせるものはないと言っても過言ではない。
back_translation: It is not an exaggeration to say that there is nothing better to please this audience.

text: but on the whole , you 're gonna like this movie .
translation: しかし、全体として、あなたはこの映画が好きになるでしょう。
back_translation: However, overall, you will come to like this movie.

text: we can tell what it is supposed to be , but ca n't really call it a work of art .
translation: それが何であるべきかは言えますが、実際にはそれを芸術作品とは呼べません。
back_translation: I can say what it should be, but in reality, it cannot be called a work of art.

text: the art direction and costumes are gorgeous and finely detailed , and kurys ' direction is clever and insightful .
translation: アートディレクションと衣装は美しく、細部まで詳細にこだわっています。そして、クーリスの演出は巧妙で洞察に満ちています。
back_translation: The art direction and costumes are beautiful, with attention to detail in every aspect. Additionally, Coolis's direction is clever and insightful.

text: the film is delicately narrated by martin landau and directed with sensitivity and skill by dana janklowicz-mann .
translation: この映画はマーティン・ランドーによって繊細に語られ、ダナ・ジャンクロウィッツ＝マンによって感受性と技術をもって監督されています。
back_translation: This film is delicately narrated by Martin Landau and directed with sensitivity and technique by Dana Janklowicz-Man.

text: sad nonsense , this .
translation: 悲しい無意味なことです、これ。
back_translation: This is a sad and meaningless thing.

text: every note rings false .
translation: すべての音符が間違って響く。
back_translation: Every note sounds wrong.

text: the evocative imagery and gentle , lapping rhythms of this film are infectious -- it gets under our skin and draws us in long before the plot kicks into gear .
translation: この映画の心に響くイメージと穏やかな波のようなリズムは伝染性があり、プロットが動き出す前に私たちの肌の下に入り込み、私たちを引き込んでいきます。
back_translation: The resonant images and gentle wave-like rhythm of this film are infectious, infiltrating beneath our skin before the plot even starts to unfold, drawing us in.

text: succeeds as a well-made evocation of a subculture .
translation: サブカルチャーのよくできた呼び起こしとして成功している。
back_translation: It is successful as a well-crafted evocation of subculture.

text: plunges you into a reality that is , more often then not , difficult and sad , and then , without sentimentalizing it or denying its brutality , transforms that reality into a lyrical and celebratory vision .
translation: あなたをしばしば困難で悲しい現実に引き込んだ後、感傷的に扱ったり、その残酷さを否定することなく、その現実を叙情的で祝福的なビジョンに変換します。
