back_translation: After often drawing you into difficult and sad realities, it transforms those realities into an emotional and blessed vision without treating them sentimentally or denying their cruelty.

text: an immensely entertaining look at some of the unsung heroes of 20th century pop music .
translation: 20世紀ポップ音楽の無名の英雄たちを非常に楽しませる視点で見た作品。
back_translation: A piece viewed from a perspective that greatly entertains the anonymous heroes of 20th-century pop music.

text: the action scenes have all the suspense of a 20-car pileup , while the plot holes are big enough for a train car to drive through -- if kaos had n't blown them all up .
translation: アクションシーンは20台の車が衝突したときのすべてのサスペンスを持ち、プロットの穴は列車の車両が通り抜けることができるほど大きい—もしカオスがそれらをすべて爆破していなければ。
back_translation: The action scenes carry all the suspense of 20 cars colliding, and the plot holes are large enough for a train to pass through—unless chaos blows them all up.

text: howard conjures the past via surrealist flourishes so overwrought you 'd swear he just stepped out of a buñuel retrospective .
translation: ハワードは、過剰なシュルレアリスムの飾り付けを通じて過去を呼び起こすので、彼がブニュエルの回顧展から出てきたと確信するほどだ。
back_translation: Howard evokes the past through excessive surrealist decoration, so much so that one could be convinced he just came out of a Buñuel retrospective.

text: eisenstein lacks considerable brio for a film about one of cinema 's directorial giants .
translation: アイゼンシュタインは、映画界の巨匠の一人についての作品にしては、かなりの活気を欠いている。
back_translation: Eisenstein's work, despite being about one of the giants of cinema, lacks considerable vitality.

text: even if you do n't know the band or the album 's songs by heart , you will enjoy seeing how both evolve , and you will also learn a good deal about the state of the music business in the 21st century .
translation: バンドやアルバムの曲を暗記していなくても、両者の進化を楽しむことができ、21世紀の音楽業界の現状についても多くのことを学べるでしょう。
back_translation: Even if you don't memorize songs from bands or albums, you can enjoy the evolution of both and learn a lot about the current state of the music industry in the 21st century.

text: inherently caustic and oddly whimsical , the film chimes in on the grieving process and strangely draws the audience into the unexplainable pain and eccentricities that are attached to the concept of loss .
translation: 本質的に腐食性で奇妙に風変わりなこの映画は、悲しみのプロセスに触れ、喪失という概念に伴う説明できない痛みや妙な特性に観客を引き込む。
back_translation: This fundamentally corrosive and strangely eccentric film touches on the process of grief, drawing the audience into the inexplicable pain and peculiar characteristics that accompany the concept of loss.

text: like being able to hit on a 15-year old when you 're over 100 .
translation: 100歳を超えた人が15歳の子にアプローチできるようなもの。
back_translation: It's like someone over 100 years old being able to approach a 15-year-old.

text: it 's better than the phantom menace .
translation: ファントム・メナスよりもいい。
back_translation: Better than Phantom Menace.

text: an effortlessly accomplished and richly resonant work .
translation: effortlessな達成感と豊かな響きを持つ作品
back_translation: A work with an effortless sense of accomplishment and rich resonance.

text: broomfield is energized by volletta wallace 's maternal fury , her fearlessness , and because of that , his film crackles .
translation: ブルームフィールドはヴォレッタ・ワラースの母性的な怒りと恐れ知らずの姿に刺激を受け、そのため彼の映画は活気に満ちている。
back_translation: Bloomfield is inspired by Violetta Waras's maternal anger and fearless demeanor, which gives his films a vibrant energy.

text: a fiercely clever and subtle film , capturing the precarious balance between the extravagant confidence of the exiled aristocracy and the cruel earnestness of the victorious revolutionaries .
translation: 非常に賢く微妙な映画であり、亡命した貴族の華々しい自信と、勝利した革命者たちの冷酷な真剣さとの間の危ういバランスを捉えています。
back_translation: It is a very clever and subtle film that captures the delicate balance between the glamorous confidence of an exiled noble and the ruthless seriousness of the victorious revolutionaries.

text: this kind of hands-on storytelling is ultimately what makes shanghai ghetto move beyond a good , dry , reliable textbook and what allows it to rank with its worthy predecessors .
translation: このような実践的なストーリーテリングが、上海ゲットーを良い、乾燥した、信頼できる教科書から超越させ、価値ある先行作品と並ぶことを可能にしています。
back_translation: This kind of practical storytelling allows the Shanghai Ghetto to transcend good, dry, reliable textbooks and stand alongside valuable predecessor works.

text: formulaic to the 51st power , more like .

text: when your subject is illusion versus reality , should n't the reality seem at least passably real ?
translation: あなたのテーマが幻想と現実であるなら、現実は多少なりとも真実に見えるべきではないでしょうか？
back_translation: If your theme is fantasy and reality, shouldn't reality appear somewhat true?

text: the results are far more alienating than involving .
translation: 結果はずっと関与するよりも疎外的です。

text: these characters become wearisome .
translation: これらのキャラクターは疲れさせます。

text: it finds its moviegoing pleasures in the tiny events that could make a person who has lived her life half-asleep suddenly wake up and take notice .

text: i could have used my two hours better watching being john malkovich again .

text: comes across as a relic from a bygone era , and its convolutions ... feel silly rather than plausible .
translation: かつての時代の遺物のように感じられ、その複雑さは現実的ではなく、むしろばかげているように思える。
back_translation: It feels like a relic from a bygone era, and its complexity seems unrealistic, almost absurd.

text: the movie is as padded as allen 's jelly belly .
translation: その映画はアレンのジェリーベリーのように厚みがある。

text: more busy than exciting , more frantic than involving , more chaotic than entertaining .

text: although ... visually striking and slickly staged , it 's also cold , grey , antiseptic and emotionally desiccated .

text: though in some ways similar to catherine breillat 's fat girl , rain is the far superior film .
translation: セリーヌ・シアマの『レイン』は、キャサリン・ブレイヤートの『脂肪の女の子』に似た部分もあるが、はるかに優れた映画である。

text: you leave feeling like you 've endured a long workout without your pulse ever racing .

text: one-sided documentary offers simplistic explanations to a very complex situation .

text: instead , it 'll only put you to sleep .

text: a sensitive and astute first feature by anne-sophie birot .
translation: アン・ソフィー・ビロの繊細で鋭敏な初の長編作品。

text: the comedy is nonexistent .

translation: 古い犬が新しい見事な技を学ぶだけでなく、発明する例。

text: romantic , riveting and handsomely animated .
translation: ロマンチックで、魅力的で、魅力的にアニメーションされています。

text: try as you might to scrutinize the ethics of kaufman 's approach , somehow it all comes together to create a very compelling , sensitive , intelligent and almost cohesive piece of film entertainment .

text: every once in a while , a movie will come along that turns me into that annoying specimen of humanity that i usually dread encountering the most - the fanboy

text: spreads itself too thin , leaving these actors , as well as the members of the commune , short of profound characterizations
translation: あまりにも広がりすぎて、これらの俳優やコミューンのメンバーに深いキャラクター描写が欠けてしまっている。

text: the acting , for the most part , is terrific , although the actors must struggle with the fact that they 're playing characters who sometimes feel more like literary conceits than flesh-and-blood humans .
translation: 演技は大部分で素晴らしいですが、役者たちは時には肉体を持つ人間というよりも文学的な概念のように感じるキャラクターを演じなければならないという事実に苦しむ必要があります。

text: -lrb- less a movie than -rrb- an appalling , odoriferous thing ... so rotten in almost every single facet of production that you 'll want to crawl up your own \*\*\* in embarrassment .

text: funny and touching .
translation: 面白くて心温まる。

text: an awkward hybrid of genres that just does n't work .
translation: 機能しない不器用なジャンルのハイブリッド。

text: affirms the gifts of all involved , starting with spielberg and going right through the ranks of the players -- on-camera and off -- that he brings together .
translation: スピルバーグから始まり、彼が集めるカメラの前後のプレーヤーのランクを通じて、関わる全ての人の才能を讃えています。

translation: クリシェの50台の玉突き事故。

translation: 罪悪感を感じることなく、心を温めてくれるでしょう。

translation: 「マイノリティ・リポート」は、SF映画として驚異的です。

text: the auteur 's ear for the way fears and slights are telegraphed in the most blithe exchanges gives the film its lingering tug .

text: the movie 's ultimate point -- that everyone should be themselves -- is trite , but the screenwriter and director michel gondry restate it to the point of ridiculousness .
translation: 映画の究極的なポイント - 誰もが自分自身であるべきだということ - は陳腐ですが、脚本家で監督のミシェル・ゴンドリーはそれをばかげるほど繰り返しています。

text: a fine documentary can be distinguished from a mediocre one by the better film 's ability to make its subject interesting to those who are n't part of its supposed target audience .
translation: 優れたドキュメンタリーは、平凡なものと比べて、対象となる観客ではない人々にとってもそのテーマを興味深く感じさせる能力によって区別される。
back_translation: Great documentaries are distinguished by their ability to make their themes interesting even to those who are not the intended audience, compared to ordinary ones.

text: in the wake of saving private ryan , black hawk down and we were soldiers , you are likely to be as heartily sick of mayhem as cage 's war-weary marine .

back_translation: After "Saving Private Ryan," "Black Hawk Down," and "Our Boys," you must be fed up with the chaos, just like a weary Marine in a cage.

translation: ウィットに富んだ対話や創造的な瞬間が散りばめられています。

text: -- is a crime that should be punishable by chainsaw .
translation: --はチェーンソーで罰せられるべき犯罪です。

text: whether or not you 're enlightened by any of derrida 's lectures on `` the other '' and `` the self , '' derrida is an undeniably fascinating and playful fellow .
translation: あなたがデリダの「他者」や「自己」に関する講義によって啓発されているかどうかにかかわらず、デリダは間違いなく魅力的で遊び心のある人物です。
back_translation: Regardless of whether you are inspired by Derrida's lectures on "the other" and "the self," he is undoubtedly an intriguing and playful figure.

text: the people in jessica are so recognizable and true that , as in real life , we 're never sure how things will work out .
translation: ジャシカの中の人々は非常に認識しやすく、真実味があるため、現実のように、物事がどのように進展するのかは決して確信できません。

text: parents may even find that it goes by quickly , because it has some of the funniest jokes of any movie this year , including those intended for adults .
translation: 親は、今年のどの映画よりも面白いジョークがいくつか含まれているため、あっという間に過ぎてしまうことに気付くかもしれません。その中には大人向けのジョークも含まれています。

text: a good music documentary , probably one of the best since the last waltz .

text: -lrb- gulpilil -rrb- is a commanding screen presence , and his character 's abundant humanism makes him the film 's moral compass .
translation: （ガルピリル）は圧倒的なスクリーンプレゼンスを持っており、彼のキャラクターの豊かな人間性が映画の道徳的な羅針盤となっています。

text: the screenplay never lets us forget that bourne was once an amoral assassin just like the ones who are pursuing him ... there is never really a true `` us '' versus `` them '' .
translation: 脚本は、ボーンがかつて自分を追う者たちと同じ道徳的に無関心な暗殺者であったことを決して忘れさせません...本当の「私たち」と「彼ら」の対立は存在しません。

text: the only thing scary about feardotcom is that the filmmakers and studio are brazen enough to attempt to pass this stinker off as a scary movie .
translation: feardotcomの唯一の恐ろしい点は、映画製作者とスタジオがこの駄作をホラー映画として通そうとするあまりの厚かましさです。

text: munch 's screenplay is tenderly observant of his characters .

text: a film of epic scale with an intimate feeling , a saga of the ups and downs of friendships .

back_translation: A film with a grand scale yet an intimate feel, depicting the ups and downs of friendship in a saga.

text: the movie would seem less of a trifle if ms. sugarman followed through on her defiance of the saccharine .
translation: ミス・スガーマンが甘ったるいものへの反抗を貫けば、この映画はもっとささいなものに思えなくなるだろう。
back_translation: If Miss Sugarman stays true to her rebellion against sweetness, this movie will seem less trivial.

text: mention `` solaris '' five years from now and i 'm sure those who saw it will have an opinion to share .
translation: 「ソラリス」について5年後に言及すれば、それを見た人たちは必ず共有したい意見を持っているでしょう。
back_translation: If you mention "Solaris" five years later, those who have seen it will definitely have opinions they want to share.

text: that ` alabama ' manages to be pleasant in spite of its predictability and occasional slowness is due primarily to the perkiness of witherspoon -lrb- who is always a joy to watch , even when her material is not first-rate -rrb- ...
translation: 「アラバマ」は、その予測可能性や時折の遅さにもかかわらず魅力的であるのは、主にウィザースプーンの元気さによるもので、彼女の素材が一流でない時でも常に見るのが楽しいです。
back_translation: "Alabama" remains captivating despite its predictability and occasional slowness, primarily due to Witherspoon's liveliness, making it enjoyable to watch even when her material isn't top-notch.

text: pacino is the best he 's been in years and keener is marvelous .
translation: パチーノはここ数年で最高の演技をしており、キーナーも素晴らしい。
back_translation: Pacino has delivered his best performance in recent years, and Keener is fantastic as well.

text: much of the cast is stiff or just plain bad .
translation: キャストの多くはぎこちないか、ただ単に悪いです。
back_translation: Many of the cast are stiff or simply bad.

text: it 's excessively quirky and a little underconfident in its delivery , but otherwise this is the best ` old neighborhood ' project since christopher walken kinda romanced cyndi lauper in the opportunists .
translation: それは非常に風変わりで、発表に少し自信がないが、それ以外はクリストファー・ウォーケンがオポチュニストでシンディ・ローパーをちょっとロマンチックにした以来、最高の「古い近所」プロジェクトだ。
back_translation: It's quite unconventional and I'm not very confident about the presentation, but aside from that, it's the best "old neighborhood" project since Christopher Walken became an opportunist and made Cyndi Lauper a little romantic.

text: busy urban comedy is clearly not zhang 's forte , his directorial touch is neither light nor magical enough to bring off this kind of whimsy .
translation: 忙しい都市のコメディは明らかに張の得意分野ではなく、彼の演出のタッチはこの種の気まぐれを生み出すには軽やかでも魔法のようでもない。
back_translation: The busy city comedy is clearly not Zhang's strong suit, and his directorial touch does not bring a lightness or magic needed to create this kind of whimsy.

text: imagine the cleanflicks version of ` love story , ' with ali macgraw 's profanities replaced by romance-novel platitudes .
translation: アリー・マクグローの悪口がロマンス小説のありふれた言葉に置き換えられた『ラブ・ストーリー』のクリーンフリックス版を想像してみてください。
back_translation: Imagine a clean flicks version of "Love Story" where the insults aimed at Ali McGraw are replaced with cliché phrases from romance novels.

text: extremely well acted by the four primary actors , this is a seriously intended movie that is not easily forgotten .
translation: 四人の主要俳優による非常に素晴らしい演技で、この映画は真剣に制作されたものであり、簡単には忘れられません。
back_translation: With outstanding performances by the four main actors, this movie is seriously crafted and will not be easily forgotten.

text: bound to appeal to women looking for a howlingly trashy time .
translation: 低俗で楽しい時間を求める女性に魅力的なものになるでしょう。
back_translation: It will be attractive to women seeking a vulgar and fun time.

text: ms. hutchins is talented enough and charismatic enough to make us care about zelda 's ultimate fate .
translation: ハッチンズさんは才能があり、魅力的なので、私たちはゼルダの最終的な運命を気にかけるようになります。
back_translation: Mr. Hutchins is talented and charming, so we will become concerned about Zelda's ultimate fate.

text: such a fine idea for a film , and such a stultifying , lifeless execution .
translation: なんて素晴らしい映画のアイデアなんだ、そしてなんて退屈で命のない実行なんだ。
back_translation: What a wonderful idea for a movie, and what a boring and lifeless execution.

text: return to neverland manages to straddle the line between another classic for the company and just another run-of-the-mill disney sequel intended for the home video market .
translation: リターン・トゥ・ネバーランドは、会社の別のクラシックと家庭用ビデオ市場向けのただの平凡なディズニーの続編の間でうまくバランスを取っている。
back_translation: Return to Neverland strikes a good balance between being just an ordinary Disney sequel for the company's other classics and the home video market.

text: writer-director david jacobson and his star , jeremy renner , have made a remarkable film that explores the monster 's psychology not in order to excuse him but rather to demonstrate that his pathology evolved from human impulses that grew hideously twisted .
translation: 作家・監督のデビッド・ジェイコブソンと彼の主演、ジェレミー・レナーは、怪物の心理を探求する素晴らしい映画を制作しました。それは、彼を擁護するためではなく、彼の病理が人間の衝動から恐ろしいほどねじれた形で進化したことを示すためです。
back_translation: Writer and director David Jacobson, along with his star Jeremy Renner, created a remarkable film that explores the psychology of a monster. This is not to defend him, but to show how his pathology has evolved in a horrifyingly twisted form from human impulses.

text: drama of temptation , salvation and good intentions is a thoughtful examination of faith , love and power .
translation: 誘惑、救済、そして善意のドラマは、信仰、愛、そして力に対する思慮深い検討です。
back_translation: Temptation, salvation, and the drama of goodwill are thoughtful reflections on faith, love, and power.

text: oddly compelling .
translation: 奇妙に引き込まれる。
back_translation: Strangely captivating.

text: feels at times like a giant commercial for universal studios , where much of the action takes place .
translation: 時々、アクションの大部分が行われるユニバーサルスタジオの巨大なCMのように感じられる。
back_translation: Sometimes, it feels like a giant commercial for Universal Studios where most of the action takes place.

text: a small fortune in salaries and stunt cars might have been saved if the director , tom dey , had spliced together bits and pieces of midnight run and 48 hours -lrb- and , for that matter , shrek -rrb- .
translation: 監督のトム・デイが『ミッドナイト・ラン』と『48時間』、さらには『シュレック』の bits and pieces を組み合わせていたら、給料やスタントカーにかかる小さな fortune が節約できたかもしれません。
back_translation: Director Tom Day might have saved a small fortune on salaries and stunt cars by combining bits and pieces from "Midnight Run," "48 Hours," and even "Shrek."

text: strange , funny , twisted , brilliant and macabre .
translation: 奇妙で、面白く、ひねくれていて、素晴らしく、そして不気味。
back_translation: Strange, interesting, twisted, wonderful, and eerie.

text: shanghai ghetto , much stranger than any fiction , brings this unknown slice of history affectingly to life .
translation: 上海ゲットーは、どんなフィクションよりも奇妙で、この知られざる歴史の一片を感動的に生き生きと描き出しています。
back_translation: The Shanghai Ghetto is stranger than any fiction and vividly brings to life this little-known piece of history in an emotional way.

text: a movie that will thrill you , touch you and make you laugh as well .
translation: あなたをワクワクさせ、心に響き、笑わせてくれる映画です。
back_translation: It's a movie that excites you, resonates in your heart, and makes you laugh.

text: though overall an overwhelmingly positive portrayal , the film does n't ignore the more problematic aspects of brown 's life .
translation: 全体として非常にポジティブな描写ではありますが、映画はブラウンの人生のより問題のある側面を無視してはいません。
back_translation: Overall, it is a very positive portrayal, but the movie does not ignore the more problematic aspects of Brown's life.

text: the film is so busy making reference to other films and trying to be other films that it fails to have a heart , mind or humor of its own .
translation: その映画は他の映画への参照をすることに忙しく、他の映画になろうとするあまり、自分自身の心、頭、またはユーモアを持つことに失敗している。
back_translation: The movie is too busy referencing other films and, in trying too hard to become another film, fails to have its own heart, mind, or humor.

text: cool gadgets and creatures keep this fresh .
translation: クールなガジェットやクリーチャーがこれを新鮮に保っています。
back_translation: Cool gadgets and creatures keep this fresh.

text: this is very much of a mixed bag , with enough negatives to outweigh the positives .
translation: これは非常に多様な内容で、ポジティブな面を上回るほどのネガティブな面が十分にあります。
back_translation: This contains a very diverse range of content, with enough negative aspects to outweigh the positive ones.

text: ringu is a disaster of a story , full of holes and completely lacking in chills .
translation: リングは穴だらけで、まったく恐怖感のない物語の災害です。
back_translation: The ring is full of holes, a disaster story with no sense of fear at all.

text: while maintaining the appearance of clinical objectivity , this sad , occasionally horrifying but often inspiring film is among wiseman 's warmest .
translation: 臨床的な客観性を保ちながら、この悲しく、時には恐ろしいが、しばしば感動的な映画は、ワイズマンの作品の中で最も温かいものの一つです。
back_translation: While maintaining clinical objectivity, this sad, sometimes terrifying, but often moving film is one of the warmest in Wiseman's body of work.

text: but it would be better to wait for the video .
translation: しかし、ビデオを待った方がいいでしょう。
back_translation: However, it would be better to wait for the video.

text: dreary tale of middle-class angst
translation: 中流階級の苦悩に関する陰鬱な物語
back_translation: A gloomy tale about the struggles of the middle class.

text: though the aboriginal aspect lends the ending an extraordinary poignancy , and the story itself could be played out in any working class community in the nation .
translation: 先住民の側面が結末に特別な感動を与えている一方で、物語自体は国のどの労働者階級コミュニティでも展開可能です。
back_translation: While the indigenous aspects provide a special emotional impact to the conclusion, the story itself can unfold in any working-class community in the country.

text: the byplay and bickering between the now spy-savvy siblings , carmen -lrb- vega -rrb- and juni -lrb- sabara -rrb- cortez , anchor the film in a very real and amusing give-and-take .
translation: 今やスパイに精通した兄妹、カルメン（ベガ）とジュニ（サバラ・コルテス）との間のやり取りや口喧嘩は、映画を非常に現実的で面白いやり取りで Anchor しています。
back_translation: The exchanges and arguments between the siblings, Carmen (Vega) and Juni (Sabara-Cortes), who are now well-versed in espionage, anchor the movie with very realistic and entertaining interactions.

text: it 's sweet , funny , charming , and completely delightful .
translation: それは甘くて、面白くて、魅力的で、完全に楽しいです。
back_translation: It is sweet, interesting, charming, and completely fun.

text: seen in that light , moonlight mile should strike a nerve in many .
translation: その観点から見ると、「ムーンライトマイル」は多くの人々の心に響くはずです。
back_translation: From that perspective, "Moonlight Mile" should resonate with many people's hearts.

text: to the filmmakers , ivan is a prince of a fellow , but he comes across as shallow and glib though not mean-spirited , and there 's no indication that he 's been responsible for putting together any movies of particular value or merit .
translation: 映画製作者にとって、イヴァンは素晴らしい王子のような人物ですが、軽薄で口先だけの印象を与えます。しかし、悪意はなく、特に価値や功績のある映画を作ったという兆しはありません。
back_translation: To filmmakers, Ivan is a wonderful prince-like figure, but he gives the impression of being frivolous and all talk. However, he is not malicious, and there are no signs that he has created films of particular value or merit.

text: the movie 's something-borrowed construction feels less the product of loving , well integrated homage and more like a mere excuse for the wan , thinly sketched story .
translation: 映画「サムシング・ボロウド」の構成は、愛情深く統合されたオマージュの産物というよりも、持続的で薄っぺらなストーリーの単なる口実のように感じられる。
back_translation: The structure of the movie "Something Borrowed" feels more like a mere excuse for a thin and persistent story rather than a lovingly integrated tribute.

text: none of birthday girl 's calculated events take us by surprise ...
translation: バースデーガールの計算されたイベントのどれも、私たちを驚かせることはありません…
back_translation: None of the birthday girl's planned events will surprise us...

text: there are many definitions of ` time waster ' but this movie must surely be one of them .
translation: 「時間の無駄」という定義はいくつかありますが、この映画は間違いなくその一つでしょう。
back_translation: There are several definitions of "a waste of time," and this movie is undoubtedly one of them.

text: i can easily imagine benigni 's pinocchio becoming a christmas perennial .
translation: 私は簡単にベニーニの『ピノキオ』がクリスマスの定番になることを想像できます。
back_translation: I can easily imagine Benigni's "Pinocchio" becoming a Christmas classic.

text: this is rote drivel aimed at mom and dad 's wallet .
translation: これは親の財布を狙った単なる退屈なものです。
back_translation: This is just a boring thing aimed at the parent's wallet.

text: k 19 stays afloat as decent drama\/action flick
translation: K19は、良いドラマ／アクション映画として浮き上がる。
back_translation: K19 stands out as a good drama/action movie.

text: what more can be expected from a college comedy that 's target audience has n't graduated from junior high school ?
translation: 中学校を卒業していないターゲットオーディエンスを持つ大学のコメディからは、何を期待できるのでしょうか？
back_translation: What can we expect from a college comedy aimed at an audience that hasn't graduated from middle school?

text: it 's quite diverting nonsense .
translation: それはかなり面白いナンセンスです。
back_translation: That is quite an interesting nonsense.

text: aggravating and tedious .
translation: 煩わしくて退屈な。
back_translation: Annoying and boring.

text: i 'm sorry to say that this should seal the deal - arnold is not , nor will he be , back .
translation: 申し訳ありませんが、これで契約が成立するはずです - アーノルドは戻ってこないし、戻ることもありません。
back_translation: I’m sorry, but this contract should be established - Arnold will not come back and will not return.

text: a bittersweet drama about the limbo of grief and how truth-telling can open the door to liberation .
translation: 悲しみの中間状態についてのほろ苦いドラマで、真実を語ることが解放への扉を開く方法を描いています。
back_translation: A bittersweet drama about the intermediate state of sadness, depicting how speaking the truth opens the door to liberation.

text: more precious than perspicacious
translation: 洞察力よりも貴重な
back_translation: More valuable than insight.

text: rarely does such high-profile talent serve such literate material .
translation: このような高名な才能がこのような教養のある素材を提供することはめったにありません。
back_translation: It is rare for such a renowned talent to provide such cultured material.

text: a moving picture that does not move .
translation: 動かない動く絵。
back_translation: A moving picture that doesn't move.

text: this ludicrous film is predictable at every turn .
translation: このばかげた映画は、あらゆる場面で予測可能です。
back_translation: This ridiculous movie is predictable in every scene.

text: just another combination of bad animation and mindless violence ... lacking the slightest bit of wit or charm .
translation: 悪いアニメーションと無意味な暴力のただの組み合わせで、少しのウィットや魅力も欠けている。
back_translation: It's just a combination of bad animation and meaningless violence, lacking even a bit of wit or charm.

text: -lrb- fiji diver rusi vulakoro and the married couple howard and michelle hall -rrb- show us the world they love and make us love it , too .
translation: （フィジーダイバーのルシ・ヴラカロと結婚したカップル、ハワードとミシェル・ホールが、彼らが愛する世界を見せてくれ、私たちもそれを愛するようにしてくれます。）
back_translation: (A couple, Howard and Michelle Hall, who married the freediver Luce Vracar, show us the world they love, and they make us love it too.)

text: a fanciful drama about napoleon 's last years and his surprising discovery of love and humility .
translation: ナポレオンの晩年と彼の愛と謙虚さの驚くべき発見についての幻想的なドラマ。
back_translation: A fantastical drama about Napoleon's later years and the remarkable discoveries of his love and humility.

text: the superior plotline is n't quite enough to drag along the dead -lrb- water -rrb- weight of the other .
translation: 優れたプロットラインは、他のものの死に体のような重荷を引きずるには十分ではない。
back_translation: An excellent plotline is not enough to drag along the burden of a dead body of something else.

text: ... enthusiastically invokes the percussion rhythm , the brass soul and the sense of fierce competition that helps make great marching bands half the fun of college football games .
translation: ... 熱心に打楽器のリズム、金管楽器の魂、そして大学フットボールゲームの楽しさの半分を作り上げる激しい競争心を呼び起こします。
back_translation: ... it passionately evokes the rhythms of percussion, the soul of brass instruments, and a fierce competitive spirit that creates half the fun of college football games.

text: spy kids 2 also happens to be that rarity among sequels : it actually improves upon the original hit movie .
translation: スパイキッズ2は、続編の中でも珍しい作品で、実際に元のヒット映画よりも改善されています。
back_translation: Spy Kids 2 is a rare film among sequels, as it actually improves upon the original hit movie.

text: speaks eloquently about the symbiotic relationship between art and life .
translation: 芸術と生活の共生関係について流暢に語っています。
back_translation: It speaks fluently about the symbiotic relationship between art and life.

text: audiard successfully maintains suspense on different levels throughout a film that is both gripping and compelling .
translation: オディヤールは、緊迫感を維持しながら、引き込まれるような魅力的な映画を通じて異なるレベルでサスペンスを成功裏に保っています。
back_translation: Odiar successfully maintains suspense at different levels through an engaging and captivating film while keeping a sense of tension.

text: an unsettling , memorable cinematic experience that does its predecessors proud .
translation: 不安を感じさせる、記憶に残る映画体験で、前作たちに恥じないものです。
back_translation: It is an unforgettable movie experience that evokes anxiety and lives up to its predecessors.

text: its almost too-spectacular coastal setting distracts slightly from an eccentric and good-naturedly aimless story .
translation: そのほぼ素晴らしい沿岸の設定は、風変わりで気さくに方向性を欠いた物語から少し気をそらす。
back_translation: The almost wonderful coastal setting slightly distracts from the quirky and amiable but directionless story.

text: a compassionate , moving portrait of an american -lrb- and an america -rrb- always reaching for something just outside his grasp .
translation: 慈悲深く、感動的なアメリカ人（そしてアメリカ）の肖像で、常に手の届かないところにある何かを求めている。
back_translation: A compassionate and touching portrait of Americans (and America) in search of something always just out of reach.

text: -lrb- stephen -rrb- earnhart 's film is more about the optimism of a group of people who are struggling to give themselves a better lot in life than the ones they currently have .
translation: スティーブン・アーンハートの映画は、現在の生活よりも良い状況を得ようと奮闘する人々の集団の楽観主義についてのものです。
back_translation: Stephen Earnhart's films are about the optimism of a group of people striving to achieve better circumstances than their current lives.

text: adaptation is intricately constructed and in a strange way nails all of orlean 's themes without being a true adaptation of her book .
translation: 適応は巧妙に構築されており、奇妙な方法でオールリーンのテーマをすべて捉えているが、彼女の本の真の適応ではない。
back_translation: The adaptation is cleverly constructed and captures all the themes of All-Rain in a strange way, but it is not a true adaptation of her book.

text: if you want a movie time trip , the 1960 version is a far smoother ride .
translation: もしタイムトリップの映画を見たいなら、1960年版はずっとスムーズな体験です。
back_translation: If you want to watch a time travel movie, the 1960 version offers a much smoother experience.

text: an older cad instructs a younger lad in zen and the art of getting laid in this prickly indie comedy of manners and misanthropy .
translation: 年配の男が、若い少年に禅とセックスの技術を教える、棘のあるインディーコメディーです。
back_translation: An elderly man teaches a young boy the techniques of Zen and sex in a thorny indie comedy.

text: with amazing finesse , the film shadows heidi 's trip back to vietnam and the city where her mother , mai thi kim , still lives .
translation: 驚くべき巧妙さで、映画は海地のベトナムへの帰省と、彼女の母、マイ・ティ・キムが今も住んでいる街を影のように映し出します。
back_translation: With astonishing cleverness, the film depicts Ha's return to Vietnam and reflects the city where her mother, Mai Thi Kim, still lives like a shadow.

text: an occasionally interesting but mostly repetitive look at a slice of counterculture that might be best forgotten .
translation: 時折興味深いが、主に繰り返しの多いカウンターカルチャーの一端を振り返ったもので、忘れられた方が良いかもしれない。
back_translation: It is occasionally interesting, but mainly reflects a part of counterculture that is often repetitive, and it might be better to forget it.

text: it 's an 88-minute highlight reel that 's 86 minutes too long .
translation: これは88分のハイライトリールですが、86分長すぎます。
back_translation: This is an 88-minute highlight reel, but 86 minutes is too long.

text: -lrb- jeff 's -rrb- gorgeous , fluid compositions , underlined by neil finn and edmund mcwilliams 's melancholy music , are charged with metaphor , but rarely easy , obvious or self-indulgent .
translation: ジェフの美しい流れるような構成は、ニール・フィンとエドマンド・マックウィリアムズの物悲しい音楽によって強調されており、比喩に満ちていますが、決して簡単で明白でも自己満足的でもありません。
back_translation: Jeff's beautifully flowing structure is emphasized by the mournful music of Neil Finn and Edmund McWilliams, full of metaphors, yet never easy, obvious, or self-satisfied.

text: it 's a smart , solid , kinetically-charged spy flick worthy of a couple hours of summertime and a bucket of popcorn .
translation: スマートでしっかりとした、動的なエネルギーに満ちたスパイ映画で、夏の数時間とポップコーンのバケツに値する作品です。
back_translation: A smart and solid spy movie filled with dynamic energy, it's worth a few hours of summer and a bucket of popcorn.

text: the film is predictable in the reassuring manner of a beautifully sung holiday carol .
translation: その映画は、美しく歌われたホリデーキャロルのように、安心感のある予測可能さを持っています。
back_translation: The movie has a comforting predictability, much like a beautifully sung holiday carol.

text: the heat of the moment prevails .
translation: その瞬間の熱が勝る。
back_translation: The heat of that moment prevails.

text: a beautifully tooled action thriller about love and terrorism in korea .
translation: 韓国における愛とテロリズムについての美しい装飾が施されたアクションスリラー。
back_translation: A beautifully decorated action thriller about love and terrorism in South Korea.

text: return to never land is much more p.c. than the original version -lrb- no more racist portraits of indians , for instance -rrb- , but the excitement is missing .
translation: 『ネバーランドへ帰る』は、オリジナル版よりもずっと政治的に正しいですが（例えば、インディアンの人種差別的な肖像はもうありません）、興奮が欠けています。
back_translation: "Returning to Neverland" is much more politically correct than the original version (for example, there are no longer any racist portrayals of Indians), but it lacks excitement.

text: the only thing `` swept away '' is the one hour and thirty-three minutes spent watching this waste of time .
translation: 「 swept away 」された唯一のものは、この無駄な時間を過ごすために費やした1時間33分だけです。
back_translation: The only thing that has been "swept away" is the 1 hour and 33 minutes spent on this wasted time.

text: the banter between calvin and his fellow barbers feels like a streetwise mclaughlin group ... and never fails to entertain .
translation: カルバンと彼の仲間の理髪師の間のやりとりは、ストリート賢いマクラフリン・グループのように感じられ、常に楽しませてくれます。
back_translation: The exchange between Calvin and his fellow barbers feels like a street-smart McLaughlin Group and always delights.

text: while the importance of being earnest offers opportunities for occasional smiles and chuckles , it does n't give us a reason to be in the theater beyond wilde 's wit and the actors ' performances .
translation: 『真面目であることの重要性』は時折笑顔や chuckle をもたらす機会を提供しますが、ワイルドの機知や俳優の演技を超えて劇場にいる理由を与えてはくれません。
back_translation: "The importance of being serious" occasionally provides opportunities for smiles and chuckles, but it does not give a reason to be in the theater beyond Wilde's wit and the actors' performances.

text: contrived , awkward and filled with unintended laughs , the film shows signs that someone other than the director got into the editing room and tried to improve things by making the movie go faster .
translation: つじつまが合わず、ぎこちなく、意図しない笑いに満ちたこの映画は、監督以外の誰かが編集室に入って、映画をもっと速く進めることで改善しようとした兆候を見せています。
back_translation: This movie, which is full of inconsistencies, awkwardness, and unintentional laughter, shows signs that someone other than the director tried to enter the editing room to improve it by speeding up the film.

text: broomfield reminds us that beneath the hype , the celebrity , the high life , the conspiracies and the mystery there were once a couple of bright young men -- promising , talented , charismatic and tragically doomed .
translation: ブルームフィールドは、誇大宣伝、セレブリティ、ハイライフ、陰謀、そしてミステリーの背後には、かつて約束され、才能があり、カリスマ性を持ちながらも悲劇的に運命づけられた明るい若者たちがいたことを思い出させてくれます。
back_translation: Bloomfield reminds us that behind the hype, celebrity, high life, conspiracy, and mystery, there were once bright young individuals who were promised talent and charisma, yet tragically destined for misfortune.

text: offers a persuasive look at a defeated but defiant nation in flux .
translation: 変化の中で defeated だが抵抗する国を説得力を持って描いている。
back_translation: It portrays a country that, while defeated in the midst of change, resists with compelling conviction.

text: muccino seems to be exploring the idea of why human beings long for what they do n't have , and how this gets us in trouble .
translation: ムッチーノは、人間が持っていないものをなぜ欲しがるのか、そのことがどのように私たちを困らせるのかというアイデアを探求しているようです。
back_translation: Mucchino seems to be exploring the idea of why humans desire things they do not possess and how that affects us negatively.

text: this picture is mostly a lump of run-of-the-mill profanity sprinkled with a few remarks so geared toward engendering audience sympathy that you might think he was running for office -- or trying to win over a probation officer .
translation: この写真は、ほとんどが一般的な冒涜的な言葉の塊であり、観客の同情を得ることを目的としたいくつかの発言が散りばめられているため、彼が公職に立候補しているか、または保護観察官を惹きつけようとしているのではないかと思われる。
back_translation: This photo consists mostly of a collection of common blasphemous words, interspersed with several statements aimed at eliciting sympathy from the audience, which makes one wonder if he is running for public office or trying to attract the attention of a parole officer.

text: my wife is an actress has its moments in looking at the comic effects of jealousy .
translation: 私の妻は女優で、嫉妬のコメディ的効果を見ている瞬間があります。
back_translation: My wife is an actress, and there are moments when I see the comedic effect of jealousy.

text: a riveting documentary .
translation: 魅力的なドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: An appealing documentary.

text: while i ca n't say it 's on par with the first one , stuart little 2 is a light , fun cheese puff of a movie .
translation: 一作目と同じレベルとは言えないが、『スチュアート・リトル2』は軽快で楽しいチーズパフのような映画だ。

text: so boring that even its target audience talked all the way through it .
translation: あまりに退屈すぎて、ターゲットオーディエンスでさえ最後までずっと話していた。
back_translation: It was so boring that even the target audience kept talking until the very end.

text: sad to say -- it accurately reflects the rage and alienation that fuels the self-destructiveness of many young people .
translation: 悲しいことに、それは多くの若者の自己破壊的な行動を駆り立てる怒りと疎外感を正確に反映しています。
back_translation: Sadly, it accurately reflects the anger and alienation that drives many young people to engage in self-destructive behavior.

text: it 's neither as sappy as big daddy nor as anarchic as happy gilmore or the waterboy , but it has its moments .

back_translation: It is not as sentimental as Big Daddy, nor as anarchic as Happy Gilmore or The Waterboy, but it has its share of good scenes.

text: great character interaction .
translation: 素晴らしいキャラクターの相互作用。
back_translation: Wonderful character interactions.

text: louiso lets the movie dawdle in classic disaffected-indie-film mode , and brother hoffman 's script stumbles over a late-inning twist that just does n't make sense .
translation: ルイソは映画を古典的な無関心インディー映画のスタイルでだらだらさせ、ホフマン兄の脚本は後半のひねりで意味が通らないつまずきを見せる。
back_translation: Luiso drags the film along in a classic indie style of indifference, and the script by the Hoffman brothers reveals nonsensical stumbling blocks with its twist in the latter half.

text: even bigger and more ambitious than the first installment , spy kids 2 looks as if it were made by a highly gifted 12-year-old instead of a grown man .
translation: 最初の作品よりもさらに大きく、野心的な「スパイキッズ2」は、成熟した男性ではなく、非常に才能のある12歳の子供によって作られたかのように見える。
back_translation: "Spy Kids 2," larger and more ambitious than the first film, seems as if it was created not by a mature adult, but by a very talented 12-year-old child.

text: a meatier deeper beginning and\/or ending would have easily tipped this film into the `` a '' range , as is , it 's a very very strong `` b + . ''
translation: より肉厚で深みのある始まりや終わりがあれば、この映画は簡単に「A」評価に到達しただろう。現状では、非常に強い「B+」と言える。
back_translation: With a thicker and deeper beginning or end, this movie could easily have reached an "A" rating. As it stands, I would say it deserves a very strong "B+".

text: funny in a sick , twisted sort of way .
translation: 病んでいて歪んだ意味で面白い。
back_translation: It is interesting in a sick and twisted way.

text: trapped wo n't score points for political correctness , but it may cause parents a few sleepless hours -- a sign of its effectiveness .
translation: トラップは政治的正しさのためにポイントを稼ぐことはないが、親にとっては数時間の寝不足を引き起こすかもしれない - それはその効果の証である。
back_translation: The trap doesn’t earn points for political correctness, but it may cause a few hours of sleep deprivation for parents – that is evidence of its effect.

text: nicks refuses to let slackers be seen as just another teen movie , which means he can be forgiven for frequently pandering to fans of the gross-out comedy .
translation: ニックスは「スラッカーズ」をただのティーン映画として見られることを拒否しており、そのため、彼が下品なコメディのファンにしばしば迎合することは許されるだろう。

text: but though he only scratches the surface , at least he provides a strong itch to explore more .
translation: しかし、彼は表面的なことしか触れていないが、少なくともさらに探求したくなる強い刺激を提供している。

text: there are few things more frustrating to a film buff than seeing an otherwise good movie marred beyond redemption by a disastrous ending .

back_translation: For movie fans, there is hardly anything more frustrating than seeing a great film ruined by an irreparable terrible ending.

text: the film lapses too often into sugary sentiment and withholds delivery on the pell-mell pyrotechnics its punchy style promises .
translation: その映画はあまりにも頻繁に甘ったるい感傷に陥り、力強いスタイルが約束する目まぐるしい花火のような演出を提供することを控えています。
back_translation: The movie falls into overly sweet sentimentality too often, holding back the explosive fireworks-like delivery that its strong style promises.

text: birthday girl walks a tricky tightrope between being wickedly funny and just plain wicked .
translation: 誕生日の女の子は、ひたすら悪戯で面白いとただの悪であることの間を巧みに行き来しています。
back_translation: The birthday girl skillfully navigates between being merely mischievous and funny and being just plain evil.

text: potty-mouthed enough for pg-13 , yet not as hilariously raunchy as south park , this strangely schizo cartoon seems suited neither to kids or adults .
translation: PG-13にふさわしいほど口が悪いが、サウスパークほど面白くわいせつではないこの奇妙なスキゾ漫画は、子供にも大人にも適していないようだ。
back_translation: This strange schizoid comic, which is foul-mouthed enough to be suitable for PG-13 but not as funny or obscene as South Park, seems to be unsuitable for both children and adults.

text: does n't add up to much .
translation: あまり意味がありません。
back_translation: It doesn't make much sense.

translation: 中国の映画が成熟した率直な方法で同性愛の関係を描いているのを見るのは歓迎されるが、『ラーニュ』は決してドラマティックな熱を帯びることはない。
back_translation: It is welcome to see Chinese films depict homosexual relationships in a mature and candid manner, but "Lanyu" never becomes dramatically intense.

text: the movie is silly beyond comprehension , and even if it were n't silly , it would still be beyond comprehension .

text: despite its flaws , crazy as hell marks an encouraging new direction for la salle .
translation: 欠点があるにもかかわらず、「Crazy as Hell」はラ・サルにとって励みとなる新しい方向性を示しています。

text: this film is too busy hitting all of its assigned marks to take on any life of its own .

text: one of the most plain , unimaginative romantic comedies i 've ever seen .
translation: 今まで見た中で最も平凡で想像力に欠けるロマンティックコメディの一つです。

text: it 's tough to watch , but it 's a fantastic movie .

text: 90 punitive minutes of eardrum-dicing gunplay , screeching-metal smashups , and flaccid odd-couple sniping .
translation: 鼓膜を切り刻む銃撃、金属がきしむ衝突、そして意気投合しないカップルの鈍い応酬が90分にわたって繰り広げられる。
back_translation: The sound of gunfire cutting through the eardrum, the clash of metal creaking, and the dull exchanges between a couple who don't get along unfold for 90 minutes.

text: moore provides an invaluable service by sparking debate and encouraging thought .

text: a big fat pain .
translation: 大きな苦痛。

back_translation: This is an undesirable movie filled with malicious fools, and it is not at all important whether their friendship is saved or not.

text: as giddy and whimsical and relevant today as it was 270 years ago .
translation: 270年前と同じように、浮き浮きしていて風変わりで、今日でも関連性があります。
back_translation: Just like 270 years ago, it is buoyant and eccentric, and still relevant today.

text: while some will object to the idea of a vietnam picture with such a rah-rah , patriotic tone , soldiers ultimately achieves its main strategic objective : dramatizing the human cost of the conflict that came to define a generation .
translation: 一部の人々は、そのような活気に満ちた愛国的なトーンのベトナム映画のアイデアに反対するかもしれませんが、最終的に『兵士たち』はその主な戦略的目的を達成しています。それは、世代を定義することになったこの対立の人間的コストをドラマチックに描くことです。
back_translation: Some people may oppose the idea of a vibrant patriotic tone in Vietnamese films, but ultimately, "The Soldiers" achieves its main strategic objective. It dramatically portrays the human cost of this conflict, which has come to define a generation.

text: it 's a pedestrian , flat drama that screams out ` amateur ' in almost every frame .
translation: これは歩行者のようなフラットなドラマで、ほぼすべてのフレームで「素人」と叫んでいます。

text: hip-hop rarely comes alive as its own fire-breathing entity in this picture .

back_translation: In this work, hip-hop is portrayed as almost lifeless, lacking its unique fiery presence.

text: parts seem like they were lifted from terry gilliam 's subconscious , pressed through kafka 's meat grinder and into buñuel 's casings
translation: その部分は、テリー・ギリアムの無意識から引き上げられ、カフカのミートグラインダーを通り、ブニュエルの皮に詰め込まれたように思える。

text: it could have been something special , but two things drag it down to mediocrity -- director clare peploe 's misunderstanding of marivaux 's rhythms , and mira sorvino 's limitations as a classical actress .

back_translation: It could have been something special, but two elements bring it down to the mundane. One is director Claire Peplow's misunderstanding of Marivaux's rhythm, and the other is Mira Sorvino's limitations as a classical actress.

translation: 親しみやすいが時代を超えたものではなく、マイクは子供たちに健全なファンタジーを提供しながら、いくつかの価値のあるテーマを提起しています。

text: an incredibly thoughtful , deeply meditative picture that neatly and effectively captures the debilitating grief felt in the immediate aftermath of the terrorist attacks .
translation: テロ攻撃の直後に感じられる思いを深く瞑想的に捉え、無理なく効果的に表現した、非常に考え抜かれた絵です。

text: this is an extraordinary film , not least because it is japanese and yet feels universal .

text: gaghan ... has thrown every suspenseful cliché in the book at this nonsensical story .

translation: デューシーズ・ワイルドは、ワンダラーズやブロンクス物語のような純真さへの別れの映画から恥知らずに盗用しながら、その知性を一切借りることなく、クリシェの百科事典です。
back_translation: Duesies Wild is a cliché encyclopedia that shamelessly borrows from films about parting with innocence like The Wanderers and The Bronx Tale, without borrowing any of their intelligence.

text: it 's still terrible !
translation: まだひどいです！

text: if ayurveda can help us return to a sane regimen of eating , sleeping and stress-reducing contemplation , it is clearly a good thing .
translation: もしアーユルヴェーダが私たちが健全な食事、睡眠、ストレスを軽減する瞑想に戻るのを助けることができるなら、それは明らかに良いことです。

text: will certainly appeal to asian cult cinema fans and asiaphiles interested to see what all the fuss is about .

translation: 彼らはただの警察官ですが、ナークでは見慣れた地域を通じて新しいルートを見つけます。

text: while dutifully pulling on heartstrings , directors dean deblois and chris sanders valiantly keep punching up the mix .
translation: 心の弦を引くことに忠実でありながら、ディレクターのディーン・デブロイスとクリス・サンダースは、勇敢にミックスを盛り上げ続けています。
back_translation: While being true to the strings of the heart, directors Dean DeBlois and Chris Sanders bravely continue to elevate the mix.

text: davis is funny , charming and quirky in her feature film acting debut as amy .

text: scherfig , the writer-director , has made a film so unabashedly hopeful that it actually makes the heart soar .
translation: スカーフィグ、作家兼監督は、心を高揚させるほどあからさまに希望に満ちた映画を作りました。
back_translation: Scafik, the writer and director, made a film that is so overtly full of hope that it lifts the spirits.

text: barry convinces us he 's a dangerous , secretly unhinged guy who could easily have killed a president because it made him feel powerful .
translation: バリーは、彼が危険で秘密裏に狂気じみた男であり、大統領を簡単に殺すことができた理由は、彼に力を感じさせるからだと私たちを納得させる。

text: an unsuccessful attempt at a movie of ideas .
translation: アイデアの映画に対する失敗した試み。

text: this strenuously unfunny showtime deserves the hook .
translation: この非常に面白くないショータイムはフックに値する。

text: stands as one of the year 's most intriguing movie experiences , letting its imagery speak for it while it forces you to ponder anew what a movie can be .
translation: 今年最も魅力的な映画体験の一つであり、その映像がその意味を語る一方で、映画とは何かを再考させられる作品です。
