back_translation: This story of unrequited love fails to maintain interest after the first 30 minutes.

text: it 's a stale , overused cocktail using the same olives since 1962 as garnish .
translation: それは1962年以来同じオリーブをガーニッシュとして使用している、古臭く使い古されたカクテルです。
back_translation: It is an old-fashioned cocktail that has been using the same olive as a garnish since 1962.

text: in imax in short , it 's just as wonderful on the big screen .
translation: IMAXでは、短く言うと、大きな画面で見るのは同じように素晴らしいです。
back_translation: In short, watching on a large screen in IMAX is equally wonderful.

text: sex ironically has little to do with the story , which becomes something about how lame it is to try and evade your responsibilities and that you should never , ever , leave a large dog alone with a toddler .
translation: セックスは皮肉なことに物語とはあまり関係がなく、責任から逃れようとすることがどれほどダサいかについての話になり、絶対に、大型犬を幼児と一緒に放置してはいけないという教訓につながります。
back_translation: Ironically, sex has little to do with the story, and it becomes a discussion about how uncool it is to try to escape responsibility, ultimately leading to the lesson that you should never leave a large dog alone with a toddler.

text: i 'd watch these two together again in a new york minute .
translation: 私はニューヨークの瞬間で、またこの二人を一緒に見ることができるなら喜んで見ます。
back_translation: I would be happy to see these two together again in the moment of New York.

text: it 's a film that 's destined to win a wide summer audience through word-of-mouth reviews and , not far down the line , to find a place among the studio 's animated classics .
translation: それは、口コミのレビューを通じて広い夏の観客を獲得し、そう遠くない将来にスタジオのアニメーションクラシックの中に位置づけられる運命の映画です。
back_translation: It is a film destined to gain a wide summer audience through word-of-mouth reviews and to be positioned among the classic studio animations in the not-so-distant future.

text: continually challenges perceptions of guilt and innocence , of good guys and bad , and asks us whether a noble end can justify evil means .
translation: 常に有罪と無罪、善人と悪人の認識に挑戦し、崇高な目的が悪しき手段を正当化できるかどうかを私たちに問いかけます。
back_translation: It constantly challenges our perceptions of guilt and innocence, good people and bad people, and questions whether noble purposes can justify evil means.

text: he 's a better actor than a standup comedian .
translation: 彼はスタンドアップコメディアンよりも優れた俳優です。
back_translation: He is a better actor than a stand-up comedian.

text: so beautifully acted and directed , it 's clear that washington most certainly has a new career ahead of him if he so chooses .
translation: 美しく演じられ、監督されており、ワシントンが望むなら確実に新しいキャリアが待っていることは明らかです。
back_translation: It is clear that beautifully performed and directed, a new career is undoubtedly waiting for Washington if he desires it.

text: he 's just a sad aristocrat in tattered finery , and the film seems as deflated as he does .
translation: 彼はボロボロの華やかさの中で悲しい貴族であり、映画も彼と同様にしぼんでいるように見える。
back_translation: He is a sad nobleman in tattered splendor, and the movie seems to wither just like him.

text: insomnia is one of the year 's best films and pacino gives one of his most daring , and complicated , performances .
translation: インソムニアは今年のベスト映画のひとつであり、パチーノは最も大胆で複雑な演技を見せています。
back_translation: Insomnia is one of the best movies of the year, and Pacino delivers the most bold and complex performance.

text: it 's so badly made on every level that i 'm actually having a hard time believing people were paid to make it .
translation: すべてのレベルでひどく作られているので、実際に人々がそれを作るために賃金を支払われたことを信じるのが難しいです。
back_translation: It's hard to believe that people were actually paid wages to create something that is so poorly made at every level.

text: while not quite `` shrek '' or `` monsters , inc. '' , it 's not too bad .
translation: 「シュレック」や「モンスターズ・インク」ほどではありませんが、悪くはありません。
back_translation: It's not as good as "Shrek" or "Monsters, Inc.", but it's not bad.

text: a slight but sweet film .
translation: 少しだけど甘い映画。
back_translation: A slightly sweet movie.

text: my only wish is that celebi could take me back to a time before i saw this movie and i could just skip it .
translation: 私の唯一の願いは、セレビィが私をこの映画を見る前の時代に連れて行ってくれることで、そうすれば私はそれをスキップできるのに。
back_translation: My only wish is for Celebi to take me back to the time before I saw this movie, so I could skip it.

text: one of these days hollywood will come up with an original idea for a teen movie , but until then there 's always these rehashes to feed to the younger generations .
translation: いつの日かハリウッドはティーン映画のオリジナルアイデアを思いつくでしょうが、それまでの間、若い世代に供給するための再ハッシュ作品が常にあります。
back_translation: One day, Hollywood will come up with original ideas for teen movies, but in the meantime, there will always be rehashed works to supply the younger generation.

text: an appalling ` ace ventura ' rip-off that somehow manages to bring together kevin pollak , former wrestler chyna and dolly parton .
translation: ひどい『エース・ベンチュラ』のパクリで、どういうわけかケビン・ポラック、元レスラーのチャイナ、そしてドリー・パートンが一緒に出演している。
back_translation: It's a terrible rip-off of "Ace Ventura," and for some reason, Kevin Pollak, former wrestler Chyna, and Dolly Parton are all appearing together.

text: a smart , arch and rather cold-blooded comedy .
translation: スマートでアーチ状、そしてやや冷酷なコメディ。
back_translation: A smart, arch, and somewhat cold-hearted comedy.

text: it finds no way to entertain or inspire its viewers .
translation: 視聴者を楽しませたり、感動させたりする方法が見つかりません。
back_translation: I can't find a way to entertain or move the audience.

text: a powerful , chilling , and affecting study of one man 's dying fall .
translation: 力強く、寒気を催させ、心に響く一人の男の死にゆく様を描いた研究。
back_translation: A study depicting the powerful, chilling, and heart-resounding death of a single man.

text: the satire is unfocused , while the story goes nowhere .
translation: 風刺は焦点が定まらず、物語はどこにも進まない。
back_translation: The satire is unfocused, and the story goes nowhere.

text: the son of the bride 's humour is born out of an engaging storyline , which also is n't embarrassed to make you reach for the tissues .
translation: 新婦の息子のユーモアは、魅力的なストーリーラインから生まれており、感情的でティッシュを必要とすることも恥じていません。
back_translation: The humor of the bride's son arises from an engaging storyline, and it is not ashamed to be emotional and in need of tissues.

text: an uneasy mix of run-of-the-mill raunchy humor and seemingly sincere personal reflection .
translation: ありふれた下品なユーモアと、一見真剣な個人的な反省の不安定な混在。
back_translation: A volatile mix of commonplace crude humor and seemingly serious personal reflection.

text: an uplifting , near-masterpiece .
translation: 心を高揚させる、ほぼマスターピース。
back_translation: A nearly masterful work that elevates the heart.

text: the film 's hero is a bore and his innocence soon becomes a questionable kind of inexcusable dumb innocence .
translation: 映画のヒーローは退屈で、彼の無邪気さはすぐに疑問の余地がある弁解の余地のない愚かな無邪気さに変わる。
back_translation: The hero of the movie is boring, and his innocence quickly transforms into a questionable, excuse-free foolishness.

text: unlike lots of hollywood fluff , this has layered , well-developed characters and some surprises .
translation: ハリウッドの軽薄な作品とは異なり、これは層のある、よく発展したキャラクターといくつかの驚きがあります。
back_translation: Unlike the lightweight productions of Hollywood, this has depth, well-developed characters, and several surprises.

text: in his role of observer of the scene , lawrence sounds whiny and defensive , as if his life-altering experiences made him bitter and less mature .
translation: 場面の観察者としての役割において、ローレンスは不平を言い、自己防衛的に響き、人生を変えるような経験が彼を苦いものにし、未熟にさせたかのようです。
back_translation: In his role as an observer of the scene, Lawrence seems to complain, sounding defensive, as if life-changing experiences have made him bitter and immature.

text: boasts eye-catching art direction but has a forcefully quirky tone that quickly wears out its limited welcome .
translation: 目を引くアートディレクションを誇りますが、強引に奇抜なトーンはすぐにその限られた歓迎を使い果たしてしまいます。
back_translation: It boasts eye-catching art direction, but an overly bold and eccentric tone quickly exhausts its limited welcome.

text: pete 's screenplay manages to find that real natural , even-flowing tone that few movies are able to accomplish .
translation: ピーターの脚本は、ほとんどの映画が達成できない、本物の自然で流れるようなトーンを見つけることに成功している。
back_translation: Peter's script successfully finds a genuine, natural, and flowing tone that most movies fail to achieve.

text: exploitative and largely devoid of the depth or sophistication that would make watching such a graphic treatment of the crimes bearable .
translation: 搾取的であり、またそのような犯罪のグラフィックな描写を観ることを耐えられるものにする深さや洗練さがほとんど欠けている。
back_translation: It is exploitative and lacks almost any depth or sophistication that would make enduring the graphic depiction of such crimes tolerable.

text: the humor and humanity of monsoon wedding are in perfect balance .
translation: モンスーン・ウェディングのユーモアと人間性は完璧にバランスが取れています。
back_translation: The humor and humanity of Monsoon Wedding are perfectly balanced.

text: the gorgeously elaborate continuation of `` the lord of the rings '' trilogy is so huge that a column of words can not adequately describe co-writer\/director peter jackson 's expanded vision of j.r.r. tolkien 's middle-earth .
translation: 「ロード・オブ・ザ・リング」三部作の美しく壮大な続編はあまりにも巨大で、共同脚本家であり監督であるピーター・ジャクソンのJ.R.R.トールキンの中つ国に対する拡張されたビジョンを言葉で十分に表現することはできません。
back_translation: The beautiful and grand sequel to the "Lord of the Rings" trilogy is so vast that words cannot adequately express the expanded vision of J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth by co-writer and director Peter Jackson.

text: to paraphrase a line from another dickens ' novel , nicholas nickleby is too much like a fragment of an underdone potato .
translation: ニコラス・ニクルビーは、半焼きのジャガイモのかけらのように生煮えすぎている。
back_translation: Nicholas Nickleby is undercooked like a half-baked potato.

text: lacks depth .
translation: 深みが欠けている。
back_translation: It lacks depth.

text: it 's as if solondz had two ideas for two movies , could n't really figure out how to flesh either out , so he just slopped ` em together here .
translation: まるでソロンツが二つの映画のための二つのアイデアを持っていて、どちらも具体化する方法がわからなかったので、ここでただまとめてしまったかのようだ。
back_translation: It feels as if Solon has two ideas for two films, but since he didn't know how to develop either of them, he just bundled them together here.

text: in the end , tuck everlasting falls victim to that everlasting conundrum experienced by every human who ever lived : too much to do , too little time to do it in .
translation: 結局、『永久に続くもの』は、これまで生きてきたすべての人間が経験する永遠の難問の犠牲となってしまう：やることが多すぎて、それをやる時間があまりにも少ないということだ。
back_translation: In the end, "things that continue indefinitely" become the victims of the eternal dilemma experienced by all humanity: there is too much to do and far too little time to do it.

text: this slight premise ... works because of the ideal casting of the masterful british actor ian holm as the aged napoleon .
translation: このわずかな前提は、熟練の英国俳優イアン・ホルムが老いたナポレオンを理想的にキャスティングされたことで機能しています。
back_translation: This slight premise works due to the ideal casting of the aged Napoleon by the seasoned British actor Ian Holm.

text: rarely has sex on screen been so aggressively anti-erotic .
translation: 画面上でのセックスは、これほどまでに攻撃的に反エロティックであったことはほとんどない。
back_translation: Sex on screen has rarely been this aggressively anti-erotic.

text: straightforward and old-fashioned in the best possible senses of both those words , possession is a movie that puts itself squarely in the service of the lovers who inhabit it .
translation: 率直で昔ながらの、両者の言葉の最良の意味において、『ポゼッション』はそれを内包する恋人たちのために自らをしっかりと提供する映画です。
back_translation: In a straightforward and old-fashioned sense, "Possession" is a film that firmly offers itself for lovers who encompass it in the best meaning of both words.

text: though the story ... is hackneyed , the characters have a freshness and modesty that transcends their predicament .
translation: 物語は使い古されたものであるが、キャラクターたちは彼らの境遇を超えた新鮮さと控えめさを持っている。
back_translation: The story is cliché, but the characters have a freshness and modesty that transcends their circumstances.

text: it 's light on the chills and heavy on the atmospheric weirdness , and there are moments of jaw-droppingly odd behavior -- yet i found it weirdly appealing .
translation: それは寒気を軽くし、雰囲気の奇妙さを重くしており、驚くほど奇妙な行動の瞬間もありますが、私はそれが不思議に魅力的だと感じました。
back_translation: It relieves the chill and intensifies the strangeness of the atmosphere, and although there are moments of surprisingly strange behavior, I found it strangely captivating.

text: the first tunisian film i have ever seen , and it 's also probably the most good-hearted yet sensual entertainment i 'm likely to see all year .
translation: 私が今まで見た最初のチュニジア映画であり、おそらく今年見ることになる最も心温まるが同時に官能的なエンターテインメントでもあります。
back_translation: It is the first Tunisian film I have ever seen and probably the most heartwarming yet sensual entertainment I will see this year.

text: anybody who enjoys quirky , fun , popcorn movies with a touch of silliness and a little bloodshed .
translation: 少しのユーモアと血しぶきを交えた、風変わりで楽しいポップコーン映画を楽しむ人。
back_translation: A person who enjoys a quirky and fun popcorn movie mixed with a little humor and some blood splatter.

text: as the dominant christine , sylvie testud is icily brilliant .
translation: 支配的なクリスティーヌとして、シルヴィ・テスタドは冷たくも輝かしい。
back_translation: As the dominant Christine, Sylvie Testud is cold yet radiant.

text: the makers of mothman prophecies succeed in producing that most frightening of all movies -- a mediocre horror film too bad to be good and too good to be bad .
translation: 「モスマン・プロフェシーズ」の製作者たちは、最も恐ろしい映画を作ることに成功しました。つまり、あまりにも悪くて良いわけではなく、あまりにも良くて悪いわけでもない、普通のホラー映画です。
back_translation: The creators of "Mossman Prophecies" have succeeded in making one of the most terrifying movies. In other words, it's not so bad that it's good, nor so good that it's bad; it's just an ordinary horror film.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- devastatingly powerful and astonishingly vivid holocaust drama .
translation: （a）壊滅的に強力で驚くほど鮮やかなホロコーストドラマ。
back_translation: (a) A devastatingly powerful and astonishingly vivid Holocaust drama.

text: dogtown & z-boys evokes the blithe rebel fantasy with the kind of insouciance embedded in the sexy demise of james dean .
translation: ドッグタウン＆Zボーイズは、ジェームズ・ディーンのセクシーな死に埋め込まれたような無頓着さで、楽しげな反逆者のファンタジーを呼び起こします。
back_translation: Dogtown & Z-Boys evokes a playful rebel fantasy with a carefree attitude, reminiscent of the sexy death of James Dean.

text: it works well enough , since the thrills pop up frequently , and the dispatching of the cast is as often imaginative as it is gory .
translation: それなりにうまく機能しており、スリルが頻繁に現れるため、キャストの処理は想像力に富んでいると同時に残酷でもあります。
back_translation: It functions reasonably well, and because thrills occur frequently, the handling of the cast is both imaginative and cruel.

text: -lrb- hayek -rrb- throws herself into this dream hispanic role with a teeth-clenching gusto , she strikes a potent chemistry with molina and she gradually makes us believe she is kahlo .
translation: -（ハイエック）-は、この夢のようなヒスパニック役に歯をくいしばって情熱的に挑み、モリーナとの強力な化学反応を生み出し、徐々に彼女がカーロであると私たちに信じさせる。
back_translation: - (Hayek) passionately tackles this dreamlike Hispanic role with grit, generating a powerful chemistry with Molina and gradually convincing us that she is Caro.

text: the film 's needlessly opaque intro takes its doe-eyed crudup out of pre-9 \/ 11 new york and onto a cross-country road trip of the homeric kind .
translation: 映画の無駄に不透明なイントロは、目を輝かせたクリューパを9/11以前のニューヨークからオデュッセイアのような全国横断の旅へと連れ出します。
back_translation: The movie's unnecessarily opaque introduction takes a wide-eyed Cleopa from pre-9/11 New York on an epic cross-country journey like an Odyssey.

text: the biggest problem with satin rouge is lilia herself .
translation: サテン・ルージュの最大の問題はリリア自身です。
back_translation: The biggest problem with Satin Rouge is Lilia herself.

text: the thought of watching this film with an audience full of teenagers fixating on its body humour and reinforcement of stereotypes -lrb- of which they 'll get plenty -rrb- fills me with revulsion .
translation: 十代の観客がそのボディーヒューモアやステレオタイプの強化に夢中になってこの映画を観ることを考えると、私は嫌悪感を覚えます。
back_translation: Thinking about how teenage audiences become engrossed in the body humor and reinforcement of stereotypes in this movie makes me feel disgusted.

text: captivates and shows how a skillful filmmaker can impart a message without bludgeoning the audience over the head .
translation: 魅了し、巧妙な映画製作者がどのようにして観客を強く打ちのめすことなくメッセージを伝えることができるかを示しています。
back_translation: It shows how captivating and skillful filmmakers can convey messages without overwhelming the audience.

text: jaglom offers the none-too-original premise that everyone involved with moviemaking is a con artist and a liar .
translation: ジャグラムは、映画製作に関わるすべての人が詐欺師であり嘘つきであるという、あまり新しくない前提を提示しています。
back_translation: Jaguram presents the premise that everyone involved in film production is a fraud and a liar, which is not a particularly new idea.

text: contrived , maudlin and cliche-ridden ... if this sappy script was the best the contest received , those rejected must have been astronomically bad .
translation: 作り物めいていて、感傷的で、クリシェが多すぎる…もしこの陳腐な脚本がコンテストで受け取った中で最良のものであれば、却下されたものは天文学的にひどかったに違いない。
back_translation: It's contrived, sentimental, and filled with clichés... If this trite script was the best they received in the contest, then the rejected ones must have been astronomically terrible.

text: one suspects that craven endorses they simply because this movie makes his own look much better by comparison .
translation: 誰もが疑っているのは、クレイヴンがこの映画を支持しているのは、単に自分の作品を比較してより良く見せるためだということです。
back_translation: What everyone doubts is that Craven supports this movie simply to make his own work look better in comparison.

text: the film 's final hour , where nearly all the previous unseen material resides , is unconvincing soap opera that tornatore was right to cut .
translation: 映画の最終時間は、ほぼすべての未公開素材が存在する場所であり、説得力のないメロドラマであり、トルナトーレはカットするべきだと正しかった。
back_translation: The final hour of the film is a place where almost all the unused material exists, and it is an unconvincing melodrama, and Tornatore was right that it should have been cut.

text: like its bizarre heroine , it irrigates our souls .
translation: 不思議なヒロインのように、それは私たちの心を潤します。
back_translation: Like a mysterious heroine, it nourishes our hearts.

text: savvy director robert j. siegel and his co-writers keep the story subtle and us in suspense .
translation: 賢い監督ロバート・J・シーゲルと彼の共同執筆者たちは、物語を控えめに保ち、私たちを緊張させ続けます。
back_translation: The clever director Robert J. Siegel and his co-writers keep the story restrained and continuously keep us on edge.

text: puts on airs of a hal hartley wannabe film -- without the vital comic ingredient of the hilarious writer-director himself .
translation: ハル・ハートリーのオナラを振りかざした映画ですが、彼自身のユーモラスな作家・監督という重要なコメディ要素が欠けています。
back_translation: It's a film that brandishes Hal Hartley's fart, but it lacks his important comedic elements as a humorous writer and director.

text: the appeal of the vulgar , sexist , racist humour went over my head or -- considering just how low brow it is -- perhaps it snuck under my feet .
translation: 俗悪で性差別的、そして人種差別的なユーモアの魅力は私には理解できなかったか、あるいはそのあまりの低俗さに、私の足元をすり抜けてしまったのかもしれない。
back_translation: I may not have understood the appeal of vulgar, sexist, and racist humor, or perhaps it slipped through my fingers due to its sheer baseness.

text: has the disjointed feel of a bunch of strung-together tv episodes .
translation: バラバラなテレビエピソードがつながれたようなぎこちない感じがする。
back_translation: It feels awkward, as if disconnected television episodes have been pieced together.

text: while broomfield 's film does n't capture the effect of these tragic deaths on hip-hop culture , it succeeds as a powerful look at a failure of our justice system .
translation: ブルームフィールドの映画は、これらの悲劇的な死がヒップホップ文化に与える影響を捉えていませんが、私たちの司法制度の失敗を力強く描写する点では成功しています。
back_translation: Bloomfield's film does not capture the impact of these tragic deaths on hip-hop culture, but it succeeds in powerfully depicting the failures of our justice system.

text: completely creatively stillborn and executed in a manner that i 'm not sure could be a single iota worse ... a soulless hunk of exploitative garbage .
translation: 完全に創造性がなく、私が知っている限りこれ以上ひどくなることはないような方法で実行された... 魂のない搾取的なゴミの塊。
back_translation: Executed in a completely uncreative manner, and to the best of my knowledge, it couldn’t get any worse... a soulless, exploitative pile of garbage.

text: ... a vivid , thoughtful , unapologetically raw coming-of-age tale full of sex , drugs and rock 'n' roll .
translation: ... 性、ドラッグ、ロックンロールに満ちた鮮やかで思慮深く、まったく遠慮のない成長物語。
back_translation: A vibrant, thoughtful, and utterly unreserved coming-of-age story filled with sex, drugs, and rock 'n' roll.

text: a treat for its depiction on not giving up on dreams when you 're a struggling nobody .
translation: 夢を諦めないことを描いたことに対する賞賛、苦しむ無名の存在であるときに。
back_translation: Praise for depicting the act of not giving up on dreams, especially when one is an unnamed existence suffering.

text: it 's fitting that a movie as artificial and soulless as the country bears owes its genesis to an animatronic display at disneyland .
translation: ディズニーランドのアニマトロニクス展示に起源を持つ、人工的で魂のない映画として『カントリー・ベアーズ』があるのは、適切なことです。
back_translation: It is fitting that "The Country Bears," an artificial and soulless film, has its origins in the animatronics exhibits of Disneyland.

text: we do n't get paid enough to sit through crap like this .
translation: こんなクソみたいなものを我慢するために十分には給料をもらっていない。
back_translation: I am not paid enough to put up with this kind of crap.

text: feels like a cold old man going through the motions .
translation: 冷たく年老いた男が作業をこなしているように感じる。
back_translation: It feels like an old, cold man is completing his tasks.

text: both an admirable reconstruction of terrible events , and a fitting memorial to the dead of that day , and of the thousands thereafter .
translation: 恐ろしい出来事の称賛すべき再構築であり、その日とその後の何千もの死者へのふさわしい記念碑でもあります。
back_translation: It is a commendable reconstruction of a terrifying event and a fitting monument to the thousands of dead on that day and thereafter.

text: bravado kathy !
translation: ブラバドー、キャシー！
back_translation: Bravado, Cathy!

text: execrable .
translation: ひどい
back_translation: Terrible.

text: -lrb- seagal 's -rrb- strenuous attempt at a change in expression could very well clinch him this year 's razzie .
translation: セガールの表情の変化に対する懸命な試みは、今年のラジー賞を受賞する可能性が非常に高い。
back_translation: Seagal's earnest attempts at changing his expressions have a very high likelihood of winning this year's Razzie award.

text: thoroughly awful .
translation: 徹底的にひどい。
back_translation: Thoroughly terrible.

text: the production values are of the highest and the performances attractive without being memorable .
translation: 制作クオリティは最高で、パフォーマンスは印象に残らないまでも魅力的です。
back_translation: The production quality is top-notch, and although the performance may not be memorable, it is still魅力的 (charming/appealing).

text: starts as a tart little lemon drop of a movie and ends up as a bitter pill .
translation: 最初は小さくて酸っぱいレモンドロップのような映画ですが、最後には苦い薬になります。
back_translation: At first, it's like a small, sour lemon drop of a movie, but in the end, it becomes a bitter medicine.

text: despite besson 's high-profile name being wasabi 's big selling point , there is no doubt that krawczyk deserves a huge amount of the credit for the film 's thoroughly winning tone .
translation: ベッソンの注目の名前がワサビの大きな売りのポイントであるにもかかわらず、クラウチックが映画の魅力的なトーンに対して多大な評価を受けるべきであることに疑いの余地はありません。
back_translation: There is no doubt that while Besson's notable name is a major selling point for Wasabi, Clauzique deserves significant recognition for the film's captivating tone.

text: often lingers just as long on the irrelevant as on the engaging , which gradually turns what time is it there ?
translation: しばしば、興味深いことと同じくらい無関係なことに長く留まってしまうため、徐々に「今、そちらは何時ですか？」という疑問に変わってしまいます。
back_translation: Often, we end up lingering on things that are just as irrelevant as they are interesting, gradually changing the question to "What time is it over there now?"

text: a sensitive , moving , brilliantly constructed work .
translation: 感受性豊かで感動的、卓越した構成の作品。
back_translation: A work that is rich in sensitivity, moving, and excellently structured.

text: not exaggerated enough to be a parody of gross-out flicks , college flicks , or even flicks in general .
translation: あまりにも誇張されていなくて、グロ映画や大学映画、さらには一般的な映画のパロディとは言えない。
back_translation: It's not exaggerated to the point where it can't be called a parody of horror films, college films, or even general movies.

text: a high-minded snoozer .
translation: 高尚な眠り猫。
back_translation: Noble sleeping cat.

text: bring on the sequel .
translation: 続編を持ってきて。
back_translation: Bring the sequel.

text: judging by those standards , ` scratch ' is a pretty decent little documentary .
translation: その基準から判断すると、「スクラッチ」はなかなか良いドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: Judging by that standard, "Scratch" is quite a good documentary.

text: a movie like the guys is why film criticism can be considered work .
translation: 「ガイズ」のような映画は、映画批評が仕事と見なされる理由です。
back_translation: Movies like "Guys" are the reason why film criticism is considered a profession.

text: pc stability notwithstanding , the film suffers from a simplistic narrative and a pat , fairy-tale conclusion .
translation: PCの安定性はさておき、映画は単純な構成とお決まりの無理のある結末に苦しんでいます。
back_translation: Aside from the stability of the PC, the movie suffers from a simple structure and a predictable, forced ending.

text: an often watchable , though goofy and lurid , blast of a costume drama set in the late 15th century .
translation: しばしば視聴可能でありながら、愚かで派手な、15世紀後半を舞台にしたコスチュームドラマの爆発的な作品。
back_translation: A flamboyant and foolish costume drama set in the late 15th century, often available for viewing.

text: check your brain and your secret agent decoder ring at the door because you do n't want to think too much about what 's going on .
translation: 脳と秘密エージェントの暗号解読リングはドアのところでチェックしてください。何が起こっているかについてあまり考えたくないので。
back_translation: Please check the brain and the secret agent's code-breaking ring at the door. I don't want to think too much about what's going on.

text: a seriocomic debut of extravagant promise by georgian-israeli director dover kosashvili .
translation: ジョージア・イスラエルの監督ドーバー・コサシヴィリによる、壮大な期待を抱かせるシリアスコメディのデビュー。
back_translation: A debut serious comedy by Georgian-Israeli director Dover Kosashvili that raises grand expectations.

text: as saccharine as it is disposable .
translation: とても甘いが、使い捨てのように。
back_translation: Very sweet, but like a disposable item.

text: the film becomes an overwhelming pleasure , and you find yourself rooting for gai 's character to avoid the fate that has befallen every other carmen before her .
translation: その映画は圧倒的な喜びとなり、あなたはガイのキャラクターが彼女以前のすべてのカルメンに降りかかった運命を避けることを応援している自分に気づきます。
back_translation: The movie becomes an overwhelming joy, and you realize that you are rooting for Guy's character to avoid the fate that befell all the Carmens before her.

text: matters play out realistically if not always fairly .
translation: 物事は現実的に展開しますが、必ずしも公平ではありません。
back_translation: Things unfold realistically, but are not necessarily fair.

text: as lively an account as seinfeld is deadpan .
translation: セインフェルドが無表情なように、こちらは活き活きとした話です。
back_translation: Like Seinfeld's expressionless demeanor, this is a lively story.

text: it may not be a great piece of filmmaking , but its power comes from its soul 's - eye view of how well-meaning patronizing masked a social injustice , at least as represented by this case .
translation: それは素晴らしい映画とは言えないかもしれませんが、その力は、善意から来た後ろめたさがどのように社会的な不正を覆い隠しているかを、この事例を通して示している魂の視点にあります。
back_translation: It may not be called a wonderful movie, but its power lies in the soul's perspective that shows how guilt stemming from goodwill covers up social injustices through this case.

text: the only thing that distinguishes a randall wallace film from any other is the fact that there is nothing distinguishing in a randall wallace film .
translation: ランドール・ウォレスの映画を他の映画と区別する唯一の点は、ランドール・ウォレスの映画には特別な特徴が何もないということです。
back_translation: The only distinguishing feature of Randall Wallace's films compared to other movies is that there is nothing particularly special about them.

text: contains all the substance of a twinkie -- easy to swallow , but scarcely nourishing .
translation: ツインキーの全ての成分を含んでいる──飲み込みやすいが、ほとんど栄養がない。
back_translation: Contains all the components of Twin Key──easy to swallow, but almost no nutritional value.

text: cremaster 3 is at once a tough pill to swallow and a minor miracle of self-expression .
translation: クレマスター3は、一方で受け入れがたいものであり、同時に自己表現の小さな奇跡です。
back_translation: Cremaster 3 is, on one hand, something that is difficult to accept, and at the same time, a small miracle of self-expression.

text: ver wiel 's desperate attempt at wit is lost , leaving the character of critical jim two-dimensional and pointless .
translation: ウェア・ウィールの絶望的な機知の試みは失われ、クリティカル・ジムのキャラクターは二次元的で無意味なものになっている。
back_translation: The desperate attempt at wit in Wear Wheel has been lost, and the character of Critical Jim has become two-dimensional and meaningless.

text: instead of hitting the audience over the head with a moral , schrader relies on subtle ironies and visual devices to convey point of view .
translation: 観客に道徳を押し付ける代わりに、シュレイダーは微妙な皮肉や視覚的手法に頼って視点を伝えます。
back_translation: Instead of forcing morals onto the audience,シュレイダー relies on subtle irony and visual techniques to convey perspective.

text: a sustained fest of self-congratulation between actor and director that leaves scant place for the viewer .
translation: 俳優と監督の間の持続的な自己満足の祭りが、観客のための余地をほとんど残さない。
back_translation: A continuous self-satisfaction fest between actors and directors leaves hardly any room for the audience.

text: a lame romantic comedy about an unsympathetic character and someone who would not likely be so stupid as to get involved with her .
translation: 同情を誘わないキャラクターと、彼女と関わるほど愚かではないと思われる誰かを巡る、つまらないロマンティックコメディ。
back_translation: A dull romantic comedy about a character who doesn’t inspire sympathy and someone who is not considered foolish enough to get involved with her.

text: a much more successful translation than its most famous previous film adaptation , writer-director anthony friedman 's similarly updated 1970 british production .
translation: その最も有名な前の映画化よりもはるかに成功した翻訳であり、脚本家兼監督のアンソニー・フリードマンによる同様に更新された1970年の英国制作です。
back_translation: It is a translation that was far more successful than the most famous earlier film adaptation, a similarly updated 1970 British production by writer and director Anthony Friedman.

text: hugh grant 's act is so consuming that sometimes it 's difficult to tell who the other actors in the movie are .
translation: ヒュー・グラントの演技はとても引き込まれるもので、時々映画の他の俳優が誰なのか判断するのが難しいことがあります。
back_translation: Hugh Grant's performance is so captivating that sometimes it's hard to tell who the other actors in the movie are.

text: mendes still does n't quite know how to fill a frame .
translation: メンデスはまだどのようにフレームを埋めるかよくわかっていない。
back_translation: Mendes still doesn't quite understand how to fill the frame.

text: but darned if it does n't also keep us riveted to our seats .
translation: しかし、それが私たちを席に引きつけ続けていることは確かです。
back_translation: However, it is certain that it continues to draw us to our seats.

text: such an incomprehensible mess that it feels less like bad cinema than like being stuck in a dark pit having a nightmare about bad cinema .
translation: そんな理解不能な混乱は、悪い映画にいるというよりも、悪い映画についての悪夢に囚われている暗い穴に閉じ込められているように感じられる。
back_translation: Such incomprehensible confusion feels less like being in a bad movie and more like being trapped in a dark hole, caught in a nightmare about a bad movie.

text: there 's too much forced drama in this wildly uneven movie , about a young man 's battle with his inescapable past and uncertain future in a very shapable but largely unfulfilling present .
translation: この極端に不均衡な映画には、避けられない過去と不確かな未来との戦いを描く若者の物語において、あまりにも強引なドラマが詰め込まれている。非常に形作りやすいが、主に満たされない現在を舞台にしている。
back_translation: This extremely unbalanced film packs an overly forceful drama into a story of youth battling an inevitable past and an uncertain future. It is highly moldable but is primarily set in a largely unfulfilled present.

text: to call this film a lump of coal would only be to flatter it .
translation: この映画を石炭の塊と呼ぶのは、それを褒めるだけに過ぎない。
back_translation: To call this movie a lump of coal is merely to praise it.

text: all of the filmmakers ' calculations ca n't rescue brown sugar from the curse of blandness .
translation: すべての映画製作者の計算では、ブラウンシュガーを平凡さの呪いから救うことはできない。
back_translation: In the calculations of all filmmakers, brown sugar cannot be saved from the curse of mediocrity.

text: intriguing and stylish .
translation: 魅力的でスタイリッシュ。
back_translation: Attractive and stylish.

text: a few nonbelievers may rethink their attitudes when they see the joy the characters take in this creed , but skeptics are n't likely to enter the theater .
translation: 一部の非信者は、この信条に対するキャラクターたちの喜びを見て自らの態度を再考するかもしれませんが、懐疑的な人々が劇場に足を運ぶことはあまりないでしょう。
back_translation: Some non-believers may reconsider their attitudes after seeing the characters' joy in this creed, but it's unlikely that skeptical people will visit the theater.

text: mostly , shafer and co-writer gregory hinton lack a strong-minded viewpoint , or a sense of humor .
translation: 主に、シェイファーと共同執筆者のグレゴリー・ヒントンは、強い見解やユーモアのセンスに欠けています。
back_translation: Mainly, Schaefer and co-author Gregory Hinton lack strong opinions and a sense of humor.

text: it should be interesting , it should be poignant , it turns out to be affected and boring .
translation: それは興味深くあるべきであり、心に残るべきですが、実際には影響を受けて退屈なものになってしまいました。
back_translation: It should be interesting and memorable, but in reality, it became boring and affected.

text: when it 's not wallowing in hormonal melodrama , `` real women have curves '' is a sweet , honest , and enjoyable comedy-drama about a young woman who wants many things in life , but fears she 'll become her mother before she gets to fulfill her dreams .
translation: ホルモンのメロドラマに没頭していないとき、「リアル・ウーマン・ハブ・カーブス」は、人生に多くのものを望む若い女性が、自分の夢を実現する前に母親になってしまうことを恐れているという、甘くて正直で楽しいコメディ・ドラマです。
back_translation: When not engrossed in hormonal melodrama, "Real Women Have Curves" is a sweet, honest, and fun comedy-drama about young women who desire many things in life and fear becoming mothers before realizing their dreams.

text: cold , nervy and memorable .
translation: 冷たく、緊張感があり、記憶に残る。
back_translation: Cold, tense, and memorable.

text: first-timer john mckay is never able to pull it back on course .
translation: 初めてのジョン・マッケイは、決してコースに戻すことができません。
back_translation: The first John McKay can never return to the course.

text: you can practically hear george orwell turning over .
translation: ジョージ・オーウェルがうめき声を上げているのが聞こえるようです。
back_translation: It seems that you can hear George Orwell groaning.

text: helmer hudlin tries to make a hip comedy , but his dependence on slapstick defeats the possibility of creating a more darkly edged tome .
translation: ヘルマー・ハドリンはヒップなコメディを作ろうとしていますが、スラップスティックへの依存が、よりダークな作品を創造する可能性を打ち砕いています。
back_translation: Helmer Hadlin is trying to create a hip comedy, but his reliance on slapstick is crushing the possibility of creating darker works.

text: passion , melodrama , sorrow , laugther , and tears cascade over the screen effortlessly ...
translation: 情熱、メロドラマ、悲しみ、笑い、そして涙が、 effortlessに画面を流れ落ちる…
back_translation: Passion, melodrama, sadness, laughter, and tears flow effortlessly across the screen...

text: eric schweig and graham greene both exude an air of dignity that 's perfect for the proud warrior that still lingers in the souls of these characters .
translation: エリック・シュワイグとグraham・グリーンはどちらも、これらのキャラクターの魂にまだ残る誇り高い戦士にぴったりな dignitiy の雰囲気を漂わせています。
back_translation: Eric Schwig and Graham Green both exude an atmosphere of dignity that is perfect for these characters, proud warriors whose spirits still remain.

text: what jackson has done is proven that no amount of imagination , no creature , no fantasy story and no incredibly outlandish scenery
translation: ジャクソンがやったことは、どんなに想像力が豊かでも、どんな生き物でも、どんなファンタジーの物語でも、どんなに突飛な風景でも、実現できることを証明したということです。
back_translation: What Jackson did was to prove that, no matter how rich one's imagination is, any creature, any fantasy story, and any bizarre landscape can be realized.

text: there is n't one moment in the film that surprises or delights .
translation: 映画の中には驚きや喜びを与える瞬間が一つもない。
back_translation: There is not a single moment in the movie that brings surprise or joy.

text: spiderman rocks
translation: スパイダーマンは最高です。
back_translation: Spider-Man is the best.

text: the plot is plastered with one hollywood cliche after another , most of which involve precocious kids getting the better of obnoxious adults .
translation: プロットは、一つまた一つとハリウッドのクリシェで覆われており、そのほとんどは生意気な子供たちが嫌な大人を出し抜くというものです。
back_translation: The plot is covered with Hollywood clichés, most of which involve cheeky kids outsmarting unpleasant adults.

text: astonishing is n't the word -- neither is incompetent , incoherent or just plain crap .
translation: 驚くべきという言葉では足りない -- 無能でもなく、支離滅裂でもなく、ただのクズでもない。
back_translation: The word "amazing" is not enough -- it's not incompetence, it's not incoherence, it's simply not garbage.

text: you might want to take a reality check before you pay the full ticket price to see `` simone , '' and consider a dvd rental instead .
translation: 「シモーヌ」を観るために全額を支払う前に、現実的なチェックをすることをお勧めします。その代わりにDVDレンタルを検討してみてください。
back_translation: Before paying the full amount to watch "Simone," I recommend doing a reality check. Instead, consider renting the DVD.

text: unfortunately , a cast of competent performers from movies , television and the theater are cast adrift in various new york city locations with no unifying rhythm or visual style .
translation: 残念ながら、有能な映画、テレビ、そして劇場の演者たちが、統一感のあるリズムや視覚スタイルなしに、様々なニューヨーク市の場所に漂流しています。
back_translation: Unfortunately, talented actors from films, television, and theater are drifting through various locations in New York City without a cohesive rhythm or visual style.

text: kids five and up will be delighted with the fast , funny , and even touching story .
translation: 5歳以上の子供たちは、速くて面白く、さらには感動的なストーリーに喜ぶことでしょう。
back_translation: Children aged 5 and older will delight in fast-paced, interesting, and even touching stories.

text: still , the updated dickensian sensibility of writer craig bartlett 's story is appealing .
translation: それでも、作家クレイグ・バートレットの物語に見られる更新されたディケンズ的感受性は魅力的です。
back_translation: Nonetheless, the updated Dickensian sensibility seen in the stories of author Craig Bartlett is captivating.

text: waydowntown manages to nail the spirit-crushing ennui of denuded urban living without giving in to it .
translation: waydowntownは、剥き出しの都市生活がもたらす精神的な倦怠感を見事に捉えながらも、それに屈しません。
back_translation: Waydowntown beautifully captures the mental fatigue brought about by the stark realities of urban life, yet it does not succumb to it.

text: he watches them as they float within the seas of their personalities .
translation: 彼は彼らが自分の個性の海の中で漂っているのを見つめている。
back_translation: He is staring at them as they drift in the sea of his own personality.

text: hard as this may be to believe , here on earth , a surprisingly similar teen drama , was a better film .
translation: 信じがたいかもしれませんが、地球上の驚くほど似たようなティーンドラマは、より良い映画でした。
back_translation: It may be hard to believe, but the incredibly similar teen drama on Earth was a better movie.

text: it 's a funny little movie with clever dialogue and likeable characters .
translation: それは巧妙な対話と好感の持てるキャラクターがいる面白い小さな映画です。
back_translation: It is an interesting little film with clever dialogue and likable characters.

text: this charming , thought-provoking new york fest of life and love has its rewards .
translation: この魅力的で考えさせられるニューヨークの生命と愛の祭典には、その報いがあります。
back_translation: This captivating and thought-provoking celebration of life and love in New York has its rewards.

text: a full-frontal attack on audience patience .
translation: 観客の忍耐に対する全面的な攻撃。
back_translation: A full-scale attack on the audience's patience.

text: ... less a story than an inexplicable nightmare , right down to the population 's shrugging acceptance to each new horror .
translation: ...物語というよりは説明不可能な悪夢であり、住民が新たな恐怖に対して肩をすくめて受け入れる様子に至るまで。
back_translation: ...rather than a story, it is an inexplicable nightmare, culminating in the residents shrugging and accepting the new fear.

text: this long and relentlessly saccharine film is a clear case of preaching to the converted .
translation: この長くて執拗に甘ったるい映画は、すでに賛同している人たちに説教している明らかな例です。
back_translation: This long and persistently sweet movie is a blatant example of preaching to the choir.

text: the film is old-fashioned , occasionally charming and as subtle as boldface .
translation: その映画は古風で、時折魅力的で、太字のように控えめです。
back_translation: The movie is old-fashioned, occasionally charming, and modest like bold text.

text: an entertaining mix of period drama and flat-out farce that should please history fans .
translation: 歴史ファンを喜ばせる、時代劇と完全なばかげたコメディの楽しいミックスです。
back_translation: A fun mix of historical drama that delights history fans and completely absurd comedy.

text: a very well-meaning movie , and it will stand in future years as an eloquent memorial to the world trade center tragedy .
translation: 非常に意義のある映画であり、将来にわたって世界貿易センターの悲劇に対する雄弁な記念碑として位置付けられるでしょう。
back_translation: It is a very meaningful film and will be positioned as an eloquent monument to the tragedy of the World Trade Center for years to come.

text: it 's pretty linear and only makeup-deep , but bogdanovich ties it together with efficiency and an affection for the period .
translation: それはかなり線形で表面的ですが、ボグダノビッチはそれを効率的に、そしてその時代への愛情を持ってまとめています。
back_translation: It is quite linear and superficial, but Bogdanovich summarizes it efficiently and with affection for the era.

text: adaptation is simply brilliant .
translation: 適応は単純に素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Adaptation is simply wonderful.

text: a thought-provoking picture .
translation: 考えさせられる写真。
back_translation: A thought-provoking photo.

text: but arriving at a particularly dark moment in history , it offers flickering reminders of the ties that bind us .
translation: しかし、歴史の特に暗い瞬間に到達することで、それは私たちを結びつける絆のちらつく思い出を提供します。
back_translation: However, by reaching particularly dark moments in history, it provides a flickering memory of the bonds that connect us.

text: director charles stone iii applies more detail to the film 's music than to the story line ; what 's best about drumline is its energy .
translation: チャールズ・ストーンIII監督は、物語よりも映画の音楽により多くの詳細を注いでいます。ドラムラインの最も素晴らしい点は、そのエネルギーです。
back_translation: Director Charles Stone III pays more attention to the film's music than to the story. The most wonderful aspect of Drumline is its energy.

text: presents nothing special and , until the final act , nothing overtly disagreeable .
translation: 特に何も特別なものは提示されず、最後の行為まで特に不快なこともありません。
back_translation: Nothing particularly special was presented, and there was nothing especially unpleasant until the last act.

text: turturro is fabulously funny and over the top as a ` very sneaky ' butler who excels in the art of impossible disappearing\/reappearing acts
translation: タートゥーロは非常に素晴らしく面白く、過剰な演技で「非常に狡猾な」執事を演じており、不可能な消失／再登場の技術に秀でています。
back_translation: Turturro is incredibly wonderful and interesting, playing a "very cunning" butler with excessive acting, and excels in the impossible techniques of disappearing and reappearing.

text: director yu seems far more interested in gross-out humor than in showing us well-thought stunts or a car chase that we have n't seen 10,000 times .
translation: ユ監督は、私たちが1万回見たことのない巧妙なスタントやカー・チェイスを見せるよりも、むしろ過激なユーモアに興味があるようです。
back_translation: Director Yu seems to be more interested in extreme humor rather than showing clever stunts or car chases that we have never seen a thousand times before.

text: average , at best , i 'm afraid .
translation: 平均的です、いくらか残念ですが。
back_translation: It's average, which is somewhat disappointing.

text: this is a superior horror flick .
translation: これは優れたホラー映画です。
back_translation: This is an excellent horror movie.

text: the cast delivers without sham the raw-nerved story .
translation: キャストは偽りなく、神経を尖らせた物語を届けます。
back_translation: The cast delivers a story that is true and sharpens the senses.

text: all in all , it 's a pretty good execution of a story that 's a lot richer than the ones hollywood action screenwriters usually come up with on their own .
translation: 全体として見ると、これはハリウッドのアクション脚本家が通常独自に考え出す物語よりもずっと豊かな物語の、とても良い実行です。
back_translation: Overall, this is a very good execution of a story that is much richer than what Hollywood action screenwriters usually come up with on their own.

text: it 's got all the familiar bruckheimer elements , and schumacher does probably as good a job as anyone at bringing off the hopkins\/rock collision of acting styles and onscreen personas .
translation: それはすべての馴染みのあるブラッカイマーの要素を持っていて、シューマカーはホプキンスとロックの演技スタイルや画面上のペルソナの衝突を描くのが誰よりも上手くやっていると思います。
back_translation: It has all the familiar elements of a Brackheimer film, and I think Schumacher does a better job than anyone at depicting the clash between Hopkins and Rock's acting styles and on-screen personas.

text: i felt trapped and with no obvious escape for the entire 100 minutes .
translation: 私は100分間ずっと閉じ込められているように感じ、明らかな脱出方法もありませんでした。
back_translation: I felt like I was trapped for 100 minutes with no obvious way to escape.

text: although i did n't hate this one , it 's not very good either .
translation: これが嫌いというわけではありませんが、あまり良くもありません。
back_translation: It's not that I dislike this, but it's not very good either.

text: cattaneo reworks the formula that made the full monty a smashing success ... but neglects to add the magic that made it all work .
translation: カッタネオは「フルモンティ」を大成功に導いたフォーミュラを再構築するが、その全てを機能させた魔法を加えるのを怠る。
back_translation: Kattaneo reconstructs the formula that led "The Full Monty" to great success, but neglects to add the magic that made it all work.

text: a moving and not infrequently breathtaking film .
translation: 感動的で、時に息をのむような映画。
back_translation: An emotional and sometimes breathtaking movie.

text: while the plot follows a predictable connect-the-dots course ... director john schultz colors the picture in some evocative shades .
translation: ストーリーは予測可能な点をつなぐ展開を追う一方で、監督のジョン・シュルツは作品にいくつかの印象的な色合いを与えています。
back_translation: While the story follows a development that connects predictable points, director John Schultz adds several impressive touches to the work.

text: anemic , pretentious .
translation: 貧血で、気取った。
back_translation: I was in a fancy mood because of anemia.

text: with few respites , marshall keeps the energy humming , and his edits , unlike those in moulin rouge , are crisp and purposeful without overdoing it .
translation: 休憩が少ない中、マーシャルはエネルギーを保ち続け、彼の編集は『ムーラン・ルージュ』のものとは異なり、鮮明で目的意識があり、やりすぎることはありません。
back_translation: Despite the limited breaks, Marshall maintains his energy, and his editing is distinct from that of "Moulin Rouge," being sharp, purposeful, and never overdone.

text: light-years ahead of paint-by-number american blockbusters like pearl harbor , at least artistically .
translation: アート的には、少なくとも「パール・ハーバー」のようなアメリカのブロックバスターのペイントバイナンバーよりもはるかに先を行っています。
back_translation: Artistically, it is far ahead of American blockbusters like "Pearl Harbor" in terms of paint-by-numbers.

text: one of those unassuming films that sneaks up on you and stays with you long after you have left the theatre .
translation: 劇場を離れた後も長く心に残る、控えめながらもじわじわと迫ってくる映画の一つ。
back_translation: One of those films that lingers in your heart long after leaving the theater, subtly yet steadily making its impact.

text: all of it works smoothly under the direction of spielberg , who does a convincing impersonation here of a director enjoying himself immensely .
translation: すべてはスピルバーグの指揮の下でスムーズに進み、彼はここで楽しんでいる監督の convincingly な真似をしています。
back_translation: Everything is progressing smoothly under Spielberg's direction, and he is convincingly mimicking a director enjoying himself here.

text: a work that lacks both a purpose and a strong pulse .
translation: 目的も強い脈動も欠けている作品。
back_translation: A work that lacks both a strong purpose and a strong pulse.

text: a moving , if uneven , success .
translation: 動きのある、もし不均一であっても、成功。
back_translation: Movement is success, even if it is uneven.

text: it 's one thing to read about or rail against the ongoing - and unprecedented - construction project going on over our heads .
translation: 頭上で進行中の前例のない建設プロジェクトについて読むことや非難することは一つのことです。
back_translation: Reading about or criticizing the unprecedented construction project underway above you is one thing.

text: -lrb- a -rrb- real pleasure in its laid-back way .
translation: そのリラックスした方法で、真の喜びがあります。
back_translation: In that relaxed manner, there is true joy.

text: feels like pieces a bunch of other , better movies slapped together .
translation: 他のいくつかの、より良い映画の要素が組み合わさったように感じる。
back_translation: It feels like elements from several other, better movies have come together.

text: has all the hallmarks of a movie designed strictly for children 's home video , a market so insatiable it absorbs all manner of lame entertainment , as long as 3-year-olds find it diverting .
translation: 子供向けのホームビデオ専用に作られた映画の特徴をすべて備えており、この市場は非常に欲深く、3歳児が楽しめる限り、あらゆる種類のつまらない娯楽を吸収する。
back_translation: It possesses all the characteristics of a movie made specifically for home videos aimed at children, and this market is very greedy, absorbing all kinds of dull entertainment as long as it's enjoyable for a 3-year-old.

text: ... too contrived to be as naturally charming as it needs to be .
translation: ... 自然に魅力的であるべきなのに、あまりにも作り込まれている。
back_translation: ... It should be naturally attractive, but it's overly crafted.

text: ... in no way original , or even all that memorable , but as downtown saturday matinee brain candy , it does n't disappoint .
translation: ... 決してオリジナルではなく、特に記憶に残るものでもありませんが、ダウンタウンの土曜午後の軽いお菓子としては、期待を裏切ることはありません。
back_translation: ... It's certainly not original, nor is it particularly memorable, but as a light snack on a Saturday afternoon in downtown, it doesn't disappoint.

text: the 50-something lovebirds are too immature and unappealing to care about .
translation: 50代の愛の鳥たちは、未熟すぎて魅力がなく、気にかける価値がありません。
back_translation: Birds of love in their 50s are too immature and unappealing, and not worth caring about.

text: after a while , the only way for a reasonably intelligent person to get through the country bears is to ponder how a whole segment of pop-music history has been allowed to get wet , fuzzy and sticky .
translation: しばらくすると、合理的に知的な人がカントリー・ベアーズを乗り越える唯一の方法は、ポップ音楽の歴史の一部がどのようにして濡れたり、ふわふわしたり、べたべたしたりすることを許されているのかを考えることです。
back_translation: After a while, the only way for a rational and intelligent person to overcome the Country Bears is to consider how a part of the history of pop music is allowed to become wet, fluffy, or sticky.

text: a lot of fun , with an undeniable energy sparked by two actresses in their 50s working at the peak of their powers .
translation: 非常に楽しく、彼女たちの力のピークで働く50代の二人の女優によって引き起こされた否定できないエネルギーがあります。
back_translation: There is undeniable energy generated by two actresses in their 50s working at the peak of their power, which is highly enjoyable.

text: a breathtaking adventure for all ages , spirit tells its poignant and uplifting story in a stunning fusion of music and images .
translation: すべての年齢層に向けた息をのむような冒険で、スピリットは音楽と映像の素晴らしい融合の中で、感動的で心を高揚させる物語を語ります。
back_translation: In a breath-taking adventure for all age groups, Spirit tells an inspiring and uplifting story through a wonderful fusion of music and visuals.

text: this is a nicely handled affair , a film about human darkness but etched with a light -lrb- yet unsentimental -rrb- touch .
translation: これはうまく処理された問題であり、人間の闇についての映画ですが、軽やかでありながら非感情的なタッチで刻まれています。
back_translation: This is a well-handled issue that is a film about the darkness of humanity, yet it is marked with a light and unemotional touch.

text: a bland animated sequel that hardly seems worth the effort .
translation: 努力する価値がほとんどない平凡なアニメの続編。
back_translation: A sequel to an ordinary anime that is hardly worth the effort.

text: unspeakable , of course , barely begins to describe the plot and its complications .
translation: 言葉では言い表せないが、もちろん、プロットやその複雑さを表現するにはほとんど始まりにもならない。
back_translation: It is hard to express in words, but of course, this is barely a starting point for conveying the plot or its complexity.

text: a limp eddie murphy vehicle that even he seems embarrassed to be part of .
translation: エディ・マーフィが参加していることすら恥ずかしがっているような、ダメな映画。
back_translation: A bad movie that even seems embarrassed to have Eddie Murphy involved.

text: the film sparkles with the the wisdom and humor of its subjects .
translation: その映画は、登場人物たちの知恵とユーモアで輝いています。
back_translation: The movie shines with the wisdom and humor of its characters.

text: though a capable thriller , somewhere along the way k-19 jettisoned some crucial drama .
translation: 能力のあるスリラーではあるが、K-19は途中でいくつかの重要なドラマを切り捨ててしまった。
back_translation: Although it is a capable thriller, K-19 has discarded several important dramatic elements along the way.

text: it 's ... worth the extra effort to see an artist , still committed to growth in his ninth decade , change while remaining true to his principles with a film whose very subject is , quite pointedly , about the peril of such efforts .
translation: それは…9つ目の十年に入っても成長に意欲的なアーティストが、原則に忠実でありながら変化する様子を、そうした努力の危険性について明確に言及した映画を通じて見るために、余分な努力をする価値がある。
back_translation: It is worth making an extra effort to see how artists who are eager for growth even in the ninth decade remain faithful to their principles while changing, as depicted in films that clearly address the dangers of such efforts.

text: in auteil 's less dramatic but equally incisive performance , he 's a charismatic charmer likely to seduce and conquer .
translation: オテイユの劇的ではないが同様に鋭い演技において、彼は魅力的な魅力度を持ったカリスマ的な人物であり、誘惑し征服する可能性が高い。
back_translation: In Oteyu's not dramatic but similarly sharp performance, he is a charismatic figure with an attractive allure, likely to tempt and conquer.

text: how many more times will indie filmmakers subject us to boring , self-important stories of how horrible we are to ourselves and each other ?
translation: インディー映画製作者は、私たち自身やお互いに対してどれほどひどいかという退屈で自己重要感の強い物語を、あと何回私たちに強いるのでしょうか？
back_translation: How many more times will indie filmmakers force us to endure the boring and self-important stories about how terrible we are to ourselves and each other?

text: this is a movie that refreshes the mind and spirit along with the body , so original is its content , look , and style .
translation: これは心と精神、体をリフレッシュさせる映画であり、その内容、見た目、スタイルは非常にオリジナルです。
back_translation: This is a movie that refreshes the heart, mind, and body, and its content, appearance, and style are very original.

text: a much better documentary -- more revealing , more emotional and more surprising -- than its pedestrian english title would have you believe .
translation: その平凡な英語のタイトルからは想像できないほど、はるかに優れたドキュメンタリーであり、より明らかで、より感情的で、より驚くべき内容です。
back_translation: It is a far superior documentary than one might imagine from its ordinary English title, with clearer, more emotional, and more astonishing content.

text: ` if you are in the mood for an intelligent weepy , it can easily worm its way into your heart . '
translation: 「もしあなたが知的な感動的な作品を求めているのなら、それは容易にあなたの心に入り込むことができます。」
back_translation: "If you are looking for an intellectually moving work, it can easily enter your heart."

text: who knows , but it works under the direction of kevin reynolds .
translation: 誰が知っているかはわからないが、ケビン・レイノルズの指導の下で機能している。
back_translation: I don't know who knows, but it is functioning under the guidance of Kevin Reynolds.

text: it 's supposed to be post-feminist breezy but ends up as tedious as the chatter of parrots raised on oprah .
translation: それはポストフェミニスト的な軽快さを持っているはずなのに、オプラに育てられたオウムのように退屈になってしまいます。
back_translation: It is supposed to have a post-feminist lightness, yet it ends up being dull like a parrot raised by Oprah.

text: lacking substance and soul , crossroads comes up shorter than britney 's cutoffs .
translation: 実体と魂が欠けている「クロスロード」は、ブリトニーのカットオフよりも短い。
back_translation: The "Crossroads," which lacks substance and soul, is shorter than Britney's cut-off.

text: simple , poignant and leavened with humor , it 's a film that affirms the nourishing aspects of love and companionship .
translation: シンプルで、心に響き、ユーモアも織り交ぜられたこの映画は、愛と友情の栄養効果を肯定する作品です。
back_translation: This film, which is simple, resonates with the heart, and incorporates humor, affirms the nurturing effects of love and friendship.

text: at times , the movie looks genuinely pretty .
translation: 時折、その映画は本当に美しく見える。
back_translation: At times, that movie looks really beautiful.

text: a deliberative account of a lifestyle characterized by its surface-obsession -- one that typifies the delirium of post , pre , and extant stardom .
translation: 表面的な執着によって特徴づけられるライフスタイルについての熟考された説明 -- これは、過去、現在、および存在するスターダムの熱狂を典型づけるものである。
back_translation: A thoughtful explanation of a lifestyle characterized by superficial obsession - this typifies the fervor of past, present, and existing stardom.

text: this is surely one of the most frantic , virulent and foul-natured christmas season pics ever delivered by a hollywood studio .
translation: これは間違いなく、ハリウッドスタジオによって届けられた最も狂乱で、猛毒的で、悪質なクリスマスシーズンの写真の一つです。
back_translation: This is undoubtedly one of the most frenzied, toxic, and malicious Christmas season photos delivered by a Hollywood studio.

text: i simply ca n't recommend it enough .
translation: 私はそれを十分にお勧めすることができません。
back_translation: I cannot recommend it enough.

text: it 's a glorified sitcom , and a long , unfunny one at that .
translation: それは誇張されたシットコムであり、長くて面白くないものです。
back_translation: It is an exaggerated sitcom that is long and not funny.

text: returning director rob minkoff ... and screenwriter bruce joel rubin ... have done a fine job of updating white 's dry wit to a new age .
translation: 復帰する監督ロブ・ミンコフと脚本家ブルース・ジョエル・ルービンは、ホワイトの乾いたウィットを新しい時代に合わせて見事に更新しました。
back_translation: Returning director Rob Minkoff and screenwriter Bruce Joel Rubin have brilliantly updated White's dry wit for a new era.

text: with zoe clarke-williams 's lackluster thriller `` new best friend '' , who needs enemies ?
translation: ゾーイ・クラーク・ウィリアムズの魅力に欠けるスリラー「新しい親友」では、敵など必要ないのでは？
back_translation: In Zoe Clarke-Williams' lackluster thriller "New Best Friend," is there even a need for an enemy?

text: just send it to cranky .
translation: それをクランキーに送ってください。
back_translation: Please send it to Crunky.

text: it 's secondary to american psycho but still has claws enough to get inside you and stay there for a couple of hours .
translation: アメリカン・サイコには劣るが、それでもあなたの中に入り込み、数時間そこに留まるだけの爪を持っている。
back_translation: It may be inferior to American Psycho, but it still has the claws to creep into you and stay there for a few hours.

text: one of the funnier movies in town .
translation: 町で一番面白い映画の一つ。
back_translation: One of the most interesting movies in town.

text: a terrific insider look at the star-making machinery of tinseltown .
translation: ティンセルタウンのスター製造の仕組みについての素晴らしい内部の視点。
back_translation: An excellent inside look at the star-making machine of Tinseltown.

text: the movie is amateurish , but it 's a minor treat .
translation: その映画は素人臭いですが、小さな楽しみです。
back_translation: The movie seems amateurish, but it's a small pleasure.

text: it is n't scary .
translation: 怖くないです。
back_translation: It's not scary.

text: a preposterous , prurient whodunit .
translation: 不条理で好色な誰がやったのかというミステリー。
back_translation: A mystery of absurdity and lewdness, questioning who did it.

text: they are what makes it worth the trip to the theatre .
translation: 彼らがいるからこそ、劇場への旅が価値あるものになる。
back_translation: It is because of them that the journey to the theater becomes worthwhile.

text: chan 's stunts are limited and so embellished by editing that there 's really not much of a sense of action or even action-comedy .
translation: チャンのスタントは限られていて、編集によってかなり誇張されているため、実際にはアクションやアクションコメディの感覚があまり感じられない。
back_translation: Chan's stunts are limited and have been greatly exaggerated through editing, so the actual sense of action or action comedy is not really felt.

text: an average kid-empowerment fantasy with slightly above-average brains .
translation: 平均的な子供の力を引き出すファンタジー、少し以上の知性を持つ。
back_translation: A fantasy that brings out the average child's potential, possessing slightly above-average intelligence.

text: instead of making his own style , director marcus adams just copies from various sources -- good sources , bad mixture
translation: 自分自身のスタイルを作る代わりに、監督マーカス・アダムスはさまざまなソースからコピーするだけです。良いソースと悪い混合が含まれています。
back_translation: Instead of creating his own style, director Marcus Adams simply copies from various sources. This includes a mix of good and bad sources.

text: the plot of the comeback curlers is n't very interesting actually , but what i like about men with brooms and what is kind of special is how the film knows what 's unique and quirky about canadians .
translation: 『カムバックカーラーズ』のプロットは実際にはあまり興味深くありませんが、『メン・ウィズ・ブルームズ』が好きな理由、そして特別な点は、映画がカナダ人についての独特で風変わりな部分を理解しているところです。
back_translation: The plot of "Comeback Curlers" isn't actually very interesting, but the reason I like "Men with Blooms" and its special aspect is that the movie understands the unique and quirky facets of Canadians.

text: tambor and clayburgh make an appealing couple -- he 's understated and sardonic , she 's appealingly manic and energetic .
translation: タンバとクレイバーグは魅力的なカップルです。彼は控えめで皮肉屋、彼女は魅力的にマニックでエネルギッシュです。
back_translation: Tamba and Kleiberg are an intriguing couple. He is modest and cynical, while she is charmingly manic and energetic.

text: the movie is without intent .
translation: その映画は意図のないものです。
back_translation: That movie is without intention.

text: the best thing about the movie is its personable , amusing cast .
translation: 映画の一番の魅力は、親しみやすく面白いキャストです。
back_translation: The greatest appeal of the movie is its relatable and interesting cast.

text: here is a divine monument to a single man 's struggle to regain his life , his dignity and his music .
translation: これは、1人の男性が自分の人生、尊厳、そして音楽を取り戻すための闘いを称えた神聖な記念碑です。
back_translation: This is a sacred monument that celebrates the struggle of a man to reclaim his life, dignity, and music.

text: if you 're the kind of parent who enjoys intentionally introducing your kids to films which will cause loads of irreparable damage that years and years of costly analysis could never fix , i have just one word for you - -- decasia
translation: もしあなたが、子供たちに意図的に修復不可能な損害を与える映画を紹介することを楽しむタイプの親なら、私から一つの言葉を贈ります - デカジア。
back_translation: If you are the type of parent who enjoys introducing films that intentionally inflict irreparable damage on children, I have one word for you - Dekagia.

text: all movie long , city by the sea swings from one approach to the other , but in the end , it stays in formula -- which is a waste of de niro , mcdormand and the other good actors in the cast .
translation: 映画全体を通して、『シティ・バイ・ザ・シー』は一方のアプローチから他方へと揺れ動きますが、結局は型にはまったものに留まります。これはデ・ニーロやマクドーマンド、そしてキャストの他の優れた俳優たちにとっては無駄です。
back_translation: Throughout the entire film, "City by the Sea" wavers from one approach to another, but ultimately remains trapped in a mold. This is a waste for De Niro, MacDormand, and the other excellent actors in the cast.

text: painful , horrifying and oppressively tragic , this film should not be missed .
translation: 痛ましく、恐ろしい、そして圧倒的に悲劇的なこの映画は、見逃してはいけません。
back_translation: This painfully, terrifyingly, and overwhelmingly tragic film is one you cannot miss.

text: take care is nicely performed by a quintet of actresses , but nonetheless it drags during its 112-minute length .
translation: 「テイク・ケア」は5人の女優によって見事に演じられていますが、それでも112分の長さの中でダラダラと感じる場面があります。
back_translation: "Take Care" is brilliantly performed by five actresses, but there are still moments that feel dragged out within its 112-minute length.

text: the script covers huge , heavy topics in a bland , surfacey way that does n't offer any insight into why , for instance , good things happen to bad people .
translation: その脚本は、大きくて重いテーマを淡々とした表面的な方法で扱っており、例えば、なぜ悪い人に良いことが起こるのかについての洞察を提供していません。
back_translation: The script deals with large and heavy themes in a calm and superficial manner, for example, it does not provide insights into why good things happen to bad people.

text: a seriously bad film with seriously warped logic by writer-director kurt wimmer at the screenplay level .
translation: 脚本レベルでのカート・ウィマーによる、非常に歪んだ論理を持つ、真剣にひどい映画。
back_translation: A seriously terrible movie with very twisted logic at the script level by Kurt Wimmer.

text: a deliciously nonsensical comedy about a city coming apart at its seams .
translation: 街が崩壊しつつある中での美味しくも意味不明なコメディ。
back_translation: A delicious yet nonsensical comedy set in a city that is on the verge of collapsing.
